bereishit bara 'elohim 'et hashamayim ve'et ha'arez. veha'arez hayetah tohu vabohu vekhoshekh 'al penei tehom veruakh 'elohim merakhefet 'al penei hamayim. vayomer 'elohim yehi 'or vayhi 'or. vayar 'elohim 'et ha'or ki tob vayabdel 'elohim ben ha'or uben hakhoshekh. vayiqra 'elohim la'or yom velakhoshekh qara layelah vayhi 'ereb vayhi boqer yom 'ekhad. vayomer 'elohim yehi raqia' betokh hamayim vihi mabdil ben mayim lamayim. vaya'as 'elohim 'et haraqia' vayabdel ben hamayim 'asher mitakhat laraqia' uben hamayim 'asher mei'al laraqia' vayhi khen. vayiqra 'elohim laraqia' shamayim vayhi 'ereb vayhi boqer yom sheini. vayomer 'elohim yiqavu hamayim mitakhat hashamayim 'el maqom 'ekhad veteira'eh hayabashah vayhi khen. vayiqra 'elohim layabashah 'erez ulemiqveh hamayim qara yamim vayar 'elohim ki tob. vayomer 'elohim tadshei ha'arez deshe 'eiseb mazria' zera' 'ez peri 'oseh peri lemino 'asher zar'o bo 'al ha'arez vayhi khen. vatozei ha'arez deshe 'eiseb mazria' zera' lemineihu ve'ez 'oseh peri 'asher zar'o bo lemineihu vayar 'elohim ki tob. vayhi 'ereb vayhi boqer yom shelishi. vayomer 'elohim yehi me'orot birqia' hashamayim lehabdil ben hayom uben halayelah vehayu le'otot ulemo'adim uleyamim veshanim. vehayu lim'orot birqia' hashamayim leha'ir 'al ha'arez vayhi khen. vaya'as 'elohim 'et shenei hame'orot hagedolim 'et hama'or hagadol lememshelet hayom ve'et hama'or haqaton lememshelet halaylah ve'et hakokhabim. vayiten 'otam 'elohim birqia' hashamayim leha'ir 'al ha'arez. velimshol bayom ubalaylah ulahabdil ben ha'or uben hakhoshekh vayar 'elohim ki tob. vayhi 'ereb vayhi boqer yom rebi'i. vayomer 'elohim yishrezu hamayim sherez nefesh khayah ve'of ye'ofef 'al ha'arez 'al penei reqia' hashamayim. vayibra 'elohim 'et hataninim hagedolim ve'et kal nefesh hakhayah haromeset 'asher sharezu hamayim lemineihem ve'et kal 'of kanaf lemineihu vayar 'elohim ki tob. vaybarekh 'otam 'elohim leimor peru urebu umil'u 'et hamayim bayamim veha'of yireb ba'arez. vayhi 'ereb vayhi boqer yom khamishi. vayomer 'elohim tozei ha'arez nefesh khayah leminah beheimah varemes vekhayto 'erez leminah vayhi khen. vaya'as 'elohim 'et khayat ha'arez leminah ve'et habeheimah leminah ve'et kal remes ha'adamah lemineihu vayar 'elohim ki tob. vayomer 'elohim na'aseh 'adam bezalmeinu kidmuteinu veyirdu bidgat hayam ube'of hashamayim ubabeheimah ubekhal ha'arez ubekhal haremes haromes 'al ha'arez. vayibra 'elohim 'et ha'adam bezalmo bezelem 'elohim bara 'oto zakhar uneqeibah bara 'otam. vaybarekh 'otam 'elohim vayomer lahem 'elohim peru urebu umil'u 'et ha'arez vekhibshuha uredu bidgat hayam ube'of hashamayim ubekhal khayah haromeset 'al ha'arez. vayomer 'elohim hineh natati lakhem 'et kal 'eiseb zoreia' zera' 'asher 'al penei khal ha'arez ve'et kal ha'ez 'asher bo feri 'ez zoreia' zara' lakhem yihyeh le'akhlah ulekhal khayat ha'arez ulekhal 'of hashamayim ulekhol romes 'al ha'arez 'asher bo nefesh khayah 'et kal yereq 'eiseb le'akhlah vayhi khen. vayar 'elohim 'et kal 'asher 'asah vehineh tob me'od vayhi 'ereb vayhi boqer yom hashishi. vaykhulu hashamayim veha'arez vekhal zeba'am. vaykhal 'elohim bayom hashebi'i melakhto 'asher 'asah vayishbot bayom hashebi'i mikal melakhto 'asher 'asah. vaybarekh 'elohim 'et yom hashebi'i vayqadesh 'oto ki bo shabat mikal melakhto 'asher bara 'elohim la'asot. 'eleh toldot hashamayim veha'arez behibare'am beyom 'asot ihoh 'elohim 'erez veshamayim. vekhol siakh hasadeh terem yihyeh ba'arez vekhal 'eiseb hasadeh terem yizmakh ki lo himtir ihoh 'elohim 'al ha'arez ve'adam 'ayin la'abod 'et ha'adamah. ve'ed ya'aleh min ha'arez vehishqah 'et kal penei ha'adamah. vayizer ihoh 'elohim 'et ha'adam 'afar min ha'adamah vayipakh be'apav nishmat khayim vayhi ha'adam lenefesh khayah. vayita' ihoh 'elohim gan be'eiden miqedem vayasem sham 'et ha'adam 'asher yazar. vayazmakh ihoh 'elohim min ha'adamah kal 'ez nekhmad lemar'eh vetob lema'akhal ve'ez hakhayim betokh hagan ve'ez hada'at tob vara'. venahar yozei mei'eiden lehashqot 'et hagan umisham yipared vehayah le'arba'ah rashim. shem ha'ekhad pishon hu hasobeb 'et kal 'erez hakhavilah 'asher sham hazahab. uzahab ha'arez hahiv tob sham habedolakh ve'eben hashoham. veshem hanahar hasheini gikhon hu hasobeb 'et kal 'erez kush. veshem hanahar hashelishi khideqel hu haholekh qidmat 'ashur vehanahar harebi'i hu ferat. vayiqakh ihoh 'elohim 'et ha'adam vayanikheihu began 'eiden le'abedah uleshamerah. vayzav ihoh 'elohim 'al ha'adam leimor mikol 'ez hagan 'akhol tokhel. umei'ez hada'at tob vara' lo tokhal mimenu ki beyom 'akhalekha mimenu mot tamut. vayomer ihoh 'elohim lo tob heyot ha'adam lebado 'e'eseh lo 'eizer kenegdo. vayizer ihoh 'elohim min ha'adamah kal khayat hasadeh ve'et kal 'of hashamayim vayabei 'el ha'adam lir'ot mah yiqra lo vekhol 'asher yiqra lo ha'adam nefesh khayah hu shemo. vayiqra ha'adam sheimot lekhal habeheimah ule'of hashamayim ulekhol khayat hasadeh ule'adam lo maza 'eizer kenegdo. vayapel ihoh 'elohim tardeimah 'al ha'adam vayishan vayiqakh 'akhat mizal'otav vayisgor basar takhtenah. vayiben ihoh 'elohim 'et hazeila' 'asher laqakh min ha'adam le'ishah vaybi'eha 'el ha'adam. vayomer ha'adam zot hapa'am 'ezem mei'azamai ubasar mibesari lezot yiqarei 'ishah ki mei'ish luqokhah zot. 'al ken ya'azab 'ish 'et 'abiv ve'et 'imo vedabaq be'ishto vehayu lebasar 'ekhad. vayihyu sheneihem 'arumim ha'adam ve'ishto velo yitboshashu. vehanakhash hayah 'arum mikol khayat hasadeh 'asher 'asah ihoh 'elohim vayomer 'el ha'ishah 'af ki 'amar 'elohim lo tokhelu mikol 'ez hagan. vatomer ha'ishah 'el hanakhash miperi 'ez hagan nokhel. umiperi ha'ez 'asher betokh hagan 'amar 'elohim lo tokhelu mimenu velo tige'u bo pen temutun. vayomer hanakhash 'el ha'ishah lo mot temutun. ki yodeia' 'elohim ki beyom 'akhalekhem mimenu venifqekhu 'eineikhem vihyitem keilohim yode'ei tob vara'. vateire ha'ishah ki tob ha'ez lema'akhal vekhi ta'avah hu la'einayim venekhmad ha'ez lehaskil vatiqakh mipiryo vatokhal vatiten gam le'ishah 'imah vayokhal. vatipaqakhnah 'einei sheneihem vayeide'u ki 'eirumim hem vayitperu 'aleh te'einah vaya'asu lahem khagorot. vayishme'u 'et qol ihoh 'elohim mithalekh bagan leruakh hayom vayitkhabei ha'adam ve'ishto mipenei ihoh 'elohim betokh 'ez hagan. vayiqra ihoh 'elohim 'el ha'adam vayomer lo 'ayekah. vayomer 'et qolekha shama'ti bagan va'ira ki 'eirom 'anokhi va'eikhabei. vayomer mi higid lekha ki 'eirom 'atah hamin ha'ez 'asher zivitikha lebilti 'akhal mimenu 'akhaleta. vayomer ha'adam ha'ishah 'asher natatah 'imadi hi natenah li min ha'ez va'okhel. vayomer ihoh 'elohim la'ishah mah zot 'asit vatomer ha'ishah hanakhash hishi'ani va'okhel. vayomer ihoh 'elohim 'el hanakhash ki 'asita zot 'arur 'atah mikal habeheimah umikol khayat hasadeh 'al gekhonekha teilekh ve'afar tokhal kal yemei khayekha. ve'eibah 'ashit beinekha uben ha'ishah uben zar'akha uben zar'ah hu yeshufekha rosh ve'atah teshufenu 'aqeb. 'el ha'ishah 'amar harbah 'arbeh 'izebonekh veheironekh be'ezeb teiledi banim ve'el 'ishekh teshuqatekh vehu yimshal bakh. ule'adam 'amar ki shama'ta leqol 'ishtekha vatokhal min ha'ez 'asher zivitikha leimor lo tokhal mimenu 'arurah ha'adamah ba'aburekha be'izabon tokhalenah kol yemei khayekha. veqoz vedardar tazmiakh lakh ve'akhalta 'et 'eiseb hasadeh. bezei'at 'apekha tokhal lekhem 'ad shubekha 'el ha'adamah ki mimenah luqakheta ki 'afar 'atah ve'el 'afar tashub. vayiqra ha'adam shem 'ishto khavah ki hi hayetah 'em kal khai. vaya'as ihoh 'elohim le'adam ule'ishto katenot 'or vayalbishem. vayomer ihoh 'elohim hen ha'adam hayah ke'akhad mimenu lada'at tob vara' ve'atah pen yishlakh yado velaqakh gam mei'ez hakhayim ve'akhal vakhai le'olam. vayshalekheihu ihoh 'elohim migan 'eiden la'abod 'et ha'adamah 'asher luqakh misham. vaygaresh 'et ha'adam vayashken miqedem legan 'eiden 'et hakerubim ve'et lahat hakhereb hamithapekhet lishmor 'et derekh 'ez hakhayim. veha'adam yada' 'et khavah 'ishto vatahar vateiled 'et qayin vatomer qaniti 'ish 'et ihoh. vatosef laledet 'et 'akhiv 'et habel vayhi hebel ro'eh zon veqayin hayah 'obed 'adamah. vayhi miqez yamim vayabei qayin miperi ha'adamah minkhah ihoh. vehebel heibi gam hu mibekhorot zono umeikhelbeihen vayisha' ihoh 'el hebel ve'el minkhato. ve'el qayin ve'el minkhato lo sha'ah vayikhar leqayin me'od vayipelu panav. vayomer ihoh 'el qayin lamah kharah lakh velamah nafelu fanekha. halo 'im teitib se'et ve'im lo teitib lapetakh khatat robez ve'eilekha teshuqato ve'atah timshal bo. vayomer qayin 'el hebel 'akhiv vayhi bihyotam basadeh vayaqam qayin 'el hebel 'akhiv vayahargeihu. vayomer ihoh 'el qayin 'ei hebel 'akhikha vayomer lo yada'ti hashomer 'akhi 'anokhi. vayomer meh 'asita qol demei 'akhikha zo'aqim 'eilai min ha'adamah. ve'atah 'arur 'atah min ha'adamah 'asher pazetah 'et piha laqakhat 'et demei 'akhikha miyadekha. ki ta'abod 'et ha'adamah lo tosef tet kokhah lakh na' vanad tihyeh ba'arez. vayomer qayin 'el ihoh gadol 'avoni mineso. hen geirashta 'oti hayom mei'al penei ha'adamah umipanekha 'esater vehayiti na' vanad ba'arez vehayah khal moze'i yahargeini. vayomer lo ihoh lakhen kal horeg qayin shib'atayim yuqam vayasem ihoh leqayin 'ot lebilti hakot 'oto kal moze'o. vayeizei qayin milifnei ihoh vayeisheb be'erez nod qidmat 'eiden. vayeida' qayin 'et 'ishto vatahar vateiled 'et khanokh vayhi boneh 'ir vayiqra shem ha'ir keshem beno khanokh. vayivaled lakhanokh 'et 'irad ve'irad yalad 'et mekhuya'el umekhiya'el yalad 'et metusha'el umetusha'el yalad 'et lamekh. vayiqakh lo lemekh shetei nashim shem ha'akhat 'adah veshem hasheinit zilah. vateiled 'adah 'et yabal hu hayah 'abi yosheb 'ohel umiqneh. veshem 'akhiv yubal hu hayah 'abi kal tofes kinor ve'ugab. vezilah gam hi yaledah 'et tubal qayin lotesh kal khoresh nekhoshet ubarzel va'akhot tubal qayin na'amah. vayomer lemekh lenashav 'adah vezilah shema'an qoli neshei lemekh ha'zenah 'imrati ki 'ish haragti lefiz'i veyeled lekhaburati. ki shib'atayim yuqam qayin velemekh shib'im veshib'ah. vayeida' 'adam 'od 'et 'ishto vateiled ben vatiqra 'et shemo shet ki shat li 'elohim zera' 'akher takhat hebel ki harago qayin. uleshet gam hu yulad ben vayiqra 'et shemo 'enosh 'az hukhal liqro beshem ihoh. zeh seifer toldot 'adam beyom bero 'elohim 'adam bidmut 'elohim 'asah 'oto. zakhar uneqeibah bera'am vaybarekh 'otam vayiqra 'et shemam 'adam beyom hibare'am. vaykhi 'adam sheloshim ume'at shanah vayoled bidmuto kezalmo vayiqra 'et shemo shet. vayihyu yemei 'adam 'akharei holido 'et shet shemoneh mei'ot shanah vayoled banim ubanot. vayihyu kal yemei 'adam 'asher khai tesha' mei'ot shanah usheloshim shanah vayamot. vaykhi shet khamesh shanim ume'at shanah vayoled 'et 'enosh. vaykhi shet 'akharei holido 'et 'enosh sheba' shanim ushemoneh mei'ot shanah vayoled banim ubanot. vayihyu kal yemei shet shetem 'esreh shanah utesha' mei'ot shanah vayamot. vaykhi 'enosh tish'im shanah vayoled 'et qeinan. vaykhi 'enosh 'akharei holido 'et qeinan khamesh 'esreh shanah ushemoneh mei'ot shanah vayoled banim ubanot. vayihyu kal yemei 'enosh khamesh shanim utesha' mei'ot shanah vayamot. vaykhi qeinan shib'im shanah vayoled 'et mahalal'el. vaykhi qeinan 'akharei holido 'et mahalal'el 'arba'im shanah ushemoneh mei'ot shanah vayoled banim ubanot. vayihyu kal yemei qeinan 'eser shanim utesha' mei'ot shanah vayamot. vaykhi mahalal'el khamesh shanim veshishim shanah vayoled 'et yared. vaykhi mahalal'el 'akharei holido 'et yered sheloshim shanah ushemoneh mei'ot shanah vayoled banim ubanot. vayihyu kal yemei mahalal'el khamesh vetish'im shanah ushemoneh mei'ot shanah vayamot. vaykhi yered shetayim veshishim shanah ume'at shanah vayoled 'et khanokh. vaykhi yered 'akharei holido 'et khanokh shemoneh mei'ot shanah vayoled banim ubanot. vayihyu kal yemei yered shetayim veshishim shanah utesha' mei'ot shanah vayamot. vaykhi khanokh khamesh veshishim shanah vayoled 'et metushalakh. vayithalekh khanokh 'et ha'elohim 'akharei holido 'et metushelakh shelosh mei'ot shanah vayoled banim ubanot. vayhi kal yemei khanokh khamesh veshishim shanah ushelosh mei'ot shanah. vayithalekh khanokh 'et ha'elohim ve'einenu ki laqakh 'oto 'elohim. vaykhi metushelakh sheba' ushemonim shanah ume'at shanah vayoled 'et lamekh. vaykhi metushelakh 'akharei holido 'et lemekh shetayim ushemonim shanah usheba' mei'ot shanah vayoled banim ubanot. vayihyu kal yemei metushelakh teisha' veshishim shanah utesha' mei'ot shanah vayamot. vaykhi lemekh shetayim ushemonim shanah ume'at shanah vayoled ben. vayiqra 'et shemo noakh leimor zeh yenakhameinu mima'aseinu umei'izebon yadeinu min ha'adamah 'asher 'eirerah ihoh. vaykhi lemekh 'akharei holido 'et noakh khamesh vetish'im shanah vakhamesh mei'ot shanah vayoled banim ubanot. vayhi kal yemei lemekh sheba' veshib'im shanah usheba' mei'ot shanah vayamot. vayhi noakh ben khamesh mei'ot shanah vayoled noakh 'et shem 'et kham ve'et yafet. vayhi ki heikhel ha'adam larob 'al penei ha'adamah ubanot yuledu lahem. vayir'u benei ha'elohim 'et benot ha'adam ki tobot henah vayiqkhu lahem nashim mikol 'asher bakharu. vayomer ihoh lo yadon rukhi ba'adam le'olam beshagam hu basar vehayu yamav mei'ah ve'esrim shanah. hanefilim hayu ba'arez bayamim hahem vegam 'akharei khen 'asher yabo'u benei ha'elohim 'el benot ha'adam veyaledu lahem hemah hagiborim 'asher mei'olam 'anshei hashem. vayar ihoh ki rabah ra'at ha'adam ba'arez vekhal yeizer makhshebot libo raq ra' kal hayom. vayinakhem ihoh ki 'asah 'et ha'adam ba'arez vayit'azeb 'el libo. vayomer ihoh 'emkheh 'et ha'adam 'asher barati mei'al penei ha'adamah mei'adam 'ad beheimah 'ad remes ve'ad 'of hashamayim ki nikhamti ki 'asitim. venoakh maza khen be'einei ihoh. 'eleh toldot noakh noakh 'ish zadiq tamim hayah bedorotav 'et ha'elohim hithalekh noakh. vayoled noakh sheloshah banim 'et shem 'et kham ve'et yafet. vatishakhet ha'arez lifnei ha'elohim vatimalei ha'arez khamas. vayar 'elohim 'et ha'arez vehineh nishkhatah ki hishkhit kal basar 'et darko 'al ha'arez. vayomer 'elohim lenoakh qez kal basar ba lefanai ki male'ah ha'arez khamas mipeneihem vehini mashkhitam 'et ha'arez. 'aseh lekha teibat 'azei gofer qinim ta'aseh 'et hateibah vekhafarta 'otah mibayit umikhuz bakofer. vezeh 'asher ta'aseh 'otah shelosh mei'ot 'amah 'orekh hateibah khamishim 'amah rakhebah usheloshim 'amah qomatah. zohar ta'aseh lateibah ve'el 'amah tekhalenah milma'lah ufetakh hateibah bezidah tasim takhtiyim sheniyim ushelishim ta'aseha. va'ani hini meibi 'et hamabul mayim 'al ha'arez leshakhet kal basar 'asher bo ruakh khayim mitakhat hashamayim kol 'asher ba'arez yigva'. vahaqimoti 'et beriti 'itakh ubata 'el hateibah 'atah ubanekha ve'ishtekha uneshei banekha 'itakh. umikal hakhai mikal basar shenayim mikol tabi 'el hateibah lehakhayot 'itakh zakhar uneqeibah yihyu. meiha'of lemineihu umin habeheimah leminah mikol remes ha'adamah lemineihu shenayim mikol yabo'u 'eilekha lehakhayot. ve'atah qakh lekha mikal ma'akhal 'asher yei'akhel ve'asafta 'eilekha vehayah lekha velahem le'akhlah vaya'as noakh kekhol 'asher zivah 'oto 'elohim ken 'asah. vayomer ihoh lenoakh bo 'atah vekhal beitekha 'el hateibah ki 'otekha ra'iti zadiq lefanai bador hazeh. mikol habeheimah hatehorah tiqakh lekha shib'ah shib'ah 'ish ve'ishto umin habeheimah 'asher lo tehorah hi shenayim 'ish ve'ishto. gam mei'of hashamayim shib'ah shib'ah zakhar uneqeibah lekhayot zera' 'al penei khal ha'arez. ki leyamim 'od shib'ah 'anokhi mamtir 'al ha'arez 'arba'im yom ve'arba'im layelah umakhiti 'et kal hayqum 'asher 'asiti mei'al penei ha'adamah. vaya'as noakh kekhol 'asher zivahu ihoh. venoakh ben shesh mei'ot shanah vehamabul hayah mayim 'al ha'arez. vayabo noakh ubanav ve'ishto uneshei banav 'ito 'el hateibah mipenei mei hamabul. min habeheimah hatehorah umin habeheimah 'asher 'einenah tehorah umin ha'of vekhol 'asher romes 'al ha'adamah. shenayim shenayim ba'u 'el noakh 'el hateibah zakhar uneqeibah ka'asher zivah 'elohim 'et noakh. vayhi leshib'at hayamim umei hamabul hayu 'al ha'arez. bishnat shesh mei'ot shanah lekhayei noakh bakhodesh hasheini beshib'ah 'asar yom lakhodesh bayom hazeh nibqe'u kal ma'yenot tehom rabah va'arubot hashamayim niftakhu. vayhi hageshem 'al ha'arez 'arba'im yom ve'arba'im layelah. be'ezem hayom hazeh ba noakh veshem vekham vayefet benei noakh ve'eishet noakh usheloshet neshei banav 'itam 'el hateibah. hemah vekhal hakhayah leminah vekhal habeheimah leminah vekhal haremes haromes 'al ha'arez lemineihu vekhal ha'of lemineihu kol zipor kal kanaf. vayabo'u 'el noakh 'el hateibah shenayim shenayim mikal habasar 'asher bo ruakh khayim. vehaba'im zakhar uneqeibah mikal basar ba'u ka'asher zivah 'oto 'elohim vayisgor ihoh ba'ado. vayhi hamabul 'arba'im yom 'al ha'arez vayirbu hamayim vayis'u 'et hateibah vataram mei'al ha'arez. vayigberu hamayim vayirbu me'od 'al ha'arez vateilekh hateibah 'al penei hamayim. vehamayim gaberu me'od me'od 'al ha'arez vaykhusu kal heharim hagebohim 'asher takhat kal hashamayim. khamesh 'esreh 'amah milma'lah gaberu hamayim vaykhusu heharim. vayigva' kal basar haromes 'al ha'arez ba'of ubabeheimah ubakhayah ubekhal hasherez hashorez 'al ha'arez vekhol ha'adam. kol 'asher nishmat ruakh khayim be'apav mikol 'asher bekharabah meitu. vayimakh 'et kal hayqum 'asher 'al penei ha'adamah mei'adam 'ad beheimah 'ad remes ve'ad 'of hashamayim vayimakhu min ha'arez vayisha'er 'akh noakh va'asher 'ito bateibah. vayigberu hamayim 'al ha'arez khamishim ume'at yom. vayizkor 'elohim 'et noakh ve'et kal hakhayah ve'et kal habeheimah 'asher 'ito bateibah vaya'aber 'elohim ruakh 'al ha'arez vayashoku hamayim. vayisakheru ma'yenot tehom va'arubot hashamayim vayikalei hageshem min hashamayim. vayashubu hamayim mei'al ha'arez halokh vashob vayakhseru hamayim miqzeh khamishim ume'at yom. vatanakh hateibah bakhodesh hashebi'i beshib'ah 'asar yom lakhodesh 'al harei 'ararat. vehamayim hayu halokh vekhasor 'ad hakhodesh ha'asiri ba'asiri be'ekhad lakhodesh nir'u rashei heharim. vayhi miqez 'arba'im yom vayiftakh noakh 'et khalon hateibah 'asher 'asah. vayshalakh 'et ha'oreb vayeizei yazo vashob 'ad yeboshet hamayim mei'al ha'arez. vayshalakh 'et hayonah mei'ito lir'ot haqalu hamayim mei'al penei ha'adamah. velo maze'ah hayonah manoakh lekhaf raglah vatashab 'eilav 'el hateibah ki mayim 'al penei khal ha'arez vayishlakh yado vayiqakheha vayabei 'otah 'eilav 'el hateibah. vayakhel 'od shib'at yamim 'akheirim vayosef shalakh 'et hayonah min hateibah. vatabo 'eilav hayonah le'et 'ereb vehineh 'aleh zayit taraf befiha vayeida' noakh ki qalu hamayim mei'al ha'arez. vayiyakhel 'od shib'at yamim 'akheirim vayshalakh 'et hayonah velo yasefah shub 'eilav 'od. vayhi be'akhat veshesh mei'ot shanah barishon be'ekhad lakhodesh kharebu hamayim mei'al ha'arez vayasar noakh 'et mikhseh hateibah vayar vehineh kharebu penei ha'adamah. ubakhodesh hasheini beshib'ah ve'esrim yom lakhodesh yabeshah ha'arez. vaydaber 'elohim 'el noakh leimor. zei min hateibah 'atah ve'ishtekha ubanekha uneshei banekha 'itakh. kal hakhayah 'asher 'itekha mikal basar ba'of ubabeheimah ubekhal haremes haromes 'al ha'arez hozei hayzei 'itakh vesharezu ba'arez ufaru verabu 'al ha'arez. vayeizei noakh ubanav ve'ishto uneshei banav 'ito. kal hakhayah kal haremes vekhal ha'of kol romes 'al ha'arez lemishpekhoteihem yaze'u min hateibah. vayiben noakh mizbeiakh ihoh vayiqakh mikol habeheimah hatehorah umikol ha'of hatahor vaya'al 'olot bamizbeiakh. vayarakh ihoh 'et reiakh hanikhoakh vayomer ihoh 'el libo lo 'osif leqalel 'od 'et ha'adamah ba'abur ha'adam ki yeizer leb ha'adam ra' mine'urav velo 'osif 'od lehakot 'et kal khai ka'asher 'asiti. 'od kal yemei ha'arez zera' veqazir veqor vakhom veqayiz vakhoref veyom valaylah lo yishbotu. vaybarekh 'elohim 'et noakh ve'et banav vayomer lahem peru urebu umil'u 'et ha'arez. umora'akhem vekhitekhem yihyeh 'al kal khayat ha'arez ve'al kal 'of hashamayim bekhol 'asher tirmos ha'adamah ubekhal degei hayam beyedkhem nitanu. kal remes 'asher hu khai lakhem yihyeh le'akhlah keyereq 'eiseb natati lakhem 'et kol. 'akh basar benafsho damo lo tokheilu. ve'akh 'et dimkhem lenafshoteikhem 'edrosh miyad kal khayah 'edreshenu umiyad ha'adam miyad 'ish 'akhiv 'edrosh 'et nefesh ha'adam. shofekh dam ha'adam ba'adam damo yishafekh ki bezelem 'elohim 'asah 'et ha'adam. ve'atem peru urebu shirzu ba'arez urebu bah. vayomer 'elohim 'el noakh ve'el banav 'ito leimor. va'ani hini meiqim 'et beriti 'itekhem ve'et zar'akhem 'akhareikhem. ve'et kal nefesh hakhayah 'asher 'itekhem ba'of babeheimah ubekhal khayat ha'arez 'itekhem mikol yoze'ei hateibah lekhol khayat ha'arez. vahaqimoti 'et beriti 'itekhem velo yikaret kal basar 'od mimei hamabul velo yihyeh 'od mabul leshakhet ha'arez. vayomer 'elohim zot 'ot haberit 'asher 'ani noten beini ubeineikhem uben kal nefesh khayah 'asher 'itekhem ledorot 'olam. 'et qashti natati be'anan vehayetah le'ot berit beini uben ha'arez. vehayah be'ani 'anan 'al ha'arez venir'atah haqeshet be'anan. vezakharti 'et beriti 'asher beini ubeineikhem uben kal nefesh khayah bekhal basar velo yihyeh 'od hamayim lemabul leshakhet kal basar. vehayetah haqeshet be'anan ure'itiha lizkor berit 'olam ben 'elohim uben kal nefesh khayah bekhal basar 'asher 'al ha'arez. vayomer 'elohim 'el noakh zot 'ot haberit 'asher haqimoti beini uben kal basar 'asher 'al ha'arez. vayihyu benei noakh hayoze'im min hateibah shem vekham vayafet vekham hu 'abi khena'an. sheloshah 'eleh benei noakh umei'eleh nafezah khal ha'arez. vayakhel noakh 'ish ha'adamah vayita' karem. vayeishet min hayayin vayishkar vayitgal betokh 'aholoh vayar kham 'abi khena'an 'et 'ervat 'abiv vayaged lishnei 'ekhav bakhuz. vayiqakh shem vayefet 'et hasimlah vayasimu 'al shekhem sheneihem vayeilekhu 'akhoranit vaykhasu 'et 'ervat 'abihem ufeneihem 'akhoranit ve'ervat 'abihem lo ra'u. vayiqez noakh miyeino vayeida' 'et 'asher 'asah lo beno haqatan. vayomer 'arur kena'an 'ebed 'abadim yihyeh le'ekhav. vayomer barukh ihoh 'elohei shem vihi khena'an 'ebed lamo. yaft 'elohim leyefet veyishkon be'aholei shem vihi khena'an 'ebed lamo. vaykhi noakh 'akhar hamabul shelosh mei'ot shanah vakhamishim shanah. vayihyu kal yemei noakh tesha' mei'ot shanah vakhamishim shanah vayamot. ve'eleh toldot benei noakh shem kham vayafet vayivaledu lahem banim 'akhar hamabul. benei yefet gomer umagog umadai veyavan vetubal umeshekh vetiras. ubenei gomer 'ashkanaz verifat vetogarmah. ubenei yavan 'elishah vetarshish kitim vedodanim. mei'eleh nifredu 'iyei hagoyim be'arzotam 'ish lilshono lemishpekhotam begoyeihem. ubenei kham kush umizrayim ufut ukhena'an. ubenei khush seba vakhavilah vesabtah vera'mah vesabtekha ubenei ra'mah sheba udedan. vekhush yalad 'et nimrod hu heikhel lihyot gibor ba'arez. hu hayah gibor zayid lifnei ihoh 'al ken yei'amar kenimrod gibor zayid lifnei ihoh. vatehi reishit mamlakhto babel ve'erekh ve'akad vekhalneh be'erez shin'ar. min ha'arez hahiv yaza 'ashur vayiben 'et nineveh ve'et rekhobot 'ir ve'et kalakh. ve'et resen ben nineveh uben kalakh hi ha'ir hagedolah. umizrayim yalad 'et ludim ve'et 'anamim ve'et lehabim ve'et naftukhim. ve'et patrusim ve'et kaslukhim 'asher yaze'u misham pelishtim ve'et kaftorim. ukhena'an yalad 'et zidon bekhoro ve'et khet. ve'et haybusi ve'et ha'emori ve'et hagirgashi. ve'et hakhivi ve'et ha'arqi ve'et hasini. ve'et ha'arvadi ve'et hazemari ve'et hakhamati ve'akhar nafozu mishpekhot hakena'ani. vayhi gebul hakena'ani mizidon bo'akhah gerarah 'ad 'azah bo'akhah sedomah va'amorah ve'admah uzeboyim 'ad lasha'. 'eleh benei kham lemishpekhotam lilshonotam be'arzotam begoyeihem. uleshem yulad gam hu 'abi kal benei 'eiber 'akhi yefet hagadol. benei shem 'eilam ve'ashur ve'arpakhshad velud va'aram. ubenei 'aram 'uz vekhul vegeter vamash. ve'arpakhshad yalad 'et shalakh veshelakh yalad 'et 'eiber. ule'eiber yulad shenei banim shem ha'ekhad peleg ki beyamav niflegah ha'arez veshem 'akhiv yaqetan. veyaqetan yalad 'et 'almodad ve'et shalef ve'et khazarmavet ve'et yarakh. ve'et hadoram ve'et 'uzal ve'et diqlah. ve'et 'obal ve'et 'abima'el ve'et sheba. ve'et 'ofir ve'et khavilah ve'et yobab kal 'eleh benei yaqetan. vayhi moshabam mimeisha bo'akhah sefarah har haqedem. 'eleh benei shem lemishpekhotam lilshonotam be'arzotam legoyeihem. 'eleh mishpekhot benei noakh letoldotam begoyeihem umei'eleh nifredu hagoyim ba'arez 'akhar hamabul. vayhi khal ha'arez safah 'ekhat udebarim 'akhadim. vayhi benase'am miqedem vayimze'u biq'ah be'erez shin'ar vayeishebu sham. vayomeru 'ish 'el rei'eihu habah nilbenah lebeinim venisrefah lisreifah vatehi lahem halebeinah le'aben vehakheimar hayah lahem lakhomer. vayomeru habah nibneh lanu 'ir umigdal verosho bashamayim vena'aseh lanu shem pen nafuz 'al penei khal ha'arez. vayeired ihoh lir'ot 'et ha'ir ve'et hamigdal 'asher banu benei ha'adam. vayomer ihoh hen 'am 'ekhad vesafah 'akhat lekhulam vezeh hakhilam la'asot ve'atah lo yibazer meihem kol 'asher yazemu la'asot. habah neiredah venabelah sham sefatam 'asher lo yishme'u 'ish sefat rei'eihu. vayafez ihoh 'otam misham 'al penei khal ha'arez vayakhdelu libnot ha'ir. 'al ken qara shemah babel ki sham balal ihoh sefat kal ha'arez umisham hefizam ihoh 'al penei kal ha'arez. 'eleh toldot shem m ben me'at shanah vayoled 'et 'arpakhshad shenatayim 'akhar hamabul. vaykhi shem 'akharei holido 'et 'arpakhshad khamesh mei'ot shanah vayoled banim ubanot. ve'arpakhshad khai khamesh usheloshim shanah vayoled 'et shalakh. vaykhi 'arpakhshad 'akharei holido 'et shelakh shalosh shanim ve'arba' mei'ot shanah vayoled banim ubanot. veshelakh khai sheloshim shanah vayoled 'et 'eiber. vaykhi shelakh 'akharei holido 'et 'eiber shalosh shanim ve'arba' mei'ot shanah vayoled banim ubanot. vaykhi 'eiber 'arba' usheloshim shanah vayoled 'et paleg. vaykhi 'eiber 'akharei holido 'et peleg sheloshim shanah ve'arba' mei'ot shanah vayoled banim ubanot. vaykhi feleg sheloshim shanah vayoled 'et re'u. vaykhi feleg 'akharei holido 'et re'u teisha' shanim umatayim shanah vayoled banim ubanot. vaykhi re'u shetayim usheloshim shanah vayoled 'et serug. vaykhi re'u 'akharei holido 'et serug sheba' shanim umatayim shanah vayoled banim ubanot. vaykhi serug sheloshim shanah vayoled 'et nakhor. vaykhi serug 'akharei holido 'et nakhor matayim shanah vayoled banim ubanot. vaykhi nakhor teisha' ve'esrim shanah vayoled 'et tarakh. vaykhi nakhor 'akharei holido 'et terakh tesha' 'esreh shanah ume'at shanah vayoled banim ubanot. vaykhi terakh shib'im shanah vayoled 'et 'abram 'et nakhor ve'et haran. ve'eleh toldot terakh terakh holid 'et 'abram 'et nakhor ve'et haran veharan holid 'et lot. vayamat haran 'al penei terakh 'abiv be'erez moladto be'ur kasdim. vayiqakh 'abram venakhor lahem nashim shem 'eishet 'abram sarai veshem 'eishet nakhor milkah bat haran 'abi milkah va'abi yiskah. vatehi sarai 'aqarah 'en lah valad. vayiqakh terakh 'et 'abram beno ve'et lot ben haran ben beno ve'et sarai kalato 'eishet 'abram beno vayeize'u 'itam mei'ur kasdim lalekhet 'arzah kena'an vayabo'u 'ad kharan vayeishebu sham. vayihyu yemei terakh khamesh shanim umatayim shanah vayamat terakh bekharan. vayomer ihoh 'el 'abram lekh lekha mei'arzekha umimoladtekha umibet 'abikha 'el ha'arez 'asher 'ar'eka. ve'e'eskha lego gadol va'abarekhkha va'agadelah shemekha vehyeh berakhah. va'abarakhah mebarekhekha umeqalelkha 'a'or venibrekhu bekha kol mishpekhot ha'adamah. vayeilekh 'abram ka'asher diber 'eilav ihoh vayeilekh 'ito lot ve'abram ben khamesh shanim veshib'im shanah bezeito meikharan. vayiqakh 'abram 'et sarai 'ishto ve'et lot ben 'akhiv ve'et kal rekhusham 'asher rakhashu ve'et hanefesh 'asher 'asu bekharan vayeize'u lalekhet 'arzah kena'an vayabo'u 'arzah kena'an. vaya'abor 'abram ba'arez 'ad meqom shekhem 'ad 'eilon moreh vehakena'ani 'az ba'arez. vayeira ihoh 'el 'abram vayomer lezar'akha 'eten 'et ha'arez hazot vayiben sham mizbeiakh ihoh hanir'eh 'eilav. vaya'teq misham haharah miqedem lebet 'el vayet 'aholoh bet 'el miyam veha'ai miqedem vayiben sham mizbeiakh ihoh vayiqra beshem ihoh. vayisa' 'abram halokh venasoa' hanegbah. vayhi ra'ab ba'arez vayeired 'abram mizraymah lagur sham ki khabed hara'ab ba'arez. vayhi ka'asher hiqrib labo mizrayemah vayomer 'el sarai 'ishto hineh na yada'ti ki 'ishah yefat mar'eh 'at. vehayah ki yir'u 'otakh hamizrim ve'ameru 'ishto zot veharegu 'oti ve'otakh yekhayu. 'imri na 'akhoti 'at lema'an yitab li ba'aburekh vekhayetah nafshi biglalekh. vayhi kebo 'abram mizrayemah vayir'u hamizrim 'et ha'ishah ki yafah hi me'od. vayir'u 'otah sarei far'oh vayhalu 'otah 'el par'oh vatuqakh ha'ishah bet par'oh. ule'abram heitib ba'aburah vayhi lo zon ubaqar vakhamorim va'abadim ushefakhot va'atonot ugemalim. vaynaga' ihoh 'et par'oh nega'im gedolim ve'et beito 'al debar sarai 'eishet 'abram. vayiqra far'oh le'abram vayomer mah zot 'asita li lamah lo higadta li ki 'ishtekha hi lamah 'amarta 'akhoti hi va'eqakh 'otah li le'ishah ve'atah hineh 'ishtekha qakh valekh. vayzav 'alav par'oh 'anashim vayshalekhu 'oto ve'et 'ishto ve'et kal 'asher lo. vaya'al 'abram mimizrayim hu ve'ishto vekhal 'asher lo velot 'imo hanegbah. ve'abram kabed me'od bamiqneh bakesef ubazahab. vayeilekh lemasa'av minegeb ve'ad bet 'el 'ad hamaqom 'asher hayah sham 'aholoh 'aholo batekhilah ben bet 'el uben ha'ai. 'el meqom hamizbeiakh 'asher 'asah sham barishonah vayiqra sham 'abram beshem ihoh. vegam lelot haholekh 'et 'abram hayah zon ubaqar ve'ohalim. velo nasa 'otam ha'arez lashebet yakhdav ki hayah rekhusham rab velo yakhelu lashebet yakhdav. vayhi rib ben ro'ei miqneh 'abram uben ro'ei miqneh lot vehakena'ani vehaperizi 'az yosheb ba'arez. vayomer 'abram 'el lot 'al na tehi meribah beini ubeinekha uben ro'ai uben ro'ekha ki 'anashim 'akhim 'anakhenu. halo khal ha'arez lefanekha hipared na mei'alai 'im hasemol ve'eiminah ve'im hayamin ve'asme'ilah. vayisa lot 'et 'einav vayar 'et kal kikar hayarden ki khulah mashqeh lifnei shakhet ihoh 'et sedom ve'et 'amorah kegan ihoh ke'erez mizrayim bo'akhah zo'ar. vayibkhar lo lot 'et kal kikar hayarden vayisa' lot miqedem vayiparedu 'ish mei'al 'akhiv. 'abram yashab be'erez kena'an velot yashab be'arei hakikar vaye'ehal 'ad sedom. ve'anshei sedom ra'im vekhata'im ihoh me'od. ihoh 'amar 'el 'abram 'akharei hipared lot mei'imo sa na 'einekha ure'eh min hamaqom 'asher 'atah sham zafonah vanegbah vaqeidemah vayamah. ki 'et kal ha'arez 'asher 'atah ro'eh lekha 'etenenah ulezar'akha 'ad 'olam. vesamti 'et zar'akha ka'afar ha'arez 'asher 'im yukhal 'ish limnot 'et 'afar ha'arez gam zar'akha yimaneh. qum hithalekh ba'arez le'arekah ulerakhebah ki lekha 'etenenah. vaye'ehal 'abram vayabo vayeisheb be'eilonei mamrei 'asher bekhebron vayiben sham mizbeiakh ihoh. vayhi bimei 'amrafel melekh shin'ar 'aryokh melekh 'elasar kedarela'omer melekh 'eilam vetid'al melekh goyim. 'asu milkhamah 'et bera' melekh sedom ve'et birsha' melekh 'amorah shin'ab melekh 'admah veshem'eiber melekh zeboyim zeboyim umelekh bela' hi zo'ar. kal 'eleh khaberu 'el 'eimeq hasidim hu yam hamelakh. shetem 'esreh shanah 'abedu 'et kedarela'omer ushelosh 'esreh shanah maradu. ube'arba' 'esreh shanah ba khedarela'omer vehamelakhim 'asher 'ito vayaku 'et refa'im be'ashterot qarnayim ve'et hazuzim beham ve'et ha'eimim beshaveh qiryatayim. ve'et hakhori beharram sei'ir 'ad 'el paran 'asher 'al hamidbar. vayashubu vayabo'u 'el 'en mishpat hi qadesh vayaku 'et kal sedeh ha'amaleiqi vegam 'et ha'emori hayosheb bekhazon tamar. vayeizei melekh sedom umelekh 'amorah umelekh 'admah umelekh zeboyim zeboyim umelekh bela' hi zo'ar vaya'arkhu 'itam milkhamah be'eimeq hasidim. 'et kedarela'omer melekh 'eilam vetid'al melekh goyim ve'amrafel melekh shin'ar ve'aryokh melekh 'elasar 'arba'ah melakhim 'et hakhamishah. ve'eimeq hasidim be'erot be'erot kheimar vayanusu melekh sedom va'amorah vayipelu shamah vehanish'arim herah nasu. vayiqkhu 'et kal rekhush sedom va'amorah ve'et kal 'akhelam vayeileikhu. vayiqkhu 'et lot ve'et rekhusho ben 'akhi 'abram vayeileikhu vehu yosheb bisdom. vayabo hapalit vayaged le'abram ha'ibri vehu shokhen be'eilonei mamrei ha'emori 'akhi 'eshkol va'akhi 'aner vehem ba'alei berit 'abram. vayishma' 'abram ki nishbah 'akhiv vayareq 'et khanikhav yelidei beito shemonah 'asar ushelosh mei'ot vayirdof 'ad dan. vayeikhaleq 'aleihem laylah hu va'abadav vayakem vayirdefem 'ad khobah 'asher misemol ledamaseq. vayasheb 'et kal harekhush vegam 'et lot 'akhiv urekhusho heishib vegam 'et hanashim ve'et ha'am. vayeizei melekh sedom liqrato 'akharei shubo meihakot 'et la'omer ve'et hamelakhim 'asher 'ito 'el 'eimeq shaveh hu 'eimeq hamelekh. umalki zedeq melekh shalem hozi lekhem vayayin vehu khohen le'el 'elyon. vaybarekheihu vayomar barukh 'abram le'el 'elyon qoneh shamayim va'arez. ubarukh 'el 'elyon 'asher migen zarekha beyadekha vayiten lo ma'aser mikol. vayomer melekh sedom 'el 'abram ten li hanefesh veharekhush qakh lakh. vayomer 'abram 'el melekh sedom harimoti yadi 'el ihoh 'el 'elyon qoneh shamayim va'arez. 'im mikhut ve'ad serokh na'al ve'im 'eqakh mikal 'asher lakh velo tomar 'ani he'esharti 'et 'abram. bil'adai raq 'asher 'akhelu hane'arim vekheileq ha'anashim 'asher halekhu 'iti 'aner 'eshkol umamrei hem yiqkhu khelqam. 'akhar hadebarim ha'eleh hayah debar ihoh 'el 'abram bamakhazeh leimor 'al tira 'abram 'anokhi magen lakh sekharekha harbeh me'od. vayomer 'abram 'adonai ihoh mah titen li ve'anokhi holekh 'ariri uben mesheq beiti hu dameseq 'eli'ezer. vayomer 'abram hen li lo natatah zara' vehineh ben beiti yoresh 'oti. vehineh debar ihoh 'eilav leimor lo yirashekha zeh ki 'im 'asher yeizei mimei'ekha hu yirashekha. vayozei 'oto hakhuzah vayomer habet na hashamaymah usefor hakokhabim 'im tukhal lispor 'otam vayomer lo koh yihyeh zar'ekha. vehe'emin ihoh vayakhshebeha lo zedaqah. vayomer 'eilav 'ani ihoh 'asher hozeitikha mei'ur kasdim latet lekha 'et ha'arez hazot lerishtah. vayomar 'adonai ihoh bamah 'eida' ki 'irashenah. vayomer 'eilav qekhah li 'eglah meshuleshet ve'ez meshuleshet ve'ayil meshulash vetor vegozal. vayiqakh lo 'et kal 'eleh vaybater 'otam batavekh vayiten 'ish bitro liqrat rei'eihu ve'et hazipor lo batar. vayeired ha'ayit 'al hapegarim vayasheb 'otam 'abram. vayhi hashemesh labo vetardeimah nafelah 'al 'abram vehineh 'eimah khasheikhah gedolah nofelet 'alav. vayomer le'abram yadoa' teida' ki ger yihyeh zar'akha be'erez lo lahem va'abadum ve'inu 'otam 'arba' mei'ot shanah. vegam 'et hago 'asher ya'abodu dan 'anokhi ve'akharei khen yeize'u birkhush gadol. ve'atah tabo 'el 'abotekha beshalom tiqaber beseibah tobah. vedor rebi'i yashubu henah ki lo shalem 'avon ha'emori 'ad henah. vayhi hashemesh ba'ah va'alatah hayah vehineh tanur 'ashan velapid 'esh 'asher 'abar ben hagezarim ha'eleh. bayom hahu karat ihoh 'et 'abram berit leimor lezar'akha natati 'et ha'arez hazot minehar mizrayim 'ad hanahar hagadol nehar perat. 'et haqeini ve'et haqenizi ve'et haqadmoni. ve'et hakhiti ve'et haperizi ve'et harefa'im. ve'et ha'emori ve'et hakena'ani ve'et hagirgashi ve'et haybusi. vesarai 'eishet 'abram lo yaledah lo velah shifkhah mizrit ushemah hagar. vatomer sarai 'el 'abram hineh na 'azarani ihoh miledet bo na 'el shifkhati 'ulai 'ibaneh mimenah vayishma' 'abram leqol sarai. vatiqakh sarai 'eishet 'abram 'et hagar hamizrit shifkhatah miqez 'eser shanim leshebet 'abram be'erez kena'an vatiten 'otah le'abram 'ishah lo le'ishah. vayabo 'el hagar vatahar vateire ki haratah vateiqal gebirtah be'eineha. vatomer sarai 'el 'abram khamasi 'alekha 'anokhi natati shifkhati bekheiqekha vateire ki haratah va'eiqal be'eineha yishpot ihoh beini ubeinekha vayomer 'abram 'el sarai hineh shifkhatekh beyadekh 'asi lah hatob be'einayikh vate'aneha sarai vatibrakh mipaneha. vayimza'ah mal'akh ihoh 'al 'en hamayim bamidbar 'al ha'ayin bederekh shur. vayomar hagar shifkhat sarai 'ei mizeh bat ve'anah teileikhi vatomer mipenei sarai gebirti 'anokhi borakhat. vayomer lah mal'akh ihoh shubi 'el gebirtekh vehit'ani takhat yadeha. vayomer lah mal'akh ihoh harbah 'arbeh 'et zar'ekh velo yisafer meirob. vayomer lah mal'akh ihoh hinakh harah veyoladt ben veqarat shemo yishma'el ki shama' ihoh 'el 'aneyekh. vehu yihyeh pere 'adam yado bakol veyad kol bo ve'al penei khal 'ekhav yishkon. vatiqra shem ihoh hadober 'eileha 'atah 'el ro'i ki 'amerah hagam halom ra'iti 'akharei ro'i. 'al ken qara labe'er be'er lakhai ro'i hineh ben qadesh uben bared. vateiled hagar le'abram ben vayiqra 'abram shem beno 'asher yaledah hagar yishma'el. ve'abram ben shemonim shanah veshesh shanim beledet hagar 'et yishma'el le'abram. vayhi 'abram ben tish'im shanah veteisha' shanim vayeira ihoh 'el 'abram vayomer 'eilav 'ani 'el shadai hithalekh lefanai vehyeh tamim. ve'etenah beriti beini ubeinekha ve'arbeh 'otkha bim'od me'od. vayipol 'abram 'al panav vaydaber 'ito 'elohim leimor. 'ani hineh beriti 'itakh vehayita le'ab hamon goyim. velo yiqarei 'od 'et shimkha 'abram vehayah shimkha 'abraham ki 'ab hamon goyim netatikha. vehifreiti 'otekha bim'od me'od unetatikha legoyim umelakhim mimekha yeizei'u. vahaqimoti 'et beriti beini ubeinekha uben zar'akha 'akharekha ledorotam librit 'olam lihyot lekha leilohim ulezar'akha 'akharekha. venatati lekha ulezar'akha 'akharekha 'et 'erez megurekha 'et kal 'erez kena'an la'akhuzat 'olam vehayiti lahem leilohim. vayomer 'elohim 'el 'abraham ve'atah 'et beriti tishmor 'atah vezar'akha 'akharekha ledorotam. zot beriti 'asher tishmeru beini ubeineikhem uben zar'akha 'akharekha himol lakhem kal zakhar. unemaltem 'et besar 'arelatkhem vehayah le'ot berit beini ubeineikhem. uben shemonat yamim yimol lakhem kal zakhar ledoroteikhem yelid bayit umiqnat kesef mikol ben neikhar 'asher lo mizar'akha hu. himol yimol yelid beitekha umiqnat kaspekha vehayetah beriti bibsarkhem librit 'olam. ve'arel zakhar 'asher lo yimol 'et besar 'arelato venikhretah hanefesh hahiv mei'ameha 'et beriti heifar. vayomer 'elohim 'el 'abraham sarai 'ishtekha lo tiqra 'et shemah sarai ki sarah shemah. ubeirakhti 'otah vegam natati mimenah lekha ben ubeirakhtiha vehayetah legoyim malkhei 'amim mimenah yihyu. vayipol 'abraham 'al panav vayizkhaq vayomer belibo haleben mei'ah shanah yivaled ve'im sarah habat tish'im shanah teiled. vayomer 'abraham 'el ha'elohim lu yishma'el yikhyeh lefanekha. vayomer 'elohim 'abal sarah 'ishtekha yoledet lekha ben veqarata 'et shemo yizkhaq vahaqimoti 'et beriti 'ito librit 'olam lezar'o 'akharav. uleyishma'el shema'tikha hineh beirakhti 'oto vehifreiti 'oto vehirbeiti 'oto bim'od me'od shenem 'asar nesi'im yolid unetativ lego gadol. ve'et beriti 'aqim 'et yizkhaq 'asher teiled lekha sarah lamo'ed hazeh bashanah ha'akheret. vaykhal ledaber 'ito vaya'al 'elohim mei'al 'abraham. vayiqakh 'abraham 'et yishma'el beno ve'et kal yelidei beito ve'et kal miqnat kaspo kal zakhar be'anshei bet 'abraham vayamal 'et besar 'arelatam be'ezem hayom hazeh ka'asher diber 'ito 'elohim. ve'abraham ben tish'im vateisha' shanah behimolo besar 'arelato. veyishma'el beno ben shelosh 'esreh shanah behimolo 'et besar 'arelato. be'ezem hayom hazeh nimol 'abraham veyishma'el beno. vekhal 'anshei beito yelid bayit umiqnat kesef mei'et ben neikhar nimolu 'ito. vayeira 'eilav ihoh be'eilonei mamrei vehu yosheb petakh ha'ohel kekhom hayom. vayisa 'einav vayar vehineh sheloshah 'anashim nizabim 'alav vayar vayaraz liqratam mipetakh ha'ohel vayishtakhu 'arezah. vayomar 'adonai 'im na mazati khen be'einekha 'al na ta'abor mei'al 'abdekha. yuqakh na me'at mayim verakhazu ragleikhem vehisha'anu takhat ha'ez. ve'eqkhah fat lekhem vesa'adu libekhem 'akhar ta'aboru ki 'al ken 'abartem 'al 'abdekhem vayomeru ken ta'aseh ka'asher dibarta. vaymaher 'abraham ha'ohelah 'el sarah vayomer mahari shelosh se'im qemakh solet lushi va'asi 'ugot. ve'el habaqar raz 'abraham vayiqakh ben baqar rakh vatob vayiten 'el hana'ar vaymaher la'asot 'oto. vayiqakh khem'ah vekhalab uben habaqar 'asher 'asah vayiten lifneihem vehu 'omed 'aleihem takhat ha'ez vayokheilu. vayomeru 'eilav 'ayeh sarah 'ishtekha vayomer hineh ba'ohel. vayomer shob 'ashub 'eilekha ka'et khayah vehineh ben lesarah 'ishtekha vesarah shoma'at petakh ha'ohel vehu 'akharav. ve'abraham vesarah zeqeinim ba'im bayamim khadal lihyot lesarah 'orakh kanashim. vatizkhaq sarah beqirbah leimor 'akharei beloti hayetah li 'ednah vadoni zaqen. vayomer ihoh 'el 'abraham lamah zeh zakhaqah sarah leimor ha'af 'umnam 'eiled va'ani zaqanti. hayipalei ihoh dabar lamo'ed 'ashub 'eilekha ka'et khayah ulesarah ben. vatekhakhesh sarah leimor lo zakhaqti ki yarei'ah vayomer lo ki zakhaqet. vayaqumu misham ha'anashim vayashqifu 'al penei sedom ve'abraham holekh 'imam leshalekham. ihoh 'amar hamkhaseh 'ani mei'abraham 'asher 'ani 'oseh. ve'abraham hayo yihyeh lego gadol ve'azum venibrekhu bo kol goyei ha'arez. ki yeda'tiv lema'an 'asher yezaveh 'et banav ve'et beito 'akharav veshameru derekh ihoh la'asot zedaqah umishpat lema'an habi ihoh 'al 'abraham 'et 'asher diber 'alav. vayomer ihoh za'aqat sedom va'amorah ki rabah vekhatatam ki khabedah me'od. 'eiradah na ve'er'eh hakeza'aqatah haba'ah 'eilai 'asu kalah ve'im lo 'eida'ah. vayifnu misham ha'anashim vayeilekhu sedomah ve'abraham 'odenu 'omed lifnei ihoh. vayigash 'abraham vayomar ha'af tispeh zadiq 'im rasha'. 'ulai yesh khamishim zadiqim betokh ha'ir ha'af tispeh velo tisa lamaqom lema'an khamishim hazadiqim 'asher beqirbah. khalilah lekha mei'asot kadabar hazeh lehamit zadiq 'im rasha' vehayah khazadiq karasha' khalilah lakh hashofet kal ha'arez lo ya'aseh mishpat. vayomer ihoh 'im 'emza bisdom khamishim zadiqim betokh ha'ir venasati lekhal hamaqom ba'aburam. vaya'an 'abraham vayomar hineh na ho'alti ledaber 'el 'adonai ve'anokhi 'afar va'eifer. 'ulai yakhserun khamishim hazadiqim khamishah hatashkhit bakhamishah 'et kal ha'ir vayomer lo 'ashkhit 'im 'emza sham 'arba'im vakhamishah. vayosef 'od ledaber 'eilav vayomar 'ulai yimaze'un sham 'arba'im vayomer lo 'e'eseh ba'abur ha'arba'im. vayomer 'al na yikhar ladonai va'adabeirah 'ulai yimaze'un sham sheloshim vayomer lo 'e'eseh 'im 'emza sham sheloshim. vayomer hineh na ho'alti ledaber 'el 'adonai 'ulai yimaze'un sham 'esrim vayomer lo 'ashkhit ba'abur ha'esrim. vayomer 'al na yikhar ladonai va'adaberah 'akh hapa'am 'ulai yimaze'un sham 'asarah vayomer lo 'ashkhit ba'abur ha'asarah. vayeilekh ihoh ka'asher kilah ledaber 'el 'abraham ve'abraham shab limqomo. vayabo'u shenei hamal'akhim sedomah ba'ereb velot yosheb besha'ar sedom vayar lot vayaqam liqratam vayishtakhu 'apayim 'arezah. vayomer hineh na 'adonai suru na 'el bet 'abdekhem velinu verakhazu ragleikhem vehishkamtem vahalakhtem ledarkekhem vayomeru lo ki barekhob nalin. vayifzar bam me'od vayasuru 'eilav vayabo'u 'el beito vaya'as lahem mishteh umazot 'afah vayokheilu. terem yishkabu ve'anshei ha'ir 'anshei sedom nasabu 'al habayit mina'ar ve'ad zaqen kal ha'am miqazeh. vayiqre'u 'el lot vayomeru lo 'ayeh ha'anashim 'asher ba'u 'eilekha halayelah hozi'em 'eileinu veneide'ah 'otam. vayeizei 'aleihem lot hapetkhah vehadelet sagar 'akharav. vayomar 'al na 'akhai tarei'u. hineh na li shetei banot 'asher lo yade'u 'ish 'ozi'ah na 'ethen 'aleikhem va'asu lahen katob be'eineikhem raq la'anashim ha'el 'al ta'asu dabar ki 'al ken ba'u bezel qorati. vayomeru gesh hale'ah vayomeru ha'ekhad ba lagur vayishpot shafot 'atah nara' lekha meihem vayifzeru ba'ish belot me'od vayigeshu lishbor hadalet. vayishlekhu ha'anashim 'et yadam vayabi'u 'et lot 'aleihem habayetah ve'et hadelet sagaru. ve'et ha'anashim 'asher petakh habayit hiku basanveirim miqaton ve'ad gadol vayil'u limzo hapatakh. vayomeru ha'anashim 'el lot 'od mi lekha foh khatan ubanekha ubenotekha vekhol 'asher lekha ba'ir hozei min hamaqom. ki mashkhitim 'anakhnu 'et hamaqom hazeh ki gadelah za'aqatam 'et penei ihoh vayshalekheinu ihoh leshakhatah. vayeizei lot vaydaber 'el khatanav loqekhei benotav vayomer qumu ze'u min hamaqom hazeh ki mashkhit ihoh 'et ha'ir vayhi khimzakheq be'einei khatanav. ukhemo hashakhar 'alah vaya'izu hamal'akhim belot leimor qum qakh 'et 'ishtekha ve'et shetei benotekha hanimza'ot pen tisafeh ba'avon ha'ir. vayitmahmah vayakhaziqu ha'anashim beyado ubeyad 'ishto ubeyad shetei benotav bekhemlat ihoh 'alav vayozi'uhu vayanikhuhu mikhuz la'ir. vayhi khehozi'am 'otam hakhuzah vayomer himalet 'al nafshekha 'al tabit 'akharekha ve'al ta'amod bekhal hakikar haharah himalet pen tisafeh. vayomer lot 'aleihem 'al na 'adonai. hineh na maza 'abdekha khen be'einekha vatagdel khasdekha 'asher 'asita 'imadi lehakhayot 'et nafshi ve'anokhi lo 'ukhal lehimalet haharah pen tidbaqani hara'ah vamati. hineh na ha'ir hazot qerobah lanus shamah vehi miz'ar 'imaletah na shamah halo miz'ar hi utekhi nafshi. vayomer 'eilav hineh nasati fanekha gam ladabar hazeh lebilti hafeki 'et ha'ir 'asher dibarta. maher himalet shamah ki lo 'ukhal la'asot dabar 'ad bo'akha shamah 'al ken qara shem ha'ir zo'ar. hashemesh yaza 'al ha'arez velot ba zo'arah. ihoh himtir 'al sedom ve'al 'amorah gaferit va'esh mei'et ihoh min hashamayim. vayahafokh 'et he'arim ha'el ve'et kal hakikar ve'et kal yoshebei he'arim vezemakh ha'adamah. vatabet 'ishto mei'akharav vatehi nezib melakh. vayashkem 'abraham baboqer 'el hamaqom 'asher 'amad sham 'et penei ihoh. vayashqef 'al penei sedom va'amorah ve'al kal penei 'erez hakikar vayar vehineh 'alah qitor ha'arez keqitor hakibshan. vayhi beshakhet 'elohim 'et 'arei hakikar vayizkor 'elohim 'et 'abraham vayshalakh 'et lot mitokh hahafeikhah bahafokh 'et he'arim 'asher yashab bahen lot. vaya'al lot mizo'ar vayeisheb bahar ushetei benotav 'imo ki yarei lashebet bezo'ar vayeisheb bame'arah hu ushetei benotav. vatomer habekhirah 'el haze'irah 'abinu zaqen ve'ish 'en ba'arez labo 'aleinu kederekh kal ha'arez. lekhah nashqeh 'et 'abinu yayin venishkebah 'imo unekhayeh mei'abinu zara'. vatashqena 'et 'abihen yayin balaylah hu vatabo habekhirah vatishkab 'et 'abiha velo yada' beshikhbah ubequmah vayhi mimakhorat vatomer habekhirah 'el haze'irah hen shakhabti 'emesh 'et 'abi nashqenu yayin gam halaylah ubo'i shikhbi 'imo unekhayeh mei'abinu zara'. vatashqena gam balaylah hahu 'et 'abihen yayin vataqam haze'irah vatishkab 'imo velo yada' beshikhbah ubequmah. vataharena shetei benot lot mei'abihen. vateiled habekhirah ben vatiqra shemo mo'ab hu 'abi mo'ab 'ad hayom. vehaze'irah gam hi yaledah ben vatiqra shemo ben 'ami hu 'abi benei 'amon 'ad hayom. vayisa' misham 'abraham 'arzah hanegeb vayeisheb ben qadesh uben shur vayagar bigrar. vayomer 'abraham 'el sarah 'ishto 'akhoti hi vayishlakh 'abimelekh melekh gerar vayiqakh 'et sarah. vayabo 'elohim 'el 'abimelekh bakhalom halayelah vayomer lo hinekha met 'al ha'ishah 'asher laqakhta vehiv be'ulat ba'al. va'abimelekh lo qarab 'eileha vayomar 'adonai hago gam zadiq taharog. halo hu 'amar li 'akhoti hi vehi gam hi 'amerah 'akhi hu betam lebabi ubeniqyon kapai 'asiti zot. vayomer 'eilav ha'elohim bakhalom gam 'anokhi yada'ti ki betam lebabekha 'asita zot va'ekhsokh gam 'anokhi 'otkha meikhato li 'al ken lo netatikha lingoa' 'eileha. ve'atah hasheb 'eishet ha'ish ki nabi hu veyitpalel ba'adkha vekhyeh ve'im 'einekha meishib da' ki mot tamut 'atah vekhal 'asher lakh. vayashkem 'abimelekh baboqer vayiqra lekhal 'abadav vaydaber 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh be'azeneihem vayire'u ha'anashim me'od. vayiqra 'abimelekh le'abraham vayomer lo meh 'asita lanu umeh khatati lakh ki heibeita 'alai ve'al mamlakhti khata'ah gedolah ma'asim 'asher lo yei'asu 'asita 'imadi. vayomer 'abimelekh 'el 'abraham mah ra'ita ki 'asita 'et hadabar hazeh. vayomer 'abraham ki 'amarti raq 'en yir'at 'elohim bamaqom hazeh vaharaguni 'al debar 'ishti. vegam 'amenah 'akhoti bat 'abi hi 'akh lo bat 'imi vatehi li le'ishah. vayhi ka'asher hit'u 'oti 'elohim mibet 'abi va'omar lah zeh khasdekh 'asher ta'asi 'imadi 'el kal hamaqom 'asher nabo shamah 'imri li 'akhi hu. vayiqakh 'abimelekh zon ubaqar va'abadim ushefakhot vayiten le'abraham vayasheb lo 'et sarah 'ishto. vayomer 'abimelekh hineh 'arzi lefanekha batob be'einekha sheb. ulesarah 'amar hineh natati 'elef kesef le'akhikh hineh hu lakh kesut 'einayim lekhol 'asher 'itakh ve'et kol venokhakhat. vayitpalel 'abraham 'el ha'elohim vayirpa 'elohim 'et 'abimelekh ve'et 'ishto ve'amhotav vayeileidu. ki 'azor 'azar ihoh be'ad kal rekhem lebet 'abimelekh 'al debar sarah 'eishet 'abraham. ihoh paqad 'et sarah ka'asher 'amar vaya'as ihoh lesarah ka'asher diber. vatahar vateiled sarah le'abraham ben lizqunav lamo'ed 'asher diber 'oto 'elohim. vayiqra 'abraham 'et shem beno hanolad lo 'asher yaledah lo sarah yizkhaq. vayamal 'abraham 'et yizkhaq beno ben shemonat yamim ka'asher zivah 'oto 'elohim. ve'abraham ben me'at shanah behivaled lo 'et yizkhaq beno. vatomer sarah zekhoq 'asah li 'elohim kal hashomeia' yizkhaq li. vatomer mi milel le'abraham heiniqah banim sarah ki yaladti ben lizqunav. vayigdal hayeled vayigamal vaya'as 'abraham mishteh gadol beyom higamel 'et yizkhaq. vateire sarah 'et ben hagar hamizrit 'asher yaledah le'abraham mezakheq. vatomer le'abraham garesh ha'amah hazot ve'et benah ki lo yirash ben ha'amah hazot 'im beni 'im yizkhaq. vayeira' hadabar me'od be'einei 'abraham 'al 'odot beno. vayomer 'elohim 'el 'abraham 'al yeira' be'einekha 'al hana'ar ve'al 'amatekha kol 'asher tomar 'eilekha sarah shema' beqolah ki beyizkhaq yiqarei lekha zara'. vegam 'et ben ha'amah lego 'asimenu ki zar'akha hu. vayashkem 'abraham baboqer vayiqakh lekhem vekheimat mayim vayiten 'el hagar sam 'al shikhmah ve'et hayeled vayshalekheha vateilekh vateita' bemidbar be'er shaba'. vayikhlu hamayim min hakheimet vatashlekh 'et hayeled takhat 'akhad hasikhim. vateilekh vateisheb lah mineged harkheq kimtakhavei qeshet ki 'amerah 'al 'er'eh bemot hayaled vateisheb mineged vatisa 'et qolah vateibek. vayishma' 'elohim 'et qol hana'ar vayiqra mal'akh 'elohim 'el hagar min hashamayim vayomer lah mah lakh hagar 'al tire'i ki shama' 'elohim 'el qol hana'ar ba'asher hu sham. qumi se'i 'et hana'ar vehakhaziqi 'et yadekh bo ki lego gadol 'asimenu. vayifqakh 'elohim 'et 'eineha vateire be'er mayim vateilekh vatemalei 'et hakheimet mayim vatashq 'et hana'ar. vayhi 'elohim 'et hana'ar vayigdal vayeisheb bamidbar vayhi robeh qashat. vayeisheb bemidbar paran vatiqakh lo 'imo 'ishah mei'erez mizrayim. vayhi ba'et hahiv vayomer 'abimelekh ufikhol sar zeba'o 'el 'abraham leimor 'elohim 'imekha bekhol 'asher 'atah 'oseh. ve'atah hishabe'ah li beilohim henah 'im tishqor li ulenini ulenekhdi kakhesed 'asher 'asiti 'imekha ta'aseh 'imadi ve'im ha'arez 'asher gartah bah. vayomer 'abraham 'anokhi 'ishabeia'. vehokhiakh 'abraham 'et 'abimelekh 'al 'odot be'er hamayim 'asher gazelu 'abdei 'abimelekh. vayomer 'abimelekh lo yada'ti mi 'asah 'et hadabar hazeh vegam 'atah lo higadta li vegam 'anokhi lo shama'ti bilti hayom. vayiqakh 'abraham zon ubaqar vayiten la'abimelekh vayikhretu sheneihem berit. vayazeb 'abraham 'et sheba' kibsot hazon lebadehen. vayomer 'abimelekh 'el 'abraham mah henah sheba' kebasot ha'eleh 'asher hizabta lebadanah. vayomer ki 'et sheba' kebasot tiqakh miyadi ba'abur tihyeh li le'eidah ki khafarti 'et habe'er hazot. 'al ken qara lamaqom hahu be'er shaba' ki sham nishbe'u sheneihem. vayikhretu berit bib'er shaba' vayaqam 'abimelekh ufikhol sar zeba'o vayashubu 'el 'erez pelishtim. vayita' 'eshel bib'er shaba' vayiqra sham beshem ihoh 'el 'olam. vayagar 'abraham be'erez pelishtim yamim rabim. vayhi 'akhar hadebarim ha'eleh veha'elohim nisah 'et 'abraham vayomer 'eilav 'abraham vayomer hineini. vayomer qakh na 'et binkha 'et yekhidekha 'asher 'ahabta 'et yizkhaq velekh lekha 'el 'erez hamoriyah veha'aleihu sham le'olah 'al 'akhad heharim 'asher 'omar 'eilekha. vayashkem 'abraham baboqer vayakhabosh 'et khamoro vayiqakh 'et shenei ne'arav 'ito ve'et yizkhaq beno vaybaqa' 'azei 'olah vayaqam vayeilekh 'el hamaqom 'asher 'amar lo ha'elohim. bayom hashelishi vayisa 'abraham 'et 'einav vayar 'et hamaqom meirakhoq. vayomer 'abraham 'el ne'arav shebu lakhem poh 'im hakhamor va'ani vehana'ar neilekhah 'ad koh venishtakhaveh venashubah 'aleikhem. vayiqakh 'abraham 'et 'azei ha'olah vayasem 'al yizkhaq beno vayiqakh beyado 'et ha'esh ve'et hama'akhelet vayeilekhu sheneihem yakhdav. vayomer yizkhaq 'el 'abraham 'abiv vayomer 'abi vayomer hineni beni vayomer hineh ha'esh veha'eizim ve'ayeh haseh le'olah. vayomer 'abraham 'elohim yir'eh lo haseh le'olah beni vayeilekhu sheneihem yakhdav. vayabo'u 'el hamaqom 'asher 'amar lo ha'elohim vayiben sham 'abraham 'et hamizbeiakh vaya'arokh 'et ha'eizim vaya'aqod 'et yizkhaq beno vayasem 'oto 'al hamizbeiakh mima'al la'eizim. vayishlakh 'abraham 'et yado vayiqakh 'et hama'akhelet lishkhot 'et beno. vayiqra 'eilav mal'akh ihoh min hashamayim vayomer 'abraham 'abraham vayomer hineini. vayomer 'al tishlakh yadekha 'el hana'ar ve'al ta'as lo me'umah ki 'atah yada'ti ki yerei 'elohim 'atah velo khasakhta 'et binkha 'et yekhidekha mimeni. vayisa 'abraham 'et 'einav vayar vehineh 'ayil 'akhar ne'ekhaz basebakh beqarnav vayeilekh 'abraham vayiqakh 'et ha'ayil vaya'aleihu le'olah takhat beno. vayiqra 'abraham shem hamaqom hahu ihoh yir'eh 'asher yei'amer hayom behar ihoh yeira'eh. vayiqra mal'akh ihoh 'el 'abraham sheinit min hashamayim. vayomer bi nishba'ti ne'um ihoh ki ya'an 'asher 'asita 'et hadabar hazeh velo khasakhta 'et binkha 'et yekhidekha. ki barekh 'abarekhkha veharbah 'arbeh 'et zar'akha kekhokhbei hashamayim vekhakhol 'asher 'al sefat hayam veyirash zar'akha 'et sha'ar 'oyebav. vehitbarakhu bezar'akha kol goyei ha'arez 'eiqeb 'asher shama'ta beqoli. vayashab 'abraham 'el ne'arav vayaqumu vayeilekhu yakhdav 'el be'er shaba' vayeisheb 'abraham bib'er shaba'. vayhi 'akharei hadebarim ha'eleh vayugad le'abraham leimor hineh yaledah milkah gam hi banim lenakhor 'akhikha. 'et 'uz bekhoro ve'et buz 'akhiv ve'et qemu'el 'abi 'aram. ve'et kesed ve'et khazo ve'et pildash ve'et yidlaf ve'et betu'el. ubetu'el yalad 'et ribqah shemonah 'eleh yaledah milkah lenakhor 'akhi 'abraham. ufilagsho ushemah re'umah vateiled gam hi 'et tebakh ve'et gakham ve'et takhash ve'et ma'akhah. vayihyu khayei sarah mei'ah shanah ve'esrim shanah vesheba' shanim shenei khayei sarah. vatamat sarah beqiryat 'arba' hi khebron be'erez kena'an vayabo 'abraham lispod lesarah velibkotah. vayaqam 'abraham mei'al penei meito vaydaber 'el benei khet leimor. ger vetoshab 'anokhi 'imakhem tenu li 'akhuzat qeber 'imakhem ve'eqberah meiti milefanai. vaya'anu benei khet 'et 'abraham leimor lo. shema'einu 'adoni nesi 'elohim 'atah betokheinu bemibkhar qebareinu qebor 'et meitekha 'ish mimenu 'et qibro lo yikhleh mimekha miqebor meitekha. vayaqam 'abraham vayishtakhu le'am ha'arez libnei khet. vaydaber 'itam leimor 'im yesh 'et nafshekhem liqbor 'et meiti milefanai shema'uni ufig'u li be'efron ben zokhar. veyiten li 'et me'arat hamakhpeilah 'asher lo 'asher biqzeh sadeihu bekhesef malei yitenenah li betokhkhem la'akhuzat qaber. ve'efron yosheb betokh benei khet vaya'an 'efron hakhiti 'et 'abraham be'azenei benei khet lekhol ba'ei sha'ar 'iro leimor. lo 'adoni shema'eini hasadeh natati lakh vehame'arah 'asher bo lekha netatiha le'einei benei 'ami netatiha lakh qebor meitekha. vayishtakhu 'abraham lifnei 'am ha'arez. vaydaber 'el 'efron be'azenei 'am ha'arez leimor 'akh 'im 'atah lu shema'eini natati kesef hasadeh qakh mimeni ve'eqberah 'et meiti shamah. vaya'an 'efron 'et 'abraham leimor lo. 'adoni shema'eini 'erez 'arba' mei'ot sheqel kesef beini ubeinekha mah hi ve'et meitekha qebor. vayishma' 'abraham 'el 'efron vayishqol 'abraham le'efron 'et hakesef 'asher diber be'azenei benei khet 'arba' mei'ot sheqel kesef 'ober lasokher. vayaqam sedeh 'efron 'asher bamakhpeilah 'asher lifnei mamrei hasadeh vehame'arah 'asher bo vekhal ha'ez 'asher basadeh 'asher bekhal gebulo sabib. le'abraham lemiqnah le'einei benei khet bekhol ba'ei sha'ar 'iro. ve'akharei khen qabar 'abraham 'et sarah 'ishto 'el me'arat sedeh hamakhpeilah 'al penei mamrei hi khebron be'erez kena'an. vayaqam hasadeh vehame'arah 'asher bo le'abraham la'akhuzat qaber mei'et benei khet. ve'abraham zaqen ba bayamim ihoh beirakh 'et 'abraham bakol. vayomer 'abraham 'el 'abdo zeqan beito hamoshel bekhal 'asher lo sim na yadekha takhat yereikhi. ve'ashbi'akha ihoh 'elohei hashamayim veilohei ha'arez 'asher lo tiqakh 'ishah libni mibenot hakena'ani 'asher 'anokhi yosheb beqirbo. ki 'el 'arzi ve'el moladti teilekh velaqakhta 'ishah libni leyizkhaq. vayomer 'eilav ha'ebed 'ulai lo tobeh ha'ishah lalekhet 'akharai 'el ha'arez hazot hehasheb 'ashib 'et binkha 'el ha'arez 'asher yazata misham. vayomer 'eilav 'abraham hishamer lekha pen tashib 'et beni shamah. ihoh 'elohei hashamayim 'asher leqakhani mibet 'abi umei'erez moladti va'asher diber li va'asher nishba' li leimor lezar'akha 'eten 'et ha'arez hazot hu yishlakh mal'akho lefanekha velaqakhta 'ishah libni misham. ve'im lo tobeh ha'ishah lalekhet 'akharekha veniqita mishebu'ati zot raq 'et beni lo tasheb shamah. vayasem ha'ebed 'et yado takhat yerekh 'abraham 'adonav vayishaba' lo 'al hadabar hazeh. vayiqakh ha'ebed 'asarah gemalim migemalei 'adonav vayeilekh vekhal tub 'adonav beyado vayaqam vayeilekh 'el 'aram naharayim 'el 'ir nakhor. vayabrekh hagemalim mikhuz la'ir 'el be'er hamayim le'et 'ereb le'et zet hasho'abot. vayomar ihoh 'elohei 'adoni 'abraham haqreh na lefanai hayom va'aseh khesed 'im 'adoni 'abraham. hineh 'anokhi nizab 'al 'en hamayim ubenot 'anshei ha'ir yoze'ot lish'ob mayim. vehayah hana'ara 'asher 'omar 'eileha hati na khadekh ve'eshteh ve'amerah sheteh vegam gemalekha 'ashqeh 'otah hokhakhta le'abdekha leyizkhaq ubah 'eida' ki 'asita khesed 'im 'adoni. vayhi hu terem kilah ledaber vehineh ribqah yozet 'asher yuledah libtu'el ben milkah 'eishet nakhor 'akhi 'abraham vekhadah 'al shikhmah. vehana'ara tobat mar'eh me'od betulah ve'ish lo yeda'ah vateired ha'aynah vatemalei khadah vata'al. vayaraz ha'ebed liqratah vayomer hagmi'ini na me'at mayim mikadekh. vatomer sheteh 'adoni vatemaher vatored kadah 'al yadah vatashqeihu. vatekhal lehashqoto vatomer gam ligmalekha 'esh'ab 'ad 'im kilu lishtot. vatemaher vate'ar kadah 'el hashoqet vataraz 'od 'el habe'er lish'ob vatish'ab lekhal gemalav. veha'ish mishta'eh lah makharish lada'at hahizliakh ihoh darko 'im lo. vayhi ka'asher kilu hagemalim lishtot vayiqakh ha'ish nezem zahab beqa' mishqalo ushenei zemidim 'al yadeha 'asarah zahab mishqalam. vayomer bat mi 'at hagidi na li hayesh bet 'abikh maqom lanu lalin. vatomer 'eilav bat betu'el 'anokhi ben milkah 'asher yaledah lenakhor. vatomer 'eilav gam teben gam mispo rab 'imanu gam maqom lalun. vayiqod ha'ish vayishtakhu ihoh. vayomer barukh ihoh 'elohei 'adoni 'abraham 'asher lo 'azab khasdo va'amito mei'im 'adoni 'anokhi baderekh nakhani ihoh bet 'akhei 'adoni. vataraz hana'ara vataged lebet 'imah kadebarim ha'eleh. uleribqah 'akh ushemo laban vayaraz laban 'el ha'ish hakhuzah 'el ha'ayin. vayhi kir'ot 'et hanezem ve'et hazemidim 'al yedei 'akhoto ukheshame'o 'et dibrei ribqah 'akhoto leimor koh diber 'eilai ha'ish vayabo 'el ha'ish vehineh 'omed 'al hagemalim 'al ha'ayin. vayomer bo berukh ihoh lamah ta'amod bakhuz ve'anokhi piniti habayit umaqom lagemalim. vayabo ha'ish habaytah vayfatakh hagemalim vayiten teben umispo lagemalim umayim lirkhoz raglav veraglei ha'anashim 'asher 'ito. vayisem vayusam lefanav le'ekhol vayomer lo 'okhal 'ad 'im dibarti debarai vayomer daber. vayomar 'ebed 'abraham 'anokhi. ihoh beirakh 'et 'adoni me'od vayigdal vayiten lo zon ubaqar vekhesef vezahab va'abadim ushefakhot ugemalim vakhamorim. vateiled sarah 'eishet 'adoni ben ladoni 'akharei ziqnatah vayiten lo 'et kal 'asher lo. vayashbi'eini 'adoni leimor lo tiqakh 'ishah libni mibenot hakena'ani 'asher 'anokhi yosheb be'arzo. 'im lo 'el bet 'abi teilekh ve'el mishpakhti velaqakhta 'ishah libni. va'omar 'el 'adoni 'ulai lo teilekh ha'ishah 'akharai. vayomer 'eilai ihoh 'asher hithalakhti lefanav yishlakh mal'akho 'itakh vehizliakh darkekha velaqakhta 'ishah libni mimishpakhti umibet 'abi. 'az tinaqeh mei'alati ki tabo 'el mishpakhti ve'im lo yitenu lakh vehayita naqi mei'alati. va'abo hayom 'el ha'ayin va'omar ihoh 'elohei 'adoni 'abraham 'im yeshkha na mazliakh darki 'asher 'anokhi holekh 'aleha. hineh 'anokhi nizab 'al 'en hamayim vehayah ha'almah hayozet lish'ob ve'amarti 'eileha hashqini na me'at mayim mikadekh. ve'amerah 'eilai gam 'atah sheteh vegam ligmalekha 'esh'ab hi ha'ishah 'asher hokhiakh ihoh leben 'adoni. 'ani terem 'akhaleh ledaber 'el libi vehineh ribqah yozet vekhadah 'al shikhmah vateired ha'aynah vatish'ab va'omar 'eileha hashqini na. vatemaher vatored kadah mei'aleha vatomer sheteh vegam gemalekha 'ashqeh va'eishet vegam hagemalim hishqatah. va'esh'al 'otah va'omar bat mi 'at vatomer bat betu'el ben nakhor 'asher yaledah lo milkah va'asim hanezem 'al 'apah vehazemidim 'al yadeha. va'eqod va'eshtakhaveh ihoh va'abarekh 'et ihoh 'elohei 'adoni 'abraham 'asher hinkhani bederekh 'emet laqakhat 'et bat 'akhi 'adoni libno. ve'atah 'im yeshkhem 'osim khesed ve'emet 'et 'adoni hagidu li ve'im lo hagidu li ve'efneh 'al yamin 'o 'al semol. vaya'an laban ubetu'el vayomeru ihoh yaza hadabar lo nukhal daber 'eilekha ra' 'o tob. hineh ribqah lefanekha qakh valekh utehi 'ishah leben 'adonekha ka'asher diber ihoh. vayhi ka'asher shama' 'ebed 'abraham 'et dibreihem vayishtakhu 'arzah ihoh. vayozei ha'ebed kelei khesef ukhelei zahab ubegadim vayiten leribqah umigdanot natan le'akhiha ule'imah. vayokhelu vayishtu hu veha'anashim 'asher 'imo vayalinu vayaqumu baboqer vayomer shalekhuni ladoni. vayomer 'akhiha ve'imah teisheb hana'ara 'itanu yamim 'o 'asor 'akhar teilekh. vayomer 'aleihem 'al te'akharu 'oti ihoh hizliakh darki shalekhuni ve'eilekhah ladoni. vayomeru niqra lana'ara venish'alah 'et piha. vayiqre'u leribqah vayomeru 'eileha hateilekhi 'im ha'ish hazeh vatomer 'eilekh. vayshalekhu 'et ribqah 'akhotam ve'et meiniqtah ve'et 'ebed 'abraham ve'et 'anashav. vaybarakhu 'et ribqah vayomeru lah 'akhoteinu 'at hayi le'alfei rebabah veyirash zar'ekh 'et sha'ar sone'av. vataqam ribqah vena'aroteha vatirkabnah 'al hagemalim vateilakhnah 'akharei ha'ish vayiqakh ha'ebed 'et ribqah vayeilakh. veyizkhaq ba mibo be'er lakhai ro'i vehu yosheb be'erez hanegeb. vayeizei yizkhaq lasuakh basadeh lifnot 'areb vayisa 'einav vayar vehineh gemalim ba'im. vatisa ribqah 'et 'eineha vateire 'et yizkhaq vatipol mei'al hagamal. vatomer 'el ha'ebed mi ha'ish halazeh haholekh basadeh liqrateinu vayomer ha'ebed hu 'adoni vatiqakh haza'if vatitkas. vaysaper ha'ebed leyizkhaq 'et kal hadebarim 'asher 'asah. vaybi'eha yizkhaq ha'ohelah sarah 'imo vayiqakh 'et ribqah vatehi lo le'ishah vaye'ehabeha vayinakhem yizkhaq 'akharei 'imo. vayosef 'abraham vayiqakh 'ishah ushemah qeturah. vateiled lo 'et zimran ve'et yaqeshan ve'et medan ve'et midyan ve'et yishbaq ve'et shuakh. veyaqeshan yalad 'et sheba ve'et dedan ubenei dedan hayu 'ashurim uletushim ule'umim. ubenei midyan 'eifah va'eifer vakhanokh va'abida' ve'elda'ah kal 'eleh benei qeturah. vayiten 'abraham 'et kal 'asher lo leyizkhaq. velibnei hapilagshim 'asher le'abraham natan 'abraham matanot vayshalekhem mei'al yizkhaq beno be'odenu khai qeidemah 'el 'erez qedem. ve'eleh yemei shenei khayei 'abraham 'asher khai me'at shanah veshib'im shanah vekhamesh shanim. vayigva' vayamat 'abraham beseibah tobah zaqen vesabeia' vayei'asef 'el 'amav. vayiqberu 'oto yizkhaq veyishma'el banav 'el me'arat hamakhpeilah 'el sedeh 'efron ben zokhar hakhiti 'asher 'al penei mamrei. hasadeh 'asher qanah 'abraham mei'et benei khet shamah qubar 'abraham vesarah 'ishto. vayhi 'akharei mot 'abraham vaybarekh 'elohim 'et yizkhaq beno vayeisheb yizkhaq 'im be'er lakhai ro'i. ve'eleh toledot yishma'el ben 'abraham 'asher yaledah hagar hamizrit shifkhat sarah le'abraham. ve'eleh shemot benei yishma'el bishmotam letoldotam bekhor yishma'el nebayot veqeidar ve'adbe'el umibsam. umishma' vedumah umasa. khadad veteima yetur nafish vaqeidemah. eleh hem benei yishma'el ve'eleh shemotam bekhazreihem ubetirotam shenem 'asar nesi'im le'umotam. ve'eleh shenei khayei yishma'el me'at shanah usheloshim shanah vesheba' shanim vayigva' vayamat vayei'asef 'el 'amav. vayishkenu meikhavilah 'ad shur 'asher 'al penei mizrayim bo'akhah 'ashurah 'al penei khal 'ekhav nafal. ve'eleh toldot yizkhaq ben 'abraham 'abraham holid 'et yizkhaq. vayhi yizkhaq ben 'arba'im shanah beqakhto 'et ribqah bat betu'el ha'arami mipadan 'aram 'akhot laban ha'arami lo le'ishah. vaye'tar yizkhaq ihoh lenokhakh 'ishto ki 'aqarah hi vayei'ater lo ihoh vatahar ribqah 'ishto. vayitrozazu habanim beqirbah vatomer 'im ken lamah zeh 'anokhi vateilekh lidrosh 'et ihoh. vayomer ihoh lah shenei goyim goyim bebitnekh ushenei le'umim mimei'ayikh yipareidu ule'om mil'om ye'emaz verab ya'abod za'ir. vayimle'u yameha laledet vehineh tomim bebitnah. vayeizei harishon 'admoni kulo ke'aderet sei'ar vayiqre'u shemo 'eisav. ve'akharei khen yaza 'akhiv veyado 'okhezet ba'aqeb 'eisav vayiqra shemo ya'aqob veyizkhaq ben shishim shanah beledet 'otam. vayigdelu hane'arim vayhi 'eisav 'ish yodeia' zayid 'ish sadeh veya'aqob 'ish tam yosheb 'ohalim. vaye'ehab yizkhaq 'et 'eisav ki zayid befiv veribqah 'ohebet 'et ya'aqob. vayazed ya'aqob nazid vayabo 'eisav min hasadeh vehu 'ayef. vayomer 'eisav 'el ya'aqob hal'iteini na min ha'adom ha'adom hazeh ki 'ayef 'anokhi 'al ken qara shemo 'edom. vayomer ya'aqob mikhrah khayom 'et bekhoratekha li. vayomer 'eisav hineh 'anokhi holekh lamut velamah zeh li bekhorah. vayomer ya'aqob hishabe'ah li kayom vayishaba' lo vayimkor 'et bekhorato leya'aqob. veya'aqob natan le'eisav lekhem unezid 'adashim vayokhal vayeishet vayaqam vayeilakh vayibez 'eisav 'et habekhorah. vayhi ra'ab ba'arez milebad hara'ab harishon 'asher hayah bimei 'abraham vayeilekh yizkhaq 'el 'abimelekh melekh pelishtim gerarah. vayeira 'eilav ihoh vayomer 'al teired mizrayemah shekhon ba'arez 'asher 'omar 'eilekha. gur ba'arez hazot ve'ehyeh 'imekha va'abarekheka ki lekha ulezar'akha 'eten 'et kal ha'arazot ha'el vahaqimoti 'et hashebu'ah 'asher nishba'ti le'abraham 'abikha. vehirbeiti 'et zar'akha kekhokhbei hashamayim venatati lezar'akha 'et kal ha'arazot ha'el vehitbarakhu bezar'akha kol goyei ha'arez. 'eiqeb 'asher shama' 'abraham beqoli vayishmor mishmarti mizvotai khuqotai vetorotai. vayeisheb yizkhaq bigrar. vayish'alu 'anshei hamaqom le'ishto vayomer 'akhoti hi ki yarei leimor 'ishti pen yaharguni 'anshei hamaqom 'al ribqah ki tobat mar'eh hi. vayhi ki 'arekhu lo sham hayamim vayashqef 'abimelekh melekh pelishtim be'ad hakhalon vayar vehineh yizkhaq mezakheq 'et ribqah 'ishto. vayiqra 'abimelekh leyizkhaq vayomer 'akh hineh 'ishtekha hi ve'ekh 'amarta 'akhoti hi vayomer 'eilav yizkhaq ki 'amarti pen 'amut 'aleha. vayomer 'abimelekh mah zot 'asita lanu kim'at shakhab 'akhad ha'am 'et 'ishtekha veheibeita 'aleinu 'asham. vayzav 'abimelekh 'et kal ha'am leimor hanogeia' ba'ish hazeh ube'ishto mot yumat. vayizra' yizkhaq ba'arez hahiv vayimza bashanah hahiv mei'ah she'arim vaybarakheihu ihoh. vayigdal ha'ish vayeilekh halokh vegadel 'ad ki gadal me'od. vayhi lo miqneh zon umiqneh baqar va'abudah rabah vayqan'u 'oto pelishtim. vekhal habe'eirot 'asher khaferu 'abdei 'abiv bimei 'abraham 'abiv sitemum pelishtim vaymal'um 'afar. vayomer 'abimelekh 'el yizkhaq lekh mei'imanu ki 'azamta mimenu me'od. vayeilekh misham yizkhaq vayikhan benakhal gerar vayeisheb sham. vayashab yizkhaq vayakhpor 'et be'eirot hamayim 'asher khaferu bimei 'abraham 'abiv vaysatemum pelishtim 'akharei mot 'abraham vayiqra lahen sheimot kasheimot 'asher qara lahen 'abiv. vayakhperu 'abdei yizkhaq banakhal vayimze'u sham be'er mayim khayim. vayaribu ro'ei gerar 'im ro'ei yizkhaq leimor lanu hamayim vayiqra shem habe'er 'eiseq ki hit'asequ 'imo. vayakhperu be'er 'akheret vayaribu gam 'aleha vayiqra shemah sitnah. vaya'teq misham vayakhpor be'er 'akheret velo rabu 'aleha vayiqra shemah rekhobot vayomer ki 'atah hirkhib ihoh lanu ufarinu ba'arez. vaya'al misham be'er shaba'. vayeira 'eilav ihoh balaylah hahu vayomer 'anokhi 'elohei 'abraham 'abikha 'al tira ki 'itekha 'anokhi ubeirakhtikha vehirbeiti 'et zar'akha ba'abur 'abraham 'abdi. vayiben sham mizbeiakh vayiqra beshem ihoh vayet sham 'aholo vayikhru sham 'abdei yizkhaq be'er. va'abimelekh halakh 'eilav migerar va'akhuzat meirei'eihu ufikhol sar zeba'o. vayomer 'aleihem yizkhaq madua' batem 'eilai ve'atem seneitem 'oti vateshalekhuni mei'itekhem. vayomeru ra'o ra'inu ki hayah ihoh 'imakh vanomer tehi na 'alah beinoteinu beineinu ubeinekha venikhretah berit 'imakh. 'im ta'aseh 'imanu ra'ah ka'asher lo nega'anukha vekha'asher 'asinu 'imekha raq tob vaneshaleikhakha beshalom 'atah 'atah berukh ihoh. vaya'as lahem mishteh vayokhelu vayishtu. vayashkimu baboqer vayishabe'u 'ish le'akhiv vayshalekhem yizkhaq vayeilekhu mei'ito beshalom. vayhi bayom hahu vayabo'u 'abdei yizkhaq vayagidu lo 'al 'odot habe'er 'asher khafaru vayomeru lo mazanu mayim. vayiqra 'otah shib'ah 'al ken shem ha'ir be'er sheba' 'ad hayom hazeh. vayhi 'eisav ben 'arba'im shanah vayiqakh 'ishah 'et yehudit bat be'eiri hakhiti ve'et basemat bat 'eilon hakhiti. vatihyena morat ruakh leyizkhaq uleribqah. vayhi ki zaqen yizkhaq vatikhhena 'einav meire'ot vayiqra 'et 'eisav beno hagadol vayomer 'eilav beni vayomer 'eilav hineini. vayomer hineh na zaqanti lo yada'ti yom moti. ve'atah sa na kheilekha telyekha veqashtekha vezei hasadeh vezudah li zeidah zayid. va'aseh li mat'amim ka'asher 'ahabti vehabi'ah li ve'okheilah ba'abur tebarekhkha nafshi beterem 'amut. veribqah shoma'at bedaber yizkhaq 'el 'eisav beno vayeilekh 'eisav hasadeh lazud zayid lehabi. veribqah 'amerah 'el ya'aqob benah leimor hineh shama'ti 'et 'abikha medaber 'el 'eisav 'akhikha leimor. habi'ah li zayid va'aseh li mat'amim ve'okheilah va'abarekhkhah lifnei ihoh lifnei moti. ve'atah beni shema' beqoli la'asher 'ani mezavah 'otakh. lekh na 'el hazon veqakh li misham shenei gedayei 'izim tobim ve'e'eseh 'otam mat'amim le'abikha ka'asher 'aheb. veheibeita le'abikha ve'akhal ba'abur 'asher yebarekhkha lifnei moto. vayomer ya'aqob 'el ribqah 'imo hen 'eisav 'akhi 'ish sa'ir ve'anokhi 'ish khalaq. 'ulai yemusheini 'abi vehayiti be'einav kimta'teia' veheibeiti 'alai qelalah velo berakhah. vatomer lo 'imo 'alai qilatekha beni 'akh shema' beqoli velekh qakh li. vayeilekh vayiqakh vayabei le'imo vata'as 'imo mat'amim ka'asher 'aheb 'abiv. vatiqakh ribqah 'et bigdei 'eisav benah hagadol hakhamudot 'asher 'itah babayit vatalbesh 'et ya'aqob benah haqatan. ve'et 'orot gedayei ha'izim hilbishah 'al yadav ve'al khelqat zavarav. vatiten 'et hamat'amim ve'et halekhem 'asher 'asatah beyad ya'aqob benah. vayabo 'el 'abiv vayomer 'abi vayomer hineni mi 'atah beni. vayomer ya'aqob 'el 'abiv 'anokhi 'eisav bekhorekha 'asiti ka'asher dibarta 'eilai qum na shebah ve'akhelah mizeidi ba'abur tebarakhani nafshekha. vayomer yizkhaq 'el beno mah zeh miharta limzo beni vayomer ki hiqrah ihoh 'elohekha lefanai. vayomer yizkhaq 'el ya'aqob geshah na va'amushkha beni ha'atah zeh beni 'eisav 'im lo. vayigash ya'aqob 'el yizkhaq 'abiv vaymusheihu vayomer haqol qol ya'aqob vehayadayim yedei 'eisav. velo hikiro ki hayu yadav kidei 'eisav 'akhiv se'irot vaybarekheihu. vayomer 'atah zeh beni 'eisav vayomer 'ani. vayomer hagishah li ve'okhelah mized beni lema'an tebarekhkha nafshi vayagesh lo vayokhal vayabei lo yayin vayeishet. vayomer 'eilav yizkhaq 'abiv geshah na usheqah li beni. vayigash vayishaq lo vayarakh 'et reiakh begadav vaybarakheihu vayomer re'eh reiakh beni kereiakh sadeh 'asher beirakho ihoh. veyiten lekha ha'elohim mital hashamayim umishmanei ha'arez verob dagan vetirosh. ya'abdukha 'amim veyishtakhu veyishtakhavu lekha le'umim heveh gebir le'akhekha veyishtakhavu lekha benei 'imekha 'orerekha 'arur umebarakhekha barukh. vayhi ka'asher kilah yizkhaq lebarekh 'et ya'aqob vayhi 'akh yazo yaza ya'aqob mei'et penei yizkhaq 'abiv ve'eisav 'akhiv ba mizeido. vaya'as gam hu mat'amim vayabei le'abiv vayomer le'abiv yaqum 'abi veyokhal mized beno ba'abur tebarakhani nafshekha. vayomer lo yizkhaq 'abiv mi 'atah vayomer 'ani binkha bekhorekha 'eisav. vayekherad yizkhaq kharadah gedolah 'ad me'od vayomer mi 'eifo hu hazad zayid vayabei li va'okhal mikol beterem tabo va'abarakheihu gam barukh yihyeh. kishmoa' 'eisav 'et dibrei 'abiv vayiz'aq ze'aqah gedolah umarah 'ad me'od vayomer le'abiv barakheini gam 'ani 'abi. vayomer ba 'akhikha bemirmah vayiqakh birkhatekha. vayomer hakhi qara shemo ya'aqob vaya'qebeini zeh fa'amayim 'et bekhorati laqakh vehineh 'atah laqakh birkhati vayomar halo 'azalta li berakhah. vaya'an yizkhaq vayomer le'eisav hen gebir samtiv lakh ve'et kal 'ekhav natati lo la'abadim vedagan vetirosh semakhtiv ulekhah 'eifo mah 'e'eseh beni. vayomer 'eisav 'el 'abiv habrakhah 'akhat hi lekha 'abi barakheini gam 'ani 'abi vayisa 'eisav qolo vayeibek. vaya'an yizkhaq 'abiv vayomer 'eilav hineh mishmanei ha'arez yihyeh moshabekha umital hashamayim mei'al. ve'al kharbekha tikhyeh ve'et 'akhikha ta'abod vehayah ka'asher tarid ufaraqta 'ulo mei'al zavarekha. vayistom 'eisav 'et ya'aqob 'al haberakhah 'asher beirakho 'abiv vayomer 'eisav belibo yiqrebu yemei 'eibel 'abi ve'ahargah 'et ya'aqob 'akhi. vayugad leribqah 'et dibrei 'eisav benah hagadol vatishlakh vatiqra leya'aqob benah haqatan vatomer 'eilav hineh 'eisav 'akhikha mitnakhem lekha leharegekha. ve'atah beni shema' beqoli vequm berakh lekha 'el laban 'akhi kharanah. veyashabta 'imo yamim 'akhadim 'ad 'asher tashub khamat 'akhikha. 'ad shub 'af 'akhikha mimekha veshakhakh 'et 'asher 'asita lo veshalakhti uleqakhtikha misham lamah 'eshkal gam sheneikhem yom 'ekhad. vatomer ribqah 'el yizkhaq qazti bekhayai mipenei benot khet 'im loqeiakh ya'aqob 'ishah mibenot khet ka'eleh mibenot ha'arez lamah li khayim. vayiqra yizkhaq 'el ya'aqob vaybarekh 'oto vayzaveihu vayomer lo lo tiqakh 'ishah mibenot kena'an. qum lekh padenah 'aram beitah betu'el 'abi 'imekha veqakh lekha misham 'ishah mibenot laban 'akhi 'imekha. ve'el shadai yebarekh 'otekha veyafrekha veyarbekha vehayita liqhal 'amim. veyiten lekha 'et birkat 'abraham lekha ulezar'akha 'itakh lerishtekha 'et 'erez megurekha 'asher natan 'elohim le'abraham. vayishlakh yizkhaq 'et ya'aqob vayeilekh padenah 'aram 'el laban ben betu'el ha'arami 'akhi ribqah 'em ya'aqob ve'eisav. vayar 'eisav ki beirakh yizkhaq 'et ya'aqob veshilakh 'oto padenah 'aram laqakhat lo misham 'ishah bebarakho 'oto vayzav 'alav leimor lo tiqakh 'ishah mibenot kena'an. vayishma' ya'aqob 'el 'abiv ve'el 'imo vayeilekh padenah 'aram. vayar 'eisav ki ra'ot benot kena'an be'einei yizkhaq 'abiv. vayeilekh 'eisav 'el yishma'el vayiqakh 'et makhalat bat yishma'el ben 'abraham 'akhot nebayot 'al nashav lo le'ishah. vayeizei ya'aqob mibe'er shaba' vayeilekh kharanah. vayifga' bamaqom vayalen sham ki ba hashemesh vayiqakh mei'abnei hamaqom vayasem mera'ashotav vayishkab bamaqom hahu. vayakhalom vehineh sulam muzab 'arzah verosho magia' hashamayemah vehineh mal'akhei 'elohim 'olim veyoredim bo. vehineh ihoh nizab 'alav vayomar 'ani ihoh 'elohei 'abraham 'abikha veilohei yizkhaq ha'arez 'asher 'atah shokheb 'aleha lekha 'etenenah ulezar'ekha. vehayah zar'akha ka'afar ha'arez ufarazta yamah vaqeidemah vezafonah vanegbah venibrakhu bekha kal mishpekhot ha'adamah ubezar'ekha. vehineh 'anokhi 'imakh ushemartikha bekhol 'asher teilekh vahashibotikha 'el ha'adamah hazot ki lo 'e'ezabekha 'ad 'asher 'im 'asiti 'et 'asher dibarti lakh. vayiqaz ya'aqob mishenato vayomer 'akhen yesh ihoh bamaqom hazeh ve'anokhi lo yada'eti. vayira vayomar mah nora hamaqom hazeh 'en zeh ki 'im bet 'elohim vezeh sha'ar hashamayim. vayashkem ya'aqob baboqer vayiqakh 'et ha'eben 'asher sam mera'ashotav vayasem 'otah mazeibah vayizoq shemen 'al roshah. vayiqra 'et shem hamaqom hahu bet 'el ve'ulam luz shem ha'ir larishonah. vayidar ya'aqob neder leimor 'im yihyeh 'elohim 'imadi ushemarani baderekh hazeh 'asher 'anokhi holekh venatan li lekhem le'ekhol ubeged lilbosh. veshabti beshalom 'el bet 'abi vehayah ihoh li leilohim. veha'eben hazot 'asher samti mazeibah yihyeh bet 'elohim vekhol 'asher titen li 'aser 'a'aserenu lakh. vayisa ya'aqob raglav vayeilekh 'arzah benei qedem. vayar vehineh be'er basadeh vehineh sham sheloshah 'edrei zon robezim 'aleha ki min habe'er hahiv yashqu ha'adarim veha'eben gedolah 'al pi habe'er. vene'esfu shamah khal ha'adarim vegalalu 'et ha'eben mei'al pi habe'er vehishqu 'et hazon veheishibu 'et ha'eben 'al pi habe'er limqomah. vayomer lahem ya'aqob 'akhai mei'ayin 'atem vayomeru meikharan 'anakhenu. vayomer lahem hayda'tem 'et laban ben nakhor vayomeru yada'enu. vayomer lahem hashalom lo vayomeru shalom vehineh rakhel bito ba'ah 'im hazon. vayomer hen 'od hayom gadol lo 'et hei'asef hamiqneh hashqu hazon ulekhu re'u. vayomeru lo nukhal 'ad 'asher yei'asefu kal ha'adarim vegalalu 'et ha'eben mei'al pi habe'er vehishqinu hazon. 'odenu medaber 'imam verakhel ba'ah 'im hazon 'asher le'abiha ki ro'ah hi vayhi ka'asher ra'ah ya'aqob 'et rakhel bat laban 'akhi 'imo ve'et zon laban 'akhi 'imo vayigash ya'aqob vayagel 'et ha'eben mei'al pi habe'er vayashq 'et zon laban 'akhi 'imo. vayishaq ya'aqob lerakhel vayisa 'et qolo vayeibek. vayaged ya'aqob lerakhel ki 'akhi 'abiha hu vekhi ben ribqah hu vataraz vataged le'abiha. vayhi khishmoa' laban 'et sheima' ya'aqob ben 'akhoto vayaraz liqrato vaykhabeq lo vaynasheq lo vaybi'eihu 'el beito vaysaper lelaban 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh. vayomer lo laban 'akh 'azmi ubesari 'atah vayeisheb 'imo khodesh yamim. vayomer laban leya'aqob hakhi 'akhi 'atah va'abadtani khinam hagidah li mah maskurtekha. ulelaban shetei banot shem hagedolah lei'ah veshem haqetanah rakhel. ve'einei lei'ah rakot verakhel hayetah yefat to'ar vifat mar'eh. vaye'ehab ya'aqob 'et rakhel vayomer 'e'ebadekha sheba' shanim berakhel bitekha haqetanah. vayomer laban tob titi 'otah lakh mititi 'otah le'ish 'akher shebah 'imadi. vaya'abod ya'aqob berakhel sheba' shanim vayihyu be'einav keyamim 'akhadim be'ahabato 'otah. vayomer ya'aqob 'el laban habah 'et 'ishti ki male'u yamai ve'abo'ah 'eileha. vaye'esof laban 'et kal 'anshei hamaqom vaya'as mishteh. vayhi ba'ereb vayiqakh 'et lei'ah bito vayabei 'otah 'eilav vayabo 'eileha. vayiten laban lah 'et zilpah shifkhato lelei'ah bito shifkhah. vayhi baboqer vehineh hi lei'ah vayomer 'el laban mah zot 'asita li halo berakhel 'abadti 'imakh velamah rimitani. vayomer laban lo yei'aseh khen bimqomeinu latet haze'irah lifnei habekhirah. malei shebua' zot venitenah lekha gam 'et zot ba'abodah 'asher ta'abod 'imadi 'od sheba' shanim 'akheirot. vaya'as ya'aqob ken vaymalei shebua' zot vayiten lo 'et rakhel bito lo le'ishah. vayiten laban lerakhel bito 'et bilhah shifkhato lah leshifkhah. vayabo gam 'el rakhel vaye'ehab gam 'et rakhel milei'ah vaya'abod 'imo 'od sheba' shanim 'akheirot. vayar ihoh ki senu'ah lei'ah vayiftakh 'et rakhmah verakhel 'aqarah. vatahar lei'ah vateiled ben vatiqra shemo re'uben ki 'amerah ki ra'ah ihoh be'anyi ki 'atah ye'ehabani 'ishi. vatahar 'od vateiled ben vatomer ki shama' ihoh ki senu'ah 'anokhi vayiten li gam 'et zeh vatiqra shemo shim'on. vatahar 'od vateiled ben vatomer 'atah hapa'am yilaveh 'ishi 'eilai ki yaladti lo sheloshah banim 'al ken qara shemo leivi. vatahar 'od vateiled ben vatomer hapa'am 'odeh 'et ihoh 'al ken qare'ah shemo yehudah vata'amod miledet. vateire rakhel ki lo yaledah leya'aqob vateqanei rakhel ba'akhotah vatomer 'el ya'aqob habah li banim ve'im 'ayin meitah 'anokhi. vayikhar 'af ya'aqob berakhel vayomer hatakhat 'elohim 'anokhi 'asher mana' mimekh peri baten. vatomer hineh 'amati bilhah bo 'eileha veteiled 'al birkai ve'ibaneh gam 'anokhi mimenah. vatiten lo 'et bilhah shifkhatah le'ishah vayabo 'eileha ya'aqob. vatahar bilhah vateiled leya'aqob ben. vatomer rakhel danani 'elohim vegam shama' beqoli vayiten li ben 'al ken qare'ah shemo dan. vatahar 'od vateiled bilhah shifkhat rakhel ben sheini leya'aqob. vatomer rakhel naftulei 'elohim niftalti 'im 'akhoti gam yakholeti vatiqra shemo naftali. vateire lei'ah ki 'amedah miledet vatiqakh 'et zilpah shifkhatah vatiten 'otah leya'aqob le'ishah. vateiled zilpah shifkhat lei'ah leya'aqob ben. vatomer lei'ah begad ba gad vatiqra 'et shemo gad. vateiled zilpah shifkhat lei'ah ben sheini leya'aqob. vatomer lei'ah be'asheri ki 'isheruni banot vatiqra 'et shemo 'asher. vayeilekh re'uben bimei qezir khitim vayimza duda'im basadeh vayabei 'otam 'el lei'ah 'imo vatomer rakhel 'el lei'ah
