teni na li miduda'ei benekh. vatomer lah ham'at qakhtekh 'et 'ishi velaqakhat gam 'et duda'ei beni vatomer rakhel lakhen yishkab 'imakh halaylah takhat duda'ei benekh. vayabo ya'aqob min hasadeh ba'ereb vateizei lei'ah liqrato vatomer 'eilai tabo ki sakhor sekhartikha beduda'ei beni vayishkab 'imah balaylah hu. vayishma' 'elohim 'el lei'ah vatahar vateiled leya'aqob ben khamishi. vatomer lei'ah natan 'elohim sekhari 'asher natati shifkhati le'ishi vatiqra shemo yisashkhar. vatahar 'od lei'ah vateiled ben shishi leya'aqob vatomer lei'ah zebadani 'elohim 'oti zeibed tob hapa'am yizbeleini 'ishi ki yaladti lo shishah banim vatiqra 'et shemo zebulun. ve'akhar yaledah bat vatiqra 'et shemah dinah. vayizkor 'elohim 'et rakhel vayishma' 'eileha 'elohim vayiftakh 'et rakhmah. vatahar vateiled ben vatomer 'asaf 'elohim 'et kherpati. vatiqra 'et shemo yosef leimor yosef ihoh li ben 'akher. vayhi ka'asher yaledah rakhel 'et yosef vayomer ya'aqob 'el laban shalekheini ve'eilekhah 'el meqomi ule'arzi. tenah 'et nashai ve'et yeladai 'asher 'abadti 'otekha bahen ve'eileikhah ki 'atah yada'ta 'et 'abodati 'asher 'abadtikha. vayomer 'eilav laban 'im na mazati khen be'einekha nikhashti vaybarakheini ihoh biglalekha. vayomar naqebah sekharekha 'alai ve'eteinah. vayomer 'eilav 'atah yada'ta 'et 'asher 'abadtikha ve'et 'asher hayah miqnekha 'iti. ki me'at 'asher hayah lekha lefanai vayifroz larob vaybarekh ihoh 'otekha leragli ve'atah matai 'e'eseh gam 'anokhi lebeiti. vayomer mah 'eten lakh vayomer ya'aqob lo titen li me'umah 'im ta'aseh li hadabar hazeh 'ashubah 'er'eh zonekha 'eshmor. 'e'ebor bekhal zonekha hayom haser misham kal seh naqod vetalu vekhal seh khum bakesabim vetalu venaqod ba'izim vehayah sekhari. ve'anetah bi zidqati beyom makhar ki tabo 'al sekhari lefanekha kol 'asher 'einenu naqod vetalu ba'izim vekhum bakesabim ganub hu 'iti. vayomer laban hen lu yehi khidbarekha. vayasar bayom hahu 'et hateyashim ha'aqudim vehatelu'im ve'et kal ha'izim hanequdot vehatelu'ot kol 'asher laban bo vekhal khum bakesabim vayiten beyad banav. vayasem derekh sheloshet yamim beino uben ya'aqob veya'aqob ro'eh 'et zon laban hanotarot. vayiqakh lo ya'aqob maqal libneh lakh veluz ve'ermon vayfazel bahen pezalot lebanot makhsof halaban 'asher 'al hamaqlot. vayazeg 'et hamaqlot 'asher pizel barohatim beshiqatot hamayim 'asher tabona hazon lishtot lenokhakh hazon vayeikhamnah bebo'an lishtot. vayekhemu hazon 'el hamaqlot vateiladna hazon 'aqudim nequdim utelu'im. vehakesabim hifrid ya'aqob vayiten penei hazon 'el 'aqod vekhal khum bezon laban vayashet lo 'adarim lebado velo shatam 'al zon laban. vehayah bekhal yakhem hazon hamqusharot vesam ya'aqob 'et hamaqlot le'einei hazon barohatim leyakhmenah bamaqlot. ubeha'atif hazon lo yasim vehayah ha'atufim lelaban vehaqeshurim leya'aqob. vayifroz ha'ish me'od me'od vayhi lo zon rabot ushefakhot va'abadim ugemalim vakhamorim. vayishma' 'et dibrei benei laban leimor laqakh ya'aqob 'et kal 'asher le'abinu umei'asher le'abinu 'asah 'et kal hakabod hazeh. vayar ya'aqob 'et penei laban vehineh 'einenu 'imo kitmol shilshom. vayomer ihoh 'el ya'aqob shub 'el 'erez 'abotekha ulemoladtekha ve'ehyeh 'imakh. vayishlakh ya'aqob vayiqra lerakhel ulelei'ah hasadeh 'el zono. vayomer lahen ro'eh 'anokhi 'et penei 'abikhen ki 'einenu 'eilai kitmol shilshom veilohei 'abi hayah 'imadi. ve'ateinah yeda'ten ki bekhal kokhi 'abadti 'et 'abikhen. va'abikhen heitel bi vehekhelif 'et maskurti 'aseret monim velo netano 'elohim lehara' 'imadi. 'im koh yomar nequdim yihyeh sekharekha veyaledu khal hazon nequdim ve'im koh yomar 'aqudim yihyeh sekharekha veyaledu khal hazon 'aqudim. vayazel 'elohim 'et miqneh 'abikhem vayiten li. vayhi be'et yakhem hazon va'esa 'einai va'eire bakhalom vehineh ha'atudim ha'olim 'al hazon 'aqudim nequdim uberudim. vayomer 'eilai mal'akh ha'elohim bakhalom ya'aqob va'omar hineini. vayomer sa na 'einekha ure'eh kal ha'atudim ha'olim 'al hazon 'aqudim nequdim uberudim ki ra'iti 'et kal 'asher laban 'oseh lakh. 'anokhi ha'el bet 'el 'asher mashakhta sham mazeibah 'asher nadarta li sham neder 'atah qum zei min ha'arez hazot veshub 'el 'erez moladtekha. vata'an rakhel velei'ah vatomarnah lo ha'od lanu kheileq venakhalah bebet 'abinu. halo nakheriyot nekhshabnu lo ki mekharanu vayokhal gam 'akhol 'et kaspeinu. ki khal ha'osher 'asher hizil 'elohim mei'abinu lanu hu ulebaneinu ve'atah kol 'asher 'amar 'elohim 'eilekha 'aseh. vayaqam ya'aqob vayisa 'et banav ve'et nashav 'al hagemalim. vayinhag 'et kal miqneihu ve'et kal rekhusho 'asher rakhash miqneh qinyano 'asher rakhash befadan 'aram labo 'el yizkhaq 'abiv 'arzah kena'an. velaban halakh ligzoz 'et zono vatignob rakhel 'et haterafim 'asher le'abiha. vayignob ya'aqob 'et leb laban ha'arami 'al beli higid lo ki boreiakh hu. vayibrakh hu vekhal 'asher lo vayaqam vaya'abor 'et hanahar vayasem 'et panav har hagil'ad. vayugad lelaban bayom hashelishi ki barakh ya'aqob. vayiqakh 'et 'ekhav 'imo vayirdof 'akharav derekh shib'at yamim vayadbeq 'oto behar hagil'ad. vayabo 'elohim 'el laban ha'arami bakhalom halayelah vayomer lo hishamer lekha pen tedaber 'im ya'aqob mitob 'ad ra'. vayaseg laban 'et ya'aqob veya'aqob taqa' 'et 'aholo bahar velaban taqa' 'et 'ekhav behar hagil'ad. vayomer laban leya'aqob meh 'asita vatignob 'et lebabi vatenaheg 'et benotai kishbuyot khareb. lamah nakhbeita libroakh vatignob 'oti velo higadta li va'ashaleikhakha besimkhah ubeshirim betof ubekhinor. velo netashtani lenasheq lebanai velibnotai 'atah hiskalta 'aso. yesh le'el yadi la'asot 'imakhem ra' veilohei 'abikhem 'emesh 'amar 'eilai leimor hishamer lekha midaber 'im ya'aqob mitob 'ad ra'. ve'atah halokh halakhta ki nikhsof nikhsaftah lebet 'abikha lamah ganabta 'et 'elohai. vaya'an ya'aqob vayomer lelaban ki yareiti ki 'amarti pen tigzol 'et benotekha mei'imi. 'im 'asher timza 'et 'elohekha lo yikhyeh neged 'akheinu haker lekha mah 'imadi veqakh lakh velo yada' ya'aqob ki rakhel genabatam. vayabo laban be'ohel ya'aqob ube'ohel lei'ah ube'ohel shetei ha'amahot velo maza vayeizei mei'ohel lei'ah vayabo be'ohel rakhel. verakhel laqekhah 'et haterafim vatesimem bekhar hagamal vateisheb 'aleihem vaymashesh laban 'et kal ha'ohel velo maza. vatomer 'el 'abiha 'al yikhar be'einei 'adoni ki lo 'ukhal laqum mipanekha ki derekh nashim li vaykhapes velo maza 'et haterafim. vayikhar leya'aqob vayareb belaban vaya'an ya'aqob vayomer lelaban mah pish'i mah khatati ki dalaqta 'akharai. ki mishashta 'et kal keilai mah mazata mikol kelei beitekha sim koh neged 'akhai ve'akhekha veyokhikhu ben sheneinu. zeh 'esrim shanah 'anokhi 'imakh rekheilekha ve'izekha lo shikeilu ve'eilei zonekha lo 'akhaleti. tereifah lo heibeiti 'eilekha 'anokhi 'akhatenah miyadi tebaqshenah genubti yom ugenubti layelah. hayiti bayom 'akhalani khoreb veqerakh balayelah vatidad shenati mei'einai. zeh li 'esrim shanah bebeitekha 'abadtikha 'arba' 'esreh shanah bishtei benotekha veshesh shanim bezonekha vatakhalef 'et maskurti 'aseret monim. lulei 'elohei 'abi 'elohei 'abraham ufakhad yizkhaq hayah li ki 'atah reiqam shilakhtani 'et 'aneyi ve'et yegia' kapai ra'ah 'elohim vayokhakh 'amesh. vaya'an laban vayomer 'el ya'aqob habanot benotai vehabanim banai vehazon zoni vekhol 'asher 'atah ro'eh li hu velibnotai mah 'e'eseh la'eleh hayom 'o libneihen 'asher yaladu. ve'atah lekhah nikhretah berit 'ani va'atah vehayah le'ed beini ubeinekha. vayiqakh ya'aqob 'aben vayrimeha mazeibah. vayomer ya'aqob le'ekhav liqtu 'abanim vayiqkhu 'abanim vaya'asu gal vayokhelu sham 'al hagal. vayiqra lo laban yegar sahaduta veya'aqob qara lo gal'ed. vayomer laban hagal hazeh 'ed beini ubeinekha hayom 'al ken qara shemo gal'ed. vehamizpah 'asher 'amar yizef ihoh beini ubeinekha ki nisater 'ish meirei'eihu. 'im te'aneh 'et benotai ve'im tiqakh nashim 'al benotai 'en 'ish 'imanu re'eh 'elohim 'ed beini ubeinekha. vayomer laban leya'aqob hineh hagal hazeh vehineh hamazeibah 'asher yariti beini ubeinekha. 'ed hagal hazeh ve'eidah hamazeibah 'im 'ani lo 'e'ebor 'eilekha 'et hagal hazeh ve'im 'atah lo ta'abor 'eilai 'et hagal hazeh ve'et hamazeibah hazot lera'ah. 'elohei 'abraham veilohei nakhor yishpetu beineinu 'elohei 'abihem vayishaba' ya'aqob befakhad 'abiv yizkhaq. vayizbakh ya'aqob zebakh bahar vayiqra le'ekhav le'ekhal lakhem vayokhelu lekhem vayalinu bahar. vayashkem laban baboqer vaynasheq lebanav velibnotav vaybarekh 'ethem vayeilekh vayashab laban limqomo. veya'aqob halakh ledarko vayifge'u bo mal'akhei 'elohim. vayomer ya'aqob ka'asher ra'am makhaneh 'elohim zeh vayiqra shem hamaqom hahu makhanayim. vayishlakh ya'aqob mal'akhim lefanav 'el 'eisav 'akhiv 'arzah sei'ir sedeh 'edom. vayzav 'otam leimor koh tomerun ladoni le'eisav koh 'amar 'abdekha ya'aqob 'im laban garti va'eikhar 'ad 'atah. vayhi li shor vakhamor zon ve'ebed veshifkhah va'eshlekhah lehagid ladoni limzo khen be'einekha. vayashubu hamal'akhim 'el ya'aqob leimor banu 'el 'akhikha 'el 'eisav vegam holekh liqratekha ve'arba' mei'ot 'ish 'imo. vayira ya'aqob me'od vayeizer lo vayakhaz 'et ha'am 'asher 'ito ve'et hazon ve'et habaqar vehagemalim lishnei makhanot. vayomer 'im yabo 'eisav 'el hamakhaneh ha'akhat vehikahu vehayah hamakhaneh hanish'ar lifleitah. vayomer ya'aqob 'elohei 'abi 'abraham veilohei 'abi yizkhaq ihoh ha'omer 'eilai shub le'arzekha ulemoladtekha ve'eitibah 'imakh. qatoneti mikol hakhasadim umikal ha'emet 'asher 'asita 'et 'abdekha ki bemaqli 'abarti 'et hayarden hazeh ve'atah hayiti lishnei makhanot. hazileini na miyad 'akhi miyad 'eisav ki yarei 'anokhi 'oto pen yabo vehikani 'em 'al banim. ve'atah 'amarta heiteb 'eitib 'imakh vesamti 'et zar'akha kekhol hayam 'asher lo yisafer meirob. vayalen sham balaylah hahu vayiqakh min haba beyado minkhah le'eisav 'akhiv. 'izim matayim uteyashim 'esrim rekheilim matayim ve'eilim 'esrim. gemalim meiniqot ubeneihem sheloshim parot 'arba'im ufarim 'asarah 'atonot 'esrim va'yarim 'asarah. vayiten beyad 'abadav 'eider 'eider lebado vayomer 'el 'abadav 'ibru lefanai verevakh tasimu ben 'eider uben 'eider. vayzav 'et harishon leimor ki yifgashekha 'eisav 'akhi vish'eilekha leimor lemi 'atah ve'anah teilekh ulemi 'eleh lefanekha. ve'amarta le'abdekha leya'aqob minkhah hi shelukhah ladoni le'eisav vehineh gam hu 'akhareinu. vayzav gam 'et hasheini gam 'et hashelishi gam 'et kal haholekhim 'akharei ha'adarim leimor kadabar hazeh tedaberun 'el 'eisav bemoza'akhem 'oto. va'amartem gam hineh 'abdekha ya'aqob 'akhareinu ki 'amar 'akhaperah fanav baminkhah haholekhet lefanai ve'akharei khen 'er'eh fanav 'ulai yisa fanai. vata'abor haminkhah 'al panav vehu lan balaylah hahu bamakhaneh. vayaqam balaylah hu vayiqakh 'et shetei nashav ve'et shetei shifkhotav ve'et 'akhad 'asar yeladav vaya'abor 'et ma'abar yaboq. vayiqakhem vaya'abirem 'et hanakhal vaya'aber 'et 'asher lo vayivater ya'aqob lebado vayei'abeq 'ish 'imo 'ad 'alot hashakhar. vayar ki lo yakhol lo vayiga' bekhaf yereikho vateiqa' kaf yerekh ya'aqob behei'abeqo 'imo. vayomer shalekheini ki 'alah hashakhar vayomer lo 'ashaleikhakha ki 'im beirakhtani. vayomer 'eilav mah shemekha vayomer ya'aqob. vayomer lo ya'aqob yei'amer 'od shimkha ki 'im yisra'el ki sarita 'im 'elohim ve'im 'anashim vatukhal. vayish'al ya'aqob vayomer hagidah na shemekha vayomer lamah zeh tish'al lishmi vaybarekh 'oto sham. vayiqra ya'aqob shem hamaqom peni'el ki ra'iti 'elohim panim 'el panim vatinazel nafshi. vayizrakh lo hashemesh ka'asher 'abar 'et penu'el vehu zoleia' 'al yereikho. 'al ken lo yokhelu benei yisra'el 'et gid hanasheh 'asher 'al kaf hayarekh 'ad hayom hazeh ki naga' bekhaf yerekh ya'aqob begid hanasheh. vayisa ya'aqob 'einav vayar vehineh 'eisav ba ve'imo 'arba' mei'ot 'ish vayakhaz 'et hayladim 'al lei'ah ve'al rakhel ve'al shetei hashefakhot. vayasem 'et hashefakhot ve'et yaldeihen rishonah ve'et lei'ah viladeha 'akharonim ve'et rakhel ve'et yosef 'akharonim. vehu 'abar lifneihem vayishtakhu 'arzah sheba' pe'amim 'ad gishto 'ad 'akhiv. vayaraz 'eisav liqrato vaykhabeqeihu vayipol 'al zavarav vayishaqeihu vayibku. vayisa 'et 'einav vayar 'et hanashim ve'et hayladim vayomer mi 'eleh lakh vayomar hayladim 'asher khanan 'elohim 'et 'abdekha. vatigashna hashefakhot henah veyaldeihen vatishtakhavena. vatigash gam lei'ah viladeha vayishtakhavu ve'akhar nigash yosef verakhel vayishtakhavu. vayomer mi lekha kal hamakhaneh hazeh 'asher pagasheti vayomer limzo khen be'einei 'adoni. vayomer 'eisav yesh li rab 'akhi yehi lekha 'asher lakh. vayomer ya'aqob 'al na 'im na mazati khen be'einekha velaqakhta minkhati miyadi ki 'al ken ra'iti fanekha kir'ot penei 'elohim vatirzeini. qakh na 'et birkhati 'asher hubat lakh ki khanani 'elohim vekhi yesh li khol vayifzar bo vayiqakh. vayomer nis'ah veneileikhah ve'eilekhah lenegdekha. vayomer 'eilav 'adoni yodeia' ki hayladim rakim vehazon vehabaqar 'alot 'alai udefaqum yom 'ekhad vameitu kal hazon. ya'abar na 'adoni lifnei 'abdo va'ani 'etnahalah le'iti leregel hamelakhah 'asher lefanai uleregel hayladim 'ad 'asher 'abo 'el 'adoni sei'irah. vayomer 'eisav 'azigah na 'imekha min ha'am 'asher 'iti vayomer lamah zeh 'emza khen be'einei 'adoni. vayashab bayom hahu 'eisav ledarko sei'irah. veya'aqob nasa' sukotah vayiben lo bayit ulemiqneihu 'asah sukot 'al ken qara shem hamaqom sukot. vayabo ya'aqob shalem 'ir shekhem 'asher be'erez kena'an bebo'o mipadan 'aram vayikhan 'et penei ha'ir. vayiqen 'et khelqat hasadeh 'asher natah sham 'aholo miyad benei khamor 'abi shekhem bemei'ah qesitah. vayazeb sham mizbeiakh vayiqra lo 'el 'elohei yisra'el. vateizei dinah bat lei'ah 'asher yaledah leya'aqob lir'ot bibnot ha'arez. vayar 'otah shekhem ben khamor hakhivi nesi ha'arez vayiqakh 'otah vayishkab 'otah vai'aneha. vatidbaq nafsho bedinah bat ya'aqob vaye'ehab 'et hana'ara vaydaber 'al leb hana'ara. vayomer shekhem 'el khamor 'abiv leimor qakh li 'et hayaldah hazot le'ishah. veya'aqob shama' ki timei 'et dinah bito ubanav hayu 'et miqneihu basadeh vehekherish ya'aqob 'ad bo'am. vayeizei khamor 'abi shekhem 'el ya'aqob ledaber 'ito. ubenei ya'aqob ba'u min hasadeh keshame'am vayit'azebu ha'anashim vayikhar lahem me'od ki nebalah 'asah beyisra'el lishkab 'et bat ya'aqob vekhen lo yei'aseh. vaydaber khamor 'itam leimor shekhem beni khasheqah nafsho bebitekhem tenu na 'otah lo le'ishah. vehitkhatenu 'otanu benoteikhem titenu lanu ve'et benoteinu tiqkhu lakhem. ve'itanu teisheibu veha'arez tihyeh lifneikhem shebu usekharuha vehei'akhazu bah. vayomer shekhem 'el 'abih ve'el 'akheha 'emza khen be'eineikhem va'asher tomeru 'eilai 'eten. harbu 'alai me'od mohar umatan ve'etenah ka'asher tomeru 'eilai utenu li 'et hana'ara le'ishah. vaya'anu benei ya'aqob 'et shekhem ve'et khamor 'abiv bemirmah vaydabeiru 'asher timei 'et dinah 'akhotam. vayomeru 'aleihem lo nukhal la'asot hadabar hazeh latet 'et 'akhoteinu le'ish 'asher lo 'arelah ki kherpah hi lanu. 'akh bezot nei'ot lakhem 'im tihyu khamonu lehimol lakhem kal zakhar. venatanu 'et benoteinu lakhem ve'et benoteikhem niqakh lanu veyashabnu 'itekhem vehayinu le'am 'ekhad. ve'im lo tishme'u 'eileinu lehimol velaqakhnu 'et biteinu vehalakhenu. vayitebu dibreihem be'einei khamor ube'einei shekhem ben khamor. velo 'eikhar hana'ar la'asot hadabar ki khafez bebat ya'aqob vehu nikhbad mikol bet 'abiv. vayabo khamor ushekhem beno 'el sha'ar 'iram vaydaberu 'el 'anshei 'iram leimor. ha'anashim ha'eleh sheleimim hem 'itanu veyeishebu ba'arez veyiskharu 'otah veha'arez hineh rakhabat yadayim lifneihem 'et benotam niqakh lanu lenashim ve'et benoteinu niten lahem. 'akh bezot yei'otu lanu ha'anashim lashebet 'itanu lihyot le'am 'ekhad behimol lanu kal zakhar ka'asher hem nimolim. miqneihem veqinyanam vekhal behemtam halo lanu hem 'akh nei'otah lahem veyeishebu 'itanu. vayishme'u 'el khamor ve'el shekhem beno kal yoze'ei sha'ar 'iro vayimolu kal zakhar kal yoze'ei sha'ar 'iro. vayhi bayom hashelishi bihyotam ko'abim vayiqkhu shenei benei ya'aqob shim'on veleivi 'akhei dinah 'ish kharbo vayabo'u 'al ha'ir betakh vayahargu kal zakhar. ve'et khamor ve'et shekhem beno haregu lefi khareb vayiqkhu 'et dinah mibet shekhem vayeizei'u. benei ya'aqob ba'u 'al hakhalalim vayabozu ha'ir 'asher time'u 'akhotam. 'et zonam ve'et beqaram ve'et khamoreihem ve'et 'asher ba'ir ve'et 'asher basadeh laqakhu. ve'et kal kheilam ve'et kal tapam ve'et nesheihem shabu vayabozu ve'et kal 'asher babayit. vayomer ya'aqob 'el shim'on ve'el leivi 'akhartem 'oti lehab'isheini beyosheb ha'arez bakena'ani ubaperizi va'ani metei mispar vene'esfu 'alai vehikuni venishmadti 'ani ubeiti. vayomeru hakhzonah ya'aseh 'et 'akhoteinu. vayomer 'elohim 'el ya'aqob qum 'aleh bet 'el vesheb sham va'aseh sham mizbeiakh la'el hanir'eh 'eilekha bebarekhakha mipenei 'eisav 'akhikha. vayomer ya'aqob 'el beito ve'el kal 'asher 'imo hasiru 'et 'elohei haneikhar 'asher betokhekhem vehitaharu vehakhalifu simloteikhem. venaqumah vena'aleh bet 'el ve'e'eseh sham mizbeiakh la'el ha'oneh 'oti beyom zarati vayhi 'imadi baderekh 'asher halakheti. vayitenu 'el ya'aqob 'et kal 'elohei haneikhar 'asher beyadam ve'et hanezamim 'asher be'azeneihem vayitmon 'otam ya'aqob takhat ha'eilah 'asher 'im shekhem. vayisa'u vayhi khitat 'elohim 'al he'arim 'asher sebiboteihem velo radefu 'akharei benei ya'aqob. vayabo ya'aqob luzah 'asher be'erez kena'an hi bet 'el hu vekhal ha'am 'asher 'imo. vayiben sham mizbeiakh vayiqra lamaqom 'el bet 'el ki sham niglu 'eilav ha'elohim bebarekho mipenei 'akhiv. vatamat deborah meineqet ribqah vatiqaber mitakhat lebet 'el takhat ha'alon vayiqra shemo 'alon bakhut. vayeira 'elohim 'el ya'aqob 'od bebo'o mipadan 'aram vaybarekh 'oto. vayomer lo 'elohim shimkha ya'aqob lo yiqarei shimkha 'od ya'aqob ki 'im yisra'el yihyeh shemekha vayiqra 'et shemo yisra'el. vayomer lo 'elohim 'ani 'el shadai pereh urebeh go uqehal goyim yihyeh mimeka umelakhim meikhalazekha yeizei'u. ve'et ha'arez 'asher natati le'abraham uleyizkhaq lekha 'etenenah ulezar'akha 'akharekha 'eten 'et ha'arez. vaya'al mei'alav 'elohim bamaqom 'asher diber 'ito. vayazeb ya'aqob mazeibah bamaqom 'asher diber 'ito mazebet 'aben vayasekh 'aleha nesekh vayizoq 'aleha shamen. vayiqra ya'aqob 'et shem hamaqom 'asher diber 'ito sham 'elohim bet 'el. vayis'u mibet 'el vayhi 'od kibrat ha'arez labo 'efratah vateiled rakhel vateqash belidtah. vayhi behaqshotah belidtah vatomer lah hamyaledet 'al tire'i ki gam zeh lakh ben. vayhi bezet nafshah ki meitah vatiqra shemo ben 'oni ve'abiv qara lo binyamin. vatamat rakhel vatiqaber bederekh 'efratah hi bet lakhem. vayazeb ya'aqob mazeibah 'al qeburatah hi mazebet qeburat rakhel 'ad hayom. vayisa' yisra'el vayet 'aholoh meihale'ah lemigdal 'eider. vayhi bishkon yisra'el ba'arez hahiv vayeilekh re'uben vayishkab 'et bilhah pilegesh 'abiv vayishma' yisra'el vayihyu benei ya'aqob shenem 'asar. benei lei'ah bekhor ya'aqob re'uben veshim'on veleivi vihudah veyisashkhar uzebulun. benei rakhel yosef ubinyamin. ubenei bilhah shifkhat rakhel dan venaftali. ubenei zilpah shifkhat lei'ah gad ve'asher 'eleh benei ya'aqob 'asher yulad lo befadan 'aram. vayabo ya'aqob 'el yizkhaq 'abiv mamrei qiryat ha'arba' hi khebron 'asher gar sham 'abraham veyizkhaq. vayihyu yemei yizkhaq me'at shanah ushemonim shanah. vayigva' yizkhaq vayamat vayei'asef 'el 'amav zaqen useba' yamim vayiqberu 'oto 'eisav veya'aqob banav. ve'eleh toledot 'eisav hu 'edom. 'eisav laqakh 'et nashav mibenot kena'an 'et 'adah bat 'eilon hakhiti ve'et 'aholibamah bat 'anah bat zib'on hakhivi. ve'et basemat bat yishma'el 'akhot nebayot. vateiled 'adah le'eisav 'et 'elifaz ubasemat yaledah 'et re'u'el. ve'aholibamah yaledah 'et 'yosh ye'ush ve'et ya'lam ve'et qorakh 'eleh benei 'eisav 'asher yuledu lo be'erez kena'an. vayiqakh 'eisav 'et nashav ve'et banav ve'et benotav ve'et kal nafshot beito ve'et miqneihu ve'et kal behemto ve'et kal qinyano 'asher rakhash be'erez kena'an vayeilekh 'el 'erez mipenei ya'aqob 'akhiv. ki hayah rekhusham rab mishebet yakhdav velo yakhelah 'erez megureihem laset 'otam mipenei miqneihem. vayeisheb 'eisav behar sei'ir 'eisav hu 'edom. ve'eleh toledot 'eisav 'abi 'edom behar sei'ir. 'eleh shemot benei 'eisav 'elifaz ben 'adah 'eishet 'eisav re'u'el ben basemat 'eishet 'eisav. vayihyu benei 'elifaz teiman 'omar zefo vega'tam uqenaz. vetimna' hayetah filegesh le'elifaz ben 'eisav vateiled le'elifaz 'et 'amaleq 'eleh benei 'adah 'eishet 'eisav. ve'eleh benei re'u'el nakhat vazerakh shamah umizah 'eleh hayu benei basemat 'eishet 'eisav. ve'eleh hayu benei 'aholibamah bat 'anah bat zib'on 'eishet 'eisav vateiled le'eisav 'et 'yosh ye'ush ve'et ya'lam ve'et qorakh. 'eleh 'alufei benei 'eisav benei 'elifaz bekhor 'eisav 'aluf teiman 'aluf 'omar 'aluf zefo 'aluf qenaz. 'aluf qorakh 'aluf ga'tam 'aluf 'amaleq 'eleh 'alufei 'elifaz be'erez 'edom 'eleh benei 'adah. ve'eleh benei re'u'el ben 'eisav 'aluf nakhat 'aluf zerakh 'aluf shamah 'aluf mizah 'eleh 'alufei re'u'el be'erez 'edom 'eleh benei basemat 'eishet 'eisav. ve'eleh benei 'aholibamah 'eishet 'eisav 'aluf ye'ush 'aluf ya'lam 'aluf qorakh 'eleh 'alufei 'aholibamah bat 'anah 'eishet 'eisav. 'eleh benei 'eisav ve'eleh 'alufeihem hu 'edom. 'eleh benei sei'ir hakhori yoshebei ha'arez lotan veshobal vezib'on va'anah. vedishon ve'eizer vedishan 'eleh 'alufei hakhori benei sei'ir be'erez 'edom. vayihyu benei lotan khori veheimam va'akhot lotan timna'. ve'eleh benei shobal 'alvan umanakhat ve'eibal shefo ve'onam. ve'eleh benei zib'on ve'ayah va'anah hu 'anah 'asher maza 'et hayeimim bamidbar bir'oto 'et hakhamorim lezib'on 'abiv. ve'eleh benei 'anah dishon ve'aholibamah bat 'anah. ve'eleh benei dishan khemdan ve'eshban veyitran ukheran. 'eleh benei 'eizer bilhan veza'avan va'aqan. 'eleh benei dishan 'uz va'aran. 'eleh 'alufei hakhori 'aluf lotan 'aluf shobal 'aluf zib'on 'aluf 'anah. 'aluf dishon 'aluf 'eizer 'aluf dishan 'eleh 'alufei hakhori le'alufeihem be'erez sei'ir. ve'eleh hamelakhim 'asher malekhu be'erez 'edom lifnei melakh melekh libnei yisra'el. vayimlokh be'edom bela' ben be'or veshem 'iro dinhabah. vayamat bala' vayimlokh takhtav yobab ben zerakh mibazerah. vayamat yobab vayimlokh takhtav khusham mei'erez hateimani. vayamat khusham vayimlokh takhtav hadad ben bedad hamakeh 'et midyan bisdeh mo'ab veshem 'iro 'avit. vayamat hadad vayimlokh takhtav samlah mimasreiqah. vayamat samlah vayimlokh takhtav sha'ul meirekhobot hanahar. vayamat sha'ul vayimlokh takhtav ba'al khanan ben 'akhbor. vayamat ba'al khanan ben 'akhbor vayimlokh takhtav hadar veshem 'iro pa'u veshem 'ishto meheitab'el bat matred bat mei zahab. ve'eleh shemot 'alufei 'eisav lemishpekhotam limqomotam bishmotam 'aluf timna' 'aluf 'alvah 'aluf yetet. 'aluf 'aholibamah 'aluf 'eilah 'aluf pinon. 'aluf qenaz 'aluf teiman 'aluf mibzar. 'aluf magdi'el 'aluf 'iram 'eleh 'alufei 'edom lemoshebotam be'erez 'akhuzatam hu 'eisav 'abi 'edom. vayeisheb ya'aqob be'erez megurei 'abiv be'erez kena'an. 'eleh toledot ya'aqob yosef ben sheba' 'esreh shanah hayah ro'eh 'et 'ekhav bazon vehu na'ar 'et benei bilhah ve'et benei zilpah neshei 'abiv vayabei yosef 'et dibatam ra'ah 'el 'abihem. veyisra'el 'ahab 'et yosef mikal banav ki ben zequnim hu lo ve'asah lo ketonet pasim. vayir'u 'ekhav ki 'oto 'ahab 'abihem mikal 'ekhav vayisne'u 'oto velo yakhelu dabero leshalom. vayakhalom yosef khalom vayaged le'ekhav vayosifu 'od seno 'oto. vayomer 'aleihem shim'u na hakhalom hazeh 'asher khalameti. vehineh 'anakhnu me'alemim 'alumim betokh hasadeh vehineh qamah 'alumati vegam nizabah vehineh tesubenah 'alumoteikhem vatishtakhavena la'alumati. vayomeru lo 'ekhav hamalokh timlokh 'aleinu 'im mashol timshol banu vayosifu 'od seno 'oto 'al khalomotav ve'al debarav. vayakhalom 'od khalom 'akher vaysaper 'oto le'ekhav vayomer hineh khalamti khalom 'od vehineh hashemesh vehayareiakh ve'akhad 'asar kokhabim mishtakhavim li. vaysaper 'el 'abiv ve'el 'ekhav vayig'ar bo 'abiv vayomer lo mah hakhalom hazeh 'asher khalameta habo nabo 'ani ve'imekha ve'akhekha lehishtakhavot lekha 'arezah. vayqan'u bo 'ekhav ve'abiv shamar 'et hadabar. vayeilekhu 'ekhav lir'ot 'et zon 'abihem bishkhem. vayomer yisra'el 'el yosef halo 'akhekha ro'im bishkhem lekhah ve'eshlakhakha 'aleihem vayomer lo hineini. vayomer lo lekh na re'eh 'et shelom 'akhekha ve'et shelom hazon vahashibeini dabar vayishlakheihu mei'eimeq khebron vayabo shekhemah. vayimza'eihu 'ish vehineh to'eh basadeh vayish'aleihu ha'ish leimor mah tebaqesh. vayomer 'et 'akhai 'anokhi mebaqesh hagidah na li 'eifoh hem ro'im. vayomer ha'ish nase'u mizeh ki shama'ti 'omerim neilekhah dotayenah vayeilekh yosef 'akhar 'ekhav vayimza'em bedotan. vayir'u 'oto meirakhoq ubeterem yiqrab 'aleihem vayitnakelu 'oto lahamito. vayomeru 'ish 'el 'akhiv hineh ba'al hakhalomot halazeh ba. ve'atah lekhu venahargeihu venashlikheihu be'akhad haborot ve'amarnu khayah ra'ah 'akhalatehu venir'eh mah yihyu khalomotav. vayishma' re'uben vayazileihu miyadam vayomer lo nakenu nafesh. vayomer 'aleihem re'uben 'al tishpekhu dam hashlikhu 'oto 'el habor hazeh 'asher bamidbar veyad 'al tishlekhu bo lema'an hazil 'oto miyadam lahashibo 'el 'abiv. vayhi ka'asher ba yosef 'el 'ekhav vayafshitu 'et yosef 'et kutaneto 'et ketonet hapasim 'asher 'alav. vayiqakhuhu vayashlikhu 'oto haborah vehabor req 'en bo mayim. vayeishebu le'ekhal lekhem vayis'u 'eineihem vayir'u vehineh 'orekhat yishme'eilim ba'ah migil'ad ugemaleihem nose'im nekhot uzeri valot holkhim lehorid mizrayemah. vayomer yehudah 'el 'ekhav mah beza' ki naharog 'et 'akhinu vekhisinu 'et damo. lekhu venimkerenu layishme'eilim veyadeinu 'al tehi bo ki 'akhinu besareinu hu vayishme'u 'ekhav. vaya'abru 'anashim midyanim sokharim vayimshekhu vaya'alu 'et yosef min habor vayimkeru 'et yosef layishme'eilim be'esrim kasef vayabi'u 'et yosef mizrayemah. vayashab re'uben 'el habor vehineh 'en yosef babor vayiqra' 'et begadav. vayashab 'el 'ekhav vayomar hayeled 'einenu va'ani 'anah 'ani ba. vayiqkhu 'et ketonet yosef vayishkhatu se'ir 'izim vayitbelu 'et hakutonet badam. vayshalekhu 'et ketonet hapasim vayabi'u 'el 'abihem vayomeru zot mazanu haker na haketonet binkha hi 'im lo. vayakirah vayomer ketonet beni khayah ra'ah 'akhalatehu tarof toraf yosef. vayiqra' ya'aqob simlotav vayasem saq bematenav vayit'abel 'al beno yamim rabim. vayaqumu khal banav vekhal benotav lenakhamo vayma'en lehitnakhem vayomer ki 'eired 'el beni 'abel she'olah vayeibek 'oto 'abiv. vehamedanim makheru 'oto 'el mizrayim lefotifar seris par'oh sar hatabakhim. vayhi ba'et hahiv vayeired yehudah mei'et 'ekhav vayet 'ad 'ish 'adulami ushemo khirah. vayar sham yehudah bat 'ish kena'ani ushemo shua' vayiqakheha vayabo 'eileha. vatahar vateiled ben vayiqra 'et shemo 'er. vatahar 'od vateiled ben vatiqra 'et shemo 'onan. vatosef 'od vateiled ben vatiqra 'et shemo sheilah vehayah bikhzib belidtah 'oto. vayiqakh yehudah 'ishah le'er bekhoro ushemah tamar. vayhi 'er bekhor yehudah ra' be'einei ihoh vaymiteihu ihoh. vayomer yehudah le'onan bo 'el 'eishet 'akhikha veyabem 'otah vehaqem zera' le'akhikha. vayeida' 'onan ki lo lo yihyeh hazara' vehayah 'im ba 'el 'eishet 'akhiv veshikhet 'arzah lebilti netan zera' le'akhiv. vayeira' be'einei ihoh 'asher 'asah vayamet gam 'oto. vayomer yehudah letamar kalato shebi 'almanah bet 'abikh 'ad yigdal sheilah beni ki 'amar pen yamut gam hu ke'ekhav vateilekh tamar vateisheb bet 'abiha. vayirbu hayamim vatamat bat shua' 'eishet yehudah vayinakhem yehudah vaya'al 'al gozazei zono hu vekhirah rei'eihu ha'adulami timnatah. vayugad letamar leimor hineh khamikh 'oleh timnatah lagoz zono. vatasar bigdei 'almenutah mei'aleha vatekhas baza'if vatit'alaf vateisheb befetakh 'einayim 'asher 'al derekh timnatah ki ra'atah ki gadal sheilah vehiv lo nitenah lo le'ishah. vayir'eha yehudah vayakhshebeha lezonah ki khisetah paneha. vayet 'eileha 'el haderekh vayomer habah na 'abo 'eilayikh ki lo yada' ki khalato hi vatomer mah titen li ki tabo 'eilai. vayomer 'anokhi 'ashalakh gedi 'izim min hazon vatomer 'im titen 'eirabon 'ad shalekhekha. vayomer mah ha'eirabon 'asher 'eten lakh vatomer khotamekha ufetilekha umatekha 'asher beyadekha vayiten lah vayabo 'eileha vatahar lo. vataqam vateilekh vatasar ze'ifah mei'aleha vatilbash bigdei 'almenutah. vayishlakh yehudah 'et gedi ha'izim beyad rei'eihu ha'adulami laqakhat ha'eirabon miyad ha'ishah velo meza'ah. vayish'al 'et 'anshei meqomah leimor 'ayeh haqedeishah hi ba'einayim 'al hadarekh vayomeru lo hayetah bazeh qedeishah. vayashab 'el yehudah vayomer lo mezatiha vegam 'anshei hamaqom 'ameru lo hayetah bazeh qedeishah. vayomer yehudah tiqakh lah pen nihyeh labuz hineh shalakhti hagedi hazeh ve'atah lo mezatah. vayhi kemishlosh khodashim vayugad lihudah leimor zanetah tamar kalatekha vegam hineh harah liznunim vayomer yehudah hozi'uha vetisaref. hi muzet vehi shalekhah 'el khamiha leimor le'ish 'asher 'eleh lo 'anokhi harah vatomer haker na lemi hakhotemet vehapetilim vehamateh ha'eleh. vayaker yehudah vayomer zadeqah mimeni ki 'al ken lo netatiha lesheilah beni velo yasaf 'od leda'tah vayhi be'et lidtah vehineh te'omim bebitnah. vayhi belidtah vayiten yad vatiqakh hamyaledet vatiqshor 'al yado shani leimor zeh yaza rishonah. vayhi kemeishib yado vehineh yaza 'akhiv vatomer mah parazta 'alekha parez vayiqra shemo parez. ve'akhar yaza 'akhiv 'asher 'al yado hashani vayiqra shemo zarakh. veyosef hurad mizrayemah vayiqneihu potifar seris par'oh sar hatabakhim 'ish mizri miyad hayishme'eilim 'asher horiduhu shamah. vayhi ihoh 'et yosef vayhi 'ish mazliakh vayhi bebet 'adonav hamizri. vayar 'adonav ki ihoh 'ito vekhol 'asher hu 'oseh ihoh mazliakh beyado. vayimza yosef khen be'einav vaysharet 'oto vayafqideihu 'al beito vekhal yesh lo natan beyado. vayhi mei'az hifqid 'oto bebeito ve'al kal 'asher yesh lo vaybarekh ihoh 'et bet hamizri biglal yosef vayhi birkat ihoh bekhal 'asher yesh lo babayit ubasadeh. vaya'azob kal 'asher lo beyad yosef velo yada' 'ito me'umah ki 'im halekhem 'asher hu 'okhel vayhi yosef yefeh to'ar vifeh mar'eh. vayhi 'akhar hadebarim ha'eleh vatisa 'eishet 'adonav 'et 'eineha 'el yosef vatomer shikhbah 'imi. vayma'en vayomer 'el 'eishet 'adonav hen 'adoni lo yada' 'iti mah babayit vekhol 'asher yesh lo natan beyadi. 'einenu gadol babayit hazeh mimeni velo khasakh mimeni me'umah ki 'im 'otakh ba'asher 'at 'ishto ve'ekh 'e'eseh hara'ah hagedolah hazot vekhatati leilohim. vayhi kedaberah 'el yosef yom yom velo shama' 'eileha lishkab 'ezlah lihyot 'imah. vayhi kehayom hazeh vayabo habaytah la'asot melakhto ve'en 'ish mei'anshei habayit sham babayit. vatitpeseihu bebigdo leimor shikhbah 'imi vaya'azob bigdo beyadah vayanas vayeizei hakhuzah. vayhi kir'otah ki 'azab bigdo beyadah vayanas hakhuzah. vatiqra le'anshei beitah vatomer lahem leimor re'u heibi lanu 'ish 'ibri lezakheq banu ba 'eilai lishkab 'imi va'eqra beqol gadol. vayhi kheshame'o ki harimoti qoli va'eqra vaya'azob bigdo 'ezli vayanas vayeizei hakhuzah. vatanakh bigdo 'ezlah 'ad bo 'adonav 'el beito. vatedaber 'eilav kadebarim ha'eleh leimor ba 'eilai ha'ebed ha'ibri 'asher heibeita lanu lezakheq bi. vayhi kaharimi qoli va'eqra vaya'azob bigdo 'ezli vayanas hakhuzah. vayhi khishmoa' 'adonav 'et dibrei 'ishto 'asher diberah 'eilav leimor kadebarim ha'eleh 'asah li 'abdekha vayikhar 'apo. vayiqakh 'adonei yosef 'oto vayiteneihu 'el bet hasohar meqom 'asher 'asurei 'asirei hamelekh 'asurim vayhi sham bebet hasohar. vayhi ihoh 'et yosef vayet 'eilav khased vayiten khino be'einei sar bet hasohar. vayiten sar bet hasohar beyad yosef 'et kal ha'asirim 'asher bebet hasohar ve'et kal 'asher 'osim sham hu hayah 'oseh. 'en sar bet hasohar ro'eh 'et kal me'umah beyado ba'asher ihoh 'ito va'asher hu 'oseh ihoh mazliakh. vayhi 'akhar hadebarim ha'eleh khate'u mashqeh melekh mizrayim veha'ofeh la'adoneihem lemelekh mizrayim. vayiqzof par'oh 'al shenei sarisav 'al sar hamashqim ve'al sar ha'ofim. vayiten 'otam bemishmar bet sar hatabakhim 'el bet hasohar meqom 'asher yosef 'asur sham. vayifqod sar hatabakhim 'et yosef 'itam vaysharet 'otam vayihyu yamim bemishmar. vayakhalmu khalom sheneihem 'ish khalomo belaylah 'ekhad 'ish kefitron khalomo hamashqeh veha'ofeh 'asher lemelekh mizrayim 'asher 'asurim bebet hasohar. vayabo 'aleihem yosef baboqer vayar 'otam vehinam zo'afim. vayish'al 'et serisei far'oh 'asher 'ito bemishmar bet 'adonav leimor madua' peneikhem ra'im hayom. vayomeru 'eilav khalom khalamnu ufoter 'en 'oto vayomer 'aleihem yosef halo leilohim pitronim saperu na li. vaysaper sar hamashqim 'et khalomo leyosef vayomer lo bakhalomi vehineh gefen lefanai. ubagefen sheloshah sarigim vehi kheforakhat 'aletah nizah hibshilu 'ashkeloteha 'anabim. vekhos par'oh beyadi va'eqakh 'et ha'anabim va'eskhat 'otam 'el kos par'oh va'eten 'et hakos 'al kaf par'oh. vayomer lo yosef zeh pitrono sheloshet hasarigim sheloshet yamim hem. be'od sheloshet yamim yisa far'oh 'et roshekha vahashibekha 'al kanekha venatata khos par'oh beyado kamishpat harishon 'asher hayita mashqeihu. ki 'im zekhartani 'itekha ka'asher yitab lakh ve'asita na 'imadi khased vehizkartani 'el par'oh vehozeitani min habayit hazeh. ki gunob gunabti mei'erez ha'ibrim vegam poh lo 'asiti me'umah ki samu 'oti babor. vayar sar ha'ofim ki tob patar vayomer 'el yosef 'af 'ani bakhalomi vehineh sheloshah salei khori 'al roshi. ubasal ha'elyon mikol ma'akhal par'oh ma'aseh 'ofeh veha'of 'okhel 'otam min hasal mei'al roshi. vaya'an yosef vayomer zeh pitrono sheloshet hasalim sheloshet yamim hem. be'od sheloshet yamim yisa far'oh 'et roshekha mei'alekha vetalah 'otkha 'al 'ez ve'akhal ha'of 'et besarekha mei'alekha. vayhi bayom hashelishi yom huledet 'et par'oh vaya'as mishteh lekhal 'abadav vayisa 'et rosh sar hamashqim ve'et rosh sar ha'ofim betokh 'abadav. vayasheb 'et sar hamashqim 'al mashqeihu vayiten hakos 'al kaf par'oh. ve'et sar ha'ofim talah ka'asher patar lahem yosef. velo zakhar sar hamashqim 'et yosef vayishkakheihu. vayhi miqez shenatayim yamim ufar'oh kholem vehineh 'omed 'al hai'or. vehineh min hai'or 'olot sheba' parot yefot mar'eh uberi'ot basar vatir'enah ba'akhu. vehineh sheba' parot 'akheirot 'olot 'akhareihen min hai'or ra'ot mar'eh vedaqot basar vata'amodenah 'eizel haparot 'al sefat hai'or. vatokhalnah haparot ra'ot hamar'eh vedaqot habasar 'et sheba' haparot yefot hamar'eh vehaberi'ot vayiqaz par'oh. vayishan vayakhalom sheinit vehineh sheba' shibolim 'olot beqaneh 'ekhad beri'ot vetobot. vehineh sheba' shibolim daqot ushedufot qadim zomekhot 'akhareihen. vatibla'nah hashibolim hadaqot 'et sheba' hashibolim haberi'ot vehamelei'ot vayiqaz par'oh vehineh khalom. vayhi baboqer vatipa'em rukho vayishlakh vayiqra 'et kal khartumei mizrayim ve'et kal khakhameha vaysaper par'oh lahem 'et khalomo ve'en poter 'otam lefar'oh. vaydaber sar hamashqim 'et par'oh leimor 'et khata'ai 'ani mazkir hayom. par'oh qazaf 'al 'abadav vayiten 'oti bemishmar bet sar hatabakhim 'oti ve'et sar ha'ofim. vanakhalmah khalom belaylah 'ekhad 'ani vahu 'ish kefitron khalomo khalamenu. vesham 'itanu na'ar 'ibri 'ebed lesar hatabakhim vanesaper lo vayiftar lanu 'et khalomoteinu 'ish kakhalomo patar. vayhi ka'asher patar lanu ken hayah 'oti heishib 'al kani ve'oto talah. vayishlakh par'oh vayiqra 'et yosef vayrizuhu min habor vaygalakh vaykhalef simlotav vayabo 'el par'oh. vayomer par'oh 'el yosef khalom khalamti ufoter 'en 'oto va'ani shama'ti 'alekha leimor tishma' khalom liftor 'oto. vaya'an yosef 'et par'oh leimor bil'adai 'elohim ya'aneh 'et shelom par'oh. vaydaber par'oh 'el yosef bakhalomi hini 'omed 'al sefat hai'or. vehineh min hai'or 'olot sheba' parot beri'ot basar vifot to'ar vatir'enah ba'akhu. vehineh sheba' parot 'akheirot 'olot 'akhareihen dalot vera'ot to'ar me'od veraqot basar lo ra'iti khahenah bekhal 'erez mizrayim laroa'. vatokhalnah haparot haraqot vehara'ot 'et sheba' haparot harishonot haberi'ot. vatabonah 'el qirbenah velo noda' ki ba'u 'el qirbenah umar'eihen ra' ka'asher batekhilah va'iqaz. va'eire bakhalomi vehineh sheba' shibolim 'olot beqaneh 'ekhad melei'ot vetobot. vehineh sheba' shibolim zenumot daqot shedufot qadim zomekhot 'akhareihem. vatibla'na hashibolim hadaqot 'et sheba' hashibolim hatobot va'omar 'el hakhartumim ve'en magid li. vayomer yosef 'el par'oh khalom par'oh 'ekhad hu 'et 'asher ha'elohim 'oseh higid lefar'oh. sheba' parot hatobot sheba' shanim henah vesheba' hashibolim hatobot sheba' shanim henah khalom 'ekhad hu. vesheba' haparot haraqot vehara'ot ha'olot 'akhareihen sheba' shanim henah vesheba' hashibolim hareiqot shedufot haqadim yihyu sheba' shenei ra'ab. hu hadabar 'asher dibarti 'el par'oh 'asher ha'elohim 'oseh her'ah 'et par'oh. hineh sheba' shanim ba'ot saba' gadol bekhal 'erez mizrayim. veqamu sheba' shenei ra'ab 'akhareihen venishkakh kal hasaba' be'erez mizrayim vekhilah hara'ab 'et ha'arez. velo yivada' hasaba' ba'arez mipenei hara'ab hahu 'akharei khen ki khabed hu me'od. ve'al hishanot hakhalom 'el par'oh pa'amayim ki nakhon hadabar mei'im ha'elohim umemaher ha'elohim la'asoto. ve'atah yeire far'oh 'ish nabon vekhakham vishiteihu 'al 'erez mizrayim. ya'aseh far'oh veyafqed peqidim 'al ha'arez vekhimesh 'et 'erez mizrayim besheba' shenei hasaba'. veyiqbezu 'et kal 'okhel hashanim hatobot haba'ot ha'eleh veyizberu bar takhat yad par'oh 'okhel be'arim veshamaru. vehayah ha'okhel lefiqadon la'arez lesheba' shenei hara'ab 'asher tihyena be'erez mizrayim velo tikaret ha'arez bara'ab. vayitab hadabar be'einei far'oh ube'einei kal 'abadav. vayomer par'oh 'el 'abadav hanimza khazeh 'ish 'asher ruakh 'elohim bo. vayomer par'oh 'el yosef 'akharei hodia' 'elohim 'otkha 'et kal zot 'en nabon vekhakham kamokha. 'atah tihyeh 'al beiti ve'al pikha yishaq kal 'ami raq hakisei 'egdal mimeka. vayomer par'oh 'el yosef re'eh natati 'otekha 'al kal 'erez mizrayim. vayasar par'oh 'et taba'to mei'al yado vayiten 'otah 'al yad yosef vayalbesh 'oto bigdei shesh vayasem rebid hazahab 'al zavaro. vayarkeb 'oto bemirkebet hamishneh 'asher lo vayiqre'u lefanav 'abrekh venaton 'oto 'al kal 'erez mizrayim. vayomer par'oh 'el yosef 'ani far'oh ubil'adekha lo yarim 'ish 'et yado ve'et raglo bekhal 'erez mizrayim. vayiqra far'oh shem yosef zafenat pa'neiakh vayiten lo 'et 'asenat bat poti fera' kohen 'on le'ishah vayeizei yosef 'al 'erez mizrayim. veyosef ben sheloshim shanah be'amedo lifnei par'oh melekh mizrayim vayeizei yosef milifnei far'oh vaya'bor bekhal 'erez mizrayim. vata'as ha'arez besheba' shenei hasaba' liqmazim. vayiqboz 'et kal 'okhel sheba' shanim 'asher hayu be'erez mizrayim vayiten 'okhel be'arim 'okhel sedeh ha'ir 'asher sebiboteha natan betokhah. vayizbor yosef bar kekhol hayam harbeh me'od 'ad ki khadal lispor ki 'en mispar. uleyosef yulad shenei banim beterem tabo shenat hara'ab 'asher yaledah lo 'asenat bat poti fera' kohen 'on. vayiqra yosef 'et shem habekhor menasheh ki nashani 'elohim 'et kal 'amali ve'et kal bet 'abi. ve'et shem hasheini qara 'efrayim ki hifrani 'elohim be'erez 'aneyi. vatikhlenah sheba' shenei hasaba' 'asher hayah be'erez mizrayim. vatekhilenah sheba' shenei hara'ab labo ka'asher 'amar yosef vayhi ra'ab bekhal ha'arazot ubekhal 'erez mizrayim hayah lakhem. vatir'ab kal 'erez mizrayim vayiz'aq ha'am 'el par'oh lalakhem vayomer par'oh lekhal mizrayim lekhu 'el yosef 'asher yomar lakhem ta'asu. vehara'ab hayah 'al kal penei ha'arez vayiftakh yosef 'et kal 'asher bahem vayishbor lemizrayim vayekhezaq hara'ab be'erez mizrayim. vekhal ha'arez ba'u mizraymah lishbor 'el yosef ki khazaq hara'ab bekhal ha'arez. vayar ya'aqob ki yesh sheber bemizrayim vayomer ya'aqob lebanav lamah titra'u. vayomer hineh shama'ti ki yesh sheber bemizrayim redu shamah veshibru lanu misham venikhyeh velo namut. vayeiredu 'akhei yosef 'asarah lishbor bar mimizrayim. ve'et binyamin 'akhi yosef lo shalakh ya'aqob 'et 'ekhav ki 'amar pen yiqra'enu 'ason. vayabo'u benei yisra'el lishbor betokh haba'im ki hayah hara'ab be'erez kena'an. veyosef hu hashalit 'al ha'arez hu hamashbir lekhal 'am ha'arez vayabo'u 'akhei yosef vayishtakhavu lo 'apayim 'arezah. vayar yosef 'et 'ekhav vayakirem vayitnaker 'aleihem vaydaber 'itam qashot vayomer 'aleihem mei'ayin batem vayomeru mei'erez kena'an lishbar 'okhel. vayaker yosef 'et 'ekhav vehem lo hikiruhu. vayizkor yosef 'et hakhalomot 'asher khalam lahem vayomer 'aleihem meragelim 'atem lir'ot 'et 'ervat ha'arez batem. vayomeru 'eilav lo 'adoni va'abadekha ba'u lishbar 'okhel. kulanu benei 'ish 'ekhad nakhenu keinim 'anakhnu lo hayu 'abadekha meragelim. vayomer 'aleihem lo ki 'ervat ha'arez batem lir'ot. vayomeru shenem 'asar 'abadekha 'akhim 'anakhnu benei 'ish 'ekhad be'erez kena'an vehineh haqaton 'et 'abinu hayom veha'ekhad 'einenu. vayomer 'aleihem yosef hu 'asher dibarti 'aleikhem leimor meragelim 'atem. bezot tibakheinu khei far'oh 'im teize'u mizeh ki 'im bebo 'akhikhem haqaton henah. shilkhu mikem 'ekhad veyiqakh 'et 'akhikhem ve'atem hei'aseru veyibakhanu dibreikhem ha'emet 'itekhem ve'im lo khei far'oh ki meragelim 'atem. vaye'esof 'otam 'el mishmar sheloshet yamim. vayomer 'aleihem yosef bayom hashelishi zot 'asu vikhyu 'et ha'elohim 'ani yarei. 'im keinim 'atem 'akhikhem 'ekhad yei'aser bebet mishmarkhem ve'atem lekhu habi'u sheber ra'abon bateikhem. ve'et 'akhikhem haqaton tabi'u 'eilai veyei'amenu dibreikhem velo tamutu vaya'asu khen. vayomeru 'ish 'el 'akhiv 'abal 'asheimim 'anakhnu 'al 'akhinu 'asher ra'inu zarat nafsho behitkhano 'eileinu velo shama'enu 'al ken ba'ah 'eileinu hazarah hazot. vaya'an re'uben 'otam leimor halo 'amarti 'aleikhem leimor 'al tekhet'u bayeled velo shema'tem vegam damo hineh nidrash. vehem lo yade'u ki shomeia' yosef ki hameiliz beinotam. vayisob mei'aleihem vayeibek vayashab 'aleihem vaydaber 'aleihem vayiqakh mei'itam 'et shim'on vaye'esor 'oto le'eineihem. vayzav yosef vaymal'u 'et keleihem bar ulehashib kaspeihem 'ish 'el saqo velatet lahem zeidah ladarekh vaya'as lahem ken. vayis'u 'et shibram 'al khamoreihem vayeilekhu misham. vayiftakh ha'ekhad 'et saqo latet mispo lakhamoro bamalon vayar 'et kaspo vehineh hu befi 'amtakhto. vayomer 'el 'ekhav hushab kaspi vegam hineh be'amtakhti vayeizei libam vayekherdu 'ish 'el 'akhiv leimor mah zot 'asah 'elohim lanu. vayabo'u 'el ya'aqob 'abihem 'arzah kena'an vayagidu lo 'et kal haqorot 'otam leimor. diber ha'ish 'adonei ha'arez 'itanu qashot vayiten 'otanu kimragelim 'et ha'arez. vanomer 'eilav keinim 'anakhenu lo hayinu meragelim. shenem 'asar 'anakhnu 'akhim benei 'abinu ha'ekhad 'einenu vehaqaton hayom 'et 'abinu be'erez kena'an. vayomer 'eileinu ha'ish 'adonei ha'arez bezot 'eida' ki kheinim 'atem 'akhikhem ha'ekhad hanikhu 'iti ve'et ra'abon bateikhem qekhu valeikhu. vehabi'u 'et 'akhikhem haqaton 'eilai ve'eide'ah ki lo meragelim 'atem ki kheinim 'atem 'et 'akhikhem 'eten lakhem ve'et ha'arez tiskharu. vayhi hem meriqim saqeihem vehineh 'ish zeror kaspo besaqo vayir'u 'et zerorot kaspeihem hemah va'abihem vayira'u. vayomer 'aleihem ya'aqob 'abihem 'oti shikaltem yosef 'einenu veshim'on 'einenu ve'et binyamin tiqakhu 'alai hayu khulanah. vayomer re'uben 'el 'abiv leimor 'et shenei banai tamit 'im lo 'abi'enu 'eilekha tenah 'oto 'al yadi va'ani 'ashibenu 'eilekha. vayomer lo yeired beni 'imakhem ki 'akhiv met vehu lebado nish'ar uqera'ahu 'ason baderekh 'asher teilekhu bah vehoradtem 'et seibati beyagon she'olah. vehara'ab kabed ba'arez. vayhi ka'asher kilu le'ekhol 'et hasheber 'asher heibi'u mimizrayim vayomer 'aleihem 'abihem shubu shibru lanu me'at 'okhel. vayomer 'eilav yehudah leimor ha'ed hei'id banu ha'ish leimor lo tir'u fanai bilti 'akhikhem 'itekhem. 'im yeshkha meshaleiakh 'et 'akhinu 'itanu neiredah venishberah lekha 'okhel. ve'im 'einekha meshaleiakh lo neired ki ha'ish 'amar 'eileinu lo tir'u fanai bilti 'akhikhem 'itekhem. vayomer yisra'el lamah harei'otem li lehagid la'ish ha'od lakhem 'akh. vayomeru sha'ol sha'al ha'ish lanu ulemoladteinu leimor ha'od 'abikhem khai hayesh lakhem 'akh vanaged lo 'al pi hadebarim ha'eleh hayadoa' neida' ki yomar horidu 'et 'akhikhem. vayomer yehudah 'el yisra'el 'abiv shilkhah hana'ar 'iti venaqumah veneileikhah venikhyeh velo namut gam 'anakhnu gam 'atah gam tapeinu. 'anokhi 'e'erbenu miyadi tebaqshenu 'im lo habi'otiv 'eilekha vehizagtiv lefanekha vekhatati lekha kal hayamim. ki lulei hitmahmahenu ki 'atah shabnu zeh fa'amayim. vayomer 'aleihem yisra'el 'abihem 'im ken 'eifo zot 'asu qekhu mizimrat ha'arez bikhleikhem vehoridu la'ish minkhah me'at zori ume'at debash nekhot valot batenim usheqeidim. vekhesef mishneh qekhu beyedkhem ve'et hakesef hamushab befi 'amtekhoteikhem tashibu beyedkhem 'ulai mishgeh hu. ve'et 'akhikhem qakhu vequmu shubu 'el ha'ish. ve'el shadai yiten lakhem rakhamim lifnei ha'ish veshilakh lakhem 'et 'akhikhem 'akher ve'et binyamin va'ani ka'asher shakholeti shakhaleti. vayiqkhu ha'anashim 'et haminkhah hazot umishneh kesef laqekhu beyadam ve'et binyamin vayaqumu vayeiredu mizrayim vaya'amdu lifnei yosef. vayar yosef 'itam 'et binyamin vayomer la'asher 'al beito habei 'et ha'anashim habayetah uteboakh tebakh vehakhen ki 'iti yokhelu ha'anashim bazahorayim. vaya'as ha'ish ka'asher 'amar yosef vayabei ha'ish 'et ha'anashim beitah yosef. vayire'u ha'anashim ki hube'u bet yosef vayomeru 'al debar hakesef hashab be'amtekhoteinu batekhilah 'anakhnu muba'im lehitgolel 'aleinu ulehitnapel 'aleinu velaqakhat 'otanu la'abadim ve'et khamoreinu. vayigeshu 'el ha'ish 'asher 'al bet yosef vaydaberu 'eilav petakh habayit. vayomeru bi 'adoni yarod yaradnu batekhilah lishbar 'okhel. vayhi ki banu 'el hamalon vaniftekhah 'et 'amtekhoteinu vehineh khesef 'ish befi 'amtakhto kaspeinu bemishqalo vanasheb 'oto beyadeinu. vekhesef 'akher horadnu beyadeinu lishbar 'okhel lo yada'nu mi sam kaspeinu be'amtekhoteinu. vayomer shalom lakhem 'al tira'u 'eloheikhem veilohei 'abikhem natan lakhem matmon be'amtekhoteikhem kaspekhem ba 'eilai vayozei 'aleihem 'et shim'on. vayabei ha'ish 'et ha'anashim beitah yosef vayiten mayim vayirkhazu ragleihem vayiten mispo lakhamoreihem. vayakhinu 'et haminkhah 'ad bo yosef bazahorayim ki shame'u ki sham yokhelu lakhem. vayabo yosef habaytah vayabi''u lo 'et haminkhah 'asher beyadam habayetah vayishtakhavu lo 'arezah. vayish'al lahem leshalom vayomer hashalom 'abikhem hazaqen 'asher 'amartem ha'odenu khai. vayomeru shalom le'abdekha le'abinu 'odenu khai vayiqedu vayishtakhu vayishtakhavu vayisa 'einav vayar 'et binyamin 'akhiv ben 'imo vayomer hazeh 'akhikhem haqaton 'asher 'amartem 'eilai vayomar 'elohim yakhenekha beni. vaymaher yosef ki nikhmeru rakhamav 'el 'akhiv vaybaqesh libkot vayabo hakhadrah vayeibek shamah. vayirkhaz panav vayeizei vayit'apaq vayomer simu lakhem. vayasimu lo lebado velahem lebadam velamizrim ha'okhelim 'ito lebadam ki lo yukhelun hamizrim le'ekhol 'et ha'ibrim lekhem ki to'eibah hi lemizrayim. vayeishebu lefanav habekhor kibkhorato vehaza'ir kiz'irato vayitmehu ha'anashim 'ish 'el rei'eihu. vayisa mas'ot mei'et panav 'aleihem vateireb mas'at binyamin mimas'ot kulam khamesh yadot vayishtu vayishkeru 'imo. vayzav 'et 'asher 'al beito leimor malei 'et 'amtekhot ha'anashim 'okhel ka'asher yukhelun se'et vesim kesef 'ish befi 'amtakhto. ve'et gebi'i gebia' hakesef tasim befi 'amtakhat haqaton ve'et kesef shibro vaya'as kidbar yosef 'asher diber. haboqer 'or veha'anashim shulekhu hemah vakhamoreihem. hem yaze'u 'et ha'ir lo hirkhiqu veyosef 'amar la'asher 'al beito qum redof 'akharei ha'anashim vehisagtam ve'amarta 'aleihem lamah shilamtem ra'ah takhat tobah. halo zeh 'asher yishteh 'adoni bo vehu nakhesh yenakhesh bo harei'otem 'asher 'asitem. vayasigem vaydaber 'aleihem 'et hadebarim ha'eleh. vayomeru 'eilav lamah yedaber 'adoni kadebarim ha'eleh khalilah la'abadekha mei'asot kadabar hazeh. hen kesef 'asher mazanu befi 'amtekhoteinu heshibonu 'eilekha mei'erez kena'an ve'ekh nignob mibet 'adonekha kesef 'o zahab. 'asher yimazei 'ito mei'abadekha vamet vegam 'anakhnu nihyeh ladoni la'abadim. vayomer gam 'atah khedibreikhem ken hu 'asher yimazei 'ito yihyeh li 'abed ve'atem tihyu neqiyim. vaymaharu vayoridu 'ish 'et 'amtakhto 'arezah vayiftekhu 'ish 'amtakhto. vaykhapes bagadol heikhel ubaqaton kilah vayimazei hagabia' be'amtakhat binyamin. vayiqre'u simlotam vaya'amos 'ish 'al khamoro vayashubu ha'irah. vayabo yehudah ve'ekhav beitah yosef vehu 'odenu sham vayipelu lefanav 'arezah. vayomer lahem yosef mah hama'aseh hazeh 'asher 'asitem halo yeda'tem ki nakhesh yenakhesh 'ish 'asher kamoni. vayomer yehudah mah nomar ladoni mah nedaber umah niztadaq ha'elohim maza 'et 'avon 'abadekha hinenu 'abadim ladoni gam 'anakhnu gam 'asher nimza hagabia' beyado. vayomer khalilah li mei'asot zot ha'ish 'asher nimza hagabia' beyado hu yihyeh li 'abed ve'atem 'alu leshalom 'el 'abikhem. vayigash 'eilav yehudah vayomer bi 'adoni yedaber na 'abdekha dabar be'azenei 'adoni ve'al yikhar 'apekha be'abdekha ki khamokha kefar'oh. 'adoni sha'al 'et 'abadav leimor hayesh lakhem 'ab 'o 'akh. vanomer 'el 'adoni yesh lanu 'ab zaqen veyeled zequnim qatan ve'akhiv met vayivater hu lebado le'imo ve'abiv 'aheibo. vatomer 'el 'abadekha horiduhu 'eilai ve'asimah 'eini 'alav. vanomer 'el 'adoni lo yukhal hana'ar la'azob 'et 'abiv ve'azab 'et 'abiv vamet. vatomer 'el 'abadekha 'im lo yeired 'akhikhem haqaton 'itekhem lo tosifun lir'ot panai. vayhi ki 'alinu 'el 'abdekha 'abi vanaged lo 'et dibrei 'adoni. vayomer 'abinu shubu shibru lanu me'at 'okhel. vanomer lo nukhal laredet 'im yesh 'akhinu haqaton 'itanu veyaradnu ki lo nukhal lir'ot penei ha'ish ve'akhinu haqaton 'einenu 'itanu. vayomer 'abdekha 'abi 'eileinu 'atem yeda'tem ki shenayim yaledah li 'ishti. vayeizei ha'ekhad mei'iti va'omar 'akh tarof toraf velo re'itiv 'ad henah. uleqakhtem gam 'et zeh mei'im panai veqarahu 'ason vehoradtem 'et seibati bera'ah she'olah. ve'atah kebo'i 'el 'abdekha 'abi vehana'ar 'einenu 'itanu venafsho qeshurah benafsho. vehayah kir'oto ki 'en hana'ar vamet vehoridu 'abadekha 'et seibat 'abdekha 'abinu beyagon she'olah. ki 'abdekha 'arab 'et hana'ar mei'im 'abi leimor 'im lo 'abi'enu 'eilekha vekhatati le'abi kal hayamim. ve'atah yeisheb na 'abdekha takhat hana'ar 'ebed ladoni vehana'ar ya'al 'im 'ekhav. ki 'ekh 'e'eleh 'el 'abi vehana'ar 'einenu 'iti pen 'er'eh bara' 'asher yimza 'et 'abi. velo yakhol yosef lehit'apeq lekhol hanizabim 'alav vayiqra hozi'u khal 'ish mei'alai velo 'amad 'ish 'ito behitvada' yosef 'el 'ekhav. vayiten 'et qolo bibkhi vayishme'u mizrayim vayishma' bet par'oh. vayomer yosef 'el 'ekhav 'ani yosef ha'od 'abi khai velo yakhelu 'ekhav la'anot 'oto ki nibhalu mipanav. vayomer yosef 'el 'ekhav geshu na 'eilai vayigashu vayomer 'ani yosef 'akhikhem 'asher mekhartem 'oti mizrayemah. ve'atah 'al tei'azebu ve'al yikhar be'eineikhem ki mekhartem 'oti henah ki lemikhyah shelakhani 'elohim lifneikhem. ki zeh shenatayim hara'ab beqereb ha'arez ve'od khamesh shanim 'asher 'en kharish veqazir vayishlakheini 'elohim lifneikhem lasum lakhem she'eirit ba'arez ulehakhayot lakhem lifleitah gedolah. ve'atah lo 'atem shelakhtem 'oti henah ki ha'elohim vaysimeini le'ab lefar'oh ule'adon lekhal beito umoshel bekhal 'erez mizrayim. maharu va'alu 'el 'abi va'amartem 'eilav koh 'amar binkha yosef samani 'elohim le'adon lekhal mizrayim redah 'eilai 'al ta'amod. veyashabta be'erez goshen vehayita qarob 'eilai 'atah ubanekha ubenei banekha vezonekha ubeqarekha vekhal 'asher lakh. vekhilkalti 'otekha sham ki 'od khamesh shanim ra'ab pen tivaresh 'atah ubeitekha vekhal 'asher lakh. vehineh 'eineikhem ro'ot ve'einei 'akhi binyamin ki fi hamdaber 'aleikhem. vehigadtem le'abi 'et kal kebodi bemizrayim ve'et kal 'asher re'item umihartem vehoradtem 'et 'abi henah. vayipol 'al zaverei binyamin 'akhiv vayeibek ubinyamin bakhah 'al zavarav. vaynasheq lekhal 'ekhav vayeibek 'aleihem ve'akharei khen diberu 'ekhav 'ito. vehaqol nishma' bet par'oh leimor ba'u 'akhei yosef vayitab be'einei far'oh ube'einei 'abadav. vayomer par'oh 'el yosef 'emor 'el 'akhekha zot 'asu ta'anu 'et be'irekhem ulekhu bo'u 'arzah kena'an. uqekhu 'et 'abikhem ve'et bateikhem ubo'u 'eilai ve'etenah lakhem 'et tub 'erez mizrayim ve'ikhlu 'et kheileb ha'arez. ve'atah zuveitah zot 'asu qekhu lakhem mei'erez mizrayim 'agalot letapekhem velinsheikhem unesatem 'et 'abikhem ubatem. ve'einekhem 'al takhos 'al keleikhem ki tub kal 'erez mizrayim lakhem hu. vaya'asu khen benei yisra'el vayiten lahem yosef 'agalot 'al pi far'oh vayiten lahem zeidah ladarekh. lekhulam natan la'ish khalifot semalot ulebinyamin natan shelosh mei'ot kesef vekhamesh khalifot semalot. ule'abiv shalakh kezot 'asarah khamorim nose'im mitub mizrayim ve'eser 'atonot nose'ot bar valekhem umazon le'abiv ladarekh. vayshalakh 'et 'ekhav vayeileikhu vayomer 'aleihem 'al tirgezu badarekh. vaya'alu mimizrayim vayabo'u 'erez kena'an 'el ya'aqob 'abihem. vayagidu lo leimor 'od yosef khai vekhi hu moshel bekhal 'erez mizrayim vayafag libo ki lo he'emin lahem. vaydaberu 'eilav 'et kal dibrei yosef 'asher diber 'aleihem vayar 'et ha'agalot 'asher shalakh yosef laset 'oto vatekhi ruakh ya'aqob 'abihem. vayomer yisra'el rab 'od yosef beni khai 'eilekhah ve'er'enu beterem 'amut. vayisa' yisra'el vekhal 'asher lo vayabo be'eirah shaba' vayizbakh zebakhim leilohei 'abiv yizkhaq. vayomer 'elohim leyisra'el bemar'ot halaylah vayomer ya'aqob ya'aqob vayomer hineini. vayomer 'anokhi ha'el 'elohei 'abikha 'al tira meiredah mizraymah ki lego gadol 'asimekha sham. 'anokhi 'eired 'imekha mizraymah ve'anokhi 'a'alkha gam 'aloh veyosef yashit yado 'al 'einekha. vayaqam ya'aqob mibe'er shaba' vayis'u benei yisra'el 'et ya'aqob 'abihem ve'et tapam ve'et nesheihem ba'agalot 'asher shalakh par'oh laset 'oto. vayiqkhu 'et miqneihem ve'et rekhusham 'asher rakheshu be'erez kena'an vayabo'u mizrayemah ya'aqob vekhal zar'o 'ito. banav ubenei banav 'ito benotav ubenot banav vekhal zar'o heibi 'ito mizrayemah. ve'eleh shemot benei yisra'el haba'im mizraymah ya'aqob ubanav bekhor ya'aqob re'uben. ubenei re'uben khanokh ufalu vekhezron vekharmi. ubenei shim'on yemu'el veyamin ve'ohad veyakhin vezokhar vesha'ul ben hakena'anit. ubenei leivi geireshon qehat umerari. ubenei yehudah 'er ve'onan vesheilah vaferez vazarakh vayamat 'er ve'onan be'erez kena'an vayihyu benei ferez khezron vekhamul. ubenei yisashkhar tola' ufuvah veyob veshimron. ubenei zebulun sered ve'eilon veyakhle'el. 'eleh benei lei'ah 'asher yaledah leya'aqob befadan 'aram ve'et dinah bito kal nefesh banav ubenotav sheloshim veshalosh. ubenei gad zifyon vekhagi shuni ve'ezbon 'eiri va'arodi ve'ar'eili. ubenei 'asher yimnah veyishvah veyishvi uberi'ah veserakh 'akhotam ubenei beri'ah kheber umalki'el. 'eleh benei zilpah 'asher natan laban lelei'ah bito vateiled 'et 'eleh leya'aqob shesh 'esreh nafesh. benei rakhel 'eishet ya'aqob yosef ubinyamin. vayivaled leyosef be'erez mizrayim 'asher yaledah lo 'asenat bat poti fera' kohen 'on 'et menasheh ve'et 'efrayim. ubenei binyamin bela' vabekher ve'ashbel geira vena'aman 'eikhi varosh mupim vekhupim va'ared. 'eleh benei rakhel 'asher yulad leya'aqob kal nefesh 'arba'ah 'asar. ubenei dan khushim. ubenei naftali yakhze'el veguni veyeizer veshilem. 'eleh benei bilhah 'asher natan laban lerakhel bito vateiled 'et 'eleh leya'aqob kal nefesh shib'ah. kal hanefesh haba'ah leya'aqob mizraymah yoze'ei yereikho milebad neshei benei ya'aqob kal nefesh shishim vashesh. ubenei yosef 'asher yulad lo bemizrayim nefesh shenayim kal hanefesh lebet ya'aqob haba'ah mizraymah shib'im. ve'et yehudah shalakh lefanav 'el yosef lehorot lefanav goshenah vayabo'u 'arzah goshen. vaye'sor yosef merkabto vaya'al liqrat yisra'el 'abiv goshenah vayeira 'eilav vayipol 'al zavarav vayeibek 'al zavarav 'od. vayomer yisra'el 'el yosef 'amutah hapa'am 'akharei re'oti 'et panekha ki 'odkha khai. vayomer yosef 'el 'ekhav ve'el bet 'abiv 'e'eleh ve'agidah lefar'oh ve'omerah 'eilav 'akhai ubet 'abi 'asher be'erez kena'an ba'u 'eilai. veha'anashim ro'ei zon ki 'anshei miqneh hayu vezonam ubeqaram vekhal 'asher lahem heibi'u. vehayah ki yiqra lakhem par'oh ve'amar mah ma'aseikhem. va'amartem 'anshei miqneh hayu 'abadekha mine'ureinu ve'ad 'atah gam 'anakhnu gam 'aboteinu ba'abur teishebu be'erez goshen ki to'abat mizrayim kal ro'eh zon. vayabo yosef vayaged lefar'oh vayomer 'abi ve'akhai vezonam ubeqaram vekhal 'asher lahem ba'u mei'erez kena'an vehinam be'erez goshen. umiqzeh 'ekhav laqakh khamishah 'anashim vayazigem lifnei far'oh. vayomer par'oh 'el 'ekhav mah ma'aseikhem vayomeru 'el par'oh ro'eh zon 'abadekha gam 'anakhnu gam 'aboteinu. vayomeru 'el par'oh lagur ba'arez banu ki 'en mir'eh lazon 'asher la'abadekha ki khabed hara'ab be'erez kena'an ve'atah yeishebu na 'abadekha be'erez goshen. vayomer par'oh 'el yosef leimor 'abikha ve'akhekha ba'u 'eilekha. 'erez mizrayim lefanekha hi bemeitab ha'arez hosheb 'et 'abikha ve'et 'akhekha yeishebu be'erez goshen ve'im yada'ta veyesh bam 'anshei khayil vesamtam sarei miqneh 'al 'asher li. vayabei yosef 'et ya'aqob 'abiv vaya'amideihu lifnei far'oh vaybarekh ya'aqob 'et par'oh. vayomer par'oh 'el ya'aqob kamah yemei shenei khayekha. vayomer ya'aqob 'el par'oh yemei shenei megurai sheloshim ume'at shanah me'at vera'im hayu yemei shenei khayai velo hisigu 'et yemei shenei khayei 'abotai bimei megureihem. vaybarekh ya'aqob 'et par'oh vayeizei milifnei far'oh. vayosheb yosef 'et 'abiv ve'et 'ekhav vayiten lahem 'akhuzah be'erez mizrayim bemeitab ha'arez be'erez ra'meses ka'asher zivah far'oh. vaykhalkel yosef 'et 'abiv ve'et 'ekhav ve'et kal bet 'abiv lekhem lefi hataf. velekhem 'en bekhal ha'arez ki khabed hara'ab me'od vateilah 'erez mizrayim ve'erez kena'an mipenei hara'ab. vaylaqet yosef 'et kal hakesef hanimza be'erez mizrayim ube'erez kena'an basheber 'asher hem shoberim vayabei yosef 'et hakesef beitah far'oh. vayitom hakesef mei'erez mizrayim umei'erez kena'an vayabo'u khal mizrayim 'el yosef leimor habah lanu lekhem velamah namut negdekha ki 'afes kasef. vayomer yosef habu miqneikhem ve'etenah lakhem bemiqneikhem 'im 'afes kasef. vayabi'u 'et miqneihem 'el yosef vayiten lahem yosef lekhem basusim ubemiqneh hazon ubemiqneh habaqar ubakhamorim vaynahalem balekhem bekhal miqneihem bashanah hahiv. vatitom hashanah hahiv vayabo'u 'eilav bashanah hasheinit vayomeru lo lo nekhakhed mei'adoni ki 'im tam hakesef umiqneh habeheimah 'el 'adoni lo nish'ar lifnei 'adoni bilti 'im geviyateinu ve'admateinu. lamah namut le'einekha gam 'anakhnu gam 'admateinu qeneh 'otanu ve'et 'admateinu balakhem venihyeh 'anakhnu ve'admateinu 'abadim lefar'oh veten zera' venikhyeh velo namut veha'adamah lo teisham. vayiqen yosef 'et kal 'admat mizrayim lefar'oh ki makheru mizrayim 'ish sadeihu ki khazaq 'aleihem hara'ab vatehi ha'arez lefar'oh. ve'et ha'am he'ebir 'oto le'arim miqzeh gebul mizrayim ve'ad qazeihu. raq 'admat hakohanim lo qanah ki khoq lakohanim mei'et par'oh ve'akhelu 'et khuqam 'asher natan lahem par'oh 'al ken lo makheru 'et 'admatam. vayomer yosef 'el ha'am hen qaniti 'etkhem hayom ve'et 'admatkhem lefar'oh hei lakhem zera' uzera'tem 'et ha'adamah. vehayah batebu'ot unetatem khamishit lefar'oh ve'arba' hayadot yihyeh lakhem lezera' hasadeh ule'akhelekhem vela'asher bebateikhem vele'ekhol letapekhem. vayomeru hekheyitanu nimza khen be'einei 'adoni vehayinu 'abadim lefar'oh. vayasem 'otah yosef lekhoq 'ad hayom hazeh 'al 'admat mizrayim lefar'oh lakhomesh raq 'admat hakohanim lebadam lo hayetah lefar'oh. vayeisheb yisra'el be'erez mizrayim be'erez goshen vayei'akhazu bah vayifru vayirbu me'od. vaykhi ya'aqob be'erez mizrayim sheba' 'esreh shanah vayhi yemei ya'aqob shenei khayav sheba' shanim ve'arba'im ume'at shanah. vayiqrebu yemei yisra'el lamut vayiqra libno leyosef vayomer lo 'im na mazati khen be'einekha sim na yadekha takhat yereikhi ve'asita 'imadi khesed ve'emet 'al na tiqbereini bemizrayim. veshakhabti 'im 'abotai unesatani mimizrayim uqebartani biqburatam vayomar 'anokhi 'e'eseh khidbarekha. vayomer hishabe'ah li vayishaba' lo vayishtakhu yisra'el 'al rosh hamitah. vayhi 'akharei hadebarim ha'eleh vayomer leyosef hineh 'abikha kholeh vayiqakh 'et shenei banav 'imo 'et menasheh ve'et 'efrayim. vayaged leya'aqob vayomer hineh binkha yosef ba 'eilekha vayitkhazeq yisra'el vayeisheb 'al hamitah. vayomer ya'aqob 'el yosef 'el shadai nir'ah 'eilai beluz be'erez kena'an vaybarekh 'oti. vayomer 'eilai hini mafrekha vehirbitikha unetatikha liqhal 'amim venatati 'et ha'arez hazot lezar'akha 'akharekha 'akhuzat 'olam. ve'atah shenei banekha hanoladim lekha be'erez mizrayim 'ad bo'i 'eilekha mizraymah li hem 'efrayim umenasheh kir'uben veshim'on yihyu li. umoladtekha 'asher holadta 'akhareihem lekha yihyu 'al shem 'akheihem yiqare'u benakhalatam. va'ani bebo'i mipadan meitah 'alai rakhel be'erez kena'an baderekh be'od kibrat 'erez labo 'efratah va'eqbereha sham bederekh 'efrat hi bet lakhem. vayar yisra'el 'et benei yosef vayomer mi 'eleh. vayomer yosef 'el 'abiv banai hem 'asher natan li 'elohim bazeh vayomar qakhem na 'eilai va'abarakhem. ve'einei yisra'el kabedu mizoqen lo yukhal lir'ot vayagesh 'otam 'eilav vayishaq lahem vaykhabeq lahem. vayomer yisra'el 'el yosef re'oh fanekha lo filaleti vehineh her'ah 'oti 'elohim gam 'et zar'ekha. vayozei yosef 'otam mei'im birkav vayishtakhu le'apav 'arezah. vayiqakh yosef 'et sheneihem 'et 'efrayim bimino misemol yisra'el ve'et menasheh bismolo mimin yisra'el vayagesh 'eilav. vayishlakh yisra'el 'et yemino vayashet 'al rosh 'efrayim vehu haza'ir ve'et semolo 'al rosh menasheh sikel 'et yadav ki menasheh habekhor. vaybarekh 'et yosef vayomar ha'elohim 'asher hithalekhu 'abotai lefanav 'abraham veyizkhaq ha'elohim haro'eh 'oti mei'odi 'ad hayom hazeh. hamal'akh hago'el 'oti mikal ra' yebarekh 'et hane'arim veyiqarei bahem shemi veshem 'abotai 'abraham veyizkhaq veyidgu larob beqereb ha'arez. vayar yosef ki yashit 'abiv yad yemino 'al rosh 'efrayim vayeira' be'einav vayitmokh yad 'abiv lehasir 'otah mei'al rosh 'efrayim 'al rosh menasheh. vayomer yosef 'el 'abiv lo khen 'abi ki zeh habekhor sim yeminekha 'al rosho. vayma'en 'abiv vayomer yada'ti beni yada'ti gam hu yihyeh le'am vegam hu yigdal ve'ulam 'akhiv haqaton yigdal mimenu vezar'o yihyeh melo hagoyim. vaybarakhem bayom hahu leimor bekha yebarekh yisra'el leimor yesimkha 'elohim ke'efrayim vekhimnasheh vayasem 'et 'efrayim lifnei menasheh. vayomer yisra'el 'el yosef hineh 'anokhi met vehayah 'elohim 'imakhem veheishib 'etkhem 'el 'erez 'aboteikhem. va'ani natati lekha shekhem 'akhad 'al 'akhekha 'asher laqakhti miyad ha'emori bekharbi ubeqashti. vayiqra ya'aqob 'el banav vayomer hei'asefu ve'agidah lakhem 'et 'asher yiqra 'etkhem be'akharit hayamim. hiqabezu veshim'u benei ya'aqob veshim'u 'el yisra'el 'abikhem. re'uben bekhori 'atah kokhi vereishit 'oni yeter se'et veyeter 'az. pakhaz kamayim 'al totar ki 'alita mishkebei 'abikha 'az khilalta yezu'i 'alah. shim'on veleivi 'akhim kelei khamas mekheiroteihem. besodam 'al tabo nafshi biqhalam 'al teikhad kebodi ki be'apam haregu 'ish ubirzonam 'iqeru shor. 'arur 'apam ki 'az ve'ebratam ki qashatah 'akhaleqem beya'aqob va'afizem beyisra'el. yehudah 'atah yodukha 'akhekha yadekha be'oref 'oyebekha yishtakhavu lekha benei 'abikha. gur 'aryeh yehudah miteref beni 'alita kara' rabaz ke'aryeh ukhelabi mi yeqimenu. lo yasur sheibet mihudah umekhoqeq miben raglav 'ad ki yabo shiloh shilo velo yiqehat 'amim. 'oseri lagefen 'iroh 'iro velasoreiqah beni 'atono kibes bayayin lebusho ubedam 'anabim sutoh suto. khakhlili 'einayim miyayin uleben shinayim meikhalab. zebulun lekhof yamim yishkon vehu lekhof 'oniyot veyarkhato 'al zidon. yisashkhar khamor garem robez ben hamishpetayim. vayar menukhah ki tob ve'et ha'arez ki na'eimah vayet shikhmo lisbol vayhi lemas 'obed. dan yadin 'amo ke'akhad shibtei yisra'el. yehi dan nakhash 'alei derekh shefifon 'alei 'orakh hanoshekh 'iqebei sus vayipol rokhebo 'akhor. lishu'atekha qiviti ihoh. gad gedud yegudenu vehu yagud 'aqeb. mei'asher shemeinah lakhmo vehu yiten ma'adanei melekh. naftali 'ayalah shelukhah hanoten 'imrei shafer. ben porat yosef ben porat 'alei 'ayin banot za'adah 'alei shur. vaymararuhu varobu vayistemuhu ba'alei khizim. vateisheb be'eitan qashto vayafozu zero'ei yadav midei 'abir ya'aqob misham ro'eh 'eben yisra'el. mei'el 'abikha veya'zereka ve'et shadai vibarekheka birkhot shamayim mei'al birkhot tehom robezet takhat birkhot shadayim varakham. birkhot 'abikha gaberu 'al birkhot horai 'ad ta'avat gib'ot 'olam tihyen lerosh yosef uleqadeqod nezir 'ekhav. binyamin ze'eb yitraf baboqer yokhal 'ad vela'ereb yekhaleq shalal. kal 'eleh shibtei yisra'el shenem 'asar vezot 'asher diber lahem 'abihem vaybarekh 'otam 'ish 'asher kebirkhato beirakh 'otam. vayzav 'otam vayomer 'aleihem 'ani ne'esaf 'el 'ami qibru 'oti 'el 'abotai 'el hame'arah 'asher bisdeh 'efron hakhiti. bame'arah 'asher bisdeh hamakhpeilah 'asher 'al penei mamrei be'erez kena'an 'asher qanah 'abraham 'et hasadeh mei'et 'efron hakhiti la'akhuzat qaber. shamah qaberu 'et 'abraham ve'et sarah 'ishto mah qaberu 'et yizkhaq ve'et ribqah 'ishto veshamah qabarti 'et lei'ah. miqneh hasadeh vehame'arah 'asher bo mei'et benei khet. vaykhal ya'aqob lezavot 'et banav vaye'esof raglav 'el hamitah vayigva' vayei'asef 'el 'amav. vayipol yosef 'al penei 'abiv vayeibek 'alav vayishaq lo. vayzav yosef 'et 'abadav 'et harofe'im lakhanot 'et 'abiv vayakhantu harofe'im 'et yisra'el. vayimle'u lo 'arba'im yom ki ken yimle'u yemei hakhanutim vayibku 'oto mizrayim shib'im yom. vaya'abru yemei bekhito vaydaber yosef 'el bet par'oh leimor 'im na mazati khen be'eineikhem daberu na be'azenei far'oh leimor. 'abi hishbi'ani leimor hineh 'anokhi met beqibri 'asher kariti li be'erez kena'an shamah tiqbereini ve'atah 'e'eleh na ve'eqberah 'et 'abi ve'ashubah. vayomer par'oh 'aleh uqebor 'et 'abikha ka'asher hishbi'ekha. vaya'al yosef liqbor 'et 'abiv vaya'alu 'ito kal 'abdei far'oh ziqnei beito vekhol ziqnei 'erez mizrayim. vekhol bet yosef ve'ekhav ubet 'abiv raq tapam vezonam ubeqaram 'azebu be'erez goshen. vaya'al 'imo gam rekheb gam parashim vayhi hamakhaneh kabed me'od. vayabo'u 'ad goren ha'atad 'asher be'eiber hayarden vayispedu sham misped gadol vekhabed me'od vaya'as le'abiv 'eibel shib'at yamim. vayar yosheb ha'arez hakena'ani 'et ha'eibel begoren ha'atad vayomeru 'eibel kabed zeh lemizrayim 'al ken qara shemah 'abel mizrayim 'asher be'eiber hayarden. vaya'asu banav lo ken ka'asher zivam. vayis'u 'oto banav 'arzah kena'an vayiqberu 'oto bim'arat sedeh hamakhpeilah 'asher qanah 'abraham 'et hasadeh la'akhuzat qeber mei'et 'efron hakhiti 'al penei mamrei. vayashab yosef mizraymah hu ve'ekhav vekhal ha'olim 'ito liqbor 'et 'abiv 'akharei qabero 'et 'abiv. vayir'u 'akhei yosef ki met 'abihem vayomeru lu yistemeinu yosef vehasheb yashib lanu 'et kal hara'ah 'asher gamalnu 'oto. vayzavu 'el yosef leimor 'abikha zivah lifnei moto leimor. koh tomeru leyosef 'ana sa na pesha' 'akhekha vekhatatam ki ra'ah gemalukha ve'atah sa na lefesha' 'abdei 'elohei 'abikha vayeibek yosef bedaberam 'eilav. vayeilekhu gam 'ekhav vayipelu lefanav vayomeru hinenu lekha la'abadim. vayomer 'aleihem yosef 'al tira'u ki hatakhat 'elohim 'ani. ve'atem khashabtem 'alai ra'ah 'elohim khashabah letobah lema'an 'asoh kayom hazeh lehakhayot 'am rab. ve'atah 'al tira'u 'anokhi 'akhalkel 'etkhem ve'et tapekhem vaynakhem 'otam vaydaber 'al libam. vayeisheb yosef bemizrayim hu ubet 'abiv vaykhi yosef mei'ah va'eser shanim. vayar yosef le'efrayim benei shileishim gam benei makhir ben menasheh yuledu 'al birkei yosef. vayomer yosef 'el 'ekhav 'anokhi met veilohim paqod yifqod 'etkhem vehe'elah 'etkhem min ha'arez hazot 'el ha'arez 'asher nishba' le'abraham leyizkhaq uleya'aqob. vayashba' yosef 'et benei yisra'el leimor paqod yifqod 'elohim 'etkhem veha'alitem 'et 'azmotai mizeh. vayamat yosef ben mei'ah va'eser shanim vayakhantu 'oto vayisem ba'aron bemizrayim.

ve'eleh shemot benei yisra'el haba'im mizrayemah 'et ya'aqob 'ish ubeito ba'u. re'uben shim'on leivi vihudah. yisashkhar zebulun ubeneyamin dan venaftali gad ve'asher. vayhi kal nefesh yoze'ei yerekh ya'aqob shib'im nafesh veyosef hayah bemizrayim. vayamat yosef vekhal 'ekhav vekhol hador hahu. ubenei yisra'el paru vayishrezu vayirbu vaya'azmu bim'od me'od vatimalei ha'arez 'otam. vayaqam melekh khadash 'al mizrayim 'asher lo yada' 'et yosef. vayomer 'el 'amo hineh 'am benei yisra'el rab ve'azum mimenu. habah nitkhakemah lo pen yirbeh vehayah ki tiqrenah milkhamah venosaf gam hu 'al sone'einu venilkham banu ve'alah min ha'arez. vayasimu 'alav sarei misim lema'an 'anoto besiblotam vayiben 'arei miskenot lefar'oh 'et pitom ve'et ra'amses. vekha'asher ye'anu 'oto ken yirbeh vekhen yifroz vayaquzu mipenei benei yisra'el. vaya'abidu mizrayim 'et benei yisra'el befarekh. vaymareru 'et khayeihem ba'abodah qashah bekhomer ubilbeinim ubekhal 'abodah basadeh 'et kal 'abodatam 'asher 'abedu bahem befarekh. vayomer melekh mizrayim lamyaledot ha'ibriyot 'asher shem ha'akhat shifrah veshem hasheinit pu'ah. vayomer beyaledkhen 'et ha'ibriyot ure'iten 'al ha'abenayim 'im ben hu vahamiten 'oto ve'im bat hi vakhayah. vatirena hamyaledot 'et ha'elohim velo 'asu ka'asher diber 'aleihen melekh mizrayim vatekhayena 'et hayladim. vayiqra melekh mizrayim lamyaledot vayomer lahen madua' 'asiten hadabar hazeh vatekhayena 'et hayladim. vatomarna hamyaledot 'el par'oh ki lo khanashim hamizriyot ha'ibriyot ki khayot henah beterem tabo 'aleihen hamyaledet veyaladu. vayeiteb 'elohim lamyaledot vayireb ha'am vaya'azmu me'od. vayhi ki yare'u hamyaledot 'et ha'elohim vaya'as lahem batim. vayzav par'oh lekhal 'amo leimor kal haben hayilod hai'orah tashlikhuhu vekhal habat tekhayun. vayeilekh 'ish mibet leivi vayiqakh 'et bat leivi. vatahar ha'ishah vateiled ben vateire 'oto ki tob hu vatizpeneihu sheloshah yerakhim. velo yakhelah 'od hazefino vatiqakh lo teibat gome vatakhmerah bakheimar ubazafet vatasem bah 'et hayeled vatasem basuf 'al sefat hai'or. vateitazab 'akhoto meirakhoq ledei'ah mah yei'aseh lo. vateired bat par'oh lirkhoz 'al hai'or vena'aroteha holekhot 'al yad hai'or vateire 'et hateibah betokh hasuf vatishlakh 'et 'amatah vatiqakheha vatiftakh vatir'eihu 'et hayeled vehineh na'ar bokheh vatakhmol 'alav vatomer miyaldei ha'ibrim zeh. vatomer 'akhoto 'el bat par'oh ha'eilekh veqarati lakh 'ishah meineqet min ha'ibriyot veteiniq lakh 'et hayaled. vatomer lah bat par'oh leikhi vateilekh ha'almah vatiqra 'et 'em hayaled. vatomer lah bat par'oh heilikhi 'et hayeled hazeh veheiniqihu li va'ani 'eten 'et sekharekh vatiqakh ha'ishah hayeled vateniqeihu. vayigdal hayeled vatebi'eihu lebat par'oh vayhi lah leben vatiqra shemo mosheh vatomer ki min hamayim meshitihu. vayhi bayamim hahem vayigdal mosheh vayeizei 'el 'ekhav vayar besiblotam vayar 'ish mizri makeh 'ish 'ibri mei'ekhav. vayifen koh vakhoh vayar ki 'en 'ish vayakh 'et hamizri vayitmeneihu bakhol. vayeizei bayom hasheini vehineh shenei 'anashim 'ibrim nizim vayomer larasha' lamah takeh rei'ekha. vayomer mi samekha le'ish sar veshofet 'aleinu halharegeini 'atah 'omer ka'asher haragta 'et hamizri vayira mosheh vayomar 'akhen noda' hadabar. vayishma' par'oh 'et hadabar hazeh vaybaqesh laharog 'et mosheh vayibrakh mosheh mipenei far'oh vayeisheb be'erez midyan vayeisheb 'al habe'er. ulekhohen midyan sheba' banot vatabonah vatidlenah vatemalenah 'et harehatim lehashqot zon 'abihen. vayabo'u haro'im vaygareshum vayaqam mosheh vayoshi'an vayashq 'et zonam. vatabonah 'el re'u'el 'abihen vayomer madua' miharten bo hayom. vatomarna 'ish mizri hizilanu miyad haro'im vegam daloh dalah lanu vayashq 'et hazon. vayomer 'el benotav ve'ayo lamah zeh 'azabten 'et ha'ish qir'en lo veyokhal lakhem. vayo'el mosheh lashebet 'et ha'ish vayiten 'et ziporah bito lemosheh. vateiled ben vayiqra 'et shemo geireshom ki 'amar ger hayiti be'erez nakheriyah. vayhi bayamim harabim hahem vayamat melekh mizrayim vayei'anekhu benei yisra'el min ha'abodah vayiz'aqu vata'al shav'atam 'el ha'elohim min ha'abodah. vayishma' 'elohim 'et na'aqatam vayizkor 'elohim 'et berito 'et 'abraham 'et yizkhaq ve'et ya'aqob. vayar 'elohim 'et benei yisra'el vayeida' 'elohim. umosheh hayah ro'eh 'et zon yitro khoteno kohen midyan vayinhag 'et hazon 'akhar hamidbar vayabo 'el har ha'elohim khoreibah. vayeira mal'akh ihoh 'eilav belabat 'esh mitokh haseneh vayar vehineh haseneh bo'er ba'esh vehaseneh 'einenu 'ukal. vayomer mosheh 'asurah na ve'er'eh 'et hamar'eh hagadol hazeh madua' lo yib'ar haseneh. vayar ihoh ki sar lir'ot vayiqra 'eilav 'elohim mitokh haseneh vayomer mosheh mosheh vayomer hineini. vayomer 'al tiqrab halom shal ne'alekha mei'al raglekha ki hamaqom 'asher 'atah 'omed 'alav 'admat qodesh hu. vayomer 'anokhi 'elohei 'abikha 'elohei 'abraham 'elohei yizkhaq veilohei ya'aqob vayaster mosheh panav ki yarei meihabit 'el ha'elohim. vayomer ihoh ra'oh ra'iti 'et 'oni 'ami 'asher bemizrayim ve'et za'aqatam shama'ti mipenei nogesav ki yada'ti 'et makh'obav. va'eired lehazilo miyad mizrayim uleha'aloto min ha'arez hahiv 'el 'erez tobah urekhabah 'el 'erez zabat khalab udebash 'el meqom hakena'ani vehakhiti veha'emori vehaperizi vehakhivi vehaybusi. ve'atah hineh za'aqat benei yisra'el ba'ah 'eilai vegam ra'iti 'et halakhaz 'asher mizrayim lokhazim 'otam. ve'atah lekhah ve'eshlakhakha 'el par'oh vehozei 'et 'ami benei yisra'el mimizrayim. vayomer mosheh 'el ha'elohim mi 'anokhi ki 'eilekh 'el par'oh vekhi 'ozi 'et benei yisra'el mimizrayim. vayomer ki 'ehyeh 'imakh vezeh lekha ha'ot ki 'anokhi shelakhtikha behozi'akha 'et ha'am mimizrayim ta'abdun 'et ha'elohim 'al hahar hazeh. vayomer mosheh 'el ha'elohim hineh 'anokhi ba 'el benei yisra'el ve'amarti lahem 'elohei 'aboteikhem shelakhani 'aleikhem ve'ameru li mah shemo mah 'omar 'aleihem. vayomer 'elohim 'el mosheh 'ehyeh 'asher 'ehyeh vayomer koh tomar libnei yisra'el 'ehyeh shelakhani 'aleikhem. vayomer 'od 'elohim 'el mosheh koh tomar 'el benei yisra'el ihoh 'elohei 'aboteikhem 'elohei 'abraham 'elohei yizkhaq veilohei ya'aqob shelakhani 'aleikhem zeh shemi le'olam vezeh zikhri ledor dor. lekh ve'asafta 'et ziqnei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem ihoh 'elohei 'aboteikhem nir'ah 'eilai 'elohei 'abraham yizkhaq veya'aqob leimor paqod paqadti 'etkhem ve'et he'asui lakhem bemizrayim. va'omar 'a'aleh 'etkhem mei'oni mizrayim 'el 'erez hakena'ani vehakhiti veha'emori vehaperizi vehakhivi vehaybusi 'el 'erez zabat khalab udebash. veshame'u leqolekha ubata 'atah veziqnei yisra'el 'el melekh mizrayim va'amartem 'eilav ihoh 'elohei ha'ibriyim niqrah 'aleinu ve'atah neilakhah na derekh sheloshet yamim bamidbar venizbekhah ihoh 'eloheinu. va'ani yada'ti ki lo yiten 'etkhem melekh mizrayim lahalokh velo beyad khazaqah. veshalakhti 'et yadi vehikeiti 'et mizrayim bekhol nifle'otai 'asher 'e'eseh beqirbo ve'akharei khen yeshalakh 'etkhem. venatati 'et khen ha'am hazeh be'einei mizrayim vehayah ki teileikhun lo teilekhu reiqam. vesha'alah 'ishah mishekhentah umigarat beitah kelei khesef ukhelei zahab usemalot vesamtem 'al beneikhem ve'al benoteikhem venizaltem 'et mizrayim. vaya'an mosheh vayomer vehen lo ya'aminu li velo yishme'u beqoli ki yomeru lo nir'ah 'eilekha ihoh. vayomer 'eilav ihoh mazeh mah zeh beyadekha vayomer mateh. vayomer hashlikheihu 'arzah vayashlikheihu 'arzah vayhi lenakhash vayanas mosheh mipanav. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh shelakh yadekha ve'ekhoz biznabo vayishlakh yado vayakhazeq bo vayhi lemateh bekhapo. lema'an ya'aminu ki nir'ah 'eilekha ihoh 'elohei 'abotam 'elohei 'abraham 'elohei yizkhaq veilohei ya'aqob. vayomer ihoh lo 'od habei na yadekha bekheiqekha vayabei yado bekheiqo vayozi'ah vehineh yado mezora'at kashaleg. vayomer hasheb yadekha 'el kheiqekha vayasheb yado 'el kheiqo vayozi'ah meikheiqo vehineh shabah kibsaro. vehayah 'im lo ya'aminu lakh velo yishme'u leqol ha'ot harishon vehe'eminu leqol ha'ot ha'akharon. vehayah 'im lo ya'aminu gam lishnei ha'otot ha'eleh velo yishme'un leqolekha velaqakhta mimeimei hai'or veshafakhta hayabashah vehayu hamayim 'asher tiqakh min hai'or vehayu ledam bayabashet. vayomer mosheh 'el ihoh bi 'adonai lo 'ish debarim 'anokhi gam mitemol gam mishilshom gam mei'az daberkha 'el 'abdekha ki khebad peh ukhebad lashon 'anokhi. vayomer ihoh 'eilav mi sam peh la'adam 'o mi yasum 'ilem 'o kheiresh 'o fiqeiakh 'o 'iver halo 'anokhi ihoh. ve'atah lekh ve'anokhi 'ehyeh 'im pikha vehoreitikha 'asher tedaber. vayomer bi 'adonai shelakh na beyad tishlakh. vayikhar 'af ihoh bemosheh vayomer halo 'aharon 'akhikha haleivi yada'ti ki daber yedaber hu vegam hineh hu yozei liqratekha vera'akha vesamakh belibo. vedibarta 'eilav vesamta 'et hadebarim befiv ve'anokhi 'ehyeh 'im pikha ve'im pihu vehoreiti 'etkhem 'et 'asher ta'asun. vediber hu lekha 'el ha'am vehayah hu yihyeh lekha lefeh ve'atah tihyeh lo leilohim. ve'et hamateh hazeh tiqakh beyadekha 'asher ta'aseh bo 'et ha'otot. vayeilekh mosheh vayashab 'el yeter khoteno vayomer lo 'eilekhah na ve'ashubah 'el 'akhai 'asher bemizrayim ve'er'eh ha'odam khayim vayomer yitro lemosheh lekh leshalom. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh bemidyan lekh shub mizrayim ki meitu kal ha'anashim hambaqshim 'et nafshekha. vayiqakh mosheh 'et 'ishto ve'et banav vayarkibem 'al hakhamor vayashab 'arzah mizrayim vayiqakh mosheh 'et mateh ha'elohim beyado. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh belekhtekha lashub mizraymah re'eh kal hamofetim 'asher samti beyadekha va'asitam lifnei far'oh va'ani 'akhazeq 'et libo velo yeshalakh 'et ha'am. ve'amarta 'el par'oh koh 'amar ihoh beni bekhori yisra'el. va'omar 'eilekha shalakh 'et beni veya'abdeini vatema'en leshalekho hineh 'anokhi horeg 'et binkha bekhorekha. vayhi baderekh bamalon vayifgesheihu ihoh vaybaqesh hamito. vatiqakh ziporah zor vatikhrot 'et 'arelat benah vataga' leraglav vatomer ki khatan damim 'atah li. vayiref mimenu 'az 'amerah khatan damim lamulot. vayomer ihoh 'el 'aharon lekh liqrat mosheh hamidbarah vayeilekh vayifgesheihu behar ha'elohim vayishaq lo. vayaged mosheh le'aharon 'et kal dibrei ihoh 'asher shelakho ve'et kal ha'otot 'asher zivahu. vayeilekh mosheh ve'aharon vaya'asfu 'et kal ziqnei benei yisra'el. vaydaber 'aharon 'et kal hadebarim 'asher diber ihoh 'el mosheh vaya'as ha'otot le'einei ha'am. vaya'amen ha'am vayishme'u ki faqad ihoh 'et benei yisra'el vekhi ra'ah 'et 'aneyam vayiqedu vayishtakhavu ve'akhar ba'u mosheh ve'aharon vayomeru 'el par'oh koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el shalakh 'et 'ami veyakhogu li bamidbar. vayomer par'oh mi ihoh 'asher 'eshma' beqolo leshalakh 'et yisra'el lo yada'ti 'et ihoh vegam 'et yisra'el lo 'ashaleiakh. vayomeru 'elohei ha'ibrim niqra 'aleinu neilakhah na derekh sheloshet yamim bamidbar venizbekhah ihoh 'eloheinu pen yifga'einu badeber 'o bekhareb. vayomer 'aleihem melekh mizrayim lamah mosheh ve'aharon tafri'u 'et ha'am mima'asav lekhu lesibloteikhem. vayomer par'oh hen rabim 'atah 'am ha'arez vehishbatem 'otam misiblotam. vayzav par'oh bayom hahu 'et hanogesim ba'am ve'et shoterav leimor. lo tosifun latet teben la'am lilbon halebeinim kitmol shilshom hem yeilekhu veqosheshu lahem teben. ve'et matkonet halebeinim 'asher hem 'osim temol shilshom tasimu 'aleihem lo tigre'u mimenu ki nirpim hem 'al ken hem zo'aqim leimor neilekhah nizbekhah leiloheinu. tikhbad ha'abodah 'al ha'anashim veya'asu bah ve'al yish'u bedibrei shaqer. vayeize'u nogesei ha'am veshoterav vayomeru 'el ha'am leimor koh 'amar par'oh 'eineni noten lakhem teben. 'atem lekhu qekhu lakhem teben mei'asher timza'u ki 'en nigra' mei'abodatkhem dabar. vayafez ha'am bekhal 'erez mizrayim leqoshesh qash lateben. vehanogesim 'azim leimor kalu ma'aseikhem debar yom beyomo ka'asher bihyot hateben. vayuku shoterei benei yisra'el 'asher samu 'aleihem nogesei far'oh leimor madua' lo khilitem khaqekhem lilbon kitmol shilshom gam temol gam hayom. vayabo'u shoterei benei yisra'el vayiz'aqu 'el par'oh leimor lamah ta'aseh khoh la'abadekha. teben 'en nitan la'abadekha ulebeinim 'omerim lanu 'asu vehineh 'abadekha mukim vekhatat 'amekha. vayomer nirpim 'atem nirpim 'al ken 'atem 'omerim neilekhah nizbekhah ihoh. ve'atah lekhu 'ibdu veteben lo yinaten lakhem vetokhen lebeinim titenu. vayir'u shoterei benei yisra'el 'otam bera' leimor lo tigre'u milibneikhem debar yom beyomo. vayifge'u 'et mosheh ve'et 'aharon nizabim liqratam bezeitam mei'et par'oh. vayomeru 'aleihem yeire ihoh 'aleikhem veyishpot 'asher hib'ashtem 'et reikheinu be'einei far'oh ube'einei 'abadav latet khereb beyadam leharegeinu. vayashab mosheh 'el ihoh vayomar 'adonai lamah harei'otah la'am hazeh lamah zeh shelakhtani. umei'az bati 'el par'oh ledaber bishmekha heira' la'am hazeh
