vehazel lo hizalta 'et 'amekha. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh 'atah tir'eh 'asher 'e'eseh lefar'oh ki beyad khazaqah yeshalekhem ubeyad khazaqah yegareshem mei'arzo. vaydaber 'elohim 'el mosheh vayomer 'eilav 'ani ihoh. va'eira 'el 'abraham 'el yizkhaq ve'el ya'aqob be'el shadai ushemi ihoh lo noda'ti lahem. vegam haqimoti 'et beriti 'itam latet lahem 'et 'erez kena'an 'et 'erez megureihem 'asher garu bah. vegam 'ani shama'ti 'et na'aqat benei yisra'el 'asher mizrayim ma'abidim 'otam va'ezkor 'et beriti. lakhen 'emor libnei yisra'el 'ani ihoh vehozeiti 'etkhem mitakhat siblot mizrayim vehizalti 'etkhem mei'abodatam vega'alti 'etkhem bizroa' netuyah ubishfatim gedolim. velaqakhti 'etkhem li le'am vehayiti lakhem leilohim vida'tem ki 'ani ihoh 'eloheikhem hamozi 'etkhem mitakhat siblot mizrayim. veheibeiti 'etkhem 'el ha'arez 'asher nasati 'et yadi latet 'otah le'abraham leyizkhaq uleya'aqob venatati 'otah lakhem morashah 'ani ihoh. vaydaber mosheh ken 'el benei yisra'el velo shame'u 'el mosheh miqozer ruakh umei'abodah qashah. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. bo daber 'el par'oh melekh mizrayim vishalakh 'et benei yisra'el mei'arzo. vaydaber mosheh lifnei ihoh leimor hen benei yisra'el lo shame'u 'eilai ve'ekh yishma'eini far'oh va'ani 'aral sefatayim. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon vayzavem 'el benei yisra'el ve'el par'oh melekh mizrayim lehozi 'et benei yisra'el mei'erez mizrayim. 'eleh rashei bet 'abotam benei re'uben bekhor yisra'el khanokh ufalu khezron vekharmi 'eleh mishpekhot re'uben. ubenei shim'on yemu'el veyamin ve'ohad veyakhin vezokhar vesha'ul ben hakena'anit 'eleh mishpekhot shim'on. ve'eleh shemot benei leivi letoledotam geireshon uqehat umerari ushenei khayei leivi sheba' usheloshim ume'at shanah. benei geireshon libni veshim'i lemishpekhotam. ubenei qehat 'amram veyizhar vekhebron ve'uzi'el ushenei khayei qehat shalosh usheloshim ume'at shanah. ubenei merari makhli umushi 'eleh mishpekhot haleivi letoledotam. vayiqakh 'amram 'et yokhebed dodato lo le'ishah vateiled lo 'et 'aharon ve'et mosheh ushenei khayei 'amram sheba' usheloshim ume'at shanah. ubenei yizhar qorakh vanefeg vezikhri. ubenei 'uzi'el misha'el ve'elzafan vesitri. vayiqakh 'aharon 'et 'elisheba' bat 'aminadab 'akhot nakhshon lo le'ishah vateiled lo 'et nadab ve'et 'abihu 'et 'el'azar ve'et 'itamar. ubenei qorakh 'asir ve'elqanah va'abi'asaf 'eleh mishpekhot haqarekhi. ve'el'azar ben 'aharon laqakh lo mibenot puti'el lo le'ishah vateiled lo 'et pinekhas 'eleh rashei 'abot halviyim lemishpekhotam. hu 'aharon umosheh 'asher 'amar ihoh lahem hozi'u 'et benei yisra'el mei'erez mizrayim 'al zib'otam. hem hamdaberim 'el par'oh melekh mizrayim lehozi 'et benei yisra'el mimizrayim hu mosheh ve'aharon. vayhi beyom diber ihoh 'el mosheh be'erez mizrayim. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor 'ani ihoh daber 'el par'oh melekh mizrayim 'et kal 'asher 'ani dober 'eilekha. vayomer mosheh lifnei ihoh hen 'ani 'aral sefatayim ve'ekh yishma' 'eilai par'oh. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh re'eh netatikha 'elohim lefar'oh ve'aharon 'akhikha yihyeh nebi'ekha. 'atah tedaber 'et kal 'asher 'azaveka ve'aharon 'akhikha yedaber 'el par'oh veshilakh 'et benei yisra'el mei'arzo. va'ani 'aqsheh 'et leb par'oh vehirbeiti 'et 'ototai ve'et moftai be'erez mizrayim. velo yishma' 'aleikhem par'oh venatati 'et yadi bemizrayim vehozeiti 'et zib'otai 'et 'ami benei yisra'el mei'erez mizrayim bishfatim gedolim. veyade'u mizrayim ki 'ani ihoh bintoti 'et yadi 'al mizrayim vehozeiti 'et benei yisra'el mitokham. vaya'as mosheh ve'aharon ka'asher zivah ihoh 'otam ken 'asu. umosheh ben shemonim shanah ve'aharon ben shalosh ushemonim shanah bedaberam 'el par'oh. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon leimor. ki yedaber 'aleikhem par'oh leimor tenu lakhem mofet ve'amarta 'el 'aharon qakh 'et matekha vehashlekh lifnei far'oh yehi letanin. vayabo mosheh ve'aharon 'el par'oh vaya'asu khen ka'asher zivah ihoh vayashlekh 'aharon 'et mateihu lifnei far'oh velifnei 'abadav vayhi letanin. vayiqra gam par'oh lakhakhamim velamkhashefim vaya'asu gam hem khartumei mizrayim belahateihem ken. vayashlikhu 'ish mateihu vayihyu letaninim vayibla' mateh 'aharon 'et matotam. vayekhezaq leb par'oh velo shama' 'aleihem ka'asher diber ihoh. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh kabed leb par'oh mei'en leshalakh ha'am. lekh 'el par'oh baboqer hineh yozei hamaymah venizabta liqrato 'al sefat hai'or vehamateh 'asher nehpakh lenakhash tiqakh beyadekha. ve'amarta 'eilav ihoh 'elohei ha'ibrim shelakhani 'eilekha leimor shalakh 'et 'ami veya'abduni bamidbar vehineh lo shama'ta 'ad koh. koh 'amar ihoh bezot teida' ki 'ani ihoh hineh 'anokhi makeh bamateh 'asher beyadi 'al hamayim 'asher bai'or venehefkhu ledam. vehadagah 'asher bai'or tamut uba'ash hai'or venil'u mizrayim lishtot mayim min hai'or. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh 'emor 'el 'aharon qakh matekha uneteh yadekha 'al meimei mizrayim 'al naharotam 'al ye'oreihem ve'al 'agmeihem ve'al kal miqveh meimeihem veyihyu dam vehayah dam bekhal 'erez mizrayim uba'eizim uba'abanim. vaya'asu khen mosheh ve'aharon ka'asher zivah ihoh vayarem bamateh vayakh 'et hamayim 'asher bai'or le'einei far'oh ule'einei 'abadav vayeihafekhu kal hamayim 'asher bai'or ledam. vehadagah 'asher bai'or meitah vayib'ash hai'or velo yakhelu mizrayim lishtot mayim min hai'or vayhi hadam bekhal 'erez mizrayim. vaya'asu khen khartumei mizrayim belateihem vayekhezaq leb par'oh velo shama' 'aleihem ka'asher diber ihoh. vayifen par'oh vayabo 'el beito velo shat libo gam lazot. vayakhperu khal mizrayim sebibot hai'or mayim lishtot ki lo yakhelu lishtot mimeimei hai'or. vayimalei shib'at yamim 'akharei hakot ihoh 'et hai'or. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh bo 'el par'oh ve'amarta 'eilav koh 'amar ihoh shalakh 'et 'ami veya'abduni. ve'im ma'en 'atah leshaleiakh hineh 'anokhi nogef 'et kal gebulekha bazfarde'im. vesharaz hai'or zefarde'im ve'alu uba'u bebeitekha ubakhadar mishkabekha ve'al mitatekha ubebet 'abadekha ube'amekha ubetanurekha ubemish'arotekha. ubekhah ube'amekha ubekhal 'abadekha ya'alu hazfarde'im. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh 'emor 'el 'aharon neteh 'et yadekha bematekha 'al haneharot 'al hai'orim ve'al ha'agamim veha'al 'et hazfarde'im 'al 'erez mizrayim. vayet 'aharon 'et yado 'al meimei mizrayim vata'al hazefardeia' vatekhas 'et 'erez mizrayim. vaya'asu khen hakhartumim belateihem vaya'alu 'et hazfarde'im 'al 'erez mizrayim. vayiqra far'oh lemosheh ule'aharon vayomer ha'tiru 'el ihoh veyaser hazfarde'im mimeni umei'ami va'ashalekhah 'et ha'am veyizbekhu ihoh. vayomer mosheh lefar'oh hitpa'er 'alai lematai 'a'tir lekha vela'abadekha ule'amekha lehakhrit hazafarde'im mimekha umibatekha raq bai'or tisha'arnah. vayomer lemakhar vayomer kidbarekha lema'an teida' ki 'en ihoh 'eloheinu. vesaru hazfarde'im mimekha umibatekha umei'abadekha umei'amekha raq bai'or tisha'arnah. vayeizei mosheh ve'aharon mei'im par'oh vayiz'aq mosheh 'el ihoh 'al debar hazfarde'im 'asher sam lefar'oh. vaya'as ihoh kidbar mosheh vayamutu hazfarde'im min habatim min hakhazeirot umin hasadot. vayizberu 'otam khomarim khomarim vatib'ash ha'arez. vayar par'oh ki hayetah harevakhah vehakhbed 'et libo velo shama' 'aleihem ka'asher diber ihoh. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh 'emor 'el 'aharon neteh 'et matekha vehakh 'et 'afar ha'arez vehayah lekhinim bekhal 'erez mizrayim. vaya'asu khen vayet 'aharon 'et yado bemateihu vayakh 'et 'afar ha'arez vatehi hakinam ba'adam ubabeheimah kal 'afar ha'arez hayah khinim bekhal 'erez mizrayim. vaya'asu khen hakhartumim belateihem lehozi 'et hakinim velo yakholu vatehi hakinam ba'adam ubabeheimah. vayomeru hakhartumim 'el par'oh 'ezba' 'elohim hi vayekhezaq leb par'oh velo shama' 'aleihem ka'asher diber ihoh. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh hashkem baboqer vehityazeb lifnei far'oh hineh yozei hamayemah ve'amarta 'eilav koh 'amar ihoh shalakh 'ami veya'abduni. ki 'im 'einekha meshaleiakh 'et 'ami hini mashliakh bekha uba'abadekha ube'amekha ubebatekha 'et he'arob umale'u batei mizrayim 'et he'arob vegam ha'adamah 'asher hem 'aleha. vehifleiti bayom hahu 'et 'erez goshen 'asher 'ami 'omed 'aleha lebilti heyot sham 'arob lema'an teida' ki 'ani ihoh beqereb ha'arez. vesamti fedut ben 'ami uben 'amekha lemakhar yihyeh ha'ot hazeh. vaya'as ihoh ken vayabo 'arob kabed beitah far'oh ubet 'abadav ubekhal 'erez mizrayim tishakhet ha'arez mipenei he'arob. vayiqra far'oh 'el mosheh ule'aharon vayomer lekhu zibkhu leiloheikhem ba'arez. vayomer mosheh lo nakhon la'asot ken ki to'abat mizrayim nizbakh ihoh 'eloheinu hen nizbakh 'et to'abat mizrayim le'eineihem velo yisqelunu. derekh sheloshet yamim neilekh bamidbar vezabakhnu ihoh 'eloheinu ka'asher yomar 'eileinu. vayomer par'oh 'anokhi 'ashalakh 'etkhem uzebakhtem ihoh 'eloheikhem bamidbar raq harkheq lo tarkhiqu lalekhet ha'tiru ba'adi. vayomer mosheh hineh 'anokhi yozei mei'imakh veha'tarti 'el ihoh vesar he'arob mipar'oh mei'abadav umei'amo makhar raq 'al yosef par'oh hatel lebilti shalakh 'et ha'am lizboakh ihoh. vayeizei mosheh mei'im par'oh vaye'tar 'el ihoh. vaya'as ihoh kidbar mosheh vayasar he'arob mipar'oh mei'abadav umei'amo lo nish'ar 'ekhad. vayakhbed par'oh 'et libo gam bapa'am hazot velo shilakh 'et ha'am. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh bo 'el par'oh vedibarta 'eilav koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei ha'ibrim shalakh 'et 'ami veya'abduni. ki 'im ma'en 'atah leshaleiakh ve'odkha makhaziq bam. hineh yad ihoh hoyah bemiqnekha 'asher basadeh basusim bakhamorim bagemalim babaqar ubazon deber kabed me'od. vehiflah ihoh ben miqneh yisra'el uben miqneh mizrayim velo yamut mikal libnei yisra'el dabar. vayasem ihoh mo'ed leimor makhar ya'aseh ihoh hadabar hazeh ba'arez. vaya'as ihoh 'et hadabar hazeh mimakhorat vayamat kol miqneh mizrayim umimiqneh benei yisra'el lo met 'ekhad. vayishlakh par'oh vehineh lo met mimiqneh yisra'el 'ad 'ekhad vayikhbad leb par'oh velo shilakh 'et ha'am. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon qekhu lakhem melo khafeneikhem piakh kibshan uzeraqo mosheh hashamaymah le'einei far'oh. vehayah le'abaq 'al kal 'erez mizrayim vehayah 'al ha'adam ve'al habeheimah lishkhin poreiakh 'aba'bu'ot bekhal 'erez mizrayim. vayiqkhu 'et piakh hakibshan vaya'amdu lifnei far'oh vayizroq 'oto mosheh hashamayemah vayhi shekhin 'aba'bu'ot poreiakh ba'adam ubabeheimah. velo yakhelu hakhartumim la'amod lifnei mosheh mipenei hashekhin ki hayah hashekhin bakhartumim ubekhal mizrayim. vaykhazeq ihoh 'et leb par'oh velo shama' 'aleihem ka'asher diber ihoh 'el mosheh. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh hashkem baboqer vehityazeb lifnei far'oh ve'amarta 'eilav koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei ha'ibrim shalakh 'et 'ami veya'abduni. ki bapa'am hazot 'ani sholeiakh 'et kal mageifotai 'el libekha uba'abadekha ube'amekha ba'abur teida' ki 'en kamoni bekhal ha'arez. ki 'atah shalakhti 'et yadi va'akh 'otkha ve'et 'amekha badaber vatikakhed min ha'arez. ve'ulam ba'abur zot he'emadtikha ba'abur har'otekha 'et kokhi ulema'an saper shemi bekhal ha'arez. 'odkha mistolel be'ami lebilti shalekham. hini mamtir ka'et makhar barad kabed me'od 'asher lo hayah khamohu bemizrayim lemin hayom hivasedah ve'ad 'atah. ve'atah shelakh ha'ez 'et miqnekha ve'et kal 'asher lekha basadeh kal ha'adam vehabeheimah 'asher yimazei basadeh velo yei'asef habaytah veyarad 'aleihem habarad vameitu. hayarei 'et debar ihoh mei'abdei par'oh heinis 'et 'abadav ve'et miqneihu 'el habatim. va'asher lo sam libo 'el debar ihoh vaya'azob 'et 'abadav ve'et miqneihu basadeh. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh neteh 'et yadekha 'al hashamayim vihi barad bekhal 'erez mizrayim 'al ha'adam ve'al habeheimah ve'al kal 'eiseb hasadeh be'erez mizrayim. vayet mosheh 'et mateihu 'al hashamayim ihoh natan qolot ubarad vatihalakh 'esh 'arezah vayamter ihoh barad 'al 'erez mizrayim. vayhi barad ve'esh mitlaqakhat betokh habarad kabed me'od 'asher lo hayah khamohu bekhal 'erez mizrayim mei'az hayetah lego. vayakh habarad bekhal 'erez mizrayim 'et kal 'asher basadeh mei'adam ve'ad beheimah ve'et kal 'eiseb hasadeh hikah habarad ve'et kal 'ez hasadeh shiber. raq be'erez goshen 'asher sham benei yisra'el lo hayah barad. vayishlakh par'oh vayiqra lemosheh ule'aharon vayomer 'aleihem khatati hapa'am ihoh hazadiq va'ani ve'ami haresha'im. ha'tiru 'el ihoh verab mihyot qolot 'elohim ubarad va'ashalekhah 'etkhem velo tosifun la'amod. vayomer 'eilav mosheh kezeiti 'et ha'ir 'efros 'et kapai 'el ihoh haqolot yekhdalun vehabarad lo yihyeh 'od lema'an teida' ki ihoh ha'arez. ve'atah va'abadekha yada'ti ki terem tire'un mipenei ihoh 'elohim. vehapishtah vehase'orah nukatah ki hase'orah 'abib vehapishtah gib'ol. vehakhitah vehakusemet lo nuku ki 'afilot henah. vayeizei mosheh mei'im par'oh 'et ha'ir vayifros kapav 'el ihoh vayakhdelu haqolot vehabarad umatar lo nitakh 'arezah. vayar par'oh ki khadal hamatar vehabarad vehaqolot vayosef lakhato vayakhbed libo hu va'abadav. vayekhezaq leb par'oh velo shilakh 'et benei yisra'el ka'asher diber ihoh beyad mosheh. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh bo 'el par'oh ki 'ani hikhbadti 'et libo ve'et leb 'abadav lema'an shiti 'ototai 'eleh beqirbo. ulema'an tesaper be'azenei binkha uben binkha 'et 'asher hit'alalti bemizrayim ve'et 'ototai 'asher samti bam vida'tem ki 'ani ihoh. vayabo mosheh ve'aharon 'el par'oh vayomeru 'eilav koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei ha'ibrim 'ad matai mei'anta lei'anot mipanai shalakh 'ami veya'abduni. ki 'im ma'en 'atah leshaleiakh 'et 'ami hini meibi makhar 'arbeh bigbulekha. vekhisah 'et 'en ha'arez velo yukhal lir'ot 'et ha'arez ve'akhal 'et yeter hapeleitah hanish'eret lakhem min habarad ve'akhal 'et kal ha'ez hazomeiakh lakhem min hasadeh. umale'u batekha ubatei khal 'abadekha ubatei khal mizrayim 'asher lo ra'u 'abotekha va'abot 'abotekha miyom heyotam 'al ha'adamah 'ad hayom hazeh vayifen vayeizei mei'im par'oh. vayomeru 'abdei far'oh 'eilav 'ad matai yihyeh zeh lanu lemoqesh shalakh 'et ha'anashim veya'abdu 'et ihoh 'eloheihem haterem teida' ki 'abedah mizrayim. vayushab 'et mosheh ve'et 'aharon 'el par'oh vayomer 'aleihem lekhu 'ibdu 'et ihoh 'eloheikhem mi vami haholekhim. vayomer mosheh bin'areinu ubizqeineinu neilekh bebaneinu ubibnoteinu bezoneinu ubibqareinu neilekh ki khag ihoh lanu. vayomer 'aleihem yehi khen ihoh 'imakhem ka'asher 'ashalakh 'etkhem ve'et tapekhem re'u ki ra'ah neged peneikhem. lo khen lekhu na hagebarim ve'ibdu 'et ihoh ki 'otah 'atem mebaqshim vaygaresh 'otam mei'et penei far'oh. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh neteh yadekha 'al 'erez mizrayim ba'arbeh veya'al 'al 'erez mizrayim veyokhal 'et kal 'eiseb ha'arez 'et kal 'asher hish'ir habarad. vayet mosheh 'et mateihu 'al 'erez mizrayim ihoh nihag ruakh qadim ba'arez kal hayom hahu vekhal halayelah haboqer hayah veruakh haqadim nasa 'et ha'arbeh. vaya'al ha'arbeh 'al kal 'erez mizrayim vayanakh bekhol gebul mizrayim kabed me'od lefanav lo hayah khen 'arbeh kamohu ve'akharav lo yihyeh ken. vaykhas 'et 'en kal ha'arez vatekhshakh ha'arez vayokhal 'et kal 'eiseb ha'arez ve'et kal peri ha'ez 'asher hotir habarad velo notar kal yereq ba'ez ube'eiseb hasadeh bekhal 'erez mizrayim. vaymaher par'oh liqro lemosheh ule'aharon vayomer khatati ihoh 'eloheikhem velakhem. ve'atah sa na khatati 'akh hapa'am veha'tiru ihoh 'eloheikhem veyaser mei'alai raq 'et hamavet hazeh. vayeizei mei'im par'oh vaye'tar 'el ihoh. vayahafokh ihoh ruakh yam khazaq me'od vayisa 'et ha'arbeh vayitqa'eihu yamah suf lo nish'ar 'arbeh 'ekhad bekhol gebul mizrayim. vaykhazeq ihoh 'et leb par'oh velo shilakh 'et benei yisra'el. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh neteh yadekha 'al hashamayim vihi khoshekh 'al 'erez mizrayim veyamesh khoshekh. vayet mosheh 'et yado 'al hashamayim vayhi khoshekh 'afeilah bekhal 'erez mizrayim sheloshet yamim. lo ra'u 'ish 'et 'akhiv velo qamu 'ish mitakhtav sheloshet yamim ulekhal benei yisra'el hayah 'or bemoshebotam. vayiqra far'oh 'el mosheh vayomer lekhu 'ibdu 'et ihoh raq zonekhem ubeqarkhem yuzag gam tapekhem yeilekh 'imakhem. vayomer mosheh gam 'atah titen beyadeinu zebakhim ve'olot ve'asinu ihoh 'eloheinu. vegam miqneinu yeilekh 'imanu lo tisha'er parsah ki mimenu niqakh la'abod 'et ihoh 'eloheinu va'anakhnu lo neida' mah na'abod 'et ihoh 'ad bo'einu shamah. vaykhazeq ihoh 'et leb par'oh velo 'abah leshalekham. vayomer lo far'oh lekh mei'alai hishamer lekha 'el tosef re'ot panai ki beyom re'otekha fanai tamut. vayomer mosheh ken dibarta lo 'osif 'od re'ot panekha. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh 'od nega' 'ekhad 'abi 'al par'oh ve'al mizrayim 'akharei khen yeshalakh 'etkhem mizeh keshalekho kalah garesh yegaresh 'etkhem mizeh. daber na be'azenei ha'am veyish'alu 'ish mei'et rei'eihu ve'ishah mei'et re'utah kelei khesef ukhelei zahab. vayiten ihoh 'et khen ha'am be'einei mizrayim gam ha'ish mosheh gadol me'od be'erez mizrayim be'einei 'abdei far'oh ube'einei ha'am. vayomer mosheh koh 'amar ihoh kakhazot halaylah 'ani yozei betokh mizrayim. umet kal bekhor be'erez mizrayim mibekhor par'oh hayosheb 'al kis'o 'ad bekhor hashifkhah 'asher 'akhar hareikhayim vekhol bekhor beheimah. vehayetah ze'aqah gedolah bekhal 'erez mizrayim 'asher kamohu lo nihyatah vekhamohu lo tosif. ulekhol benei yisra'el lo yekheraz keleb leshono lemei'ish ve'ad beheimah lema'an teide'un 'asher yafleh ihoh ben mizrayim uben yisra'el. veyaredu khal 'abadekha 'eleh 'eilai vehishtakhavu li leimor zei 'atah vekhal ha'am 'asher beraglekha ve'akharei khen 'eizei vayeizei mei'im par'oh bakhori 'af. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh lo yishma' 'aleikhem par'oh lema'an rebot moftai be'erez mizrayim. umosheh ve'aharon 'asu 'et kal hamofetim ha'eleh lifnei far'oh vaykhazeq ihoh 'et leb par'oh velo shilakh 'et benei yisra'el mei'arzo. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon be'erez mizrayim leimor. hakhodesh hazeh lakhem rosh khodashim rishon hu lakhem lekhadeshei hashanah. daberu 'el kal 'adat yisra'el leimor be'asor lakhodesh hazeh veyiqkhu lahem 'ish seh lebet 'abot seh labayit. ve'im yim'at habayit mihyot miseh velaqakh hu ushekheino haqarob 'el beito bemikhsat nefashot 'ish lefi 'akhelo takhosu 'al haseh. seh tamim zakhar ben shanah yihyeh lakhem min hakebasim umin ha'izim tiqakhu. vehayah lakhem lemishmeret 'ad 'arba'ah 'asar yom lakhodesh hazeh veshakhatu 'oto kol qehal 'adat yisra'el ben ha'arbayim. velaqekhu min hadam venatenu 'al shetei hamezuzot ve'al hamashqof 'al habatim 'asher yokhelu 'oto bahem. ve'akhelu 'et habasar balaylah hazeh zeli 'esh umazot 'al merorim yokheluhu. 'al tokhelu mimenu na ubashel mebushal bamayim ki 'im zeli 'esh rosho 'al kera'av ve'al qirbo. velo totiru mimenu 'ad boqer vehanotar mimenu 'ad boqer ba'esh tisrofu. vekhakhah tokhelu 'oto mateneikhem khagurim na'aleikhem beragleikhem umaqelkhem beyedkhem va'akhaltem 'oto bekhipazon pesakh hu ihoh. ve'abarti be'erez mizrayim balaylah hazeh vehikeiti khal bekhor be'erez mizrayim mei'adam ve'ad beheimah ubekhal 'elohei mizrayim 'e'eseh shefatim 'ani ihoh. vehayah hadam lakhem le'ot 'al habatim 'asher 'atem sham vera'iti 'et hadam ufasakhti 'aleikhem velo yihyeh bakhem negef lemashkhit behakoti be'erez mizrayim. vehayah hayom hazeh lakhem lezikaron vekhagotem 'oto khag ihoh ledoroteikhem khuqat 'olam tekhaguhu. shib'at yamim mazot tokheilu 'akh bayom harishon tashbitu se'or mibateikhem ki kal 'okhel khamez venikhretah hanefesh hahiv miyisra'el miyom harishon 'ad yom hashebi'i. ubayom harishon miqra qodesh ubayom hashebi'i miqra qodesh yihyeh lakhem kal melakhah lo yei'aseh bahem 'akh 'asher yei'akhel lekhal nefesh hu lebado yei'aseh lakhem. ushemartem 'et hamazot ki be'ezem hayom hazeh hozeiti 'et zib'oteikhem mei'erez mizrayim ushemartem 'et hayom hazeh ledoroteikhem khuqat 'olam. barishon be'arba'ah 'asar yom lakhodesh ba'ereb tokhelu mazot 'ad yom ha'ekhad ve'esrim lakhodesh ba'areb. shib'at yamim se'or lo yimazei bebateikhem ki kal 'okhel makhmezet venikhretah hanefesh hahiv mei'adat yisra'el bager ube'ezrakh ha'arez. kal makhmezet lo tokheilu bekhol mosheboteikhem tokhelu mazot. vayiqra mosheh lekhal ziqnei yisra'el vayomer 'aleihem mishkhu uqekhu lakhem zon lemishpekhoteikhem veshakhatu hapasakh. uleqakhtem 'agudat 'eizob utebaltem badam 'asher basaf vehiga'tem 'el hamashqof ve'el shetei hamezuzot min hadam 'asher basaf ve'atem lo teize'u 'ish mipetakh beito 'ad boqer. ve'abar ihoh lingof 'et mizrayim vera'ah 'et hadam 'al hamashqof ve'al shetei hamezuzot ufasakh ihoh 'al hapetakh velo yiten hamashkhit labo 'el bateikhem lingof. ushemartem 'et hadabar hazeh lekhaq lekha ulebanekha 'ad 'olam. vehayah ki tabo'u 'el ha'arez 'asher yiten ihoh lakhem ka'asher diber ushemartem 'et ha'abodah hazot. vehayah ki yomeru 'aleikhem beneikhem mah ha'abodah hazot lakhem. va'amartem zebakh pesakh hu ihoh 'asher pasakh 'al batei benei yisra'el bemizrayim benagepo 'et mizrayim ve'et bateinu hizil vayiqod ha'am vayishtakhavu. vayeilekhu vaya'asu benei yisra'el ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh ve'aharon ken 'asu. vayhi bakhazi halaylah ihoh hikah khal bekhor be'erez mizrayim mibekhor par'oh hayosheb 'al kis'o 'ad bekhor hashebi 'asher bebet habor vekhol bekhor beheimah. vayaqam par'oh laylah hu vekhal 'abadav vekhal mizrayim vatehi ze'aqah gedolah bemizrayim ki 'en bayit 'asher 'en sham met. vayiqra lemosheh ule'aharon laylah vayomer qumu ze'u mitokh 'ami gam 'atem gam benei yisra'el ulekhu 'ibdu 'et ihoh kedaberkhem. gam zonekhem gam beqarkhem qekhu ka'asher dibartem valeikhu ubeirakhtem gam 'oti. vatekhezaq mizrayim 'al ha'am lemaher leshalekham min ha'arez ki 'ameru kulanu meitim. vayisa ha'am 'et bezeiqo terem yekhmaz mish'arotam zerurot besimlotam 'al shikhmam. ubenei yisra'el 'asu kidbar mosheh vayish'alu mimizrayim kelei khesef ukhelei zahab usemalot. ihoh natan 'et khen ha'am be'einei mizrayim vayash'ilum vaynazelu 'et mizrayim. vayis'u benei yisra'el meira'meses sukotah keshesh mei'ot 'elef ragli hagebarim lebad mitaf. vegam 'eireb rab 'alah 'itam vezon ubaqar miqneh kabed me'od. vayofu 'et habazeq 'asher hozi'u mimizrayim 'ugot mazot ki lo khamez ki goreshu mimizrayim velo yakhelu lehitmahmeiah vegam zeidah lo 'asu lahem. umoshab benei yisra'el 'asher yashebu bemizrayim sheloshim shanah ve'arba' mei'ot shanah. vayhi miqez sheloshim shanah ve'arba' mei'ot shanah vayhi be'ezem hayom hazeh yaze'u kal zib'ot ihoh mei'erez mizrayim. lel shimurim hu ihoh lehozi'am mei'erez mizrayim hu halaylah hazeh ihoh shimurim lekhal benei yisra'el ledorotam. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh ve'aharon zot khuqat hapasakh kal ben neikhar lo yokhal bo. vekhal 'ebed 'ish miqnat kasef umaltah 'oto 'az yokhal bo. toshab vesakhir lo yokhal bo. bebayit 'ekhad yei'akhel lo tozi min habayit min habasar khuzah ve'ezem lo tishberu bo. kal 'adat yisra'el ya'asu 'oto. vekhi yagur 'itekha ger ve'asah fesakh ihoh himol lo khal zakhar ve'az yiqrab la'asoto vehayah ke'ezrakh ha'arez vekhal 'arel lo yokhal bo. torah 'akhat yihyeh la'ezrakh velager hagar betokhkhem. vaya'asu kal benei yisra'el ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh ve'et 'aharon ken 'asu. vayhi be'ezem hayom hazeh hozi ihoh 'et benei yisra'el mei'erez mizrayim 'al zib'otam. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. qadesh li khal bekhor peter kal rekhem bibnei yisra'el ba'adam ubabeheimah li hu. vayomer mosheh 'el ha'am zakhor 'et hayom hazeh 'asher yezatem mimizrayim mibet 'abadim ki bekhozeq yad hozi ihoh 'etkhem mizeh velo yei'akhel khamez. hayom 'atem yoze'im bekhodesh ha'abib. vehayah khi yebi'akha ihoh 'el 'erez hakena'ani vehakhiti veha'emori vehakhivi vehaybusi 'asher nishba' la'abotekha latet lakh 'erez zabat khalab udebash ve'abadta 'et ha'abodah hazot bakhodesh hazeh. shib'at yamim tokhal mazot ubayom hashebi'i khag ihoh. mazot yei'akhel 'et shib'at hayamim velo yeira'eh lekha khamez velo yeira'eh lekha se'or bekhal gebulekha. vehigadta lebinkha bayom hahu leimor ba'abur zeh 'asah ihoh li bezeiti mimizrayim. vehayah lekha le'ot 'al yadekha ulezikaron ben 'einekha lema'an tihyeh torat ihoh befikha ki beyad khazaqah hozi'akha ihoh mimizrayim. veshamarta 'et hakhuqah hazot lemo'adah miyamim yamimah. vehayah ki yebi'akha ihoh 'el 'erez hakena'ani ka'asher nishba' lekha vela'abotekha unetanah lakh. veha'abarta khal peter rekhem ihoh vekhal peter sheger beheimah 'asher yihyeh lekha hazekharim ihoh. vekhal peter khamor tifdeh beseh ve'im lo tifdeh va'arafto vekhol bekhor 'adam bebanekha tifdeh. vehayah ki yish'alekha binkha makhar leimor mah zot ve'amarta 'eilav bekhozeq yad hozi'anu ihoh mimizrayim mibet 'abadim. vayhi ki hiqshah far'oh leshalekheinu vayaharog ihoh kal bekhor be'erez mizrayim mibekhor 'adam ve'ad bekhor beheimah 'al ken 'ani zobeiakh ihoh kal peter rekhem hazekharim vekhal bekhor banai 'efdeh. vehayah le'ot 'al yadekhah uletotafot ben 'einekha ki bekhozeq yad hozi'anu ihoh mimizrayim. vayhi beshalakh par'oh 'et ha'am velo nakham 'elohim derekh 'erez pelishtim ki qarob hu ki 'amar 'elohim pen yinakhem ha'am bir'otam milkhamah veshabu mizrayemah. vayaseb 'elohim 'et ha'am derekh hamidbar yam suf vakhamushim 'alu benei yisra'el mei'erez mizrayim. vayiqakh mosheh 'et 'azmot yosef 'imo ki hashbeia' hishbia' 'et benei yisra'el leimor paqod yifqod 'elohim 'etkhem veha'alitem 'et 'azmotai mizeh 'itekhem. vayis'u misukot vayakhanu be'eitam biqzeh hamidbar. ihoh holekh lifneihem yomam be'amud 'anan lankhotam haderekh velaylah be'amud 'esh leha'ir lahem lalekhet yomam valayelah. lo yamish 'amud he'anan yomam ve'amud ha'esh layelah lifnei ha'am. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. daber 'el benei yisra'el veyashubu veyakhanu lifnei pi hakhirot ben migdol uben hayam lifnei ba'al zefon nikhkho takhanu 'al hayam. ve'amar par'oh libnei yisra'el nebukhim hem ba'arez sagar 'aleihem hamidbar. vekhizaqti 'et leb par'oh veradaf 'akhareihem ve'ikabedah befar'oh ubekhal kheilo veyade'u mizrayim ki 'ani ihoh vaya'asu khen. vayugad lemelekh mizrayim ki barakh ha'am vayeihafekh lebab par'oh va'abadav 'el ha'am vayomru mah zot 'asinu ki shilakhnu 'et yisra'el mei'abedeinu. vaye'sor 'et rikhbo ve'et 'amo laqakh 'imo. vayiqakh shesh mei'ot rekheb bakhur vekhol rekheb mizrayim veshalishim 'al kulo. vaykhazeq ihoh 'et leb par'oh melekh mizrayim vayirdof 'akharei benei yisra'el ubenei yisra'el yoze'im beyad ramah. vayirdefu mizrayim 'akhareihem vayasigu 'otam khonim 'al hayam kal sus rekheb par'oh ufarashav vekheilo 'al pi hakhirot lifnei ba'al zefon. ufar'oh hiqrib vayis'u benei yisra'el 'et 'eineihem vehineh mizrayim noseia' 'akhareihem vayire'u me'od vayiz'aqu benei yisra'el 'el ihoh. vayomeru 'el mosheh hamibeli 'en qebarim bemizrayim leqakhtanu lamut bamidbar mah zot 'asita lanu lehozi'anu mimizrayim. halo zeh hadabar 'asher dibarnu 'eilekha bemizrayim leimor khadal mimenu vena'abdah 'et mizrayim ki tob lanu 'abod 'et mizrayim mimuteinu bamidbar. vayomer mosheh 'el ha'am 'al tira'u hityazbu ure'u 'et yeshu'at ihoh 'asher ya'aseh lakhem hayom ki 'asher re'item 'et mizrayim hayom lo tosifu lir'otam 'od 'ad 'olam. ihoh yilakhem lakhem ve'atem takharishun. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh mah tiz'aq 'eilai daber 'el benei yisra'el veyisa'u. ve'atah harem 'et matekha uneteh 'et yadekha 'al hayam ubeqa'eihu veyabo'u benei yisra'el betokh hayam bayabashah. va'ani hini mekhazeq 'et leb mizrayim veyabo'u 'akhareihem ve'ikabedah befar'oh ubekhal kheilo berikhbo ubefarashav. veyade'u mizrayim ki 'ani ihoh behikabedi befar'oh berikhbo ubefarashav. vayisa' mal'akh ha'elohim haholekh lifnei makhaneh yisra'el vayeilekh mei'akhareihem vayisa' 'amud he'anan mipeneihem vaya'amod mei'akhareihem. vayabo ben makhaneh mizrayim uben makhaneh yisra'el vayhi he'anan vehakhoshekh vaya'er 'et halayelah velo qarab zeh 'el zeh kal halayelah. vayet mosheh 'et yado 'al hayam vayolekh ihoh 'et hayam beruakh qadim 'azah kal halaylah vayasem 'et hayam lekharabah vayibaqe'u hamayim. vayabo'u benei yisra'el betokh hayam bayabashah vehamayim lahem khomah miminam umisemolam. vayirdefu mizrayim vayabo'u 'akhareihem kol sus par'oh rikhbo ufarashav 'el tokh hayam. vayhi be'ashmoret haboqer vayashqef ihoh 'el makhaneh mizrayim be'amud 'esh ve'anan vayaham 'et makhaneh mizrayim. vayasar 'et 'ofan markebotav vaynahageihu bikhbeidut vayomer mizrayim 'anusah mipenei yisra'el ki ihoh nilkham lahem bemizrayim vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh neteh 'et yadekha 'al hayam veyashubu hamayim 'al mizrayim 'al rikhbo ve'al parashav. vayet mosheh 'et yado 'al hayam vayashab hayam lifnot boqer le'eitano umizrayim nasim liqrato vayna'er ihoh 'et mizrayim betokh hayam. vayashubu hamayim vaykhasu 'et harekheb ve'et haparashim lekhol khel par'oh haba'im 'akhareihem bayam lo nish'ar bahem 'ad 'ekhad. ubenei yisra'el halekhu bayabashah betokh hayam vehamayim lahem khomah miminam umisemolam vayosha' ihoh bayom hahu 'et yisra'el miyad mizrayim vayar yisra'el 'et mizrayim met 'al sefat hayam. vayar yisra'el 'et hayad hagedolah 'asher 'asah ihoh bemizrayim vayire'u ha'am 'et ihoh vaya'aminu ihoh ubemosheh 'abdo. 'az yashir mosheh ubenei yisra'el 'et hashirah hazot ihoh vayomeru leimor 'ashirah ihoh ki ga'oh ga'ah sus verokhebo ramah bayam. 'azi vezimrat yah vayhi li lishu'ah zeh 'eili ve'anveihu 'elohei 'abi va'aromemenhu. ihoh 'ish milkhamah ihoh shemo. markebot par'oh vekheilo yarah bayam umibkhar shalishav tube'u beyam suf. tehomot yekhasyumu yaredu bimzolot kemo 'aben. yeminekha ihoh ne'dari bakoakh yeminekha ihoh tir'az 'oyeb. uberob ge'onkha taharos qamekha teshalakh kharonekha yokheleimo kaqash. uberuakh 'apekha ne'ermu mayim nizebu khemo ned nozelim qafe'u tehomot beleb yam. 'amar 'oyeb 'erdof 'asig 'akhaleq shalal timla'eimo nafshi 'ariq kharbi torisheimo yadi. nashafta berukhakha kisamo yam zalalu ka'oferet bemayim 'adirim. mi khamokhah ba'eilim ihoh mi kamokhah ne'dar baqodesh nora tehilot 'oseh fele. natita yeminekha tibla'eimo 'arez. nakhita bekhasdekha 'am zu ga'aleta neihalta be'azekha 'el neveh qadshekha shame'u 'amim yirgazun khil 'akhaz yoshebei pelashet. 'az nibhalu 'alufei 'edom 'eilei mo'ab yokhazeimo ra'ad namogu kol yoshebei khena'an. tipol 'aleihem 'eimatah vafakhad bigdol zero'akha yidemu ka'aben 'ad ya'abor 'amekha ihoh 'ad ya'abor 'am zu qanita. tebi'eimo vetita'eimo behar nakhalatekha makhon leshibtekha pa'alta ihoh miqedash 'adonai konu yadekha. ihoh yimlokh le'olam va'ed. ki ba sus par'oh berikhbo ubefarashav bayam vayasheb ihoh 'aleihem 'et mei hayam ubenei yisra'el halekhu bayabashah betokh hayam. vatiqakh miryam hanebi'ah 'akhot 'aharon 'et hatof beyadah vateizena khal hanashim 'akhareha betupim ubimkholot. vata'an lahem miryam shiru ihoh ki ga'oh ga'ah sus verokhebo ramah bayam. vayasa' mosheh 'et yisra'el miyam suf vayeize'u 'el midbar shur vayeilekhu sheloshet yamim bamidbar velo maze'u mayim. vayabo'u maratah velo yakhelu lishtot mayim mimarah ki marim hem 'al ken qara shemah marah. vayilonu ha'am 'al mosheh leimor mah nishteh. vayiz'aq 'el ihoh vayoreihu ihoh 'ez vayashlekh 'el hamayim vayimtequ hamayim sham sam lo khoq umishpat vesham nisahu. vayomer 'im shamoa' tishma' leqol ihoh 'elohekha vehayashar be'einav ta'aseh veha'azanta lemizvotav veshamarta kal khuqav kal hamakhalah 'asher samti bemizrayim lo 'asim 'alekha ki 'ani ihoh rofe'ekha. vayabo'u 'eilimah vesham shetem 'esreh 'einot mayim veshib'im temarim vayakhanu sham 'al hamayim. vayis'u mei'eilim vayabo'u kal 'adat benei yisra'el 'el midbar sin 'asher ben 'eilim uben sinai bakhamishah 'asar yom lakhodesh hasheini lezeitam mei'erez mizrayim. vayilinu vayilonu kal 'adat benei yisra'el 'al mosheh ve'al 'aharon bamidbar. vayomeru 'aleihem benei yisra'el mi yiten muteinu beyad ihoh be'erez mizrayim beshibteinu 'al sir habasar be'akheleinu lekhem lasoba' ki hozeitem 'otanu 'el hamidbar hazeh lehamit 'et kal haqahal hazeh bara'ab. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh hini mamtir lakhem lekhem min hashamayim veyaza ha'am velaqetu debar yom beyomo lema'an 'anasenu hayeilekh betorati 'im lo. vehayah bayom hashishi veheikhinu 'et 'asher yabi'u vehayah mishneh 'al 'asher yilqetu yom yom. vayomer mosheh ve'aharon 'el kal benei yisra'el 'ereb vida'tem ki ihoh hozi 'etkhem mei'erez mizrayim. uboqer ure'item 'et kebod ihoh beshame'o 'et telunoteikhem 'al ihoh venakhnu mah ki talonu talinu 'aleinu. vayomer mosheh betet ihoh lakhem ba'ereb basar le'ekhol velekhem baboqer lisboa' bishmoa' ihoh 'et telunoteikhem 'asher 'atem malinim 'alav venakhnu mah lo 'aleinu telunoteikhem ki 'al ihoh. vayomer mosheh 'el 'aharon 'emor 'el kal 'adat benei yisra'el qirbu lifnei ihoh ki shama' 'et telunoteikhem. vayhi kedaber 'aharon 'el kal 'adat benei yisra'el vayifnu 'el hamidbar vehineh kebod ihoh nir'ah be'anan. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. shama'ti 'et telunot benei yisra'el daber 'aleihem leimor ben ha'arbayim tokhelu basar ubaboqer tisbe'u lakhem vida'tem ki 'ani ihoh 'eloheikhem. vayhi ba'ereb vata'al haselav vatekhas 'et hamakhaneh ubaboqer hayetah shikhbat hatal sabib lamakhaneh. vata'al shikhbat hatal vehineh 'al penei hamidbar daq mekhuspas daq kakefor 'al ha'arez. vayir'u benei yisra'el vayomeru 'ish 'el 'akhiv man hu ki lo yade'u mah hu vayomer mosheh 'aleihem hu halekhem 'asher natan ihoh lakhem le'akhlah zeh hadabar 'asher zivah ihoh liqtu mimenu 'ish lefi 'akhelo 'omer lagulgolet mispar nafshoteikhem 'ish la'asher be'aholo tiqakhu. vaya'asu khen benei yisra'el vayilqetu hamarbeh vehamam'it. vayamodu ba'omer velo he'dif hamarbeh vehamam'it lo hekhsir 'ish lefi 'akhelo laqatu. vayomer mosheh 'aleihem 'ish 'al yoter mimenu 'ad boqer. velo shame'u 'el mosheh vayotiru 'anashim mimenu 'ad boqer vayarum tola'im vayib'ash vayiqzof 'aleihem mosheh. vayilqetu 'oto baboqer baboqer 'ish kefi 'akhelo vekham hashemesh venamas. vayhi bayom hashishi laqetu lekhem mishneh shenei ha'omer la'ekhad vayabo'u kal nesi'ei ha'eidah vayagidu lemosheh. vayomer 'aleihem hu 'asher diber ihoh shabaton shabat qodesh ihoh makhar 'et 'asher tofu 'eifu ve'et 'asher tebashelu basheilu ve'et kal ha'odef hanikhu lakhem lemishmeret 'ad haboqer. vayanikhu 'oto 'ad haboqer ka'asher zivah mosheh velo hib'ish verimah lo hayetah bo. vayomer mosheh 'ikhluhu hayom ki shabat hayom ihoh hayom lo timza'uhu basadeh. sheishet yamim tilqetuhu ubayom hashebi'i shabat lo yihyeh bo. vayhi bayom hashebi'i yaze'u min ha'am lilqot velo maza'u. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh 'ad 'anah mei'antem lishmor mizvotai vetorotai. re'u ki ihoh natan lakhem hashabat 'al ken hu noten lakhem bayom hashishi lekhem yomayim shebu 'ish takhtav 'al yeizei 'ish mimeqomo bayom hashebi'i. vayishbetu ha'am bayom hashebi'i. vayiqre'u bet yisra'el 'et shemo man vehu kezera' gad laban veta'mo kezapikhit bidbash. vayomer mosheh zeh hadabar 'asher zivah ihoh melo ha'omer mimenu lemishmeret ledoroteikhem lema'an yir'u 'et halekhem 'asher he'ekhalti 'etkhem bamidbar behozi'i 'etkhem mei'erez mizrayim. vayomer mosheh 'el 'aharon qakh zinzenet 'akhat veten shamah melo ha'omer man vehanakh 'oto lifnei ihoh lemishmeret ledoroteikhem. ka'asher zivah ihoh 'el mosheh vayanikheihu 'aharon lifnei ha'eidut lemishmaret. ubenei yisra'el 'akhelu 'et haman 'arba'im shanah 'ad bo'am 'el 'erez noshabet 'et haman 'akhelu 'ad bo'am 'el qezeh 'erez kena'an. veha'omer 'asirit ha'eifah hu. vayis'u kal 'adat benei yisra'el mimidbar sin lemas'eihem 'al pi ihoh vayakhanu birfidim ve'en mayim lishtot ha'am. vayareb ha'am 'im mosheh vayomeru tenu lanu mayim venishteh vayomer lahem mosheh mah teribun 'imadi mah tenasun 'et ihoh. vayizma sham ha'am lamayim vayalen ha'am 'al mosheh vayomer lamah zeh he'elitanu mimizrayim lehamit 'oti ve'et banai ve'et miqnai bazama. vayiz'aq mosheh 'el ihoh leimor mah 'e'eseh la'am hazeh 'od me'at useqaluni. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh 'abor lifnei ha'am veqakh 'itekha miziqnei yisra'el umatekha 'asher hikita bo 'et hai'or qakh beyadekha vehalakheta. hini 'omed lefanekha sham 'al hazur bekhoreb vehikita bazur veyaze'u mimenu mayim veshatah ha'am vaya'as ken mosheh le'einei ziqnei yisra'el. vayiqra shem hamaqom masah umeribah 'al rib benei yisra'el ve'al nasotam 'et ihoh leimor hayesh ihoh beqirbeinu 'im 'ayin. vayabo 'amaleq vayilakhem 'im yisra'el birfidim. vayomer mosheh 'el yehoshua' bekhar lanu 'anashim vezei hilakhem ba'amaleq makhar 'anokhi nizab 'al rosh hagib'ah umateh ha'elohim beyadi. vaya'as yehoshua' ka'asher 'amar lo mosheh lehilakhem ba'amaleq umosheh 'aharon vekhur 'alu rosh hagib'ah. vehayah ka'asher yarim mosheh yado vegabar yisra'el vekha'asher yaniakh yado vegabar 'amaleq. videi mosheh kebeidim vayiqkhu 'eben vayasimu takhtav vayeisheb 'aleha ve'aharon vekhur tamekhu beyadav mizeh 'ekhad umizeh 'ekhad vayhi yadav 'emunah 'ad bo hashamesh. vayakhalosh yehoshua' 'et 'amaleq ve'et 'amo lefi khareb. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh ketob zot zikaron baseifer vesim be'azenei yehoshua' ki makhoh 'emkheh 'et zeikher 'amaleq mitakhat hashamayim. vayiben mosheh mizbeiakh vayiqra shemo ihoh nisi. vayomer ki yad 'al kes yah milkhamah ihoh ba'amaleq midor dor. vayishma' yitro khohen midyan khoten mosheh 'et kal 'asher 'asah 'elohim lemosheh uleyisra'el 'amo ki hozi ihoh 'et yisra'el mimizrayim. vayiqakh yitro khoten mosheh 'et ziporah 'eishet mosheh 'akhar shilukheha. ve'et shenei baneha 'asher shem ha'ekhad geireshom ki 'amar ger hayiti be'erez nakheriyah. veshem ha'ekhad 'eli'ezer ki 'elohei 'abi be'ezri vayazileini meikhereb par'oh. vayabo yitro khoten mosheh ubanav ve'ishto 'el mosheh 'el hamidbar 'asher hu khoneh sham har ha'elohim. vayomer 'el mosheh 'ani khotenkha yitro ba 'eilekha ve'ishtekha ushenei baneha 'imah. vayeizei mosheh liqrat khoteno vayishtakhu vayishaq lo vayish'alu 'ish lerei'eihu leshalom vayabo'u ha'ohelah. vaysaper mosheh lekhoteno 'et kal 'asher 'asah ihoh lefar'oh ulemizrayim 'al 'odot yisra'el 'et kal hatela'ah 'asher meza'atam baderekh vayazilem ihoh. vayikhad yitro 'al kal hatobah 'asher 'asah ihoh leyisra'el 'asher hizilo miyad mizrayim. vayomer yitro barukh ihoh 'asher hizil 'etkhem miyad mizrayim umiyad par'oh 'asher hizil 'et ha'am mitakhat yad mizrayim. 'atah yada'ti ki gadol ihoh mikal ha'elohim ki badabar 'asher zadu 'aleihem. vayiqakh yitro khoten mosheh 'olah uzebakhim leilohim vayabo 'aharon vekhol ziqnei yisra'el le'ekhal lekhem 'im khoten mosheh lifnei ha'elohim. vayhi mimakhorat vayeisheb mosheh lishpot 'et ha'am vaya'amod ha'am 'al mosheh min haboqer 'ad ha'areb. vayar khoten mosheh 'et kal 'asher hu 'oseh la'am vayomer mah hadabar hazeh 'asher 'atah 'oseh la'am madua' 'atah yosheb lebadekha vekhal ha'am nizab 'alekha min boqer 'ad 'areb. vayomer mosheh lekhoteno ki yabo 'eilai ha'am lidrosh 'elohim. ki yihyeh lahem dabar ba 'eilai veshafati ben 'ish uben rei'eihu vehoda'ti 'et khuqei ha'elohim ve'et torotav. vayomer khoten mosheh 'eilav lo tob hadabar 'asher 'atah 'oseh. nabol tibol gam 'atah gam ha'am hazeh 'asher 'imakh ki khabed mimekha hadabar lo tukhal 'asohu lebadekha. 'atah shema' beqoli 'i'azekha vihi 'elohim 'imakh heyeh 'atah la'am mul ha'elohim veheibeita 'atah 'et hadebarim 'el ha'elohim. vehizhartah 'ethem 'et hakhuqim ve'et hatorot vehoda'ta lahem 'et haderekh yeilekhu bah ve'et hama'aseh 'asher ya'asun. ve'atah tekhezeh mikal ha'am 'anshei khayil yir'ei 'elohim 'anshei 'emet sone'ei baza' vesamta 'aleihem sarei 'alafim sarei mei'ot sarei khamishim vesarei 'asarot. veshafetu 'et ha'am bekhal 'et vehayah kal hadabar hagadol yabi'u 'eilekha vekhal hadabar haqaton yishpetu hem vehaqel mei'alekha venase'u 'itakh. 'im 'et hadabar hazeh ta'aseh vezivekha 'elohim veyakhaleta 'amod vegam kal ha'am hazeh 'al meqomo yabo beshalom. vayishma' mosheh leqol khoteno vaya'as kol 'asher 'amar. vayibkhar mosheh 'anshei khayil mikal yisra'el vayiten 'otam rashim 'al ha'am sarei 'alafim sarei mei'ot sarei khamishim vesarei 'asarot. veshafetu 'et ha'am bekhal 'et 'et hadabar haqasheh yebi'un 'el mosheh vekhal hadabar haqaton yishputu hem. vayshalakh mosheh 'et khoteno vayeilekh lo 'el 'arzo. bakhodesh hashelishi lezet benei yisra'el mei'erez mizrayim bayom hazeh ba'u midbar sinai. vayis'u meirefidim vayabo'u midbar sinai vayakhanu bamidbar vayikhan sham yisra'el neged hahar. umosheh 'alah 'el ha'elohim vayiqra 'eilav ihoh min hahar leimor koh tomar lebet ya'aqob vetaged libnei yisra'el. 'atem re'item 'asher 'asiti lemizrayim va'esa 'etkhem 'al kanfei nesharim va'abi 'etkhem 'eilai. ve'atah 'im shamoa' tishme'u beqoli ushemartem 'et beriti vihyitem li segulah mikal ha'amim ki li kal ha'arez. ve'atem tihyu li mamlekhet kohanim vego qadosh 'eleh hadebarim 'asher tedaber 'el benei yisra'el. vayabo mosheh vayiqra leziqnei ha'am vayasem lifneihem 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh 'asher zivahu ihoh. vaya'anu khal ha'am yakhdav vayomeru kol 'asher diber ihoh na'aseh vayasheb mosheh 'et dibrei ha'am 'el ihoh. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh hineh 'anokhi ba 'eilekha be'ab he'anan ba'abur yishma' ha'am bedaberi 'imakh vegam bekha ya'aminu le'olam vayaged mosheh 'et dibrei ha'am 'el ihoh. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh lekh 'el ha'am veqidashtam hayom umakhar vekhibesu simlotam. vehayu nekhonim layom hashelishi ki bayom hashelishi yeired ihoh le'einei khal ha'am 'al har sinai. vehigbalta 'et ha'am sabib leimor hishameru lakhem 'alot bahar unegoa' beqazeihu kal hanogeia' bahar mot yumat. lo tiga' bo yad ki saqol yisaqel 'o yaroh yiyareh 'im beheimah 'im 'ish lo yikhyeh bimshokh hayobel hemah ya'alu bahar. vayeired mosheh min hahar 'el ha'am vayqadesh 'et ha'am vaykhabesu simlotam. vayomer 'el ha'am heyu nekhonim lishloshet yamim 'al tigeshu 'el 'ishah. vayhi bayom hashelishi bihyot haboqer vayhi qolot uberaqim ve'anan kabed 'al hahar veqol shofar khazaq me'od vayekherad kal ha'am 'asher bamakhaneh. vayozei mosheh 'et ha'am liqrat ha'elohim min hamakhaneh vayityazebu betakhtit hahar. vehar sinai 'ashan kulo mipenei 'asher yarad 'alav ihoh ba'esh vaya'al 'ashano ke'eshen hakibshan vayekherad kal hahar me'od. vayhi qol hashofar holekh vekhazeq me'od mosheh yedaber veha'elohim ya'anenu beqol. vayeired ihoh 'al har sinai 'el rosh hahar vayiqra ihoh lemosheh 'el rosh hahar vaya'al mosheh. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh red ha'ed ba'am pen yehersu 'el ihoh lir'ot venafal mimenu rab. vegam hakohanim hanigashim 'el ihoh yitqadashu pen yifroz bahem ihoh. vayomer mosheh 'el ihoh lo yukhal ha'am la'alot 'el har sinai ki 'atah ha'eidotah banu leimor hagbel 'et hahar veqidashto. vayomer 'eilav ihoh lekh red ve'alita 'atah ve'aharon 'imakh vehakohanim veha'am 'al yehersu la'alot 'el ihoh pen yifraz bam. vayeired mosheh 'el ha'am vayomer 'aleihem. vaydaber 'elohim 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh leimor. 'anokhi ihoh 'elohekha 'asher hozeitikha mei'erez mizrayim mibet 'abadim. lo yihyeh lekha 'elohim 'akheirim 'al panaya lo ta'aseh lekha fesel vekhal temunah 'asher bashamayim mima'al va'asher ba'arez mitakhat va'asher bamayim mitakhat la'arez lo tishtakhveh lahem velo ta'abedem ki 'anokhi ihoh 'elohekha 'el qana poqed 'avon 'abot 'al banim 'al shileishim ve'al ribei'im lesone'ai. ve'oseh khesed la'alafim le'ohabai uleshomerei mizvotai. lo tisa 'et shem ihoh 'elohekha lashav ki lo yenaqeh ihoh 'et 'asher yisa 'et shemo lashav. zakhor 'et yom hashabat leqadesho sheishet yamim ta'abod ve'asita kal melakhtekha veyom hashebi'i shabat ihoh 'elohekha lo ta'aseh khal melakhah 'atah ubinkha ubitekha 'abdekha va'amatekha ubehemtekha vegeirekha 'asher bish'arekha ki sheishet yamim 'asah ihoh 'et hashamayim ve'et ha'arez 'et hayam ve'et kal 'asher bam vayanakh bayom hashebi'i 'al ken beirakh ihoh 'et yom hashabat vayqadesheihu. kabed 'et 'abikha ve'et 'imekha lema'an ya'arikhun yamekha 'al ha'adamah 'asher ihoh 'elohekha noten lakh. lo trezakh. lo tne'af. lo tgenob. lo ta'aneh berei'akha 'ed shaqer. lo takhmod bet rei'ekha lo takhmod 'eishet rei'ekha ve'abdo va'amato veshoro vakhamoro vekhol 'asher lerei'ekha. vekhal ha'am ro'im 'et haqolot ve'et halapidim ve'et qol hashofar ve'et hahar 'ashen vayar ha'am vayanu'u vaya'amdu meirakhoq. vayomeru 'el mosheh daber 'atah 'imanu venishma'ah ve'al yedaber 'imanu 'elohim pen namut. vayomer mosheh 'el ha'am 'al tira'u ki leba'abur nasot 'etkhem ba ha'elohim uba'abur tihyeh yir'ato 'al peneikhem lebilti tekheta'u. vaya'amod ha'am meirakhoq umosheh nigash 'el ha'arafel 'asher sham ha'elohim. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh koh tomar 'el benei yisra'el 'atem re'item ki min hashamayim dibarti 'imakhem. lo ta'asun 'iti 'elohei khesef veilohei zahab lo ta'asu lakhem. mizbakh 'adamah ta'aseh li vezabakhta 'alav 'et 'olotekha ve'et shelamekha 'et zonekha ve'et beqarekha bekhal hamaqom 'asher 'azkir 'et shemi 'abo 'eilekha ubeirakhtikha. ve'im mizbakh 'abanim ta'aseh li lo tibneh 'ethen gazit ki kharbekha heinafta 'aleha vatekhaleha. velo ta'aleh bema'alot 'al mizbekhi 'asher lo tigaleh 'ervatekha 'alav. ve'eleh hamishpatim 'asher tasim lifneihem. ki tiqneh 'ebed 'ibri shesh shanim ya'abod ubashebi'it yeizei lakhafeshi khinam. 'im begapo yabo begapo yeizei 'im ba'al 'ishah hu veyaze'ah 'ishto 'imo. 'im 'adonav yiten lo 'ishah veyaledah lo banim 'o banot ha'ishah viladeha tihyeh ladoneha vehu yeizei begapo. ve'im 'amor yomar ha'ebed 'ahabti 'et 'adoni 'et 'ishti ve'et banai lo 'eizei khafeshi. vehigisho 'adonav 'el ha'elohim vehigisho 'el hadelet 'o 'el hamezuzah veraza' 'adonav 'et 'azeno bamarzeia' va'abado le'olam. vekhi yimkor 'ish 'et bito le'amah lo teizei kezet ha'abadim. 'im ra'ah be'einei 'adoneha 'asher lo lo ye'adah vehefdah le'am nakheri lo yimshol lemakherah bebigdo bah. ve'im libno yi'adenah kemishpat habanot ya'aseh lah. 'im 'akheret yiqakh lo she'eirah kesutah ve'onatah lo yigra'. ve'im shelash 'eleh lo ya'aseh lah veyaze'ah khinam 'en kasef. makeh 'ish vamet mot yumat. va'asher lo zadah veha'elohim 'inah leyado vesamti lekha maqom 'asher yanus shamah. vekhi yazid 'ish 'al rei'eihu leharego be'aremah mei'im mizbekhi tiqakhenu lamut. umakeh 'abiv ve'imo mot yumat. vegoneb 'ish umekharo venimza beyado mot yumat. umeqalel 'abiv ve'imo mot yumat. vekhi yeribun 'anashim vehikah 'ish 'et rei'eihu be'eben 'o be'egrof velo yamut venafal lemishkab. 'im yaqum vehithalekh bakhuz 'al mish'anto veniqah hamakeh raq shibto yiten verapo yerapei. vekhi yakeh 'ish 'et 'abdo 'o 'et 'amato basheibet umet takhat yado naqom yinaqem. 'akh 'im yom 'o yomayim ya'amod lo yuqam ki khaspo hu. vekhi yinazu 'anashim venagefu 'ishah harah veyaze'u yeladeha velo yihyeh 'ason 'anosh yei'anesh ka'asher yashit 'alav ba'al ha'ishah venatan biflilim. ve'im 'ason yihyeh venatatah nefesh takhat nafesh. 'ayin takhat 'ayin shen takhat shen yad takhat yad regel takhat ragel. keviyah takhat keviyah peza' takhat paza' khaburah takhat khaburah. vekhi yakeh 'ish 'et 'en 'abdo 'o 'et 'en 'amato veshikhatah lakhafeshi yeshalekhenu takhat 'eino. ve'im shen 'abdo 'o shen 'amato yapil lakhafeshi yeshalekhenu takhat shino. vekhi yigakh shor 'et 'ish 'o 'et 'ishah vamet saqol yisaqel hashor velo yei'akhel 'et besaro uba'al hashor naqi. ve'im shor nagakh hu mitemol shilshom vehu'ad bib'alav velo yishmerenu veheimit 'ish 'o 'ishah hashor yisaqel vegam be'alav yumat. 'im kofer yushat 'alav venatan pidyon nafsho kekhol 'asher yushat 'alav. 'o ben yigakh 'o bat yigakh kamishpat hazeh yei'aseh lo. 'im 'ebed yigakh hashor 'o 'amah kesef sheloshim sheqalim yiten ladonav vehashor yisaqel. vekhi yiftakh 'ish bor 'o ki yikhreh 'ish bor velo yekhasenu venafal shamah shor 'o khamor. ba'al habor yeshalem kesef yashib lib'alav vehamet yihyeh lo. vekhi yigof shor 'ish 'et shor rei'eihu vamet umakheru 'et hashor hakhai vekhazu 'et kaspo vegam 'et hamet yekhezun. 'o noda' ki shor nagakh hu mitemol shilshom velo yishmerenu be'alav shalem yeshalem shor takhat hashor vehamet yihyeh lo. ki yignob 'ish shor 'o seh utebakho 'o mekharo khamishah baqar yeshalem takhat hashor ve'arba' zon takhat haseh. 'im bamakhteret yimazei haganab vehukah vamet 'en lo damim. 'im zarekhah hashemesh 'alav damim lo shalem yeshalem 'im 'en lo venimkar bigneibato. 'im himazei timazei beyado hageneibah mishor 'ad khamor 'ad seh khayim shenayim yeshalem. ki yab'er 'ish sadeh 'o kherem veshilakh 'et be'irah be'iro ubi'er bisdeh 'akher meitab sadeihu umeitab karmo yeshalem. ki teizei 'esh umaze'ah qozim vene'ekhal gadish 'o haqamah 'o hasadeh shalem yeshalem hamab'ir 'et habe'eirah. ki yiten 'ish 'el rei'eihu kesef 'o kheilim lishmor vegunab mibet ha'ish 'im yimazei haganab yeshalem shenayim. 'im lo yimazei haganab veniqrab ba'al habayit 'el ha'elohim 'im lo shalakh yado bimlekhet rei'eihu. 'al kal debar pesha' 'al shor 'al khamor 'al seh 'al salmah 'al kal 'abeidah 'asher yomar ki hu zeh 'ad ha'elohim yabo debar sheneihem 'asher yarshi'un 'elohim yeshalem shenayim lerei'eihu. ki yiten 'ish 'el rei'eihu khamor 'o shor 'o seh vekhal beheimah lishmor umet 'o nishbar 'o nishbah 'en ro'eh. shebu'at ihoh tihyeh ben sheneihem 'im lo shalakh yado bimlekhet rei'eihu velaqakh be'alav velo yeshalem. ve'im ganob yiganeb mei'imo yeshalem lib'alav. 'im tarof yitaref yebi'eihu 'ed hatereifah lo yeshalem. vekhi yish'al 'ish mei'im rei'eihu venishbar 'o met be'alav 'en 'imo shalem yeshalem. 'im be'alav 'imo lo yeshalem 'im sakhir hu ba biskharo. vekhi yefateh 'ish betulah 'asher lo 'orasah veshakhab 'imah mahor yimharenah lo le'ishah. 'im ma'en yema'en 'abiha letitah lo kesef yishqol kemohar habetulot. mekhasheifah lo tekhayeh. kal shokheb 'im beheimah mot yumat. zobeiakh la'elohim yakhoram bilti ihoh lebado. veger lo toneh velo tilkhazenu ki geirim heyitem be'erez mizrayim. kal 'almanah veyatom lo te'anun. 'im 'aneh te'aneh 'oto ki 'im za'oq yiz'aq 'eilai shamoa' 'eshma' za'aqato. vekharah 'api veharagti 'etkhem bekhareb vehayu nesheikhem 'almanot ubeneikhem yetomim. 'im kesef talveh 'et 'ami 'et he'ani 'imakh lo tihyeh lo kenosheh lo tesimun 'alav neshekh. 'im khabol takhbol salmat rei'ekha 'ad bo hashemesh teshibenu lo. ki hi khesutah khesuto lebadah hi simlato le'oro bameh yishkab vehayah ki yiz'aq 'eilai veshama'ti ki khanun 'ani. 'elohim lo teqalel venasi be'amekha lo ta'or. melei'atekha vedim'akha lo te'akher bekhor banekha titen li ken ta'aseh leshorekha lezonekha shib'at yamim yihyeh 'im 'imo bayom hashemini titeno li. ve'anshei qodesh tihyun li ubasar basadeh tereifah lo tokheilu lakeleb tashlikhun 'oto. lo tisa sheima' shav 'al tashet yadekha 'im rasha' lihyot 'ed khamas. lo tihyeh 'akharei rabim lera'ot velo ta'aneh 'al rib lintot 'akharei rabim lehatot. vedal lo tehdar beribo. ki tifga' shor 'oyibkha 'o khamoro to'eh hasheb teshibenu lo. ki tir'eh khamor sona'akha robez takhat masa'o vekhadalta mei'azob lo 'azob ta'azob 'imo. lo tateh mishpat 'ebyonekha beribo. midebar sheqer tirkhaq venaqi vezadiq 'al taharog ki lo 'azdiq rasha'. veshokhad lo tiqakh ki hashokhad ye'aver piqkhim visalef dibrei zadiqim. veger lo tilkhaz ve'atem yeda'tem 'et nefesh hager ki geirim heyitem be'erez mizrayim. veshesh shanim tizra' 'et 'arzekha ve'asafta 'et tebu'atah. vehashebi'it tishmetenah unetashtah ve'akhelu 'ebyonei 'amekha veyitram tokhal khayat hasadeh ken ta'aseh lekharmekha lezeitekha. sheishet yamim ta'aseh ma'asekha ubayom hashebi'i tishbot lema'an yanuakh shorkha vakhamorekha veyinafesh ben 'amatekha vehager. ubekhol 'asher 'amarti 'aleikhem tishameiru veshem 'elohim 'akheirim lo tazkiru lo yishama' 'al pikha. shalosh regalim takhog li bashanah. 'et khag hamazot tishmor shib'at yamim tokhal mazot ka'asher zivitikha lemo'ed khodesh ha'abib ki bo yazata mimizrayim velo yeira'u fanai reiqam. vekhag haqazir bikurei ma'asekha 'asher tizra' basadeh vekhag ha'asif bezet hashanah be'asepekha 'et ma'asekha min hasadeh. shalosh pe'amim bashanah yeira'eh kal zekhurekha 'el penei ha'adon ihoh. lo tizbakh 'al khamez dam zibkhi velo yalin kheileb khagi 'ad boqer. reishit bikurei 'admatekha tabi bet ihoh 'elohekha lo tebashel gedi bakhaleb 'imo. hineh 'anokhi sholeiakh mal'akh lefanekha lishmarekha badarekh velahabi'akha 'el hamaqom 'asher hakhinoti. hishamer mipanav ushema' beqolo 'al tamer bo ki lo yisa lefish'akhem ki shemi beqirbo. ki 'im shamoa' tishma' beqolo ve'asita kol 'asher 'adaber ve'ayabti 'et 'oyebekha vezarti 'et zorerekha. ki yeilekh mal'akhi lefanekha vehebi'akha 'el ha'emori vehakhiti vehaperizi vehakena'ani hakhivi vehaybusi vehikhkhadtiv. lo tishtakhaveh leiloheihem velo ta'abedem velo ta'aseh kema'aseihem ki hares teharesem veshaber teshaber mazeiboteihem. va'abadtem 'et ihoh 'eloheikhem ubeirakh 'et lakhmekha ve'et meimekha vahasiroti makhalah miqirbekha. lo tihyeh meshakeilah va'aqarah be'arzekha 'et mispar yamekha 'amalei. 'et 'eimati 'ashalakh lefanekha vehamoti 'et kal ha'am 'asher tabo bahem venatati 'et kal 'oyebekha 'eilekha 'oref. veshalakhti 'et hazir'ah lefanekha vegeireshah 'et hakhivi 'et hakena'ani ve'et hakhiti milefanekha. lo 'agareshenu mipanekha beshanah 'ekhat pen tihyeh ha'arez shemamah verabah 'alekha khayat hasadeh. me'at me'at 'agareshenu mipanekha 'ad 'asher tifreh venakhalta 'et ha'arez. veshati 'et gebulkha miyam suf ve'ad yam pelishtim umimidbar 'ad hanahar ki 'eten beyedkhem 'et yoshebei ha'arez vegeirashtamo mipanekha. lo tikhrot lahem veleiloheihem berit. lo yeishebu be'arzekha pen yakhati'u 'otekha li ki ta'abod 'et 'eloheihem ki yihyeh lekha lemoqesh. ve'el mosheh 'amar 'aleh 'el ihoh 'atah ve'aharon nadab va'abihu veshib'im miziqnei yisra'el vehishtakhavitem meirakhoq. venigash mosheh lebado 'el ihoh vehem lo yigashu veha'am lo ya'alu 'imo. vayabo mosheh vaysaper la'am 'et kal dibrei ihoh ve'et kal hamishpatim vaya'an kal ha'am qol 'ekhad vayomeru kal hadebarim 'asher diber ihoh na'aseh. vayikhtob mosheh 'et kal dibrei ihoh vayashkem baboqer vayiben mizbeiakh takhat hahar ushetem 'esreh mazeibah lishnem 'asar shibtei yisra'el. vayishlakh 'et na'arei benei yisra'el vaya'alu 'olot vayizbekhu zebakhim shelamim ihoh parim. vayiqakh mosheh khazi hadam vayasem ba'aganot vakhazi hadam zaraq 'al hamizbeiakh. vayiqakh seifer haberit vayiqra be'azenei ha'am vayomeru kol 'asher diber ihoh na'aseh venishma'. vayiqakh mosheh 'et hadam vayizroq 'al ha'am vayomer hineh dam haberit 'asher karat ihoh 'imakhem 'al kal hadebarim ha'eleh. vaya'al mosheh ve'aharon nadab va'abihu veshib'im miziqnei yisra'el. vayir'u 'et 'elohei yisra'el vetakhat raglav kema'aseh libnat hasapir ukhe'ezem hashamayim latohar. ve'el 'azilei benei yisra'el lo shalakh yado vayekhezu 'et ha'elohim vayokhelu vayishtu. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh 'aleh 'eilai haharah vehyeh sham ve'etenah lekha 'et lukhot ha'eben vehatorah vehamizvah 'asher katabti lehorotam. vayaqam mosheh vihoshua' meshareto vaya'al mosheh 'el har ha'elohim. ve'el hazeqeinim 'amar shebu lanu bazeh 'ad 'asher nashub 'aleikhem vehineh 'aharon vekhur 'imakhem mi ba'al debarim yigash 'aleihem. vaya'al mosheh 'el hahar vaykhas he'anan 'et hahar. vayishkon kebod ihoh 'al har sinai vaykhaseihu he'anan sheishet yamim vayiqra 'el mosheh bayom hashebi'i mitokh he'anan. umar'eh kebod ihoh ke'esh 'okhelet berosh hahar le'einei benei yisra'el. vayabo mosheh betokh he'anan vaya'al 'el hahar vayhi mosheh bahar 'arba'im yom ve'arba'im layelah. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. daber 'el benei yisra'el veyiqkhu li terumah mei'et kal 'ish 'asher yidebenu libo tiqkhu 'et terumati. vezot haterumah 'asher tiqkhu mei'itam zahab vakhesef unekhoshet. utekheilet ve'argaman vetola'at shani veshesh ve'izim. ve'orot 'eilim me'adamim ve'orot tekhashim va'azei shitim. shemen lama'or besamim leshemen hamishkhah veliqtoret hasamim. 'abnei shoham ve'abnei milu'im la'eifod velakhoshen. ve'asu li miqdash veshakhanti betokham. kekhol 'asher 'ani mar'eh 'otkha 'et tabnit hamishkan ve'et tabnit kal keilav vekhen ta'asu. ve'asu 'aron 'azei shitim 'amatayim vakheizi 'areko ve'amah vakheizi rakhebo ve'amah vakheizi qomato. vezipita 'oto zahab tahor mibayit umikhuz tezapenu ve'asita 'alav zer zahab sabib. veyazaqta lo 'arba' tabe'ot zahab venatatah 'al 'arba' pa'amotav ushetei taba'ot 'al zal'o ha'ekhat ushetei taba'ot 'al zal'o hasheinit. ve'asita badei 'azei shitim vezipita 'otam zahab. veheibeita 'et habadim bataba'ot 'al zal'ot ha'aron laset 'et ha'aron bahem. betabe'ot ha'aron yihyu habadim lo yasuru mimenu. venatata 'el ha'aron 'et ha'eidut 'asher 'eten 'eilekha. ve'asita khaporet zahab tahor 'amatayim vakheizi 'arekah ve'amah vakheizi rakhebah. ve'asita shenayim kerubim zahab miqshah ta'aseh 'otam mishenei qezot hakaporet. va'aseh kerub 'ekhad miqazah mizeh ukherub 'ekhad miqazah mizeh min hakaporet ta'asu 'et hakerubim 'al shenei qezotav. vehayu hakerubim poresei khenafayim lema'lah sokhekhim bekhanfeihem 'al hakaporet ufeneihem 'ish 'el 'akhiv 'el hakaporet yihyu penei hakerubim. venatata 'et hakaporet 'al ha'aron milma'elah ve'el ha'aron titen 'et ha'eidut 'asher 'eten 'eilekha. veno'adti lekha sham vedibarti 'itekha mei'al hakaporet miben shenei hakerubim 'asher 'al 'aron ha'eidut 'et kal 'asher 'azaveh 'otkha 'el benei yisra'el. ve'asita shulkhan 'azei shitim 'amatayim 'areko ve'amah rakhebo ve'amah vakheizi qomato. vezipita 'oto zahab tahor ve'asita lo zer zahab sabib. ve'asita lo misgeret tofakh sabib ve'asita zer zahab lemisgarto sabib. ve'asita lo 'arba' tabe'ot zahab venatata 'et hataba'ot 'al 'arba' hapei'ot 'asher le'arba' raglav. le'umat hamisgeret tihyena hataba'ot lebatim lebadim laset 'et hashulkhan. ve'asita 'et habadim 'azei shitim vezipita 'otam zahab venisa bam 'et hashulkhan. ve'asita qe'arotav vekhapotav uqesotav umenaqiyotav 'asher yusakh bahen zahab tahor ta'aseh 'otam. venatata 'al hashulkhan lekhem panim lefanai tamid. ve'asita menorat zahab tahor miqshah tei'aseh hamenorah yereikhah veqanah gebi'eha kaftoreha uferakheha mimenah yihyu. veshishah qanim yoze'im mizideha sheloshah qenei menorah mizidah ha'ekhad usheloshah qenei menorah mizidah hasheini. sheloshah gebi'im meshuqadim baqaneh ha'ekhad kaftor vaferakh usheloshah gebi'im meshuqadim baqaneh ha'ekhad kaftor vafarakh ken lesheishet haqanim hayoze'im min hamenorah. ubamenorah 'arba'ah gebi'im meshuqadim kaftoreha uferakheha. vekhaftor takhat shenei haqanim mimenah vekhaftor takhat shenei haqanim mimenah vekhaftor takhat shenei haqanim mimenah lesheishet haqanim hayoze'im min hamenorah. kaftoreihem uqenotam mimenah yihyu kulah miqshah 'akhat zahab tahor. ve'asita 'et neiroteha shib'ah vehe'elah 'et neiroteha vehei'ir 'al 'eiber paneha. umalqakheha umakhtoteha zahab tahor. kikar zahab tahor ya'aseh 'otah 'et kal hakeilim ha'eleh. ure'eh va'aseh betabnitam 'asher 'atah mare'eh bahar. ve'et hamishkan ta'aseh 'eser yeri'ot shesh mashezar utekheilet ve'argaman vetola'at shani kerubim ma'aseh khosheb ta'aseh 'otam. 'orekh hayri'ah ha'akhat shemoneh ve'esrim ba'amah verokhab 'arba' ba'amah hayri'ah ha'ekhat midah 'akhat lekhal hayri'ot. khamesh hayri'ot tihyena khoberot 'ishah 'el 'akhotah vekhamesh yeri'ot khoberot 'ishah 'el 'akhotah. ve'asita lul'ot tekheilet 'al sefat hayri'ah ha'ekhat miqazah bakhobaret vekhen ta'aseh bisfat hayri'ah haqizonah bamakhberet hasheinit. khamishim lula'ot ta'aseh bayri'ah ha'ekhat vakhamishim lula'ot ta'aseh biqzeh hayri'ah 'asher bamakhberet hasheinit maqbilot halula'ot 'ishah 'el 'akhotah. ve'asita khamishim qarsei zahab vekhibarta 'et hayri'ot 'ishah 'el 'akhotah baqerasim vehayah hamishkan 'ekhad. ve'asita yeri'ot 'izim le'ohel 'al hamishkan 'ashtei 'esreh yeri'ot ta'aseh 'otam. 'orekh hayri'ah ha'akhat sheloshim ba'amah verokhab 'arba' ba'amah hayri'ah ha'ekhat midah 'akhat le'ashtei 'esreh yeri'ot. vekhibarta 'et khamesh hayri'ot lebad ve'et shesh hayri'ot lebad vekhafalta 'et hayri'ah hashishit 'el mul penei ha'ohel. ve'asita khamishim lula'ot 'al sefat hayri'ah ha'ekhat haqizonah bakhobaret vakhamishim lula'ot 'al sefat hayri'ah hakhoberet hasheinit. ve'asita qarsei nekhoshet khamishim veheibeita 'et haqerasim balula'ot vekhibarta 'et ha'ohel vehayah 'ekhad. veserakh ha'odef biri'ot ha'ohel khazi hayri'ah ha'odefet tisrakh 'al 'akhorei hamishkan. veha'amah mizeh veha'amah mizeh ba'odef be'orekh yeri'ot ha'ohel yihyeh saruakh 'al zidei hamishkan mizeh umizeh lekhasoto. ve'asita mikhseh la'ohel 'orot 'eilim me'adamim umikhseh 'orot tekhashim milma'elah. ve'asita 'et haqerashim lamishkan 'azei shitim 'omedim. 'eser 'amot 'orekh haqaresh ve'amah vakhazi ha'amah rokhab haqeresh ha'ekhad. shetei yadot laqeresh ha'ekhad meshulabot 'ishah 'el 'akhotah ken ta'aseh lekhol qarshei hamishkan. ve'asita 'et haqerashim lamishkan 'esrim qeresh lif'at negbah teimanah. ve'arba'im 'adnei khesef ta'aseh takhat 'esrim haqaresh shenei 'adanim takhat haqeresh ha'ekhad lishtei yedotav ushenei 'adanim takhat haqeresh ha'ekhad lishtei yedotav. ulezela' hamishkan hasheinit lif'at zafon 'esrim qaresh. ve'arba'im 'adneihem kasef shenei 'adanim takhat haqeresh ha'ekhad ushenei 'adanim takhat haqeresh ha'ekhad. uleyarketei hamishkan yamah ta'aseh shishah qerashim. ushenei qerashim ta'aseh limquz'ot hamishkan bayarkhatayim. veyihyu to'amim milematah veyakhdav yihyu tamim 'al rosho 'el hataba'at ha'ekhat ken yihyeh lishneihem lishnei hamiqzo'ot yihyu. vehayu shemonah qerashim ve'adneihem kesef shishah 'asar 'adanim shenei 'adanim takhat haqeresh ha'ekhad ushenei 'adanim takhat haqeresh ha'ekhad. ve'asita berikhim 'azei shitim khamishah leqarshei zela' hamishkan ha'ekhad. vakhamishah berikhim leqarshei zela' hamishkan hasheinit vakhamishah berikhim leqarshei zela' hamishkan layarkhatayim yamah. vehaberiakh hatikhon betokh haqerashim mabriakh min haqazeh 'el haqazeh. ve'et haqerashim tezapeh zahab ve'et tabe'oteihem ta'aseh zahab batim laberikhim vezipita 'et haberikhim zahab. vahaqeimota 'et hamishkan kemishpato 'asher hare'eita bahar. ve'asita farokhet tekheilet ve'argaman vetola'at shani veshesh mashezar ma'aseh khosheb ya'aseh 'otah kerubim. venatatah 'otah 'al 'arba'ah 'amudei shitim mezupim zahab vaveihem zahab 'al 'arba'ah 'adnei khasef. venatatah 'et haparokhet takhat haqerasim veheibeita shamah mibet laparokhet 'et 'aron ha'eidut vehibdilah haparokhet lakhem ben haqodesh uben qodesh haqodashim. venatata 'et hakaporet 'al 'aron ha'eidut beqodesh haqodashim. vesamta 'et hashulkhan mikhuz laparokhet ve'et hamenorah nokhakh hashulkhan 'al zela' hamishkan teimanah vehashulkhan titen 'al zela' zafon. ve'asita masakh lefetakh ha'ohel tekheilet ve'argaman vetola'at shani veshesh mashezar ma'aseh roqem. ve'asita lamasakh khamishah 'amudei shitim vezipita 'otam zahab vaveihem zahab veyazaqta lahem khamishah 'adnei nekhoshet. ve'asita 'et hamizbeiakh 'azei shitim khamesh 'amot 'orekh vekhamesh 'amot rokhab rabua' yihyeh hamizbeiakh veshalosh 'amot qomato. ve'asita qarnotav 'al 'arba' pinotav mimenu tihyena qarnotav vezipita 'oto nekhoshet. ve'asita sirotav ledasheno veya'av umizreqotav umizlegotav umakhtotav lekhal keilav ta'aseh nekhoshet. ve'asita lo mikhbar ma'aseh reshet nekhoshet ve'asita 'al hareshet 'arba' tabe'ot nekhoshet 'al 'arba' qezotav. venatatah 'otah takhat karkob hamizbeiakh milematah vehayetah hareshet 'ad khazi hamizbeiakh. ve'asita badim lamizbeiakh badei 'azei shitim vezipita 'otam nekhoshet. vehuba 'et badav bataba'ot vehayu habadim 'al shetei zal'ot hamizbeiakh bis'et 'oto. nebub lukhot ta'aseh 'oto ka'asher her'ah 'otekha bahar ken ya'asu. ve'asita 'et khazar hamishkan lif'at negeb teimanah qela'im lekhazer shesh mashezar mei'ah ba'amah 'orekh lapei'ah ha'ekhat. ve'amudav 'esrim ve'adneihem 'esrim nekhoshet vavei ha'amudim vakhashuqeihem kasef. vekhen lif'at zafon ba'orekh qela'im mei'ah 'orekh ve'amdu ve'amudav 'esrim ve'adneihem 'esrim nekhoshet vavei ha'amudim vakhashuqeihem kasef. verokhab hekhazer lif'at yam qela'im khamishim 'amah 'amudeihem 'asarah ve'adneihem 'asarah. verokhab hekhazer lif'at qeidemah mizrakhah khamishim 'amah. vakhamesh 'esreh 'amah qela'im lakatef 'amudeihem sheloshah ve'adneihem sheloshah. velakatef hasheinit khemesh 'esreh qela'im 'amudeihem sheloshah ve'adneihem sheloshah. ulesha'ar hekhazer masakh 'esrim 'amah tekheilet ve'argaman vetola'at shani veshesh mashezar ma'aseh roqem 'amudeihem 'arba'ah ve'adneihem 'arba'ah. kal 'amudei hekhazer sabib mekhushaqim kesef vaveihem kasef ve'adneihem nekhoshet. 'orekh hekhazer mei'ah ba'amah verokhab khamishim bakhamishim veqomah khamesh 'amot shesh mashezar ve'adneihem nekhoshet. lekhol kelei hamishkan bekhol 'abodato vekhal yeteidotav vekhal yitdot hekhazer nekhoshet. ve'atah tezaveh 'et benei yisra'el veyiqkhu 'eilekha shemen zayit zakh katit lama'or leha'alot ner tamid. be'ohel mo'ed mikhuz laparokhet 'asher 'al ha'eidut ya'arokh 'oto 'aharon ubanav mei'ereb 'ad boqer lifnei ihoh khuqat 'olam ledorotam mei'et benei yisra'el. ve'atah haqreb 'eilekha 'et 'aharon 'akhikha ve'et banav 'ito mitokh benei yisra'el lekhahano li 'aharon nadab va'abihu 'el'azar ve'itamar benei 'aharon. ve'asita bigdei qodesh le'aharon 'akhikha lekhabod uletif'aret. ve'atah tedaber 'el kal khakhmei leb 'asher mileitiv ruakh khakhmah ve'asu 'et bigdei 'aharon leqadesho lekhahano li. ve'eleh habegadim 'asher ya'asu khoshen ve'eifod ume'il ukhetonet tashbez miznefet ve'abnet ve'asu bigdei qodesh le'aharon 'akhikha ulebanav lekhahano li. vehem yiqkhu 'et hazahab ve'et hatekheilet ve'et ha'argaman ve'et tola'at hashani ve'et hashesh. ve'asu 'et ha'eifod zahab tekheilet ve'argaman tola'at shani veshesh mashezar ma'aseh khosheb. shetei kheteifot khoberot yihyeh lo 'el shenei qezotav vekhubar. vekheisheb 'afudato 'asher 'alav kema'aseihu mimenu yihyeh zahab tekheilet ve'argaman vetola'at shani veshesh mashezar. velaqakhta 'et shetei 'abnei shoham ufitakhta 'aleihem shemot benei yisra'el. shishah mishemotam 'al ha'eben ha'ekhat ve'et shemot hashishah hanotarim 'al ha'eben hasheinit ketoldotam. ma'aseh kharash 'eben pitukhei khotam tefatakh 'et shetei ha'abanim 'al shemot benei yisra'el musabot mishbezot zahab ta'aseh 'otam. vesamta 'et shetei ha'abanim 'al kitfot ha'eifod 'abnei zikaron libnei yisra'el venasa 'aharon 'et shemotam lifnei ihoh 'al shetei kheteifav lezikaron. ve'asita mishbezot zahab. ushetei sharsherot zahab tahor migbalot ta'aseh 'otam ma'aseh 'abot venatatah 'et sharsherot ha'abotot 'al hamishbezot. ve'asita khoshen mishpat ma'aseh khosheb kema'aseh 'eifod ta'asenu zahab tekheilet ve'argaman vetola'at shani veshesh mashezar ta'aseh 'oto. rabua' yihyeh kaful zeret 'areko vezeret rakhebo. umileita bo milu'at 'eben 'arba'ah turim 'aben tur 'odem pitdah ubareqet hatur ha'ekhad. vehatur hasheini nofekh sapir veyahalom. vehatur hashelishi leshem shebo ve'akhlamah. vehatur harebi'i tarshish veshoham veyashefeh meshubazim zahab yihyu bemilu'otam. veha'abanim tihyena 'al shemot benei yisra'el shetem 'esreh 'al shemotam pitukhei khotam 'ish 'al shemo tihyena lishnei 'asar shabet. ve'asita 'al hakhoshen sharshot gablut ma'aseh 'abot zahab tahor. ve'asita 'al hakhoshen shetei tabe'ot zahab venatata 'et shetei hataba'ot 'al shenei qezot hakhoshen. venatatah 'et shetei 'abotot hazahab 'al shetei hataba'ot 'el qezot hakhoshen. ve'et shetei qezot shetei ha'abotot titen 'al shetei hamishbezot venatatah 'al kitfot ha'eifod 'el mul panav. ve'asita shetei tabe'ot zahab vesamta 'otam 'al shenei qezot hakhoshen 'al sefato 'asher 'el 'eiber ha'eifod bayetah. ve'asita shetei tabe'ot zahab venatatah 'otam 'al shetei khitfot ha'eifod milematah mimul panav le'umat mekhbarto mima'al lekheisheb ha'eifod. veyirkesu 'et hakhoshen mitabe'oto mitabe'otav 'el tabe'ot ha'eifod biftil tekheilet lihyot 'al kheisheb ha'eifod velo yizakh hakhoshen mei'al ha'eifod. venasa 'aharon 'et shemot benei yisra'el bekhoshen hamishpat 'al libo bebo'o 'el haqodesh lezikaron lifnei ihoh tamid. venatata 'el khoshen hamishpat 'et ha'urim ve'et hatumim vehayu 'al leb 'aharon bebo'o lifnei ihoh venasa 'aharon 'et mishpat benei yisra'el 'al libo lifnei ihoh tamid. ve'asita 'et me'il ha'eifod kelil tekheilet. vehayah fi rosho betokho safah yihyeh lefiv sabib ma'aseh 'oreg kefi takhra yihyeh lo lo yiqareia'. ve'asita 'al shulav rimonei tekheilet ve'argaman vetola'at shani 'al shulav sabib ufa'amonei zahab betokham sabib. pa'amon zahab verimon pa'amon zahab verimon 'al shulei hame'il sabib. vehayah 'al 'aharon lesharet venishma' qolo bebo'o 'el haqodesh lifnei ihoh ubezeito velo yamut. ve'asita ziz zahab tahor ufitakhta 'alav pitukhei khotam qodesh ihoh. vesamta 'oto 'al petil tekheilet vehayah 'al hamiznafet 'el mul penei hamiznefet yihyeh. vehayah 'al meizakh 'aharon venasa 'aharon 'et 'avon haqodashim 'asher yaqdishu benei yisra'el lekhal matenot qadesheihem vehayah 'al mizkho tamid lerazon lahem lifnei ihoh. veshibazta haketonet shesh ve'asita miznefet shesh ve'abnet ta'aseh ma'aseh roqem. velibnei 'aharon ta'aseh khutonot ve'asita lahem 'abneitim umigba'ot ta'aseh lahem lekhabod uletif'aret. vehilbashta 'otam 'et 'aharon 'akhikha ve'et banav 'ito umashakhta 'otam umileita 'et yadam veqidashta 'otam vekhihanu li. va'aseh lahem mikhnesei bad lekhasot besar 'ervah mimatenayim ve'ad yereikhayim yihyu. vehayu 'al 'aharon ve'al banav bebo'am 'el 'ohel mo'ed 'o begishtam 'el hamizbeiakh lesharet baqodesh velo yis'u 'avon vameitu khuqat 'olam lo ulezar'o 'akharav. vezeh hadabar 'asher ta'aseh lahem leqadesh 'otam lekhahen li leqakh par 'ekhad ben baqar ve'eilim shenayim temimim. velekhem mazot vekhalot mazot belulot bashemen ureqiqei mazot meshukhim bashamen solet khitim ta'aseh 'otam. venatata 'otam 'al sal 'ekhad vehiqrabta 'otam basal ve'et hapar ve'et shenei ha'eilim. ve'et 'aharon ve'et banav taqrib 'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed verakhazta 'otam bamayim. velaqakhta 'et habegadim vehilbashta 'et 'aharon 'et hakutonet ve'et me'il ha'eifod ve'et ha'eifod ve'et hakhoshen ve'afadta lo bekheisheb ha'eifod. vesamta hamiznefet 'al rosho venatata 'et neizer haqodesh 'al hamiznafet. velaqakhta 'et shemen hamishkhah veyazaqta 'al rosho umashakhta 'oto. ve'et banav taqrib vehilbashtam kutonot. vekhagarta 'otam 'abnet 'aharon ubanav vekhabashta lahem migba'ot vehayetah lahem kehunah lekhuqat 'olam umileita yad 'aharon veyad banav. vehiqrabta 'et hapar lifnei 'ohel mo'ed vesamakh 'aharon ubanav 'et yedeihem 'al rosh hapar. veshakhata 'et hapar lifnei ihoh petakh 'ohel mo'ed. velaqakhta midam hapar venatatah 'al qarnot hamizbeiakh be'ezba'ekha ve'et kal hadam tishpokh 'el yesod hamizbeiakh. velaqakhta 'et kal hakheileb hamkhaseh 'et haqereb ve'et hayoteret 'al hakabed ve'et shetei hakelayot ve'et hakheileb 'asher 'aleihen vehiqtarta hamizbeikhah. ve'et besar hapar ve'et 'oro ve'et pirsho tisrof ba'esh mikhuz lamakhaneh khatat hu. ve'et ha'ayil ha'ekhad tiqakh vesamekhu 'aharon ubanav 'et yedeihem 'al rosh ha'ayil. veshakhata 'et ha'ayil velaqakhta 'et damo vezaraqta 'al hamizbeiakh sabib. ve'et ha'ayil tenateiakh lintakhav verakhazta qirbo ukhera'av venatata 'al netakhav ve'al rosho. vehiqtarta 'et kal ha'ayil hamizbeikhah 'olah hu ihoh reiakh nikhoakh 'isheh ihoh hu. velaqakhta 'et ha'ayil hasheini vesamakh 'aharon ubanav 'et yedeihem 'al rosh ha'ayil. veshakhata 'et ha'ayil velaqakhta midamo venatatah 'al tenukh 'ozen 'aharon ve'al tenukh 'ozen banav haymanit ve'al bohen yadam haymanit ve'al bohen raglam haymanit vezaraqta 'et hadam 'al hamizbeiakh sabib. velaqakhta min hadam 'asher 'al hamizbeiakh umishemen hamishkhah vehizeita 'al 'aharon ve'al begadav ve'al banav ve'al bigdei banav 'ito veqadash hu ubegadav ubanav ubigdei banav 'ito. velaqakhta min ha'ayil hakheileb veha'alyah ve'et hakheileb hamkhaseh 'et haqereb ve'et yoteret hakabed ve'et shetei hakelayot ve'et hakheileb 'asher 'aleihen ve'et shoq hayamin ki 'el milu'im hu. vekhikar lekhem 'akhat vakhalat lekhem shemen 'akhat veraqiq 'ekhad misal hamazot 'asher lifnei ihoh. vesamta hakol 'al kapei 'aharon ve'al kapei banav veheinafta 'otam tenufah lifnei ihoh. velaqakhta 'otam miyadam vehiqtarta hamizbeikhah 'al ha'olah lereiakh nikhoakh lifnei ihoh 'isheh hu ihoh. velaqakhta 'et hekhazeh mei'el hamilu'im 'asher le'aharon veheinafta 'oto tenufah lifnei ihoh vehayah lekha lemanah. veqidashta 'et khazeh hatenufah ve'et shoq haterumah 'asher hunaf va'asher huram mei'el hamilu'im mei'asher le'aharon umei'asher lebanav. vehayah le'aharon ulebanav lekhaq 'olam mei'et benei yisra'el ki terumah hu uterumah yihyeh mei'et benei yisra'el mizibkhei shalmeihem terumatam ihoh. ubigdei haqodesh 'asher le'aharon yihyu lebanav 'akharav lemashekhah bahem ulemalei bam 'et yadam. shib'at yamim yilbasham hakohen takhtav mibanav 'asher yabo 'el 'ohel mo'ed lesharet baqodesh. ve'et 'el hamilu'im tiqakh ubishalta 'et besaro bemaqom qadosh. ve'akhal 'aharon ubanav 'et besar ha'ayil ve'et halekhem 'asher basal petakh 'ohel mo'ed. ve'akhelu 'otam 'asher kupar bahem lemalei 'et yadam leqadesh 'otam vezar lo yokhal ki qodesh hem. ve'im yivater mibesar hamilu'im umin halekhem 'ad haboqer vesarafta 'et hanotar ba'esh lo yei'akhel ki qodesh hu. ve'asita le'aharon ulebanav kakhah kekhol 'asher ziviti 'otakhah shib'at yamim temalei yadam. ufar khatat ta'aseh layom 'al hakipurim vekhiteita 'al hamizbeiakh bekhaperkha 'alav umashakhta 'oto leqadesho. shib'at yamim tekhaper 'al hamizbeiakh veqidashta 'oto vehayah hamizbeiakh qodesh qadashim kal hanogeia' bamizbeiakh yiqdash. vezeh 'asher ta'aseh 'al hamizbeiakh kebasim benei shanah shenayim layom tamid. 'et hakebes ha'ekhad ta'aseh baboqer ve'et hakebes hasheini ta'aseh ben ha'arbayim. ve'isaron solet balul beshemen katit reba' hahin veneisekh rebi'it hahin yayin lakebes ha'ekhad. ve'et hakebes hasheini ta'aseh ben ha'arbayim keminkhat haboqer ukheniskah ta'aseh lah lereiakh nikhoakh 'isheh ihoh. 'olat tamid ledoroteikhem petakh 'ohel mo'ed lifnei ihoh 'asher 'iva'ed lakhem shamah ledaber 'eilekha sham. veno'adti shamah libnei yisra'el veniqdash bikhbodi. veqidashti 'et 'ohel mo'ed ve'et hamizbeiakh ve'et 'aharon ve'et banav 'aqadesh lekhahen li. veshakhanti betokh benei yisra'el vehayiti lahem leilohim. veyade'u ki 'ani ihoh 'eloheihem 'asher hozeiti 'otam mei'erez mizrayim leshakheni betokham 'ani ihoh 'eloheihem. ve'asita mizbeiakh miqtar qetoret 'azei shitim ta'aseh 'oto. 'amah 'areko ve'amah rakhebo rabua' yihyeh ve'amatayim qomato mimenu qarnotav. vezipita 'oto zahab tahor 'et gago ve'et qirotav sabib ve'et qarnotav ve'asita lo zer zahab sabib. ushetei tabe'ot zahab ta'aseh lo mitakhat lezeiro 'al shetei zal'otav ta'aseh 'al shenei zidav vehayah lebatim lebadim laset 'oto bahemah. ve'asita 'et habadim 'azei shitim vezipita 'otam zahab. venatatah 'oto lifnei haparokhet 'asher 'al 'aron ha'eidut lifnei hakaporet 'asher 'al ha'eidut 'asher 'iva'ed lekha shamah. vehiqtir 'alav 'aharon qetoret samim baboqer baboqer beheitibo 'et haneirot yaqtirenah. ubeha'alot 'aharon 'et haneirot ben ha'arbayim yaqtirenah qetoret tamid lifnei ihoh ledoroteikhem. lo ta'alu 'alav qetoret zarah ve'olah uminkhah veneisekh lo tisekhu 'alav. vekhiper 'aharon 'al qarnotav 'akhat bashanah midam khatat hakipurim 'akhat bashanah yekhaper 'alav ledoroteikhem qodesh qadashim hu ihoh. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. ki tisa 'et rosh benei yisra'el lifqudeihem venatenu 'ish kofer nafsho ihoh bifqod 'otam velo yihyeh bahem negef bifqod 'otam. zeh yitenu kal ha'ober 'al hapequdim makhazit hasheqel besheqel haqodesh 'esrim geirah hasheqel makhazit hasheqel terumah ihoh. kol ha'ober 'al hapequdim miben 'esrim shanah vama'elah yiten terumat ihoh. he'ashir lo yarbeh vehadal lo yam'it mimakhazit hashaqel latet 'et terumat ihoh lekhaper 'al nafshoteikhem. velaqakhta 'et kesef hakipurim mei'et benei yisra'el venatata 'oto 'al 'abodat 'ohel mo'ed vehayah libnei yisra'el lezikaron lifnei ihoh lekhaper 'al nafshoteikhem. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. ve'asita kiyor nekhoshet vekhano nekhoshet lerakhezah venatata 'oto ben 'ohel mo'ed uben hamizbeiakh venatata shamah mayim. verakhazu 'aharon ubanav mimenu 'et yedeihem ve'et ragleihem. bebo'am 'el 'ohel mo'ed yirkhazu mayim velo yamutu 'o begishtam 'el hamizbeiakh lesharet lehaqtir 'isheh ihoh. verakhazu yedeihem veragleihem velo yamutu vehayetah lahem khaq 'olam lo ulezar'o ledorotam. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. ve'atah qakh lekha besamim rosh mar deror khamesh mei'ot veqineman besem makhazito khamishim umatayim uqeneh bosem khamishim umatayim. veqidah khamesh mei'ot besheqel haqodesh veshemen zayit hin. ve'asita 'oto men mishkhat qodesh roqakh mirqakhat ma'aseh roqeiakh shemen mishkhat qodesh yihyeh. umashakhta bo 'et 'ohel mo'ed ve'et 'aron ha'eidut. ve'et hashulkhan ve'et kal keilav ve'et hamenorah ve'et keileha ve'et mizbakh haqetoret. ve'et mizbakh ha'olah ve'et kal keilav ve'et hakiyor ve'et kano. veqidashta 'otam vehayu qodesh qadashim kal hanogeia' bahem yiqdash. ve'et 'aharon ve'et banav timshakh veqidashta 'otam lekhahen li. ve'el benei yisra'el tedaber leimor men mishkhat qodesh yihyeh zeh li ledoroteikhem. 'al besar 'adam lo yisakh ubematkunto lo ta'asu kamohu qodesh hu qodesh yihyeh lakhem. 'ish 'asher yirqakh kamohu va'asher yiten mimenu 'al zar venikhrat mei'amav. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh qakh lekha samim nataf ushekheilet vekhelbenah samim ulebonah zakah bad bebad yihyeh. ve'asita 'otah qetoret roqakh ma'aseh roqeiakh memulakh tahor qodesh. veshakhaqta mimenah hadeq venatatah mimenah lifnei ha'eidut be'ohel mo'ed 'asher 'iva'ed lekha shamah qodesh qadashim tihyeh lakhem. vehaqetoret 'asher ta'aseh bematkuntah lo ta'asu lakhem qodesh tihyeh lekha ihoh. 'ish 'asher ya'aseh khamoha lehariakh bah venikhrat mei'amav. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. re'eh qarati beshem bezal'el ben 'uri ben khur lemateh yehudah. va'amalei 'oto ruakh 'elohim bekhakhemah ubitbunah ubeda'at ubekhal melakhah. lakhshob makhashabot la'asot bazahab ubakesef ubanekhoshet. ubakharoshet 'eben lemalot ubakharoshet 'ez la'asot bekhal melakhah. va'ani hineh natati 'ito 'et 'aholi'ab ben 'akhisamakh lemateh dan ubeleb kal khakham leb natati khakhmah ve'asu 'et kal 'asher zivitikha. 'et 'ohel mo'ed ve'et ha'aron la'eidut ve'et hakaporet 'asher 'alav ve'et kal kelei ha'ohel. ve'et hashulkhan ve'et keilav ve'et hamenorah hatehorah ve'et kal keileha ve'et mizbakh haqetoret. ve'et mizbakh ha'olah ve'et kal keilav ve'et hakiyor ve'et kano. ve'et bigdei haserad ve'et bigdei haqodesh le'aharon hakohen ve'et bigdei banav lekhahen. ve'et shemen hamishkhah ve'et qetoret hasamim laqodesh kekhol 'asher zivitikha ya'asu. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. ve'atah daber 'el benei yisra'el leimor 'akh 'et shabetotai tishmoru ki 'ot hi beini ubeineikhem ledoroteikhem lada'at ki 'ani ihoh meqadishkhem. ushemartem 'et hashabat ki qodesh hi lakhem mekhaleha mot yumat ki kal ha'oseh bah melakhah venikhretah hanefesh hahiv miqereb 'ameha. sheishet yamim yei'aseh melakhah ubayom hashebi'i shabat shabaton qodesh ihoh kal ha'oseh melakhah beyom hashabat mot yumat. veshameru benei yisra'el 'et hashabat la'asot 'et hashabat ledorotam berit 'olam. beini uben benei yisra'el 'ot hi le'olam ki sheishet yamim 'asah ihoh 'et hashamayim ve'et ha'arez ubayom hashebi'i shabat vayinafash. vayiten 'el mosheh kekhaloto ledaber 'ito behar sinai shenei lukhot ha'eidut lukhot 'eben ketubim be'ezba' 'elohim. vayar ha'am ki boshesh mosheh laredet min hahar vayiqahel ha'am 'al 'aharon vayomeru 'eilav qum 'aseh lanu 'elohim 'asher yeilekhu lefaneinu ki zeh mosheh ha'ish 'asher he'elanu mei'erez mizrayim lo yada'nu meh hayah lo. vayomer 'aleihem 'aharon parequ nizmei hazahab 'asher be'azenei nesheikhem beneikhem ubenoteikhem vehabi'u 'eilai. vayitparequ kal ha'am 'et nizmei hazahab 'asher be'azeneihem vayabi'u 'el 'aharon. vayiqakh miyadam vayazar 'oto bakheret vaya'aseihu 'eigel maseikhah vayomeru 'eleh 'elohekha yisra'el 'asher he'elukha mei'erez mizrayim. vayar 'aharon vayiben mizbeiakh lefanav vayiqra 'aharon vayomar khag ihoh makhar. vayashkimu mimakhorat vaya'alu 'olot vayagishu shelamim vayeisheb ha'am le'ekhol veshato vayaqumu lezakheq. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh lekh red ki shikhet 'amekha 'asher he'eleita mei'erez mizrayim. saru maher min haderekh 'asher zivitim 'asu lahem 'eigel maseikhah vayishtakhavu lo vayizbekhu lo vayomeru 'eleh 'elohekha yisra'el 'asher he'elukha mei'erez mizrayim. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh ra'iti 'et ha'am hazeh vehineh 'am qesheh 'oref hu. ve'atah hanikhah li veyikhar 'api bahem va'akhalem ve'e'eseh 'otkha lego gadol. vaykhal mosheh 'et penei ihoh 'elohav vayomer lamah ihoh yekhereh 'apekha be'amekha 'asher hozeita mei'erez mizrayim bekhoakh gadol ubeyad khazaqah. lamah yomeru mizrayim leimor bera'ah hozi'am laharog 'otam beharim ulekhalotam mei'al penei ha'adamah ub meikharon 'apekha vehinakhem 'al hara'ah le'amekha. zekhor le'abraham leyizkhaq uleyisra'el 'abadekha 'asher nishba'ta lahem bakh vatedaber 'aleihem 'arbeh 'et zar'akhem kekhokhbei hashamayim vekhal ha'arez hazot 'asher 'amarti 'eten lezar'akhem venakhalu le'olam. vayinakhem ihoh 'al hara'ah 'asher diber la'asot le'amo. vayifen vayeired mosheh min hahar ushenei lukhot ha'eidut beyado lukhot ketubim mishenei 'ebreihem mizeh umizeh hem ketubim. vehalukhot ma'aseh 'elohim hemah vehamikhtab mikhtab 'elohim hu kharut 'al halukhot. vayishma'
