yehoshua' 'et qol ha'am berei'oh vayomer 'el mosheh qol milkhamah bamakhaneh vayomer 'en qol 'anot geburah ve'en qol 'anot khalushah qol 'anot 'anokhi shomeia'. vayhi ka'asher qarab 'el hamakhaneh vayar 'et ha'eigel umekholot vayikhar 'af mosheh vayashlekh miyado miyadav 'et halukhot vayshaber 'otam takhat hahar. vayiqakh 'et ha'eigel 'asher 'asu vayisrof ba'esh vayitkhan 'ad 'asher daq vayizer 'al penei hamayim vayashq 'et benei yisra'el. vayomer mosheh 'el 'aharon meh 'asah lekha ha'am hazeh ki heibeita 'alav khata'ah gedolah. vayomer 'aharon 'al yikhar 'af 'adoni 'atah yada'ta 'et ha'am ki bera' hu. vayomeru li 'aseh lanu 'elohim 'asher yeilekhu lefaneinu ki zeh mosheh ha'ish 'asher he'elanu mei'erez mizrayim lo yada'nu meh hayah lo. va'omar lahem lemi zahab hitparaqu vayitenu li va'ashlikheihu ba'esh vayeizei ha'eigel hazeh. vayar mosheh 'et ha'am ki farua' hu ki fera'oh 'aharon leshimzah beqameihem. vaya'amod mosheh besha'ar hamakhaneh vayomer mi ihoh 'eilai vayei'asefu 'eilav kal benei leivi. vayomer lahem koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el simu 'ish kharbo 'al yereikho 'ibru vashubu misha'ar lasha'ar bamakhaneh vehirgu 'ish 'et 'akhiv ve'ish 'et rei'eihu ve'ish 'et qerobo. vaya'asu benei leivi kidbar mosheh vayipol min ha'am bayom hahu kishloshet 'alfei 'ish. vayomer mosheh mil'u yedkhem hayom ihoh ki 'ish bibno ube'akhiv velatet 'aleikhem hayom berakhah. vayhi mimakhorat vayomer mosheh 'el ha'am 'atem khatatem khata'ah gedolah ve'atah 'e'eleh 'el ihoh 'ulai 'akhaperah be'ad khatatkhem. vayashab mosheh 'el ihoh vayomar 'ana khata ha'am hazeh khata'ah gedolah vaya'asu lahem 'elohei zahab. ve'atah 'im tisa khatatam ve'im 'ayin mekheini na misifrekha 'asher katabeta. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh mi 'asher khata li 'emkhenu misifri. ve'atah lekh nekheh 'et ha'am 'el 'asher dibarti lakh hineh mal'akhi yeilekh lefanekha ubeyom paqedi ufaqadti 'aleihem khatatam. vayigof ihoh 'et ha'am 'al 'asher 'asu 'et ha'eigel 'asher 'asah 'aharon. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh lekh 'aleh mizeh 'atah veha'am 'asher he'elita mei'erez mizrayim 'el ha'arez 'asher nishba'ti le'abraham leyizkhaq uleya'aqob leimor lezar'akha 'etenenah. veshalakhti lefanekha mal'akh vegeirashti 'et hakena'ani ha'emori vehakhiti vehaperizi hakhivi vehaybusi. 'el 'erez zabat khalab udebash ki lo 'e'eleh beqirbekha ki 'am qesheh 'oref 'atah pen 'akhelkha badarekh. vayishma' ha'am 'et hadabar hara' hazeh vayit'abalu velo shatu 'ish 'edyo 'alav. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh 'emor 'el benei yisra'el 'atem 'am qesheh 'oref rega' 'ekhad 'e'eleh beqirbekha vekhilitikha ve'atah hored 'edyekha mei'alekha ve'eide'ah mah 'e'eseh lakh. vayitnazelu benei yisra'el 'et 'edyam meihar khoreb. umosheh yiqakh 'et ha'ohel venatah lo mikhuz lamakhaneh harkheq min hamakhaneh veqara lo 'ohel mo'ed vehayah kal mebaqesh ihoh yeizei 'el 'ohel mo'ed 'asher mikhuz lamakhaneh. vehayah kezet mosheh 'el ha'ohel yaqumu kal ha'am venizebu 'ish petakh 'aholo vehibitu 'akharei mosheh 'ad bo'o ha'ohelah. vehayah kebo mosheh ha'ohelah yeired 'amud he'anan ve'amad petakh ha'ohel vediber 'im mosheh. vera'ah khal ha'am 'et 'amud he'anan 'omed petakh ha'ohel veqam kal ha'am vehishtakhavu 'ish petakh 'aholo. vediber ihoh 'el mosheh panim 'el panim ka'asher yedaber 'ish 'el rei'eihu veshab 'el hamakhaneh umeshareto yehoshua' bin nun na'ar lo yamish mitokh ha'ohel. vayomer mosheh 'el ihoh re'eh 'atah 'omer 'eilai ha'al 'et ha'am hazeh ve'atah lo hoda'tani 'et 'asher tishlakh 'imi ve'atah 'amarta yeda'tikha beshem vegam mazata khen be'einai. ve'atah 'im na mazati khen be'einekha hodi'eini na 'et derakhekha ve'eida'akha lema'an 'emza khen be'einekha ure'eh ki 'amekha hago hazeh. vayomar panai yeileikhu vahanikhoti lakh. vayomer 'eilav 'im 'en panekha holekhim 'al ta'aleinu mizeh. ubameh yivada' 'eifo ki mazati khen be'einekha 'ani ve'amekha halo belekhtekha 'imanu venifleinu 'ani ve'amekha mikal ha'am 'asher 'al penei ha'adamah. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh gam 'et hadabar hazeh 'asher dibarta 'e'eseh ki mazata khen be'einai va'eida'akha beshem. vayomar har'eini na 'et kebodekha. vayomer 'ani 'a'abir kal tubi 'al panekha veqarati beshem ihoh lefanekha vekhanoti 'et 'asher 'akhon verikhamti 'et 'asher 'arakhem. vayomer lo tukhal lir'ot 'et panai ki lo yir'ani ha'adam vakhai. vayomer ihoh hineh maqom 'iti venizabta 'al hazur. vehayah ba'abor kebodi vesamtikha beniqrat hazur vesakoti khapi 'alekha 'ad 'aberi. vahasiroti 'et kapi vera'ita 'et 'akhorai ufanai lo yeira'u. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh pesal lekha shenei lukhot 'abanim karishonim vekhatabti 'al halukhot 'et hadebarim 'asher hayu 'al halukhot harishonim 'asher shibarta. vehyeh nakhon laboqer ve'alita baboqer 'el har sinai venizabta li sham 'al rosh hahar. ve'ish lo ya'aleh 'imakh vegam 'ish 'al yeira bekhal hahar gam hazon vehabaqar 'al yir'u 'el mul hahar hahu. vayifsol shenei lukhot 'abanim karishonim vayashkem mosheh baboqer vaya'al 'el har sinai ka'asher zivah ihoh 'oto vayiqakh beyado shenei lukhot 'abanim. vayeired ihoh be'anan vayityazeb 'imo sham vayiqra beshem ihoh. vaya'abor ihoh 'al panav vayiqra ihoh ihoh 'el rakhum vekhanun 'erekh 'apayim verab khesed ve'emet. nozer khesed la'alafim nosei 'avon vafesha' vekhata'ah venaqeh lo yenaqeh poqed 'avon 'abot 'al banim ve'al benei banim 'al shileishim ve'al ribei'im. vaymaher mosheh vayiqod 'arzah vayishtakhu. vayomer 'im na mazati khen be'einekha 'adonai yeilekh na 'adonai beqirbeinu ki 'am qesheh 'oref hu vesalakhta la'avoneinu ulekhatateinu unekhaltanu. vayomer hineh 'anokhi koret berit neged kal 'amekha 'e'eseh nifla'ot 'asher lo nibre'u bekhal ha'arez ubekhal hagoyim vera'ah khal ha'am 'asher 'atah beqirbo 'et ma'aseh ihoh ki nora hu 'asher 'ani 'oseh 'imakh. shemar lekha 'et 'asher 'anokhi mezavekha hayom hini goresh mipanekha 'et ha'emori vehakena'ani vehakhiti vehaperizi vehakhivi vehaybusi. hishamer lekha pen tikhrot berit leyosheb ha'arez 'asher 'atah ba 'aleha pen yihyeh lemoqesh beqirbekha. ki 'et mizbekhotam titozun ve'et mazeibotam teshabeirun ve'et 'asheirav tikhrotun. ki lo tishtakhaveh le'el 'akher ki ihoh qana shemo 'el qana hu. pen tikhrot berit leyosheb ha'arez vezanu 'akharei 'eloheihem vezabekhu leiloheihem veqara lekha ve'akhalta mizibkho. velaqakhta mibenotav lebanekha vezanu benotav 'akharei 'eloheihen vehiznu 'et banekha 'akharei 'eloheihen. 'elohei maseikhah lo ta'aseh lakh. 'et khag hamazot tishmor shib'at yamim tokhal mazot 'asher zivitikha lemo'ed khodesh ha'abib ki bekhodesh ha'abib yazata mimizrayim. kal peter rekhem li vekhal miqnekha tizakhar peter shor vaseh. ufeter khamor tifdeh beseh ve'im lo tifdeh va'arafto kol bekhor banekha tifdeh velo yeira'u fanai reiqam. sheishet yamim ta'abod ubayom hashebi'i tishbot bekharish ubaqazir tishbot. vekhag shabu'ot ta'aseh lekha bikurei qezir khitim vekhag ha'asif tequfat hashanah. shalosh pe'amim bashanah yeira'eh kal zekhurekha 'et penei ha'adon ihoh 'elohei yisra'el. ki 'orish goyim mipanekha vehirkhabti 'et gebulekha velo yakhmod 'ish 'et 'arzekha ba'alotekha leira'ot 'et penei ihoh 'elohekha shalosh pe'amim bashanah. lo tishkhat 'al khamez dam zibkhi velo yalin laboqer zebakh khag hapasakh. reishit bikurei 'admatekha tabi bet ihoh 'elohekha lo tebashel gedi bakhaleb 'imo. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh ketab lekha 'et hadebarim ha'eleh ki 'al pi hadebarim ha'eleh karati 'itekha berit ve'et yisra'el. vayhi sham 'im ihoh 'arba'im yom ve'arba'im laylah lekhem lo 'akhal umayim lo shatah vayikhtob 'al halukhot 'et dibrei haberit 'aseret hadebarim. vayhi beredet mosheh meihar sinai ushenei lukhot ha'eidut beyad mosheh beridto min hahar umosheh lo yada' ki qaran 'or panav bedabero 'ito. vayar 'aharon vekhal benei yisra'el 'et mosheh vehineh qaran 'or panav vayire'u migeshet 'eilav. vayiqra 'aleihem mosheh vayashubu 'eilav 'aharon vekhal hanesi'im ba'eidah vaydaber mosheh 'aleihem. ve'akharei khen nigeshu kal benei yisra'el vayzavem 'et kal 'asher diber ihoh 'ito behar sinai. vaykhal mosheh midaber 'itam vayiten 'al panav masveh. ubebo mosheh lifnei ihoh ledaber 'ito yasir 'et hamasveh 'ad zeito veyaza vediber 'el benei yisra'el 'et 'asher yezuveh. vera'u benei yisra'el 'et penei mosheh ki qaran 'or penei mosheh veheishib mosheh 'et hamasveh 'al panav 'ad bo'o ledaber 'ito. vayaqhel mosheh 'et kal 'adat benei yisra'el vayomer 'aleihem 'eleh hadebarim 'asher zivah ihoh la'asot 'otam. sheishet yamim tei'aseh melakhah ubayom hashebi'i yihyeh lakhem qodesh shabat shabaton ihoh kal ha'oseh bo melakhah yumat. lo teba'aru 'esh bekhol mosheboteikhem beyom hashabat. vayomer mosheh 'el kal 'adat benei yisra'el leimor zeh hadabar 'asher zivah ihoh leimor. qekhu mei'itekhem terumah ihoh kol nedib libo yebi'eha 'et terumat ihoh zahab vakhesef unekhoshet. utekheilet ve'argaman vetola'at shani veshesh ve'izim. ve'orot 'eilim me'adamim ve'orot tekhashim va'azei sitim veshemen lama'or ubesamim leshemen hamishkhah veliqtoret hasamim. ve'abnei shoham ve'abnei milu'im la'eifod velakhoshen. vekhal khakham leb bakhem yabo'u veya'asu 'et kal 'asher zivah ihoh. 'et hamishkan 'et 'aholo ve'et mikhseihu 'et qerasav ve'et qerashav 'et berikhav 'et 'amudav ve'et 'adanav. 'et ha'aron ve'et badav 'et hakaporet ve'et parokhet hamasakh. 'et hashulkhan ve'et badav ve'et kal keilav ve'et lekhem hapanim. ve'et menorat hama'or ve'et keileha ve'et neiroteha ve'et shemen hama'or. ve'et mizbakh haqetoret ve'et badav ve'et shemen hamishkhah ve'et qetoret hasamim ve'et masakh hapetakh lefetakh hamishkan. 'et mizbakh ha'olah ve'et mikhbar hanekhoshet 'asher lo 'et badav ve'et kal keilav 'et hakiyor ve'et kano. 'et qal'ei hekhazer 'et 'amudav ve'et 'adaneha ve'et masakh sha'ar hekhazer. 'et yitdot hamishkan ve'et yitdot hekhazer ve'et meitereihem. 'et bigdei haserad lesharet baqodesh 'et bigdei haqodesh le'aharon hakohen ve'et bigdei banav lekhahen. vayeize'u kal 'adat benei yisra'el milifnei mosheh. vayabo'u kal 'ish 'asher nesa'o libo vekhol 'asher nadebah rukho 'oto heibi'u 'et terumat ihoh limlekhet 'ohel mo'ed ulekhal 'abodato ulebigdei haqodesh. vayabo'u ha'anashim 'al hanashim kol nedib leb heibi'u khakh vanezem vetaba'at vekhumaz kal keli zahab vekhal 'ish 'asher heinif tenufat zahab ihoh. vekhal 'ish 'asher nimza 'ito tekheilet ve'argaman vetola'at shani veshesh ve'izim ve'orot 'eilim me'adamim ve'orot tekhashim heibi'u. kal meirim terumat kesef unekhoshet heibi'u 'et terumat ihoh vekhol 'asher nimza 'ito 'azei shitim lekhal melekhet ha'abodah heibi'u. vekhal 'ishah khakhmat leb beyadeha tavu vayabi'u matveh 'et hatekheilet ve'et ha'argaman 'et tola'at hashani ve'et hashesh. vekhal hanashim 'asher nasa liban 'otanah bekhakhemah tavu 'et ha'izim. vehanesi'im heibi'u 'et 'abnei hashoham ve'et 'abnei hamilu'im la'eifod velakhoshen. ve'et habosem ve'et hashamen lema'or uleshemen hamishkhah veliqtoret hasamim. kal 'ish ve'ishah 'asher nadab libam 'otam lehabi lekhal hamelakhah 'asher zivah ihoh la'asot beyad mosheh heibi'u benei yisra'el nedabah ihoh. vayomer mosheh 'el benei yisra'el re'u qara ihoh beshem bezal'el ben 'uri ben khur lemateh yehudah. vaymalei 'oto ruakh 'elohim bekhakhemah bitbunah ubeda'at ubekhal melakhah. velakhshob makhashabot la'asot bazahab ubakesef ubanekhoshet. ubakharoshet 'eben lemalot ubakharoshet 'ez la'asot bekhal melekhet makhashabet. ulehorot natan belibo hu ve'aholi'ab ben 'akhisamakh lemateh dan. milei 'otam khakhemat leb la'asot kal melekhet kharash vekhosheb veroqem batekheilet uba'argaman betola'at hashani ubashesh ve'oreg 'osei kal melakhah vekhoshebei makhashabot. ve'asah bezal'el ve'aholi'ab vekhol 'ish khakham leb 'asher natan ihoh khakhmah utebunah bahemah lada'at la'asot 'et kal melekhet 'abodat haqodesh lekhol 'asher zivah ihoh. vayiqra mosheh 'el bezal'el ve'el 'aholi'ab ve'el kal 'ish khakham leb 'asher natan ihoh khakhmah belibo kol 'asher nesa'o libo leqarebah 'el hamelakhah la'asot 'otah. vayiqkhu milifnei mosheh 'et kal haterumah 'asher heibi'u benei yisra'el limlekhet 'abodat haqodesh la'asot 'otah vehem heibi'u 'eilav 'od nedabah baboqer baboqer. vayabo'u kal hakhakhamim ha'osim 'et kal melekhet haqodesh 'ish 'ish mimelakhto 'asher hemah 'osim. vayomeru 'el mosheh leimor marbim ha'am lehabi midei ha'abodah lamelakhah 'asher zivah ihoh la'asot 'otah. vayzav mosheh vaya'abiru qol bamakhaneh leimor 'ish ve'ishah 'al ya'asu 'od melakhah litrumat haqodesh vayikalei ha'am meihabi. vehamelakhah hayetah dayam lekhal hamelakhah la'asot 'otah vehoter. vaya'asu khal khakham leb be'osei hamelakhah 'et hamishkan 'eser yeri'ot shesh mashezar utekheilet ve'argaman vetola'at shani kerubim ma'aseh khosheb 'asah 'otam. 'orekh hayri'ah ha'akhat shemoneh ve'esrim ba'amah verokhab 'arba' ba'amah hayri'ah ha'ekhat midah 'akhat lekhal hayri'ot. vaykhaber 'et khamesh hayri'ot 'akhat 'el 'ekhat vekhamesh yeri'ot khibar 'akhat 'el 'ekhat. vaya'as lul'ot tekheilet 'al sefat hayri'ah ha'ekhat miqazah bamakhbaret ken 'asah bisfat hayri'ah haqizonah bamakhberet hasheinit. khamishim lula'ot 'asah bayri'ah ha'ekhat vakhamishim lula'ot 'asah biqzeh hayri'ah 'asher bamakhberet hasheinit maqbilot halula'ot 'akhat 'el 'ekhat. vaya'as khamishim qarsei zahab vaykhaber 'et hayri'ot 'akhat 'el 'akhat baqerasim vayhi hamishkan 'ekhad. vaya'as yeri'ot 'izim le'ohel 'al hamishkan 'ashtei 'esreh yeri'ot 'asah 'otam. 'orekh hayri'ah ha'akhat sheloshim ba'amah ve'arba' 'amot rokhab hayri'ah ha'ekhat midah 'akhat le'ashtei 'esreh yeri'ot. vaykhaber 'et khamesh hayri'ot lebad ve'et shesh hayri'ot lebad. vaya'as lula'ot khamishim 'al sefat hayri'ah haqizonah bamakhbaret vakhamishim lula'ot 'asah 'al sefat hayri'ah hakhoberet hasheinit. vaya'as qarsei nekhoshet khamishim lekhaber 'et ha'ohel lihyot 'ekhad. vaya'as mikhseh la'ohel 'orot 'eilim me'adamim umikhseh 'orot tekhashim milma'elah. vaya'as 'et haqerashim lamishkan 'azei shitim 'omedim. 'eser 'amot 'orekh haqaresh ve'amah vakhazi ha'amah rokhab haqeresh ha'ekhad. shetei yadot laqeresh ha'ekhad meshulabot 'akhat 'el 'ekhat ken 'asah lekhol qarshei hamishkan. vaya'as 'et haqerashim lamishkan 'esrim qerashim lif'at negeb teimanah. ve'arba'im 'adnei khesef 'asah takhat 'esrim haqerashim shenei 'adanim takhat haqeresh ha'ekhad lishtei yedotav ushenei 'adanim takhat haqeresh ha'ekhad lishtei yedotav. ulezela' hamishkan hasheinit lif'at zafon 'asah 'esrim qerashim. ve'arba'im 'adneihem kasef shenei 'adanim takhat haqeresh ha'ekhad ushenei 'adanim takhat haqeresh ha'ekhad. uleyarketei hamishkan yamah 'asah shishah qerashim. ushenei qerashim 'asah limquz'ot hamishkan bayarkhatayim. vehayu to'amim milematah veyakhdav yihyu tamim 'el rosho 'el hataba'at ha'ekhat ken 'asah lishneihem lishnei hamiqzo'ot. vehayu shemonah qerashim ve'adneihem kesef shishah 'asar 'adanim shenei 'adanim shenei 'adanim takhat haqeresh ha'ekhad. vaya'as berikhei 'azei shitim khamishah leqarshei zela' hamishkan ha'ekhat. vakhamishah berikhim leqarshei zela' hamishkan hasheinit vakhamishah berikhim leqarshei hamishkan layarkhatayim yamah. vaya'as 'et haberiakh hatikhon libroakh betokh haqerashim min haqazeh 'el haqazeh. ve'et haqerashim zipah zahab ve'et tabe'otam 'asah zahab batim laberikhim vayzaf 'et haberikhim zahab. vaya'as 'et haparokhet tekheilet ve'argaman vetola'at shani veshesh mashezar ma'aseh khosheb 'asah 'otah kerubim. vaya'as lah 'arba'ah 'amudei shitim vayzapem zahab vaveihem zahab vayizoq lahem 'arba'ah 'adnei khasef. vaya'as masakh lefetakh ha'ohel tekheilet ve'argaman vetola'at shani veshesh mashezar ma'aseh roqem. ve'et 'amudav khamishah ve'et vaveihem vezipah rasheihem vakhashuqeihem zahab ve'adneihem khamishah nekhoshet. vaya'as bezal'el 'et ha'aron 'azei shitim 'amatayim vakheizi 'areko ve'amah vakheizi rakhebo ve'amah vakheizi qomato. vayzapeihu zahab tahor mibayit umikhuz vaya'as lo zer zahab sabib. vayizoq lo 'arba' tabe'ot zahab 'al 'arba' pa'amotav ushetei taba'ot 'al zal'o ha'ekhat ushetei taba'ot 'al zal'o hasheinit. vaya'as badei 'azei shitim vayzaf 'otam zahab. vayabei 'et habadim bataba'ot 'al zal'ot ha'aron laset 'et ha'aron. vaya'as kaporet zahab tahor 'amatayim vakheizi 'arekah ve'amah vakheizi rakhebah. vaya'as shenei kherubim zahab miqshah 'asah 'otam mishenei qezot hakaporet. kerub 'ekhad miqazah mizeh ukherub 'ekhad miqazah mizeh min hakaporet 'asah 'et hakerubim mishenei qizvoto qezotav. vayihyu hakerubim poresei khenafayim lema'lah sokhekhim bekhanfeihem 'al hakaporet ufeneihem 'ish 'el 'akhiv 'el hakaporet hayu penei hakerubim. vaya'as 'et hashulkhan 'azei shitim 'amatayim 'areko ve'amah rakhebo ve'amah vakheizi qomato. vayzaf 'oto zahab tahor vaya'as lo zer zahab sabib. vaya'as lo misgeret tofakh sabib vaya'as zer zahab lemisgarto sabib. vayizoq lo 'arba' tabe'ot zahab vayiten 'et hataba'ot 'al 'arba' hapei'ot 'asher le'arba' raglav. le'umat hamisgeret hayu hataba'ot batim labadim laset 'et hashulkhan. vaya'as 'et habadim 'azei shitim vayzaf 'otam zahab laset 'et hashulkhan. vaya'as 'et hakeilim 'asher 'al hashulkhan 'et qe'arotav ve'et kapotav ve'et menaqiyotav ve'et haqesavot 'asher yusakh bahen zahab tahor. vaya'as 'et hamenorah zahab tahor miqshah 'asah 'et hamenorah yereikhah veqanah gebi'eha kaftoreha uferakheha mimenah hayu. veshishah qanim yoze'im mizideha sheloshah qenei menorah mizidah ha'ekhad usheloshah qenei menorah mizidah hasheini. sheloshah gebi'im meshuqadim baqaneh ha'ekhad kaftor vaferakh usheloshah gebi'im meshuqadim beqaneh 'ekhad kaftor vafarakh ken lesheishet haqanim hayoze'im min hamenorah. ubamenorah 'arba'ah gebi'im meshuqadim kaftoreha uferakheha. vekhaftor takhat shenei haqanim mimenah vekhaftor takhat shenei haqanim mimenah vekhaftor takhat shenei haqanim mimenah lesheishet haqanim hayoze'im mimenah. kaftoreihem uqenotam mimenah hayu kulah miqshah 'akhat zahab tahor. vaya'as 'et neiroteha shib'ah umalqakheha umakhtoteha zahab tahor. kikar zahab tahor 'asah 'otah ve'et kal keileha. vaya'as 'et mizbakh haqetoret 'azei shitim 'amah 'areko ve'amah rakhebo rabua' ve'amatayim qomato mimenu hayu qarnotav. vayzaf 'oto zahab tahor 'et gago ve'et qirotav sabib ve'et qarnotav vaya'as lo zer zahab sabib. ushetei tabe'ot zahab 'asah lo mitakhat lezeiro 'al shetei zal'otav 'al shenei zidav lebatim lebadim laset 'oto bahem. vaya'as 'et habadim 'azei shitim vayzaf 'otam zahab. vaya'as 'et shemen hamishkhah qodesh ve'et qetoret hasamim tahor ma'aseh roqeiakh. vaya'as 'et mizbakh ha'olah 'azei shitim khamesh 'amot 'areko vekhamesh 'amot rakhebo rabua' veshalosh 'amot qomato. vaya'as qarnotav 'al 'arba' pinotav mimenu hayu qarnotav vayzaf 'oto nekhoshet. vaya'as 'et kal kelei hamizbeiakh 'et hasirot ve'et haya'im ve'et hamizraqot 'et hamizlagot ve'et hamakhtot kal keilav 'asah nekhoshet. vaya'as lamizbeiakh mikhbar ma'aseh reshet nekhoshet takhat karkubo milematah 'ad khezyo. vayizoq 'arba' taba'ot be'arba' haqezavot lemikhbar hanekhoshet batim labadim. vaya'as 'et habadim 'azei shitim vayzaf 'otam nekhoshet. vayabei 'et habadim bataba'ot 'al zal'ot hamizbeiakh laset 'oto bahem nebub lukhot 'asah 'oto. vaya'as 'et hakiyor nekhoshet ve'et kano nekhoshet bemar'ot hazobe'ot 'asher zabe'u petakh 'ohel mo'ed. vaya'as 'et hekhazer lif'at negeb teimanah qal'ei hekhazer shesh mashezar mei'ah ba'amah. 'amudeihem 'esrim ve'adneihem 'esrim nekhoshet vavei ha'amudim vakhashuqeihem kasef. velif'at zafon mei'ah ba'amah 'amudeihem 'esrim ve'adneihem 'esrim nekhoshet vavei ha'amudim vakhashuqeihem kasef. velif'at yam qela'im khamishim ba'amah 'amudeihem 'asarah ve'adneihem 'asarah vavei ha'amudim vakhashuqeihem kasef. velif'at qeidemah mizrakhah khamishim 'amah. qela'im khamesh 'esreh 'amah 'el hakatef 'amudeihem sheloshah ve'adneihem sheloshah. velakatef hasheinit mizeh umizeh lesha'ar hekhazer qela'im khamesh 'esreh 'amah 'amudeihem sheloshah ve'adneihem sheloshah. kal qal'ei hekhazer sabib shesh mashezar. veha'adanim la'amudim nekhoshet vavei ha'amudim vakhashuqeihem kesef vezipui rasheihem kasef vehem mekhushaqim kesef kol 'amudei hekhazer. umasakh sha'ar hekhazer ma'aseh roqem tekheilet ve'argaman vetola'at shani veshesh mashezar ve'esrim 'amah 'orekh veqomah berokhab khamesh 'amot le'umat qal'ei hekhazer. ve'amudeihem 'arba'ah ve'adneihem 'arba'ah nekhoshet vaveihem kesef vezipui rasheihem vakhashuqeihem kasef. vekhal hayteidot lamishkan velekhazer sabib nekhoshet. 'eleh fequdei hamishkan mishkan ha'eidut 'asher puqad 'al pi mosheh 'abodat halviyim beyad 'itamar ben 'aharon hakohen. ubezal'el ben 'uri ben khur lemateh yehudah 'asah 'et kal 'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. ve'ito 'aholi'ab ben 'akhisamakh lemateh dan kharash vekhosheb veroqem batekheilet uba'argaman ubetola'at hashani ubashesh. kal hazahab he'asui lamelakhah bekhol melekhet haqodesh vayhi zehab hatenufah teisha' ve'esrim kikar usheba' mei'ot usheloshim sheqel besheqel haqodesh. vekhesef pequdei ha'eidah me'at kikar ve'elef usheba' mei'ot vakhamishah veshib'im sheqel besheqel haqodesh. beqa' lagulgolet makhazit hasheqel besheqel haqodesh lekhol ha'ober 'al hapequdim miben 'esrim shanah vama'lah leshesh mei'ot 'elef usheloshet 'alafim vakhamesh mei'ot vakhamishim. vayhi me'at kikar hakesef lazeqet 'et 'adnei haqodesh ve'et 'adnei haparokhet me'at 'adanim lim'at hakikar kikar la'aden. ve'et ha'elef usheba' hamei'ot vakhamishah veshib'im 'asah vavim la'amudim vezipah rasheihem vekhishaq 'otam. unekhoshet hatenufah shib'im kikar ve'alpayim ve'arba' mei'ot shaqel. vaya'as bah 'et 'adnei petakh 'ohel mo'ed ve'et mizbakh hanekhoshet ve'et mikhbar hanekhoshet 'asher lo ve'et kal kelei hamizbeiakh. ve'et 'adnei hekhazer sabib ve'et 'adnei sha'ar hekhazer ve'et kal yitdot hamishkan ve'et kal yitdot hekhazer sabib. umin hatekheilet veha'argaman vetola'at hashani 'asu bigdei serad lesharet baqodesh vaya'asu 'et bigdei haqodesh 'asher le'aharon ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. vaya'as 'et ha'eifod zahab tekheilet ve'argaman vetola'at shani veshesh mashezar. vayraqe'u 'et pakhei hazahab veqizez petilim la'asot betokh hatekheilet ubetokh ha'argaman ubetokh tola'at hashani ubetokh hashesh ma'aseh khosheb. keteifot 'asu lo khoberot 'al shenei qizvoto qezotav khubar. vekheisheb 'afudato 'asher 'alav mimenu hu kema'aseihu zahab tekheilet ve'argaman vetola'at shani veshesh mashezar ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. vaya'asu 'et 'abnei hashoham musabot mishbezot zahab mefutakhot pitukhei khotam 'al shemot benei yisra'el. vayasem 'otam 'al kitfot ha'eifod 'abnei zikaron libnei yisra'el ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. vaya'as 'et hakhoshen ma'aseh khosheb kema'aseh 'eifod zahab tekheilet ve'argaman vetola'at shani veshesh mashezar. rabua' hayah kaful 'asu 'et hakhoshen zeret 'areko vezeret rakhebo kaful. vaymal'u bo 'arba'ah turei 'aben tur 'odem pitdah ubareqet hatur ha'ekhad. vehatur hasheini nofekh sapir veyahalom. vehatur hashelishi leshem shebo ve'akhlamah. vehatur harebi'i tarshish shoham veyashefeh musabot mishbezot zahab bemilu'otam. veha'abanim 'al shemot benei yisra'el henah shetem 'esreh 'al shemotam pitukhei khotam 'ish 'al shemo lishnem 'asar shabet. vaya'asu 'al hakhoshen sharsherot gablut ma'aseh 'abot zahab tahor. vaya'asu shetei mishbezot zahab ushetei tabe'ot zahab vayitenu 'et shetei hataba'ot 'al shenei qezot hakhoshen. vayitenu shetei ha'abotot hazahab 'al shetei hataba'ot 'al qezot hakhoshen. ve'et shetei qezot shetei ha'abotot natenu 'al shetei hamishbezot vayitenum 'al kitfot ha'eifod 'el mul panav. vaya'asu shetei tabe'ot zahab vayasimu 'al shenei qezot hakhoshen 'al sefato 'asher 'el 'eiber ha'eifod bayetah. vaya'asu shetei tabe'ot zahab vayitenum 'al shetei khitfot ha'eifod milmatah mimul panav le'umat mekhbarto mima'al lekheisheb ha'eifod. vayirkesu 'et hakhoshen mitabe'otav 'el tabe'ot ha'eifod biftil tekheilet lihyot 'al kheisheb ha'eifod velo yizakh hakhoshen mei'al ha'eifod ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. vaya'as 'et me'il ha'eifod ma'aseh 'oreg kelil tekheilet. ufi hame'il betokho kefi takhra safah lefiv sabib lo yiqareia'. vaya'asu 'al shulei hame'il rimonei tekheilet ve'argaman vetola'at shani mashezar. vaya'asu fa'amonei zahab tahor vayitenu 'et hapa'amonim betokh harimonim 'al shulei hame'il sabib betokh harimonim. pa'amon verimon pa'amon verimon 'al shulei hame'il sabib lesharet ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. vaya'asu 'et hakatenot shesh ma'aseh 'oreg le'aharon ulebanav. ve'et hamiznefet shesh ve'et pa'arei hamigba'ot shesh ve'et mikhnesei habad shesh mashezar. ve'et ha'abnet shesh mashezar utekheilet ve'argaman vetola'at shani ma'aseh roqem ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. vaya'asu 'et ziz neizer haqodesh zahab tahor vayikhtebu 'alav mikhtab pitukhei khotam qodesh ihoh. vayitenu 'alav petil tekheilet latet 'al hamiznefet milma'elah ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. vateikhel kal 'abodat mishkan 'ohel mo'ed vaya'asu benei yisra'el kekhol 'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh ken 'asu. vayabi'u 'et hamishkan 'el mosheh 'et ha'ohel ve'et kal keilav qerasav qerashav berikho berikhav ve'amudav va'adanav. ve'et mikhseh 'orot ha'eilim ham'adamim ve'et mikhseh 'orot hatekhashim ve'et parokhet hamasakh. 'et 'aron ha'eidut ve'et badav ve'et hakaporet. 'et hashulkhan 'et kal keilav ve'et lekhem hapanim. 'et hamenorah hatehorah 'et neiroteha neirot hama'arakhah ve'et kal keileha ve'et shemen hama'or. ve'et mizbakh hazahab ve'et shemen hamishkhah ve'et qetoret hasamim ve'et masakh petakh ha'ohel. 'et mizbakh hanekhoshet ve'et mikhbar hanekhoshet 'asher lo 'et badav ve'et kal keilav 'et hakiyor ve'et kano. 'et qal'ei hekhazer 'et 'amudeha ve'et 'adaneha ve'et hamasakh lesha'ar hekhazer 'et meitarav viteidoteha ve'et kal kelei 'abodat hamishkan le'ohel mo'ed. 'et bigdei haserad lesharet baqodesh 'et bigdei haqodesh le'aharon hakohen ve'et bigdei banav lekhahen. kekhol 'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh ken 'asu benei yisra'el 'et kal ha'abodah. vayar mosheh 'et kal hamelakhah vehineh 'asu 'otah ka'asher zivah ihoh ken 'asu vaybarekh 'otam mosheh. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. beyom hakhodesh harishon be'ekhad lakhodesh taqim 'et mishkan 'ohel mo'ed. vesamta sham 'et 'aron ha'eidut vesakota 'al ha'aron 'et haparokhet. veheibeita 'et hashulkhan ve'arakhta 'et 'erko veheibeita 'et hamenorah veha'aleita 'et neiroteha. venatatah 'et mizbakh hazahab liqtoret lifnei 'aron ha'eidut vesamta 'et masakh hapetakh lamishkan. venatatah 'et mizbakh ha'olah lifnei petakh mishkan 'ohel mo'ed. venatata 'et hakiyor ben 'ohel mo'ed uben hamizbeiakh venatata sham mayim. vesamta 'et hekhazer sabib venatata 'et masakh sha'ar hekhazer. velaqakhta 'et shemen hamishkhah umashakhta 'et hamishkan ve'et kal 'asher bo veqidashta 'oto ve'et kal keilav vehayah qodesh. umashakhta 'et mizbakh ha'olah ve'et kal keilav veqidashta 'et hamizbeiakh vehayah hamizbeiakh qodesh qadashim. umashakhta 'et hakiyor ve'et kano veqidashta 'oto. vehiqrabta 'et 'aharon ve'et banav 'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed verakhazta 'otam bamayim. vehilbashta 'et 'aharon 'et bigdei haqodesh umashakhta 'oto veqidashta 'oto vekhihen li. ve'et banav taqrib vehilbashta 'otam kutonot. umashakhta 'otam ka'asher mashakhta 'et 'abihem vekhihanu li vehayetah lihyot lahem mashekhatam likhhunat 'olam ledorotam vaya'as mosheh kekhol 'asher zivah ihoh 'oto ken 'asah. vayhi bakhodesh harishon bashanah hasheinit be'ekhad lakhodesh huqam hamishkan. vayaqem mosheh 'et hamishkan vayiten 'et 'adanav vayasem 'et qerashav vayiten 'et berikhav vayaqem 'et 'amudav. vayifros 'et ha'ohel 'al hamishkan vayasem 'et mikhseh ha'ohel 'alav milma'elah ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. vayiqakh vayiten 'et ha'eidut 'el ha'aron vayasem 'et habadim 'al ha'aron vayiten 'et hakaporet 'al ha'aron milma'elah. vayabei 'et ha'aron 'el hamishkan vayasem 'et parokhet hamasakh vayasekh 'al 'aron ha'eidut ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. vayiten 'et hashulkhan be'ohel mo'ed 'al yerekh hamishkan zafonah mikhuz laparokhet. vaya'arokh 'alav 'eirekh lekhem lifnei ihoh ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. vayasem 'et hamenorah be'ohel mo'ed nokhakh hashulkhan 'al yerekh hamishkan negbah. vaya'al haneirot lifnei ihoh ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. vayasem 'et mizbakh hazahab be'ohel mo'ed lifnei haparokhet. vayaqter 'alav qetoret samim ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. vayasem 'et masakh hapetakh lamishkan. ve'et mizbakh ha'olah sam petakh mishkan 'ohel mo'ed vaya'al 'alav 'et ha'olah ve'et haminkhah ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. vayasem 'et hakiyor ben 'ohel mo'ed uben hamizbeiakh vayiten shamah mayim lerakhezah. verakhazu mimenu mosheh ve'aharon ubanav 'et yedeihem ve'et ragleihem. bebo'am 'el 'ohel mo'ed ubeqarebatam 'el hamizbeiakh yirkhazu ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. vayaqem 'et hekhazer sabib lamishkan velamizbeiakh vayiten 'et masakh sha'ar hekhazer vaykhal mosheh 'et hamelakhah. vaykhas he'anan 'et 'ohel mo'ed ukhebod ihoh malei 'et hamishkan. velo yakhol mosheh labo 'el 'ohel mo'ed ki shakhan 'alav he'anan ukhebod ihoh malei 'et hamishkan. ubehei'alot he'anan mei'al hamishkan yis'u benei yisra'el bekhol mas'eihem. ve'im lo yei'aleh he'anan velo yis'u 'ad yom hei'aloto. ki 'anan ihoh 'al hamishkan yomam ve'esh tihyeh laylah bo le'einei khal bet yisra'el bekhal mas'eihem.

vayiqra 'el mosheh vaydaber ihoh 'eilav mei'ohel mo'ed leimor. daber 'el benei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem 'adam ki yaqrib mikem qarban ihoh min habeheimah min habaqar umin hazon taqribu 'et qarebankhem. 'im 'olah qarebano min habaqar zakhar tamim yaqribenu 'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed yaqrib 'oto lirzono lifnei ihoh. vesamakh yado 'al rosh ha'olah venirzah lo lekhaper 'alav. veshakhat 'et ben habaqar lifnei ihoh vehiqribu benei 'aharon hakohanim 'et hadam vezarequ 'et hadam 'al hamizbeiakh sabib 'asher petakh 'ohel mo'ed. vehifshit 'et ha'olah venitakh 'otah lintakheha. venatenu benei 'aharon hakohen 'esh 'al hamizbeiakh ve'arekhu 'eizim 'al ha'esh. ve'arekhu benei 'aharon hakohanim 'et hanetakhim 'et harosh ve'et hapader 'al ha'eizim 'asher 'al ha'esh 'asher 'al hamizbeiakh. veqirbo ukhera'av yirkhaz bamayim vehiqtir hakohen 'et hakol hamizbeikhah 'olah 'isheh reiakh nikhoakh ihoh. ve'im min hazon qarebano min hakesabim 'o min ha'izim le'olah zakhar tamim yaqribenu. veshakhat 'oto 'al yerekh hamizbeiakh zafonah lifnei ihoh vezarequ benei 'aharon hakohanim 'et damo 'al hamizbeiakh sabib. venitakh 'oto lintakhav ve'et rosho ve'et pidro ve'arakh hakohen 'otam 'al ha'eizim 'asher 'al ha'esh 'asher 'al hamizbeiakh. vehaqereb vehakera'ayim yirkhaz bamayim vehiqrib hakohen 'et hakol vehiqtir hamizbeikhah 'olah hu 'isheh reiakh nikhoakh ihoh. ve'im min ha'of 'olah qarebano ihoh vehiqrib min hatorim 'o min benei hayonah 'et qarebano. vehiqribo hakohen 'el hamizbeiakh umalaq 'et rosho vehiqtir hamizbeikhah venimzah damo 'al qir hamizbeiakh. veheisir 'et mur'ato benozatah vehishlikh 'otah 'eizel hamizbeiakh qeidemah 'el meqom hadashen. veshisa' 'oto bikhnafav lo yabdil vehiqtir 'oto hakohen hamizbeikhah 'al ha'eizim 'asher 'al ha'esh 'olah hu 'isheh reiakh nikhoakh ihoh. venefesh ki taqrib qareban minkhah ihoh solet yihyeh qarebano veyazaq 'aleha shemen venatan 'aleha lebonah. vehebi'ah 'el benei 'aharon hakohanim veqamaz misham melo qumzo misaletah umishamnah 'al kal lebonatah vehiqtir hakohen 'et 'azkaratah hamizbeikhah 'isheh reiakh nikhoakh ihoh. vehanoteret min haminkhah le'aharon ulebanav qodesh qadashim mei'ishei ihoh. vekhi taqrib qareban minkhah ma'afeh tanur solet khalot mazot belulot bashemen ureqiqei mazot meshukhim bashamen. ve'im minkhah 'al hamakhabat qarebanekha solet belulah bashemen mazah tihyeh. patot 'otah pitim veyazaqta 'aleha shamen minkhah hi ve'im minkhat markheshet qarebanekha solet bashemen tei'aseh. veheibeita 'et haminkhah 'asher yei'aseh mei'eleh ihoh vehiqribah 'el hakohen vehigishah 'el hamizbeiakh. veheirim hakohen min haminkhah 'et 'azkaratah vehiqtir hamizbeikhah 'isheh reiakh nikhoakh ihoh. vehanoteret min haminkhah le'aharon ulebanav qodesh qadashim mei'ishei ihoh. kal haminkhah 'asher taqribu ihoh lo tei'aseh khamez ki khal se'or vekhal debash lo taqtiru mimenu 'isheh ihoh. qareban reishit taqribu 'otam ihoh ve'el hamizbeiakh lo ya'alu lereiakh nikhoakh. vekhal qareban minkhatekha bamelakh timlakh velo tashbit melakh berit 'elohekha mei'al minkhatekha 'al kal qarebanekha taqrib melakh. ve'im taqrib minkhat bikurim ihoh 'abib qalui ba'esh geres karmel taqrib 'et minkhat bikurekha. venatata 'aleha shemen vesamta 'aleha lebonah minkhah hi vehiqtir hakohen 'et 'azkaratah migirsah umishamnah 'al kal lebonatah 'isheh ihoh. ve'im zebakh shelamim qarebano 'im min habaqar hu maqrib 'im zakhar 'im neqeibah tamim yaqribenu lifnei ihoh. vesamakh yado 'al rosh qarebano ushekhato petakh 'ohel mo'ed vezarequ benei 'aharon hakohanim 'et hadam 'al hamizbeiakh sabib. vehiqrib mizebakh hashelamim 'isheh ihoh 'et hakheileb hamkhaseh 'et haqereb ve'et kal hakheileb 'asher 'al haqereb. ve'et shetei hakelayot ve'et hakheileb 'asher 'aleihen 'asher 'al hakesalim ve'et hayoteret 'al hakabed 'al hakelayot yesirenah. vehiqtiru 'oto benei 'aharon hamizbeikhah 'al ha'olah 'asher 'al ha'eizim 'asher 'al ha'esh 'isheh reiakh nikhoakh ihoh. ve'im min hazon qarebano lezebakh shelamim ihoh zakhar 'o neqeibah tamim yaqribenu. 'im keseb hu maqrib 'et qarebano vehiqrib 'oto lifnei ihoh. vesamakh 'et yado 'al rosh qarebano veshakhat 'oto lifnei 'ohel mo'ed vezarequ benei 'aharon 'et damo 'al hamizbeiakh sabib. vehiqrib mizebakh hashelamim 'isheh ihoh khelbo ha'alyah temimah le'umat he'azeh yesirenah ve'et hakheileb hamkhaseh 'et haqereb ve'et kal hakheileb 'asher 'al haqereb. ve'et shetei hakelayot ve'et hakheileb 'asher 'aleihen 'asher 'al hakesalim ve'et hayoteret 'al hakabed 'al hakelayot yesirenah. vehiqtiro hakohen hamizbeikhah lekhem 'isheh ihoh. ve'im 'ez qarebano vehiqribo lifnei ihoh. vesamakh 'et yado 'al rosho veshakhat 'oto lifnei 'ohel mo'ed vezarequ benei 'aharon 'et damo 'al hamizbeiakh sabib. vehiqrib mimenu qarebano 'isheh ihoh 'et hakheileb hamkhaseh 'et haqereb ve'et kal hakheileb 'asher 'al haqereb. ve'et shetei hakelayot ve'et hakheileb 'asher 'aleihen 'asher 'al hakesalim ve'et hayoteret 'al hakabed 'al hakelayot yesirenah. vehiqtiram hakohen hamizbeikhah lekhem 'isheh lereiakh nikhoakh kal kheileb ihoh. khuqat 'olam ledoroteikhem bekhol mosheboteikhem kal kheileb vekhal dam lo tokheilu. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. daber 'el benei yisra'el leimor nefesh ki tekheta bishgagah mikol mizvot ihoh 'asher lo tei'asenah ve'asah mei'akhat meihenah. 'im hakohen hamashiakh yekheta le'ashmat ha'am vehiqrib 'al khatato 'asher khata par ben baqar tamim ihoh lekhatat. veheibi 'et hapar 'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed lifnei ihoh vesamakh 'et yado 'al rosh hapar veshakhat 'et hapar lifnei ihoh. velaqakh hakohen hamashiakh midam hapar veheibi 'oto 'el 'ohel mo'ed. vetabal hakohen 'et 'ezba'o badam vehizah min hadam sheba' pe'amim lifnei ihoh 'et penei parokhet haqodesh. venatan hakohen min hadam 'al qarnot mizbakh qetoret hasamim lifnei ihoh 'asher be'ohel mo'ed ve'et kal dam hapar yishpokh 'el yesod mizbakh ha'olah 'asher petakh 'ohel mo'ed. ve'et kal kheileb par hakhatat yarim mimenu 'et hakheileb hamkhaseh 'al haqereb ve'et kal hakheileb 'asher 'al haqereb. ve'et shetei hakelayot ve'et hakheileb 'asher 'aleihen 'asher 'al hakesalim ve'et hayoteret 'al hakabed 'al hakelayot yesirenah. ka'asher yuram mishor zebakh hashelamim vehiqtiram hakohen 'al mizbakh ha'olah. ve'et 'or hapar ve'et kal besaro 'al rosho ve'al kera'av veqirbo ufirsho. vehozi 'et kal hapar 'el mikhuz lamakhaneh 'el maqom tahor 'el shefekh hadeshen vesaraf 'oto 'al 'eizim ba'esh 'al shefekh hadeshen yisaref. ve'im kal 'adat yisra'el yishgu vene'lam dabar mei'einei haqahal ve'asu 'akhat mikal mizvot ihoh 'asher lo tei'asenah ve'asheimu. venod'ah hakhatat 'asher khate'u 'aleha vehiqribu haqahal par ben baqar lekhatat veheibi'u 'oto lifnei 'ohel mo'ed. vesamekhu ziqnei ha'eidah 'et yedeihem 'al rosh hapar lifnei ihoh veshakhat 'et hapar lifnei ihoh. veheibi hakohen hamashiakh midam hapar 'el 'ohel mo'ed. vetabal hakohen 'ezba'o min hadam vehizah sheba' pe'amim lifnei ihoh 'et penei haparokhet. umin hadam yiten 'al qarnot hamizbeiakh 'asher lifnei ihoh 'asher be'ohel mo'ed ve'et kal hadam yishpokh 'el yesod mizbakh ha'olah 'asher petakh 'ohel mo'ed. ve'et kal khelbo yarim mimenu vehiqtir hamizbeikhah. ve'asah lapar ka'asher 'asah lefar hakhatat ken ya'aseh lo vekhiper 'aleihem hakohen venislakh lahem. vehozi 'et hapar 'el mikhuz lamakhaneh vesaraf 'oto ka'asher saraf 'et hapar harishon khatat haqahal hu. 'asher nasi yekheta ve'asah 'akhat mikal mizvot ihoh 'elohav 'asher lo tei'asenah bishgagah ve'ashem. 'o hoda' 'eilav khatato 'asher khata bah veheibi 'et qarebano se'ir 'izim zakhar tamim. vesamakh yado 'al rosh hasa'ir veshakhat 'oto bimqom 'asher yishkhat 'et ha'olah lifnei ihoh khatat hu. velaqakh hakohen midam hakhatat be'ezba'o venatan 'al qarnot mizbakh ha'olah ve'et damo yishpokh 'el yesod mizbakh ha'olah. ve'et kal khelbo yaqtir hamizbeikhah kekheileb zebakh hashelamim vekhiper 'alav hakohen meikhatato venislakh lo. ve'im nefesh 'akhat tekheta bishgagah mei'am ha'arez ba'asotah 'akhat mimizvot ihoh 'asher lo tei'asenah ve'ashem. 'o hoda' 'eilav khatato 'asher khata veheibi qarebano se'irat 'izim temimah neqeibah 'al khatato 'asher khata. vesamakh 'et yado 'al rosh hakhatat veshakhat 'et hakhatat bimqom ha'olah. velaqakh hakohen midamah be'ezba'o venatan 'al qarnot mizbakh ha'olah ve'et kal damah yishpokh 'el yesod hamizbeiakh. ve'et kal khelbah yasir ka'asher husar kheileb mei'al zebakh hashelamim vehiqtir hakohen hamizbeikhah lereiakh nikhoakh ihoh vekhiper 'alav hakohen venislakh lo. ve'im kebes yabi qarebano lekhatat neqeibah temimah yebi'enah. vesamakh 'et yado 'al rosh hakhatat veshakhat 'otah lekhatat bimqom 'asher yishkhat 'et ha'olah. velaqakh hakohen midam hakhatat be'ezba'o venatan 'al qarnot mizbakh ha'olah ve'et kal damah yishpokh 'el yesod hamizbeiakh. ve'et kal khelbah yasir ka'asher yusar kheileb hakeseb mizebakh hashelamim vehiqtir hakohen 'otam hamizbeikhah 'al 'ishei ihoh vekhiper 'alav hakohen 'al khatato 'asher khata venislakh lo. venefesh ki tekheta veshame'ah qol 'alah vehu 'ed 'o ra'ah 'o yada' 'im lo yagid venasa 'avono. 'o nefesh 'asher tiga' bekhal dabar tamei 'o beniblat khayah temei'ah 'o beniblat beheimah temei'ah 'o beniblat sherez tamei vene'lam mimenu vehu tamei ve'ashem. 'o khi yiga' betum'at 'adam lekhol tum'ato 'asher yitma bah vene'lam mimenu vehu yada' ve'ashem. 'o nefesh ki tishaba' lebatei bisfatayim lehara' 'o leheitib lekhol 'asher yebatei ha'adam bishbu'ah vene'lam mimenu vehu yada' ve'ashem le'akhat mei'eleh. vehayah khi ye'sham le'akhat mei'eleh vehitvadah 'asher khata 'aleha. veheibi 'et 'ashamo ihoh 'al khatato 'asher khata neqeibah min hazon kisbah 'o se'irat 'izim lekhatat vekhiper 'alav hakohen meikhatato. ve'im lo tagi' yado dei seh veheibi 'et 'ashamo 'asher khata shetei torim 'o shenei benei yonah ihoh 'ekhad lekhatat ve'ekhad le'olah. veheibi 'otam 'el hakohen vehiqrib 'et 'asher lakhatat rishonah umalaq 'et rosho mimul 'arepo velo yabdil. vehizah midam hakhatat 'al qir hamizbeiakh vehanish'ar badam yimazeh 'el yesod hamizbeiakh khatat hu. ve'et hasheini ya'aseh 'olah kamishpat vekhiper 'alav hakohen meikhatato 'asher khata venislakh lo. ve'im lo tasig yado lishtei torim 'o lishnei benei yonah veheibi 'et qarebano 'asher khata 'asirit ha'eifah solet lekhatat lo yasim 'aleha shemen velo yiten 'aleha lebonah ki khatat hi. vehebi'ah 'el hakohen veqamaz hakohen mimenah melo qumzo 'et 'azkaratah vehiqtir hamizbeikhah 'al 'ishei ihoh khatat hi vekhiper 'alav hakohen 'al khatato 'asher khata mei'akhat mei'eleh venislakh lo vehayetah lakohen kaminkhah. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. nefesh ki tim'ol ma'al vekhate'ah bishgagah miqadeshei ihoh veheibi 'et 'ashamo ihoh 'ayil tamim min hazon be'erkekha kesef sheqalim besheqel haqodesh le'asham. ve'et 'asher khata min haqodesh yeshalem ve'et khamishito yosef 'alav venatan 'oto lakohen vehakohen yekhaper 'alav be'el ha'asham venislakh lo. ve'im nefesh ki tekheta ve'asetah 'akhat mikal mizvot ihoh 'asher lo tei'asenah velo yada' ve'ashem venasa 'avono. veheibi 'ayil tamim min hazon be'erkekha le'asham 'el hakohen vekhiper 'alav hakohen 'al shiggato 'asher shagag vehu lo yada' venislakh lo. 'asham hu 'ashom 'asham ihoh. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. nefesh ki tekheta uma'alah ma'al ihoh vekhikhesh ba'amito befiqadon 'o bitsumet yad 'o begazel 'o 'ashaq 'et 'amito. 'o maza 'abeidah vekhikhesh bah venishba' 'al shaqer 'al 'akhat mikol 'asher ya'aseh ha'adam lakhato bahenah. vehayah ki yekheta ve'ashem veheishib 'et hagezeilah 'asher gazal 'o 'et ha'osheq 'asher 'ashaq 'o 'et hapiqadon 'asher hafeqad 'ito 'o 'et ha'abeidah 'asher maza. 'o mikol 'asher yishaba' 'alav lasheqer veshilam 'oto berosho vakhamishitav yosef 'alav la'asher hu lo yitenenu beyom 'ashmato. ve'et 'ashamo yabi ihoh 'ayil tamim min hazon be'erkekha le'asham 'el hakohen. vekhiper 'alav hakohen lifnei ihoh venislakh lo 'al 'akhat mikol 'asher ya'aseh le'ashmah bah. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. zav 'et 'aharon ve'et banav leimor zot torat ha'olah hi ha'olah 'al moqdah 'al hamizbeiakh kal halaylah 'ad haboqer ve'esh hamizbeiakh tuqad bo. velabash hakohen mido bad umikhnesei bad yilbash 'al besaro veheirim 'et hadeshen 'asher tokhal ha'esh 'et ha'olah 'al hamizbeiakh vesamo 'eizel hamizbeiakh. ufashat 'et begadav velabash begadim 'akheirim vehozi 'et hadeshen 'el mikhuz lamakhaneh 'el maqom tahor. veha'esh 'al hamizbeiakh tuqad bo lo tikhbeh ubi'er 'aleha hakohen 'eizim baboqer baboqer ve'arakh 'aleha ha'olah vehiqtir 'aleha khelbei hashelamim. 'esh tamid tuqad 'al hamizbeiakh lo tikhbeh vezot torat haminkhah haqreb 'otah benei 'aharon lifnei ihoh 'el penei hamizbeiakh. veheirim mimenu bequmzo misolet haminkhah umishamnah ve'et kal halebonah 'asher 'al haminkhah vehiqtir hamizbeiakh reiakh nikhoakh 'azkaratah ihoh. vehanoteret mimenah yokhelu 'aharon ubanav mazot tei'akhel bemaqom qadosh bakhazar 'ohel mo'ed yokheluha. lo tei'afeh khamez khelqam natati 'otah mei'ishai qodesh qadashim hi kakhatat vekha'asham. kal zakhar bibnei 'aharon yokhalenah khaq 'olam ledoroteikhem mei'ishei ihoh kol 'asher yiga' bahem yiqdash. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. zeh qareban 'aharon ubanav 'asher yaqribu ihoh beyom himashakh 'oto 'asirit ha'eifah solet minkhah tamid makhazitah baboqer umakhazitah ba'areb. 'al makhabat bashemen tei'aseh murbekhet tebi'enah tufinei minkhat pitim taqrib reiakh nikhoakh ihoh. vehakohen hamashiakh takhtav mibanav ya'aseh 'otah khaq 'olam ihoh kalil taqetar. vekhal minkhat kohen kalil tihyeh lo tei'akhel. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. daber 'el 'aharon ve'el banav leimor zot torat hakhatat bimqom 'asher tishakhet ha'olah tishakhet hakhatat lifnei ihoh qodesh qadashim hi hakohen hamkhatei 'otah yokhalenah bemaqom qadosh tei'akhel bakhazar 'ohel mo'ed. kol 'asher yiga' bibsarah yiqdash va'asher yizeh midamah 'al habeged 'asher yizeh 'aleha tekhabes bemaqom qadosh. ukheli kheres 'asher tebushal bo yishaber ve'im bikhli nekhoshet bushalah umoraq veshutaf bamayim. kal zakhar bakohanim yokhal 'otah qodesh qadashim hi vekhal khatat 'asher yuba midamah 'el 'ohel mo'ed lekhaper baqodesh lo tei'akhel ba'esh tisaref. vezot torat ha'asham qodesh qadashim hu. bimqom 'asher yishkhatu 'et ha'olah yishkhatu 'et ha'asham ve'et damo yizroq 'al hamizbeiakh sabib. ve'et kal khelbo yaqrib mimenu 'et ha'alyah ve'et hakheileb hamkhaseh 'et haqereb. ve'et shetei hakelayot ve'et hakheileb 'asher 'aleihen 'asher 'al hakesalim ve'et hayoteret 'al hakabed 'al hakelayot yesirenah. vehiqtir 'otam hakohen hamizbeikhah 'isheh ihoh 'asham hu. kal zakhar bakohanim yokhelenu bemaqom qadosh yei'akhel qodesh qadashim hu. kakhatat ka'asham torah 'akhat lahem hakohen 'asher yekhaper bo lo yihyeh. vehakohen hamaqrib 'et 'olat 'ish 'or ha'olah 'asher hiqrib lakohen lo yihyeh. vekhal minkhah 'asher tei'afeh batanur vekhal na'asah bamarkheshet ve'al makhabat lakohen hamaqrib 'otah lo tihyeh. vekhal minkhah belulah bashemen vakhareibah lekhal benei 'aharon tihyeh 'ish ke'akhiv. vezot torat zebakh hashelamim 'asher yaqrib ihoh. 'im 'al todah yaqribenu vehiqrib 'al zebakh hatodah khalot mazot belulot bashemen ureqiqei mazot meshukhim bashamen vesolet murbekhet khalot belulot bashamen. 'al khalot lekhem khamez yaqrib qarebano 'al zebakh todat shelamav. vehiqrib mimenu 'ekhad mikal qarban terumah ihoh lakohen hazoreq 'et dam hashelamim lo yihyeh. ubesar zebakh todat shelamav beyom qarebano yei'akhel lo yaniakh mimenu 'ad boqer. ve'im neder 'o nedabah zebakh qarebano beyom haqribo 'et zibkho yei'akhel umimakhorat vehanotar mimenu yei'akhel. vehanotar mibesar hazabakh bayom hashelishi ba'esh yisaref. ve'im hei'akhol yei'akhel mibesar zebakh shelamav bayom hashelishi lo yeirazeh hamaqrib 'oto lo yeikhasheb lo pigul yihyeh vehanefesh ha'okhelet mimenu 'avonah tisa. vehabasar 'asher yiga' bekhal tamei lo yei'akhel ba'esh yisaref vehabasar kal tahor yokhal basar. vehanefesh 'asher tokhal basar mizebakh hashelamim 'asher ihoh vetum'ato 'alav venikhretah hanefesh hahiv mei'ameha. venefesh ki tiga' bekhal tamei betum'at 'adam 'o bibheimah temei'ah 'o bekhal sheqez tamei ve'akhal mibesar zebakh hashelamim 'asher ihoh venikhretah hanefesh hahiv mei'ameha. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. daber 'el benei yisra'el leimor kal kheileb shor vekheseb va'ez lo tokheilu. vekheileb nebeilah vekheileb tereifah yei'aseh lekhal melakhah ve'akhol lo tokheluhu. ki kal 'okhel kheileb min habeheimah 'asher yaqrib mimenah 'isheh ihoh venikhretah hanefesh ha'okhelet mei'ameha. vekhal dam lo tokhelu bekhol mosheboteikhem la'of velabeheimah. kal nefesh 'asher tokhal kal dam venikhretah hanefesh hahiv mei'ameha. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. daber 'el benei yisra'el leimor hamaqrib 'et zebakh shelamav ihoh yabi 'et qarebano ihoh mizebakh shelamav. yadav tebi'enah 'et 'ishei ihoh 'et hakheileb 'al hekhazeh yebi'enu 'et hekhazeh lehanif 'oto tenufah lifnei ihoh. vehiqtir hakohen 'et hakheileb hamizbeikhah vehayah hekhazeh le'aharon ulebanav. ve'et shoq hayamin titenu terumah lakohen mizibkhei shalmeikhem. hamaqrib 'et dam hashelamim ve'et hakheileb mibenei 'aharon lo tihyeh shoq hayamin lemanah. ki 'et khazeh hatenufah ve'et shoq haterumah laqakhti mei'et benei yisra'el mizibkhei shalmeihem va'eten 'otam le'aharon hakohen ulebanav lekhaq 'olam mei'et benei yisra'el. zot mishkhat 'aharon umishkhat banav mei'ishei ihoh beyom hiqrib 'otam lekhahen ihoh. 'asher zivah ihoh latet lahem beyom mashekho 'otam mei'et benei yisra'el khuqat 'olam ledorotam. zot hatorah la'olah laminkhah velakhatat vela'asham velamilu'im ulezebakh hashelamim. 'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh behar sinai beyom zavoto 'et benei yisra'el lehaqrib 'et qarebeneihem ihoh bemidbar sinai. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. qakh 'et 'aharon ve'et banav 'ito ve'et habegadim ve'et shemen hamishkhah ve'et par hakhatat ve'et shenei ha'eilim ve'et sal hamazot. ve'et kal ha'eidah haqhel 'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed. vaya'as mosheh ka'asher zivah ihoh 'oto vatiqahel ha'eidah 'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed. vayomer mosheh 'el ha'eidah zeh hadabar 'asher zivah ihoh la'asot. vayaqreb mosheh 'et 'aharon ve'et banav vayirkhaz 'otam bamayim. vayiten 'alav 'et hakutonet vayakhgor 'oto ba'abnet vayalbesh 'oto 'et hame'il vayiten 'alav 'et ha'eifod vayakhgor 'oto bekheisheb ha'eifod vaye'pod lo bo. vayasem 'alav 'et hakhoshen vayiten 'el hakhoshen 'et ha'urim ve'et hatumim. vayasem 'et hamiznefet 'al rosho vayasem 'al hamiznefet 'el mul panav 'et ziz hazahab neizer haqodesh ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. vayiqakh mosheh 'et shemen hamishkhah vayimshakh 'et hamishkan ve'et kal 'asher bo vayqadesh 'otam. vayaz mimenu 'al hamizbeiakh sheba' pe'amim vayimshakh 'et hamizbeiakh ve'et kal keilav ve'et hakiyor ve'et kano leqadesham. vayizoq mishemen hamishkhah 'al rosh 'aharon vayimshakh 'oto leqadesho. vayaqreb mosheh 'et benei 'aharon vayalbishem kutonot vayakhgor 'otam 'abnet vayakhabosh lahem migba'ot ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. vayagesh 'et par hakhatat vayismokh 'aharon ubanav 'et yedeihem 'al rosh par hakhatat. vayishkhat vayiqakh mosheh 'et hadam vayiten 'al qarnot hamizbeiakh sabib be'ezba'o vaykhatei 'et hamizbeiakh ve'et hadam yazaq 'el yesod hamizbeiakh vayqadesheihu lekhaper 'alav. vayiqakh 'et kal hakheileb 'asher 'al haqereb ve'et yoteret hakabed ve'et shetei hakelayot ve'et khelbehen vayaqter mosheh hamizbeikhah. ve'et hapar ve'et 'oro ve'et besaro ve'et pirsho saraf ba'esh mikhuz lamakhaneh ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. vayaqreb 'et 'el ha'olah vayismekhu 'aharon ubanav 'et yedeihem 'al rosh ha'ayil. vayishkhat vayizroq mosheh 'et hadam 'al hamizbeiakh sabib. ve'et ha'ayil nitakh lintakhav vayaqter mosheh 'et harosh ve'et hanetakhim ve'et hapader. ve'et haqereb ve'et hakera'ayim rakhaz bamayim vayaqter mosheh 'et kal ha'ayil hamizbeikhah 'olah hu lereiakh nikhoakh 'isheh hu ihoh ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. vayaqreb 'et ha'ayil hasheini 'el hamilu'im vayismekhu 'aharon ubanav 'et yedeihem 'al rosh ha'ayil. vayishkhat vayiqakh mosheh midamo vayiten 'al tenukh 'ozen 'aharon haymanit ve'al bohen yado haymanit ve'al bohen raglo haymanit. vayaqreb 'et benei 'aharon vayiten mosheh min hadam 'al tenukh 'azenam haymanit ve'al bohen yadam haymanit ve'al bohen raglam haymanit vayizroq mosheh 'et hadam 'al hamizbeiakh sabib. vayiqakh 'et hakheileb ve'et ha'alyah ve'et kal hakheileb 'asher 'al haqereb ve'et yoteret hakabed ve'et shetei hakelayot ve'et khelbehen ve'et shoq hayamin. umisal hamazot 'asher lifnei ihoh laqakh khalat mazah 'akhat vekhalat lekhem shemen 'akhat veraqiq 'ekhad vayasem 'al hakhalabim ve'al shoq hayamin. vayiten 'et hakol 'al kapei 'aharon ve'al kapei banav vayanef 'otam tenufah lifnei ihoh. vayiqakh mosheh 'otam mei'al kapeihem vayaqter hamizbeikhah 'al ha'olah milu'im hem lereiakh nikhoakh 'isheh hu ihoh. vayiqakh mosheh 'et hekhazeh vaynifeihu tenufah lifnei ihoh mei'el hamilu'im lemosheh hayah lemanah ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. vayiqakh mosheh mishemen hamishkhah umin hadam 'asher 'al hamizbeiakh vayaz 'al 'aharon 'al begadav ve'al banav ve'al bigdei banav 'ito vayqadesh 'et 'aharon 'et begadav ve'et banav ve'et bigdei banav 'ito. vayomer mosheh 'el 'aharon ve'el banav bashelu 'et habasar petakh 'ohel mo'ed vesham tokhelu 'oto ve'et halekhem 'asher besal hamilu'im ka'asher ziveiti leimor 'aharon ubanav yokheluhu. vehanotar babasar ubalakhem ba'esh tisrofu. umipetakh 'ohel mo'ed lo teize'u shib'at yamim 'ad yom melot yemei milu'eikhem ki shib'at yamim yemalei 'et yedkhem. ka'asher 'asah bayom hazeh zivah ihoh la'asot lekhaper 'aleikhem. ufetakh 'ohel mo'ed teishebu yomam valaylah shib'at yamim ushemartem 'et mishmeret ihoh velo tamutu ki khen zuveiti. vaya'as 'aharon ubanav 'et kal hadebarim 'asher zivah ihoh beyad mosheh. vayhi bayom hashemini qara mosheh le'aharon ulebanav uleziqnei yisra'el. vayomer 'el 'aharon qakh lekha 'eigel ben baqar lekhatat ve'ayil le'olah temimim vehaqreb lifnei ihoh. ve'el benei yisra'el tedaber leimor qekhu se'ir 'izim lekhatat ve'eigel vakhebes benei shanah temimim le'olah. veshor va'ayil lishlamim lizboakh lifnei ihoh uminkhah belulah bashamen ki hayom ihoh nir'ah 'aleikhem. vayiqkhu 'et 'asher zivah mosheh 'el penei 'ohel mo'ed vayiqrebu kal ha'eidah vaya'amdu lifnei ihoh. vayomer mosheh zeh hadabar 'asher zivah ihoh ta'asu veyeira 'aleikhem kebod ihoh. vayomer mosheh 'el 'aharon qerab 'el hamizbeiakh va'aseh 'et khatatekha ve'et 'olatekha vekhaper ba'adkha ube'ad ha'am va'aseh 'et qareban ha'am vekhaper ba'adam ka'asher zivah ihoh. vayiqrab 'aharon 'el hamizbeiakh vayishkhat 'et 'eigel hakhatat 'asher lo. vayaqribu benei 'aharon 'et hadam 'eilav vayitbol 'ezba'o badam vayiten 'al qarnot hamizbeiakh ve'et hadam yazaq 'el yesod hamizbeiakh. ve'et hakheileb ve'et hakelayot ve'et hayoteret min hakabed min hakhatat hiqtir hamizbeikhah ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. ve'et habasar ve'et ha'or saraf ba'esh mikhuz lamakhaneh. vayishkhat 'et ha'olah vayamzi'u benei 'aharon 'eilav 'et hadam vayizreqeihu 'al hamizbeiakh sabib. ve'et ha'olah himzi'u 'eilav lintakheha ve'et harosh vayaqter 'al hamizbeiakh. vayirkhaz 'et haqereb ve'et hakera'ayim vayaqter 'al ha'olah hamizbeikhah. vayaqreb 'et qareban ha'am vayiqakh 'et se'ir hakhatat 'asher la'am vayishkhateihu vaykhate'eihu karishon. vayaqreb 'et ha'olah vaya'aseha kamishpat. vayaqreb 'et haminkhah vaymalei khapo mimenah vayaqter 'al hamizbeiakh milebad 'olat haboqer. vayishkhat 'et hashor ve'et ha'ayil zebakh hashelamim 'asher la'am vayamzi'u benei 'aharon 'et hadam 'eilav vayizreqeihu 'al hamizbeiakh sabib. ve'et hakhalabim min hashor umin ha'ayil ha'alyah vehamkhaseh vehakelayot veyoteret hakabed. vayasimu 'et hakhalabim 'al hekhazot vayaqter hakhalabim hamizbeikhah. ve'et hekhazot ve'et shoq hayamin heinif 'aharon tenufah lifnei ihoh ka'asher zivah mosheh. vayisa 'aharon 'et yado yadav 'el ha'am vaybarekhem vayeired mei'asot hakhatat veha'olah vehashelamim. vayabo mosheh ve'aharon 'el 'ohel mo'ed vayeize'u vaybarakhu 'et ha'am vayeira khebod ihoh 'el kal ha'am. vateizei 'esh milifnei ihoh vatokhal 'al hamizbeiakh 'et ha'olah ve'et hakhalabim vayar kal ha'am vayaronu vayipelu 'al peneihem. vayiqkhu benei 'aharon nadab va'abihu 'ish makhtato vayitenu bahen 'esh vayasimu 'aleha qetoret vayaqribu lifnei ihoh 'esh zarah 'asher lo zivah 'otam. vateizei 'esh milifnei ihoh vatokhal 'otam vayamutu lifnei ihoh. vayomer mosheh 'el 'aharon hu 'asher diber ihoh leimor biqrobai 'eqadesh ve'al penei khal ha'am 'ekabed vayidom 'aharon. vayiqra mosheh 'el misha'el ve'el 'elzafan benei 'uzi'el dod 'aharon vayomer 'aleihem qirbu se'u 'et 'akheikhem mei'et penei haqodesh 'el mikhuz lamakhaneh. vayiqrebu vayisa'um bekhutonotam 'el mikhuz lamakhaneh ka'asher diber mosheh. vayomer mosheh 'el 'aharon ule'el'azar ule'itamar banav rasheikhem 'al tifra'u ubigdeikhem lo tifromu velo tamutu ve'al kal ha'eidah yiqzof va'akheikhem kal bet yisra'el yibku 'et hasereifah 'asher saraf ihoh. umipetakh 'ohel mo'ed lo teize'u pen tamutu ki shemen mishkhat ihoh 'aleikhem vaya'asu kidbar mosheh. vaydaber ihoh 'el 'aharon leimor. yayin vesheikhar 'al teishet 'atah ubanekha 'itakh bebo'akhem 'el 'ohel mo'ed velo tamutu khuqat 'olam ledoroteikhem. ulahabdil ben haqodesh uben hakhol uben hatamei uben hatahor. ulehorot 'et benei yisra'el 'et kal hakhuqim 'asher diber ihoh 'aleihem beyad mosheh. vaydaber mosheh 'el 'aharon ve'el 'el'azar ve'el 'itamar banav hanotarim qekhu 'et haminkhah hanoteret mei'ishei ihoh ve'ikhluha mazot 'eizel hamizbeiakh ki qodesh qadashim hi va'akhaltem 'otah bemaqom qadosh ki khaqekha vekhaq banekha hi mei'ishei ihoh ki khen zuveiti. ve'et khazeh hatenufah ve'et shoq haterumah tokhelu bemaqom tahor 'atah ubanekha ubenotekha 'itakh ki khaqekha vekhaq banekha nitenu mizibkhei shalmei benei yisra'el. shoq haterumah vakhazeh hatenufah 'al 'ishei hakhalabim yabi'u lehanif tenufah lifnei ihoh vehayah lekha ulebanekha 'itekha lekhaq 'olam ka'asher zivah ihoh. ve'et se'ir hakhatat darosh darash mosheh vehineh soraf vayiqzof 'al 'el'azar ve'al 'itamar benei 'aharon hanotarim leimor. madua' lo 'akhaltem 'et hakhatat bimqom haqodesh ki qodesh qadashim hi ve'otah natan lakhem laset 'et 'avon ha'eidah lekhaper 'aleihem lifnei ihoh. hen lo huba 'et damah 'el haqodesh penimah 'akhol tokhelu 'otah baqodesh ka'asher ziveiti. vaydaber 'aharon 'el mosheh hen hayom hiqribu 'et khatatam ve'et 'olatam lifnei ihoh vatiqrenah 'oti ka'eleh ve'akhalti khatat hayom hayitab be'einei ihoh. vayishma' mosheh vayitab be'einav. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon leimor 'aleihem. daberu 'el benei yisra'el leimor zot hakhayah 'asher tokhelu mikal habeheimah 'asher 'al ha'arez. kol mafreset parsah veshosa'at shesa' perasot ma'alat geirah babeheimah 'otah tokheilu. 'akh 'et zeh lo tokhelu mima'alei hageirah umimafrisei haparsah 'et hagamal ki ma'aleh geirah hu ufarsah 'einenu mafris tamei hu lakhem. ve'et hashafan ki ma'aleh geirah hu ufarsah lo yafris tamei hu lakhem. ve'et ha'arnebet ki ma'alat geirah hi ufarsah lo hifrisah temei'ah hi lakhem. ve'et hakhazir ki mafris parsah hu veshosa' shesa' parsah vehu geirah lo yigar tamei hu lakhem. mibesaram lo tokheilu ubeniblatam lo tiga'u temei'im hem lakhem. 'et zeh tokhelu mikol 'asher bamayim kol 'asher lo senapir veqasqeset bamayim bayamim ubanekhalim 'otam tokheilu. vekhol 'asher 'en lo senapir veqasqeset bayamim ubanekhalim mikol sherez hamayim umikol nefesh hakhayah 'asher bamayim sheqez hem lakhem. vesheqez yihyu lakhem mibesaram lo tokheilu ve'et niblatam teshaqeizu. kol 'asher 'en lo senapir veqasqeset bamayim sheqez hu lakhem. ve'et 'eleh teshaqezu min ha'of lo yei'akhelu sheqez hem 'et hanesher ve'et haperes ve'et ha'azeniyah. ve'et hada'ah ve'et ha'ayah leminah. 'et kal 'oreb lemino. ve'et bat haya'anah ve'et hatakhmas ve'et hashakhaf ve'et hanez lemineihu. ve'et hakos ve'et hashalakh ve'et hayanshuf. ve'et hatinshemet ve'et haqa'at ve'et harakham. ve'et hakhasidah ha'anafah leminah ve'et hadukhifat ve'et ha'atalef. kol sherez ha'of haholekh 'al 'arba' sheqez hu lakhem. 'akh 'et zeh tokhelu mikol sherez ha'of haholekh 'al 'arba' 'asher lo lo khera'ayim mima'al leraglav lenater bahen 'al ha'arez. 'et 'eleh meihem tokheilu 'et ha'arbeh lemino ve'et hasale'am lemineihu ve'et hakhargol lemineihu ve'et hekhagab lemineihu. vekhol sherez ha'of 'asher lo 'arba' raglayim sheqez hu lakhem. ule'eleh titama'u kal hanogeia' beniblatam yitma 'ad ha'areb. vekhal hanosei miniblatam yekhabes begadav vetamei 'ad ha'areb. lekhal habeheimah 'asher hi mafreset parsah veshesa' 'einenah shosa'at vegeirah 'einenah ma'alah temei'im hem lakhem kal hanogeia' bahem yitma. vekhol holekh 'al kapav bekhal hakhayah haholekhet 'al 'arba' temei'im hem lakhem kal hanogeia' beniblatam yitma 'ad ha'areb. vehanosei 'et niblatam yekhabes begadav vetamei 'ad ha'areb temei'im hemah lakhem. vezeh lakhem hatamei basherez hashorez 'al ha'arez hakholed veha'akhbar vehazab lemineihu. veha'anaqah vehakoakh vehaleta'ah vehakhomet vehatinshamet. 'eleh hatemei'im lakhem bekhal hasharez kal hanogeia' bahem bemotam yitma 'ad ha'areb. vekhol 'asher yipol 'alav meihem bemotam yitma mikal keli 'ez 'o beged 'o 'or 'o saq kal keli 'asher yei'aseh melakhah bahem bamayim yuba vetamei 'ad ha'ereb vetaher. vekhal keli kheres 'asher yipol meihem 'el tokho kol 'asher betokho yitma ve'oto tishboru. mikal ha'okhel 'asher yei'akhel 'asher yabo 'alav mayim yitma vekhal mashqeh 'asher yishateh bekhal keli yitma. vekhol 'asher yipol miniblatam 'alav yitma tanur vekhirayim yutaz temei'im hem utemei'im yihyu lakhem. 'akh ma'yan ubor miqveh mayim yihyeh tahor venogeia' beniblatam yitma. vekhi yipol miniblatam 'al kal zera' zeirua' 'asher yizareia' tahor hu. vekhi yutan mayim 'al zera' venafal miniblatam 'alav tamei hu lakhem. vekhi yamut min habeheimah 'asher hi lakhem le'akhlah hanogeia' beniblatah yitma 'ad ha'areb. veha'okhel miniblatah yekhabes begadav vetamei 'ad ha'areb vehanosei 'et niblatah yekhabes begadav vetamei 'ad ha'areb. vekhal hasherez hashorez 'al ha'arez sheqez hu lo yei'akhel. kol holekh 'al gakhon vekhol holekh 'al 'arba' 'ad kal marbeh raglayim lekhal hasherez hashorez 'al ha'arez lo tokhelum ki sheqez hem. 'al teshaqezu 'et nafshoteikhem bekhal hasherez hashorez velo titame'u bahem venitmeitem bam. ki 'ani ihoh 'eloheikhem vehitqadishtem vihyitem qedoshim ki qadosh 'ani velo tetame'u 'et nafshoteikhem bekhal hasherez haromes 'al ha'arez. ki 'ani ihoh hama'aleh 'etkhem mei'erez mizrayim lihyot lakhem leilohim vihyitem qedoshim ki qadosh 'ani. zot torat habeheimah veha'of vekhol nefesh hakhayah haromeset bamayim ulekhal nefesh hashorezet 'al ha'arez. lehabdil ben hatamei uben hatahor uben hakhayah hane'ekhelet uben hakhayah 'asher lo tei'akhel. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. daber 'el benei yisra'el leimor 'ishah ki tazria' veyaledah zakhar vetame'ah shib'at yamim kimei nidat devotah titma. ubayom hashemini yimol besar 'arelato. usheloshim yom usheloshet yamim teisheb bidmei tahorah bekhal qodesh lo tiga' ve'el hamiqdash lo tabo 'ad melot yemei tahorah. ve'im neqeibah teiled vetame'ah shebu'ayim kenidatah veshishim yom vesheishet yamim teisheb 'al demei tahorah. ubimlot yemei tahorah leben 'o lebat tabi kebes ben shenato le'olah uben yonah 'o tor lekhatat 'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed 'el hakohen. vehiqribo lifnei ihoh vekhiper 'aleha vetaharah mimeqor dameha zot torat hayoledet lazakhar 'o laneqeibah. ve'im lo timza yadah dei seh velaqekhah shetei torim 'o shenei benei yonah 'ekhad le'olah ve'ekhad lekhatat vekhiper 'aleha hakohen vetaheirah. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon leimor. 'adam ki yihyeh be'or besaro se'et 'o sapakhat 'o baheret vehayah be'or besaro lenega' zara'at vehuba 'el 'aharon hakohen 'o 'el 'akhad mibanav hakohanim. vera'ah hakohen 'et hanega' be'or habasar vesei'ar banega' hafakh laban umar'eh hanega' 'amoq mei'or besaro nega' zara'at hu vera'ahu hakohen vetimei 'oto. ve'im baheret lebanah hi be'or besaro ve'amoq 'en mar'eha min ha'or use'arah lo hafakh laban vehisgir hakohen 'et hanega' shib'at yamim. vera'ahu hakohen bayom hashebi'i vehineh hanega' 'amad be'einav lo fasah hanega' ba'or vehisgiro hakohen shib'at yamim sheinit. vera'ah hakohen 'oto bayom hashebi'i sheinit vehineh keihah hanega' velo fasah hanega' ba'or vetiharo hakohen mispakhat hi vekhibes begadav vetaher. ve'im pasoh tifseh hamispakhat ba'or 'akharei heira'oto 'el hakohen letahorato venir'ah sheinit 'el hakohen. vera'ah hakohen vehineh pasetah hamispakhat ba'or vetime'o hakohen zara'at hi nega' zara'at ki tihyeh be'adam vehuba 'el hakohen. vera'ah hakohen vehineh se'et lebanah ba'or vehi hafekhah sei'ar laban umikhyat basar khai bas'et. zara'at noshenet hi be'or besaro vetime'o hakohen lo yasgirenu ki tamei hu. ve'im paroakh tifrakh hazara'at ba'or vekhisetah hazara'at 'et kal 'or hanega' meirosho ve'ad raglav lekhal mar'eh 'einei hakohen. vera'ah hakohen vehineh khisetah hazara'at 'et kal besaro vetihar 'et hanaga' kulo hafakh laban tahor hu. ubeyom heira'ot bo basar khai yitma. vera'ah hakohen 'et habasar hakhai vetime'o habasar hakhai tamei hu zara'at hu. 'o khi yashub habasar hakhai venehpakh lelaban uba 'el hakohen. vera'ahu hakohen vehineh nehpakh hanega' lelaban vetihar hakohen 'et hanega' tahor hu. ubasar ki yihyeh bo be'oro shekhin venirpa. vehayah bimqom hashekhin se'et lebanah 'o baheret lebanah 'adamdamet venir'ah 'el hakohen. vera'ah hakohen vehineh mar'eha shafal min ha'or use'arah hafakh laban vetime'o hakohen nega' zara'at hi bashekhin parakhah. ve'im yir'enah hakohen vehineh 'en bah sei'ar laban ushefalah 'einenah min ha'or vehi kheihah vehisgiro hakohen shib'at yamim. ve'im pasoh tifseh ba'or vetimei hakohen 'oto nega' hi ve'im takhteha ta'amod habaheret lo fasatah zarebet hashekhin hi vetiharo hakohen. 'o basar ki yihyeh be'oro mikhvat 'esh vehayetah mikhyat hamikhvah baheret lebanah 'adamdemet 'o lebanah. vera'ah 'otah hakohen vehineh nehpakh sei'ar laban babaheret umar'eha 'amoq min ha'or zara'at hi bamikhvah parakhah vetimei 'oto hakohen nega' zara'at hi ve'im yir'enah hakohen vehineh 'en babeheret sei'ar laban ushefalah 'einenah min ha'or vehiv kheihah vehisgiro hakohen shib'at yamim. vera'ahu hakohen bayom hashebi'i 'im pasoh tifseh ba'or vetimei hakohen 'oto nega' zara'at hi ve'im takhteha ta'amod habaheret lo fasetah ba'or vehiv kheihah se'et hamikhvah hi vetiharo hakohen ki zarebet hamikhvah hi ve'ish 'o 'ishah ki yihyeh bo naga' berosh 'o bezaqan. vera'ah hakohen 'et hanega' vehineh mar'eihu 'amoq min ha'or ubo sei'ar zahob daq vetimei 'oto hakohen neteq hu zara'at harosh 'o hazaqan hu. vekhi yir'eh hakohen 'et nega' haneteq vehineh 'en mar'eihu 'amoq min ha'or vesei'ar shakhor 'en bo vehisgir hakohen 'et nega' haneteq shib'at yamim. vera'ah hakohen 'et hanega' bayom hashebi'i vehineh lo fasah haneteq velo hayah bo sei'ar zahob umar'eh haneteq 'en 'amoq min ha'or. vehitgalakh ve'et haneteq lo yegaleiakh vehisgir hakohen 'et haneteq shib'at yamim sheinit. vera'ah hakohen 'et haneteq bayom hashebi'i vehineh lo fasah haneteq ba'or umar'eihu 'einenu 'amoq min ha'or vetihar 'oto hakohen vekhibes begadav vetaher. ve'im pasoh yifseh haneteq ba'or 'akharei tahorato. vera'ahu hakohen vehineh pasah haneteq ba'or lo yebaqer hakohen lasei'ar hazahob tamei hu. ve'im be'einav 'amad haneteq vesei'ar shakhor zamakh bo nirpa haneteq tahor hu vetiharo hakohen. ve'ish 'o 'ishah ki yihyeh be'or besaram beharot beharot lebanot. vera'ah hakohen vehineh be'or besaram beharot keihot lebanot bohaq hu parakh ba'or tahor hu. ve'ish ki yimaret rosho qeireiakh hu tahor hu. ve'im mipe'at panav yimaret rosho gibeiakh hu tahor hu. vekhi yihyeh baqarakhat 'o bagabakhat nega' laban 'adamdam zara'at porakhat hi beqarakhto 'o begabakhto. vera'ah 'oto hakohen vehineh se'et hanega' lebanah 'adamdemet beqarakhto 'o begabakhto kemar'eh zara'at 'or basar. 'ish zarua' hu tamei hu tamei yetame'enu hakohen berosho nig'o. vehazarua' 'asher bo hanega' begadav yihyu ferumim verosho yihyeh farua' ve'al safam ya'teh vetamei tamei yiqra. kal yemei 'asher hanega' bo yitma tamei hu badad yeisheb mikhuz lamakhaneh moshabo. vehabeged ki yihyeh bo nega' zara'at bebeged zemer 'o bebeged pishtim. 'o bishti 'o be'eireb lapishtim velazamer 'o be'or 'o bekhal melekhet 'or. vehayah hanega' yeraqraq 'o 'adamdam babeged 'o ba'or 'o basheti 'o ba'eireb 'o bekhal keli 'or nega' zara'at hu vehare'ah 'et hakohen. vera'ah hakohen 'et hanaga' vehisgir 'et hanega' shib'at yamim. vera'ah 'et hanega' bayom hashebi'i ki fasah hanega' babeged 'o basheti 'o ba'eireb 'o ba'or lekhol 'asher yei'aseh ha'or limlakhah zara'at mam'eret hanega' tamei hu. vesaraf 'et habeged 'o 'et hasheti 'o 'et ha'eireb bazemer 'o bapishtim 'o 'et kal keli ha'or 'asher yihyeh bo hanaga' ki zara'at mam'eret hi ba'esh tisaref. ve'im yir'eh hakohen vehineh lo fasah hanega' babeged 'o basheti 'o ba'eireb 'o bekhal keli 'or. vezivah hakohen vekhibesu 'et 'asher bo hanaga' vehisgiro shib'at yamim sheinit. vera'ah hakohen 'akharei hukabes 'et hanega' vehineh lo hafakh hanega' 'et 'eino vehanega' lo fasah tamei hu ba'esh tisrefenu pekhetet hi beqarakhto 'o begabakhto. ve'im ra'ah hakohen vehineh keihah hanega' 'akharei hukabes 'oto veqara' 'oto min habeged 'o min ha'or 'o min hasheti 'o min ha'eireb. ve'im teira'eh 'od babeged 'o basheti 'o ba'eireb 'o bekhal keli 'or porakhat hi ba'esh tisrefenu 'et 'asher bo hanaga'. vehabeged 'o hasheti 'o ha'eireb 'o khal keli ha'or 'asher tekhabes vesar meihem hanaga' vekhubas sheinit vetaher. zot torat nega' zara'at beged hazemer 'o hapishtim 'o hasheti 'o ha'eireb 'o kal keli 'or letaharo 'o letame'o. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. zot tihyeh torat hamezora' beyom tahorato vehuba 'el hakohen. veyaza hakohen 'el mikhuz lamakhaneh vera'ah hakohen vehineh nirpa nega' hazara'at min hazarua'. vezivah hakohen velaqakh lamitaher shetei ziporim khayot tehorot ve'ez 'erez usheni tola'at ve'eizob. vezivah hakohen veshakhat 'et hazipor ha'ekhat 'el keli kheres 'al mayim khayim. 'et hazipor hakhayah yiqakh 'otah ve'et 'ez ha'erez ve'et sheni hatola'at ve'et ha'eizob vetabal 'otam ve'et hazipor hakhayah bedam hazipor hashekhutah 'al hamayim hakhayim. vehizah 'al hamitaher min hazara'at sheba' pe'amim vetiharo veshilakh 'et hazipor hakhayah 'al penei hasadeh. vekhibes hamitaher 'et begadav vegilakh 'et kal se'aro verakhaz bamayim vetaher ve'akhar yabo 'el hamakhaneh veyashab mikhuz le'aholo shib'at yamim. vehayah bayom hashebi'i yegalakh 'et kal se'aro 'et rosho ve'et zeqano ve'et gabot 'einav ve'et kal se'aro yegaleiakh vekhibes 'et begadav verakhaz 'et besaro bamayim vetaher. ubayom hashemini yiqakh shenei khebasim temimim vekhabsah 'akhat bat shenatah temimah usheloshah 'esronim solet minkhah belulah bashemen velog 'ekhad shamen. vehe'emid hakohen hamtaher 'et ha'ish hamitaher ve'otam lifnei ihoh petakh 'ohel mo'ed. velaqakh hakohen 'et hakebes ha'ekhad vehiqrib 'oto le'asham ve'et log hashamen veheinif 'otam tenufah lifnei ihoh. veshakhat 'et hakebes bimqom 'asher yishkhat 'et hakhatat ve'et ha'olah bimqom haqodesh ki kakhatat ha'asham hu lakohen qodesh qadashim hu. velaqakh hakohen midam ha'asham venatan hakohen 'al tenukh 'ozen hamitaher haymanit ve'al bohen yado haymanit ve'al bohen raglo haymanit. velaqakh hakohen milog hashamen veyazaq 'al kaf hakohen hasemalit. vetabal hakohen 'et 'ezba'o haymanit min hashemen 'asher 'al kapo hasemalit vehizah min hashemen be'ezba'o sheba' pe'amim lifnei ihoh. umiyeter hashemen 'asher 'al kapo yiten hakohen 'al tenukh 'ozen hamitaher haymanit ve'al bohen yado haymanit ve'al bohen raglo haymanit 'al dam ha'asham. vehanotar bashemen 'asher 'al kaf hakohen yiten 'al rosh hamitaher vekhiper 'alav hakohen lifnei ihoh. ve'asah hakohen 'et hakhatat vekhiper 'al hamitaher mitum'ato ve'akhar yishkhat 'et ha'olah. vehe'elah hakohen 'et ha'olah ve'et haminkhah hamizbeikhah vekhiper 'alav hakohen vetaher. ve'im dal hu ve'en yado maseget velaqakh kebes 'ekhad 'asham litnufah lekhaper 'alav ve'isaron solet 'ekhad balul bashemen leminkhah velog shamen. ushetei torim 'o shenei benei yonah 'asher tasig yado vehayah 'ekhad khatat veha'ekhad 'olah. veheibi 'otam bayom hashemini letahorato 'el hakohen 'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed lifnei ihoh. velaqakh hakohen 'et kebes ha'asham ve'et log hashamen veheinif 'otam hakohen tenufah lifnei ihoh. veshakhat 'et kebes ha'asham velaqakh hakohen midam ha'asham venatan 'al tenukh 'ozen hamitaher haymanit ve'al bohen yado haymanit ve'al bohen raglo haymanit. umin hashemen yizoq hakohen 'al kaf hakohen hasemalit. vehizah hakohen be'ezba'o haymanit min hashemen 'asher 'al kapo hasemalit sheba' pe'amim lifnei ihoh. venatan hakohen min hashemen 'asher 'al kapo 'al tenukh 'ozen hamitaher haymanit ve'al bohen yado haymanit ve'al bohen raglo haymanit 'al meqom dam ha'asham. vehanotar min hashemen 'asher 'al kaf hakohen yiten 'al rosh hamitaher lekhaper 'alav lifnei ihoh. ve'asah 'et ha'ekhad min hatorim 'o min benei hayonah mei'asher tasig yado. 'et 'asher tasig yado 'et ha'ekhad khatat ve'et ha'ekhad 'olah 'al haminkhah vekhiper hakohen 'al hamitaher lifnei ihoh. zot torat 'asher bo nega' zara'at 'asher lo tasig yado betahorato. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon leimor. ki tabo'u 'el 'erez kena'an 'asher 'ani noten lakhem la'akhuzah venatati nega' zara'at bebet 'erez 'akhuzatkhem. uba 'asher lo habayit vehigid lakohen leimor kenega' nir'ah li babayit. vezivah hakohen ufinu 'et habayit beterem yabo hakohen lir'ot 'et hanega' velo yitma kal 'asher babayit ve'akhar ken yabo hakohen lir'ot 'et habayit. vera'ah 'et hanega' vehineh hanega' beqirot habayit sheqa'arurot yeraqraqot 'o 'adamdamot umar'eihen shafal min haqir. veyaza hakohen min habayit 'el petakh habayit vehisgir 'et habayit shib'at yamim. veshab hakohen bayom hashebi'i vera'ah vehineh pasah hanega' beqirot habayit. vezivah hakohen vekhilezu 'et ha'abanim 'asher bahen hanaga' vehishlikhu 'ethen 'el mikhuz la'ir 'el maqom tamei. ve'et habayit yaqzia' mibayit sabib veshafekhu 'et he'afar 'asher hiqzu 'el mikhuz la'ir 'el maqom tamei. velaqekhu 'abanim 'akheirot veheibi'u 'el takhat ha'abanim ve'afar 'akher yiqakh vetakh 'et habayit. ve'im yashub hanega' ufarakh babayit 'akhar khilez 'et ha'abanim ve'akharei hiqzot 'et habayit ve'akharei hitoakh. uba hakohen vera'ah vehineh pasah hanega' babayit zara'at mam'eret hi babayit tamei hu. venataz 'et habayit 'et 'abanav ve'et 'eizav ve'et kal 'afar habayit vehozi 'el mikhuz la'ir 'el maqom tamei. vehaba 'el habayit kal yemei hisgir 'oto yitma 'ad ha'areb. vehashokheb babayit yekhabes 'et begadav veha'okhel babayit yekhabes 'et begadav. ve'im bo yabo hakohen vera'ah vehineh lo fasah hanega' babayit 'akharei hitoakh 'et habayit vetihar hakohen 'et habayit ki nirpa hanaga'. velaqakh lekhatei 'et habayit shetei ziporim ve'ez 'erez usheni tola'at ve'eizob. veshakhat 'et hazipor ha'ekhat 'el keli kheres 'al mayim khayim. velaqakh 'et 'ez ha'erez ve'et ha'eizob ve'et sheni hatola'at ve'et hazipor hakhayah vetabal 'otam bedam hazipor hashekhutah ubamayim hakhayim vehizah 'el habayit sheba' pe'amim. vekhitei 'et habayit bedam hazipor ubamayim hakhayim ubazipor hakhayah ube'ez ha'erez uba'eizob ubishni hatola'at. veshilakh 'et hazipor hakhayah 'el mikhuz la'ir 'el penei hasadeh vekhiper 'al habayit vetaher. zot hatorah lekhal nega' hazara'at velanateq. ulezara'at habeged velabayit. velas'et velasapakhat velabeharet. lehorot beyom hatamei ubeyom hatahor zot torat hazara'at. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon leimor. daberu 'el benei yisra'el va'amartem 'aleihem 'ish 'ish ki yihyeh zab mibesaro zobo tamei hu. vezot tihyeh tum'ato bezobo rar besaro 'et zobo 'o hekhtim besaro mizobo tum'ato hi kal hamishkab 'asher yishkab 'alav hazab yitma vekhal hakeli 'asher yeisheb 'alav yitma. ve'ish 'asher yiga' bemishkabo yekhabes begadav verakhaz bamayim vetamei 'ad ha'areb. vehayosheb 'al hakeli 'asher yeisheb 'alav hazab yekhabes begadav verakhaz bamayim vetamei 'ad ha'areb. vehanogeia' bibsar hazab yekhabes begadav verakhaz bamayim vetamei 'ad ha'areb. vekhi yaroq hazab batahor vekhibes begadav verakhaz bamayim vetamei 'ad ha'areb. vekhal hamerkab 'asher yirkab 'alav hazab yitma. vekhal hanogeia' bekhol 'asher yihyeh takhtav yitma 'ad ha'areb vehanosei 'otam yekhabes begadav verakhaz bamayim vetamei 'ad ha'areb. vekhol 'asher yiga' bo hazab veyadav lo shataf bamayim vekhibes begadav verakhaz bamayim vetamei 'ad ha'areb. ukheli kheres 'asher yiga' bo hazab yishaber vekhal keli 'ez yishatef bamayim. vekhi yithar hazab mizobo vesafar lo shib'at yamim letahorato vekhibes begadav verakhaz besaro bemayim khayim vetaher. ubayom hashemini yiqakh lo shetei torim 'o shenei benei yonah uba lifnei ihoh 'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed unetanam 'el hakohen. ve'asah 'otam hakohen 'ekhad khatat veha'ekhad 'olah vekhiper 'alav hakohen lifnei ihoh mizobo. ve'ish ki teizei mimenu shikhbat zara' verakhaz bamayim 'et kal besaro vetamei 'ad ha'areb. vekhal beged vekhal 'or 'asher yihyeh 'alav shikhbat zara' vekhubas bamayim vetamei 'ad ha'areb. ve'ishah 'asher yishkab 'ish 'otah shikhbat zara' verakhazu bamayim vetame'u 'ad ha'areb. ve'ishah ki tihyeh zabah dam yihyeh zobah bibsarah shib'at yamim tihyeh benidatah vekhal hanogeia' bah yitma 'ad ha'areb. vekhol 'asher tishkab 'alav benidatah yitma vekhol 'asher teisheb 'alav yitma. vekhal hanogeia' bemishkabah yekhabes begadav verakhaz bamayim vetamei 'ad ha'areb. vekhal hanogeia' bekhal keli 'asher teisheb 'alav yekhabes begadav verakhaz bamayim vetamei 'ad ha'areb. ve'im 'al hamishkab hu 'o 'al hakeli 'asher hi yoshebet 'alav benage'o bo yitma 'ad ha'areb. ve'im shakhob yishkab 'ish 'otah utehi nidatah 'alav vetamei shib'at yamim vekhal hamishkab 'asher yishkab 'alav yitma. ve'ishah ki yazub zob damah yamim rabim belo 'et nidatah 'o khi tazub 'al nidatah kal yemei zob tum'atah kimei nidatah tihyeh temei'ah hi kal hamishkab 'asher tishkab 'alav kal yemei zobah kemishkab nidatah yihyeh lah vekhal hakeli 'asher teisheb 'alav tamei yihyeh ketum'at nidatah. vekhal hanogeia' bam yitma vekhibes begadav verakhaz bamayim vetamei 'ad ha'areb. ve'im taharah mizobah vesaferah lah shib'at yamim ve'akhar tithar. ubayom hashemini tiqakh lah shetei torim 'o shenei benei yonah veheibi'ah 'otam 'el hakohen 'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed. ve'asah hakohen 'et ha'ekhad khatat ve'et ha'ekhad 'olah vekhiper 'aleha hakohen lifnei ihoh mizob tum'atah. vehizartem 'et benei yisra'el mitum'atam velo yamutu betum'atam betame'am 'et mishkani 'asher betokham. zot torat hazab va'asher teizei mimenu shikhbat zera' letame'ah bah. vehadavah benidatah vehazab 'et zobo lazakhar velaneqeibah ule'ish 'asher yishkab 'im temei'ah. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh 'akharei mot shenei benei 'aharon beqarebatam lifnei ihoh vayamutu. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh daber 'el 'aharon 'akhikha ve'al yabo bekhal 'et 'el haqodesh mibet laparokhet 'el penei hakaporet 'asher 'al ha'aron velo yamut ki be'anan 'eira'eh 'al hakaporet. bezot yabo 'aharon 'el haqodesh befar ben baqar lekhatat ve'ayil le'olah. ketonet bad qodesh yilbash umikhnesei bad yihyu 'al besaro ube'abnet bad yakhgor ubemiznefet bad yiznof bigdei qodesh hem verakhaz bamayim 'et besaro ulebeisham. umei'et 'adat benei yisra'el yiqakh shenei se'irei 'izim lekhatat ve'ayil 'ekhad le'olah. vehiqrib 'aharon 'et par hakhatat 'asher lo vekhiper ba'ado ube'ad beito. velaqakh 'et shenei hase'irim vehe'emid 'otam lifnei ihoh petakh 'ohel mo'ed. venatan 'aharon 'al shenei hase'irim goralot goral 'ekhad ihoh vegoral 'ekhad la'azazel. vehiqrib 'aharon 'et hasa'ir 'asher 'alah 'alav hagoral ihoh ve'asahu khatat. vehasa'ir 'asher 'alah 'alav hagoral la'azazel ya'omad khai lifnei ihoh lekhaper 'alav leshalakh 'oto la'azazel hamidbarah. vehiqrib 'aharon 'et par hakhatat 'asher lo vekhiper ba'ado ube'ad beito veshakhat 'et par hakhatat 'asher lo. velaqakh melo hamakhtah gakhalei 'esh mei'al hamizbeiakh milifnei ihoh umelo khafenav qetoret samim daqah veheibi mibet laparokhet. venatan 'et haqetoret 'al ha'esh lifnei ihoh vekhisah 'anan haqetoret 'et hakaporet 'asher 'al ha'eidut velo yamut. velaqakh midam hapar vehizah be'ezba'o 'al penei hakaporet qeidemah velifnei hakaporet yazeh sheba' pe'amim min hadam be'ezba'o. veshakhat 'et se'ir hakhatat 'asher la'am veheibi 'et damo 'el mibet laparokhet ve'asah 'et damo ka'asher 'asah ledam hapar vehizah 'oto 'al hakaporet velifnei hakaporet. vekhiper 'al haqodesh mitum'ot benei yisra'el umipish'eihem lekhal khatotam vekhen ya'aseh le'ohel mo'ed hashokhen 'itam betokh tum'otam. vekhal 'adam lo yihyeh be'ohel mo'ed bebo'o lekhaper baqodesh 'ad zeito vekhiper ba'ado ube'ad beito ube'ad kal qehal yisra'el. veyaza 'el hamizbeiakh 'asher lifnei ihoh vekhiper 'alav velaqakh midam hapar umidam hasa'ir venatan 'al qarnot hamizbeiakh sabib. vehizah 'alav min hadam be'ezba'o sheba' pe'amim vetiharo veqidesho mitum'ot benei yisra'el. vekhilah mikaper 'et haqodesh ve'et 'ohel mo'ed ve'et hamizbeiakh vehiqrib 'et hasa'ir hekhai. vesamakh 'aharon 'et shetei yado yadav 'al rosh hasa'ir hakhai vehitvadah 'alav 'et kal 'avonot benei yisra'el ve'et kal pish'eihem lekhal khatotam venatan 'otam 'al rosh hasa'ir veshilakh beyad 'ish 'iti hamidbarah. venasa hasa'ir 'alav 'et kal 'avonotam 'el 'erez gezeirah veshilakh 'et hasa'ir bamidbar. uba 'aharon 'el 'ohel mo'ed ufashat 'et bigdei habad 'asher labash bebo'o 'el haqodesh vehinikham sham. verakhaz 'et besaro bamayim bemaqom qadosh velabash 'et begadav veyaza ve'asah 'et 'olato ve'et 'olat ha'am vekhiper ba'ado ube'ad ha'am. ve'et kheileb hakhatat yaqtir hamizbeikhah. vehamshaleiakh 'et hasa'ir la'azazel yekhabes begadav verakhaz 'et besaro bamayim ve'akharei khen yabo 'el hamakhaneh. ve'et par hakhatat ve'et se'ir hakhatat 'asher huba 'et damam lekhaper baqodesh yozi 'el mikhuz lamakhaneh vesarefu ba'esh 'et 'orotam ve'et besaram ve'et pirsham. vehasoref 'otam yekhabes begadav verakhaz 'et besaro bamayim ve'akharei khen yabo 'el hamakhaneh. vehayetah lakhem lekhuqat 'olam bakhodesh hashebi'i be'asor lakhodesh te'anu 'et nafshoteikhem vekhal melakhah lo ta'asu ha'ezrakh vehager hagar betokhkhem. ki bayom hazeh yekhaper 'aleikhem letaher 'etkhem mikol khatoteikhem lifnei ihoh titharu. shabat shabaton hi lakhem ve'initem 'et nafshoteikhem khuqat 'olam. vekhiper hakohen 'asher yimshakh 'oto va'asher yemalei 'et yado lekhahen takhat 'abiv velabash 'et bigdei habad bigdei haqodesh. vekhiper 'et miqdash haqodesh ve'et 'ohel mo'ed ve'et hamizbeiakh yekhaper ve'al hakohanim ve'al kal 'am haqahal yekhaper. vehayetah zot lakhem lekhuqat 'olam lekhaper 'al benei yisra'el mikal khatotam 'akhat bashanah vaya'as ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. daber 'el 'aharon ve'el banav ve'el kal benei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem zeh hadabar 'asher zivah ihoh leimor.
