'ish 'ish mibet yisra'el 'asher yishkhat shor 'o kheseb 'o 'ez bamakhaneh 'o 'asher yishkhat mikhuz lamakhaneh. ve'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed lo hebi'o lehaqrib qarban ihoh lifnei mishkan ihoh dam yeikhasheb la'ish hahu dam shafakh venikhrat ha'ish hahu miqereb 'amo. lema'an 'asher yabi'u benei yisra'el 'et zibkheihem 'asher hem zobekhim 'al penei hasadeh vehebi'um ihoh 'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed 'el hakohen vezabekhu zibkhei shelamim ihoh 'otam. vezaraq hakohen 'et hadam 'al mizbakh ihoh petakh 'ohel mo'ed vehiqtir hakheileb lereiakh nikhoakh ihoh. velo yizbekhu 'od 'et zibkheihem lase'irim 'asher hem zonim 'akhareihem khuqat 'olam tihyeh zot lahem ledorotam. va'aleihem tomar 'ish 'ish mibet yisra'el umin hager 'asher yagur betokham 'asher ya'aleh 'olah 'o zabakh. ve'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed lo yebi'enu la'asot 'oto ihoh venikhrat ha'ish hahu mei'amav. ve'ish 'ish mibet yisra'el umin hager hagar betokham 'asher yokhal kal dam venatati fanai banefesh ha'okhelet 'et hadam vehikhrati 'otah miqereb 'amah. ki nefesh habasar badam hi va'ani netativ lakhem 'al hamizbeiakh lekhaper 'al nafshoteikhem ki hadam hu banefesh yekhaper. 'al ken 'amarti libnei yisra'el kal nefesh mikem lo tokhal dam vehager hagar betokhkhem lo yokhal dam. ve'ish 'ish mibenei yisra'el umin hager hagar betokham 'asher yazud zed khayah 'o 'of 'asher yei'akhel veshafakh 'et damo vekhisahu be'afar. ki nefesh kal basar damo benafsho hu va'omar libnei yisra'el dam kal basar lo tokheilu ki nefesh kal basar damo hi kal 'okhelav yikaret. vekhal nefesh 'asher tokhal nebeilah utereifah ba'ezrakh ubager vekhibes begadav verakhaz bamayim vetamei 'ad ha'ereb vetaher. ve'im lo yekhabes ubesaro lo yirkhaz venasa 'avono. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. daber 'el benei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem 'ani ihoh 'eloheikhem. kema'aseh 'erez mizrayim 'asher yeshabtem bah lo ta'asu ukhema'aseh 'erez kena'an 'asher 'ani meibi 'etkhem shamah lo ta'asu ubekhuqoteihem lo teileikhu. 'et mishpatai ta'asu ve'et khuqotai tishmeru lalekhet bahem 'ani ihoh 'eloheikhem. ushemartem 'et khuqotai ve'et mishpatai 'asher ya'aseh 'otam ha'adam vakhai bahem 'ani ihoh. 'ish 'ish 'el kal she'er besaro lo tiqrebu legalot 'ervah 'ani ihoh. 'ervat 'abikha ve'ervat 'imekha lo tegaleh 'imekha hi lo tegaleh 'ervatah. 'ervat 'eishet 'abikha lo tegaleh 'ervat 'abikha hi 'ervat 'akhotkha bat 'abikha 'o bat 'imekha moledet bayit 'o moledet khuz lo tegaleh 'ervatan. 'ervat bat binkha 'o bat bitekha lo tegaleh 'ervatan ki 'ervatekha henah. 'ervat bat 'eishet 'abikha moledet 'abikha 'akhotkha hi lo tegaleh 'ervatah. 'ervat 'akhot 'abikha lo tegaleh she'er 'abikha hi 'ervat 'akhot 'imekha lo tegaleh ki she'er 'imekha hi 'ervat 'akhi 'abikha lo tegaleh 'el 'ishto lo tiqrab dodatekha hi 'ervat kalatekha lo tegaleh 'eishet binkha hi lo tegaleh 'ervatah. 'ervat 'eishet 'akhikha lo tegaleh 'ervat 'akhikha hi 'ervat 'ishah ubitah lo tegaleh 'et bat benah ve'et bat bitah lo tiqakh legalot 'ervatah sha'arah henah zimah hi ve'ishah 'el 'akhotah lo tiqakh lizror legalot 'ervatah 'aleha bekhayeha. ve'el 'ishah benidat tum'atah lo tiqrab legalot 'ervatah. ve'el 'eishet 'amitekha lo titen shekhabetekha lezara' letame'ah bah. umizar'akha lo titen leha'abir lamolekh velo tekhalel 'et shem 'elohekha 'ani ihoh. ve'et zakhar lo tishkab mishkebei 'ishah to'eibah hi ubekhal beheimah lo titen shekhabetekha letame'ah bah ve'ishah lo ta'amod lifnei beheimah lerib'ah tebel hu. 'al titame'u bekhal 'eleh ki bekhal 'eleh nitme'u hagoyim 'asher 'ani meshaleiakh mipeneikhem. vatitma ha'arez va'efqod 'avonah 'aleha vataqi ha'arez 'et yoshebeha. ushemartem 'atem 'et khuqotai ve'et mishpatai velo ta'asu mikol hato'eibot ha'eleh ha'ezrakh vehager hagar betokhkhem. ki 'et kal hato'eibot ha'el 'asu 'anshei ha'arez 'asher lifneikhem vatitma ha'arez. velo taqi ha'arez 'etkhem betama'akhem 'otah ka'asher qa'ah 'et hago 'asher lifneikhem. ki kal 'asher ya'aseh mikol hato'eibot ha'eleh venikhretu hanefashot ha'osot miqereb 'amam. ushemartem 'et mishmarti lebilti 'asot meikhuqot hato'eibot 'asher na'asu lifneikhem velo titame'u bahem 'ani ihoh 'eloheikhem. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor daber 'el kal 'adat benei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem qedoshim tihyu ki qadosh 'ani ihoh 'eloheikhem. 'ish 'imo ve'abiv tira'u ve'et shabetotai tishmoru 'ani ihoh 'eloheikhem. 'al tifnu 'el ha'elilim veilohei maseikhah lo ta'asu lakhem 'ani ihoh 'eloheikhem. vekhi tizbekhu zebakh shelamim ihoh lirzonekhem tizbakhuhu. beyom zibkhakhem yei'akhel umimakhorat vehanotar 'ad yom hashelishi ba'esh yisaref. ve'im hei'akhol yei'akhel bayom hashelishi pigul hu lo yeirazeh. ve'okhelav 'avono yisa ki 'et qodesh ihoh khilel venikhretah hanefesh hahiv mei'ameha. ubequzrekhem 'et qezir 'arzekhem lo tekhaleh pe'at sadekha liqzor veleqet qezirekha lo telaqet. vekharmekha lo te'olel uferet karmekha lo telaqet le'ani velager ta'azob 'otam 'ani ihoh 'eloheikhem. lo tignobu velo tekhakhashu velo teshaqeru 'ish ba'amito. velo tishabe'u bishmi lashaqer vekhilalta 'et shem 'elohekha 'ani ihoh. lo ta'ashoq 'et rei'akha velo tigzol lo talin pe'ulat sakhir 'itekha 'ad boqer. lo teqalel kheiresh velifnei 'iver lo titen mikhshol veyareita mei'elohekha 'ani ihoh. lo ta'asu 'avel bamishpat lo tisa fenei dal velo tehdar penei gadol bezedeq tishpot 'amitekha. lo teilekh rakhil be'amekha lo ta'amod 'al dam rei'ekha 'ani ihoh. lo tisna 'et 'akhikha bilbabekha hokheiakh tokhiakh 'et 'amitekha velo tisa 'alav khet. lo tiqom velo titor 'et benei 'amekha ve'ahabta lerei'akha kamokha 'ani ihoh. 'et khuqotai tishmoru behemtekha lo tarbia' kil'ayim sadekha lo tizra' kil'ayim ubeged kil'ayim sha'atnez lo ya'aleh 'alekha. ve'ish ki yishkab 'et 'ishah shikhbat zera' vehiv shifkhah nekherefet le'ish vehafedeh lo nifdatah 'o khufshah lo nitan lah biqoret tihyeh lo yumetu ki lo khupashah. veheibi 'et 'ashamo ihoh 'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed 'el 'asham. vekhiper 'alav hakohen be'el ha'asham lifnei ihoh 'al khatato 'asher khata venislakh lo meikhatato 'asher khata. vekhi tabo'u 'el ha'arez uneta'tem kal 'ez ma'akhal va'araltem 'arelato 'et piryo shalosh shanim yihyeh lakhem 'areilim lo yei'akhel. ubashanah harebi'it yihyeh kal piryo qodesh hilulim ihoh. ubashanah hakhamishit tokhelu 'et piryo lehosif lakhem tebu'ato 'ani ihoh 'eloheikhem. lo tokhelu 'al hadam lo tenakhashu velo te'oneinu. lo taqifu pe'at roshekhem velo tashkhit 'et pe'at zeqanekha. veseret lanefesh lo titenu bibsarkhem ukhetobet qa'aqa' lo titenu bakhem 'ani ihoh. 'al tekhalel 'et bitekha lehaznotah velo tizneh ha'arez umale'ah ha'arez zimah. 'et shabetotai tishmoru umiqdashi tira'u 'ani ihoh. 'al tifnu 'el ha'obot ve'el hayide'onim 'al tebaqshu letame'ah bahem 'ani ihoh 'eloheikhem. mipenei seibah taqum vehadarta penei zaqen veyareita mei'elohekha 'ani ihoh. vekhi yagur 'itekha ger be'arzekhem lo tonu 'oto. ke'ezrakh mikem yihyeh lakhem hager hagar 'itekhem ve'ahabta lo kamokha ki geirim heyitem be'erez mizrayim 'ani ihoh 'eloheikhem. lo ta'asu 'avel bamishpat bamidah bamishqal ubamesurah. mozenei zedeq 'abnei zedeq 'eifat zedeq vehin zedeq yihyeh lakhem 'ani ihoh 'eloheikhem 'asher hozeiti 'etkhem mei'erez mizrayim. ushemartem 'et kal khuqotai ve'et kal mishpatai va'asitem 'otam 'ani ihoh. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. ve'el benei yisra'el tomar 'ish 'ish mibenei yisra'el umin hager hagar beyisra'el 'asher yiten mizar'o lamolekh mot yumat 'am ha'arez yirgemuhu ba'aben. va'ani 'eten 'et panai ba'ish hahu vehikhrati 'oto miqereb 'amo ki mizar'o natan lamolekh lema'an tamei 'et miqdashi ulekhalel 'et shem qadshi ve'im ha'lem ya'limu 'am ha'arez 'et 'eineihem min ha'ish hahu betito mizar'o lamolekh lebilti hamit 'oto. vesamti 'ani 'et panai ba'ish hahu ubemishpakhto vehikhrati 'oto ve'et kal hazonim 'akharav liznot 'akharei hamolekh miqereb 'amam. vehanefesh 'asher tifneh 'el ha'obot ve'el hayide'onim liznot 'akhareihem venatati 'et panai banefesh hahiv vehikhrati 'oto miqereb 'amo. vehitqadishtem vihyitem qedoshim ki 'ani ihoh 'eloheikhem. ushemartem 'et khuqotai va'asitem 'otam 'ani ihoh meqadishkhem. ki 'ish 'ish 'asher yeqalel 'et 'abiv ve'et 'imo mot yumat 'abiv ve'imo qilel damav bo. ve'ish 'asher yin'af 'et 'eishet 'ish 'asher yin'af 'et 'eishet rei'eihu mot yumat hano'ef vehano'afet. ve'ish 'asher yishkab 'et 'eishet 'abiv 'ervat 'abiv gilah mot yumetu sheneihem demeihem bam. ve'ish 'asher yishkab 'et kalato mot yumetu sheneihem tebel 'asu demeihem bam. ve'ish 'asher yishkab 'et zakhar mishkebei 'ishah to'eibah 'asu sheneihem mot yumatu demeihem bam. ve'ish 'asher yiqakh 'et 'ishah ve'et 'imah zimah hi ba'esh yisrefu 'oto ve'ethen velo tihyeh zimah betokhkhem. ve'ish 'asher yiten shekhabeto bibheimah mot yumat ve'et habeheimah taharogu. ve'ishah 'asher tiqrab 'el kal beheimah lerib'ah 'otah veharagta 'et ha'ishah ve'et habeheimah mot yumatu demeihem bam. ve'ish 'asher yiqakh 'et 'akhoto bat 'abiv 'o bat 'imo vera'ah 'et 'ervatah vehi tir'eh 'et 'ervato khesed hu venikhretu le'einei benei 'amam 'ervat 'akhoto gilah 'avono yisa. ve'ish 'asher yishkab 'et 'ishah davah vegilah 'et 'ervatah 'et meqorah he'erah vehi giletah 'et meqor dameha venikhretu sheneihem miqereb 'amam. ve'ervat 'akhot 'imekha va'akhot 'abikha lo tegaleh ki 'et she'eiro he'erah 'avonam yisa'u. ve'ish 'asher yishkab 'et dodato 'ervat dodo gilah khet'am yisa'u 'aririm yamutu. ve'ish 'asher yiqakh 'et 'eishet 'akhiv nidah hi 'ervat 'akhiv gilah 'aririm yihyu. ushemartem 'et kal khuqotai ve'et kal mishpatai va'asitem 'otam velo taqi 'etkhem ha'arez 'asher 'ani meibi 'etkhem shamah lashebet bah. velo teilekhu bekhuqot hago 'asher 'ani meshaleiakh mipeneikhem ki 'et kal 'eleh 'asu va'aquz bam. va'omar lakhem 'atem tireshu 'et 'admatam va'ani 'etenenah lakhem lareshet 'otah 'erez zabat khalab udebash 'ani ihoh 'eloheikhem 'asher hibdalti 'etkhem min ha'amim. vehibdaltem ben habeheimah hatehorah latemei'ah uben ha'of hatamei latahor velo teshaqezu 'et nafshoteikhem babeheimah uba'of ubekhol 'asher tirmos ha'adamah 'asher hibdalti lakhem letamei. vihyitem li qedoshim ki qadosh 'ani ihoh va'abdil 'etkhem min ha'amim lihyot li. ve'ish 'o 'ishah ki yihyeh bahem 'ob 'o yide'oni mot yumatu ba'eben yirgemu 'otam demeihem bam. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh 'emor 'el hakohanim benei 'aharon ve'amarta 'aleihem lenefesh lo yitama be'amav. ki 'im lish'eiro haqarob 'eilav le'imo ule'abiv velibno ulebito ule'akhiv. vela'akhoto habetulah haqerobah 'eilav 'asher lo hayetah le'ish lah yitama. lo yitama ba'al be'amav leheikhalo. lo yiqrekhah yiqrekhu qarekhah berosham ufe'at zeqanam lo yegaleikhu ubibsaram lo yisretu saratet. qedoshim yihyu leiloheihem velo yekhalelu shem 'eloheihem ki 'et 'ishei ihoh lekhem 'eloheihem hem maqribim vehayu qodesh. 'ishah zonah vakhalalah lo yiqakhu ve'ishah gerushah mei'ishah lo yiqakhu ki qadosh hu leilohav. veqidashto ki 'et lekhem 'elohekha hu maqrib qadosh yihyeh lakh ki qadosh 'ani ihoh meqadishkhem. ubat 'ish kohen ki teikhel liznot 'et 'abiha hi mekhalelet ba'esh tisaref. vehakohen hagadol mei'ekhav 'asher yuzaq 'al rosho shemen hamishkhah umilei 'et yado lilbosh 'et habegadim 'et rosho lo yifra' ubegadav lo yifrom. ve'al kal nafshot met lo yabo le'abiv ule'imo lo yitama. umin hamiqdash lo yeizei velo yekhalel 'et miqdash 'elohav ki neizer shemen mishkhat 'elohav 'alav 'ani ihoh. vehu 'ishah bibtuleha yiqakh. 'almanah ugerushah vakhalalah zonah 'et 'eleh lo yiqakh ki 'im betulah mei'amav yiqakh 'ishah. velo yekhalel zar'o be'amav ki 'ani ihoh meqadesho. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. daber 'el 'aharon leimor 'ish mizar'akha ledorotam 'asher yihyeh bo mum lo yiqrab lehaqrib lekhem 'elohav. ki khal 'ish 'asher bo mum lo yiqrab 'ish 'iver 'o fiseiakh 'o kharum 'o sarua'. 'o 'ish 'asher yihyeh bo sheber ragel 'o sheber yad. 'o giben 'o daq 'o tebalul be'eino 'o garab 'o yalefet 'o meroakh 'ashekh. kal 'ish 'asher bo mum mizera' 'aharon hakohen lo yigash lehaqrib 'et 'ishei ihoh mum bo 'et lekhem 'elohav lo yigash lehaqrib. lekhem 'elohav miqadeshei haqodashim umin haqodashim yokhel. 'akh 'el haparokhet lo yabo ve'el hamizbeiakh lo yigash ki mum bo velo yekhalel 'et miqdashai ki 'ani ihoh meqadesham. vaydaber mosheh 'el 'aharon ve'el banav ve'el kal benei yisra'el. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. daber 'el 'aharon ve'el banav veyinazeru miqadeshei benei yisra'el velo yekhalelu 'et shem qadshi 'asher hem maqdishim li 'ani ihoh. 'emor 'aleihem ledoroteikhem kal 'ish 'asher yiqrab mikal zar'akhem 'el haqodashim 'asher yaqdishu benei yisra'el ihoh vetum'ato 'alav venikhretah hanefesh hahiv milefanai 'ani ihoh. 'ish 'ish mizera' 'aharon vehu zarua' 'o zab baqodashim lo yokhal 'ad 'asher yithar vehanogeia' bekhal temei nefesh 'o 'ish 'asher teizei mimenu shikhbat zara'. 'o 'ish 'asher yiga' bekhal sherez 'asher yitma lo 'o be'adam 'asher yitma lo lekhol tum'ato. nefesh 'asher tiga' bo vetame'ah 'ad ha'areb velo yokhal min haqodashim ki 'im rakhaz besaro bamayim. uba hashemesh vetaher ve'akhar yokhal min haqodashim ki lakhmo hu. nebeilah utereifah lo yokhal letame'ah bah 'ani ihoh. veshameru 'et mishmarti velo yis'u 'alav khet umeitu bo ki yekhaleluhu 'ani ihoh meqadesham. vekhal zar lo yokhal qodesh toshab kohen vesakhir lo yokhal qodesh. vekhohen ki yiqneh nefesh qinyan kaspo hu yokhal bo vilid beito hem yokhelu belakhmo. ubat kohen ki tihyeh le'ish zar hi bitrumat haqodashim lo tokhel. ubat kohen ki tihyeh 'almanah ugerushah vezera' 'en lah veshabah 'el bet 'abiha kin'ureha milekhem 'abiha tokhel vekhal zar lo yokhal bo. ve'ish ki yokhal qodesh bishgagah veyasaf khamishito 'alav venatan lakohen 'et haqodesh. velo yekhalelu 'et qadeshei benei yisra'el 'et 'asher yarimu ihoh. vehisi'u 'otam 'avon 'ashmah be'akhelam 'et qadesheihem ki 'ani ihoh meqadesham. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. daber 'el 'aharon ve'el banav ve'el kal benei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem 'ish 'ish mibet yisra'el umin hager beyisra'el 'asher yaqrib qarebano lekhal nidreihem ulekhal nidbotam 'asher yaqribu ihoh le'olah. lirzonekhem tamim zakhar babaqar bakesabim uba'izim. kol 'asher bo mum lo taqribu ki lo lerazon yihyeh lakhem. ve'ish ki yaqrib zebakh shelamim ihoh lefalei neder 'o lindabah babaqar 'o bazon tamim yihyeh lerazon kal mum lo yihyeh bo. 'averet 'o shabur 'o kharuz 'o yabelet 'o garab 'o yalefet lo taqribu 'eleh ihoh ve'isheh lo titenu meihem 'al hamizbeiakh ihoh. veshor vaseh sarua' veqalut nedabah ta'aseh 'oto uleneider lo yeirazeh. uma'ukh vekhatut venatuq vekharut lo taqribu ihoh ube'arzekhem lo ta'asu. umiyad ben neikhar lo taqribu 'et lekhem 'eloheikhem mikal 'eleh ki mashekhatam bahem mum bam lo yeirazu lakhem. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. shor 'o kheseb 'o 'ez ki yivaled vehayah shib'at yamim takhat 'imo umiyom hashemini vahale'ah yeirazeh leqareban 'isheh ihoh. veshor 'o seh 'oto ve'et beno lo tishkhatu beyom 'ekhad. vekhi tizbekhu zebakh todah ihoh lirzonekhem tizbakhu. bayom hahu yei'akhel lo totiru mimenu 'ad boqer 'ani ihoh. ushemartem mizvotai va'asitem 'otam 'ani ihoh. velo tekhalelu 'et shem qadshi veniqdashti betokh benei yisra'el 'ani ihoh meqadishkhem. hamozi 'etkhem mei'erez mizrayim lihyot lakhem leilohim 'ani ihoh. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. daber 'el benei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem mo'adei ihoh 'asher tiqre'u 'otam miqra'ei qodesh 'eleh hem mo'adai. sheishet yamim tei'aseh melakhah ubayom hashebi'i shabat shabaton miqra qodesh kal melakhah lo ta'asu shabat hi ihoh bekhol mosheboteikhem. 'eleh mo'adei ihoh miqra'ei qodesh 'asher tiqre'u 'otam bemo'adam. bakhodesh harishon be'arba'ah 'asar lakhodesh ben ha'arbayim pesakh ihoh. ubakhamishah 'asar yom lakhodesh hazeh khag hamazot ihoh shib'at yamim mazot tokheilu. bayom harishon miqra qodesh yihyeh lakhem kal melekhet 'abodah lo ta'asu. vehiqrabtem 'isheh ihoh shib'at yamim bayom hashebi'i miqra qodesh kal melekhet 'abodah lo ta'asu. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. daber 'el benei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem ki tabo'u 'el ha'arez 'asher 'ani noten lakhem uqezartem 'et qezirah vahabeitem 'et 'omer reishit qezirekhem 'el hakohen. veheinif 'et ha'omer lifnei ihoh lirzonekhem mimakhorat hashabat yenifenu hakohen. va'asitem beyom hanifekhem 'et ha'omer kebes tamim ben shenato le'olah ihoh. uminkhato shenei 'esronim solet belulah bashemen 'isheh ihoh reiakh nikhoakh veniskoh yayin rebi'it hahin. velekhem veqali vekharmel lo tokhelu 'ad 'ezem hayom hazeh 'ad habi'akhem 'et qareban 'eloheikhem khuqat 'olam ledoroteikhem bekhol mosheboteikhem. usefartem lakhem mimakhorat hashabat miyom habi'akhem 'et 'omer hatenufah sheba' shabatot temimot tihyenah. 'ad mimakhorat hashabat hashebi'it tisperu khamishim yom vehiqrabtem minkhah khadashah ihoh. mimosheboteikhem tabi''u lekhem tenufah tayim shenei 'esronim solet tihyenah khamez tei'afenah bikurim ihoh. vehiqrabtem 'al halekhem shib'at kebasim temimim benei shanah ufar ben baqar 'ekhad ve'eilim shenayim yihyu 'olah ihoh uminkhatam veniskeihem 'isheh reiakh nikhoakh ihoh. va'asitem se'ir 'izim 'ekhad lekhatat ushenei khebasim benei shanah lezebakh shelamim. veheinif hakohen 'otam 'al lekhem habikurim tenufah lifnei ihoh 'al shenei kebasim qodesh yihyu ihoh lakohen. uqeratem be'ezem hayom hazeh miqra qodesh yihyeh lakhem kal melekhet 'abodah lo ta'asu khuqat 'olam bekhal mosheboteikhem ledoroteikhem. ubequzrekhem 'et qezir 'arzekhem lo tekhaleh pe'at sadekha bequzrekha veleqet qezirekha lo telaqet le'ani velager ta'azob 'otam 'ani ihoh 'eloheikhem. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. daber 'el benei yisra'el leimor bakhodesh hashebi'i be'ekhad lakhodesh yihyeh lakhem shabaton zikhron teru'ah miqra qodesh. kal melekhet 'abodah lo ta'asu vehiqrabtem 'isheh ihoh. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. 'akh be'asor lakhodesh hashebi'i hazeh yom hakipurim hu miqra qodesh yihyeh lakhem ve'initem 'et nafshoteikhem vehiqrabtem 'isheh ihoh. vekhal melakhah lo ta'asu be'ezem hayom hazeh ki yom kipurim hu lekhaper 'aleikhem lifnei ihoh 'eloheikhem ki khal hanefesh 'asher lo te'uneh be'ezem hayom hazeh venikhretah mei'ameha. vekhal hanefesh 'asher ta'aseh kal melakhah be'ezem hayom hazeh veha'abadti 'et hanefesh hahiv miqereb 'amah. kal melakhah lo ta'asu khuqat 'olam ledoroteikhem bekhol mosheboteikhem. shabat shabaton hu lakhem ve'initem 'et nafshoteikhem betish'ah lakhodesh ba'ereb mei'ereb 'ad 'ereb tishbetu shabatekhem. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. daber 'el benei yisra'el leimor bakhamishah 'asar yom lakhodesh hashebi'i hazeh khag hasukot shib'at yamim ihoh. bayom harishon miqra qodesh kal melekhet 'abodah lo ta'asu. shib'at yamim taqribu 'isheh ihoh bayom hashemini miqra qodesh yihyeh lakhem vehiqrabtem 'isheh ihoh 'azeret hi kal melekhet 'abodah lo ta'asu. 'eleh mo'adei ihoh 'asher tiqre'u 'otam miqra'ei qodesh lehaqrib 'isheh ihoh 'olah uminkhah zebakh unesakhim debar yom beyomo. milebad shabetot ihoh umilebad matenoteikhem umilebad kal nidreikhem umilebad kal nidboteikhem 'asher titenu ihoh. 'akh bakhamishah 'asar yom lakhodesh hashebi'i be'asepekhem 'et tebu'at ha'arez takhogu 'et khag ihoh shib'at yamim bayom harishon shabaton ubayom hashemini shabaton. uleqakhtem lakhem bayom harishon peri 'ez hadar kapot temarim va'anaf 'ez 'abot ve'arbei nakhal usemakhtem lifnei ihoh 'eloheikhem shib'at yamim. vekhagotem 'oto khag ihoh shib'at yamim bashanah khuqat 'olam ledoroteikhem bakhodesh hashebi'i takhogu 'oto. basukot teishebu shib'at yamim kal ha'ezrakh beyisra'el yeishebu basukot. lema'an yeide'u doroteikhem ki basukot hoshabti 'et benei yisra'el behozi'i 'otam mei'erez mizrayim 'ani ihoh 'eloheikhem. vaydaber mosheh 'et mo'adei ihoh 'el benei yisra'el. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. zav 'et benei yisra'el veyiqkhu 'eilekha shemen zayit zakh katit lama'or leha'alot ner tamid. mikhuz lefarokhet ha'eidut be'ohel mo'ed ya'arokh 'oto 'aharon mei'ereb 'ad boqer lifnei ihoh tamid khuqat 'olam ledoroteikhem. 'al hamenorah hatehorah ya'arokh 'et haneirot lifnei ihoh tamid. velaqakhta solet ve'afita 'otah shetem 'esreh khalot shenei 'esronim yihyeh hakhalah ha'ekhat. vesamta 'otam shetayim ma'arakhot shesh hama'arakhet 'al hashulkhan hatahor lifnei ihoh. venatata 'al hama'arekhet lebonah zakah vehayetah lalekhem le'azkarah 'isheh ihoh. beyom hashabat beyom hashabat ya'arkhenu lifnei ihoh tamid mei'et benei yisra'el berit 'olam. vehayetah le'aharon ulebanav va'akhaluhu bemaqom qadosh ki qodesh qadashim hu lo mei'ishei ihoh khaq 'olam. vayeizei ben 'ishah yisre'eilit vehu ben 'ish mizri betokh benei yisra'el vayinazu bamakhaneh ben hayisre'eilit ve'ish hayisre'eili. vayiqob ben ha'ishah hayisre'eilit 'et hashem vayqalel vayabi'u 'oto 'el mosheh veshem 'imo shelomit bat dibri lemateh dan. vayanikhuhu bamishmar lifrosh lahem 'al pi ihoh. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. hozei 'et hamqalel 'el mikhuz lamakhaneh vesamekhu khal hashome'im 'et yedeihem 'al rosho veragemu 'oto kal ha'eidah. ve'el benei yisra'el tedaber leimor 'ish 'ish ki yeqalel 'elohav venasa khet'o. venoqeb shem ihoh mot yumat ragom yirgemu bo kal ha'eidah kager ka'ezrakh benaqebo shem yumat. ve'ish ki yakeh kal nefesh 'adam mot yumat. umakeh nefesh beheimah yeshalemenah nefesh takhat nafesh. ve'ish ki yiten mum ba'amito ka'asher 'asah ken yei'aseh lo. ber takhat sheber 'ayin takhat 'ayin shen takhat shen ka'asher yiten mum ba'adam ken yinaten bo. umakeh beheimah yeshalemenah umakeh 'adam yumat. mishpat 'ekhad yihyeh lakhem kager ka'ezrakh yihyeh ki 'ani ihoh 'eloheikhem. vaydaber mosheh 'el benei yisra'el vayozi'u 'et hamqalel 'el mikhuz lamakhaneh vayirgemu 'oto 'aben ubenei yisra'el 'asu ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh behar sinai leimor. daber 'el benei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem ki tabo'u 'el ha'arez 'asher 'ani noten lakhem veshabetah ha'arez shabat ihoh. shesh shanim tizra' sadekha veshesh shanim tizmor karmekha ve'asafta 'et tebu'atah. ubashanah hashebi'it shabat shabaton yihyeh la'arez shabat ihoh sadekha lo tizra' vekharmekha lo tizmor. 'et sefiakh qezirekha lo tiqzor ve'et 'inebei nezirekha lo tibzor shenat shabaton yihyeh la'arez. vehayetah shabat ha'arez lakhem le'akhlah lekha ule'abdekha vela'amatekha veliskhirekha uletoshabekha hagarim 'imakh. velibhemtekha velakhayah 'asher be'arzekha tihyeh khal tebu'atah le'ekhol. vesafarta lekha ba' shabetot shanim sheba' shanim sheba' pe'amim vehayu lekha yemei ba' shabetot hashanim teisha' ve'arba'im shanah. veha'abarta shofar teru'ah bakhodesh hashebi'i be'asor lakhodesh beyom hakipurim ta'abiru shofar bekhal 'arzekhem. veqidashtem 'et shenat hakhamishim shanah uqeratem deror ba'arez lekhal yoshebeha yobel hi tihyeh lakhem veshabtem 'ish 'el 'akhuzato ve'ish 'el mishpakhto tashubu. yobel hi shenat hakhamishim shanah tihyeh lakhem lo tizra'u velo tiqzeru 'et sefikheha velo tibzeru 'et nezireha. ki yobel hi qodesh tihyeh lakhem min hasadeh tokhelu 'et tebu'atah. bishnat hayobel hazot tashubu 'ish 'el 'akhuzato. vekhi timkeru mimkar la'amitekha 'o qanoh miyad 'amitekha 'al tonu 'ish 'et 'akhiv. bemispar shanim 'akhar hayobel tiqneh mei'et 'amitekha bemispar shenei tebu'ot yimkar lakh. lefi rob hashanim tarbeh miqnato ulefi me'ot hashanim tam'it miqnato ki mispar tebu'ot hu mokher lakh. velo tonu 'ish 'et 'amito veyareita mei'elohekha ki 'ani ihoh 'eloheikhem. va'asitem 'et khuqotai ve'et mishpatai tishmeru va'asitem 'otam vishabtem 'al ha'arez labetakh. venatenah ha'arez piryah va'akhaltem lasoba' vishabtem labetakh 'aleha. vekhi tomeru mah nokhal bashanah hashebi'it hen lo nizra' velo ne'esof 'et tebu'ateinu. veziviti 'et birkhati lakhem bashanah hashishit ve'asat 'et hatebu'ah lishlosh hashanim. uzera'tem 'et hashanah hasheminit va'akhaltem min hatebu'ah yashan 'ad hashanah hateshi'it 'ad bo tebu'atah tokhelu yashan. veha'arez lo timakher lizmitut ki li ha'arez ki geirim vetoshabim 'atem 'imadi. ubekhol 'erez 'akhuzatkhem ge'ulah titenu la'arez. ki yamukh 'akhikha umakhar mei'akhuzato uba go'alo haqarob 'eilav vega'al 'et mimkar 'akhiv. ve'ish ki lo yihyeh lo go'el vehisigah yado umaza kedei ge'ulato. vekhishab 'et shenei mimkaro veheishib 'et ha'odef la'ish 'asher makhar lo veshab la'akhuzato. ve'im lo maze'ah yado dei hashib lo vehayah mimkaro beyad haqoneh 'oto 'ad shenat hayobel veyaza bayobel veshab la'akhuzato. ve'ish ki yimkor bet moshab 'ir khomah vehayetah ge'ulato 'ad tom shenat mimkaro yamim tihyeh ge'ulato. ve'im lo yiga'el 'ad melot lo shanah temimah veqam habayit 'asher ba'ir 'asher lo lo khomah lazemitut laqoneh 'oto ledorotav lo yeizei bayobel. ubatei hakhazeirim 'asher 'en lahem khomah sabib 'al sedeh ha'arez yeikhasheb ge'ulah tihyeh lo ubayobel yeizei. ve'arei halviyim batei 'arei 'akhuzatam ge'ulat 'olam tihyeh lalviyim. va'asher yig'al min halviyim veyaza mimkar bayit ve'ir 'akhuzato bayobel ki batei 'arei halviyim hi 'akhuzatam betokh benei yisra'el. usedeh migrash 'areihem lo yimakher ki 'akhuzat 'olam hu lahem. vekhi yamukh 'akhikha umatah yado 'imakh vehekhezaqta bo ger vetoshab vakhai 'imakh. 'al tiqakh mei'ito neshekh vetarbit veyareita mei'elohekha vekhei 'akhikha 'imakh. 'et kaspekha lo titen lo beneshekh ubemarbit lo titen 'akhelekha. 'ani ihoh 'eloheikhem 'asher hozeiti 'etkhem mei'erez mizrayim latet lakhem 'et 'erez kena'an lihyot lakhem leilohim. vekhi yamukh 'akhikha 'imakh venimkar lakh lo ta'abod bo 'abodat 'abed. kesakhir ketoshab yihyeh 'imakh 'ad shenat hayobel ya'abod 'imakh. veyaza mei'imakh hu ubanav 'imo veshab 'el mishpakhto ve'el 'akhuzat 'abotav yashub. ki 'abadai hem 'asher hozeiti 'otam mei'erez mizrayim lo yimakheru mimkeret 'abed. lo tirdeh bo befarekh veyareita mei'elohekha. ve'abdekha va'amatekha 'asher yihyu lakh mei'et hagoyim 'asher sebiboteikhem meihem tiqnu 'ebed ve'amah. vegam mibenei hatoshabim hagarim 'imakhem meihem tiqnu umimishpakhtam 'asher 'imakhem 'asher holidu be'arzekhem vehayu lakhem la'akhuzah. vehitnakhaltem 'otam libneikhem 'akhareikhem lareshet 'akhuzah le'olam bahem ta'abodu ube'akheikhem benei yisra'el 'ish be'akhiv lo tirdeh bo befarekh. vekhi tasig yad ger vetoshab 'imakh umakh 'akhikha 'imo venimkar leger toshab 'imakh 'o le'eiqer mishpakhat ger. 'akharei nimkar ge'ulah tihyeh lo 'ekhad mei'ekhav yig'alenu. 'o dodo 'o ben dodo yig'alenu 'o mishe'er besaro mimishpakhto yig'alenu 'o hisigah yado venig'al. vekhishab 'im qoneihu mishenat himakhero lo 'ad shenat hayobel vehayah kesef mimkaro bemispar shanim kimei sakhir yihyeh 'imo. 'im 'od rabot bashanim lefihen yashib ge'ulato mikesef miqnato. ve'im me'at nish'ar bashanim 'ad shenat hayobel vekhishab lo kefi shanav yashib 'et ge'ulato. kiskhir shanah beshanah yihyeh 'imo lo yirdenu beferekh le'einekha. ve'im lo yiga'el be'eleh veyaza bishnat hayobel hu ubanav 'imo. ki li benei yisra'el 'abadim 'abadai hem 'asher hozeiti 'otam mei'erez mizrayim 'ani ihoh 'eloheikhem. lo ta'asu lakhem 'elilim ufesel umazeibah lo taqimu lakhem ve'eben maskit lo titenu be'arzekhem lehishtakhavot 'aleha ki 'ani ihoh 'eloheikhem. 'et shabetotai tishmoru umiqdashi tira'u 'ani ihoh. 'im bekhuqotai teileikhu ve'et mizvotai tishmeru va'asitem 'otam. venatati gishmeikhem be'itam venatenah ha'arez yebulah ve'ez hasadeh yiten piryo. vehisig lakhem dayish 'et bazir ubazir yasig 'et zara' va'akhaltem lakhmekhem lasoba' vishabtem labetakh be'arzekhem. venatati shalom ba'arez ushekhabtem ve'en makharid vehishbati khayah ra'ah min ha'arez vekhereb lo ta'abor be'arzekhem. uredaftem 'et 'oyebeikhem venafelu lifneikhem lekhareb veradefu mikem khamishah mei'ah umei'ah mikem rebabah yirdofu venafelu 'oyebeikhem lifneikhem lekhareb. ufaniti 'aleikhem vehifreiti 'etkhem vehirbeiti 'etkhem vahaqimoti 'et beriti 'itekhem. va'akhaltem yashan noshan veyashan mipenei khadash tozi'u. venatati mishkani betokhkhem velo tig'al nafshi 'etkhem. vehithalakhti betokhkhem vehayiti lakhem leilohim ve'atem tihyu li le'am. 'ani ihoh 'eloheikhem 'asher hozeiti 'etkhem mei'erez mizrayim mihyot lahem 'abadim va'eshbor motot 'ulekhem va'olekh 'etkhem qomiyut. ve'im lo tishme'u li velo ta'asu 'et kal hamizvot ha'eleh. ve'im bekhuqotai tim'asu ve'im 'et mishpatai tig'al nafshekhem lebilti 'asot 'et kal mizvotai lehafrekhem 'et beriti. 'af 'ani 'e'eseh zot lakhem vehifqadti 'aleikhem behalah 'et hashakhefet ve'et haqadakhat mekhalot 'einayim umedibot nafesh uzera'tem lariq zar'akhem va'akhaluhu 'oyebeikhem. venatati fanai bakhem venigaftem lifnei 'oyebeikhem veradu bakhem sone'eikhem venastem ve'en rodef 'etkhem. ve'im 'ad 'eleh lo tishme'u li veyasafti leyaserah 'etkhem sheba' 'al khatoteikhem. veshabarti 'et ge'on 'uzekhem venatati 'et shemeikhem kabarzel ve'et 'arzekhem kanekhushah. vetam lariq kokhakhem velo titen 'arzekhem 'et yebulah ve'ez ha'arez lo yiten piryo. ve'im teilekhu 'imi qeri velo tobu lishmoa' li veyasafti 'aleikhem makah sheba' kekhatoteikhem. vehishlakhti bakhem 'et khayat hasadeh veshikelah 'etkhem vehikhritah 'et behemtekhem vehim'itah 'etkhem venashamu darkheikhem. ve'im be'eleh lo tivaseru li vahalakhtem 'imi qeri. vehalakhti 'af 'ani 'imakhem beqeri vehikeiti 'etkhem gam 'ani sheba' 'al khatoteikhem. veheibeiti 'aleikhem khereb noqemet neqam berit vene'esaftem 'el 'areikhem veshilakhti deber betokhkhem venitatem beyad 'oyeb. beshibri lakhem mateh lekhem ve'afu 'eser nashim lakhmekhem betanur 'ekhad veheishibu lakhmekhem bamishqal va'akhaltem velo tisba'u. ve'im bezot lo tishme'u li vahalakhtem 'imi beqeri. vehalakhti 'imakhem bakhamat qeri veyisarti 'etkhem 'af 'ani sheba' 'al khatoteikhem va'akhaltem besar beneikhem ubesar benoteikhem tokheilu. vehishmadti 'et bamoteikhem vehikhrati 'et khamaneikhem venatati 'et pigreikhem 'al pigrei giluleikhem vega'alah nafshi 'etkhem. venatati 'et 'areikhem kharebah vahashimoti 'et miqdesheikhem velo 'ariakh bereiakh nikhokhakhem. vahashimoti 'ani 'et ha'arez veshamemu 'aleha 'oyebeikhem hayoshebim bah. ve'etkhem 'ezareh bagoyim vahariqoti 'akhareikhem khareb vehayetah 'arzekhem shemamah ve'areikhem yihyu kharebah. 'az tirzeh ha'arez 'et shabetoteha kol yemei hoshamah ve'atem be'erez 'oyebeikhem 'az tishbat ha'arez vehirzat 'et shabetoteha. kal yemei hashamah tishbot 'et 'asher lo shabetah beshabetoteikhem beshibtekhem 'aleha. vehanish'arim bakhem veheibeiti morekh bilbabam be'arzot 'oyebeihem veradaf 'otam qol 'aleh nidaf venasu menusat khereb venafelu ve'en rodef. vekhashelu 'ish be'akhiv kemipenei khereb verodef 'ayin velo tihyeh lakhem tequmah lifnei 'oyebeikhem. va'abadtem bagoyim ve'akhelah 'etkhem 'erez 'oyebeikhem. vehanish'arim bakhem yimaqu ba'avonam be'arzot 'oyebeikhem ve'af ba'avonot 'abotam 'itam yimaqu. vehitvadu 'et 'avonam ve'et 'avon 'abotam bema'alam 'asher ma'alu bi ve'af 'asher halekhu 'imi beqeri. 'af 'ani 'eilekh 'imam beqeri veheibeiti 'otam be'erez 'oyebeihem 'o 'az yikana' lebabam he'arel ve'az yirzu 'et 'avonam. vezakharti 'et beriti ya'aqob ve'af 'et beriti yizkhaq ve'af 'et beriti 'abraham 'ezkor veha'arez 'ezkor. veha'arez tei'azeb meihem vetirez 'et shabetoteha baheshamah meihem vehem yirzu 'et 'avonam ya'an ubeya'an bemishpatai ma'asu ve'et khuqotai ga'alah nafsham. ve'af gam zot bihyotam be'erez 'oyebeihem lo me'astim velo ge'altim lekhalotam lehafer beriti 'itam ki 'ani ihoh 'eloheihem. vezakharti lahem berit rishonim 'asher hozeiti 'otam mei'erez mizrayim le'einei hagoyim lihyot lahem leilohim 'ani ihoh. 'eleh hakhuqim vehamishpatim vehatorot 'asher natan ihoh beino uben benei yisra'el behar sinai beyad mosheh. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. daber 'el benei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem 'ish ki yafli neder be'erkekha nefashot ihoh. vehayah 'erkekha hazakhar miben 'esrim shanah ve'ad ben shishim shanah vehayah 'erkekha khamishim sheqel kesef besheqel haqodesh. ve'im neqeibah hi vehayah 'erkekha sheloshim shaqel. ve'im miben khamesh shanim ve'ad ben 'esrim shanah vehayah 'erkekha hazakhar 'esrim sheqalim velaneqeibah 'aseret sheqalim. ve'im miben khodesh ve'ad ben khamesh shanim vehayah 'erkekha hazakhar khamishah sheqalim kasef velaneqeibah 'erkekha sheloshet sheqalim kasef. ve'im miben shishim shanah vama'lah 'im zakhar vehayah 'erkekha khamishah 'asar shaqel velaneqeibah 'asarah sheqalim. ve'im makh hu mei'erkekha vehe'emido lifnei hakohen vehe'erikh 'oto hakohen 'al pi 'asher tasig yad hanoder ya'arikhenu hakohen. ve'im beheimah 'asher yaqribu mimenah qarban ihoh kol 'asher yiten mimenu ihoh yihyeh qodesh. lo yakhalifenu velo yamir 'oto tob bera' 'o ra' betob ve'im hamer yamir beheimah bibheimah vehayah hu utemurato yihyeh qodesh. ve'im kal beheimah temei'ah 'asher lo yaqribu mimenah qarban ihoh vehe'emid 'et habeheimah lifnei hakohen. vehe'erikh hakohen 'otah ben tob uben ra' ke'erkekha hakohen ken yihyeh. ve'im ga'ol yig'alenah veyasaf khamishito 'al 'erkekha. ve'ish ki yaqdish 'et beito qodesh ihoh vehe'erikho hakohen ben tob uben ra' ka'asher ya'arikh 'oto hakohen ken yaqum. ve'im hamaqdish yig'al 'et beito veyasaf khamishit kesef 'erkekha 'alav vehayah lo. ve'im misedeh 'akhuzato yaqdish 'ish ihoh vehayah 'erkekha lefi zar'o zera' khomer se'orim bakhamishim sheqel kasef. 'im mishenat hayobel yaqdish sadeihu ke'erkekha yaqum. ve'im 'akhar hayobel yaqdish sadeihu vekhishab lo hakohen 'et hakesef 'al pi hashanim hanotarot 'ad shenat hayobel venigra' mei'erkekha. ve'im ga'ol yig'al 'et hasadeh hamaqdish 'oto veyasaf khamishit kesef 'erkekha 'alav veqam lo. ve'im lo yig'al 'et hasadeh ve'im makhar 'et hasadeh le'ish 'akher lo yiga'el 'od. vehayah hasadeh bezeito bayobel qodesh ihoh kisdeh hakheirem lakohen tihyeh 'akhuzato. ve'im 'et sedeh miqnato 'asher lo misedeh 'akhuzato yaqdish ihoh. vekhishab lo hakohen 'et mikhsat ha'erkekha 'ad shenat hayobel venatan 'et ha'erkekha bayom hahu qodesh ihoh. bishnat hayobel yashub hasadeh la'asher qanahu mei'ito la'asher lo 'akhuzat ha'arez. vekhal 'erkekha yihyeh besheqel haqodesh 'esrim geirah yihyeh hashaqel. 'akh bekhor 'asher yebukar ihoh bibheimah lo yaqdish 'ish 'oto 'im shor 'im seh ihoh hu. ve'im babeheimah hatemei'ah ufadah be'erkekha veyasaf khamishito 'alav ve'im lo yiga'el venimkar be'erkekha. 'akh kal kheirem 'asher yakharim 'ish ihoh mikal 'asher lo mei'adam ubeheimah umisedeh 'akhuzato lo yimakher velo yiga'el kal kheirem qodesh qadashim hu ihoh. kal kheirem 'asher yakhoram min ha'adam lo yipadeh mot yumat. vekhal ma'sar ha'arez mizera' ha'arez miperi ha'ez ihoh hu qodesh ihoh. ve'im ga'ol yig'al 'ish mima'asro khamishito yosef 'alav. vekhal ma'sar baqar vazon kol 'asher ya'abor takhat hashabet ha'asiri yihyeh qodesh ihoh. lo yebaqer ben tob lara' velo yemirenu ve'im hamer yemirenu vehayah hu utemurato yihyeh qodesh lo yiga'el. 'eleh hamizvot 'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh 'el benei yisra'el behar sinai.

vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh bemidbar sinai be'ohel mo'ed be'ekhad lakhodesh hasheini bashanah hasheinit lezeitam mei'erez mizrayim leimor. se'u 'et rosh kal 'adat benei yisra'el lemishpekhotam lebet 'abotam bemispar sheimot kal zakhar legulgelotam. miben 'esrim shanah vama'lah kal yozei zaba beyisra'el tifqedu 'otam lezib'otam 'atah ve'aharon. ve'itekhem yihyu 'ish 'ish lamateh 'ish rosh lebet 'abotav hu. ve'eleh shemot ha'anashim 'asher ya'amdu 'itekhem lir'uben 'elizur ben shedei'ur. leshim'on shelumi'el ben zurishadai. lihudah nakhshon ben 'aminadab. leyisashkhar netan'el ben zu'ar. lizbulun 'eli'ab ben kheilon. libnei yosef le'efrayim 'elishama' ben 'amihud limnasheh gamli'el ben pedahzur. lebinyamin 'abidan ben gid'oni. ledan 'akhi'ezer ben 'amishadai. le'asher pag'i'el ben 'akheran. legad 'elyasaf ben de'u'el. lenaftali 'akhira' ben 'einan. 'eleh qeri'ei qeru'ei ha'eidah nesi'ei matot 'abotam rashei 'alfei yisra'el hem. vayiqakh mosheh ve'aharon 'et ha'anashim ha'eleh 'asher niqebu besheimot. ve'et kal ha'eidah hiqhilu be'ekhad lakhodesh hasheini vayityaldu 'al mishpekhotam lebet 'abotam bemispar sheimot miben 'esrim shanah vama'lah legulgelotam. ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh vayifqedem bemidbar sinai. vayihyu benei re'uben bekhor yisra'el toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet 'abotam bemispar sheimot legulgelotam kal zakhar miben 'esrim shanah vama'lah kol yozei zaba. pequdeihem lemateh re'uben shishah ve'arba'im 'elef vakhamesh mei'ot. libnei shim'on toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet 'abotam pequdav bemispar sheimot legulgelotam kal zakhar miben 'esrim shanah vama'lah kol yozei zaba. pequdeihem lemateh shim'on tish'ah vakhamishim 'elef ushelosh mei'ot. libnei gad toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet 'abotam bemispar sheimot miben 'esrim shanah vama'lah kol yozei zaba. pequdeihem lemateh gad khamishah ve'arba'im 'elef veshesh mei'ot vakhamishim. libnei yehudah toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet 'abotam bemispar sheimot miben 'esrim shanah vama'lah kol yozei zaba. pequdeihem lemateh yehudah 'arba'ah veshib'im 'elef veshesh mei'ot. libnei yisashkhar toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet 'abotam bemispar sheimot miben 'esrim shanah vama'lah kol yozei zaba. pequdeihem lemateh yisashkhar 'arba'ah vakhamishim 'elef ve'arba' mei'ot. libnei zebulun toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet 'abotam bemispar sheimot miben 'esrim shanah vama'lah kol yozei zaba. pequdeihem lemateh zebulun shib'ah vakhamishim 'elef ve'arba' mei'ot. libnei yosef libnei 'efrayim toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet 'abotam bemispar sheimot miben 'esrim shanah vama'lah kol yozei zaba. pequdeihem lemateh 'efrayim 'arba'im 'elef vakhamesh mei'ot. libnei menasheh toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet 'abotam bemispar sheimot miben 'esrim shanah vama'lah kol yozei zaba. pequdeihem lemateh menasheh shenayim usheloshim 'elef umatayim. libnei binyamin toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet 'abotam bemispar sheimot miben 'esrim shanah vama'lah kol yozei zaba. pequdeihem lemateh binyamin khamishah usheloshim 'elef ve'arba' mei'ot. libnei dan toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet 'abotam bemispar sheimot miben 'esrim shanah vama'lah kol yozei zaba. pequdeihem lemateh dan shenayim veshishim 'elef usheba' mei'ot. libnei 'asher toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet 'abotam bemispar sheimot miben 'esrim shanah vama'lah kol yozei zaba. pequdeihem lemateh 'asher 'ekhad ve'arba'im 'elef vakhamesh mei'ot. benei naftali toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet 'abotam bemispar sheimot miben 'esrim shanah vama'lah kol yozei zaba. pequdeihem lemateh naftali sheloshah vakhamishim 'elef ve'arba' mei'ot. 'eleh hapequdim 'asher paqad mosheh ve'aharon unesi'ei yisra'el shenem 'asar 'ish 'ish 'ekhad lebet 'abotav hayu. vayihyu kal pequdei benei yisra'el lebet 'abotam miben 'esrim shanah vama'lah kal yozei zaba beyisra'el. vayihyu kal hapequdim shesh mei'ot 'elef usheloshet 'alafim vakhamesh mei'ot vakhamishim. vehalviyim lemateh 'abotam lo hatepaqedu betokham. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. 'akh 'et mateh leivi lo tifqod ve'et rosham lo tisa betokh benei yisra'el. ve'atah hafqed 'et halviyim 'al mishkan ha'eidut ve'al kal keilav ve'al kal 'asher lo hemah yis'u 'et hamishkan ve'et kal keilav vehem yesharetuhu vesabib lamishkan yakhanu. ubinsoa' hamishkan yoridu 'oto halviyim ubakhanot hamishkan yaqimu 'oto halviyim vehazar haqareb yumat. vekhanu benei yisra'el 'ish 'al makhaneihu ve'ish 'al diglo lezib'otam. vehalviyim yakhanu sabib lemishkan ha'eidut velo yihyeh qezef 'al 'adat benei yisra'el veshameru halviyim 'et mishmeret mishkan ha'eidut. vaya'asu benei yisra'el kekhol 'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh ken 'asu. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon leimor. 'ish 'al diglo be'otot lebet 'abotam yakhanu benei yisra'el mineged sabib le'ohel mo'ed yakhanu. vehakhonim qeidemah mizrakhah degel makhaneh yehudah lezib'otam venasi libnei yehudah nakhshon ben 'aminadab. uzeba'o ufequdeihem 'arba'ah veshib'im 'elef veshesh mei'ot. vehakhonim 'alav mateh yisashkhar venasi libnei yisashkhar netan'el ben zu'ar. uzeba'o ufequdav 'arba'ah vakhamishim 'elef ve'arba' mei'ot. mateh zebulun venasi libnei zebulun 'eli'ab ben kheilon. uzeba'o ufequdav shib'ah vakhamishim 'elef ve'arba' mei'ot. kal hapequdim lemakhaneh yehudah me'at 'elef ushemonim 'elef vesheishet 'alafim ve'arba' mei'ot lezib'otam rishonah yisa'u. degel makhaneh re'uben teimanah lezib'otam venasi libnei re'uben 'elizur ben shedei'ur. uzeba'o ufequdav shishah ve'arba'im 'elef vakhamesh mei'ot. vehakhonim 'alav mateh shim'on venasi libnei shim'on shelumi'el ben zuri shadai uzeba'o ufequdeihem tish'ah vakhamishim 'elef ushelosh mei'ot. vemateh gad venasi libnei gad 'elyasaf ben re'u'el. uzeba'o ufequdeihem khamishah ve'arba'im 'elef veshesh mei'ot vakhamishim. kal hapequdim lemakhaneh re'uben me'at 'elef ve'ekhad vakhamishim 'elef ve'arba' mei'ot vakhamishim lezib'otam usheniyim yisa'u. venasa' 'ohel mo'ed makhaneh halviyim betokh hamakhanot ka'asher yakhanu ken yisa'u 'ish 'al yado ledigleihem. degel makhaneh 'efrayim lezib'otam yamah venasi libnei 'efrayim 'elishama' ben 'amihud. uzeba'o ufequdeihem 'arba'im 'elef vakhamesh mei'ot. ve'alav mateh menasheh venasi libnei menasheh gamli'el ben pedahzur. uzeba'o ufequdeihem shenayim usheloshim 'elef umatayim. umateh binyamin venasi libnei binyamin 'abidan ben gid'oni. uzeba'o ufequdeihem khamishah usheloshim 'elef ve'arba' mei'ot. kal hapequdim lemakhaneh 'efrayim me'at 'elef ushemonat 'alafim umei'ah lezib'otam ushelishim yisa'u. degel makhaneh dan zafonah lezib'otam venasi libnei dan 'akhi'ezer ben 'amishadai. uzeba'o ufequdeihem shenayim veshishim 'elef usheba' mei'ot. vehakhonim 'alav mateh 'asher venasi libnei 'asher pag'i'el ben 'akheran. uzeba'o ufequdeihem 'ekhad ve'arba'im 'elef vakhamesh mei'ot. umateh naftali venasi libnei naftali 'akhira' ben 'einan. uzeba'o ufequdeihem sheloshah vakhamishim 'elef ve'arba' mei'ot. kal hapequdim lemakhaneh dan me'at 'elef veshib'ah vakhamishim 'elef veshesh mei'ot la'akharonah yis'u ledigleihem. 'eleh pequdei benei yisra'el lebet 'abotam kal pequdei hamakhanot lezib'otam shesh mei'ot 'elef usheloshet 'alafim vakhamesh mei'ot vakhamishim. vehalviyim lo hatepaqedu betokh benei yisra'el ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. vaya'asu benei yisra'el kekhol 'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh ken khanu ledigleihem vekhen nasa'u 'ish lemishpekhotav 'al bet 'abotav. ve'eleh toldot 'aharon umosheh beyom diber ihoh 'et mosheh behar sinai. ve'eleh shemot benei 'aharon habekhor nadab va'abihu 'el'azar ve'itamar. 'eleh shemot benei 'aharon hakohanim hameshukhim 'asher milei yadam lekhahen. vayamat nadab va'abihu lifnei ihoh behaqribam 'esh zarah lifnei ihoh bemidbar sinai ubanim lo hayu lahem vaykhahen 'el'azar ve'itamar 'al penei 'aharon 'abihem. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. haqreb 'et mateh leivi veha'amadta 'oto lifnei 'aharon hakohen vesheiretu 'oto. veshameru 'et mishmarto ve'et mishmeret kal ha'eidah lifnei 'ohel mo'ed la'abod 'et 'abodat hamishkan. veshameru 'et kal kelei 'ohel mo'ed ve'et mishmeret benei yisra'el la'abod 'et 'abodat hamishkan. venatatah 'et halviyim le'aharon ulebanav netunim netunim hemah lo mei'et benei yisra'el. ve'et 'aharon ve'et banav tifqod veshameru 'et kehunatam vehazar haqareb yumat. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. va'ani hineh laqakhti 'et halviyim mitokh benei yisra'el takhat kal bekhor peter rekhem mibenei yisra'el vehayu li halviyim. ki li kal bekhor beyom hakoti khal bekhor be'erez mizrayim hiqdashti li khal bekhor beyisra'el mei'adam 'ad beheimah li yihyu 'ani ihoh. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh bemidbar sinai leimor. peqod 'et benei leivi lebet 'abotam lemishpekhotam kal zakhar miben khodesh vama'lah tifqedem. vayifqod 'otam mosheh 'al pi ihoh ka'asher zuvah. vayihyu 'eleh benei leivi bishmotam geireshon uqehat umerari. ve'eleh shemot benei geireshon lemishpekhotam libni veshim'i. ubenei qehat lemishpekhotam 'amram veyizhar khebron ve'uzi'el. ubenei merari lemishpekhotam makhli umushi 'eleh hem mishpekhot haleivi lebet 'abotam. legeireshon mishpakhat halibni umishpakhat hashim'i 'eleh hem mishpekhot hageireshuni. pequdeihem bemispar kal zakhar miben khodesh vama'elah pequdeihem shib'at 'alafim vakhamesh mei'ot. mishpekhot hageireshuni 'akharei hamishkan yakhanu yamah. unesi bet 'ab lageireshuni 'elyasaf ben la'el. umishmeret benei geireshon be'ohel mo'ed hamishkan veha'ohel mikhseihu umasakh petakh 'ohel mo'ed. veqal'ei hekhazer ve'et masakh petakh hekhazer 'asher 'al hamishkan ve'al hamizbeiakh sabib ve'et meitarav lekhol 'abodato. veliqhat mishpakhat ha'amrami umishpakhat hayizhari umishpakhat hakhebroni umishpakhat ha'azi'eili 'eleh hem mishpekhot haqehati. bemispar kal zakhar miben khodesh vama'elah shemonat 'alafim veshesh mei'ot shomerei mishmeret haqodesh. mishpekhot benei qehat yakhanu 'al yerekh hamishkan teimanah. unesi bet 'ab lemishpekhot haqehati 'elizafan ben 'uzi'el. umishmartam ha'aron vehashulkhan vehamenorah vehamizbekhot ukhelei haqodesh 'asher yesharetu bahem vehamasakh vekhol 'abodato. unesi nesi'ei haleivi 'el'azar ben 'aharon hakohen pequdat shomerei mishmeret haqodesh. limrari mishpakhat hamakhli umishpakhat hamushi 'eleh hem mishpekhot merari. ufequdeihem bemispar kal zakhar miben khodesh vama'elah sheishet 'alafim umatayim. unesi bet 'ab lemishpekhot merari zuri'el ben 'abikhayil 'al yerekh hamishkan yakhanu zafonah. ufequdat mishmeret benei merari qarshei hamishkan uberikhav ve'amudav va'adanav vekhal keilav vekhol 'abodato. ve'amudei hekhazer sabib ve'adneihem viteidotam umeitereihem. vehakhonim lifnei hamishkan qeidemah lifnei 'ohel mo'ed mizrakhah mosheh ve'aharon ubanav shomerim mishmeret hamiqdash lemishmeret benei yisra'el vehazar haqareb yumat. kal pequdei halviyim 'asher paqad mosheh ve'aharon 'al pi ihoh lemishpekhotam kal zakhar miben khodesh vama'lah shenayim ve'esrim 'alef. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh peqod kal bekhor zakhar libnei yisra'el miben khodesh vama'elah vesa 'et mispar shemotam. velaqakhta 'et halviyim li 'ani ihoh takhat kal bekhor bibnei yisra'el ve'et behemat halviyim takhat kal bekhor bebehemat benei yisra'el. vayifqod mosheh ka'asher zivah ihoh 'oto 'et kal bekhor bibnei yisra'el. vayhi khal bekhor zakhar bemispar sheimot miben khodesh vama'lah lifqudeihem shenayim ve'esrim 'elef sheloshah veshib'im umatayim. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. qakh 'et halviyim takhat kal bekhor bibnei yisra'el ve'et behemat halviyim takhat behemtam vehayu li halviyim 'ani ihoh. ve'et peduyei hasheloshah vehashib'im vehamatayim ha'odefim 'al halviyim mibekhor benei yisra'el. velaqakhta khameishet khameishet sheqalim lagulgolet besheqel haqodesh tiqakh 'esrim geirah hashaqel. venatatah hakesef le'aharon ulebanav peduyei ha'odefim bahem. vayiqakh mosheh 'et kesef hapidyom mei'et ha'odefim 'al peduyei halviyim. mei'et bekhor benei yisra'el laqakh 'et hakasef khamishah veshishim ushelosh mei'ot va'elef besheqel haqodesh. vayiten mosheh 'et kesef hapeduyim le'aharon ulebanav 'al pi ihoh ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon leimor. naso 'et rosh benei qehat mitokh benei leivi lemishpekhotam lebet 'abotam. miben sheloshim shanah vama'lah ve'ad ben khamishim shanah kal ba lazaba la'asot melakhah be'ohel mo'ed. zot 'abodat benei qehat be'ohel mo'ed qodesh haqodashim. uba 'aharon ubanav binsoa' hamakhaneh vehoridu 'et parokhet hamasakh vekhisu bah 'et 'aron ha'eidut. venatenu 'alav kesui 'or takhash ufaresu beged kelil tekheilet milma'elah vesamu badav. ve'al shulkhan hapanim yifresu beged tekheilet venatenu 'alav 'et haqe'arot ve'et hakapot ve'et hamenaqiyot ve'et qesot hanasekh velekhem hatamid 'alav yihyeh. ufaresu 'aleihem beged tola'at shani vekhisu 'oto bemikhseh 'or takhash vesamu 'et badav. velaqekhu beged tekheilet vekhisu 'et menorat hama'or ve'et neiroteha ve'et malqakheha ve'et makhtoteha ve'et kal kelei shamnah 'asher yesharetu lah bahem. venatenu 'otah ve'et kal keileha 'el mikhseh 'or takhash venatenu 'al hamot. ve'al mizbakh hazahab yifresu beged tekheilet vekhisu 'oto bemikhseh 'or takhash vesamu 'et badav. velaqekhu 'et kal kelei hasharet 'asher yesharetu bam baqodesh venatenu 'el beged tekheilet vekhisu 'otam bemikhseh 'or takhash venatenu 'al hamot. vedishenu 'et hamizbeiakh ufaresu 'alav beged 'argaman. venatenu 'alav 'et kal keilav 'asher yesharetu 'alav bahem 'et hamakhtot 'et hamizlagot ve'et haya'im ve'et hamizraqot kol kelei hamizbeiakh ufaresu 'alav kesui 'or takhash vesamu badav. vekhilah 'aharon ubanav lekhasot 'et haqodesh ve'et kal kelei haqodesh binsoa' hamakhaneh ve'akharei khen yabo'u benei qehat laset velo yige'u 'el haqodesh vameitu 'eleh masa benei qehat be'ohel mo'ed. ufequdat 'el'azar ben 'aharon hakohen shemen hama'or uqetoret hasamim uminkhat hatamid veshemen hamishkhah pequdat kal hamishkan vekhal 'asher bo beqodesh ubekheilav. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon leimor. 'al takhritu 'et sheibet mishpekhot haqehati mitokh halviyim. vezot 'asu lahem vekhayu velo yamutu begishtam 'et qodesh haqodashim 'aharon ubanav yabo'u vesamu 'otam 'ish 'ish 'al 'abodato ve'el masa'o. velo yabo'u lir'ot kebala' 'et haqodesh vameitu. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. naso 'et rosh benei geireshon gam hem lebet 'abotam lemishpekhotam. miben sheloshim shanah vama'lah 'ad ben khamishim shanah tifqod 'otam kal haba lizbo zaba la'abod 'abodah be'ohel mo'ed. zot 'abodat mishpekhot hageireshuni la'abod ulemasa. venase'u 'et yeri'ot hamishkan ve'et 'ohel mo'ed mikhseihu umikhseh hatakhash 'asher 'alav milma'elah ve'et masakh petakh 'ohel mo'ed. ve'et qal'ei hekhazer ve'et masakh petakh sha'ar hekhazer 'asher 'al hamishkan ve'al hamizbeiakh sabib ve'et meitereihem ve'et kal kelei 'abodatam ve'et kal 'asher yei'aseh lahem ve'abadu. 'al pi 'aharon ubanav tihyeh kal 'abodat benei hageireshuni lekhal masa'am ulekhol 'abodatam ufeqadtem 'aleihem bemishmeret 'et kal masa'am. zot 'abodat mishpekhot benei hageireshuni be'ohel mo'ed umishmartam beyad 'itamar ben 'aharon hakohen. benei merari lemishpekhotam lebet 'abotam tifqod 'otam. miben sheloshim shanah vama'lah ve'ad ben khamishim shanah tifqedem kal haba lazaba la'abod 'et 'abodat 'ohel mo'ed. vezot mishmeret masa'am lekhal 'abodatam be'ohel mo'ed qarshei hamishkan uberikhav ve'amudav va'adanav. ve'amudei hekhazer sabib ve'adneihem viteidotam umeitereihem lekhal keleihem ulekhol 'abodatam ubesheimot tifqedu 'et kelei mishmeret masa'am. zot 'abodat mishpekhot benei merari lekhal 'abodatam be'ohel mo'ed beyad 'itamar ben 'aharon hakohen. vayifqod mosheh ve'aharon unesi'ei ha'eidah 'et benei haqehati lemishpekhotam ulebet 'abotam. miben sheloshim shanah vama'lah ve'ad ben khamishim shanah kal haba lazaba la'abodah be'ohel mo'ed. vayihyu fequdeihem lemishpekhotam 'alpayim sheba' mei'ot vakhamishim. 'eleh fequdei mishpekhot haqehati kal ha'obed be'ohel mo'ed 'asher paqad mosheh ve'aharon 'al pi ihoh beyad mosheh. ufequdei benei geireshon lemishpekhotam ulebet 'abotam. miben sheloshim shanah vama'lah ve'ad ben khamishim shanah kal haba lazaba la'abodah be'ohel mo'ed. vayihyu pequdeihem lemishpekhotam lebet 'abotam 'alpayim veshesh mei'ot usheloshim. 'eleh fequdei mishpekhot benei geireshon kal ha'obed be'ohel mo'ed 'asher paqad mosheh ve'aharon 'al pi ihoh. ufequdei mishpekhot benei merari lemishpekhotam lebet 'abotam. miben sheloshim shanah vama'lah ve'ad ben khamishim shanah kal haba lazaba la'abodah be'ohel mo'ed. vayihyu fequdeihem lemishpekhotam sheloshet 'alafim umatayim. 'eleh fequdei mishpekhot benei merari 'asher paqad mosheh ve'aharon 'al pi ihoh beyad mosheh. kal hapequdim 'asher paqad mosheh ve'aharon unesi'ei yisra'el 'et halviyim lemishpekhotam ulebet 'abotam. miben sheloshim shanah vama'lah ve'ad ben khamishim shanah kal haba la'abod 'abodat 'abodah va'abodat masa be'ohel mo'ed. vayihyu pequdeihem shemonat 'alafim vakhamesh mei'ot ushemonim. 'al pi ihoh paqad 'otam beyad mosheh 'ish 'ish 'al 'abodato ve'al masa'o ufequdav 'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. zav 'et benei yisra'el vishalekhu min hamakhaneh kal zarua' vekhal zab vekhol tamei lanafesh. mizakhar 'ad neqeibah teshaleikhu 'el mikhuz lamakhaneh teshalekhum velo yetame'u 'et makhaneihem 'asher 'ani shokhen betokham. vaya'asu khen benei yisra'el vayshalekhu 'otam 'el mikhuz lamakhaneh ka'asher diber ihoh 'el mosheh ken 'asu benei yisra'el. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. daber 'el benei yisra'el 'ish 'o 'ishah ki ya'asu mikal khatot ha'adam lim'ol ma'al ihoh ve'ashemah hanefesh hahiv. vehitvadu 'et khatatam 'asher 'asu veheishib 'et 'ashamo berosho vakhamishito yosef 'alav venatan la'asher 'asham lo. ve'im 'en la'ish go'el lehashib ha'asham 'eilav ha'asham hamushab ihoh lakohen milebad 'el hakipurim 'asher yekhaper bo 'alav. vekhal terumah lekhal qadeshei benei yisra'el 'asher yaqribu lakohen lo yihyeh. ve'ish 'et qodashav lo yihyu 'ish 'asher yiten lakohen lo yihyeh. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. daber 'el benei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem 'ish 'ish ki tisteh 'ishto uma'alah bo ma'al. veshakhab 'ish 'otah shikhbat zera' vene'lam mei'einei 'ishah venisterah vehi nitma'ah ve'ed 'en bah vehiv lo nitpasah. ve'abar 'alav ruakh qin'ah veqinei 'et 'ishto vehiv nitma'ah 'o 'abar 'alav ruakh qin'ah veqinei 'et 'ishto vehi lo nitma'ah. veheibi ha'ish 'et 'ishto 'el hakohen veheibi 'et qarebanah 'aleha 'asirit ha'eifah qemakh se'orim lo yizoq 'alav shemen velo yiten 'alav lebonah ki minkhat qena'ot hu minkhat zikaron mazkeret 'avon. vehiqrib 'otah hakohen vehe'emidah lifnei ihoh. velaqakh hakohen mayim qedoshim bikhli khares umin he'afar 'asher yihyeh beqarqa' hamishkan yiqakh hakohen venatan 'el hamayim. vehe'emid hakohen 'et ha'ishah lifnei ihoh ufara' 'et rosh ha'ishah venatan 'al kapeha 'et minkhat hazikaron minkhat qena'ot hi ubeyad hakohen yihyu mei hamarim ham'ararim vehishbia' 'otah hakohen ve'amar 'el ha'ishah 'im lo shakhab 'ish 'otakh ve'im lo satit tum'ah takhat 'ishekh hinaqi mimei hamarim ham'ararim ha'eleh. ve'at ki satit takhat 'ishekh vekhi nitmet vayiten 'ish bakh 'et shekhabeto mibal'adei 'ishekh. vehishbia' hakohen 'et ha'ishah bishbu'at ha'alah ve'amar hakohen la'ishah yiten ihoh 'otakh le'alah velishbu'ah betokh 'amekh betet ihoh 'et yereikhekh nofelet ve'et bitnekh zabah. uba'u hamayim ham'arerim ha'eleh bemei'ayikh lazbot beten velanpil yarekh ve'amerah ha'ishah 'amen 'amen. vekhatab 'et ha'alot ha'eleh hakohen baseifer umakhah 'el mei hamarim. vehishqah 'et ha'ishah 'et mei hamarim ham'ararim uba'u bah hamayim ham'ararim lemarim. velaqakh hakohen miyad ha'ishah 'et minkhat haqena'ot veheinif 'et haminkhah lifnei ihoh vehiqrib 'otah 'el hamizbeiakh. veqamaz hakohen min haminkhah 'et 'azkaratah vehiqtir hamizbeikhah ve'akhar yashqeh 'et ha'ishah 'et hamayim. vehishqah 'et hamayim vehayetah 'im nitme'ah vatim'ol ma'al be'ishah uba'u bah hamayim ham'ararim lemarim vezabetah bitnah venafelah yereikhah vehayetah ha'ishah le'alah beqereb 'amah. ve'im lo nitme'ah ha'ishah utehorah hi veniqetah venizre'ah zara'. zot torat haqena'ot 'asher tisteh 'ishah takhat 'ishah venitma'ah. 'o 'ish 'asher ta'abor 'alav ruakh qin'ah veqinei 'et 'ishto vehe'emid 'et ha'ishah lifnei ihoh ve'asah lah hakohen 'et kal hatorah hazot. veniqah ha'ish mei'avon veha'ishah hahiv tisa 'et 'avonah. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. daber 'el benei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem 'ish 'o 'ishah ki yafli lindor neder nazir lehazir ihoh. miyayin vesheikhar yazir khomez yayin vekhomez sheikhar lo yishteh vekhal mishrat 'anabim lo yishteh va'anabim lakhim vibeishim lo yokhel. kol yemei nizro mikol 'asher yei'aseh migefen hayayin meikharzanim ve'ad zag lo yokhel. kal yemei neder nizro ta'ar lo ya'abor 'al rosho 'ad melot hayamim 'asher yazir ihoh qadosh yihyeh gadel pera' se'ar rosho. kal yemei haziro ihoh 'al nefesh met lo yabo. le'abiv ule'imo le'akhiv ule'akhoto lo yitama lahem bemotam ki neizer 'elohav 'al rosho. kol yemei nizro qadosh hu ihoh. vekhi yamut met 'alav befeta' pit'om vetimei rosh nizro vegilakh rosho beyom tahorato bayom hashebi'i yegalekhenu. ubayom hashemini yabi shetei torim 'o shenei benei yonah 'el hakohen 'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed. ve'asah hakohen 'ekhad lekhatat ve'ekhad le'olah vekhiper 'alav mei'asher khata 'al hanafesh veqidash 'et rosho bayom hahu. vehizir ihoh 'et yemei nizro veheibi kebes ben shenato le'asham vehayamim harishonim yipelu ki tamei nizro. vezot torat hanazir beyom melot yemei nizro yabi 'oto 'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed. vehiqrib 'et qarebano ihoh kebes ben shenato tamim 'ekhad le'olah vekhabsah 'akhat bat shenatah temimah lekhatat ve'ayil 'ekhad tamim lishlamim. vesal mazot solet khalot belulot bashemen ureqiqei mazot meshukhim bashamen uminkhatam veniskeihem. vehiqrib hakohen lifnei ihoh ve'asah 'et khatato ve'et 'olato. ve'et ha'ayil ya'aseh zebakh shelamim ihoh 'al sal hamazot ve'asah hakohen 'et minkhato ve'et nisko. vegilakh hanazir petakh 'ohel mo'ed 'et rosh nizro velaqakh 'et se'ar rosh nizro venatan 'al ha'esh 'asher takhat zebakh hashelamim. velaqakh hakohen 'et hazeroa' besheilah min ha'ayil vekhalat mazah 'akhat min hasal ureqiq mazah 'ekhad venatan 'al kapei hanazir 'akhar hitgalekho 'et nizro. veheinif 'otam hakohen tenufah lifnei ihoh qodesh hu lakohen 'al khazeh hatenufah ve'al shoq haterumah ve'akhar yishteh hanazir yayin. zot torat hanazir 'asher yidor qarebano ihoh 'al nizro milebad 'asher tasig yado kefi nidro 'asher yidor ken ya'aseh 'al torat nizro. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. daber 'el 'aharon ve'el banav leimor koh tebarakhu 'et benei yisra'el 'amor lahem. yebarekhkha ihoh veyishmerekha. ya'er ihoh panav 'eilekha vikhuneka. yisa ihoh panav 'eilekha veyasem lekha shalom. vesamu 'et shemi 'al benei yisra'el va'ani 'abarakhem. vayhi beyom kalot mosheh lehaqim 'et hamishkan vayimshakh 'oto vayqadesh 'oto ve'et kal keilav ve'et hamizbeiakh ve'et kal keilav vayimshakhem vayqadesh 'otam. vayaqribu nesi'ei yisra'el rashei bet 'abotam hem nesi'ei hamatot hem ha'omedim 'al hapequdim. vayabi'u 'et qarebanam lifnei ihoh shesh 'eglot zab ushenei 'asar baqar 'agalah 'al shenei hanesi'im veshor le'ekhad vayaqribu 'otam lifnei hamishkan. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. qakh mei'itam vehayu la'abod 'et 'abodat 'ohel mo'ed venatatah 'otam 'el halviyim 'ish kefi 'abodato. vayiqakh mosheh 'et ha'agalot ve'et habaqar vayiten 'otam 'el halviyim. 'et shetei ha'agalot ve'et 'arba'at habaqar natan libnei geireshon kefi 'abodatam. ve'et 'arba' ha'agalot ve'et shemonat habaqar natan libnei merari kefi 'abodatam beyad 'itamar ben 'aharon hakohen. velibnei qehat lo natan ki 'abodat haqodesh 'aleihem bakatef yisa'u. vayaqribu hanesi'im 'et khanukat hamizbeiakh beyom himashakh 'oto vayaqribu hanesi'im 'et qarebanam lifnei hamizbeiakh. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh nasi 'ekhad layom nasi 'ekhad layom yaqribu 'et qarebanam lakhanukat hamizbeiakh. vayhi hamaqrib bayom harishon 'et qarebano nakhshon ben 'aminadab lemateh yehudah. veqarebano qa'arat kesef 'akhat sheloshim umei'ah mishqalah mizraq 'ekhad kesef shib'im sheqel besheqel haqodesh sheneihem melei'im solet belulah bashemen leminkhah. kaf 'akhat 'asarah zahab melei'ah qetoret. par 'ekhad ben baqar 'ayil 'ekhad kebes 'ekhad ben shenato le'olah. se'ir 'izim 'ekhad lekhatat. ulezebakh hashelamim baqar shenayim 'eilim khamishah 'atudim khamishah kebasim benei shanah khamishah zeh qareban nakhshon ben 'aminadab. bayom hasheini hiqrib netan'el ben zu'ar nesi yisashkhar. hiqrib 'et qarebano qa'arat kesef 'akhat sheloshim umei'ah mishqalah mizraq 'ekhad kesef shib'im sheqel besheqel haqodesh sheneihem melei'im solet belulah bashemen leminkhah. kaf 'akhat 'asarah zahab melei'ah qetoret. par 'ekhad ben baqar 'ayil 'ekhad kebes 'ekhad ben shenato le'olah. se'ir 'izim 'ekhad lekhatat. ulezebakh hashelamim baqar shenayim 'eilim khamishah 'atudim khamishah kebasim benei shanah khamishah zeh qareban netan'el ben zu'ar. bayom hashelishi nasi libnei zebulun 'eli'ab ben kheilon. qarebano qa'arat kesef 'akhat sheloshim umei'ah mishqalah mizraq 'ekhad kesef shib'im sheqel besheqel haqodesh sheneihem melei'im solet belulah bashemen leminkhah. kaf 'akhat 'asarah zahab melei'ah qetoret. par 'ekhad ben baqar 'ayil 'ekhad kebes 'ekhad ben shenato le'olah. se'ir 'izim 'ekhad lekhatat. ulezebakh hashelamim baqar shenayim 'eilim khamishah 'atudim khamishah kebasim benei shanah khamishah zeh qareban 'eli'ab ben kheilon. bayom harebi'i nasi libnei re'uben 'elizur ben shedei'ur. qarebano qa'arat kesef 'akhat sheloshim umei'ah mishqalah mizraq 'ekhad kesef shib'im sheqel besheqel haqodesh sheneihem melei'im solet belulah bashemen leminkhah. kaf 'akhat 'asarah zahab melei'ah qetoret par 'ekhad ben baqar 'ayil 'ekhad kebes 'ekhad ben shenato le'olah. se'ir 'izim 'ekhad lekhatat. ulezebakh hashelamim baqar shenayim 'eilim khamishah 'atudim khamishah kebasim benei shanah khamishah zeh qareban 'elizur ben shedei'ur. bayom hakhamishi nasi libnei shim'on shelumi'el ben zurishadai. qarebano qa'arat kesef 'akhat sheloshim umei'ah mishqalah mizraq 'ekhad kesef shib'im sheqel besheqel haqodesh sheneihem melei'im solet belulah bashemen leminkhah. kaf 'akhat 'asarah zahab melei'ah qetoret. par 'ekhad ben baqar 'ayil 'ekhad kebes 'ekhad ben shenato le'olah. se'ir 'izim 'ekhad lekhatat ulezebakh hashelamim baqar shenayim 'eilim khamishah 'atudim khamishah kebasim benei shanah khamishah zeh qareban shelumi'el ben zurishadai. bayom hashishi nasi libnei gad 'elyasaf ben de'u'el. qarebano qa'arat kesef 'akhat sheloshim umei'ah mishqalah mizraq 'ekhad kesef shib'im sheqel besheqel haqodesh sheneihem melei'im solet belulah bashemen leminkhah. kaf 'akhat 'asarah zahab melei'ah qetoret. par 'ekhad ben baqar 'ayil 'ekhad kebes 'ekhad ben shenato le'olah. se'ir 'izim 'ekhad lekhatat. ulezebakh hashelamim baqar shenayim 'eilim khamishah 'atudim khamishah kebasim benei shanah khamishah zeh qareban 'elyasaf ben de'u'el. bayom hashebi'i nasi libnei 'efrayim 'elishama' ben 'amihud. qarebano qa'arat kesef 'akhat sheloshim umei'ah mishqalah mizraq 'ekhad kesef shib'im sheqel besheqel haqodesh sheneihem melei'im solet belulah bashemen leminkhah. kaf 'akhat 'asarah zahab melei'ah qetoret. par 'ekhad ben baqar 'ayil 'ekhad kebes 'ekhad ben shenato le'olah. se'ir 'izim 'ekhad lekhatat. ulezebakh hashelamim baqar shenayim 'eilim khamishah 'atudim khamishah kebasim benei shanah khamishah zeh qareban 'elishama' ben 'amihud. bayom hashemini nasi libnei menasheh gamli'el ben pedah zur. qarebano qa'arat kesef 'akhat sheloshim umei'ah mishqalah mizraq 'ekhad kesef shib'im sheqel besheqel haqodesh sheneihem melei'im solet belulah bashemen leminkhah kaf 'akhat 'asarah zahab melei'ah qetoret. par 'ekhad ben baqar 'ayil 'ekhad kebes 'ekhad ben shenato le'olah. se'ir 'izim 'ekhad lekhatat. ulezebakh hashelamim baqar shenayim 'eilim khamishah 'atudim khamishah kebasim benei shanah khamishah zeh qareban gamli'el ben pedah zur bayom hateshi'i nasi libnei binyamin 'abidan ben gid'oni. qarebano qa'arat kesef 'akhat sheloshim umei'ah mishqalah mizraq 'ekhad kesef shib'im sheqel besheqel haqodesh sheneihem melei'im solet belulah bashemen leminkhah. kaf 'akhat 'asarah zahab melei'ah qetoret. par 'ekhad ben baqar 'ayil 'ekhad kebes 'ekhad ben shenato le'olah. se'ir 'izim 'ekhad lekhatat. ulezebakh hashelamim baqar shenayim 'eilim khamishah 'atudim khamishah kebasim benei shanah khamishah zeh qareban 'abidan ben gid'oni. bayom ha'asiri nasi libnei dan 'akhi'ezer ben 'amishadai. qarebano qa'arat kesef 'akhat sheloshim umei'ah mishqalah mizraq 'ekhad kesef shib'im sheqel besheqel haqodesh sheneihem melei'im solet belulah bashemen leminkhah. kaf 'akhat 'asarah zahab melei'ah qetoret par 'ekhad ben baqar 'ayil 'ekhad kebes 'ekhad ben shenato le'olah. se'ir 'izim 'ekhad lekhatat. ulezebakh hashelamim baqar shenayim 'eilim khamishah 'atudim khamishah kebasim benei shanah khamishah zeh qareban 'akhi'ezer ben 'amishadai. beyom 'ashtei 'asar yom nasi libnei 'asher pag'i'el ben 'akheran. qarebano qa'arat kesef 'akhat sheloshim umei'ah mishqalah mizraq 'ekhad kesef shib'im sheqel besheqel haqodesh sheneihem melei'im solet belulah bashemen leminkhah. kaf 'akhat 'asarah zahab melei'ah qetoret. par 'ekhad ben baqar 'ayil 'ekhad kebes 'ekhad ben shenato le'olah. se'ir 'izim 'ekhad lekhatat. ulezebakh hashelamim baqar shenayim 'eilim khamishah 'atudim khamishah kebasim benei shanah khamishah zeh qareban pag'i'el ben 'akheran. beyom shenem 'asar yom nasi libnei naftali 'akhira' ben 'einan. qarebano qa'arat kesef 'akhat sheloshim umei'ah mishqalah mizraq 'ekhad kesef shib'im sheqel besheqel haqodesh sheneihem melei'im solet belulah bashemen leminkhah. kaf 'akhat 'asarah zahab melei'ah qetoret. par 'ekhad ben baqar 'ayil 'ekhad kebes 'ekhad ben shenato le'olah. se'ir 'izim 'ekhad lekhatat. ulezebakh hashelamim baqar shenayim 'eilim khamishah 'atudim khamishah kebasim benei shanah khamishah zeh qareban 'akhira' ben 'einan. zot khanukat hamizbeiakh beyom himashakh 'oto mei'et nesi'ei yisra'el qa'arot kesef shetem 'esreh mizreqei khesef shenem 'asar kapot zahab shetem 'esreh. sheloshim umei'ah haqe'arah ha'akhat kesef veshib'im hamizraq ha'ekhad kol kesef hakeilim 'alpayim ve'arba' mei'ot besheqel haqodesh. kapot zahab shetem 'esreh melei'ot qetoret 'asarah 'asarah hakaf besheqel haqodesh kal zehab hakapot 'esrim umei'ah. kal habaqar la'olah shenem 'asar parim 'eilim shenem 'asar kebasim benei shanah shenem 'asar uminkhatam use'irei 'izim shenem 'asar lekhatat. vekhol beqar zebakh hashelamim 'esrim ve'arba'ah parim 'eilim shishim 'atudim shishim kebasim benei shanah shishim zot khanukat hamizbeiakh 'akharei himashakh 'oto. ubebo mosheh 'el 'ohel mo'ed ledaber 'ito vayishma' 'et haqol midaber 'eilav mei'al hakaporet 'asher 'al 'aron ha'eidut miben shenei hakerubim vaydaber 'eilav. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. daber 'el 'aharon ve'amarta 'eilav beha'alotekha 'et haneirot 'el mul penei hamenorah ya'iru shib'at haneirot. vaya'as ken 'aharon 'el mul penei hamenorah he'elah neiroteha ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. vezeh ma'aseh hamenorah miqshah zahab 'ad yereikhah 'ad pirkhah miqshah hi kamar'eh 'asher her'ah ihoh 'et mosheh ken 'asah 'et hamenorah. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. qakh 'et halviyim mitokh benei yisra'el vetiharta 'otam. vekhoh ta'aseh lahem letaharam hazeh 'aleihem mei khatat vehe'ebiru ta'ar 'al kal besaram vekhibesu bigdeihem vehiteharu. velaqekhu par ben baqar uminkhato solet belulah bashamen ufar sheini ben baqar tiqakh lekhatat. vehiqrabta 'et halviyim lifnei 'ohel mo'ed vehiqhalta 'et kal 'adat benei yisra'el. vehiqrabta 'et halviyim lifnei ihoh vesamekhu benei yisra'el 'et yedeihem 'al halviyim. veheinif 'aharon 'et halviyim tenufah lifnei ihoh mei'et benei yisra'el vehayu la'abod 'et 'abodat ihoh. vehalviyim yismekhu 'et yedeihem 'al rosh haparim va'aseh 'et ha'ekhad khatat ve'et ha'ekhad 'olah ihoh lekhaper 'al halviyim. veha'amadta 'et halviyim lifnei 'aharon velifnei banav veheinafta 'otam tenufah ihoh. vehibdalta 'et halviyim mitokh benei yisra'el vehayu li halviyim. ve'akharei khen yabo'u halviyim la'abod 'et 'ohel mo'ed vetiharta 'otam veheinafta 'otam tenufah. ki netunim netunim hemah li mitokh benei yisra'el takhat pitrat kal rekhem bekhor kol mibenei yisra'el laqakhti 'otam li. ki li khal bekhor bibnei yisra'el ba'adam ubabeheimah beyom hakoti khal bekhor be'erez mizrayim hiqdashti 'otam li. va'eqakh 'et halviyim takhat kal bekhor bibnei yisra'el. va'etenah 'et halviyim netunim le'aharon ulebanav mitokh benei yisra'el la'abod 'et 'abodat benei yisra'el be'ohel mo'ed ulekhaper 'al benei yisra'el velo yihyeh bibnei yisra'el negef begeshet benei yisra'el 'el haqodesh. vaya'as mosheh ve'aharon vekhal 'adat benei yisra'el lalviyim kekhol 'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh lalviyim ken 'asu lahem benei yisra'el. vayitkhate'u halviyim vaykhabesu bigdeihem vayanef 'aharon 'otam tenufah lifnei ihoh vaykhaper 'aleihem 'aharon letaharam. ve'akharei khen ba'u halviyim la'abod 'et 'abodatam be'ohel mo'ed lifnei 'aharon velifnei banav ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh 'al halviyim ken 'asu lahem. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. zot 'asher lalviyim miben khamesh ve'esrim shanah vama'lah yabo lizbo zaba ba'abodat 'ohel mo'ed. umiben khamishim shanah yashub mizeba ha'abodah velo ya'abod 'od. vesheiret 'et 'ekhav be'ohel mo'ed lishmor mishmeret va'abodah lo ya'abod kakhah ta'aseh lalviyim bemishmerotam. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh bemidbar sinai bashanah hasheinit lezeitam mei'erez mizrayim bakhodesh harishon leimor. veya'asu benei yisra'el 'et hapasakh bemo'ado. be'arba'ah 'asar yom bakhodesh hazeh ben ha'arbayim ta'asu 'oto bemo'ado kekhal khuqotav ukhekhal mishpatav ta'asu 'oto. vaydaber mosheh 'el benei yisra'el la'asot hapasakh. vaya'asu 'et hapesakh barishon be'arba'ah 'asar yom lakhodesh ben ha'arbayim bemidbar sinai kekhol 'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh ken 'asu benei yisra'el. vayhi 'anashim 'asher hayu temei'im lenefesh 'adam velo yakhelu la'asot hapesakh bayom hahu vayiqrebu lifnei mosheh velifnei 'aharon bayom hahu. vayomeru ha'anashim hahemah 'eilav 'anakhnu temei'im lenefesh 'adam lamah nigara' lebilti haqrib 'et qareban ihoh bemo'ado betokh benei yisra'el. vayomer 'aleihem mosheh 'imdu ve'eshme'ah mah yezaveh ihoh lakhem. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. daber 'el benei yisra'el leimor 'ish 'ish ki yihyeh tamei lanefesh 'o bederekh rekhoqah lakhem 'o ledoroteikhem ve'asah fesakh ihoh. bakhodesh hasheini be'arba'ah 'asar yom ben ha'arbayim ya'asu 'oto 'al mazot umerorim yokheluhu. lo yash'iru mimenu 'ad boqer ve'ezem lo yishberu bo kekhal khuqat hapesakh ya'asu 'oto. veha'ish 'asher hu tahor ubederekh lo hayah vekhadal la'asot hapesakh venikhretah hanefesh hahiv mei'ameha ki qareban ihoh lo hiqrib bemo'ado khet'o yisa ha'ish hahu. vekhi yagur 'itekhem ger ve'asah fesakh ihoh kekhuqat hapesakh ukhemishpato ken ya'aseh khuqah 'akhat yihyeh lakhem velager ule'ezrakh ha'arez. ubeyom haqim 'et hamishkan kisah he'anan 'et hamishkan le'ohel ha'eidut uba'ereb yihyeh 'al hamishkan kemar'eh 'esh 'ad boqer. ken yihyeh tamid he'anan yekhasenu umar'eh 'esh layelah. ulefi hei'alot he'anan mei'al ha'ohel ve'akharei khen yis'u benei yisra'el ubimqom 'asher yishkan sham he'anan sham yakhanu benei yisra'el. 'al pi ihoh yis'u benei yisra'el ve'al pi ihoh yakhanu kal yemei 'asher yishkon he'anan 'al hamishkan yakhanu. ubeha'arikh he'anan 'al hamishkan yamim rabim veshameru benei yisra'el 'et mishmeret ihoh velo yisa'u. veyesh 'asher yihyeh he'anan yamim mispar 'al hamishkan 'al pi ihoh yakhanu ve'al pi ihoh yisa'u. veyesh 'asher yihyeh he'anan mei'ereb 'ad boqer vena'alah he'anan baboqer venasa'u 'o yomam valaylah vena'alah he'anan venasa'u. 'o yomayim 'o khodesh 'o yamim beha'arikh he'anan 'al hamishkan lishkon 'alav yakhanu benei yisra'el velo yisa'u ubehei'aloto yisa'u. 'al pi ihoh yakhanu ve'al pi ihoh yisa'u 'et mishmeret ihoh shamaru 'al pi ihoh beyad mosheh. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. 'aseh lekha shetei khazozrot kesef miqshah ta'aseh 'otam vehayu lekha lemiqra ha'eidah ulemasa' 'et hamakhanot. vetaqe'u bahen veno'adu 'eilekha kal ha'eidah 'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed. ve'im be'akhat yitqa'u veno'adu 'eilekha hanesi'im rashei 'alfei yisra'el. uteqa'tem teru'ah venase'u hamakhanot hakhonim qeidemah. uteqa'tem teru'ah sheinit venase'u hamakhanot hakhonim teimanah teru'ah yitqe'u lemas'eihem. ubehaqhil 'et haqahal titqe'u velo tari'u. ubenei 'aharon hakohanim yitqe'u bakhazozerot vehayu lakhem lekhuqat 'olam ledoroteikhem. vekhi tabo'u milkhamah be'arzekhem 'al hazar hazorer 'etkhem vaharei'otem bakhazozerot vanizkartem lifnei ihoh 'eloheikhem venosha'tem mei'oyebeikhem. ubeyom simkhatkhem ubemo'adeikhem uberashei khadesheikhem uteqa'tem bakhazozerot 'al 'oloteikhem ve'al zibkhei shalmeikhem vehayu lakhem lezikaron lifnei 'eloheikhem 'ani ihoh 'eloheikhem. vayhi bashanah hasheinit bakhodesh hasheini be'esrim bakhodesh na'alah he'anan mei'al mishkan ha'eidut. vayis'u benei yisra'el lemas'eihem mimidbar sinai vayishkon he'anan bemidbar paran. vayis'u barishonah 'al pi ihoh beyad mosheh. vayisa' degel makhaneh benei yehudah barishonah lezib'otam ve'al zeba'o nakhshon ben 'aminadab. ve'al zeba mateh benei yisashkhar netan'el ben zu'ar. ve'al zeba mateh benei zebulun 'eli'ab ben kheilon. vehurad hamishkan venase'u benei geireshon ubenei merari nose'ei hamishkan. venasa' degel makhaneh re'uben lezib'otam ve'al zeba'o 'elizur ben shedei'ur. ve'al zeba mateh benei shim'on shelumi'el ben zuri shadai. ve'al zeba mateh benei gad 'elyasaf ben de'u'el. venase'u haqehatim nose'ei hamiqdash veheiqimu 'et hamishkan 'ad bo'am. venasa' degel makhaneh benei 'efrayim lezib'otam ve'al zeba'o 'elishama' ben 'amihud. ve'al zeba mateh benei menasheh gamli'el ben pedah zur ve'al zeba mateh benei binyamin 'abidan ben gid'oni. venasa' degel makhaneh benei dan me'asef lekhal hamakhanot lezib'otam ve'al zeba'o 'akhi'ezer ben 'amishadai ve'al zeba mateh benei 'asher pag'i'el ben 'akheran. ve'al zeba mateh benei naftali 'akhira' ben 'einan. 'eleh mas'ei benei yisra'el lezib'otam vayisa'u. vayomer mosheh lekhobab ben re'u'el hamidyani khoten mosheh nose'im 'anakhnu 'el hamaqom 'asher 'amar ihoh 'oto 'eten lakhem lekhah 'itanu veheitabnu lakh ki ihoh diber tob 'al yisra'el. vayomer 'eilav lo 'eilekh ki 'im 'el 'arzi ve'el moladti 'eilekh. vayomer 'al na ta'azob 'otanu ki 'al ken yada'ta khanoteinu bamidbar vehayita lanu le'einayim. vehayah ki teilekh 'imanu vehayah hatob hahu 'asher yeitib ihoh 'imanu veheitabnu lakh. vayis'u meihar ihoh derekh sheloshet yamim va'aron berit ihoh noseia' lifneihem derekh sheloshet yamim latur lahem menukhah. va'anan ihoh 'aleihem yomam benase'am min hamakhaneh. vayhi binsoa' ha'aron vayomer mosheh qumah ihoh veyafuzu 'oyebekha veyanusu mesan'ekha mipanekha. ubenukhoh yomar shubah ihoh ribbot 'alfei yisra'el. vayhi ha'am kemit'onenim ra' be'azenei ihoh vayishma' ihoh vayikhar 'apo vatib'ar bam 'esh ihoh vatokhal biqzeh hamakhaneh. vayiz'aq ha'am 'el mosheh vayitpalel mosheh 'el ihoh vatishqa' ha'esh. vayiqra shem hamaqom hahu tab'eirah ki ba'arah bam 'esh ihoh. vehasafsuf 'asher beqirbo hit'avu ta'avah vayashubu vayibku gam benei yisra'el vayomeru mi ya'akhileinu basar. zakharnu 'et hadagah 'asher nokhal bemizrayim khinam 'et haqishu'im ve'et ha'abatikhim ve'et hekhazir ve'et habezalim ve'et hashumim. ve'atah nafsheinu yebeishah 'en kol bilti 'el haman 'eineinu. vehaman kizra' gad hu ve'eino ke'en habedolakh. shatu ha'am velaqetu vetakhanu bareikhayim 'o dakhu bamedokhah ubishelu baparur ve'asu 'oto 'ugot vehayah ta'mo keta'am leshad hashamen. uberedet hatal 'al hamakhaneh layelah yeired haman 'alav. vayishma' mosheh 'et ha'am bokheh lemishpekhotav 'ish lefetakh 'aholo vayikhar 'af ihoh me'od ube'einei mosheh ra'. vayomer mosheh 'el ihoh lamah harei'ota le'abdekha velamah lo mazati khen be'einekha lasum 'et masa kal ha'am hazeh 'alai. he'anokhi hariti 'et kal ha'am hazeh 'im 'anokhi yelidtihu ki tomar 'eilai sa'eihu bekheiqekha ka'asher yisa ha'omen 'et hayoneq 'al ha'adamah 'asher nishba'ta la'abotav. mei'ayin li basar latet lekhal ha'am hazeh ki yibku 'alai leimor tenah lanu basar venokheilah. lo 'ukhal 'anokhi lebadi laset 'et kal ha'am hazeh ki khabed mimeni. ve'im kakhah 'at 'oseh li haregeini na harog 'im mazati khen be'einekha ve'al 'er'eh bera'ati. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh 'esfah li shib'im 'ish miziqnei yisra'el 'asher yada'ta ki hem ziqnei ha'am veshoterav velaqakhta 'otam 'el 'ohel mo'ed vehityazebu sham 'imakh. veyaradti vedibarti 'imekha sham ve'azalti min haruakh 'asher 'alekha vesamti 'aleihem venase'u 'itekha bemasa ha'am velo tisa 'atah lebadekha. ve'el ha'am tomar hitqadeshu lemakhar va'akhaltem basar ki bekhitem be'azenei ihoh leimor mi ya'akhileinu basar ki tob lanu bemizrayim venatan ihoh lakhem basar va'akhaltem. lo yom 'ekhad tokhelun velo yomayim velo khamishah yamim velo 'asarah yamim velo 'esrim yom. 'ad khodesh yamim 'ad 'asher yeizei mei'apekhem vehayah lakhem lezara ya'an ki me'astem 'et ihoh 'asher beqirbekhem vatibku lefanav leimor lamah zeh yazanu mimizrayim. vayomer mosheh shesh mei'ot 'elef ragli ha'am 'asher 'anokhi beqirbo ve'atah 'amarta basar 'eten lahem ve'akhelu khodesh yamim. hazon ubaqar yishakhet lahem umaza lahem 'im 'et kal degei hayam yei'asef lahem umaza lahem. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh hayad ihoh tiqzar 'atah tir'eh hayiqrekha debari 'im lo. vayeizei mosheh vaydaber 'el ha'am 'et dibrei ihoh vaye'esof shib'im 'ish miziqnei ha'am vaya'amed 'otam sebibot ha'ohel. vayeired ihoh be'anan vaydaber 'eilav vayazel min haruakh 'asher 'alav vayiten 'al shib'im 'ish hazeqeinim vayhi kenoakh 'aleihem haruakh vayitnabe'u velo yasafu. vayisha'aru shenei 'anashim bamakhaneh shem ha'ekhad 'eldad veshem hasheini meidad vatanakh 'aleihem haruakh vehemah baketubim velo yaze'u ha'ohelah vayitnabe'u bamakhaneh. vayaraz hana'ar vayaged lemosheh vayomar 'eldad umeidad mitnabe'im bamakhaneh. vaya'an yehoshua' bin nun mesharet mosheh mibekhurav vayomar 'adoni mosheh kela'em. vayomer lo mosheh hamqanei 'atah li umi yiten kal 'am ihoh nebi'im ki yiten ihoh 'et rukho 'aleihem. vayei'asef mosheh 'el hamakhaneh hu veziqnei yisra'el. veruakh nasa' mei'et ihoh vayagaz salvim min hayam vayitosh 'al hamakhaneh kederekh yom koh ukhederekh yom koh sebibot hamakhaneh ukhe'amatayim 'al penei ha'arez. vayaqam ha'am kal hayom hahu vekhal halaylah vekhol yom hamakhorat vaya'asfu 'et haselav hamam'it 'asaf 'asarah khomarim vayishtekhu lahem shatoakh sebibot hamakhaneh. habasar 'odenu ben shineihem terem yikaret ve'af ihoh kharah ba'am vayakh ihoh ba'am makah rabah me'od. vayiqra 'et shem hamaqom hahu qibrot hata'avah ki sham qaberu 'et ha'am hamit'avim. miqibrot hata'avah nase'u ha'am khazeirot vayihyu bakhazeirot. vatedaber miryam ve'aharon bemosheh 'al 'odot ha'ishah hakushit 'asher laqakh ki 'ishah khushit laqakh. vayomeru haraq 'akh bemosheh diber ihoh halo gam banu diber vayishma' ihoh. veha'ish mosheh 'anav 'anav me'od mikol ha'adam 'asher 'al penei ha'adamah. vayomer ihoh pit'om 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon ve'el miryam ze'u shelashetekhem 'el 'ohel mo'ed vayeize'u shelashetam. vayeired ihoh be'amud 'anan vaya'amod petakh ha'ohel vayiqra 'aharon umiryam vayeize'u sheneihem. vayomer shim'u na debarai 'im yihyeh nebi'akhem ihoh bamar'ah 'eilav 'etvada' bakhalom 'adaber bo. lo khen 'abdi mosheh bekhal beiti ne'eman hu. peh 'el peh 'adaber bo umar'eh velo bekhidot utemunat ihoh yabit umadua' lo yereitem ledaber be'abdi bemosheh. vayikhar 'af ihoh bam vayeilakh. vehe'anan sar mei'al ha'ohel vehineh miryam mezora'at kashaleg vayifen 'aharon 'el miryam vehineh mezora'at. vayomer 'aharon 'el mosheh bi 'adoni 'al na tashet 'aleinu khatat 'asher no'alnu va'asher khatanu. 'al na tehi kamet 'asher bezeito meirekhem 'imo vayei'akhel khazi besaro. vayiz'aq mosheh 'el ihoh leimor 'el na refa na lah. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh ve'abiha yaroq yaraq befaneha halo tikalem shib'at yamim tisager shib'at yamim mikhuz lamakhaneh ve'akhar tei'asef. vatisager miryam mikhuz lamakhaneh shib'at yamim veha'am lo nasa' 'ad hei'asef miryam. ve'akhar nase'u ha'am meikhazeirot vayakhanu bemidbar paran. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. shelakh lekha 'anashim veyaturu 'et 'erez kena'an 'asher 'ani noten libnei yisra'el 'ish 'ekhad 'ish 'ekhad lemateh 'abotav tishlakhu kol nasi bahem. vayishlakh 'otam mosheh mimidbar paran 'al pi ihoh kulam 'anashim rashei benei yisra'el hemah. ve'eleh shemotam lemateh re'uben shamua' ben zakur. lemateh shim'on shafat ben khori. lemateh yehudah kaleb ben yefuneh. lemateh yisashkhar yig'al ben yosef. lemateh 'efrayim hosheia' bin nun. lemateh binyamin palti ben rafu. lemateh zebulun gadi'el ben sodi. lemateh yosef lemateh menasheh gadi ben susi. lemateh dan 'ami'el ben gemali. lemateh 'asher setur ben mikha'el. lemateh naftali nakhbi ben vafesi. lemateh gad ge'u'el ben makhi.
