'eleh shemot ha'anashim 'asher shalakh mosheh latur 'et ha'arez vayiqra mosheh lehosheia' bin nun yehoshua'. vayishlakh 'otam mosheh latur 'et 'erez kena'an vayomer 'aleihem 'alu zeh banegeb va'alitem 'et hahar. ure'item 'et ha'arez mah hi ve'et ha'am hayosheb 'aleha hekhazaq hu harafeh ham'at hu 'im rab. umah ha'arez 'asher hu yosheb bah hatobah hi 'im ra'ah umah he'arim 'asher hu yosheb bahenah habemakhanim 'im bemibzarim. umah ha'arez hashemeinah hi 'im razah hayesh bah 'ez 'im 'ayin vehitkhazaqtem uleqakhtem miperi ha'arez vehayamim yemei bikurei 'anabim. vaya'alu vayaturu 'et ha'arez mimidbar zin 'ad rekhob lebo khamat. vaya'alu banegeb vayabo 'ad khebron vesham 'akhiman sheishai vetalmai yelidei ha'anaq vekhebron sheba' shanim nibnetah lifnei zo'an mizrayim. vayabo'u 'ad nakhal 'eshkol vayikhretu misham zemorah ve'eshkol 'anabim 'ekhad vayisa'uhu bamot bishnayim umin harimonim umin hate'einim. lamaqom hahu qara nakhal 'eshkol 'al 'odot ha'eshkol 'asher karetu misham benei yisra'el. vayashubu mitur ha'arez miqez 'arba'im yom. vayeilekhu vayabo'u 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon ve'el kal 'adat benei yisra'el 'el midbar paran qadeishah vayashibu 'otam dabar ve'et kal ha'eidah vayar'um 'et peri ha'arez. vaysaperu lo vayomeru banu 'el ha'arez 'asher shelakhtanu vegam zabat khalab udebash hi vezeh piryah. 'efes ki 'az ha'am hayosheb ba'arez vehe'arim bezurot gedolot me'od vegam yelidei ha'anaq ra'inu sham. 'amaleq yosheb be'erez hanegeb vehakhiti vehaybusi veha'emori yosheb bahar vehakena'ani yosheb 'al hayam ve'al yad hayarden. vayahas kaleb 'et ha'am 'el mosheh vayomer 'aloh na'aleh veyarashnu 'otah ki yakhol nukhal lah. veha'anashim 'asher 'alu 'imo 'ameru lo nukhal la'alot 'el ha'am ki khazaq hu mimenu. vayozi'u dibat ha'arez 'asher taru 'otah 'el benei yisra'el leimor ha'arez 'asher 'abarnu bah latur 'otah 'erez 'okhelet yoshebeha hi vekhal ha'am 'asher ra'inu betokhah 'anshei midot. vesham ra'inu 'et hanefilim benei 'anaq min hanefilim vanehi be'eineinu kakhagabim vekhen hayinu be'eineihem. vatisa kal ha'eidah vayitenu 'et qolam vayibku ha'am balaylah hahu. vayilonu 'al mosheh ve'al 'aharon kol benei yisra'el vayomeru 'aleihem kal ha'eidah lu matnu be'erez mizrayim 'o bamidbar hazeh lu matenu. velamah ihoh meibi 'otanu 'el ha'arez hazot linpol bakhereb nasheinu vetapeinu yihyu labaz halo tob lanu shub mizrayemah. vayomeru 'ish 'el 'akhiv nitenah rosh venashubah mizrayemah. vayipol mosheh ve'aharon 'al peneihem lifnei kal qehal 'adat benei yisra'el. vihoshua' bin nun vekhaleb ben yefuneh min hatarim 'et ha'arez qare'u bigdeihem. vayomeru 'el kal 'adat benei yisra'el leimor ha'arez 'asher 'abarnu bah latur 'otah tobah ha'arez me'od me'od. 'im khafez banu ihoh veheibi 'otanu 'el ha'arez hazot unetanah lanu 'erez 'asher hi zabat khalab udebash. 'akh ihoh 'al timrodu ve'atem 'al tire'u 'et 'am ha'arez ki lakhmeinu hem sar zilam mei'aleihem ihoh 'itanu 'al tira'um. vayomeru kal ha'eidah lirgom 'otam ba'abanim ukhebod ihoh nir'ah be'ohel mo'ed 'el kal benei yisra'el. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh 'ad 'anah yena'azuni ha'am hazeh ve'ad 'anah lo ya'aminu bi bekhol ha'otot 'asher 'asiti beqirbo. 'akenu badeber ve'orishenu ve'e'eseh 'otekha lego gadol ve'azum mimenu. vayomer mosheh 'el ihoh veshame'u mizrayim ki he'elita bekhokhakha 'et ha'am hazeh miqirbo. ve'ameru 'el yosheb ha'arez hazot shame'u ki 'atah ihoh beqereb ha'am hazeh 'asher 'ayin be'ayin nir'ah 'atah ihoh va'ananekha 'omed 'aleihem ube'amud 'anan 'atah holekh lifneihem yomam ube'amud 'esh layelah. veheimatah 'et ha'am hazeh ke'ish 'ekhad ve'ameru hagoyim 'asher shame'u 'et shim'akha leimor. mibilti yekholet ihoh lehabi 'et ha'am hazeh 'el ha'arez 'asher nishba' lahem vayishkhatem bamidbar. ve'atah yigdal na koakh 'adonai ka'asher dibarta leimor. ihoh 'erekh 'apayim verab khesed nosei 'avon vafasha' venaqeh lo yenaqeh poqed 'avon 'abot 'al banim 'al shileishim ve'al ribei'im. selakh na la'avon ha'am hazeh kegodel khasdekha vekha'asher nasatah la'am hazeh mimizrayim ve'ad henah. vayomer ihoh salakhti kidbarekha. ve'ulam khai 'ani veyimalei khebod ihoh 'et kal ha'arez. ki khal ha'anashim haro'im 'et kebodi ve'et 'ototai 'asher 'asiti bemizrayim ubamidbar vaynasu 'oti zeh 'eser pe'amim velo shame'u beqoli. 'im yir'u 'et ha'arez 'asher nishba'ti la'abotam vekhal mena'azai lo yir'uha. ve'abdi khaleb 'eiqeb hayetah ruakh 'akheret 'imo vaymalei 'akharai vahabi'otiv 'el ha'arez 'asher ba shamah vezar'o yorishenah. veha'amaleiqi vehakena'ani yosheb ba'eimeq makhar penu use'u lakhem hamidbar derekh yam suf. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon leimor. 'ad matai la'eidah hara'ah hazot 'asher hemah malinim 'alai 'et telunot benei yisra'el 'asher hemah malinim 'alai shama'eti. 'emor 'aleihem khai 'ani ne'um ihoh 'im lo ka'asher dibartem be'azenai ken 'e'eseh lakhem. bamidbar hazeh yipelu figreikhem vekhal pequdeikhem lekhal misparkhem miben 'esrim shanah vama'elah 'asher halinotem 'alai. 'im 'atem tabo'u 'el ha'arez 'asher nasati 'et yadi leshaken 'etkhem bah ki 'im kaleb ben yefuneh vihoshua' bin nun. vetapekhem 'asher 'amartem labaz yihyeh veheibeiti 'otam veyade'u 'et ha'arez 'asher me'astem bah. ufigreikhem 'atem yipelu bamidbar hazeh. ubeneikhem yihyu ro'im bamidbar 'arba'im shanah venase'u 'et zenuteikhem 'ad tom pigreikhem bamidbar. bemispar hayamim 'asher tartem 'et ha'arez 'arba'im yom yom lashanah yom lashanah tis'u 'et 'avonoteikhem 'arba'im shanah vida'tem 'et tenu'ati. 'ani ihoh dibarti 'im lo zot 'e'eseh lekhal ha'eidah hara'ah hazot hano'adim 'alai bamidbar hazeh yitamu vesham yamutu. veha'anashim 'asher shalakh mosheh latur 'et ha'arez vayashubu vayilonu vayalinu 'alav 'et kal ha'eidah lehozi dibah 'al ha'arez. vayamutu ha'anashim mozi'ei dibat ha'arez ra'ah bamageifah lifnei ihoh. vihoshua' bin nun vekhaleb ben yefuneh khayu min ha'anashim hahem haholekhim latur 'et ha'arez. vaydaber mosheh 'et hadebarim ha'eleh 'el kal benei yisra'el vayit'abelu ha'am me'od. vayashkimu baboqer vaya'alu 'el rosh hahar leimor hinenu ve'alinu 'el hamaqom 'asher 'amar ihoh ki khatanu. vayomer mosheh lamah zeh 'atem 'oberim 'et pi ihoh vehiv lo tizlakh. 'al ta'alu ki 'en ihoh beqirbekhem velo tinagefu lifnei 'oyebeikhem. ki ha'amaleiqi vehakena'ani sham lifneikhem unefaltem bekhareb ki 'al ken shabtem mei'akharei ihoh velo yihyeh ihoh 'imakhem. vaya'pilu la'alot 'el rosh hahar va'aron berit ihoh umosheh lo mashu miqereb hamakhaneh. vayeired ha'amaleiqi vehakena'ani hayosheb bahar hahu vayakum vayaketum 'ad hakharemah. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. daber 'el benei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem ki tabo'u 'el 'erez mosheboteikhem 'asher 'ani noten lakhem. va'asitem 'isheh ihoh 'olah 'o zebakh lefalei neder 'o bindabah 'o bemo'adeikhem la'asot reiakh nikhoakh ihoh min habaqar 'o min hazon. vehiqrib hamaqrib qarebano ihoh minkhah solet 'isaron balul birbi'it hahin shamen. veyayin lanesekh rebi'it hahin ta'aseh 'al ha'olah 'o lazabakh lakebes ha'ekhad. 'o la'ayil ta'aseh minkhah solet shenei 'esronim belulah bashemen shelishit hahin. veyayin lanesekh shelishit hahin taqrib reiakh nikhoakh ihoh. vekhi ta'aseh ben baqar 'olah 'o zabakh lefalei neder 'o shelamim ihoh. vehiqrib 'al ben habaqar minkhah solet sheloshah 'esronim balul bashemen khazi hahin. veyayin taqrib lanesekh khazi hahin 'isheh reiakh nikhoakh ihoh. kakhah yei'aseh lashor ha'ekhad 'o la'ayil ha'ekhad 'o laseh bakebasim 'o ba'izim. kamispar 'asher ta'asu kakhah ta'asu la'ekhad kemisparam. kal ha'ezrakh ya'aseh kakhah 'et 'eleh lehaqrib 'isheh reiakh nikhoakh ihoh. vekhi yagur 'itekhem ger 'o 'asher betokhkhem ledoroteikhem ve'asah 'isheh reiakh nikhoakh ihoh ka'asher ta'asu ken ya'aseh. haqahal khuqah 'akhat lakhem velager hagar khuqat 'olam ledoroteikhem kakhem kager yihyeh lifnei ihoh. torah 'akhat umishpat 'ekhad yihyeh lakhem velager hagar 'itekhem. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. daber 'el benei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem bebo'akhem 'el ha'arez 'asher 'ani meibi 'etkhem shamah. vehayah ba'akhalekhem milekhem ha'arez tarimu terumah ihoh. reishit 'arisoteikhem khalah tarimu terumah kitrumat goren ken tarimu 'otah. meireishit 'arisoteikhem titenu ihoh terumah ledoroteikhem. vekhi tishgu velo ta'asu 'et kal hamizvot ha'eleh 'asher diber ihoh 'el mosheh. 'et kal 'asher zivah ihoh 'aleikhem beyad mosheh min hayom 'asher zivah ihoh vahale'ah ledoroteikhem. vehayah 'im mei'einei ha'eidah ne'estah lishgagah ve'asu khal ha'eidah par ben baqar 'ekhad le'olah lereiakh nikhoakh ihoh uminkhato venisko kamishpat use'ir 'izim 'ekhad lekhatat. vekhiper hakohen 'al kal 'adat benei yisra'el venislakh lahem ki shegagah hi vehem heibi'u 'et qarebanam 'isheh ihoh vekhatatam lifnei ihoh 'al shiggatam. venislakh lekhal 'adat benei yisra'el velager hagar betokham ki lekhal ha'am bishgagah. ve'im nefesh 'akhat tekheta bishgagah vehiqribah 'ez bat shenatah lekhatat. vekhiper hakohen 'al hanefesh hashogeget bekhet'ah bishgagah lifnei ihoh lekhaper 'alav venislakh lo. ha'ezrakh bibnei yisra'el velager hagar betokham torah 'akhat yihyeh lakhem la'oseh bishgagah. vehanefesh 'asher ta'aseh beyad ramah min ha'ezrakh umin hager 'et ihoh hu megadef venikhretah hanefesh hahiv miqereb 'amah. ki debar ihoh bazah ve'et mizvato heifar hikaret tikaret hanefesh hahiv 'avonah bah. vayihyu benei yisra'el bamidbar vayimze'u 'ish meqoshesh 'eizim beyom hashabat. vayaqribu 'oto hamoze'im 'oto meqoshesh 'eizim 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon ve'el kal ha'eidah. vayanikhu 'oto bamishmar ki lo forash mah yei'aseh lo. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh mot yumat ha'ish ragom 'oto ba'abanim kal ha'eidah mikhuz lamakhaneh. vayozi'u 'oto kal ha'eidah 'el mikhuz lamakhaneh vayirgemu 'oto ba'abanim vayamot ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. daber 'el benei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem ve'asu lahem zizit 'al kanfei bigdeihem ledorotam venatenu 'al zizit hakanaf petil tekheilet. vehayah lakhem lezizit ure'item 'oto uzekhartem 'et kal mizvot ihoh va'asitem 'otam velo taturu 'akharei lebabkhem ve'akharei 'eineikhem 'asher 'atem zonim 'akhareihem. lema'an tizkeru va'asitem 'et kal mizvotai vihyitem qedoshim leiloheikhem. 'ani ihoh 'eloheikhem 'asher hozeiti 'etkhem mei'erez mizrayim lihyot lakhem leilohim 'ani ihoh 'eloheikhem. vayiqakh qorakh ben yizhar ben qehat ben leivi vedatan va'abiram benei 'eli'ab ve'on ben pelet benei re'uben. vayaqumu lifnei mosheh va'anashim mibenei yisra'el khamishim umatayim nesi'ei 'eidah qeri'ei mo'ed 'anshei shem. vayiqahalu 'al mosheh ve'al 'aharon vayomeru 'aleihem rab lakhem ki khal ha'eidah kulam qedoshim ubetokham ihoh umadua' titnase'u 'al qehal ihoh. vayishma' mosheh vayipol 'al panav. vaydaber 'el qorakh ve'el kal 'adato leimor boqer veyoda' ihoh 'et 'asher lo ve'et haqadosh vehiqrib 'eilav ve'et 'asher yibkhar bo yaqrib 'eilav. zot 'asu qekhu lakhem makhtot qorakh vekhal 'adato. utenu bahen 'esh vesimu 'aleihen qetoret lifnei ihoh makhar vehayah ha'ish 'asher yibkhar ihoh hu haqadosh rab lakhem benei leivi. vayomer mosheh 'el qorakh shim'u na benei leivi. ham'at mikem ki hibdil 'elohei yisra'el 'etkhem mei'adat yisra'el lehaqrib 'etkhem 'eilav la'abod 'et 'abodat mishkan ihoh vela'amod lifnei ha'eidah lesharetam. vayaqreb 'otekha ve'et kal 'akhekha benei leivi 'itakh ubiqashtem gam kehunah. lakhen 'atah vekhal 'adatekha hano'adim 'al ihoh ve'aharon mah hu ki tilonu talinu 'alav. vayishlakh mosheh liqro ledatan vela'abiram benei 'eli'ab vayomeru lo na'aleh. ham'at ki he'elitanu mei'erez zabat khalab udebash lahamiteinu bamidbar ki tistarer 'aleinu gam histarer. 'af lo 'el 'erez zabat khalab udebash habi'otanu vatiten lanu nakhalat sadeh vakharem ha'einei ha'anashim hahem tenaqer lo na'aleh. vayikhar lemosheh me'od vayomer 'el ihoh 'al teifen 'el minkhatam lo khamor 'ekhad meihem nasati velo harei'oti 'et 'akhad meihem. vayomer mosheh 'el qorakh 'atah vekhal 'adatekha heyu lifnei ihoh 'atah vahem ve'aharon makhar. uqekhu 'ish makhtato unetatem 'aleihem qetoret vehiqrabtem lifnei ihoh 'ish makhtato khamishim umatayim makhtot ve'atah ve'aharon 'ish makhtato. vayiqkhu 'ish makhtato vayitenu 'aleihem 'esh vayasimu 'aleihem qetoret vaya'amdu petakh 'ohel mo'ed umosheh ve'aharon. vayaqhel 'aleihem qorakh 'et kal ha'eidah 'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed vayeira khebod ihoh 'el kal ha'eidah. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon leimor. hibadelu mitokh ha'eidah hazot va'akhaleh 'otam keraga'. vayipelu 'al peneihem vayomeru 'el 'elohei harukhot lekhal basar ha'ish 'ekhad yekheta ve'al kal ha'eidah tiqzof. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. daber 'el ha'eidah leimor hei'alu misabib lemishkan qorakh datan va'abiram. vayaqam mosheh vayeilekh 'el datan va'abiram vayeilekhu 'akharav ziqnei yisra'el. vaydaber 'el ha'eidah leimor suru na mei'al 'aholei ha'anashim haresha'im ha'eleh ve'al tige'u bekhal 'asher lahem pen tisafu bekhal khatotam. vayei'alu mei'al mishkan qorekh datan va'abiram misabib vedatan va'abiram yaze'u nizabim petakh 'aholeihem unesheihem ubeneihem vetapam. vayomer mosheh bezot teide'un ki ihoh shelakhani la'asot 'et kal hama'asim ha'eleh ki lo milibi. 'im kemot kal ha'adam yemutun 'eleh ufequdat kal ha'adam yipaqed 'aleihem lo ihoh shelakhani. ve'im beri'ah yibra ihoh ufazetah ha'adamah 'et piha ubale'ah 'otam ve'et kal 'asher lahem veyaredu khayim she'olah vida'tem ki ni'azu ha'anashim ha'eleh 'et ihoh. vayhi kekhaloto ledaber 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh vatibaqa' ha'adamah 'asher takhteihem. vatiftakh ha'arez 'et piha vatibla' 'otam ve'et bateihem ve'et kal ha'adam 'asher leqorakh ve'et kal harakhush. vayeiredu hem vekhal 'asher lahem khayim she'olah vatekhas 'aleihem ha'arez vayobedu mitokh haqahal. vekhal yisra'el 'asher sebiboteihem nasu leqolam ki 'ameru pen tibla'einu ha'arez. ve'esh yaze'ah mei'et ihoh vatokhal 'et hakhamishim umatayim 'ish maqribei haqetoret. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. 'emor 'el 'el'azar ben 'aharon hakohen veyarem 'et hamakhtot miben hasereifah ve'et ha'esh zereh hale'ah ki qadeishu. 'et makhtot hakhata'im ha'eleh benafshotam ve'asu 'otam riqu'ei fakhim zipui lamizbeiakh ki hiqribum lifnei ihoh vayiqdashu veyihyu le'ot libnei yisra'el. vayiqakh 'el'azar hakohen 'et makhtot hanekhoshet 'asher hiqribu haserufim vayraqe'um zipui lamizbeiakh. zikaron libnei yisra'el lema'an 'asher lo yiqrab 'ish zar 'asher lo mizera' 'aharon hu lehaqtir qetoret lifnei ihoh velo yihyeh kheqorakh vekha'adato ka'asher diber ihoh beyad mosheh lo. vayilonu kal 'adat benei yisra'el mimakhorat 'al mosheh ve'al 'aharon leimor 'atem hamitem 'et 'am ihoh. vayhi behiqahel ha'eidah 'al mosheh ve'al 'aharon vayifnu 'el 'ohel mo'ed vehineh khisahu he'anan vayeira kebod ihoh. vayabo mosheh ve'aharon 'el penei 'ohel mo'ed. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. heiromu mitokh ha'eidah hazot va'akhaleh 'otam keraga' vayipelu 'al peneihem. vayomer mosheh 'el 'aharon qakh 'et hamakhtah veten 'aleha 'esh mei'al hamizbeiakh vesim qetoret veholekh meheirah 'el ha'eidah vekhaper 'aleihem ki yaza haqezef milifnei ihoh heikhel hanagef. vayiqakh 'aharon ka'asher diber mosheh vayaraz 'el tokh haqahal vehineh heikhel hanegef ba'am vayiten 'et haqetoret vaykhaper 'al ha'am. vaya'amod ben hameitim uben hakhayim vatei'azar hamageifah. vayihyu hameitim bamageifah 'arba'ah 'asar 'elef usheba' mei'ot milebad hameitim 'al debar qorakh. vayashab 'aharon 'el mosheh 'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed vehamageifah ne'ezarah. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. daber 'el benei yisra'el veqakh mei'itam mateh mateh lebet 'ab mei'et kal nesi'eihem lebet 'abotam shenem 'asar matot 'ish 'et shemo tikhtob 'al mateihu. ve'et shem 'aharon tikhtob 'al mateh leivi ki mateh 'ekhad lerosh bet 'abotam. vehinakhtam be'ohel mo'ed lifnei ha'eidut 'asher 'iva'ed lakhem shamah. vehayah ha'ish 'asher 'ebkhar bo mateihu yifrakh vahashikoti mei'alai 'et telunot benei yisra'el 'asher hem malinim 'aleikhem. vaydaber mosheh 'el benei yisra'el vayitenu 'eilav kal nesi'eihem mateh lenasi 'ekhad mateh lenasi 'ekhad lebet 'abotam shenem 'asar matot umateh 'aharon betokh matotam. vayanakh mosheh 'et hamatot lifnei ihoh be'ohel ha'eidut. vayhi mimakhorat vayabo mosheh 'el 'ohel ha'eidut vehineh parakh mateh 'aharon lebet leivi vayozei ferakh vayazez ziz vayigmol sheqeidim. vayozei mosheh 'et kal hamatot milifnei ihoh 'el kal benei yisra'el vayir'u vayiqkhu 'ish mateihu. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh hasheb 'et mateh 'aharon lifnei ha'eidut lemishmeret le'ot libnei meri utekhal telunotam mei'alai velo yamutu. vaya'as mosheh ka'asher zivah ihoh 'oto ken 'asah. vayomeru benei yisra'el 'el mosheh leimor hen gava'nu 'abadnu kulanu 'abadnu. kol haqareb haqareb 'el mishkan ihoh yamut ha'im tamnu ligvoa'. vayomer ihoh 'el 'aharon 'atah ubanekha ubet 'abikha 'itakh tis'u 'et 'avon hamiqdash ve'atah ubanekha 'itakh tis'u 'et 'avon kehunatkhem. vegam 'et 'akhekha mateh leivi sheibet 'abikha haqreb 'itakh veyilavu 'alekha visharetukha ve'atah ubanekha 'itakh lifnei 'ohel ha'eidut. veshameru mishmartekha umishmeret kal ha'ohel 'akh 'el kelei haqodesh ve'el hamizbeiakh lo yiqrabu velo yamutu gam hem gam 'atem. venilvu 'alekha veshameru 'et mishmeret 'ohel mo'ed lekhol 'abodat ha'ohel vezar lo yiqrab 'aleikhem. ushemartem 'et mishmeret haqodesh ve'et mishmeret hamizbeiakh velo yihyeh 'od qezef 'al benei yisra'el. va'ani hineh laqakhti 'et 'akheikhem halviyim mitokh benei yisra'el lakhem matanah netunim ihoh la'abod 'et 'abodat 'ohel mo'ed. ve'atah ubanekha 'itekha tishmeru 'et kehunatkhem lekhal debar hamizbeiakh ulemibet laparokhet va'abadtem 'abodat matanah 'eten 'et kehunatkhem vehazar haqareb yumat. vaydaber ihoh 'el 'aharon va'ani hineh natati lekha 'et mishmeret terumotai lekhal qadeshei benei yisra'el lekha netatim lemashekhah ulebanekha lekhaq 'olam. zeh yihyeh lekha miqodesh haqodashim min ha'esh kal qarebanam lekhal minkhatam ulekhal khatatam ulekhal 'ashamam 'asher yashibu li qodesh qadashim lekha hu ulebanekha. beqodesh haqodashim tokhalenu kal zakhar yokhal 'oto qodesh yihyeh lakh. vezeh lekha terumat matanam lekhal tenufot benei yisra'el lekha netatim ulebanekha velibnotekha 'itekha lekhaq 'olam kal tahor bebeitekha yokhal 'oto. kol kheileb yizhar vekhal kheileb tirosh vedagan reishitam 'asher yitenu ihoh lekha netatim. bikurei kal 'asher be'arzam 'asher yabi'u ihoh lekha yihyeh kal tahor bebeitekha yokhalenu. kal kheirem beyisra'el lekha yihyeh. kal peter rekhem lekhal basar 'asher yaqribu ihoh ba'adam ubabeheimah yihyeh lakh 'akh padoh tifdeh 'et bekhor ha'adam ve'et bekhor habeheimah hatemei'ah tifdeh. ufeduyav miben khodesh tifdeh be'erkekha kesef khameishet sheqalim besheqel haqodesh 'esrim geirah hu. 'akh bekhor shor 'o bekhor keseb 'o bekhor 'ez lo tifdeh qodesh hem 'et damam tizroq 'al hamizbeiakh ve'et khelbam taqtir 'isheh lereiakh nikhoakh ihoh. ubesaram yihyeh lakh kakhazeh hatenufah ukheshoq hayamin lekha yihyeh. kol terumot haqodashim 'asher yarimu benei yisra'el ihoh natati lekha ulebanekha velibnotekha 'itekha lekhaq 'olam berit melakh 'olam hi lifnei ihoh lekha ulezar'akha 'itakh. vayomer ihoh 'el 'aharon be'arzam lo tinkhal vekheileq lo yihyeh lekha betokham 'ani khelqekha venakhalatekha betokh benei yisra'el. velibnei leivi hineh natati kal ma'aser beyisra'el lenakhalah kheilef 'abodatam 'asher hem 'obedim 'et 'abodat 'ohel mo'ed. velo yiqrebu 'od benei yisra'el 'el 'ohel mo'ed laset khet lamut. ve'abad haleivi hu 'et 'abodat 'ohel mo'ed vehem yis'u 'avonam khuqat 'olam ledoroteikhem ubetokh benei yisra'el lo yinkhalu nakhalah. ki 'et ma'sar benei yisra'el 'asher yarimu ihoh terumah natati lalviyim lenakhalah 'al ken 'amarti lahem betokh benei yisra'el lo yinkhalu nakhalah. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. ve'el halviyim tedaber ve'amarta 'aleihem ki tiqkhu mei'et benei yisra'el 'et hama'aser 'asher natati lakhem mei'itam benakhalatkhem vahareimotem mimenu terumat ihoh ma'aser min hama'aser. venekhshab lakhem terumatkhem kadagan min hagoren vekhamlei'ah min hayaqeb. ken tarimu gam 'atem terumat ihoh mikol ma'seroteikhem 'asher tiqkhu mei'et benei yisra'el unetatem mimenu 'et terumat ihoh le'aharon hakohen. mikol matenoteikhem tarimu 'et kal terumat ihoh mikal khelbo 'et miqdesho mimenu. ve'amarta 'aleihem baharimekhem 'et khelbo mimenu venekhshab lalviyim kitbu'at goren vekhitbu'at yaqeb. va'akhaltem 'oto bekhal maqom 'atem ubeitekhem ki sakhar hu lakhem kheilef 'abodatkhem be'ohel mo'ed. velo tis'u 'alav khet baharimekhem 'et khelbo mimenu ve'et qadeshei benei yisra'el lo tekhalelu velo tamutu. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon leimor. zot khuqat hatorah 'asher zivah ihoh leimor daber 'el benei yisra'el veyiqkhu 'eilekha farah 'adumah temimah 'asher 'en bah mum 'asher lo 'alah 'aleha 'ol. unetatem 'otah 'el 'el'azar hakohen vehozi 'otah 'el mikhuz lamakhaneh veshakhat 'otah lefanav. velaqakh 'el'azar hakohen midamah be'ezba'o vehizah 'el nokhakh penei 'ohel mo'ed midamah sheba' pe'amim. vesaraf 'et haparah le'einav 'et 'orah ve'et besarah ve'et damah 'al pirshah yisrof. velaqakh hakohen 'ez 'erez ve'eizob usheni tola'at vehishlikh 'el tokh sereifat haparah. vekhibes begadav hakohen verakhaz besaro bamayim ve'akhar yabo 'el hamakhaneh vetamei hakohen 'ad ha'areb. vehasoref 'otah yekhabes begadav bamayim verakhaz besaro bamayim vetamei 'ad ha'areb. ve'asaf 'ish tahor 'et 'eifer haparah vehiniakh mikhuz lamakhaneh bemaqom tahor vehayetah la'adat benei yisra'el lemishmeret lemei nidah khatat hi vekhibes ha'osef 'et 'eifer haparah 'et begadav vetamei 'ad ha'areb vehayetah libnei yisra'el velager hagar betokham lekhuqat 'olam. hanogeia' bemet lekhal nefesh 'adam vetamei shib'at yamim. hu yitkhata bo bayom hashelishi ubayom hashebi'i yithar ve'im lo yitkhata bayom hashelishi ubayom hashebi'i lo yithar. kal hanogeia' bemet benefesh ha'adam 'asher yamut velo yitkhata 'et mishkan ihoh timei venikhretah hanefesh hahiv miyisra'el ki mei nidah lo zoraq 'alav tamei yihyeh 'od tum'ato bo. zot hatorah 'adam ki yamut be'ohel kal haba 'el ha'ohel vekhal 'asher ba'ohel yitma shib'at yamim. vekhol keli fatuakh 'asher 'en zamid patil 'alav tamei hu. vekhol 'asher yiga' 'al penei hasadeh bakhalal khereb 'o bemet 'o be'ezem 'adam 'o beqaber yitma shib'at yamim. velaqekhu latamei mei'afar sereifat hakhatat venatan 'alav mayim khayim 'el keli. velaqakh 'eizob vetabal bamayim 'ish tahor vehizah 'al ha'ohel ve'al kal hakeilim ve'al hanefashot 'asher hayu sham ve'al hanogeia' ba'ezem 'o bekhalal 'o bamet 'o baqaber. vehizah hatahor 'al hatamei bayom hashelishi ubayom hashebi'i vekhite'o bayom hashebi'i vekhibes begadav verakhaz bamayim vetaher ba'areb. ve'ish 'asher yitma velo yitkhata venikhretah hanefesh hahiv mitokh haqahal ki 'et miqdash ihoh timei mei nidah lo zoraq 'alav tamei hu. vehayetah lahem lekhuqat 'olam umazeh mei hanidah yekhabes begadav vehanogeia' bemei hanidah yitma 'ad ha'areb. vekhol 'asher yiga' bo hatamei yitma vehanefesh hanoga'at titma 'ad ha'areb. vayabo'u benei yisra'el kal ha'eidah midbar zin bakhodesh harishon vayeisheb ha'am beqadesh vatamat sham miryam vatiqaber sham. velo hayah mayim la'eidah vayiqahalu 'al mosheh ve'al 'aharon. vayareb ha'am 'im mosheh vayomeru leimor velu gava'nu bigva' 'akheinu lifnei ihoh. velamah habeitem 'et qehal ihoh 'el hamidbar hazeh lamut sham 'anakhnu ube'ireinu. velamah he'elitunu mimizrayim lehabi 'otanu 'el hamaqom hara' hazeh lo meqom zera' ute'einah vegefen verimon umayim 'ayin lishtot. vayabo mosheh ve'aharon mipenei haqahal 'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed vayipelu 'al peneihem vayeira khebod ihoh 'aleihem. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. qakh 'et hamateh vehaqhel 'et ha'eidah 'atah ve'aharon 'akhikha vedibartem 'el hasela' le'eineihem venatan meimav vehozeita lahem mayim min hasela' vehishqita 'et ha'eidah ve'et be'iram. vayiqakh mosheh 'et hamateh milifnei ihoh ka'asher zivahu. vayaqhilu mosheh ve'aharon 'et haqahal 'el penei hasala' vayomer lahem shim'u na hamorim hamin hasela' hazeh nozi lakhem mayim. vayarem mosheh 'et yado vayakh 'et hasela' bemateihu pa'amayim vayeize'u mayim rabim vateishet ha'eidah ube'iram. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon ya'an lo he'emantem bi lehaqdisheini le'einei benei yisra'el lakhen lo tabi'u 'et haqahal hazeh 'el ha'arez 'asher natati lahem. hemah mei meribah 'asher rabu benei yisra'el 'et ihoh vayiqadesh bam. vayishlakh mosheh mal'akhim miqadesh 'el melekh 'edom koh 'amar 'akhikha yisra'el 'atah yada'ta 'et kal hatela'ah 'asher meza'atenu. vayeiredu 'aboteinu mizraymah vaneisheb bemizrayim yamim rabim vayarei'u lanu mizrayim vela'aboteinu. vaniz'aq 'el ihoh vayishma' qoleinu vayishlakh mal'akh vayozi'einu mimizrayim vehineh 'anakhnu beqadesh 'ir qezeh gebulekha. na'berah na be'arzekha lo na'abor besadeh ubekherem velo nishteh mei be'er derekh hamelekh neilekh lo niteh yamin usemol 'ad 'asher na'abor gebulekha. vayomer 'eilav 'edom lo ta'abor bi pen bakhereb 'eizei liqratekha. vayomeru 'eilav benei yisra'el bamsilah na'aleh ve'im meimekha nishteh 'ani umiqnai venatati mikhram raq 'en dabar beraglai 'e'eborah. vayomer lo ta'abor vayeizei 'edom liqrato be'am kabed ubeyad khazaqah. vayma'en 'edom neton 'et yisra'el 'abor bigbulo vayet yisra'el mei'alav. vayis'u miqadesh vayabo'u benei yisra'el kal ha'eidah hor hahar. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon behor hahar 'al gebul 'erez 'edom leimor. yei'asef 'aharon 'el 'amav ki lo yabo 'el ha'arez 'asher natati libnei yisra'el 'al 'asher meritem 'et pi lemei meribah. qakh 'et 'aharon ve'et 'el'azar beno veha'al 'otam hor hahar. vehafshet 'et 'aharon 'et begadav vehilbashtam 'et 'el'azar beno ve'aharon yei'asef umet sham. vaya'as mosheh ka'asher zivah ihoh vaya'alu 'el hor hahar le'einei kal ha'eidah. vayafshet mosheh 'et 'aharon 'et begadav vayalbesh 'otam 'et 'el'azar beno vayamat 'aharon sham berosh hahar vayeired mosheh ve'el'azar min hahar. vayir'u kal ha'eidah ki gava' 'aharon vayibku 'et 'aharon sheloshim yom kol bet yisra'el. vayishma' hakena'ani melekh 'arad yosheb hanegeb ki ba yisra'el derekh ha'atarim vayilakhem beyisra'el vayishb mimenu shebi. vayidar yisra'el neder ihoh vayomar 'im naton titen 'et ha'am hazeh beyadi vehakharamti 'et 'areihem. vayishma' ihoh beqol yisra'el vayiten 'et hakena'ani vayakharem 'ethem ve'et 'areihem vayiqra shem hamaqom kharemah. vayis'u meihor hahar derekh yam suf lisbob 'et 'erez 'edom vatiqzar nefesh ha'am badarekh. vaydaber ha'am beilohim ubemosheh lamah he'elitunu mimizrayim lamut bamidbar ki 'en lekhem ve'en mayim venafsheinu qazah balekhem haqeloqel. vayshalakh ihoh ba'am 'et hanekhashim haserafim vaynashekhu 'et ha'am vayamat 'am rab miyisra'el. vayabo ha'am 'el mosheh vayomeru khatanu ki dibarnu ihoh vabakh hitpalel 'el ihoh veyaser mei'aleinu 'et hanakhash vayitpalel mosheh be'ad ha'am. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh 'aseh lekha saraf vesim 'oto 'al nes vehayah kal hanashukh vera'ah 'oto vakhai. vaya'as mosheh nekhash nekhoshet vaysimeihu 'al hanes vehayah 'im nashakh hanakhash 'et 'ish vehibit 'el nekhash hanekhoshet vakhai. vayis'u benei yisra'el vayakhanu be'obot. vayis'u mei'obot vayakhanu be'iyei ha'abarim bamidbar 'asher 'al penei mo'ab mimizrakh hashamesh. misham nasa'u vayakhanu benakhal zared. misham nasa'u vayakhanu mei'eiber 'arnon 'asher bamidbar hayozei migebul ha'emori ki 'arnon gebul mo'ab ben mo'ab uben ha'emori. 'al ken yei'amar beseifer milkhamot ihoh 'et vaheb besufah ve'et hanekhalim 'arnon. ve'eshed hanekhalim 'asher natah leshebet 'ar venish'an ligbul mo'ab. umisham be'eirah hi habe'er 'asher 'amar ihoh lemosheh 'esof 'et ha'am ve'etenah lahem mayim. 'az yashir yisra'el 'et hashirah hazot 'ali be'er 'enu lah. be'er khafaruha sarim karuha nedibei ha'am bimkhoqeq bemish'anotam umimidbar matanah. umimatanah nakhali'el uminakhali'el bamot. umibamot hagai 'asher bisdeh mo'ab rosh hapisgah venishqafah 'al penei hayshimon. vayishlakh yisra'el mal'akhim 'el sikhon melekh ha'emori leimor. 'e'berah be'arzekha lo niteh besadeh ubekherem lo nishteh mei be'er bederekh hamelekh neilekh 'ad 'asher na'abor gebulekha. velo natan sikhon 'et yisra'el 'abor bigbulo vaye'esof sikhon 'et kal 'amo vayeizei liqrat yisra'el hamidbarah vayabo yahezah vayilakhem beyisra'el. vayakeihu yisra'el lefi khareb vayirash 'et 'arzo mei'arnon 'ad yaboq 'ad benei 'amon ki 'az gebul benei 'amon. vayiqakh yisra'el 'et kal he'arim ha'eleh vayeisheb yisra'el bekhal 'arei ha'emori bekheshbon ubekhal benoteha. ki kheshbon 'ir sikhon melekh ha'emori hi vehu nilkham bemelekh mo'ab harishon vayiqakh 'et kal 'arzo miyado 'ad 'arnon. 'al ken yomeru hamoshelim bo'u kheshbon tibaneh vetikonen 'ir sikhon. ki 'esh yaze'ah meikheshbon lehabah miqiryat sikhon 'akhelah 'ar mo'ab ba'alei bamot 'arnon. 'o lekha mo'ab 'abadta 'am kemosh natan banav peleitim ubenotav bashebit lemelekh 'emori sikhon. vaniram 'abad kheshbon 'ad dibon vanashim 'ad nofakh 'asher 'ad meideba. vayeisheb yisra'el be'erez ha'emori. vayishlakh mosheh leragel 'et ya'zer vayilkedu benoteha vayiresh vayoresh 'et ha'emori 'asher sham. vayifnu vaya'alu derekh habashan vayeizei 'og melekh habashan liqratam hu vekhal 'amo lamilkhamah 'edre'i. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh 'al tira 'oto ki beyadekha natati 'oto ve'et kal 'amo ve'et 'arzo ve'asita lo ka'asher 'asita lesikhon melekh ha'emori 'asher yosheb bekheshbon. vayaku 'oto ve'et banav ve'et kal 'amo 'ad bilti hish'ir lo sarid vayireshu 'et 'arzo. vayis'u benei yisra'el vayakhanu be'arbot mo'ab mei'eiber leyarden yereikho. vayar balaq ben zipor 'et kal 'asher 'asah yisra'el la'emori. vayagar mo'ab mipenei ha'am me'od ki rab hu vayaqaz mo'ab mipenei benei yisra'el. vayomer mo'ab 'el ziqnei midyan 'atah yelakhakhu haqahal 'et kal sebiboteinu kilkhokh hashor 'et yereq hasadeh ubalaq ben zipor melekh lemo'ab ba'et hahiv. vayishlakh mal'akhim 'el bil'am ben be'or petorah 'asher 'al hanahar 'erez benei 'amo liqro lo leimor hineh 'am yaza mimizrayim hineh khisah 'et 'en ha'arez vehu yosheb mimuli. ve'atah lekhah na 'arah li 'et ha'am hazeh ki 'azum hu mimeni 'ulai 'ukhal nakeh bo va'agareshenu min ha'arez ki yada'ti 'et 'asher tebarekh meborakh va'asher ta'or yu'ar. vayeilekhu ziqnei mo'ab veziqnei midyan uqesamim beyadam vayabo'u 'el bil'am vaydaberu 'eilav dibrei balaq. vayomer 'aleihem linu foh halaylah vahashiboti 'etkhem dabar ka'asher yedaber ihoh 'eilai vayeishebu sarei mo'ab 'im bil'am. vayabo 'elohim 'el bil'am vayomer mi ha'anashim ha'eleh 'imakh. vayomer bil'am 'el ha'elohim balaq ben zipor melekh mo'ab shalakh 'eilai. hineh ha'am hayozei mimizrayim vaykhas 'et 'en ha'arez 'atah lekhah qabah li 'oto 'ulai 'ukhal lehilakhem bo vegeirashtiv. vayomer 'elohim 'el bil'am lo teilekh 'imahem lo ta'or 'et ha'am ki barukh hu. vayaqam bil'am baboqer vayomer 'el sarei balaq lekhu 'el 'arzekhem ki mei'en ihoh letiti lahalokh 'imakhem. vayaqumu sarei mo'ab vayabo'u 'el balaq vayomeru mei'en bil'am halokh 'imanu. vayosef 'od balaq sheloakh sarim rabim venikhbadim mei'eleh. vayabo'u 'el bil'am vayomeru lo koh 'amar balaq ben zipor 'al na timana' meihalokh 'eilai. ki khabed 'akhabedkha me'od vekhol 'asher tomar 'eilai 'e'eseh ulekhah na qabah li 'et ha'am hazeh. vaya'an bil'am vayomer 'el 'abdei balaq 'im yiten li balaq melo beito kesef vezahab lo 'ukhal la'abor 'et pi ihoh 'elohai la'asot qetanah 'o gedolah. ve'atah shebu na bazeh gam 'atem halayelah ve'eide'ah mah yosef ihoh daber 'imi. vayabo 'elohim 'el bil'am laylah vayomer lo 'im liqro lekha ba'u ha'anashim qum lekh 'itam ve'akh 'et hadabar 'asher 'adaber 'eilekha 'oto ta'aseh. vayaqam bil'am baboqer vayakhabosh 'et 'atono vayeilekh 'im sarei mo'ab. vayikhar 'af 'elohim ki holekh hu vayityazeb mal'akh ihoh baderekh lesatan lo vehu rokheb 'al 'atono ushenei ne'arav 'imo. vateire ha'aton 'et mal'akh ihoh nizab baderekh vekharbo shelufah beyado vatet ha'aton min haderekh vateilekh basadeh vayakh bil'am 'et ha'aton lehatotah hadarekh. vaya'amod mal'akh ihoh bemish'ol hakeramim gader mizeh vegader mizeh. vateire ha'aton 'et mal'akh ihoh vatilakhez 'el haqir vatilkhaz 'et regel bil'am 'el haqir vayosef lehakotah. vayosef mal'akh ihoh 'abor vaya'amod bemaqom zar 'asher 'en derekh lintot yamin usemol. vateire ha'aton 'et mal'akh ihoh vatirbaz takhat bil'am vayikhar 'af bil'am vayakh 'et ha'aton bamaqel. vayiftakh ihoh 'et pi ha'aton vatomer lebil'am meh 'asiti lekha ki hikitani zeh shalosh regalim. vayomer bil'am la'aton ki hit'alalt bi lu yesh khereb beyadi ki 'atah haragtikh. vatomer ha'aton 'el bil'am halo 'anokhi 'atonekha 'asher rakhabta 'alai mei'odkha 'ad hayom hazeh hahasken hiskanti la'asot lekha koh vayomer lo. vaygal ihoh 'et 'einei bil'am vayar 'et mal'akh ihoh nizab baderekh vekharbo shelufah beyado vayiqod vayishtakhu le'apav. vayomer 'eilav mal'akh ihoh 'al mah hikita 'et 'atonekha zeh shalosh regalim hineh 'anokhi yazati lesatan ki yarat haderekh lenegdi. vatir'ani ha'aton vatet lefanai zeh shalosh regalim 'ulai natetah mipanai ki 'atah gam 'otekhah haragti ve'otah hekheyeiti. vayomer bil'am 'el mal'akh ihoh khatati ki lo yada'ti ki 'atah nizab liqrati badarekh ve'atah 'im ra' be'einekha 'ashubah li. vayomer mal'akh ihoh 'el bil'am lekh 'im ha'anashim ve'efes 'et hadabar 'asher 'adaber 'eilekha 'oto tedaber vayeilekh bil'am 'im sarei balaq. vayishma' balaq ki ba bil'am vayeizei liqrato 'el 'ir mo'ab 'asher 'al gebul 'arnon 'asher biqzeh hagebul. vayomer balaq 'el bil'am halo shaloakh shalakhti 'eilekha liqro lakh lamah lo halakhta 'eilai ha'umnam lo 'ukhal kabedekha. vayomer bil'am 'el balaq hineh bati 'eilekha 'atah hayakhol 'ukhal daber me'umah hadabar 'asher yasim 'elohim befi 'oto 'adaber. vayeilekh bil'am 'im balaq vayabo'u qiryat khuzot. vayizbakh balaq baqar vazon vayshalakh lebil'am velasarim 'asher 'ito. vayhi baboqer vayiqakh balaq 'et bil'am vaya'aleihu bamot ba'al vayar misham qezeh ha'am. vayomer bil'am 'el balaq beneh li bazeh shib'ah mizbekhot vehakhen li bazeh shib'ah farim veshib'ah 'eilim. vaya'as balaq ka'asher diber bil'am vaya'al balaq ubil'am par va'ayil bamizbeiakh. vayomer bil'am lebalaq hityazeb 'al 'olatekha ve'eilekhah 'ulai yiqareh ihoh liqrati udebar mah yar'eini vehigadti lakh vayeilekh shefi. vayiqar 'elohim 'el bil'am vayomer 'eilav 'et shib'at hamizbekhot 'arakhti va'a'al par va'ayil bamizbeiakh. vayasem ihoh dabar befi bil'am vayomer shub 'el balaq vekhoh tedaber. vayashab 'eilav vehineh nizab 'al 'olato hu vekhal sarei mo'ab. vayisa meshalo vayomar min 'aram yankheini balaq melekh mo'ab meiharrei qedem lekhah 'arah li ya'aqob ulekhah zo'amah yisra'el. mah 'eqob lo qaboh 'el umah 'ez'om lo za'am ihoh. ki meirosh zurim 'er'enu umigeba'ot 'ashurenu hen 'am lebadad yishkon ubagoyim lo yitkhashab. mi manah 'afar ya'aqob umispar 'et roba' yisra'el tamot nafshi mot yesharim utehi 'akhariti kamohu. vayomer balaq 'el bil'am meh 'asita li laqob 'oyebai leqakhtikha vehineh beirakhta barekh. vaya'an vayomar halo 'et 'asher yasim ihoh befi 'oto 'eshmor ledaber. vayomer 'eilav balaq lekha lekhah 'iti 'el maqom 'akher 'asher tir'enu misham 'efes qazeihu tir'eh vekhulo lo tir'eh veqabeno li misham. vayiqakheihu sedeh zofim 'el rosh hapisgah vayiben shib'ah mizbekhot vaya'al par va'ayil bamizbeiakh. vayomer 'el balaq hityazeb koh 'al 'olatekha ve'anokhi 'iqareh koh. vayiqar ihoh 'el bil'am vayasem dabar befiv vayomer shub 'el balaq vekhoh tedaber. vayabo 'eilav vehino nizab 'al 'olato vesarei mo'ab 'ito vayomer lo balaq mah diber ihoh. vayisa meshalo vayomar qum balaq ushama' ha'azinah 'adai beno zipor. lo 'ish 'el vikhazeb uben 'adam veyitnekham hahu 'amar velo ya'aseh vediber velo yeqimenah. hineh barekh laqakheti ubeirekh velo 'ashibenah. lo hibit 'aven beya'aqob velo ra'ah 'amal beyisra'el ihoh 'elohav 'imo uteru'at melekh bo. 'el mozi'am mimizrayim keto'afot re'em lo. ki lo nakhash beya'aqob velo qesem beyisra'el ka'et yei'amer leya'aqob uleyisra'el mah pa'al 'el. hen 'am kelabi yaqum vekha'ari yitnasa lo yishkab 'ad yokhal teref vedam khalalim yishteh. vayomer balaq 'el bil'am gam qob lo tiqobenu gam barekh lo tebarakhenu. vaya'an bil'am vayomer 'el balaq halo dibarti 'eilekha leimor kol 'asher yedaber ihoh 'oto 'e'eseh. vayomer balaq 'el bil'am lekhah na 'eqakhakha 'el maqom 'akher 'ulai yishar be'einei ha'elohim veqaboto li misham. vayiqakh balaq 'et bil'am rosh hape'or hanishqaf 'al penei hayshimon. vayomer bil'am 'el balaq beneh li bazeh shib'ah mizbekhot vehakhen li bazeh shib'ah farim veshib'ah 'eilim. vaya'as balaq ka'asher 'amar bil'am vaya'al par va'ayil bamizbeiakh. vayar bil'am ki tob be'einei ihoh lebarekh 'et yisra'el velo halakh kefa'am befa'am liqrat nekhashim vayashet 'el hamidbar panav. vayisa bil'am 'et 'einav vayar 'et yisra'el shokhen lishbatav vatehi 'alav ruakh 'elohim. vayisa meshalo vayomar ne'um bil'am beno be'or une'um hageber shetum ha'ayin. ne'um shomeia' 'imrei 'el 'asher makhazeh shadai yekhezeh nofel ugelui 'einayim. mah tobu 'ohalekha ya'aqob mishkenotekha yisra'el. kinkhalim nitayu keganot 'alei nahar ka'ahalim nata' ihoh ka'arazim 'alei mayim. yizal mayim midaleyav vezar'o bemayim rabim veyarom mei'agag malko vetinasei malkhuto. 'el mozi'o mimizrayim keto'afot re'em lo yokhal goyim zarav ve'azmoteihem yegarem vekhizav yimkhaz. kara' shakhab ka'ari ukhelabi mi yeqimenu mebarakhekha barukh ve'orerekha 'arur. vayikhar 'af balaq 'el bil'am vayispoq 'et kapav vayomer balaq 'el bil'am laqob 'oyebai qeratikha vehineh beirakhta barekh zeh shalosh pe'amim. ve'atah berakh lekha 'el meqomekha 'amarti kabed 'akhabedkha vehineh mena'akha ihoh mikabod. vayomer bil'am 'el balaq halo gam 'el mal'akhekha 'asher shalakhta 'eilai dibarti leimor. 'im yiten li balaq melo beito kesef vezahab lo 'ukhal la'abor 'et pi ihoh la'asot tobah 'o ra'ah milibi 'asher yedaber ihoh 'oto 'adaber. ve'atah hini holekh le'ami lekhah 'i'azekha 'asher ya'aseh ha'am hazeh le'amekha be'akharit hayamim. vayisa meshalo vayomar ne'um bil'am beno be'or une'um hageber shetum ha'ayin. ne'um shomeia' 'imrei 'el veyodeia' da'at 'elyon makhazeh shadai yekhezeh nofel ugelui 'einayim. 'er'enu velo 'atah 'ashurenu velo qarob darakh kokhab miya'aqob veqam sheibet miyisra'el umakhaz pa'atei mo'ab veqarqar kal benei shet. vehayah 'edom yereishah vehayah yereishah sei'ir 'oyebav veyisra'el 'oseh khayil. veyeired miya'aqob vehe'ebid sarid mei'ir. vayar 'et 'amaleq vayisa meshalo vayomar reishit goyim 'amaleq ve'akharito 'adei 'obed. vayar 'et haqeini vayisa meshalo vayomar 'eitan moshabekha vesim basela' qinekha. ki 'im yihyeh leba'er qayin 'ad mah 'ashur tishbeka. vayisa meshalo vayomar 'o mi yikhyeh misumo 'el. vezim miyad kitim ve'inu 'ashur ve'inu 'eiber vegam hu 'adei 'obed. vayaqam bil'am vayeilekh vayashab limqomo vegam balaq halakh ledarko. vayeisheb yisra'el bashitim vayakhel ha'am liznot 'el benot mo'ab. vatiqrena la'am lezibkhei 'eloheihen vayokhal ha'am vayishtakhavu leiloheihen. vayizamed yisra'el leba'al pe'or vayikhar 'af ihoh beyisra'el. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh qakh 'et kal rashei ha'am vehoqa' 'otam ihoh neged hashamesh veyashob kharon 'af ihoh miyisra'el. vayomer mosheh 'el shofetei yisra'el hirgu 'ish 'anashav hanizmadim leba'al pe'or. vehineh 'ish mibenei yisra'el ba vayaqreb 'el 'ekhav 'et hamidyanit le'einei mosheh ule'einei kal 'adat benei yisra'el vehemah bokhim petakh 'ohel mo'ed. vayar pinekhas ben 'el'azar ben 'aharon hakohen vayaqam mitokh ha'eidah vayiqakh romakh beyado. vayabo 'akhar 'ish yisra'el 'el haqubah vayidqor 'et sheneihem 'et 'ish yisra'el ve'et ha'ishah 'el qobatah vatei'azar hamageifah mei'al benei yisra'el. vayihyu hameitim bamageifah 'arba'ah ve'esrim 'alef. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. pinekhas ben 'el'azar ben 'aharon hakohen heishib 'et khamati mei'al benei yisra'el beqan'o 'et qin'ati betokham velo khiliti 'et benei yisra'el beqin'ati. lakhen 'emor hini noten lo 'et beriti shalom. vehayetah lo ulezar'o 'akharav berit kehunat 'olam takhat 'asher qinei leilohav vaykhaper 'al benei yisra'el. veshem 'ish yisra'el hamukeh 'asher hukah 'et hamidyanit zimri ben salu nesi bet 'ab lashim'oni. veshem ha'ishah hamukah hamidyanit kazebi bat zur rosh 'umot bet 'ab bemidyan hu. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. zaror 'et hamidyanim vehikitem 'otam. ki zorerim hem lakhem benikhleihem 'asher nikelu lakhem 'al debar pe'or ve'al debar kazebi bat nesi midyan 'akhotam hamukah beyom hamageifah 'al debar pe'or. vayhi 'akharei hamageifah vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh ve'el 'el'azar ben 'aharon hakohen leimor. se'u 'et rosh kal 'adat benei yisra'el miben 'esrim shanah vama'lah lebet 'abotam kal yozei zaba beyisra'el. vaydaber mosheh ve'el'azar hakohen 'otam be'arbot mo'ab 'al yarden yereikho leimor. miben 'esrim shanah vama'elah ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh ubenei yisra'el hayoze'im mei'erez mizrayim. re'uben bekhor yisra'el benei re'uben khanokh mishpakhat hakhanokhi lefalu mishpakhat hapalu'i. lekhezron mishpakhat hakhezroni lekharmi mishpakhat hakarmi. 'eleh mishpekhot haru'ubeini vayihyu fequdeihem sheloshah ve'arba'im 'elef usheba' mei'ot usheloshim. ubenei falu 'eli'ab. ubenei 'eli'ab nemu'el vedatan va'abiram hu datan va'abiram qeru'ei qeri'ei ha'eidah 'asher hizu 'al mosheh ve'al 'aharon ba'adat qorakh behazotam 'al ihoh. vatiftakh ha'arez 'et piha vatibla' 'otam ve'et qorakh bemot ha'eidah ba'akhol ha'esh 'et khamishim umatayim 'ish vayihyu lenes. ubenei qorakh lo meitu. benei shim'on lemishpekhotam linmu'el mishpakhat hanemu'eili leyamin mishpakhat hayamini leyakhin mishpakhat hayakhini. lezerakh mishpakhat hazarkhi lesha'ul mishpakhat hasha'uli. 'eleh mishpekhot hashim'oni shenayim ve'esrim 'elef umatayim. benei gad lemishpekhotam lizfon mishpakhat hazefoni lekhagi mishpakhat hakhagi leshuni mishpakhat hashuni. le'azeni mishpakhat ha'azeni le'eiri mishpakhat ha'eiri. la'arod mishpakhat ha'arodi le'ar'eili mishpakhat ha'ar'eili. 'eleh mishpekhot benei gad lifqudeihem 'arba'im 'elef vakhamesh mei'ot. benei yehudah 'er ve'onan vayamat 'er ve'onan be'erez kena'an. vayihyu benei yehudah lemishpekhotam lesheilah mishpakhat hasheilani leferez mishpakhat haparzi lezerakh mishpakhat hazarkhi. vayihyu benei ferez lekhezron mishpakhat hakhezroni lekhamul mishpakhat hekhamuli. 'eleh mishpekhot yehudah lifqudeihem shishah veshib'im 'elef vakhamesh mei'ot. benei yisashkhar lemishpekhotam tola' mishpakhat hatola'i lefuvah mishpakhat hapuni. leyashub mishpakhat hayashubi leshimron mishpakhat hashimroni. 'eleh mishpekhot yisashkhar lifqudeihem 'arba'ah veshishim 'elef ushelosh mei'ot. benei zebulun lemishpekhotam lesered mishpakhat hasardi le'eilon mishpakhat ha'eiloni leyakhle'el mishpakhat hayakhle'eili. 'eleh mishpekhot hazebuloni lifqudeihem shishim 'elef vakhamesh mei'ot. benei yosef lemishpekhotam menasheh ve'efrayim. benei menasheh lemakhir mishpakhat hamakhiri umakhir holid 'et gil'ad legil'ad mishpakhat hagil'adi. 'eleh benei gil'ad 'i'ezer mishpakhat ha'i'ezri lekheileq mishpakhat hakhelqi. ve'asri'el mishpakhat ha'asri'eili veshekhem mishpakhat hashikhmi. ushemida' mishpakhat hashemida'i vekheifer mishpakhat hakhefri. uzelafekhad ben kheifer lo hayu lo banim ki 'im banot veshem benot zelafekhad makhlah veno'ah khagelah milkah vetirzah. 'eleh mishpekhot menasheh ufequdeihem shenayim vakhamishim 'elef usheba' mei'ot. 'eleh benei 'efrayim lemishpekhotam leshutelakh mishpakhat hashutalkhi lebekher mishpakhat habakhri letakhan mishpakhat hatakhani. ve'eleh benei shutalakh le'eiran mishpakhat ha'eirani. 'eleh mishpekhot benei 'efrayim lifqudeihem shenayim usheloshim 'elef vakhamesh mei'ot 'eleh benei yosef lemishpekhotam. benei binyamin lemishpekhotam lebela' mishpakhat habal'i le'ashbel mishpakhat ha'ashbeili la'akhiram mishpakhat ha'akhirami. lishfufam mishpakhat hashufami lekhufam mishpakhat hakhufami. vayihyu benei bela' 'ard vena'aman mishpakhat ha'ardi lena'aman mishpakhat hana'ami. 'eleh benei binyamin lemishpekhotam ufequdeihem khamishah ve'arba'im 'elef veshesh mei'ot. 'eleh benei dan lemishpekhotam leshukham mishpakhat hashukhami 'eleh mishpekhot dan lemishpekhotam. kal mishpekhot hashukhami lifqudeihem 'arba'ah veshishim 'elef ve'arba' mei'ot. benei 'asher lemishpekhotam leyimnah mishpakhat hayimnah leyishvi mishpakhat hayishvi libri'ah mishpakhat haberi'i. libnei beri'ah lekheber mishpakhat hakhebri lemalki'el mishpakhat hamalki'eili. veshem bat 'asher sarakh. 'eleh mishpekhot benei 'asher lifqudeihem sheloshah vakhamishim 'elef ve'arba' mei'ot. benei naftali lemishpekhotam leyakhze'el mishpakhat hayakhze'eili leguni mishpakhat haguni. leyeizer mishpakhat hayizri leshilem mishpakhat hashileimi. 'eleh mishpekhot naftali lemishpekhotam ufequdeihem khamishah ve'arba'im 'elef ve'arba' mei'ot. 'eleh pequdei benei yisra'el shesh mei'ot 'elef va'alef sheba' mei'ot usheloshim. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. la'eleh teikhaleq ha'arez benakhalah bemispar sheimot. larab tarbeh nakhalato velam'at tam'it nakhalato 'ish lefi fequdav yutan nakhalato. 'akh begoral yeikhaleq 'et ha'arez lishmot matot 'abotam yinkhalu. 'al pi hagoral teikhaleq nakhalato ben rab lim'at. ve'eleh fequdei haleivi lemishpekhotam legeireshon mishpakhat hageireshuni liqhat mishpakhat haqehati limrari mishpakhat hamerari. 'eleh mishpekhot leivi mishpakhat halibni mishpakhat hakhebroni mishpakhat hamakhli mishpakhat hamushi mishpakhat haqarekhi uqehat holid 'et 'amram. veshem 'eishet 'amram yokhebed bat leivi 'asher yaledah 'otah leleivi bemizrayim vateiled le'amram 'et 'aharon ve'et mosheh ve'et miryam 'akhotam. vayivaled le'aharon 'et nadab ve'et 'abihu 'et 'el'azar ve'et 'itamar. vayamat nadab va'abihu behaqribam 'esh zarah lifnei ihoh. vayihyu fequdeihem sheloshah ve'esrim 'elef kal zakhar miben khodesh vama'elah ki lo hatepaqedu betokh benei yisra'el ki lo nitan lahem nakhalah betokh benei yisra'el. 'eleh pequdei mosheh ve'el'azar hakohen 'asher paqedu 'et benei yisra'el be'arbot mo'ab 'al yarden yereikho. ube'eleh lo hayah 'ish mipequdei mosheh ve'aharon hakohen 'asher paqedu 'et benei yisra'el bemidbar sinai. ki 'amar ihoh lahem mot yamutu bamidbar velo notar meihem 'ish ki 'im kaleb ben yefuneh vihoshua' bin nun. vatiqrabnah benot zelafekhad ben kheifer ben gil'ad ben makhir ben menasheh lemishpekhot menasheh ben yosef ve'eleh shemot benotav makhlah no'ah vekhagelah umilkah vetirzah. vata'amodenah lifnei mosheh velifnei 'el'azar hakohen velifnei hanesi'im vekhal ha'eidah petakh 'ohel mo'ed leimor. 'abinu met bamidbar vehu lo hayah betokh ha'eidah hano'adim 'al ihoh ba'adat qorakh ki bekhet'o met ubanim lo hayu lo. lamah yigara' shem 'abinu mitokh mishpakhto ki 'en lo ben tenah lanu 'akhuzah betokh 'akhei 'abinu. vayaqreb mosheh 'et mishpatan lifnei ihoh. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. ken benot zelafekhad doberot naton titen lahem 'akhuzat nakhalah betokh 'akhei 'abihem veha'abarta 'et nakhalat 'abihen lahen. ve'el benei yisra'el tedaber leimor 'ish ki yamut uben 'en lo veha'abartem 'et nakhalato lebito. ve'im 'en lo bat unetatem 'et nakhalato le'ekhav ve'im 'en lo 'akhim unetatem 'et nakhalato la'akhei 'abiv. ve'im 'en 'akhim le'abiv unetatem 'et nakhalato lish'eiro haqarob 'eilav mimishpakhto veyarash 'otah vehayetah libnei yisra'el lekhuqat mishpat ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh 'aleh 'el har ha'abarim hazeh ure'eh 'et ha'arez 'asher natati libnei yisra'el. vera'itah 'otah vene'esafta 'el 'amekha gam 'atah ka'asher ne'esaf 'aharon 'akhikha. ka'asher meritem pi bemidbar zin bimribat ha'eidah lehaqdisheini bamayim le'eineihem hem mei meribat qadesh midbar zin. vaydaber mosheh 'el ihoh leimor. yifqod ihoh 'elohei harukhot lekhal basar 'ish 'al ha'eidah. 'asher yeizei lifneihem va'asher yabo lifneihem va'asher yozi'em va'asher yebi'em velo tihyeh 'adat ihoh kazon 'asher 'en lahem ro'eh. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh qakh lekha 'et yehoshua' bin nun 'ish 'asher ruakh bo vesamakhta 'et yadekha 'alav. veha'amadta 'oto lifnei 'el'azar hakohen velifnei kal ha'eidah vezivitah 'oto le'eineihem. venatatah meihodkha 'alav lema'an yishme'u kal 'adat benei yisra'el. velifnei 'el'azar hakohen ya'amod vesha'al lo bemishpat ha'urim lifnei ihoh 'al piv yeize'u ve'al piv yabo'u hu vekhal benei yisra'el 'ito vekhal ha'eidah. vaya'as mosheh ka'asher zivah ihoh 'oto vayiqakh 'et yehoshua' vaya'amideihu lifnei 'el'azar hakohen velifnei kal ha'eidah. vayismokh 'et yadav 'alav vayzaveihu ka'asher diber ihoh beyad mosheh. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. zav 'et benei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem 'et qarebani lakhmi le'ishai reiakh nikhokhi tishmeru lehaqrib li bemo'ado. ve'amarta lahem zeh ha'isheh 'asher taqribu ihoh kebasim benei shanah temimim shenayim layom 'olah tamid. 'et hakebes 'ekhad ta'aseh baboqer ve'et hakebes hasheini ta'aseh ben ha'arbayim. va'asirit ha'eifah solet leminkhah belulah beshemen katit rebi'it hahin. 'olat tamid ha'asuyah behar sinai lereiakh nikhoakh 'isheh ihoh. venisko rebi'it hahin lakebes ha'ekhad baqodesh hasekh nesekh sheikhar ihoh. ve'et hakebes hasheini ta'aseh ben ha'arbayim keminkhat haboqer ukhenisko ta'aseh 'isheh reiakh nikhoakh ihoh. ubeyom hashabat shenei khebasim benei shanah temimim ushenei 'esronim solet minkhah belulah bashemen venisko. 'olat shabat beshabato 'al 'olat hatamid veniskah. uberashei khadesheikhem taqribu 'olah ihoh parim benei baqar shenayim ve'ayil 'ekhad kebasim benei shanah shib'ah temimim. usheloshah 'esronim solet minkhah belulah bashemen lapar ha'ekhad ushenei 'esronim solet minkhah belulah bashemen la'ayil ha'ekhad. ve'isaron 'isaron solet minkhah belulah bashemen lakebes ha'ekhad 'olah reiakh nikhoakh 'isheh ihoh. veniskeihem khazi hahin yihyeh lapar ushelishit hahin la'ayil urebi'it hahin lakebes yayin zot 'olat khodesh bekhadesho lekhadeshei hashanah. use'ir 'izim 'ekhad lekhatat ihoh 'al 'olat hatamid yei'aseh venisko. ubakhodesh harishon be'arba'ah 'asar yom lakhodesh pesakh ihoh. ubakhamishah 'asar yom lakhodesh hazeh khag shib'at yamim mazot yei'akhel. bayom harishon miqra qodesh kal melekhet 'abodah lo ta'asu. vehiqrabtem 'isheh 'olah ihoh parim benei baqar shenayim ve'ayil 'ekhad veshib'ah khebasim benei shanah temimim yihyu lakhem. uminkhatam solet belulah bashamen sheloshah 'esronim lapar ushenei 'esronim la'ayil ta'asu. 'isaron 'isaron ta'aseh lakebes ha'ekhad leshib'at hakebasim. use'ir khatat 'ekhad lekhaper 'aleikhem. milebad 'olat haboqer 'asher le'olat hatamid ta'asu 'et 'eleh. ka'eleh ta'asu layom shib'at yamim lekhem 'isheh reiakh nikhoakh ihoh 'al 'olat hatamid yei'aseh venisko. ubayom hashebi'i miqra qodesh yihyeh lakhem kal melekhet 'abodah lo ta'asu. ubeyom habikurim behaqribekhem minkhah khadashah ihoh beshabu'oteikhem miqra qodesh yihyeh lakhem kal melekhet 'abodah lo ta'asu. vehiqrabtem 'olah lereiakh nikhoakh ihoh parim benei baqar shenayim 'ayil 'ekhad shib'ah khebasim benei shanah. uminkhatam solet belulah bashamen sheloshah 'esronim lapar ha'ekhad shenei 'esronim la'ayil ha'ekhad. 'isaron 'isaron lakebes ha'ekhad leshib'at hakebasim. se'ir 'izim 'ekhad lekhaper 'aleikhem. milebad 'olat hatamid uminkhato ta'asu temimim yihyu lakhem veniskeihem. ubakhodesh hashebi'i be'ekhad lakhodesh miqra qodesh yihyeh lakhem kal melekhet 'abodah lo ta'asu yom teru'ah yihyeh lakhem. va'asitem 'olah lereiakh nikhoakh ihoh par ben baqar 'ekhad 'ayil 'ekhad kebasim benei shanah shib'ah temimim. uminkhatam solet belulah bashamen sheloshah 'esronim lapar shenei 'esronim la'ayil. ve'isaron 'ekhad lakebes ha'ekhad leshib'at hakebasim. use'ir 'izim 'ekhad khatat lekhaper 'aleikhem. milebad 'olat hakhodesh uminkhatah ve'olat hatamid uminkhatah veniskeihem kemishpatam lereiakh nikhoakh 'isheh ihoh. ube'asor lakhodesh hashebi'i hazeh miqra qodesh yihyeh lakhem ve'initem 'et nafshoteikhem kal melakhah lo ta'asu. vehiqrabtem 'olah ihoh reiakh nikhoakh par ben baqar 'ekhad 'ayil 'ekhad kebasim benei shanah shib'ah temimim yihyu lakhem. uminkhatam solet belulah bashamen sheloshah 'esronim lapar shenei 'esronim la'ayil ha'ekhad. 'isaron 'isaron lakebes ha'ekhad leshib'at hakebasim. se'ir 'izim 'ekhad khatat milebad khatat hakipurim ve'olat hatamid uminkhatah veniskeihem. ubakhamishah 'asar yom lakhodesh hashebi'i miqra qodesh yihyeh lakhem kal melekhet 'abodah lo ta'asu vekhagotem khag ihoh shib'at yamim. vehiqrabtem 'olah 'isheh reiakh nikhoakh ihoh parim benei baqar sheloshah 'asar 'eilim shenayim kebasim benei shanah 'arba'ah 'asar temimim yihyu. uminkhatam solet belulah bashamen sheloshah 'esronim lapar ha'ekhad lishloshah 'asar parim shenei 'esronim la'ayil ha'ekhad lishnei ha'eilim. ve'isaron 'isaron lakebes ha'ekhad le'arba'ah 'asar kebasim. use'ir 'izim 'ekhad khatat milebad 'olat hatamid minkhatah veniskah. ubayom hasheini parim benei baqar shenem 'asar 'eilim shenayim kebasim benei shanah 'arba'ah 'asar temimim. uminkhatam veniskeihem laparim la'eilim velakebasim bemisparam kamishpat. use'ir 'izim 'ekhad khatat milebad 'olat hatamid uminkhatah veniskeihem. ubayom hashelishi parim 'ashtei 'asar 'eilim shenayim kebasim benei shanah 'arba'ah 'asar temimim. uminkhatam veniskeihem laparim la'eilim velakebasim bemisparam kamishpat. use'ir khatat 'ekhad milebad 'olat hatamid uminkhatah veniskah. ubayom harebi'i parim 'asarah 'eilim shenayim kebasim benei shanah 'arba'ah 'asar temimim. minkhatam veniskeihem laparim la'eilim velakebasim bemisparam kamishpat. use'ir 'izim 'ekhad khatat milebad 'olat hatamid minkhatah veniskah. ubayom hakhamishi parim tish'ah 'eilim shenayim kebasim benei shanah 'arba'ah 'asar temimim. uminkhatam veniskeihem laparim la'eilim velakebasim bemisparam kamishpat. use'ir khatat 'ekhad milebad 'olat hatamid uminkhatah veniskah. ubayom hashishi parim shemonah 'eilim shenayim kebasim benei shanah 'arba'ah 'asar temimim. uminkhatam veniskeihem laparim la'eilim velakebasim bemisparam kamishpat. use'ir khatat 'ekhad milebad 'olat hatamid minkhatah unesakheha. ubayom hashebi'i parim shib'ah 'eilim shenayim kebasim benei shanah 'arba'ah 'asar temimim. uminkhatam veniskeihem laparim la'eilim velakebasim bemisparam kemishpatam. use'ir khatat 'ekhad milebad 'olat hatamid minkhatah veniskah. bayom hashemini 'azeret tihyeh lakhem kal melekhet 'abodah lo ta'asu. vehiqrabtem 'olah 'isheh reiakh nikhoakh ihoh par 'ekhad 'ayil 'ekhad kebasim benei shanah shib'ah temimim. minkhatam veniskeihem lapar la'ayil velakebasim bemisparam kamishpat. use'ir khatat 'ekhad milebad 'olat hatamid uminkhatah veniskah. 'eleh ta'asu ihoh bemo'adeikhem lebad minidreikhem venidboteikhem le'oloteikhem uleminkhoteikhem uleniskeikhem uleshalmeikhem. vayomer mosheh 'el benei yisra'el kekhol 'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. vaydaber mosheh 'el rashei hamatot libnei yisra'el leimor zeh hadabar 'asher zivah ihoh. 'ish ki yidor neder ihoh 'o hishaba' shebu'ah le'sor 'isar 'al nafsho lo yakhel debaro kekhal hayozei mipiv ya'aseh. ve'ishah ki tidor neder ihoh ve'aserah 'isar bebet 'abiha bin'ureha. veshama' 'abiha 'et nidrah ve'esarah 'asher 'aserah 'al nafshah vehekherish lah 'abiha veqamu kal nedareha vekhal 'isar 'asher 'aserah 'al nafshah yaqum. ve'im heini 'abiha 'otah beyom shame'o kal nedareha ve'esareha 'asher 'aserah 'al nafshah lo yaqum ihoh yislakh lah ki heini 'abiha 'otah. ve'im hayo tihyeh le'ish unedareha 'aleha 'o mibta sefateha 'asher 'aserah 'al nafshah. veshama' 'ishah beyom shame'o vehekherish lah veqamu nedareha ve'esareha 'asher 'aserah 'al nafshah yaqumu. ve'im beyom shemoa' 'ishah yani 'otah veheifer 'et nidrah 'asher 'aleha ve'et mibta sefateha 'asher 'aserah 'al nafshah ihoh yislakh lah. veneider 'almanah ugerushah kol 'asher 'aserah 'al nafshah yaqum 'aleha. ve'im bet 'ishah nadarah 'o 'aserah 'isar 'al nafshah bishbu'ah. veshama' 'ishah vehekherish lah lo heini 'otah veqamu kal nedareha vekhal 'isar 'asher 'aserah 'al nafshah yaqum. ve'im hafer yafer 'otam 'ishah beyom shame'o kal moza sefateha lindareha ule'isar nafshah lo yaqum 'ishah hafeiram ihoh yislakh lah. kal neider vekhal shebu'at 'isar le'anot nafesh 'ishah yeqimenu ve'ishah yefeirenu. ve'im hakharesh yakharish lah 'ishah miyom 'el yom veheiqim 'et kal nedareha 'o 'et kal 'esareha 'asher 'aleha heiqim 'otam ki hekherish lah beyom shame'o. ve'im hafer yafer 'otam 'akharei shame'o venasa 'et 'avonah. 'eleh hakhuqim 'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh ben 'ish le'ishto ben 'ab lebito bin'ureha bet 'abiha. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. neqom niqmat benei yisra'el mei'et hamidyanim 'akhar tei'asef 'el 'amekha. vaydaber mosheh 'el ha'am leimor heikhalezu mei'itekhem 'anashim lazaba veyihyu 'al midyan latet niqmat ihoh bemidyan. 'elef lamateh 'elef lamateh lekhol matot yisra'el tishlekhu lazaba. vayimaseru mei'alfei yisra'el 'elef lamateh shenem 'asar 'elef khaluzei zaba. vayishlakh 'otam mosheh 'elef lamateh lazaba 'otam ve'et pinekhas ben 'el'azar hakohen lazaba ukhelei haqodesh vakhazozerot hateru'ah beyado. vayizbe'u 'al midyan ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh vayahargu kal zakhar. ve'et malkhei midyan haregu 'al khaleihem 'et 'evi ve'et reqem ve'et zur ve'et khur ve'et reba' khameishet malkhei midyan ve'et bil'am ben be'or haregu bekhareb. vayishbu benei yisra'el 'et neshei midyan ve'et tapam ve'et kal behemtam ve'et kal miqneihem ve'et kal kheilam bazazu. ve'et kal 'areihem bemoshebotam ve'et kal tirotam sarefu ba'esh. vayiqkhu 'et kal hashalal ve'et kal hamalqoakh ba'adam ubabeheimah. vayabi'u 'el mosheh ve'el 'el'azar hakohen ve'el 'adat benei yisra'el 'et hashebi ve'et hamalqoakh ve'et hashalal 'el hamakhaneh 'el 'arbot mo'ab 'asher 'al yarden yereikho. vayeize'u mosheh ve'el'azar hakohen vekhal nesi'ei ha'eidah liqratam 'el mikhuz lamakhaneh. vayiqzof mosheh 'al pequdei hekhayil sarei ha'alafim vesarei hamei'ot haba'im mizeba hamilkhamah. vayomer 'aleihem mosheh hakhiyitem kal neqeibah. hen henah hayu libnei yisra'el bidbar bil'am limsar ma'al ihoh 'al debar pe'or vatehi hamageifah ba'adat ihoh. ve'atah hirgu khal zakhar bataf vekhal 'ishah yoda'at 'ish lemishkab zakhar harogu. vekhol hataf banashim 'asher lo yade'u mishkab zakhar hakhayu lakhem. ve'atem khanu mikhuz lamakhaneh shib'at yamim kol horeg nefesh vekhol nogeia' bekhalal titkhate'u bayom hashelishi ubayom hashebi'i 'atem ushebikhem. vekhal beged vekhal keli 'or vekhal ma'aseh 'izim vekhal keli 'ez titkhata'u. vayomer 'el'azar hakohen 'el 'anshei hazaba haba'im lamilkhamah zot khuqat hatorah 'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. 'akh 'et hazahab ve'et hakasef 'et hanekhoshet 'et habarzel 'et habedil ve'et ha'ofaret. kal dabar 'asher yabo ba'esh ta'abiru ba'esh vetaher 'akh bemei nidah yitkhata vekhol 'asher lo yabo ba'esh ta'abiru bamayim. vekhibastem bigdeikhem bayom hashebi'i utehartem ve'akhar tabo'u 'el hamakhaneh. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. sa 'et rosh malqoakh hashebi ba'adam ubabeheimah 'atah ve'el'azar hakohen verashei 'abot ha'eidah. vekhazita 'et hamalqoakh ben tofesei hamilkhamah hayoze'im lazaba uben kal ha'eidah. vahareimota mekhes ihoh mei'et 'anshei hamilkhamah hayoze'im lazaba 'ekhad nefesh meikhamesh hamei'ot min ha'adam umin habaqar umin hakhamorim umin hazon. mimakhazitam tiqakhu venatatah le'el'azar hakohen terumat ihoh. umimakhazit benei yisra'el tiqakh 'ekhad 'akhuz min hakhamishim min ha'adam min habaqar min hakhamorim umin hazon mikal habeheimah venatatah 'otam lalviyim shomerei mishmeret mishkan ihoh. vaya'as mosheh ve'el'azar hakohen ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. vayhi hamalqoakh yeter habaz 'asher bazezu 'am hazaba zon shesh mei'ot 'elef veshib'im 'elef vakhameishet 'alafim ubaqar shenayim veshib'im 'alef. vakhamorim 'ekhad veshishim 'alef. venefesh 'adam min hanashim 'asher lo yade'u mishkab zakhar kal nefesh shenayim usheloshim 'alef. vatehi hamekhezah kheileq hayoze'im bazaba mispar hazon shelosh mei'ot 'elef usheloshim 'elef veshib'at 'alafim vakhamesh mei'ot. vayhi hamekhes ihoh min hazon shesh mei'ot khamesh veshib'im. vehabaqar shishah usheloshim 'alef umikhsam ihoh shenayim veshib'im. vakhamorim sheloshim 'elef vakhamesh mei'ot umikhsam ihoh 'ekhad veshishim. venefesh 'adam shishah 'asar 'alef umikhsam ihoh shenayim usheloshim nafesh. vayiten mosheh 'et mekhes terumat ihoh le'el'azar hakohen ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. umimakhazit benei yisra'el 'asher khazah mosheh min ha'anashim hazobe'im. vatehi mekhezat ha'eidah min hazon shelosh mei'ot 'elef usheloshim 'elef shib'at 'alafim vakhamesh mei'ot. ubaqar shishah usheloshim 'alef. vakhamorim sheloshim 'elef vakhamesh mei'ot. venefesh 'adam shishah 'asar 'alef. vayiqakh mosheh mimakhazit benei yisra'el 'et ha'akhuz 'ekhad min hakhamishim min ha'adam umin habeheimah vayiten 'otam lalviyim shomerei mishmeret mishkan ihoh ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. vayiqrebu 'el mosheh hapequdim 'asher le'alfei hazaba sarei ha'alafim vesarei hamei'ot. vayomeru 'el mosheh 'abadekha nase'u 'et rosh 'anshei hamilkhamah 'asher beyadeinu velo nifqad mimenu 'ish. vanaqreb 'et qareban ihoh 'ish 'asher maza kheli zahab 'ez'adah vezamid taba'at 'agil vekhumaz lekhaper 'al nafshoteinu lifnei ihoh. vayiqakh mosheh ve'el'azar hakohen 'et hazahab mei'itam kol keli ma'aseh. vayhi kal zehab haterumah 'asher heirimu ihoh shishah 'asar 'elef sheba' mei'ot vakhamishim shaqel mei'et sarei ha'alafim umei'et sarei hamei'ot. 'anshei hazaba bazezu 'ish lo. vayiqakh mosheh ve'el'azar hakohen 'et hazahab mei'et sarei ha'alafim vehamei'ot vayabi'u 'oto 'el 'ohel mo'ed zikaron libnei yisra'el lifnei ihoh. umiqneh rab hayah libnei re'uben velibnei gad 'azum me'od vayir'u 'et 'erez ya'zer ve'et 'erez gil'ad vehineh hamaqom meqom miqneh. vayabo'u benei gad ubenei re'uben vayomeru 'el mosheh ve'el 'el'azar hakohen ve'el nesi'ei ha'eidah leimor. 'atarot vedibon veya'zer venimrah vekheshbon ve'el'aleh usebam unebo ube'on. ha'arez 'asher hikah ihoh lifnei 'adat yisra'el 'erez miqneh hi vela'abadekha miqneh. vayomeru 'im mazanu khen be'einekha yutan 'et ha'arez hazot la'abadekha la'akhuzah 'al ta'abireinu 'et hayarden. vayomer mosheh libnei gad velibnei re'uben ha'akheikhem yabo'u lamilkhamah ve'atem teishebu foh. velamah tenu'un teni'un 'et leb benei yisra'el mei'abor 'el ha'arez 'asher natan lahem ihoh. koh 'asu 'aboteikhem beshalekhi 'otam miqadesh barneia' lir'ot 'et ha'arez. vaya'alu 'ad nakhal 'eshkol vayir'u 'et ha'arez vayani'u 'et leb benei yisra'el lebilti bo 'el ha'arez 'asher natan lahem ihoh. vayikhar 'af ihoh bayom hahu vayishaba' leimor. 'im yir'u ha'anashim ha'olim mimizrayim miben 'esrim shanah vama'lah 'et ha'adamah 'asher nishba'ti le'abraham leyizkhaq uleya'aqob ki lo mil'u 'akharai. bilti kaleb ben yefuneh haqenizi vihoshua' bin nun ki mil'u 'akharei ihoh. vayikhar 'af ihoh beyisra'el vayni'em bamidbar 'arba'im shanah 'ad tom kal hador ha'oseh hara' be'einei ihoh. vehineh qamtem takhat 'aboteikhem tarbut 'anashim khata'im lispot 'od 'al kharon 'af ihoh 'el yisra'el. ki teshubun mei'akharav veyasaf 'od lehanikho bamidbar veshikhatem lekhal ha'am hazeh. vayigeshu 'eilav vayomeru gidrot zon nibneh lemiqneinu poh ve'arim letapeinu. va'anakhnu neikhalez khushim lifnei benei yisra'el 'ad 'asher 'im habi'onum 'el meqomam veyashab tapeinu be'arei hamibzar mipenei yoshebei ha'arez. lo nashub 'el bateinu 'ad hitnakhel benei yisra'el 'ish nakhalato. ki lo ninkhal 'itam mei'eiber layarden vahale'ah ki ba'ah nakhalateinu 'eileinu mei'eiber hayarden mizrakhah. vayomer 'aleihem mosheh 'im ta'asun 'et hadabar hazeh 'im teikhalezu lifnei ihoh lamilkhamah. ve'abar lakhem kal khaluz 'et hayarden lifnei ihoh 'ad horisho 'et 'oyebav mipanav. venikhbeshah ha'arez lifnei ihoh ve'akhar tashubu vihyitem neqiyim ihoh umiyisra'el vehayetah ha'arez hazot lakhem la'akhuzah lifnei ihoh. ve'im lo ta'asun ken hineh khatatem ihoh ude'u khatatkhem 'asher timza 'etkhem. benu lakhem 'arim letapekhem ugedeirot lezona'akhem vehayozei mipikhem ta'asu. vayomer benei gad ubenei re'uben 'el mosheh leimor 'abadekha ya'asu ka'asher 'adoni mezaveh. tapeinu nasheinu miqneinu vekhal behemteinu yihyu sham be'arei hagil'ad. va'abadekha ya'abru kal khaluz zaba lifnei ihoh lamilkhamah ka'asher 'adoni dober. vayzav lahem mosheh 'et 'el'azar hakohen ve'et yehoshua' bin nun ve'et rashei 'abot hamatot libnei yisra'el. vayomer mosheh 'aleihem 'im ya'abru benei gad ubenei re'uben 'itekhem 'et hayarden kal khaluz lamilkhamah lifnei ihoh venikhbeshah ha'arez lifneikhem unetatem lahem 'et 'erez hagil'ad la'akhuzah. ve'im lo ya'abru khaluzim 'itekhem venokhazu betokhekhem be'erez kena'an. vaya'anu benei gad ubenei re'uben leimor 'et 'asher diber ihoh 'el 'abadekha ken na'aseh. nakhnu na'abor khaluzim lifnei ihoh 'erez kena'an ve'itanu 'akhuzat nakhalateinu mei'eiber layarden. vayiten lahem mosheh libnei gad velibnei re'uben velakhazi sheibet menasheh ben yosef 'et mamlekhet sikhon melekh ha'emori ve'et mamlekhet 'og melekh habashan ha'arez le'areha bigbulot 'arei ha'arez sabib. vayibnu benei gad 'et dibon ve'et 'atarot ve'et 'aro'er. ve'et 'atrot shofan ve'et ya'zer veyagebohah. ve'et bet nimrah ve'et bet haran 'arei mibzar vegidrot zon. ubenei re'uben banu 'et kheshbon ve'et 'el'alei ve'et qiryatayim. ve'et nebo ve'et ba'al me'on musabot shem ve'et sibmah vayiqre'u besheimot 'et shemot he'arim 'asher banu. vayeilekhu benei makhir ben menasheh gil'adah vayilkeduha vayoresh 'et ha'emori 'asher bah. vayiten mosheh 'et hagil'ad lemakhir ben menasheh vayeisheb bah. veya'ir ben menasheh halakh vayilkod 'et khavoteihem vayiqra 'ethen khavot ya'ir. venobakh halakh vayilkod 'et qenat ve'et benoteha vayiqra lah nobakh bishmo. 'eleh mas'ei benei yisra'el 'asher yaze'u mei'erez mizrayim lezib'otam beyad mosheh ve'aharon. vayikhtob mosheh 'et moza'eihem lemas'eihem 'al pi ihoh ve'eleh mas'eihem lemoza'eihem. vayis'u meira'meses bakhodesh harishon bakhamishah 'asar yom lakhodesh harishon mimakhorat hapesakh yaze'u benei yisra'el beyad ramah le'einei kal mizrayim. umizrayim meqaberim 'et 'asher hikah ihoh bahem kal bekhor ubeiloheihem 'asah ihoh shefatim. vayis'u benei yisra'el meira'meses vayakhanu besukot. vayis'u misukot vayakhanu be'eitam 'asher biqzeh hamidbar. vayis'u mei'eitam vayashab 'al pi hakhirot 'asher 'al penei ba'al zefon vayakhanu lifnei migdol. vayis'u mipenei hakhirot vaya'abru betokh hayam hamidbarah vayeilekhu derekh sheloshet yamim bemidbar 'eitam vayakhanu bemarah. vayis'u mimarah vayabo'u 'eilimah ube'eilim shetem 'esreh 'einot mayim veshib'im temarim vayakhanu sham. vayis'u mei'eilim vayakhanu 'al yam suf. vayis'u miyam suf vayakhanu bemidbar sin. vayis'u mimidbar sin vayakhanu bedafeqah. vayis'u midafeqah vayakhanu be'alush. vayis'u mei'alush vayakhanu birfidim velo hayah sham mayim la'am lishtot. vayis'u meirefidim vayakhanu bemidbar sinai. vayis'u mimidbar sinai vayakhanu beqibrot hata'avah. vayis'u miqibrot hata'avah vayakhanu bakhazeirot. vayis'u meikhazeirot vayakhanu beritmah. vayis'u meiritmah vayakhanu berimon parez. vayis'u meirimon parez vayakhanu belibnah. vayis'u milibnah vayakhanu berisah. vayis'u meirisah vayakhanu biqheilatah. vayis'u miqeheilatah vayakhanu behar shafer. vayis'u meihar shafer vayakhanu bakharadah. vayis'u meikharadah vayakhanu bemaqheilot. vayis'u mimaqheilot vayakhanu betakhat. vayis'u mitakhat vayakhanu betarakh. vayis'u mitarakh vayakhanu bemitqah. vayis'u mimitqah vayakhanu bekhashmonah. vayis'u meikhashmonah vayakhanu bemoseirot. vayis'u mimoseirot vayakhanu bibnei ya'aqan. vayis'u mibenei ya'aqan vayakhanu bekhor hagidgad. vayis'u meikhor hagidgad vayakhanu beyatebatah. vayis'u miyatebatah vayakhanu be'abronah. vayis'u mei'abronah vayakhanu be'ezyon gaber. vayis'u mei'ezyon gaber vayakhanu bemidbar zin hi qadesh. vayis'u miqadesh vayakhanu behor hahar biqzeh 'erez 'edom. vaya'al 'aharon hakohen 'el hor hahar 'al pi ihoh vayamat sham bishnat ha'arba'im lezet benei yisra'el mei'erez mizrayim bakhodesh hakhamishi be'ekhad lakhodesh. ve'aharon ben shalosh ve'esrim ume'at shanah bemoto behor hahar. vayishma' hakena'ani melekh 'arad vehu yosheb banegeb be'erez kena'an bebo benei yisra'el. vayis'u meihor hahar vayakhanu bezalmonah. vayis'u mizalmonah vayakhanu befunon. vayis'u mipunon vayakhanu be'obot. vayis'u mei'obot vayakhanu be'iyei ha'abarim bigbul mo'ab. vayis'u mei'iyim vayakhanu bedibon gad. vayis'u midibon gad vayakhanu be'almon diblatayemah. vayis'u mei'almon diblatayemah vayakhanu beharei ha'abarim lifnei nebo. vayis'u meiharei ha'abarim vayakhanu be'arbot mo'ab 'al yarden yereikho. vayakhanu 'al hayarden mibet hayshimot 'ad 'abel hashitim be'arbot mo'ab. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh be'arbot mo'ab 'al yarden yereikho leimor. daber 'el benei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem ki 'atem 'oberim 'et hayarden 'el 'erez kena'an. vehorashtem 'et kal yoshebei ha'arez mipeneikhem ve'ibadtem 'et kal maskiyotam ve'et kal zalmei maseikhotam te'abeidu ve'et kal bamotam tashmidu. vehorashtem 'et ha'arez vishabtem bah ki lakhem natati 'et ha'arez lareshet 'otah. vehitnakhaltem 'et ha'arez begoral lemishpekhoteikhem larab tarbu 'et nakhalato velam'at tam'it 'et nakhalato 'el 'asher yeizei lo shamah hagoral lo yihyeh lematot 'aboteikhem titnekhalu. ve'im lo torishu 'et yoshebei ha'arez mipeneikhem vehayah 'asher totiru meihem lesikim be'eineikhem velizninim bezideikhem vezararu 'etkhem 'al ha'arez 'asher 'atem yoshebim bah. vehayah ka'asher dimiti la'asot lahem 'e'eseh lakhem. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. zav 'et benei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem ki 'atem ba'im 'el ha'arez kena'an zot ha'arez 'asher tipol lakhem benakhalah 'erez kena'an ligbuloteha. vehayah lakhem pe'at negeb mimidbar zin 'al yedei 'edom vehayah lakhem gebul negeb miqzeh yam hamelakh qeidemah. venasab lakhem hagebul minegeb lema'aleh 'aqrabim ve'abar zinah vehayah vehayu toz'otav minegeb leqadesh barneia' veyaza khazar 'adar ve'abar 'azmonah. venasab hagebul mei'azmon nakhlah mizrayim vehayu toz'otav hayamah. ugebul yam vehayah lakhem hayam hagadol ugebul zeh yihyeh lakhem gebul yam. vezeh yihyeh lakhem gebul zafon min hayam hagadol teta'u lakhem hor hahar. meihor hahar teta'u lebo khamat vehayu toz'ot hagebul zedadah. veyaza hagebul zifronah vehayu toz'otav khazar 'einan zeh yihyeh lakhem gebul zafon. vehit'avitem lakhem ligbul qeidemah meikhazar 'einan shefamah. veyarad hagebul mishefam hariblah miqedem la'ayin veyarad hagebul umakhah 'al ketef yam kineret qeidemah. veyarad hagebul hayardeinah vehayu toz'otav yam hamelakh zot tihyeh lakhem ha'arez ligbuloteha sabib. vayzav mosheh 'et benei yisra'el leimor zot ha'arez 'asher titnakhalu 'otah begoral 'asher zivah ihoh latet letish'at hamatot vakhazi hamateh. ki laqekhu mateh benei har'ubeini lebet 'abotam umateh benei hagadi lebet 'abotam vakhazi mateh menasheh laqekhu nakhalatam. shenei hamatot vakhazi hamateh laqekhu nakhalatam mei'eiber leyarden yereikho qeidemah mizrakhah. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. 'eleh shemot ha'anashim 'asher yinkhalu lakhem 'et ha'arez 'el'azar hakohen vihoshua' bin nun. venasi 'ekhad nasi 'ekhad mimateh tiqkhu linkhol 'et ha'arez. ve'eleh shemot ha'anashim lemateh yehudah kaleb ben yefuneh. ulemateh benei shim'on shemu'el ben 'amihud. lemateh binyamin 'elidad ben kislon. ulemateh benei dan nasi buqi ben yageli. libnei yosef lemateh benei menasheh nasi khani'el ben 'eifod. ulemateh benei 'efrayim nasi qemu'el ben shiftan. ulemateh benei zebulun nasi 'elizafan ben parnakh. ulemateh benei yisashkhar nasi palti'el ben 'azan. ulemateh benei 'asher nasi 'akhihud ben shelomi. ulemateh benei naftali nasi pedah'el ben 'amihud. 'eleh 'asher zivah ihoh lenakhel 'et benei yisra'el be'erez kena'an. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh be'arbot mo'ab 'al yarden yereikho leimor. zav 'et benei yisra'el venatenu lalviyim minakhalat 'akhuzatam 'arim lashabet umigrash le'arim sebiboteihem titenu lalviyim. vehayu he'arim lahem lashabet umigresheihem yihyu libhemtam velirkhusham ulekhol khayatam. umigreshei he'arim 'asher titenu lalviyim miqir ha'ir vakhuzah 'elef 'amah sabib. umadotem mikhuz la'ir 'et pe'at qeidemah 'alpayim ba'amah ve'et pe'at negeb 'alpayim ba'amah ve'et pe'at yam 'alpayim ba'amah ve'et pe'at zafon 'alpayim ba'amah veha'ir batavekh zeh yihyeh lahem migreshei he'arim. ve'et he'arim 'asher titenu lalviyim 'et shesh 'arei hamiqlat 'asher titenu lanus shamah harozeiakh va'aleihem titenu 'arba'im ushetayim 'ir. kal he'arim 'asher titenu lalviyim 'arba'im ushemoneh 'ir 'ethen ve'et migresheihen. vehe'arim 'asher titenu mei'akhuzat benei yisra'el mei'et harab tarbu umei'et ham'at tam'itu 'ish kefi nakhalato 'asher yinkhalu yiten mei'arav lalviyim. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh leimor. daber 'el benei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem ki 'atem 'oberim 'et hayarden 'arzah kena'an. vehiqritem lakhem 'arim 'arei miqlat tihyenah lakhem venas shamah rozeiakh makeh nefesh bishgagah. vehayu lakhem he'arim lemiqlat migo'el velo yamut harozeiakh 'ad 'amedo lifnei ha'eidah lamishpat. vehe'arim 'asher titeinu shesh 'arei miqlat tihyenah lakhem. 'et shelosh he'arim titenu mei'eiber layarden ve'et shelosh he'arim titenu be'erez kena'an 'arei miqlat tihyenah. libnei yisra'el velager velatoshab betokham tihyenah shesh he'arim ha'eleh lemiqlat lanus shamah kal makeh nefesh bishgagah. ve'im bikhli barzel hikahu vayamot rozeiakh hu mot yumat harozeiakh. ve'im be'eben yad 'asher yamut bah hikahu vayamot rozeiakh hu mot yumat harozeiakh. 'o bikhli 'ez yad 'asher yamut bo hikahu vayamot rozeiakh hu mot yumat harozeiakh. go'el hadam hu yamit 'et harozeiakh befig'o bo hu yemitenu. ve'im besin'ah yehdafenu 'o hishlikh 'alav bizdiyah vayamot. 'o be'eibah hikahu beyado vayamot mot yumat hamakeh rozeiakh hu go'el hadam yamit 'et harozeiakh befig'o bo. ve'im befeta' belo 'eibah hadafo 'o hishlikh 'alav kal keli belo zediyah. 'o bekhal 'eben 'asher yamut bah belo re'ot vayapel 'alav vayamot vehu lo 'oyeb lo velo mebaqesh ra'ato. veshafetu ha'eidah ben hamakeh uben go'el hadam 'al hamishpatim ha'eleh. vehizilu ha'eidah 'et harozeiakh miyad go'el hadam veheishibu 'oto ha'eidah 'el 'ir miqlato 'asher nas shamah veyashab bah 'ad mot hakohen hagadol 'asher mashakh 'oto beshemen haqodesh. ve'im yazo yeizei harozeiakh 'et gebul 'ir miqlato 'asher yanus shamah. umaza 'oto go'el hadam mikhuz ligbul 'ir miqlato verazakh go'el hadam 'et harozeiakh 'en lo dam. ki be'ir miqlato yeisheb 'ad mot hakohen hagadol ve'akharei mot hakohen hagadol yashub harozeiakh 'el 'erez 'akhuzato. vehayu 'eleh lakhem lekhuqat mishpat ledoroteikhem bekhol mosheboteikhem. kal makeh nefesh lefi 'eidim yirzakh 'et harozeiakh ve'ed 'ekhad lo ya'aneh benefesh lamut. velo tiqkhu khofer lenefesh rozeiakh 'asher hu rasha' lamut ki mot yumat. velo tiqkhu khofer lanus 'el 'ir miqlato lashub lashebet ba'arez 'ad mot hakohen. velo takhanifu 'et ha'arez 'asher 'atem bah ki hadam hu yakhanif 'et ha'arez vela'arez lo yekhupar ladam 'asher shupakh bah ki 'im bedam shofekho. velo tetamei 'et ha'arez 'asher 'atem yoshebim bah 'asher 'ani shokhen betokhah ki 'ani ihoh shokhen betokh benei yisra'el. vayiqrebu rashei ha'abot lemishpakhat benei gil'ad ben makhir ben menasheh mimishpekhot benei yosef vaydaberu lifnei mosheh velifnei hanesi'im rashei 'abot libnei yisra'el. vayomeru 'et 'adoni zivah ihoh latet 'et ha'arez benakhalah begoral libnei yisra'el vadoni zuvah ihoh latet 'et nakhalat zelafekhad 'akhinu libnotav. vehayu le'ekhad mibenei shibtei benei yisra'el lenashim venigre'ah nakhalatan minakhalat 'aboteinu venosaf 'al nakhalat hamateh 'asher tihyenah lahem umigoral nakhalateinu yigareia'. ve'im yihyeh hayobel libnei yisra'el venosfah nakhalatan 'al nakhalat hamateh 'asher tihyenah lahem uminakhalat mateh 'aboteinu yigara' nakhalatan. vayzav mosheh 'et benei yisra'el 'al pi ihoh leimor ken mateh benei yosef doberim. zeh hadabar 'asher zivah ihoh libnot zelafekhad leimor latob be'eineihem tihyenah lenashim 'akh lemishpakhat mateh 'abihem tihyenah lenashim. velo tisob nakhalah libnei yisra'el mimateh 'el mateh ki 'ish benakhalat mateh 'abotav yidbequ benei yisra'el. vekhal bat yoreshet nakhalah mimatot benei yisra'el le'ekhad mimishpakhat mateh 'abiha tihyeh le'ishah lema'an yireshu benei yisra'el 'ish nakhalat 'abotav. velo tisob nakhalah mimateh lemateh 'akher ki 'ish benakhalato yidbequ matot benei yisra'el. ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh ken 'asu benot zelafekhad. vatihyenah makhlah tirzah vekhagelah umilkah veno'ah benot zelafekhad libnei dodeihen lenashim. mimishpekhot benei menasheh ben yosef hayu lenashim vatehi nakhalatan 'al mateh mishpakhat 'abihen. 'eleh hamizvot vehamishpatim 'asher zivah ihoh beyad mosheh 'el benei yisra'el be'arbot mo'ab 'al yarden yereikho.

'eleh hadebarim 'asher diber mosheh 'el kal yisra'el be'eiber hayarden bamidbar ba'arabah mol suf ben paran uben tofel velaban vakhazeirot vedi zahab. 'akhad 'asar yom meikhoreb derekh har sei'ir 'ad qadesh barneia'. vayhi be'arba'im shanah be'ashtei 'asar khodesh be'ekhad lakhodesh diber mosheh 'el benei yisra'el kekhol 'asher zivah ihoh 'oto 'aleihem. 'akharei hakoto 'et sikhon melekh ha'emori 'asher yosheb bekheshbon ve'et 'og melekh habashan 'asher yosheb be'ashtarot be'edre'i. be'eiber hayarden be'erez mo'ab ho'il mosheh bei'er 'et hatorah hazot leimor. ihoh 'eloheinu diber 'eileinu bekhoreb leimor rab lakhem shebet bahar hazeh. penu use'u lakhem ubo'u har ha'emori ve'el kal shekheinav ba'arabah bahar ubashefeilah ubanegeb ubekhof hayam 'erez hakena'ani vehalebanon 'ad hanahar hagadol nehar perat. re'eh natati lifneikhem 'et ha'arez bo'u ureshu 'et ha'arez 'asher nishba' ihoh la'aboteikhem le'abraham leyizkhaq uleya'aqob latet lahem ulezar'am 'akhareihem. va'omar 'aleikhem ba'et hahiv leimor lo 'ukhal lebadi se'et 'etkhem. ihoh 'eloheikhem hirbah 'etkhem vehinekhem hayom kekhokhbei hashamayim larob. ihoh 'elohei 'aboteikhem yosef 'aleikhem kakhem 'elef pe'amim vibarekh 'etkhem ka'asher diber lakhem. 'eikhah 'esa lebadi tarekhakhem umasa'akhem veribekhem. habu lakhem 'anashim khakhamim unebonim vidu'im leshibteikhem va'asimem berasheikhem. vata'anu 'oti vatomeru tob hadabar 'asher dibarta la'asot. va'eqakh 'et rashei shibteikhem 'anashim khakhamim vidu'im va'eten 'otam rashim 'aleikhem sarei 'alafim vesarei mei'ot vesarei khamishim vesarei 'asarot veshoterim leshibteikhem. va'azaveh 'et shofeteikhem ba'et hahiv leimor shamoa' ben 'akheikhem ushefatem zedeq ben 'ish uben 'akhiv uben geiro. lo takiru fanim bamishpat kaqaton kagadol tishma'un lo taguru mipenei 'ish ki hamishpat leilohim hu vehadabar 'asher yiqsheh mikem taqribun 'eilai ushema'tiv. va'azaveh 'etkhem ba'et hahiv 'et kal hadebarim 'asher ta'asun. vanisa' meikhoreb vaneilekh 'et kal hamidbar hagadol vehanora hahu 'asher re'item derekh har ha'emori ka'asher zivah ihoh 'eloheinu 'otanu vanabo 'ad qadesh barneia'. va'omar 'aleikhem batem 'ad har ha'emori 'asher ihoh 'eloheinu noten lanu. re'eh natan ihoh 'elohekha lefanekha 'et ha'arez 'aleh resh ka'asher diber ihoh 'elohei 'abotekha lakh 'al tira ve'al teikhat. vatiqrebun 'eilai kulekhem vatomeru nishlekhah 'anashim lefaneinu veyakhperu lanu 'et ha'arez veyashibu 'otanu dabar 'et haderekh 'asher na'aleh bah ve'et he'arim 'asher nabo 'aleihen. vayitab be'einai hadabar va'eqakh mikem shenem 'asar 'anashim 'ish 'ekhad lashabet. vayifnu vaya'alu haharah vayabo'u 'ad nakhal 'eshkol vayragelu 'otah. vayiqkhu beyadam miperi ha'arez vayoridu 'eileinu vayashibu 'otanu dabar vayomeru tobah ha'arez 'asher ihoh 'eloheinu noten lanu. velo 'abitem la'alot vatamru 'et pi ihoh 'eloheikhem. vateiragenu be'aholeikhem vatomeru besin'at ihoh 'otanu hozi'anu mei'erez mizrayim latet 'otanu beyad ha'emori lehashmideinu. 'anah 'anakhnu 'olim 'akheinu heimasu 'et lebabeinu leimor 'am gadol varam mimenu 'arim gedolot ubezurot bashamayim vegam benei 'anaqim ra'inu sham. va'omar 'aleikhem lo ta'arzun velo tire'un meihem. ihoh 'eloheikhem haholekh lifneikhem hu yilakhem lakhem kekhol 'asher 'asah 'itekhem bemizrayim le'eineikhem. ubamidbar 'asher ra'ita 'asher nesa'akha ihoh 'elohekha ka'asher yisa 'ish 'et beno bekhal haderekh 'asher halakhtem 'ad bo'akhem 'ad hamaqom hazeh. ubadabar hazeh 'einekhem ma'aminim ihoh 'eloheikhem. haholekh lifneikhem baderekh latur lakhem maqom lakhanotekhem ba'esh laylah lar'otekhem baderekh 'asher teilekhu bah ube'anan yomam. vayishma' ihoh 'et qol dibreikhem vayiqzof vayishaba' leimor.
