'im yir'eh 'ish ba'anashim ha'eleh hador hara' hazeh 'et ha'arez hatobah 'asher nishba'ti latet la'aboteikhem. zulati kaleb ben yefuneh hu yir'enah velo 'eten 'et ha'arez 'asher darakh bah ulebanav ya'an 'asher milei 'akharei ihoh. gam bi hit'anaf ihoh biglalkhem leimor gam 'atah lo tabo sham. yehoshua' bin nun ha'omed lefanekha hu yabo shamah 'oto khazeq ki hu yankhilenah 'et yisra'el. vetapekhem 'asher 'amartem labaz yihyeh ubeneikhem 'asher lo yade'u hayom tob vara' hemah yabo'u shamah velahem 'etenenah vehem yirashuha. ve'atem penu lakhem use'u hamidbarah derekh yam suf. vata'anu vatomeru 'eilai khatanu ihoh 'anakhnu na'aleh venilkhamnu kekhol 'asher zivanu ihoh 'eloheinu vatakhgeru 'ish 'et kelei milkhamto vatahinu la'alot haharah. vayomer ihoh 'eilai 'emor lahem lo ta'alu velo tilakhamu ki 'eineni beqirbekhem velo tinagefu lifnei 'oyebeikhem. va'adaber 'aleikhem velo shema'tem vatamru 'et pi ihoh vatazidu vata'alu haharah. vayeizei ha'emori hayosheb bahar hahu liqratkhem vayirdefu 'etkhem ka'asher ta'asenah hadeborim vayaketu 'etkhem besei'ir 'ad kharemah. vatashubu vatibku lifnei ihoh velo shama' ihoh beqolekhem velo he'ezin 'aleikhem. vateishebu beqadesh yamim rabim kayamim 'asher yeshabtem. vaneifen vanisa' hamidbarah derekh yam suf ka'asher diber ihoh 'eilai vanasab 'et har sei'ir yamim rabim. vayomer ihoh 'eilai leimor. rab lakhem sob 'et hahar hazeh penu lakhem zafonah. ve'et ha'am zav leimor 'atem 'oberim bigbul 'akheikhem benei 'eisav hayoshebim besei'ir veyire'u mikem venishmartem me'od. 'al titgaru bam ki lo 'eten lakhem mei'arzam 'ad midrakh kaf ragel ki yerushah le'eisav natati 'et har sei'ir. 'okhel tishberu mei'itam bakesef va'akhaltem vegam mayim tikhru mei'itam bakesef ushetitem. ki ihoh 'elohekha beirakhkha bekhol ma'aseh yadekha yada' lekhtekha 'et hamidbar hagadol hazeh zeh 'arba'im shanah ihoh 'elohekha 'imakh lo khasarta dabar. vana'abor mei'et 'akheinu benei 'eisav hayoshebim besei'ir miderekh ha'arabah mei'eilat umei'ezyon gaber vaneifen vana'abor derekh midbar mo'ab. vayomer ihoh 'eilai 'el tazar 'et mo'ab ve'al titgar bam milkhamah ki lo 'eten lekha mei'arzo yerushah ki libnei lot natati 'et 'ar yerushah ha'eimim lefanim yashebu bah 'am gadol verab varam ka'anaqim. refa'im yeikhashebu 'af hem ka'anaqim vehamo'abim yiqre'u lahem 'eimim. ubesei'ir yashebu hakhorim lefanim ubenei 'eisav yirashum vayashmidum mipeneihem vayeishebu takhtam ka'asher 'asah yisra'el le'erez yerushato 'asher natan ihoh lahem. 'atah qumu ve'ibru lakhem 'et nakhal zared vana'abor 'et nakhal zared. vehayamim 'asher halakhnu miqadesh barneia' 'ad 'asher 'abarnu 'et nakhal zered sheloshim ushemoneh shanah 'ad tom kal hador 'anshei hamilkhamah miqereb hamakhaneh ka'asher nishba' ihoh lahem. vegam yad ihoh hayetah bam lehumam miqereb hamakhaneh 'ad tumam. vayhi kha'asher tamu kal 'anshei hamilkhamah lamut miqereb ha'am. vaydaber ihoh 'eilai leimor. 'atah 'ober hayom 'et gebul mo'ab 'et 'ar. veqarabta mul benei 'amon 'al tezurem ve'al titgar bam ki lo 'eten mei'erez benei 'amon lekha yerushah ki libnei lot netatiha yerushah. 'erez refa'im teikhasheb 'af hi refa'im yashebu bah lefanim veha'amonim yiqre'u lahem zamzumim. 'am gadol verab varam ka'anaqim vayashmidem ihoh mipeneihem vayirashum vayeishebu takhtam. ka'asher 'asah libnei 'eisav hayoshebim besei'ir 'asher hishmid 'et hakhori mipeneihem vayirashum vayeishebu takhtam 'ad hayom hazeh. veha'avim hayoshebim bakhazeirim 'ad 'azah kaftorim hayoze'im mikaftor hishmidum vayeishebu takhtam. qumu se'u ve'ibru 'et nakhal 'arnon re'eh natati beyadekha 'et sikhon melekh kheshbon ha'emori ve'et 'arzo hakhel rash vehitgar bo milkhamah. hayom hazeh 'akhel tet pakhdekha veyir'atekha 'al penei ha'amim takhat kal hashamayim 'asher yishme'un shim'akha veragezu vekhalu mipanekha va'eshlakh mal'akhim mimidbar qedeimot 'el sikhon melekh kheshbon dibrei shalom leimor. 'e'berah be'arzekha baderekh baderekh 'eilekh lo 'asur yamin usemol. 'okhel bakesef tashbireini ve'akhalti umayim bakesef titen li veshatiti raq 'e'berah beraglai. ka'asher 'asu li benei 'eisav hayoshebim besei'ir vehamo'abim hayoshebim be'ar 'ad 'asher 'e'ebor 'et hayarden 'el ha'arez 'asher ihoh 'eloheinu noten lanu. velo 'abah sikhon melekh kheshbon ha'abireinu bo ki hiqshah ihoh 'elohekha 'et rukho ve'imez 'et lebabo lema'an tito beyadekha kayom hazeh. vayomer ihoh 'eilai re'eh hakhiloti tet lefanekha 'et sikhon ve'et 'arzo hakhel rash lareshet 'et 'arzo. vayeizei sikhon liqrateinu hu vekhal 'amo lamilkhamah yahezah. vayiteneihu ihoh 'eloheinu lefaneinu vanakh 'oto ve'et beno banav ve'et kal 'amo. vanilkod 'et kal 'arav ba'et hahiv vanakharem 'et kal 'ir metim vehanashim vehataf lo hish'arnu sarid. raq habeheimah bazaznu lanu ushelal he'arim 'asher lakhadenu. mei'aro'er 'asher 'al sefat nakhal 'arnon veha'ir 'asher banakhal ve'ad hagil'ad lo hayetah qiryah 'asher sagebah mimenu 'et hakol natan ihoh 'eloheinu lefaneinu. raq 'el 'erez benei 'amon lo qarabeta kal yad nakhal yaboq ve'arei hahar vekhol 'asher zivah ihoh 'eloheinu. vaneifen vana'al derekh habashan vayeizei 'og melekh habashan liqrateinu hu vekhal 'amo lamilkhamah 'edre'i. vayomer ihoh 'eilai 'al tira 'oto ki beyadekha natati 'oto ve'et kal 'amo ve'et 'arzo ve'asita lo ka'asher 'asita lesikhon melekh ha'emori 'asher yosheb bekheshbon. vayiten ihoh 'eloheinu beyadeinu gam 'et 'og melekh habashan ve'et kal 'amo vanakeihu 'ad bilti hish'ir lo sarid. vanilkod 'et kal 'arav ba'et hahiv lo hayetah qiryah 'asher lo laqakhnu mei'itam shishim 'ir kal khebel 'argob mamlekhet 'og babashan. kal 'eleh 'arim bezurot khomah gebohah delatayim uberiakh lebad mei'arei haperazi harbeh me'od. vanakharem 'otam ka'asher 'asinu lesikhon melekh kheshbon hakharem kal 'ir metim hanashim vehataf. vekhal habeheimah ushelal he'arim bazonu lanu. vaniqakh ba'et hahiv 'et ha'arez miyad shenei malkhei ha'emori 'asher be'eiber hayarden minakhal 'arnon 'ad har khermon. zidonim yiqre'u lekhermon siryon veha'emori yiqre'u lo senir. kol 'arei hamishor vekhal hagil'ad vekhal habashan 'ad salkhah ve'edre'i 'arei mamlekhet 'og babashan. ki raq 'og melekh habashan nish'ar miyeter harefa'im hineh 'arso 'eres barzel haloh hi berabat benei 'amon teisha' 'amot 'arekah ve'arba' 'amot rakhebah be'amat 'ish. ve'et ha'arez hazot yarashnu ba'et hahiv mei'aro'er 'asher 'al nakhal 'arnon vakhazi har hagil'ad ve'arav natati laru'ubeini velagadi. veyeter hagil'ad vekhal habashan mamlekhet 'og natati lakhazi sheibet hamnasheh kol khebel ha'argob lekhal habashan hahu yiqarei 'erez refa'im. ya'ir ben menasheh laqakh 'et kal khebel 'argob 'ad gebul hageshuri vehama'akhati vayiqra 'otam 'al shemo 'et habashan khavot ya'ir 'ad hayom hazeh. ulemakhir natati 'et hagil'ad. velaru'ubeini velagadi natati min hagil'ad ve'ad nakhal 'arnon tokh hanakhal ugebul ve'ad yaboq hanakhal gebul benei 'amon. veha'arabah vehayarden ugebul mikineret ve'ad yam ha'arabah yam hamelakh takhat 'ashdot hapisgah mizrakhah. va'azav 'etkhem ba'et hahiv leimor ihoh 'eloheikhem natan lakhem 'et ha'arez hazot lerishtah khaluzim ta'abru lifnei 'akheikhem benei yisra'el kal benei khayil. raq nesheikhem vetapekhem umiqneikhem yada'ti ki miqneh rab lakhem yeishebu be'areikhem 'asher natati lakhem. 'ad 'asher yaniakh ihoh la'akheikhem kakhem veyareshu gam hem 'et ha'arez 'asher ihoh 'eloheikhem noten lahem be'eiber hayarden veshabtem 'ish lirushato 'asher natati lakhem. ve'et yehoshua' ziveiti ba'et hahiv leimor 'einekha haro'ot 'et kal 'asher 'asah ihoh 'eloheikhem lishnei hamelakhim ha'eleh ken ya'aseh ihoh lekhal hamamlakhot 'asher 'atah 'ober shamah. lo tira'um ki ihoh 'eloheikhem hu hanilkham lakhem. va'etkhanan 'el ihoh ba'et hahiv leimor. 'adonai ihoh 'atah hakhilota lehar'ot 'et 'abdekha 'et gadelekha ve'et yadekha hakhazaqah 'asher mi 'el bashamayim uba'arez 'asher ya'aseh khema'asekha vekhigburotekha. 'e'berah na ve'er'eh 'et ha'arez hatobah 'asher be'eiber hayarden hahar hatob hazeh vehalebanon. vayit'aber ihoh bi lema'ankhem velo shama' 'eilai vayomer ihoh 'eilai rab lakh 'al tosef daber 'eilai 'od badabar hazeh. 'aleh rosh hapisgah vesa 'einekha yamah vezafonah veteimanah umizrakhah ure'eh be'einekha ki lo ta'abor 'et hayarden hazeh. vezav 'et yehoshua' vekhazeqeihu ve'amezeihu ki hu ya'abor lifnei ha'am hazeh vehu yankhil 'otam 'et ha'arez 'asher tir'eh. vaneisheb bagai mul bet pe'or. ve'atah yisra'el shema' 'el hakhuqim ve'el hamishpatim 'asher 'anokhi melamed 'etkhem la'asot lema'an tikhyu ubatem virishtem 'et ha'arez 'asher ihoh 'elohei 'aboteikhem noten lakhem. lo tosifu 'al hadabar 'asher 'anokhi mezaveh 'etkhem velo tigre'u mimenu lishmor 'et mizvot ihoh 'eloheikhem 'asher 'anokhi mezaveh 'etkhem. 'eineikhem haro'ot 'et 'asher 'asah ihoh beba'al pe'or ki khal ha'ish 'asher halakh 'akharei ba'al pe'or hishmido ihoh 'elohekha miqirbekha. ve'atem hadebeiqim ihoh 'eloheikhem khayim kulekhem hayom. re'eh limadti 'etkhem khuqim umishpatim ka'asher zivani ihoh 'elohai la'asot ken beqereb ha'arez 'asher 'atem ba'im shamah lerishtah. ushemartem va'asitem ki hi khakhematkhem ubinatkhem le'einei ha'amim 'asher yishme'un 'et kal hakhuqim ha'eleh ve'ameru raq 'am khakham venabon hago hagadol hazeh. ki mi go gadol 'asher lo 'elohim qerobim 'eilav ihoh 'eloheinu bekhal qare'einu 'eilav. umi go gadol 'asher lo khuqim umishpatim zadiqim kekhol hatorah hazot 'asher 'anokhi noten lifneikhem hayom. raq hishamer lekha ushemor nafshekha me'od pen tishkakh 'et hadebarim 'asher ra'u 'einekha ufen yasuru milebabekha kol yemei khayekha vehoda'tam lebanekha velibnei banekha. yom 'asher 'amadta lifnei ihoh 'elohekha bekhoreb be'emor ihoh 'eilai haqhel li 'et ha'am ve'ashmi'em 'et debarai 'asher yilmedun leyir'ah 'oti kal hayamim 'asher hem khayim 'al ha'adamah ve'et beneihem yelameidun. vatiqrebun vata'amdun takhat hahar vehahar bo'er ba'esh 'ad leb hashamayim khoshekh 'anan va'arafel. vaydaber ihoh 'aleikhem mitokh ha'esh qol debarim 'atem shome'im utemunah 'einekhem ro'im zulati qol. vayaged lakhem 'et berito 'asher zivah 'etkhem la'asot 'aseret hadebarim vayikhtebem 'al shenei lukhot 'abanim. ve'oti zivah ihoh ba'et hahiv lelamed 'etkhem khuqim umishpatim la'asotekhem 'otam ba'arez 'asher 'atem 'oberim shamah lerishtah. venishmartem me'od lenafshoteikhem ki lo re'item kal temunah beyom diber ihoh 'aleikhem bekhoreb mitokh ha'esh. pen tashkhitun va'asitem lakhem pesel temunat kal samel tabnit zakhar 'o neqeibah. tabnit kal beheimah 'asher ba'arez tabnit kal zipor kanaf 'asher ta'uf bashamayim. tabnit kal romes ba'adamah tabnit kal dagah 'asher bamayim mitakhat la'arez. ufen tisa 'einekha hashamaymah vera'ita 'et hashemesh ve'et hayareiakh ve'et hakokhabim kol zeba hashamayim venidakhta vehishtakhavita lahem va'abadtam 'asher khalaq ihoh 'elohekha 'otam lekhol ha'amim takhat kal hashamayim. ve'etkhem laqakh ihoh vayozi 'etkhem mikur habarzel mimizrayim lihyot lo le'am nakhalah kayom hazeh. ihoh hit'anef bi 'al dibreikhem vayishaba' lebilti 'aberi 'et hayarden ulebilti bo 'el ha'arez hatobah 'asher ihoh 'elohekha noten lekha nakhalah. ki 'anokhi met ba'arez hazot 'eineni 'ober 'et hayarden ve'atem 'oberim virishtem 'et ha'arez hatobah hazot. hishameru lakhem pen tishkekhu 'et berit ihoh 'eloheikhem 'asher karat 'imakhem va'asitem lakhem pesel temunat kol 'asher zivekha ihoh 'elohekha. ki ihoh 'elohekha 'esh 'okhelah hu 'el qana. ki tolid banim ubenei banim venoshantem ba'arez vehishkhatem va'asitem pesel temunat kol va'asitem hara' be'einei ihoh 'elohekha lehakh'iso. ha'idoti bakhem hayom 'et hashamayim ve'et ha'arez ki 'abod tobeidun maher mei'al ha'arez 'asher 'atem 'oberim 'et hayarden shamah lerishtah lo ta'arikhun yamim 'aleha ki hishamed tishameidun. veheifiz ihoh 'etkhem ba'amim venish'artem metei mispar bagoyim 'asher yenaheg ihoh 'etkhem shamah. va'abadtem sham 'elohim ma'aseh yedei 'adam 'ez va'eben 'asher lo yir'un velo yishme'un velo yokhelun velo yerikhun. ubiqashtem misham 'et ihoh 'elohekha umazata ki tidreshenu bekhal lebabekha ubekhal nafshekha. bazar lekha umeza'ukha kol hadebarim ha'eleh be'akharit hayamim veshabta 'ad ihoh 'elohekha veshama'ta beqolo. ki 'el rakhum ihoh 'elohekha lo yarpekha velo yashkhitekha velo yishkakh 'et berit 'abotekha 'asher nishba' lahem. ki she'al na leyamim rishonim 'asher hayu lefanekha lemin hayom 'asher bara 'elohim 'adam 'al ha'arez ulemiqzeh hashamayim ve'ad qezeh hashamayim hanihyah kadabar hagadol hazeh 'o hanishma' kamohu. hashama' 'am qol 'elohim medaber mitokh ha'esh ka'asher shama'ta 'atah vayekhi. 'o hanisah 'elohim labo laqakhat lo go miqereb go bemasot be'otot ubemoftim ubemilkhamah ubeyad khazaqah ubizroa' netuyah ubemora'im gedolim kekhol 'asher 'asah lakhem ihoh 'eloheikhem bemizrayim le'einekha. 'atah hare'eita lada'at ki ihoh hu ha'elohim 'en 'od milbado. min hashamayim hishmi'akha 'et qolo leyasereka ve'al ha'arez her'akha 'et 'isho hagedolah udebarav shama'ta mitokh ha'esh. vetakhat ki 'ahab 'et 'abotekha vayibkhar bezar'o 'akharav vayozi'akha befanav bekhokho hagadol mimizrayim. lehorish goyim gedolim va'azumim mimekha mipanekha lahabi'akha latet lekha 'et 'arzam nakhalah kayom hazeh. veyada'ta hayom vahasheibota 'el lebabekha ki ihoh hu ha'elohim bashamayim mima'al ve'al ha'arez mitakhat 'en 'od. veshamarta 'et khuqav ve'et mizvotav 'asher 'anokhi mezavekha hayom 'asher yitab lekha ulebanekha 'akharekha ulema'an ta'arikh yamim 'al ha'adamah 'asher ihoh 'elohekha noten lekha kal hayamim. 'az yabdil mosheh shalosh 'arim be'eiber hayarden mizrekhah shamesh. lanus shamah rozeiakh 'asher yirzakh 'et rei'eihu bibli da'at vehu lo sonei lo mitemol shilshom venas 'el 'akhat min he'arim ha'el vakhai. 'et bezer bamidbar be'erez hamishor laru'ubeini ve'et ramot bagil'ad lagadi ve'et golan babashan lamnashi. vezot hatorah 'asher sam mosheh lifnei benei yisra'el. 'eleh ha'eidot vehakhuqim vehamishpatim 'asher diber mosheh 'el benei yisra'el bezeitam mimizrayim. be'eiber hayarden bagai mul bet pe'or be'erez sikhon melekh ha'emori 'asher yosheb bekheshbon 'asher hikah mosheh ubenei yisra'el bezeitam mimizrayim. vayireshu 'et 'arzo ve'et 'erez 'og melekh habashan shenei malkhei ha'emori 'asher be'eiber hayarden mizrakh shamesh. mei'aro'er 'asher 'al sefat nakhal 'arnon ve'ad har si'on hu khermon. vekhal ha'arabah 'eiber hayarden mizrakhah ve'ad yam ha'arabah takhat 'ashdot hapisgah. vayiqra mosheh 'el kal yisra'el vayomer 'aleihem shema' yisra'el 'et hakhuqim ve'et hamishpatim 'asher 'anokhi dober be'azeneikhem hayom ulemadtem 'otam ushemartem la'asotam. ihoh 'eloheinu karat 'imanu berit bekhoreb. lo 'et 'aboteinu karat ihoh 'et haberit hazot ki 'itanu 'anakhnu 'eleh foh hayom kulanu khayim. panim befanim diber ihoh 'imakhem bahar mitokh ha'esh. 'anokhi 'omed ben ihoh ubeineikhem ba'et hahiv lehagid lakhem 'et debar ihoh ki yereitem mipenei ha'esh velo 'alitem bahar leimor. 'anokhi ihoh 'elohekha 'asher hozeitikha mei'erez mizrayim mibet 'abadim. lo yihyeh lekha 'elohim 'akheirim 'al panaya. lo ta'aseh lekha fesel kal temunah 'asher bashamayim mima'al va'asher ba'arez mitakhat va'asher bamayim mitakhat la'arez. lo tishtakhaveh lahem velo ta'abedem ki 'anokhi ihoh 'elohekha 'el qana poqed 'avon 'abot 'al banim ve'al shileishim ve'al ribei'im lesone'ai. ve'oseh khesed la'alafim le'ohabai uleshomerei mizvoto mizvotai. lo tisa 'et shem ihoh 'elohekha lashav ki lo yenaqeh ihoh 'et 'asher yisa 'et shemo lashav. shamor 'et yom hashabat leqadesho ka'asher zivekha ihoh 'elohekha sheishet yamim ta'abod ve'asita kla melakhtekha. veyom hashebi'i shabat ihoh 'elohekha lo ta'aseh khal melakhah 'atah ubinkha ubitekha ve'abdekha va'amatekha veshorkha vakhamorekha vekhal behemtekha vegeirekha 'asher bish'arekha lema'an yanuakh 'abdekha va'amatekha kamokha. vezakharta ki 'ebed hayita be'erez mizrayim vayozi'akha ihoh 'elohekha misham beyad khazaqah ubizroa' netuyah 'al ken zivekha ihoh 'elohekha la'asot 'et yom hashabat. kabed 'et 'abikha ve'et 'imekha ka'asher zivekha ihoh 'elohekha lema'an ya'arikhun yamekha ulema'an yitab lakh 'al ha'adamah 'asher ihoh 'elohekha noten lakh. lo trezakh. velo tne'af. velo tgenob. velo ta'aneh berei'akha 'ed shav. velo takhmod 'eishet rei'ekha velo tit'aveh bet rei'ekha sadeihu ve'abdo va'amato shoro vakhamoro vekhol 'asher lerei'ekha. 'et hadebarim ha'eleh diber ihoh 'el kal qehalkhem bahar mitokh ha'esh he'anan veha'arafel qol gadol velo yasaf vayikhtebem 'al shenei lukhot 'abanim vayitenem 'eilai. vayhi keshame'akhem 'et haqol mitokh hakhoshekh vehahar bo'er ba'esh vatiqrebun 'eilai kal rashei shibteikhem veziqneikhem. vatomeru hen her'anu ihoh 'eloheinu 'et kebodo ve'et gadelo ve'et qolo shama'nu mitokh ha'esh hayom hazeh ra'inu ki yedaber 'elohim 'et ha'adam vakhai. ve'atah lamah namut ki tokheleinu ha'esh hagedolah hazot 'im yosefim 'anakhnu lishmoa' 'et qol ihoh 'eloheinu 'od vamatenu. ki mi khal basar 'asher shama' qol 'elohim khayim medaber mitokh ha'esh kamonu vayekhi. qerab 'atah ushama' 'et kal 'asher yomar ihoh 'eloheinu ve'at tedaber 'eileinu 'et kal 'asher yedaber ihoh 'eloheinu 'eilekha veshama'nu ve'asinu. vayishma' ihoh 'et qol dibreikhem bedaberkhem 'eilai vayomer ihoh 'eilai ma'ti 'et qol dibrei ha'am hazeh 'asher diberu 'eilekha heitibu kal 'asher dibeiru. mi yiten vehayah lebabam zeh lahem leyir'ah 'oti velishmor 'et kal mizvotai kal hayamim lema'an yitab lahem velibneihem le'olam. lekh 'emor lahem shubu lakhem le'aholeikhem. ve'atah poh 'amod 'imadi va'adaberah 'eilekha 'et kal hamizvah vehakhuqim vehamishpatim 'asher telamedem ve'asu ba'arez 'asher 'anokhi noten lahem lerishtah. ushemartem la'asot ka'asher zivah ihoh 'eloheikhem 'etkhem lo tasuru yamin usemol. bekhal haderekh 'asher zivah ihoh 'eloheikhem 'etkhem teileikhu lema'an tikhyun vetob lakhem veha'arakhtem yamim ba'arez 'asher tirashun. vezot hamizvah hakhuqim vehamishpatim 'asher zivah ihoh 'eloheikhem lelamed 'etkhem la'asot ba'arez 'asher 'atem 'oberim shamah lerishtah. lema'an tira 'et ihoh 'elohekha lishmor 'et kal khuqotav umizvotav 'asher 'anokhi mezavekha 'atah ubinkha uben binkha kol yemei khayekha ulema'an ya'arikhun yamekha. veshama'ta yisra'el veshamarta la'asot 'asher yitab lekha va'asher tirbun me'od ka'asher diber ihoh 'elohei 'abotekha lakh 'erez zabat khalab udebash. shema' yisra'el ihoh 'eloheinu ihoh 'ekhad ve'ahabta 'et ihoh 'elohekha bekhal lebabekha ubekhal nafshekha ubekhal me'odekha. vehayu hadebarim ha'eleh 'asher 'anokhi mezavekha hayom 'al lebabekha. veshinantam lebanekha vedibarta bam beshibtekha bebeitekha ubelekhtekha baderekh ubeshakhebekha ubequmekha. uqeshartam le'ot 'al yadekha vehayu letotafot ben 'einekha. ukhetabtam 'al mezuzot beitekha ubish'arekha. vehayah ki yebi'akha ihoh 'elohekha 'el ha'arez 'asher nishba' la'abotekha le'abraham leyizkhaq uleya'aqob latet lakh 'arim gedolot vetobot 'asher lo banita. ubatim melei'im kal tub 'asher lo mileita uborot khazubim 'asher lo khazabta keramim vezeitim 'asher lo nata'eta ve'akhalta vesaba'eta. hishamer lekha pen tishkakh 'et ihoh 'asher hozi'akha mei'erez mizrayim mibet 'abadim. 'et ihoh 'elohekha tira ve'oto ta'abod ubishmo tishabeia'. lo teilekhun 'akharei 'elohim 'akheirim mei'elohei ha'amim 'asher sebiboteikhem. ki 'el qana ihoh 'elohekha beqirbekha pen yekhereh 'af ihoh 'elohekha bakh vehishmidekha mei'al penei ha'adamah. lo tenasu 'et ihoh 'eloheikhem ka'asher nisitem bamasah. shamor tishmerun 'et mizvot ihoh 'eloheikhem ve'eidotav vekhuqav 'asher zivakh. ve'asita hayashar vehatob be'einei ihoh lema'an yitab lakh ubata veyarashta 'et ha'arez hatobah 'asher nishba' ihoh la'abotekha. lahadof 'et kal 'oyebekha mipanekha ka'asher diber ihoh. ki yish'alekha binkha makhar leimor mah ha'eidot vehakhuqim vehamishpatim 'asher zivah ihoh 'eloheinu 'etkhem. ve'amarta lebinkha 'abadim hayinu lefar'oh bemizrayim vayozi'einu ihoh mimizrayim beyad khazaqah. vayiten ihoh 'otot umofetim gedolim vera'im bemizrayim befar'oh ubekhal beito le'eineinu. ve'otanu hozi misham lema'an habi 'otanu latet lanu 'et ha'arez 'asher nishba' la'aboteinu. vayzaveinu ihoh la'asot 'et kal hakhuqim ha'eleh leyir'ah 'et ihoh 'eloheinu letob lanu kal hayamim lekhayoteinu kehayom hazeh. uzedaqah tihyeh lanu ki nishmor la'asot 'et kal hamizvah hazot lifnei ihoh 'eloheinu ka'asher zivanu. ki yebi'akha ihoh 'elohekha 'el ha'arez 'asher 'atah ba shamah lerishtah venashal goyim rabim mipanekha hakhiti vehagirgashi veha'emori vehakena'ani vehaperizi vehakhivi vehaybusi shib'ah goyim rabim va'azumim mimeka. unetanam ihoh 'elohekha lefanekha vehikitam hakharem takharim 'otam lo tikhrot lahem berit velo tekhanem. velo titkhaten bam bitekha lo titen libno ubito lo tiqakh libnekha. ki yasir 'et binkha mei'akharai ve'abedu 'elohim 'akheirim vekharah 'af ihoh bakhem vehishmidekha maher. ki 'im koh ta'asu lahem mizbekhoteihem titozu umazeibotam teshabeiru va'asheireihem tegadei'un ufesileihem tisrefun ba'esh. ki 'am qadosh 'atah ihoh 'elohekha bekha bakhar ihoh 'elohekha lihyot lo le'am segulah mikol ha'amim 'asher 'al penei ha'adamah. lo meirubekhem mikal ha'amim khashaq ihoh bakhem vayibkhar bakhem ki 'atem ham'at mikal ha'amim. ki mei'ahabat ihoh 'etkhem umishamero 'et hashebu'ah 'asher nishba' la'aboteikhem hozi ihoh 'etkhem beyad khazaqah vayifdekha mibet 'abadim miyad par'oh melekh mizrayim. veyada'ta ki ihoh 'elohekha hu ha'elohim ha'el hane'eman shomer haberit vehakhesed le'ohabav uleshomerei mizvoto mizvotav le'elef dor. umeshalem lesone'av 'el panav leha'abido lo ye'akher lesone'o 'el panav yeshalem lo. veshamarta 'et hamizvah ve'et hakhuqim ve'et hamishpatim 'asher 'anokhi mezavekha hayom la'asotam. vehayah 'eiqeb tishme'un 'et hamishpatim ha'eleh ushemartem va'asitem 'otam veshamar ihoh 'elohekha lekha 'et haberit ve'et hakhesed 'asher nishba' la'abotekha. va'aheibekha ubeirakhkha vehirbekha ubeirakh peri bitnekha uferi 'admatekha deganekha vetiroshekha veyizharekha shegar 'alafekha ve'ashterot zonekha 'al ha'adamah 'asher nishba' la'abotekha latet lakh. barukh tihyeh mikal ha'amim lo yihyeh bekha 'aqar va'aqarah ubibhemtekha. veheisir ihoh mimekha kal kholi vekhal madvei mizrayim hara'im 'asher yada'ta lo yesimam bakh unetanam bekhal sone'ekha. ve'akhalta 'et kal ha'amim 'asher ihoh 'elohekha noten lakh lo takhos 'einekha 'aleihem velo ta'abod 'et 'eloheihem ki moqesh hu lakh. ki tomar bilbabekha rabim hagoyim ha'eleh mimeni 'eikhah 'ukhal lehorisham. lo tira meihem zakhor tizkor 'et 'asher 'asah ihoh 'elohekha lefar'oh ulekhal mizrayim. hamasot hagedolot 'asher ra'u 'einekha veha'otot vehamofetim vehayad hakhazaqah vehazeroa' hanetuyah 'asher hozi'akha ihoh 'elohekha ken ya'aseh ihoh 'elohekha lekhal ha'amim 'asher 'atah yarei mipeneihem. vegam 'et hazir'ah yeshalakh ihoh 'elohekha bam 'ad 'abod hanish'arim vehanistarim mipanekha. lo ta'aroz mipeneihem ki ihoh 'elohekha beqirbekha 'el gadol venora. venashal ihoh 'elohekha 'et hagoyim ha'el mipanekha me'at me'at lo tukhal kalotam maher pen tirbeh 'alekha khayat hasadeh. unetanam ihoh 'elohekha lefanekha vehamam mehumah gedolah 'ad hishamedam. venatan malkheihem beyadekha veha'abadta 'et shemam mitakhat hashamayim lo yityazeb 'ish befanekha 'ad hishmidkha 'otam. pesilei 'eloheihem tisrefun ba'esh lo takhmod kesef vezahab 'aleihem velaqakhta lakh pen tivaqesh bo ki to'abat ihoh 'elohekha hu. velo tabi to'eibah 'el beitekha vehayita kheirem kamohu shaqez teshaqezenu veta'eb teta'abenu ki kheirem hu. kal hamizvah 'asher 'anokhi mezavekha hayom tishmerun la'asot lema'an tikhyun urebitem ubatem virishtem 'et ha'arez 'asher nishba' ihoh la'aboteikhem. vezakharta 'et kal haderekh 'asher holikhakha ihoh 'elohekha zeh 'arba'im shanah bamidbar lema'an 'anotekha lenasotekha lada'at 'et 'asher bilbabekha hatishmor mizvoto mizvotav 'im lo. vai'anekha vayar'ibekha vaya'akhilkha 'et haman 'asher lo yada'ta velo yade'un 'abotekha lema'an hodi'akha ki lo 'al halekhem lebado yikhyeh ha'adam ki 'al kal moza fi ihoh yikhyeh ha'adam. simlatekha lo baletah mei'alekha veraglekha lo bazeiqah zeh 'arba'im shanah. veyada'ta 'im lebabekha ki ka'asher yeyaser 'ish 'et beno ihoh 'elohekha meyasereka. veshamarta 'et mizvot ihoh 'elohekha lalekhet bidrakhav uleyir'ah 'oto. ki ihoh 'elohekha mebi'akha 'el 'erez tobah 'erez nakhalei mayim 'ayanot utehomot yoze'im babiq'ah ubahar. 'erez khitah use'orah vegefen ute'einah verimon 'erez zet shemen udebash. 'erez 'asher lo bemiskeinut tokhal bah lekhem lo tekhsar kol bah 'erez 'asher 'abaneha barzel umeiharareha takhzob nekhoshet. ve'akhalta vesaba'eta ubeirakhta 'et ihoh 'elohekha 'al ha'arez hatobah 'asher natan lakh. hishamer lekha pen tishkakh 'et ihoh 'elohekha lebilti shemor mizvotav umishpatav vekhuqotav 'asher 'anokhi mezavekha hayom. pen tokhal vesaba'eta ubatim tobim tibneh veyashabeta. ubeqarekha vezonekha yirbeyun vekhesef vezahab yirbeh lakh vekhol 'asher lekha yirbeh. veram lebabekha veshakhakhta 'et ihoh 'elohekha hamozi'akha mei'erez mizrayim mibet 'abadim. hamolikhakha bamidbar hagadol vehanora nakhash saraf ve'aqrab vezima'on 'asher 'en mayim hamozi lekha mayim mizur hakhalamish. hama'akhilkha man bamidbar 'asher lo yade'un 'abotekha lema'an 'anotekha ulema'an nasotekha leheitibkha be'akharitekha. ve'amarta bilbabekha kokhi ve'ozem yadi 'asah li 'et hakhayil hazeh. vezakharta 'et ihoh 'elohekha ki hu hanoten lekha koakh la'asot khayil lema'an haqim 'et berito 'asher nishba' la'abotekha kayom hazeh. vehayah 'im shakhoakh tishkakh 'et ihoh 'elohekha vehalakhta 'akharei 'elohim 'akheirim va'abadtam vehishtakhavita lahem ha'idoti bakhem hayom ki 'abod tobeidun. kagoyim 'asher ihoh ma'abid mipeneikhem ken tobeidun 'eiqeb lo tishme'un beqol ihoh 'eloheikhem. shema' yisra'el 'atah 'ober hayom 'et hayarden labo lareshet goyim gedolim va'azumim mimeka 'arim gedolot ubezurot bashamayim. 'am gadol varam benei 'anaqim 'asher 'atah yada'ta ve'atah shama'ta mi yityazeb lifnei benei 'anaq. veyada'ta hayom ki ihoh 'elohekha hu ha'ober lefanekha 'esh 'okhelah hu yashmidem vehu yakhni'em lefanekha vehorashtam veha'abadtam maher ka'asher diber ihoh lakh. 'al tomar bilbabekha bahadof ihoh 'elohekha 'otam milefanekha leimor bezidqati hebi'ani ihoh lareshet 'et ha'arez hazot uberish'at hagoyim ha'eleh ihoh morisham mipanekha. lo bezidqatekha ubeyosher lebabekha 'atah ba lareshet 'et 'arzam ki berish'at hagoyim ha'eleh ihoh 'elohekha morisham mipanekha ulema'an haqim 'et hadabar 'asher nishba' ihoh la'abotekha le'abraham leyizkhaq uleya'aqob. veyada'ta ki lo bezidqatekha ihoh 'elohekha noten lekha 'et ha'arez hatobah hazot lerishtah ki 'am qesheh 'oref 'atah. zekhor 'al tishkakh 'et 'asher hiqzafta 'et ihoh 'elohekha bamidbar lemin hayom 'asher yazata mei'erez mizrayim 'ad bo'akhem 'ad hamaqom hazeh mamrim heyitem 'im ihoh. ubekhoreb hiqzaftem 'et ihoh vayit'anaf ihoh bakhem lehashmid 'etkhem. ba'aloti haharah laqakhat lukhot ha'abanim lukhot haberit 'asher karat ihoh 'imakhem va'eisheb bahar 'arba'im yom ve'arba'im laylah lekhem lo 'akhalti umayim lo shatiti. vayiten ihoh 'eilai 'et shenei lukhot ha'abanim ketubim be'ezba' 'elohim va'aleihem kekhal hadebarim 'asher diber ihoh 'imakhem bahar mitokh ha'esh beyom haqahal. vayhi miqez 'arba'im yom ve'arba'im layelah natan ihoh 'eilai 'et shenei lukhot ha'abanim lukhot haberit. vayomer ihoh 'eilai qum red maher mizeh ki shikhet 'amekha 'asher hozeita mimizrayim saru maher min haderekh 'asher zivitim 'asu lahem maseikhah. vayomer ihoh 'eilai leimor ra'iti 'et ha'am hazeh vehineh 'am qesheh 'oref hu. heref mimeni ve'ashmidem ve'emkheh 'et shemam mitakhat hashamayim ve'e'eseh 'otkha lego 'azum varab mimenu. va'eifen va'eired min hahar vehahar bo'er ba'esh ushenei lukhot haberit 'al shetei yadai. va'eire vehineh khatatem ihoh 'eloheikhem 'asitem lakhem 'eigel maseikhah sartem maher min haderekh 'asher zivah ihoh 'etkhem. va'etpos bishnei halukhot va'ashlikhem mei'al shetei yadai va'ashaberem le'eineikhem. va'etnapal lifnei ihoh karishonah 'arba'im yom ve'arba'im laylah lekhem lo 'akhalti umayim lo shatiti 'al kal khatatkhem 'asher khatatem la'asot hara' be'einei ihoh lehakh'iso. ki yagoreti mipenei ha'af vehakheimah 'asher qazaf ihoh 'aleikhem lehashmid 'etkhem vayishma' ihoh 'eilai gam bapa'am hahiv. ube'aharon hit'anaf ihoh me'od lehashmido va'etpalel gam be'ad 'aharon ba'et hahiv. ve'et khatatkhem 'asher 'asitem 'et ha'eigel laqakhti va'esrof 'oto ba'esh va'ekot 'oto takhon heiteb 'ad 'asher daq le'afar va'ashlikh 'et 'afaro 'el hanakhal hayored min hahar. ubetab'eirah ubemasah ubeqibrot hata'avah maqzifim heyitem 'et ihoh. ubishloakh ihoh 'etkhem miqadesh barneia' leimor 'alu ureshu 'et ha'arez 'asher natati lakhem vatamru 'et pi ihoh 'eloheikhem velo he'emantem lo velo shema'tem beqolo. mamrim heyitem 'im ihoh miyom da'ti 'etkhem. va'etnapal lifnei ihoh 'et 'arba'im hayom ve'et 'arba'im halaylah 'asher hitnapaleti ki 'amar ihoh lehashmid 'etkhem. va'etpalel 'el ihoh va'omar 'adonai ihoh 'al tashkhet 'amekha venakhalatekha 'asher padita begadelekha 'asher hozeita mimizrayim beyad khazaqah. zekhor la'abadekha le'abraham leyizkhaq uleya'aqob 'al teifen 'el qeshi ha'am hazeh ve'el rish'o ve'el khatato. pen yomeru ha'arez 'asher hozeitanu misham mibeli yekholet ihoh lahabi'am 'el ha'arez 'asher diber lahem umisin'ato 'otam hozi'am lahamitam bamidbar. vehem 'amekha venakhalatekha 'asher hozeita bekhokhakha hagadol ubizro'akha hanetuyah. ba'et hahiv 'amar ihoh 'eilai pesal lekha shenei lukhot 'abanim karishonim va'aleh 'eilai haharah ve'asita lekha 'aron 'ez. ve'ekhtob 'al halukhot 'et hadebarim 'asher hayu 'al halukhot harishonim 'asher shibarta vesamtam ba'aron. va'a'as 'aron 'azei shitim va'efsol shenei lukhot 'abanim karishonim va'a'al haharah ushenei halukhot beyadi. vayikhtob 'al halukhot kamikhtab harishon 'et 'aseret hadebarim 'asher diber ihoh 'aleikhem bahar mitokh ha'esh beyom haqahal vayitenem ihoh 'eilai. va'eifen va'eired min hahar va'asim 'et halukhot ba'aron 'asher 'asiti vayihyu sham ka'asher zivani ihoh. ubenei yisra'el nase'u mibe'eirot benei ya'aqan moseirah sham met 'aharon vayiqaber sham vaykhahen 'el'azar beno takhtav. misham nase'u hagudgodah umin hagudgodah yatebatah 'erez nakhalei mayim. ba'et hahiv hibdil ihoh 'et sheibet haleivi laset 'et 'aron berit ihoh la'amod lifnei ihoh leshareto ulebarekh bishmo 'ad hayom hazeh. 'al ken lo hayah leleivi kheileq venakhalah 'im 'ekhav ihoh hu nakhalato ka'asher diber ihoh 'elohekha lo. ve'anokhi 'amadti bahar kayamim harishonim 'arba'im yom ve'arba'im layelah vayishma' ihoh 'eilai gam bapa'am hahiv lo 'abah ihoh hashkhitekha. vayomer ihoh 'eilai qum lekh lemasa' lifnei ha'am veyabo'u veyirshu 'et ha'arez 'asher nishba'ti la'abotam latet lahem. ve'atah yisra'el mah ihoh 'elohekha sho'el mei'imakh ki 'im leyir'ah 'et ihoh 'elohekha lalekhet bekhal derakhav ule'ahabah 'oto vela'abod 'et ihoh 'elohekha bekhal lebabekha ubekhal nafshekha. lishmor 'et mizvot ihoh ve'et khuqotav 'asher 'anokhi mezavekha hayom letob lakh. hen ihoh 'elohekha hashamayim ushemei hashamayim ha'arez vekhal 'asher bah. raq ba'abotekha khashaq ihoh le'ahabah 'otam vayibkhar bezar'am 'akhareihem bakhem mikal ha'amim kayom hazeh. umaltem 'et 'arelat lebabkhem ve'arepekhem lo taqshu 'od. ki ihoh 'eloheikhem hu 'elohei ha'elohim va'adonei ha'adonim ha'el hagadol hagibor vehanora 'asher lo yisa fanim velo yiqakh shokhad. 'oseh mishpat yatom ve'almanah ve'oheb ger latet lo lekhem vesimlah. va'ahabtem 'et hager ki geirim heyitem be'erez mizrayim. 'et ihoh 'elohekha tira 'oto ta'abod ubo tidbaq ubishmo tishabeia'. hu tehilatekha vehu 'elohekha 'asher 'asah 'itekha 'et hagedolot ve'et hanora'ot ha'eleh 'asher ra'u 'einekha. beshib'im nefesh yaredu 'abotekha mizrayemah ve'atah samekha ihoh 'elohekha kekhokhbei hashamayim larob. ve'ahabta 'et ihoh 'elohekha veshamarta mishmarto vekhuqotav umishpatav umizvotav kal hayamim. vida'tem hayom ki lo 'et beneikhem 'asher lo yade'u va'asher lo ra'u 'et musar ihoh 'eloheikhem 'et gadelo 'et yado hakhazaqah uzero'o hanetuyah. ve'et 'ototav ve'et ma'asav 'asher 'asah betokh mizrayim lefar'oh melekh mizrayim ulekhal 'arzo. va'asher 'asah lekhel mizrayim lesusav ulerikhbo 'asher heizif 'et mei yam suf 'al peneihem beradefam 'akhareikhem vai'abedem ihoh 'ad hayom hazeh. va'asher 'asah lakhem bamidbar 'ad bo'akhem 'ad hamaqom hazeh. va'asher 'asah ledatan vela'abiram benei 'eli'ab ben re'uben 'asher pazetah ha'arez 'et piha vatibla'em ve'et bateihem ve'et 'aholeihem ve'et kal hayqum 'asher beragleihem beqereb kal yisra'el. ki 'eineikhem haro'ot 'et kal ma'aseh ihoh hagadol 'asher 'asah. ushemartem 'et kal hamizvah 'asher 'anokhi mezavekha hayom lema'an tekhezqu ubatem virishtem 'et ha'arez 'asher 'atem 'oberim shamah lerishtah. ulema'an ta'arikhu yamim 'al ha'adamah 'asher nishba' ihoh la'aboteikhem latet lahem ulezar'am 'erez zabat khalab udebash. ki ha'arez 'asher 'atah ba shamah lerishtah lo khe'erez mizrayim hi 'asher yezatem misham 'asher tizra' 'et zar'akha vehishqita beraglekha kegan hayaraq. veha'arez 'asher 'atem 'oberim shamah lerishtah 'erez harim ubeqa'ot limtar hashamayim tishteh mayim. 'erez 'asher ihoh 'elohekha doresh 'otah tamid 'einei ihoh 'elohekha bah meireishit hashanah ve'ad 'akharit shanah. vehayah 'im shamoa' tishme'u 'el mizvotai 'asher 'anokhi mezaveh 'etkhem hayom le'ahabah 'et ihoh 'eloheikhem ule'abedo bekhal lebabkhem ubekhal nafshekhem. venatati metar 'arzekhem be'ito yoreh umalqosh ve'asafta deganekha vetiroshekha veyizharekha. venatati 'eiseb besadekha libhemtekha ve'akhalta vesaba'eta. hishameru lakhem pen yifteh lebabkhem vesartem va'abadtem 'elohim 'akheirim vehishtakhavitem lahem. vekharah 'af ihoh bakhem ve'azar 'et hashamayim velo yihyeh matar veha'adamah lo titen 'et yebulah va'abadtem meheirah mei'al ha'arez hatobah 'asher ihoh noten lakhem. vesamtem 'et debarai 'eleh 'al lebabkhem ve'al nafshekhem uqeshartem 'otam le'ot 'al yedkhem vehayu letotafot ben 'eineikhem. velimadtem 'otam 'et beneikhem ledaber bam beshibtekha bebeitekha ubelekhtekha baderekh ubeshakhebekha ubequmekha. ukhetabtam 'al mezuzot beitekha ubish'arekha. lema'an yirbu yemeikhem vimei beneikhem 'al ha'adamah 'asher nishba' ihoh la'aboteikhem latet lahem kimei hashamayim 'al ha'arez. ki 'im shamor tishmerun 'et kal hamizvah hazot 'asher 'anokhi mezaveh 'etkhem la'asotah le'ahabah 'et ihoh 'eloheikhem lalekhet bekhal derakhav uledabeqah bo. vehorish ihoh 'et kal hagoyim ha'eleh milifneikhem virishtem goyim gedolim va'azumim mikem. kal hamaqom 'asher tidrokh kaf raglekhem bo lakhem yihyeh min hamidbar vehalebanon min hanahar nehar perat ve'ad hayam ha'akharon yihyeh gebulkhem. lo yityazeb 'ish bifneikhem pakhdekhem umora'akhem yiten ihoh 'eloheikhem 'al penei khal ha'arez 'asher tidrekhu bah ka'asher diber lakhem. re'eh 'anokhi noten lifneikhem hayom berakhah uqelalah. 'et haberakhah 'asher tishme'u 'el mizvot ihoh 'eloheikhem 'asher 'anokhi mezaveh 'etkhem hayom. vehaqelalah 'im lo tishme'u 'el mizvot ihoh 'eloheikhem vesartem min haderekh 'asher 'anokhi mezaveh 'etkhem hayom lalekhet 'akharei 'elohim 'akheirim 'asher lo yeda'tem. vehayah ki yebi'akha ihoh 'elohekha 'el ha'arez 'asher 'atah ba shamah lerishtah venatatah 'et haberakhah 'al har gerizim ve'et haqelalah 'al har 'eibal. halo hemah be'eiber hayarden 'akharei derekh mebo hashemesh be'erez hakena'ani hayosheb ba'arabah mul hagilgal 'eizel 'eilonei moreh. ki 'atem 'oberim 'et hayarden labo lareshet 'et ha'arez 'asher ihoh 'eloheikhem noten lakhem virishtem 'otah vishabtem bah. ushemartem la'asot 'et kal hakhuqim ve'et hamishpatim 'asher 'anokhi noten lifneikhem hayom. 'eleh hakhuqim vehamishpatim 'asher tishmerun la'asot ba'arez 'asher natan ihoh 'elohei 'abotekha lekha lerishtah kal hayamim 'asher 'atem khayim 'al ha'adamah. 'abed te'abedun 'et kal hameqomot 'asher 'abedu sham hagoyim 'asher 'atem yoreshim 'otam 'et 'eloheihem 'al heharim haramim ve'al hageba'ot vetakhat kal 'ez ra'anan venitaztem 'et mizbkhotam veshibartem 'et mazeibotam va'asheireihem tisrefun ba'esh ufesilei 'eloheihem tegadei'un ve'ibadtem 'et shemam min hamaqom hahu. lo ta'asun ken ihoh 'eloheikhem. ki 'im 'el hamaqom 'asher yibkhar ihoh 'eloheikhem mikal shibteikhem lasum 'et shemo sham leshikhno tidreshu ubata shamah. vahabeitem shamah 'oloteikhem vezibkheikhem ve'et ma'seroteikhem ve'et terumat yedkhem venidreikhem venidboteikhem ubekhorot beqarkhem vezonekhem. va'akhaltem sham lifnei ihoh 'eloheikhem usemakhtem bekhol mishlakh yedkhem 'atem ubateikhem 'asher beirakhkha ihoh 'elohekha. lo ta'asun kekhol 'asher 'anakhnu 'osim poh hayom 'ish kal hayashar be'einav. ki lo batem 'ad 'atah 'el hamenukhah ve'el hanakhalah 'asher ihoh 'elohekha noten lakh. va'abartem 'et hayarden vishabtem ba'arez 'asher ihoh 'eloheikhem mankhil 'etkhem veheiniakh lakhem mikal 'oyebeikhem misabib vishabtem betakh. vehayah hamaqom 'asher yibkhar ihoh 'eloheikhem bo leshaken shemo sham shamah tabi'u 'et kal 'asher 'anokhi mezaveh 'etkhem 'oloteikhem vezibkheikhem ma'seroteikhem uterumat yedkhem vekhol mibkhar nidreikhem 'asher tideru ihoh. usemakhtem lifnei ihoh 'eloheikhem 'atem ubeneikhem ubenoteikhem ve'abdeikhem ve'amhoteikhem vehaleivi 'asher besha'areikhem ki 'en lo kheileq venakhalah 'itekhem. hishamer lekha pen ta'aleh 'olotekha bekhal maqom 'asher tir'eh. ki 'im bamaqom 'asher yibkhar ihoh be'akhad shebatekha sham ta'aleh 'olotekha vesham ta'aseh kol 'asher 'anokhi mezaveka. raq bekhal 'avat nafshekha tizbakh ve'akhalta basar kebirkat ihoh 'elohekha 'asher natan lekha bekhal she'arekha hatamei vehatahor yokhelenu kazebi vekha'ayal. raq hadam lo tokheilu 'al ha'arez tishpekhenu kamayim. lo tukhal le'ekhol bish'arekha ma'sar deganekha vetiroshekha veyizharekha ubekhorot beqarekha vezonekha vekhal nedarekha 'asher tidor venidbotekha uterumat yadekha. ki 'im lifnei ihoh 'elohekha tokhelenu bamaqom 'asher yibkhar ihoh 'elohekha bo 'atah ubinkha ubitekha ve'abdekha va'amatekha vehaleivi 'asher bish'arekha vesamakhta lifnei ihoh 'elohekha bekhol mishlakh yadekha. hishamer lekha pen ta'azob 'et haleivi kal yamekha 'al 'admatekha. ki yarkhib ihoh 'elohekha 'et gebulekha ka'asher diber lakh ve'amarta 'okhelah basar ki te'aveh nafshekha le'ekhol basar bekhal 'avat nafshekha tokhal basar. ki yirkhaq mimekha hamaqom 'asher yibkhar ihoh 'elohekha lasum shemo sham vezabakhta mibeqarekha umizonekha 'asher natan ihoh lekha ka'asher zivitikha ve'akhalta bish'arekha bekhol 'avat nafshekha. 'akh ka'asher yei'akhel 'et hazebi ve'et ha'ayal ken tokhelenu hatamei vehatahor yakhdav yokhelenu. raq khazaq lebilti 'akhol hadam ki hadam hu hanafesh velo tokhal hanefesh 'im habasar. lo tokhelenu 'al ha'arez tishpekhenu kamayim. lo tokhelenu lema'an yitab lekha ulebanekha 'akharekha ki ta'aseh hayashar be'einei ihoh. raq qadashekha 'asher yihyu lekha unedarekha tisa ubata 'el hamaqom 'asher yibkhar ihoh. ve'asita 'olotekha habasar vehadam 'al mizbakh ihoh 'elohekha vedam zebakhekha yishafekh 'al mizbakh ihoh 'elohekha vehabasar tokhel. shemor veshama'ta 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh 'asher 'anokhi mezaveka lema'an yitab lekha ulebanekha 'akharekha 'ad 'olam ki ta'aseh hatob vehayashar be'einei ihoh 'elohekha. ki yakhrit ihoh 'elohekha 'et hagoyim 'asher 'atah ba shamah lareshet 'otam mipanekha veyarashta 'otam veyashabta be'arzam. hishamer lekha pen tinaqesh 'akhareihem 'akharei hishamedam mipanekha ufen tidrosh leiloheihem leimor 'eikhah ya'abdu hagoyim ha'eleh 'et 'eloheihem ve'e'eseh ken gam 'ani. lo ta'aseh khen ihoh 'elohekha ki kal to'abat ihoh 'asher sanei 'asu leiloheihem ki gam 'et beneihem ve'et benoteihem yisrefu ba'esh leiloheihem. 'et kal hadabar 'asher 'anokhi mezaveh 'etkhem 'oto tishmeru la'asot lo tosef 'alav velo tigra' mimenu. ki yaqum beqirbekha nabi 'o kholem khalom venatan 'eilekha 'ot 'o mofet. uba ha'ot vehamofet 'asher diber 'eilekha leimor neilekhah 'akharei 'elohim 'akheirim 'asher lo yeda'tam vena'abedem. lo tishma' 'el dibrei hanabi hahu 'o 'el kholem hakhalom hahu ki menaseh ihoh 'eloheikhem 'etkhem lada'at hayishkhem 'ohabim 'et ihoh 'eloheikhem bekhal lebabkhem ubekhal nafshekhem. 'akharei ihoh 'eloheikhem teileikhu ve'oto tira'u ve'et mizvotav tishmoru ubeqolo tishma'u ve'oto ta'abodu ubo tidbaqun. vehanabi hahu 'o kholem hakhalom hahu yumat ki diber sarah 'al ihoh 'eloheikhem hamozi 'etkhem mei'erez mizrayim vehapodekha mibet 'abadim lehadikhakha min haderekh 'asher zivekha ihoh 'elohekha lalekhet bah ubi'arta hara' miqirbekha. ki yesitekha 'akhikha ben 'imekha 'o binkha 'o bitekha 'o 'eishet kheiqekha 'o rei'akha 'asher kenafshekha baseiter leimor neilekhah vena'abdah 'elohim 'akheirim 'asher lo yada'ta 'atah va'abotekha. mei'elohei ha'amim 'asher sebiboteikhem haqerobim 'eilekha 'o harekhoqim mimeka miqzeh ha'arez ve'ad qezeh ha'arez. lo tobeh lo velo tishma' 'eilav velo takhos 'einekha 'alav velo takhmol velo tekhaseh 'alav. ki harog tahargenu yadekha tihyeh bo barishonah lahamito veyad kal ha'am ba'akharonah. useqalto ba'abanim vamet ki biqesh lehadikhakha mei'al ihoh 'elohekha hamozi'akha mei'erez mizrayim mibet 'abadim. vekhal yisra'el yishme'u veyira'un velo yosifu la'asot kadabar hara' hazeh beqirbekha. ki tishma' be'akhat 'arekha 'asher ihoh 'elohekha noten lekha lashebet sham leimor. yaze'u 'anashim benei beliya'al miqirbekha vayadikhu 'et yoshebei 'iram leimor neilekhah vena'abdah 'elohim 'akheirim 'asher lo yeda'tem. vedarashta vekhaqarta vesha'alta heiteb vehineh 'emet nakhon hadabar ne'estah hato'eibah hazot beqirbekha. hakeh takeh 'et yoshebei ha'ir hahu hahi lefi khareb hakharem 'otah ve'et kal 'asher bah ve'et behemtah lefi khareb. ve'et kal shelalah tiqboz 'el tokh rekhobah vesarafta ba'esh 'et ha'ir ve'et kal shelalah kalil ihoh 'elohekha vehayetah tel 'olam lo tibaneh 'od. velo yidbaq beyadekha me'umah min hakheirem lema'an yashub ihoh meikharon 'apo venatan lekha rakhamim verikhamkha vehirbekha ka'asher nishba' la'abotekha. ki tishma' beqol ihoh 'elohekha lishmor 'et kal mizvotav 'asher 'anokhi mezavekha hayom la'asot hayashar be'einei ihoh 'elohekha. banim 'atem ihoh 'eloheikhem lo titgodedu velo tasimu qarekhah ben 'eineikhem lamet. ki 'am qadosh 'atah ihoh 'elohekha ubekha bakhar ihoh lihyot lo le'am segulah mikol ha'amim 'asher 'al penei ha'adamah. lo tokhal kal to'eibah. zot habeheimah 'asher tokheilu shor seh khesabim veseh 'izim. 'ayal uzebi veyakhmur ve'aqo vedishon ute'o vazamer. vekhal beheimah mafreset parsah veshosa'at shesa' shetei ferasot ma'alat geirah babeheimah 'otah tokheilu. 'akh 'et zeh lo tokhelu mima'alei hageirah umimafrisei haparsah hashesu'ah 'et hagamal ve'et ha'arnebet ve'et hashafan ki ma'aleh geirah hemah ufarsah lo hifrisu temei'im hem lakhem. ve'et hakhazir ki mafris parsah hu velo geirah tamei hu lakhem mibesaram lo tokheilu ubeniblatam lo tiga'u. 'et zeh tokhelu mikol 'asher bamayim kol 'asher lo senapir veqasqeset tokheilu. vekhol 'asher 'en lo senapir veqasqeset lo tokheilu tamei hu lakhem. kal zipor tehorah tokheilu. vezeh 'asher lo tokhelu meihem hanesher vehaperes veha'azeniyah. vehara'ah ve'et ha'ayah vehadayah leminah. ve'et kal 'oreb lemino. ve'et bat haya'anah ve'et hatakhmas ve'et hashakhaf ve'et hanez lemineihu. 'et hakos ve'et hayanshuf vehatinshamet. vehaqa'at ve'et harakhamah ve'et hashalakh. vehakhasidah veha'anafah leminah vehadukhifat veha'atalef. vekhol sherez ha'of tamei hu lakhem lo yei'akheilu. kal 'of tahor tokheilu. lo tokhelu khal nebeilah lager 'asher bish'arekha titenenah va'akhalah 'o makhor lenakheri ki 'am qadosh 'atah ihoh 'elohekha lo tebashel gedi bakhaleb 'imo. 'aser te'aser 'et kal tebu'at zar'ekha hayozei hasadeh shanah shanah. ve'akhalta lifnei ihoh 'elohekha bamaqom 'asher yibkhar leshaken shemo sham ma'sar deganekha tiroshekha veyizharekha ubekhorot beqarekha vezonekha lema'an tilmad leyir'ah 'et ihoh 'elohekha kal hayamim. vekhi yirbeh mimekha haderekh ki lo tukhal se'eito ki yirkhaq mimekha hamaqom 'asher yibkhar ihoh 'elohekha lasum shemo sham ki yebarekhkha ihoh 'elohekha. venatatah bakasef vezarta hakesef beyadekha vehalakhta 'el hamaqom 'asher yibkhar ihoh 'elohekha bo. venatatah hakesef bekhol 'asher te'aveh nafshekha babaqar ubazon ubayayin ubasheikhar ubekhol 'asher tish'alekha nafshekha ve'akhalta sham lifnei ihoh 'elohekha vesamakhta 'atah ubeitekha. vehaleivi 'asher bish'arekha lo ta'azbenu ki 'en lo kheileq venakhalah 'imakh. miqzeh shalosh shanim tozi 'et kal ma'sar tebu'atekha bashanah hahiv vehinakhta bish'arekha. uba haleivi ki 'en lo kheileq venakhalah 'imakh vehager vehayatom veha'almanah 'asher bish'arekha ve'akhelu vesabei'u lema'an yebarekhkha ihoh 'elohekha bekhal ma'aseh yadekha 'asher ta'aseh. miqez sheba' shanim ta'aseh shemitah. vezeh debar hashemitah shamot kal ba'al masheh yado 'asher yasheh berei'eihu lo yigos 'et rei'eihu ve'et 'akhiv ki qara shemitah ihoh. 'et hanakheri tigos va'asher yihyeh lekha 'et 'akhikha tashmet yadekha. 'efes ki lo yihyeh bekha 'ebyon ki barekh yebarekhkha ihoh ba'arez 'asher ihoh 'elohekha noten lekha nakhalah lerishtah. raq 'im shamoa' tishma' beqol ihoh 'elohekha lishmor la'asot 'et kal hamizvah hazot 'asher 'anokhi mezavekha hayom. ki ihoh 'elohekha beirakhkha ka'asher diber lakh veha'abata goyim rabim ve'atah lo ta'abot umashalta begoyim rabim ubekha lo yimsholu. ki yihyeh bekha 'ebyon mei'akhad 'akhekha be'akhad she'arekha be'arzekha 'asher ihoh 'elohekha noten lakh lo te'amez 'et lebabekha velo tiqpoz 'et yadekha mei'akhikha ha'ebyon. ki fatoakh tiftakh 'et yadekha lo veha'abet ta'abitenu dei makhsoro 'asher yekhsar lo. hishamer lekha pen yihyeh dabar 'im lebabekha beliya'al leimor qarebah shenat hasheba' shenat hashemitah vera'ah 'einekha be'akhikha ha'ebyon velo titen lo veqara 'alekha 'el ihoh vehayah bekha khet. naton titen lo velo yeira' lebabekha betitekha lo ki biglal hadabar hazeh yebarekhkha ihoh 'elohekha bekhal ma'asekha ubekhol mishlakh yadekha. ki lo yekhdal 'ebyon miqereb ha'arez 'al ken 'anokhi mezavekha leimor patoakh tiftakh 'et yadekha le'akhikha la'aniyekha ule'ebyonekha be'arzekha. ki yimakher lekha 'akhikha ha'ibri 'o ha'ibriyah va'abadekha shesh shanim ubashanah hashebi'it teshalekhenu khafeshi mei'imakh. vekhi teshalekhenu khafeshi mei'imakh lo teshalekhenu reiqam. ha'aneq ta'aniq lo mizonekha umigarenekha umiyiqbekha 'asher beirakhkha ihoh 'elohekha titen lo. vezakharta ki 'ebed hayita be'erez mizrayim vayifdekha ihoh 'elohekha 'al ken 'anokhi mezavekha 'et hadabar hazeh hayom. vehayah ki yomar 'eilekha lo 'eizei mei'imakh ki 'aheibekha ve'et beitekha ki tob lo 'imakh. velaqakhta 'et hamarzeia' venatatah be'azeno ubadelet vehayah lekha 'ebed 'olam ve'af la'amatekha ta'aseh ken. lo yiqsheh be'einekha beshaleikhakha 'oto khafeshi mei'imakh ki mishneh sekhar sakhir 'abadekha shesh shanim ubeirakhkha ihoh 'elohekha bekhol 'asher ta'aseh. kal habekhor 'asher yivaled bibqarekha ubezonekha hazakhar taqdish ihoh 'elohekha lo ta'abod bibkhor shorekha velo tagoz bekhor zonekha. lifnei ihoh 'elohekha tokhalenu shanah beshanah bamaqom 'asher yibkhar ihoh 'atah ubeitekha. vekhi yihyeh bo mum piseiakh 'o 'iver kol mum ra' lo tizbakhenu ihoh 'elohekha. bish'arekha tokhalenu hatamei vehatahor yakhdav kazebi vekha'ayal. raq 'et damo lo tokhel 'al ha'arez tishpekhenu kamayim. shamor 'et khodesh ha'abib ve'asita pesakh ihoh 'elohekha ki bekhodesh ha'abib hozi'akha ihoh 'elohekha mimizrayim layelah. vezabakhta pesakh ihoh 'elohekha zon ubaqar bamaqom 'asher yibkhar ihoh leshaken shemo sham. lo tokhal 'alav khamez shib'at yamim tokhal 'alav mazot lekhem 'oni ki bekhipazon yazata mei'erez mizrayim lema'an tizkor 'et yom zeitekha mei'erez mizrayim kol yemei khayekha. velo yeira'eh lekha se'or bekhal gebulkha shib'at yamim velo yalin min habasar 'asher tizbakh ba'ereb bayom harishon laboqer. lo tukhal lizboakh 'et hapasakh be'akhad she'arekha 'asher ihoh 'elohekha noten lakh. ki 'im 'el hamaqom 'asher yibkhar ihoh 'elohekha leshaken shemo sham tizbakh 'et hapesakh ba'areb kebo hashemesh mo'ed zeitekha mimizrayim. ubishalta ve'akhalta bamaqom 'asher yibkhar ihoh 'elohekha bo ufanita baboqer vehalakhta le'ohalekha. sheishet yamim tokhal mazot ubayom hashebi'i 'azeret ihoh 'elohekha lo ta'aseh melakhah. shib'ah shabu'ot tispar lakh meihakhel khermesh baqamah takhel lispor shib'ah shabu'ot. ve'asita khag shabu'ot ihoh 'elohekha misat nidbat yadekha 'asher titen ka'asher yebarekhkha ihoh 'elohekha. vesamakhta lifnei ihoh 'elohekha 'atah ubinkha ubitekha ve'abdekha va'amatekha vehaleivi 'asher bish'arekha vehager vehayatom veha'almanah 'asher beqirbekha bamaqom 'asher yibkhar ihoh 'elohekha leshaken shemo sham. vezakharta ki 'ebed hayita bemizrayim veshamarta ve'asita 'et hakhuqim ha'eleh. khag hasukot ta'aseh lekha shib'at yamim be'asepekha migarenekha umiyiqbekha. vesamakhta bekhagekha 'atah ubinkha ubitekha ve'abdekha va'amatekha vehaleivi vehager vehayatom veha'almanah 'asher bish'arekha. shib'at yamim takhog ihoh 'elohekha bamaqom 'asher yibkhar ihoh ki yebarekhkha ihoh 'elohekha bekhol tebu'atekha ubekhol ma'aseh yadekha vehayita 'akh sameiakh. shalosh pe'amim bashanah yeira'eh khal zekhurekha 'et penei ihoh 'elohekha bamaqom 'asher yibkhar bekhag hamazot ubekhag hashabu'ot ubekhag hasukot velo yeira'eh 'et penei ihoh reiqam. 'ish kematenat yado kebirkat ihoh 'elohekha 'asher natan lakh. shofetim veshoterim titen lekha bekhal she'arekha 'asher ihoh 'elohekha noten lekha lishbatekha veshafetu 'et ha'am mishpat zedeq. lo tateh mishpat lo takir panim velo tiqakh shokhad ki hashokhad ye'aver 'einei khakhamim visalef dibrei zadiqim. zedeq zedeq tirdof lema'an tikhyeh veyarashta 'et ha'arez 'asher ihoh 'elohekha noten lakh. lo tita' lekha 'asheirah kal 'ez 'eizel mizbakh ihoh 'elohekha 'asher ta'aseh lakh. velo taqim lekha mazeibah 'asher sanei ihoh 'elohekha. lo tizbakh ihoh 'elohekha shor vaseh 'asher yihyeh bo mum kol dabar ra' ki to'abat ihoh 'elohekha hu. ki yimazei beqirbekha be'akhad she'arekha 'asher ihoh 'elohekha noten lakh 'ish 'o 'ishah 'asher ya'aseh 'et hara' be'einei ihoh 'elohekha la'abor berito. vayeilekh vaya'abod 'elohim 'akheirim vayishtakhu lahem velashemesh 'o layareiakh 'o lekhal zeba hashamayim 'asher lo ziviti. vehugad lekha veshama'eta vedarashta heiteb vehineh 'emet nakhon hadabar ne'estah hato'eibah hazot beyisra'el. vehozeita 'et ha'ish hahu 'o 'et ha'ishah hahiv 'asher 'asu 'et hadabar hara' hazeh 'el she'arekha 'et ha'ish 'o 'et ha'ishah useqaltam ba'abanim vameitu. 'al pi shenayim 'eidim 'o sheloshah 'eidim yumat hamet lo yumat 'al pi 'ed 'ekhad. yad ha'eidim tihyeh bo barishonah lahamito veyad kal ha'am ba'akharonah ubi'arta hara' miqirbekha. ki yipalei mimekha dabar lamishpat ben dam ledam ben din ledin uben nega' lanega' dibrei ribot bish'arekha veqamta ve'alita 'el hamaqom 'asher yibkhar ihoh 'elohekha bo. ubata 'el hakohanim halviyim ve'el hashofet 'asher yihyeh bayamim hahem vedarashta vehigidu lekha 'et debar hamishpat. ve'asita 'al pi hadabar 'asher yagidu lekha min hamaqom hahu 'asher yibkhar ihoh veshamarta la'asot kekhol 'asher yorukha. 'al pi hatorah 'asher yorukha ve'al hamishpat 'asher yomeru lekha ta'aseh lo tasur min hadabar 'asher yagidu lekha yamin usemol. veha'ish 'asher ya'aseh bezadon lebilti shemoa' 'el hakohen ha'omed lesharet sham 'et ihoh 'elohekha 'o 'el hashofet umet ha'ish hahu ubi'arta hara' miyisra'el. vekhal ha'am yishme'u veyira'u velo yezidun 'od. ki tabo 'el ha'arez 'asher ihoh 'elohekha noten lakh virishtah veyashabtah bah ve'amarta 'asimah 'alai melekh kekhal hagoyim 'asher sebibotai. som tasim 'alekha melekh 'asher yibkhar ihoh 'elohekha bo miqereb 'akhekha tasim 'alekha melekh lo tukhal latet 'alekha 'ish nakheri 'asher lo 'akhikha hu. raq lo yarbeh lo susim velo yashib 'et ha'am mizraymah lema'an harbot sus ihoh 'amar lakhem lo tosifun lashub baderekh hazeh 'od. velo yarbeh lo nashim velo yasur lebabo vekhesef vezahab lo yarbeh lo me'od. vehayah kheshibto 'al kisei mamlakhto vekhatab lo 'et mishneh hatorah hazot 'al seifer milifnei hakohanim halviyim vehayetah 'imo veqara bo kal yemei khayav lema'an yilmad leyir'ah 'et ihoh 'elohav lishmor 'et kal dibrei hatorah hazot ve'et hakhuqim ha'eleh la'asotam. lebilti rum lebabo mei'ekhav ulebilti sur min hamizvah yamin usemol lema'an ya'arikh yamim 'al mamlakhto hu ubanav beqereb yisra'el. lo yihyeh lakohanim halviyim kal sheibet leivi kheileq venakhalah 'im yisra'el 'ishei ihoh venakhalato yokheilun. venakhalah lo yihyeh lo beqereb 'ekhav ihoh hu nakhalato ka'asher diber lo. vezeh yihyeh mishpat hakohanim mei'et ha'am mei'et zobekhei hazebakh 'im shor 'im seh venatan lakohen hazeroa' vehalekhayayim vehaqeibah. reishit deganekha tiroshekha veyizharekha vereishit gez zonekha titen lo ki bo bakhar ihoh 'elohekha mikal shebatekha la'amod lesharet beshem ihoh hu ubanav kal hayamim. vekhi yabo haleivi mei'akhad she'arekha mikal yisra'el 'asher hu gar sham uba bekhal 'avat nafsho 'el hamaqom 'asher yibkhar ihoh. vesheiret beshem ihoh 'elohav kekhal 'ekhav halviyim ha'omedim sham lifnei ihoh. kheileq kekheileq yokheilu lebad mimkarav 'al ha'abot. ki 'atah ba 'el ha'arez 'asher ihoh 'elohekha noten lakh lo tilmad la'asot keto'abot hagoyim hahem. lo yimazei bekha ma'abir beno ubito ba'esh qosem qesamim me'onen umenakhesh umekhashef. vekhober khaber vesho'el 'ob veyide'oni vedoresh 'el hameitim. ki to'abat ihoh kal 'oseh 'eleh ubiglal hato'eibot ha'eleh ihoh 'elohekha morish 'otam mipanekha. tamim tihyeh 'im ihoh 'elohekha. ki hagoyim ha'eleh 'asher 'atah yoresh 'otam 'el me'onenim ve'el qosemim yishma'u ve'atah lo khen natan lekha ihoh 'elohekha. nabi miqirbekha mei'akhekha kamoni yaqim lekha ihoh 'elohekha 'eilav tishma'un. kekhol 'asher sha'alta mei'im ihoh 'elohekha bekhoreb beyom haqahal leimor lo 'osef lishmoa' 'et qol ihoh 'elohai ve'et ha'esh hagedolah hazot lo 'er'eh 'od velo 'amut. vayomer ihoh 'eilai heitibu 'asher dibeiru. nabi 'aqim lahem miqereb 'akheihem kamokha venatati debarai befiv vediber 'aleihem 'et kal 'asher 'azavenu. vehayah ha'ish 'asher lo yishma' 'el debarai 'asher yedaber bishmi 'anokhi 'edrosh mei'imo. 'akh hanabi 'asher yazid ledaber dabar bishmi 'et 'asher lo zivitiv ledaber va'asher yedaber beshem 'elohim 'akheirim umet hanabi hahu. vekhi tomar bilbabekha 'eikhah neida' 'et hadabar 'asher lo dibero ihoh. 'asher yedaber hanabi beshem ihoh velo yihyeh hadabar velo yabo hu hadabar 'asher lo dibero ihoh bezadon dibero hanabi lo tagur mimenu. ki yakhrit ihoh 'elohekha 'et hagoyim 'asher ihoh 'elohekha noten lekha 'et 'arzam virishtam veyashabta be'areihem ubebateihem. shalosh 'arim tabdil lakh betokh 'arzekha 'asher ihoh 'elohekha noten lekha lerishtah. takhin lekha haderekh veshilashta 'et gebul 'arzekha 'asher yankhilekha ihoh 'elohekha vehayah lanus shamah kal rozeiakh. vezeh debar harozeiakh 'asher yanus shamah vakhai 'asher yakeh 'et rei'eihu bibli da'at vehu lo sonei lo mitemol shilshom. va'asher yabo 'et rei'eihu baya'ar lakhtob 'eizim venidekhah yado bagarzen likhrot ha'ez venashal habarzel min ha'ez umaza 'et rei'eihu vamet hu yanus 'el 'akhat he'arim ha'eleh vakhai. pen yirdof go'el hadam 'akharei harozeiakh ki yeikham lebabo vehisigo ki yirbeh haderekh vehikahu nafesh velo 'en mishpat mavet ki lo sonei hu lo mitemol shilshom. 'al ken 'anokhi mezavekha leimor shalosh 'arim tabdil lakh. ve'im yarkhib ihoh 'elohekha 'et gebulkha ka'asher nishba' la'abotekha venatan lekha 'et kal ha'arez 'asher diber latet la'abotekha. ki tishmor 'et kal hamizvah hazot la'asotah 'asher 'anokhi mezavekha hayom le'ahabah 'et ihoh 'elohekha velalekhet bidrakhav kal hayamim veyasafta lekha 'od shalosh 'arim 'al hashalosh ha'eleh. velo yishafekh dam naqi beqereb 'arzekha 'asher ihoh 'elohekha noten lekha nakhalah vehayah 'alekha damim. vekhi yihyeh 'ish sonei lerei'eihu ve'arab lo veqam 'alav vehikahu nefesh vamet venas 'el 'akhat he'arim ha'el. veshalekhu ziqnei 'iro velaqekhu 'oto misham venatenu 'oto beyad go'el hadam vamet. lo takhos 'einekha 'alav ubi'arta dam hanaqi miyisra'el vetob lakh. lo tasig gebul rei'akha 'asher gabelu rishonim benakhalatekha 'asher tinkhal ba'arez 'asher ihoh 'elohekha noten lekha lerishtah. lo yaqum 'ed 'ekhad be'ish lekhal 'avon ulekhal khatat bekhal khet 'asher yekheta 'al pi shenei 'eidim 'o 'al pi sheloshah 'eidim yaqum dabar. ki yaqum 'ed khamas be'ish la'anot bo sarah. ve'amedu shenei ha'anashim 'asher lahem harib lifnei ihoh lifnei hakohanim vehashofetim 'asher yihyu bayamim hahem. vedareshu hashofetim heiteb vehineh 'ed sheqer ha'ed sheqer 'anah be'akhiv. va'asitem lo ka'asher zamam la'asot le'akhiv ubi'arta hara' miqirbekha. vehanish'arim yishme'u veyira'u velo yosifu la'asot 'od kadabar hara' hazeh beqirbekha. velo takhos 'einekha nefesh benefesh 'ayin be'ayin shen beshen yad beyad regel beragel. ki teizei lamilkhamah 'al 'oyebekha vera'ita sus varekheb 'am rab mimekha lo tira meihem ki ihoh 'elohekha 'imakh hama'alkha mei'erez mizrayim. vehayah keqarabekhem 'el hamilkhamah venigash hakohen vediber 'el ha'am. ve'amar 'aleihem shema' yisra'el 'atem qereibim hayom lamilkhamah 'al 'oyebeikhem 'al yeirakh lebabkhem 'al tire'u ve'al takhpezu ve'al ta'arzu mipeneihem. ki ihoh 'eloheikhem haholekh 'imakhem lehilakhem lakhem 'im 'oyebeikhem lehoshia' 'etkhem. vediberu hashoterim 'el ha'am leimor mi ha'ish 'asher banah bayit khadash velo khanakho yeilekh veyashob lebeito pen yamut bamilkhamah ve'ish 'akher yakhnekhenu. umi ha'ish 'asher nata' kerem velo khilelo yeilekh veyashob lebeito pen yamut bamilkhamah ve'ish 'akher yekhalelenu. umi ha'ish 'asher 'eiras 'ishah velo leqakhah yeilekh veyashob lebeito pen yamut bamilkhamah ve'ish 'akher yiqakhenah. veyasefu hashoterim ledaber 'el ha'am ve'ameru mi ha'ish hayarei verakh haleibab yeilekh veyashob lebeito velo yimas 'et lebab 'ekhav kilbabo. vehayah kekhalot hashoterim ledaber 'el ha'am ufaqedu sarei zeba'ot berosh ha'am. ki tiqrab 'el 'ir lehilakhem 'aleha veqarata 'eileha leshalom. vehayah 'im shalom ta'ankha ufatekhah lakh vehayah kal ha'am hanimza bah yihyu lekha lamas va'abadukha. ve'im lo tashlim 'imakh ve'asetah 'imekha milkhamah vezarta 'aleha. unetanah ihoh 'elohekha beyadekha vehikita 'et kal zekhurah lefi khareb. raq hanashim vehataf vehabeheimah vekhol 'asher yihyeh ba'ir kal shelalah taboz lakh ve'akhalta 'et shelal 'oyebekha 'asher natan ihoh 'elohekha lakh. ken ta'aseh lekhal he'arim harekhoqot mimekha me'od 'asher lo mei'arei hagoyim ha'eleh henah. raq mei'arei ha'amim ha'eleh 'asher ihoh 'elohekha noten lekha nakhalah lo tekhayeh kal neshamah. ki hakharem takharimem hakhiti veha'emori hakena'ani vehaperizi hakhivi vehaybusi ka'asher zivekha ihoh 'elohekha. lema'an 'asher lo yelamedu 'etkhem la'asot kekhol to'abotam 'asher 'asu leiloheihem vakhatatem ihoh 'eloheikhem. ki tazur 'el 'ir yamim rabim lehilakhem 'aleha letafesah lo tashkhit 'et 'eizah lindoakh 'alav garzen ki mimenu tokhel ve'oto lo tikhrot ki ha'adam 'ez hasadeh labo mipanekha bamazor. raq 'ez 'asher teida' ki lo 'ez ma'akhal hu 'oto tashkhit vekharata ubanita mazor 'al ha'ir 'asher hi 'osah 'imekha milkhamah 'ad ridtah. ki yimazei khalal ba'adamah 'asher ihoh 'elohekha noten lekha lerishtah nofel basadeh lo noda' mi hikahu. veyaze'u zeqeinekha veshofetekha umadedu 'el he'arim 'asher sebibot hekhalal. vehayah ha'ir haqerobah 'el hekhalal velaqekhu ziqnei ha'ir hahiv 'eglat baqar 'asher lo 'ubad bah 'asher lo mashekhah be'ol. vehoridu ziqnei ha'ir hahiv 'et ha'eglah 'el nakhal 'eitan 'asher lo yei'abed bo velo yizareia' ve'arefu sham 'et ha'eglah banakhal. venigeshu hakohanim benei leivi ki bam bakhar ihoh 'elohekha leshareto ulebarekh beshem ihoh ve'al pihem yihyeh kal rib vekhal naga'. vekhol ziqnei ha'ir hahiv haqerobim 'el hekhalal yirkhazu 'et yedeihem 'al ha'eglah ha'arufah banakhal. ve'anu ve'ameru yadeinu lo shafekhah shafekhu 'et hadam hazeh ve'eineinu lo ra'u. kaper le'amekha yisra'el 'asher padita ihoh ve'al titen dam naqi beqereb 'amekha yisra'el venikaper lahem hadam. ve'atah teba'er hadam hanaqi miqirbekha ki ta'aseh hayashar be'einei ihoh. ki teizei lamilkhamah 'al 'oyebekha unetano ihoh 'elohekha beyadekha veshabita shibyo. vera'ita bashibyah 'eishet yefat to'ar vekhashaqta bah velaqakhta lekha le'ishah. vahabeitah 'el tokh beitekha vegilekhah 'et roshah ve'asetah 'et zipareneha. veheisirah 'et simlat shibyah mei'aleha veyashebah bebeitekha ubakhetah 'et 'abiha ve'et 'imah yerakh yamim ve'akhar ken tabo 'eileha ube'altah vehayetah lekha le'ishah. vehayah 'im lo khafazta bah veshilakhtah lenafshah umakhor lo timkerenah bakasef lo tit'amer bah takhat 'asher 'initah. ki tihyena le'ish shetei nashim ha'akhat 'ahubah veha'akhat senu'ah veyaledu lo banim ha'ahubah vehasenu'ah vehayah haben habekhor laseni'ah. vehayah beyom hankhilo 'et banav 'et 'asher yihyeh lo lo yukhal lebaker 'et ben ha'ahubah 'al penei ben hasenu'ah habekhor. ki 'et habekhor ben hasenu'ah yakir latet lo pi shenayim bekhol 'asher yimazei lo ki hu reishit 'ono lo mishpat habekhorah. ki yihyeh le'ish ben sorer umoreh 'einenu shomeia' beqol 'abiv ubeqol 'imo veyiseru 'oto velo yishma' 'aleihem. vetafesu bo 'abiv ve'imo vehozi'u 'oto 'el ziqnei 'iro ve'el sha'ar meqomo. ve'ameru 'el ziqnei 'iro beneinu zeh sorer umoreh 'einenu shomeia' beqoleinu zolel vesobei. uregamuhu kal 'anshei 'iro ba'abanim vamet ubi'arta hara' miqirbekha vekhal yisra'el yishme'u veyira'u. vekhi yihyeh be'ish khet mishpat mavet vehumat vetalita 'oto 'al 'ez. lo talin niblato 'al ha'ez ki qabor tiqberenu bayom hahu ki qilat 'elohim talui velo tetamei 'et 'admatekha 'asher ihoh 'elohekha noten lekha nakhalah. lo tir'eh 'et shor 'akhikha 'o 'et seiyo nidakhim vehit'alamta meihem hasheb teshibem le'akhikha. ve'im lo qarob 'akhikha 'eilekha velo yeda'to va'asafto 'el tokh beitekha vehayah 'imekha 'ad derosh 'akhikha 'oto vahasheiboto lo. vekhen ta'aseh lakhamoro vekhen ta'aseh lesimlato vekhen ta'aseh lekhal 'abeidat 'akhikha 'asher tobad mimenu umezatah lo tukhal lehit'alem. lo tir'eh 'et khamor 'akhikha 'o shoro nofelim baderekh vehit'alamta meihem haqem taqim 'imo. lo yihyeh kheli geber 'al 'ishah velo yilbash geber simlat 'ishah ki to'abat ihoh 'elohekha kal 'oseh 'eleh. ki yiqarei qan zipor lefanekha baderekh bekhal 'ez 'o 'al ha'arez 'efrokhim 'o beizim veha'em robezet 'al ha'efrokhim 'o 'al habeizim lo tiqakh ha'em 'al habanim. shaleiakh teshalakh 'et ha'em ve'et habanim tiqakh lakh lema'an yitab lakh veha'arakhta yamim. ki tibneh bayit khadash ve'asita ma'aqeh legagekha velo tasim damim bebeitekha ki yipol hanofel mimenu. lo tizra' karmekha kil'ayim pen tiqdash hamlei'ah hazera' 'asher tizra' utebu'at hakarem. lo takharosh beshor ubakhamor yakhdav. lo tilbash sha'atnez zemer ufishtim yakhdav. gedilim ta'aseh lakh 'al 'arba' kanfot kesutekha 'asher tekhaseh bah. ki yiqakh 'ish 'ishah uba 'eileha usenei'ah. vesam lah 'alilot debarim vehozi 'aleha shem ra' ve'amar 'et ha'ishah hazot laqakhti va'eqrab 'eileha velo mazati lah betulim. velaqakh 'abi hana'ar hana'arah ve'imah vehozi'u 'et betulei hana'ar hana'arah 'el ziqnei ha'ir hasha'erah. ve'amar 'abi hana'ar hana'arah 'el hazeqeinim 'et biti natati la'ish hazeh le'ishah vayisna'eha. vehineh hu sam 'alilot debarim leimor lo mazati lebitekha betulim ve'eleh betulei biti ufaresu hasimlah lifnei ziqnei ha'ir. velaqekhu ziqnei ha'ir hahiv 'et ha'ish veyiseru 'oto. ve'aneshu 'oto mei'ah khesef venatenu la'abi hana'arah ki hozi shem ra' 'al betulat yisra'el velo tihyeh le'ishah lo yukhal leshalekhah kal yamav. ve'im 'emet hayah hadabar hazeh lo nimze'u betulim lana'ar lana'arah. vehozi'u 'et hana'ar hana'arah 'el petakh bet 'abiha useqaluha 'anshei 'irah ba'abanim vameitah ki 'asetah nebalah beyisra'el liznot bet 'abiha ubi'arta hara' miqirbekha. ki yimazei 'ish shokheb 'im 'ishah be'ulat ba'al umeitu gam sheneihem ha'ish hashokheb 'im ha'ishah veha'ishah ubi'arta hara' miyisra'el. ki yihyeh na'ar na'arah betulah me'orasah le'ish umeza'ah 'ish ba'ir veshakhab 'imah. vehozeitem 'et sheneihem 'el sha'ar ha'ir hahiv useqaltem 'otam ba'abanim vameitu 'et hana'ar hana'arah 'al debar 'asher lo za'aqah ba'ir ve'et ha'ish 'al debar 'asher 'inah 'et 'eishet rei'eihu ubi'arta hara' miqirbekha. ve'im basadeh yimza ha'ish 'et hana'ar hana'arah ham'orasah vehekheziq bah ha'ish veshakhab 'imah umet ha'ish 'asher shakhab 'imah lebado. velana'ar velana'arah lo ta'aseh dabar 'en lana'ar lana'arah khet mavet ki ka'asher yaqum 'ish 'al rei'eihu urezakho nefesh ken hadabar hazeh. ki basadeh meza'ah za'aqah hana'ar hana'arah ham'orasah ve'en moshia' lah. ki yimza 'ish na'ar na'arah betulah 'asher lo 'orasah utefasah veshakhab 'imah venimza'u. venatan ha'ish hashokheb 'imah la'abi hana'ar hana'arah khamishim kasef velo tihyeh le'ishah takhat 'asher 'inah lo yukhal shalekhah kal yamav. lo yiqakh 'ish 'et 'eishet 'abiv velo yegaleh kenaf 'abiv. lo yabo fezua' daka ukherut shafekhah biqhal ihoh. lo yabo mamzer biqhal ihoh gam dor 'asiri lo yabo lo biqhal ihoh. lo yabo 'amoni umo'abi biqhal ihoh gam dor 'asiri lo yabo lahem biqhal ihoh 'ad 'olam. 'al debar 'asher lo qidemu 'etkhem balekhem ubamayim baderekh bezeitekhem mimizrayim va'asher sakhar 'alekha 'et bil'am ben be'or mipetor 'aram naharayim leqaleka. velo 'abah ihoh 'elohekha lishmoa' 'el bil'am vayahafokh ihoh 'elohekha lekha 'et haqelalah librakhah ki 'aheibekha ihoh 'elohekha. lo tidrosh shelomam vetobatam kal yamekha le'olam. lo teta'eb 'adomi ki 'akhikha hu lo teta'eb mizri ki ger hayita be'arzo. banim 'asher yivaledu lahem dor shelishi yabo lahem biqhal ihoh. ki teizei makhaneh 'al 'oyebekha venishmarta mikol dabar ra'. ki yihyeh bekha 'ish 'asher lo yihyeh tahor miqereh layelah veyaza 'el mikhuz lamakhaneh lo yabo 'el tokh hamakhaneh. vehayah lifnot 'ereb yirkhaz bamayim ukhebo hashemesh yabo 'el tokh hamakhaneh veyad tihyeh lekha mikhuz lamakhaneh veyazata shamah khuz. veyated tihyeh lekha 'al 'azeinekha vehayah beshibtekha khuz vekhafartah bah veshabta vekhisita 'et zei'atekha. ki ihoh 'elohekha mithalekh beqereb makhanekha lehazilekha velatet 'oyebekha lefanekha vehayah makhanekha qadosh velo yir'eh bekha 'ervat dabar veshab mei'akharekha. lo tasgir 'ebed 'el 'adonav 'asher yinazel 'eilekha mei'im 'adonav. 'imekha yeisheb beqirbekha bamaqom 'asher yibkhar be'akhad she'arekha batob lo lo tonenu. lo tihyeh qedeishah mibenot yisra'el velo yihyeh qadesh mibenei yisra'el lo tabi 'etnan zonah umekhir keleb bet ihoh 'elohekha lekhal neder ki to'abat ihoh 'elohekha gam sheneihem. lo tashikh le'akhikha neshekh kesef neshekh 'okhel neshekh kal dabar 'asher yishakh. lanakheri tashikh ule'akhikha lo tashikh lema'an yebarekhkha ihoh 'elohekha bekhol mishlakh yadekha 'al ha'arez 'asher 'atah ba shamah lerishtah. ki tidor neder ihoh 'elohekha lo te'akher leshalemo ki darosh yidreshenu ihoh 'elohekha mei'imakh vehayah bekha khet. vekhi tekhdal lindor lo yihyeh bekha khet. moza sefatekha tishmor ve'asita ka'asher nadarta ihoh 'elohekha nedabah 'asher dibarta befikha. ki tabo bekherem rei'ekha ve'akhalta 'anabim kenafshekha sabe'ekha ve'el kelyekha lo titen. ki tabo beqamat rei'ekha veqatafta melilot beyadekha vekhermesh lo tanif 'al qamat rei'ekha. ki yiqakh 'ish 'ishah ube'alah vehayah 'im lo timza khen be'einav ki maza bah 'ervat dabar vekhatab lah seifer keritut venatan beyadah veshilekhah mibeito. veyaze'ah mibeito vehalekhah vehayetah le'ish 'akher. usenei'ah ha'ish ha'akharon vekhatab lah seifer keritut venatan beyadah veshilekhah mibeito 'o khi yamut ha'ish ha'akharon 'asher leqakhah lo le'ishah. lo yukhal ba'lah harishon 'asheroshi lekhah lashub leqakhtah lihyot lo le'ishah 'akharei 'asher hutama'ah ki to'eibah hi lifnei ihoh velo takhati 'et ha'arez 'asher ihoh 'elohekha noten lekha nakhalah. ki yiqakh 'ish 'ishah khadashah lo yeizei bazaba velo ya'abor 'alav lekhal dabar naqi yihyeh lebeito shanah 'ekhat vesimakh 'et 'ishto 'asher laqakh. lo yakhabol reikhayim varakheb ki nefesh hu khobel. ki yimazei 'ish goneb nefesh mei'ekhav mibenei yisra'el vehit'amer bo umekharo umet haganab hahu ubi'arta hara' miqirbekha. hishamer benega' hazara'at lishmor me'od vela'asot kekhol 'asher yoru 'etkhem hakohanim halviyim ka'asher zivitim tishmeru la'asot. zakhor 'et 'asher 'asah ihoh 'elohekha lemiryam baderekh bezeitekhem mimizrayim. ki tasheh berei'akha mashat me'umah lo tabo 'el beito la'abot 'aboto. bakhuz ta'amod veha'ish 'asher 'atah nosheh bo yozi 'eilekha 'et ha'abot hakhuzah. ve'im 'ish 'ani hu lo tishkab ba'aboto. hasheb tashib lo 'et ha'abot kebo hashemesh veshakhab besalmato ubeirakheka ulekha tihyeh zedaqah lifnei ihoh 'elohekha. lo ta'ashoq sakhir 'ani ve'ebyon mei'akhekha 'o migeirekha 'asher be'arzekha bish'arekha. beyomo titen sekharo velo tabo 'alav hashemesh ki 'ani hu ve'eilav hu nosei 'et nafsho velo yiqra 'alekha 'el ihoh vehayah bekha khet. lo yumetu 'abot 'al banim ubanim lo yumetu 'al 'abot 'ish bekhet'o yumatu. lo tateh mishpat ger yatom velo takhabol beged 'almanah. vezakharta ki 'ebed hayita bemizrayim vayifdekha ihoh 'elohekha misham 'al ken 'anokhi mezavekha la'asot 'et hadabar hazeh. ki tiqzor qezirekha besadekha veshakhakhta 'omer basadeh lo tashub leqakhto lager layatom vela'almanah yihyeh lema'an yebarekhkha ihoh 'elohekha bekhol ma'aseh yadekha. ki takhbot zeitekha lo tefa'er 'akharekha lager layatom vela'almanah yihyeh. ki tibzor karmekha lo te'olel 'akharekha lager layatom vela'almanah yihyeh. vezakharta ki 'ebed hayita be'erez mizrayim 'al ken 'anokhi mezavekha la'asot 'et hadabar hazeh. ki yihyeh rib ben 'anashim venigeshu 'el hamishpat ushefatum vehizdiqu 'et hazadiq vehirshi'u 'et harasha'. vehayah 'im bin hakot harasha' vehipilo hashofet vehikahu lefanav kedei rish'ato bemispar. 'arba'im yakenu lo yosif pen yosif lehakoto 'al 'eleh makah rabah veniqlah 'akhikha le'einekha. lo takhsom shor bedisho. ki yeishebu 'akhim yakhdav umet 'akhad meihem uben 'en lo lo tihyeh 'eishet hamet hakhuzah le'ish zar yebamah yabo 'aleha uleqakhah lo le'ishah veyibemah. vehayah habekhor 'asher teiled yaqum 'al shem 'akhiv hamet velo yimakheh shemo miyisra'el. ve'im lo yakhpoz ha'ish laqakhat 'et yebimto ve'aletah yebimto hasha'rah 'el hazeqeinim ve'amerah mei'en yebami lehaqim le'akhiv shem beyisra'el lo 'abah yabemi. veqare'u lo ziqnei 'iro vediberu 'eilav ve'amad ve'amar lo khafazti leqakhtah. venigeshah yebimto 'eilav le'einei hazeqeinim vekhalezah na'alo mei'al raglo veyareqah befanav ve'anetah ve'amerah kakhah yei'aseh la'ish 'asher lo yibneh 'et bet 'akhiv. veniqra shemo beyisra'el bet khaluz hana'al. ki yinazu 'anashim yakhdav 'ish ve'akhiv veqarebah 'eishet ha'ekhad lehazil 'et 'ishah miyad makeihu veshalekhah yadah vehekheziqah bimbushav. veqazotah 'et kapah lo takhos 'einekha. lo yihyeh lekha bekhisekha 'eben va'aben gedolah uqetanah. lo yihyeh lekha bebeitekha 'eifah ve'eifah gedolah uqetanah. 'eben sheleimah vazedeq yihyeh lakh 'eifah sheleimah vazedeq yihyeh lakh lema'an ya'arikhu yamekha 'al ha'adamah 'asher ihoh 'elohekha noten lakh. ki to'abat ihoh 'elohekha kal 'oseh 'eleh kol 'oseh 'avel. zakhor 'et 'asher 'asah lekha 'amaleq baderekh bezeitekhem mimizrayim. 'asher qarekha baderekh vayzaneb bekha kal hanekheshalim 'akharekha ve'atah 'ayef veyageia' velo yarei 'elohim. vehayah behaniakh ihoh 'elohekha lekha mikal 'oyebekha misabib ba'arez 'asher ihoh 'elohekha noten lekha nakhalah lerishtah timkheh 'et zeikher 'amaleq mitakhat hashamayim lo tishkakh. vehayah ki tabo 'el ha'arez 'asher ihoh 'elohekha noten lekha nakhalah virishtah veyashabta bah. velaqakhta meireishit kal peri ha'adamah 'asher tabi mei'arzekha 'asher ihoh 'elohekha noten lakh vesamta batene vehalakhta 'el hamaqom 'asher yibkhar ihoh 'elohekha leshaken shemo sham. ubata 'el hakohen 'asher yihyeh bayamim hahem ve'amarta 'eilav higadti hayom ihoh 'elohekha ki bati 'el ha'arez 'asher nishba' ihoh la'aboteinu latet lanu. velaqakh hakohen hatene miyadekha vehinikho lifnei mizbakh ihoh 'elohekha. ve'anita ve'amarta lifnei ihoh 'elohekha 'arami 'obed 'abi vayeired mizraymah vayagar sham bimtei me'at vayhi sham lego gadol 'azum varab. vayarei'u 'otanu hamizrim vai'anunu vayitenu 'aleinu 'abodah qashah. vaniz'aq 'el ihoh 'elohei 'aboteinu vayishma' ihoh 'et qoleinu vayar 'et 'aneyeinu ve'et 'amaleinu ve'et lakhazeinu. vayozi'einu ihoh mimizrayim beyad khazaqah ubizroa' netuyah ubemora gadol ube'otot ubemofetim. vaybi'einu 'el hamaqom hazeh vayiten lanu 'et ha'arez hazot 'erez zabat khalab udebash. ve'atah hineh heibeiti 'et reishit peri ha'adamah 'asher natatah li ihoh vehinakhto lifnei ihoh 'elohekha vehishtakhavita lifnei ihoh 'elohekha. vesamakhta bekhal hatob 'asher natan lekha ihoh 'elohekha ulebeitekha 'atah vehaleivi vehager 'asher beqirbekha. ki tekhaleh la'ser 'et kal ma'sar tebu'atekha bashanah hashelishit shenat hama'aser venatatah laleivi lager layatom vela'almanah ve'akhelu bish'arekha vesabei'u. ve'amarta lifnei ihoh 'elohekha bi'arti haqodesh min habayit vegam netativ laleivi velager layatom vela'almanah kekhal mizvatekha 'asher zivitani lo 'abarti mimizvotekha velo shakhakheti. lo 'akhalti be'oni mimenu velo bi'arti mimenu betamei velo natati mimenu lemet shama'ti beqol ihoh 'elohai 'asiti kekhol 'asher zivitani. hashqifah mime'on qadshekha min hashamayim ubarekh 'et 'amekha 'et yisra'el ve'et ha'adamah 'asher natatah lanu ka'asher nishba'ta la'aboteinu 'erez zabat khalab udebash. hayom hazeh ihoh 'elohekha mezavekha la'asot 'et hakhuqim ha'eleh ve'et hamishpatim veshamarta ve'asita 'otam bekhal lebabekha ubekhal nafshekha. 'et ihoh he'emarta hayom lihyot lekha leilohim velalekhet bidrakhav velishmor khuqav umizvotav umishpatav velishmoa' beqolo. ihoh he'emirekha hayom lihyot lo le'am segulah ka'asher diber lakh velishmor kal mizvotav. uletitekha 'elyon 'al kal hagoyim 'asher 'asah lithilah uleshem uletif'aret velihyotekha 'am qadosh ihoh 'elohekha ka'asher diber. vayzav mosheh veziqnei yisra'el 'et ha'am leimor shamor 'et kal hamizvah 'asher 'anokhi mezaveh 'etkhem hayom. vehayah bayom 'asher ta'abru 'et hayarden 'el ha'arez 'asher ihoh 'elohekha noten lakh vahaqeimota lekha 'abanim gedolot vesadta 'otam basid. vekhatabta 'aleihen 'et kal dibrei hatorah hazot be'aberekha lema'an 'asher tabo 'el ha'arez 'asher ihoh 'elohekha noten lekha 'erez zabat khalab udebash ka'asher diber ihoh 'elohei 'abotekha lakh. vehayah be'aberekhem 'et hayarden taqimu 'et ha'abanim ha'eleh 'asher 'anokhi mezaveh 'etkhem hayom behar 'eibal vesadta 'otam basid. ubanita sham mizbeiakh ihoh 'elohekha mizbakh 'abanim lo tanif 'aleihem barzel. 'abanim sheleimot tibneh 'et mizbakh ihoh 'elohekha veha'alita 'alav 'olot ihoh 'elohekha. vezabakhta shelamim ve'akhalta sham vesamakhta lifnei ihoh 'elohekha. vekhatabta 'al ha'abanim 'et kal dibrei hatorah hazot ba'er heiteb. vaydaber mosheh vehakohanim halviyim 'el kal yisra'el leimor hasket ushema' yisra'el hayom hazeh nihyeita le'am ihoh 'elohekha. veshama'ta beqol ihoh 'elohekha ve'asita 'et mizvotav ve'et khuqav 'asher 'anokhi mezavekha hayom. vayzav mosheh 'et ha'am bayom hahu leimor. 'eleh ya'amdu lebarekh 'et ha'am 'al har gerizim be'aberekhem 'et hayarden shim'on veleivi vihudah veyisashkhar veyosef ubinyamin. ve'eleh ya'amdu 'al haqelalah behar 'eibal re'uben gad ve'asher uzebulun dan venaftali. ve'anu halviyim ve'ameru 'el kal 'ish yisra'el qol ram. 'arur ha'ish 'asher ya'aseh fesel umaseikhah to'abat ihoh ma'aseh yedei kharash vesam basater ve'anu khal ha'am ve'ameru 'amen. 'arur maqleh 'abiv ve'imo ve'amar kal ha'am 'amen. 'arur masig gebul rei'eihu ve'amar kal ha'am 'amen. 'arur mashgeh 'iver badarekh ve'amar kal ha'am 'amen. 'arur mateh mishpat ger yatom ve'almanah ve'amar kal ha'am 'amen. 'arur shokheb 'im 'eishet 'abiv ki gilah kenaf 'abiv ve'amar kal ha'am 'amen. 'arur shokheb 'im kal beheimah ve'amar kal ha'am 'amen. 'arur shokheb 'im 'akhoto bat 'abiv 'o bat 'imo ve'amar kal ha'am 'amen. 'arur shokheb 'im khotanto ve'amar kal ha'am 'amen. 'arur makeh rei'eihu basater ve'amar kal ha'am 'amen. 'arur loqeiakh shokhad lehakot nefesh dam naqi ve'amar kal ha'am 'amen. 'arur 'asher lo yaqim 'et dibrei hatorah hazot la'asot 'otam ve'amar kal ha'am 'amen. vehayah 'im shamoa' tishma' beqol ihoh 'elohekha lishmor la'asot 'et kal mizvotav 'asher 'anokhi mezavekha hayom unetanekha ihoh 'elohekha 'elyon 'al kal goyei ha'arez. uba'u 'alekha kal haberakhot ha'eleh vehisigukha ki tishma' beqol ihoh 'elohekha. barukh 'atah ba'ir ubarukh 'atah basadeh. barukh peri bitnekha uferi 'admatekha uferi behemtekha shegar 'alafekha ve'ashterot zonekha. barukh tan'akha umish'artekha. barukh 'atah bebo'ekha ubarukh 'atah bezeitekha. yiten ihoh 'et 'oyebekha haqamim 'alekha nigafim lefanekha bederekh 'ekhad yeize'u 'eilekha ubeshib'ah derakhim yanusu lefanekha. yezav ihoh 'itekha 'et haberakhah ba'asamekha ubekhol mishlakh yadekha ubeirakhkha ba'arez 'asher ihoh 'elohekha noten lakh. yeqimekha ihoh lo le'am qadosh ka'asher nishba' lakh ki tishmor 'et mizvot ihoh 'elohekha vehalakhta bidrakhav. vera'u kal 'amei ha'arez ki shem ihoh niqra 'alekha veyare'u mimeka. vehotirkha ihoh letobah bifri bitnekha ubifri behamtekha ubifri 'admatekha 'al ha'adamah 'asher nishba' ihoh la'abotekha latet lakh. yiftakh ihoh lekha 'et 'ozaro hatob 'et hashamayim latet metar 'arzekha be'ito ulebarekh 'et kal ma'aseh yadekha vehilvita goyim rabim ve'atah lo tilveh. unetanekha ihoh lerosh velo lezanab vehayita raq lema'lah velo tihyeh lematah ki tishma' 'el mizvot ihoh 'elohekha 'asher 'anokhi mezavekha hayom lishmor vela'asot. velo tasur mikal hadebarim 'asher 'anokhi mezaveh 'etkhem hayom yamin usemol lalekhet 'akharei 'elohim 'akheirim le'abedam. vehayah 'im lo tishma' beqol ihoh 'elohekha lishmor la'asot 'et kal mizvotav vekhuqotav 'asher 'anokhi mezavekha hayom uba'u 'alekha kal haqelalot ha'eleh vehisigukha. 'arur 'atah ba'ir ve'arur 'atah basadeh. 'arur tan'akha umish'artekha. 'arur peri bitnekha uferi 'admatekha shegar 'alafekha ve'ashterot zonekha. 'arur 'atah bebo'ekha ve'arur 'atah bezeitekha. yeshalakh ihoh bekha 'et hame'eirah 'et hamehumah ve'et hamig'eret bekhal mishlakh yadekha 'asher ta'aseh 'ad hishamedkha ve'ad 'abadekha maher mipenei roa' ma'alalekha 'asher 'azabtani. yadbeq ihoh bekha 'et hadaber 'ad kaloto 'otekha mei'al ha'adamah 'asher 'atah ba shamah lerishtah. yakekhah ihoh bashakhefet ubaqadakhat ubadaleqet ubakharkhur ubakhereb ubashidafon ubayeiraqon uredafukha 'ad 'abedekha. vehayu shamekha 'asher 'al roshekha nekhoshet veha'arez 'asher takhtekha barzel. yiten ihoh 'et metar 'arzekha 'abaq ve'afar min hashamayim yeired 'alekha 'ad hishamedakh. yitenkha ihoh nigaf lifnei 'oyebekha bederekh 'ekhad teizei 'eilav ubeshib'ah derakhim tanus lefanav vehayita leza'avah lekhol mamlekhot ha'arez. vehayetah niblatekha lema'akhal lekhal 'of hashamayim ulebehemat ha'arez ve'en makharid. yakekhah ihoh bishkhin mizrayim uba'ofalim ubatekhorim ubagarab ubekhares 'asher lo tukhal leheirafei. yakekhah ihoh beshiga'on ube'ivaron ubetimhon leibab. vehayita memashesh bazahorayim ka'asher yemashesh ha'iver ba'afeilah velo tazliakh 'et derakhekha vehayita 'akh 'ashuq vegazul kal hayamim ve'en moshia'. 'ishah te'ares ve'ish 'akher yishgalenah yishkabenah bayit tibneh velo teisheb bo kerem tita' velo tekhalelenu. shorkha tabuakh le'einekha velo tokhal mimenu khamorekha gazul milefanekha velo yashub lakh zonekha netunot le'oyebekha ve'en lekha moshia'. banekha ubenotekha netunim le'am 'akher ve'einekha ro'ot vekhalot 'aleihem kal hayom ve'en le'el yadekha. peri 'admatekha vekhal yegi'akha yokhal 'am 'asher lo yada'eta vehayita raq 'ashuq verazuz kal hayamim. vehayita meshuga' mimar'eh 'einekha 'asher tir'eh. yakekhah ihoh bishkhin ra' 'al habirkayim ve'al hashoqayim 'asher lo tukhal leheirafei mikaf raglekha ve'ad qadeqodekha. yolekh ihoh 'otekha ve'et malkekha 'asher taqim 'alekha 'el go 'asher lo yada'ta 'atah va'abotekha ve'abadta sham 'elohim 'akheirim 'ez va'aben. vehayita leshamah lemashal velishninah bekhol ha'amim 'asher yenahegkha ihoh shamah. zera' rab tozi hasadeh ume'at te'esof ki yakhselenu ha'arbeh. keramim tita' ve'abadeta veyayin lo tishteh velo te'egor ki tokhelenu hatola'at. zeitim yihyu lekha bekhal gebulekha veshemen lo tasukh ki yishal zeitekha. banim ubanot tolid velo yihyu lakh ki yeilekhu bashebi. kal 'eizekha uferi 'admatekha yeyaresh hazelazal. hager 'asher beqirbekha ya'aleh 'alekha ma'lah ma'elah ve'atah teired matah matah. hu yalvekha ve'atah lo talvenu hu yihyeh lerosh ve'atah tihyeh lezanab. uba'u 'alekha kal haqelalot
