ha'eleh uredafukha vehisigukha 'ad hishamedakh ki lo shama'ta beqol ihoh 'elohekha lishmor mizvotav vekhuqotav 'asher zivakh. vehayu bekha le'ot ulemofet ubezar'akha 'ad 'olam. takhat 'asher lo 'abadta 'et ihoh 'elohekha besimkhah ubetub leibab meirob kol. ve'abadta 'et 'oyebekha 'asher yeshalekhenu ihoh bakh bera'ab ubezama ube'eirom ubekhoser kol venatan 'ol barzel 'al zavarekha 'ad hishmido 'otakh. yisa ihoh 'alekha go meirakhoq miqzeh ha'arez ka'asher yid'eh hanasher go 'asher lo tishma' leshono. go 'az panim 'asher lo yisa fanim lezaqen vena'ar lo yakhon. ve'akhal peri behemtekha uferi 'admatekha 'ad hishamedakh 'asher lo yash'ir lekha dagan tirosh veyizhar shegar 'alafekha ve'ashterot zonekha 'ad ha'abido 'otakh. veheizar lekha bekhal she'arekha 'ad redet khomotekha hagebohot vehabezurot 'asher 'atah boteiakh bahen bekhal 'arzekha veheizar lekha bekhal she'arekha bekhal 'arzekha 'asher natan ihoh 'elohekha lakh. ve'akhalta feri bitnekha besar banekha ubenotekha 'asher natan lekha ihoh 'elohekha bemazor ubemazoq 'asher yaziq lekha 'oyebekha. ha'ish harakh bekha vehe'anog me'od teira' 'eino be'akhiv ube'eishet kheiqo ubeyeter banav 'asher yotir. mitet le'akhad meihem mibesar banav 'asher yokhel mibeli hish'ir lo kol bemazor ubemazoq 'asher yaziq lekha 'oyibkha bekhal she'arekha. harakah bekha veha'anugah 'asher lo nisetah khaf raglah hazeg 'al ha'arez meihit'aneg umeirokh teira' 'einah be'ish kheiqah ubibnah ubebitah. ubeshilyatah hayozet miben ragleha ubebaneha 'asher teiled ki tokhelem bekhoser kol basater bemazor ubemazoq 'asher yaziq lekha 'oyibkha bish'arekha. 'im lo tishmor la'asot 'et kal dibrei hatorah hazot haketubim baseifer hazeh leyir'ah 'et hashem hanikhbad vehanora hazeh 'et ihoh 'elohekha. vehifla ihoh 'et makotekha ve'et makot zar'ekha makot gedolot vene'emanot vakholayim ra'im vene'emanim. veheishib bekha 'et kal madveh mizrayim 'asher yagoreta mipeneihem vedabequ bakh. gam kal kholi vekhal makah 'asher lo khatub beseifer hatorah hazot ya'lem ihoh 'alekha 'ad hishamedakh. venish'artem bimtei me'at takhat 'asher heyitem kekhokhbei hashamayim larob ki lo shama'ta beqol ihoh 'elohekha. vehayah ka'asher sas ihoh 'aleikhem leheitib 'etkhem uleharbot 'etkhem ken yasis ihoh 'aleikhem leha'abid 'etkhem ulehashmid 'etkhem venisakhtem mei'al ha'adamah 'asher 'atah ba shamah lerishtah. vehefizekha ihoh bekhal ha'amim miqzeh ha'arez ve'ad qezeh ha'arez ve'abadta sham 'elohim 'akheirim 'asher lo yada'ta 'atah va'abotekha 'ez va'aben. ubagoyim hahem lo targia' velo yihyeh manoakh lekhaf raglekha venatan ihoh lekha sham leb ragaz vekhilyon 'einayim veda'abon nafesh. vehayu khayekha telu'im lekha mineged ufakhadta laylah veyomam velo ta'amin bekhayekha. baboqer tomar mi yiten 'ereb uba'ereb tomar mi yiten boqer mipakhad lebabekha 'asher tifkhad umimar'eh 'einekha 'asher tir'eh. veheshibekha ihoh mizrayim ba'oniyot baderekh 'asher 'amarti lekha lo tosif 'od lir'otah vehitmakartem sham le'oyebekha la'abadim velishfakhot ve'en qoneh. 'eleh dibrei haberit 'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh likhrot 'et benei yisra'el be'erez mo'ab milebad haberit 'asher karat 'itam bekhoreb. vayiqra mosheh 'el kal yisra'el vayomer 'aleihem 'atem re'item 'et kal 'asher 'asah ihoh le'eineikhem be'erez mizrayim lefar'oh ulekhal 'abadav ulekhal 'arzo. hamasot hagedolot 'asher ra'u 'einekha ha'otot vehamofetim hagedolim hahem. velo natan ihoh lakhem leb lada'at ve'einayim lir'ot ve'azenayim lishmoa' 'ad hayom hazeh. va'olekh 'etkhem 'arba'im shanah bamidbar lo balu salmoteikhem mei'aleikhem vena'alkha lo baletah mei'al raglekha. lekhem lo 'akhaltem veyayin vesheikhar lo shetitem lema'an teide'u ki 'ani ihoh 'eloheikhem. vatabo'u 'el hamaqom hazeh vayeizei sikhon melekh kheshbon ve'og melekh habashan liqrateinu lamilkhamah vanakem. vaniqakh 'et 'arzam vanitenah lenakhalah lar'ubeini velagadi velakhazi sheibet hamnashi. ushemartem 'et dibrei haberit hazot va'asitem 'otam lema'an taskilu 'et kal 'asher ta'asun. 'atem nizabim hayom kulekhem lifnei ihoh 'eloheikhem rasheikhem shibteikhem ziqneikhem veshotereikhem kol 'ish yisra'el. tapekhem nesheikhem vegeirekha 'asher beqereb makhanekha meikhoteb 'eizekha 'ad sho'eb meimekha. le'aberekha bibrit ihoh 'elohekha ube'alato 'asher ihoh 'elohekha koret 'imekha hayom. lema'an haqim 'otekha hayom lo le'am vehu yihyeh lekha leilohim ka'asher diber lakh vekha'asher nishba' la'abotekha le'abraham leyizkhaq uleya'aqob. velo 'itekhem lebadekhem 'anokhi koret 'et haberit hazot ve'et ha'alah hazot. ki 'et 'asher yeshno poh 'imanu 'omed hayom lifnei ihoh 'eloheinu ve'et 'asher 'einenu poh 'imanu hayom. ki 'atem yeda'tem 'et 'asher yashabnu be'erez mizrayim ve'et 'asher 'abarnu beqereb hagoyim 'asher 'abartem. vatir'u 'et shiquzeihem ve'et giluleihem 'ez va'eben kesef vezahab 'asher 'imahem. pen yesh bakhem 'ish 'o 'ishah 'o mishpakhah 'o sheibet 'asher lebabo foneh hayom mei'im ihoh 'eloheinu lalekhet la'abod 'et 'elohei hagoyim hahem pen yesh bakhem shoresh poreh rosh vela'anah. vehayah beshame'o 'et dibrei ha'alah hazot vehitbarekh bilbabo leimor shalom yihyeh li ki bishrirut libi 'eilekh lema'an sefot haravah 'et hazemei'ah. lo yobeh ihoh seloakh lo ki 'az ye'shan 'af ihoh veqin'ato ba'ish hahu verabezah bo kal ha'alah haketubah baseifer hazeh umakhah ihoh 'et shemo mitakhat hashamayim. vehibdilo ihoh lera'ah mikol shibtei yisra'el kekhol 'alot haberit haketubah beseifer hatorah hazeh. ve'amar hador ha'akharon beneikhem 'asher yaqumu mei'akhareikhem vehanakheri 'asher yabo mei'erez rekhoqah vera'u 'et makot ha'arez hahiv ve'et takhalu'eha 'asher khilah ihoh bah. gaferit vamelakh sereifah khal 'arzah lo tizara' velo tazmiakh velo ya'aleh bah kal 'eiseb kemahpeikhat sedom va'amorah 'admah uzebyim uzeboyim 'asher hafakh ihoh be'apo ubakhamato. ve'ameru kal hagoyim 'al meh 'asah ihoh kakhah la'arez hazot meh khori ha'af hagadol hazeh. ve'ameru 'al 'asher 'azebu 'et berit ihoh 'elohei 'abotam 'asher karat 'imam behozi'o 'otam mei'erez mizrayim. vayeilekhu vaya'abdu 'elohim 'akheirim vayishtakhavu lahem 'elohim 'asher lo yeda'um velo khalaq lahem. vayikhar 'af ihoh ba'arez hahiv lehabi 'aleha 'et kal haqelalah haketubah baseifer hazeh. vayiteshem ihoh mei'al 'admatam be'af ubekheimah ubeqezef gadol vayashlikhem 'el 'erez 'akheret kayom hazeh. hanistarot ihoh 'eloheinu vehaniglot lanu ulebaneinu 'ad 'olam la'asot 'et kal dibrei hatorah hazot. vehayah khi yabo'u 'alekha kal hadebarim ha'eleh haberakhah vehaqelalah 'asher natati lefanekha vahasheibota 'el lebabekha bekhal hagoyim 'asher hidikhakha ihoh 'elohekha shamah. veshabta 'ad ihoh 'elohekha veshama'ta beqolo kekhol 'asher 'anokhi mezavekha hayom 'atah ubanekha bekhal lebabekha ubekhal nafshekha. veshab ihoh 'elohekha 'et shebutekha verikhamekha veshab veqibezkha mikal ha'amim 'asher hefizekha ihoh 'elohekha shamah. 'im yihyeh nidakhakha biqzeh hashamayim misham yeqabezkha ihoh 'elohekha umisham yiqakhekha. vehebi'akha ihoh 'elohekha 'el ha'arez 'asher yareshu 'abotekha virishtah veheitibkha vehirbekha mei'abotekha. umal ihoh 'elohekha 'et lebabekha ve'et lebab zar'ekha le'ahabah 'et ihoh 'elohekha bekhal lebabekha ubekhal nafshekha lema'an khayekha. venatan ihoh 'elohekha 'et kal ha'alot ha'eleh 'al 'oyebekha ve'al sone'ekha 'asher redafukha. ve'atah tashub veshama'ta beqol ihoh ve'asita 'et kal mizvotav 'asher 'anokhi mezavekha hayom. vehotirekha ihoh 'elohekha bekhol ma'aseh yadekha bifri bitnekha ubifri behemtekha ubifri 'admatekha letobah ki yashub ihoh lasus 'alekha letob ka'asher sas 'al 'abotekha. ki tishma' beqol ihoh 'elohekha lishmor mizvotav vekhuqotav haketubah beseifer hatorah hazeh ki tashub 'el ihoh 'elohekha bekhal lebabekha ubekhal nafshekha. ki hamizvah hazot 'asher 'anokhi mezavekha hayom lo niflet hi mimekha velo rekhoqah hi lo bashamayim hi leimor mi ya'aleh lanu hashamaymah veyiqakheha lanu veyashmi'einu 'otah vena'asenah. velo mei'eiber layam hi leimor mi ya'abar lanu 'el 'eiber hayam veyiqakheha lanu veyashmi'einu 'otah vena'asenah. ki qarob 'eilekha hadabar me'od befikha ubilbabekha la'asoto. re'eh natati lefanekha hayom 'et hakhayim ve'et hatob ve'et hamavet ve'et hara'. 'asher 'anokhi mezavekha hayom le'ahabah 'et ihoh 'elohekha lalekhet bidrakhav velishmor mizvotav vekhuqotav umishpatav vekhayita verabita ubeirakhkha ihoh 'elohekha ba'arez 'asher 'atah ba shamah lerishtah. ve'im yifneh lebabekha velo tishma' venidakhta vehishtakhavita leilohim 'akheirim va'abadtam. higadti lakhem hayom ki 'abod tobeidun lo ta'arikhun yamim 'al ha'adamah 'asher 'atah 'ober 'et hayarden labo shamah lerishtah. ha'idoti bakhem hayom 'et hashamayim ve'et ha'arez hakhayim vehamavet natati lefanekha haberakhah vehaqelalah ubakharta bakhayim lema'an tikhyeh 'atah vezar'ekha. le'ahabah 'et ihoh 'elohekha lishmoa' beqolo uledabeqah bo ki hu khayekha ve'orekh yamekha lashebet 'al ha'adamah 'asher nishba' ihoh la'abotekha le'abraham leyizkhaq uleya'aqob latet lahem. vayeilekh mosheh vaydaber 'et hadebarim ha'eleh 'el kal yisra'el. vayomer 'aleihem ben mei'ah ve'esrim shanah 'anokhi hayom lo 'ukhal 'od lazet velabo ihoh 'amar 'eilai lo ta'abor 'et hayarden hazeh. ihoh 'elohekha hu 'ober lefanekha hu yashmid 'et hagoyim ha'eleh milefanekha virishtam yehoshua' hu 'ober lefanekha ka'asher diber ihoh. ve'asah ihoh lahem ka'asher 'asah lesikhon ule'og malkhei ha'emori ule'arzam 'asher hishmid 'otam. unetanam ihoh lifneikhem va'asitem lahem kekhal hamizvah 'asher ziviti 'etkhem. khizqu ve'imzu 'al tire'u ve'al ta'arzu mipeneihem ki ihoh 'elohekha hu haholekh 'imakh lo yarpekha velo ya'azbeka. vayiqra mosheh lihoshua' vayomer 'eilav le'einei khal yisra'el khazaq ve'emaz ki 'atah tabo 'et ha'am hazeh 'el ha'arez 'asher nishba' ihoh la'abotam latet lahem ve'atah tankhilenah 'otam. ihoh hu haholekh lefanekha hu yihyeh 'imakh lo yarpekha velo ya'azbeka lo tira velo teikhat. vayikhtob mosheh 'et hatorah hazot vayitenah 'el hakohanim benei leivi hanose'im 'et 'aron berit ihoh ve'el kal ziqnei yisra'el. vayzav mosheh 'otam leimor miqez sheba' shanim bemo'ed shenat hashemitah bekhag hasukot. bebo khal yisra'el leira'ot 'et penei ihoh 'elohekha bamaqom 'asher yibkhar tiqra 'et hatorah hazot neged kal yisra'el be'azeneihem. haqhel 'et ha'am ha'anashim vehanashim vehataf vegeirekha 'asher bish'arekha lema'an yishme'u ulema'an yilmedu veyare'u 'et ihoh 'eloheikhem veshameru la'asot 'et kal dibrei hatorah hazot. ubeneihem 'asher lo yade'u yishme'u velamedu leyir'ah 'et ihoh 'eloheikhem kal hayamim 'asher 'atem khayim 'al ha'adamah 'asher 'atem 'oberim 'et hayarden shamah lerishtah. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh hen qarebu yamekha lamut qera 'et yehoshua' vehityazebu be'ohel mo'ed va'azavenu vayeilekh mosheh vihoshua' vayityazebu be'ohel mo'ed. vayeira ihoh ba'ohel be'amud 'anan vaya'amod 'amud he'anan 'al petakh ha'ohel. vayomer ihoh 'el mosheh hinekha shokheb 'im 'abotekha veqam ha'am hazeh vezanah 'akharei 'elohei neikhar ha'arez 'asher hu ba shamah beqirbo va'azabani veheifer 'et beriti 'asher karati 'ito. vekharah 'api bo bayom hahu va'azabtim vehistarti fanai meihem vehayah le'ekhol umeza'uhu ra'ot rabot vezarot ve'amar bayom hahu halo 'al ki 'en 'elohai beqirbi meza'uni hara'ot ha'eleh. ve'anokhi haster 'astir panai bayom hahu 'al kal hara'ah 'asher 'asah ki fanah 'el 'elohim 'akheirim. ve'atah kitbu lakhem 'et hashirah hazot velamedah 'et benei yisra'el simah befihem lema'an tihyeh li hashirah hazot le'ed bibnei yisra'el. ki 'abi'enu 'el ha'adamah 'asher nishba'ti la'abotav zabat khalab udebash ve'akhal vesaba' vedashen ufanah 'el 'elohim 'akheirim va'abadum veni'azuni veheifer 'et beriti. vehayah ki timzena 'oto ra'ot rabot vezarot ve'anetah hashirah hazot lefanav le'ed ki lo tishakhakh mipi zar'o ki yada'ti 'et yizro 'asher hu 'oseh hayom beterem 'abi'enu 'el ha'arez 'asher nishba'eti. vayikhtob mosheh 'et hashirah hazot bayom hahu vaylamedah 'et benei yisra'el. vayzav 'et yehoshua' bin nun vayomer khazaq ve'emaz ki 'atah tabi 'et benei yisra'el 'el ha'arez 'asher nishba'ti lahem ve'anokhi 'ehyeh 'imakh. vayhi kekhalot mosheh likhtob 'et dibrei hatorah hazot 'al seifer 'ad tumam. vayzav mosheh 'et halviyim nose'ei 'aron berit ihoh leimor. laqoakh 'et seifer hatorah hazeh vesamtem 'oto mizad 'aron berit ihoh 'eloheikhem vehayah sham bekha le'ed. ki 'anokhi yada'ti 'et meryekha ve'et 'arepekha haqasheh hen be'odeni khai 'imakhem hayom mamrim heyitem 'im ihoh ve'af ki 'akharei moti. haqhilu 'eilai 'et kal ziqnei shibteikhem veshotereikhem va'adaberah be'azeneihem 'et hadebarim ha'eleh ve'a'idah bam 'et hashamayim ve'et ha'arez. ki yada'ti 'akharei moti ki hashkhet tashkhitun vesartem min haderekh 'asher ziviti 'etkhem veqarat 'etkhem hara'ah be'akharit hayamim ki ta'asu 'et hara' be'einei ihoh lehakh'iso bema'aseh yedeikhem. vaydaber mosheh be'azenei kal qehal yisra'el 'et dibrei hashirah hazot 'ad tumam. ha'azinu hashamayim va'adabeirah vetishma' ha'arez 'imrei fi. ya'arof kamatar liqkhi tizal katal 'imrati kis'irim 'alei deshe vekhirbibim 'alei 'eiseb. ki shem ihoh 'eqra habu godel leiloheinu. hazur tamim pa'olo ki khal derakhav mishpat 'el 'emunah ve'en 'avel zadiq veyashar hu. shikhet lo lo banav mumam dor 'iqesh ufetaltol. ha ihoh tigmelu zot 'am nabal velo khakham halo hu 'abikha qanekha hu 'asekha vaykhonenekha. zekhor yemot 'olam binu shenot dor vador she'al 'abikha veyageidekha zeqeinekha veyomeru lakh. behankhel 'elyon goyim behafrido benei 'adam yazeb gebulot 'amim lemispar benei yisra'el. ki kheileq ihoh 'amo ya'aqob khebel nakhalato. yimza'eihu be'erez midbar ubetohu yelel yeshimon yesobebenhu yeboneihu yizerenhu ke'ishon 'eino. kenesher ya'ir qino 'al gozalav yerakhef yifros kenafav yiqakheihu yisa'eihu 'al 'ebrato. ihoh badad yankhenu ve'en 'imo 'el neikhar. yarkibeihu 'al bamotei bamotei 'arez vayokhal tenubot sadai vayeiniqeihu debash misela' veshemen meikhalmish zur. khem'at baqar vakhaleb zon 'im kheileb karim ve'eilim benei bashan ve'atudim 'im kheileb kilyot khitah vedam 'einab tishteh khamer. vayishman yeshurun vayib'at shamanta 'abita kasita vayitosh 'eloha 'asahu vaynabel zur yeshu'ato. yaqni'uhu bezarim beto'eibot yakh'isuhu. yizbekhu lasheidim lo 'eloha 'elohim lo yeda'um khadashim miqarob ba'u lo se'arum 'aboteikhem. zur yeladekha teshi vatishkakh 'el mekholelekha. vayar ihoh vayin'az mika'as banav ubenotav. vayomer 'astirah fanai meihem 'er'eh mah 'akharitam ki dor tahpukhot hemah banim lo 'eimun bam. hem qin'uni belo 'el ki'asuni behableihem va'ani 'aqni'em belo 'am bego nabal 'akh'isem. ki 'esh qadekhah be'api vatiqad 'ad she'ol takhtit vatokhal 'erez vibulah vatelahet mosdei harim. 'aspeh 'aleimo ra'ot khizai 'akhaleh bam. mezei ra'ab ulekhumei reshef veqeteb meriri veshen beheimot 'ashalakh bam 'im khamat zokhalei 'afar. mikhuz teshakel khereb umeikhadarim 'eimah gam bakhur gam betulah yoneq 'im 'ish seibah. 'amarti 'af'eihem 'ashbitah mei'enosh zikhram. lulei ka'as 'oyeb 'agur pen yenakeru zareimo pen yomeru yadeinu ramah velo ihoh pa'al kal zot. ki go 'obad 'eizot hemah ve'en bahem tebunah. lu khakhemu yaskilu zot yabinu le'akharitam. 'eikhah yirdof 'ekhad 'elef ushenayim yanisu rebabah 'im lo ki zuram mekharam ihoh hisgiram. ki lo khezureinu zuram ve'oyebeinu pelilim. ki migefen sedom gafnam umishadmot 'amorah 'anabeimo 'inebei rosh 'ashkelot merorot lamo. khamat taninim yeinam verosh petanim 'akhzar. halo hu kamus 'imadi khatum be'ozrotai. li naqam veshilem le'et tamut raglam ki qarob yom 'eidam vekhash 'atidot lamo. ki yadin ihoh 'amo ve'al 'abadav yitnekham ki yir'eh ki 'azelat yad ve'efes 'azur ve'azub. ve'amar 'ei 'eloheimo zur khasayu bo. 'asher kheileb zebakheimo yokheilu yishtu yen nesikham yaqumu veya'zerukhem yehi 'aleikhem sitrah. re'u 'atah ki 'ani 'ani hu ve'en 'elohim 'imadi 'ani 'amit va'akhayeh makhazti va'ani 'erpa ve'en miyadi mazil. ki 'esa 'el shamayim yadi ve'amarti khai 'anokhi le'olam. 'im shanoti beraq kharbi vetokhez bemishpat yadi 'ashib naqam lezarai velimsan'ai 'ashalem. 'ashkir khizai midam vekharbi tokhal basar midam khalal veshibyah meirosh par'ot 'oyeb. harninu goyim 'amo ki dam 'abadav yiqom venaqam yashib lezarav vekhiper 'admato 'amo. vayabo mosheh vaydaber 'et kal dibrei hashirah hazot be'azenei ha'am hu vehosheia' bin nun. vaykhal mosheh ledaber 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh 'el kal yisra'el. vayomer 'aleihem simu lebabkhem lekhal hadebarim 'asher 'anokhi mei'id bakhem hayom 'asher tezavum 'et beneikhem lishmor la'asot 'et kal dibrei hatorah hazot. ki lo dabar req hu mikem ki hu khayeikhem ubadabar hazeh ta'arikhu yamim 'al ha'adamah 'asher 'atem 'oberim 'et hayarden shamah lerishtah. vaydaber ihoh 'el mosheh be'ezem hayom hazeh leimor. 'aleh 'el har ha'abarim hazeh har nebo 'asher be'erez mo'ab 'asher 'al penei yereikho ure'eh 'et 'erez kena'an 'asher 'ani noten libnei yisra'el la'akhuzah. umut bahar 'asher 'atah 'oleh shamah vehei'asef 'el 'amekha ka'asher met 'aharon 'akhikha behor hahar vayei'asef 'el 'amav. 'al 'asher me'altem bi betokh benei yisra'el bemei meribat qadesh midbar zin 'al 'asher lo qidashtem 'oti betokh benei yisra'el. ki mineged tir'eh 'et ha'arez veshamah lo tabo 'el ha'arez 'asher 'ani noten libnei yisra'el. vezot haberakhah 'asher beirakh mosheh 'ish ha'elohim 'et benei yisra'el lifnei moto. vayomar ihoh misinai ba vezarakh misei'ir lamo hofia' meihar paran ve'atah meiribbot qodesh mimino 'eishedat 'esh dat lamo. 'af khobeb 'amim kal qedoshav beyadekha vehem tuku leraglekha yisa midaberotekha. torah zivah lanu mosheh morashah qehilat ya'aqob. vayhi bishurun melekh behit'asef rashei 'am yakhad shibtei yisra'el. yekhi re'uben ve'al yamot vihi metav mispar. vezot lihudah vayomar shema' ihoh qol yehudah ve'el 'amo tebi'enu yadav rab lo ve'eizer mizarav tihyeh. uleleivi 'amar tumekha ve'urekha le'ish khasidekha 'asher nisito bemasah teribeihu 'al mei meribah. ha'omer le'abiv ule'imo lo re'itiv ve'et 'ekhav lo hikir ve'et bano banav lo yada' ki shameru 'imratekha uberitekha yinzoru. yoru mishpatekha leya'aqob vetoratekha leyisra'el yasimu qetorah be'apekha vekhalil 'al mizbekhekha. barekh ihoh kheilo ufo'al yadav tirzeh mekhaz matenayim qamav umesan'av min yequmun. lebinyamin 'amar yedid ihoh yishkon labetakh 'alav khofef 'alav kal hayom uben keteifav shakhen. uleyosef 'amar meborekhet ihoh 'arzo mimeged shamayim mital umitehom robezet takhat. umimeged tebu'ot shamesh umimeged geresh yerakhim. umeirosh harrei qedem umimeged gib'ot 'olam. umimeged 'erez umelo'ah urezon shokheni seneh tabotah lerosh yosef uleqadeqod nezir 'ekhav. bekhor shoro hadar lo veqarnei re'em qarnav bahem 'amim yenagakh yakhdav 'afsei 'arez vehem ribbot 'efrayim vehem 'alfei menasheh. velizbulun 'amar semakh zebulun bezeitekha veyisashkhar be'ohalekha. 'amim har yiqra'u sham yizbekhu zibkhei zedeq ki shefa' yamim yinaqu usefunei temunei khol. ulegad 'amar barukh markhib gad kelabi shakhen vetaraf zeroa' 'af qadeqod. vayar reishit lo ki sham khelqat mekhoqeq safun vayeitei rashei 'am zidqat ihoh 'asah umishpatav 'im yisra'el. uledan 'amar dan gur 'aryeh yezaneq min habashan. ulenaftali 'amar naftali seba' razon umalei birkat ihoh yam vedarom yerashah. ule'asher 'amar barukh mibanim 'asher yehi rezui 'ekhav vetobel bashemen raglo. barzel unekhoshet min'alekha ukheyamekha dabe'ekha. 'en ka'el yeshurun rokheb shamayim be'ezrekha ubega'avato shekhaqim. me'onah 'elohei qedem umitakhat zero'ot 'olam vaygaresh mipanekha 'oyeb vayomer hashmed. vayishkon yisra'el betakh badad 'en ya'aqob 'el 'erez dagan vetirosh 'af shamav ya'arfu tal. 'ashrekha yisra'el mi khamokha 'am nosha' ihoh magen 'ezrekha va'asher khereb ga'avatekha veyikakhashu 'oyebekha lakh ve'atah 'al bamoteimo tidrokh. vaya'al mosheh mei'arbot mo'ab 'el har nebo rosh hapisgah 'asher 'al penei yereikho vayar'eihu ihoh 'et kal ha'arez 'et hagil'ad 'ad dan. ve'et kal naftali ve'et 'erez 'efrayim umenasheh ve'et kal 'erez yehudah 'ad hayam ha'akharon. ve'et hanegeb ve'et hakikar biq'at yereikho 'ir hatemarim 'ad zo'ar. vayomer ihoh 'eilav zot ha'arez 'asher nishba'ti le'abraham leyizkhaq uleya'aqob leimor lezar'akha 'etenenah her'itikha be'einekha veshamah lo ta'abor. vayamat sham mosheh 'ebed ihoh be'erez mo'ab 'al pi ihoh. vayiqbor 'oto bagai be'erez mo'ab mul bet pe'or velo yada' 'ish 'et qeburato 'ad hayom hazeh. umosheh ben mei'ah ve'esrim shanah bemoto lo khahatah 'eino velo nas leikhoh. vayibku benei yisra'el 'et mosheh be'arbot mo'ab sheloshim yom vayitemu yemei bekhi 'eibel mosheh. vihoshua' bin nun malei ruakh khakhmah ki samakh mosheh 'et yadav 'alav vayishme'u 'eilav benei yisra'el vaya'asu ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. velo qam nabi 'od beyisra'el kemosheh 'asher yeda'o ihoh panim 'el panim. lekhal ha'otot vehamoftim 'asher shelakho ihoh la'asot be'erez mizrayim lefar'oh ulekhal 'abadav ulekhal 'arzo. ulekhol hayad hakhazaqah ulekhol hamora hagadol 'asher 'asah mosheh le'einei kal yisra'el.

vayhi 'akharei mot mosheh 'ebed ihoh vayomer ihoh 'el yehoshua' bin nun mesharet mosheh leimor. mosheh 'abdi met ve'atah qum 'abor 'et hayarden hazeh 'atah vekhal ha'am hazeh 'el ha'arez 'asher 'anokhi noten lahem libnei yisra'el. kal maqom 'asher tidrokh kaf raglekhem bo lakhem netativ ka'asher dibarti 'el mosheh. meihamidbar vehalebanon hazeh ve'ad hanahar hagadol nehar perat kol 'erez hakhitim ve'ad hayam hagadol mebo hashamesh yihyeh gebulekhem. lo yityazeb 'ish lefanekha kol yemei khayekha ka'asher hayiti 'im mosheh 'ehyeh 'imakh lo 'arpekha velo 'e'ezbeka. khazaq ve'emaz ki 'atah tankhil 'et ha'am hazeh 'et ha'arez 'asher nishba'ti la'abotam latet lahem. raq khazaq ve'emaz me'od lishmor la'asot kekhal hatorah 'asher zivekha mosheh 'abdi 'al tasur mimenu yamin usemol lema'an taskil bekhol 'asher teilekh. lo yamush seifer hatorah hazeh mipikha vehagita bo yomam valaylah lema'an tishmor la'asot kekhal hakatub bo ki 'az tazliakh 'et derakhekha ve'az taskil. halo zivitikha khazaq ve'emaz 'al ta'aroz ve'al teikhat ki 'imekha ihoh 'elohekha bekhol 'asher teilekh. vayzav yehoshua' 'et shoterei ha'am leimor. 'ibru beqereb hamakhaneh vezavu 'et ha'am leimor hakhinu lakhem zeidah ki be'od sheloshet yamim 'atem 'oberim 'et hayarden hazeh labo lareshet 'et ha'arez 'asher ihoh 'eloheikhem noten lakhem lerishtah. velar'ubeini velagadi velakhazi sheibet hamnasheh 'amar yehoshua' leimor. zakhor 'et hadabar 'asher zivah 'etkhem mosheh 'ebed ihoh leimor ihoh 'eloheikhem meiniakh lakhem venatan lakhem 'et ha'arez hazot. nesheikhem tapekhem umiqneikhem yeishebu ba'arez 'asher natan lakhem mosheh be'eiber hayarden ve'atem ta'abru khamushim lifnei 'akheikhem kol giborei hakhayil va'azartem 'otam. 'ad 'asher yaniakh ihoh la'akheikhem kakhem veyareshu gam hemah 'et ha'arez 'asher ihoh 'eloheikhem noten lahem veshabtem le'erez yerushatkhem virishtem 'otah 'asher natan lakhem mosheh 'ebed ihoh be'eiber hayarden mizrakh hashamesh. vaya'anu 'et yehoshua' leimor kol 'asher zivitanu na'aseh ve'el kal 'asher tishlakheinu neilekh. kekhol 'asher shama'nu 'el mosheh ken nishma' 'eilekha raq yihyeh ihoh 'elohekha 'imakh ka'asher hayah 'im mosheh. kal 'ish 'asher yamreh 'et pikha velo yishma' 'et debarekha lekhol 'asher tezavenu yumat raq khazaq ve'emaz. vayishlakh yehoshua' bin nun min hashitim shenayim 'anashim meragelim kheresh leimor lekhu re'u 'et ha'arez ve'et yerikho vayeilekhu vayabo'u bet 'ishah zonah ushemah rakhab vayishkebu shamah. vayei'amar lemelekh yerikho leimor hineh 'anashim ba'u henah halaylah mibenei yisra'el lakhpor 'et ha'arez. vayishlakh melekh yerikho 'el rakhab leimor hozi'i ha'anashim haba'im 'eilayikh 'asher ba'u lebeitekh ki lakhpor 'et kal ha'arez ba'u. vatiqakh ha'ishah 'et shenei ha'anashim vatizpeno vatomer ken ba'u 'eilai ha'anashim velo yada'ti mei'ayin hemah. vayhi hasha'ar lisgor bakhoshekh veha'anashim yaza'u lo yada'ti 'anah halekhu ha'anashim ridfu maher 'akhareihem ki tasigum. vehi he'elatam hagagah vatitmenem befishtei ha'ez ha'arukhot lah 'al hagag. veha'anashim radefu 'akhareihem derekh hayarden 'al hama'berot vehasha'ar sagaru 'akharei ka'asher yaze'u harodefim 'akhareihem. vehemah terem yishkabun vehi 'aletah 'aleihem 'al hagag. vatomer 'el ha'anashim yada'ti ki natan ihoh lakhem 'et ha'arez vekhi nafelah 'eimatkhem 'aleinu vekhi namogu kal yoshebei ha'arez mipeneikhem. ki shama'nu 'et 'asher hobish ihoh 'et mei yam suf mipeneikhem bezeitekhem mimizrayim va'asher 'asitem lishnei malkhei ha'emori 'asher be'eiber hayarden lesikhon ule'og 'asher hekheramtem 'otam. vanishma' vayimas lebabeinu velo qamah 'od ruakh be'ish mipeneikhem ki ihoh 'eloheikhem hu 'elohim bashamayim mima'al ve'al ha'arez mitakhat. ve'atah hishabe'u na li ihoh ki 'asiti 'imakhem khased va'asitem gam 'atem 'im bet 'abi khesed unetatem li 'ot 'emet. vehakhayitem 'et 'abi ve'et 'imi ve'et 'akhai ve'et 'akhotai 'akhyotai ve'et kal 'asher lahem vehizaltem 'et nafshoteinu mimavet. vayomeru lah ha'anashim nafsheinu takhteikhem lamut 'im lo tagidu 'et debareinu zeh vehayah betet ihoh lanu 'et ha'arez ve'asinu 'imakh khesed ve'emet. vatoridem bakhebel be'ad hakhalon ki beitah beqir hakhomah ubakhomah hi yoshabet. vatomer lahem haharah leikhu pen yifge'u bakhem harodefim venakhbeitem shamah sheloshet yamim 'ad shob harodefim ve'akhar teilekhu ledarkekhem. vayomeru 'eileha ha'anashim neqiyim 'anakhnu mishebu'atekh hazeh 'asher hishba'tanu. hineh 'anakhnu ba'im ba'arez 'et tiqvat khut hashani hazeh tiqsheri bakhalon 'asher horadteinu bo ve'et 'abikh ve'et 'imekh ve'et 'akhayikh ve'et kal bet 'abikh ta'asfi 'eilayikh habayetah. vehayah kol 'asher yeizei midaltei beitekh hakhuzah damo berosho va'anakhnu neqiyim vekhol 'asher yihyeh 'itakh babayit damo berosheinu 'im yad tihyeh bo. ve'im tagidi 'et debareinu zeh vehayinu neqiyim mishebu'atekh 'asher hishba'tanu. vatomer kedibreikhem ken hu vateshalekhem vayeileikhu vatiqshor 'et tiqvat hashani bakhalon. vayeilekhu vayabo'u haharah vayeishebu sham sheloshet yamim 'ad shabu harodefim vaybaqshu harodefim bekhal haderekh velo maza'u. vayashubu shenei ha'anashim vayeiredu meihahar vaya'abru vayabo'u 'el yehoshua' bin nun vaysaperu lo 'et kal hamoze'ot 'otam. vayomeru 'el yehoshua' ki natan ihoh beyadeinu 'et kal ha'arez vegam namogu kal yoshebei ha'arez mipaneinu. vayashkem yehoshua' baboqer vayis'u meihashitim vayabo'u 'ad hayarden hu vekhal benei yisra'el vayalinu sham terem ya'aboru. vayhi miqzeh sheloshet yamim vaya'abru hashoterim beqereb hamakhaneh. vayzavu 'et ha'am leimor kir'otkhem 'et 'aron berit ihoh 'eloheikhem vehakohanim halviyim nose'im 'oto ve'atem tis'u mimeqomkhem vahalakhtem 'akharav. 'akh rakhoq yihyeh beineikhem ubeino ubeinav ke'alpayim 'amah bamidah 'al tiqrebu 'eilav lema'an 'asher teide'u 'et haderekh 'asher teilekhu bah ki lo 'abartem baderekh mitemol shilshom. vayomer yehoshua' 'el ha'am hitqadashu ki makhar ya'aseh ihoh beqirbekhem nifla'ot. vayomer yehoshua' 'el hakohanim leimor se'u 'et 'aron haberit ve'ibru lifnei ha'am vayis'u 'et 'aron haberit vayeilekhu lifnei ha'am. vayomer ihoh 'el yehoshua' hayom hazeh 'akhel gadelkha be'einei kal yisra'el 'asher yeide'un ki ka'asher hayiti 'im mosheh 'ehyeh 'imakh. ve'atah tezaveh 'et hakohanim nose'ei 'aron haberit leimor kebo'akhem 'ad qezeh mei hayarden bayarden ta'amodu. vayomer yehoshua' 'el benei yisra'el goshu henah veshim'u 'et dibrei ihoh 'eloheikhem. vayomer yehoshua' bezot teide'un ki 'el khai beqirbekhem vehoresh yorish mipeneikhem 'et hakena'ani ve'et hakhiti ve'et hakhivi ve'et haperizi ve'et hagirgashi veha'emori vehaybusi. hineh 'aron haberit 'adon kal ha'arez 'ober lifneikhem bayarden. ve'atah qekhu lakhem shenei 'asar 'ish mishibtei yisra'el 'ish 'ekhad 'ish 'ekhad lashabet. vehayah kenoakh kapot raglei hakohanim nose'ei 'aron ihoh 'adon kal ha'arez bemei hayarden mei hayarden yikareitun hamayim hayoredim milma'elah veya'amdu ned 'ekhad. vayhi binsoa' ha'am mei'aholeihem la'abor 'et hayarden vehakohanim nose'ei ha'aron haberit lifnei ha'am. ukhebo nose'ei ha'aron 'ad hayarden veraglei hakohanim nose'ei ha'aron nitbelu biqzeh hamayim vehayarden malei 'al kal gedotav kol yemei qazir. vaya'amdu hamayim hayoredim milma'lah qamu ned 'ekhad harkheq me'od ba'adam mei'adam ha'ir 'asher mizad zaretan vehayoredim 'al yam ha'arabah yam hamelakh tamu nikhratu veha'am 'aberu neged yerikho. vaya'amdu hakohanim nose'ei ha'aron berit ihoh bekharabah betokh hayarden hakhen vekhal yisra'el 'oberim bekharabah 'ad 'asher tamu kal hago la'abor 'et hayarden. vayhi ka'asher tamu khal hago la'abor 'et hayarden vayomer ihoh 'el yehoshua' leimor. qekhu lakhem min ha'am shenem 'asar 'anashim 'ish 'ekhad 'ish 'ekhad mishabet. vezavu 'otam leimor se'u lakhem mizeh mitokh hayarden mimazab raglei hakohanim hakhin shetem 'esreh 'abanim veha'abartem 'otam 'imakhem vehinakhtem 'otam bamalon 'asher talinu bo halayelah. vayiqra yehoshua' 'el shenem he'asar 'ish 'asher heikhin mibenei yisra'el 'ish 'ekhad 'ish 'ekhad mishabet. vayomer lahem yehoshua' 'ibru lifnei 'aron ihoh 'eloheikhem 'el tokh hayarden veharimu lakhem 'ish 'eben 'akhat 'al shikhmo lemispar shibtei benei yisra'el. lema'an tihyeh zot 'ot beqirbekhem ki yish'alun beneikhem makhar leimor mah ha'abanim ha'eleh lakhem. va'amartem lahem 'asher nikhretu meimei hayarden mipenei 'aron berit ihoh be'abero bayarden nikhretu mei hayarden vehayu ha'abanim ha'eleh lezikaron libnei yisra'el 'ad 'olam. vaya'asu khen benei yisra'el ka'asher zivah yehoshua' vayis'u shetei 'esreh 'abanim mitokh hayarden ka'asher diber ihoh 'el yehoshua' lemispar shibtei benei yisra'el vaya'abirum 'imam 'el hamalon vayanikhum sham. ushetem 'esreh 'abanim heiqim yehoshua' betokh hayarden takhat mazab raglei hakohanim nose'ei 'aron haberit vayihyu sham 'ad hayom hazeh. vehakohanim nose'ei ha'aron 'omedim betokh hayarden 'ad tom kal hadabar 'asher zivah ihoh 'et yehoshua' ledaber 'el ha'am kekhol 'asher zivah mosheh 'et yehoshua' vaymaharu ha'am vaya'aboru. vayhi ka'asher tam kal ha'am la'abor vaya'abor 'aron ihoh vehakohanim lifnei ha'am. vaya'abru benei re'uben ubenei gad vakhazi sheibet hamnasheh khamushim lifnei benei yisra'el ka'asher diber 'aleihem mosheh. ke'arba'im 'elef khaluzei hazaba 'aberu lifnei ihoh lamilkhamah 'el 'arbot yerikho. bayom hahu gidal ihoh 'et yehoshua' be'einei kal yisra'el vayir'u 'oto ka'asher yare'u 'et mosheh kal yemei khayav. vayomer ihoh 'el yehoshua' leimor. zaveh 'et hakohanim nose'ei 'aron ha'eidut veya'alu min hayarden. vayzav yehoshua' 'et hakohanim leimor 'alu min hayarden. vayhi ba'alot ka'alot hakohanim nose'ei 'aron berit ihoh mitokh hayarden nitequ kapot raglei hakohanim 'el hekharabah vayashubu mei hayarden limqomam vayeilekhu khitmol shilshom 'al kal gedotav. veha'am 'alu min hayarden be'asor lakhodesh harishon vayakhanu bagilgal biqzeh mizrakh yerikho. ve'et shetem 'esreh ha'abanim ha'eleh 'asher laqekhu min hayarden heiqim yehoshua' bagilgal. vayomer 'el benei yisra'el leimor 'asher yish'alun beneikhem makhar 'et 'abotam leimor mah ha'abanim ha'eleh. vehoda'tem 'et beneikhem leimor bayabashah 'abar yisra'el 'et hayarden hazeh. 'asher hobish ihoh 'eloheikhem 'et mei hayarden mipeneikhem 'ad 'aberekhem ka'asher 'asah ihoh 'eloheikhem leyam suf 'asher hobish mipaneinu 'ad 'abereinu. lema'an da'at kal 'amei ha'arez 'et yad ihoh ki khazaqah hi lema'an yeratem 'et ihoh 'eloheikhem kal hayamim. vayhi khishmoa' kal malkhei ha'emori 'asher be'eiber hayarden yamah vekhal malkhei hakena'ani 'asher 'al hayam 'et 'asher hobish ihoh 'et mei hayarden mipenei benei yisra'el 'ad 'aberanu 'aberam vayimas lebabam velo hayah bam 'od ruakh mipenei benei yisra'el. ba'et hahi 'amar ihoh 'el yehoshua' 'aseh lekha kharbot zurim veshub mol 'et benei yisra'el sheinit. vaya'as lo yehoshua' kharbot zurim vayamal 'et benei yisra'el 'el gib'at ha'aralot. vezeh hadabar 'asher mal yehoshua' kal ha'am hayozei mimizrayim hazekharim kol 'anshei hamilkhamah meitu bamidbar baderekh bezeitam mimizrayim. ki mulim hayu kal ha'am hayoze'im vekhal ha'am hayilodim bamidbar baderekh bezeitam mimizrayim lo malu. ki 'arba'im shanah halekhu benei yisra'el bamidbar 'ad tom kal hago 'anshei hamilkhamah hayoze'im mimizrayim 'asher lo shame'u beqol ihoh 'asher nishba' ihoh lahem lebilti har'otam 'et ha'arez 'asher nishba' ihoh la'abotam latet lanu 'erez zabat khalab udebash. ve'et beneihem heiqim takhtam 'otam mal yehoshua' ki 'areilim hayu ki lo malu 'otam badarekh. vayhi ka'asher tamu khal hago lehimol vayeishebu takhtam bamakhaneh 'ad khayotam. vayomer ihoh 'el yehoshua' hayom galoti 'et kherpat mizrayim mei'aleikhem vayiqra shem hamaqom hahu gilgal 'ad hayom hazeh. vayakhanu benei yisra'el bagilgal vaya'asu 'et hapesakh be'arba'ah 'asar yom lakhodesh ba'ereb be'arbot yerikho. vayokhelu mei'abur ha'arez mimakhorat hapesakh mazot veqalui be'ezem hayom hazeh. vayishbot haman mimakhorat be'akhelam mei'abur ha'arez velo hayah 'od libnei yisra'el man vayokhelu mitebu'at 'erez kena'an bashanah hahi. vayhi bihyot yehoshua' birikho vayisa 'einav vayar vehineh 'ish 'omed lenegdo vekharbo shelufah beyado vayeilekh yehoshua' 'eilav vayomer lo halanu 'atah 'im lezareinu. vayomer lo ki 'ani sar zeba ihoh 'atah bati vayipol yehoshua' 'el panav 'arzah vayishtakhu vayomer lo mah 'adoni medaber 'el 'abdo. vayomer sar zeba ihoh 'el yehoshua' shal na'alkha mei'al raglekha ki hamaqom 'asher 'atah 'omed 'alav qodesh hu vaya'as yehoshua' ken. virikho sogeret umesugeret mipenei benei yisra'el 'en yozei ve'en ba. vayomer ihoh 'el yehoshua' re'eh natati beyadekha 'et yerikho ve'et malkah giborei hekhayil. vesabotem 'et ha'ir kol 'anshei hamilkhamah haqef 'et ha'ir pa'am 'ekhat koh ta'aseh sheishet yamim. veshib'ah khohanim yis'u shib'ah shofrot hayoblim lifnei ha'aron ubayom hashebi'i tasobu 'et ha'ir sheba' pe'amim vehakohanim yitqe'u bashofarot. vehayah bimshokh beqeren hayobel beshame'akhem keshame'akhem 'et qol hashofar yari'u khal ha'am teru'ah gedolah venafelah khomat ha'ir takhteha ve'alu ha'am 'ish negdo. vayiqra yehoshua' bin nun 'el hakohanim vayomer 'aleihem se'u 'et 'aron haberit veshib'ah khohanim yis'u shib'ah shofrot yoblim lifnei 'aron ihoh. vayomeru vayomer 'el ha'am 'ibru vesobu 'et ha'ir vehekhaluz ya'abor lifnei 'aron ihoh. vayhi ke'emor yehoshua' 'el ha'am veshib'ah hakohanim nose'im shib'ah shofrot hayoblim lifnei ihoh 'aberu vetaqe'u bashofarot va'aron berit ihoh holekh 'akhareihem. vehekhaluz holekh lifnei hakohanim taqe'u toqe'ei hashofarot veham'asef holekh 'akharei ha'aron halokh vetaqoa' bashofarot. ve'et ha'am zivah yehoshua' leimor lo tari'u velo tashmi'u 'et qolkhem velo yeizei mipikhem dabar 'ad yom 'ameri 'aleikhem hari'u vahari'otem. vayaseb 'aron ihoh 'et ha'ir haqef pa'am 'ekhat vayabo'u hamakhaneh vayalinu bamakhaneh. vayashkem yehoshua' baboqer vayis'u hakohanim 'et 'aron ihoh. veshib'ah hakohanim nose'im shib'ah shofrot hayobelim lifnei 'aron ihoh holekhim halokh vetaqe'u bashofarot vehekhaluz holekh lifneihem veham'asef holekh 'akharei 'aron ihoh holekh halokh vetaqoa' bashofarot. vayasobu 'et ha'ir bayom hasheini pa'am 'akhat vayashubu hamakhaneh koh 'asu sheishet yamim. vayhi bayom hashebi'i vayashkimu ka'alot hashakhar vayasobu 'et ha'ir kamishpat hazeh sheba' pe'amim raq bayom hahu sabebu 'et ha'ir sheba' pe'amim. vayhi bapa'am hashebi'it taqe'u hakohanim bashofarot vayomer yehoshua' 'el ha'am hari'u ki natan ihoh lakhem 'et ha'ir. vehayetah ha'ir kheirem hi vekhal 'asher bah ihoh raq rakhab hazonah tikhyeh hi vekhal 'asher 'itah babayit ki hekhbe'atah 'et hamal'akhim 'asher shalakhenu. veraq 'atem shimru min hakheirem pen takharimu uleqakhtem min hakheirem vesamtem 'et makhaneh yisra'el lekheirem va'akhartem 'oto. vekhol kesef vezahab ukhelei nekhoshet ubarzel qodesh hu ihoh 'ozar ihoh yabo. vayara' ha'am vayitqe'u bashofarot vayhi khishmoa' ha'am 'et qol hashofar vayari'u ha'am teru'ah gedolah vatipol hakhomah takhteha vaya'al ha'am ha'irah 'ish negdo vayilkedu 'et ha'ir. vayakharimu 'et kal 'asher ba'ir mei'ish ve'ad 'ishah mina'ar ve'ad zaqen ve'ad shor vaseh vakhamor lefi khareb. velishnayim ha'anashim hamragelim 'et ha'arez 'amar yehoshua' bo'u bet ha'ishah hazonah vehozi'u misham 'et ha'ishah ve'et kal 'asher lah ka'asher nishba'tem lah. vayabo'u hane'arim hamragelim vayozi'u 'et rakhab ve'et 'abiha ve'et 'imah ve'et 'akheha ve'et kal 'asher lah ve'et kal mishpekhoteha hozi'u vayanikhum mikhuz lemakhaneh yisra'el. veha'ir sarefu ba'esh vekhal 'asher bah raq hakesef vehazahab ukhelei hanekhoshet vehabarzel natenu 'ozar bet ihoh. ve'et rakhab hazonah ve'et bet 'abiha ve'et kal 'asher lah hekheyah yehoshua' vateisheb beqereb yisra'el 'ad hayom hazeh ki hekhbi'ah 'et hamal'akhim 'asher shalakh yehoshua' leragel 'et yerikho. vayashba' yehoshua' ba'et hahi leimor 'arur ha'ish lifnei ihoh 'asher yaqum ubanah 'et ha'ir hazot 'et yerikho bibkhoro yeyasedenah ubiz'iro yazib delateha. vayhi ihoh 'et yehoshua' vayhi shame'o bekhal ha'arez. vayim'alu benei yisra'el ma'al bakheirem vayiqakh 'akhan ben karmi ben zabdi ben zerakh lemateh yehudah min hakheirem vayikhar 'af ihoh bibnei yisra'el. vayishlakh yehoshua' 'anashim mirikho ha'ai 'asher 'im bet 'aven miqedem lebet 'el vayomer 'aleihem leimor 'alu veragelu 'et ha'arez vaya'alu ha'anashim vayragelu 'et ha'ai. vayashubu 'el yehoshua' vayomeru 'eilav 'al ya'al kal ha'am ke'alpayim 'ish 'o kishloshet 'alafim 'ish ya'alu veyaku 'et ha'ai 'al teyaga' shamah 'et kal ha'am ki me'at hemah. vaya'alu min ha'am shamah kishloshet 'alafim 'ish vayanusu lifnei 'anshei ha'ai. vayaku meihem 'anshei ha'ai kishloshim veshishah 'ish vayirdefum lifnei hasha'ar 'ad hashebarim vayakum bamorad vayimas lebab ha'am vayhi lemayim. vayiqra' yehoshua' simlotav vayipol 'al panav 'arzah lifnei 'aron ihoh 'ad ha'ereb hu veziqnei yisra'el vaya'alu 'afar 'al rosham. vayomer yehoshua' 'ahah 'adonai ihoh lamah hei'abarta ha'abir 'et ha'am hazeh 'et hayarden latet 'otanu beyad ha'emori leha'abideinu velu ho'alnu vaneisheb be'eiber hayarden. bi 'adonai mah 'omar 'akharei 'asher hafakh yisra'el 'oref lifnei 'oyebav. veyishme'u hakena'ani vekhol yoshebei ha'arez venasabu 'aleinu vehikhritu 'et shemeinu min ha'arez umah ta'aseh leshimkha hagadol. vayomer ihoh 'el yehoshua' qum lakh lamah zeh 'atah nofel 'al panekha. khata yisra'el vegam 'aberu 'et beriti 'asher ziviti 'otam vegam laqekhu min hakheirem vegam ganebu vegam kikhashu vegam samu bikhleihem. velo yukhlu benei yisra'el laqum lifnei 'oyebeihem 'oref yifnu lifnei 'oyebeihem ki hayu lekheirem lo 'osif lihyot 'imakhem 'im lo tashmidu hakheirem miqirbekhem. qum qadesh 'et ha'am ve'amarta hitqadeshu lemakhar ki khoh 'amar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el kheirem beqirbekha yisra'el lo tukhal laqum lifnei 'oyebekha 'ad hasirekhem hakheirem miqirbekhem. veniqrabtem baboqer leshibteikhem vehayah hasheibet 'asher yilkedenu ihoh yiqrab lamishpakhot vehamishpakhah 'asher yilkedenah ihoh tiqrab labatim vehabayit 'asher yilkedenu ihoh yiqrab lagebarim. vehayah hanilkad bakheirem yisaref ba'esh 'oto ve'et kal 'asher lo ki 'abar 'et berit ihoh vekhi 'asah nebalah beyisra'el. vayashkem yehoshua' baboqer vayaqreb 'et yisra'el lishbatav vayilakhed sheibet yehudah. vayaqreb 'et mishpakhat yehudah vayilkod 'et mishpakhat hazarkhi vayaqreb 'et mishpakhat hazarkhi lagebarim vayilakhed zabdi. vayaqreb 'et beito lagebarim vayilakhed 'akhan ben karmi ben zabdi ben zerakh lemateh yehudah. vayomer yehoshua' 'el 'akhan beni sim na khabod ihoh 'elohei yisra'el veten lo todah vehaged na li meh 'asita 'al tekhakhed mimeni. vaya'an 'akhan 'et yehoshua' vayomar 'amenah 'anokhi khatati ihoh 'elohei yisra'el vekhazot vekhazot 'asiti. va'er'eh va'eire bashalal 'aderet shin'ar 'akhat tobah umatayim sheqalim kesef uleshon zahab 'ekhad khamishim sheqalim mishqalo va'ekhmedem va'eqakhem vehinam temunim ba'arez betokh ha'aholi vehakesef takhteha. vayishlakh yehoshua' mal'akhim vayaruzu ha'ohelah vehineh temunah be'aholo vehakesef takhteha. vayiqakhum mitokh ha'ohel vaybi'um 'el yehoshua' ve'el kal benei yisra'el vayaziqum lifnei ihoh. vayiqakh yehoshua' 'et 'akhan ben zerakh ve'et hakesef ve'et ha'aderet ve'et leshon hazahab ve'et banav ve'et benotav ve'et shoro ve'et khamoro ve'et zono ve'et 'aholo ve'et kal 'asher lo vekhal yisra'el 'imo vaya'alu 'otam 'eimeq 'akhor. vayomer yehoshua' meh 'akhartanu ya'korkha ihoh bayom hazeh vayirgemu 'oto khal yisra'el 'eben vayisrefu 'otam ba'esh vayisqelu 'otam ba'abanim. vayaqimu 'alav gal 'abanim gadol 'ad hayom hazeh vayashab ihoh meikharon 'apo 'al ken qara shem hamaqom hahu 'eimeq 'akhor 'ad hayom hazeh. vayomer ihoh 'el yehoshua' 'al tira ve'al teikhat qakh 'imekha 'et kal 'am hamilkhamah vequm 'aleh ha'ai re'eh natati beyadekha 'et melekh ha'ai ve'et 'amo ve'et 'iro ve'et 'arzo. ve'asita la'ai ulemalkah ka'asher 'asita lirikho ulemalkah raq shelalah ubehemtah tabozu lakhem sim lekha 'oreb la'ir mei'akhareha. vayaqam yehoshua' vekhal 'am hamilkhamah la'alot ha'ai vayibkhar yehoshua' sheloshim 'elef 'ish giborei hakhayil vayishlakhem layelah. vayzav 'otam leimor re'u 'atem 'orebim la'ir mei'akharei ha'ir 'al tarkhiqu min ha'ir me'od vihyitem kulekhem nekhonim. va'ani vekhal ha'am 'asher 'iti niqrab 'el ha'ir vehayah ki yeize'u liqrateinu ka'asher barishonah venasnu lifneihem. veyaze'u 'akhareinu 'ad hatiqeinu 'otam min ha'ir ki yomeru nasim lefaneinu ka'asher barishonah venasnu lifneihem. ve'atem taqumu meiha'oreb vehorashtem 'et ha'ir unetanah ihoh 'eloheikhem beyedkhem. vehayah ketafesekhem 'et ha'ir tazitu 'et ha'ir ba'esh kidbar ihoh ta'asu re'u ziviti 'etkhem. vayishlakhem yehoshua' vayeilekhu 'el hama'rab vayeishebu ben bet 'el uben ha'ai miyam la'ai vayalen yehoshua' balaylah hahu betokh ha'am. vayashkem yehoshua' baboqer vayifqod 'et ha'am vaya'al hu veziqnei yisra'el lifnei ha'am ha'ai. vekhal ha'am hamilkhamah 'asher 'ito 'alu vayigeshu vayabo'u neged ha'ir vayakhanu mizefon la'ai vehagai beino beinav uben ha'ai. vayiqakh kakhameishet 'alafim 'ish vayasem 'otam 'oreb ben bet 'el uben ha'ai miyam la'ir. vayasimu ha'am 'et kal hamakhaneh 'asher mizefon la'ir ve'et 'aqeibo miyam la'ir vayeilekh yehoshua' balaylah hahu betokh ha'eimeq. vayhi kir'ot melekh ha'ai vaymaharu vayashkimu vayeize'u 'anshei ha'ir liqrat yisra'el lamilkhamah hu vekhal 'amo lamo'ed lifnei ha'arabah vehu lo yada' ki 'oreb lo mei'akharei ha'ir. vayinage'u yehoshua' vekhal yisra'el lifneihem vayanusu derekh hamidbar. vayiza'aqu kal ha'am 'asher ba'ir ba'ai lirdof 'akhareihem vayirdefu 'akharei yehoshua' vayinatequ min ha'ir. velo nish'ar 'ish ba'ai ubet 'el 'asher lo yaze'u 'akharei yisra'el vaya'azbu 'et ha'ir petukhah vayirdefu 'akharei yisra'el. vayomer ihoh 'el yehoshua' neteh bakidon 'asher beyadekha 'el ha'ai ki beyadekha 'etenenah vayet yehoshua' bakidon 'asher beyado 'el ha'ir. veha'oreb qam meheirah mimeqomo vayaruzu kintot yado vayabo'u ha'ir vayilkeduha vaymaharu vayazitu 'et ha'ir ba'esh. vayifnu 'anshei ha'ai 'akhareihem vayir'u vehineh 'alah 'ashan ha'ir hashamaymah velo hayah bahem yadayim lanus henah vahenah veha'am hanas hamidbar nehpakh 'el harodef. vihoshua' vekhal yisra'el ra'u ki lakhad ha'oreb 'et ha'ir vekhi 'alah 'ashan ha'ir vayashubu vayaku 'et 'anshei ha'ai. ve'eleh yaze'u min ha'ir liqratam vayihyu leyisra'el batavekh 'eleh mizeh ve'eleh mizeh vayaku 'otam 'ad bilti hish'ir lo sarid ufalit. ve'et melekh ha'ai tafesu khai vayaqribu 'oto 'el yehoshua'. vayhi kekhalot yisra'el laharog 'et kal yoshebei ha'ai basadeh bamidbar 'asher redafum bo vayipelu khulam lefi khereb 'ad tumam vayashubu khal yisra'el ha'ai vayaku 'otah lefi khareb. vayhi khal hanofelim bayom hahu mei'ish ve'ad 'ishah shenem 'asar 'alef kol 'anshei ha'ai. vihoshua' lo heishib yado 'asher natah bakidon 'ad 'asher hekherim 'et kal yoshebei ha'ai. raq habeheimah ushelal ha'ir hahi bazezu lahem yisra'el kidbar ihoh 'asher zivah 'et yehoshua'. vayisrof yehoshua' 'et ha'ai vaysimeha tel 'olam shemamah 'ad hayom hazeh. ve'et melekh ha'ai talah 'al ha'ez 'ad 'et ha'areb ukhebo hashemesh zivah yehoshua' vayoridu 'et niblato min ha'ez vayashlikhu 'otah 'el petakh sha'ar ha'ir vayaqimu 'alav gal 'abanim gadol 'ad hayom hazeh. 'az yibneh yehoshua' mizbeiakh ihoh 'elohei yisra'el behar 'eibal. ka'asher zivah mosheh 'ebed ihoh 'et benei yisra'el kakatub beseifer torat mosheh mizbakh 'abanim sheleimot 'asher lo heinif 'aleihen barzel vaya'alu 'alav 'olot ihoh vayizbekhu shelamim. vayikhtab sham 'al ha'abanim 'et mishneh torat mosheh 'asher katab lifnei benei yisra'el. vekhal yisra'el uzeqeinav veshoterim veshofetav 'omedim mizeh umizeh la'aron neged hakohanim halviyim nose'ei 'aron berit ihoh kager ka'ezrakh khezyo 'el mul har gerizim vehakhezyo 'el mul har 'eibal ka'asher zivah mosheh 'ebed ihoh lebarekh 'et ha'am yisra'el barishonah. ve'akharei khen qara 'et kal dibrei hatorah haberakhah vehaqelalah kekhal hakatub beseifer hatorah. lo hayah dabar mikol 'asher zivah mosheh 'asher lo qara yehoshua' neged kal qehal yisra'el vehanashim vehataf vehager haholekh beqirbam. vayhi khishmoa' kal hamelakhim 'asher be'eiber hayarden bahar ubashefeilah ubekhol khof hayam hagadol 'el mul halebanon hakhiti veha'emori hakena'ani haperizi hakhivi vehaybusi. vayitqabezu yakhdav lehilakhem 'im yehoshua' ve'im yisra'el peh 'ekhad. veyoshebei gib'on shame'u 'et 'asher 'asah yehoshua' lirikho vela'ai. vaya'asu gam hemah be'aremah vayeilekhu vayiztayaru vayiqkhu saqim balim lakhamoreihem venodot yayin balim umebuqa'im umezorarim. une'alot balot umetula'ot beragleihem uselamot balot 'aleihem vekhol lekhem zeidam yabesh hayah niqudim. vayeilekhu 'el yehoshua' 'el hamakhaneh hagilgal vayomeru 'eilav ve'el 'ish yisra'el mei'erez rekhoqah banu ve'atah kirtu lanu berit. vayomeru vayomer 'ish yisra'el 'el hakhivi 'ulai beqirbi 'atah yosheb ve'ekh 'ekhrot 'ekhrat lekha berit. vayomeru 'el yehoshua' 'abadekha 'anakhenu vayomer 'aleihem yehoshua' mi 'atem umei'ayin tabo'u. vayomeru 'eilav mei'erez rekhoqah me'od ba'u 'abadekha leshem ihoh 'elohekha ki shama'nu shame'o ve'et kal 'asher 'asah bemizrayim. ve'et kal 'asher 'asah lishnei malkhei ha'emori 'asher be'eiber hayarden lesikhon melekh kheshbon ule'og melekh habashan 'asher be'ashtarot. vayomeru 'eileinu zeqeineinu vekhal yoshebei 'arzeinu leimor qekhu beyedkhem zeidah laderekh ulekhu liqratam va'amartem 'aleihem 'abdeikhem 'anakhnu ve'atah kirtu lanu berit. zeh lakhmeinu kham hiztayadnu 'oto mibateinu beyom zeiteinu lalekhet 'aleikhem ve'atah hineh yabesh vehayah niqudim. ve'eleh nodot hayayin 'asher mileinu khadashim vehineh hitbaqa'u ve'eleh salmoteinu une'aleinu balu meirob haderekh me'od. vayiqkhu ha'anashim mizeidam ve'et pi ihoh lo sha'alu. vaya'as lahem yehoshua' shalom vayikhrot lahem berit lekhayotam vayishabe'u lahem nesi'ei ha'eidah. vayhi miqzeh sheloshet yamim 'akharei 'asher karetu lahem berit vayishme'u ki qerobim hem 'eilav ubeqirbo hem yoshebim. vayis'u benei yisra'el vayabo'u 'el 'areihem bayom hashelishi ve'areihem gib'on vehakefirah ube'eirot veqiryat ye'arim. velo hikum benei yisra'el ki nishbe'u lahem nesi'ei ha'eidah ihoh 'elohei yisra'el vayilonu khal ha'eidah 'al hanesi'im. vayomeru khal hanesi'im 'el kal ha'eidah 'anakhnu nishba'nu lahem ihoh 'elohei yisra'el ve'atah lo nukhal lingoa' bahem. zot na'aseh lahem vehakhayeh 'otam velo yihyeh 'aleinu qezef 'al hashebu'ah 'asher nishba'nu lahem. vayomeru 'aleihem hanesi'im yikhyu vayihyu khotebei 'eizim vesho'abei mayim lekhal ha'eidah ka'asher diberu lahem hanesi'im. vayiqra lahem yehoshua' vaydaber 'aleihem leimor lamah rimitem 'otanu leimor rekhoqim 'anakhnu mikem me'od ve'atem beqirbeinu yoshebim. ve'atah 'arurim 'atem velo yikaret mikem 'ebed vekhotebei 'eizim vesho'abei mayim lebet 'elohai. vaya'anu 'et yehoshua' vayomeru ki huged hugad la'abadekha 'et 'asher zivah ihoh 'elohekha 'et mosheh 'abdo latet lakhem 'et kal ha'arez ulehashmid 'et kal yoshebei ha'arez mipeneikhem vanira me'od lenafshoteinu mipeneikhem vana'aseh 'et hadabar hazeh. ve'atah hinu beyadekha katob vekhayashar be'einekha la'asot lanu 'aseh. vaya'as lahem ken vayazel 'otam miyad benei yisra'el velo haragum. vayitenem yehoshua' bayom hahu khotebei 'eizim vesho'abei mayim la'eidah ulemizbakh ihoh 'ad hayom hazeh 'el hamaqom 'asher yibkhar. vayhi khishmoa' 'adoni zedeq melekh yerushalim ki lakhad yehoshua' 'et ha'ai vayakharimah ka'asher 'asah lirikho ulemalkah ken 'asah la'ai ulemalkah vekhi hishlimu yoshebei gib'on 'et yisra'el vayihyu beqirbam. vayire'u me'od ki 'ir gedolah gib'on ke'akhat 'arei hamamlakhah vekhi hi gedolah min ha'ai vekhal 'anasheha giborim. vayishlakh 'adoni zedeq melekh yerushalim 'el hoham melekh khebron ve'el pir'am melekh yarmut ve'el yafia' melekh lakhish ve'el debir melekh 'eglon leimor. 'alu 'eilai ve'izruni venakeh 'et gib'on ki hishlimah 'et yehoshua' ve'et benei yisra'el. vayei'asefu vaya'alu khameishet malkhei ha'emori melekh yerushalim melekh khebron melekh yarmut melekh lakhish melekh 'eglon hem vekhal makhaneihem vayakhanu 'al gib'on vayilakhamu 'aleha. vayishlekhu 'anshei gib'on 'el yehoshua' 'el hamakhaneh hagilgalah leimor 'al teref yadekha mei'abadekha 'aleh 'eileinu meheirah vehoshi'ah lanu ve'azereinu ki niqbezu 'eileinu kal malkhei ha'emori yoshebei hahar. vaya'al yehoshua' min hagilgal hu vekhal 'am hamilkhamah 'imo vekhol giborei hekhayil. vayomer ihoh 'el yehoshua' 'al tira meihem ki beyadekha netatim lo ya'amod 'ish meihem befanekha. vayabo 'aleihem yehoshua' pit'om kal halaylah 'alah min hagilgal. vayhumem ihoh lifnei yisra'el vayakem makah gedolah begib'on vayirdefem derekh ma'aleh bet khoron vayakem 'ad 'azeiqah ve'ad maqeidah. vayhi benusam mipenei yisra'el hem bemorad bet khoron ihoh hishlikh 'aleihem 'abanim gedolot min hashamayim 'ad 'azeiqah vayamutu rabim 'asher meitu be'abnei habarad mei'asher haregu benei yisra'el bekhareb. 'az yedaber yehoshua' ihoh beyom tet ihoh 'et ha'emori lifnei benei yisra'el vayomer le'einei yisra'el mesh begib'on dom veyareiakh be'eimeq 'ayalon. vayidom hashemesh veyareiakh 'amad 'ad yiqom go 'oyebav halo hi khetubah 'al seifer hayashar vaya'amod hashemesh bakhazi hashamayim velo 'az labo keyom tamim. velo hayah kayom hahu lefanav ve'akharav lishmoa' ihoh beqol 'ish ki ihoh nilkham leyisra'el. vayashab yehoshua' vekhal yisra'el 'imo 'el hamakhaneh hagilgalah. vayanusu khameishet hamelakhim ha'eleh vayeikhabe'u bame'arah bemaqeidah. vayugad lihoshua' leimor nimze'u khameishet hamelakhim nekhbe'im bame'arah bemaqeidah. vayomer yehoshua' golu 'abanim gedolot 'el pi hame'arah vehafqidu 'aleha 'anashim leshameram. ve'atem 'al ta'amodu ridfu 'akharei 'oyebeikhem vezinabtem 'otam 'al titenum labo 'el 'areihem ki netanam ihoh 'eloheikhem beyedkhem. vayhi kekhalot yehoshua' ubenei yisra'el lehakotam makah gedolah me'od 'ad tumam vehaseridim saredu meihem vayabo'u 'el 'arei hamibzar. vayashubu khal ha'am 'el hamakhaneh 'el yehoshua' maqeidah beshalom lo kharaz libnei yisra'el le'ish 'et leshono. vayomer yehoshua' pitkhu 'et pi hame'arah vehozi'u 'eilai 'et khameishet hamelakhim ha'eleh min hame'arah. vaya'asu khen vayozi'u 'eilav 'et khameishet hamelakhim ha'eleh min hame'arah 'et melekh yerushalim 'et melekh khebron 'et melekh yarmut 'et melekh lakhish 'et melekh 'eglon. vayhi kehozi'am 'et hamelakhim ha'eleh 'el yehoshua' vayiqra yehoshua' 'el kal 'ish yisra'el vayomer 'el qezinei 'anshei hamilkhamah hehalekhu 'ito qirbu mu 'et ragleikhem 'al zaverei hamelakhim ha'eleh vayiqrebu vayasimu 'et ragleihem 'al zavereihem. vayomer 'aleihem yehoshua' 'al tire'u ve'al teikhatu khizqu ve'imzu ki khakhah ya'aseh ihoh lekhal 'oyebeikhem 'asher 'atem nilkhamim 'otam. vayakem yehoshua' 'akharei khen vaymitem vayitlem 'al khamishah 'eizim vayihyu teluyim 'al ha'eizim 'ad ha'areb. vayhi le'et bo hashemesh zivah yehoshua' vayoridum mei'al ha'eizim vayashlikhum 'el hame'arah 'asher nekhbe'u sham vayasimu 'abanim gedolot 'al pi hame'arah 'ad 'ezem hayom hazeh. ve'et maqeidah lakhad yehoshua' bayom hahu vayakeha lefi khereb ve'et malkah hekherim 'otam ve'et kal hanefesh 'asher bah lo hish'ir sarid vaya'as lemelekh maqeidah ka'asher 'asah lemelekh yerikho. vaya'abor yehoshua' vekhal yisra'el 'imo mimaqeidah libnah vayilakhem 'im libnah. vayiten ihoh gam 'otah beyad yisra'el ve'et malkah vayakeha lefi khereb ve'et kal hanefesh 'asher bah lo hish'ir bah sarid vaya'as lemalkah ka'asher 'asah lemelekh yerikho. vaya'abor yehoshua' vekhal yisra'el 'imo milibnah lakhishah vayikhan 'aleha vayilakhem bah. vayiten ihoh 'et lakhish beyad yisra'el vayilkedah bayom hasheini vayakeha lefi khereb ve'et kal hanefesh 'asher bah kekhol 'asher 'asah lelibnah. 'az 'alah horam melekh gezer la'zor 'et lakhish vayakeihu yehoshua' ve'et 'amo 'ad bilti hish'ir lo sarid. vaya'abor yehoshua' vekhal yisra'el 'imo milakhish 'eglonah vayakhanu 'aleha vayilakhamu 'aleha. vayilkeduha bayom hahu vayakuha lefi khereb ve'et kal hanefesh 'asher bah bayom hahu hekherim kekhol 'asher 'asah lelakhish. vaya'al yehoshua' vekhal yisra'el 'imo mei'eglonah khebronah vayilakhamu 'aleha. vayilkeduha vayakuha lefi khereb ve'et malkah ve'et kal 'areha ve'et kal hanefesh 'asher bah lo hish'ir sarid kekhol 'asher 'asah le'eglon vayakharem 'otah ve'et kal hanefesh 'asher bah. vayashab yehoshua' vekhal yisra'el 'imo debirah vayilakhem 'aleha. vayilkedah ve'et malkah ve'et kal 'areha vayakum lefi khereb vayakharimu 'et kal nefesh 'asher bah lo hish'ir sarid ka'asher 'asah lekhebron ken 'asah lidbirah ulemalkah vekha'asher 'asah lelibnah ulemalkah. vayakeh yehoshua' 'et kal ha'arez hahar vehanegeb vehashefeilah veha'asheidot ve'et kal malkheihem lo hish'ir sarid ve'et kal haneshamah hekherim ka'asher zivah ihoh 'elohei yisra'el. vayakem yehoshua' miqadesh barneia' ve'ad 'azah ve'et kal 'erez goshen ve'ad gib'on. ve'et kal hamelakhim ha'eleh ve'et 'arzam lakhad yehoshua' pa'am 'ekhat ki ihoh 'elohei yisra'el nilkham leyisra'el. vayashab yehoshua' vekhal yisra'el 'imo 'el hamakhaneh hagilgalah. vayhi kishmoa' yabin melekh khazor vayishlakh 'el yobab melekh madon ve'el melekh shimron ve'el melekh 'akhshaf. ve'el hamelakhim 'asher mizefon bahar uba'arabah negeb kinarot ubashefeilah ubenafot dor miyam. hakena'ani mimizrakh umiyam veha'emori vehakhiti vehaperizi vehaybusi bahar vehakhivi takhat khermon be'erez hamizpah. vayeize'u hem vekhal makhaneihem 'imam 'am rab kakhol 'asher 'al sefat hayam larob vesus varekheb rab me'od. vayiva'adu kol hamelakhim ha'eleh vayabo'u vayakhanu yakhdav 'el mei meirom lehilakhem 'im yisra'el. vayomer ihoh 'el yehoshua' 'al tira mipeneihem ki makhar ka'et hazot 'anokhi noten 'et kulam khalalim lifnei yisra'el 'et suseihem te'aqer ve'et markeboteihem tisrof ba'esh. vayabo yehoshua' vekhal 'am hamilkhamah 'imo 'aleihem 'al mei meirom pit'om vayipelu bahem. vayitenem ihoh beyad yisra'el vayakum vayirdefum 'ad zidon rabah ve'ad misrefot mayim ve'ad biq'at mizpeh mizrakhah vayakum 'ad bilti hish'ir lahem sarid. vaya'as lahem yehoshua' ka'asher 'amar lo ihoh 'et suseihem 'iqer ve'et markeboteihem saraf ba'esh. vayashab yehoshua' ba'et hahi vayilkod 'et khazor ve'et malkah hikah bekhareb ki khazor lefanim hi rosh kal hamamlakhot ha'eleh. vayaku 'et kal hanefesh 'asher bah lefi khereb hakharem lo notar kal neshamah ve'et khazor saraf ba'esh. ve'et kal 'arei hamelakhim ha'eleh ve'et kal malkheihem lakhad yehoshua' vayakem lefi khereb hekherim 'otam ka'asher zivah mosheh 'ebed ihoh. raq kal he'arim ha'omedot 'al tilam lo serafam yisra'el zulati 'et khazor lebadah saraf yehoshua'. vekhol shelal he'arim ha'eleh vehabeheimah bazezu lahem benei yisra'el raq 'et kal ha'adam hiku lefi khereb 'ad hishmidam 'otam lo hish'iru kal neshamah. ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh 'abdo ken zivah mosheh 'et yehoshua' vekhen 'asah yehoshua' lo heisir dabar mikol 'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. vayiqakh yehoshua' 'et kal ha'arez hazot hahar ve'et kal hanegeb ve'et kal 'erez hagoshen ve'et hashefeilah ve'et ha'arabah ve'et har yisra'el ushefeilatoh. min hahar hekhalaq ha'oleh sei'ir ve'ad ba'al gad bebiq'at halebanon takhat har khermon ve'et kal malkheihem lakhad vayakem vaymitem. yamim rabim 'asah yehoshua' 'et kal hamelakhim ha'eleh milkhamah. lo hayetah 'ir 'asher hishlimah 'el benei yisra'el bilti hakhivi yoshebei gib'on 'et hakol laqekhu bamilkhamah. ki mei'et ihoh hayetah lekhazeq 'et libam liqrat hamilkhamah 'et yisra'el lema'an hakharimam lebilti heyot lahem tekhinah ki lema'an hashmidam ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. vayabo yehoshua' ba'et hahi vayakhret 'et ha'anaqim min hahar min khebron min debir min 'anab umikol har yehudah umikol har yisra'el 'im 'areihem hekherimam yehoshua'. lo notar 'anaqim be'erez benei yisra'el raq be'azah begat ube'ashdod nish'aru. vayiqakh yehoshua' 'et kal ha'arez kekhol 'asher diber ihoh 'el mosheh vayitenah yehoshua' lenakhalah leyisra'el kemakhleqotam leshibteihem veha'arez shaqetah mimilkhamah. ve'eleh malkhei ha'arez 'asher hiku benei yisra'el vayirshu 'et 'arzam be'eiber hayarden mizrekhah hashamesh minakhal 'arnon 'ad har khermon vekhal ha'arabah mizrakhah. sikhon melekh ha'emori hayosheb bekheshbon moshel mei'aro'er 'asher 'al sefat nakhal 'arnon vetokh hanakhal vakhazi hagil'ad ve'ad yaboq hanakhal gebul benei 'amon. veha'arabah 'ad yam kinrot mizrakhah ve'ad yam ha'arabah yam hamelakh mizrakhah derekh bet hayshimot umiteiman takhat 'ashdot hapisgah. ugebul 'og melekh habashan miyeter harefa'im hayosheb be'ashtarot ube'edre'i. umoshel behar khermon ubesalkhah ubekhal habashan 'ad gebul hageshuri vehama'akhati vakhazi hagil'ad gebul sikhon melekh kheshbon. mosheh 'ebed ihoh ubenei yisra'el hikum vayitenah mosheh 'ebed ihoh yerushah laru'ubeini velagadi velakhazi sheibet hamnasheh. ve'eleh malkhei ha'arez 'asher hikah yehoshua' ubenei yisra'el be'eiber hayarden yamah miba'al gad bebiq'at halebanon ve'ad hahar hekhalaq ha'oleh sei'irah vayitenah yehoshua' leshibtei yisra'el yerushah kemakhleqotam. bahar ubashefeilah uba'arabah uba'asheidot ubamidbar ubanegeb hakhiti ha'emori vehakena'ani haperizi hakhivi vehaybusi. melekh yerikho 'ekhad melekh ha'ai 'asher mizad bet 'el 'ekhad. melekh yerushalim 'ekhad melekh khebron 'ekhad. melekh yarmut 'ekhad melekh lakhish 'ekhad. melekh 'eglon 'ekhad melekh gezer 'ekhad. melekh debir 'ekhad melekh geder 'ekhad. melekh kharemah 'ekhad melekh 'arad 'ekhad. melekh libnah 'ekhad melekh 'adulam 'ekhad. melekh maqeidah 'ekhad melekh bet 'el 'ekhad. melekh tapuakh 'ekhad melekh kheifer 'ekhad. melekh 'afeq 'ekhad melekh lasharon 'ekhad. melekh madon 'ekhad melekh khazor 'ekhad. melekh shimron mer'on 'ekhad melekh 'akhshaf 'ekhad. melekh ta'nakh 'ekhad melekh megido 'ekhad. melekh qedesh 'ekhad melekh yaqeno'am lakarmel 'ekhad. melekh dor lenafat dor 'ekhad melekh goyim legilgal 'ekhad. melekh tirzah 'ekhad kal melakhim sheloshim ve'ekhad. vihoshua' zaqen ba bayamim vayomer ihoh 'eilav 'atah zaqantah bata bayamim veha'arez nish'arah harbeh me'od lerishtah. zot ha'arez hanish'aret kal gelilot hapelishtim vekhal hageshuri. min hashikhor 'asher 'al penei mizrayim ve'ad gebul 'eqron zafonah lakena'ani teikhasheb khameishet sarnei felishtim ha'azati veha'ashdodi ha'eshqeloni hagiti veha'eqroni veha'avim. miteiman kal 'erez hakena'ani ume'arah 'asher lazidonim 'ad 'afeiqah 'ad gebul ha'emori. veha'arez hagibli vekhal halebanon mizrakh hashemesh miba'al gad takhat har khermon 'ad lebo khamat. kal yoshebei hahar min halebanon 'ad misrefot mayim kal zidonim 'anokhi 'orishem mipenei benei yisra'el raq hapileha leyisra'el benakhalah ka'asher zivitikha. ve'atah khaleq 'et ha'arez hazot benakhalah letish'at hashebatim vakhazi hasheibet hamnasheh. 'imo har'ubeini vehagadi laqekhu nakhalatam 'asher natan lahem mosheh be'eiber hayarden mizrakhah ka'asher natan lahem mosheh 'ebed ihoh. mei'aro'er 'asher 'al sefat nakhal 'arnon veha'ir 'asher betokh hanakhal vekhal hamishor meideba 'ad dibon. vekhol 'arei sikhon melekh ha'emori 'asher malakh bekheshbon 'ad gebul benei 'amon. vehagil'ad ugebul hageshuri vehama'akhati vekhol har khermon vekhal habashan 'ad salkhah. kal mamlekhut 'og babashan 'asher malakh be'ashtarot ube'edre'i hu nish'ar miyeter harefa'im vayakem mosheh vayorishem. velo horishu benei yisra'el 'et hageshuri ve'et hama'akhati vayeisheb geshur uma'akhat beqereb yisra'el 'ad hayom hazeh. raq lesheibet haleivi lo natan nakhalah 'ishei ihoh 'elohei yisra'el hu nakhalato ka'asher diber lo. vayiten mosheh lemateh benei re'uben lemishpekhotam. vayhi lahem hagebul mei'aro'er 'asher 'al sefat nakhal 'arnon veha'ir 'asher betokh hanakhal vekhal hamishor 'al meideba. kheshbon vekhal 'areha 'asher bamishor dibon ubamot ba'al ubet ba'al me'on. veyahzah uqedeimot umeifa'at. veqiryatayim vesibmah vezeret hashakhar behar ha'eimeq. ubet pe'or ve'ashdot hapisgah ubet hayshimot. vekhol 'arei hamishor vekhal mamlekhut sikhon melekh ha'emori 'asher malakh bekheshbon 'asher hikah mosheh 'oto ve'et nesi'ei midyan 'et 'evi ve'et reqem ve'et zur ve'et khur ve'et reba' nesikhei sikhon yoshebei ha'arez. ve'et bil'am ben be'or haqosem haregu benei yisra'el bakhereb 'el khaleihem. vayhi gebul benei re'uben hayarden ugebul zot nakhalat benei re'uben lemishpekhotam he'arim vekhazreihen. vayiten mosheh lemateh gad libnei gad lemishpekhotam. vayhi lahem hagebul ya'zer vekhal 'arei hagil'ad vakhazi 'erez benei 'amon 'ad 'aro'er 'asher 'al penei rabah. umeikheshbon 'ad ramat hamizpeh ubetonim umimakhanayim 'ad gebul lidbir. uba'eimeq bet haram ubet nimrah vesukot vezafon yeter mamlekhut sikhon melekh kheshbon hayarden ugebul 'ad qezeh yam kineret 'eiber hayarden mizrakhah. zot nakhalat benei gad lemishpekhotam he'arim vekhazreihem. vayiten mosheh lakhazi sheibet menasheh vayhi lakhazi mateh benei menasheh lemishpekhotam. vayhi gebulam mimakhanayim kal habashan kal mamlekhut 'og melekh habashan vekhal khavot ya'ir 'asher babashan shishim 'ir. vakhazi hagil'ad ve'ashtarot ve'edre'i 'arei mamlekhut 'og babashan libnei makhir ben menasheh lakhazi benei makhir lemishpekhotam. 'eleh 'asher nikhal mosheh be'arbot mo'ab mei'eiber leyarden yerikho mizrakhah. ulesheibet haleivi lo natan mosheh nakhalah ihoh 'elohei yisra'el hu nakhalatam ka'asher diber lahem. ve'eleh 'asher nakhalu benei yisra'el be'erez kena'an 'asher nikhalu 'otam 'el'azar hakohen vihoshua' bin nun verashei 'abot hamatot libnei yisra'el. begoral nakhalatam ka'asher zivah ihoh beyad mosheh letish'at hamatot vakhazi hamateh. ki natan mosheh nakhalat shenei hamatot vakhazi hamateh mei'eiber layarden velalviyim lo natan nakhalah betokham. ki hayu benei yosef shenei matot menasheh ve'efrayim velo natenu kheileq lalviyim ba'arez ki 'im 'arim lashebet umigresheihem lemiqneihem uleqinyanam. ka'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh ken 'asu benei yisra'el vayakhlequ 'et ha'arez. vayigeshu benei yehudah 'el yehoshua' bagilgal vayomer 'eilav kaleb ben yefuneh haqenizi 'atah yada'ta 'et hadabar 'asher diber ihoh 'el mosheh 'ish ha'elohim 'al 'odotai ve'al 'odotekha beqadesh barneia'. ben 'arba'im shanah 'anokhi bishloakh mosheh 'ebed ihoh 'oti miqadesh barneia' leragel 'et ha'arez va'asheb 'oto dabar ka'asher 'im lebabi. ve'akhai 'asher 'alu 'imi himsiv 'et leb ha'am ve'anokhi mileiti 'akharei ihoh 'elohai. vayishaba' mosheh bayom hahu leimor 'im lo ha'arez 'asher darekhah raglekha bah lekha tihyeh lenakhalah ulebanekha 'ad 'olam ki mileita 'akharei ihoh 'elohai. ve'atah hineh hekheyah ihoh 'oti ka'asher diber zeh 'arba'im vekhamesh shanah mei'az diber ihoh 'et hadabar hazeh 'el mosheh 'asher halakh yisra'el bamidbar ve'atah hineh 'anokhi hayom ben khamesh ushemonim shanah. 'odeni hayom khazaq ka'asher beyom sheloakh 'oti mosheh kekhokhi 'az ukhekhokhi 'atah lamilkhamah velazet velabo. ve'atah tenah li 'et hahar hazeh 'asher diber ihoh bayom hahu ki 'atah shama'ta bayom hahu ki 'anaqim sham ve'arim gedolot bezurot 'ulai ihoh 'oti vehorashtim ka'asher diber ihoh. vaybarekheihu yehoshua' vayiten 'et khebron lekhaleb ben yefuneh lenakhalah. 'al ken hayetah khebron lekhaleb ben yefuneh haqenizi lenakhalah 'ad hayom hazeh ya'an 'asher milei 'akharei ihoh 'elohei yisra'el. veshem khebron lefanim qiryat 'arba' ha'adam hagadol ba'anaqim hu veha'arez shaqetah mimilkhamah. vayhi hagoral lemateh benei yehudah lemishpekhotam 'el gebul 'edom midbar zin negbah miqzeh teiman. vayhi lahem gebul negeb miqzeh yam hamelakh min halashon haponeh negbah. veyaza 'el minegeb lema'aleh 'aqrabim ve'abar zinah ve'alah minegeb leqadesh barneia' ve'abar khezron ve'alah 'adarah venasab haqarqa'ah. ve'abar 'azmonah veyaza nakhal mizrayim vehayah vehayu toze'ot hagebul yamah zeh yihyeh lakhem gebul negeb. ugebul qeidemah yam hamelakh 'ad qezeh hayarden ugebul lif'at zafonah mileshon hayam miqzeh hayarden. ve'alah hagebul bet khagelah ve'abar mizefon lebet ha'arabah ve'alah hagebul 'eben bohan ben re'uben. ve'alah hagebul debirah mei'eimeq 'akhor vezafonah poneh 'el hagilgal 'asher nokhakh lema'aleh 'adumim 'asher minegeb lanakhal ve'abar hagebul 'el mei 'en shemesh vehayu toze'otav 'el 'en rogel. ve'alah hagebul gei ben hinom 'el ketef haybusi minegeb hi yerushalim ve'alah hagebul 'el rosh hahar 'asher 'al penei gei hinom yamah 'asher biqzeh 'eimeq refa'im zafonah. veta'ar hagebul meirosh hahar 'el ma'yan mei neftoakh veyaza 'el 'arei har 'efron veta'ar hagebul ba'alah hi qiryat ye'arim. venasab hagebul miba'alah yamah 'el har sei'ir ve'abar 'el ketef har ye'arim mizafonah hi khesalon veyarad bet shemesh ve'abar timnah. veyaza hagebul 'el ketef 'eqron zafonah veta'ar hagebul shikeronah ve'abar har haba'alah veyaza yabne'el vehayu toze'ot hagebul yamah. ugebul yam hayamah hagadol ugebul zeh gebul benei yehudah sabib lemishpekhotam. ulekhaleb ben yefuneh natan kheileq betokh benei yehudah 'el pi ihoh lihoshua' 'et qiryat 'arba' 'abi ha'anaq hi khebron. vayoresh misham kaleb 'et sheloshah benei ha'anaq 'et sheishai ve'et 'akhiman ve'et talmai yelidei ha'anaq. vaya'al misham 'el yoshebei debir veshem debir lefanim qiryat seifer. vayomer kaleb 'asher yakeh 'et qiryat seifer ulekhadah venatati lo 'et 'akhsah biti le'ishah. vayilkedah 'ateni'el ben qenaz 'akhi khaleb vayiten lo 'et 'akhsah bito le'ishah. vayhi bebo'ah vatesiteihu lish'ol mei'et 'abiha sadeh vatiznakh mei'al hakhamor vayomer lah kaleb mah lakh. vatomer tenah li berakhah ki 'erez hanegeb netatani venatatah li gulot mayim vayiten lah 'et gulot 'iliyot ve'et gulot takhtiyot. zot nakhalat mateh benei yehudah lemishpekhotam. vayihyu he'arim miqzeh lemateh benei yehudah 'el gebul 'edom banegbah qabze'el ve'eider veyagur. veqinah vedimonah ve'ad'adah. veqedesh vekhazor veyitnan. zif vatelem ube'alot. vekhazor khadatah uqeriyot khezron hi khazor. 'amam ushema' umoladah. vakhazar gadah vekheshmon ubet palet. vakhazar shu'al ube'er sheba' ubizyotyah. ba'alah ve'iyim va'azem. ve'eltolad ukhesil vekharemah. veziqlag umadmanah vesansanah. uleba'ot veshilkhim ve'ayin verimon kal 'arim 'esrim vateisha' vekhazreihen. bashefeilah 'eshta'ol vezare'ah ve'ashnah. vezanoakh ve'en ganim tapuakh veha'einam. yarmut va'adulam sokhoh va'azeiqah. vesha'arayim va'aditayim vehagedeirah ugedeirotayim 'arim 'arba' 'esreh vekhazreihen. zenan vakhadashah umigdal gad. vedil'an vehamizpeh veyaqete'el. lakhish ubazeqat ve'eglon. vekhabon velakhmas vekhitlish. ugedeirot bet dagon vena'amah umaqeidah 'arim shesh 'esreh vekhazreihen. libnah va'eter ve'ashan. veyiftakh ve'ashnah unezib. uqe'ilah ve'akhzib umareishah 'arim teisha' vekhazreihen. 'eqron ubenoteha vakhazeireha. mei'eqron vayamah kol 'asher 'al yad 'ashdod vekhazreihen. 'ashdod benoteha vakhazeireha 'azah benoteha vakhazeireha 'ad nakhal mizrayim vehayam hagabol hagadol ugebul. ubahar shamir veyatir vesokhoh. vedanah veqiryat sanah hi debir. va'anab ve'eshtemoh ve'anim. vegoshen vekholon vegiloh 'arim 'akhat 'esreh vekhazreihen. 'arab verumah ve'esh'an. veyanim veyanum ubet tapuakh va'afeiqah. vekhumtah veqiryat 'arba' hi khebron vezi'or 'arim teisha' vekhazreihen. ma'on karmel vazif veyutah. veyizre'el veyaqede'am vezanoakh. haqayin gib'ah vetimnah 'arim 'eser vekhazreihen. khalkhul bet zur ugedor. uma'arat ubet 'anot ve'elteqon 'arim shesh vekhazreihen. qiryat ba'al hi qiryat ye'arim veharabah 'arim shetayim vekhazreihen. bamidbar bet ha'arabah midin usekhakhah. vehanibshan ve'ir hamelakh ve'en gedi 'arim shesh vekhazreihen. ve'et haybusi yoshebei yerushalim lo yukhelu yakhelu benei yehudah lehorisham vayeisheb haybusi 'et benei yehudah birushalim 'ad hayom hazeh. vayeizei hagoral libnei yosef miyarden yerikho lemei yerikho mizrakhah hamidbar 'oleh mirikho bahar bet 'el. veyaza mibet 'el luzah ve'abar 'el gebul ha'arki 'atarot. veyarad yamah 'el gebul hayafleiti 'ad gebul bet khoron takhton ve'ad gazer vehayu toze'oto toze'otav yamah. vayinkhalu benei yosef menasheh ve'efrayim. vayhi gebul benei 'efrayim lemishpekhotam vayhi gebul nakhalatam mizrakhah 'atrot 'adar 'ad bet khoron 'elyon. veyaza hagebul hayamah hamikhmetat mizafon venasab hagebul mizrakhah ta'anat shiloh ve'abar 'oto mimizrakh yanokhah. veyarad miyanokhah 'atarot vena'aratah ufaga' birikho veyaza hayarden. mitapuakh yeilekh hagebul yamah nakhal qanah vehayu toze'otav hayamah zot nakhalat mateh benei 'efrayim lemishpekhotam. vehe'arim hamibdalot libnei 'efrayim betokh nakhalat benei menasheh kal he'arim vekhazreihen. velo horishu 'et hakena'ani hayosheb begazer vayeisheb hakena'ani beqereb 'efrayim 'ad hayom hazeh vayhi lemas 'obed. vayhi hagoral lemateh menasheh ki hu bekhor yosef lemakhir bekhor menasheh 'abi hagil'ad ki hu hayah 'ish milkhamah vayhi lo hagil'ad vehabashan. vayhi libnei menasheh hanotarim lemishpekhotam libnei 'abi'ezer velibnei kheileq velibnei 'asri'el velibnei shekhem velibnei kheifer velibnei shemida' 'eleh benei menasheh ben yosef hazekharim lemishpekhotam. velizlafekhad ben kheifer ben gil'ad ben makhir ben menasheh lo hayu lo banim ki 'im banot ve'eleh shemot benotav makhlah veno'ah khagelah milkah vetirzah. vatiqrabnah lifnei 'el'azar hakohen velifnei yehoshua' bin nun velifnei hanesi'im leimor ihoh zivah 'et mosheh latet lanu nakhalah betokh 'akheinu vayiten lahem 'el pi ihoh nakhalah betokh 'akhei 'abihen. vayipelu khablei menasheh 'asarah lebad mei'erez hagil'ad vehabashan 'asher mei'eiber layarden. ki benot menasheh nakhalu nakhalah betokh banav ve'erez hagil'ad hayetah libnei menasheh hanotarim. vayhi gebul menasheh mei'asher hamikhmetat 'asher 'al penei shekhem vehalakh hagebul 'el hayamin 'el yoshebei 'en tapuakh. limnasheh hayetah 'erez tapuakh vetapuakh 'el gebul menasheh libnei 'efrayim. veyarad hagebul nakhal qanah negbah lanakhal 'arim ha'eleh le'efrayim betokh 'arei menasheh ugebul menasheh mizefon lanakhal vayhi toze'otav hayamah. negbah le'efrayim vezafonah limnasheh vayhi hayam gebulo ube'asher yifge'un mizafon ubeyisashkhar mimizrakh. vayhi limnasheh beyisashkhar ube'asher bet she'an ubenoteha veyible'am ubenoteha ve'et yoshebei dor ubenoteha veyoshebei 'en dor ubenoteha veyoshebei ta'nakh ubenoteha veyoshebei megido ubenoteha sheloshet hanafet. velo yakhelu benei menasheh lehorish 'et he'arim ha'eleh vayo'el hakena'ani lashebet ba'arez hazot. vayhi ki khazequ benei yisra'el vayitenu 'et hakena'ani lamas vehoresh lo horisho. vaydaberu benei yosef 'et yehoshua' leimor madua' natatah li nakhalah goral 'ekhad vekhebel 'ekhad va'ani 'am rab 'ad 'asher 'ad koh beirekhani ihoh. vayomer 'aleihem yehoshua' 'im 'am rab 'atah 'aleh lekha haya'rah ubeireita lekha sham be'erez haperizi veharefa'im ki 'az lekha har 'efrayim. vayomeru benei yosef lo yimazei lanu hahar verekheb barzel bekhal hakena'ani hayosheb be'erez ha'eimeq la'asher bebet she'an ubenoteha vela'asher be'eimeq yizre'el. vayomer yehoshua' 'el bet yosef le'efrayim velimnasheh leimor 'am rab 'atah vekhoakh gadol lakh lo yihyeh lekha goral 'ekhad. ki har yihyeh lakh ki ya'ar hu ubeireito vehayah lekha toze'otav ki torish 'et hakena'ani ki rekheb barzel lo ki khazaq hu. vayiqahalu kal 'adat benei yisra'el shiloh vayashkinu sham 'et 'ohel mo'ed veha'arez nikhbeshah lifneihem. vayivateru bibnei yisra'el 'asher lo khalequ 'et nakhalatam shib'ah shebatim. vayomer yehoshua' 'el benei yisra'el 'ad 'anah 'atem mitrapim labo lareshet 'et ha'arez 'asher natan lakhem ihoh 'elohei 'aboteikhem. habu lakhem sheloshah 'anashim lashabet ve'eshlakhem veyaqumu veyithalekhu ba'arez veyikhtebu 'otah lefi nakhalatam veyabo'u 'eilai. vehitkhalequ 'otah leshib'ah khalaqim yehudah ya'amod 'al gebulo minegeb ubet yosef ya'amdu 'al gebulam mizafon. ve'atem tikhtebu 'et ha'arez shib'ah khalaqim vahabeitem 'eilai henah veyariti lakhem goral poh lifnei ihoh 'eloheinu. ki 'en kheileq lalviyim beqirbekhem ki khehunat ihoh nakhalato vegad ure'uben vakhazi sheibet hamnasheh laqekhu nakhalatam mei'eiber layarden mizrakhah 'asher natan lahem mosheh 'ebed ihoh. vayaqumu ha'anashim vayeileikhu vayzav yehoshua' 'et haholekhim likhtob 'et ha'arez leimor lekhu vehithalekhu ba'arez vekhitbu 'otah veshubu 'eilai ufoh 'ashlikh lakhem goral lifnei ihoh beshiloh. vayeilekhu ha'anashim vaya'abru ba'arez vayikhtebuha le'arim leshib'ah khalaqim 'al seifer vayabo'u 'el yehoshua' 'el hamakhaneh shiloh. vayashlekh lahem yehoshua' goral beshiloh lifnei ihoh vaykhaleq sham yehoshua' 'et ha'arez libnei yisra'el kemakhleqotam. vaya'al goral mateh benei binyamin lemishpekhotam vayeizei gebul goralam ben benei yehudah uben benei yosef. vayhi lahem hagebul lif'at zafonah min hayarden ve'alah hagebul 'el ketef yerikho mizafon ve'alah bahar yamah vehayah vehayu toze'otav midbarah bet 'aven. ve'abar misham hagebul luzah 'el ketef luzah negbah hi bet 'el veyarad hagebul 'atrot 'adar 'al hahar 'asher minegeb lebet khoron takhton. veta'ar hagebul venasab lif'at yam negbah min hahar 'asher 'al penei bet khoron negbah vehayah vehayu toze'otav 'el qiryat ba'al hi qiryat ye'arim 'ir benei yehudah zot pe'at yam. ufe'at negbah miqzeh qiryat ye'arim veyaza hagebul yamah veyaza 'el ma'yan mei neftoakh. veyarad hagebul 'el qezeh hahar 'asher 'al penei gei ben hinom 'asher be'eimeq refa'im zafonah veyarad gei hinom 'el ketef haybusi negbah veyarad 'en rogel. veta'ar mizafon veyaza 'en shemesh veyaza 'el gelilot 'asher nokhakh ma'aleh 'adumim veyarad 'eben bohan ben re'uben. ve'abar 'el ketef mul ha'arabah zafonah veyarad ha'arabatah. ve'abar hagebul 'el ketef bet khagelah zafonah vehayah vehayu toze'otav toze'ot hagebul 'el leshon yam hamelakh zafonah 'el qezeh hayarden negbah zeh gebul negeb. vehayarden yigbol 'oto lif'at qeidemah zot nakhalat benei binyamin ligbuloteha sabib lemishpekhotam. vehayu he'arim lemateh benei binyamin lemishpekhoteihem yerikho ubet khagelah ve'eimeq qeziz. ubet ha'arabah uzemarayim ubet 'el. veha'avim vehaparah ve'aferah. ukhefar ha'amoni ha'amonah veha'afeni vagaba' 'arim shetem 'esreh vekhazreihen. gib'on veharamah ube'eirot. vehamizpeh vehakefirah vehamozah. vereqem veyirpe'el vetar'alah. vezeila' ha'elef vehaybusi hi yerushalim gib'at qiryat 'arim 'arba' 'esreh vekhazreihen zot nakhalat benei binyamin lemishpekhotam. vayeizei hagoral hasheini leshim'on lemateh benei shim'on lemishpekhotam vayhi nakhalatam betokh nakhalat benei yehudah. vayhi lahem benakhalatam be'er sheba' vesheba' umoladah. vakhazar shu'al ubalah va'azem. ve'eltolad ubetul vekharemah. veziqlag ubet hamarkabot vakhazar susah. ubet leba'ot vesharukhen 'arim shelosh 'esreh vekhazreihen. 'ayin rimon va'eter ve'ashan 'arim 'arba' vekhazreihen. vekhal hakhazeirim 'asher sebibot he'arim ha'eleh 'ad ba'alat be'er ramat negeb zot nakhalat mateh benei shim'on lemishpekhotam. meikhebel benei yehudah nakhalat benei shim'on ki hayah kheileq benei yehudah rab meihem vayinkhalu benei shim'on betokh nakhalatam. vaya'al hagoral hashelishi libnei zebulun lemishpekhotam vayhi gebul nakhalatam 'ad sarid. ve'alah gebulam layamah umar'alah ufaga' bedabashet ufaga' 'el hanakhal 'asher 'al penei yaqene'am. veshab misarid qeidemah mizrakh hashemesh 'al gebul kislot tabor veyaza 'el hadaberat ve'alah yafia'. umisham 'abar qeidemah mizrakhah gitah kheifer 'itah qazin veyaza rimon hameto'ar hanei'ah. venasab 'oto hagebul mizefon khanaton vehayu toze'otav gei yiftakh 'el. veqatat venahalal veshimron veyid'alah ubet lakhem 'arim shetem 'esreh vekhazreihen. zot nakhalat benei zebulun lemishpekhotam he'arim ha'eleh vekhazreihen. leyisashkhar yaza hagoral harebi'i libnei yisashkhar lemishpekhotam. vayhi gebulam yizre'elah vehakesulot veshunem. vakhafarayim veshi'on va'anakharat. veharabit veqishyon va'abez. veremet ve'en ganim ve'en khadah ubet pazez. ufaga' hagebul betabor veshakhazumah veshakhazimah ubet shemesh vehayu toze'ot gebulam hayarden 'arim shesh 'esreh vekhazreihen. zot nakhalat mateh benei yisashkhar lemishpekhotam he'arim vekhazreihen. vayeizei hagoral hakhamishi lemateh benei 'asher lemishpekhotam. vayhi gebulam khelqat vakhali vabeten ve'akhshaf. ve'alamelekh ve'am'ad umish'al ufaga' bekharmel hayamah ubeshikhor libnat. veshab mizrakh hashemesh bet dagon ufaga' bizbulun ubegei yiftakh 'el zafonah bet ha'eimeq une'i'el veyaza 'el kabul misemol. ve'ebron urekhob vekhamon veqanah 'ad zidon rabah. veshab hagebul haramah ve'ad 'ir mibzar zor veshab hagebul khosah veyihyu vehayu toze'otav hayamah meikhebel 'akhzibah. ve'umah va'afeq urekhob 'arim 'esrim ushetayim vekhazreihen. zot nakhalat mateh benei 'asher lemishpekhotam he'arim ha'eleh vekhazreihen. libnei naftali yaza hagoral hashishi libnei naftali lemishpekhotam. vayhi gebulam meikheilef mei'eilon beza'ananim va'adami haneqeb veyabne'el 'ad laqum vayhi toze'otav hayarden. veshab hagebul yamah 'aznot tabor veyaza misham khuqoqah ufaga' bizbulun minegeb ube'asher paga' miyam ubihudah hayarden mizrakh hashamesh. ve'arei mibzar hazidim zer vekhamat raqat vekhinaret. va'adamah veharamah vekhazor. veqedesh ve'edre'i ve'en khazor. veyir'on umigdal 'el khorem ubet 'anat ubet shamesh 'arim tesha' 'esreh vekhazreihen. zot nakhalat mateh benei naftali lemishpekhotam he'arim vekhazreihen. lemateh benei dan lemishpekhotam yaza hagoral hashebi'i. vayhi gebul nakhalatam zare'ah ve'eshta'ol ve'ir shamesh. vesha'alabin ve'ayalon veyitlah. ve'eilon vetimnatah ve'eqron. ve'elteqeh vegibeton uba'alat. vihud ubenei beraq vegat rimon. umei hayarqon veharaqon 'im hagebul mul yafo. vayeizei gebul benei dan meihem vaya'alu benei dan vayilakhamu 'im leshem vayilkedu 'otah vayaku 'otah lefi khereb vayirshu 'otah vayeishebu bah vayiqre'u leleshem dan keshem dan 'abihem. zot nakhalat mateh benei dan lemishpekhotam he'arim ha'eleh vekhazreihen. vaykhalu linkhol 'et ha'arez ligbuloteha vayitenu benei yisra'el nakhalah lihoshua' bin nun betokham. 'al pi ihoh natenu lo 'et ha'ir 'asher sha'al 'et timnat serakh behar 'efrayim vayibneh 'et ha'ir vayeisheb bah. 'eleh hanekhalot 'asher nikhalu 'el'azar hakohen vihoshua' bin nun verashei ha'abot lematot benei yisra'el begoral beshiloh lifnei ihoh petakh 'ohel mo'ed vaykhalu meikhaleq 'et ha'arez. vaydaber ihoh 'el yehoshua' leimor. daber 'el benei yisra'el leimor tenu lakhem 'et 'arei hamiqlat 'asher dibarti 'aleikhem beyad mosheh. lanus shamah rozeiakh makeh nefesh bishgagah bibli da'at vehayu lakhem lemiqlat migo'el hadam. venas 'el 'akhat meihe'arim ha'eleh ve'amad petakh sha'ar ha'ir vediber be'azenei ziqnei ha'ir hahi 'et debarav ve'asefu 'oto ha'irah 'aleihem venatenu lo maqom veyashab 'imam. vekhi yirdof go'el hadam 'akharav velo yasgiru 'et harozeiakh beyado ki bibli da'at hikah 'et rei'eihu velo sonei hu lo mitemol shilshom. veyashab ba'ir hahi 'ad 'amedo lifnei ha'eidah lamishpat 'ad mot hakohen hagadol 'asher yihyeh bayamim hahem 'az yashub harozeiakh uba 'el 'iro ve'el beito 'el ha'ir 'asher nas misham. vayaqdishu 'et qedesh bagalil behar naftali ve'et shekhem behar 'efrayim ve'et qiryat 'arba' hi khebron behar yehudah. umei'eiber leyarden yerikho mizrakhah natenu 'et bezer bamidbar bamishor mimateh re'uben ve'et ramot bagil'ad mimateh gad ve'et galon golan babashan mimateh menasheh.
