'eleh hayu 'arei hamu'adah lekhol benei yisra'el velager hagar betokham lanus shamah kal makeh nefesh bishgagah velo yamut beyad go'el hadam 'ad 'amedo lifnei ha'eidah. vayigeshu rashei 'abot halviyim 'el 'el'azar hakohen ve'el yehoshua' bin nun ve'el rashei 'abot hamatot libnei yisra'el. vaydaberu 'aleihem beshiloh be'erez kena'an leimor ihoh zivah beyad mosheh latet lanu 'arim lashabet umigresheihen libhemteinu. vayitenu benei yisra'el lalviyim minakhalatam 'el pi ihoh 'et he'arim ha'eleh ve'et migresheihen. vayeizei hagoral lemishpekhot haqehati vayhi libnei 'aharon hakohen min halviyim mimateh yehudah umimateh hashim'oni umimateh binyamin bagoral 'arim shelosh 'esreh. velibnei qehat hanotarim mimishpekhot mateh 'efrayim umimateh dan umeikhazi mateh menasheh bagoral 'arim 'aser. velibnei geireshon mimishpekhot mateh yisashkhar umimateh 'asher umimateh naftali umeikhazi mateh menasheh babashan bagoral 'arim shelosh 'esreh. libnei merari lemishpekhotam mimateh re'uben umimateh gad umimateh zebulun 'arim shetem 'esreh. vayitenu benei yisra'el lalviyim 'et he'arim ha'eleh ve'et migresheihen ka'asher zivah ihoh beyad mosheh bagoral. vayitenu mimateh benei yehudah umimateh benei shim'on 'et he'arim ha'eleh 'asher yiqra 'ethen beshem. vayhi libnei 'aharon mimishpekhot haqehati mibenei leivi ki lahem hayah hagoral rishonah. vayitenu lahem 'et qiryat 'arba' 'abi ha'anoq hi khebron behar yehudah ve'et migrasheha sebiboteha. ve'et sedeh ha'ir ve'et khazeireha natenu lekhaleb ben yefuneh ba'akhuzato. velibnei 'aharon hakohen natenu 'et 'ir miqlat harozeiakh 'et khebron ve'et migrasheha ve'et libnah ve'et migrasheha. ve'et yatir ve'et migrasheha ve'et 'eshtemoa' ve'et migrasheha. ve'et kholon ve'et migrasheha ve'et debir ve'et migrasheha. ve'et 'ayin ve'et migrasheha ve'et yutah ve'et migrasheha 'et bet shemesh ve'et migrasheha 'arim teisha' mei'et shenei hashebatim ha'eleh. umimateh binyamin 'et gib'on ve'et migrasheha 'et geba' ve'et migrasheha. 'et 'anatot ve'et migrasheha ve'et 'almon ve'et migrasheha 'arim 'arba'. kal 'arei benei 'aharon hakohanim shelosh 'esreh 'arim umigresheihen. ulemishpekhot benei qehat halviyim hanotarim mibenei qehat vayhi 'arei goralam mimateh 'efrayim. vayitenu lahem 'et 'ir miqlat harozeiakh 'et shekhem ve'et migrasheha behar 'efrayim ve'et gezer ve'et migrasheha. ve'et qibzayim ve'et migrasheha ve'et bet khoron ve'et migrasheha 'arim 'arba'. umimateh dan 'et 'elteqei ve'et migrasheha 'et gibeton ve'et migrasheha. 'et 'ayalon ve'et migrasheha 'et gat rimon ve'et migrasheha 'arim 'arba'. umimakhazit mateh menasheh 'et ta'nakh ve'et migrasheha ve'et gat rimon ve'et migrasheha 'arim shetayim. kal 'arim 'eser umigresheihen lemishpekhot benei qehat hanotarim. velibnei geireshon mimishpekhot halviyim meikhazi mateh menasheh 'et 'ir miqlat harozeiakh 'et galon golan babashan ve'et migrasheha ve'et be'eshterah ve'et migrasheha 'arim shetayim. umimateh yisashkhar 'et qishyon ve'et migrasheha 'et daberat ve'et migrasheha. 'et yarmut ve'et migrasheha 'et 'en ganim ve'et migrasheha 'arim 'arba'. umimateh 'asher 'et mish'al ve'et migrasheha 'et 'abdon ve'et migrasheha. 'et khelqat ve'et migrasheha ve'et rekhob ve'et migrasheha 'arim 'arba'. umimateh naftali 'et 'ir miqlat harozeiakh 'et qedesh bagalil ve'et migrasheha ve'et khamot dor ve'et migrasheha ve'et qartan ve'et migrasheha 'arim shalosh. kal 'arei hageireshuni lemishpekhotam shelosh 'esreh 'ir umigresheihen. ulemishpekhot benei merari halviyim hanotarim mei'et mateh zebulun 'et yaqene'am ve'et migrasheha 'et qartah ve'et migrasheha. 'et dimnah ve'et migrasheha 'et nahalal ve'et migrasheha 'arim 'arba'. umimateh re'uben 'et bezer ve'et migrasheha ve'et yahzah ve'et migrasheha. 'et qedeimot ve'et migrasheha ve'et meifa'at ve'et migrasheha 'arim 'arba'. umimateh gad 'et 'ir miqlat harozeiakh 'et ramot bagil'ad ve'et migrasheha ve'et makhanayim ve'et migrasheha. 'et kheshbon ve'et migrasheha 'et ya'zer ve'et migrasheha kal 'arim 'arba'. kal he'arim libnei merari lemishpekhotam hanotarim mimishpekhot halviyim vayhi goralam 'arim shetem 'esreh. kol 'arei halviyim betokh 'akhuzat benei yisra'el 'arim 'arba'im ushemoneh umigresheihen. tihyenah he'arim ha'eleh 'ir 'ir umigrasheha sebiboteha ken lekhal he'arim ha'eleh. vayiten ihoh leyisra'el 'et kal ha'arez 'asher nishba' latet la'abotam vayirashuha vayeishebu bah. vayanakh ihoh lahem misabib kekhol 'asher nishba' la'abotam velo 'amad 'ish bifneihem mikal 'oyebeihem 'et kal 'oyebeihem natan ihoh beyadam. lo nafal dabar mikol hadabar hatob 'asher diber ihoh 'el bet yisra'el hakol ba. 'az yiqra yehoshua' lar'ubeini velagadi velakhazi mateh menasheh. vayomer 'aleihem 'atem shemartem 'et kal 'asher zivah 'etkhem mosheh 'ebed ihoh vatishme'u beqoli lekhol 'asher ziviti 'etkhem. lo 'azabtem 'et 'akheikhem zeh yamim rabim 'ad hayom hazeh ushemartem 'et mishmeret mizvat ihoh 'eloheikhem. ve'atah heiniakh ihoh 'eloheikhem la'akheikhem ka'asher diber lahem ve'atah penu ulekhu lakhem le'aholeikhem 'el 'erez 'akhuzatkhem 'asher natan lakhem mosheh 'ebed ihoh be'eiber hayarden. raq shimru me'od la'asot 'et hamizvah ve'et hatorah 'asher zivah 'etkhem mosheh 'ebed ihoh le'ahabah 'et ihoh 'eloheikhem velalekhet bekhal derakhav velishmor mizvotav uledabeqah bo ule'abedo bekhal lebabkhem ubekhal nafshekhem. vaybarekhem yehoshua' vayshalekhem vayeilekhu 'el 'aholeihem. velakhazi sheibet hamnasheh natan mosheh babashan ulekhezyo natan yehoshua' 'im 'akheihem mei'eiber be'eiber hayarden yamah vegam ki shilekham yehoshua' 'el 'aholeihem vaybarakhem. vayomer 'aleihem leimor binkhasim rabim shubu 'el 'aholeikhem ubemiqneh rab me'od bekhesef ubezahab ubinkhoshet ubebarzel ubislamot harbeh me'od khilqu shelal 'oyebeikhem 'im 'akheikhem. vayashubu vayeilekhu benei re'uben ubenei gad vakhazi sheibet hamnasheh mei'et benei yisra'el mishiloh 'asher be'erez kena'an lalekhet 'el 'erez hagil'ad 'el 'erez 'akhuzatam 'asher nokhazu bah 'al pi ihoh beyad mosheh. vayabo'u 'el gelilot hayarden 'asher be'erez kena'an vayibnu benei re'uben ubenei gad vakhazi sheibet hamnasheh sham mizbeiakh 'al hayarden mizbeiakh gadol lemar'eh. vayishme'u benei yisra'el leimor hineh banu benei re'uben ubenei gad vakhazi sheibet hamnasheh 'et hamizbeiakh 'el mul 'erez kena'an 'el gelilot hayarden 'el 'eiber benei yisra'el. vayishme'u benei yisra'el vayiqahalu kal 'adat benei yisra'el shiloh la'alot 'aleihem lazaba. vayishlekhu benei yisra'el 'el benei re'uben ve'el benei gad ve'el khazi sheibet menasheh 'el 'erez hagil'ad 'et pinekhas ben 'el'azar hakohen. va'asarah nesi'im 'imo nasi 'ekhad nasi 'ekhad lebet 'ab lekhol matot yisra'el ve'ish rosh bet 'abotam hemah le'alfei yisra'el. vayabo'u 'el benei re'uben ve'el benei gad ve'el khazi sheibet menasheh 'el 'erez hagil'ad vaydaberu 'itam leimor. koh 'ameru kol 'adat ihoh mah hama'al hazeh 'asher me'altem beilohei yisra'el lashub hayom mei'akharei ihoh bibnotkhem lakhem mizbeiakh limradekhem hayom ihoh. ham'at lanu 'et 'avon pe'or 'asher lo hitaharnu mimenu 'ad hayom hazeh vayhi hanegef ba'adat ihoh. ve'atem tashubu hayom mei'akharei ihoh vehayah 'atem timredu hayom ihoh umakhar 'el kal 'adat yisra'el yiqzof. ve'akh 'im temei'ah 'erez 'akhuzatkhem 'ibru lakhem 'el 'erez 'akhuzat ihoh 'asher shakhan sham mishkan ihoh vehei'akhazu betokheinu ihoh 'al timrodu ve'otanu 'el timrodu bibnotekhem lakhem mizbeiakh mibal'adei mizbakh ihoh 'eloheinu. halo 'akhan ben zerakh ma'al ma'al bakheirem ve'al kal 'adat yisra'el hayah qazef vehu 'ish 'ekhad lo gava' ba'avono. vaya'anu benei re'uben ubenei gad vakhazi sheibet hamnasheh vaydaberu 'et rashei 'alfei yisra'el. 'el 'elohim ihoh 'el 'elohim ihoh hu yodeia' veyisra'el hu yeida' 'im bemered ve'im bema'al ihoh 'al toshi'einu hayom hazeh. libnot lanu mizbeiakh lashub mei'akharei ihoh ve'im leha'alot 'alav 'olah uminkhah ve'im la'asot 'alav zibkhei shelamim ihoh hu yebaqesh. ve'im lo mide'agah midabar 'asinu 'et zot leimor makhar yomeru beneikhem lebaneinu leimor mah lakhem ihoh 'elohei yisra'el. ugebul natan ihoh beineinu ubeineikhem benei re'uben ubenei gad 'et hayarden 'en lakhem kheileq ihoh vehishbitu beneikhem 'et baneinu lebilti yero 'et ihoh. vanomer na'aseh na lanu libnot 'et hamizbeiakh lo le'olah velo lezabakh. ki 'ed hu beineinu ubeineikhem uben doroteinu 'akhareinu la'abod 'et 'abodat ihoh lefanav be'oloteinu ubizbakheinu ubishlameinu velo yomeru beneikhem makhar lebaneinu 'en lakhem kheileq ihoh. vanomer vehayah ki yomeru 'eileinu ve'el doroteinu makhar ve'amarnu re'u 'et tabnit mizbakh ihoh 'asher 'asu 'aboteinu lo le'olah velo lezebakh ki 'ed hu beineinu ubeineikhem. khalilah lanu mimenu limrod ihoh velashub hayom mei'akharei ihoh libnot mizbeiakh le'olah leminkhah ulezabakh milebad mizbakh ihoh 'eloheinu 'asher lifnei mishkano. vayishma' pinekhas hakohen unesi'ei ha'eidah verashei 'alfei yisra'el 'asher 'ito 'et hadebarim 'asher diberu benei re'uben ubenei gad ubenei menasheh vayitab be'eineihem. vayomer pinekhas ben 'el'azar hakohen 'el benei re'uben ve'el benei gad ve'el benei menasheh hayom yada'nu ki betokheinu ihoh 'asher lo me'altem ihoh hama'al hazeh 'az hizaltem 'et benei yisra'el miyad ihoh. vayashab pinekhas ben 'el'azar hakohen vehanesi'im mei'et benei re'uben umei'et benei gad mei'erez hagil'ad 'el 'erez kena'an 'el benei yisra'el vayashibu 'otam dabar. vayitab hadabar be'einei benei yisra'el vaybarakhu 'elohim benei yisra'el velo 'ameru la'alot 'aleihem lazaba leshakhet 'et ha'arez 'asher benei re'uben ubenei gad yoshebim bah. vayiqre'u benei re'uben ubenei gad lamizbeiakh ki 'ed hu beinoteinu ki ihoh ha'elohim. vayhi miyamim rabim 'akharei 'asher heiniakh ihoh leyisra'el mikal 'oyebeihem misabib vihoshua' zaqen ba bayamim. vayiqra yehoshua' lekhal yisra'el lizqeinav ulerashav uleshofetav uleshoterav vayomer 'aleihem 'ani zaqanti bati bayamim. ve'atem re'item 'et kal 'asher 'asah ihoh 'eloheikhem lekhal hagoyim ha'eleh mipeneikhem ki ihoh 'eloheikhem hu hanilkham lakhem. re'u hipalti lakhem 'et hagoyim hanish'arim ha'eleh benakhalah leshibteikhem min hayarden vekhal hagoyim 'asher hikhrati vehayam hagadol mebo hashamesh. ihoh 'eloheikhem hu yehdofem mipeneikhem vehorish 'otam milifneikhem virishtem 'et 'arzam ka'asher diber ihoh 'eloheikhem lakhem. vakhazaqtem me'od lishmor vela'asot 'et kal hakatub beseifer torat mosheh lebilti sur mimenu yamin usemol. lebilti bo bagoyim ha'eleh hanish'arim ha'eleh 'itekhem ubeshem 'eloheihem lo tazkiru velo tashbi'u velo ta'abdum velo tishtakhavu lahem. ki 'im ihoh 'eloheikhem tidbaqu ka'asher 'asitem 'ad hayom hazeh. vayoresh ihoh mipeneikhem goyim gedolim va'azumim ve'atem lo 'amad 'ish bifneikhem 'ad hayom hazeh. 'ish 'ekhad mikem yirdaf 'alef ki ihoh 'eloheikhem hu hanilkham lakhem ka'asher diber lakhem. venishmartem me'od lenafshoteikhem le'ahabah 'et ihoh 'eloheikhem. ki 'im shob tashubu udebaqtem beyeter hagoyim ha'eleh hanish'arim ha'eleh 'itekhem vehitkhatantem bahem ubatem bahem vehem bakhem. yadoa' teide'u ki lo yosif ihoh 'eloheikhem lehorish 'et hagoyim ha'eleh milifneikhem vehayu lakhem lefakh ulemoqesh uleshotet bezideikhem velizninim be'eineikhem 'ad 'abadekhem mei'al ha'adamah hatobah hazot 'asher natan lakhem ihoh 'eloheikhem. vehineh 'anokhi holekh hayom bederekh kal ha'arez vida'tem bekhal lebabkhem ubekhal nafshekhem ki lo nafal dabar 'ekhad mikol hadebarim hatobim 'asher diber ihoh 'eloheikhem 'aleikhem hakol ba'u lakhem lo nafal mimenu dabar 'ekhad. vehayah ka'asher ba 'aleikhem kal hadabar hatob 'asher diber ihoh 'eloheikhem 'aleikhem ken yabi ihoh 'aleikhem 'et kal hadabar hara' 'ad hashmido 'otkhem mei'al ha'adamah hatobah hazot 'asher natan lakhem ihoh 'eloheikhem. be'aberekhem 'et berit ihoh 'eloheikhem 'asher zivah 'etkhem vahalakhtem va'abadtem 'elohim 'akheirim vehishtakhavitem lahem vekharah 'af ihoh bakhem va'abadtem meheirah mei'al ha'arez hatobah 'asher natan lakhem. vaye'esof yehoshua' 'et kal shibtei yisra'el shekhemah vayiqra leziqnei yisra'el ulerashav uleshofetav uleshoterav vayityazebu lifnei ha'elohim. vayomer yehoshua' 'el kal ha'am koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el be'eiber hanahar yashebu 'aboteikhem mei'olam terakh 'abi 'abraham va'abi nakhor vaya'abdu 'elohim 'akheirim. va'eqakh 'et 'abikhem 'et 'abraham mei'eiber hanahar va'olekh 'oto bekhal 'erez kena'an va'ereb va'arbeh 'et zar'o va'eten lo 'et yizkhaq. va'eten leyizkhaq 'et ya'aqob ve'et 'eisav va'eten le'eisav 'et har sei'ir lareshet 'oto veya'aqob ubanav yaredu mizrayim. va'eshlakh 'et mosheh ve'et 'aharon va'egof 'et mizrayim ka'asher 'asiti beqirbo ve'akhar hozeiti 'etkhem. va'ozi 'et 'aboteikhem mimizrayim vatabo'u hayamah vayirdefu mizrayim 'akharei 'aboteikhem berekheb ubefarashim yam suf. vayiz'aqu 'el ihoh vayasem ma'afel beineikhem uben hamizrim vayabei 'alav 'et hayam vaykhaseihu vatir'enah 'eineikhem 'et 'asher 'asiti bemizrayim vateishebu bamidbar yamim rabim. va'abi'ah va'abi 'etkhem 'el 'erez ha'emori hayosheb be'eiber hayarden vayilakhamu 'itekhem va'eten 'otam beyedkhem vatireshu 'et 'arzam va'ashmidem mipeneikhem. vayaqam balaq ben zipor melekh mo'ab vayilakhem beyisra'el vayishlakh vayiqra lebil'am ben be'or leqalel 'etkhem. velo 'abiti lishmoa' lebil'am vaybarekh barokh 'etkhem va'azil 'etkhem miyado. vata'abru 'et hayarden vatabo'u 'el yerikho vayilakhamu bakhem ba'alei yerikho ha'emori vehaperizi vehakena'ani vehakhiti vehagirgashi hakhivi vehaybusi va'eten 'otam beyedkhem. va'eshlakh lifneikhem 'et hazir'ah vategaresh 'otam mipeneikhem shenei malkhei ha'emori lo bekharbekha velo beqashtekha. va'eten lakhem 'erez 'asher lo yaga'ta bah ve'arim 'asher lo benitem vateishebu bahem keramim vezeitim 'asher lo neta'tem 'atem 'okhelim. ve'atah yer'u 'et ihoh ve'ibdu 'oto betamim ube'emet vehasiru 'et 'elohim 'asher 'abedu 'aboteikhem be'eiber hanahar ubemizrayim ve'ibdu 'et ihoh. ve'im ra' be'eineikhem la'abod 'et ihoh bakharu lakhem hayom 'et mi ta'abodun 'im 'et 'elohim 'asher 'abedu 'aboteikhem 'asher be'eiber mei'eiber hanahar ve'im 'et 'elohei ha'emori 'asher 'atem yoshebim be'arzam ve'anokhi ubeiti na'abod 'et ihoh. vaya'an ha'am vayomer khalilah lanu mei'azob 'et ihoh la'abod 'elohim 'akheirim. ki ihoh 'eloheinu hu hama'aleh 'otanu ve'et 'aboteinu mei'erez mizrayim mibet 'abadim va'asher 'asah le'eineinu 'et ha'otot hagedolot ha'eleh vayishmereinu bekhal haderekh 'asher halakhnu bah ubekhol ha'amim 'asher 'abarnu beqirbam. vaygaresh ihoh 'et kal ha'amim ve'et ha'emori yosheb ha'arez mipaneinu gam 'anakhnu na'abod 'et ihoh ki hu 'eloheinu. vayomer yehoshua' 'el ha'am lo tukhelu la'abod 'et ihoh ki 'elohim qedoshim hu 'el qano hu lo yisa lefish'akhem ulekhatoteikhem. ki ta'azbu 'et ihoh va'abadtem 'elohei neikhar veshab veheira' lakhem vekhilah 'etkhem 'akharei 'asher heitib lakhem. vayomer ha'am 'el yehoshua' lo ki 'et ihoh na'abod. vayomer yehoshua' 'el ha'am 'eidim 'atem bakhem ki 'atem bekhartem lakhem 'et ihoh la'abod 'oto vayomeru 'eidim. ve'atah hasiru 'et 'elohei haneikhar 'asher beqirbekhem vehatu 'et lebabkhem 'el ihoh 'elohei yisra'el. vayomeru ha'am 'el yehoshua' 'et ihoh 'eloheinu na'abod ubeqolo nishma'. vayikhrot yehoshua' berit la'am bayom hahu vayasem lo khoq umishpat bishkhem. vayikhtob yehoshua' 'et hadebarim ha'eleh beseifer torat 'elohim vayiqakh 'eben gedolah vayqimeha sham takhat ha'alah 'asher bemiqdash ihoh. vayomer yehoshua' 'el kal ha'am hineh ha'eben hazot tihyeh banu le'eidah ki hi shame'ah 'et kal 'imrei ihoh 'asher diber 'imanu vehayetah bakhem le'eidah pen tekhakhashun beiloheikhem. vayshalakh yehoshua' 'et ha'am 'ish lenakhalato. vayhi 'akharei hadebarim ha'eleh vayamat yehoshua' bin nun 'ebed ihoh ben mei'ah va'eser shanim. vayiqberu 'oto bigbul nakhalato betimnat serakh 'asher behar 'efrayim mizefon lehar ga'ash vaya'abod yisra'el 'et ihoh kol yemei yehoshua' vekhol yemei hazeqeinim 'asher he'erikhu yamim 'akharei yehoshua' va'asher yade'u 'et kal ma'aseh ihoh 'asher 'asah leyisra'el. ve'et 'azmot yosef 'asher he'elu benei yisra'el mimizrayim qaberu bishkhem bekhelqat hasadeh 'asher qanah ya'aqob mei'et benei khamor 'abi shekhem bemei'ah qesitah vayihyu libnei yosef lenakhalah. ve'el'azar ben 'aharon met vayiqberu 'oto begib'at pinekhas beno 'asher nitan lo behar 'efrayim.

vayhi 'akharei mot yehoshua' vayish'alu benei yisra'el ihoh leimor mi ya'aleh lanu 'el hakena'ani batekhilah lehilakhem bo. vayomer ihoh yehudah ya'aleh hineh natati 'et ha'arez beyado. vayomer yehudah leshim'on 'akhiv 'aleh 'iti begorali venilakhamah bakena'ani vehalakhti gam 'ani 'itekha begoralekha vayeilekh 'ito shim'on. vaya'al yehudah vayiten ihoh 'et hakena'ani vehaperizi beyadam vayakum bebezeq 'aseret 'alafim 'ish. vayimze'u 'et 'adoni bezeq bebezeq vayilakhamu bo vayaku 'et hakena'ani ve'et haperizi. vayanas 'adoni bezeq vayirdefu 'akharav vayokhazu 'oto vayqazezu 'et behonot yadav veraglav. vayomer 'adoni bezeq shib'im melakhim behonot yedeihem veragleihem mequzazim hayu melaqetim takhat shulkhani ka'asher 'asiti ken shilam li 'elohim vaybi'uhu yerushalim vayamat sham. vayilakhamu benei yehudah birushalim vayilkedu 'otah vayakuha lefi khareb ve'et ha'ir shilekhu ba'esh. ve'akhar yaredu benei yehudah lehilakhem bakena'ani yosheb hahar vehanegeb vehashefeilah. vayeilekh yehudah 'el hakena'ani hayosheb bekhebron veshem khebron lefanim qiryat 'arba' vayaku 'et sheishai ve'et 'akhiman ve'et talmai. vayeilekh misham 'el yoshebei debir veshem debir lefanim qiryat seifer. vayomer kaleb 'asher yakeh 'et qiryat seifer ulekhadah venatati lo 'et 'akhsah biti le'ishah. vayilkedah 'ateni'el ben qenaz 'akhi khaleb haqaton mimenu vayiten lo 'et 'akhsah bito le'ishah. vayhi bebo'ah vatesiteihu lish'ol mei'et 'abiha hasadeh vatiznakh mei'al hakhamor vayomer lah kaleb mah lakh. vatomer lo habah li berakhah ki 'erez hanegeb netatani venatatah li gulot mayim vayiten lah kaleb 'et gulot 'ilit ve'et gulot takhtit. ubenei qeini khoten mosheh 'alu mei'ir hatemarim 'et benei yehudah midbar yehudah 'asher benegeb 'arad vayeilekh vayeisheb 'et ha'am. vayeilekh yehudah 'et shim'on 'akhiv vayaku 'et hakena'ani yosheb zefat vayakharimu 'otah vayiqra 'et shem ha'ir kharemah. vayilkod yehudah 'et 'azah ve'et gebulah ve'et 'ashqelon ve'et gebulah ve'et 'eqron ve'et gebulah. vayhi ihoh 'et yehudah vayoresh 'et hahar ki lo lehorish 'et yoshebei ha'eimeq ki rekheb barzel lahem. vayitenu lekhaleb 'et khebron ka'asher diber mosheh vayoresh misham 'et sheloshah benei ha'anaq. ve'et haybusi yosheb yerushalim lo horishu benei binyamin vayeisheb haybusi 'et benei binyamin birushalim 'ad hayom hazeh. vaya'alu bet yosef gam hem bet 'el ihoh 'imam. vayatiru bet yosef bebet 'el veshem ha'ir lefanim luz. vayir'u hashomerim 'ish yozei min ha'ir vayomeru lo har'einu na 'et mebo ha'ir ve'asinu 'imekha khased. vayar'em 'et mebo ha'ir vayaku 'et ha'ir lefi khareb ve'et ha'ish ve'et kal mishpakhto shileikhu. vayeilekh ha'ish 'erez hakhitim vayiben 'ir vayiqra shemah luz hu shemah 'ad hayom hazeh. velo horish menasheh 'et bet she'an ve'et benoteha ve'et ta'nakh ve'et benoteha ve'et yosheb yoshebei dor ve'et benoteha ve'et yoshebei yible'am ve'et benoteha ve'et yoshebei megido ve'et benoteha vayo'el hakena'ani lashebet ba'arez hazot. vayhi ki khazaq yisra'el vayasem 'et hakena'ani lamas vehoresh lo horisho. ve'efrayim lo horish 'et hakena'ani hayosheb begazer vayeisheb hakena'ani beqirbo begazer. zebulun lo horish 'et yoshebei qitron ve'et yoshebei nahalol vayeisheb hakena'ani beqirbo vayihyu lamas. 'asher lo horish 'et yoshebei 'ako ve'et yoshebei zidon ve'et 'akhlab ve'et 'akhzib ve'et khelbah ve'et 'afiq ve'et rekhob. vayeisheb ha'asheiri beqereb hakena'ani yoshebei ha'arez ki lo horisho. naftali lo horish 'et yoshebei bet shemesh ve'et yoshebei bet 'anat vayeisheb beqereb hakena'ani yoshebei ha'arez veyoshebei bet shemesh ubet 'anat hayu lahem lamas. vayilkhazu ha'emori 'et benei dan haharah ki lo netano laredet la'eimeq. vayo'el ha'emori lashebet behar kheres be'ayalon ubesha'albim vatikhbad yad bet yosef vayihyu lamas. ugebul ha'emori mima'aleh 'aqrabim meihasela' vama'elah. vaya'al mal'akh ihoh min hagilgal 'el habokhim vayomer 'a'aleh 'etkhem mimizrayim va'abi 'etkhem 'el ha'arez 'asher nishba'ti la'aboteikhem va'omar lo 'afer beriti 'itekhem le'olam. ve'atem lo tikhretu berit leyoshebei ha'arez hazot mizbekhoteihem titozun velo shema'tem beqoli mah zot 'asitem. vegam 'amarti lo 'agaresh 'otam mipeneikhem vehayu lakhem lezidim veiloheihem yihyu lakhem lemoqesh. vayhi kedaber mal'akh ihoh 'et hadebarim ha'eleh 'el kal benei yisra'el vayis'u ha'am 'et qolam vayibku. vayiqre'u shem hamaqom hahu bokhim vayizbekhu sham ihoh. vayshalakh yehoshua' 'et ha'am vayeilekhu benei yisra'el 'ish lenakhalato lareshet 'et ha'arez. vaya'abdu ha'am 'et ihoh kol yemei yehoshua' vekhol yemei hazeqeinim 'asher he'erikhu yamim 'akharei yehoshua' 'asher ra'u 'et kal ma'aseh ihoh hagadol 'asher 'asah leyisra'el. vayamat yehoshua' bin nun 'ebed ihoh ben mei'ah va'eser shanim. vayiqberu 'oto bigbul nakhalato betimnat kheres behar 'efrayim mizefon lehar ga'ash. vegam kal hador hahu ne'esfu 'el 'abotav vayaqam dor 'akher 'akhareihem 'asher lo yade'u 'et ihoh vegam 'et hama'aseh 'asher 'asah leyisra'el. vaya'asu benei yisra'el 'et hara' be'einei ihoh vaya'abdu 'et habe'alim. vaya'azbu 'et ihoh 'elohei 'abotam hamozi 'otam mei'erez mizrayim vayeilekhu 'akharei 'elohim 'akheirim mei'elohei ha'amim 'asher sebiboteihem vayishtakhavu lahem vayakh'isu 'et ihoh. vaya'azbu 'et ihoh vaya'abdu laba'al vela'ashtarot. vayikhar 'af ihoh beyisra'el vayitenem beyad shosim vayashosu 'otam vayimkerem beyad 'oybeihem misabib velo yakhelu 'od la'amod lifnei 'oybeihem. bekhol 'asher yaze'u yad ihoh hayetah bam lera'ah ka'asher diber ihoh vekha'asher nishba' ihoh lahem vayeizer lahem me'od. vayaqem ihoh shofetim vayoshi'um miyad shoseihem. vegam 'el shofeteihem lo shamei'u ki zanu 'akharei 'elohim 'akheirim vayishtakhavu lahem saru maher min haderekh 'asher halekhu 'abotam lishmoa' mizvot ihoh lo 'asu khen. vekhi heiqim ihoh lahem shofetim vehayah ihoh 'im hashofet vehoshi'am miyad 'oyebeihem kol yemei hashofet ki yinakhem ihoh mina'aqatam mipenei lokhazeihem vedokhaqeihem. vehayah bemot hashofet yashubu vehishkhitu mei'abotam lalekhet 'akharei 'elohim 'akheirim le'abedam ulehishtakhavot lahem lo hipilu mima'aleihem umidarkam haqashah. vayikhar 'af ihoh beyisra'el vayomer ya'an 'asher 'aberu hago hazeh 'et beriti 'asher ziviti 'et 'abotam velo shame'u leqoli. gam 'ani lo 'osif lehorish 'ish mipeneihem min hagoyim 'asher 'azab yehoshua' vayamot. lema'an nasot bam 'et yisra'el hashomerim hem 'et derekh ihoh lalekhet bam ka'asher shameru 'abotam 'im lo. vayanakh ihoh 'et hagoyim ha'eleh lebilti horisham maher velo netanam beyad yehoshua'. ve'eleh hagoyim 'asher hiniakh ihoh lenasot bam 'et yisra'el 'et kal 'asher lo yade'u 'et kal milkhamot kena'an. raq lema'an da'at dorot benei yisra'el lelamedam milkhamah raq 'asher lefanim lo yeda'um. khameishet sarnei felishtim vekhal hakena'ani vehazidoni vehakhivi yosheb har halebanon meihar ba'al khermon 'ad lebo khamat. vayihyu lenasot bam 'et yisra'el lada'at hayishme'u 'et mizvot ihoh 'asher zivah 'et 'abotam beyad mosheh. ubenei yisra'el yashebu beqereb hakena'ani hakhiti veha'emori vehaperizi vehakhivi vehaybusi. vayiqkhu 'et benoteihem lahem lenashim ve'et benoteihem natenu libneihem vaya'abdu 'et 'eloheihem. vaya'asu benei yisra'el 'et hara' be'einei ihoh vayishkekhu 'et ihoh 'eloheihem vaya'abdu 'et habe'alim ve'et ha'asheirot. vayikhar 'af ihoh beyisra'el vayimkerem beyad kushan rish'atayim melekh 'aram naharayim vaya'abdu benei yisra'el 'et kushan rish'atayim shemoneh shanim. vayiz'aqu benei yisra'el 'el ihoh vayaqem ihoh moshia' libnei yisra'el vayoshi'em 'et 'ateni'el ben qenaz 'akhi khaleb haqaton mimenu. vatehi 'alav ruakh ihoh vayishpot 'et yisra'el vayeizei lamilkhamah vayiten ihoh beyado 'et kushan rish'atayim melekh 'aram vata'az yado 'al kushan rish'atayim. vatishqot ha'arez 'arba'im shanah vayamat 'ateni'el ben qenaz. vayosifu benei yisra'el la'asot hara' be'einei ihoh vaykhazeq ihoh 'et 'eglon melekh mo'ab 'al yisra'el 'al ki 'asu 'et hara' be'einei ihoh. vaye'esof 'eilav 'et benei 'amon va'amaleq vayeilekh vayakh 'et yisra'el vayireshu 'et 'ir hatemarim. vaya'abdu benei yisra'el 'et 'eglon melekh mo'ab shemoneh 'esreh shanah. vayiz'aqu benei yisra'el 'el ihoh vayaqem ihoh lahem moshia' 'et 'eihud ben geira ben haymini 'ish 'iter yad yemino vayishlekhu benei yisra'el beyado minkhah le'eglon melekh mo'ab. vaya'as lo 'eihud khereb velah shenei feiyot gomed 'arekah vayakhgor 'otah mitakhat lemadav 'al yerekh yemino. vayaqreb 'et haminkhah le'eglon melekh mo'ab ve'eglon 'ish bari me'od. vayhi ka'asher kilah lehaqrib 'et haminkhah vayshalakh 'et ha'am nose'ei haminkhah. vehu shab min hapesilim 'asher 'et hagilgal vayomer debar seiter li 'eilekha hamelekh vayomer has vayeize'u mei'alav kal ha'omedim 'alav. ve'eihud ba 'eilav vehu yosheb ba'aliyat hameqeirah 'asher lo lebado vayomer 'eihud debar 'elohim li 'eilekha vayaqam mei'al hakisei. vayishlakh 'eihud 'et yad semolo vayiqakh 'et hakhereb mei'al yerekh yemino vayitqa'eha bebitno. vayabo gam hanizab 'akhar halahab vayisgor hakheileb be'ad halahab ki lo shalaf hakhereb mibitno vayeizei haparshedonah. vayeizei 'eihud hamisderonah vayisgor daltot ha'aliyah ba'ado vena'al. vehu yaza va'abadav ba'u vayir'u vehineh daltot ha'aliyah ne'ulot vayomeru 'akh meisikh hu 'et raglav bakhadar hameqeirah. vayakhilu 'ad bosh vehineh 'einenu foteiakh daltot ha'aliyah vayiqkhu 'et hamafteiakh vayiftakhu vehineh 'adoneihem nofel 'arzah met. ve'eihud nimlat 'ad hitmahmeham vehu 'abar 'et hapesilim vayimalet hase'iratah. vayhi bebo'o vayitqa' bashofar behar 'efrayim vayeiredu 'imo benei yisra'el min hahar vehu lifneihem. vayomer 'aleihem ridfu 'akharai ki natan ihoh 'et 'oyebeikhem 'et mo'ab beyedkhem vayeiredu 'akharav vayilkedu 'et ma'berot hayarden lemo'ab velo natenu 'ish la'abor. vayaku 'et mo'ab ba'et hahi ka'aseret 'alafim 'ish kal shamen vekhal 'ish khayil velo nimlat 'ish. vatikana' mo'ab bayom hahu takhat yad yisra'el vatishqot ha'arez shemonim shanah. ve'akharav hayah shamgar ben 'anat vayakh 'et pelishtim shesh mei'ot 'ish bemalmad habaqar vayosha' gam hu 'et yisra'el. vayosifu benei yisra'el la'asot hara' be'einei ihoh ve'eihud met. vayimkerem ihoh beyad yabin melekh kena'an 'asher malakh bekhazor vesar zeba'o sisera vehu yosheb bakharoshet hagoyim. vayiz'aqu benei yisra'el 'el ihoh ki tesha' mei'ot rekheb barzel lo vehu lakhaz 'et benei yisra'el bekhazeqah 'esrim shanah. udeborah 'ishah nebi'ah 'eishet lapidot hi shofetah 'et yisra'el ba'et hahi. vehi yoshebet takhat tomer deborah ben haramah uben bet 'el behar 'efrayim vaya'alu 'eileha benei yisra'el lamishpat. vatishlakh vatiqra lebaraq ben 'abino'am miqedesh naftali vatomer 'eilav halo zivah ihoh 'elohei yisra'el lekh umashakhta behar tabor velaqakhta 'imekha 'aseret 'alafim 'ish mibenei naftali umibenei zebulun. umashakhti 'eilekha 'el nakhal qishon 'et sisera sar zeba yabin ve'et rikhbo ve'et hamono unetatihu beyadekha. vayomer 'eileha baraq 'im teilekhi 'imi vehalakheti ve'im lo teilekhi 'imi lo 'eilekh. vatomer halokh 'eilekh 'imakh 'efes ki lo tihyeh tif'artekha 'al haderekh 'asher 'atah holekh ki beyad 'ishah yimkor ihoh 'et sisera vataqam deborah vateilekh 'im baraq qedshah. vayaz'eq baraq 'et zebulun ve'et naftali qedshah vaya'al beraglav 'aseret 'alfei 'ish vata'al 'imo deborah. vekheber haqeini nifrad miqayin mibenei khobab khoten mosheh vayet 'aholo 'ad 'eilon baz'anim beza'ananim 'asher 'et qedesh. vayagidu lesisera ki 'alah baraq ben 'abino'am har tabor. vayaz'eq sisera 'et kal rikhbo tesha' mei'ot rekheb barzel ve'et kal ha'am 'asher 'ito meikharoshet hagoyim 'el nakhal qishon. vatomer deborah 'el baraq qum ki zeh hayom 'asher natan ihoh 'et sisera beyadekha halo ihoh yaza lefanekha vayeired baraq meihar tabor va'aseret 'alafim 'ish 'akharav. vayaham ihoh 'et sisera ve'et kal harekheb ve'et kal hamakhaneh lefi khereb lifnei baraq vayeired sisera mei'al hamerkabah vayanas beraglav. ubaraq radaf 'akharei harekheb ve'akharei hamakhaneh 'ad kharoshet hagoyim vayipol kal makhaneh sisera lefi khereb lo nish'ar 'ad 'ekhad. vesisera nas beraglav 'el 'ohel ya'el 'eishet kheber haqeini ki shalom ben yabin melekh khazor uben bet kheber haqeini. vateizei ya'el liqrat sisera vatomer 'eilav surah 'adoni surah 'eilai 'al tira vayasar 'eileha ha'ohelah vatekhaseihu basemikhah. vayomer 'eileha hashqini na me'at mayim ki zameiti vatiftakh 'et nod hekhalab vatashqeihu vatekhaseihu. vayomer 'eileha 'amod petakh ha'ohel vehayah 'im 'ish yabo ushe'eilekh ve'amar hayesh poh 'ish ve'amart 'ayin. vatiqakh ya'el 'eishet kheber 'et yetad ha'ohel vatasem 'et hamaqebet beyadah vatabo 'eilav balat vatitqa' 'et hayated beraqato vatiznakh ba'arez vehu nirdam vaya'af vayamot. vehineh baraq rodef 'et sisera vateizei ya'el liqrato vatomer lo lekh ve'ar'eka 'et ha'ish 'asher 'atah mebaqesh vayabo 'eileha vehineh sisera nofel met vehayated beraqato. vayakhna' 'elohim bayom hahu 'et yabin melekh kena'an lifnei benei yisra'el. vateilekh yad benei yisra'el halokh veqashah 'al yabin melekh kena'an 'ad 'asher hikhritu 'et yabin melekh kena'an. vatashar deborah ubaraq ben 'abino'am bayom hahu leimor. bifroa' pera'ot beyisra'el behitnadeb 'am barakhu ihoh. shim'u melakhim ha'azinu rozenim 'anokhi ihoh 'anokhi 'ashirah 'azamer ihoh 'elohei yisra'el. ihoh bezeitekha misei'ir beza'dekha misedeh 'edom 'erez ra'ashah gam shamayim natafu gam 'abim natefu mayim. harim nazelu mipenei ihoh zeh sinai mipenei ihoh 'elohei yisra'el. bimei shamgar ben 'anat bimei ya'el khadelu 'orakhot veholekhei netibot yeilekhu 'orakhot 'aqalqalot. khadelu ferazon beyisra'el khadelu 'ad shaqamti deborah shaqamti 'em beyisra'el. yibkhar 'elohim khadashim 'az lakhem she'arim magen 'im yeira'eh varomakh be'arba'im 'elef beyisra'el. libi lekhoqei yisra'el hamitnadebim ba'am barakhu ihoh. rokhebei 'atonot zekhorot yoshebei 'al midin veholekhei 'al derekh sikhu. miqol mekhazim ben mash'abim sham yetanu zidqot ihoh zidqot pirzono beyisra'el 'az yaredu lashe'arim 'am ihoh. 'uri 'uri deborah 'uri 'uri daberi shir qum baraq ushabeh shebyekha ben 'abino'am. 'az yerad sarid le'adirim 'am ihoh yerad li bagiborim. mini 'efrayim sharesham ba'amaleq 'akharekha binyamin ba'amamekha mini makhir yaredu mekhoqeqim umizebulun moshekhim besheibet sofer. vesarai beyisashkhar 'im deborah veyisashkhar ken baraq ba'eimeq shulakh beraglav biflagot re'uben gedolim khiqei leb. lamah yashabta ben hamishpetayim lishmoa' sheriqot 'adarim liflagot re'uben gedolim khiqrei leb. gil'ad be'eiber hayarden shakhen vedan lamah yagur 'oniyot 'asher yashab lekhof yamim ve'al mifrazav yishkon. zebulun 'am kheiref nafsho lamut venaftali 'al meromei sadeh. ba'u melakhim nilkhamu 'az nilkhamu malkhei khena'an beta'nakh 'al mei megido beza' kesef lo laqakhu. min shamayim nilkhamu hakokhabim mimesilotam nilkhamu 'im sisera. nakhal qishon gerafam nakhal qedumim nakhal qishon tidrekhi nafshi 'oz. 'az halemu 'iqebei sus midaharot daharot 'abirav. 'oru meiroz 'amar mal'akh ihoh 'oru 'aror yoshebeha ki lo ba'u le'ezrat ihoh le'ezrat ihoh bagiborim. teborakh minashim ya'el 'eishet kheber haqeini minashim ba'ohel teborakh. mayim sha'al khalab natanah beseifel 'adirim hiqribah khem'ah. yadah layated tishlakhnah viminah lehalmut 'ameilim vehalemah sisera makhaqah rosho umakhazah vekhalefah raqato. ben ragleha kara' nafal shakhab ben ragleha kara' nafal ba'asher kara' sham nafal shadud. be'ad hakhalon nishqefah vateyabeb 'em sisera be'ad ha'eshnab madua' boshesh rikhbo labo madua' 'ekheru pa'amei markebotav. khakhmot saroteha ta'anenah 'af hi tashib 'amareha lah. halo yimze'u yekhalequ shalal rakham rakhamatayim lerosh geber shelal zeba'im lesisera shelal zeba'im riqmah zeba' riqmatayim lezaverei shalal. ken yobedu khal 'oybekha ihoh ve'ohabav kezet hashemesh bigburato vatishqot ha'arez 'arba'im shanah. vaya'asu benei yisra'el hara' be'einei ihoh vayitenem ihoh beyad midyan sheba' shanim. vata'az yad midyan 'al yisra'el mipenei midyan 'asu lahem benei yisra'el 'et haminharot 'asher beharim ve'et hame'arot ve'et hamezadot. vehayah 'im zara' yisra'el ve'alah midyan va'amaleq ubenei qedem ve'alu 'alav. vayakhanu 'aleihem vayashkhitu 'et yebul ha'arez 'ad bo'akha 'azah velo yash'iru mikhyah beyisra'el veseh vashor vakhamor. ki hem umiqneihem ya'alu ve'aholeihem yabo'u uba'u khedei 'arbeh larob velahem veligmaleihem 'en mispar vayabo'u ba'arez leshakhatah. vayidal yisra'el me'od mipenei midyan vayiz'aqu benei yisra'el 'el ihoh. vayhi ki za'aqu benei yisra'el 'el ihoh 'al 'odot midyan. vayishlakh ihoh 'ish nabi 'el benei yisra'el vayomer lahem koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el 'anokhi he'eleiti 'etkhem mimizrayim va'ozi 'etkhem mibet 'abadim. va'azil 'etkhem miyad mizrayim umiyad kal lokhazeikhem va'agaresh 'otam mipeneikhem va'etenah lakhem 'et 'arzam. va'omerah lakhem 'ani ihoh 'eloheikhem lo tire'u 'et 'elohei ha'emori 'asher 'atem yoshebim be'arzam velo shema'tem beqoli. vayabo mal'akh ihoh vayeisheb takhat ha'eilah 'asher be'aferah 'asher leyo'ash 'abi ha'ezri vegid'on beno khobet khitim bagat lehanis mipenei midyan. vayeira 'eilav mal'akh ihoh vayomer 'eilav ihoh 'imekha gibor hekhayil. vayomer 'eilav gid'on bi 'adoni veyesh ihoh 'imanu velamah meza'atnu kal zot ve'ayeh khal nifle'otav 'asher siperu lanu 'aboteinu leimor halo mimizrayim he'elanu ihoh ve'atah netashanu ihoh vayiteneinu bekhaf midyan. vayifen 'eilav ihoh vayomer lekh bekhokhakha zeh vehosha'ta 'et yisra'el mikaf midyan halo shelakhtikha. vayomer 'eilav bi 'adonai bamah 'oshia' 'et yisra'el hineh 'alpi hadal bimnasheh ve'anokhi haza'ir bebet 'abi. vayomer 'eilav ihoh ki 'ehyeh 'imakh vehikita 'et midyan ke'ish 'ekhad. vayomer 'eilav 'im na mazati khen be'einekha ve'asita li 'ot sha'atah medaber 'imi. 'al na tamush mizeh 'ad bo'i 'eilekha vehozeiti 'et minkhati vehinakhti lefanekha vayomar 'anokhi 'eisheb 'ad shubekha. vegid'on ba vaya'as gedi 'izim ve'eifat qemakh mazot habasar sam basal vehamaraq sam baparur vayozei 'eilav 'el takhat ha'eilah vayagash. vayomer 'eilav mal'akh ha'elohim qakh 'et habasar ve'et hamazot vehanakh 'el hasela' halaz ve'et hamaraq shefokh vaya'as ken. vayishlakh mal'akh ihoh 'et qezeh hamish'enet 'asher beyado vayiga' babasar ubamazot vata'al ha'esh min hazur vatokhal 'et habasar ve'et hamazot umal'akh ihoh halakh mei'einav. vayar gid'on ki mal'akh ihoh hu vayomer gid'on 'ahah 'adonai ihoh ki 'al ken ra'iti mal'akh ihoh panim 'el panim. vayomer lo ihoh shalom lekha 'al tira lo tamut. vayiben sham gid'on mizbeiakh ihoh vayiqra lo ihoh shalom 'ad hayom hazeh 'odenu be'aferat 'abi ha'ezri. vayhi balaylah hahu vayomer lo ihoh qakh 'et par hashor 'asher le'abikha ufar hasheini sheba' shanim veharasta 'et mizbakh haba'al 'asher le'abikha ve'et ha'asheirah 'asher 'alav tikhrot. ubanita mizbeiakh ihoh 'elohekha 'al rosh hama'oz hazeh bama'arakhah velaqakhta 'et hapar hasheini veha'alita 'olah ba'azei ha'asheirah 'asher tikhrot. vayiqakh gid'on 'asarah 'anashim mei'abadav vaya'as ka'asher diber 'eilav ihoh vayhi ka'asher yarei 'et bet 'abiv ve'et 'anshei ha'ir mei'asot yomam vaya'as layelah. vayashkimu 'anshei ha'ir baboqer vehineh nutaz mizbakh haba'al veha'asheirah 'asher 'alav koratah ve'et hapar hasheini ho'alah 'al hamizbeiakh habanui. vayomeru 'ish 'el rei'eihu mi 'asah hadabar hazeh vayidreshu vaybaqshu vayomeru gid'on ben yo'ash 'asah hadabar hazeh. vayomeru 'anshei ha'ir 'el yo'ash hozei 'et binkha veyamot ki nataz 'et mizbakh haba'al vekhi kharat ha'asheirah 'asher 'alav. vayomer yo'ash lekhol 'asher 'amedu 'alav ha'atem teribun laba'al 'im 'atem toshi'un 'oto 'asher yarib lo yumat 'ad haboqer 'im 'elohim hu yareb lo ki nataz 'et mizbekho. vayiqra lo bayom hahu yeruba'al leimor yareb bo haba'al ki nataz 'et mizbekho. vekhal midyan va'amaleq ubenei qedem ne'esfu yakhdav vaya'abru vayakhanu be'eimeq yizre'el. veruakh ihoh labeshah 'et gid'on vayitqa' bashofar vayiza'eq 'abi'ezer 'akharav. umal'akhim shalakh bekhal menasheh vayiza'eq gam hu 'akharav umal'akhim shalakh be'asher ubizbulun ubenaftali vaya'alu liqratam. vayomer gid'on 'el ha'elohim 'im yeshkha moshia' beyadi 'et yisra'el ka'asher dibarta. hineh 'anokhi mazig 'et gizat hazemer bagoren 'im tal yihyeh 'al hagizah lebadah ve'al kal ha'arez khoreb veyada'ti ki toshia' beyadi 'et yisra'el ka'asher dibarta. vayhi khen vayashkem mimakhorat vayazar 'et hagizah vayimez tal min hagizah melo haseifel mayim. vayomer gid'on 'el ha'elohim 'al yikhar 'apekha bi va'adaberah 'akh hapa'am 'anaseh na raq hapa'am bagizah yehi na khoreb 'el hagizah lebadah ve'al kal ha'arez yihyeh tal. vaya'as 'elohim ken balaylah hahu vayhi khoreb 'el hagizah lebadah ve'al kal ha'arez hayah tal. vayashkem yeruba'al hu gid'on vekhal ha'am 'asher 'ito vayakhanu 'al 'en kharod umakhaneh midyan hayah lo mizafon migib'at hamoreh ba'eimeq. vayomer ihoh 'el gid'on rab ha'am 'asher 'itakh mititi 'et midyan beyadam pen yitpa'er 'alai yisra'el leimor yadi hoshi'ah li. ve'atah qera na be'azenei ha'am leimor mi yarei vekhared yashob veyizpor meihar hagil'ad vayashab min ha'am 'esrim ushenayim 'elef va'aseret 'alafim nish'aru. vayomer ihoh 'el gid'on 'od ha'am rab hored 'otam 'el hamayim ve'ezrefenu lekha sham vehayah 'asher 'omar 'eilekha zeh yeilekh 'itakh hu yeilekh 'itakh vekhol 'asher 'omar 'eilekha zeh lo yeilekh 'imakh hu lo yeilekh. vayored 'et ha'am 'el hamayim vayomer ihoh 'el gid'on kol 'asher yaloq bilshono min hamayim ka'asher yaloq hakeleb tazig 'oto lebad vekhol 'asher yikhra' 'al birkav lishtot. vayhi mispar hamalaqim beyadam 'el pihem shelosh mei'ot 'ish vekhol yeter ha'am kare'u 'al birkheihem lishtot mayim. vayomer ihoh 'el gid'on bishlosh mei'ot ha'ish hamalaqim 'oshia' 'etkhem venatati 'et midyan beyadekha vekhal ha'am yeilekhu 'ish limqomo. vayiqkhu 'et zeidah ha'am beyadam ve'et shofroteihem ve'et kal 'ish yisra'el shilakh 'ish le'ohalav ubishlosh mei'ot ha'ish hekheziq umakhaneh midyan hayah lo mitakhat ba'eimeq. vayhi balaylah hahu vayomer 'eilav ihoh qum red bamakhaneh ki netativ beyadekha. ve'im yarei 'atah laredet red 'atah ufurah na'arkha 'el hamakhaneh. veshama'ta mah yedabeiru ve'akhar tekhezaqnah yadekha veyaradta bamakhaneh vayeired hu ufurah na'aro 'el qezeh hakhamushim 'asher bamakhaneh. umidyan va'amaleq vekhal benei qedem nofelim ba'eimeq ka'arbeh larob veligmaleihem 'en mispar kakhol she'al sefat hayam larob. vayabo gid'on vehineh 'ish mesaper lerei'eihu khalom vayomer hineh khalom khalamti vehineh zelol zelil lekhem se'orim mithapekh bemakhaneh midyan vayabo 'ad ha'ohel vayakeihu vayipol vayahafkheihu lema'lah venafal ha'ohel. vaya'an rei'eihu vayomer 'en zot bilti 'im khereb gid'on ben yo'ash 'ish yisra'el natan ha'elohim beyado 'et midyan ve'et kal hamakhaneh. vayhi khishmoa' gid'on 'et mispar hakhalom ve'et shibro vayishtakhu vayashab 'el makhaneh yisra'el vayomer qumu ki natan ihoh beyedkhem 'et makhaneh midyan. vayakhaz 'et shelosh mei'ot ha'ish sheloshah rashim vayiten shofarot beyad kulam vekhadim reiqim velapidim betokh hakadim. vayomer 'aleihem mimeni tir'u vekhen ta'asu vehineh 'anokhi ba biqzeh hamakhaneh vehayah kha'asher 'e'eseh ken ta'asun. vetaqa'ti bashofar 'anokhi vekhal 'asher 'iti uteqa'tem bashofarot gam 'atem sebibot kal hamakhaneh va'amartem ihoh ulegid'on. vayabo gid'on umei'ah 'ish 'asher 'ito biqzeh hamakhaneh rosh ha'ashmoret hatikhonah 'akh haqem heiqimu 'et hashomerim vayitqe'u bashofarot venafoz hakadim 'asher beyadam. vayitqe'u sheloshet harashim bashofarot vayishberu hakadim vayakhaziqu beyad sem'olam balapidim ubeyad yeminam hashofarot litqoa' vayiqre'u khereb ihoh ulegid'on. vaya'amdu 'ish takhtav sabib lamakhaneh vayaraz kal hamakhaneh vayari'u vayanisu vayanusu. vayitqe'u shelosh mei'ot hashofarot vayasem ihoh 'et khereb 'ish berei'eihu ubekhal hamakhaneh vayanas hamakhaneh 'ad bet hashitah zereiratah 'ad sefat 'abel mekholah 'al tabat. vayiza'eq 'ish yisra'el minaftali umin 'asher umin kal menasheh vayirdefu 'akharei midyan. umal'akhim shalakh gid'on bekhal har 'efrayim leimor redu liqrat midyan velikhdu lahem 'et hamayim 'ad bet barah ve'et hayarden vayiza'eq kal 'ish 'efrayim vayilkedu 'et hamayim 'ad bet barah ve'et hayarden. vayilkedu shenei sarei midyan 'et 'oreb ve'et ze'eb vayahargu 'et 'oreb bezur 'oreb ve'et ze'eb haregu beyeqeb ze'eb vayirdefu 'el midyan verosh 'oreb uze'eb heibi'u 'el gid'on mei'eiber layarden. vayomeru 'eilav 'ish 'efrayim mah hadabar hazeh 'asita lanu lebilti qerot lanu ki halakhta lehilakhem bemidyan vayribun 'ito bekhazeqah. vayomer 'aleihem meh 'asiti 'atah kakhem halo tob 'olelot 'efrayim mibzir 'abi'ezer. beyedkhem natan 'elohim 'et sarei midyan 'et 'oreb ve'et ze'eb umah yakholeti 'asot kakhem 'az rafetah rukham mei'alav bedabero hadabar hazeh. vayabo gid'on hayardeinah 'ober hu ushelosh mei'ot ha'ish 'asher 'ito 'ayeifim verodefim. vayomer le'anshei sukot tenu na kikerot lekhem la'am 'asher beraglai ki 'ayeifim hem ve'anokhi rodef 'akharei zebakh vezalmuna' malkhei midyan. vayomer sarei sukot hakhaf zebakh vezalmuna' 'atah beyadekha ki niten lizba'akha lakhem. vayomer gid'on lakhen betet ihoh 'et zebakh ve'et zalmuna' beyadi vedashti 'et besarkhem 'et qozei hamidbar ve'et habarqonim. vaya'al misham penu'el vaydaber 'aleihem kazot vaya'anu 'oto 'anshei fenu'el ka'asher 'anu 'anshei sukot. vayomer gam le'anshei fenu'el leimor beshubi beshalom 'etoz 'et hamigdal hazeh. vezebakh vezalmuna' baqarqor umakhaneihem 'imam kakhameishet 'asar 'elef kol hanotarim mikol makhaneh benei qedem vehanofelim mei'ah ve'esrim 'elef 'ish sholef khareb. vaya'al gid'on derekh hashekhunei ba'ohalim miqedem lenobakh veyagebohah vayakh 'et hamakhaneh vehamakhaneh hayah betakh. vayanusu zebakh vezalmuna' vayirdof 'akhareihem vayilkod 'et shenei malkhei midyan 'et zebakh ve'et zalmuna' vekhal hamakhaneh hekherid. vayashab gid'on ben yo'ash min hamilkhamah milma'aleh hekhares. vayilkad na'ar mei'anshei sukot vayish'aleihu vayikhtob 'eilav 'et sarei sukot ve'et zeqeineha shib'im veshib'ah 'ish. vayabo 'el 'anshei sukot vayomer hineh zebakh vezalmuna' 'asher kheiraftem 'oti leimor hakhaf zebakh vezalmuna' 'atah beyadekha ki niten la'anashekha haye'eifim lakhem. vayiqakh 'et ziqnei ha'ir ve'et qozei hamidbar ve'et habarqonim vayoda' bahem 'et 'anshei sukot. ve'et migdal penu'el nataz vayaharog 'et 'anshei ha'ir. vayomer 'el zebakh ve'el zalmuna' 'eifoh ha'anashim 'asher haragtem betabor vayomeru kamokha khemohem 'ekhad keto'ar benei hamelekh. vayomar 'akhai benei 'imi hem khai ihoh lu hakhayitem 'otam lo haragti 'etkhem. vayomer leyeter bekhoro qum harog 'otam velo shalaf hana'ar kharbo ki yarei ki 'odenu na'ar. vayomer zebakh vezalmuna' qum 'atah ufega' banu ki kha'ish geburato vayaqam gid'on vayaharog 'et zebakh ve'et zalmuna' vayiqakh 'et hasaharonim 'asher bezaverei gemaleihem. vayomeru 'ish yisra'el 'el gid'on meshal banu gam 'atah gam binkha gam ben benekha ki hosha'tanu miyad midyan. vayomer 'aleihem gid'on lo 'emshol 'ani bakhem velo yimshol beni bakhem ihoh yimshol bakhem. vayomer 'aleihem gid'on 'esh'alah mikem she'eilah utenu li 'ish nezem shelalo ki nizmei zahab lahem ki yishme'eilim hem. vayomeru naton niten vayifresu 'et hasimlah vayashlikhu shamah 'ish nezem shelalo. vayhi mishqal nizmei hazahab 'asher sha'al 'elef usheba' mei'ot zahab lebad min hasaharonim vehanetifot ubigdei ha'argaman she'al malkhei midyan ulebad min ha'anaqot 'asher bezaverei gemaleihem. vaya'as 'oto gid'on le'eifod vayazeg 'oto be'iro be'aferah vayiznu khal yisra'el 'akharav sham vayhi legid'on ulebeito lemoqesh. vayikana' midyan lifnei benei yisra'el velo yasefu laset rosham vatishqot ha'arez 'arba'im shanah bimei gid'on. vayeilekh yeruba'al ben yo'ash vayeisheb bebeito. ulegid'on hayu shib'im banim yoze'ei yereikho ki nashim rabot hayu lo. ufilagsho 'asher bishkhem yaledah lo gam hi ben vayasem 'et shemo 'abimelekh. vayamat gid'on ben yo'ash beseibah tobah vayiqaber beqeber yo'ash 'abiv be'aferah 'abi ha'ezri. vayhi ka'asher met gid'on vayashubu benei yisra'el vayiznu 'akharei habe'alim vayasimu lahem ba'al berit leilohim. velo zakheru benei yisra'el 'et ihoh 'eloheihem hamazil 'otam miyad kal 'oyebeihem misabib. velo 'asu khesed 'im bet yeruba'al gid'on kekhal hatobah 'asher 'asah 'im yisra'el. vayeilekh 'abimelekh ben yeruba'al shekhemah 'el 'akhei 'imo vaydaber 'aleihem ve'el kal mishpakhat bet 'abi 'imo leimor. daberu na be'azenei khal ba'alei shekhem mah tob lakhem hamshol bakhem shib'im 'ish kol benei yeruba'al 'im meshol bakhem 'ish 'ekhad uzekhartem ki 'azmeikhem ubesarkhem 'ani. vaydaberu 'akhei 'imo 'alav be'azenei kal ba'alei shekhem 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh vayet libam 'akharei 'abimelekh ki 'ameru 'akhinu hu. vayitenu lo shib'im kesef mibet ba'al berit vayiskor bahem 'abimelekh 'anashim reiqim ufokhazim vayeilekhu 'akharav. vayabo bet 'abiv 'aferatah vayaharog 'et 'ekhav benei yeruba'al shib'im 'ish 'al 'eben 'ekhat vayivater yotam ben yeruba'al haqaton ki nekhba. vayei'asefu kal ba'alei shekhem vekhal bet milo vayeilekhu vayamlikhu 'et 'abimelekh lemelekh 'im 'eilon muzab 'asher bishkhem. vayagidu leyotam vayeilekh vaya'amod berosh har gerizim vayisa qolo vayiqra vayomer lahem shim'u 'eilai ba'alei shekhem veyishma' 'aleikhem 'elohim. halokh halekhu ha'eizim limshoakh 'aleihem melekh vayomeru lazayit melokhah malekhah 'aleinu. vayomer lahem hazayit hekhodalti 'et dishni 'asher bi yekhabedu 'elohim va'anashim vehalakhti lanua' 'al ha'eizim. vayomeru ha'eizim late'einah lekhi 'at malekhi 'aleinu. vatomer lahem hate'einah hekhodalti 'et mateqi ve'et tenubati hatobah vehalakhti lanua' 'al ha'eizim. vayomeru ha'eizim lagafen lekhi 'at malokhi malekhi 'aleinu. vatomer lahem hagefen hekhodalti 'et tiroshi hamsameiakh 'elohim va'anashim vehalakhti lanua' 'al ha'eizim. vayomeru khal ha'eizim 'el ha'atad lekh 'atah melakh 'aleinu. vayomer ha'atad 'el ha'eizim 'im be'emet 'atem moshekhim 'oti lemelekh 'aleikhem bo'u khasu bezili ve'im 'ayin teizei 'esh min ha'atad vetokhal 'et 'arzei halebanon. ve'atah 'im be'emet ubetamim 'asitem vatamlikhu 'et 'abimelekh ve'im tobah 'asitem 'im yeruba'al ve'im beito ve'im kigmul yadav 'asitem lo. 'asher nilkham 'abi 'aleikhem vayashlekh 'et nafsho mineged vayazel 'etkhem miyad midyan. ve'atem qamtem 'al bet 'abi hayom vatahargu 'et banav shib'im 'ish 'al 'eben 'ekhat vatamlikhu 'et 'abimelekh ben 'amato 'al ba'alei shekhem ki 'akhikhem hu. ve'im be'emet ubetamim 'asitem 'im yeruba'al ve'im beito hayom hazeh simkhu ba'abimelekh veyismakh gam hu bakhem. ve'im 'ayin teizei 'esh mei'abimelekh vetokhal 'et ba'alei shekhem ve'et bet milo veteizei 'esh miba'alei shekhem umibet milo vetokhal 'et 'abimelekh. vayanas yotam vayibrakh vayeilekh be'eirah vayeisheb sham mipenei 'abimelekh 'akhiv. vayasar 'abimelekh 'al yisra'el shalosh shanim. vayishlakh 'elohim ruakh ra'ah ben 'abimelekh uben ba'alei shekhem vayibgedu ba'alei shekhem ba'abimelekh. labo khamas shib'im benei yeruba'al vedamam lasum 'al 'abimelekh 'akhihem 'asher harag 'otam ve'al ba'alei shekhem 'asher khizequ 'et yadav laharog 'et 'ekhav. vayasimu lo ba'alei shekhem me'arebim 'al rashei heharim vayigzelu 'et kal 'asher ya'abor 'aleihem badarekh vayugad la'abimelekh. vayabo ga'al ben 'ebed ve'ekhav vaya'abru bishkhem vayibtekhu bo ba'alei shekhem. vayeize'u hasadeh vayibzeru 'et karmeihem vayidrekhu vaya'asu hilulim vayabo'u bet 'eloheihem vayokhelu vayishtu vayqalu 'et 'abimelekh. vayomer ga'al ben 'ebed mi 'abimelekh umi shekhem ki na'abdenu halo ben yeruba'al uzebul peqido 'ibdu 'et 'anshei khamor 'abi shekhem umadua' na'abdenu 'anakhenu. umi yiten 'et ha'am hazeh beyadi ve'asirah 'et 'abimelekh vayomer la'abimelekh rabeh zeba'akha vazei'ah. vayishma' zebul sar ha'ir 'et dibrei ga'al ben 'abed vayikhar 'apo. vayishlakh mal'akhim 'el 'abimelekh betaremah leimor hineh ga'al ben 'ebed ve'ekhav ba'im shekhemah vehinam zarim 'et ha'ir 'alekha. ve'atah qum laylah 'atah veha'am 'asher 'itakh ve'erob basadeh. vehayah baboqer kizroakh hashemesh tashkim ufashata 'al ha'ir vehineh hu veha'am 'asher 'ito yoze'im 'eilekha ve'asita lo ka'asher timza yadekha. vayaqam 'abimelekh vekhal ha'am 'asher 'imo layelah vaye'erbu 'al shekhem 'arba'ah rashim. vayeizei ga'al ben 'ebed vaya'amod petakh sha'ar ha'ir vayaqam 'abimelekh veha'am 'asher 'ito min hama'rab. vayar ga'al 'et ha'am vayomer 'el zebul hineh 'am yored meirashei heharim vayomer 'eilav zebul 'et zel heharim 'atah ro'eh ka'anashim. vayosef 'od ga'al ledaber vayomer hineh 'am yordim mei'im tabur ha'arez verosh 'ekhad ba miderekh 'eilon me'onim. vayomer 'eilav zebul 'ayeh 'eifo fikha 'asher tomar mi 'abimelekh ki na'abdenu halo zeh ha'am 'asher ma'astah bo zei na 'atah vehilakhem bo. vayeizei ga'al lifnei ba'alei shekhem vayilakhem ba'abimelekh. vayirdefeihu 'abimelekh vayanas mipanav vayipelu khalalim rabim 'ad petakh hasha'ar. vayeisheb 'abimelekh barumah vaygaresh zebul 'et ga'al ve'et 'ekhav mishebet bishkhem. vayhi mimakhorat vayeizei ha'am hasadeh vayagidu la'abimelekh. vayiqakh 'et ha'am vayekhezem lishloshah rashim vaye'erob basadeh vayar vehineh ha'am yozei min ha'ir vayaqam 'aleihem vayakem. va'abimelekh veharashim 'asher 'imo pashetu vaya'amdu petakh sha'ar ha'ir ushenei harashim pashetu 'al kal 'asher basadeh vayakum. va'abimelekh nilkham ba'ir kol hayom hahu vayilkod 'et ha'ir ve'et ha'am 'asher bah harag vayitoz 'et ha'ir vayizra'eha melakh. vayishme'u kal ba'alei migdal shekhem vayabo'u 'el zeriakh bet 'el berit. vayugad la'abimelekh ki hitqabezu kal ba'alei migdal shekhem. vaya'al 'abimelekh har zalmon hu vekhal ha'am 'asher 'ito vayiqakh 'abimelekh 'et haqardumot beyado vayikhrot sokhat 'eizim vayisa'eha vayasem 'al shikhmo vayomer 'el ha'am 'asher 'imo mah re'item 'asiti maharu 'asu khamoni. vayikhretu gam kal ha'am 'ish sokhoh vayeilekhu 'akharei 'abimelekh vayasimu 'al hazeriakh vayazitu 'aleihem 'et hazeriakh ba'esh vayamutu gam kal 'anshei migdal shekhem ke'elef 'ish ve'ishah. vayeilekh 'abimelekh 'el teibez vayikhan beteibez vayilkedah. umigdal 'oz hayah betokh ha'ir vayanusu shamah kal ha'anashim vehanashim vekhol ba'alei ha'ir vayisgeru ba'adam vaya'alu 'al gag hamigdal. vayabo 'abimelekh 'ad hamigdal vayilakhem bo vayigash 'ad petakh hamigdal lesarefo ba'esh. vatashlekh 'ishah 'akhat pelakh rekheb 'al rosh 'abimelekh vatariz 'et gulgaleto. vayiqra meheirah 'el hana'ar nosei kheilav vayomer lo shelof kharbekha umoteini pen yomeru li 'ishah haragatehu vayidqereihu na'aro vayamot. vayir'u 'ish yisra'el ki met 'abimelekh vayeilekhu 'ish limqomo. vayasheb 'elohim 'et ra'at 'abimelekh 'asher 'asah le'abiv laharog 'et shib'im 'ekhav. ve'et kal ra'at 'anshei shekhem heishib 'elohim berosham vatabo 'aleihem qilalat yotam ben yeruba'al. vayaqam 'akharei 'abimelekh lehoshia' 'et yisra'el tola' ben pu'ah ben dodo 'ish yisashkhar vehu yosheb beshamir behar 'efrayim. vayishpot 'et yisra'el 'esrim veshalosh shanah vayamat vayiqaber beshamir. vayaqam 'akharav ya'ir hagil'adi vayishpot 'et yisra'el 'esrim ushetayim shanah. vayhi lo sheloshim banim rokhebim 'al sheloshim 'ayarim usheloshim 'ayarim lahem lahem yiqre'u khavot ya'ir 'ad hayom hazeh 'asher be'erez hagil'ad. vayamat ya'ir vayiqaber beqamon. vayosifu benei yisra'el la'asot hara' be'einei ihoh vaya'abdu 'et habe'alim ve'et ha'ashtarot ve'et 'elohei 'aram ve'et 'elohei zidon ve'et 'elohei mo'ab ve'et 'elohei benei 'amon ve'et 'elohei felishtim vaya'azbu 'et ihoh velo 'abaduhu. vayikhar 'af ihoh beyisra'el vayimkerem beyad pelishtim ubeyad benei 'amon. vayir'azu vayrozezu 'et benei yisra'el bashanah hahi shemoneh 'esreh shanah 'et kal benei yisra'el 'asher be'eiber hayarden be'erez ha'emori 'asher bagil'ad. vaya'abru benei 'amon 'et hayarden lehilakhem gam bihudah ubebinyamin ubebet 'efrayim vateizer leyisra'el me'od. vayiz'aqu benei yisra'el 'el ihoh leimor khatanu lakh vekhi 'azabnu 'et 'eloheinu vana'abod 'et habe'alim. vayomer ihoh 'el benei yisra'el halo mimizrayim umin ha'emori umin benei 'amon umin pelishtim. vezidonim va'amaleq uma'on lakhazu 'etkhem vatiz'aqu 'eilai va'oshi'ah 'etkhem miyadam. ve'atem 'azabtem 'oti vata'abdu 'elohim 'akheirim lakhen lo 'osif lehoshia' 'etkhem. lekhu veza'aqu 'el ha'elohim 'asher bekhartem bam hemah yoshi'u lakhem be'et zaratkhem. vayomeru benei yisra'el 'el ihoh khatanu 'aseh 'atah lanu kekhal hatob be'einekha 'akh hazileinu na hayom hazeh. vayasiru 'et 'elohei haneikhar miqirbam vaya'abdu 'et ihoh vatiqzar nafsho ba'amal yisra'el. vayiza'aqu benei 'amon vayakhanu bagil'ad vayei'asefu benei yisra'el vayakhanu bamizpah. vayomeru ha'am sarei gil'ad 'ish 'el rei'eihu mi ha'ish 'asher yakhel lehilakhem bibnei 'amon yihyeh lerosh lekhol yoshebei gil'ad. veyiftakh hagil'adi hayah gibor khayil vehu ben 'ishah zonah vayoled gil'ad 'et yiftakh. vateiled 'eishet gil'ad lo banim vayigdelu benei ha'ishah vaygareshu 'et yiftakh vayomeru lo lo tinkhal bebet 'abinu ki ben 'ishah 'akheret 'atah. vayibrakh yiftakh mipenei 'ekhav vayeisheb be'erez tob vayitlaqetu 'el yiftakh 'anashim reiqim vayeize'u 'imo. vayhi miyamim vayilakhamu benei 'amon 'im yisra'el. vayhi ka'asher nilkhamu benei 'amon 'im yisra'el vayeilekhu ziqnei gil'ad laqakhat 'et yiftakh mei'erez tob. vayomeru leyiftakh lekhah vehayitah lanu leqazin venilakhamah bibnei 'amon. vayomer yiftakh leziqnei gil'ad halo 'atem seneitem 'oti vategareshuni mibet 'abi umadua' batem 'eilai 'atah ka'asher zar lakhem. vayomeru ziqnei gil'ad 'el yiftakh lakhen 'atah shabnu 'eilekha vehalakhta 'imanu venilkhamta bibnei 'amon vehayita lanu lerosh lekhol yoshebei gil'ad. vayomer yiftakh 'el ziqnei gil'ad 'im meshibim 'atem 'oti lehilakhem bibnei 'amon venatan ihoh 'otam lefanai 'anokhi 'ehyeh lakhem lerosh. vayomeru ziqnei gil'ad 'el yiftakh ihoh yihyeh shomeia' beinoteinu 'im lo khidbarekha ken na'aseh. vayeilekh yiftakh 'im ziqnei gil'ad vayasimu ha'am 'oto 'aleihem lerosh uleqazin vaydaber yiftakh 'et kal debarav lifnei ihoh bamizpah. vayishlakh yiftakh mal'akhim 'el melekh benei 'amon leimor mah li valakh ki bata 'eilai lehilakhem be'arzi. vayomer melekh benei 'amon 'el mal'akhei yiftakh ki laqakh yisra'el 'et 'arzi ba'aloto mimizrayim mei'arnon ve'ad hayaboq ve'ad hayarden ve'atah hashibah 'ethen beshalom. vayosef 'od yiftakh vayishlakh mal'akhim 'el melekh benei 'amon. vayomer lo koh 'amar yiftakh lo laqakh yisra'el 'et 'erez mo'ab ve'et 'erez benei 'amon. ki ba'alotam mimizrayim vayeilekh yisra'el bamidbar 'ad yam suf vayabo qadeishah. vayishlakh yisra'el mal'akhim 'el melekh 'edom leimor 'e'berah na be'arzekha velo shama' melekh 'edom vegam 'el melekh mo'ab shalakh velo 'abah vayeisheb yisra'el beqadesh. vayeilekh bamidbar vayasab 'et 'erez 'edom ve'et 'erez mo'ab vayabo mimizrakh shemesh le'erez mo'ab vayakhanun be'eiber 'arnon velo ba'u bigbul mo'ab ki 'arnon gebul mo'ab. vayishlakh yisra'el mal'akhim 'el sikhon melekh ha'emori melekh kheshbon vayomer lo yisra'el na'berah na be'arzekha 'ad meqomi. velo he'emin sikhon 'et yisra'el 'abor bigbulo vaye'esof sikhon 'et kal 'amo vayakhanu beyahezah vayilakhem 'im yisra'el. vayiten ihoh 'elohei yisra'el 'et sikhon ve'et kal 'amo beyad yisra'el vayakum vayirash yisra'el 'et kal 'erez ha'emori yosheb ha'arez hahi. vayireshu 'et kal gebul ha'emori mei'arnon ve'ad hayaboq umin hamidbar ve'ad hayarden. ve'atah ihoh 'elohei yisra'el horish 'et ha'emori mipenei 'amo yisra'el ve'atah tirashenu. halo 'et 'asher yorishekha kemosh 'elohekha 'oto tirash ve'et kal 'asher horish ihoh 'eloheinu mipaneinu 'oto nirash. ve'atah hatob tob 'atah mibalaq ben zipor melekh mo'ab harob rab 'im yisra'el 'im nilkhom nilkham bam. beshebet yisra'el bekheshbon ubibnoteha ube'ar'or ubibnoteha ubekhal he'arim 'asher 'al yedei 'arnon shelosh mei'ot shanah umadua' lo hizaltem ba'et hahi. ve'anokhi lo khatati lakh ve'atah 'oseh 'iti ra'ah lehilakhem bi yishpot ihoh hashofet hayom ben benei yisra'el uben benei 'amon. velo shama' melekh benei 'amon 'el dibrei yiftakh 'asher shalakh 'eilav. vatehi 'al yiftakh ruakh ihoh vaya'abor 'et hagil'ad ve'et menasheh vaya'abor 'et mizpeh gil'ad umimizpeh gil'ad 'abar benei 'amon. vayidar yiftakh neder ihoh vayomar 'im naton titen 'et benei 'amon beyadi. vehayah hayozei 'asher yeizei midaltei beiti liqrati beshubi beshalom mibenei 'amon vehayah ihoh veha'alitihu 'olah. vaya'abor yiftakh 'el benei 'amon lehilakhem bam vayitenem ihoh beyado. vayakem mei'aro'er ve'ad bo'akha minit 'esrim 'ir ve'ad 'abel keramim makah gedolah me'od vayikane'u benei 'amon mipenei benei yisra'el. vayabo yiftakh hamizpah 'el beito vehineh bito yozet liqrato betupim ubimkholot veraq hi yekhidah 'en lo mimenu ben 'o bat. vayhi khir'oto 'otah vayiqra' 'et begadav vayomer 'ahah biti hakhreia' hikhra'tini ve'at hayit be'okherai ve'anokhi paziti fi 'el ihoh velo 'ukhal lashub. vatomer 'eilav 'abi pazitah 'et pikha 'el ihoh 'aseh li ka'asher yaza mipikha 'akharei 'asher 'asah lekha ihoh neqamot mei'oyebekha mibenei 'amon. vatomer 'el 'abiha yei'aseh li hadabar hazeh harpeh mimeni shenayim khodashim ve'eilekhah veyaradti 'al heharim ve'ebkeh 'al betulai 'anokhi vera'iti verei'otai. vayomer leikhi vayishlakh 'otah shenei khodashim vateilekh hi verei'oteha vateibek 'al betuleha 'al heharim. vayhi miqez shenayim khodashim vatashab 'el 'abiha vaya'as lah 'et nidro 'asher nadar vehi lo yade'ah 'ish vatehi khoq beyisra'el. miyamim yamimah teilakhnah benot yisra'el letanot lebat yiftakh hagil'adi 'arba'at yamim bashanah. vayiza'eq 'ish 'efrayim vaya'abor zafonah vayomeru leyiftakh madua' 'abarta lehilakhem bibnei 'amon velanu lo qarata lalekhet 'imakh beitekha nisrof 'alekha ba'esh. vayomer yiftakh 'aleihem 'ish rib hayiti 'ani ve'ami ubenei 'amon me'od va'ez'aq 'etkhem velo hosha'tem 'oti miyadam. va'er'eh ki 'einekha moshia' va'asimah nafshi bekhapi va'e'berah 'el benei 'amon vayitenem ihoh beyadi velamah 'alitem 'eilai hayom hazeh lehilakhem bi. vayiqboz yiftakh 'et kal 'anshei gil'ad vayilakhem 'et 'efrayim vayaku 'anshei gil'ad 'et 'efrayim ki 'ameru pelitei 'efrayim 'atem gil'ad betokh 'efrayim betokh menasheh. vayilkod gil'ad 'et ma'berot hayarden le'efrayim vehayah ki yomeru pelitei 'efrayim 'e'eborah vayomeru lo 'anshei gil'ad ha'efrati 'atah vayomer lo. vayomeru lo 'emar na shibolet vayomer sibolet velo yakhin ledaber ken vayokhazu 'oto vayishkhatuhu 'el ma'berot hayarden vayipol ba'et hahi mei'efrayim 'arba'im ushenayim 'alef. vayishpot yiftakh 'et yisra'el shesh shanim vayamat yiftakh hagil'adi vayiqaber be'arei gil'ad. vayishpot 'akharav 'et yisra'el 'ibzan mibet lakhem. vayhi lo sheloshim banim usheloshim banot shilakh hakhuzah usheloshim banot heibi lebanav min hakhuz vayishpot 'et yisra'el sheba' shanim. vayamat 'ibzan vayiqaber bebet lakhem. vayishpot 'akharav 'et yisra'el 'eilon hazebuloni vayishpot 'et yisra'el 'eser shanim. vayamat 'eilon hazebuloni vayiqaber be'ayalon be'erez zebulun. vayishpot 'akharav 'et yisra'el 'abdon ben hilel hapir'atoni. vayhi lo 'arba'im banim usheloshim benei banim rokhebim 'al shib'im 'ayarim vayishpot 'et yisra'el shemoneh shanim. vayamat 'abdon ben hilel hapir'atoni vayiqaber befir'aton be'erez 'efrayim behar ha'amaleiqi. vayosifu benei yisra'el la'asot hara' be'einei ihoh vayitenem ihoh beyad pelishtim 'arba'im shanah. vayhi 'ish 'ekhad mizare'ah mimishpakhat hadani ushemo manoakh ve'ishto 'aqarah velo yaladah. vayeira mal'akh ihoh 'el ha'ishah vayomer 'eileha hineh na 'at 'aqarah velo yaladt veharit veyaladt ben. ve'atah hishameri na ve'al tishti yayin vesheikhar ve'al tokheli kal tamei. ki hinakh harah veyoladt ben umorah lo ya'aleh 'al rosho ki nezir 'elohim yihyeh hana'ar min habaten vehu yakhel lehoshia' 'et yisra'el miyad pelishtim. vatabo ha'ishah vatomer le'ishah leimor 'ish ha'elohim ba 'eilai umar'eihu kemar'eh mal'akh ha'elohim nora me'od velo she'iltihu 'ei mizeh hu ve'et shemo lo higid li. vayomer li hinakh harah veyoladt ben ve'atah 'al tishti yayin vesheikhar ve'al tokheli kal tum'ah ki nezir 'elohim yihyeh hana'ar min habeten 'ad yom moto. vaye'tar manoakh 'el ihoh vayomar bi 'adonai 'ish ha'elohim 'asher shalakhta yabo na 'od 'eileinu veyoreinu mah na'aseh lana'ar hayulad. vayishma' ha'elohim beqol manoakh vayabo mal'akh ha'elohim 'od 'el ha'ishah vehi yoshebet basadeh umanoakh 'ishah 'en 'imah. vatemaher ha'ishah vataraz vataged le'ishah vatomer 'eilav hineh nir'ah 'eilai ha'ish 'asher ba bayom 'eilai. vayaqam vayeilekh manoakh 'akharei 'ishto vayabo 'el ha'ish vayomer lo ha'atah ha'ish 'asher dibarta 'el ha'ishah vayomer 'ani. vayomer manoakh 'atah yabo debarekha mah yihyeh mishpat hana'ar uma'aseihu. vayomer mal'akh ihoh 'el manoakh mikol 'asher 'amarti 'el ha'ishah tishamer. mikol 'asher yeizei migefen hayayin lo tokhal veyayin vesheikhar 'al teishet vekhal tum'ah 'al tokhal kol 'asher zivitiha tishmor. vayomer manoakh 'el mal'akh ihoh na'zerah na 'otakh vena'aseh lefanekha gedi 'izim. vayomer mal'akh ihoh 'el manoakh 'im ta'zereini lo 'okhal belakhmekha ve'im ta'aseh 'olah ihoh ta'alenah ki lo yada' manoakh ki mal'akh ihoh hu. vayomer manoakh 'el mal'akh ihoh mi shemekha ki yabo dibreikha debarekha vekhibadnukha. vayomer lo mal'akh ihoh lamah zeh tish'al lishmi vehu feli. vayiqakh manoakh 'et gedi ha'izim ve'et haminkhah vaya'al 'al hazur ihoh umafli la'asot umanoakh ve'ishto ro'im. vayhi ba'alot halahab mei'al hamizbeiakh hashamaymah vaya'al mal'akh ihoh belahab hamizbeiakh umanoakh ve'ishto ro'im vayipelu 'al peneihem 'arezah. velo yasaf 'od mal'akh ihoh leheira'oh 'el manoakh ve'el 'ishto 'az yada' manoakh ki mal'akh ihoh hu. vayomer manoakh 'el 'ishto mot namut ki 'elohim ra'inu. vatomer lo 'ishto lu khafez ihoh lahamiteinu lo laqakh miyadeinu 'olah uminkhah velo her'anu 'et kal 'eleh vekha'et lo hishmi'anu kazot. vateiled ha'ishah ben vatiqra 'et shemo shimshon vayigdal hana'ar vaybarekheihu ihoh. vatakhel ruakh ihoh lefa'amo bemakhaneh dan ben zare'ah uben 'eshta'ol. vayeired shimshon timnatah vayar 'ishah betimnatah mibenot pelishtim. vaya'al vayaged le'abiv ule'imo vayomer 'ishah ra'iti betimnatah mibenot pelishtim ve'atah qekhu 'otah li le'ishah. vayomer lo 'abiv ve'imo ha'en bibnot 'akhekha ubekhal 'ami 'ishah ki 'atah holekh laqakhat 'ishah mipelishtim ha'areilim vayomer shimshon 'el 'abiv 'otah qakh li ki hi yasherah be'einai. ve'abiv ve'imo lo yade'u ki ihoh hi ki to'anah hu mebaqesh mipelishtim uba'et hahi pelishtim moshelim beyisra'el. vayeired shimshon ve'abiv ve'imo timnatah vayabo'u 'ad karmei timnatah vehineh kefir 'arayot sho'eg liqrato. vatizlakh 'alav ruakh ihoh vayshase'eihu keshasa' hagedi ume'umah 'en beyado velo higid le'abiv ule'imo 'et 'asher 'asah. vayeired vaydaber la'ishah vatishar be'einei shimshon. vayashab miyamim leqakhtah vayasar lir'ot 'et mapelet ha'aryeh vehineh 'adat deborim bigviyat ha'aryeh udebash. vayirdeihu 'el kapav vayeilekh halokh ve'akhol vayeilekh 'el 'abiv ve'el 'imo vayiten lahem vayokheilu velo higid lahem ki migeviyat ha'aryeh radah hadebash. vayeired 'abihu 'el ha'ishah vaya'as sham shimshon mishteh ki ken ya'asu habakhurim. vayhi kir'otam 'oto vayiqkhu sheloshim meirei'im vayihyu 'ito. vayomer lahem shimshon 'akhudah na lakhem khidah 'im haged tagidu 'otah li shib'at yemei hamishteh umezatem venatati lakhem sheloshim sedinim usheloshim khalifot begadim. ve'im lo tukhelu lehagid li unetatem 'atem li sheloshim sedinim usheloshim khalifot begadim vayomeru lo khudah khidatekha venishma'enah. vayomer lahem meiha'okhel yaza ma'akhal umei'az yaza matoq velo yakhelu lehagid hakhidah sheloshet yamim. vayhi bayom hashebi'i vayomeru le'eishet shimshon pati 'et 'ishekh veyaged lanu 'et hakhidah pen nisrof 'otakh ve'et bet 'abikh ba'esh halyaresheinu qeratem lanu halo. vateibek 'eishet shimshon 'alav vatomer raq seneitani velo 'ahabtani hakhidah khadta libnei 'ami veli lo higadtah vayomer lah hineh le'abi ule'imi lo higadti velakh 'agid. vateibek 'alav shib'at hayamim 'asher hayah lahem hamishteh vayhi bayom hashebi'i vayaged lah ki heziqathu vataged hakhidah libnei 'amah. vayomeru lo 'anshei ha'ir bayom hashebi'i beterem yabo hakharsah mah matoq midebash umeh 'az mei'ari vayomer lahem lulei kharashtem be'eglati lo mezatem khidati. vatizlakh 'alav ruakh ihoh vayeired 'ashqelon vayakh meihem sheloshim 'ish vayiqakh 'et khalizotam vayiten hakhalifot lemagidei hakhidah vayikhar 'apo vaya'al bet 'abihu. vatehi 'eishet shimshon lemeirei'eihu 'asher rei'ah lo. vayhi miyamim bimei qezir khitim vayifqod shimshon 'et 'ishto bigdi 'izim vayomer 'abo'ah 'el 'ishti hekhaderah velo netano 'abiha labo. vayomer 'abiha 'amor 'amarti ki sano seneitah va'etenenah lemeirei'ekha halo 'akhotah haqetanah tobah mimenah tehi na lekha takhteha. vayomer lahem shimshon niqeiti hapa'am mipelishtim ki 'oseh 'ani 'imam ra'ah. vayeilekh shimshon vayilkod shelosh mei'ot shu'alim vayiqakh lapidim vayefen zanab 'el zanab vayasem lapid 'ekhad ben shenei hazenabot batavekh. vayab'er 'esh balapidim vayshalakh beqamot pelishtim vayab'er migadish ve'ad qamah ve'ad kerem zayit. vayomeru felishtim mi 'asah zot vayomeru shimshon khatan hatimni ki laqakh 'et 'ishto vayitenah lemeirei'eihu vaya'alu felishtim vayisrefu 'otah ve'et 'abiha ba'esh. vayomer lahem shimshon 'im ta'asun kazot ki 'im niqamti bakhem ve'akhar 'ekhdal. vayakh 'otam shoq 'al yarekh makah gedolah vayeired vayeisheb bis'if sela' 'eitam. vaya'alu felishtim vayakhanu bihudah vayinateshu balekhi. vayomeru 'ish yehudah lamah 'alitem 'aleinu vayomeru le'esor 'et shimshon 'alinu la'asot lo ka'asher 'asah lanu. vayeiredu sheloshet 'alafim 'ish mihudah 'el se'if sela' 'eitam vayomeru leshimshon halo yada'ta ki moshelim banu pelishtim umah zot 'asita lanu vayomer lahem ka'asher 'asu li ken 'asiti lahem. vayomeru lo le'esarekha yaradnu letitekha beyad pelishtim vayomer lahem shimshon hishabe'u li pen tifge'un bi 'atem. vayomeru lo leimor lo ki 'asor ne'esarekha unetanukha beyadam vehamet lo nemitekha vaya'asruhu bishnayim 'abotim khadashim vaya'aluhu min hasala'. hu ba 'ad lekhi ufelishtim heiri'u liqrato vatizlakh 'alav ruakh ihoh vatihyenah ha'abotim 'asher 'al zero'otav kapishtim 'asher ba'aru ba'esh vayimasu 'esurav mei'al yadav. vayimza lekhi khamor teriyah vayishlakh yado vayiqakheha vayakh bah 'elef 'ish. vayomer shimshon bilkhi hakhamor khamor khamoratayim bilkhi hakhamor hikeiti 'elef 'ish. vayhi kekhaloto ledaber vayashlekh halekhi miyado vayiqra lamaqom hahu ramat lekhi. vayizma me'od vayiqra 'el ihoh vayomar 'atah natata beyad 'abdekha 'et hateshu'ah hagedolah hazot ve'atah 'amut bazama venafalti beyad ha'areilim. vayibqa' 'elohim 'et hamakhtesh 'asher balekhi vayeize'u mimenu mayim vayeishet vatashab rukho vayekhi 'al ken qara shemah 'en haqorei 'asher balekhi 'ad hayom hazeh. vayishpot 'et yisra'el bimei felishtim 'esrim shanah. vayeilekh shimshon 'azatah vayar sham 'ishah zonah vayabo 'eileha. la'azatim leimor ba shimshon henah vayasobu vaye'erbu lo khal halaylah besha'ar ha'ir vayitkhareshu khal halaylah leimor 'ad 'or haboqer vahargenuhu vayishkab shimshon 'ad khazi halaylah vayaqam bakhazi halaylah vaye'ekhoz bedaltot sha'ar ha'ir ubishtei hamezuzot vayisa'em 'im haberiakh vayasem 'al keteifav vaya'alem 'el rosh hahar 'asher 'al penei khebron. vayhi 'akharei khen vaye'ehab 'ishah benakhal soreq ushemah delilah. vaya'alu 'eileha sarnei felishtim vayomeru lah pati 'oto ure'i bameh kokho gadol ubameh nukhal lo va'asarnuhu le'anoto va'anakhnu nitan lakh 'ish 'elef umei'ah kasef. vatomer delilah 'el shimshon hagidah na li bameh kokhakha gadol ubameh tei'aser le'anotekha. vayomer 'eileha shimshon 'im ya'asruni beshib'ah yetarim lakhim 'asher lo khorabu vekhaliti vehayiti ke'akhad ha'adam. vaya'alu lah sarnei felishtim shib'ah yetarim lakhim 'asher lo khorabu vata'asreihu bahem. veha'oreb yosheb lah bakheder vatomer 'eilav pelishtim 'alekha shimshon vaynateq 'et haytarim ka'asher yinateq petil hane'oret baharikho 'esh velo noda' kokho. vatomer delilah 'el shimshon hineh heitalta bi vatedaber 'eilai kezabim 'atah hagidah na li bameh tei'aser. vayomer 'eileha 'im 'asor ya'asruni ba'abotim khadashim 'asher lo na'asah bahem melakhah vekhaliti vehayiti ke'akhad ha'adam. vatiqakh delilah 'abotim khadashim vata'asreihu bahem vatomer 'eilav pelishtim 'alekha shimshon veha'oreb yosheb bekhader vaynateqem mei'al zero'otav kakhut. vatomer delilah 'el shimshon 'ad henah heitalta bi vatedaber 'eilai kezabim hagidah li bameh tei'aser vayomer 'eileha 'im ta'argi 'et sheba' makhlefot roshi 'im hamasakhet. vatitqa' bayated vatomer 'eilav pelishtim 'alekha shimshon vayiqaz mishenato vayisa' 'et haytad ha'ereg ve'et hamasakhet. vatomer 'eilav 'ekh tomar 'ahabtikh velibekha 'en 'iti zeh shalosh pe'amim heitalta bi velo higadta li bameh kokhakha gadol. vayhi ki heiziqah lo bidbareha kal hayamim vate'alazeihu vatiqzar nafsho lamut. vayaged lah 'et kal libo vayomer lah morah lo 'alah 'al roshi ki nezir 'elohim 'ani mibeten 'imi 'im gulakhti vesar mimeni khokhi vekhaliti vehayiti kekhal ha'adam. vateire delilah ki higid lah 'et kal libo vatishlakh vatiqra lesarnei felishtim leimor 'alu hapa'am ki higid lah li 'et kal libo ve'alu 'eileha sarnei felishtim vaya'alu hakesef beyadam. vateyasheneihu 'al birkeha vatiqra la'ish vategalakh 'et sheba' makhlefot rosho vatakhel le'anoto vayasar kokho mei'alav. vatomer pelishtim 'alekha shimshon vayiqaz mishenato vayomer 'eizei kefa'am befa'am ve'ina'er vehu lo yada' ki ihoh sar mei'alav. vayokhazuhu felishtim vaynaqeru 'et 'einav vayoridu 'oto 'azatah vaya'asruhu bankhushtayim vayhi tokhen bebet ha'asirim ha'asurim. vayakhel se'ar rosho lezameiakh ka'asher gulakh. vesarnei felishtim ne'esfu lizboakh zebakh gadol ledagon 'eloheihem ulesimkhah vayomeru natan 'eloheinu beyadeinu 'et shimshon 'oybeinu. vayir'u 'oto ha'am vayhalu 'et 'eloheihem ki 'ameru natan 'eloheinu beyadeinu 'et 'oybeinu ve'et makharib 'arzeinu va'asher hirbah 'et khalaleinu. vayhi ki tob ketob libam vayomeru qir'u leshimshon visakheq lanu vayiqre'u leshimshon mibet ha'asirim ha'asurim vayzakheq lifneihem vaya'amidu 'oto ben ha'amudim. vayomer shimshon 'el hana'ar hamakhaziq beyado hanikhah 'oti vaheimisheini vahamisheini 'et ha'amudim 'asher habayit nakhon 'aleihem ve'esha'en 'aleihem. vehabayit malei ha'anashim vehanashim veshamah kol sarnei felishtim ve'al hagag kishloshet 'alafim 'ish ve'ishah haro'im biskhoq shimshon. vayiqra shimshon 'el ihoh vayomar 'adonai ihoh zakhereini na vekhazeqeini na 'akh hapa'am hazeh ha'elohim ve'inaqemah neqam 'akhat mishetei 'einai mipelishtim. vayilpot shimshon 'et shenei 'amudei hatavekh 'asher habayit nakhon 'aleihem vayisamekh 'aleihem 'ekhad bimino ve'ekhad bismolo. vayomer shimshon tamot nafshi 'im pelishtim vayet bekhoakh vayipol habayit 'al haseranim ve'al kal ha'am 'asher bo vayihyu hameitim 'asher heimit bemoto rabim mei'asher heimit bekhayav. vayeiredu 'ekhav vekhal bet 'abihu vayis'u 'oto vaya'alu vayiqberu 'oto ben zare'ah uben 'eshta'ol beqeber manoakh 'abiv vehu shafat 'et yisra'el 'esrim shanah. vayhi 'ish meihar 'efrayim ushemo mikhayehu. vayomer le'imo 'elef umei'ah hakesef 'asher luqakh lakh ve'ati ve'at 'alit vegam 'amart be'azenai hineh hakesef 'iti 'ani leqakhtiv vatomer 'imo barukh beni ihoh. vayasheb 'et 'elef umei'ah hakesef le'imo vatomer 'imo haqdesh hiqdashti 'et hakesef ihoh miyadi libni la'asot pesel umaseikhah ve'atah 'ashibenu lakh. vayasheb 'et hakesef le'imo vatiqakh 'imo matayim kesef vatiteneihu lazoref vaya'aseihu pesel umaseikhah vayhi bebet mikhayehu. veha'ish mikhah lo bet 'elohim vaya'as 'eifod uterafim vaymalei 'et yad 'akhad mibanav vayhi lo lekhohen. bayamim hahem 'en melekh beyisra'el 'ish hayashar be'einav ya'aseh. vayhi na'ar mibet lekhem yehudah mimishpakhat yehudah vehu leivi vehu gar sham. vayeilekh ha'ish meiha'ir mibet lekhem yehudah lagur ba'asher yimza vayabo har 'efrayim 'ad bet mikhah la'asot darko. vayomer lo mikhah mei'ayin tabo vayomer 'eilav leivi 'anokhi mibet lekhem yehudah ve'anokhi holekh lagur ba'asher 'emza. vayomer lo mikhah shebah 'imadi vehyeh li le'ab ulekhohen ve'anokhi 'eten lekha 'aseret kesef layamim ve'eirekh begadim umikhyatekha vayeilekh haleivi. vayo'el haleivi lashebet 'et ha'ish vayhi hana'ar lo ke'akhad mibanav. vaymalei mikhah 'et yad haleivi vayhi lo hana'ar lekhohen vayhi bebet mikhah. vayomer mikhah 'atah yada'ti ki yeitib ihoh li ki hayah li haleivi lekhohen. bayamim hahem 'en melekh beyisra'el ubayamim hahem sheibet hadani mebaqesh lo nakhalah lashebet ki lo nafelah lo 'ad hayom hahu betokh shibtei yisra'el benakhalah. vayishlekhu benei dan mimishpakhtam khamishah 'anashim miqzotam 'anashim benei khayil mizare'ah umei'eshta'ol leragel 'et ha'arez ulekhaqerah vayomeru 'aleihem lekhu khiqru 'et ha'arez vayabo'u har 'efrayim 'ad bet mikhah vayalinu sham. hemah 'im bet mikhah vehemah hikiru 'et qol hana'ar haleivi vayasuru sham vayomeru lo mi hebi'akha halom umah 'atah 'oseh bazeh umah lekha foh. vayomer 'aleihem kazoh vekhazeh 'asah li mikhah vayiskereini va'ehi lo lekhohen. vayomeru lo she'al na beilohim veneide'ah hatazliakh darkeinu 'asher 'anakhnu holekhim 'aleha. vayomer lahem hakohen lekhu leshalom nokhakh ihoh darkekhem 'asher teilekhu bah. vayeilekhu khameishet ha'anashim vayabo'u layeshah vayir'u 'et ha'am 'asher beqirbah yoshebet labetakh kemishpat zidonim shoqet uboteiakh ve'en makhlim dabar ba'arez yoresh 'ezer urekhoqim hemah mizidonim vedabar 'en lahem 'im 'adam. vayabo'u 'el 'akheihem zare'ah ve'eshta'ol vayomeru lahem 'akheihem mah 'atem. vayomeru qumah vena'aleh 'aleihem ki ra'inu 'et ha'arez vehineh tobah me'od ve'atem makhshim 'al tei'azelu lalekhet labo lareshet 'et ha'arez. kebo'akhem tabo'u 'el 'am boteiakh veha'arez rakhabat yadayim ki netanah 'elohim beyedkhem maqom 'asher 'en sham makhsor kal dabar 'asher ba'arez. vayis'u misham mimishpakhat hadani mizare'ah umei'eshta'ol shesh mei'ot 'ish khagur kelei milkhamah. vaya'alu vayakhanu beqiryat ye'arim bihudah 'al ken qare'u lamaqom hahu makhaneh dan 'ad hayom hazeh hineh 'akharei qiryat ye'arim. vaya'abru misham har 'efrayim vayabo'u 'ad bet mikhah. vaya'anu khameishet ha'anashim haholekhim leragel 'et ha'arez layish vayomeru 'el 'akheihem hayda'tem ki yesh babatim ha'eleh 'eifod uterafim ufesel umaseikhah ve'atah de'u mah ta'asu. vayasuru shamah vayabo'u 'el bet hana'ar haleivi bet mikhah vayish'alu lo leshalom. veshesh mei'ot 'ish khagurim kelei milkhamtam nizabim petakh hasha'ar 'asher mibenei dan. vaya'alu khameishet ha'anashim haholekhim leragel 'et ha'arez ba'u shamah laqekhu 'et hapesel ve'et ha'eifod ve'et haterafim ve'et hamaseikhah vehakohen nizab petakh hasha'ar veshesh mei'ot ha'ish hekhagur kelei hamilkhamah. ve'eleh ba'u bet mikhah vayiqkhu 'et pesel ha'eifod ve'et haterafim ve'et hamaseikhah vayomer 'aleihem hakohen mah 'atem 'osim. vayomeru lo hakharesh sim yadekha 'al pikha velekh 'imanu vehyeh lanu le'ab ulekhohen hatob heyotkha khohen lebet 'ish 'ekhad 'o heyotkha khohen lesheibet ulemishpakhah beyisra'el. vayitab leb hakohen vayiqakh 'et ha'eifod ve'et haterafim ve'et hapasel vayabo beqereb ha'am. vayifnu vayeileikhu vayasimu 'et hataf ve'et hamiqneh ve'et hakebudah lifneihem. hemah hirkhiqu mibet mikhah veha'anashim 'asher babatim 'asher 'im bet mikhah niz'aqu vayadbiqu 'et benei dan. vayiqre'u 'el benei dan vayasebu peneihem vayomeru lemikhah mah lekha ki niz'aqeta. vayomer 'et 'elohai 'asher 'asiti leqakhtem ve'et hakohen vateilekhu umah li 'od umah zeh tomeru 'eilai mah lakh. vayomeru 'eilav benei dan 'al tashma' qolkha 'imanu pen yifge'u bakhem 'anashim marei nefesh ve'asaftah nafshekha venefesh beitekha. vayeilekhu benei dan ledarkam vayar mikhah ki khazaqim hemah mimenu vayifen vayashab 'el beito. vehemah laqekhu 'et 'asher 'asah mikhah ve'et hakohen 'asher hayah lo vayabo'u 'al layish 'al 'am shoqet uboteiakh vayaku 'otam lefi khareb ve'et ha'ir sarefu ba'esh. ve'en mazil ki rekhoqah hi mizidon vedabar 'en lahem 'im 'adam vehi ba'eimeq 'asher lebet rekhob vayibnu 'et ha'ir vayeishebu bah. vayiqre'u shem ha'ir dan beshem dan 'abihem 'asher yulad leyisra'el ve'ulam layish shem ha'ir larishonah. vayaqimu lahem benei dan 'et hapasel vihonatan ben geireshom ben menasheh hu ubanav hayu khohanim lesheibet hadani 'ad yom gelot ha'arez. vayasimu lahem 'et pesel mikhah 'asher 'asah kal yemei heyot bet ha'elohim beshiloh. vayhi bayamim hahem umelekh 'en beyisra'el vayhi 'ish leivi gar beyarketei har 'efrayim vayiqakh lo 'ishah filegesh mibet lekhem yehudah. vatizneh 'alav pilagsho vateilekh mei'ito 'el bet 'abiha 'el bet lekhem yehudah vatehi sham yamim 'arba'ah khodashim. vayaqam 'ishah vayeilekh 'akhareha ledaber 'al libah lahashibo lahashibah vena'aro 'imo vezemed khamorim vatebi'eihu bet 'abiha vayir'eihu 'abi hana'arah vayismakh liqrato. vayekhezaq bo khoteno 'abi hana'arah vayeisheb 'ito sheloshet yamim vayokhelu vayishtu vayalinu sham. vayhi bayom harebi'i vayashkimu baboqer vayaqam lalekhet vayomer 'abi hana'arah 'el khatano se'ad libekha pat lekhem ve'akhar teileikhu. vayeishebu vayokhelu sheneihem yakhdav vayishtu vayomer 'abi hana'arah 'el ha'ish ho'el na velin veyitab libekha. vayaqam ha'ish lalekhet vayifzar bo khoteno vayashab vayalen sham. vayashkem baboqer bayom hakhamishi lalekhet vayomer 'abi hana'arah se'ad na lebabekha vehitmahmehu 'ad netot hayom vayokhelu sheneihem. vayaqam ha'ish lalekhet hu ufilagsho vena'aro vayomer lo khoteno 'abi hana'arah hineh na rafah hayom la'arob linu na hineh khanot hayom lin poh veyitab lebabekha vehishkamtem makhar ledarkekhem vehalakhta le'ohalekha. velo 'abah ha'ish lalun vayaqam vayeilekh vayabo 'ad nokhakh yebus hi yerushalim ve'imo zemed khamorim khabushim ufilagsho 'imo. hem 'im yebus vehayom rad me'od vayomer hana'ar 'el 'adonav lekhah na venasurah 'el 'ir haybusi hazot venalin bah. vayomer 'eilav 'adonav lo nasur 'el 'ir nakheri 'asher lo mibenei yisra'el henah ve'abarnu 'ad gib'ah. vayomer lena'aro lekha veniqrebah be'akhad hameqomot velanu bagib'ah 'o baramah. vaya'abru vayeileikhu vatabo lahem hashemesh 'eizel hagib'ah 'asher lebinyamin. vayasuru sham labo lalun bagib'ah vayabo vayeisheb birkhob ha'ir ve'en 'ish me'asef 'otam habaytah lalun. vehineh 'ish zaqen ba min ma'aseihu min hasadeh ba'ereb veha'ish meihar 'efrayim vehu gar bagib'ah ve'anshei hamaqom benei yemini. vayisa 'einav vayar 'et ha'ish ha'oreiakh birkhob ha'ir vayomer ha'ish hazaqen 'anah teilekh umei'ayin tabo. vayomer 'eilav 'oberim 'anakhnu mibet lekhem yehudah 'ad yarketei har 'efrayim misham 'anokhi va'eilekh 'ad bet lekhem yehudah ve'et bet ihoh 'ani holekh ve'en 'ish me'asef 'oti habayetah. vegam teben gam mispo yesh lakhamoreinu vegam lekhem vayayin yesh li vela'amatekha velana'ar 'im 'abadekha 'en makhsor kal dabar. vayomer ha'ish hazaqen shalom lakh raq kal makhsorkha 'alai raq barekhob 'al talan. vaybi'eihu lebeito vayibol lakhamorim vayirkhazu ragleihem vayokhelu vayishtu. hemah meitibim 'et libam vehineh 'anshei ha'ir 'anshei benei beliya'al nasabu 'et habayit mitdapeqim 'al hadalet vayomeru 'el ha'ish ba'al habayit hazaqen leimor hozei 'et ha'ish 'asher ba 'el beitekha veneida'enu. vayeizei 'aleihem ha'ish ba'al habayit vayomer 'aleihem 'al 'akhai 'al tarei'u na 'akharei 'asher ba ha'ish hazeh 'al beiti 'al ta'asu 'et hanebalah hazot. hineh biti habetulah ufilagsheihu 'ozi'ah na 'otam ve'anu 'otam va'asu lahem hatob be'eineikhem vela'ish hazeh lo ta'asu debar hanebalah hazot. velo 'abu ha'anashim lishmoa' lo vayakhazeq ha'ish befilagsho vayozei 'aleihem hakhuz vayeide'u 'otah vayit'alelu bah kal halaylah 'ad haboqer vayshalekhuha ba'alot ka'alot hashakhar. vatabo ha'ishah lifnot haboqer vatipol petakh bet ha'ish 'asher 'adoneha sham 'ad ha'or. vayaqam 'adoneha baboqer vayiftakh daltot habayit vayeizei lalekhet ledarko vehineh ha'ishah filagsho nofelet petakh habayit veyadeha 'al hasaf. vayomer 'eileha qumi veneileikhah ve'en 'oneh vayiqakheha 'al hakhamor vayaqam ha'ish vayeilekh limqomo. vayabo 'el beito vayiqakh 'et hama'akhelet vayakhazeq befilagsho vaynatekheha la'azameha lishnem 'asar netakhim vayshalekheha bekhol gebul yisra'el. vehayah khal haro'eh ve'amar lo nihyetah velo nir'atah kazot lemiyom 'alot benei yisra'el mei'erez mizrayim 'ad hayom hazeh simu lakhem 'aleha 'uzu vedabeiru. vayeize'u kal benei yisra'el vatiqahel ha'eidah ke'ish 'ekhad lemidan ve'ad be'er sheba' ve'erez hagil'ad 'el ihoh hamizpah. vayityazebu pinot kal ha'am kol shibtei yisra'el biqhal 'am ha'elohim
