'arba' mei'ot 'elef 'ish ragli sholef khareb. vayishme'u benei binyamin ki 'alu benei yisra'el hamizpah vayomeru benei yisra'el daberu 'eikhah nihyetah hara'ah hazot. vaya'an ha'ish haleivi 'ish ha'ishah hanirzakhah vayomar hagib'atah 'asher lebinyamin bati 'ani ufilagshi lalun. vayaqumu 'alai ba'alei hagib'ah vayasobu 'alai 'et habayit layelah 'oti dimu laharog ve'et pilagshi 'inu vatamot. va'okhez befilagshi va'anatekheha va'ashalekheha bekhal sedeh nakhalat yisra'el ki 'asu zimah unebalah beyisra'el. hineh khulekhem benei yisra'el habu lakhem dabar ve'eizah halom. vayaqam kal ha'am ke'ish 'ekhad leimor lo neilekh 'ish le'aholo velo nasur 'ish lebeito. ve'atah zeh hadabar 'asher na'aseh lagib'ah 'aleha begoral. velaqakhnu 'asarah 'anashim lamei'ah lekhol shibtei yisra'el umei'ah la'elef ve'elef larebabah laqakhat zeidah la'am la'asot lebo'am legeba' binyamin kekhal hanebalah 'asher 'asah beyisra'el. vayei'asef kal 'ish yisra'el 'el ha'ir ke'ish 'ekhad khabeirim. vayishlekhu shibtei yisra'el 'anashim bekhal shibtei binyamin leimor mah hara'ah hazot 'asher nihyetah bakhem. ve'atah tenu 'et ha'anashim benei beliya'al 'asher bagib'ah unemitem uneba'arah ra'ah miyisra'el velo 'abu benei binyamin lishmoa' beqol 'akheihem benei yisra'el. vayei'asefu benei binyamin min he'arim hagib'atah lazet lamilkhamah 'im benei yisra'el. vayitpaqedu benei binyamin bayom hahu meihe'arim 'esrim veshishah 'elef 'ish sholef khareb lebad miyoshebei hagib'ah hitpaqedu sheba' mei'ot 'ish bakhur. mikol ha'am hazeh sheba' mei'ot 'ish bakhur 'iter yad yemino kal zeh qoleia' ba'eben 'el hasa'arah velo yakhati. ve'ish yisra'el hitpaqedu lebad mibinyamin 'arba' mei'ot 'elef 'ish sholef khareb kal zeh 'ish milkhamah. vayaqumu vaya'alu bet 'el vayish'alu beilohim vayomeru benei yisra'el mi ya'aleh lanu batekhilah lamilkhamah 'im benei binyamin vayomer ihoh yehudah batekhilah. vayaqumu benei yisra'el baboqer vayakhanu 'al hagib'ah. vayeizei 'ish yisra'el lamilkhamah 'im binyamin vaya'arkhu 'itam 'ish yisra'el milkhamah 'el hagib'ah. vayeize'u benei binyamin min hagib'ah vayashkhitu beyisra'el bayom hahu shenayim ve'esrim 'elef 'ish 'arezah. vayitkhazeq ha'am 'ish yisra'el vayosifu la'arokh milkhamah bamaqom 'asher 'arekhu sham bayom harishon. vaya'alu benei yisra'el vayibku lifnei ihoh 'ad ha'ereb vayish'alu ihoh leimor ha'osif lageshet lamilkhamah 'im benei binyamin 'akhi vayomer ihoh 'alu 'eilav. vayiqrebu benei yisra'el 'el benei binyamin bayom hasheini. vayeizei binyamin liqratam min hagib'ah bayom hasheini vayashkhitu bibnei yisra'el 'od shemonat 'asar 'elef 'ish 'arezah kal 'eleh sholefei khareb. vaya'alu khal benei yisra'el vekhal ha'am vayabo'u bet 'el vayibku vayeishebu sham lifnei ihoh vayazumu bayom hahu 'ad ha'areb vaya'alu 'olot ushelamim lifnei ihoh. vayish'alu benei yisra'el ihoh vesham 'aron berit ha'elohim bayamim hahem. ufinekhas ben 'el'azar ben 'aharon 'omed lefanav bayamim hahem leimor ha'osif 'od lazet lamilkhamah 'im benei binyamin 'akhi 'im 'ekhdal vayomer ihoh 'alu ki makhar 'etenenu beyadekha. vayasem yisra'el 'orebim 'el hagib'ah sabib. vaya'alu benei yisra'el 'el benei binyamin bayom hashelishi vaya'arkhu 'el hagib'ah kefa'am befa'am. vayeize'u benei binyamin liqrat ha'am hanetequ min ha'ir vayakhelu lehakot meiha'am khalalim kefa'am befa'am bamsilot 'asher 'akhat 'olah bet 'el ve'akhat gib'atah basadeh kishloshim 'ish beyisra'el. vayomeru benei binyamin nigafim hem lefaneinu kebarishonah ubenei yisra'el 'ameru nanusah unetaqenuhu min ha'ir 'el hamsilot. vekhol 'ish yisra'el qamu mimeqomo vaya'arkhu beba'al tamar ve'oreb yisra'el meigiakh mimeqomo mima'areh gaba'. vayabo'u mineged lagib'ah 'aseret 'alafim 'ish bakhur mikal yisra'el vehamilkhamah kabeidah vehem lo yade'u ki noga'at 'aleihem hara'ah. vayigof ihoh 'et binyamin lifnei yisra'el vayashkhitu benei yisra'el bebinyamin bayom hahu 'esrim vakhamishah 'elef umei'ah 'ish kal 'eleh sholef khareb. vayir'u benei binyamin ki nigafu vayitenu 'ish yisra'el maqom lebinyamin ki batekhu 'el ha'oreb 'asher samu 'el hagib'ah. veha'oreb heikhishu vayifshetu 'el hagib'ah vayimshokh ha'oreb vayakh 'et kal ha'ir lefi khareb. vehamo'ed hayah le'ish yisra'el 'im ha'oreb hereb leha'alotam mas'at he'ashan min ha'ir. vayahafokh 'ish yisra'el bamilkhamah ubinyamin heikhel lehakot khalalim be'ish yisra'el kishloshim 'ish ki 'ameru 'akh nigof nigaf hu lefaneinu kamilkhamah harishonah. vehamas'et heikhelah la'alot min ha'ir 'amud 'ashan vayifen binyamin 'akharav vehineh 'alah khelil ha'ir hashamayemah. ve'ish yisra'el hafakh vayibahel 'ish binyamin ki ra'ah ki nage'ah 'alav hara'ah. vayifnu lifnei 'ish yisra'el 'el derekh hamidbar vehamilkhamah hidbiqatehu va'asher meihe'arim mashkhitim 'oto betokho. kiteru 'et binyamin hirdifuhu menukhah hidrikhuhu 'ad nokhakh hagib'ah mimizrakh shamesh. vayipelu mibinyamin shemonah 'asar 'elef 'ish 'et kal 'eleh 'anshei khayil. vayifnu vayanusu hamidbarah 'el sela' harimon vai'oleluhu bamsilot khameishet 'alafim 'ish vayadbiqu 'akharav 'ad gid'om vayaku mimenu 'alpayim 'ish. vayhi khal hanofelim mibinyamin 'esrim vakhamishah 'elef 'ish sholef khereb bayom hahu 'et kal 'eleh 'anshei khayil. vayifnu vayanusu hamidbarah 'el sela' harimon shesh mei'ot 'ish vayeishebu besela' rimon 'arba'ah khodashim. ve'ish yisra'el shabu 'el benei binyamin vayakum lefi khereb mei'ir metom 'ad beheimah 'ad kal hanimza gam kal he'arim hanimza'ot shilekhu ba'esh. ve'ish yisra'el nishba' bamizpah leimor 'ish mimenu lo yiten bito lebinyamin le'ishah. vayabo ha'am bet 'el vayeishebu sham 'ad ha'ereb lifnei ha'elohim vayis'u qolam vayibku bekhi gadol. vayomeru lamah ihoh 'elohei yisra'el hayetah zot beyisra'el lehipaqed hayom miyisra'el sheibet 'ekhad. vayhi mimakhorat vayashkimu ha'am vayibnu sham mizbeiakh vaya'alu 'olot ushelamim. vayomeru benei yisra'el mi 'asher lo 'alah baqahal mikal shibtei yisra'el 'el ihoh ki hashebu'ah hagedolah hayetah la'asher lo 'alah 'el ihoh hamizpah leimor mot yumat. vayinakhamu benei yisra'el 'el binyamin 'akhiv vayomeru nigda' hayom sheibet 'ekhad miyisra'el. mah na'aseh lahem lanotarim lenashim va'anakhnu nishba'nu ihoh lebilti tet lahem mibenoteinu lenashim. vayomeru mi 'ekhad mishibtei yisra'el 'asher lo 'alah 'el ihoh hamizpah vehineh lo ba 'ish 'el hamakhaneh miyabesh gil'ad 'el haqahal. vayitpaqed ha'am vehineh 'en sham 'ish miyoshebei yabesh gil'ad. vayishlekhu sham ha'eidah shenem 'asar 'elef 'ish mibenei hekhayil vayzavu 'otam leimor lekhu vehikitem 'et yoshebei yabesh gil'ad lefi khereb vehanashim vehataf. vezeh hadabar 'asher ta'asu kal zakhar vekhal 'ishah yoda'at mishkab zakhar takharimu. vayimze'u miyoshebei yabesh gil'ad 'arba' mei'ot na'arah betulah 'asher lo yade'ah 'ish lemishkab zakhar vayabi'u 'otam 'el hamakhaneh shiloh 'asher be'erez kena'an. vayishlekhu kal ha'eidah vaydaberu 'el benei binyamin 'asher besela' rimon vayiqre'u lahem shalom. vayashab binyamin ba'et hahi vayitenu lahem hanashim 'asher khiyu mineshei yabesh gil'ad velo maze'u lahem ken. veha'am nikham lebinyamin ki 'asah ihoh perez beshibtei yisra'el. vayomeru ziqnei ha'eidah mah na'aseh lanotarim lenashim ki nishmedah mibinyamin 'ishah. vayomeru yerushat peleitah lebinyamin velo yimakheh sheibet miyisra'el. va'anakhnu lo nukhal latet lahem nashim mibenoteinu ki nishbe'u benei yisra'el leimor 'arur noten 'ishah lebinyamin. vayomeru hineh khag ihoh beshilo miyamim yamimah 'asher mizefonah lebet 'el mizrekhah hashemesh limsilah ha'olah mibet 'el shekhemah uminegeb lilbonah. vayzav vayzavu 'et benei binyamin leimor lekhu va'arabtem bakeramim. ure'item vehineh 'im yeize'u benot shilo lakhul bamekholot vizatem min hakeramim vakhataftem lakhem 'ish 'ishto mibenot shilo vahalakhtem 'erez binyamin. vehayah ki yabo'u 'abotam 'o 'akheihem larob larib 'eileinu ve'amarnu 'aleihem khanunu 'otam ki lo laqakhnu 'ish 'ishto bamilkhamah ki lo 'atem netatem lahem ka'et te'shamu. vaya'asu khen benei binyamin vayis'u nashim lemisparam min hamekholelot 'asher gazalu vayeilekhu vayashubu 'el nakhalatam vayibnu 'et he'arim vayeishebu bahem. vayithalekhu misham benei yisra'el ba'et hahi 'ish leshibto ulemishpakhto vayeize'u misham 'ish lenakhalato. bayamim hahem 'en melekh beyisra'el 'ish hayashar be'einav ya'aseh.

vayhi 'ish 'ekhad min haramatayim zofim meihar 'efrayim ushemo 'elqanah ben yerokham ben 'elihu ben tokhu ben zuf 'efrati. velo shetei nashim shem 'akhat khanah veshem hasheinit peninah vayhi lifninah yeladim ulekhanah 'en yeladim. ve'alah ha'ish hahu mei'iro miyamim yamimah lehishtakhavot velizboakh ihoh zeba'ot beshiloh vesham shenei benei 'eili khafeni ufinkhas kohanim ihoh. vayhi hayom vayizbakh 'elqanah venatan lifninah 'ishto ulekhal baneha ubenoteha manot. ulekhanah yiten manah 'akhat 'apayim ki 'et khanah 'aheb ihoh sagar rakhmah. vekhi'asatah zaratah gam ka'as ba'abur harre'imah ki sagar ihoh be'ad rakhmah. vekhen ya'aseh shanah beshanah midei 'alotah bebet ihoh ken takh'isenah vatibkeh velo tokhal. vayomer lah 'elqanah 'ishah khanah lameh tibki velameh lo tokheli velameh yeira' lebabekh halo 'anokhi tob lakh mei'asarah banim. vataqam khanah 'akharei 'akhelah beshiloh ve'akharei shatoh ve'eili hakohen yosheb 'al hakisei 'al mezuzat heikhal ihoh. vehi marat nafesh vatitpalel 'al ihoh ubakhoh tibkeh. vatidor neder vatomar ihoh zeba'ot 'im ra'oh tir'eh ba'oni 'amatekha uzekhartani velo tishkakh 'et 'amatekha venatatah la'amatekha zera' 'anashim unetativ ihoh kal yemei khayav umorah lo ya'aleh 'al rosho. vehayah ki hirbetah lehitpalel lifnei ihoh ve'eili shomer 'et piha. vekhanah hi medaberet 'al libah raq sefateha na'ot veqolah lo yishameia' vayakhshebeha 'eili leshikorah. vayomer 'eileha 'eili 'ad matai tishtakarin hasiri 'et yeinekh mei'alayikh. vata'an khanah vatomer lo 'adoni 'ishah qeshat ruakh 'anokhi veyayin vesheikhar lo shatiti va'eshpokh 'et nafshi lifnei ihoh. 'al titen 'et 'amatekha lifnei bat beliya'al ki meirob sikhi vekha'si dibarti 'ad henah. vaya'an 'eili vayomer lekhi leshalom veilohei yisra'el yiten 'et sheilatekh 'asher sha'alt mei'imo. vatomer timza shifkhatekha khen be'einekha vateilekh ha'ishah ledarkah vatokhal ufaneha lo hayu lah 'od. vayashkimu baboqer vayishtakhavu lifnei ihoh vayashubu vayabo'u 'el beitam haramatah vayeida' 'elqanah 'et khanah 'ishto vayizkereha ihoh. vayhi litqufot hayamim vatahar khanah vateiled ben vatiqra 'et shemo shemu'el ki ihoh she'iltiv. vaya'al ha'ish 'elqanah vekhal beito lizboakh ihoh 'et zebakh hayamim ve'et nidro. vekhanah lo 'alatah ki 'amerah le'ishah 'ad yigamel hana'ar vahabi'otiv venir'ah 'et penei ihoh veyashab sham 'ad 'olam. vayomer lah 'elqanah 'ishah 'asi hatob be'einayikh shebi 'ad gamelekh 'oto 'akh yaqem ihoh 'et debaro vateisheb ha'ishah vateineq 'et benah 'ad gamelah 'oto. vata'aleihu 'imah ka'asher gemalatu befarim sheloshah ve'eifah 'akhat qemakh veneibel yayin vatebi'eihu bet ihoh shilo vehana'ar na'ar. vayishkhatu 'et hapar vayabi'u 'et hana'ar 'el 'eili. vatomer bi 'adoni khei nafshekha 'adoni 'ani ha'ishah hanizebet 'imekhah bazeh lehitpalel 'el ihoh. 'el hana'ar hazeh hitpalaleti vayiten ihoh li 'et she'eilati 'asher sha'alti mei'imo. vegam 'anokhi hish'iltihu ihoh kal hayamim 'asher hayah hu sha'ul ihoh vayishtakhu sham ihoh. vatitpalel khanah vatomar 'alaz libi ihoh ramah qarni ihoh rakhab pi 'al 'oybai ki samakhti bishu'atekha. 'en qadosh ihoh ki 'en biltekha ve'en zur keiloheinu. 'al tarbu tedaberu gebohah gebohah yeizei 'ataq mipikhem ki 'el dei'ot ihoh velo velo nitkenu 'alilot. qeshet giborim khatim venikhshalim 'azeru khayil. sebei'im balekhem niskaru ure'eibim khadelu 'ad 'aqarah yaledah shib'ah verabat banim 'umlalah. ihoh meimit umekhayeh morid she'ol vaya'al. ihoh morish uma'ashir mashpil 'af meromem. meiqim mei'afar dal mei'ashpot yarim 'ebyon lehoshib 'im nedibim vekhisei khabod yankhilem ki ihoh mezuqei 'erez vayashet 'aleihem teibel. raglei khasido khasidav yishmor uresha'im bakhoshekh yidamu ki lo bekhoakh yigbar 'ish. ihoh yeikhatu meribo meribav 'alo 'alav bashamayim yar'em ihoh yadin 'afsei 'arez veyiten 'oz lemalko veyarem qeren meshikho. vayeilekh 'elqanah haramatah 'al beito vehana'ar hayah mesharet 'et ihoh 'et penei 'eili hakohen. ubenei 'eili benei beliya'al lo yade'u 'et ihoh. umishpat hakohanim 'et ha'am kal 'ish zobeiakh zebakh uba na'ar hakohen kebashel habasar vehamazleg shelosh hashinayim beyado. vehikah bakiyor 'o badud 'o baqalakhat 'o baparur kol 'asher ya'aleh hamazleg yiqakh hakohen bo kakhah ya'asu lekhal yisra'el haba'im sham beshiloh. gam beterem yaqtirun 'et hakheileb uba na'ar hakohen ve'amar la'ish hazobeiakh tenah basar lizlot lakohen velo yiqakh mimekha basar mebushal ki 'im khai. vayomer 'eilav ha'ish qater yaqtirun kayom hakheileb veqakh lekha ka'asher te'aveh nafshekha ve'amar lo lo ki 'atah titen ve'im lo laqakhti bekhazeqah. vatehi khatat hane'arim gedolah me'od 'et penei ihoh ki ni'azu ha'anashim 'et minkhat ihoh. ushemu'el mesharet 'et penei ihoh na'ar khagur 'eifod bad. ume'il qaton ta'aseh lo 'imo veha'altah lo miyamim yamimah ba'alotah 'et 'ishah lizboakh 'et zebakh hayamim. ubeirakh 'eili 'et 'elqanah ve'et 'ishto ve'amar yasem ihoh lekha zera' min ha'ishah hazot takhat hashe'eilah 'asher sha'al ihoh vehalekhu limqomo. ki faqad ihoh 'et khanah vatahar vateiled sheloshah banim ushetei banot vayigdal hana'ar shemu'el 'im ihoh. ve'eili zaqen me'od veshama' 'et kal 'asher ya'asun banav lekhal yisra'el ve'et 'asher yishkebun 'et hanashim hazobe'ot petakh 'ohel mo'ed. vayomer lahem lamah ta'asun kadebarim ha'eleh 'asher 'anokhi shomeia' 'et dibreikhem ra'im mei'et kal ha'am 'eleh. 'al banai ki lo tobah hashemu'ah 'asher 'anokhi shomeia' ma'abirim 'am ihoh. 'im yekheta 'ish le'ish ufilo 'elohim ve'im ihoh yekheta 'ish mi yitpalel lo velo yishme'u leqol 'abihem ki khafez ihoh lahamitam. vehana'ar shemu'el holekh vegadel vatob gam 'im ihoh vegam 'im 'anashim. vayabo 'ish 'elohim 'el 'eili vayomer 'eilav koh 'amar ihoh hanigloh nigleiti 'el bet 'abikha bihyotam bemizrayim lebet par'oh. ubakhor 'oto mikal shibtei yisra'el li lekhohen la'alot 'al mizbekhi lehaqtir qetoret laset 'eifod lefanai va'etenah lebet 'abikha 'et kal 'ishei benei yisra'el. lamah tib'atu bezibkhi ubeminkhati 'asher ziviti ma'on vatekhabed 'et banekha mimeni lehabri'akhem meireishit kal minkhat yisra'el le'ami. lakhen ne'um ihoh 'elohei yisra'el 'amor 'amarti beitekha ubet 'abikha yithalekhu lefanai 'ad 'olam ve'atah ne'um ihoh khalilah li ki mekhabedai 'akhabed ubozai yeiqalu. hineh yamim ba'im vegada'ti 'et zero'akha ve'et zeroa' bet 'abikha mihyot zaqen bebeitekha. vehibata zar ma'on bekhol 'asher yeitib 'et yisra'el velo yihyeh zaqen bebeitekha kal hayamim. ve'ish lo 'akhrit lekha mei'im mizbekhi lekhalot 'et 'einekha vela'adib 'et nafshekha vekhal marbit beitekha yamutu 'anashim. vezeh lekha ha'ot 'asher yabo 'el shenei banekha 'el khafeni ufinekhas beyom 'ekhad yamutu sheneihem. vahaqimoti li kohen ne'eman ka'asher bilbabi ubenafshi ya'aseh ubaniti lo bayit ne'eman vehthalekh lifnei meshikhi kal hayamim. vehayah kal hanotar bebeitekha yabo lehishtakhavot lo la'agorat kesef vekhikar lakhem ve'amar sefakheini na 'el 'akhat hakehunot le'ekhol pat lakhem. vehana'ar shemu'el mesharet 'et ihoh lifnei 'eili udebar ihoh hayah yaqar bayamim hahem 'en khazon nifraz. vayhi bayom hahu ve'eili shokheb bimqomo ve'eino ve'einav heikhelu kheihot lo yukhal lir'ot. vener 'elohim terem yikhbeh ushemu'el shokheb beheikhal ihoh 'asher sham 'aron 'elohim. vayiqra ihoh 'el shemu'el vayomer hineini. vayaraz 'el 'eili vayomer hini ki qarata li vayomer lo qarati shub shekhab vayeilekh vayishkab. vayosef ihoh qero 'od shemu'el vayaqam shemu'el vayeilekh 'el 'eili vayomer hini ki qarata li vayomer lo qarati beni shub shekhab. ushemu'el terem yada' 'et ihoh veterem yigaleh 'eilav debar ihoh. vayosef ihoh qero shemu'el bashelishit vayaqam vayeilekh 'el 'eili vayomer hini ki qarata li vayaben 'eili ki ihoh qorei lana'ar. vayomer 'eili lishmu'el lekh shekhab vehayah 'im yiqra 'eilekha ve'amarta daber ihoh ki shomeia' 'abdekha vayeilekh shemu'el vayishkab bimqomo. vayabo ihoh vayityazab vayiqra khefa'am befa'am shemu'el shemu'el vayomer shemu'el daber ki shomeia' 'abdekha. vayomer ihoh 'el shemu'el hineh 'anokhi 'oseh dabar beyisra'el 'asher kal shome'o tezilenah shetei 'azenav. bayom hahu 'aqim 'el 'eili 'et kal 'asher dibarti 'el beito hakhel vekhaleh. vehigadti lo ki shofet 'ani 'et beito 'ad 'olam ba'avon 'asher yada' ki meqalim lahem banav velo khihah bam. velakhen nishba'ti lebet 'eili 'im yitkaper 'avon bet 'eili bezebakh ubeminkhah 'ad 'olam. vayishkab shemu'el 'ad haboqer vayiftakh 'et daltot bet ihoh ushemu'el yarei meihagid 'et hamar'ah 'el 'eili. vayiqra 'eili 'et shemu'el vayomer shemu'el beni vayomer hineini. vayomer mah hadabar 'asher diber 'eilekha 'al na tekhakhed mimeni koh ya'aseh lekha 'elohim vekhoh yosif 'im tekhakhed mimeni dabar mikal hadabar 'asher diber 'eilekha. vayaged lo shemu'el 'et kal hadebarim velo khikhed mimenu vayomar ihoh hu hatob be'einav ya'aseh. vayigdal shemu'el ihoh hayah 'imo velo hipil mikal debarav 'arezah. vayeida' kal yisra'el midan ve'ad be'er shaba' ki ne'eman shemu'el lenabi ihoh. vayosef ihoh leheira'oh beshiloh ki niglah ihoh 'el shemu'el beshilo bidbar ihoh. vayhi debar shemu'el lekhal yisra'el vayeizei yisra'el liqrat pelishtim lamilkhamah vayakhanu 'al ha'eben ha'eizer ufelishtim khanu ba'afeq. vaya'arkhu felishtim liqrat yisra'el vatitosh hamilkhamah vayinagef yisra'el lifnei felishtim vayaku bama'arakhah basadeh ke'arba'at 'alafim 'ish. vayabo ha'am 'el hamakhaneh vayomeru ziqnei yisra'el lamah negafanu ihoh hayom lifnei felishtim niqkhah 'eileinu mishiloh 'et 'aron berit ihoh veyabo beqirbeinu veyoshi'einu mikaf 'oyebeinu. vayishlakh ha'am shiloh vayis'u misham 'et 'aron berit ihoh zeba'ot yosheb hakerubim vesham shenei benei 'eili 'im 'aron berit ha'elohim khafeni ufinekhas. vayhi kebo 'aron berit ihoh 'el hamakhaneh vayari'u khal yisra'el teru'ah gedolah vateihom ha'arez. vayishme'u felishtim 'et qol hateru'ah vayomeru meh qol hateru'ah hagedolah hazot bemakhaneh ha'ibrim vayeide'u ki 'aron ihoh ba 'el hamakhaneh. vayir'u hapelishtim ki 'ameru ba 'elohim 'el hamakhaneh vayomeru 'o lanu ki lo hayetah kazot 'etmol shilshom. 'o lanu mi yazileinu miyad ha'elohim ha'adirim ha'eleh 'eleh hem ha'elohim hamakim 'et mizrayim bekhal makah bamidbar. hitkhazequ vihyu la'anashim pelishtim pen ta'abdu la'ibrim ka'asher 'abedu lakhem vihyitem la'anashim venilkhamtem. vayilakhamu felishtim vayinagef yisra'el vayanusu 'ish le'ohalav vatehi hamakah gedolah me'od vayipol miyisra'el sheloshim 'elef ragli. va'aron 'elohim nilqakh ushenei benei 'eili meitu khafeni ufinekhas. vayaraz 'ish binyamin meihama'arakhah vayabo shiloh bayom hahu umadav qeru'im va'adamah 'al rosho. vayabo vehineh 'eili yosheb 'al hakisei yakh yad derekh mezapeh ki hayah libo khared 'al 'aron ha'elohim veha'ish ba lehagid ba'ir vatiz'aq kal ha'ir. vayishma' 'eili 'et qol haze'aqah vayomer meh qol hehamon hazeh veha'ish mihar vayabo vayaged le'eili. ve'eili ben tish'im ushemoneh shanah ve'einav qamah velo yakhol lir'ot. vayomer ha'ish 'el 'eili 'anokhi haba min hama'arakhah va'ani min hama'arakhah nasti hayom vayomer meh hayah hadabar beni. vaya'an hambaser vayomer nas yisra'el lifnei felishtim vegam mageifah gedolah hayetah ba'am vegam shenei banekha meitu khafeni ufinekhas va'aron ha'elohim nilqakhah. vayhi kehazkiro 'et 'aron ha'elohim vayipol mei'al hakisei 'akhoranit be'ad yad hasha'ar vatishaber mafraqto vayamot ki zaqen ha'ish vekhabed vehu shafat 'et yisra'el 'arba'im shanah. vekhalato 'eishet pinekhas harah lalat vatishma' 'et hashemu'ah 'el hilaqakh 'aron ha'elohim umet khamiha ve'ishah vatikhra' vateiled ki nehefkhu 'aleha zireha. ukhe'et mutah vatedabeirenah hanizabot 'aleha 'al tire'i ki ben yaladet velo 'anetah velo shatah libah. vatiqra lana'ar 'i khabod leimor galah khabod miyisra'el 'el hilaqakh 'aron ha'elohim ve'el khamiha ve'ishah. vatomer galah khabod miyisra'el ki nilqakh 'aron ha'elohim. ufelishtim laqekhu 'et 'aron ha'elohim vaybi'uhu mei'eben ha'eizer 'ashdodah. vayiqkhu felishtim 'et 'aron ha'elohim vayabi'u 'oto bet dagon vayazigu 'oto 'eizel dagon. vayashkimu 'ashdodim mimakhorat vehineh dagon nofel lefanav 'arzah lifnei 'aron ihoh vayiqkhu 'et dagon vayashibu 'oto limqomo. vayashkimu baboqer mimakhorat vehineh dagon nofel lefanav 'arzah lifnei 'aron ihoh verosh dagon ushetei kapot yadav kerutot 'el hamiftan raq dagon nish'ar 'alav. 'al ken lo yidrekhu khohanei dagon vekhal haba'im bet dagon 'al miftan dagon be'ashdod 'ad hayom hazeh. vatikhbad yad ihoh 'el ha'ashdodim vayshimem vayakh 'otam ba'ofalim batekhorim 'et 'ashdod ve'et gebuleha. vayir'u 'anshei 'ashdod ki khen ve'ameru lo yeisheb 'aron 'elohei yisra'el 'imanu ki qashetah yado 'aleinu ve'al dagon 'eloheinu. vayishlekhu vaya'asfu 'et kal sarnei felishtim 'aleihem vayomeru mah na'aseh la'aron 'elohei yisra'el vayomeru gat yisob 'aron 'elohei yisra'el vayasebu 'et 'aron 'elohei yisra'el. vayhi 'akharei heisabu 'oto vatehi yad ihoh ba'ir mehumah gedolah me'od vayakh 'et 'anshei ha'ir miqaton ve'ad gadol vayisateru lahem 'ofalim tekhorim. vayshalekhu 'et 'aron ha'elohim 'eqron vayhi kebo 'aron ha'elohim 'eqron vayiz'aqu ha'eqronim leimor heisabu 'eilai 'et 'aron 'elohei yisra'el lahamiteini ve'et 'ami. vayishlekhu vaya'asfu 'et kal sarnei felishtim vayomeru shalekhu 'et 'aron 'elohei yisra'el veyashob limqomo velo yamit 'oti ve'et 'ami ki hayetah mehumat mavet bekhal ha'ir kabedah me'od yad ha'elohim sham. veha'anashim 'asher lo meitu huku ba'ofalim batekhorim vata'al shav'at ha'ir hashamayim. vayhi 'aron ihoh bisdeh felishtim shib'ah khodashim. vayiqre'u felishtim lakohanim velaqosemim leimor mah na'aseh la'aron ihoh hodi'unu bameh neshalekhenu limqomo. vayomeru 'im meshalekhim 'et 'aron 'elohei yisra'el 'al teshalekhu 'oto reiqam ki hasheb tashibu lo 'asham 'az teirafe'u venoda' lakhem lamah lo tasur yado mikem. vayomeru mah ha'asham 'asher nashib lo vayomeru mispar sarnei felishtim khamishah 'afelei tekhorei zahab vakhamishah 'akhberei zahab ki mageifah 'akhat lekhulam ulesarneikhem. va'asitem zalmei 'afeleikhem tekhoreikhem vezalmei 'akhbereikhem hamashkhitim 'et ha'arez unetatem leilohei yisra'el kabod 'ulai yaqel 'et yado mei'aleikhem umei'al 'eloheikhem umei'al 'arzekhem. velamah tekhabedu 'et lebabkhem ka'asher kibedu mizrayim ufar'oh 'et libam halo ka'asher hit'alel bahem vayshalekhum vayeileikhu. ve'atah qekhu va'asu 'agalah khadashah 'ekhat ushetei farot 'alot 'asher lo 'alah 'aleihem 'ol va'asartem 'et haparot ba'agalah vahasheibotem beneihem mei'akhareihem habayetah. uleqakhtem 'et 'aron ihoh unetatem 'oto 'el ha'agalah ve'et kelei hazahab 'asher hasheibotem lo 'asham tasimu ba'argaz mizido veshilakhtem 'oto vehalakh. ure'item 'im derekh gebulo ya'aleh bet shemesh hu 'asah lanu 'et hara'ah hagedolah hazot ve'im lo veyada'nu ki lo yado nage'ah banu miqreh hu hayah lanu. vaya'asu ha'anashim ken vayiqkhu shetei farot 'alot vaya'asrum ba'agalah ve'et beneihem kalu babayit. vayasimu 'et 'aron ihoh 'el ha'agalah ve'et ha'argaz ve'et 'akhberei hazahab ve'et zalmei tekhoreihem. vayisharnah haparot baderekh 'al derekh bet shemesh bimsilah 'akhat halekhu halokh vega'o velo saru yamin usemol vesarnei felishtim holekhim 'akhareihem 'ad gebul bet shamesh. ubet shemesh qozerim qezir khitim ba'eimeq vayis'u 'et 'eineihem vayir'u 'et ha'aron vayismekhu lir'ot. veha'agalah ba'ah 'el sedeh yehoshua' bet hashimshi vata'amod sham vesham 'eben gedolah vaybaqe'u 'et 'azei ha'agalah ve'et haparot he'elu 'olah ihoh. vehalviyim horidu 'et 'aron ihoh ve'et ha'argaz 'asher 'ito 'asher bo khelei zahab vayasimu 'el ha'eben hagedolah ve'anshei bet shemesh he'elu 'olot vayizbekhu zebakhim bayom hahu ihoh. vakhamishah sarnei felishtim ra'u vayashubu 'eqron bayom hahu. ve'eleh tekhorei hazahab 'asher heishibu felishtim 'asham ihoh le'ashdod 'ekhad le'azah 'ekhad le'ashqelon 'ekhad legat 'ekhad le'eqron 'ekhad. ve'akhberei hazahab mispar kal 'arei felishtim lakhameishet haseranim mei'ir mibzar ve'ad kofer haperazi ve'ad 'abel hagedolah 'asher hinikhu 'aleha 'et 'aron ihoh 'ad hayom hazeh bisdeh yehoshua' bet hashimshi. vayakh be'anshei bet shemesh ki ra'u ba'aron ihoh vayakh ba'am shib'im 'ish khamishim 'elef 'ish vayit'abelu ha'am ki hikah ihoh ba'am makah gedolah vayomeru 'anshei bet shemesh mi yukhal la'amod lifnei ihoh ha'elohim haqadosh hazeh ve'el mi ya'aleh mei'aleinu. vayishlekhu mal'akhim 'el yoshebei qiryat ye'arim leimor heishibu felishtim 'et 'aron ihoh redu ha'alu 'oto 'aleikhem. vayabo'u 'anshei qiryat ye'arim vaya'alu 'et 'aron ihoh vayabi'u 'oto 'el bet 'abinadab bagib'ah ve'et 'el'azar beno qideshu lishmor 'et 'aron ihoh. vayhi miyom shebet ha'aron beqiryat ye'arim vayirbu hayamim vayihyu 'esrim shanah vayinahu kal bet yisra'el 'akharei ihoh. vayomer shemu'el 'el kal bet yisra'el leimor 'im bekhal lebabkhem 'atem shabim 'el ihoh hasiru 'et 'elohei haneikhar mitokhkhem veha'ashtarot vehakhinu lebabkhem 'el ihoh ve'ibduhu lebado veyazel 'etkhem miyad pelishtim. vayasiru benei yisra'el 'et habe'alim ve'et ha'ashtarot vaya'abdu 'et ihoh lebado. vayomer shemu'el qibzu 'et kal yisra'el hamizpatah ve'etpalel ba'adkhem 'el ihoh. vayiqabezu hamizpatah vayish'abu mayim vayishpekhu lifnei ihoh vayazumu bayom hahu vayomeru sham khatanu ihoh vayishpot shemu'el 'et benei yisra'el bamizpah. vayishme'u felishtim ki hitqabezu benei yisra'el hamizpatah vaya'alu sarnei felishtim 'el yisra'el vayishme'u benei yisra'el vayir'u mipenei felishtim. vayomeru benei yisra'el 'el shemu'el 'al takharesh mimenu mize'oq 'el ihoh 'eloheinu veyoshi'einu miyad pelishtim. vayiqakh shemu'el teleh khalab 'ekhad vaya'aleh vaya'aleihu 'olah kalil ihoh vayiz'aq shemu'el 'el ihoh be'ad yisra'el vaya'aneihu ihoh. vayhi shemu'el ma'aleh ha'olah ufelishtim nigeshu lamilkhamah beyisra'el vayar'em ihoh beqol gadol bayom hahu 'al pelishtim vayhumem vayinagefu lifnei yisra'el. vayeize'u 'anshei yisra'el min hamizpah vayirdefu 'et pelishtim vayakum 'ad mitakhat lebet kar. vayiqakh shemu'el 'eben 'akhat vayasem ben hamizpah uben hashen vayiqra 'et shemah 'eben ha'azer vayomar 'ad henah 'azaranu ihoh. vayikane'u hapelishtim velo yasefu 'od labo bigbul yisra'el vatehi yad ihoh bapelishtim kol yemei shemu'el. vatashobenah he'arim 'asher laqekhu felishtim mei'et yisra'el leyisra'el mei'eqron ve'ad gat ve'et gebulan hizil yisra'el miyad pelishtim vayhi shalom ben yisra'el uben ha'emori. vayishpot shemu'el 'et yisra'el kol yemei khayav. vehalakh midei shanah beshanah vesabab bet 'el vehagilgal vehamizpah veshafat 'et yisra'el 'et kal hameqomot ha'eleh. uteshubato haramatah ki sham beito vesham shafat 'et yisra'el vayiben sham mizbeiakh ihoh. vayhi ka'asher zaqen shemu'el vayasem 'et banav shofetim leyisra'el. vayhi shem beno habekhor yo'el veshem mishneihu 'abiyah shofetim bib'er shaba'. velo halekhu banav bedarkho bidrakhav vayitu 'akharei habaza' vayiqkhu shokhad vayatu mishpat. vayitqabezu kol ziqnei yisra'el vayabo'u 'el shemu'el haramatah. vayomeru 'eilav hineh 'atah zaqanta ubanekha lo halekhu bidrakhekha 'atah simah lanu melekh leshafeteinu kekhal hagoyim. vayeira' hadabar be'einei shemu'el ka'asher 'ameru tenah lanu melekh leshafeteinu vayitpalel shemu'el 'el ihoh. vayomer ihoh 'el shemu'el shema' beqol ha'am lekhol 'asher yomeru 'eilekha ki lo 'otekha ma'asu ki 'oti ma'asu mimelokh 'aleihem. kekhal hama'asim 'asher 'asu miyom ha'aloti 'otam mimizrayim ve'ad hayom hazeh vaya'azbuni vaya'abdu 'elohim 'akheirim ken hemah 'osim gam lakh. ve'atah shema' beqolam 'akh ki ha'ed ta'id bahem vehigadta lahem mishpat hamelekh 'asher yimlokh 'aleihem. vayomer shemu'el 'et kal dibrei ihoh 'el ha'am hasho'alim mei'ito melekh. vayomer zeh yihyeh mishpat hamelekh 'asher yimlokh 'aleikhem 'et beneikhem yiqakh vesam lo bemerkabto ubefarashav verazu lifnei merkabto. velasum lo sarei 'alafim vesarei khamishim velakharosh kharisho veliqzor qeziro vela'asot kelei milkhamto ukhelei rikhbo. ve'et benoteikhem yiqakh leraqakhot uletabakhot ule'ofot. ve'ets doteikhem ve'et karmeikhem vezeiteikhem hatobim yiqakh venatan la'abadav. vezar'eikhem vekharmeikhem ya'sor venatan lesarisav vela'abadav. ve'et 'abdeikhem ve'et shifkhoteikhem ve'et bakhureikhem hatobim ve'et khamoreikhem yiqakh ve'asah limlakhto. zonekhem ya'sor ve'atem tihyu lo la'abadim. uze'aqtem bayom hahu milifnei malkekhem 'asher bekhartem lakhem velo ya'aneh ihoh 'etkhem bayom hahu. vayma'anu ha'am lishmoa' beqol shemu'el vayomeru lo ki 'im melekh yihyeh 'aleinu. vehayinu gam 'anakhnu kekhal hagoyim ushefatanu malkeinu veyaza lefaneinu venilkham 'et milkhamoteinu. vayishma' shemu'el 'et kal dibrei ha'am vaydaberem be'azenei ihoh. vayomer ihoh 'el shemu'el shema' beqolam vehimlakhta lahem melekh vayomer shemu'el 'el 'anshei yisra'el lekhu 'ish le'iro. vayhi 'ish mibin yamin mibinyamin ushemo qish ben 'abi'el ben zeror ben bekhorat ben 'afiakh ben 'ish yemini gibor khayil. velo hayah ben ushemo sha'ul bakhur vatob ve'en 'ish mibenei yisra'el tob mimenu mishikhmo vama'lah gaboah mikal ha'am. vatobadnah ha'atonot leqish 'abi sha'ul vayomer qish 'el sha'ul beno qakh na 'itekha 'et 'akhad meihane'arim vequm lekh baqesh 'et ha'atonot. vaya'abor behar 'efrayim vaya'abor be'erez shalishah velo maza'u vaya'abru be'erez sha'alim va'ayin vaya'abor be'erez yemini velo maza'u. hemah ba'u be'erez zuf vesha'ul 'amar lena'aro 'asher 'imo lekhah venashubah pen yekhdal 'abi min ha'atonot veda'ag lanu. vayomer lo hineh na 'ish 'elohim ba'ir hazot veha'ish nikhbad kol 'asher yedaber bo yabo 'atah neilakhah sham 'ulai yagid lanu 'et darkeinu 'asher halakhnu 'aleha. vayomer sha'ul lena'aro vehineh neilekh umah nabi la'ish ki halekhem 'azal mikeileinu uteshurah 'en lehabi le'ish ha'elohim mah 'itanu. vayosef hana'ar la'anot 'et sha'ul vayomer hineh nimza beyadi reba' sheqel kasef venatati le'ish ha'elohim vehigid lanu 'et darkeinu. lefanim beyisra'el koh 'amar ha'ish belekhto lidrosh 'elohim lekhu veneilekhah 'ad haro'eh ki lanabi hayom yiqarei lefanim haro'eh. vayomer sha'ul lena'aro tob debarekha lekhah neileikhah vayeilekhu 'el ha'ir 'asher sham 'ish ha'elohim. hemah 'olim bema'aleh ha'ir vehemah maze'u ne'arot yoze'ot lish'ob mayim vayomeru lahen hayesh bazeh haro'eh. vata'anenah 'otam vatomarnah yesh hineh lefanekha maher 'atah ki hayom ba la'ir ki zebakh hayom la'am babamah. kebo'akhem ha'ir ken timze'un 'oto beterem ya'aleh habamatah le'ekhol ki lo yokhal ha'am 'ad bo'o ki hu yebarekh hazebakh 'akharei khen yokhelu haqeru'im ve'atah 'alu ki 'oto khehayom timze'un 'oto. vaya'alu ha'ir hemah ba'im betokh ha'ir vehineh shemu'el yozei liqratam la'alot habamah. ihoh galah 'et 'ozen shemu'el yom 'ekhad lifnei bo sha'ul leimor. ka'et makhar 'eshlakh 'eilekha 'ish mei'erez binyamin umeshakhto lenagid 'al 'ami yisra'el vehoshia' 'et 'ami miyad pelishtim ki ra'iti 'et 'ami ki ba'ah za'aqato 'eilai. ushemu'el ra'ah 'et sha'ul ihoh 'anahu hineh ha'ish 'asher 'amarti 'eilekha zeh ya'zor be'ami. vayigash sha'ul 'et shemu'el betokh hasha'ar vayomer hagidah na li 'ei zeh bet haro'eh. vaya'an shemu'el 'et sha'ul vayomer 'anokhi haro'eh 'aleh lefanai habamah va'akhaltem 'imi hayom veshilakhtikha baboqer vekhol 'asher bilbabekha 'agid lakh. vela'atonot ha'obedot lekha hayom sheloshet hayamim 'al tasem 'et libekha lahem ki nimza'u ulemi kal khemdat yisra'el halo lekha ulekhol bet 'abikha. vaya'an sha'ul vayomer halo ben yemini 'anokhi miqatanei shibtei yisra'el umishpakhti haze'irah mikal mishpekhot shibtei binyamin velamah dibarta 'eilai kadabar hazeh. vayiqakh shemu'el 'et sha'ul ve'et na'aro vaybi'em lishkatah vayiten lahem maqom berosh haqeru'im vehemah kishloshim 'ish. vayomer shemu'el latabakh tenah 'et hamanah 'asher natati lakh 'asher 'amarti 'eilekha sim 'otah 'imakh. vayarem hatabakh 'et hashoq vehe'aleha vayasem lifnei sha'ul vayomer hineh hanish'ar sim lefanekha 'ekhol ki lamo'ed shamur lekha leimor ha'am qarati vayokhal sha'ul 'im shemu'el bayom hahu. vayeiredu meihabamah ha'ir vaydaber 'im sha'ul 'al hagag. vayashkimu vayhi ka'alot hashakhar vayiqra shemu'el 'el sha'ul hagag hagagah leimor qumah va'ashalekheka vayaqam sha'ul vayeize'u sheneihem hu ushemu'el hakhuzah. hemah yordim biqzeh ha'ir ushemu'el 'amar 'el sha'ul 'emor lana'ar veya'abor lefaneinu vaya'abor ve'atah 'amod kayom ve'ashmi'akha 'et debar 'elohim. vayiqakh shemu'el 'et pakh hashemen vayizoq 'al rosho vayishaqeihu vayomer halo ki meshakhakha ihoh 'al nakhalato lenagid. belekhtekha hayom mei'imadi umazata shenei 'anashim 'im qeburat rakhel bigbul binyamin bezelzakh ve'ameru 'eilekha nimze'u ha'atonot 'asher halakhta lebaqesh vehineh natash 'abikha 'et dibrei ha'atonot veda'ag lakhem leimor mah 'e'eseh libni. vekhalafta misham vahale'ah ubata 'ad 'eilon tabor umeza'ukha sham sheloshah 'anashim 'olim 'el ha'elohim bet 'el 'ekhad nosei sheloshah gedayim ve'ekhad nosei sheloshet kikerot lekhem ve'ekhad nosei neibel yayin. vesha'alu lekha leshalom venatenu lekha shetei lekhem velaqakhta miyadam. 'akhar ken tabo gib'at ha'elohim 'asher sham nezibei felishtim vihi khebo'akha sham ha'ir ufaga'ta khebel nebi'im yoredim meihabamah velifneihem neibel vetof vekhalil vekhinor vehemah mitnabe'im. vezalekhah 'alekha ruakh ihoh vehitnabita 'imam venehpakhta le'ish 'akher. vehayah ki tebo'enah tabonah ha'otot ha'eleh lakh 'aseh lekha 'asher timza yadekha ki ha'elohim 'imakh. veyaradta lefanai hagilgal vehineh 'anokhi yored 'eilekha leha'alot 'olot lizboakh zibkhei shelamim shib'at yamim tokhel 'ad bo'i 'eilekha vehoda'ti lekha 'et 'asher ta'aseh. vehayah kehafnoto shikhmo lalekhet mei'im shemu'el vayahafakh lo 'elohim leb 'akher vayabo'u kal ha'otot ha'eleh bayom hahu. vayabo'u sham hagib'atah vehineh khebel nebi'im liqrato vatizlakh 'alav ruakh 'elohim vayitnabei betokham. vayhi kal yod'o mei'itemol shilshom vayir'u vehineh 'im nebi'im niba vayomer ha'am 'ish 'el rei'eihu mah zeh hayah leben qish hagam sha'ul banebi'im. vaya'an 'ish misham vayomer umi 'abihem 'al ken hayetah lemashal hagam sha'ul banebi'im. vaykhal meihitnabot vayabo habamah. vayomer dod sha'ul 'eilav ve'el na'aro 'an halakhtem vayomer lebaqesh 'et ha'atonot vanir'eh khi 'ayin vanabo 'el shemu'el. vayomer dod sha'ul hagidah na li mah 'amar lakhem shemu'el. vayomer sha'ul 'el dodo haged higid lanu ki nimze'u ha'atonot ve'et debar hamelukhah lo higid lo 'asher 'amar shemu'el. vayaz'eq shemu'el 'et ha'am 'el ihoh hamizpah. vayomer 'el benei yisra'el koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el 'anokhi he'eleiti 'et yisra'el mimizrayim va'azil 'etkhem miyad mizrayim umiyad kal hamamlakhot halokhazim 'etkhem. ve'atem hayom me'astem 'et 'eloheikhem 'asher hu moshia' lakhem mikal ra'oteikhem vezaroteikhem vatomeru lo ki melekh tasim 'aleinu ve'atah hityazebu lifnei ihoh leshibteikhem ule'alfeikhem. vayaqreb shemu'el 'et kal shibtei yisra'el vayilakhed sheibet binyamin. vayaqreb 'et sheibet binyamin lemishpekhoto lemishpekhotav vatilakhed mishpakhat hamatri vayilakhed sha'ul ben qish vaybaqshuhu velo nimza. vayish'alu 'od ihoh haba 'od halom 'ish vayomer ihoh hineh hu nekhba 'el hakeilim. vayaruzu vayiqakhuhu misham vayityazeb betokh ha'am vayigbah mikal ha'am mishikhmo vama'elah. vayomer shemu'el 'el kal ha'am harre'item 'asher bakhar bo ihoh ki 'en kamohu bekhal ha'am vayari'u khal ha'am vayomeru yekhi hamelekh. vaydaber shemu'el 'el ha'am 'et mishpat hamelukhah vayikhtob baseifer vayanakh lifnei ihoh vayshalakh shemu'el 'et kal ha'am 'ish lebeito. vegam sha'ul halakh lebeito gib'atah vayeilekhu 'imo hakhayil 'asher naga' 'elohim belibam. ubenei beliya'al 'ameru mah yoshi'einu zeh vayibzuhu velo heibi'u lo minkhah vayhi kemakharish. vaya'al nakhash ha'amoni vayikhan 'al yabesh gil'ad vayomeru kal 'anshei yabesh 'el nakhash kerat lanu berit vena'abdeka. vayomer 'aleihem nakhash ha'amoni bezot 'ekhrot lakhem binqor lakhem kal 'en yamin vesamtiha kherpah 'al kal yisra'el. vayomeru 'eilav ziqnei yabesh heref lanu shib'at yamim venishlekhah mal'akhim bekhol gebul yisra'el ve'im 'en moshia' 'otanu veyazanu 'eilekha. vayabo'u hamal'akhim gib'at sha'ul vaydaberu hadebarim be'azenei ha'am vayis'u khal ha'am 'et qolam vayibku. vehineh sha'ul ba 'akharei habaqar min hasadeh vayomer sha'ul mah la'am ki yibku vaysaperu lo 'et dibrei 'anshei yabesh. vatizlakh ruakh 'elohim 'al sha'ul beshame'o keshame'o 'et hadebarim ha'eleh vayikhar 'apo me'od. vayiqakh zemed baqar vaynatekheihu vayshalakh bekhal gebul yisra'el beyad hamal'akhim leimor 'asher 'einenu yozei 'akharei sha'ul ve'akhar shemu'el koh yei'aseh libqaro vayipol pakhad ihoh 'al ha'am vayeize'u ke'ish 'ekhad. vayifqedem bebazeq vayihyu benei yisra'el shelosh mei'ot 'elef ve'ish yehudah sheloshim 'alef. vayomeru lamal'akhim haba'im koh tomerun le'ish yabesh gil'ad makhar tihyeh lakhem teshu'ah bekhom kekhom hashamesh vayabo'u hamal'akhim vayagidu le'anshei yabesh vayismakhu. vayomeru 'anshei yabesh makhar neizei 'aleikhem va'asitem lanu kekhal hatob be'eineikhem. vayhi mimakhorat vayasem sha'ul 'et ha'am sheloshah rashim vayabo'u betokh hamakhaneh be'ashmoret haboqer vayaku 'et 'amon 'ad khom hayom vayhi hanish'arim vayafuzu velo nish'aru bam shenayim yakhad. vayomer ha'am 'el shemu'el mi ha'omer sha'ul yimlokh 'aleinu tenu ha'anashim unemitem. vayomer sha'ul lo yumat 'ish bayom hazeh ki hayom 'asah ihoh teshu'ah beyisra'el. vayomer shemu'el 'el ha'am lekhu veneilekhah hagilgal unekhadesh sham hamelukhah. vayeilekhu khal ha'am hagilgal vayamlikhu sham 'et sha'ul lifnei ihoh bagilgal vayizbekhu sham zebakhim shelamim lifnei ihoh vayismakh sham sha'ul vekhal 'anshei yisra'el 'ad me'od. vayomer shemu'el 'el kal yisra'el hineh shama'ti beqolekhem lekhol 'asher 'amartem li va'amlikh 'aleikhem melekh. ve'atah hineh hamelekh mithalekh lifneikhem va'ani zaqanti vasabti ubanai hinam 'itekhem va'ani hithalakhti lifneikhem mine'urai 'ad hayom hazeh. hini 'anu bi neged ihoh veneged meshikho 'et shor mi laqakhti vakhamor mi laqakhti ve'et mi 'ashaqti 'et mi razoti umiyad mi laqakhti khofer ve'a'lim 'einai bo ve'ashib lakhem. vayomeru lo 'ashaqtanu velo razotanu velo laqakhta miyad 'ish me'umah. vayomer 'aleihem 'ed ihoh bakhem ve'ed meshikho hayom hazeh ki lo mezatem beyadi me'umah vayomer 'ed. vayomer shemu'el 'el ha'am ihoh 'asher 'asah 'et mosheh ve'et 'aharon va'asher he'elah 'et 'aboteikhem mei'erez mizrayim. ve'atah hityazebu ve'ishafetah 'itekhem lifnei ihoh 'et kal zidqot ihoh 'asher 'asah 'itekhem ve'et 'aboteikhem. ka'asher ba ya'aqob mizrayim vayiz'aqu 'aboteikhem 'el ihoh vayishlakh ihoh 'et mosheh ve'et 'aharon vayozi'u 'et 'aboteikhem mimizrayim vayoshibum bamaqom hazeh. vayishkekhu 'et ihoh 'eloheihem vayimkor 'otam beyad sisera sar zeba khazor ubeyad pelishtim ubeyad melekh mo'ab vayilakhamu bam. vayiz'aqu 'el ihoh vayomer vayomeru khatanu ki 'azabnu 'et ihoh vana'abod 'et habe'alim ve'et ha'ashtarot ve'atah hazileinu miyad 'oyebeinu vena'abdeka. vayishlakh ihoh 'et yeruba'al ve'et bedan ve'et yiftakh ve'et shemu'el vayazel 'etkhem miyad 'oyebeikhem misabib vateishebu betakh. vatir'u ki nakhash melekh benei 'amon ba 'aleikhem vatomeru li lo ki melekh yimlokh 'aleinu ihoh 'eloheikhem malkekhem. ve'atah hineh hamelekh 'asher bekhartem 'asher she'eltem vehineh natan ihoh 'aleikhem melekh. 'im tire'u 'et ihoh va'abadtem 'oto ushema'tem beqolo velo tamru 'et pi ihoh vihyitem gam 'atem vegam hamelekh 'asher malakh 'aleikhem 'akhar ihoh 'eloheikhem. ve'im lo tishme'u beqol ihoh umeritem 'et pi ihoh vehayetah yad ihoh bakhem uba'aboteikhem. gam 'atah hityazebu ure'u 'et hadabar hagadol hazeh 'asher ihoh 'oseh le'eineikhem. halo qezir khitim hayom 'eqra 'el ihoh veyiten qolot umatar ude'u ure'u ki ra'atkhem rabah 'asher 'asitem be'einei ihoh lish'ol lakhem melekh. vayiqra shemu'el 'el ihoh vayiten ihoh qolot umatar bayom hahu vayira khal ha'am me'od 'et ihoh ve'et shemu'el. vayomeru khal ha'am 'el shemu'el hitpalel be'ad 'abadekha 'el ihoh 'elohekha ve'al namut ki yasafnu 'al kal khatoteinu ra'ah lish'ol lanu melekh. vayomer shemu'el 'el ha'am 'al tira'u 'atem 'asitem 'et kal hara'ah hazot 'akh 'al tasuru mei'akharei ihoh va'abadtem 'et ihoh bekhal lebabkhem. velo tasuru ki 'akharei hatohu 'asher lo yo'ilu velo yazilu ki tohu hemah. ki lo yitosh ihoh 'et 'amo ba'abur shemo hagadol ki ho'il ihoh la'asot 'etkhem lo le'am. gam 'anokhi khalilah li meikhato ihoh meikhadol lehitpalel ba'adkhem vehoreiti 'etkhem bederekh hatobah vehaysharah. 'akh yer'u 'et ihoh va'abadtem 'oto be'emet bekhal lebabkhem ki re'u 'et 'asher higdil 'imakhem. ve'im hareia' tarei'u gam 'atem gam malkekhem tisafu. ben shanah sha'ul bemalekho ushetei shanim malakh 'al yisra'el. vayibkhar lo sha'ul sheloshet 'alafim miyisra'el vayihyu 'im sha'ul 'alpayim bemikhmas ubehar bet 'el ve'elef hayu 'im yonatan begib'at binyamin veyeter ha'am shilakh 'ish le'ohalav. vayakh yonatan 'et nezib pelishtim 'asher begeba' vayishme'u pelishtim vesha'ul taqa' bashofar bekhal ha'arez leimor yishme'u ha'ibrim. vekhal yisra'el shame'u leimor hikah sha'ul 'et nezib pelishtim vegam nib'ash yisra'el bapelishtim vayiza'aqu ha'am 'akharei sha'ul hagilgal. ufelishtim ne'esfu lehilakhem 'im yisra'el sheloshim 'elef rekheb vesheishet 'alafim parashim ve'am kakhol 'asher 'al sefat hayam larob vaya'alu vayakhanu bemikhmas qidmat bet 'aven. ve'ish yisra'el ra'u ki zar lo ki nigas ha'am vayitkhabe'u ha'am bame'arot ubakhavakhim ubasela'im ubazerikhim ubaborot. ve'ibrim 'aberu 'et hayarden 'erez gad vegil'ad vesha'ul 'odenu bagilgal vekhal ha'am kharedu 'akharav. vayikhel vayokhel shib'at yamim lamo'ed 'asher shemu'el velo ba shemu'el hagilgal vayafez ha'am mei'alav. vayomer sha'ul hagishu 'eilai ha'olah vehashelamim vaya'al ha'olah. vayhi kekhaloto leha'alot ha'olah vehineh shemu'el ba vayeizei sha'ul liqrato lebarakho. vayomer shemu'el meh 'asita vayomer sha'ul ki ra'iti khi nafaz ha'am mei'alai ve'atah lo bata lemo'ed hayamim ufelishtim ne'esafim mikhmas. va'omar 'atah yeiredu felishtim 'eilai hagilgal ufenei ihoh lo khiliti va'et'apaq va'a'aleh ha'olah. vayomer shemu'el 'el sha'ul niskaleta lo shamarta 'et mizvat ihoh 'elohekha 'asher zivakh ki 'atah heikhin ihoh 'et mamlakhtekha 'el yisra'el 'ad 'olam. ve'atah mamlakhtekha lo taqum biqesh ihoh lo 'ish kilbabo vayzaveihu ihoh lenagid 'al 'amo ki lo shamarta 'et 'asher zivekha ihoh. vayaqam shemu'el vaya'al min hagilgal gib'at binyamin vayifqod sha'ul 'et ha'am hanimze'im 'imo keshesh mei'ot 'ish. vesha'ul veyonatan beno veha'am hanimza 'imam yoshebim begeba' binyamin ufelishtim khanu bemikhmas. vayeizei hamashkhit mimakhaneh felishtim sheloshah rashim harosh 'ekhad yifneh 'el derekh 'aferah 'el 'erez shu'al. veharosh 'ekhad yifneh derekh bet khoron veharosh 'ekhad yifneh derekh hagebul hanishqaf 'al gei hazebo'im hamidbarah. vekharash lo yimazei bekhol 'erez yisra'el ki 'amar 'ameru felishtim pen ya'asu ha'ibrim khereb 'o khanit. vayeiredu khal yisra'el hapelishtim liltosh 'ish 'et makharashto ve'et 'eito ve'et qardumo ve'et makhareishato. vehayetah hapezirah fim lamakhareishot vela'eitim velishlosh qileshon ulehaqardumim ulehazib hadareban. vehayah beyom milkhemet velo nimza khereb vakhanit beyad kal ha'am 'asher 'et sha'ul ve'et yonatan vatimazei lesha'ul uleyonatan beno. vayeizei mazab pelishtim 'el ma'abar mikhmas. vayhi hayom vayomer yonatan ben sha'ul 'el hana'ar nosei kheilav lekhah vena'berah 'el mazab pelishtim 'asher mei'eiber halaz ule'abiv lo higid. vesha'ul yosheb biqzeh hagib'ah takhat harimon 'asher bemigron veha'am 'asher 'imo keshesh mei'ot 'ish. va'akhiyah ben 'akhitub 'akhi 'ikhabod ben pinekhas ben 'eili kohen ihoh beshilo nosei 'eifod veha'am lo yada' ki halakh yonatan. uben hama'berot 'asher biqesh yonatan la'abor 'al mazab pelishtim shen hasela' meiha'eiber mizeh veshen hasela' meiha'eiber mizeh veshem ha'ekhad bozez veshem ha'ekhad seneh. hashen ha'ekhad mazuq mizafon mul mikhmas veha'ekhad minegeb mul gaba'. vayomer yehonatan 'el hana'ar nosei kheilav lekhah vena'berah 'el mazab ha'areilim ha'eleh 'ulai ya'aseh ihoh lanu ki 'en ihoh ma'zor lehoshia' berab 'o bim'at. vayomer lo nosei kheilav 'aseh kal 'asher bilbabekha neteh lakh hini 'imekha kilbabekha. vayomer yehonatan hineh 'anakhnu 'oberim 'el ha'anashim veniglinu 'aleihem. 'im koh yomeru 'eileinu domu 'ad hagi'einu 'aleikhem ve'amadnu takhteinu velo na'aleh 'aleihem. ve'im koh yomeru 'alu 'aleinu ve'alinu ki netanam ihoh beyadeinu vezeh lanu ha'ot. vayigalu sheneihem 'el mazab pelishtim vayomeru felishtim hineh 'ibrim yoze'im min hakhorim 'asher hitkhabe'u sham. vaya'anu 'anshei hamazabah 'et yonatan ve'et nosei kheilav vayomeru 'alu 'eileinu venodi'ah 'etkhem dabar vayomer yonatan 'el nosei kheilav 'aleh 'akharai ki netanam ihoh beyad yisra'el. vaya'al yonatan 'al yadav ve'al raglav venosei kheilav 'akharav vayipelu lifnei yonatan venosei kheilav memotet 'akharav. vatehi hamakah harishonah 'asher hikah yonatan venosei kheilav ke'esrim 'ish kebakhazi ma'anah zemed sadeh. vatehi kharadah bamakhaneh basadeh ubekhal ha'am hamazab vehamashkhit kharedu gam hemah vatirgaz ha'arez vatehi lekherdat 'elohim. vayir'u hazofim lesha'ul begib'at binyamin vehineh hehamon namog vayeilekh vahalom. vayomer sha'ul la'am 'asher 'ito piqdu na ure'u mi halakh mei'imanu vayifqedu vehineh 'en yonatan venosei kheilav. vayomer sha'ul la'akhiyah hagishah 'aron ha'elohim ki hayah 'aron ha'elohim bayom hahu ubenei yisra'el. vayhi 'ad diber sha'ul 'el hakohen vehehamon 'asher bemakhaneh felishtim vayeilekh halokh varab vayomer sha'ul 'el hakohen 'esof yadekha. vayiza'eq sha'ul vekhal ha'am 'asher 'ito vayabo'u 'ad hamilkhamah vehineh hayetah khereb 'ish berei'eihu mehumah gedolah me'od. veha'ibrim hayu lapelishtim ke'etmol shilshom 'asher 'alu 'imam bamakhaneh sabib vegam hemah lihyot 'im yisra'el 'asher 'im sha'ul veyonatan. vekhol 'ish yisra'el hamitkhabe'im behar 'efrayim shame'u ki nasu pelishtim vayadbequ gam hemah 'akhareihem bamilkhamah. vayosha' ihoh bayom hahu 'et yisra'el vehamilkhamah 'aberah 'et bet 'aven. ve'ish yisra'el nigas bayom hahu vayo'el sha'ul 'et ha'am leimor 'arur ha'ish 'asher yokhal lekhem 'ad ha'ereb veniqamti mei'oyebai velo ta'am kal ha'am lakhem. vekhal ha'arez ba'u baya'ar vayhi debash 'al penei hasadeh. vayabo ha'am 'el haya'ar vehineh heilekh debash ve'en masig yado 'el piv ki yarei ha'am 'et hashebu'ah. veyonatan lo shama' behashbia' 'abiv 'et ha'am vayishlakh 'et qezeh hamateh 'asher beyado vayitbol 'otah beya'rat hadebash vayasheb yado 'el piv vataronah vata'orenah 'einav. vaya'an 'ish meiha'am vayomer hashbeia' hishbia' 'abikha 'et ha'am leimor 'arur ha'ish 'asher yokhal lekhem hayom vaya'af ha'am. vayomer yonatan 'akhar 'abi 'et ha'arez re'u na ki 'oru 'einai ki ta'amti me'at debash hazeh. 'af ki lu 'akhol 'akhal hayom ha'am mishelal 'oyebav 'asher maza ki 'atah lo rabetah makah bapelishtim. vayaku bayom hahu bapelishtim mimikhmas 'ayalonah vaya'af ha'am me'od. vaya'as vaya'at ha'am 'el shalal hashalal vayiqkhu zon ubaqar ubenei baqar vayishkhatu 'arezah vayokhal ha'am 'al hadam. vayagidu lesha'ul leimor hineh ha'am khotim ihoh le'ekhol 'al hadam vayomer begadtem golu 'eilai hayom 'eben gedolah. vayomer sha'ul puzu ba'am va'amartem lahem hagishu 'eilai 'ish shoro ve'ish seyeihu ushekhatem bazeh va'akhaltem velo tekhet'u ihoh le'ekhol 'el hadam vayagishu khal ha'am 'ish shoro beyado halaylah vayishkhatu sham. vayiben sha'ul mizbeiakh ihoh 'oto heikhel libnot mizbeiakh ihoh. vayomer sha'ul neiredah 'akharei felishtim laylah venabozah bahem 'ad 'or haboqer velo nash'er bahem 'ish vayomeru kal hatob be'einekha 'aseh vayomer hakohen niqrebah halom 'el ha'elohim. vayish'al sha'ul beilohim ha'eired 'akharei felishtim hatitenem beyad yisra'el velo 'anahu bayom hahu. vayomer sha'ul goshu halom kol pinot ha'am ude'u ure'u bamah hayetah hakhatat hazot hayom. ki khai ihoh hamoshia' 'et yisra'el ki 'im yeshno beyonatan beni ki mot yamut ve'en 'oneihu mikal ha'am. vayomer 'el kal yisra'el 'atem tihyu le'eiber 'ekhad va'ani veyonatan beni nihyeh le'eiber 'ekhad vayomeru ha'am 'el sha'ul hatob be'einekha 'aseh. vayomer sha'ul 'el ihoh 'elohei yisra'el habah tamim vayilakhed yonatan vesha'ul veha'am yaza'u. vayomer sha'ul hapilu beini uben yonatan beni vayilakhed yonatan. vayomer sha'ul 'el yonatan hagidah li meh 'asitah vayaged lo yonatan vayomer ta'om ta'amti biqzeh hamateh 'asher beyadi me'at debash hini 'amut. vayomer sha'ul koh ya'aseh 'elohim vekhoh yosif ki mot tamut yonatan. vayomer ha'am 'el sha'ul hayonatan yamut 'asher 'asah hayshu'ah hagedolah hazot beyisra'el khalilah khai ihoh 'im yipol misa'arat rosho 'arzah ki 'im 'elohim 'asah hayom hazeh vayifdu ha'am 'et yonatan velo met. vaya'al sha'ul mei'akharei pelishtim ufelishtim halekhu limqomam. vesha'ul lakhad hamelukhah 'al yisra'el vayilakhem sabib bekhal 'oyebav bemo'ab ubibnei 'amon ube'edom ubemalkhei zobah ubapelishtim ubekhol 'asher yifneh yarshia'. vaya'as khayil vayakh 'et 'amaleq vayazel 'et yisra'el miyad shoseihu. vayihyu benei sha'ul yonatan veyishvi umalki shua' veshem shetei benotav shem habekhirah meirab veshem haqetanah mikhal. veshem 'eishet sha'ul 'akhino'am bat 'akhima'az veshem sar zeba'o 'abiner ben ner dod sha'ul. veqish 'abi sha'ul vener 'abi 'abner ben 'abi'el. vatehi hamilkhamah khazaqah 'al pelishtim kol yemei sha'ul vera'ah sha'ul kal 'ish gibor vekhal ben khayil vaya'asfeihu 'eilav. vayomer shemu'el 'el sha'ul 'oti shalakh ihoh limshakhokha lemelekh 'al 'amo 'al yisra'el ve'atah shema' leqol dibrei ihoh. koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot paqadti 'et 'asher 'asah 'amaleq leyisra'el 'asher sam lo baderekh ba'aloto mimizrayim. 'atah lekh vehikitah 'et 'amaleq vehakharamtem 'et kal 'asher lo velo takhmol 'alav veheimatah mei'ish 'ad 'ishah mei'olel ve'ad yoneq mishor ve'ad seh migamal ve'ad khamor. vayshama' sha'ul 'et ha'am vayifqedem batela'im matayim 'elef ragli va'aseret 'alafim 'et 'ish yehudah. vayabo sha'ul 'ad 'ir 'amaleq vayareb banakhal. vayomer sha'ul 'el haqeini lekhu suru redu mitokh 'amaleiqi pen 'osifkha 'imo ve'atah 'asitah khesed 'im kal benei yisra'el ba'alotam mimizrayim vayasar qeini mitokh 'amaleq. vayakh sha'ul 'et 'amaleq meikhavilah bo'akha shur 'asher 'al penei mizrayim. vayitpos 'et 'agag melekh 'amaleq khai ve'et kal ha'am hekherim lefi khareb. vayakhmol sha'ul veha'am 'al 'agag ve'al meitab hazon vehabaqar vehamishnim ve'al hakarim ve'al kal hatob velo 'abu hakharimam vekhal hamelakhah nemibzah venames 'otah hekherimu. vayhi debar ihoh 'el shemu'el leimor. nikhamti ki himlakhti 'et sha'ul lemelekh ki shab mei'akharai ve'et debarai lo heiqim vayikhar lishmu'el vayiz'aq 'el ihoh kal halayelah. vayashkem shemu'el liqrat sha'ul baboqer vayugad lishmu'el leimor ba sha'ul hakarmelah vehineh mazib lo yad vayisob vaya'abor vayeired hagilgal. vayabo shemu'el 'el sha'ul vayomer lo sha'ul barukh 'atah ihoh haqimoti 'et debar ihoh. vayomer shemu'el umeh qol hazon hazeh be'azenai veqol habaqar 'asher 'anokhi shomeia'. vayomer sha'ul mei'amaleiqi hebi'um 'asher khamal ha'am 'al meitab hazon vehabaqar lema'an zeboakh ihoh 'elohekha ve'et hayoter hekheramnu. vayomer shemu'el 'el sha'ul heref ve'agidah lekha 'et 'asher diber ihoh 'eilai halayelah vayomeru vayomer lo daber. vayomer shemu'el halo 'im qaton 'atah be'einekha rosh shibtei yisra'el 'atah vayimshakhakha ihoh lemelekh 'al yisra'el. vayishlakhakha ihoh bedarekh vayomer lekh vehakharamtah 'et hakhata'im 'et 'amaleq venilkhamta bo 'ad kalotam 'otam. velamah lo shama'ta beqol ihoh vata'at 'el hashalal vata'as hara' be'einei ihoh. vayomer sha'ul 'el shemu'el 'asher shama'ti beqol ihoh va'eilekh baderekh 'asher shelakhani ihoh va'abi 'et 'agag melekh 'amaleq ve'et 'amaleq hekheramti. vayiqakh ha'am meihashalal zon ubaqar reishit hakheirem lizboakh ihoh 'elohekha bagilgal. vayomer shemu'el hakheifez ihoh be'olot uzebakhim kishmoa' beqol ihoh hineh shemoa' mizebakh tob lehaqshib meikheileb 'eilim. ki khatat qesem meri ve'aven uterafim hafzar ya'an ma'asta 'et debar ihoh vayim'asekha mimelekh. vayomer sha'ul 'el shemu'el khatati ki 'abarti 'et pi ihoh ve'et debarekha ki yareiti 'et ha'am va'eshma' beqolam. ve'atah sa na 'et khatati veshub 'imi ve'eshtakhaveh ihoh. vayomer shemu'el 'el sha'ul lo 'ashub 'imakh ki ma'astah 'et debar ihoh vayim'asekha ihoh mihyot melekh 'al yisra'el. vayisob shemu'el lalekhet vayakhazeq bikhnaf me'ilo vayiqara'. vayomer 'eilav shemu'el qara' ihoh 'et mamlekhut yisra'el mei'alekha hayom unetanah lerei'akha hatob mimeka. vegam neizakh yisra'el lo yeshaqer velo yinakhem ki lo 'adam hu lehinakhem. vayomer khatati 'atah kabedeini na neged ziqnei 'ami veneged yisra'el veshub 'imi vehishtakhaveiti ihoh 'elohekha. vayashab shemu'el 'akharei sha'ul vayishtakhu sha'ul ihoh. vayomer shemu'el hagishu 'eilai 'et 'agag melekh 'amaleq vayeilekh 'eilav 'agag ma'adanot vayomer 'agag 'akhen sar mar hamavet. vayomer shemu'el ka'asher shikelah nashim kharbekha ken tishkal minashim 'imekha vayshasef shemu'el 'et 'agag lifnei ihoh bagilgal. vayeilekh shemu'el haramatah vesha'ul 'alah 'el beito gib'at sha'ul. velo yasaf shemu'el lir'ot 'et sha'ul 'ad yom moto ki hit'abel shemu'el 'el sha'ul ihoh nikham ki himlikh 'et sha'ul 'al yisra'el. vayomer ihoh 'el shemu'el 'ad matai 'atah mit'abel 'el sha'ul va'ani me'astiv mimelokh 'al yisra'el malei qarnekha shemen velekh 'eshlakhakha 'el yishai bet halakhmi ki ra'iti bebanav li melekh. vayomer shemu'el 'ekh 'eilekh veshama' sha'ul vaharagani vayomer ihoh 'eglat baqar tiqakh beyadekha ve'amarta lizboakh ihoh bati. veqarata leyishai bazabakh ve'anokhi 'odi'akha 'et 'asher ta'aseh umashakhta li 'et 'asher 'omar 'eilekha. vaya'as shemu'el 'et 'asher diber ihoh vayabo bet lakhem vayekherdu ziqnei ha'ir liqrato vayomer shalom bo'ekha. vayomer shalom lizboakh ihoh bati hitqadeshu ubatem 'iti bazabakh vayqadesh 'et yishai ve'et banav vayiqra lahem lazabakh. vayhi bebo'am vayar 'et 'eli'ab vayomer 'akh neged ihoh meshikho. vayomer ihoh 'el shemu'el 'al tabet 'el mar'eihu ve'el geboah qomato ki me'astihu ki lo 'asher yir'eh ha'adam ki ha'adam yir'eh la'einayim ihoh yir'eh laleibab. vayiqra yishai 'el 'abinadab vaya'abireihu lifnei shemu'el vayomer gam bazeh lo bakhar ihoh. vaya'aber yishai shamah vayomer gam bazeh lo bakhar ihoh. vaya'aber yishai shib'at banav lifnei shemu'el vayomer shemu'el 'el yishai lo bakhar ihoh ba'eleh. vayomer shemu'el 'el yishai hatamu hane'arim vayomer 'od sha'ar haqatan vehineh ro'eh bazon vayomer shemu'el 'el yishai shilkhah veqakhenu ki lo nasob 'ad bo'o foh. vayishlakh vaybi'eihu vehu 'admoni 'im yefeh 'einayim vetob ro'i vayomer ihoh qum meshakheihu ki zeh hu. vayiqakh shemu'el 'et qeren hashemen vayimshakh 'oto beqereb 'ekhav vatizlakh ruakh ihoh 'el david meihayom hahu vama'elah vayaqam shemu'el vayeilekh haramatah. veruakh ihoh sarah mei'im sha'ul ubi'atatu ruakh ra'ah mei'et ihoh. vayomeru 'abdei sha'ul 'eilav hineh na ruakh 'elohim ra'ah meba'itekha. yomar na 'adoneinu 'abadekha lefanekha yebaqshu 'ish yodeia' menagen bakinor vehayah bihyot 'alekha ruakh 'elohim ra'ah venigen beyado vetob lakh. vayomer sha'ul 'el 'abadav re'u na li 'ish meitib lenagen vahabi'otem 'eilai. vaya'an 'ekhad meihane'arim vayomer hineh ra'iti ben leyishai bet halakhmi yodeia' nagen vegibor khayil ve'ish milkhamah unebon dabar ve'ish to'ar ihoh 'imo. vayishlakh sha'ul mal'akhim 'el yishai vayomer shilkhah 'eilai 'et david binkha 'asher bazon. vayiqakh yishai khamor lekhem venod yayin ugedi 'izim 'ekhad vayishlakh beyad david beno 'el sha'ul. vayabo david 'el sha'ul vaya'amod lefanav vaye'ehabeihu me'od vayhi lo nosei kheilim. vayishlakh sha'ul 'el yishai leimor ya'amad na david lefanai ki maza khen be'einai. vehayah bihyot ruakh 'elohim 'el sha'ul velaqakh david 'et hakinor venigen beyado veravakh lesha'ul vetob lo vesarah mei'alav ruakh hara'ah. vaya'asfu felishtim 'et makhaneihem lamilkhamah vayei'asefu sokhoh 'asher lihudah vayakhanu ben sokhoh uben 'azeiqah be'efes damim. vesha'ul ve'ish yisra'el ne'esfu vayakhanu be'eimeq ha'eilah vaya'arkhu milkhamah liqrat pelishtim. ufelishtim 'omedim 'el hahar mizeh veyisra'el 'omedim 'el hahar mizeh vehagai beineihem. vayeizei 'ish habeinayim mimakhanot pelishtim galeyat shemo migat gabeho shesh 'amot vazaret. vekhoba' nekhoshet 'al rosho veshiryon qasqasim hu labush umishqal hashiryon khameishet 'alafim sheqalim nekhoshet. umizkhat nekhoshet 'al raglav vekhidon nekhoshet ben keteifav. vekhaz ve'ez khanito kimnor 'oregim velahebet khanito shesh mei'ot sheqalim barzel venosei hazinah holekh lefanav. vaya'amod vayiqra 'el ma'arkhot yisra'el vayomer lahem lamah teize'u la'arokh milkhamah halo 'anokhi hapelishti ve'atem 'abadim lesha'ul beru lakhem 'ish veyeired 'eilai. 'im yukhal lehilakhem 'iti vehikani vehayinu lakhem la'abadim ve'im 'ani 'ukhal lo vehikitiv vihyitem lanu la'abadim va'abadtem 'otanu. vayomer hapelishti 'ani kheirafti 'et ma'arkhot yisra'el hayom hazeh tenu li 'ish venilakhamah yakhad. vayishma' sha'ul vekhal yisra'el 'et dibrei hapelishti ha'eleh vayeikhatu vayir'u me'od. vedavid ben 'ish 'efrati hazeh mibet lekhem yehudah ushemo yishai velo shemonah banim veha'ish bimei sha'ul zaqen ba ba'anashim. vayeilekhu sheloshet benei yishai hagedolim halekhu 'akharei sha'ul lamilkhamah veshem sheloshet banav 'asher halekhu bamilkhamah 'eli'ab habekhor umishneihu 'abinadab vehashelishi shamah. vedavid hu haqatan usheloshah hagedolim halekhu 'akharei sha'ul. vedavid holekh vashab mei'al sha'ul lir'ot 'et zon 'abiv bet lakhem. vayigash hapelishti hashkem veha'areb vayityazeb 'arba'im yom. vayomer yishai ledavid beno qakh na le'akhekha 'eifat haqali hazeh va'asarah lekhem hazeh veharez hamakhaneh le'akhekha. ve'et 'aseret kharizei hekhalab ha'eleh tabi lesar ha'alef ve'et 'akhekha tifqod leshalom ve'et 'arubatam tiqakh. vesha'ul vehemah vekhal 'ish yisra'el be'eimeq ha'eilah nilkhamim 'im pelishtim. vayashkem david baboqer vayitosh 'et hazon 'al shomer vayisa vayeilekh ka'asher zivahu yishai vayabo hama'galah vehakhayil hayozei 'el hama'arakhah veheirei'u bamilkhamah. vata'arokh yisra'el ufelishtim ma'arakhah liqrat ma'arakhah. vayitosh david 'et hakeilim mei'alav 'al yad shomer hakeilim vayaraz hama'arakhah vayabo vayish'al le'ekhav leshalom. vehu medaber 'imam vehineh 'ish habeinayim 'oleh galeyat hapelishti shemo migat mima'arot mima'arkhot pelishtim vaydaber kadebarim ha'eleh vayishma' david. vekhol 'ish yisra'el bir'otam 'et ha'ish vayanusu mipanav vayire'u me'od. vayomer 'ish yisra'el harre'item ha'ish ha'oleh hazeh ki lekharef 'et yisra'el 'oleh vehayah ha'ish 'asher yakenu ya'sherenu hamelekh 'osher gadol ve'et bito yiten lo ve'et bet 'abiv ya'aseh khafeshi beyisra'el. vayomer david 'el ha'anashim ha'omedim 'imo leimor mah yei'aseh la'ish 'asher yakeh 'et hapelishti halaz veheisir kherpah mei'al yisra'el ki mi hapelishti he'arel hazeh ki kheiref ma'arkhot 'elohim khayim. vayomer lo ha'am kadabar hazeh leimor koh yei'aseh la'ish 'asher yakenu. vayishma' 'eli'ab 'akhiv hagadol bedabero 'el ha'anashim vayikhar 'af 'eli'ab bedavid vayomer lamah zeh yaradta ve'al mi natashta me'at hazon hahenah bamidbar 'ani yada'ti 'et zedonekha ve'et roa' lebabekha ki lema'an re'ot hamilkhamah yaradeta. vayomer david meh 'asiti 'atah halo dabar hu. vayisob mei'ezlo 'el mul 'akher vayomer kadabar hazeh vayshibuhu ha'am dabar kadabar harishon. vayeshame'u hadebarim 'asher diber david vayagidu lifnei sha'ul vayiqakheihu. vayomer david 'el sha'ul 'al yipol leb 'adam 'alav 'abdekha yeilekh venilkham 'im hapelishti hazeh. vayomer sha'ul 'el david lo tukhal lalekhet 'el hapelishti hazeh lehilakhem 'imo ki na'ar 'atah vehu 'ish milkhamah mine'urav. vayomer david 'el sha'ul ro'eh hayah 'abdekha le'abiv bazon uba ha'ari ve'et hadob venasa seh meiha'eider. veyazati 'akharav vehikitiv vehizalti mipiv vayaqam 'alai vehekhezaqti bizqano vehikitiv vahamitiv. gam 'et ha'ari gam hadob hikah 'abdekha vehayah hapelishti he'arel hazeh ke'akhad meihem ki kheiref ma'arkhot 'elohim khayim. vayomer david ihoh 'asher hizilani miyad ha'ari umiyad hadob hu yazileini miyad hapelishti hazeh vayomer sha'ul 'el david lekh ihoh yihyeh 'imakh. vayalbesh sha'ul 'et david madav venatan qoba' nekhoshet 'al rosho vayalbesh 'oto shiryon. vayakhgor david 'et kharbo mei'al lemadav vayo'el lalekhet ki lo nisah vayomer david 'el sha'ul lo 'ukhal lalekhet ba'eleh ki lo nisiti vaysirem david mei'alav. vayiqakh maqlo beyado vayibkhar lo khamishah khaluqei 'abanim min hanakhal vayasem 'otam bikhli haro'im 'asher lo ubayalqut veqale'o beyado vayigash 'el hapelishti. vayeilekh hapelishti holekh veqareb 'el david veha'ish nosei hazinah lefanav. vayabet hapelishti vayir'eh 'et david vayibzeihu ki hayah na'ar ve'admoni 'im yefeh mar'eh. vayomer hapelishti 'el david hakheleb 'anokhi ki 'atah ba 'eilai bamaqlot vayqalel hapelishti 'et david beilohav. vayomer hapelishti 'el david lekhah 'eilai ve'etenah 'et besarekha le'of hashamayim ulebehemat hasadeh. vayomer david 'el hapelishti 'atah ba 'eilai bekhereb ubakhanit ubekhidon ve'anokhi ba 'eilekha beshem ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei ma'arkhot yisra'el 'asher kheirafta. hayom hazeh yesagerkha ihoh beyadi vehikitikha vahasiroti 'et roshekha mei'alekha venatati peger makhaneh felishtim hayom hazeh le'of hashamayim ulekhayat ha'arez veyeide'u kal ha'arez ki yesh 'elohim leyisra'el. veyeide'u kal haqahal hazeh ki lo bekhereb ubakhanit yehoshia' ihoh ki ihoh hamilkhamah venatan 'etkhem beyadeinu. vehayah ki qam hapelishti vayeilekh vayiqrab liqrat david vaymaher david vayaraz hama'arakhah liqrat hapelishti. vayishlakh david 'et yado 'el hakeli vayiqakh misham 'eben vayqala' vayakh 'et hapelishti 'el mizkho vatitba' ha'eben bemizkho vayipol 'al panav 'arezah. vayekhezaq david min hapelishti baqela' uba'eben vayakh 'et hapelishti vaymiteihu vekhereb 'en beyad david. vayaraz david vaya'amod 'el hapelishti vayiqakh 'et kharbo vayishlefah mita'rah vaymoteteihu vayikhrat bah 'et rosho vayir'u hapelishtim ki met giboram vayanusu. vayaqumu 'anshei yisra'el vihudah vayari'u vayirdefu 'et hapelishtim 'ad bo'akha gai ve'ad sha'arei 'eqron vayipelu khalei felishtim bederekh sha'arayim ve'ad gat ve'ad 'eqron. vayashubu benei yisra'el mideloq 'akharei felishtim vayashosu 'et makhaneihem. vayiqakh david 'et rosh hapelishti vaybi'eihu yerushalim ve'et keilav sam be'aholo. vekhir'ot sha'ul 'et david yozei liqrat hapelishti 'amar 'el 'abner sar hazaba ben mi zeh hana'ar 'abner vayomer 'abner khei nafshekha hamelekh 'im yada'eti. vayomer hamelekh she'al 'atah ben mi zeh ha'alem. ukheshub david meihakot 'et hapelishti vayiqakh 'oto 'abner vaybi'eihu lifnei sha'ul verosh hapelishti beyado. vayomer 'eilav sha'ul ben mi 'atah hana'ar vayomer david ben 'abdekha yishai bet halakhmi. vayhi kekhaloto ledaber 'el sha'ul venefesh yehonatan niqsherah benefesh david vaye'ehabo vaye'ehabeihu yehonatan kenafsho. vayiqakheihu sha'ul bayom hahu velo netano lashub bet 'abiv. vayikhrot yehonatan vedavid berit be'ahabato 'oto kenafsho. vayitpashet yehonatan 'et hame'il 'asher 'alav vayiteneihu ledavid umadav ve'ad kharbo ve'ad qashto ve'ad khagoro. vayeizei david bekhol 'asher yishlakhenu sha'ul yaskil vaysimeihu sha'ul 'al 'anshei hamilkhamah vayitab be'einei khal ha'am vegam be'einei 'abdei sha'ul. vayhi bebo'am beshub david meihakot 'et hapelishti vateizenah hanashim mikal 'arei yisra'el lashor lashir vehamekholot liqrat sha'ul hamelekh betupim besimkhah ubeshalishim. vata'anenah hanashim hamsakhaqot vatomarna hikah sha'ul ba'elfo ba'alafav vedavid beribbotav. vayikhar lesha'ul me'od vayeira' be'einav hadabar hazeh vayomer natenu ledavid rebabot veli natenu ha'alafim ve'od lo 'akh hamelukhah. vayhi sha'ul 'avon 'oyen 'et david meihayom hahu vahale'ah. vayhi mimakhorat vatizlakh ruakh 'elohim ra'ah 'el sha'ul vayitnabei betokh habayit vedavid menagen beyado keyom beyom vehakhanit beyad sha'ul. vayatel sha'ul 'et hakhanit vayomer 'akeh bedavid ubaqir vayisob david mipanav pa'amayim. vayira sha'ul milifnei david ki hayah ihoh 'imo umei'im sha'ul sar. vaysireihu sha'ul mei'imo vaysimeihu lo sar 'alef vayeizei vayabo lifnei ha'am. vayhi david lekhal darekhav maskil ihoh 'imo. vayar sha'ul 'asher hu maskil me'od vayagar mipanav. vekhal yisra'el vihudah 'oheb 'et david ki hu yozei vaba lifneihem. vayomer sha'ul 'el david hineh biti hagedolah meirab 'otah 'eten lekha le'ishah 'akh heyeh li leben khayil vehilakhem milkhamot ihoh vesha'ul 'amar 'al tehi yadi bo utehi bo yad pelishtim. vayomer david 'el sha'ul mi 'anokhi umi khayai mishpakhat 'abi beyisra'el ki 'ehyeh khatan lamelekh. vayhi be'et tet 'et meirab bat sha'ul ledavid vehi nitenah le'adri'el hamekholati le'ishah. vate'ehab mikhal bat sha'ul 'et david vayagidu lesha'ul vayishar hadabar be'einav. vayomer sha'ul 'etenenah lo utehi lo lemoqesh utehi bo yad pelishtim vayomer sha'ul 'el david bishtayim titkhaten bi hayom. vayzav sha'ul 'et 'abadav daberu 'el david balat leimor hineh khafez bekha hamelekh vekhal 'abadav 'aheibukha ve'atah hitkhaten bamelekh. vaydaberu 'abdei sha'ul be'azenei david 'et hadebarim ha'eleh vayomer david hanqalah be'eineikhem hitkhaten bamelekh ve'anokhi 'ish rash veniqleh. vayagidu 'abdei sha'ul lo leimor kadebarim ha'eleh diber david. vayomer sha'ul koh tomeru ledavid 'en kheifez lamelekh bemohar ki bemei'ah 'arelot pelishtim lehinaqem be'oyebei hamelekh vesha'ul khashab lehapil 'et david beyad pelishtim. vayagidu 'abadav ledavid 'et hadebarim ha'eleh vayishar hadabar be'einei david lehitkhaten bamelekh velo male'u hayamim. vayaqam david vayeilekh hu va'anashav vayakh bapelishtim matayim 'ish vayabei david 'et 'areloteihem vaymal'um lamelekh lehitkhaten bamelekh vayiten lo sha'ul 'et mikhal bito le'ishah. vayar sha'ul vayeida' ki ihoh 'im david umikhal bat sha'ul 'aheibathu. vayosef sha'ul leiro mipenei david 'od vayhi sha'ul 'oyeb 'et david kal hayamim. vayeize'u sarei felishtim vayhi midei zeitam sakhal david mikol 'abdei sha'ul vayiqar shemo me'od. vaydaber sha'ul 'el yonatan beno ve'el kal 'abadav lehamit 'et david vihonatan ben sha'ul khafez bedavid me'od. vayaged yehonatan ledavid leimor mebaqesh sha'ul 'abi lahamitekha ve'atah hishamer na baboqer veyashabta baseiter venakhbeita. va'ani 'eizei ve'amadti leyad 'abi basadeh 'asher 'atah sham va'ani 'adaber bekha 'el 'abi vera'iti mah vehigadti lakh. vaydaber yehonatan bedavid tob 'el sha'ul 'abiv vayomer 'eilav 'al yekheta hamelekh be'abdo bedavid ki lo khata lakh vekhi ma'asav tob lekha me'od. vayasem 'et nafsho bekhapo vayakh 'et hapelishti vaya'as ihoh teshu'ah gedolah lekhal yisra'el ra'ita vatismakh velamah tekheta bedam naqi lehamit 'et david khinam. vayishma' sha'ul beqol yehonatan vayishaba' sha'ul khai ihoh 'im yumat. vayiqra yehonatan ledavid vayaged lo yehonatan 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh vayabei yehonatan 'et david 'el sha'ul vayhi lefanav ke'etmol shilshom. vatosef hamilkhamah lihyot vayeizei david vayilakhem bapelishtim vayakh bahem makah gedolah vayanusu mipanav. vatehi ruakh ihoh ra'ah 'el sha'ul vehu bebeito yosheb vakhanito beyado vedavid menagen beyad. vaybaqesh sha'ul lehakot bakhanit bedavid ubaqir vayiftar mipenei sha'ul vayakh 'et hakhanit baqir vedavid nas vayimalet balaylah hu. vayishlakh sha'ul mal'akhim 'el bet david leshamero velahamito baboqer vataged ledavid mikhal 'ishto leimor 'im 'einekha memalet 'et nafshekha halaylah makhar 'atah mumat. vatored mikhal 'et david be'ad hakhalon vayeilekh vayibrakh vayimalet. vatiqakh mikhal 'et haterafim vatasem 'el hamitah ve'et kebir ha'izim samah mera'ashotav vatekhas babaged. vayishlakh sha'ul mal'akhim laqakhat 'et david vatomer kholeh hu. vayishlakh sha'ul 'et hamal'akhim lir'ot 'et david leimor ha'alu 'oto bamitah 'eilai lahamito. vayabo'u hamal'akhim vehineh haterafim 'el hamitah ukhebir ha'izim mera'ashotav. vayomer sha'ul 'el mikhal lamah kakhah rimitini vateshalekhi 'et 'oyebi vayimalet vatomer mikhal 'el sha'ul hu 'amar 'eilai shalekhini lamah 'amitekh. vedavid barakh vayimalet vayabo 'el shemu'el haramatah vayaged lo 'et kal 'asher 'asah lo sha'ul vayeilekh hu ushemu'el vayeishebu benoit benayot. vayugad lesha'ul leimor hineh david benoit benayot baramah. vayishlakh sha'ul mal'akhim laqakhat 'et david vayar 'et lahaqat hanebi'im nibe'im ushemu'el 'omed nizab 'aleihem vatehi 'al mal'akhei sha'ul ruakh 'elohim vayitnabe'u gam hemah. vayagidu lesha'ul vayishlakh mal'akhim 'akheirim vayitnabe'u gam hemah vayosef sha'ul vayishlakh mal'akhim shelishim vayitnabe'u gam hemah. vayeilekh gam hu haramatah vayabo 'ad bor hagadol 'asher basekhu vayish'al vayomer 'eifoh shemu'el vedavid vayomer hineh benoit benayot baramah. vayeilekh sham 'el noit nayot baramah vatehi 'alav gam hu ruakh 'elohim vayeilekh halokh vayitnabei 'ad bo'o benoit benayot baramah. vayifshat gam hu begadav vayitnabei gam hu lifnei shemu'el vayipol 'arom kal hayom hahu vekhal halayelah 'al ken yomeru hagam sha'ul banebi'im. vayibrakh david minoivt minayot baramah vayabo vayomer lifnei yehonatan meh 'asiti meh 'avoni umeh khatati lifnei 'abikha ki mebaqesh 'et nafshi. vayomer lo khalilah lo tamut hineh lo 'asah lo ya'aseh 'abi dabar gadol 'o dabar qaton velo yigleh 'et 'azeni umadua' yastir 'abi mimeni 'et hadabar hazeh 'en zot. vayishaba' 'od david vayomer yadoa' yada' 'abikha ki mazati khen be'einekha vayomer 'al yeida' zot yehonatan pen yei'azeb ve'ulam khai ihoh vekhei nafshekha ki khefesa' beini uben hamavet. vayomer yehonatan 'el david mah tomar nafshekha ve'e'eseh lakh. vayomer david 'el yehonatan hineh khodesh makhar ve'anokhi yashob 'eisheb 'im hamelekh le'ekhol veshilakhtani venistarti basadeh 'ad ha'ereb hashelishit. 'im paqod yifqedeini 'abikha ve'amarta nish'ol nish'al mimeni david laruz bet lekhem 'iro ki zebakh hayamim sham lekhal hamishpakhah. 'im koh yomar tob shalom le'abdekha ve'im kharoh yekhereh lo da' ki khaletah hara'ah mei'imo. ve'asita khesed 'al 'abdekha ki bibrit ihoh heibeita 'et 'abdekha 'imakh ve'im yesh bi 'avon hamiteini 'atah ve'ad 'abikha lamah zeh tebi'eini. vayomer yehonatan khalilah lakh ki 'im yadoa' 'eida' ki khaletah hara'ah mei'im 'abi labo 'alekha velo 'otah 'agid lakh. vayomer david 'el yehonatan mi yagid li 'o mah ya'ankha 'abikha qashah. vayomer yehonatan 'el david lekhah veneizei hasadeh vayeize'u sheneihem hasadeh. vayomer yehonatan 'el david ihoh 'elohei yisra'el ki 'ekhqor 'et 'abi ka'et makhar hashelishit vehineh tob 'el david velo 'az 'eshlakh 'eilekha vegaliti 'et 'azenekha. koh ya'aseh ihoh lihonatan vekhoh yosif ki yeitib 'el 'abi 'et hara'ah 'alekha vegaliti 'et 'azenekha veshilakhtikha vehalakhta leshalom vihi ihoh 'imakh ka'asher hayah 'im 'abi. velo 'im 'odeni khai velo ta'aseh 'imadi khesed ihoh velo 'amut. velo takhrit 'et khasdekha mei'im beiti 'ad 'olam velo behakhrit ihoh 'et 'oyebei david 'ish mei'al penei ha'adamah. vayikhrot yehonatan 'im bet david ubiqesh ihoh miyad 'oyebei david. vayosef yehonatan lehashbia' 'et david be'ahabato 'oto ki 'ahabat nafsho 'aheibo. vayomer lo yehonatan makhar khodesh venifqadta ki yipaqed moshabekha. veshilashta teired me'od ubata 'el hamaqom 'asher nistarta sham beyom hama'aseh veyashabta 'eizel ha'eben ha'azel. va'ani sheloshet hakhizim zidah 'oreh leshalakh li lematarah. vehineh 'eshlakh 'et hana'ar lekh meza 'et hakhizim 'im 'amor 'omar lana'ar hineh hakhizim mimekha vahenah qakhenu vabo'ah ki shalom lekha ve'en dabar khai ihoh. ve'im koh 'omar la'elem hineh hakhizim mimekha vahale'ah lekh ki shilakhakha ihoh. vehadabar 'asher dibarnu 'ani va'atah hineh ihoh beini ubeinekha 'ad 'olam. vayisater david basadeh vayhi hakhodesh vayeisheb hamelekh 'al 'el halekhem le'ekhol. vayeisheb hamelekh 'al moshabo kefa'am befa'am 'el moshab haqir vayaqam yehonatan vayeisheb 'abner mizad sha'ul vayipaqed meqom david. velo diber sha'ul me'umah bayom hahu ki 'amar miqreh hu bilti tahor hu ki lo tahor. vayhi mimakhorat hakhodesh hasheini vayipaqed meqom david vayomer sha'ul 'el yehonatan beno madua' lo ba ben yishai gam temol gam hayom 'el halakhem. vaya'an yehonatan 'et sha'ul nish'ol nish'al david mei'imadi 'ad bet lakhem. vayomer shalekheini na ki zebakh mishpakhah lanu ba'ir vehu zivah li 'akhi ve'atah 'im mazati khen be'einekha 'imaletah na ve'er'eh 'et 'ekhai 'al ken lo ba 'el shulkhan hamelekh. vayikhar 'af sha'ul bihonatan vayomer lo ben na'avat hamardut halo yada'ti ki bokher 'atah leben yishai lebashetekha uleboshet 'ervat 'imekha. ki khal hayamim 'asher ben yishai khai 'al ha'adamah lo tikon 'atah umalkhutekha ve'atah shelakh veqakh 'oto 'eilai ki ben mavet hu. vaya'an yehonatan 'et sha'ul 'abiv vayomer 'eilav lamah yumat meh 'asah. vayatel sha'ul 'et hakhanit 'alav lehakoto vayeida' yehonatan ki khalah hi mei'im 'abiv lehamit 'et david. vayaqam yehonatan mei'im hashulkhan bakhori 'af velo 'akhal beyom hakhodesh hasheini lekhem ki ne'zab 'el david ki hikhlimo 'abiv. vayhi baboqer vayeizei yehonatan hasadeh lemo'ed david vena'ar qaton 'imo. vayomer lena'aro ruz meza na 'et hakhizim 'asher 'anokhi moreh hana'ar raz vehu yarah hakheizi leha'abiro. vayabo hana'ar 'ad meqom hakheizi 'asher yarah yehonatan vayiqra yehonatan 'akharei hana'ar vayomer halo hakheizi mimekha vahale'ah. vayiqra yehonatan 'akharei hana'ar meheirah khushah 'al ta'amod vaylaqet na'ar yehonatan 'et hakheizi hakhizim vayabo 'el 'adonav. vehana'ar lo yada' me'umah 'akh yehonatan vedavid yade'u 'et hadabar. vayiten yehonatan 'et keilav 'el hana'ar 'asher lo vayomer lo lekh habei ha'ir. hana'ar ba vedavid qam mei'eizel hanegeb vayipol le'apav 'arzah vayishtakhu shalosh pe'amim vayishequ 'ish 'et rei'eihu vayibku 'ish 'et rei'eihu 'ad david higdil. vayomer yehonatan ledavid lekh leshalom 'asher nishba'nu sheneinu 'anakhnu beshem ihoh leimor ihoh yihyeh beini ubeinekha uben zar'i uben zar'akha 'ad 'olam. vayaqam vayeilakh vihonatan ba ha'ir. vayabo david nobeh 'el 'akhimelekh hakohen vayekherad 'akhimelekh liqrat david vayomer lo madua' 'atah lebadekha ve'ish 'en 'itakh. vayomer david la'akhimelekh hakohen hamelekh zivani dabar vayomer 'eilai 'ish 'al yeida' me'umah 'et hadabar 'asher 'anokhi sholeikhakha va'asher zivitikha ve'et hane'arim yoda'ti 'el meqom peloni 'almoni. ve'atah mah yesh takhat yadekha khamishah lekhem tenah beyadi 'o hanimza. vaya'an hakohen 'et david vayomer 'en lekhem khol 'el takhat yadi ki 'im lekhem qodesh yesh 'im nishmeru hane'arim 'akh mei'ishah. f vaya'an david 'et hakohen vayomer lo ki 'im 'ishah 'azurah lanu kitmol shilshom bezeiti vayihyu khelei hane'arim qodesh vehu derekh khol ve'af ki hayom yiqdash bakeli. vayiten lo hakohen qodesh ki lo hayah sham lekhem ki 'im lekhem hapanim hamusarim milifnei ihoh lasum lekhem khom beyom hilaqekho. vesham 'ish mei'abdei sha'ul bayom hahu ne'zar lifnei ihoh ushemo do'eg ha'adomi 'abir haro'im 'asher lesha'ul. vayomer david la'akhimelekh ve'in yesh poh takhat yadekha khanit 'o khareb ki gam kharbi vegam keilai lo laqakhti beyadi ki hayah debar hamelekh nakhuz. s vayomer hakohen khereb galeyat hapelishti 'asher hikita be'eimeq ha'eilah hineh hi lutah basimlah 'akharei ha'eifod 'im 'otah tiqakh lekha qakh ki 'en 'akheret zulatah bazeh vayomer david 'en kamoha tenenah li. vayaqam david vayibrakh bayom hahu mipenei sha'ul vayabo 'el 'akhish melekh gat. vayomeru 'abdei 'akhish 'eilav halo zeh david melekh ha'arez halo lazeh ya'anu bamekholot leimor hikah sha'ul ba'alafo ba'alafav vedavid beribboto beribbotav. vayasem david 'et hadebarim ha'eleh bilbabo vayira me'od mipenei 'akhish melekh gat. vayshano 'et ta'mo be'eineihem vayitholel beyadam vaytav vaytav 'al daltot hasha'ar vayored riro 'el zeqano. vayomer 'akhish 'el 'abadav hineh tir'u 'ish mishtageia' lamah tabi'u 'oto 'eilai. khasar meshuga'im 'ani ki habeitem 'et zeh lehishtageia' 'alai hazeh yabo 'el beiti. vayeilekh david misham vayimalet 'el me'arat 'adulam vayishme'u 'ekhav vekhal bet 'abiv vayeiredu 'eilav shamah. vayitqabezu 'eilav kal 'ish mazoq vekhal 'ish 'asher lo noshe vekhal 'ish mar nefesh vayhi 'aleihem lesar vayihyu 'imo ke'arba' mei'ot 'ish. vayeilekh david misham mizpeh mo'ab vayomer 'el melekh mo'ab yeizei na 'abi ve'imi 'itekhem 'ad 'asher 'eida' mah ya'aseh li 'elohim. vayankhem 'et penei melekh mo'ab vayeishebu 'imo kal yemei heyot david bamezudah. vayomer gad hanabi 'el david lo teisheb bamezudah lekh ubata lekha 'erez yehudah vayeilekh david vayabo ya'ar kharet. vayishma' sha'ul ki noda' david va'anashim 'asher 'ito vesha'ul yosheb bagib'ah takhat ha'eshel baramah vakhanito beyado vekhal 'abadav nizabim 'alav. vayomer sha'ul la'abadav hanizabim 'alav shim'u na benei yemini gam lekhulekhem yiten ben yishai sadot ukheramim lekhulekhem yasim sarei 'alafim vesarei mei'ot. ki qeshartem kulekhem 'alai ve'en goleh 'et 'azeni bikhrat beni 'im ben yishai ve'en kholeh mikem 'alai vegoleh 'et 'azeni ki heiqim beni 'et 'abdi 'alai le'oreb kayom hazeh. vaya'an do'eg ha'adomi vehu nizab 'al 'abdei sha'ul vayomar ra'iti 'et ben yishai ba nobeh 'el 'akhimelekh ben 'akhitub. vayish'al lo ihoh vezeidah natan lo ve'et khereb galeyat hapelishti natan lo. vayishlakh hamelekh liqro 'et 'akhimelekh ben 'akhitub hakohen ve'et kal bet 'abiv hakohanim 'asher benob vayabo'u khulam 'el hamelekh. vayomer sha'ul shema' na ben 'akhitub vayomer hini 'adoni. vayomer 'eilo 'eilav sha'ul lamah qeshartem 'alai 'atah uben yishai betitekha lo lekhem vekhereb vesha'ol lo beilohim laqum 'eilai le'oreb kayom hazeh. vaya'an 'akhimelekh 'et hamelekh vayomar umi bekhal 'abadekha kedavid ne'eman vakhatan hamelekh vesar 'el mishma'tekha venikhbad bebeitekha. hayom hakhiloti lesha'ol lish'al lo beilohim khalilah li 'al yasem hamelekh be'abdo dabar bekhal bet 'abi ki lo yada' 'abdekha bekhal zot dabar qaton 'o gadol. vayomer hamelekh mot tamut 'akhimelekh 'atah vekhal bet 'abikha. vayomer hamelekh larazim hanizabim 'alav sobu vehamitu kohanei ihoh ki gam yadam 'im david vekhi yade'u ki boreiakh hu velo galu 'et 'azeno 'azeni velo 'abu 'abdei hamelekh lishloakh 'et yadam lifgoa' bekhohanei ihoh. vayomer hamelekh ledoyeg ledo'eg sob 'atah ufega' bakohanim vayisob doyeg do'eg ha'adomi vayifga' hu bakohanim vayamet bayom hahu shemonim vakhamishah 'ish nosei 'eifod bad. ve'et nob 'ir hakohanim hikah lefi khereb mei'ish ve'ad 'ishah mei'olel ve'ad yoneq veshor vakhamor vaseh lefi khareb. vayimalet ben 'ekhad la'akhimelekh ben 'akhitub ushemo 'ebyatar vayibrakh 'akharei david. vayaged 'ebyatar ledavid ki harag sha'ul 'et kohanei ihoh. vayomer david le'ebyatar yada'ti bayom hahu ki sham doyeg do'eg ha'adomi ki haged yagid lesha'ul 'anokhi saboti bekhal nefesh bet 'abikha. shebah 'iti 'al tira ki 'asher yebaqesh 'et nafshi yebaqesh 'et nafshekha ki mishmeret 'atah 'imadi. vayagidu ledavid leimor hineh felishtim nilkhamim biq'ilah vehemah shosim 'et hagoranot. vayish'al david ihoh leimor ha'eilekh vehikeiti bapelishtim ha'eleh vayomer ihoh 'el david lekh vehikita bapelishtim vehosha'ta 'et qe'ilah. vayomeru 'anshei david 'eilav hineh 'anakhnu foh bihudah yerei'im ve'af ki neilekh qe'ilah 'el ma'arkhot pelishtim. vayosef 'od david lish'ol ihoh vaya'aneihu ihoh vayomer qum red qe'ilah ki 'ani noten 'et pelishtim beyadekha. vayeilekh david va'insho va'anashav qe'ilah vayilakhem bapelishtim vayinhag 'et miqneihem vayakh bahem makah gedolah vayosha' david 'et yoshebei qe'ilah. vayhi bibroakh 'ebyatar ben 'akhimelekh 'el david qe'ilah 'eifod yarad beyado. vayugad lesha'ul ki ba david qe'ilah vayomer sha'ul nikar 'oto 'elohim beyadi ki nisgar labo be'ir delatayim uberiakh. vayshama' sha'ul 'et kal ha'am lamilkhamah laredet qe'ilah lazur 'el david ve'el 'anashav. vayeida' david ki 'alav sha'ul makharish hara'ah vayomer 'el 'ebyatar hakohen hagishah ha'eifod. vayomer david ihoh 'elohei yisra'el shamoa' shama' 'abdekha ki mebaqesh sha'ul labo 'el qe'ilah leshakhet la'ir ba'aburi. hayasgiruni ba'alei qe'ilah beyado hayeired sha'ul ka'asher shama' 'abdekha ihoh 'elohei yisra'el haged na le'abdekha vayomer ihoh yeired. vayomer david hayasgiru ba'alei qe'ilah 'oti ve'et 'anashai beyad sha'ul vayomer ihoh yasgiru. vayaqam david va'anashav keshesh mei'ot 'ish vayeize'u miqe'ilah vayithalekhu ba'asher yithalakhu ulesha'ul hugad ki nimlat david miqe'ilah vayekhdal lazet. vayeisheb david bamidbar bamezadot vayeisheb bahar bemidbar zif vaybaqsheihu sha'ul kal hayamim velo netano 'elohim beyado. vayar david ki yaza sha'ul lebaqesh 'et nafsho vedavid bemidbar zif bakhoreshah. vayaqam yehonatan ben sha'ul vayeilekh 'el david khoreshah vaykhazeq 'et yado beilohim. vayomer 'eilav 'al tira ki lo timza'akha yad sha'ul 'abi
