ve'atah timlokh 'al yisra'el ve'anokhi 'ehyeh lekha lemishneh vegam sha'ul 'abi yodeia' ken. vayikhretu sheneihem berit lifnei ihoh vayeisheb david bakhoreshah vihonatan halakh lebeito. vaya'alu zifim 'el sha'ul hagib'atah leimor halo david mistater 'imanu bamezadot bakhoreshah begib'at hakhakhilah 'asher mimin hayshimon. ve'atah lekhal 'avat nafshekha hamelekh laredet red velanu hasgiro beyad hamelekh. vayomer sha'ul berukhim 'atem ihoh ki khamaltem 'alai. lekhu na hakhinu 'od ude'u ure'u 'et meqomo 'asher tihyeh raglo mi ra'ahu sham ki 'amar 'eilai 'arom ya'rim hu. ure'u ude'u mikol hamakhabo'im 'asher yitkhabei sham veshabtem 'eilai 'el nakhon vehalakhti 'itekhem vehayah 'im yeshno ba'arez vekhipasti 'oto bekhol 'alfei yehudah. vayaqumu vayeilekhu zifah lifnei sha'ul vedavid va'anashav bemidbar ma'on ba'arabah 'el yemin hayshimon. vayeilekh sha'ul va'anashav lebaqesh vayagidu ledavid vayeired hasela' vayeisheb bemidbar ma'on vayishma' sha'ul vayirdof 'akharei david midbar ma'on. vayeilekh sha'ul mizad hahar mizeh vedavid va'anashav mizad hahar mizeh vayhi david nekhpaz lalekhet mipenei sha'ul vesha'ul va'anashav 'oterim 'el david ve'el 'anashav letafesam. umal'akh ba 'el sha'ul leimor maharah veleikhah ki fashetu felishtim 'al ha'arez. vayashab sha'ul mirdof 'akharei david vayeilekh liqrat pelishtim 'al ken qare'u lamaqom hahu sela' hamakhleqot. vaya'al david misham vayeisheb bimzadot 'en gedi. vayhi ka'asher shab sha'ul mei'akharei pelishtim vayagidu lo leimor hineh david bemidbar 'en gedi. vayiqakh sha'ul sheloshet 'alafim 'ish bakhur mikal yisra'el vayeilekh lebaqesh 'et david va'anashav 'al penei zurei haye'eilim. vayabo 'el gidrot hazon 'al haderekh vesham me'arah vayabo sha'ul lehasekh 'et raglav vedavid va'anashav beyarketei hame'arah yoshebim. vayomeru 'anshei david 'eilav hineh hayom 'asher 'amar ihoh 'eilekha hineh 'anokhi noten 'et 'oyebeikha 'oyibkha beyadekha ve'asita lo ka'asher yitab be'einekha vayaqam david vayikhrot 'et kenaf hame'il 'asher lesha'ul balat. vayhi 'akharei khen vayakh leb david 'oto 'al 'asher karat 'et kanaf 'asher lesha'ul. vayomer la'anashav khalilah li ihoh 'im 'e'eseh 'et hadabar hazeh ladoni limshiakh ihoh lishloakh yadi bo ki meshiakh ihoh hu. vayshasa' david 'et 'anashav badebarim velo netanam laqum 'el sha'ul vesha'ul qam meihame'arah vayeilekh badarekh. vayaqam david 'akharei khen vayeizei min hame'arah meihame'arah vayiqra 'akharei sha'ul leimor 'adoni hamelekh vayabet sha'ul 'akharav vayiqod david 'apayim 'arzah vayishtakhu. vayomer david lesha'ul lamah tishma' 'et dibrei 'adam leimor hineh david mebaqesh ra'atekha. hineh hayom hazeh ra'u 'einekha 'et 'asher netanekha ihoh hayom beyadi bame'arah ve'amar laharagakha vatakhas 'alekha va'omar lo 'eshlakh yadi badoni ki meshiakh ihoh hu. ve'abi re'eh gam re'eh 'et kenaf me'ilekha beyadi ki bekhareti 'et kenaf me'ilekha velo haragtikha da' ure'eh ki 'en beyadi ra'ah vafesha' velo khatati lakh ve'atah zodeh 'et nafshi leqakhtah. yishpot ihoh beini ubeinekha uneqamani ihoh mimeka veyadi lo tihyeh bakh. ka'asher yomar meshal haqadmoni meiresha'im yeizei resha' veyadi lo tihyeh bakh. 'akharei mi yaza melekh yisra'el 'akharei mi 'atah rodef 'akharei keleb met 'akharei par'osh 'ekhad. vehayah ihoh ledayan veshafat beini ubeinekha veyeire veyareb 'et ribi veyishpeteini miyadekha. vayhi kekhalot david ledaber 'et hadebarim ha'eleh 'el sha'ul vayomer sha'ul haqolekha zeh beni david vayisa sha'ul qolo vayeibek. vayomer 'el david zadiq 'atah mimeni ki 'atah gemaltani hatobah va'ani gemaltikha hara'ah. ve'at ve'atah higadta hayom 'et 'asher 'asitah 'iti tobah 'et 'asher sigerani ihoh beyadekha velo haragtani. vekhi yimza 'ish 'et 'oyebo veshilekho bederekh tobah ihoh yeshalemkha tobah takhat hayom hazeh 'asher 'asitah li. ve'atah hineh yada'ti ki malokh timlokh veqamah beyadekha mamlekhet yisra'el. ve'atah hishabe'ah li ihoh 'im takhrit 'et zar'i 'akharai ve'im tashmid 'et shemi mibet 'abi. vayishaba' david lesha'ul vayeilekh sha'ul 'el beito vedavid va'anashav 'alu 'al hamezudah. vayamat shemu'el vayiqabezu khal yisra'el vayispedu lo vayiqberuhu bebeito baramah vayaqam david vayeired 'el midbar paran. ve'ish bema'on uma'aseihu bakarmel veha'ish gadol me'od velo zon sheloshet 'alafim ve'elef 'izim vayhi bigzoz 'et zono bakarmel. veshem ha'ish nabal veshem 'ishto 'abigayil veha'ishah tobat sekhel vifat to'ar veha'ish qasheh vera' ma'alalim vehu khalebo khalibi. vayishma' david bamidbar ki gozez nabal 'et zono. vayishlakh david 'asarah ne'arim vayomer david lane'arim 'alu kharmelah ubatem 'el nabal ushe'eltem lo bishmi leshalom. va'amartem koh lekhai ve'atah shalom ubeitekha shalom vekhol 'asher lekha shalom. ve'atah shama'ti ki gozezim lakh 'atah haro'im 'asher lekha hayu 'imanu lo hekhlamnum velo nifqad lahem me'umah kal yemei heyotam bakarmel. she'al 'et ne'arekha veyagidu lakh veyimze'u hane'arim khen be'einekha ki 'al yom tob banu tenah na 'et 'asher timza yadekha la'abadekha ulebinkha ledavid. vayabo'u na'arei david vaydaberu 'el nabal kekhal hadebarim ha'eleh beshem david vayanukhu. vaya'an nabal 'et 'abdei david vayomer mi david umi ben yishai hayom rabu 'abadim hamitparezim 'ish mipenei 'adonav. velaqakhti 'et lakhmi ve'et meimai ve'et tibkhati 'asher tabakhti legozezai venatati la'anashim 'asher lo yada'ti 'ei mizeh hemah. vayahafkhu na'arei david ledarkam vayashubu vayabo'u vayagidu lo kekhol hadebarim ha'eleh. vayomer david la'anashav khigru 'ish 'et kharbo vayakhgeru 'ish 'et kharbo vayakhgor gam david 'et kharbo vaya'alu 'akharei david ke'arba' mei'ot 'ish umatayim yashebu 'al hakeilim. vela'abigayil 'eishet nabal higid na'ar 'ekhad meihane'arim leimor hineh shalakh david mal'akhim meihamidbar lebarekh 'et 'adoneinu vaya'at bahem. veha'anashim tobim lanu me'od velo hakhelamnu velo faqadnu me'umah kal yemei hithalakhnu 'itam bihyoteinu basadeh. khomah hayu 'aleinu gam laylah gam yomam kal yemei heyoteinu 'imam ro'im hazon. ve'atah de'i ure'i mah ta'asi ki khaletah hara'ah 'el 'adoneinu ve'al kal beito vehu ben beliya'al midaber 'eilav. vatemaher 'abogayil 'abigayil vatiqakh matayim lekhem ushenayim niblei yayin vekhamesh zon 'asavot 'asuyot vekhamesh se'im qali umei'ah zimuqim umatayim debeilim vatasem 'al hakhamorim. vatomer lin'areha 'ibru lefanai hini 'akhareikhem ba'ah ule'ishah nabal lo higidah. vehayah hi rokhebet 'al hakhamor veyoredet beseiter hahar vehineh david va'anashav yoredim liqratah vatifgosh 'otam. vedavid 'amar 'akh lasheqer shamarti 'et kal 'asher lazeh bamidbar velo nifqad mikal 'asher lo me'umah vayasheb li ra'ah takhat tobah. koh ya'aseh 'elohim le'oyebei david vekhoh yosif 'im 'ash'ir mikal 'asher lo 'ad haboqer mashtin beqir. vateire 'abigayil 'et david vatemaher vateired mei'al hakhamor vatipol le'apei david 'al paneha vatishtakhu 'arez. vatipol 'al raglav vatomer bi 'ani 'adoni he'avon utedaber na 'amatekha be'azenekha ushema' 'et dibrei 'amatekha. 'al na yasim 'adoni 'et libo 'el 'ish habeliya'al hazeh 'al nabal ki khishmo ken hu nabal shemo unebalah 'imo va'ani 'amatekha lo ra'iti 'et na'arei 'adoni 'asher shalakheta. ve'atah 'adoni khai ihoh vekhei nafshekha 'asher mena'akha ihoh mibo bedamim vehosheia' yadekha lakh ve'atah yihyu khenabal 'oyebekha vehambaqshim 'el 'adoni ra'ah. ve'atah haberakhah hazot 'asher heibi shifkhatekha ladoni venitenah lane'arim hamithalekhim beraglei 'adoni. sa na lefesha' 'amatekha ki 'asoh ya'aseh ihoh ladoni bayit ne'eman ki milkhamot ihoh 'adoni nilkham vera'ah lo timazei bekha miyamekha. vayaqam 'adam lirdafekha ulebaqesh 'et nafshekha vehayetah nefesh 'adoni zerurah bizror hakhayim 'et ihoh 'elohekha ve'et nefesh 'oyebekha yeqale'enah betokh kaf haqala'. vehayah ki ya'aseh ihoh ladoni kekhol 'asher diber 'et hatobah 'alekha vezivekha lenagid 'al yisra'el. velo tihyeh zot lekha lefuqah ulemikhshol leb ladoni velishpakh dam khinam ulehoshia' 'adoni lo veheitib ihoh ladoni vezakharta 'et 'amatekha. vayomer david la'abigal barukh ihoh 'elohei yisra'el 'asher shelakhekh hayom hazeh liqrati. ubarukh ta'mekh uberukhah 'at 'asher kelitini hayom hazeh mibo bedamim vehosheia' yadi li. ve'ulam khai ihoh 'elohei yisra'el 'asher mena'ani meihara' 'otakh ki lulei mihart vataboti vatabot liqrati ki 'im notar lenabal 'ad 'or haboqer mashtin beqir. vayiqakh david miyadah 'et 'asher heibi'ah lo velah 'amar 'ali leshalom lebeitekh re'i shama'ti beqolekh va'esa panayikh. vatabo 'abigayil 'el nabal vehineh lo mishteh bebeito kemishteh hamelekh veleb nabal tob 'alav vehu shikor 'ad me'od velo higidah lo dabar qaton vegadol 'ad 'or haboqer. vayhi baboqer bezet hayayin minabal vataged lo 'ishto 'et hadebarim ha'eleh vayamat libo beqirbo vehu hayah le'aben. vayhi ka'aseret hayamim vayigof ihoh 'et nabal vayamot. vayishma' david ki met nabal vayomer barukh ihoh 'asher rab 'et rib kherpati miyad nabal ve'et 'abdo khasakh meira'ah ve'et ra'at nabal heishib ihoh berosho vayishlakh david vaydaber ba'abigayil leqakhtah lo le'ishah. vayabo'u 'abdei david 'el 'abigayil hakarmelah vaydaberu 'eileha leimor david shelakhanu 'eilayikh leqakhtekh lo le'ishah. vataqam vatishtakhu 'apayim 'arezah vatomer hineh 'amatekha leshifkhah lirkhoz raglei 'abdei 'adoni. vatemaher vataqam 'abigayil vatirkab 'al hakhamor vekhamesh na'aroteha haholekhot leraglah vateilekh 'akharei mal'akhei david vatehi lo le'ishah. ve'et 'akhino'am laqakh david miyizre'el vatihyena gam sheteihen lo lenashim. vesha'ul natan 'et mikhal bito 'eishet david lefalti ben layish 'asher migalim. vayabo'u hazifim 'el sha'ul hagib'atah leimor halo david mistater begib'at hakhakhilah 'al penei hayshimon. vayaqam sha'ul vayeired 'el midbar zif ve'ito sheloshet 'alafim 'ish bekhurei yisra'el lebaqesh 'et david bemidbar zif. vayikhan sha'ul begib'at hakhakhilah 'asher 'al penei hayshimon 'al hadarekh vedavid yosheb bamidbar vayar ki ba sha'ul 'akharav hamidbarah. vayishlakh david meragelim vayeida' ki ba sha'ul 'el nakhon. vayaqam david vayabo 'el hamaqom 'asher khanah sham sha'ul vayar david 'et hamaqom 'asher shakhab sham sha'ul ve'abner ben ner sar zeba'o vesha'ul shokheb bama'gal veha'am khonim sebiboto sebibotav. vaya'an david vayomer 'el 'akhimelekh hakhiti ve'el 'abishai ben zeruyah 'akhi yo'ab leimor mi yeired 'iti 'el sha'ul 'el hamakhaneh vayomer 'abishai 'ani 'eired 'imakh. vayabo david va'abishai 'el ha'am laylah vehineh sha'ul shokheb yashen bama'gal vakhanito me'ukhah ba'arez mera'ashoto mera'ashotav ve'abner veha'am shokhebim sebiboto sebibotav. vayomer 'abishai 'el david sigar 'elohim hayom 'et 'oyibkha beyadekha ve'atah 'akenu na bakhanit uba'arez pa'am 'akhat velo 'eshneh lo. vayomer david 'el 'abishai 'al tashkhiteihu ki mi shalakh yado bimshiakh ihoh veniqah. vayomer david khai ihoh ki 'im ihoh yigafenu 'o yomo yabo vamet 'o bamilkhamah yeired venispah. khalilah li ihoh misheloakh yadi bimshiakh ihoh ve'atah qakh na 'et hakhanit 'asher mera'ashoto mera'ashotav ve'et zapakhat hamayim veneilakhah lanu. vayiqakh david 'et hakhanit ve'et zapakhat hamayim meira'ashotei sha'ul vayeilekhu lahem ve'en ro'eh ve'en yodeia' ve'en meiqiz ki khulam yesheinim ki tardeimat ihoh nafelah 'aleihem. vaya'abor david ha'eiber vaya'amod 'al rosh hahar meirakhoq rab hamaqom beineihem. vayiqra david 'el ha'am ve'el 'abner ben ner leimor halo ta'aneh 'abner vaya'an 'abner vayomer mi 'atah qarata 'el hamelekh. vayomer david 'el 'abner halo 'ish 'atah umi khamokha beyisra'el velamah lo shamarta 'el 'adonekha hamelekh ki ba 'akhad ha'am lehashkhit 'et hamelekh 'adonekha. lo tob hadabar hazeh 'asher 'asita khai ihoh ki benei mavet 'atem 'asher lo shemartem 'al 'adoneikhem 'al meshiakh ihoh ve'atah re'eh 'ei khanit hamelekh ve'et zapakhat hamayim 'asher mera'ashoto mera'ashotav. vayaker sha'ul 'et qol david vayomer haqolkha zeh beni david vayomer david qoli 'adoni hamelekh. vayomer lamah zeh 'adoni rodef 'akharei 'abdo ki meh 'asiti umah beyadi ra'ah. ve'atah yishma' na 'adoni hamelekh 'et dibrei 'abdo 'im ihoh hesitekha bi yarakh minkhah ve'im benei ha'adam 'arurim hem lifnei ihoh ki geireshuni hayom meihistapeiakh benakhalat ihoh leimor lekh 'abod 'elohim 'akheirim. ve'atah 'al yipol dami 'arzah mineged penei ihoh ki yaza melekh yisra'el lebaqesh 'et par'osh 'ekhad ka'asher yirdof haqorei beharim. vayomer sha'ul khatati shub beni david ki lo 'ara' lekha 'od takhat 'asher yaqerah nafshi be'einekha hayom hazeh hineh hiskalti va'eshgeh harbeh me'od. vaya'an david vayomer hineh hakhanit khanit hamelekh veya'abor 'ekhad meihane'arim veyiqakheha. ihoh yashib la'ish 'et zidqato ve'et 'emunato 'asher netanekha ihoh hayom beyad velo 'abiti lishloakh yadi bimshiakh ihoh. vehineh ka'asher gadelah nafshekha hayom hazeh be'einai ken tigdal nafshi be'einei ihoh veyazileini mikal zarah. vayomer sha'ul 'el david barukh 'atah beni david gam 'asoh ta'aseh vegam yakhol tukhal vayeilekh david ledarko vesha'ul shab limqomo. vayomer david 'el libo 'atah 'esafeh yom 'ekhad beyad sha'ul 'en li tob ki himalet 'imalet 'el 'erez pelishtim veno'ash mimeni sha'ul lebaqsheini 'od bekhal gebul yisra'el venimlati miyado. vayaqam david vaya'abor hu veshesh mei'ot 'ish 'asher 'imo 'el 'akhish ben ma'okh melekh gat. vayeisheb david 'im 'akhish begat hu va'anashav 'ish ubeito david ushetei nashav 'akhino'am hayizre'eilit va'abigayil 'eishet nabal hakarmelit. vayugad lesha'ul ki barakh david gat velo yosaf yasaf 'od lebaqsho. vayomer david 'el 'akhish 'im na mazati khen be'einekha yitenu li maqom be'akhat 'arei hasadeh ve'eishebah sham velamah yeisheb 'abdekha be'ir hamamlakhah 'imakh. vayiten lo 'akhish bayom hahu 'et ziqlag lakhen hayetah ziqlag lemalkhei yehudah 'ad hayom hazeh. vayhi mispar hayamim 'asher yashab david bisdeh felishtim yamim ve'arba'ah khodashim. vaya'al david va'anashav vayifshetu 'el hageshuri vehagirzi vehagizri veha'amaleiqi ki henah yoshebot ha'arez 'asher mei'olam bo'akha shurah ve'ad 'erez mizrayim. vehikah david 'et ha'arez velo yekhayeh 'ish ve'ishah velaqakh zon ubaqar vakhamorim ugemalim ubegadim vayashab vayabo 'el 'akhish. vayomer 'akhish 'al peshatem hayom vayomer david 'al negeb yehudah ve'al negeb hayarkheme'eili ve'el negeb haqeini. ve'ish ve'ishah lo yekhayeh david lehabi gat leimor pen yagidu 'aleinu leimor koh 'asah david vekhoh mishpato kal hayamim 'asher yashab bisdeh felishtim. vaya'amen 'akhish bedavid leimor hab'esh hib'ish be'amo beyisra'el vehayah li le'ebed 'olam. vayhi bayamim hahem vayiqbezu felishtim 'et makhaneihem lazaba lehilakhem beyisra'el vayomer 'akhish 'el david yadoa' teida' ki 'iti teizei bamakhaneh 'atah va'anashekha. vayomer david 'el 'akhish lakhen 'atah teida' 'et 'asher ya'aseh 'abdekha vayomer 'akhish 'el david lakhen shomer leroshi 'asimekha kal hayamim. ushemu'el met vayispedu lo kal yisra'el vayiqberuhu baramah ube'iro vesha'ul heisir ha'obot ve'et hayide'onim meiha'arez. vayiqabezu felishtim vayabo'u vayakhanu beshunem vayiqboz sha'ul 'et kal yisra'el vayakhanu bagilboa'. vayar sha'ul 'et makhaneh felishtim vayira vayekherad libo me'od. vayish'al sha'ul ihoh velo 'anahu ihoh gam bakhalomot gam ba'urim gam banebi'im. vayomer sha'ul la'abadav baqeshu li 'eishet ba'alat 'ob ve'eilekhah 'eileha ve'edreshah bah vayomeru 'abadav 'eilav hineh 'eishet ba'alat 'ob be'en dor. vayitkhapes sha'ul vayilbash begadim 'akheirim vayeilekh hu ushenei 'anashim 'imo vayabo'u 'el ha'ishah layelah vayomer qasomi qasomi na li ba'ob veha'ali li 'et 'asher 'omar 'eilayikh. vatomer ha'ishah 'eilav hineh 'atah yada'ta 'et 'asher 'asah sha'ul 'asher hikhrit 'et ha'obot ve'et hayide'oni min ha'arez velamah 'atah mitnaqesh benafshi lahamiteini. vayishaba' lah sha'ul ihoh leimor khai ihoh 'im yiqerekh 'avon badabar hazeh. vatomer ha'ishah 'et mi 'a'aleh lakh vayomer 'et shemu'el ha'ali li. vateire ha'ishah 'et shemu'el vatiz'aq beqol gadol vatomer ha'ishah 'el sha'ul leimor lamah rimitani ve'atah sha'ul. vayomer lah hamelekh 'al tire'i ki mah ra'it vatomer ha'ishah 'el sha'ul 'elohim ra'iti 'olim min ha'arez. vayomer lah mah ta'oro vatomer 'ish zaqen 'oleh vehu 'oteh me'il vayeida' sha'ul ki shemu'el hu vayiqod 'apayim 'arzah vayishtakhu. vayomer shemu'el 'el sha'ul lamah hirgaztani leha'alot 'oti vayomer 'ul zar li me'od ufelishtim nilkhamim bi veilohim sar mei'alai velo 'anani 'od gam beyad hanebi'im gam bakhalomot va'eqra'eh lekha lehodi'eini mah 'e'eseh. vayomer shemu'el velamah tish'aleini ihoh sar mei'alekha vayhi 'arekha. vaya'as ihoh lo ka'asher diber beyadi vayiqra' ihoh 'et hamamlakhah miyadekha vayitenah lerei'akha ledavid. ka'asher lo shama'ta beqol ihoh velo 'asita kharon 'apo ba'amaleq 'al ken hadabar hazeh 'asah lekha ihoh hayom hazeh. veyiten ihoh gam 'et yisra'el 'imekha beyad pelishtim umakhar 'atah ubanekha 'imi gam 'et makhaneh yisra'el yiten ihoh beyad pelishtim. vaymaher sha'ul vayipol melo qomato 'arzah vayira me'od midibrei shemu'el gam koakh lo hayah bo ki lo 'akhal lekhem kal hayom vekhal halayelah. vatabo ha'ishah 'el sha'ul vateire ki nibhal me'od vatomer 'eilav hineh shame'ah shifkhatekha beqolekha va'asim nafshi bekhapi va'eshma' 'et debarekha 'asher dibarta 'eilai. ve'atah shema' na gam 'atah beqol shifkhatekha ve'asimah lefanekha pat lekhem ve'ekhol vihi bekha koakh ki teilekh badarekh. vayma'en vayomer lo 'okhal vayifrezu bo 'abadav vegam ha'ishah vayishma' leqolam vayaqam meiha'arez vayeisheb 'el hamitah. vela'ishah 'eigel marbeq babayit vatemaher vatizbakheihu vatiqakh qemakh vatalash vatofeihu mazot. vatagesh lifnei sha'ul velifnei 'abadav vayokheilu vayaqumu vayeilekhu balaylah hahu. vayiqbezu felishtim 'et kal makhaneihem 'afeiqah veyisra'el khonim ba'ayin 'asher beyizre'el. vesarnei felishtim 'oberim lemei'ot vela'alafim vedavid va'anashav 'oberim ba'akharonah 'im 'akhish. vayomeru sarei felishtim mah ha'ibrim ha'eleh vayomer 'akhish 'el sarei felishtim halo zeh david 'ebed sha'ul melekh yisra'el 'asher hayah 'iti zeh yamim 'o zeh shanim velo mazati bo me'umah miyom nafelo 'ad hayom hazeh. vayiqzefu 'alav sarei felishtim vayomeru lo sarei felishtim hasheb 'et ha'ish veyashob 'el meqomo 'asher hifqadto sham velo yeired 'imanu bamilkhamah velo yihyeh lanu lesatan bamilkhamah ubameh yitrazeh zeh 'el 'adonav halo berashei ha'anashim hahem. halo zeh david 'asher ya'anu lo bamekholot leimor hikah sha'ul ba'alafav vedavid beribboto beribbotav. vayiqra 'akhish 'el david vayomer 'eilav khai ihoh ki yashar 'atah vetob be'einai zeitekha ubo'akha 'iti bamakhaneh ki lo mazati bekha ra'ah miyom bo'akha 'eilai 'ad hayom hazeh ube'einei haseranim lo tob 'atah. ve'atah shub velekh beshalom velo ta'aseh ra' be'einei sarnei felishtim. vayomer david 'el 'akhish ki meh 'asiti umah mazata be'abdekha miyom 'asher hayiti lefanekha 'ad hayom hazeh ki lo 'abo venilkhamti be'oyebei 'adoni hamelekh. vaya'an 'akhish vayomer 'el david yada'ti ki tob 'atah be'einai kemal'akh 'elohim 'akh sarei felishtim 'ameru lo ya'aleh 'imanu bamilkhamah. ve'atah hashkem baboqer ve'abdei 'adonekha 'asher ba'u 'itakh vehishkamtem baboqer ve'or lakhem valeikhu. vayashkem david hu va'anashav lalekhet baboqer lashub 'el 'erez pelishtim ufelishtim 'alu yizre'el. vayhi bebo david va'anashav ziqlag bayom hashelishi va'amaleiqi fashetu 'el negeb ve'el ziqlag vayaku 'et ziqlag vayisrefu 'otah ba'esh. vayishbu 'et hanashim 'asher bah miqaton ve'ad gadol lo heimitu 'ish vayinhagu vayeilekhu ledarkam. vayabo david va'anashav 'el ha'ir vehineh serufah ba'esh unesheihem ubeneihem ubenoteihem nishbu. vayisa david veha'am 'asher 'ito 'et qolam vayibku 'ad 'asher 'en bahem koakh libkot. ushetei neshei david nishbu 'akhino'am hayizre'eilit va'abigayil 'eishet nabal hakarmeli. vateizer ledavid me'od ki 'ameru ha'am lesaqelo ki marah nefesh kal ha'am 'ish 'al beno banav ve'al benotav vayitkhazeq david ihoh 'elohav. vayomer david 'el 'ebyatar hakohen ben 'akhimelekh hagishah na li ha'eifod vayagesh 'ebyatar 'et ha'eifod 'el david. vayish'al david ihoh leimor 'erdof 'akharei hagedud hazeh ha'asigenu vayomer lo redof ki haseg tasig vehazel tazil. vayeilekh david hu veshesh mei'ot 'ish 'asher 'ito vayabo'u 'ad nakhal habesor vehanotarim 'amadu. vayirdof david hu ve'arba' mei'ot 'ish vaya'amdu matayim 'ish 'asher pigeru mei'abor 'et nakhal habesor. vayimze'u 'ish mizri basadeh vayiqkhu 'oto 'el david vayitenu lo lekhem vayokhal vayashquhu mayim. vayitenu lo felakh debeilah ushenei zimuqim vayokhal vatashab rukho 'eilav ki lo 'akhal lekhem velo shatah mayim sheloshah yamim usheloshah leilot. vayomer lo david lemi 'atah ve'ei mizeh 'atah vayomer na'ar mizri 'anokhi 'ebed le'ish 'amaleiqi vaya'azbeini 'adoni ki khaliti hayom sheloshah. 'anakhnu pashatnu negeb hakereiti ve'al 'asher lihudah ve'al negeb kaleb ve'et ziqlag sarafnu ba'esh. vayomer 'eilav david hatorideini 'el hagedud hazeh vayomer hishabe'ah li beilohim 'im temiteini ve'im tasgireini beyad 'adoni ve'oridkha 'el hagedud hazeh. vayorideihu vehineh netushim 'al penei khal ha'arez 'okhelim veshotim vekhogegim bekhol hashalal hagadol 'asher laqekhu mei'erez pelishtim umei'erez yehudah. vayakem david meihaneshef ve'ad ha'ereb lemakhoratam velo nimlat meihem 'ish ki 'im 'arba' mei'ot 'ish na'ar 'asher rakhebu 'al hagemalim vayanusu. vayazel david 'et kal 'asher laqekhu 'amaleq ve'et shetei nashav hizil david. velo ne'dar lahem min haqaton ve'ad hagadol ve'ad banim ubanot umishalal ve'ad kal 'asher laqekhu lahem hakol heishib david. vayiqakh david 'et kal hazon vehabaqar nahagu lifnei hamiqneh hahu vayomeru zeh shelal david. vayabo david 'el matayim ha'anashim 'asher pigeru milekhet 'akharei david vayoshibum benakhal habesor vayeize'u liqrat david veliqrat ha'am 'asher 'ito vayigash david 'et ha'am vayish'al lahem leshalom. vaya'an kal 'ish ra' ubeliya'al meiha'anashim 'asher halekhu 'im david vayomeru ya'an 'asher lo halekhu 'imi lo niten lahem meihashalal 'asher hizalnu ki 'im 'ish 'et 'ishto ve'et banav veyinhagu veyeileikhu. vayomer david lo ta'asu khen 'ekhai 'et 'asher natan ihoh lanu vayishmor 'otanu vayiten 'et hagedud haba 'aleinu beyadeinu. umi yishma' lakhem ladabar hazeh ki kekheileq hayored bamilkhamah ukhekheileq hayosheb 'al hakeilim yakhdav yakhaloqu. vayhi meihayom hahu vama'elah vaysimeha lekhoq ulemishpat leyisra'el 'ad hayom hazeh. vayabo david 'el ziqlag vayshalakh meihashalal leziqnei yehudah lerei'eihu leimor hineh lakhem berakhah mishelal 'oyebei ihoh. la'asher bebet 'el vela'asher beramot negeb vela'asher beyatir. vela'asher ba'aro'er vela'asher besifmot vela'asher be'eshtemoa'. vela'asher berakhal vela'asher be'arei hayerakhme'eili vela'asher be'arei haqeini. vela'asher bekharemah vela'asher bebor 'ashan vela'asher ba'atakh. vela'asher bekhebron ulekhal hameqomot 'asher hithalekh sham david hu va'anashav. ufelishtim nilkhamim beyisra'el vayanusu 'anshei yisra'el mipenei felishtim vayipelu khalalim behar hagilboa'. vayadbequ felishtim 'et sha'ul ve'et banav vayaku felishtim 'et yehonatan ve'et 'abinadab ve'et malki shua' benei sha'ul. vatikhbad hamilkhamah 'el sha'ul vayimza'uhu hamorim 'anashim baqashet vayakhel me'od meihamorim. vayomer sha'ul lenosei kheilav shelof kharbekha vedaqereini bah pen yabo'u ha'areilim ha'eleh udeqaruni vehit'alelu bi velo 'abah nosei kheilav ki yarei me'od vayiqakh sha'ul 'et hakhereb vayipol 'aleha. vayar nosei kheilav ki met sha'ul vayipol gam hu 'al kharbo vayamat 'imo. vayamat sha'ul usheloshet banav venosei kheilav gam kal 'anashav bayom hahu yakhdav. vayir'u 'anshei yisra'el 'asher be'eiber ha'eimeq va'asher be'eiber hayarden ki nasu 'anshei yisra'el vekhi meitu sha'ul ubanav vaya'azbu 'et he'arim vayanusu vayabo'u felishtim vayeishebu bahen. vayhi mimakhorat vayabo'u felishtim lefashet 'et hakhalalim vayimze'u 'et sha'ul ve'et sheloshet banav nofelim behar hagilboa'. vayikhretu 'et rosho vayafshitu 'et keilav vayshalekhu be'erez pelishtim sabib lebaser bet 'azabeihem ve'et ha'am. vayasimu 'et keilav bet 'ashtarot ve'et geviyato taqe'u bekhomat bet shan. vayishme'u 'eilav yoshebei yabesh gil'ad 'et 'asher 'asu felishtim lesha'ul. vayaqumu kal 'ish khayil vayeilekhu khal halaylah vayiqkhu 'et geviyat sha'ul ve'et geviyot banav meikhomat bet shan vayabo'u yabeishah vayisrefu 'otam sham. vayiqkhu 'et 'azmoteihem vayiqberu takhat ha'eshel beyabeishah vayazumu shib'at yamim.

vayhi 'akharei mot sha'ul vedavid shab meihakot 'et ha'amaleq vayeisheb david beziqlag yamim shenayim. vayhi bayom hashelishi vehineh 'ish ba min hamakhaneh mei'im sha'ul ubegadav qeru'im va'adamah 'al rosho vayhi bebo'o 'el david vayipol 'arzah vayishtakhu. vayomer lo david 'ei mizeh tabo vayomer 'eilav mimakhaneh yisra'el nimlateti. vayomer 'eilav david meh hayah hadabar haged na li vayomer 'asher nas ha'am min hamilkhamah vegam harbeh nafal min ha'am vayamutu vegam sha'ul vihonatan beno meitu. vayomer david 'el hana'ar hamagid lo 'ekh yada'ta ki met sha'ul vihonatan beno. vayomer hana'ar hamagid lo niqro niqreiti behar hagilboa' vehineh sha'ul nish'an 'al khanito vehineh harekheb uba'alei haparashim hidbiquhu. vayifen 'akharav vayir'eini vayiqra 'eilai va'omar hineini. vayomer li mi 'atah vayomer va'omar 'eilav 'amaleiqi 'anokhi. vayomer 'eilai 'amad na 'alai umoteteini ki 'akhazani hashabaz ki khal 'od nafshi bi. va'e'emod 'alav va'amoteteihu ki yada'ti ki lo yikhyeh 'akharei niflo va'eqakh haneizer 'asher 'al rosho ve'ez'adah 'asher 'al zero'o va'abi'em 'el 'adoni henah. vayakhazeq david bibgado bibgadav vayiqra'em vegam kal ha'anashim 'asher 'ito. vayispedu vayibku vayazumu 'ad ha'areb 'al sha'ul ve'al yehonatan beno ve'al 'am ihoh ve'al bet yisra'el ki nafelu bekhareb. vayomer david 'el hana'ar hamagid lo 'ei mizeh 'atah vayomer ben 'ish ger 'amaleiqi 'anokhi. vayomer 'eilav david 'ekh lo yareita lishloakh yadekha leshakhet 'et meshiakh ihoh. vayiqra david le'akhad meihane'arim vayomer gash pega' bo vayakeihu vayamot. vayomer 'eilav david dameikha damekha 'al roshekha ki fikha 'anah bekha leimor 'anokhi motati 'et meshiakh ihoh. vayqonen david 'et haqinah hazot 'al sha'ul ve'al yehonatan beno. vayomer lelamed benei yehudah qashet hineh khetubah 'al seifer hayashar. hazebi yisra'el 'al bamotekha khalal 'ekh nafelu giborim. 'al tagidu begat 'al tebaseru bekhuzot 'ashqelon pen tismakhnah benot pelishtim pen ta'alozenah benot ha'areilim. harei bagilboa' 'al tal ve'al matar 'aleikhem usedei terumot ki sham nig'al magen giborim magen sha'ul beli mashiakh bashamen. midam khalalim meikheileb giborim qeshet yehonatan lo nasog 'akhor vekhereb sha'ul lo tashub reiqam. sha'ul vihonatan hane'ehabim vehane'imim bekhayeihem ubemotam lo nifradu minesharim qalu mei'arayot gabeiru. benot yisra'el 'el sha'ul bekhenah hamalbishkhem shani 'im 'adanim hama'aleh 'adi zahab 'al lebushekhen. 'ekh nafelu giborim betokh hamilkhamah yehonatan 'al bamotekha khalal. zar li 'alekha 'akhi yehonatan na'amta li me'od nifle'atah 'ahabatekha li mei'ahabat nashim. 'ekh nafelu giborim vayobedu kelei milkhamah. vayhi 'akharei khen vayish'al david ihoh leimor ha'e'eleh be'akhat 'arei yehudah vayomer ihoh 'eilav 'aleh vayomer david 'anah 'e'eleh vayomer khebronah. vaya'al sham david vegam shetei nashav 'akhino'am hayizre'eilit va'abigayil 'eishet nabal hakarmeli. va'anashav 'asher 'imo he'elah david 'ish ubeito vayeishebu be'arei khebron. vayabo'u 'anshei yehudah vayimshekhu sham 'et david lemelekh 'al bet yehudah vayagidu ledavid leimor 'anshei yabesh gil'ad 'asher qaberu 'et sha'ul. vayishlakh david mal'akhim 'el 'anshei yabesh gil'ad vayomer 'aleihem berukhim 'atem ihoh 'asher 'asitem hakhesed hazeh 'im 'adoneikhem 'im sha'ul vatiqberu 'oto. ve'atah ya'as ihoh 'imakhem khesed ve'emet vegam 'anokhi 'e'eseh 'itekhem hatobah hazot 'asher 'asitem hadabar hazeh. ve'atah tekhezaqnah yedeikhem vihyu libnei khayil ki met 'adoneikhem sha'ul vegam 'oti mashekhu bet yehudah lemelekh 'aleihem. ve'abner ben ner sar zaba 'asher lesha'ul laqakh 'et 'ish boshet ben sha'ul vaya'abireihu makhanayim. vayamlikheihu 'el hagil'ad ve'el ha'ashuri ve'el yizre'el ve'al 'efrayim ve'al binyamin ve'al yisra'el kuloh. ben 'arba'im shanah 'ish boshet ben sha'ul bemalekho 'al yisra'el ushetayim shanim malakh 'akh bet yehudah hayu 'akharei david. vayhi mispar hayamim 'asher hayah david melekh bekhebron 'al bet yehudah sheba' shanim veshishah khodashim. vayeizei 'abner ben ner ve'abdei 'ish boshet ben sha'ul mimakhanayim gib'onah. veyo'ab ben zeruyah ve'abdei david yaze'u vayifgeshum 'al bereikhat gib'on yakhdav vayeishebu 'eleh 'al habereikhah mizeh ve'eleh 'al habereikhah mizeh. vayomer 'abner 'el yo'ab yaqumu na hane'arim visakhaqu lefaneinu vayomer yo'ab yaqumu. vayaqumu vaya'abru bemispar shenem 'asar lebinyamin ule'ish boshet ben sha'ul ushenem 'asar mei'abdei david. vayakhaziqu 'ish berosh rei'eihu vekharbo bezad rei'eihu vayipelu yakhdav vayiqra lamaqom hahu khelqat hazurim 'asher begib'on. vatehi hamilkhamah qashah 'ad me'od bayom hahu vayinagef 'abner ve'anshei yisra'el lifnei 'abdei david. vayihyu sham sheloshah benei zeruyah yo'ab va'abishai va'asah'el va'asah'el qal beraglav ke'akhad hazebayim 'asher basadeh. vayirdof 'asah'el 'akharei 'abner velo natah lalekhet 'al hayamin ve'al hasemol mei'akharei 'abner. vayifen 'abner 'akharav vayomer ha'atah zeh 'asah'el vayomer 'anokhi. vayomer lo 'abner neteh lekha 'al yeminekha 'o 'al semolekha ve'ekhoz lekha 'ekhad meihane'arim veqakh lekha 'et khalizato velo 'abah 'asah'el lasur mei'akharav. vayosef 'od 'abner leimor 'el 'asah'el sur lekha mei'akharai lamah 'akekah 'arzah ve'ekh 'esa fanai 'el yo'ab 'akhikha. vayma'en lasur vayakeihu 'abner be'akharei hakhanit 'el hakhomesh vateizei hakhanit mei'akharav vayipal sham vayamat takhato takhtav vayhi kal haba 'el hamaqom 'asher nafal sham 'asah'el vayamot vaya'amodu. vayirdefu yo'ab va'abishai 'akharei 'abner vehashemesh ba'ah vehemah ba'u 'ad gib'at 'amah 'asher 'al penei giakh derekh midbar gib'on. vayitqabezu benei binyamin 'akharei 'abner vayihyu la'agudah 'ekhat vaya'amdu 'al rosh gib'ah 'ekhat. vayiqra 'abner 'el yo'ab vayomer halanezakh tokhal khereb halo yada'tah ki marah tihyeh ba'akharonah ve'ad matai lo tomar la'am lashub mei'akharei 'akheihem. vayomer yo'ab khai ha'elohim ki lulei dibarta ki 'az meihaboqer na'alah ha'am 'ish mei'akharei 'akhiv. vayitqa' yo'ab bashofar vaya'amdu kal ha'am velo yirdefu 'od 'akharei yisra'el velo yasefu 'od lehilakhem. ve'abner va'anashav halekhu ba'arabah kol halaylah hahu vaya'abru 'et hayarden vayeilekhu kal habitron vayabo'u makhanayim. veyo'ab b mei'akharei 'abner vayiqboz 'et kal ha'am vayipaqedu mei'abdei david tish'ah 'asar 'ish va'asah 'el ve'abdei david hiku mibinyamin ube'anshei 'abner shelosh mei'ot veshishim 'ish meitu. vayis'u 'et 'asah'el vayiqberuhu beqeber 'abiv 'asher bet lakhem vayeilekhu khal halaylah yo'ab va'anashav vayei'or lahem bekhebron. vatehi hamilkhamah 'arukah ben bet sha'ul uben bet david vedavid holekh vekhazeq ubet sha'ul holekhim vedalim. vayeiledu vayivaledu ledavid banim bekhebron vayhi bekhoro 'amnon la'akhino'am hayizre'eilit. umishneihu khil'ab la'abigel la'abigayil 'eishet nabal hakarmeli vehashelishi 'abshalom ben ma'akhah bat talmai melekh geshur. veharebi'i 'adoniyah ben khagit vehakhamishi shefatyah ben 'abital. vehashishi yitre'am le'eglah 'eishet david 'eleh yuledu ledavid bekhebron. vayhi bihyot hamilkhamah ben bet sha'ul uben bet david ve'abner hayah mitkhazeq bebet sha'ul. ulesha'ul pilegesh ushemah rizpah bat 'ayah vayomer 'el 'abner madua' batah 'el pilegesh 'abi. vayikhar le'abner me'od 'al dibrei 'ish boshet vayomer harosh keleb 'anokhi 'asher lihudah hayom 'e'eseh khesed 'im bet sha'ul 'abikha 'el 'ekhav ve'el meirei'eihu velo himzitikha beyad david vatifqod 'alai 'avon ha'ishah hayom. koh ya'aseh 'elohim le'abner vekhoh yosif lo ki ka'asher nishba' ihoh ledavid ki khen 'e'eseh lo. leha'abir hamamlakhah mibet sha'ul ulehaqim 'et kisei david 'al yisra'el ve'al yehudah midan ve'ad be'er shaba'. velo yakhol 'od lehashib 'et 'abner dabar miyir'ato 'oto. vayishlakh 'abner mal'akhim 'el david takhato takhtav leimor lemi 'arez leimor karetah beritekha 'iti vehineh yadi 'imakh lehaseb 'eilekha 'et kal yisra'el. vayomer tob 'ani 'ekhrot 'itekha berit 'akh dabar 'ekhad 'anokhi sho'el mei'itekha leimor lo tir'eh 'et panai ki 'im lifnei hebi'akha 'et mikhal bat sha'ul bebo'akha lir'ot 'et panai. vayishlakh david mal'akhim 'el 'ish boshet ben sha'ul leimor tenah 'et 'ishti 'et mikhal 'asher 'eirasti li bemei'ah 'arelot pelishtim. vayishlakh 'ish boshet vayiqakheha mei'im 'ish mei'im palti'el ben lush layish. vayeilekh 'itah 'ishah halokh ubakhoh 'akhareha 'ad bakhurim vayomer 'eilav 'abner lekh shub vayashob. udebar 'abner hayah 'im ziqnei yisra'el leimor gam temol gam shilshom heyitem mebaqshim 'et david lemelekh 'aleikhem. ve'atah 'asu ki ihoh 'amar 'el david leimor beyad david 'abdi hoshia' 'et 'ami yisra'el miyad pelishtim umiyad kal 'oyebeihem. vaydaber gam 'abner be'azenei binyamin vayeilekh gam 'abner ledaber be'azenei david bekhebron 'et kal 'asher tob be'einei yisra'el ube'einei kal bet binyamin. vayabo 'abner 'el david khebron ve'ito 'esrim 'anashim vaya'as david le'abner vela'anashim 'asher 'ito mishteh. vayomer 'abner 'el david 'aqumah ve'eileikhah ve'eqbezah 'el 'adoni hamelekh 'et kal yisra'el veyikhretu 'itekha berit umalakhta bekhol 'asher te'aveh nafshekha vayeshalakh david 'et 'abner vayeilekh beshalom. vehineh 'abdei david veyo'ab ba meihagedud veshalal rab 'imam heibi'u ve'abner 'einenu 'im david bekhebron ki shilekho vayeilekh beshalom. veyo'ab vekhal hazaba 'asher 'ito ba'u vayagidu leyo'ab leimor ba 'abner ben ner 'el hamelekh vayshalekheihu vayeilekh beshalom. vayabo yo'ab 'el hamelekh vayomer meh 'asitah hineh ba 'abner 'eilekha lamah zeh shilakhto vayeilekh halokh. yada'ta 'et 'abner ben ner ki lefatotekha ba velada'at 'et moza'akha ve'et mibo'ekha moba'ekha velada'at 'et kal 'asher 'atah 'oseh. vayeizei yo'ab mei'im david vayishlakh mal'akhim 'akharei 'abner vayashibu 'oto mibor hasirah vedavid lo yada'. vayashab 'abner khebron vayateihu yo'ab 'el tokh hasha'ar ledaber 'ito basheli vayakeihu sham hakhomesh vayamat bedam 'asah 'el 'akhiv. vayishma' david mei'akharei khen vayomer naqi 'anokhi umamlakhti mei'im ihoh 'ad 'olam midemei 'abner ben ner. yakhulu 'al rosh yo'ab ve'el kal bet 'abiv ve'al yikaret mibet yo'ab zab umezora' umakhaziq bapelekh venofel bakhereb vakhasar lakhem. veyo'ab va'abishai 'akhiv haregu le'abner 'al 'asher heimit 'et 'asah'el 'akhihem begib'on bamilkhamah. vayomer david 'el yo'ab ve'el kal ha'am 'asher 'ito qir'u bigdeikhem vekhigru saqim vesifdu lifnei 'abner vehamelekh david holekh 'akharei hamitah. vayiqberu 'et 'abner bekhebron vayisa hamelekh 'et qolo vayeibek 'el qeber 'abner vayibku kal ha'am. vayqonen hamelekh 'el 'abner vayomar hakemot nabal yamut 'abner. yadekha lo 'asurot veraglekha lo linkhushtayim hugashu kinfol lifnei benei 'avlah nafaleta vayosifu khal ha'am libkot 'alav. vayabo khal ha'am lehabrot 'et david lekhem be'od hayom vayishaba' david leimor koh ya'aseh li 'elohim vekhoh yosif ki 'im lifnei bo hashemesh 'et'am lekhem 'o khal me'umah. vekhal ha'am hikiru vayitab be'eineihem kekhol 'asher 'asah hamelekh be'einei khal ha'am tob. vayeide'u khal ha'am vekhal yisra'el bayom hahu ki lo hayetah meihamelekh lehamit 'et 'abner ben ner. vayomer hamelekh 'el 'abadav halo teide'u ki sar vegadol nafal hayom hazeh beyisra'el. ve'anokhi hayom rakh umashuakh melekh veha'anashim ha'eleh benei zeruyah qashim mimeni yeshalem ihoh le'oseh hara'ah kera'ato. vayishma' ben sha'ul ki met 'abner bekhebron vayirpu yadav vekhal yisra'el nibhalu. ushenei 'anashim sarei gedudim hayu ben sha'ul shem ha'ekhad ba'anah veshem hasheini reikhab benei rimon habe'eroti mibenei binyamin ki gam be'eirot teikhasheb 'al binyamin. vayibrekhu habe'eirotim gitayemah vayihyu sham garim 'ad hayom hazeh. velihonatan ben sha'ul ben nekheh raglayim ben khamesh shanim hayah bebo shemu'at sha'ul vihonatan miyizre'el vatisa'eihu 'omanto vatanos vayhi bekhafezah lanus vayipol vayipaseiakh ushemo mefiboshet. vayeilekhu benei rimon habe'eiroti reikhab uba'anah vayabo'u kekhom hayom 'el bet 'ish boshet vehu shokheb 'et mishkab hazahorayim. vehenah ba'u 'ad tokh habayit loqekhei khitim vayakuhu 'el hakhomesh vereikhab uba'anah 'akhiv nimlatu. vayabo'u habayit vehu shokheb 'al mitato bakhadar mishkabo vayakuhu vaymituhu vayasiru 'et rosho vayiqkhu 'et rosho vayeilekhu derekh ha'arabah kal halayelah. vayabi'u 'et rosh 'ish boshet 'el david khebron vayomeru 'el hamelekh hineh rosh 'ish boshet ben sha'ul 'oyibkha 'asher biqesh 'et nafshekha vayiten ihoh ladoni hamelekh neqamot hayom hazeh misha'ul umizar'o. vaya'an david 'et reikhab ve'et ba'anah 'akhiv benei rimon habe'eiroti vayomer lahem khai ihoh 'asher padah 'et nafshi mikal zarah. ki hamagid li leimor hineh met sha'ul vehu hayah khimbaser be'einav va'okhazah bo va'ehregeihu beziqlag 'asher letiti lo besorah. 'af ki 'anashim resha'im haregu 'et 'ish zadiq bebeito 'al mishkabo ve'atah halo 'abaqesh 'et damo miyedkhem ubi'arti 'etkhem min ha'arez. vayzav david 'et hane'arim vayahargum vayqazezu 'et yedeihem ve'et ragleihem vayitlu 'al habereikhah bekhebron ve'et rosh 'ish boshet laqakhu vayiqberu beqeber 'abner bekhebron. vayabo'u kal shibtei yisra'el 'el david khebronah vayomeru leimor hinu 'azmekha ubesarekha 'anakhenu. gam 'etmol gam shilshom bihyot sha'ul melekh 'aleinu 'atah hayitah hayita mozi hamozi vehameibi vehameibi 'et yisra'el vayomer ihoh lekha 'atah tir'eh 'et 'ami 'et yisra'el ve'atah tihyeh lenagid 'al yisra'el. vayabo'u kal ziqnei yisra'el 'el hamelekh khebronah vayikhrot lahem hamelekh david berit bekhebron lifnei ihoh vayimshekhu 'et david lemelekh 'al yisra'el. ben sheloshim shanah david bemalekho 'arba'im shanah malakh. bekhebron malakh 'al yehudah sheba' shanim veshishah khodashim ubirushalim malakh sheloshim veshalosh shanah 'al kal yisra'el vihudah. vayeilekh hamelekh va'anashav yerushalim 'el haybusi yosheb ha'arez vayomer ledavid leimor lo tabo henah ki 'im hesirekha ha'ivrim vehapiskhim leimor lo yabo david henah. vayilkod david 'et mezudat ziyon hi 'ir david. vayomer david bayom hahu kal makeh yebusi veyiga' bazinor ve'et hapiskhim ve'et ha'ivrim seno senu'ei nefesh david 'al ken yomeru 'iver ufiseiakh lo yabo 'el habayit. vayeisheb david bamezudah vayiqra lah 'ir david vayiben david sabib min hamilo vabayetah. vayeilekh david halokh vegadol ihoh 'elohei zeba'ot 'imo. vayishlakh khiram melekh zor mal'akhim 'el david va'azei 'arazim vekharashei 'ez vekharashei 'eben qir vayibnu bayit ledavid. vayeida' david ki hekhino ihoh lemelekh 'al yisra'el vekhi nisei mamlakhto ba'abur 'amo yisra'el. vayiqakh david 'od pilagshim venashim mirushalim 'akharei bo'o meikhebron vayivaledu 'od ledavid banim ubanot. ve'eleh shemot hayilodim lo birushalim shamua' veshobab venatan ushelomoh. veyibkhar ve'elishua' venefeg veyafia'. ve'elishama' ve'elyada' ve'elifalet. vayishme'u felishtim ki mashekhu 'et david lemelekh 'al yisra'el vaya'alu khal pelishtim lebaqesh 'et david vayishma' david vayeired 'el hamezudah. ufelishtim ba'u vayinateshu be'eimeq refa'im. vayish'al david ihoh leimor ha'e'eleh 'el pelishtim hatitenem beyadi vayomer ihoh 'el david 'aleh ki naton 'eten 'et hapelishtim beyadekha. vayabo david beba'al perazim vayakem sham david vayomer paraz ihoh 'et 'oyebai lefanai keferez mayim 'al ken qara shem hamaqom hahu ba'al perazim. vaya'azbu sham 'et 'azabeihem vayisa'em david va'anashav. vayosifu 'od pelishtim la'alot vayinateshu be'eimeq refa'im. vayish'al david ihoh vayomer lo ta'aleh haseb 'el 'akhareihem ubata lahem mimul bekha'im. vihi beshame'akha keshame'akha 'et qol ze'adah berashei habekha'im 'az tekheraz ki 'az yaza ihoh lefanekha lehakot bemakhaneh felishtim. vaya'as david ken ka'asher zivahu ihoh vayakh 'et pelishtim migeba' 'ad bo'akha gazer. vayosef 'od david 'et kal bakhur beyisra'el sheloshim 'alef. vayaqam vayeilekh david vekhal ha'am 'asher 'ito miba'alei yehudah leha'alot misham 'et 'aron ha'elohim 'asher niqra shem shem ihoh zeba'ot yosheb hakerubim 'alav. vayarkibu 'et 'aron ha'elohim 'el 'agalah khadashah vayisa'uhu mibet 'abinadab 'asher bagib'ah ve'uza ve'akhyo benei 'abinadab nohagim 'et ha'agalah khadashah. vayisa'uhu mibet 'abinadab 'asher bagib'ah 'im 'aron ha'elohim ve'akhyo holekh lifnei ha'aron. vedavid vekhal bet yisra'el mesakhaqim lifnei ihoh bekhol 'azei beroshim ubekhinorot ubinbalim ubetupim ubimna'an'im ubezelzelim. vayabo'u 'ad goren nakhon vayishlakh 'uza 'el 'aron ha'elohim vayokhez bo ki shametu habaqar. vayikhar 'af ihoh be'uzah vayakeihu sham ha'elohim 'al hashal vayamat sham 'im 'aron ha'elohim. vayikhar ledavid 'al 'asher paraz ihoh perez be'uzah vayiqra lamaqom hahu perez 'uzah 'ad hayom hazeh. vayira david 'et ihoh bayom hahu vayomer 'ekh yabo 'eilai 'aron ihoh. velo 'abah david lehasir 'eilav 'et 'aron ihoh 'al 'ir david vayateihu david bet 'obed 'edom hagiti. vayeisheb 'aron ihoh bet 'obed 'edom hagiti sheloshah khodashim vaybarekh ihoh 'et 'obed 'edom ve'et kal beito. vayugad lamelekh david leimor beirakh ihoh 'et bet 'obed 'edom ve'et kal 'asher lo ba'abur 'aron ha'elohim vayeilekh david vaya'al 'et 'aron ha'elohim mibet 'obed 'edom 'ir david besimkhah. vayhi ki za'adu nose'ei 'aron ihoh shishah ze'adim vayizbakh shor umeri. vedavid mekharker bekhal 'oz lifnei ihoh vedavid khagur 'eifod bad. vedavid vekhal bet yisra'el ma'alim 'et 'aron ihoh bitru'ah ubeqol shofar. vehayah 'aron ihoh ba 'ir david umikhal bat sha'ul nishqefah be'ad hakhalon vateire 'et hamelekh david mefazez umekharker lifnei ihoh vatibez lo belibah. vayabi'u 'et 'aron ihoh vayazigu 'oto bimqomo betokh ha'ohel 'asher natah lo david vaya'al david 'olot lifnei ihoh ushelamim. vaykhal david meiha'alot ha'olah vehashelamim vaybarekh 'et ha'am beshem ihoh zeba'ot. vaykhaleq lekhal ha'am lekhal hamon yisra'el lemei'ish ve'ad 'ishah le'ish khalat lekhem 'akhat ve'eshpar 'ekhad va'ashishah 'ekhat vayeilekh kal ha'am 'ish lebeito. vayashab david lebarekh 'et beito vateizei mikhal bat sha'ul liqrat david vatomer mah nikhbad hayom melekh yisra'el 'asher niglah hayom le'einei 'amhot 'abadav kehigalot niglot 'akhad hareiqim. vayomer david 'el mikhal lifnei ihoh 'asher bakhar bi mei'abikh umikal beito lezavot 'oti nagid 'al 'am ihoh 'al yisra'el vesikhaqti lifnei ihoh. uneqaloti 'od mizot vehayiti shafal be'einai ve'im ha'amahot 'asher 'amart 'imam 'ikabeidah. ulemikhal bat sha'ul lo hayah lah yaled 'ad yom motah. vayhi ki yashab hamelekh bebeito ihoh heiniakh lo misabib mikal 'oyebav. vayomer hamelekh 'el natan hanabi re'eh na 'anokhi yosheb bebet 'arazim va'aron ha'elohim yosheb betokh hayri'ah. vayomer natan 'el hamelekh kol 'asher bilbabekha lekh 'aseh ki ihoh 'imakh. vayhi balaylah hahu vayhi debar ihoh 'el natan leimor. lekh ve'amarta 'el 'abdi 'el david koh 'amar ihoh ha'atah tibneh li bayit leshibti. ki lo yashabti bebayit lemiyom ha'aloti 'et benei yisra'el mimizrayim ve'ad hayom hazeh va'ehyeh mithalekh be'ohel ubemishkan. bekhol 'asher hithalakhti bekhal benei yisra'el hadabar dibarti 'et 'akhad shibtei yisra'el 'asher ziviti lir'ot 'et 'ami 'et yisra'el leimor lamah lo benitem li bet 'arazim. ve'atah koh tomar le'abdi ledavid koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'ani leqakhtikha min hanaveh mei'akhar hazon lihyot nagid 'al 'ami 'al yisra'el. va'ehyeh 'imekha bekhol 'asher halakhta va'akhritah 'et kal 'oyebekha mipanekha ve'asiti lekha shem gadol keshem hagedolim 'asher ba'arez. vesamti maqom le'ami leyisra'el uneta'tiv veshakhan takhtav velo yirgaz 'od velo yosifu benei 'avlah le'anoto ka'asher barishonah. ulemin hayom 'asher ziviti shofetim 'al 'ami yisra'el vahanikhoti lekha mikal 'oyebekha vehigid lekha ihoh ki bayit ya'aseh lekha ihoh. ki yimle'u yamekha veshakhabta 'et 'abotekha vahaqimoti 'et zar'akha 'akharekha 'asher yeizei mimei'ekha vahakhinoti 'et mamlakhto. hu yibneh bayit lishmi vekhonanti 'et kisei mamlakhto 'ad 'olam. 'ani 'ehyeh lo le'ab vehu yihyeh li leben 'asher beha'avoto vehokhakhtiv besheibet 'anashim ubenig'ei benei 'adam. vekhasdi lo yasur mimenu ka'asher hasiroti mei'im sha'ul 'asher hasiroti milefanekha. vene'man beitekha umamlakhtekha 'ad 'olam lefanekha kis'akha yihyeh nakhon 'ad 'olam. kekhol hadebarim ha'eleh ukhekhol hakhizayon hazeh ken diber natan 'el david. vayabo hamelekh david vayeisheb lifnei ihoh vayomer mi 'anokhi 'adonai ihoh umi beiti ki habi'otani 'ad halom. vatiqtan 'od zot be'einekha 'adonai ihoh vatedaber gam 'el bet 'abdekha lemeirakhoq vezot torat ha'adam 'adonai ihoh. umah yosif david 'od ledaber 'eilekha ve'atah yada'ta 'et 'abdekha 'adonai ihoh. ba'abur debarekha ukhelibekha 'asita 'et kal hagedulah hazot lehodia' 'et 'abdekha. 'al ken gadalta 'adonai ihoh ki 'en kamokha ve'en 'elohim zulatekha bekhol 'asher shama'nu be'azeneinu. umi khe'amekha keyisra'el go 'ekhad ba'arez 'asher halekhu 'elohim lifdot lo le'am velasum lo shem vela'asot lakhem hagedulah venora'ot le'arzekha mipenei 'amekha 'asher padita lekha mimizrayim goyim veilohav. vatekhonen lekha 'et 'amekha yisra'el lekha le'am 'ad 'olam ve'atah ihoh hayita lahem leilohim. ve'atah ihoh 'elohim hadabar 'asher dibarta 'al 'abdekha ve'al beito haqem 'ad 'olam va'aseh ka'asher dibarta. veyigdal shimkha 'ad 'olam leimor ihoh zeba'ot 'elohim 'al yisra'el ubet 'abdekha david yihyeh nakhon lefanekha. ki 'atah ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el galitah 'et 'ozen 'abdekha leimor bayit 'ebneh lakh 'al ken maza 'abdekha 'et libo lehitpalel 'eilekha 'et hatefilah hazot. ve'atah 'adonai ihoh 'atah hu ha'elohim udebarekha yihyu 'emet vatedaber 'el 'abdekha 'et hatobah hazot. ve'atah ho'el ubarekh 'et bet 'abdekha lihyot le'olam lefanekha ki 'atah 'adonai ihoh dibarta umibirkhatekha yeborakh bet 'abdekha le'olam. vayhi 'akharei khen vayakh david 'et pelishtim vayakhni'em vayiqakh david 'et meteg ha'amah miyad pelishtim. vayakh 'et mo'ab vaymadedem bakhebel hashkeb 'otam 'arzah vaymaded shenei khabalim lehamit umelo hakhebel lehakhayot vatehi mo'ab ledavid la'abadim nose'ei minkhah. vayakh david 'et hadad'ezer ben rekhob melekh zobah belekhto lehashib yado binhar perat vayilkod david mimenu 'elef usheba' mei'ot parashim ve'esrim 'elef 'ish ragli vai'aqer david 'et kal harekheb vayoter mimenu mei'ah rakheb. vatabo 'aram dameseq la'zor lahadad'ezer melekh zobah vayakh david ba'aram 'esrim ushenayim 'elef 'ish. vayasem david nezibim ba'aram dameseq vatehi 'aram ledavid la'abadim nos'ei minkhah vayosha' ihoh 'et david bekhol 'asher halakh. vayiqakh david 'et shiltei hazahab 'asher hayu 'el 'abdei hadad'azer vaybi'em yerushalim. umibetakh umibeirotai 'arei hadad'azer laqakh hamelekh david nekhoshet harbeh me'od. vayishma' to'i melekh khamat ki hikah david 'et kal khel hadad'azer. vayishlakh to'i 'et yoram beno 'el hamelekh david lish'al lo leshalom ulebarakho 'al 'asher nilkham bahadad'ezer vayakeihu ki 'ish milkhamot to'i hayah hadad'azer ubeyado hayu kelei khesef ukhelei zahab ukhelei nekhoshet. gam 'otam hiqdish hamelekh david ihoh 'im hakesef vehazahab 'asher hiqdish mikal hagoyim 'asher kibesh. mei'aram umimo'ab umibenei 'amon umipelishtim umei'amaleq umishelal hadad'ezer ben rekhob melekh zobah. vaya'as david shem beshubo meihakoto 'et 'aram begei melakh shemonah 'asar 'alef. vayasem be'edom nezibim bekhal 'edom sam nezibim vayhi khal 'edom 'abadim ledavid vayosha' ihoh 'et david bekhol 'asher halakh. vayimlokh david 'al kal yisra'el vayhi david 'oseh mishpat uzedaqah lekhal 'amo. veyo'ab ben zeruyah 'al hazaba vihoshafat ben 'akhilud mazkir. vezadoq ben 'akhitub va'akhimelekh ben 'ebyatar kohanim userayah sofer. ubenayahu ben yehoyada' vehakereiti vehapeleiti ubenei david kohanim hayu. vayomer david hakhi yesh 'od 'asher notar lebet sha'ul ve'e'eseh 'imo khesed ba'abur yehonatan. ulebet sha'ul 'ebed ushemo ziba vayiqre'u lo 'el david vayomer hamelekh 'eilav ha'atah ziba vayomer 'abdekha. vayomer hamelekh ha'efes 'od 'ish lebet sha'ul ve'e'eseh 'imo khesed 'elohim vayomer ziba 'el hamelekh 'od ben lihonatan nekheh raglayim. vayomer lo hamelekh 'eifoh hu vayomer ziba 'el hamelekh hineh hu bet makhir ben 'ami'el belo debar. vayishlakh hamelekh david vayiqakheihu mibet makhir ben 'ami'el milo debar. vayabo mefiboshet ben yehonatan ben sha'ul 'el david vayipol 'al panav vayishtakhu vayomer david mefiboshet vayomer hineh 'abdekha. vayomer lo david 'al tira ki 'asoh 'e'eseh 'imekha khesed ba'abur yehonatan 'abikha vahashiboti lekha 'et kal sedeh sha'ul 'abikha ve'atah tokhal lekhem 'al shulkhani tamid. vayishtakhu vayomer meh 'abdekha ki fanita 'el hakeleb hamet 'asher kamoni. vayiqra hamelekh 'el ziba na'ar sha'ul vayomer 'eilav kol 'asher hayah lesha'ul ulekhal beito natati leben 'adonekha. ve'abadta lo 'et ha'adamah 'atah ubanekha va'abadekha veheibeita vehayah leben 'adonekha lekhem va'akhalo umefiboshet ben 'adonekha yokhal tamid lekhem 'al shulkhani uleziba khamishah 'asar banim ve'esrim 'abadim. vayomer ziba 'el hamelekh kekhol 'asher yezaveh 'adoni hamelekh 'et 'abdo ken ya'aseh 'abdekha umefiboshet 'okhel 'al shulkhani ke'akhad mibenei hamelekh. velimfiboshet ben qatan ushemo mikha vekhol moshab bet ziba 'abadim limfiboshet. umefiboshet yosheb birushalim ki 'al shulkhan hamelekh tamid hu 'okhel vehu piseiakh shetei raglav. vayhi 'akharei khen vayamat melekh benei 'amon vayimlokh khanun beno takhtav. vayomer david 'e'eseh khesed 'im khanun ben nakhash ka'asher 'asah 'abiv 'imadi khesed vayishlakh david lenakhamo beyad 'abadav 'el 'abiv vayabo'u 'abdei david 'erez benei 'amon. vayomeru sarei benei 'amon 'el khanun 'adoneihem hamkhabed david 'et 'abikha be'einekha ki shalakh lekha menakhamim halo ba'abur khaqor 'et ha'ir uleragelah ulehafekhah shalakh david 'et 'abadav 'eilekha. vayiqakh khanun 'et 'abdei david vaygalakh 'et khazi zeqanam vayikhrot 'et madveihem bakheizi 'ad shetoteihem vayshalekhem. vayagidu ledavid vayishlakh liqratam ki hayu ha'anashim nikhlamim me'od vayomer hamelekh shebu bireikho 'ad yezamakh zeqankhem veshabtem. vayir'u benei 'amon ki nib'ashu bedavid vayishlekhu benei 'amon vayiskeru 'et 'aram bet rekhob ve'et 'aram zoba 'esrim 'elef ragli ve'et melekh ma'akhah 'elef 'ish ve'ish tob shenem 'asar 'elef 'ish. vayishma' david vayishlakh 'et yo'ab ve'et kal hazaba hagiborim. vayeize'u benei 'amon vaya'arkhu milkhamah petakh hasha'ar va'aram zoba urekhob ve'ish tob uma'akhah lebadam basadeh. vayar yo'ab ki hayetah 'eilav penei hamilkhamah mipanim umei'akhor vayibkhar mikol bekhurei beyisra'el yisra'el vaya'arokh liqrat 'aram. ve'et yeter ha'am natan beyad 'abshai 'akhiv vaya'arokh liqrat benei 'amon. vayomer 'im tekhezaq 'aram mimeni vehayitah li lishu'ah ve'im benei 'amon yekhezqu mimekha vehalakhti lehoshia' lakh. khazaq venitkhazaq be'ad 'ameinu ube'ad 'arei 'eloheinu ihoh ya'aseh hatob be'einav. vayigash yo'ab veha'am 'asher 'imo lamilkhamah ba'aram vayanusu mipanav. ubenei 'amon ra'u ki nas 'aram vayanusu mipenei 'abishai vayabo'u ha'ir vayashab yo'ab mei'al benei 'amon vayabo yerushalim. vayar 'aram ki nigaf lifnei yisra'el vayei'asefu yakhad. vayishlakh hadad'ezer vayozei 'et 'aram 'asher mei'eiber hanahar vayabo'u kheilam veshobakh sar zeba hadad'ezer lifneihem. vayugad ledavid vaye'esof 'et kal yisra'el vaya'abor 'et hayarden vayabo kheilamah vaya'arkhu 'aram liqrat david vayilakhamu 'imo. vayanas 'aram mipenei yisra'el vayaharog david mei'aram sheba' mei'ot rekheb ve'arba'im 'elef parashim ve'et shobakh sar zeba'o hikah vayamat sham. vayir'u khal hamelakhim 'abdei hadad'ezer ki nigefu lifnei yisra'el vayashlimu 'et yisra'el vaya'abdum vayir'u 'aram lehoshia' 'od 'et benei 'amon. vayhi litshubat hashanah le'et zet hamalkhim vayishlakh david 'et yo'ab ve'et 'abadav 'imo ve'et kal yisra'el vayashkhitu 'et benei 'amon vayazuru 'al rabah vedavid yosheb birushalim. vayhi le'et ha'ereb vayaqam david mei'al mishkabo vayithalekh 'al gag bet hamelekh vayar 'ishah rokhezet mei'al hagag veha'ishah tobat mar'eh me'od. vayishlakh david vayidrosh la'ishah vayomer halo zot bat sheba' bat 'eli'am 'eishet 'uriyah hakhiti. vayishlakh david mal'akhim vayiqakheha vatabo 'eilav vayishkab 'imah vehi mitqadeshet mitum'atah vatashab 'el beitah. vatahar ha'ishah vatishlakh vataged ledavid vatomer harah 'anokhi. vayishlakh david 'el yo'ab shelakh 'eilai 'et 'uriyah hakhiti vayishlakh yo'ab 'et 'uriyah 'el david. vayabo 'uriyah 'eilav vayish'al david lishlom yo'ab velishlom ha'am velishlom hamilkhamah. vayomer david le'uriyah red lebeitekha urekhaz raglekha vayeizei 'uriyah mibet hamelekh vateizei 'akharav mas'at hamelekh. vayishkab 'uriyah petakh bet hamelekh 'et kal 'abdei 'adonav velo yarad 'el beito. vayagidu ledavid leimor lo yarad 'uriyah 'el beito vayomer david 'el 'uriyah halo miderekh 'atah ba madua' lo yaradta 'el beitekha. vayomer 'uriyah 'el david ha'aron veyisra'el vihudah yoshebim basukot vadoni yo'ab ve'abdei 'adoni 'al penei hasadeh khonim va'ani 'abo 'el beiti le'ekhol velishtot velishkab 'im 'ishti khayekha vekhei nafshekha 'im 'e'eseh 'et hadabar hazeh. vayomer david 'el 'uriyah sheb bazeh gam hayom umakhar 'ashalekheka vayeisheb 'uriyah birushalim bayom hahu umimakhorat. vayiqra lo david vayokhal lefanav vayeishet vayshakereihu vayeizei ba'ereb lishkab bemishkabo 'im 'abdei 'adonav ve'el beito lo yarad. vayhi baboqer vayikhtob david seifer 'el yo'ab vayishlakh beyad 'uriyah. vayikhtob baseifer leimor habu 'et 'uriyah 'el mul penei hamilkhamah hakhazaqah veshabtem mei'akharav venikah vamet. vayhi bishmor yo'ab 'el ha'ir vayiten 'et 'uriyah 'el hamaqom 'asher yada' ki 'anshei khayil sham. vayeize'u 'anshei ha'ir vayilakhamu 'et yo'ab vayipol min ha'am mei'abdei david vayamat gam 'uriyah hakhiti. vayishlakh yo'ab vayaged ledavid 'et kal dibrei hamilkhamah. vayzav 'et hamal'akh leimor kekhalotkha 'et kal dibrei hamilkhamah ledaber 'el hamelekh. vehayah 'im ta'aleh khamat hamelekh ve'amar lekha madua' nigashtem 'el ha'ir lehilakhem halo yeda'tem 'et 'asher yoru mei'al hakhomah. mi hikah 'et 'abimelekh ben yerubeshet halo 'ishah hishlikhah 'alav pelakh rekheb mei'al hakhomah vayamat beteibez lamah nigashtem 'el hakhomah ve'amarta gam 'abdekha 'uriyah hakhiti met. vayeilekh hamal'akh vayabo vayaged ledavid 'et kal 'asher shelakho yo'ab. vayomer hamal'akh 'el david ki gaberu 'aleinu ha'anashim vayeize'u 'eileinu hasadeh vanihyeh 'aleihem 'ad petakh hasha'ar. vayore'u vayoru hamor'im hamorim 'el 'abadekha mei'al hakhomah vayamutu mei'abdei hamelekh vegam 'abdekha 'uriyah hakhiti met. vayomer david 'el hamal'akh koh tomar 'el yo'ab 'al yeira' be'einekha 'et hadabar hazeh ki khazoh vekhazeh tokhal hekhareb hakhazeq milkhamtekha 'el ha'ir veharesah vekhazeqeihu. vatishma' 'eishet 'uriyah ki met 'uriyah 'ishah vatispod 'al ba'lah. vaya'abor ha'eibel vayishlakh david vaya'asfah 'el beito vatehi lo le'ishah vateiled lo ben vayeira' hadabar 'asher 'asah david be'einei ihoh. vayishlakh ihoh 'et natan 'el david vayabo 'eilav vayomer lo shenei 'anashim hayu be'ir 'ekhat 'ekhad 'ashir ve'ekhad rash. le'ashir hayah zon ubaqar harbeh me'od. velarash 'en kol ki 'im kibsah 'akhat qetanah 'asher qanah vaykhayeha vatigdal 'imo ve'im banav yakhdav mipito tokhal umikoso tishteh ubekheiqo tishkab vatehi lo kebat. vayabo heilekh le'ish he'ashir vayakhmol laqakhat mizono umibeqaro la'asot la'oreiakh haba lo vayiqakh 'et kibsat ha'ish harash vaya'aseha la'ish haba 'eilav. vayikhar 'af david ba'ish me'od vayomer 'el natan khai ihoh ki ben mavet ha'ish ha'oseh zot. ve'et hakibsah yeshalem 'arba'tayim 'eiqeb 'asher 'asah 'et hadabar hazeh ve'al 'asher lo khamal. vayomer natan 'el david 'atah ha'ish koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el 'anokhi meshakhtikha lemelekh 'al yisra'el ve'anokhi hizaltikha miyad sha'ul. va'etenah lekha 'et bet 'adonekha ve'et neshei 'adonekha bekheiqekha va'etenah lekha 'et bet yisra'el vihudah ve'im me'at ve'osifah lekha kahenah vekhahenah. madua' bazita 'et debar ihoh la'asot hara' be'eino be'einai 'et 'uriyah hakhiti hikita bakhereb ve'et 'ishto laqakhta lekha le'ishah ve'oto haragta bekhereb benei 'amon. ve'atah lo tasur khereb mibeitekha 'ad 'olam 'eiqeb ki bezitani vatiqakh 'et 'eishet 'uriyah hakhiti lihyot lekha le'ishah. koh 'amar ihoh hini meiqim 'alekha ra'ah mibeitekha velaqakhti 'et nashekha le'einekha venatati lerei'ekha veshakhab 'im nashekha le'einei hashemesh hazot. ki 'atah 'asita basater va'ani 'e'eseh 'et hadabar hazeh neged kal yisra'el veneged hashamesh. vayomer david 'el natan khatati ihoh vayomer natan 'el david gam ihoh he'ebir khatatekha lo tamut. 'efes ki ni'ez ni'azta 'et 'oyebei ihoh badabar hazeh gam haben hayilod lekha mot yamut. vayeilekh natan 'el beito vayigof ihoh 'et hayeled 'asher yaledah 'eishet 'uriyah ledavid vayei'anash. vaybaqesh david 'et ha'elohim be'ad hana'ar vayazam david zom uba velan veshakhab 'arezah. vayaqumu ziqnei beito 'alav lahaqimo min ha'arez velo 'abah velo bara 'itam lakhem. vayhi bayom hashebi'i vayamat hayaled vayir'u 'abdei david lehagid lo ki met hayeled ki 'ameru hineh bihyot hayeled khai dibarnu 'eilav velo shama' beqoleinu ve'ekh nomar 'eilav met hayeled ve'asah ra'ah. vayar david ki 'abadav mitlakhashim vayaben david ki met hayaled vayomer david 'el 'abadav hamet hayeled vayomeru met. vayaqam david meiha'arez vayirkhaz vayasekh vaykhalef simloto simlotav vayabo bet ihoh vayishtakhu vayabo 'el beito vayish'al vayasimu lo lekhem vayokhal. vayomeru 'abadav 'eilav mah hadabar hazeh 'asher 'asitah ba'abur hayeled khai zamta vateibek vekha'asher met hayeled qamta vatokhal lakhem. vayomer be'od hayeled khai zamti va'ebkeh ki 'amarti mi yodeia' yekhanani vekhanani ihoh vekhai hayaled. ve'atah met lamah zeh 'ani zam ha'ukhal lahashibo 'od 'ani holekh 'eilav vehu lo yashub 'eilai. vaynakhem david 'et bat sheba' 'ishto vayabo 'eileha vayishkab 'imah vateiled ben vayiqra vatiqra 'et shemo shelomoh ihoh 'aheibo. vayishlakh beyad natan hanabi vayiqra 'et shemo yedideyah ba'abur ihoh. vayilakhem yo'ab berabat benei 'amon vayilkod 'et 'ir hamelukhah. vayishlakh yo'ab mal'akhim 'el david vayomer nilkhamti berabah gam lakhadti 'et 'ir hamayim. ve'atah 'esof 'et yeter ha'am vakhaneh 'al ha'ir velakhedah pen 'elkod 'ani 'et ha'ir veniqra shemi 'aleha. vaye'esof david 'et kal ha'am vayeilekh rabatah vayilakhem bah vayilkedah. vayiqakh 'et 'ateret malkam mei'al rosho umishqalah kikar zahab ve'eben yeqarah vatehi 'al rosh david ushelal ha'ir hozi harbeh me'od. ve'et ha'am 'asher bah hozi vayasem bamegeirah ubakharizei habarzel ubemagzerot habarzel vehe'ebir 'otam bamalken bamalben vekhen ya'aseh lekhol 'arei benei 'amon vayashab david vekhal ha'am yerushalim. vayhi 'akharei khen ule'abshalom ben david 'akhot yafah ushemah tamar vaye'ehabeha 'amnon ben david. vayeizer le'amnon lehitkhalot ba'abur tamar 'akhoto ki betulah hi vayipalei be'einei 'amnon la'asot lah me'umah. ule'amnon reia' ushemo yonadab ben shim'ah 'akhi david veyonadab 'ish khakham me'od. vayomer lo madua' 'atah kakhah dal ben hamelekh baboqer baboqer halo tagid li vayomer lo 'amnon 'et tamar 'akhot 'abshalom 'akhi 'ani 'oheb. vayomer lo yehonadab shekhab 'al mishkabekha vehitkhal uba 'abikha lir'otekha ve'amarta 'eilav tabo na tamar 'akhoti vetabreini lekhem ve'asetah le'einai 'et habiryah lema'an 'asher 'er'eh ve'akhalti miyadah. vayishkab 'amnon vayitkhal vayabo hamelekh lir'oto vayomer 'amnon 'el hamelekh tabo na tamar 'akhoti utelabeb le'einai shetei lebibot ve'ebreh miyadah. vayishlakh david 'el tamar habaytah leimor lekhi na bet 'amnon 'akhikh va'asi lo habiryah. vateilekh tamar bet 'amnon 'akhiha vehu shokheb vatiqakh 'et habazeq vatalosh vatalash vatelabeb le'einav vatebashel 'et halebibot. vatiqakh 'et hamasret vatizoq lefanav vayma'en le'ekhol vayomer 'amnon hozi'u khal 'ish mei'alai vayeize'u khal 'ish mei'alav. vayomer 'amnon 'el tamar habi'i habiryah hakheder ve'ebreh miyadekh vatiqakh tamar 'et halebibot 'asher 'asatah vatabei le'amnon 'akhiha hekhaderah. vatagesh 'eilav le'ekhol vayakhazeq bah vayomer lah bo'i shikhbi 'imi 'akhoti. vatomer lo 'al 'akhi 'al te'aneini ki lo yei'aseh khen beyisra'el 'al ta'aseh 'et hanebalah hazot. va'ani 'anah 'olikh 'et kherpati ve'atah tihyeh ke'akhad hanebalim beyisra'el ve'atah daber na 'el hamelekh ki lo yimna'eini mimeka. velo 'abah lishmoa' beqolah vayekhezaq mimenah vai'aneha vayishkab 'otah. vayisna'eha 'amnon sin'ah gedolah me'od ki gedolah hasin'ah 'asher senei'ah mei'ahabah 'asher 'aheibah vayomer lah 'amnon qumi leikhi. vatomer lo 'al 'odot hara'ah hagedolah hazot mei'akheret 'asher 'asita 'imi leshalekheini velo 'abah lishmoa' lah. vayiqra 'et na'aro meshareto vayomer shilkhu na 'et zot mei'alai hakhuzah une'ol hadelet 'akhareha. ve'aleha ketonet pasim ki khen tilbashna benot hamelekh habetulot me'ilim vayozei 'otah meshareto hakhuz vena'al hadelet 'akhareha. vatiqakh tamar 'eifer 'al roshah ukhetonet hapasim 'asher 'aleha qara'ah vatasem yadah 'al roshah vateilekh halokh veza'aqah. vayomer 'eileha 'abshalom 'akhiha ha'aminon 'akhikh hayah 'imakh ve'atah 'akhoti hakharishi 'akhikh hu 'al tashiti 'et libekh ladabar hazeh vateisheb tamar veshomeimah bet 'abshalom 'akhiha. vehamelekh david shama' 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh vayikhar lo me'od. velo diber 'abshalom 'im 'amnon lemeira' ve'ad tob ki sanei 'abshalom 'et 'amnon 'al debar 'asher 'inah 'et tamar 'akhoto. vayhi lishnatayim yamim vayihyu gozezim le'abshalom beba'al khazor 'asher 'im 'efrayim vayiqra 'abshalom lekhal benei hamelekh. vayabo 'abshalom 'el hamelekh vayomer hineh na gozezim le'abdekha yeilekh na hamelekh va'abadav 'im 'abdekha. vayomer hamelekh 'el 'abshalom 'al beni 'al na neilekh kulanu velo nikhbad 'alekha vayifraz bo velo 'abah lalekhet vaybarakheihu. vayomer 'abshalom valo yeilekh na 'itanu 'amnon 'akhi vayomer lo hamelekh lamah yeilekh 'imakh. vayifraz bo 'abshalom vayishlakh 'ito 'et 'amnon ve'et kal benei hamelekh. vayzav 'abshalom 'et ne'arav leimor re'u na ketob leb 'amnon bayayin ve'amarti 'aleikhem haku 'et 'amnon vahamitem 'oto 'al tira'u halo ki 'anokhi ziviti 'etkhem khizqu vihyu libnei khayil. vaya'asu na'arei 'abshalom le'amnon ka'asher zivah 'abshalom vayaqumu kal benei hamelekh vayirkebu 'ish 'al pirdo vayanusu. vayhi hemah baderekh vehashemu'ah ba'ah 'el david leimor hikah 'abshalom 'et kal benei hamelekh velo notar meihem 'ekhad. vayaqam hamelekh vayiqra' 'et begadav vayishkab 'arezah vekhal 'abadav nizabim qeru'ei begadim. vaya'an yonadab ben shim'ah 'akhi david vayomer 'al yomar 'adoni 'et kal hane'arim benei hamelekh heimitu ki 'amnon lebado met ki 'al pi 'abshalom hayetah sumah miyom 'anoto 'et tamar 'akhoto. ve'atah 'al yasem 'adoni hamelekh 'el libo dabar leimor kal benei hamelekh meitu ki 'im 'amnon lebado met. vayibrakh 'abshalom vayisa hana'ar hazofeh 'et 'eino 'einav vayar vehineh 'am rab holekhim miderekh 'akharav mizad hahar. vayomer yonadab 'el hamelekh hineh benei hamelekh ba'u kidbar 'abdekha ken hayah. vayhi kekhaloto ledaber vehineh benei hamelekh ba'u vayis'u qolam vayibku vegam hamelekh vekhal 'abadav bakhu bekhi gadol me'od. ve'abshalom barakh vayeilekh 'el talmai ben 'amikhur 'amihud melekh geshur vayit'abel 'al beno kal hayamim. ve'abshalom barakh vayeilekh geshur vayhi sham shalosh shanim. vatekhal david hamelekh lazet 'el 'abshalom ki nikham 'al 'amnon ki met. vayeida' yo'ab ben zeruyah ki leb hamelekh 'al 'abshalom. vayishlakh yo'ab teqo'ah vayiqakh misham 'ishah khakhamah vayomer 'eileha hit'abeli na velibshi na bigdei 'eibel ve'al tasukhi shemen vehayit ke'ishah zeh yamim rabim mit'abelet 'al met. ubat 'el hamelekh vedibart 'eilav kadabar hazeh vayasem yo'ab 'et hadebarim befiha. vatomer ha'ishah hateqo'it 'el hamelekh vatipol 'al 'apeha 'arzah vatishtakhu vatomer hoshi'ah hamelekh. vayomer lah hamelekh mah lakh vatomer 'abal 'ishah 'almanah 'ani vayamat 'ishi. uleshifkhatekha shenei banim vayinazu sheneihem basadeh ve'en mazil beineihem vayako ha'ekhad 'et ha'ekhad vayamet 'oto. vehineh qamah khal hamishpakhah 'al shifkhatekha vayomeru teni 'et makeh 'akhiv unemiteihu benefesh 'akhiv 'asher harag venashmidah gam 'et hayoresh vekhibu 'et gakhalti 'asher nish'arah lebilti som sim le'ishi shem ushe'eirit 'al penei ha'adamah. vayomer hamelekh 'el ha'ishah lekhi lebeitekh va'ani 'azaveh 'alayikh. vatomer ha'ishah hateqo'it 'el hamelekh 'alai 'adoni hamelekh he'avon ve'al bet 'abi vehamelekh vekhis'o naqi. vayomer hamelekh hamdaber 'eilayikh vahabeito 'eilai velo yosif 'od laga'at bakh. vatomer yizkar na hamelekh 'et ihoh 'elohekha meiharbit meiharbat go'el hadam leshakhet velo yashmidu 'et beni vayomer khai ihoh 'im yipol misa'arat benekh 'arezah. vatomer ha'ishah tedaber na shifkhatekha 'el 'adoni hamelekh dabar vayomer dabeiri. vatomer ha'ishah velamah khashabtah kazot 'al 'am 'elohim umidaber hamelekh hadabar hazeh ke'ashem lebilti hashib hamelekh 'et nidekho. ki mot namut vekhamayim hanigarim 'arzah 'asher lo yei'aseifu velo yisa 'elohim nefesh vekhashab makhashabot lebilti yidakh mimenu nidakh. ve'atah 'asher bati ledaber 'el hamelekh 'adoni 'et hadabar hazeh ki yeire'uni ha'am vatomer shifkhatekha 'adaberah na 'el hamelekh 'ulai ya'aseh hamelekh 'et debar 'amato. ki yishma' hamelekh lehazil 'et 'amato mikaf ha'ish lehashmid 'oti ve'et beni yakhad minakhalat 'elohim. vatomer shifkhatekha yihyeh na debar 'adoni hamelekh limnukhah ki kemal'akh ha'elohim ken 'adoni hamelekh lishmoa' hatob vehara' ihoh 'elohekha yehi 'imakh. vaya'an hamelekh vayomer 'el ha'ishah 'al na tekhakhadi mimeni dabar 'asher 'anokhi sho'el 'otakh vatomer ha'ishah yedaber na 'adoni hamelekh. vayomer hamelekh hayad yo'ab 'itakh bekhal zot vata'an ha'ishah vatomer khei nafshekha 'adoni hamelekh 'im 'ish leheimin ulehasmil mikol 'asher diber 'adoni hamelekh ki 'abdekha yo'ab hu zivani vehu m befi shifkhatekha 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh. leba'abur sabeb 'et penei hadabar 'asah 'abdekha yo'ab 'et hadabar hazeh vadoni khakham kekhakhemat mal'akh ha'elohim lada'at 'et kal 'asher ba'arez. vayomer hamelekh 'el yo'ab hineh na 'asiti 'et hadabar hazeh velekh hasheb 'et hana'ar 'et 'abshalom. vayipol yo'ab 'el panav 'arzah vayishtakhu vaybarekh 'et hamelekh vayomer yo'ab hayom yada' 'abdekha ki mazati khen be'einekha 'adoni hamelekh 'asher 'asah hamelekh 'et debar 'abdo 'abdekha. vayaqam yo'ab vayeilekh geshurah vayabei 'et 'abshalom yerushalim. vayomer hamelekh yisob 'el beito ufanai lo yir'eh vayisob 'abshalom 'el beito ufenei hamelekh lo ra'ah. ukhe'abshalom lo hayah 'ish yafeh bekhal yisra'el lehalel me'od mikaf raglo ve'ad qadeqodo lo hayah bo mum. ubegalekho 'et rosho vehayah miqez yamim layamim 'asher yegaleiakh ki khabed 'alav vegilekho veshaqal 'et se'ar rosho matayim sheqalim be'eben hamelekh. vayivaledu le'abshalom sheloshah banim ubat 'akhat ushemah tamar hi hayetah 'ishah yefat mar'eh. vayeisheb 'abshalom birushalim shenatayim yamim ufenei hamelekh lo ra'ah. vayishlakh 'abshalom 'el yo'ab lishloakh 'oto 'el hamelekh velo 'abah labo 'eilav vayishlakh 'od sheinit velo 'abah labo. vayomer 'el 'abadav re'u khelqat yo'ab 'el yadi velo sham se'orim lekhu vehoziteiha vehazituha ba'esh vayazitu 'abdei 'abshalom 'et hakhelqah ba'esh. vayaqam yo'ab vayabo 'el 'abshalom habayetah vayomer 'eilav lamah hizitu 'abadekha 'et hakhelqah 'asher li ba'esh. vayomer 'abshalom 'el yo'ab hineh shalakhti 'eilekha leimor bo henah ve'eshlekhah 'otekha 'el hamelekh leimor lamah bati migeshur tob li 'od 'ani sham ve'atah 'er'eh penei hamelekh ve'im yesh bi 'avon vehemitani. vayabo yo'ab 'el hamelekh vayaged lo vayiqra 'el 'abshalom vayabo 'el hamelekh vayishtakhu lo 'al 'apav 'arzah lifnei hamelekh vayishaq hamelekh le'abshalom. vayhi mei'akharei khen vaya'as lo 'abshalom merkabah vesusim vakhamishim 'ish razim lefanav. vehishkim 'abshalom ve'amad 'al yad derekh hasha'ar vayhi kal ha'ish 'asher yihyeh lo rib labo 'el hamelekh lamishpat vayiqra 'abshalom 'eilav vayomer 'ei mizeh 'ir 'atah vayomer mei'akhad shibtei yisra'el 'abdekha. vayomer 'eilav 'abshalom re'eh debarekha tobim unekhokhim veshomeia' 'en lekha mei'et hamelekh. vayomer 'abshalom mi yesimeini shofet ba'arez ve'alai yabo kal 'ish 'asher yihyeh lo rib umishpat vehizdaqtiv. vehayah biqrab 'ish lehishtakhavot lo veshalakh 'et yado vehekheziq lo venashaq lo. vaya'as 'abshalom kadabar hazeh lekhal yisra'el 'asher yabo'u lamishpat 'el hamelekh vayganeb 'abshalom 'et leb 'anshei yisra'el. vayhi miqez 'arba'im shanah vayomer 'abshalom 'el hamelekh 'eilakhah na va'ashalem 'et nidri 'asher nadarti ihoh bekhebron. ki neider nadar 'abdekha beshibti bigshur ba'aram leimor 'im yeshib yashob yeshibeini ihoh yerushalim ve'abadti 'et ihoh. vayomer lo hamelekh lekh beshalom vayaqam vayeilekh khebronah. vayishlakh 'abshalom meragelim bekhal shibtei yisra'el leimor keshame'akhem 'et qol hashofar va'amartem malakh 'abshalom bekhebron. ve'et 'abshalom halekhu matayim 'ish mirushalim qeru'im veholekhim letumam velo yade'u kal dabar. vayishlakh 'abshalom 'et 'akhitofel hagiloni yo'ez david mei'iro migiloh bezabekho 'et hazebakhim vayhi haqesher 'amiz veha'am holekh varab 'et 'abshalom. vayabo hamagid 'el david leimor hayah leb 'ish yisra'el 'akharei 'abshalom. vayomer david lekhal 'abadav 'asher 'ito birushalim qumu venibrakhah ki lo tihyeh lanu feleitah mipenei 'abshalom maharu lalekhet pen yemaher vehisiganu vehidiakh 'aleinu 'et hara'ah vehikah ha'ir lefi khareb. vayomeru 'abdei hamelekh 'el hamelekh kekhol 'asher yibkhar 'adoni hamelekh hineh 'abadekha. vayeizei hamelekh vekhal beito beraglav vaya'azob hamelekh 'et 'eser nashim pilagshim lishmor habayit. vayeizei hamelekh vekhal ha'am beraglav vaya'amdu bet hamerkhaq. vekhal 'abadav 'oberim 'al yado vekhal hakereiti vekhal hapeleiti vekhal hagitim shesh mei'ot 'ish 'asher ba'u beraglo migat 'oberim 'al penei hamelekh. vayomer hamelekh 'el 'itai hagiti lamah teilekh gam 'atah 'itanu shub vesheb 'im hamelekh ki nakheri 'atah vegam goleh 'atah limqomekha. temol bo'ekha vehayom 'ano'akha 'ani'akha 'imanu lalekhet va'ani holekh 'al 'asher 'ani holekh shub vehasheb 'et 'akhekha 'imakh khesed ve'emet. vaya'an 'itai 'et hamelekh vayomar khai ihoh vekhei 'adoni hamelekh ki 'im bimqom 'asher yihyeh sham 'adoni hamelekh 'im lemavet 'im lekhayim ki sham yihyeh 'abdekha. vayomer david 'el 'itai lekh va'abor vaya'abor 'itai hagiti vekhal 'anashav vekhal hataf 'asher 'ito. vekhal ha'arez bokhim qol gadol vekhal ha'am 'oberim vehamelekh 'ober benakhal qidron vekhal ha'am 'oberim 'al penei derekh 'et hamidbar. vehineh gam zadoq vekhal halviyim 'ito nose'im 'et 'aron berit ha'elohim vayaziqu 'et 'aron ha'elohim vaya'al 'ebyatar 'ad tom kal ha'am la'abor min ha'ir. vayomer hamelekh lezadoq hasheb 'et 'aron ha'elohim ha'ir 'im 'emza khen be'einei ihoh veheshibani vehir'ani 'oto ve'et naveihu. ve'im koh yomar lo khafazti bakh hini ya'aseh li ka'asher tob be'einav. vayomer hamelekh 'el zadoq hakohen haro'eh 'atah shubah ha'ir beshalom va'akhima'az binkha vihonatan ben 'ebyatar shenei beneikhem 'itekhem. re'u 'anokhi mitmahmeiah be'abrot be'arbot hamidbar 'ad bo dabar mei'imakhem lehagid li. vayasheb zadoq ve'ebyatar 'et 'aron ha'elohim yerushalim vayeishebu sham. vedavid 'oleh bema'aleh hazeitim 'oleh ubokheh verosh lo khafui vehu holekh yakhef vekhal ha'am 'asher 'ito khafu 'ish rosho ve'alu 'aloh ubakhoh. vedavid higid leimor 'akhitofel baqosherim 'im 'abshalom vayomer david sakel na 'et 'azat 'akhitofel ihoh. vayhi david ba 'ad harosh 'asher yishtakhaveh sham leilohim vehineh liqrato khushai ha'arki qarua' kutaneto va'adamah 'al rosho. vayomer lo david 'im 'abarta 'iti vehayita 'alai lemasa. ve'im ha'ir tashub ve'amarta le'abshalom 'abdekha 'ani hamelekh 'ehyeh 'ebed 'abikha va'ani mei'az ve'atah va'ani 'abdekha veheifartah li 'et 'azat 'akhitofel. vahalo 'imekha sham zadoq ve'ebyatar hakohanim vehayah kal hadabar 'asher tishma' mibet hamelekh tagid lezadoq ule'ebyatar hakohanim. hineh sham 'imam shenei beneihem 'akhima'az lezadoq vihonatan le'ebyatar ushelakhtem beyadam 'eilai kal dabar 'asher tishma'u. vayabo khushai rei'eh david ha'ir ve'abshalom yabo yerushalim. vedavid 'abar me'at meiharosh vehineh ziba na'ar mefi boshet liqrato vezemed khamorim khabushim va'aleihem matayim lekhem umei'ah zimuqim umei'ah qayiz veneibel yayin. vayomer hamelekh 'el ziba mah 'eleh lakh vayomer ziba hakhamorim lebet hamelekh lirkob ulehalekhem vehalekhem vehaqayiz le'ekhol hane'arim vehayayin lishtot haya'ef bamidbar. vayomer hamelekh ve'ayeh ben 'adonekha vayomer ziba 'el hamelekh hineh yosheb birushalim ki 'amar hayom yashibu li bet yisra'el 'et mamlekhut 'abi. vayomer hamelekh leziba hineh lekha kol 'asher limfi boshet vayomer ziba hishtakhaveiti 'emza khen be'einekha 'adoni hamelekh. uba hamelekh david 'ad bakhurim vehineh misham 'ish yozei mimishpakhat bet sha'ul ushemo shim'i ben geira yozei yazo umeqalel. vaysaqel ba'abanim 'et david ve'et kal 'abdei hamelekh david vekhal ha'am vekhal hagiborim mimino umisemolo. vekhoh 'amar shim'i beqalo zei zei 'ish hadamim ve'ish habeliya'al. heishib 'alekha ihoh kol demei bet sha'ul 'asher malakhta takhto takhtav vayiten ihoh 'et hamelukhah beyad 'abshalom benekha vehinekha bera'atekha ki 'ish damim 'atah. vayomer 'abishai ben zeruyah 'el hamelekh lamah yeqalel hakeleb hamet hazeh 'et 'adoni hamelekh 'e'berah na ve'asirah 'et rosho. vayomer hamelekh mah li velakhem benei zeruyah ki koh yeqalel vekhi ki ihoh 'amar lo qalel 'et david umi yomar madua' 'asitah ken. vayomer david 'el 'abishai ve'el kal 'abadav hineh beni 'asher yaza mimei'ai mebaqesh 'et nafshi ve'af ki 'atah ben haymini hanikhu lo viqalel ki 'amar lo ihoh. 'ulai yir'eh ihoh be'ovoni be'eini veheishib ihoh li tobah takhat qilato hayom hazeh. vayeilekh david va'anashav badarekh veshim'i holekh bezeila' hahar le'umato halokh vayqalel vaysaqel ba'abanim le'umato ve'ipar be'afar. vayabo hamelekh vekhal ha'am 'asher 'ito 'ayeifim vayinafesh sham. ve'abshalom vekhal ha'am 'ish yisra'el ba'u yerushalim va'akhitofel 'ito. vayhi ka'asher ba khushai ha'arki rei'eh david 'el 'abshalom vayomer khushai 'el 'abshalom yekhi hamelekh yekhi hamelekh. vayomer 'abshalom 'el khushai zeh khasdekha 'et rei'ekha lamah lo halakhta 'et rei'ekha. vayomer khushai 'el 'abshalom lo ki 'asher bakhar ihoh veha'am hazeh vekhal 'ish yisra'el lo lo 'ehyeh ve'ito 'eisheb. vehasheinit lemi 'ani 'e'ebod halo lifnei beno ka'asher 'abadti lifnei 'abikha ken 'ehyeh lifanekha. vayomer 'abshalom 'el 'akhitofel habu lakhem 'eizah mah na'aseh. vayomer 'akhitofel 'el 'abshalom bo 'el pilagshei 'abikha 'asher hiniakh lishmor habayit veshama' kal yisra'el ki nib'ashta 'et 'abikha vekhazequ yedei kal 'asher 'itakh. vayatu le'abshalom ha'ohel 'al hagag vayabo 'abshalom 'el pilagshei 'abiv le'einei kal yisra'el. va'azat 'akhitofel 'asher ya'az bayamim hahem ka'asher yish'al 'ish bidbar ha'elohim ken kal 'azat 'akhitofel gam ledavid gam le'abshalom. vayomer 'akhitofel 'el 'abshalom 'ebkharah na shenem 'asar 'elef 'ish ve'aqumah ve'erdefah 'akharei david halayelah. ve'abo 'alav vehu yageia' urefeh yadayim vehakharadti 'oto venas kal ha'am 'asher 'ito vehikeiti 'et hamelekh lebado. ve'ashibah khal ha'am 'eilekha keshub hakol ha'ish 'asher 'atah mebaqesh kal ha'am yihyeh shalom. vayishar hadabar be'einei 'abshalom ube'einei kal ziqnei yisra'el. vayomer 'abshalom qera na gam lekhushai ha'arki venishme'ah mah befiv gam hu. vayabo khushai 'el 'abshalom vayomer 'abshalom 'eilav leimor kadabar hazeh diber 'akhitofel hana'aseh 'et debaro 'im 'ayin 'atah daber. vayomer khushai 'el 'abshalom lo tobah ha'eizah 'asher ya'az 'akhitofel bapa'am hazot. vayomer khushai 'atah yada'ta 'et 'abikha ve'et 'anashav ki giborim hemah umarei nefesh hemah kedob shakul basadeh ve'abikha 'ish milkhamah velo yalin 'et ha'am. hineh 'atah hu nekhba be'akhat hapekhatim 'o be'akhad hameqomot vehayah kinfol bahem batekhilah veshama' hashomeia' ve'amar hayetah mageifah ba'am 'asher 'akharei 'abshalom. vehu gam ben khayil 'asher libo keleb ha'aryeh himes yimas ki yodeia' kal yisra'el ki gibor 'abikha ubenei khayil 'asher 'ito. ki ya'azti hei'asof yei'asef 'alekha khal yisra'el midan ve'ad be'er sheba' kakhol 'asher 'al hayam larob ufanekha holekhim baqrab. ubanu 'eilav be'akhat be'akhad hameqomot 'asher nimza sham venakhnu 'alav ka'asher yipol hatal 'al ha'adamah velo notar bo ubekhal ha'anashim 'asher 'ito gam 'ekhad. ve'im 'el 'ir yei'asef vehisi'u khal yisra'el 'el ha'ir hahi khabalim vesakhabnu 'oto 'ad hanakhal 'ad 'asher lo nimza sham gam zeror. vayomer 'abshalom vekhal 'ish yisra'el tobah 'azat khushai ha'arki mei'azat 'akhitofel ihoh zivah lehafer 'et 'azat 'akhitofel hatobah leba'abur habi ihoh 'el 'abshalom 'et hara'ah. vayomer khushai 'el zadoq ve'el 'ebyatar hakohanim kazot vekhazot ya'az 'akhitofel 'et 'abshalom ve'et ziqnei yisra'el vekhazot vekhazot ya'azti 'ani. ve'atah shilkhu meheirah vehagidu ledavid leimor 'al talen halaylah be'arbot hamidbar vegam 'abor ta'abor pen yebula' lamelekh ulekhal ha'am 'asher 'ito. vihonatan va'akhima'az 'omedim be'en rogel vehalekhah hashifkhah vehigidah lahem vehem yeilekhu vehigidu lamelekh david ki lo yukhelu leheira'ot labo ha'irah. vayar 'otam na'ar vayaged le'abshalom vayeilekhu sheneihem meheirah vayabo'u 'el bet 'ish bebakhurim velo be'er bakhazeiro vayeiredu sham. vatiqakh ha'ishah vatifros 'et hamasakh 'al penei habe'er vatishtakh 'alav harifot velo noda' dabar. vayabo'u 'abdei 'abshalom 'el ha'ishah habaytah vayomeru 'ayeh 'akhima'az vihonatan vatomer lahem ha'ishah 'aberu mikhal hamayim vaybaqshu velo maza'u vayashubu yerushalim. vayhi 'akharei lekhtam vaya'alu meihabe'er vayeilekhu vayagidu lamelekh david vayomeru 'el david qumu ve'ibru meheirah 'et hamayim ki khakhah ya'az 'aleikhem 'akhitofel. vayaqam david vekhal ha'am 'asher 'ito vaya'abru 'et hayarden 'ad 'or haboqer 'ad 'akhad lo ne'dar 'asher lo 'abar 'et hayarden. va'akhitofel ra'ah ki lo ne'estah 'azato vayakhabosh 'et hakhamor vayaqam vayeilekh 'el beito 'el 'iro vayzav 'el beito vayeikhanaq vayamat vayiqaber beqeber 'abiv. vedavid ba makhanayemah ve'abshalom 'abar 'et hayarden hu vekhal 'ish yisra'el 'imo. ve'et 'amasa sam 'abshalom takhat yo'ab 'al hazaba va'amasa ben 'ish ushemo yitra hayisre'eili 'asher ba 'el 'abigal bat nakhash 'akhot zeruyah 'em yo'ab. vayikhan yisra'el ve'abshalom 'erez hagil'ad. vayhi kebo david makhanayemah veshobi ben nakhash meirabat benei 'amon umakhir ben 'ami'el milo debar ubarzilai hagil'adi meirogelim. mishkab vesapot ukheli yozer vekhitim use'orim veqemakh veqali ufol va'adashim veqali. udebash vekhem'ah vezon ushefot baqar higishu ledavid vela'am 'asher 'ito le'ekhol ki 'ameru ha'am ra'eb ve'ayef vezamei bamidbar. vayifqod david 'et ha'am 'asher 'ito vayasem 'aleihem sarei 'alafim vesarei mei'ot. vayshalakh david 'et ha'am hashelishit beyad yo'ab vehashelishit beyad 'abishai ben zeruyah 'akhi yo'ab vehashelishit beyad 'itai hagiti vayomer hamelekh 'el ha'am yazo 'eizei gam 'ani 'imakhem. vayomer ha'am lo teizei ki 'im nos nanus lo yasimu 'eileinu leb ve'im yamutu khezyeinu lo yasimu 'eileinu leb ki 'atah khamonu 'asarah 'alafim ve'atah tob ki tihyeh lanu mei'ir la'zir la'zor. vayomer 'aleihem hamelekh 'asher yitab be'eineikhem 'e'eseh vaya'amod hamelekh 'el yad hasha'ar vekhal ha'am yaze'u lemei'ot vela'alafim. vayzav hamelekh 'et yo'ab ve'et 'abishai ve'et 'itai leimor le'at li lana'ar le'abshalom vekhal ha'am shame'u bezavot hamelekh 'et kal hasarim 'al debar 'abshalom. vayeizei ha'am hasadeh liqrat yisra'el vatehi hamilkhamah beya'ar 'efrayim. vayinagefu sham 'am yisra'el lifnei 'abdei david vatehi sham hamageifah gedolah bayom hahu 'esrim 'alef. vatehi sham hamilkhamah nafozet nafozet 'al penei khal ha'arez vayereb haya'ar le'ekhol ba'am mei'asher 'akhelah hakhereb bayom hahu. vayiqarei 'abshalom lifnei 'abdei david ve'abshalom rokheb 'al hapered vayabo hapered takhat sobekh ha'eilah hagedolah vayekhezaq rosho ba'eilah vayutan ben hashamayim uben ha'arez vehapered 'asher takhtav 'abar. vayar 'ish 'ekhad vayaged leyo'ab vayomer hineh ra'iti 'et 'abshalom talui ba'eilah. vayomer yo'ab la'ish hamagid lo vehineh ra'ita umadua' lo hikito sham 'arezah ve'alai latet lekha 'asarah khesef vakhagorah 'ekhat. vayomer ha'ish 'el yo'ab velo velu 'anokhi shoqel 'al kapai 'elef kesef lo 'eshlakh yadi 'el ben hamelekh ki be'azeneinu zivah hamelekh 'otekha ve'et 'abishai ve'et 'itai leimor shimru mi bana'ar be'abshalom. 'o 'asiti benafsho benafshi sheqer vekhal dabar lo yikakhed min hamelekh ve'atah tityazeb mineged. vayomer yo'ab lo khen 'okhilah lefanekha vayiqakh sheloshah shebatim bekhapo vayitqa'em beleb
