'abshalom 'odenu khai beleb ha'eilah. vayasobu 'asarah ne'arim nose'ei kelei yo'ab vayaku 'et 'abshalom vaymituhu. vayitqa' yo'ab bashofar vayashab ha'am mirdof 'akharei yisra'el ki khasakh yo'ab 'et ha'am. vayiqkhu 'et 'abshalom vayashlikhu 'oto baya'ar 'el hapakhat hagadol vayazibu 'alav gal 'abanim gadol me'od vekhal yisra'el nasu 'ish le'oheilo le'ohalav. ve'abshalom laqakh vayazeb lo bekhayav bekhayav 'et mazebet 'asher be'eimeq hamelekh ki 'amar 'en li ben ba'abur hazkir shemi vayiqra lamazebet 'al shemo vayiqarei lah yad 'abshalom 'ad hayom hazeh. va'akhima'az ben zadoq 'amar 'aruzah na va'abaserah 'et hamelekh ki shefato ihoh miyad 'oyebav. vayomer lo yo'ab lo 'ish besorah 'atah hayom hazeh ubisarta beyom 'akher vehayom hazeh lo tebaser ki 'al 'al ken ben hamelekh met. vayomer yo'ab lakushi lekh haged lamelekh 'asher ra'itah vayishtakhu khushi leyo'ab vayaroz. vayosef 'od 'akhima'az ben zadoq vayomer 'el yo'ab vihi mah 'aruzah na gam 'ani 'akharei hakushi vayomer yo'ab lamah zeh 'atah raz beni ulekhah 'en besorah mozet. vihi mah 'aruz vayomer lo ruz vayaraz 'akhima'az derekh hakikar vaya'abor 'et hakushi. vedavid yosheb ben shenei hashe'arim vayeilekh hazofeh 'el gag hasha'ar 'el hakhomah vayisa 'et 'einav vayar vehineh 'ish raz lebado. vayiqra hazofeh vayaged lamelekh vayomer hamelekh 'im lebado besorah befiv vayeilekh halokh veqareb. vayar hazofeh 'ish 'akher raz vayiqra hazofeh 'el hasho'er vayomer hineh 'ish raz lebado vayomer hamelekh gam zeh mebaser. vayomer hazofeh 'ani ro'eh 'et meruzat harishon kimruzat 'akhima'az ben zadoq vayomer hamelekh 'ish tob zeh ve'el besorah tobah yabo. vayiqra 'akhima'az vayomer 'el hamelekh shalom vayishtakhu lamelekh le'apav 'arezah vayomer barukh ihoh 'elohekha 'asher sigar 'et ha'anashim 'asher nase'u 'et yadam badoni hamelekh. vayomer hamelekh shalom lana'ar le'abshalom vayomer 'akhima'az ra'iti hehamon hagadol lishloakh 'et 'ebed hamelekh yo'ab ve'et 'abdekha velo yada'ti mah. vayomer hamelekh sob hityazeb koh vayisob vaya'amod. vehineh hakushi ba vayomer hakushi yitbaser 'adoni hamelekh ki shefatekha ihoh hayom miyad kal haqamim 'alekha. vayomer hamelekh 'el hakushi hashalom lana'ar le'abshalom vayomer hakushi yihyu khana'ar 'oyebei 'adoni hamelekh vekhol 'asher qamu 'alekha lera'ah. vayirgaz hamelekh vaya'al 'al 'aliyat hasha'ar vayeibek vekhoh 'amar belekhto beni 'abshalom beni beni 'abshalom mi yiten muti 'ani takhtekha 'abshalom beni beni. vayugad leyo'ab hineh hamelekh bokheh vayit'abel 'al 'abshalom. vatehi hateshu'ah bayom hahu le'eibel lekhal ha'am ki shama' ha'am bayom hahu leimor ne'ezab hamelekh 'al beno. vayitganeb ha'am bayom hahu labo ha'ir ka'asher yitganeb ha'am hanikhlamim benusam bamilkhamah. vehamelekh la'at 'et panav vayiz'aq hamelekh qol gadol beni 'abshalom 'abshalom beni beni. vayabo yo'ab 'el hamelekh habayit vayomer hobashta hayom 'et penei khal 'abadekha hamaletim 'et nafshekha hayom ve'et nefesh banekha ubenotekha venefesh nashekha venefesh pilagshekha. le'ahabah 'et sone'ekha velisno 'et 'ohabekha ki higadta hayom ki 'en lekha sarim va'abadim ki yada'ti hayom ki lo lu 'abshalom khai vekhulanu hayom meitim ki 'az yashar be'einekha. ve'atah qum zei vedaber 'al leb 'abadekha ki ihoh nishba'ti ki 'einekha yozei 'im yalin 'ish 'itekha halaylah vera'ah lekha zot mikal hara'ah 'asher ba'ah 'alekha mine'urekha 'ad 'atah. vayaqam hamelekh vayeisheb basha'ar ulekhal ha'am higidu leimor hineh hamelekh yosheb basha'ar vayabo khal ha'am lifnei hamelekh veyisra'el nas 'ish le'ohalav. vayhi khal ha'am nadon bekhal shibtei yisra'el leimor hamelekh hizilanu mikaf 'oyebeinu vehu miletanu mikaf pelishtim ve'atah barakh min ha'arez mei'al 'abshalom. ve'abshalom 'asher mashakhnu 'aleinu met bamilkhamah ve'atah lamah 'atem makharishim lehashib 'et hamelekh. vehamelekh david lakh 'el zadoq ve'el 'ebyatar hakohanim leimor daberu 'el ziqnei yehudah leimor lamah tihyu 'akharonim lehashib 'et hamelekh 'el beito udebar kal yisra'el ba 'el hamelekh 'el beito. 'akhai 'atem 'azmi ubesari 'atem velamah tihyu 'akharonim lehashib 'et hamelekh. vela'amasa tomeru halo 'azmi ubesari 'atah koh ya'aseh li 'elohim vekhoh yosif 'im lo sar zaba tihyeh lefanai kal hayamim takhat yo'ab. vayat 'et lebab kal 'ish yehudah ke'ish 'ekhad vayishlekhu 'el hamelekh shub 'atah vekhal 'abadekha. vayashab hamelekh vayabo 'ad hayarden vihudah ba hagilgalah lalekhet liqrat hamelekh leha'abir 'et hamelekh 'et hayarden. vaymaher shim'i ben geira ben haymini 'asher mibakhurim vayeired 'im 'ish yehudah liqrat hamelekh david. ve'elef 'ish 'imo mibinyamin veziba na'ar bet sha'ul vakhameishet 'asar banav ve'esrim 'abadav 'ito vezalekhu hayarden lifnei hamelekh. ve'aberah ha'abarah la'abir 'et bet hamelekh vela'asot hatob be'ayno be'einav veshim'i ben geira nafal lifnei hamelekh be'abero bayarden. vayomer 'el hamelekh 'al yakhashab li 'adoni 'avon ve'al tizkor 'et 'asher he'evah 'abdekha bayom 'asher yaza 'adoni hamelekh mirushalim lasum hamelekh 'el libo. ki yada' 'abdekha ki 'ani khatati vehineh bati hayom rishon lekhal bet yosef laredet liqrat 'adoni hamelekh. vaya'an 'abishai ben zeruyah vayomer hatakhat zot lo yumat shim'i ki qilel 'et meshiakh ihoh. vayomer david mah li velakhem benei zeruyah ki tihyu li hayom lesatan hayom yumat 'ish beyisra'el ki halo yada'ti ki hayom 'ani melekh 'al yisra'el. vayomer hamelekh 'el shim'i lo tamut vayishaba' lo hamelekh. umefiboshet ben sha'ul yarad liqrat hamelekh velo 'asah raglav velo 'asah sefamo ve'et begadav lo khibes lemin hayom lekhet hamelekh 'ad hayom 'asher ba beshalom. vayhi ki ba yerushalim liqrat hamelekh vayomer lo hamelekh lamah lo halakhta 'imi mefiboshet. vayomar 'adoni hamelekh 'abdi rimani ki 'amar 'abdekha 'ekhbeshah li hakhamor ve'erkab 'aleha ve'eilekh 'et hamelekh ki fiseiakh 'abdekha. vayragel be'abdekha 'el 'adoni hamelekh vadoni hamelekh kemal'akh ha'elohim va'aseh hatob be'einekha. ki lo hayah kal bet 'abi ki 'im 'anshei mavet ladoni hamelekh vatashet 'et 'abdekha be'okhelei shulkhanekha umah yesh li 'od zedaqah veliz'oq 'od 'el hamelekh. vayomer lo hamelekh lamah tedaber 'od debarekha 'amarti 'atah veziba takhlequ 'et hasadeh. vayomer mefiboshet 'el hamelekh gam 'et hakol yiqakh 'akharei 'asher ba 'adoni hamelekh beshalom 'el beito. ubarzilai hagil'adi yarad meirogelim vaya'abor 'et hamelekh hayarden leshalekho 'et bayarden hayarden. ubarzilai zaqen me'od ben shemonim shanah vehu khilkal 'et hamelekh beshibato bemakhanayim ki 'ish gadol hu me'od. vayomer hamelekh 'el barzilai 'atah 'abor 'iti vekhilkalti 'otekha 'imadi birushalim. vayomer barzilai 'el hamelekh kamah yemei shenei khayai ki 'e'eleh 'et hamelekh yerushalim. ben shemonim shanah 'anokhi hayom ha'eida' ben tob lera' 'im yit'am 'abdekha 'et 'asher 'okhal ve'et 'asher 'eshteh 'im 'eshma' 'od beqol sharim vesharot velamah yihyeh 'abdekha 'od lemasa 'el 'adoni hamelekh. kim'at ya'abor 'abdekha 'et hayarden 'et hamelekh velamah yigmeleini hamelekh hagemulah hazot. yashab na 'abdekha ve'amut be'iri 'im qeber 'abi ve'imi vehineh 'abdekha khimham ya'abor 'im 'adoni hamelekh va'aseh lo 'et 'asher tob be'einekha. vayomer hamelekh 'iti ya'abor kimham va'ani 'e'eseh lo 'et hatob be'einekha vekhol 'asher tibkhar 'alai 'e'eseh lakh. vaya'abor kal ha'am 'et hayarden vehamelekh 'abar vayishaq hamelekh lebarzilai vaybarakheihu vayashab limqomo. vaya'abor hamelekh hagilgalah vekhimhan 'abar 'imo vekhal 'am yehudah vai'ebiru he'ebiru 'et hamelekh vegam khazi 'am yisra'el. vehineh kal 'ish yisra'el ba'im 'el hamelekh vayomeru 'el hamelekh madua' genabukha 'akheinu 'ish yehudah vaya'abiru 'et hamelekh ve'et beito 'et hayarden vekhal 'anshei david 'imo. vaya'an kal 'ish yehudah 'al 'ish yisra'el ki qarob hamelekh 'eilai velamah zeh kharah lekha 'al hadabar hazeh he'akhol 'akhalnu min hamelekh 'im niset nisa lanu. vaya'an 'ish yisra'el 'et 'ish yehudah vayomer 'eser yadot li bamelekh vegam bedavid 'ani mimekha umadua' heqilotani velo hayah debari rishon li lehashib 'et malki vayiqesh debar 'ish yehudah midebar 'ish yisra'el. vesham niqra 'ish beliya'al ushemo sheba' ben bikhri 'ish yemini vayitqa' bashofar vayomer 'en lanu kheileq bedavid velo nakhalah lanu beben yishai 'ish le'ohalav yisra'el. vaya'al kal 'ish yisra'el mei'akharei david 'akharei sheba' ben bikhri ve'ish yehudah dabequ bemalkam min hayarden ve'ad yerushalim. vayabo david 'el beito yerushalim vayiqakh hamelekh 'et 'eser nashim pilagshim 'asher hiniakh lishmor habayit vayitenem bet mishmeret vaykhalkelem va'aleihem lo ba vatihyenah zerurot 'ad yom mutan 'almenut khayut. vayomer hamelekh 'el 'amasa haz'eq li 'et 'ish yehudah sheloshet yamim ve'atah poh 'amod. vayeilekh 'amasa lehaz'iq 'et yehudah vayikher vayokher min hamo'ed 'asher ye'ado. vayomer david 'el 'abishai 'atah yeira' lanu sheba' ben bikhri min 'abshalom 'atah qakh 'et 'abdei 'adonekha uredof 'akharav pen maza lo 'arim bezurot vehizil 'eineinu. vayeize'u 'akharav 'anshei yo'ab vehakereiti vehapeleiti vekhal hagiborim vayeize'u mirushalim lirdof 'akharei sheba' ben bikhri. hem 'im ha'eben hagedolah 'asher begib'on va'amasa ba lifneihem veyo'ab khagur mido lebushu ve'alo ve'alav khagor khereb mezumedet 'al matenav beta'rah vehu yaza vatipol. vayomer yo'ab la'amasa hashalom 'atah 'akhi vatokhez yad yemin yo'ab bizqan 'amasa linshaq lo. va'amasa lo nishmar bakhereb 'asher beyad yo'ab vayakeihu bah 'el hakhomesh vayishpokh mei'av 'arzah velo shanah lo vayamot veyo'ab va'abishai 'akhiv radaf 'akharei sheba' ben bikhri. ve'ish 'amad 'alav mina'arei yo'ab vayomer mi 'asher khafez beyo'ab umi 'asher ledavid 'akharei yo'ab. va'amasa mitgolel badam betokh hamesilah vayar ha'ish ki 'amad kal ha'am vayaseb 'et 'amasa min hamsilah hasadeh vayashlekh 'alav beged ka'asher ra'ah kal haba 'alav ve'amad. ka'asher hogah min hamsilah 'abar kal 'ish 'akharei yo'ab lirdof 'akharei sheba' ben bikhri. vaya'abor bekhal shibtei yisra'el 'abeilah ubet ma'akhah vekhal habeirim vayiqleihu vayiqahalu vayabo'u 'af 'akharav. vayabo'u vayazuru 'alav be'abeilah bet hama'akhah vayishpekhu solelah 'el ha'ir vata'amod bakhel vekhal ha'am 'asher 'et yo'ab mashkhitim lehapil hakhomah. vatiqra 'ishah khakhamah min ha'ir shim'u shim'u 'imru na 'el yo'ab qerab 'ad henah va'adaberah 'eilekha. vayiqrab 'eileha vatomer ha'ishah ha'atah yo'ab vayomer 'ani vatomer lo shema' dibrei 'amatekha vayomer shomeia' 'anokhi. vatomer leimor daber yedaberu barishonah leimor sha'ol yesha'alu be'abel vekhen heitamu. 'anokhi shelumei 'emunei yisra'el 'atah mebaqesh lehamit 'ir ve'em beyisra'el lamah tebala' nakhalat ihoh. vaya'an yo'ab vayomar khalilah khalilah li 'im 'abala' ve'im 'ashkhit. lo khen hadabar ki 'ish meihar 'efrayim sheba' ben bikhri shemo nasa yado bamelekh bedavid tenu 'oto lebado ve'eilekhah mei'al ha'ir vatomer ha'ishah 'el yo'ab hineh rosho mushlakh 'eilekha be'ad hakhomah. vatabo ha'ishah 'el kal ha'am bekhakhematah vayikhretu 'et rosh sheba' ben bikhri vayashlikhu 'el yo'ab vayitqa' bashofar vayafuzu mei'al ha'ir 'ish le'ohalav veyo'ab shab yerushalim 'el hamelekh. veyo'ab 'el kal hazaba yisra'el ubenayah ben yehoyada' 'al hakeri hakereiti ve'al hapeleiti. va'adoram 'al hamas vihoshafat ben 'akhilud hamazkir. usheiya usheva sofer vezadoq ve'ebyatar kohanim. vegam 'ira haya'iri hayah khohen ledavid. vayhi ra'ab bimei david shalosh shanim shanah 'akharei shanah vaybaqesh david 'et penei ihoh vayomer ihoh 'el sha'ul ve'el bet hadamim 'al 'asher heimit 'et hagib'onim. vayiqra hamelekh lagib'onim vayomer 'aleihem vehagib'onim lo mibenei yisra'el hemah ki 'im miyeter ha'emori ubenei yisra'el nishbe'u lahem vaybaqesh sha'ul lehakotam beqanoto libnei yisra'el vihudah. vayomer david 'el hagib'onim mah 'e'eseh lakhem ubamah 'akhaper ubarekhu 'et nakhalat ihoh. vayomeru lo hagib'onim 'en li lanu kesef vezahab 'im sha'ul ve'im beito ve'en lanu 'ish lehamit beyisra'el vayomer mah 'atem 'omerim 'e'eseh lakhem. vayomeru 'el hamelekh ha'ish 'asher kilanu va'asher dimah lanu nishmadnu meihityazeb bekhal gebul yisra'el. yenatan yutan lanu shib'ah 'anashim mibanav vehoqa'anum ihoh begib'at sha'ul bekhir ihoh vayomer hamelekh 'ani 'eten. vayakhmol hamelekh 'al mefi boshet ben yehonatan ben sha'ul 'al shebu'at ihoh 'asher beinotam ben david uben yehonatan ben sha'ul. vayiqakh hamelekh 'etosh nei benei rizpah bat 'ayah 'asher yaledah lesha'ul 'et 'armoni ve'et mefiboshet ve'et khameishet benei mikhal bat sha'ul 'asher yaledah le'adri'el ben barzilai hamekholati. vayitenem beyad hagib'onim vayoqi'um bahar lifnei ihoh vayipelu shiba'tayim sheba'tam yakhad vehem vehemah humtu bimei qazir barishonim tekhilat bitkhilat qezir se'orim. vatiqakh rizpah bat 'ayah 'et hasaq vatateihu lah 'el hazur mitekhilat qazir 'ad nitakh mayim 'aleihem min hashamayim velo natenah 'of hashamayim lanuakh 'aleihem yomam ve'et khayat hasadeh layelah. vayugad ledavid 'et 'asher 'asetah rizpah bat 'ayah pilegesh sha'ul. vayeilekh david vayiqakh 'et 'azmot sha'ul ve'et 'azmot yehonatan beno mei'et ba'alei yabesh gil'ad 'asher ganebu 'otam meirekhob bet shan 'asher telum tela'um sham hapelishtim shamah pelishtim beyom hakot pelishtim 'et sha'ul bagilboa'. vaya'al misham 'et 'azmot sha'ul ve'et 'azmot yehonatan beno vaya'asfu 'et 'azmot hamuqa'im. vayiqberu 'et 'azmot sha'ul vihonatan beno be'erez binyamin bezeila' beqeber qish 'abiv vaya'asu kol 'asher zivah hamelekh vayei'ater 'elohim la'arez 'akharei khen. vatehi 'od milkhamah lapelishtim 'et yisra'el vayeired david va'abadav 'imo vayilakhamu 'et pelishtim vaya'af david. veyishbo veyishbi benob 'asher bilidei harafah umishqal qeino shelosh mei'ot mishqal nekhoshet vehu khagur khadashah vayomer lehakot 'et david. vaya'azar lo 'abishai ben zeruyah vayakh 'et hapelishti vaymiteihu 'az nishbe'u 'anshei david lo leimor lo teizei 'od 'itanu lamilkhamah velo tekhabeh 'et ner yisra'el. vayhi 'akharei khen vatehi 'od hamilkhamah begob 'im pelishtim 'az hikah sibekhai hakhushati 'et saf 'asher bilidei harafah. vatehi 'od hamilkhamah begob 'im pelishtim vayakh 'elkhanan ben ya'rei 'oregim bet halakhmi 'et galeyat hagiti ve'ez khanito kimnor 'oregim. vatehi 'od milkhamah begat vayhi 'ish madin madon ve'ezbe'ot yadav ve'ezbe'ot raglav shesh vashesh 'esrim ve'arba' mispar vegam hu yulad leharafah. vaykharef 'et yisra'el vayakeihu yehonatan ben shim'i shim'ah 'akhi david. 'et 'arba'at 'eleh yuledu leharafah begat vayipelu beyad david ubeyad 'abadav. vaydaber david ihoh 'et dibrei hashirah hazot beyom hizil ihoh 'oto mikaf kal 'oyebav umikaf sha'ul. vayomar ihoh sal'i umezudati umefalti li. 'elohei zuri 'ekheseh bo magini veqeren yish'i misgabi umenusi moshi'i meikhamas toshi'eini. mehulal 'eqra ihoh umei'oyebai 'ivasheia'. ki 'afafuni mishberei mavet nakhalei beliya'al yeba'atuni. kheblei she'ol sabuni qidemuni moqeshei mavet. bazar li 'eqra ihoh ve'el 'elohai 'eqra vayishma' meiheikhalo qoli veshav'ati be'azenav. vatga'ash vayitga'ash vatir'ash ha'arez mosdot hashamayim yirgazu vayitga'ashu ki kharah lo. 'alah 'ashan be'apo ve'esh mipiv tokhel gekhalim ba'aru mimenu. vayet shamayim vayeirad va'arafel takhat raglav. vayirkab 'al kerub vaya'of vayeira 'al kanfei ruakh. vayashet khoshekh sebibotav sukot khashrat mayim 'abei shekhaqim. minogah negdo ba'aru gakhalei 'esh. yar'em min shamayim ihoh ve'elyon yiten qolo. vayishlakh khizim vayfizem baraq vayehumem vayahom. vayeira'u 'afiqei yam yigalu mosedot teibel bega'arat ihoh minishmat ruakh 'apo. yishlakh mimarom yiqakheini yamsheini mimayim rabim. yazileini mei'oyebi 'az misone'ai ki 'amezu mimeni. yeqademuni beyom 'eidi vayhi ihoh mish'an li. vayozei lamerkhab 'oti yekhalezeini ki khafez bi. yigmeleini ihoh kezidqati kebor yadai yashib li. ki shamarti darkhei ihoh velo rasha'ti mei'elohai. ki khal mishpoto mishpatav lenegdi vekhuqotav lo 'asur mimenah. va'ehyeh tamim lo va'eshtamerah mei'avoni. vayasheb ihoh li kezidqati kebori leneged 'einav. 'im khasid titkhasad 'im gibor tamim titamam. 'im nabar titabar ve'im 'iqesh titapal. ve'et 'am 'ani toshia' ve'einekha 'al ramim tashpil. ki 'atah neiri ihoh ihoh yagiah khasheki. ki bekhah 'aruz gedud beilohai 'adaleg shur. ha'el tamim darko 'imrat ihoh zerufah magen hu lekhol hakhosim bo. ki mi 'el mibal'adei ihoh umi zur mibal'adei 'eloheinu. ha'el ma'uzi khayil vayater tamim darko darki. meshaveh raglav raglai ka'ayalot ve'al bamotai ya'amideini. melamed yadai lamilkhamah venikhat qeshet nekhushah zero'otai. vatiten li magen yish'ekha va'anotekha tarbeini. tarkhib za'adi takhteini velo ma'adu qarsulai. 'erdefah 'oyebai va'ashmidem velo 'ashub 'ad kalotam. va'akhalem va'emkhazem velo yequmun vayipelu takhat raglai. vatazreini khayil lamilkhamah takhria' qamai takhteini. ve'oyebai tatah li 'oref mesan'ai va'azmitem. yish'u ve'en moshia' 'el ihoh velo 'anam. ve'eshkhaqem ka'afar 'arez ketit khuzot 'adiqem 'erqa'em. vatefaleteini meiribei 'ami tishmereini lerosh goyim 'am lo yada'ti ya'abduni. benei neikhar yitkakhashu li lishmoa' 'ozen yishame'u li. benei neikhar yibolu veyakhgeru mimisgerotam. khai ihoh ubarukh zuri veyarum 'elohei zur yish'i. ha'el hanoten neqamot li umorid 'amim takhteini. umozi'i mei'oyebai umiqamai teromeini mei'ish khamasim tazileini. 'al ken 'odkha ihoh bagoyim uleshimkha 'azamer. migdil migdol yeshu'ot malko ve'oseh khesed limshikho ledavid ulezar'o 'ad 'olam. ve'eleh dibrei david ha'akharonim ne'um david ben yishai une'um hageber huqam 'al meshiakh 'elohei ya'aqob une'im zemirot yisra'el. ruakh ihoh diber bi umilato 'al leshoni. 'amar 'elohei yisra'el li diber zur yisra'el moshel ba'adam zadiq moshel yir'at 'elohim. ukhe'or boqer yizrakh shamesh boqer lo 'abot minogah mimatar deshe mei'arez. ki lo khen beiti 'im 'el ki berit 'olam sam li 'arukhah bakol ushemurah ki khal yish'i vekhal kheifez ki lo yazmiakh. ubeliya'al keqoz munad kulaham ki lo beyad yiqakhu. ve'ish yiga' bahem yimalei barzel ve'ez khanit uba'esh sarof yisarefu bashabet. 'eleh shemot hagiborim 'asher ledavid yosheb bashebet takhkemoni rosh hashalishi hu 'adino ha'ezno ha'ezni 'al shemoneh mei'ot khalal befa'am 'ekhad 'ekhat. ve'akharo ve'akharav 'el'azar ben dodi dodo ben 'akhokhi bishloshah giborim hagiborim 'im david bekharefam bapelishtim ne'esfu sham lamilkhamah vaya'alu 'ish yisra'el. hu qam vayakh bapelishtim 'ad ki yage'ah yado vatidbaq yado 'el hakhereb vaya'as ihoh teshu'ah gedolah bayom hahu veha'am yashubu 'akharav 'akh lefashet. ve'akharav shama ben 'agei harari vayei'asefu felishtim lakhayah vatehi sham khelqat hasadeh melei'ah 'adashim veha'am nas mipenei felishtim. vayityazeb betokh hakhelqah vayazileha vayakh 'et pelishtim vaya'as ihoh teshu'ah gedolah. vayeiredu sheloshim sheloshah meihasheloshim rosh vayabo'u 'el qazir 'el david 'el me'arat 'adulam vekhayat pelishtim khonah be'eimeq refa'im. vedavid 'az bamezudah umazab pelishtim 'az bet lakhem. vayit'aveh david vayomar mi yashqeini mayim mibor bet lekhem 'asher basha'ar. vayibqe'u sheloshet hagiborim bemakhaneh felishtim vayish'abu mayim mibor bet lekhem 'asher basha'ar vayis'u vayabi'u 'el david velo 'abah lishtotam vayasekh 'otam ihoh. vayomer khalilah li ihoh mei'asoti zot hadam ha'anashim haholekhim benafshotam velo 'abah lishtotam 'eleh 'asu sheloshet hagiborim. va'abishai 'akhi yo'ab ben zeruyah hu rosh hasheloshi hasheloshah vehu 'orer 'et khanito 'al shelosh mei'ot khalal velo shem basheloshah. min hasheloshah hakhi nikhbad vayhi lahem lesar ve'ad hasheloshah lo ba. ubenayahu ben yehoyada' ben 'ish khai khayil rab pe'alim miqabze'el hu hikah 'et shenei 'ari'el mo'ab vehu yarad vehikah 'et ha'ariyah ha'ari betokh habor beyom hashaleg. vehu hikah 'et 'ish mizri 'asher 'ish mar'eh ubeyad hamizri khanit vayeired 'eilav bashabet vayigzol 'et hakhanit miyad hamizri vayahargeihu bakhanito. 'eleh 'asah benayahu ben yehoyada' velo shem bishloshah hagiborim. min hasheloshim nikhbad ve'el hasheloshah lo ba vaysimeihu david 'el mishma'to. 'asah 'el 'akhi yo'ab basheloshim 'elkhanan ben dodo bet lakhem. shamah hakharodi 'eliqa hakharodi. khelez hapalti 'ira ben 'iqesh hateqo'i. 'abi'ezer ha'anetoti mebunai hakhushati. zalmon ha'akhokhi mahrai hanetofati. kheileb ben ba'anah hanetofati 'itai ben ribai migib'at benei binyamin. benayahu pir'atoni hidai minakhalei ga'ash. 'abi 'albon ha'arbati 'azmavet habarkhumi. 'elyakhba hasha'alboni benei yashen yehonatan. shamah haharari 'akhi'am ben sharar harari. 'elifelet ben 'akhasbai ben hama'akhati 'eli'am ben 'akhitofel hagiloni. khezro khezrai hakarmeli pa'arai ha'arbi. yig'al ben natan mizobah bani hagadi. zeleq ha'amoni nakhrai habe'eiroti nose'ei nosei kelei yo'ab ben zeruyah. 'ira hayitri gareb hayitri. 'uriyah hakhiti kol sheloshim veshib'ah. vayosef 'af ihoh lakharot beyisra'el vayaset 'et david bahem leimor lekh meneh 'et yisra'el ve'et yehudah. vayomer hamelekh 'el yo'ab sar hakhayil 'asher 'ito shut na bekhal shibtei yisra'el midan ve'ad be'er sheba' ufiqdu 'et ha'am veyada'ti 'et mispar ha'am. vayomer yo'ab 'el hamelekh veyosef ihoh 'elohekha 'el ha'am kahem vekhahem mei'ah fe'amim ve'einei 'adoni hamelekh ro'ot vadoni hamelekh lamah khafez badabar hazeh. vayekhezaq debar hamelekh 'el yo'ab ve'al sarei hekhayil vayeizei yo'ab vesarei hakhayil lifnei hamelekh lifqod 'et ha'am 'et yisra'el. vaya'abru 'et hayarden vayakhanu ba'aro'er yemin ha'ir 'asher betokh hanakhal hagad ve'el ya'zer. vayabo'u hagil'adah ve'el 'erez takhtim khadeshi vayabo'u danah ya'an vesabib 'el zidon. vayabo'u mibzar zor vekhal 'arei hakhivi vehakena'ani vayeize'u 'el negeb yehudah be'er shaba'. vayashutu bekhal ha'arez vayabo'u miqzeh tish'ah khodashim ve'esrim yom yerushalim. vayiten yo'ab 'et mispar mifqad ha'am 'el hamelekh vatehi yisra'el shemoneh mei'ot 'elef 'ish khayil sholef khereb ve'ish yehudah khamesh mei'ot 'elef 'ish. vayakh leb david 'oto 'akharei khen safar 'et ha'am vayomer david 'el ihoh khatati me'od 'asher 'asiti ve'atah ihoh ha'aber na 'et 'avon 'abdekha ki niskalti me'od. vayaqam david baboqer udebar ihoh hayah 'el gad hanabi khozeh david leimor. halokh vedibarta 'el david koh 'amar ihoh shalosh 'anokhi notel 'alekha bekhar lekha 'akhat meihem ve'e'eseh lakh. vayabo gad 'el david vayaged lo vayomer lo hatabo lekha sheba' shanim ra'ab be'arzekha 'im sheloshah khodashim nuskha lifnei zarekha vehu rodefekha ve'im heyot sheloshet yamim deber be'arzekha 'atah da' ure'eh mah 'ashib sholekhi dabar. vayomer david 'el gad zar li me'od nipelah na beyad ihoh ki rabim rakhamo rakhamav ubeyad 'adam 'al 'epolah. vayiten ihoh deber beyisra'el meihaboqer ve'ad 'et mo'ed vayamat min ha'am midan ve'ad be'er sheba' shib'im 'elef 'ish. vayishlakh yado hamal'akh yerushalim leshakhatah vayinakhem ihoh 'el hara'ah vayomer lamal'akh hamashkhit ba'am rab 'atah heref yadekha umal'akh ihoh hayah 'im goren ha'ornah ha'aravnah haybusi. vayomer david 'el ihoh bir'oto 'et hamal'akh hamakeh ba'am vayomer hineh 'anokhi khatati ve'anokhi he'eveiti ve'eleh hazon meh 'asu tehi na yadekha bi ubebet 'abi. vayabo gad 'el david bayom hahu vayomer lo 'aleh haqem ihoh mizbeiakh begoren 'araneyah 'aravnah haybusi. vaya'al david kidbar gad ka'asher zivah ihoh. vayashqef 'aravnah vayar 'et hamelekh ve'et 'abadav 'oberim 'alav vayeizei 'aravnah vayishtakhu lamelekh 'apav 'arezah. vayomer 'aravnah madua' ba 'adoni hamelekh 'el 'abdo vayomer david liqnot mei'imekha 'et hagoren libnot mizbeiakh ihoh vetei'azar hamageifah mei'al ha'am. vayomer 'aravnah 'el david yiqakh veya'al 'adoni hamelekh hatob be'ayno be'einav re'eh habaqar la'olah vehamorigim ukhelei habaqar la'eizim. hakol natan 'aravnah hamelekh lamelekh vayomer 'aravnah 'el hamelekh ihoh 'elohekha yirzekha. vayomer hamelekh 'el 'aravnah lo ki qano 'eqneh mei'otkha bimkhir velo 'a'aleh ihoh 'elohai 'olot khinam vayiqen david 'et hagoren ve'et habaqar bekhesef sheqalim khamishim. vayiben sham david mizbeiakh ihoh vaya'al 'olot ushelamim vayei'ater ihoh la'arez vatei'azar hamageifah mei'al yisra'el.

vehamelekh david zaqen ba bayamim vaykhasuhu babegadim velo yikham lo. vayomeru lo 'abadav yebaqshu ladoni hamelekh na'arah betulah ve'amedah lifnei hamelekh utehi lo sokhenet veshakhebah bekheiqekha vekham ladoni hamelekh. vaybaqshu na'arah yafah bekhol gebul yisra'el vayimze'u 'et 'abishag hashunamit vayabi'u 'otah lamelekh. vehana'arah yafah 'ad me'od vatehi lamelekh sokhenet vateshareteihu vehamelekh lo yeda'ah. va'adoniyah ben khagit mitnasei leimor 'ani 'emlokh vaya'as lo rekheb ufarashim vakhamishim 'ish razim lefanav. velo 'azabo 'abiv miyamav leimor madua' kakhah 'asita vegam hu tob to'ar me'od ve'oto yaledah 'akharei 'abshalom. vayihyu debarav 'im yo'ab ben zeruyah ve'im 'ebyatar hakohen vaya'zeru 'akharei 'adoniyah. vezadoq hakohen ubenayahu ben yehoyada' venatan hanabi veshim'i verei'i vehagiborim 'asher ledavid lo hayu 'im 'adoniyahu. vayizbakh 'adoniyahu zon ubaqar umeri 'im 'eben hazokhelet 'asher 'eizel 'en rogel vayiqra 'et kal 'ekhav benei hamelekh ulekhal 'anshei yehudah 'abdei hamelekh. ve'et natan hanabi ubenayahu ve'et hagiborim ve'et shelomoh 'akhiv lo qara. vayomer natan 'el bat sheba' 'em shelomoh leimor halo shama'at ki malakh 'adoniyahu ben khagit va'adoneinu david lo yada'. ve'atah lekhi 'i'azekh na 'eizah umaleti 'et nafshekh ve'et nefesh benekh shelomoh. lekhi ubo'i 'el hamelekh david ve'amart 'eilav halo 'atah 'adoni hamelekh nishba'ta la'amatekha leimor ki shelomoh benekh yimlokh 'akharai vehu yeisheb 'al kis'i umadua' malakh 'adoniyahu hineh 'odakh medaberet sham 'im hamelekh va'ani 'abo 'akharayikh umileiti 'et debarayikh. vatabo bat shebe' 'el hamelekh hakhadrah vehamelekh zaqen me'od va'abishag hashunamit mesharat 'et hamelekh. vatiqod bat sheba' vatishtakhu lamelekh vayomer hamelekh mah lakh. vatomer lo 'adoni 'atah nishba'ta ihoh 'elohekha la'amatekha ki shelomoh benekh yimlokh 'akharai vehu yeisheb 'al kis'i. ve'atah hineh 'adoniyah malakh ve'atah 'adoni hamelekh lo yada'eta. vayizbakh shor umeri vezon larob vayiqra lekhal benei hamelekh ule'ebyatar hakohen uleyo'ab sar hazaba velishlomoh 'abdekha lo qara. ve'atah 'adoni hamelekh 'einei khal yisra'el 'alekha lehagid lahem mi yeisheb 'al kisei 'adoni hamelekh 'akharav. vehayah kishkhab 'adoni hamelekh 'im 'abotav vehayiti 'ani ubeni shelomoh khata'im. vehineh 'odenah medaberet 'im hamelekh venatan hanabi ba. vayagidu lamelekh leimor hineh natan hanabi vayabo lifnei hamelekh vayishtakhu lamelekh 'al 'apav 'arezah. vayomer natan 'adoni hamelekh 'atah 'amarta 'adoniyahu yimlokh 'akharai vehu yeisheb 'al kis'i. ki yarad hayom vayizbakh shor umeri vezon larob vayiqra lekhal benei hamelekh ulesarei hazaba ule'ebyatar hakohen vehinam 'okhelim veshotim lefanav vayomeru yekhi hamelekh 'adoniyahu. veli 'ani 'abdekha ulezadoq hakohen velibnayahu ben yehoyada' velishlomoh 'abdekha lo qara. 'im mei'et 'adoni hamelekh nihyah hadabar hazeh velo hoda'ta 'et 'abdekha 'abdekha mi yeisheb 'al kisei 'adoni hamelekh 'akharav. vaya'an hamelekh david vayomer qir'u li lebat shaba' vatabo lifnei hamelekh vata'amod lifnei hamelekh. vayishaba' hamelekh vayomar khai ihoh 'asher padah 'et nafshi mikal zarah. ki ka'asher nishba'ti lakh ihoh 'elohei yisra'el leimor ki shelomoh benekh yimlokh 'akharai vehu yeisheb 'al kis'i takhtai ki ken 'e'eseh hayom hazeh. vatiqod bat sheba' 'apayim 'erez vatishtakhu lamelekh vatomer yekhi 'adoni hamelekh david le'olam. vayomer hamelekh david qir'u li lezadoq hakohen ulenatan hanabi velibnayahu ben yehoyada' vayabo'u lifnei hamelekh. vayomer hamelekh lahem qekhu 'imakhem 'et 'abdei 'adoneikhem vehirkabtem 'et shelomoh beni 'al hapirdah 'asher li vehoradtem 'oto 'el gikhon. umashakh 'oto m zadoq hakohen venatan hanabi lemelekh 'al yisra'el uteqa'tem bashofar va'amartem yekhi hamelekh shelomoh. va'alitem 'akharav uba veyashab 'al kis'i vehu yimlokh takhtai ve'oto ziviti lihyot nagid 'al yisra'el ve'al yehudah. vaya'an benayahu ben yehoyada' 'et hamelekh vayomer 'amen ken yomar ihoh 'elohei 'adoni hamelekh. ka'asher hayah ihoh 'im 'adoni hamelekh ken yehi yihyeh 'im shelomoh vigadel 'et kis'o mikisei 'adoni hamelekh david. vayeired zadoq hakohen venatan hanabi ubenayahu ben yehoyada' vehakereiti vehapeleiti vayarkibu 'et shelomoh 'al pirdat hamelekh david vayolikhu 'oto 'al gikhon. vayiqakh zadoq hakohen 'et qeren hashemen min ha'ohel vayimshakh 'et shelomoh vayitqe'u bashofar vayomeru kal ha'am yekhi hamelekh shelomoh. vaya'alu khal ha'am 'akharav veha'am mekhalelim bakhalilim usemeikhim simkhah gedolah vatibaqa' ha'arez beqolam. vayishma' 'adoniyahu vekhal haqeru'im 'asher 'ito vehem kilu le'ekhol vayishma' yo'ab 'et qol hashofar vayomer madua' qol haqiryah homah. 'odenu medaber vehineh yonatan ben 'ebyatar hakohen ba vayomer 'adoniyahu bo ki 'ish khayil 'atah vetob tebaser. vaya'an yonatan vayomer la'adoniyahu 'abal 'adoneinu hamelekh david himlikh 'et shelomoh. vayishlakh 'ito hamelekh 'et zadoq hakohen ve'et natan hanabi ubenayahu ben yehoyada' vehakereiti vehapeleiti vayarkibu 'oto 'al pirdat hamelekh. vayimshekhu 'oto zadoq hakohen venatan hanabi lemelekh begikhon vaya'alu misham semeikhim vateihom haqiryah hu haqol 'asher shema'tem. vegam yashab shelomoh 'al kisei hamelukhah. vegam ba'u 'abdei hamelekh lebarekh 'et 'adoneinu hamelekh david leimor yeiteb 'elohekha 'elohim 'et shem shelomoh mishemekha vigadel 'et kis'o mikis'ekha vayishtakhu hamelekh 'al hamishkab. vegam kakhah 'amar hamelekh barukh ihoh 'elohei yisra'el 'asher natan hayom yosheb 'al kis'i ve'einai ro'ot. vayekherdu vayaqumu kal haqeru'im 'asher la'adoniyahu vayeilekhu 'ish ledarko. va'adoniyahu yarei mipenei shelomoh vayaqam vayeilekh vayakhazeq beqarnot hamizbeiakh. vayugad lishlomoh leimor hineh 'adoniyahu yarei 'et hamelekh shelomoh vehineh 'akhaz beqarnot hamizbeiakh leimor yishaba' li khayom hamelekh shelomoh 'im yamit 'et 'abdo bekhareb. vayomer shelomoh 'im yihyeh leben khayil lo yipol misa'arato 'arezah ve'im ra'ah timazei bo vamet. vayishlakh hamelekh shelomoh vayoriduhu mei'al hamizbeiakh vayabo vayishtakhu lamelekh shelomoh vayomer lo shelomoh lekh lebeitekha. vayiqrebu yemei david lamut vayzav 'et shelomoh beno leimor. 'anokhi holekh bederekh kal ha'arez vekhazaqta vehayita le'ish. veshamarta 'et mishmeret ihoh 'elohekha lalekhet bidrakhav lishmor khuqotav mizvotav umishpatav ve'eidevotav kakatub betorat mosheh lema'an taskil 'et kal 'asher ta'aseh ve'et kal 'asher tifneh sham. lema'an yaqim ihoh 'et debaro 'asher diber 'alai leimor 'im yishmeru banekha 'et darkam lalekhet lefanai be'emet bekhal lebabam ubekhal nafsham leimor lo yikaret lekha 'ish mei'al kisei yisra'el. vegam 'atah yada'ta 'et 'asher 'asah li yo'ab ben zeruyah 'asher 'asah lishnei sarei zib'ot yisra'el le'abner ben ner vela'amasa ben yeter vayahargem vayasem demei milkhamah beshalom vayiten demei milkhamah bakhagorato 'asher bematenav ubena'alo 'asher beraglav. ve'asita kekhakhematekha velo tored seibato beshalom she'ol. velibnei barzilai hagil'adi ta'aseh khesed vehayu be'okhelei shulkhanekha ki khen qarebu 'eilai bebarekhi mipenei 'abshalom 'akhikha. vehineh 'imekha shim'i ben geira ben haymini mibakhurim vehu qilani qelalah nimrezet beyom lekhti makhanayim vehu yarad liqrati hayarden va'eshaba' lo ihoh leimor 'im 'amitekha bekhareb. ve'atah 'al tenaqeihu ki 'ish khakham 'atah veyada'ta 'et 'asher ta'aseh lo vehoradta 'et seibato bedam she'ol. vayishkab david 'im 'abotav vayiqaber be'ir david. vehayamim 'asher malakh david 'al yisra'el 'arba'im shanah bekhebron malakh sheba' shanim ubirushalim malakh sheloshim veshalosh shanim. ushelomoh yashab 'al kisei david 'abiv vatikon malkhuto me'od. vayabo 'adoniyahu ben khaget 'el bat sheba' 'em shelomoh vatomer hashalom bo'ekha vayomer shalom. vayomer dabar li 'eilayikh vatomer daber. vayomer 'at yada'at ki li hayetah hamelukhah ve'alai samu khal yisra'el peneihem limlokh vatisob hamelukhah vatehi le'akhi ki ihoh hayetah lo. ve'atah she'eilah 'akhat 'anokhi sho'el mei'itakh 'al tashibi 'et panai vatomer 'eilav daber. vayomer 'imri na lishlomoh hamelekh ki lo yashib 'et panayikh veyiten li 'et 'abishag hashunamit le'ishah. vatomer bat sheba' tob 'anokhi 'adaber 'alekha 'el hamelekh. vatabo bat sheba' 'el hamelekh shelomoh ledaber lo 'al 'adoniyahu vayaqam hamelekh liqratah vayishtakhu lah vayeisheb 'al kis'o vayasem kisei le'em hamelekh vateisheb limino. vatomer she'eilah 'akhat qetanah 'anokhi sho'elet mei'itakh 'al tasheb 'et panai vayomer lah hamelekh sha'ali 'imi ki lo 'ashib 'et panayikh. vatomer yutan 'et 'abishag hashunamit la'adoniyahu 'akhikha le'ishah. vaya'an hamelekh shelomoh vayomer le'imo velamah 'at sho'elet 'et 'abishag hashunamit la'adoniyahu vesha'ali lo 'et hamelukhah ki hu 'akhi hagadol mimeni velo ule'ebyatar hakohen uleyo'ab ben zeruyah. vayishaba' hamelekh shelomoh ihoh leimor koh ya'aseh li 'elohim vekhoh yosif ki benafsho diber 'adoniyahu 'et hadabar hazeh. ve'atah khai ihoh 'asher hekhinani vayoshibini vayoshibani 'al kisei david 'abi va'asher 'asah li bayit ka'asher diber ki hayom yumat 'adoniyahu. vayishlakh hamelekh shelomoh beyad benayahu ben yehoyada' vayifga' bo vayamot. ule'ebyatar hakohen 'amar hamelekh 'anatot lekh 'al sadekha ki 'ish mavet 'atah ubayom hazeh lo 'amitekha ki nasata 'et 'aron 'adonai ihoh lifnei david 'abi vekhi hit'anita bekhol 'asher hit'anah 'abi. vaygaresh shelomoh 'et 'ebyatar mihyot kohen ihoh lemalei 'et debar ihoh 'asher diber 'al bet 'eili beshiloh. vehashemu'ah ba'ah 'ad yo'ab ki yo'ab natah 'akharei 'adoniyah ve'akharei 'abshalom lo natah vayanas yo'ab 'el 'ohel ihoh vayakhazeq beqarnot hamizbeiakh. vayugad lamelekh shelomoh ki nas yo'ab 'el 'ohel ihoh vehineh 'eizel hamizbeiakh vayishlakh shelomoh 'et benayahu ben yehoyada' leimor lekh pega' bo. vayabo benayahu 'el 'ohel ihoh vayomer 'eilav koh 'amar hamelekh zei vayomer lo ki foh 'amut vayasheb benayahu 'et hamelekh dabar leimor koh diber yo'ab vekhoh 'anani. vayomer lo hamelekh 'aseh ka'asher diber ufega' bo uqebarto vahasirota demei khinam 'asher shafakh yo'ab mei'alai umei'al bet 'abi. veheishib ihoh 'et damo 'al rosho 'asher paga' bishnei 'anashim zadiqim vetobim mimenu vayahargem bakhereb ve'abi david lo yada' 'et 'abner ben ner sar zeba yisra'el ve'et 'amasa ben yeter sar zeba yehudah. veshabu demeihem berosh yo'ab uberosh zar'o le'olam uledavid ulezar'o ulebeito ulekhis'o yihyeh shalom 'ad 'olam mei'im ihoh. vaya'al benayahu ben yehoyada' vayifga' bo vaymiteihu vayiqaber bebeito bamidbar. vayiten hamelekh 'et benayahu ben yehoyada' takhtav 'al hazaba ve'et zadoq hakohen natan hamelekh takhat 'ebyatar. vayishlakh hamelekh vayiqra leshim'i vayomer lo beneh lekha bayit birushalim veyashabta sham velo teizei misham 'aneh va'anah. vehayah beyom zeitekha ve'abarta 'et nakhal qidron yadoa' teida' ki mot tamut damekha yihyeh beroshekha. vayomer shim'i lamelekh tob hadabar ka'asher diber 'adoni hamelekh ken ya'aseh 'abdekha vayeisheb shim'i birushalim yamim rabim. vayhi miqez shalosh shanim vayibrekhu shenei 'abadim leshim'i 'el 'akhish ben ma'akhah melekh gat vayagidu leshim'i leimor hineh 'abadekha begat. vayaqam shim'i vayakhabosh 'et khamoro vayeilekh gatah 'el 'akhish lebaqesh 'et 'abadav vayeilekh shim'i vayabei 'et 'abadav migat. vayugad lishlomoh ki halakh shim'i mirushalim gat vayashob. vayishlakh hamelekh vayiqra leshim'i vayomer 'eilav halo hishba'tikha ihoh va'a'id bekha leimor beyom zeitekha vehalakhta 'aneh va'anah yadoa' teida' ki mot tamut vatomer 'eilai tob hadabar shama'eti. umadua' lo shamarta 'et shebu'at ihoh ve'et hamizvah 'asher ziviti 'alekha. vayomer hamelekh 'el shim'i 'atah yada'ta 'et kal hara'ah 'asher yada' lebabekha 'asher 'asita ledavid 'abi veheishib ihoh 'et ra'atekha beroshekha. vehamelekh shelomoh barukh vekhisei david yihyeh nakhon lifnei ihoh 'ad 'olam. vayzav hamelekh 'et benayahu ben yehoyada' vayeizei vayifga' bo vayamot vehamamlakhah nakhonah beyad shelomoh. vayitkhaten shelomoh 'et par'oh melekh mizrayim vayiqakh 'et bat par'oh vaybi'eha 'el 'ir david 'ad kaloto libnot 'et beito ve'et bet ihoh ve'et khomat yerushalim sabib. raq ha'am mezabekhim babamot ki lo nibnah bayit leshem ihoh 'ad hayamim hahem. vaye'ehab shelomoh 'et ihoh lalekhet bekhuqot david 'abiv raq babamot hu mezabeiakh umaqtir. vayeilekh hamelekh gib'onah lizboakh sham ki hi habamah hagedolah 'elef 'olot ya'aleh shelomoh 'al hamizbeiakh hahu. begib'on nir'ah ihoh 'el shelomoh bakhalom halayelah vayomer 'elohim she'al mah 'eten lakh. vayomer shelomoh 'atah 'asita 'im 'abdekha david 'abi khesed gadol ka'asher halakh lefanekha be'emet ubizdaqah ubeyishrat leibab 'imakh vatishmar lo 'et hakhesed hagadol hazeh vatiten lo ben yosheb 'al kis'o kayom hazeh. ve'atah ihoh 'elohai 'atah himlakhta 'et 'abdekha takhat david 'abi ve'anokhi na'ar qaton lo 'eida' zet vabo. ve'abdekha betokh 'amekha 'asher bakhareta 'am rab 'asher lo yimaneh velo yisafer meirob. venatata le'abdekha leb shomeia' lishpot 'et 'amekha lehabin ben tob lera' ki mi yukhal lishpot 'et 'amekha hakabed hazeh. vayitab hadabar be'einei 'adonai ki sha'al shelomoh 'et hadabar hazeh. vayomer 'elohim 'eilav ya'an 'asher sha'alta 'et hadabar hazeh velo sha'alta lekha yamim rabim velo sha'alta lekha 'osher velo sha'alta nefesh 'oyebekha vesha'alta lekha habin lishmoa' mishpat. hineh 'asiti kidbarekha hineh natati lekha leb khakham venabon 'asher kamokha lo hayah lefanekha ve'akharekha lo yaqum kamokha. vegam 'asher lo sha'alta natati lakh gam 'osher gam kabod 'asher lo hayah khamokha 'ish bamelakhim kal yamekha. ve'im teilekh bidrakhai lishmor khuqai umizvotai ka'asher halakh david 'abikha veha'arakhti 'et yamekha. vayiqaz shelomoh vehineh khalom vayabo yerushalim vaya'amod lifnei 'aron berit 'adonai vaya'al 'olot vaya'as shelamim vaya'as mishteh lekhal 'abadav. 'az tabonah shetayim nashim zonot 'el hamelekh vata'amodenah lefanav. vatomer ha'ishah ha'akhat bi 'adoni 'ani veha'ishah hazot yoshebot bebayit 'ekhad va'eiled 'imah babayit. vayhi bayom hashelishi lelidti vateiled gam ha'ishah hazot va'anakhnu yakhdav 'en zar 'itanu babayit zulati shetayim 'anakhnu babayit. vayamat ben ha'ishah hazot layelah 'asher shakhebah 'alav. vataqam betokh halaylah vatiqakh 'et beni mei'ezli va'amatekha yesheinah vatashkibeihu bekheiqah ve'et benah hamet hishkibah bekheiqi. va'aqum baboqer leheiniq 'et beni vehineh met va'etbonen 'eilav baboqer vehineh lo hayah beni 'asher yaladeti. vatomer ha'ishah ha'akheret lo khi beni hakhai ubenekh hamet vezot 'omeret lo khi benekh hamet ubeni hekhai vatedabeirenah lifnei hamelekh. vayomer hamelekh zot 'omeret zeh beni hakhai ubenekh hamet vezot 'omeret lo khi benekh hamet ubeni hekhai. vayomer hamelekh qekhu li khareb vayabi'u hakhereb lifnei hamelekh. vayomer hamelekh gizru 'et hayeled hakhai lishnayim utenu 'et hakhazi le'akhat ve'et hakhazi le'ekhat. vatomer ha'ishah 'asher benah hakhai 'el hamelekh ki nikhmeru rakhameha 'al benah vatomer bi 'adoni tenu lah 'et hayalud hakhai vehamet 'al temituhu vezot 'omeret gam li gam lakh lo yihyeh gezoru. vaya'an hamelekh vayomer tenu lah 'et hayalud hakhai vehamet lo temituhu hi 'imo. vayishme'u khal yisra'el 'et hamishpat 'asher shafat hamelekh vayir'u mipenei hamelekh ki ra'u ki khakhemat 'elohim beqirbo la'asot mishpat. vayhi hamelekh shelomoh melekh 'al kal yisra'el. ve'eleh hasarim 'asher lo 'azaryahu ben zadoq hakohen. 'elikhoref va'akhiyah benei shisha soferim yehoshafat ben 'akhilud hamazkir. ubenayahu ben yehoyada' 'al hazaba vezadoq ve'ebyatar kohanim. va'azaryahu ben natan 'al hanizabim vezabud ben natan kohen rei'eh hamelekh. va'akhishar 'al habayit va'adoniram ben 'abda 'al hamas. velishlomoh shenem 'asar nizabim 'al kal yisra'el vekhilkelu 'et hamelekh ve'et beito khodesh bashanah yihyeh 'al 'ekhad ha'ekhad lekhalkel. ve'eleh shemotam ben khur behar 'efrayim. ben deqer bemaqaz ubesha'albim ubet shamesh ve'eilon bet khanan. ben khesed ba'arubot lo sokhoh vekhal 'erez kheifer. ben 'abinadab kal nafat dor tafat bat shelomoh hayetah lo le'ishah. ba'ana ben 'akhilud ta'nakh umegido vekhal bet she'an 'asher 'eizel zaretanah mitakhat leyizre'el mibet she'an 'ad 'abel mekholah 'ad mei'eiber leyaqemo'am. ben geber beramot gil'ad lo khavot ya'ir ben menasheh 'asher bagil'ad lo khebel 'argob 'asher babashan shishim 'arim gedolot khomah uberiakh nekhoshet. 'akhinadab ben 'ido makhanayemah. 'akhima'az benaftali gam hu laqakh 'et basemat bat shelomoh le'ishah. ba'ana ben khushai be'asher ube'alot. yehoshafat ben paruakh beyisashkhar. shim'i ben 'eila bebinyamin. geber ben 'uri be'erez gil'ad 'erez sikhon melekh ha'emori ve'og melekh habashan unezib 'ekhad 'asher ba'arez. yehudah veyisra'el rabim kakhol 'asher 'al hayam larob 'okhelim veshotim usemeikhim. ushelomoh hayah moshel bekhal hamamlakhot min hanahar 'erez pelishtim ve'ad gebul mizrayim magishim minkhah ve'obedim 'et shelomoh kal yemei khayav. vayhi lekhem shelomoh leyom 'ekhad sheloshim kor solet veshishim kor qamakh. 'asarah baqar beri'im ve'esrim baqar re'i umei'ah zon lebad mei'ayal uzebi veyakhmur ubarburim 'abusim. ki hu rodeh bekhal 'eiber hanahar mitifsakh ve'ad 'azah bekhal malkhei 'eiber hanahar veshalom hayah lo mikal 'abarav misabib. vayeisheb yehudah veyisra'el labetakh 'ish takhat gafno vetakhat te'einato midan ve'ad be'er shaba' kol yemei shelomoh. vayhi lishlomoh 'arba'im 'elef 'urvot susim lemerkabo ushenem 'asar 'elef parashim. vekhilkelu hanizabim ha'eleh 'et hamelekh shelomoh ve'et kal haqareb 'el shulkhan hamelekh shelomoh 'ish khadesho lo ye'aderu dabar. vehase'orim vehateben lasusim velarakhesh yabi'u 'el hamaqom 'asher yihyeh sham 'ish kemishpato. vayiten 'elohim khakhmah lishlomoh utebunah harbeh me'od verokhab leb kakhol 'asher 'al sefat hayam. vateireb khakhemat shelomoh meikhakhemat kal benei qedem umikol khakhemat mizrayim. vayekhkam mikal ha'adam mei'eitan ha'ezrakhi veheiman vekhalkol vedarda' benei makhol vayhi shemo bekhal hagoyim sabib. vaydaber sheloshet 'alafim mashal vayhi shiro khamishah va'alef. vaydaber 'al ha'eizim min ha'erez 'asher balebanon ve'ad ha'eizob 'asher yozei baqir vaydaber 'al habeheimah ve'al ha'of ve'al haremes ve'al hadagim. vayabo'u mikal ha'amim lishmoa' 'et khakhemat shelomoh mei'et kal malkhei ha'arez 'asher shame'u 'et khakhemato. vayishlakh khiram melekh zor 'et 'abadav 'el shelomoh ki shama' ki 'oto mashekhu lemelekh takhat 'abihu ki 'oheb hayah khiram ledavid kal hayamim. vayishlakh shelomoh 'el khiram leimor. 'atah yada'ta 'et david 'abi ki lo yakhol libnot bayit leshem ihoh 'elohav mipenei hamilkhamah 'asher sebabuhu 'ad tet ihoh 'otam takhat kapot raglo raglai. ve'atah heiniakh ihoh 'elohai li misabib 'en satan ve'en pega' ra'. vehini 'omer libnot bayit leshem ihoh 'elohai ka'asher diber ihoh 'el david 'abi leimor binkha 'asher 'eten takhtekha 'al kis'ekha hu yibneh habayit lishmi. ve'atah zaveh veyikhretu li 'arazim min halebanon va'abadai yihyu 'im 'abadekha usekhar 'abadekha 'eten lekha kekhol 'asher tomer ki 'atah yada'ta ki 'en banu 'ish yodeia' likhrat 'eizim kazidonim. vayhi kishmoa' khiram 'et dibrei shelomoh vayismakh me'od vayomer barukh ihoh hayom 'asher natan ledavid ben khakham 'al ha'am harab hazeh. vayishlakh khiram 'el shelomoh leimor shama'ti 'et 'asher shalakhta 'eilai 'ani 'e'eseh 'et kal khefzekha ba'azei 'arazim uba'azei beroshim. 'abadai yoridu min halebanon yamah va'ani 'asimem doberot bayam 'ad hamaqom 'asher tishlakh 'eilai venipaztim sham ve'atah tisa ve'atah ta'aseh 'et khefzi latet lekhem beiti. vayhi khirom noten lishlomoh 'azei 'arazim va'azei beroshim kal khefzo. ushelomoh natan lekhiram 'esrim 'elef kor khitim makolet lebeito ve'esrim kor shemen katit koh yiten shelomoh lekhiram shanah beshanah. ihoh natan khakhmah lishlomoh ka'asher diber lo vayhi shalom ben khiram uben shelomoh vayikhretu berit sheneihem. vaya'al hamelekh shelomoh mas mikal yisra'el vayhi hamas sheloshim 'elef 'ish. vayishlakhem lebanonah 'aseret 'alafim bakhodesh khalifot khodesh yihyu balebanon shenayim khodashim bebeito va'adoniram 'al hamas. vayhi lishlomoh shib'im 'elef nosei sabal ushemonim 'elef khozeb bahar. lebad misarei hanizabim lishlomoh 'asher 'al hamelakhah sheloshet 'alafim ushelosh mei'ot harodim ba'am ha'osim bamelakhah. vayzav hamelekh vayasi'u 'abanim gedolot 'abanim yeqarot leyased habayit 'abnei gazit. vayifselu bonei shelomoh ubonei khirom vehagiblim vayakhinu ha'eizim veha'abanim libnot habayit. vayhi bishmonim shanah ve'arba' mei'ot shanah lezet benei yisra'el mei'erez mizrayim bashanah harebi'it bekhodesh ziv hu hakhodesh hasheini limlokh shelomoh 'al yisra'el vayiben habayit ihoh. vehabayit 'asher banah hamelekh shelomoh ihoh shishim 'amah 'areko ve'esrim rakhebo usheloshim 'amah qomato. veha'ulam 'al penei heikhal habayit 'esrim 'amah 'areko 'al penei rokhab habayit 'eser ba'amah rakhebo 'al penei habayit. vaya'as labayit khalonei shequfim 'atumim. vayiben 'al qir habayit yazoa' yazia' sabib 'et qirot habayit sabib laheikhal veladebir vaya'as zela'ot sabib. hayazoa' hayazia' hatakhtonah khamesh ba'amah rakhebah vehatikhonah shesh ba'amah rakhebah vehashelishit sheba' ba'amah rakhebah ki migra'ot natan labayit sabib khuzah lebilti 'akhoz beqirot habayit. vehabayit behibanoto 'eben sheleimah masa' nibnah umaqabot vehagarzen kal keli barzel lo nishma' babayit behibanoto. petakh hazeila' hatikhonah 'el ketef habayit haymanit ubelulim ya'alu 'al hatikhonah umin hatikhonah 'el hashelishim. vayiben 'et habayit vaykhaleihu vayispon 'et habayit geibim usedeirot ba'arazim. vayiben 'et hayazoa' hayazia' 'al kal habayit khamesh 'amot qomato vaye'ekhoz 'et habayit ba'azei 'arazim. vayhi debar ihoh 'el shelomoh leimor. habayit hazeh 'asher 'atah boneh 'im teilekh bekhuqotai ve'et mishpatai ta'aseh veshamarta 'et kal mizvotai lalekhet bahem vahaqimoti 'et debari 'itakh 'asher dibarti 'el david 'abikha. veshakhanti betokh benei yisra'el velo 'e'ezob 'et 'ami yisra'el. vayiben shelomoh 'et habayit vaykhaleihu. vayiben 'et qirot habayit mibaytah bezal'ot 'arazim miqarqa' habayit 'ad qirot hasipun zipah 'ez mibayit vayzaf 'et qarqa' habayit bezal'ot beroshim. vayiben 'et 'esrim 'amah miyarkotei miyarketei habayit bezal'ot 'arazim min haqarqa' 'ad haqirot vayiben lo mibayit lidbir leqodesh haqodashim. ve'arba'im ba'amah hayah habayit hu haheikhal lifnai. ve'erez 'el habayit penimah miqla'at peqa'im ufeturei zizim hakol 'erez 'en 'eben nir'ah. udebir betokh habayit mipenimah heikhin letiten sham 'et 'aron berit ihoh. velifnei hadebir 'esrim 'amah 'orekh ve'esrim 'amah rokhab ve'esrim 'amah qomato vayzapeihu zahab sagur vayzaf mizbeiakh 'arez. vayzaf shelomoh 'et habayit mipenimah zahab sagur vai'aber beratiqot beratuqot zahab lifnei hadebir vayzapeihu zahab. ve'et kal habayit zipah zahab 'ad tom kal habayit vekhal hamizbeiakh 'asher ladebir zipah zahab. vaya'as badebir shenei kherubim 'azei shamen 'eser 'amot qomato. vekhamesh 'amot kenaf hakerub ha'ekhat vekhamesh 'amot kenaf hakerub hasheinit 'eser 'amot miqzot kenafav ve'ad qezot kenafav. ve'eser ba'amah hakerub hasheini midah 'akhat veqezeb 'ekhad lishnei hakerubim. qomat hakerub ha'ekhad 'eser ba'amah vekhen hakerub hasheini. vayiten 'et hakerubim betokh habayit hapenimi vayifresu 'et kanfei hakerubim vatiga' kenaf ha'ekhad baqir ukhenaf hakerub hasheini noga'at baqir hasheini vekhanfeihem 'el tokh habayit noge'ot kanaf 'el kanaf. vayzaf 'et hakerubim zahab. ve'et kal qirot habayit meisab qala' pitukhei miqle'ot kerubim vetimorot ufeturei zizim milifnim velakhizon. ve'et qarqa' habayit zipah zahab lifnimah velakhizon. ve'et petakh hadebir 'asah daltot 'azei shamen ha'ayil mezuzot khamishit. ushetei daltot 'azei shemen veqala' 'aleihem miqle'ot kerubim vetimorot ufeturei zizim vezipah zahab vayared 'al hakerubim ve'al hatimorot 'et hazahab. vekhen 'asah lefetakh haheikhal mezuzot 'azei shamen mei'et rebi'it. ushetei daltot 'azei beroshim shenei zela'im hadelet ha'akhat gelilim ushenei qela'im hadelet hasheinit gelilim. veqala' kerubim vetimorot ufeturei zizim vezipah zahab meyushar 'al hamekhuqeh. vayiben 'et hekhazer hapenimit sheloshah turei gazit vetur kerutot 'arazim. bashanah harebi'it yusad bet ihoh beyerakh ziv. ubashanah ha'akhat 'esreh beyerakh bul hu hakhodesh hashemini kalah habayit lekhal debarav ulekhal mishpato mishpatav vayibneihu sheba' shanim. ve'et beito banah shelomoh shelosh 'esreh shanah vaykhal 'et kal beito. vayiben 'et bet ya'ar halebanon mei'ah 'amah 'areko vakhamishim 'amah rakhebo usheloshim 'amah qomato 'al 'arba'ah turei 'amudei 'arazim ukherutot 'arazim 'al ha'amudim. vesafun ba'erez mima'al 'al hazela'ot 'asher 'al ha'amudim 'arba'im vakhamishah khamishah 'asar hatur. ushequfim sheloshah turim umekhezah 'el mekhezah shalosh pe'amim. vekhal hapetakhim vehamezuzot rebu'im shaqef umul mekhezah 'el mekhezah shalosh pe'amim. ve'et 'ulam ha'amudim 'asah khamishim 'amah 'areko usheloshim 'amah rakhebo ve'ulam 'al peneihem ve'amudim ve'ab 'al peneihem. ve'ulam hakisei 'asher yishpat sham 'ulam hamishpat 'asah vesafun ba'erez meihaqarqa' 'ad haqarqa'. ubeito 'asher yeisheb sham khazer ha'akheret mibet la'ulam kama'aseh hazeh hayah ubayit ya'aseh lebat par'oh 'asher laqakh shelomoh ka'ulam hazeh. kal 'eleh 'abanim yeqarot kemidot gazit megorarot bamegeirah mibayit umikhuz umimasad 'ad hatefakhot umikhuz 'ad hekhazer hagedolah. umeyusad 'abanim yeqarot 'abanim gedolot 'abnei 'eser 'amot ve'abnei shemoneh 'amot. umilma'lah 'abanim yeqarot kemidot gazit va'arez. vekhazer hagedolah sabib sheloshah turim gazit vetur kerutot 'arazim velakhazar bet ihoh hapenimit ule'ulam habayit. vayishlakh hamelekh shelomoh vayiqakh 'et khiram mizor. ben 'ishah 'almanah hu mimateh naftali ve'abiv 'ish zori khoresh nekhoshet vayimalei 'et hakhakhemah ve'et hatebunah ve'et hada'at la'asot kal melakhah banekhoshet vayabo 'el hamelekh shelomoh vaya'as 'et kal melakhto. vayazar 'et shenei ha'amudim nekhoshet shemoneh 'esreh 'amah qomat ha'amud ha'ekhad vekhut shetem 'esreh 'amah yasob 'et ha'amud hasheini. ushetei khotarot 'asah latet 'al rashei ha'amudim muzaq nekhoshet khamesh 'amot qomat hakoteret ha'ekhat vekhamesh 'amot qomat hakoteret hasheinit. sebakhim ma'aseh sebakhah gedilim ma'aseh sharsherot lakotarot 'asher 'al rosh ha'amudim shib'ah lakoteret ha'ekhat veshib'ah lakoteret hasheinit. vaya'as 'et ha'amudim ushenei turim sabib 'al hasebakhah ha'ekhat lekhasot 'et hakotarot 'asher 'al rosh harimonim vekhen 'asah lakoteret hasheinit. vekhotarot 'asher 'al rosh ha'amudim ma'aseh shushan ba'ulam 'arba' 'amot. vekhotarot 'al shenei ha'amudim gam mima'al mile'umat habeten 'asher le'eiber sebakhah hasebakhah veharimonim matayim turim sabib 'al hakoteret hasheinit. vayaqem 'et ha'amudim le'ulam haheikhal vayaqem 'et ha'amud haymani vayiqra 'et shemo yakhin vayaqem 'et ha'amud hasemali vayiqra 'et shemo bo'az. ve'al rosh ha'amudim ma'aseh shoshan vatitom melekhet ha'amudim. vaya'as 'et hayam muzaq 'eser ba'amah misefato 'ad sefato 'agol sabib vekhamesh ba'amah qomato uqeveh veqav sheloshim ba'amah yasob 'oto sabib. ufeqa'im mitakhat lisfato sabib sobebim 'oto 'eser ba'amah maqifim 'et hayam sabib shenei turim hapeqa'im yezuqim bizuqato. 'omed 'al shenei 'asar baqar sheloshah fonim zafonah usheloshah fonim yamah usheloshah ponim negbah usheloshah ponim mizrakhah vehayam 'aleihem milma'elah vekhal 'akhoreihem bayetah. ve'abeyo tefakh usefato kema'aseh sefat kos perakh shoshan 'alpayim bat yakhil. vaya'as 'et hamekhonot 'eser nekhoshet 'arba' ba'amah 'orekh hamekhonah ha'ekhat ve'arba' ba'amah rakhebah veshalosh ba'amah qomatah. vezeh ma'aseh hamekhonah misgerot lahem umisgerot ben hashlabim. ve'al hamisgerot 'asher ben hashlabim 'arayot baqar ukherubim ve'al hashlabim ken mima'al umitakhat la'arayot velabaqar loyot ma'aseh morad. ve'arba'ah 'ofanei nekhoshet lamekhonah ha'akhat vesarnei nekhoshet ve'arba'ah fa'amotav keteifot lahem mitakhat lakiyor haketeifot yezuqot mei'eiber 'ish loyot. ufihu mibet lakoteret vama'lah ba'amah ufiha 'agol ma'aseh khen 'amah vakhazi ha'amah vegam 'al piha miqla'ot umisgeroteihem meruba'ot lo 'agulot. ve'arba'at ha'ofanim lemitakhat lamisgerot vidot ha'ofanim bamekhonah veqomat ha'ofan ha'ekhad 'amah vakhazi ha'amah. uma'aseh ha'ofanim kema'aseh 'ofan hamerkabah yedotam vegabeihem vekhishuqeihem vekhishureihem hakol muzaq. ve'arba' keteifot 'el 'arba' pinot hamekhonah ha'ekhat min hamekhonah keteifeha. uberosh hamekhonah khazi ha'amah qomah 'agol sabib ve'al rosh hamekhonah yedoteha umisgeroteha mimenah. vayfatakh 'al halukhot yedoteha ve'al vamisgeroteha misgeroteha kerubim 'arayot vetimorot kema'ar 'ish veloyot sabib. kazot 'asah 'et 'eser hamekhonot muzaq 'ekhad midah 'akhat qezeb 'ekhad lekhulahenah. vaya'as 'asarah khiyorot nekhoshet 'arba'im bat yakhil hakiyor ha'ekhad 'arba' ba'amah hakiyor ha'ekhad kiyor 'ekhad 'al hamekhonah ha'akhat le'eser hamekhonot. vayiten 'et hamekhonot khamesh 'al ketef habayit miyamin vekhamesh 'al ketef habayit misemolo ve'et hayam natan miketef habayit haymanit qeidemah mimul negeb. vaya'as khirom 'et hakiyorot ve'et haya'im ve'et hamizraqot vaykhal khiram la'asot 'et kal hamelakhah 'asher 'asah lamelekh shelomoh bet ihoh. 'amudim shenayim vegulot hakotarot 'asher 'al rosh ha'amudim shetayim vehasebakhot shetayim lekhasot 'et shetei gulot hakotarot 'asher 'al rosh ha'amudim. ve'et harimonim 'arba' mei'ot lishtei hasebakhot shenei turim rimonim lasebakhah ha'ekhat lekhasot 'et shetei gulot hakotarot 'asher 'al penei ha'amudim. ve'et hamekhonot 'aser ve'et hakiyorot 'asarah 'al hamekhonot. ve'et hayam ha'ekhad ve'et habaqar shenem 'asar takhat hayam. ve'et hasirot ve'et haya'im ve'et hamizraqot ve'et kal hakeilim ha'ohel ha'eleh 'asher 'asah khiram lamelekh shelomoh bet ihoh nekhoshet memorat. bekhikar hayarden yezaqam hamelekh bema'abeh ha'adamah ben sukot uben zaretan. vayanakh shelomoh 'et kal hakeilim meirob me'od me'od lo nekhqar mishqal hanekhoshet. vaya'as shelomoh 'et kal hakeilim 'asher bet ihoh 'et mizbakh hazahab ve'et hashulkhan 'asher 'alav lekhem hapanim zahab. ve'et hamenorot khamesh miyamin vekhamesh misemol lifnei hadebir zahab sagur vehaperakh vehaneirot vehamelqakhayim zahab. vehasipot vehamzamerot vehamizraqot vehakapot vehamakhtot zahab sagur vehapotot ledaltot habayit hapenimi leqodesh haqodashim ledaltei habayit laheikhal zahab. vatishlam kal hamelakhah 'asher 'asah hamelekh shelomoh bet ihoh vayabei shelomoh 'et qadeshei david 'abiv 'et hakesef ve'et hazahab ve'et hakeilim natan be'ozerot bet ihoh. 'az yaqhel shelomoh 'et ziqnei yisra'el 'et kal rashei hamatot nesi'ei ha'abot libnei yisra'el 'el hamelekh shelomoh yerushalim leha'alot 'et 'aron berit ihoh mei'ir david hi ziyon. vayiqahalu 'el hamelekh shelomoh kal 'ish yisra'el beyerakh ha'eitanim bekhag hu hakhodesh hashebi'i. vayabo'u kol ziqnei yisra'el vayis'u hakohanim 'et ha'aron. vaya'alu 'et 'aron ihoh ve'et 'ohel mo'ed ve'et kal kelei haqodesh 'asher ba'ohel vaya'alu 'otam hakohanim vehalviyim. vehamelekh shelomoh vekhal 'adat yisra'el hano'adim 'alav 'ito lifnei ha'aron mezabekhim zon ubaqar 'asher lo yisaferu velo yimanu meirob. vayabi'u hakohanim 'et 'aron berit ihoh 'el meqomo 'el debir habayit 'el qodesh haqodashim 'el takhat kanfei hakerubim. ki hakerubim poresim kenafayim 'el meqom ha'aron vayasoku hakerubim 'al ha'aron ve'al badav milma'elah. vaya'arikhu habadim vayeira'u rashei habadim min haqodesh 'al penei hadebir velo yeira'u hakhuzah vayihyu sham 'ad hayom hazeh. 'en ba'aron raq shenei lukhot ha'abanim 'asher hiniakh sham mosheh bekhoreb 'asher karat ihoh 'im benei yisra'el bezeitam mei'erez mizrayim. vayhi bezet hakohanim min haqodesh vehe'anan malei 'et bet ihoh. velo yakhelu hakohanim la'amod lesharet mipenei he'anan ki malei khebod ihoh 'et bet ihoh. 'az 'amar shelomoh ihoh 'amar lishkon ba'arafel. banoh baniti bet zebul lakh makhon leshibtekha 'olamim. vayaseb hamelekh 'et panav vaybarekh 'et kal qehal yisra'el vekhal qehal yisra'el 'omed. vayomer barukh ihoh 'elohei yisra'el 'asher diber befiv 'et david 'abi ubeyado milei leimor. min hayom 'asher hozeiti 'et 'ami 'et yisra'el mimizrayim lo bakharti be'ir mikol shibtei yisra'el libnot bayit lihyot shemi sham va'ebkhar bedavid lihyot 'al 'ami yisra'el. vayhi 'im lebab david 'abi libnot bayit leshem ihoh 'elohei yisra'el. vayomer ihoh 'el david 'abi ya'an 'asher hayah 'im lebabekha libnot bayit lishmi hetibota ki hayah 'im lebabekha. raq 'atah lo tibneh habayit ki 'im binkha hayozei meikhalazekha hu yibneh habayit lishmi. vayaqem ihoh 'et debaro 'asher diber va'aqum takhat david 'abi va'eisheb 'al kisei yisra'el ka'asher diber ihoh va'ebneh habayit leshem ihoh 'elohei yisra'el. va'asim sham maqom la'aron 'asher sham berit ihoh 'asher karat 'im 'aboteinu behozi'o 'otam mei'erez mizrayim. vaya'amod shelomoh lifnei mizbakh ihoh neged kal qehal yisra'el vayifros kapav hashamayim. vayomar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el 'en kamokha 'elohim bashamayim mima'al ve'al ha'arez mitakhat shomer haberit vehakhesed la'abadekha haholekhim lefanekha bekhal libam. 'asher shamarta le'abdekha david 'abi 'et 'asher dibarta lo vatedaber befikha ubeyadekha mileita kayom hazeh. ve'atah ihoh 'elohei yisra'el mor le'abdekha david 'abi 'et 'asher dibarta lo leimor lo yikaret lekha 'ish milefanai yosheb 'al kisei yisra'el raq 'im yishmeru banekha 'et darkam lalekhet lefanai ka'asher halakhta lefanai. ve'atah 'elohei yisra'el yei'amen na debarekha debarekha 'asher dibarta le'abdekha david 'abi. ki ha'umnam yeisheb 'elohim 'al ha'arez hineh hashamayim ushemei hashamayim lo yekhalkelukha 'af ki habayit hazeh 'asher baniti. ufanita 'el tefilat 'abdekha ve'el tekhinato ihoh 'elohai lishmoa' 'el harinah ve'el hatefilah 'asher 'abdekha mitpalel lefanekha hayom. lihyot 'einekha fetukhot 'el habayit hazeh laylah vayom 'el hamaqom 'asher 'amarta yihyeh shemi sham lishmoa' 'el hatefilah 'asher yitpalel 'abdekha 'el hamaqom hazeh. veshama'ta 'el tekhinat 'abdekha ve'amekha yisra'el 'asher yitpalu 'el hamaqom hazeh ve'atah tishma' 'el meqom shibtekha 'el hashamayim veshama'ta vesalakheta. 'et 'asher yekheta 'ish lerei'eihu venasha bo 'alah leha'aloto uba 'alah lifnei mizbakhakha babayit hazeh. ve'atah tishma' hashamayim ve'asita veshafata 'et 'abadekha leharshia' rasha' latet darko berosho ulehazdiq zadiq latet lo kezidqato. behinagef 'amekha yisra'el lifnei 'oyeb 'asher yekhet'u lakh veshabu 'eilekha vehodu 'et shemekha vehitpalu vehitkhanenu 'eilekha babayit hazeh. ve'atah tishma' hashamayim vesalakhta lekhatat 'amekha yisra'el vahasheibotam 'el ha'adamah 'asher natata la'abotam. behei'azer shamayim velo yihyeh matar ki yekhet'u lakh vehitpalu 'el hamaqom hazeh vehodu 'et shemekha umeikhatatam yeshubun ki ta'anem. ve'atah tishma' hashamayim vesalakhta lekhatat 'abadekha ve'amekha yisra'el ki torem 'et haderekh hatobah 'asher yeilekhu bah venatatah matar 'al 'arzekha 'asher natatah le'amekha lenakhalah. ra'ab ki yihyeh ba'arez deber ki yihyeh shidafon yeiraqon 'arbeh khasil ki yihyeh ki yazar lo 'oyebo be'erez she'arav kal nega' kal makhalah. kal tefilah khal tekhinah 'asher tihyeh lekhal ha'adam lekhol 'amekha yisra'el 'asher yeide'un 'ish nega' lebabo ufaras kapav 'el habayit hazeh. ve'atah tishma' hashamayim mekhon shibtekha vesalakhta ve'asita venatata la'ish kekhal derakhav 'asher teida' 'et lebabo ki 'atah yada'ta lebadekha 'et lebab kal benei ha'adam. lema'an yira'ukha kal hayamim 'asher hem khayim 'al penei ha'adamah 'asher natatah la'aboteinu. vegam 'el hanakheri 'asher lo mei'amekha yisra'el hu uba mei'erez rekhoqah lema'an shemekha. ki yishme'un 'et shimkha hagadol ve'et yadekha hakhazaqah uzero'akha hanetuyah uba vehitpalel 'el habayit hazeh. 'atah tishma' hashamayim mekhon shibtekha ve'asita kekhol 'asher yiqra 'eilekha hanakheri lema'an yeide'un kal 'amei ha'arez 'et shemekha leyir'ah 'otekha ke'amekha yisra'el velada'at ki shimkha niqra 'al habayit hazeh 'asher baniti. ki yeizei 'amekha lamilkhamah 'al 'oyebo baderekh 'asher tishlakhem vehitpalu 'el ihoh derekh ha'ir 'asher bakharta bah vehabayit 'asher baniti lishmekha. veshama'ta hashamayim 'et tefilatam ve'et tekhinatam ve'asita mishpatam. ki yekhet'u lakh ki 'en 'adam 'asher lo yekheta ve'anafta bam unetatam lifnei 'oyeb veshabum shobeihem 'el 'erez ha'oyeb rekhoqah 'o qerobah. veheishibu 'el libam ba'arez 'asher nishbu sham veshabu vehitkhanenu 'eilekha be'erez shobeihem leimor khatanu vehe'evinu rasha'enu. veshabu 'eilekha bekhal lebabam ubekhal nafsham be'erez 'oyebeihem 'asher shabu 'otam vehitpalu 'eilekha derekh 'arzam 'asher natatah la'abotam ha'ir 'asher bakharta vehabayit 'asher banita baniti lishmekha. veshama'ta hashamayim mekhon shibtekha 'et tefilatam ve'et tekhinatam ve'asita mishpatam. vesalakhta le'amekha 'asher khate'u lakh ulekhal pish'eihem 'asher pashe'u bakh unetatam lerakhamim lifnei shobeihem verikhamum. ki 'amekha venakhalatekha hem 'asher hozeita mimizrayim mitokh kur habarzel. lihyot 'einekha fetukhot 'el tekhinat 'abdekha ve'el tekhinat 'amekha yisra'el lishmoa' 'aleihem bekhol qare'am 'eilekha. ki 'atah hibdaltam lekha lenakhalah mikol 'amei ha'arez ka'asher dibarta beyad mosheh 'abdekha behozi'akha 'et 'aboteinu mimizrayim 'adonai ihoh. vayhi kekhalot shelomoh lehitpalel 'el ihoh 'et kal hatefilah vehatekhinah hazot qam milifnei mizbakh ihoh mikeroa' 'al birkav vekhapav perusot hashamayim. vaya'mod vaybarekh 'et kal qehal yisra'el qol gadol leimor. barukh ihoh 'asher natan menukhah le'amo yisra'el kekhol 'asher diber lo nafal dabar 'ekhad mikol debaro hatob 'asher diber beyad mosheh 'abdo. yehi ihoh 'eloheinu 'imanu ka'asher hayah 'im 'aboteinu 'al ya'azbeinu ve'al yitesheinu. lehatot lebabeinu 'eilav lalekhet bekhal derakhav velishmor mizvotav vekhuqav umishpatav 'asher zivah 'et 'aboteinu. veyihyu debarai 'eleh 'asher hitkhananti lifnei ihoh qerobim 'el ihoh 'eloheinu yomam valayelah la'asot mishpat 'abdo umishpat 'amo yisra'el debar yom beyomo. lema'an da'at kal 'amei ha'arez ki ihoh hu ha'elohim 'en 'od. vehayah lebabkhem shalem 'im ihoh 'eloheinu lalekhet bekhuqav velishmor mizvotav kayom hazeh. vehamelekh vekhal yisra'el 'imo zobekhim zebakh lifnei ihoh. vayizbakh shelomoh 'et zebakh hashelamim 'asher zabakh ihoh baqar 'esrim ushenayim 'elef vezon mei'ah ve'esrim 'alef vayakhnekhu 'et bet ihoh hamelekh vekhal benei yisra'el. bayom hahu qidash hamelekh 'et tokh hekhazer 'asher lifnei bet ihoh ki 'asah sham 'et ha'olah ve'et haminkhah ve'et khelbei hashelamim ki mizbakh hanekhoshet 'asher lifnei ihoh qaton meihakhil 'et ha'olah ve'et haminkhah ve'et khelbei hashelamim. vaya'as shelomoh ba'et hahi 'et hekhag vekhal yisra'el 'imo qahal gadol milebo khamat 'ad nakhal mizrayim lifnei ihoh 'eloheinu shib'at yamim veshib'at yamim 'arba'ah 'asar yom. bayom hashemini shilakh 'et ha'am vaybarakhu 'et hamelekh vayeilekhu le'aholeihem semeikhim vetobei leb 'al kal hatobah 'asher 'asah ihoh ledavid 'abdo uleyisra'el 'amo. vayhi kekhalot shelomoh libnot 'et bet ihoh ve'et bet hamelekh ve'et kal kheisheq shelomoh 'asher khafez la'asot. vayeira ihoh 'el shelomoh sheinit ka'asher nir'ah 'eilav begib'on. vayomer ihoh 'eilav ma'ti 'et tefilatekha ve'et tekhinatekha 'asher hitkhanantah lefanai hiqdashti 'et habayit hazeh 'asher banitah lasum shemi sham 'ad 'olam vehayu 'einai velibi sham kal hayamim. ve'atah 'im teilekh lefanai ka'asher halakh david 'abikha betam leibab ubeyosher la'asot kekhol 'asher zivitikha khuqai umishpatai tishmor. vahaqimoti 'et kisei mamlakhtekha 'al yisra'el le'olam ka'asher dibarti 'al david 'abikha leimor lo yikaret lekha 'ish mei'al kisei yisra'el. 'im shob teshubun 'atem ubeneikhem mei'akharai velo tishmeru mizvotai khuqotai 'asher natati lifneikhem vahalakhtem va'abadtem 'elohim 'akheirim vehishtakhavitem lahem. vehikhrati 'et yisra'el mei'al penei ha'adamah 'asher natati lahem ve'et habayit 'asher hiqdashti lishmi 'ashalakh mei'al panai vehayah yisra'el lemashal velishninah bekhal ha'amim. vehabayit hazeh yihyeh 'elyon kal 'ober 'alav yishom vesharaq ve'ameru 'al meh 'asah ihoh kakhah la'arez hazot velabayit hazeh. ve'ameru 'al 'asher 'azebu 'et ihoh 'eloheihem 'asher hozi 'et 'abotam mei'erez mizrayim vayakhaziqu beilohim 'akheirim vayishtakhu vayishtakhavu lahem vaya'abdum 'al ken heibi ihoh 'aleihem 'et kal hara'ah hazot. vayhi miqzeh 'esrim shanah 'asher banah shelomoh 'et shenei habatim 'et bet ihoh ve'et bet hamelekh. khiram melekh zor nisa 'et shelomoh ba'azei 'arazim uba'azei beroshim ubazahab lekhal khefzo 'az yiten hamelekh shelomoh lekhiram 'esrim 'ir be'erez hagalil. vayeizei khiram mizor lir'ot 'et he'arim 'asher natan lo shelomoh velo yasheru be'einav. vayomer mah he'arim ha'eleh 'asher natatah li 'akhi vayiqra lahem 'erez kabul 'ad hayom hazeh. vayishlakh khiram lamelekh mei'ah ve'esrim kikar zahab. vezeh debar hamas 'asher he'elah hamelekh shelomoh libnot 'et bet ihoh ve'et beito ve'et hamilo ve'et khomat yerushalim ve'et khazor ve'et megido ve'et gazer. par'oh melekh mizrayim 'alah vayilkod 'et gezer vayisrefah ba'esh ve'et hakena'ani hayosheb ba'ir harag vayitenah shilukhim lebito 'eishet shelomoh. vayiben shelomoh 'et gazer ve'et bet khoron takhton. ve'et ba'alat ve'et tamar tadmor bamidbar ba'arez. ve'et kal 'arei hamiskenot 'asher hayu lishlomoh ve'et 'arei harekheb ve'et 'arei haparashim ve'et kheisheq shelomoh 'asher khashaq libnot birushalim ubalebanon ubekhol 'erez memshalto. kal ha'am hanotar min ha'emori hakhiti haperizi hakhivi vehaybusi 'asher lo mibenei yisra'el hemah. beneihem 'asher noteru 'akhareihem ba'arez 'asher lo yakhelu benei yisra'el lehakharimam vaya'alem shelomoh lemas 'obed 'ad hayom hazeh. umibenei yisra'el lo natan shelomoh 'abed ki hem 'anshei hamilkhamah va'abadav vesarav veshalishav vesarei rikhbo ufarashav. 'eleh sarei hanizabim 'asher 'al hamelakhah lishlomoh khamishim vakhamesh mei'ot harodim ba'am ha'osim bamelakhah. 'akh bat par'oh 'aletah mei'ir david 'el beitah 'asher banah lah 'az banah 'et hamilo. vehe'elah shelomoh shalosh pe'amim bashanah 'olot ushelamim 'al hamizbeiakh 'asher banah ihoh vehaqter 'ito 'asher lifnei ihoh veshilam 'et habayit. va'oni 'asah hamelekh shelomoh be'ezyon geber 'asher 'et 'eilot 'al sefat yam suf be'erez 'edom. vayishlakh khiram ba'oni 'et 'abadav 'anshei 'oniyot yode'ei hayam 'im 'abdei shelomoh. vayabo'u 'ofirah vayiqkhu misham zahab 'arba' mei'ot ve'esrim kikar vayabi'u 'el hamelekh shelomoh. umalkat sheba shoma'at 'et sheima' shelomoh leshem ihoh vatabo lenasoto bekhidot. vatabo yerushalemah bekhayil kabed me'od gemalim nose'im besamim vezahab rab me'od ve'eben yeqarah vatabo 'el shelomoh vatedaber 'eilav 'et kal 'asher hayah 'im lebabah. vayaged lah shelomoh 'et kal debareha lo hayah dabar ne'lam min hamelekh 'asher lo higid lah. vateire malkat sheba 'et kal khakhemat shelomoh vehabayit 'asher banah. uma'akhal shulkhano umoshab 'abadav uma'amad meshareto mesharetav umalbusheihem umashqav ve'olato 'asher ya'aleh bet ihoh velo hayah bah 'od ruakh. vatomer 'el hamelekh 'emet hayah hadabar 'asher shama'ti be'arzi 'al debarekha ve'al khakhematekha. velo he'emanti ladebarim 'ad 'asher bati vatir'enah 'einai vehineh lo hugad li hakheizi hosafta khakhmah vatob 'el hashemu'ah 'asher shama'eti. 'ashrei 'anashekha 'ashrei 'abadekha 'eleh ha'omedim lefanekha tamid hashome'im 'et khakhematekha. yehi ihoh 'elohekha barukh 'asher khafez bekha letitekha 'al kisei yisra'el be'ahabat ihoh 'et yisra'el le'olam vaysimekha lemelekh la'asot mishpat uzedaqah. vatiten lamelekh mei'ah ve'esrim kikar zahab ubesamim harbeh me'od ve'eben yeqarah lo ba khabosem hahu 'od larob 'asher natenah malkat sheba lamelekh shelomoh. vegam 'oni khiram 'asher nasa zahab mei'ofir heibi mei'ofir 'azei 'almugim harbeh me'od ve'eben yeqarah. vaya'as hamelekh 'et 'azei ha'almugim mis'ad lebet ihoh ulebet hamelekh vekhinorot unebalim lasharim lo ba khen 'azei 'almugim velo nir'ah 'ad hayom hazeh. vehamelekh shelomoh natan lemalkat sheba 'et kal khefzah 'asher sha'alah milebad 'asher natan lah keyad hamelekh shelomoh vateifen vateilekh le'arzah hi va'abadeha. vayhi mishqal hazahab 'asher ba lishlomoh beshanah 'ekhat shesh mei'ot shishim vashesh kikar zahab. lebad mei'anshei hatarim umiskhar harokhelim vekhal malkhei ha'ereb ufakhot ha'arez. vaya'as hamelekh shelomoh matayim zinah zahab shakhut shesh mei'ot zahab ya'aleh 'al hazinah ha'ekhat. ushelosh mei'ot maginim zahab shakhut sheloshet manim zahab ya'aleh 'al hamagen ha'ekhat vayitenem hamelekh bet ya'ar halebanon. vaya'as hamelekh kisei shen gadol vayzapeihu zahab mufaz. shesh ma'alot lakiseh verosh 'agol lakiseh mei'akharav veyadot mizeh umizeh 'el meqom hashabet ushenayim 'arayot 'omedim 'eizel hayadot. ushenem 'asar 'arayim 'omedim sham 'al shesh hama'alot mizeh umizeh lo na'asah khen lekhal mamlakhot. vekhol kelei mashqeh hamelekh shelomoh zahab vekhol kelei bet ya'ar halebanon zahab sagur 'en kesef lo nekhshab bimei shelomoh lim'umah. ki 'oni tarshish lamelekh bayam 'im 'oni khiram 'akhat leshalosh shanim tabo 'oni tarshish nose'et zahab vakhesef shenhabim veqofim vetukiyim. vayigdal hamelekh shelomoh mikol malkhei ha'arez le'osher ulekhakhemah. vekhal ha'arez mebaqshim 'et penei shelomoh lishmoa' 'et khakhemato 'asher natan 'elohim belibo. vehemah mebi'im 'ish minkhato kelei khesef ukhelei zahab uselamot veneisheq ubesamim susim uferadim debar shanah beshanah. vaye'esof shelomoh rekheb ufarashim vayhi lo 'elef ve'arba' mei'ot rekheb ushenem 'asar 'elef parashim vayankhem be'arei harekheb ve'im hamelekh birushalim. vayiten hamelekh 'et hakesef birushalim ka'abanim ve'et ha'arazim natan kashiqmim 'asher bashefeilah larob. umoza hasusim 'asher lishlomoh mimizrayim umiqveh sokharei hamelekh yiqkhu miqveh bimkhir. vata'aleh vateizei merkabah mimizrayim beshesh mei'ot kesef vesus bakhamishim umei'ah vekhen lekhal malkhei hakhitim ulemalkhei 'aram beyadam yozi'u. vehamelekh shelomoh 'ahab nashim nakheriyot rabot ve'et bat par'oh mo'abiyot 'amoniyot 'adomiyot zeideniyot khitiyot. min hagoyim 'asher 'amar ihoh 'el benei yisra'el lo tabo'u bahem vehem lo yabo'u bakhem 'akhen yatu 'et lebabkhem 'akharei 'eloheihem bahem dabaq shelomoh le'ahabah. vayhi lo nashim sarot sheba' mei'ot ufilagshim shelosh mei'ot vayatu nashav 'et libo. vayhi le'et ziqnat shelomoh nashav hitu 'et lebabo 'akharei 'elohim 'akheirim velo hayah lebabo shalem 'im ihoh 'elohav kilbab david 'abiv. vayeilekh shelomoh 'akharei 'ashtoret 'elohei zidonim ve'akharei milkom shiquz 'amonim. vaya'as shelomoh hara' be'einei ihoh velo milei 'akharei ihoh kedavid 'abiv. 'az yibneh shelomoh bamah likhmosh shiquz mo'ab bahar 'asher 'al penei yerushalim ulemolekh shiquz benei 'amon. vekhen 'asah lekhal nashav hanakheriyot maqtirot umezabekhot leiloheihen. vayit'anaf ihoh bishlomoh ki natah lebabo mei'im ihoh 'elohei yisra'el hanir'ah 'eilav pa'amayim. vezivah 'eilav 'al hadabar hazeh lebilti lekhet 'akharei 'elohim 'akheirim velo shamar 'et 'asher zivah ihoh. vayomer ihoh lishlomoh ya'an 'asher hayetah zot 'imakh velo shamarta beriti vekhuqotai 'asher ziviti 'alekha qaroa' 'eqra' 'et hamamlakhah mei'alekha unetatiha le'abdekha. 'akh beyamekha lo 'e'esenah lema'an david 'abikha miyad binkha 'eqra'enah. raq 'et kal hamamlakhah lo 'eqra' sheibet 'ekhad 'eten libnekha lema'an david 'abdi ulema'an yerushalim 'asher bakhareti. vayaqem ihoh satan lishlomoh 'et hadad ha'adomi mizera' hamelekh hu be'edom. vayhi bihyot david 'et 'edom ba'alot yo'ab sar hazaba leqaber 'et hakhalalim vayakh kal zakhar be'edom. ki sheishet khodashim yashab sham yo'ab vekhal yisra'el 'ad hikhrit kal zakhar be'edom. vayibrakh 'adad hu va'anashim 'adomiyim mei'abdei 'abiv 'ito labo mizrayim vahadad na'ar qatan. vayaqumu mimidyan vayabo'u paran vayiqkhu 'anashim 'imam miparan vayabo'u mizrayim 'el par'oh melekh mizrayim vayiten lo bayit velekhem 'amar lo ve'erez natan lo. vayimza hadad khen be'einei far'oh me'od vayiten lo 'ishah 'et 'akhot 'ishto 'akhot takhpenes hagebirah. vateiled lo 'akhot takhpenes 'et genubat beno vatigmeleihu takhpenes betokh bet par'oh vayhi genubat bet par'oh betokh benei far'oh. vahadad shama' bemizrayim ki shakhab david 'im 'abotav vekhi met yo'ab sar hazaba vayomer hadad 'el par'oh shalekheini ve'eilekh 'el 'arzi. vayomer lo far'oh ki mah 'atah khaser 'imi vehinekha mebaqesh lalekhet 'el 'arzekha vayomer lo ki shaleiakh teshalekheini. vayaqem 'elohim lo satan 'et rezon ben 'elyada' 'asher barakh mei'et hadad'ezer melekh zobah 'adonav. vayiqboz 'alav 'anashim vayhi sar gedud baharog david 'otam vayeilekhu dameseq vayeishebu bah vayimlekhu bedamaseq. vayhi satan leyisra'el kal yemei shelomoh ve'et hara'ah 'asher hadad vayaqaz beyisra'el vayimlokh 'al 'aram. veyarabe'am ben nebat 'efrati min hazereidah veshem 'imo zeru'ah 'ishah 'almanah 'ebed lishlomoh vayarem yad bamelekh. vezeh hadabar 'asher heirim yad bamelekh shelomoh banah 'et hamilo sagar 'et perez 'ir david 'abiv. veha'ish yarabe'am gibor khayil vayar shelomoh 'et hana'ar ki 'oseh melakhah hu vayafqed 'oto lekhal seibel bet yosef. vayhi ba'et hahi veyarabe'am yaza mirushalim vayimza 'oto 'akhiyah hashiloni hanabi baderekh vehu mitkaseh besalmah khadashah usheneihem lebadam basadeh. vayitpos 'akhiyah basalmah hakhadashah 'asher 'alav vayiqra'eha shenem 'asar qera'im. vayomer leyarabe'am qakh lekha 'asarah qera'im ki khoh 'amar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el hini qoreia' 'et hamamlakhah miyad shelomoh venatati lekha 'et 'asarah hashebatim. vehasheibet ha'ekhad yihyeh lo lema'an 'abdi david ulema'an yerushalim ha'ir 'asher bakharti bah mikol shibtei yisra'el. ya'an 'asher 'azabuni vayishtakhavu le'ashtoret 'elohei zidonin likhmosh 'elohei mo'ab ulemilkom 'elohei benei 'amon velo halekhu bidrakhai la'asot hayashar be'einai vekhuqotai umishpatai kedavid 'abiv. velo 'eqakh 'et kal hamamlakhah miyado ki nasi 'ashitenu kol yemei khayav lema'an david 'abdi 'asher bakharti 'oto 'asher shamar mizvotai vekhuqotai. velaqakhti hamelukhah miyad beno unetatiha lekha 'et 'aseret hashebatim. velibno 'eten sheibet 'ekhad lema'an heyot nir ledavid 'abdi kal hayamim lefanai birushalim ha'ir 'asher bakharti li lasum shemi sham. ve'otekha 'eqakh umalakhta bekhol 'asher te'aveh nafshekha vehayita melekh 'al yisra'el. vehayah 'im tishma' 'et kal 'asher 'azavekha vehalakhta bidrakhai ve'asita hayashar be'einai lishmor khuqotai umizvotai ka'asher 'asah david 'abdi vehayiti 'imakh ubaniti lekha bayit ne'eman ka'asher baniti ledavid venatati lekha 'et yisra'el. va'aneh 'et zera' david lema'an zot 'akh lo khal hayamim. vaybaqesh shelomoh lehamit 'et yarabe'am vayaqam yarabe'am vayibrakh mizrayim 'el shishaq melekh mizrayim vayhi bemizrayim 'ad mot shelomoh. veyeter dibrei shelomoh vekhal 'asher 'asah vekhakhemato halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei shelomoh. vehayamim 'asher malakh shelomoh birushalim 'al kal yisra'el 'arba'im shanah. vayishkab shelomoh 'im 'abotav vayiqaber be'ir david 'abiv vayimlokh rekhab'am beno takhtav. vayeilekh rekhab'am shekhem ki shekhem ba khal yisra'el lehamlikh 'oto. vayhi kishmoa' yarabe'am ben nebat vehu 'odenu bemizrayim 'asher barakh mipenei hamelekh shelomoh vayeisheb yarabe'am bemizrayim. vayishlekhu vayiqre'u lo vayabo'u vayabo yarabe'am vekhal qehal yisra'el vaydaberu 'el rekhab'am leimor. 'abikha hiqshah 'et 'uleinu ve'atah 'atah haqel mei'abodat 'abikha haqashah umei'ulo hakabed 'asher natan 'aleinu vena'abdeka. vayomer 'aleihem lekhu 'od sheloshah yamim veshubu 'eilai vayeilekhu ha'am. vayiva'az hamelekh rekhab'am 'et hazeqeinim 'asher hayu 'omedim 'et penei shelomoh 'abiv bihyoto khai leimor 'ekh 'atem no'azim lehashib 'et ha'am hazeh dabar. vaydaber vaydaberu 'eilav leimor 'im hayom tihyeh 'ebed la'am hazeh va'abadtam va'anitam vedibarta 'aleihem debarim tobim vehayu lekha 'abadim kal hayamim. vaya'azob 'et 'azat hazeqeinim 'asher ye'azuhu vayiva'az 'et hayladim 'asher gadelu 'ito 'asher ha'omedim lefanav. vayomer 'aleihem mah 'atem no'azim venashib dabar 'et ha'am hazeh 'asher diberu 'eilai leimor haqel min ha'ol 'asher natan 'abikha 'aleinu. vaydaberu 'eilav hayladim 'asher gadelu 'ito leimor koh tomar la'am hazeh 'asher diberu 'eilekha leimor 'abikha hikhbid 'et 'uleinu ve'atah haqel mei'aleinu koh tedaber 'aleihem qatani 'abah mimatenei 'abi. ve'atah 'abi he'mis 'aleikhem 'ol kabed va'ani 'osif 'al 'ulekhem 'abi yisar 'etkhem bashotim va'ani 'ayaser 'etkhem ba'aqrabim. vayabo vayabo yarabe'am vekhal ha'am 'el rekhab'am bayom hashelishi ka'asher diber hamelekh leimor shubu 'eilai bayom hashelishi. vaya'an hamelekh 'et ha'am qashah vaya'azob 'et 'azat hazeqeinim 'asher ye'azuhu. vaydaber 'aleihem ka'azat hayladim leimor 'abi hikhbid 'et 'ulekhem va'ani 'osif 'al 'ulekhem 'abi yisar 'etkhem bashotim va'ani 'ayaser 'etkhem ba'aqrabim. velo shama' hamelekh 'el ha'am ki hayetah sibah mei'im ihoh lema'an haqim 'et debaro 'asher diber ihoh beyad 'akhiyah hashiloni 'el yarabe'am ben nebat. vayar kal yisra'el ki lo shama' hamelekh 'aleihem vayashibu ha'am 'et hamelekh dabar leimor mah lanu kheileq bedavid velo nakhalah beben yishai le'ohalekha yisra'el 'atah re'eh beitekha david vayeilekh yisra'el le'ohalav. ubenei yisra'el hayoshebim be'arei yehudah vayimlokh 'aleihem rekhab'am. vayishlakh hamelekh rekhab'am 'et 'adoram 'asher 'al hamas vayirgemu khal yisra'el bo 'eben vayamot vehamelekh rekhab'am hit'amez la'alot bamerkabah lanus yerushalim. vayifshe'u yisra'el bebet david 'ad hayom hazeh. vayhi kishmoa' kal yisra'el ki shab yarabe'am vayishlekhu vayiqre'u 'oto 'el ha'eidah vayamlikhu 'oto 'al kal yisra'el lo hayah 'akharei bet david zulati sheibet yehudah lebado. vayabo'u vayabo rekhab'am yerushalim vayaqhel 'et kal bet yehudah ve'et sheibet binyamin mei'ah ushemonim 'elef bakhur 'oseh milkhamah lehilakhem 'im bet yisra'el lehashib 'et hamelukhah lirkhab'am ben shelomoh. vayhi debar ha'elohim 'el shema'yah 'ish ha'elohim leimor. 'emor 'el rekhab'am ben shelomoh melekh yehudah ve'el kal bet yehudah ubinyamin veyeter ha'am leimor. koh 'amar ihoh lo ta'alu velo tilakhamun 'im 'akheikhem benei yisra'el ubu 'ish lebeito ki mei'iti nihyah hadabar hazeh vayishme'u 'et debar ihoh vayashubu lalekhet kidbar ihoh. vayiben yarabe'am 'et shekhem behar 'efrayim vayeisheb bah vayeizei misham vayiben 'et penu'el. vayomer yarabe'am belibo 'atah tashub hamamlakhah lebet david. 'im ya'aleh ha'am hazeh la'asot zebakhim bebet ihoh birushalim veshab leb ha'am hazeh 'el 'adoneihem 'el rekhab'am melekh yehudah vaharaguni veshabu 'el rekhab'am melekh yehudah. vayiva'az hamelekh vaya'as shenei 'eglei zahab vayomer 'aleihem rab lakhem mei'alot yerushalim hineh 'elohekha yisra'el 'asher he'elukha mei'erez mizrayim. vayasem 'et ha'ekhad bebet 'el ve'et ha'ekhad natan bedan. vayhi hadabar hazeh lekhatat vayeilekhu ha'am lifnei ha'ekhad 'ad dan. vaya'as 'et bet bamot vaya'as kohanim miqzot ha'am 'asher lo hayu mibenei leivi. vaya'as yarabe'am khag bakhodesh hashemini bakhamishah 'asar yom lakhodesh kekhag 'asher bihudah vaya'al 'al hamizbeiakh ken 'asah bebet 'el lezabeiakh la'agalim 'asher 'asah vehe'emid bebet 'el 'et kohanei habamot 'asher 'asah. vaya'al 'al hamizbeiakh 'asher 'asah bebet 'el bakhamishah 'asar yom bakhodesh hashemini bakhodesh 'asher bada milibad milibo vaya'as khag libnei yisra'el vaya'al 'al hamizbeiakh lehaqtir. vehineh 'ish 'elohim ba mihudah bidbar ihoh 'el bet 'el veyarabe'am 'omed 'al hamizbeiakh lehaqtir. vayiqra 'al hamizbeiakh bidbar ihoh vayomer mizbeiakh mizbeiakh koh 'amar ihoh hineh ben nolad lebet david yoshiyahu shemo vezabakh 'alekha 'et kohanei habamot hamaqtirim 'alekha ve'azmot 'adam yisrefu 'alekha. venatan bayom hahu mofet leimor zeh hamofet 'asher diber ihoh hineh hamizbeiakh niqra' venishpakh hadeshen 'asher 'alav. vayhi khishmoa' hamelekh 'et debar 'ish ha'elohim 'asher qara 'al hamizbeiakh bebet 'el vayishlakh yarabe'am 'et yado mei'al hamizbeiakh leimor tifsuhu vatibash yado 'asher shalakh 'alav velo yakhol lahashibah 'eilav. vehamizbeiakh niqra' vayishafekh hadeshen min hamizbeiakh kamofet 'asher natan 'ish ha'elohim bidbar ihoh. vaya'an hamelekh vayomer 'el 'ish ha'elohim khal na 'et penei ihoh 'elohekha vehitpalel ba'adi vetashob yadi 'eilai vaykhal 'ish ha'elohim 'et penei ihoh vatashab yad hamelekh 'eilav vatehi kebarishonah. vaydaber hamelekh 'el 'ish ha'elohim bo'ah 'iti habaytah use'adah ve'etenah lekha matat. vayomer 'ish ha'elohim 'el hamelekh 'im titen li 'et khazi beitekha lo 'abo 'imakh velo 'okhal lekhem velo 'eshteh mayim bamaqom hazeh. ki khen zivah 'oti bidbar ihoh
