leimor lo tokhal lekhem velo tishteh mayim velo tashub baderekh 'asher halakheta. vayeilekh bederekh 'akher velo shab baderekh 'asher ba bah 'el bet 'el. venabi 'ekhad zaqen yosheb bebet 'el vayabo beno vaysaper lo 'et kal hama'aseh 'asher 'asah 'ish ha'elohim hayom bebet 'el 'et hadebarim 'asher diber 'el hamelekh vaysaperum la'abihem. vaydaber 'aleihem 'abihem 'ei zeh haderekh halakh vayir'u banav 'et haderekh 'asher halakh 'ish ha'elohim 'asher ba mihudah. vayomer 'el banav khibshu li hakhamor vayakhbeshu lo hakhamor vayirkab 'alav. vayeilekh 'akharei 'ish ha'elohim vayimza'eihu yosheb takhat ha'eilah vayomer 'eilav ha'atah 'ish ha'elohim 'asher bata mihudah vayomer 'ani. vayomer 'eilav lekh 'iti habayetah ve'ekhol lakhem. vayomer lo 'ukhal lashub 'itakh velabo 'itakh velo 'okhal lekhem velo 'eshteh 'itekha mayim bamaqom hazeh. ki dabar 'eilai bidbar ihoh lo tokhal lekhem velo tishteh sham mayim lo tashub lalekhet baderekh 'asher halakhta bah. vayomer lo gam 'ani nabi kamokha umal'akh diber 'eilai bidbar ihoh leimor hashibeihu 'itekha 'el beitekha veyokhal lekhem veyeishet mayim kikhesh lo. vayashab 'ito vayokhal lekhem bebeito vayeishet mayim. vayhi hem yoshebim 'el hashulkhan vayhi debar ihoh 'el hanabi 'asher heshibo. vayiqra 'el 'ish ha'elohim 'asher ba mihudah leimor koh 'amar ihoh ya'an ki marita pi ihoh velo shamarta 'et hamizvah 'asher zivekha ihoh 'elohekha. vatashab vatokhal lekhem vateishet mayim bamaqom 'asher diber 'eilekha 'al tokhal lekhem ve'al teishet mayim lo tabo niblatekha 'el qeber 'abotekha. vayhi 'akharei 'akhelo lekhem ve'akharei shetoto vayakhabash lo hakhamor lanabi 'asher heshibo. vayeilekh vayimza'eihu 'aryeh baderekh vaymiteihu vatehi niblato mushlekhet baderekh vehakhamor 'omed 'ezlah veha'aryeh 'omed 'eizel hanebeilah. vehineh 'anashim 'oberim vayir'u 'et hanebeilah mushlekhet baderekh ve'et ha'aryeh 'omed 'eizel hanebeilah vayabo'u vaydaberu ba'ir 'asher hanabi hazaqen yosheb bah. vayishma' hanabi 'asher heshibo min haderekh vayomer 'ish ha'elohim hu 'asher marah 'et pi ihoh vayiteneihu ihoh la'aryeh vayishbereihu vaymiteihu kidbar ihoh 'asher diber lo. vaydaber 'el banav leimor khibshu li 'et hakhamor vayakhaboshu. vayeilekh vayimza 'et niblato mushlekhet baderekh vakhamor veha'aryeh 'omedim 'eizel hanebeilah lo 'akhal ha'aryeh 'et hanebeilah velo shabar 'et hakhamor. vayisa hanabi 'et niblat 'ish ha'elohim vayanikheihu 'el hakhamor vayshibeihu vayabo 'el 'ir hanabi hazaqen lispod uleqabero. vayanakh 'et niblato beqibro vayispedu 'alav ho 'akhi. vayhi 'akharei qabero 'oto vayomer 'el banav leimor bemoti uqebartem 'oti baqeber 'asher 'ish ha'elohim qabur bo 'eizel 'azmotav hanikhu 'et 'azmotai. ki hayoh yihyeh hadabar 'asher qara bidbar ihoh 'al hamizbeiakh 'asher bebet 'el ve'al kal batei habamot 'asher be'arei shomeron. 'akhar hadabar hazeh lo shab yarabe'am midarko hara'ah vayashab vaya'as miqzot ha'am kohanei bamot hekhafez yemalei 'et yado vihi kohanei bamot. vayhi badabar hazeh lekhatat bet yarabe'am ulehakhkhid ulehashmid mei'al penei ha'adamah. ba'et hahi khalah 'abiyah ben yarabe'am. vayomer yarabe'am le'ishto qumi na vehishtanit velo yeide'u ki 'ati 'at 'eishet yarabe'am vehalakht shiloh hineh sham 'akhiyah hanabi hu diber 'alai lemelekh 'al ha'am hazeh. velaqakhat beyadekh 'asarah lekhem veniqudim ubaqbuq debash ubat 'eilav hu yagid lakh mah yihyeh lana'ar. vata'as ken 'eishet yarabe'am vataqam vateilekh shiloh vatabo bet 'akhiyah va'akhiyahu lo yakhol lir'ot ki qamu 'einav miseibo. ihoh 'amar 'el 'akhiyahu hineh 'eishet yarabe'am ba'ah lidrosh dabar mei'imekha 'el benah ki kholeh hu kazoh vekhazeh tedaber 'eileha vihi khebo'ah vehi mitnakeirah. vayhi khishmoa' 'akhiyahu 'et qol ragleha ba'ah bapetakh vayomer bo'i 'eishet yarabe'am lamah zeh 'at mitnakeirah ve'anokhi shaluakh 'eilayikh qashah. lekhi 'imri leyarabe'am koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el ya'an 'asher harimotikha mitokh ha'am va'etenkha nagid 'al 'ami yisra'el. va'eqra' 'et hamamlakhah mibet david va'eteneha lakh velo hayita ke'abdi david 'asher shamar mizvotai va'asher halakh 'akharai bekhal lebabo la'asot raq hayashar be'einai. vatara' la'asot mikol 'asher hayu lefanekha vateilekh vata'aseh lekha 'elohim 'akheirim umaseikhot lehakh'iseini ve'oti hishlakhta 'akharei gavekha. lakhen hini meibi ra'ah 'el bet yarabe'am vehikhrati leyarabe'am mashtin beqir 'azur ve'azub beyisra'el ubi'arti 'akharei bet yarabe'am ka'asher yeba'er hagalal 'ad tumo. hamet leyarabe'am ba'ir yokhelu hakelabim vehamet basadeh yokhelu 'of hashamayim ki ihoh diber. ve'at qumi lekhi lebeitekh bebo'ah raglayikh ha'irah umet hayaled. vesafedu lo khal yisra'el veqaberu 'oto ki zeh lebado yabo leyarabe'am 'el qaber ya'an nimza bo dabar tob 'el ihoh 'elohei yisra'el bebet yarabe'am. veheiqim ihoh lo melekh 'al yisra'el 'asher yakhrit 'et bet yarabe'am zeh hayom umeh gam 'atah. vehikah ihoh 'et yisra'el ka'asher yanud haqaneh bamayim venatash 'et yisra'el mei'al ha'adamah hatobah hazot 'asher natan la'aboteihem vezeiram mei'eiber lanahar ya'an 'asher 'asu 'et 'asheireihem makh'isim 'et ihoh. veyiten 'et yisra'el biglal khatot yarabe'am 'asher khata va'asher hekheti 'et yisra'el. vataqam 'eishet yarabe'am vateilekh vatabo tirzatah hi ba'ah besaf habayit vehana'ar met. vayiqberu 'oto vayispedu lo kal yisra'el kidbar ihoh 'asher diber beyad 'abdo 'akhiyahu hanabi. veyeter dibrei yarabe'am 'asher nilkham va'asher malakh hinam ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra'el. vehayamim 'asher malakh yarabe'am 'esrim ushetayim shanah vayishkab 'im 'abotav vayimlokh nadab beno takhtav. urekhab'am ben shelomoh malakh bihudah ben 'arba'im ve'akhat shanah rekhab'am bemalekho ushaba' 'esreh shanah malakh birushalim ha'ir 'asher bakhar ihoh lasum 'et shemo sham mikol shibtei yisra'el veshem 'imo na'amah ha'amonit. vaya'as yehudah hara' be'einei ihoh vayqan'u 'oto mikol 'asher 'asu 'abotam bekhatotam 'asher khata'u. vayibnu gam hemah lahem bamot umazeibot va'asheirim 'al kal gib'ah gebohah vetakhat kal 'ez ra'anan. vegam qadesh hayah ba'arez 'asu kekhol hato'abot hagoyim 'asher horish ihoh mipenei benei yisra'el. vayhi bashanah hakhamishit lamelekh rekhab'am 'alah shushaq shishaq melekh mizrayim 'al yerushalim. vayiqakh 'et 'ozerot bet ihoh ve'et 'ozrot bet hamelekh ve'et hakol laqakh vayiqakh 'et kal maginei hazahab 'asher 'asah shelomoh. vaya'as hamelekh rekhab'am takhtam maginei nekhoshet vehifqid 'al yad sarei harazim hashomerim petakh bet hamelekh. vayhi midei bo hamelekh bet ihoh yisa'um harazim veheshibum 'el ta harazim. veyeter dibrei rekhab'am vekhal 'asher 'asah halo hemah khetubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. umilkhamah hayetah ben rekhab'am uben yarabe'am kal hayamim. vayishkab rekhab'am 'im 'abotav vayiqaber 'im 'abotav be'ir david veshem 'imo na'amah ha'amonit vayimlokh 'abiyam beno takhtav. ubishnat shemoneh 'esreh lamelekh yarabe'am ben nebat malakh 'abiyam 'al yehudah. shalosh shanim malakh birushalim veshem 'imo ma'akhah bat 'abishalom. vayeilekh bekhal khatot 'abiv 'asher 'asah lefanav velo hayah lebabo shalem 'im ihoh 'elohav kilbab david 'abiv. ki lema'an david natan ihoh 'elohav lo nir birushalim lehaqim 'et beno 'akharav uleha'amid 'et yerushalim. 'asher 'asah david 'et hayashar be'einei ihoh velo sar mikol 'asher zivahu kol yemei khayav raq bidbar 'uriyah hakhiti. umilkhamah hayetah ben rekhab'am uben yarabe'am kal yemei khayav. veyeter dibrei 'abiyam vekhal 'asher 'asah halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah umilkhamah hayetah ben 'abiyam uben yarabe'am. vayishkab 'abiyam 'im 'abotav vayiqberu 'oto be'ir david vayimlokh 'asa beno takhtav. ubishnat 'esrim leyarabe'am melekh yisra'el malakh 'asa melekh yehudah. ve'arba'im ve'akhat shanah malakh birushalim veshem 'imo ma'akhah bat 'abishalom. vaya'as 'asa hayashar be'einei ihoh kedavid 'abiv. vaya'aber haqedeishim min ha'arez vayasar 'et kal hagilulim 'asher 'asu 'abotav. vegam 'et ma'akhah 'imo vaysireha migebirah 'asher 'asetah miflezet la'asheirah vayikhrot 'asa 'et miflaztah vayisrof benakhal qidron. vehabamot lo saru raq lebab 'asa hayah shalem 'im ihoh kal yamav. vayabei 'et qadeshei 'abiv veqadesho veqadeshei bet ihoh kesef vezahab vekheilim. umilkhamah hayetah ben 'asa uben ba'sha melekh yisra'el kal yemeihem. vaya'al ba'sha melekh yisra'el 'al yehudah vayiben 'et haramah lebilti tet yozei vaba le'asa melekh yehudah. vayiqakh 'asa 'et kal hakesef vehazahab hanotarim be'ozrot bet ihoh ve'et 'ozrot bet melekh hamelekh vayitenem beyad 'abadav vayishlakhem hamelekh 'asa 'el ben hadad ben tabrimon ben khezyon melekh 'aram hayosheb bedameseq leimor. berit beini ubeinekha ben 'abi uben 'abikha hineh shalakhti lekha shokhad kesef vezahab lekh hafeirah 'et beritekha 'et ba'sha melekh yisra'el veya'aleh mei'alai. vayishma' ben hadad 'el hamelekh 'asa vayishlakh 'et sarei hakhayalim 'asher lo 'al 'arei yisra'el vayakh 'et 'iyon ve'et dan ve'et 'abel bet ma'akhah ve'et kal kinrot 'al kal 'erez naftali. vayhi kishmoa' ba'sha vayekhdal mibenot 'et haramah vayeisheb betirzah. vehamelekh 'asa hishmia' 'et kal yehudah 'en naqi vayis'u 'et 'abnei haramah ve'et 'eizeha 'asher banah ba'sha vayiben bam hamelekh 'asa 'et geba' binyamin ve'et hamizpah. veyeter kal dibrei 'asa vekhal geburato vekhal 'asher 'asah vehe'arim 'asher banah halo hemah khetubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah raq le'et ziqnato khalah 'et raglav. vayishkab 'asa 'im 'abotav vayiqaber 'im 'abotav be'ir david 'abiv vayimlokh yehoshafat beno takhtav. venadab ben yarabe'am malakh 'al yisra'el bishnat shetayim le'asa melekh yehudah vayimlokh 'al yisra'el shenatayim. vaya'as hara' be'einei ihoh vayeilekh bederekh 'abiv ubekhatato 'asher hekheti 'et yisra'el. vayiqshor 'alav ba'sha ben 'akhiyah lebet yisashkhar vayakeihu ba'sha begibeton 'asher lapelishtim venadab vekhal yisra'el zarim 'al gibeton. vaymiteihu ba'sha bishnat shalosh le'asa melekh yehudah vayimlokh takhtav. vayhi khemalekho hikah 'et kal bet yarabe'am lo hish'ir kal neshamah leyarabe'am 'ad hishmido kidbar ihoh 'asher diber beyad 'abdo 'akhiyah hashiloni. 'al khatot yarabe'am 'asher khata va'asher hekheti 'et yisra'el bekha'so 'asher hikh'is 'et ihoh 'elohei yisra'el. veyeter dibrei nadab vekhal 'asher 'asah halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra'el. umilkhamah hayetah ben 'asa uben ba'sha melekh yisra'el kal yemeihem. bishnat shalosh le'asa melekh yehudah malakh ba'sha ben 'akhiyah 'al kal yisra'el betirzah 'esrim ve'arba' shanah. vaya'as hara' be'einei ihoh vayeilekh bederekh yarabe'am ubekhatato 'asher hekheti 'et yisra'el. vayhi debar ihoh 'el yeihu ben khanani 'al ba'sha leimor. ya'an 'asher harimotikha min he'afar va'etenkha nagid 'al 'ami yisra'el vateilekh bederekh yarabe'am vatakhati 'et 'ami yisra'el lehakh'iseini bekhatotam. hini mab'ir 'akharei ba'sha ve'akharei beito venatati 'et beitekha kebet yarabe'am ben nebat. hamet leba'sha ba'ir yokhelu hakelabim vehamet lo basadeh yokhelu 'of hashamayim. veyeter dibrei ba'sha va'asher 'asah ugeburato halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra'el. vayishkab ba'sha 'im 'abotav vayiqaber betirzah vayimlokh 'eilah beno takhtav. vegam beyad yeihu ben khanani hanabi debar ihoh hayah 'el ba'sha ve'el beito ve'al kal hara'ah 'asher 'asah be'einei ihoh lehakh'iso bema'aseh yadav lihyot kebet yarabe'am ve'al 'asher hikah 'oto. bishnat 'esrim vashesh shanah le'asa melekh yehudah malakh 'eilah ben ba'sha 'al yisra'el betirzah shenatayim. vayiqshor 'alav 'abdo zimri sar makhazit harakheb vehu betirzah shoteh shikor bet 'arza 'asher 'al habayit betirzah. vayabo zimri vayakeihu vaymiteihu bishnat 'esrim vasheba' le'asa melekh yehudah vayimlokh takhtav. vayhi bemalekho keshibto 'al kis'o hikah 'et kal bet ba'sha lo hish'ir lo mashtin beqir vego'alav verei'eihu. vayashmed zimri 'et kal bet ba'sha kidbar ihoh 'asher diber 'el ba'sha beyad yeihu hanabi. 'el kal khatot ba'sha vekhatot 'eilah beno 'asher khate'u va'asher hekheti'u 'et yisra'el lehakh'is 'et ihoh 'elohei yisra'el behableihem. veyeter dibrei 'eilah vekhal 'asher 'asah halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra'el. bishnat 'esrim vasheba' shanah le'asa melekh yehudah malakh zimri shib'at yamim betirzah veha'am khonim 'al gibeton 'asher lapelishtim. vayishma' ha'am hakhonim leimor qashar zimri vegam hikah 'et hamelekh vayamlikhu khal yisra'el 'et 'ameri sar zaba 'al yisra'el bayom hahu bamakhaneh. vaya'aleh 'ameri vekhal yisra'el 'imo migibeton vayazuru 'al tirzah. vayhi kir'ot zimri ki nilkedah ha'ir vayabo 'el 'armon bet hamelekh vayisrof 'alav 'et bet melekh ba'esh vayamot. 'al khatato khatotav 'asher khata la'asot hara' be'einei ihoh lalekhet bederekh yarabe'am ubekhatato 'asher 'asah lehakhati 'et yisra'el. veyeter dibrei zimri veqishro 'asher qashar halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra'el. 'az yeikhaleq ha'am yisra'el lakheizi khazi ha'am hayah 'akharei tibni ben ginat lehamlikho vehakhazi 'akharei 'ameri. vayekhezaq ha'am 'asher 'akharei 'ameri 'et ha'am 'asher 'akharei tibni ben ginat vayamat tibni vayimlokh 'ameri. bishnat sheloshim ve'akhat shanah le'asa melekh yehudah malakh 'ameri 'al yisra'el shetem 'esreh shanah betirzah malakh shesh shanim. vayiqen 'et hahar shomeron mei'et shemer bekhikerayim kasef vayiben 'et hahar vayiqra 'et shem ha'ir 'asher banah 'al shem shemer 'adonei hahar shomeron. vaya'aseh 'ameri hara' be'einei ihoh vayara' mikol 'asher lefanav. vayeilekh bekhal derekh yarabe'am ben nebat ubekhatotav ubekhatato 'asher hekheti 'et yisra'el lehakh'is 'et ihoh 'elohei yisra'el behableihem veyeter dibrei 'ameri 'asher 'asah ugeburato 'asher 'asah halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra'el. vayishkab 'ameri 'im 'abotav vayiqaber beshomeron vayimlokh 'akh'ab beno takhtav. ve'akh'ab ben 'ameri malakh 'al yisra'el bishnat sheloshim ushemoneh shanah le'asa melekh yehudah vayimlokh 'akh'ab ben 'ameri 'al yisra'el beshomeron 'esrim ushetayim shanah. vaya'as 'akh'ab ben 'ameri hara' be'einei ihoh mikol 'asher lefanav. vayhi hanaqel lekhto bekhatot yarabe'am ben nebat vayiqakh 'ishah 'et 'izebel bat 'etba'al melekh zidonim vayeilekh vaya'abod 'et haba'al vayishtakhu lo. vayaqem mizbeiakh laba'al bet haba'al 'asher banah beshomeron. vaya'as 'akh'ab 'et ha'asheirah vayosef 'akh'ab la'asot lehakh'is 'et ihoh 'elohei yisra'el mikol malkhei yisra'el 'asher hayu lefanav. beyamav banah khi'el bet ha'eli 'et yerikhoh ba'abiram bekhoro yisedah ubisgib ubisgub ze'iro hizib delateha kidbar ihoh 'asher diber beyad yehoshua' bin nun. vayomer 'eiliyahu hatishbi mitoshabei gil'ad 'el 'akh'ab khai ihoh 'elohei yisra'el 'asher 'amadti lefanav 'im yihyeh hashanim ha'eleh tal umatar ki 'im lefi debari. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilav leimor. lekh mizeh ufanita lekha qeidemah venistarta benakhal kerit 'asher 'al penei hayarden. vehayah meihanakhal tishteh ve'et ha'orebim ziviti lekhalkelkha sham. vayeilekh vaya'as kidbar ihoh vayeilekh vayeisheb benakhal kerit 'asher 'al penei hayarden. veha'orebim mebi'im lo lekhem ubasar baboqer velekhem ubasar ba'areb umin hanakhal yishteh. vayhi miqez yamim vayibash hanakhal ki lo hayah geshem ba'arez. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilav leimor. qum lekh zarefatah 'asher lezidon veyashabta sham hineh ziviti sham 'ishah 'almanah lekhalkelekha. vayaqam vayeilekh zarefatah vayabo 'el petakh ha'ir vehineh sham 'ishah 'almanah meqosheshet 'eizim vayiqra 'eileha vayomar qekhi na li me'at mayim bakeli ve'eshteh. vateilekh laqakhat vayiqra 'eileha vayomar liqkhi na li pat lekhem beyadekh. vatomer khai ihoh 'elohekha 'im yesh li ma'og ki 'im melo khaf qemakh bakad ume'at shemen bazapakhat vehini meqosheshet shenayim 'eizim ubati va'asitihu li velibni va'akhalnuhu vamatenu. vayomer 'eileha 'eiliyahu 'al tire'i bo'i 'asi khidbarekh 'akh 'asi li misham 'ugah qetanah barishonah vehozet li velakh velibnekh ta'asi ba'akharonah. ki khoh 'amar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el kad haqemakh lo tikhlah vezapakhat hashemen lo tekhsar 'ad yom titen tet hashem geshem 'al penei ha'adamah. vateilekh vata'aseh kidbar 'eiliyahu vatokhal hu vahi hi vahu ubeitah yamim. kad haqemakh lo khalatah vezapakhat hashemen lo khaser kidbar ihoh 'asher diber beyad 'eiliyahu. vayhi 'akhar hadebarim ha'eleh khalah ben ha'ishah ba'alat habayit vayhi khaleyo khazaq me'od 'ad 'asher lo notrah bo neshamah. vatomer 'el 'eiliyahu mah li valakh 'ish ha'elohim bata 'eilai lehazkir 'et 'avoni ulehamit 'et beni. vayomer 'eileha teni li 'et benekh vayiqakheihu meikheiqah vaya'aleihu 'el ha'aliyah 'asher hu yosheb sham vayashkibeihu 'al mitato. vayiqra 'el ihoh vayomar ihoh 'elohai hagam 'al ha'almanah 'asher 'ani mitgorer 'imah harei'ota lehamit 'et benah. vayitmoded 'al hayeled shalosh pe'amim vayiqra 'el ihoh vayomar ihoh 'elohai tashab na nefesh hayeled hazeh 'al qirbo. vayishma' ihoh beqol 'eiliyahu vatashab nefesh hayeled 'al qirbo vayekhi. vayiqakh 'eiliyahu 'et hayeled vayorideihu min ha'aliyah habaytah vayiteneihu le'imo vayomer 'eiliyahu re'i khai benekh. vatomer ha'ishah 'el 'eiliyahu 'atah zeh yada'ti ki 'ish 'elohim 'atah udebar ihoh befikha 'emet. vayhi yamim rabim udebar ihoh hayah 'el 'eiliyahu bashanah hashelishit leimor lekh heira'eh 'el 'akh'ab ve'etenah matar 'al penei ha'adamah. vayeilekh 'eiliyahu leheira'ot 'el 'akh'ab vehara'ab khazaq beshomeron. vayiqra 'akh'ab 'el 'obadyahu 'asher 'al habayit ve'obadyahu hayah yarei 'et ihoh me'od. vayhi behakhrit 'izebel 'et nebi'ei ihoh vayiqakh 'obadyahu mei'ah nebi'im vayakhbi'em khamishim 'ish bame'arah vekhilkelam lekhem vamayim. vayomer 'akh'ab 'el 'obadyahu lekh ba'arez 'el kal ma'yenei hamayim ve'el kal hanekhalim 'ulai nimza khazir unekhayeh sus vafered velo nakhrit meihabeheimah. vaykhalequ lahem 'et ha'arez la'abar bah 'akh'ab halakh bederekh 'ekhad lebado ve'obadyahu halakh bederekh 'ekhad lebado. vayhi 'obadyahu baderekh vehineh 'eiliyahu liqrato vayakireihu vayipol 'al panav vayomer ha'atah zeh 'adoni 'eiliyahu. vayomer lo 'ani lekh 'emor ladonekha hineh 'eiliyahu. vayomer meh khatati ki 'atah noten 'et 'abdekha beyad 'akh'ab lahamiteini. khai ihoh 'elohekha 'im yesh go umamlakhah 'asher lo shalakh 'adoni sham lebaqeshkha ve'ameru 'ayin vehishbia' 'et hamamlakhah ve'et hago ki lo yimza'ekah. ve'atah 'atah 'omer lekh 'emor ladonekha hineh 'eiliyahu. vehayah 'ani 'eilekh mei'itakh veruakh ihoh yisa'akha 'al 'asher lo 'eida' ubati lehagid le'akh'ab velo yimza'akha vaharagani ve'abdekha yarei 'et ihoh mine'urai. halo hugad ladoni 'et 'asher 'asiti baharog 'izebel 'et nebi'ei ihoh va'akhbi minebi'ei ihoh mei'ah 'ish khamishim khamishim 'ish bame'arah va'akhalkelem lekhem vamayim. ve'atah 'atah 'omer lekh 'emor ladonekha hineh 'eiliyahu vaharagani. vayomer 'eiliyahu khai ihoh zeba'ot 'asher 'amadti lefanav ki hayom 'eira'eh 'eilav. vayeilekh 'obadyahu liqrat 'akh'ab vayaged lo vayeilekh 'akh'ab liqrat 'eiliyahu. vayhi kir'ot 'akh'ab 'et 'eiliyahu vayomer 'akh'ab 'eilav ha'atah zeh 'okher yisra'el. vayomer lo 'akharti 'et yisra'el ki 'im 'atah ubet 'abikha ba'azabekhem 'et mizvot ihoh vateilekh 'akharei habe'alim. ve'atah shelakh qeboz 'eilai 'et kal yisra'el 'el har hakarmel ve'et nebi'ei haba'al 'arba' mei'ot vakhamishim unebi'ei ha'asheirah 'arba' mei'ot 'okhelei shulkhan 'izabel. vayishlakh 'akh'ab bekhal benei yisra'el vayiqboz 'et hanebi'im 'el har hakarmel. vayigash 'eiliyahu 'el kal ha'am vayomer 'ad matai 'atem posekhim 'al shetei hase'ipim 'im ihoh ha'elohim lekhu 'akharav ve'im haba'al lekhu 'akharav velo 'anu ha'am 'oto dabar. vayomer 'eiliyahu 'el ha'am 'ani notarti nabi ihoh lebadi unebi'ei haba'al 'arba' mei'ot vakhamishim 'ish. veyitenu lanu shenayim parim veyibkharu lahem hapar ha'ekhad vinatekhuhu veyasimu 'al ha'eizim ve'esh lo yasimu va'ani 'e'eseh 'et hapar ha'ekhad venatati 'al ha'eizim ve'esh lo 'asim. uqeratem beshem 'eloheikhem va'ani 'eqra beshem ihoh vehayah ha'elohim 'asher ya'aneh ba'esh hu ha'elohim vaya'an kal ha'am vayomeru tob hadabar. vayomer 'eiliyahu linbi'ei haba'al bakharu lakhem hapar ha'ekhad va'asu rishonah ki 'atem harabim veqir'u beshem 'eloheikhem ve'esh lo tasimu. vayiqkhu 'et hapar 'asher natan lahem vaya'asu vayiqre'u beshem haba'al meihaboqer ve'ad hazahorayim leimor haba'al 'aneinu ve'en qol ve'en 'oneh vayfasekhu 'al hamizbeiakh 'asher 'asah. vayhi bazahorayim vayhatel bahem 'eiliyahu vayomer qir'u beqol gadol ki 'elohim hu ki siakh vekhi sig lo vekhi derekh lo 'ulai yashen hu veyiqaz. vayiqre'u beqol gadol vayitgodedu kemishpatam bakharabot ubaremakhim 'ad shefakh dam 'aleihem. vayhi ka'abor hazahorayim vayitnabe'u 'ad la'alot haminkhah ve'en qol ve'en 'oneh ve'en qasheb. vayomer 'eiliyahu lekhal ha'am geshu 'eilai vayigeshu khal ha'am 'eilav vayrapei 'et mizbakh ihoh heharus. vayiqakh 'eiliyahu shetem 'esreh 'abanim kemispar shibtei benei ya'aqob 'asher hayah debar ihoh 'eilav leimor yisra'el yihyeh shemekha. vayibneh 'et ha'abanim mizbeiakh beshem ihoh vaya'as te'alah kebet satayim zera' sabib lamizbeiakh. vaya'arokh 'et ha'eizim vaynatakh 'et hapar vayasem 'al ha'eizim. vayomer mil'u 'arba'ah khadim mayim veyizqu 'al ha'olah ve'al ha'eizim vayomer shenu vayishnu vayomer shaleishu vayshaleishu. vayeilekhu hamayim sabib lamizbeiakh vegam 'et hate'alah milei mayim. vayhi ba'alot haminkhah vayigash 'eiliyahu hanabi vayomar ihoh 'elohei 'abraham yizkhaq veyisra'el hayom yivada' ki 'atah 'elohim beyisra'el va'ani 'abdekha ubedibreikha ubidbarekha 'asiti 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh. 'aneini ihoh 'aneini veyeide'u ha'am hazeh ki 'atah ihoh ha'elohim ve'atah hasibota 'et libam 'akhoranit. vatipol 'esh ihoh vatokhal 'et ha'olah ve'et ha'eizim ve'et ha'abanim ve'et he'afar ve'et hamayim 'asher bate'alah likheikhah. vayar kal ha'am vayipelu 'al peneihem vayomeru ihoh hu ha'elohim ihoh hu ha'elohim. vayomer 'eiliyahu lahem tifsu 'et nebi'ei haba'al 'ish 'al yimalet meihem vayitpesum vayoridem 'eiliyahu 'el nakhal qishon vayishkhatem sham. vayomer 'eiliyahu le'akh'ab 'aleh 'ekhol usheteh ki qol hamon hagashem. vaya'aleh 'akh'ab le'ekhol velishtot ve'eiliyahu 'alah 'el rosh hakarmel vayighar 'arzah vayasem panav ben berakho birkav. vayomer 'el na'aro 'aleh na habet derekh yam vaya'al vayabet vayomer 'en me'umah vayomer shub sheba' pe'amim. vayhi bashebi'it vayomer hineh 'ab qetanah kekhaf 'ish 'olah miyam vayomer 'aleh 'emor 'el 'akh'ab 'esor vared velo ya'azarekhah hagashem. vayhi 'ad koh ve'ad koh vehashamayim hitqaderu 'abim veruakh vayhi geshem gadol vayirkab 'akh'ab vayeilekh yizre'elah. veyad ihoh hayetah 'el 'eiliyahu vayshanes matenav vayaraz lifnei 'akh'ab 'ad bo'akhah yizre'elah. vayaged 'akh'ab le'izebel 'et kal 'asher 'asah 'eiliyahu ve'et kal 'asher harag 'et kal hanebi'im bekhareb. vatishlakh 'izebel mal'akh 'el 'eiliyahu leimor koh ya'asun 'elohim vekhoh yosifun ki kha'et makhar 'asim 'et nafshekha kenefesh 'akhad meihem. vayar vayaqam vayeilekh 'el nafsho vayabo be'er sheba' 'asher lihudah vayanakh 'et na'aro sham. vehu halakh bamidbar derekh yom vayabo vayeisheb takhat rotem 'ekhat 'ekhad vayish'al 'et nafsho lamut vayomer rab 'atah ihoh qakh nafshi ki lo tob 'anokhi mei'abotai. vayishkab vayishan takhat rotem 'ekhad vehineh zeh mal'akh nogeia' bo vayomer lo qum 'ekhol. vayabet vehineh mera'ashotav 'ugat rezafim vezapakhat mayim vayokhal vayeishet vayashab vayishkab. vayashab mal'akh ihoh sheinit vayiga' bo vayomer qum 'ekhol ki rab mimekha hadarekh. vayaqam vayokhal vayishteh vayeilekh bekhoakh ha'akhilah hahi 'arba'im yom ve'arba'im laylah 'ad har ha'elohim khoreb. vayabo sham 'el hame'arah vayalen sham vehineh debar ihoh 'eilav vayomer lo mah lekha foh 'eiliyahu. vayomer qano qineiti ihoh 'elohei zeba'ot ki 'azebu beritekha benei yisra'el 'et mizbekhotekha harasu ve'et nebi'ekha haregu bekhareb va'ivater 'ani lebadi vaybaqshu 'et nafshi leqakhtah. vayomer zei ve'amadta bahar lifnei ihoh vehineh ihoh 'ober veruakh gedolah vekhazaq mefareq harim umeshaber sela'im lifnei ihoh lo baruakh ihoh ve'akhar haruakh ra'ash lo bara'ash ihoh. ve'akhar hara'ash 'esh lo ba'esh ihoh ve'akhar ha'esh qol demamah daqah. vayhi kishmoa' 'eiliyahu vayalet panav be'adarto vayeizei vaya'amod petakh hame'arah vehineh 'eilav qol vayomer mah lekha foh 'eiliyahu. vayomer qano qineiti ihoh 'elohei zeba'ot ki 'azebu beritekha benei yisra'el 'et mizbekhotekha harasu ve'et nebi'ekha haregu bekhareb va'ivater 'ani lebadi vaybaqshu 'et nafshi leqakhtah. vayomer ihoh 'eilav lekh shub ledarkekha midbarah damaseq ubata umashakhta 'et khaza'el lemelekh 'al 'aram. ve'et yeihu ben nimshi timshakh lemelekh 'al yisra'el ve'et 'elisha' ben shafat mei'abel mekholah timshakh lenabi takhtekha. vehayah hanimlat meikhereb khaza'el yamit yeihu vehanimlat meikhereb yeihu yamit 'elisha'. vehish'arti beyisra'el shib'at 'alafim kal habirkayim 'asher lo khare'u laba'al vekhal hapeh 'asher lo nashaq lo. vayeilekh misham vayimza 'et 'elisha' ben shafat vehu khoresh shenem 'asar zemadim lefanav vehu bishnem he'asar vaya'abor 'eiliyahu 'eilav vayashlekh 'adarto 'eilav. vaya'azob 'et habaqar vayaraz 'akharei 'eiliyahu vayomer 'esheqah na le'abi ule'imi ve'eilekhah 'akharekha vayomer lo lekh shub ki meh 'asiti lakh. vayashab mei'akharav vayiqakh 'et zemed habaqar vayizbakheihu ubikhli habaqar bishelam habasar vayiten la'am vayokheilu vayaqam vayeilekh 'akharei 'eiliyahu vayshareteihu. uben hadad melekh 'aram qabaz 'et kal kheilo usheloshim ushenayim melekh 'ito vesus varakheb vaya'al vayazar 'al shomeron vayilakhem bah. vayishlakh mal'akhim 'el 'akh'ab melekh yisra'el ha'irah. vayomer lo koh 'amar ben hadad kaspekha uzehabekha li hu venashekha ubanekha hatobim li hem. vaya'an melekh yisra'el vayomer kidbarekha 'adoni hamelekh lekha 'ani vekhal 'asher li. vayashubu hamal'akhim vayomeru koh 'amar ben hadad leimor ki shalakhti 'eilekha leimor kaspekha uzehabekha venashekha ubanekha li titen. ki 'im ka'et makhar 'eshlakh 'et 'abadai 'eilekha vekhipesu 'et beitekha ve'et batei 'abadekha vehayah kal makhmad 'einekha yasimu beyadam velaqakhu. vayiqra melekh yisra'el lekhal ziqnei ha'arez vayomer de'u na ure'u ki ra'ah zeh mebaqesh ki shalakh 'eilai lenashai ulebanai ulekhaspi velizhabi velo mana'ti mimenu. vayomeru 'eilav kal hazeqeinim vekhal ha'am 'al tishma' velo tobeh. vayomer lemal'akhei ben hadad 'imru ladoni hamelekh kol 'asher shalakhta 'el 'abdekha barishonah 'e'eseh vehadabar hazeh lo 'ukhal la'asot vayeilekhu hamal'akhim vayshibuhu dabar. vayishlakh 'eilav ben hadad vayomer koh ya'asun li 'elohim vekhoh yosifu 'im yispoq 'afar shomeron lish'alim lekhal ha'am 'asher beraglai. vaya'an melekh yisra'el vayomer daberu 'al yithalel khoger kimfateiakh. vayhi kishmoa' 'et hadabar hazeh vehu shoteh hu vehamelakhim basukot vayomer 'el 'abadav simu vayasimu 'al ha'ir. vehineh nabi 'ekhad nigash 'el 'akh'ab melekh yisra'el vayomer koh 'amar ihoh hera'ita 'et kal hehamon hagadol hazeh hini noteno beyadekha hayom veyada'ta ki 'ani ihoh. vayomer 'akh'ab bemi vayomer koh 'amar ihoh bena'arei sarei hamedinot vayomer mi ye'sor hamilkhamah vayomer 'atah. vayifqod 'et na'arei sarei hamedinot vayihyu matayim shenayim usheloshim ve'akhareihem paqad 'et kal ha'am kal benei yisra'el shib'at 'alafim. vayeize'u bazahorayim uben hadad shoteh shikor basukot hu vehamelakhim sheloshim ushenayim melekh 'ozer 'oto. vayeize'u na'arei sarei hamedinot barishonah vayishlakh ben hadad vayagidu lo leimor 'anashim yaze'u mishomeron. vayomer 'im leshalom yaza'u tifsum khayim ve'im lemilkhamah yaza'u khayim tifsum. ve'eleh yaze'u min ha'ir na'arei sarei hamedinot vehakhayil 'asher 'akhareihem. vayaku 'ish 'isho vayanusu 'aram vayirdefem yisra'el vayimalet ben hadad melekh 'aram 'al sus ufarashim. vayeizei melekh yisra'el vayakh 'et hasus ve'et harakheb vehikah ba'aram makah gedolah. vayigash hanabi 'el melekh yisra'el vayomer lo lekh hitkhazaq veda' ure'eh 'et 'asher ta'aseh ki litshubat hashanah melekh 'aram 'oleh 'alekha. ve'abdei melekh 'aram 'ameru 'eilav 'elohei harim 'eloheihem 'al ken khazequ mimenu ve'ulam nilakhem 'itam bamishor 'im lo nekhezaq meihem. ve'et hadabar hazeh 'aseh haser hamelakhim 'ish mimeqomo vesim pakhot takhteihem. ve'atah timneh lekha khayil kakhayil hanofel mei'otakh vesus kasus verekheb karekheb venilakhamah 'otam bamishor 'im lo nekhezaq meihem vayishma' leqolam vaya'as ken. vayhi litshubat hashanah vayifqod ben hadad 'et 'aram vaya'al 'afeiqah lamilkhamah 'im yisra'el. ubenei yisra'el hatepaqedu vekhalekelu vayeilekhu liqratam vayakhanu benei yisra'el negdam kishnei khasifei 'izim va'aram mil'u 'et ha'arez. vayigash 'ish ha'elohim vayomer 'el melekh yisra'el vayomer koh 'amar ihoh ya'an 'asher 'ameru 'aram 'elohei harim ihoh velo 'elohei 'amaqim hu venatati 'et kal hehamon hagadol hazeh beyadekha vida'tem ki 'ani ihoh. vayakhanu 'eleh nokhakh 'eleh shib'at yamim vayhi bayom hashebi'i vatiqrab hamilkhamah vayaku benei yisra'el 'et 'aram mei'ah 'elef ragli beyom 'ekhad. vayanusu hanotarim 'afeiqah 'el ha'ir vatipol hakhomah 'al 'esrim veshib'ah 'elef 'ish hanotarim uben hadad nas vayabo 'el ha'ir kheder bekhader. vayomeru 'eilav 'abadav hineh na shama'nu ki malkhei bet yisra'el ki malkhei khesed hem nasimah na saqim bemateneinu vakhabalim berosheinu veneizei 'el melekh yisra'el 'ulai yekhayeh 'et nafshekha. vayakhgeru saqim bemateneihem vakhabalim berasheihem vayabo'u 'el melekh yisra'el vayomeru 'abdekha ben hadad 'amar tekhi na nafshi vayomer ha'odenu khai 'akhi hu. veha'anashim yenakhashu vaymaharu vayakhletu hamimenu vayomeru 'akhikha ben hadad vayomer bo'u qakhuhu vayeizei 'eilav ben hadad vaya'aleihu 'al hamerkabah. vayomer 'eilav he'arim 'asher laqakh 'abi mei'et 'abikha 'ashib vekhuzot tasim lekha bedameseq ka'asher sam 'abi beshomeron va'ani baberit 'ashalekheka vayikhrat lo berit vayshalekheihu. ve'ish 'ekhad mibenei hanebi'im 'amar 'el rei'eihu bidbar ihoh hakeini na vayma'en ha'ish lehakoto. vayomer lo ya'an 'asher lo shama'ta beqol ihoh hinekha holekh mei'iti vehikekha ha'aryeh vayeilekh mei'ezlo vayimza'eihu ha'aryeh vayakeihu. vayimza 'ish 'akher vayomer hakeini na vayakeihu ha'ish hakeh ufazoa'. vayeilekh hanabi vaya'amod lamelekh 'al hadarekh vayitkhapes ba'afer 'al 'einav. vayhi hamelekh 'ober vehu za'aq 'el hamelekh vayomer 'abdekha yaza beqereb hamilkhamah vehineh 'ish sar vayabei 'eilai 'ish vayomer shemor 'et ha'ish hazeh 'im hipaqed yipaqed vehayetah nafshekha takhat nafsho 'o khikar kesef tishqol. vayhi 'abdekha 'oseh henah vahenah vehu 'einenu vayomer 'eilav melekh yisra'el ken mishpatekha 'atah kharazeta. vaymaher vayasar 'et ha'afer mei'al mei'alei 'einav vayaker 'oto melekh yisra'el ki meihanebi'im hu. vayomer 'eilav koh 'amar ihoh ya'an shilakhta 'et 'ish khermi miyad vehayetah nafshekha takhat nafsho ve'amekha takhat 'amo. vayeilekh melekh yisra'el 'al beito sar veza'ef vayabo shomeronah. vayhi 'akhar hadebarim ha'eleh kerem hayah lenabot hayizre'eili 'asher beyizre'el 'eizel heikhal 'akh'ab melekh shomeron. vaydaber 'akh'ab 'el nabot leimor tenah li 'et karmekha vihi li legan yaraq ki hu qarob 'eizel beiti ve'etenah lekha takhtav kerem tob mimenu 'im tob be'einekha 'etenah lekha khesef mekhir zeh. vayomer nabot 'el 'akh'ab khalilah li ihoh mititi 'et nakhalat 'abotai lakh. vayabo 'akh'ab 'el beito sar veza'ef 'al hadabar 'asher diber 'eilav nabot hayizre'eili vayomer lo 'eten lekha 'et nakhalat 'abotai vayishkab 'al mitato vayaseb 'et panav velo 'akhal lakhem. vatabo 'eilav 'izebel 'ishto vatedaber 'eilav mah zeh rukhakha sarah ve'einekha 'okhel lakhem. vaydaber 'eileha ki 'adaber 'el nabot hayizre'eili va'omar lo tenah li 'et karmekha bekhesef 'o 'im khafez 'atah 'etenah lekha kherem takhtav vayomer lo 'eten lekha 'et karmi. vatomer 'eilav 'izebel 'ishto 'atah 'atah ta'aseh melukhah 'al yisra'el qum 'ekhal lekhem veyitab libekha 'ani 'eten lekha 'et kerem nabot hayizre'eili. vatikhtob sefarim beshem 'akh'ab vatakhtom bekhotamo vatishlakh hasfarim sefarim 'el hazqeinim ve'el hakhorim 'asher be'iro hayoshebim 'et nabot. vatikhtob basefarim leimor qir'u zom vehoshibu 'et nabot berosh ha'am. vehoshibu shenayim 'anashim benei beliya'al negdo vi'iduhu leimor beirakhta 'elohim vamelekh vehozi'uhu vesiqluhu veyamot. vaya'asu 'anshei 'iro hazeqeinim vehakhorim 'asher hayoshebim be'iro ka'asher shalekhah 'aleihem 'izabel ka'asher katub basefarim 'asher shalekhah 'aleihem. qare'u zom vehoshibu 'et nabot berosh ha'am. vayabo'u shenei ha'anashim benei beliya'al vayeishebu negdo vai'iduhu 'anshei habeliya'al 'et nabot neged ha'am leimor beirakh nabot 'elohim vamelekh vayozi'uhu mikhuz la'ir vayisqeluhu ba'abanim vayamot. vayishlekhu 'el 'izebel leimor suqal nabot vayamot. vayhi kishmoa' 'izebel ki suqal nabot vayamot vatomer 'izebel 'el 'akh'ab qum resh 'et kerem nabot hayizre'eili 'asher mei'en latet lekha bekhesef ki 'en nabot khai ki met. vayhi kishmoa' 'akh'ab ki met nabot vayaqam 'akh'ab laredet 'el kerem nabot hayizre'eili lerishto. vayhi debar ihoh 'el 'eiliyahu hatishbi leimor. qum red liqrat 'akh'ab melekh yisra'el 'asher beshomeron hineh bekherem nabot 'asher yarad sham lerishto. vedibarta 'eilav leimor koh 'amar ihoh harazakhta vegam yarasheta vedibarta 'eilav leimor koh 'amar ihoh bimqom 'asher laqequ hakelabim 'et dam nabot yaloqu hakelabim 'et damekha gam 'atah. vayomer 'akh'ab 'el 'eiliyahu hamzatani 'oyebi vayomer mazati ya'an hitmakerkha la'asot hara' be'einei ihoh. hini meibi meibi 'eilekha ra'ah ubi'arti 'akharekha vehikhrati le'akh'ab mashtin beqir ve'azur ve'azub beyisra'el. venatati 'et beitekha kebet yarabe'am ben nebat ukhebet ba'sha ben 'akhiyah 'el haka'as 'asher hikh'asta vatakhati 'et yisra'el. vegam le'izebel diber ihoh leimor hakelabim yokhelu 'et 'izebel bekhel yizre'el. hamet le'akh'ab ba'ir yokhelu hakelabim vehamet basadeh yokhelu 'of hashamayim. raq lo hayah khe'akh'ab 'asher hitmaker la'asot hara' be'einei ihoh 'asher heisatah 'oto 'izebel 'ishto. vayat'eb me'od lalekhet 'akharei hagilulim kekhol 'asher 'asu ha'emori 'asher horish ihoh mipenei benei yisra'el. vayhi khishmoa' 'akh'ab 'et hadebarim ha'eleh vayiqra' begadav vayasem saq 'al besaro vayazom vayishkab basaq vayhalekh 'at. vayhi debar ihoh 'el 'eiliyahu hatishbi leimor. hara'ita ki nikhna' 'akh'ab milefanai ya'an ki nikhna' mipanai lo 'abi 'abi hara'ah beyamav bimei beno 'abi hara'ah 'al beito. vayeishebu shalosh shanim 'en milkhamah ben 'aram uben yisra'el. vayhi bashanah hashelishit vayeired yehoshafat melekh yehudah 'el melekh yisra'el. vayomer melekh yisra'el 'el 'abadav hayda'tem ki lanu ramot gil'ad va'anakhnu makhshim miqakhat 'otah miyad melekh 'aram. vayomer 'el yehoshafat hateilekh 'iti lamilkhamah ramot gil'ad vayomer yehoshafat 'el melekh yisra'el kamoni khamokha ke'ami khe'amekha kesusai kesusekha. vayomer yehoshafat 'el melekh yisra'el derash na khayom 'et debar ihoh. vayiqboz melekh yisra'el 'et hanebi'im ke'arba' mei'ot 'ish vayomer 'aleihem ha'eilekh 'al ramot gil'ad lamilkhamah 'im 'ekhdal vayomeru 'aleh veyiten 'adonai beyad hamelekh. vayomer yehoshafat ha'en poh nabi ihoh 'od venidreshah mei'oto. vayomer melekh yisra'el 'el yehoshafat 'od 'ish 'ekhad lidrosh 'et ihoh mei'oto va'ani seneitiv ki lo yitnabei 'alai tob ki 'im ra' mikhayehu ben yimlah vayomer yehoshafat 'al yomar hamelekh ken. vayiqra melekh yisra'el 'el saris 'ekhad vayomer maharah mikhayehu ben yimlah. umelekh yisra'el vihoshafat melekh yehudah yoshebim 'ish 'al kis'o melubashim begadim begoren petakh sha'ar shomeron vekhal hanebi'im mitnabe'im lifneihem. vaya'as lo zidqiyah ben kena'anah qarnei barzel vayomer koh 'amar ihoh be'eleh tenagakh 'et 'aram 'ad kalotam. vekhal hanebi'im nibe'im ken leimor 'aleh ramot gil'ad vehazlakh venatan ihoh beyad hamelekh. vehamal'akh 'asher halakh liqro mikhayehu diber 'eilav leimor hineh na dibrei hanebi'im peh 'ekhad tob 'el hamelekh yehi na dibreikha debarekha kidbar 'akhad meihem vedibarta tob. vayomer mikhayehu khai ihoh ki 'et 'asher yomar ihoh 'eilai 'oto 'adaber. vayabo 'el hamelekh vayomer hamelekh 'eilav mikhayehu haneilekh 'el ramot gil'ad lamilkhamah 'im nekhdal vayomer 'eilav 'aleh vehazlakh venatan ihoh beyad hamelekh. vayomer 'eilav hamelekh 'ad kameh fe'amim 'ani mashbi'ekha 'asher lo tedaber 'eilai raq 'emet beshem ihoh. vayomer ra'iti 'et kal yisra'el nefozim 'el heharim kazon 'asher 'en lahem ro'eh vayomer ihoh lo 'adonim la'eleh yashubu 'ish lebeito beshalom. vayomer melekh yisra'el 'el yehoshafat halo 'amarti 'eilekha lo yitnabei 'alai tob ki 'im ra'. vayomer lakhen shema' debar ihoh ra'iti 'et ihoh yosheb 'al kis'o vekhal zeba hashamayim 'omed 'alav mimino umisemolo. vayomer ihoh mi yefateh 'et 'akh'ab veya'al veyipol beramot gil'ad vayomer zeh bekhoh vezeh 'omer bekhoh. vayeizei haruakh vaya'amod lifnei ihoh vayomer 'ani 'afatenu vayomer ihoh 'eilav bamah. vayomer 'eizei vehayiti ruakh sheqer befi kal nebi'av vayomer tefateh vegam tukhal zei va'aseh khen. ve'atah hineh natan ihoh ruakh sheqer befi kal nebi'ekha 'eleh ihoh diber 'alekha ra'ah. vayigash zidqiyahu ben kena'anah vayakeh 'et mikhayehu 'al halekhi vayomer 'ei zeh 'abar ruakh ihoh mei'iti ledaber 'otakh. vayomer mikhayehu hinekha ro'eh bayom hahu 'asher tabo kheder bekheder leheikhabeh. vayomer melekh yisra'el qakh 'et mikhayehu vahashibeihu 'el 'amon sar ha'ir ve'el yo'ash ben hamelekh. ve'amarta koh 'amar hamelekh simu 'et zeh bet hakele veha'akhiluhu lekhem lakhaz umayim lakhaz 'ad bo'i beshalom. vayomer mikhayehu 'im shob tashub beshalom lo diber ihoh bi vayomer shim'u 'amim kulam. vaya'al melekh yisra'el vhoshafat melekh yehudah ramot gil'ad. vayomer melekh yisra'el 'el yehoshafat hitkhapes vabo bamilkhamah ve'atah lebash begadekha vayitkhapes melekh yisra'el vayabo bamilkhamah. umelekh 'aram zivah 'et sarei harekheb 'asher lo sheloshim ushenayim leimor lo tilakhamu 'et qaton ve'et gadol ki 'im 'et melekh yisra'el lebado. vayhi kir'ot sarei harekheb 'et yehoshafat vehemah 'ameru 'akh melekh yisra'el hu vayasuru 'alav lehilakhem vayiz'aq yehoshafat. vayhi kir'ot sarei harekheb ki lo melekh yisra'el hu vayashubu mei'akharav. ve'ish mashakh baqeshet letumo vayakeh 'et melekh yisra'el ben hadebaqim uben hashiryan vayomer lerakabo hafokh yadekha vehozi'eini min hamakhaneh ki hakholeiti. vata'aleh hamilkhamah bayom hahu vehamelekh hayah ma'omad bamerkabah nokhakh 'aram vayamat ba'ereb vayizeq dam hamakah 'el kheq harakheb. vaya'abor harinah bamakhaneh kebo hashemesh leimor 'ish 'el 'iro ve'ish 'el 'arzo. vayamat hamelekh vayabo shomeron vayiqberu 'et hamelekh beshomeron. vayishtof 'et harekheb 'al bereikhat shomeron vayaloqu hakelabim 'et damo vehazonot rakhazu kidbar ihoh 'asher diber. veyeter dibrei 'akh'ab vekhal 'asher 'asah ubet hashen 'asher banah vekhal he'arim 'asher banah halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra'el. vayishkab 'akh'ab 'im 'abotav vayimlokh 'akhazyahu beno takhtav. vihoshafat ben 'asa malakh 'al yehudah bishnat 'arba' le'akh'ab melekh yisra'el. yehoshafat ben sheloshim vekhamesh shanah bemalekho ve'esrim vekhamesh shanah malakh birushalim veshem 'imo 'azubah bat shilkhi. vayeilekh bekhal derekh 'asa 'abiv lo sar mimenu la'asot hayashar be'einei ihoh. 'akh habamot lo saru 'od ha'am mezabekhim umeqaterim babamot. vayashlem yehoshafat 'im melekh yisra'el. veyeter dibrei yehoshafat ugeburato 'asher 'asah va'asher nilkham halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. veyeter haqadesh 'asher nish'ar bimei 'asa 'abiv bi'er min ha'arez. umelekh 'en be'edom nizab melekh. yehoshafat 'asar 'asah 'oniyot tarshish lalekhet 'ofirah lazahab velo halakh ki nishberah nishberu 'oniyot be'ezyon gaber. 'az 'amar 'akhazyahu ben 'akh'ab 'el yehoshafat yeilekhu 'abadai 'im 'abadekha ba'oniyot velo 'abah yehoshafat. vayishkab yehoshafat 'im 'abotav vayiqaber 'im 'abotav be'ir david 'abiv vayimlokh yehoram beno takhtav. 'akhazyahu ben 'akh'ab malakh 'al yisra'el beshomeron bishnat sheba' 'esreh lihoshafat melekh yehudah vayimlokh 'al yisra'el shenatayim. vaya'as hara' be'einei ihoh vayeilekh bederekh 'abiv ubederekh 'imo ubederekh yarabe'am ben nebat 'asher hekheti 'et yisra'el. vaya'abod 'et haba'al vayishtakhaveh lo vayakh'es 'et ihoh 'elohei yisra'el kekhol 'asher 'asah 'abiv.

vayifsha' mo'ab beyisra'el 'akharei mot 'akh'ab. vayipol 'akhazyah be'ad hasebakhah ba'aliyato 'asher beshomeron vayakhal vayishlakh mal'akhim vayomer 'aleihem lekhu dirshu beba'al zebub 'elohei 'eqron 'im 'ekhyeh meikholi zeh. umal'akh ihoh diber 'el 'eiliyah hatishbi qum 'aleh liqrat mal'akhei melekh shomeron vedaber 'aleihem hamibeli 'en 'elohim beyisra'el 'atem holekhim lidrosh beba'al zebub 'elohei 'eqron. velakhen koh 'amar ihoh hamitah 'asher 'alita sham lo teired mimenah ki mot tamut vayeilekh 'eiliyah. vayashubu hamal'akhim 'eilav vayomer 'aleihem mah zeh shabtem. vayomeru 'eilav 'ish 'alah liqrateinu vayomer 'eileinu lekhu shubu 'el hamelekh 'asher shalakh 'etkhem vedibartem 'eilav koh 'amar ihoh hamibeli 'en 'elohim beyisra'el 'atah sholeiakh lidrosh beba'al zebub 'elohei 'eqron lakhen hamitah 'asher 'alita sham lo teired mimenah ki mot tamut. vaydaber 'aleihem meh mishpat ha'ish 'asher 'alah liqratkhem vaydaber 'aleikhem 'et hadebarim ha'eleh. vayomeru 'eilav 'ish ba'al sei'ar ve'eizor 'or 'azur bematenav vayomar 'eiliyah hatishbi hu. vayishlakh 'eilav sar khamishim vakhamishav vaya'al 'eilav vehineh yosheb 'al rosh hahar vaydaber 'eilav 'ish ha'elohim hamelekh diber reidah. vaya'aneh 'eiliyahu vaydaber 'el sar hakhamishim ve'im 'ish 'elohim 'ani teired 'esh min hashamayim vetokhal 'otekha ve'et khamishekha vateired 'esh min hashamayim vatokhal 'oto ve'et khamishav. vayashab vayishlakh 'eilav sar khamishim 'akher vakhamishav vaya'an vaydaber 'eilav 'ish ha'elohim koh 'amar hamelekh meheirah reidah. vaya'an 'eiliyah vaydaber 'aleihem 'im 'ish ha'elohim 'ani teired 'esh min hashamayim vetokhal 'otekha ve'et khamishekha vateired 'esh 'elohim min hashamayim vatokhal 'oto ve'et khamishav. vayashab vayishlakh sar khamishim shelishim vakhamishav vaya'al vayabo sar hakhamishim hashelishi vayikhra' 'al birkav leneged 'eiliyahu vayitkhanen 'eilav vaydaber 'eilav 'ish ha'elohim tiqar na nafshi venefesh 'abadekha 'eleh khamishim be'einekha. hineh yaredah 'esh min hashamayim vatokhal 'et shenei sarei hakhamishim harishonim ve'et khamisheihem ve'atah tiqar nafshi be'einekha. vaydaber mal'akh ihoh 'el 'eiliyahu red 'oto 'al tira mipanav vayaqam vayeired 'oto 'el hamelekh. vaydaber 'eilav koh 'amar ihoh ya'an 'asher shalakhta mal'akhim lidrosh beba'al zebub 'elohei 'eqron hamibeli 'en 'elohim beyisra'el lidrosh bidbaro lakhen hamitah 'asher 'alita sham lo teired mimenah ki mot tamut. vayamat kidbar ihoh 'asher diber 'eiliyahu vayimlokh yehoram takhtav bishnat shetayim lihoram ben yehoshafat melekh yehudah ki lo hayah lo ben. veyeter dibrei 'akhazyahu 'asher 'asah halo hemah khetubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra'el. vayhi beha'alot ihoh 'et 'eiliyahu bas'arah hashamayim vayeilekh 'eiliyahu ve'elisha' min hagilgal. vayomer 'eiliyahu 'el 'elisha' sheb na foh ki ihoh shelakhani 'ad bet 'el vayomer 'elisha' khai ihoh vekhei nafshekha 'im 'e'ezbeka vayeiredu bet 'el. vayeize'u benei hanebi'im 'asher bet 'el 'el 'elisha' vayomeru 'eilav hayada'ta ki hayom ihoh loqeiakh 'et 'adonekha mei'al roshekha vayomer gam 'ani yada'ti hekheshu. vayomer lo 'eiliyahu 'elisha' sheb na foh ki ihoh shelakhani yerikho vayomer khai ihoh vekhei nafshekha 'im 'e'ezbeka vayabo'u yerikho. vayigeshu benei hanebi'im 'asher birikho 'el 'elisha' vayomeru 'eilav hayada'ta ki hayom ihoh loqeiakh 'et 'adonekha mei'al roshekha vayomer gam 'ani yada'ti hekheshu. vayomer lo 'eiliyahu sheb na foh ki ihoh shelakhani hayardeinah vayomer khai ihoh vekhei nafshekha 'im 'e'ezbeka vayeilekhu sheneihem. vakhamishim 'ish mibenei hanebi'im halekhu vaya'amdu mineged meirakhoq usheneihem 'amedu 'al hayarden. vayiqakh 'eiliyahu 'et 'adarto vayiglom vayakeh 'et hamayim vayeikhazu henah vahenah vaya'abru sheneihem bekharabah. vayhi khe'aberam ve'eiliyahu 'amar 'el 'elisha' she'al mah 'e'eseh lakh beterem 'elaqakh mei'imakh vayomer 'elisha' vihi na pi shenayim berukhakha 'eilai. vayomer hiqshita lish'ol 'im tir'eh 'oti luqakh mei'itakh yehi lekha khen ve'im 'ayin lo yihyeh. vayhi hemah holekhim halokh vedaber vehineh rekheb 'esh vesusei 'esh vayafridu ben sheneihem vaya'al 'eiliyahu base'arah hashamayim. ve'elisha' ro'eh vehu meza'eq 'abi 'abi rekheb yisra'el ufarashav velo ra'ahu 'od vayakhazeq bibgadav vayiqra'em lishnayim qera'im. vayarem 'et 'aderet 'eiliyahu 'asher nafelah mei'alav vayashab vaya'amod 'al sefat hayarden. vayiqakh 'et 'aderet 'eiliyahu 'asher nafelah mei'alav vayakeh 'et hamayim vayomar 'ayeh ihoh 'elohei 'eiliyahu 'af hu vayakeh 'et hamayim vayeikhazu henah vahenah vaya'abor 'elisha'. vayir'uhu benei hanebi'im 'asher birikho mineged vayomeru nakhah ruakh 'eiliyahu 'al 'elisha' vayabo'u liqrato vayishtakhavu lo 'arezah. vayomeru 'eilav hineh na yesh 'et 'abadekha khamishim 'anashim benei khayil yeilekhu na vibaqshu 'et 'adonekha pen nesa'o ruakh ihoh vayashlikheihu be'akhad heharim 'o be'akhat hageya'ot hagei'ayot vayomer lo tishlakhu. vayifzeru bo 'ad bosh vayomer shelakhu vayishlekhu khamishim 'ish vaybaqshu sheloshah yamim velo meza'uhu. vayashubu 'eilav vehu yosheb birikho vayomer 'aleihem halo 'amarti 'aleikhem 'al teileikhu. vayomeru 'anshei ha'ir 'el 'elisha' hineh na moshab ha'ir tob ka'asher 'adoni ro'eh vehamayim ra'im veha'arez meshakalet. vayomer qekhu li zelokhit khadashah vesimu sham melakh vayiqkhu 'eilav. vayeizei 'el moza hamayim vayashlekh sham melakh vayomer koh 'amar ihoh ripiti lamayim ha'eleh lo yihyeh misham 'od mavet umeshakalet. vayeirafu hamayim 'ad hayom hazeh kidbar 'elisha' 'asher diber. vaya'al misham bet 'el vehu 'oleh baderekh une'arim qetanim yaze'u min ha'ir vayitqalesu bo vayomeru lo 'aleh qeireiakh 'aleh qeireiakh. vayifen 'akharav vayir'em vayqalem beshem ihoh vateizenah shetayim dubim min haya'ar vatebaqa'nah meihem 'arba'im ushenei yeladim. vayeilekh misham 'el har hakarmel umisham shab shomeron. vihoram ben 'akh'ab malakh 'al yisra'el beshomeron bishnat shemoneh 'esreh lihoshafat melekh yehudah vayimlokh shetem 'esreh shanah. vaya'aseh hara' be'einei ihoh raq lo khe'abiv ukhe'imo vayasar 'et mazebat haba'al 'asher 'asah 'abiv. raq bekhatot yarabe'am ben nebat 'asher hekheti 'et yisra'el dabeq lo sar mimenah. umeisha' melekh mo'ab hayah noqed veheishib lemelekh yisra'el mei'ah 'elef karim umei'ah 'elef 'eilim zamer. vayhi kemot 'akh'ab vayifsha' melekh mo'ab bemelekh yisra'el. vayeizei hamelekh yehoram bayom hahu mishomeron vayifqod 'et kal yisra'el. vayeilekh vayishlakh 'el yehoshafat melekh yehudah leimor melekh mo'ab pasha' bi hateilekh 'iti 'el mo'ab lamilkhamah vayomer 'e'eleh kamoni khamokha ke'ami khe'amekha kesusai kesusekha. vayomer 'ei zeh haderekh na'aleh vayomer derekh midbar 'edom. vayeilekh melekh yisra'el umelekh yehudah umelekh 'edom vayasobu derekh shib'at yamim velo hayah mayim lamakhaneh velabeheimah 'asher beragleihem. vayomer melekh yisra'el 'ahah ki qara ihoh lishloshet hamelakhim ha'eleh latet 'otam beyad mo'ab. vayomer yehoshafat ha'en poh nabi ihoh venidreshah 'et ihoh mei'oto vaya'an 'ekhad mei'abdei melekh yisra'el vayomer poh 'elisha' ben shafat 'asher yazaq mayim 'al yedei 'eiliyahu. vayomer yehoshafat yesh 'oto debar ihoh vayeiredu 'eilav melekh yisra'el vihoshafat umelekh 'edom. vayomer 'elisha' 'el melekh yisra'el mah li valakh lekh 'el nebi'ei 'abikha ve'el nebi'ei 'imekha vayomer lo melekh yisra'el 'al ki qara ihoh lishloshet hamelakhim ha'eleh latet 'otam beyad mo'ab. vayomer 'elisha' khai ihoh zeba'ot 'asher 'amadti lefanav ki lulei penei yehoshafat melekh yehudah 'ani nosei 'im 'abit 'eilekha ve'im 'er'eka. ve'atah qekhu li menagen vehayah kenagen hamnagen vatehi 'alav yad ihoh. vayomer koh 'amar ihoh 'asoh hanakhal hazeh geibim geibim. ki khoh 'amar ihoh lo tir'u ruakh velo tir'u geshem vehanakhal hahu yimalei mayim ushetitem 'atem umiqneikhem ubehemtekhem. venaqal zot be'einei ihoh venatan 'et mo'ab beyedkhem. vehikitem kal 'ir mibzar vekhal 'ir mibkhor vekhal 'ez tob tapilu vekhal ma'yenei mayim tistomu vekhol hakhelqah hatobah takh'ibu ba'abanim. vayhi baboqer ka'alot haminkhah vehineh mayim ba'im miderekh 'edom vatimalei ha'arez 'et hamayim. vekhal mo'ab shame'u ki 'alu hamelakhim lehilakhem bam vayiza'aqu mikol khoger khagorah vama'lah vaya'amdu 'al hagebul. vayashkimu baboqer vehashemesh zarekhah 'al hamayim vayir'u mo'ab mineged 'et hamayim 'adumim kadam. vayomeru dam zeh hakhoreb nekherbu hamelakhim vayaku 'ish 'et rei'eihu ve'atah lashalal mo'ab. vayabo'u 'el makhaneh yisra'el vayaqumu yisra'el vayaku 'et mo'ab vayanusu mipeneihem vayabo vayaku bah vehakot 'et mo'ab. vehe'arim yaharosu vekhal khelqah tobah yashlikhu 'ish 'abno umil'uha vekhal ma'yan mayim yistomu vekhal 'ez tob yapilu 'ad hish'ir 'abaneha baqir kharaset vayasobu haqala'im vayakuha. vayar melekh mo'ab ki khazaq mimenu hamilkhamah vayiqakh 'oto sheba' mei'ot 'ish sholef khereb lehabqia' 'el melekh 'edom velo yakholu. vayiqakh 'et beno habekhor 'asher yimlokh takhtav vaya'aleihu 'olah 'al hakhomah vayhi qezef gadol 'al yisra'el vayis'u mei'alav vayashubu la'arez. ve'ishah 'akhat mineshei benei hanebi'im za'aqah 'el 'elisha' leimor 'abdekha 'ishi met ve'atah yada'ta ki 'abdekha hayah yarei 'et ihoh vehanosheh ba laqakhat 'et shenei yeladai lo la'abadim. vayomer 'eileha 'elisha' mah 'e'eseh lakh hagidi li mah yesh lekhi lakh babayit vatomer 'en leshifkhatekha khol babayit ki 'im 'asukh shamen. vayomer lekhi sha'ali lakh keilim min hakhuz mei'et kal shikhnakhei shekheinayikh keilim reiqim 'al tam'iti. ubat vesagart hadelet ba'adekh ube'ad banayikh veyazaqt 'al kal hakeilim ha'eleh vehamalei tasi'i. vateilekh mei'ito vatisgor hadelet ba'adah ube'ad baneha hem magishim 'eileha vehi meizaqet mozaqet. vayhi kimlot hakeilim vatomer 'el benah hagishah 'eilai 'od keli vayomer 'eileha 'en 'od keli vaya'amod hashamen. vatabo vataged le'ish ha'elohim vayomer lekhi mikhri 'et hashemen veshalemi 'et nishyeikhi nishyekh ve'at beneikhi ubanayikh tikhyi banotar. vayhi hayom vaya'abor 'elisha' 'el shunem vesham 'ishah gedolah vatakhazeq bo le'ekhal lakhem vayhi midei 'abero yasur shamah le'ekhal lakhem. vatomer 'el 'ishah hineh na yada'ti ki 'ish 'elohim qadosh hu 'ober 'aleinu tamid. na'aseh na 'aliyat qir qetanah venasim lo sham mitah veshulkhan vekhisei umenorah vehayah bebo'o 'eileinu yasur shamah. vayhi hayom vayabo shamah vayasar 'el ha'aliyah vayishkab shamah. vayomer 'el geikhazi na'aro qera lashunamit hazot vayiqra lah vata'amod lefanav. vayomer lo 'emar na 'eileha hineh kharadt 'eileinu 'et kal hakharadah hazot meh la'asot lakh hayesh ledaber lakh 'el hamelekh 'o 'el sar hazaba vatomer betokh 'ami 'anokhi yoshabet. vayomer umeh la'asot lah vayomer geikhazi 'abal ben 'en lah ve'ishah zaqen. vayomer qera lah vayiqra lah vata'amod bapatakh. vayomer lamo'ed hazeh ka'et khayah 'ati 'at khobeqet ben vatomer 'al 'adoni 'ish ha'elohim 'al tekhazeb beshifkhatekha. vatahar ha'ishah vateiled ben lamo'ed hazeh ka'et khayah 'asher diber 'eileha 'elisha'. vayigdal hayaled vayhi hayom vayeizei 'el 'abiv 'el haqozerim. vayomer 'el 'abiv roshi roshi vayomer 'el hana'ar sa'eihu 'el 'imo. vayisa'eihu vaybi'eihu 'el 'imo vayeisheb 'al birkeha 'ad hazahorayim vayamot. vata'al vatashkibeihu 'al mitat 'ish ha'elohim vatisgor ba'ado vateizei. vatiqra 'el 'ishah vatomer shilkhah na li 'ekhad min hane'arim ve'akhat ha'atonot ve'aruzah 'ad 'ish ha'elohim ve'ashubah. vayomer madua' 'ati 'at holakhti holekhet 'eilav hayom lo khodesh velo shabat vatomer shalom. vatakhabosh ha'aton vatomer 'el na'arah nehag valekh 'al ta'azar li lirkob ki 'im 'amarti lakh. vateilekh vatabo 'el 'ish ha'elohim 'el har hakarmel vayhi kir'ot 'ish ha'elohim 'otah mineged vayomer 'el geikhazi na'aro hineh hashunamit halaz. 'atah ruz na liqratah ve'emar lah hashalom lakh hashalom le'ishekh hashalom layaled vatomer shalom. vatabo 'el 'ish ha'elohim 'el hahar vatakhazeq beraglav vayigash geikhazi lehadefah vayomer 'ish ha'elohim harpeh lah ki nafshah marah lah ihoh he'lim mimeni velo higid li. vatomer hasha'alti ben mei'et 'adoni halo 'amarti lo tashleh 'oti. vayomer legeikhazi khagor matenekha veqakh mish'anti beyadekha valekh ki timza 'ish lo tebarekhenu vekhi yebarekhkha 'ish lo ta'anenu vesamta mish'anti 'al penei hana'ar. vatomer 'em hana'ar khai ihoh vekhei nafshekha 'im 'e'ezbeka vayaqam vayeilekh 'akhareha. vegeikhazi 'abar lifneihem vayasem 'et hamish'enet 'al penei hana'ar ve'en qol ve'en qasheb vayashab liqrato vayaged lo leimor lo heiqiz hana'ar. vayabo 'elisha' habayetah vehineh hana'ar met mushkab 'al mitato. vayabo vayisgor hadelet be'ad sheneihem vayitpalel 'el ihoh. vaya'al vayishkab 'al hayeled vayasem piv 'al piv ve'einav 'al 'einav vekhapav 'al kapo kapav vayighar 'alav vayakham besar hayaled. vayashab vayeilekh babayit 'akhat henah ve'akhat henah vaya'al vayighar 'alav vayzorer hana'ar 'ad sheba' pe'amim vayifqakh hana'ar 'et 'einav. vayiqra 'el geikhazi vayomer qera 'el hashunamit hazot vayiqra'eha vatabo 'eilav vayomer se'i benekh. vatabo vatipol 'al raglav vatishtakhu 'arezah vatisa 'et benah vateizei. ve'elisha' shab hagilgalah vehara'ab ba'arez ubenei hanebi'im yoshebim lefanav vayomer lena'aro shefot hasir hagedolah ubashel nazid libnei hanebi'im. vayeizei 'ekhad 'el hasadeh lelaqet 'orot vayimza gefen sadeh vaylaqet mimenu paqu'ot sadeh melo bigdo vayabo vayfalakh 'el sir hanazid ki lo yada'u. vayizqu la'anashim le'ekhol vayhi ke'akhelam meihanazid vehemah za'aqu vayomeru mavet basir 'ish ha'elohim velo yakhelu le'ekhol. vayomer uqekhu qemakh vayashlekh 'el hasir vayomer zaq la'am veyokheilu velo hayah dabar ra' basir. ve'ish ba miba'al shalishah vayabei le'ish ha'elohim lekhem bikurim 'esrim lekhem se'orim vekharmel beziqlono vayomer ten la'am veyokheilu. vayomer meshareto mah 'eten zeh lifnei mei'ah 'ish vayomer ten la'am veyokheilu ki khoh 'amar ihoh 'akhol vehoter. vayiten lifneihem vayokhelu vayotiru kidbar ihoh. vena'aman sar zeba melekh 'aram hayah 'ish gadol lifnei 'adonav unesu fanim ki bo natan ihoh teshu'ah la'aram veha'ish hayah gibor khayil mezora'. va'aram yaze'u gedudim vayishbu mei'erez yisra'el na'arah qetanah vatehi lifnei 'eishet na'aman. vatomer 'el gebirtah 'akhalei 'adoni lifnei hanabi 'asher beshomeron 'az ye'esof 'oto mizara'to. vayabo vayaged ladonav leimor kazot vekhazot diberah hana'arah 'asher mei'erez yisra'el. vayomer melekh 'aram lekh bo ve'eshlekhah seifer 'el melekh yisra'el vayeilekh vayiqakh beyado 'eser kikerei khesef vesheishet 'alafim zahab ve'eser khalifot begadim. vayabei haseifer 'el melekh yisra'el leimor ve'atah kebo haseifer hazeh 'eilekha hineh shalakhti 'eilekha 'et na'aman 'abdi va'asafto mizara'to. vayhi kiqro melekh yisra'el 'et haseifer vayiqra' begadav vayomer ha'elohim 'ani lehamit ulehakhayot ki zeh sholeiakh 'eilai le'esof 'ish mizara'to ki 'akh de'u na ure'u ki mit'aneh hu li. vayhi kishmoa' 'elisha' 'ish ha'elohim ki qara' melekh yisra'el 'et begadav vayishlakh 'el hamelekh leimor lamah qara'ta begadekha yabo na 'eilai veyeida' ki yesh nabi beyisra'el. vayabo na'aman besuso besusav uberikhbo vaya'amod petakh habayit le'elisha'. vayishlakh 'eilav 'elisha' mal'akh leimor halokh verakhazta sheba' pe'amim bayarden veyashob besarekha lekha utehar. vayiqzof na'aman vayeilakh vayomer hineh 'amarti 'eilai yeizei yazo ve'amad veqara beshem ihoh 'elohav veheinif yado 'el hamaqom ve'asaf hamezora'. halo tob 'abanah 'amanah ufarpar naharot dameseq mikol meimei yisra'el halo 'erkhaz bahem vetahareti vayifen vayeilekh bekheimah. vayigeshu 'abadav vaydaberu 'eilav vayomeru 'abi dabar gadol hanabi diber 'eilekha halo ta'aseh ve'af ki 'amar 'eilekha rekhaz utehar. vayeired vayitbol bayarden sheba' pe'amim kidbar 'ish ha'elohim vayashab besaro kibsar na'ar qaton vayithar. vayashab 'el 'ish ha'elohim hu vekhal makhaneihu vayabo vaya'amod lefanav vayomer hineh na yada'ti ki 'en 'elohim bekhal ha'arez ki 'im beyisra'el ve'atah qakh na berakhah mei'et 'abdekha. vayomer khai ihoh 'asher 'amadti lefanav 'im 'eqakh vayifzar bo laqakhat vayma'en. vayomer na'aman valo yutan na le'abdekha masa zemed peradim 'adamah ki lo ya'aseh 'od 'abdekha 'olah vazebakh leilohim 'akheirim ki 'im ihoh. ladabar hazeh yislakh ihoh le'abdekha bebo 'adoni bet rimon lehishtakhavot shamah vehu nish'an 'al yadi vehishtakhaveiti bet rimon behishtakhavayati bet rimon yislakh na ihoh le'abdekha badabar hazeh. vayomer lo lekh leshalom vayeilekh mei'ito kibrat 'arez. vayomer geikhazi na'ar 'elisha' 'ish ha'elohim hineh khasakh 'adoni 'et na'aman ha'arami hazeh miqakhat miyado 'et 'asher heibi khai ihoh ki 'im razti 'akharav velaqakhti mei'ito me'umah. vayirdof geikhazi 'akharei na'aman vayir'eh na'aman raz 'akharav vayipol mei'al hamerkabah liqrato vayomer hashalom. vayomer shalom 'adoni shelakhani leimor hineh 'atah zeh ba'u 'eilai shenei ne'arim meihar 'efrayim mibenei hanebi'im tenah na lahem kikar kesef ushetei khalifot begadim. vayomer na'aman ho'el qakh kikarayim vayifraz bo vayazar kikerayim kesef bishnei kharitim ushetei khalifot begadim vayiten 'el shenei ne'arav vayis'u lefanav. vayabo 'el ha'ofel vayiqakh miyadam vayifqod babayit vayshalakh 'et ha'anashim vayeileikhu. vehu ba vaya'amod 'el 'adonav vayomer 'eilav 'elisha' mei'an mei'ayin geikhazi vayomer lo halakh 'abdekha 'aneh va'anah. vayomer 'eilav lo libi halakh ka'asher hafakh 'ish mei'al merkabto liqratekha ha'et laqakhat 'et hakesef velaqakhat begadim vezeitim ukheramim vezon ubaqar va'abadim ushefakhot. vezara'at na'aman tidbaq bekha ubezar'akha le'olam vayeizei milefanav mezora' kashaleg. vayomeru benei hanebi'im 'el 'elisha' hineh na hamaqom 'asher 'anakhnu yoshebim sham lefanekha zar mimenu. neilekhah na 'ad hayarden veniqkhah misham 'ish qorah 'ekhat vena'aseh lanu sham maqom lashebet sham vayomer leikhu. vayomer ha'ekhad ho'el na velekh 'et 'abadekha vayomer 'ani 'eilekh. vayeilekh 'itam vayabo'u hayardeinah vayigzeru ha'eizim. vayhi ha'ekhad mapil haqorah ve'et habarzel nafal 'el hamayim vayiz'aq vayomer 'ahah 'adoni vehu sha'ul. vayomer 'ish ha'elohim 'anah nafal vayar'eihu 'et hamaqom vayiqzab 'ez vayashlekh shamah vayazef habarzel. vayomer harem lakh vayishlakh yado vayiqakheihu. umelekh 'aram hayah nilkham beyisra'el vayiva'az 'el 'abadav leimor 'el meqom peloni 'almoni takhanoti. vayishlakh 'ish ha'elohim 'el melekh yisra'el leimor hishamer mei'abor hamaqom hazeh ki sham 'aram nekhitim. vayishlakh melekh yisra'el 'el hamaqom 'asher 'amar lo 'ish ha'elohim vehizhirah vehizhiro venishmar sham lo 'akhat velo shetayim. vayisa'er leb melekh 'aram 'al hadabar hazeh vayiqra 'el 'abadav vayomer 'aleihem halo tagidu li mi mishelanu 'el melekh yisra'el. vayomer 'akhad mei'abadav lo 'adoni hamelekh ki 'elisha' hanabi 'asher beyisra'el yagid lemelekh yisra'el 'et hadebarim 'asher tedaber bakhadar mishkabekha. vayomer lekhu ure'u 'eikhoh hu ve'eshlakh ve'eqakheihu vayugad lo leimor hineh bedotan. vayishlakh shamah susim verekheb vekhayil kabed vayabo'u laylah vayaqifu 'al ha'ir. vayashkem mesharet 'ish ha'elohim laqum vayeizei vehineh khayil sobeb 'et ha'ir vesus varakheb vayomer na'aro 'eilav 'ahah 'adoni 'eikhah na'aseh. vayomer 'al tira ki rabim 'asher 'itanu mei'asher 'otam. vayitpalel 'elisha' vayomar ihoh peqakh na 'et 'einav veyir'eh vayifqakh ihoh 'et 'einei hana'ar vayar vehineh hahar malei susim verekheb 'esh sebibot 'elisha'. vayeiredu 'eilav vayitpalel 'elisha' 'el ihoh vayomar hakh na 'et hago hazeh basanveirim vayakem basanveirim kidbar 'elisha'. vayomer 'aleihem 'elisha' lo zeh haderekh velo zoh ha'ir lekhu 'akharai ve'olikhah 'etkhem 'el ha'ish 'asher tebaqeishun vayolekh 'otam shomeronah. vayhi kebo'am shomeron vayomer 'elisha' ihoh peqakh 'et 'einei 'eleh veyir'u vayifqakh ihoh 'et 'eineihem vayir'u vehineh betokh shomeron. vayomer melekh yisra'el 'el 'elisha' kir'oto 'otam ha'akeh 'akeh 'abi. vayomer lo takeh ha'asher shabita bekharbekha ubeqashtekha 'atah makeh sim lekhem vamayim lifneihem veyokhelu veyishtu veyeilekhu 'el 'adoneihem. vayikhreh lahem keirah gedolah vayokhelu vayishtu vayshalekhem vayeilekhu 'el 'adoneihem velo yasefu 'od gedudei 'aram labo be'erez yisra'el. vayhi 'akharei khen vayiqboz ben hadad melekh 'aram 'et kal makhaneihu vaya'al vayazar 'al shomeron. vayhi ra'ab gadol beshomeron vehineh zarim 'aleha 'ad heyot rosh khamor bishmonim kesef veroba' haqab khareiyonim dibyonim bakhamishah khasef. vayhi melekh yisra'el 'ober 'al hakhomah ve'ishah za'aqah 'eilav leimor hoshi'ah 'adoni hamelekh. vayomer 'al yoshi'ekh ihoh mei'ayin 'oshi'ekh hamin hagoren 'o min hayaqeb. vayomer lah hamelekh mah lakh vatomer ha'ishah hazot 'amerah 'eilai teni 'et benekh venokhelenu hayom ve'et beni nokhal makhar. vanebashel 'et beni vanokheleihu va'omar 'eileha bayom ha'akher teni 'et benekh venokhelenu vatakhbi 'et benah. vayhi khishmoa' hamelekh 'et dibrei ha'ishah vayiqra' 'et begadav vehu 'ober 'al hakhomah vayar ha'am vehineh hasaq 'al besaro mibayit. vayomer koh ya'aseh li 'elohim vekhoh yosif 'im ya'amod rosh 'elisha' ben shafat 'alav hayom. ve'elisha' yosheb bebeito vehazeqeinim yoshebim 'ito vayishlakh 'ish milefanav beterem yabo hamal'akh 'eilav vehu 'amar 'el hazeqeinim harre'item ki shalakh ben hamrazeiakh hazeh lehasir 'et roshi re'u kebo hamal'akh sigru hadelet ulekhaztem 'oto badelet halo qol raglei 'adonav 'akharav. 'odenu medaber 'imam vehineh hamal'akh yored 'eilav vayomer hineh zot hara'ah mei'et ihoh mah 'okhil ihoh 'od. vayomer 'elisha' shim'u debar ihoh koh 'amar ihoh ka'et makhar se'ah solet besheqel vesatayim se'orim besheqel besha'ar shomeron. vaya'an hashalish 'asher lamelekh nish'an 'al yado 'et 'ish ha'elohim vayomar hineh ihoh 'oseh 'arubot bashamayim hayihyeh hadabar hazeh vayomer hinekhah ro'eh be'einekha umisham lo tokhel. ve'arba'ah 'anashim hayu mezora'im petakh hasha'ar vayomeru 'ish 'el rei'eihu mah 'anakhnu yoshebim poh 'ad matenu. 'im 'amarnu nabo ha'ir vehara'ab ba'ir vamatnu sham ve'im yashabnu foh vamatenu ve'atah lekhu venipelah 'el makhaneh 'aram 'im yekhayunu nikhyeh ve'im yemitunu vamatenu. vayaqumu baneshef labo 'el makhaneh 'aram vayabo'u 'ad qezeh makhaneh 'aram vehineh 'en sham 'ish. vadonai hishmia' 'et makhaneh 'aram qol rekheb qol sus qol khayil gadol vayomeru 'ish 'el 'akhiv hineh sakhar 'aleinu melekh yisra'el 'et malkhei hakhitim ve'et malkhei mizrayim labo 'aleinu. vayaqumu vayanusu baneshef vaya'azbu 'et 'aholeihem ve'et suseihem ve'et khamoreihem hamakhaneh ka'asher hi vayanusu 'el nafsham. vayabo'u hamzora'im ha'eleh 'ad qezeh hamakhaneh vayabo'u 'el 'ohel 'ekhad vayokhelu vayishtu vayis'u misham kesef vezahab ubegadim vayeilekhu vayatminu vayashubu vayabo'u 'el 'ohel 'akher vayis'u misham vayeilekhu vayatminu. vayomeru 'ish 'el rei'eihu lo khen 'anakhnu 'osim hayom hazeh yom besorah hu va'anakhnu makhshim vekhikinu 'ad 'or haboqer umeza'anu 'avon ve'atah lekhu venabo'ah venagidah bet hamelekh. vayabo'u vayiqre'u 'el sho'er ha'ir vayagidu lahem leimor banu 'el makhaneh 'aram vehineh 'en sham 'ish veqol 'adam ki 'im hasus 'asur vehakhamor 'asur ve'ohalim ka'asher hemah. vayiqra hasho'arim vayagidu bet hamelekh penimah. vayaqam hamelekh laylah vayomer 'el 'abadav 'agidah na lakhem 'et 'asher 'asu lanu 'aram yade'u ki re'eibim 'anakhnu vayeize'u min hamakhaneh leheikhabeh behasadeh basadeh leimor ki yeize'u min ha'ir venitpesem khayim ve'el ha'ir nabo. vaya'an 'ekhad mei'abadav vayomer veyiqkhu na khamishah min hasusim hanish'arim 'asher nish'aru bah hinam kekhal hehamon hamon yisra'el 'asher nish'aru bah hinam kekhal hamon yisra'el 'asher tamu venishlekhah venir'eh. vayiqkhu shenei rekheb susim vayishlakh hamelekh 'akharei makhaneh 'aram leimor lekhu ure'u. vayeilekhu 'akhareihem 'ad hayarden vehineh khal haderekh melei'ah begadim vekheilim 'asher hishlikhu 'aram beheikhafezam bekhafezam vayashubu hamal'akhim vayagidu lamelekh. vayeizei ha'am vayabozu 'et makhaneh 'aram vayhi se'ah solet besheqel vesatayim se'orim besheqel kidbar ihoh. vehamelekh hifqid 'et hashalish 'asher nish'an 'al yado 'al hasha'ar vayirmesuhu ha'am basha'ar vayamot ka'asher diber 'ish ha'elohim 'asher diber beredet hamelekh 'eilav. vayhi kedaber 'ish ha'elohim 'el hamelekh leimor satayim se'orim besheqel use'ah solet besheqel yihyeh ka'et makhar besha'ar shomeron. vaya'an hashalish 'et 'ish ha'elohim vayomar vehineh ihoh 'oseh 'arubot bashamayim hayihyeh kadabar hazeh vayomer hinekha ro'eh be'einekha umisham lo tokhel. vayhi lo ken vayirmesu 'oto ha'am basha'ar vayamot. ve'elisha' diber 'el ha'ishah 'asher hekheyah 'et benah leimor qumi ulekhi 'ati 'at ubeitekh veguri ba'asher taguri ki qara ihoh lara'ab vegam ba 'el ha'arez sheba' shanim. vataqam ha'ishah vata'as kidbar 'ish ha'elohim vateilekh hi ubeitah vatagar be'erez pelishtim sheba' shanim. vayhi miqzeh sheba' shanim vatashab ha'ishah mei'erez pelishtim vateizei liz'oq 'el hamelekh 'el beitah ve'el sadah. vehamelekh medaber 'el geikhazi na'ar 'ish ha'elohim leimor saperah na li 'et kal hagedolot 'asher 'asah 'elisha'. vayhi hu mesaper lamelekh 'et 'asher hekheyah 'et hamet vehineh ha'ishah 'asher hekheyah 'et benah zo'eqet 'el hamelekh 'al beitah ve'al sadah vayomer geikhazi 'adoni hamelekh zot ha'ishah vezeh benah 'asher hekheyah 'elisha'. vayish'al hamelekh la'ishah vatesaper lo vayiten lah hamelekh saris 'ekhad leimor hasheb 'et kal 'asher lah ve'et kal tebu'ot hasadeh miyom 'azebah 'et ha'arez ve'ad 'atah. vayabo 'elisha' dameseq uben hadad melekh 'aram kholeh vayugad lo leimor ba 'ish ha'elohim 'ad henah. vayomer hamelekh 'el khazah'el qakh beyadekha minkhah velekh liqrat 'ish ha'elohim vedarashta 'et ihoh mei'oto leimor ha'ekhyeh meikholi zeh. vayeilekh khaza'el liqrato vayiqakh minkhah beyado vekhal tub dameseq masa 'arba'im gamal vayabo vaya'amod lefanav vayomer binkha ben hadad melekh 'aram shelakhani 'eilekha leimor ha'ekhyeh meikholi zeh. vayomer 'eilav 'elisha' lekh 'emar lo lo khayoh tikhyeh vehir'ani ihoh ki mot yamut. vaya'amed 'et panav vayasem 'ad bosh vayeibek 'ish ha'elohim. vayomer khaza'el madua' 'adoni bokheh vayomer ki yada'ti 'et 'asher ta'aseh libnei yisra'el ra'ah mibzereihem teshalakh ba'esh ubakhureihem bakhereb taharog ve'oleleihem teratesh veharoteihem tebaqeia'. vayomer khazah'el ki mah 'abdekha hakeleb ki ya'aseh hadabar hagadol hazeh vayomer 'elisha' hir'ani ihoh 'otekha melekh 'al 'aram. vayeilekh mei'et 'elisha' vayabo 'el 'adonav vayomer lo mah 'amar lekha 'elisha' vayomer 'amar li khayoh tikhyeh. vayhi mimakhorat vayiqakh hamakhber vayitbol bamayim vayifros 'al panav vayamot vayimlokh khazah'el takhtav. ubishnat khamesh leyoram ben 'akh'ab melekh yisra'el vihoshafat melekh yehudah malakh yehoram ben yehoshafat melekh yehudah. ben sheloshim ushetayim shanah hayah bemalekho ushemoneh shanah shanim malakh birushalim. vayeilekh bederekh malkhei yisra'el ka'asher 'asu bet 'akh'ab ki bat 'akh'ab hayetah lo le'ishah vaya'as hara' be'einei ihoh. velo 'abah ihoh lehashkhit 'et yehudah lema'an david 'abdo ka'asher 'amar lo latet lo nir lebanav kal hayamim. beyamav pasha' 'edom mitakhat yad yehudah vayamlikhu 'aleihem melekh. vaya'abor yoram za'irah vekhal harekheb 'imo vayhi hu qam laylah vayakeh 'et 'edom hasobeb 'eilav ve'et sarei harekheb vayanas ha'am le'ohalav. vayifsha' 'edom mitakhat yad yehudah 'ad hayom hazeh 'az tifsha' libnah ba'et hahi. veyeter dibrei yoram vekhal 'asher 'asah halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. vayishkab yoram 'im 'abotav vayiqaber 'im 'abotav be'ir david vayimlokh 'akhazyahu beno takhtav. bishnat shetem 'esreh shanah leyoram ben 'akh'ab melekh yisra'el malakh 'akhazyahu ben yehoram melekh yehudah. ben 'esrim ushetayim shanah 'akhazyahu bemalekho veshanah 'akhat malakh birushalim veshem 'imo 'atalyahu bat 'ameri melekh yisra'el. vayeilekh bederekh bet 'akh'ab vaya'as hara' be'einei ihoh kebet 'akh'ab ki khatan bet 'akh'ab hu. vayeilekh 'et yoram ben 'akh'ab lamilkhamah 'im khazah'el melekh 'aram beramot gil'ad vayaku 'aramim 'et yoram. vayashab yoram hamelekh lehitrapei beyizre'el min hamakim 'asher yakuhu 'aramim baramah behilakhamo 'et khazah'el melekh 'aram va'akhazyahu ben yehoram melekh yehudah yarad lir'ot 'et yoram ben 'akh'ab beyizre'el ki kholeh hu. ve'elisha' hanabi qara le'akhad mibenei hanebi'im vayomer lo khagor matenekha veqakh pakh hashemen hazeh beyadekha velekh ramot gil'ad. ubata shamah ure'eihosha m yeihu ben yehoshafat ben nimshi ubata vahaqeimoto mitokh 'ekhav veheibeita 'oto kheder bekhader. velaqakhta fakh hashemen veyazaqta 'al rosho ve'amarta koh 'amar ihoh meshakhtikha lemelekh 'el yisra'el ufatakhta hadelet venastah velo tekhakeh. vayeilekh hana'ar hana'ar hanabi ramot gil'ad. vayabo vehineh sarei hakhayil yoshebim vayomer dabar li 'eilekha hasar vayomer yeihu 'el mi mikulanu vayomer 'eilekha hasar. vayaqam vayabo habaytah vayizoq hashemen 'el rosho vayomer lo koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el meshakhtikha lemelekh 'el 'am ihoh 'el yisra'el. vehikitah 'et bet 'akh'ab 'adonekha veniqamti demei 'abadai hanebi'im udemei kal 'abdei ihoh miyad 'izabel. ve'abad kal bet 'akh'ab vehikhrati le'akh'ab mashtin beqir ve'azur ve'azub beyisra'el. venatati 'et bet 'akh'ab kebet yarabe'am ben nebat ukhebet ba'sha ben 'akhiyah. ve'et 'izebel yokhelu hakelabim bekheileq yizre'el ve'en qober vayiftakh hadelet vayanos. veyeihu yaza 'el 'abdei 'adonav vayomer lo hashalom madua' ba hamshuga' hazeh 'eilekha vayomer 'aleihem 'atem yeda'tem 'et ha'ish ve'et sikho. vayomeru sheqer haged na lanu vayomer kazot vekhazot 'amar 'eilai leimor koh 'amar ihoh meshakhtikha lemelekh 'el yisra'el. vaymaharu vayiqkhu 'ish bigdo vayasimu takhtav 'el gerem hama'alot vayitqe'u bashofar vayomeru malakh yeihu. vayitqasher yeihu ben yehoshafat ben nimshi 'el yoram veyoram hayah shomer beramot gil'ad hu vekhal yisra'el mipenei khaza'el melekh 'aram. vayashab yehoram hamelekh lehitrapei biyzere'el min hamakim 'asher yakuhu 'aramim behilakhamo 'et khaza'el melekh 'aram vayomer yeihu 'im yesh nafshekhem 'al yeizei falit min ha'ir lalekhet legid lehagid beyizre'el. vayirkab yeihu vayeilekh yizre'elah ki yoram shokheb shamah va'akhazyah melekh yehudah yarad lir'ot 'et yoram. vehazofeh 'omed 'al hamigdal beyizre'el vayar 'et shif'at yeihu bebo'o vayomer shif'at 'ani ro'eh vayomer yehoram qakh rakab ushelakh liqratam veyomar hashalom. vayeilekh rokheb hasus liqrato vayomer koh 'amar hamelekh hashalom vayomer yeihu mah lekha uleshalom sob 'el 'akharai vayaged hazofeh leimor ba hamal'akh 'ad hem velo shab. vayishlakh rokheb sus sheini vayabo 'aleihem vayomer koh 'amar hamelekh shalom vayomer yeihu mah lekha uleshalom sob 'el 'akharai. vayaged hazofeh leimor ba 'ad 'aleihem velo shab vehaminhag keminhag yeihu ben nimshi ki beshiga'on yinhag. vayomer yehoram 'esor vaye'sor rikhbo vayeizei yehoram melekh yisra'el va'akhazyahu melekh yehudah 'ish berikhbo vayeize'u liqrat yeihu vayimza'uhu bekhelqat nabot hayizre'eili. vayhi kir'ot yehoram 'et yeihu vayomer hashalom yeihu vayomer mah hashalom 'ad zenunei 'izebel 'imekha ukheshafeha harabim. vayahafokh yehoram yadav vayanos vayomer 'el 'akhazyahu mirmah 'akhazyah. veyeihu milei yado baqeshet vayakh 'et yehoram ben zero'av vayeizei hakheizi milibo vayikhra' berikhbo. vayomer 'el bidqar sheloshah shalisho sa hashlikheihu bekhelqat sedeh nabot hayizre'eili ki zekhor 'ani va'atah 'et rokhebim zemadim 'akharei 'akh'ab 'abiv ihoh nasa 'alav 'et hamasa hazeh. 'im lo 'et demei nabot ve'et demei banav ra'iti 'emesh ne'um ihoh veshilamti lekha bakhelqah hazot ne'um ihoh ve'atah sa hashlikheihu bakhelqah kidbar ihoh. va'akhazyah melekh yehudah ra'ah vayanas derekh bet hagan vayirdof 'akharav yeihu vayomer gam 'oto hakuhu 'el hamerkabah bema'aleh gur 'asher 'et yible'am vayanas megido vayamat sham. vayarkibu 'oto 'abadav yerushalemah vayiqberu 'oto biqburato 'im 'abotav be'ir david. ubishnat 'akhat 'esreh shanah leyoram ben 'akh'ab malakh 'akhazyah 'al yehudah. vayabo yeihu yizre'elah ve'izebel shame'ah vatasem bapukh 'eineha vateiteb 'et roshah vatashqef be'ad hakhalon. veyeihu ba basha'ar vatomer hashalom zimri horeg 'adonav. vayisa fanav 'el hakhalon vayomer mi 'iti mi vayashqifu 'eilav shenayim sheloshah sarisim. vayomer shimtuhu shimtuha vayishmetuha vayiz midamah 'el haqir ve'el hasusim vayirmesenah. vayabo vayokhal vayeishet vayomer piqdu na 'et ha'arurah hazot veqibruha ki bat melekh hi. vayeilekhu leqaberah velo maze'u bah ki 'im hagulgolet veharaglayim vekhapot hayadayim. vayashubu vayagidu lo vayomer debar ihoh hu 'asher diber beyad 'abdo 'eiliyahu hatishbi leimor bekheileq yizre'el yokhelu hakelabim 'et besar 'izabel. vehayat vehayetah niblat 'izebel kedomen 'al penei hasadeh bekheileq yizre'el 'asher lo yomeru zot 'izabel. ule'akh'ab shib'im banim beshomeron vayikhtob yeihu sefarim vayishlakh shomeron 'el sarei yizre'el hazeqeinim ve'el ha'omenim 'akh'ab leimor. ve'atah kebo haseifer hazeh 'aleikhem ve'itekhem benei 'adoneikhem ve'itekhem harekheb vehasusim ve'ir mibzar vehanasheq. ure'item hatob vehayashar mibenei 'adoneikhem vesamtem 'al kisei 'abiv vehilakhamu 'al bet 'adoneikhem. vayir'u me'od me'od vayomeru hineh shenei hamelakhim lo 'amedu lefanav ve'ekh na'amod 'anakhenu. vayishlakh 'asher 'al habayit va'asher 'al ha'ir vehazeqeinim veha'omenim 'el yeihu leimor 'abadekha 'anakhnu vekhol 'asher tomar 'eileinu na'aseh lo namlikh 'ish hatob be'einekha 'aseh. vayikhtob 'aleihem seifer sheinit leimor 'im li 'atem uleqoli 'atem shome'im qekhu 'et rashei 'anshei benei 'adoneikhem ubo'u 'eilai ka'et makhar yizre'elah ubenei hamelekh shib'im 'ish 'et gedolei ha'ir megadelim 'otam. vayhi kebo haseifer 'aleihem vayiqkhu 'et benei hamelekh vayishkhatu shib'im 'ish vayasimu 'et rasheihem badudim vayishlekhu 'eilav yizre'elah. vayabo hamal'akh vayaged lo leimor heibi'u rashei benei hamelekh vayomer simu 'otam shenei ziburim petakh hasha'ar 'ad haboqer. vayhi baboqer vayeizei vaya'amod vayomer 'el kal ha'am zadiqim 'atem hineh 'ani qasharti 'al 'adoni va'ehregeihu umi hikah 'et kal 'eleh. de'u 'eifo ki lo yipol midebar ihoh 'arzah 'asher diber ihoh 'al bet 'akh'ab ihoh 'asah 'et 'asher diber beyad 'abdo 'eiliyahu. vayakh yeihu 'et kal hanish'arim lebet 'akh'ab beyizre'el vekhal gedolav umeyuda'av vekhohanav 'ad bilti hish'ir lo sarid. vayaqam vayabo vayeilekh shomeron hu bet 'eiqed haro'im badarekh. veyeihu maza 'et 'akhei 'akhazyahu melekh yehudah vayomer mi 'atem vayomeru 'akhei 'akhazyahu 'anakhnu vaneired lishlom benei hamelekh ubenei hagebirah. vayomer tifsum khayim vayitpesum khayim vayishkhatum 'el bor bet 'eiqed 'arba'im ushenayim 'ish velo hish'ir 'ish meihem. vayeilekh misham vayimza 'et yehonadab ben reikhab liqrato vaybarekheihu vayomer 'eilav hayesh 'et lebabekha yashar ka'asher lebabi 'im lebabekha vayomer yehonadab yesh vayesh tenah 'et yadekha vayiten yado vaya'aleihu 'eilav 'el hamerkabah. vayomer lekhah 'iti ure'eh beqin'ati ihoh vayarkibu 'oto berikhbo. vayabo shomeron vayakh 'et kal hanish'arim le'akh'ab beshomeron 'ad hishmido kidbar ihoh 'asher diber 'el 'eiliyahu. vayiqboz yeihu 'et kal ha'am vayomer 'aleihem 'akh'ab 'abad 'et haba'al me'at yeihu ya'abdenu harbeh. ve'atah khal nebi'ei haba'al kal 'obedav vekhal kohanav qir'u 'eilai 'ish 'al yipaqed ki zebakh gadol li laba'al kol 'asher yipaqed lo yikhyeh veyeihu 'asah be'aqebah lema'an ha'abid 'et 'obedei haba'al. vayomer yeihu qadeshu 'azarah laba'al vayiqra'u. vayishlakh yeihu bekhal yisra'el vayabo'u kal 'obedei haba'al velo nish'ar 'ish 'asher lo ba vayabo'u bet haba'al vayimalei bet haba'al peh lafeh. vayomer la'asher 'al hameltakhah hozei lebush lekhol 'obedei haba'al vayozei lahem hamalbush. vayabo yeihu vihonadab ben reikhab bet haba'al vayomer le'obedei haba'al khapesu ure'u pen yesh poh 'imakhem mei'abdei ihoh ki 'im 'obedei haba'al lebadam. vayabo'u la'asot zebakhim ve'olot veyeihu sam lo bakhuz shemonim 'ish vayomer ha'ish 'asher yimalet min ha'anashim 'asher 'ani meibi 'al yedeikhem nafsho takhat nafsho. vayhi kekhaloto la'asot ha'olah vayomer yeihu larazim velashalishim bo'u hakum 'ish 'al yeizei vayakum lefi khareb vayashlikhu harazim vehashalishim vayeilekhu 'ad 'ir bet haba'al. vayozi'u 'et mazebot bet haba'al vayisrefuha. vayitezu 'et mazebat haba'al vayitezu 'et bet haba'al vaysimuhu lemakhara'ot lemoza'ot 'ad hayom. vayashmed yeihu 'et haba'al miyisra'el. raq khata'ei yarabe'am ben nebat 'asher hekheti 'et yisra'el lo sar yeihu mei'akhareihem 'eglei hazahab 'asher bet 'el va'asher bedan. vayomer ihoh 'el yeihu ya'an 'asher hetibota la'asot hayashar be'einai kekhol 'asher bilbabi 'asita lebet 'akh'ab benei rebi'im yeishebu lekha 'al kisei yisra'el. veyeihu lo shamar lalekhet betorat ihoh 'elohei yisra'el bekhal lebabo lo sar mei'al khatot yarabe'am 'asher hekheti 'et yisra'el. bayamim hahem heikhel ihoh leqazot beyisra'el vayakem khaza'el bekhal gebul yisra'el. min hayarden mizrakh hashemesh 'et kal 'erez hagil'ad hagadi veharuvbeini vehamnashi mei'aro'er 'asher 'al nakhal 'arnon vehagil'ad vehabashan. veyeter dibrei yeihu vekhal 'asher 'asah vekhal geburato halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra'el. vayishkab yeihu 'im 'abotav vayiqberu 'oto beshomeron vayimlokh yeho'akhaz beno takhtav. vehayamim 'asher malakh yeihu 'al yisra'el 'esrim ushemoneh shanah beshomeron. va'atalyah 'em 'akhazyahu ura'atah ra'atah ki met benah vataqam vate'abed 'et kal zera' hamamlakhah. vatiqakh yehosheba' bat hamelekh yoram 'akhot 'akhazyahu 'et yo'ash ben 'akhazyah vatignob 'oto mitokh benei hamelekh hamamotim hamumatim 'oto ve'et meiniqto bakhadar hamitot vayastiru 'oto mipenei 'atalyahu velo humat. vayhi 'itah bet ihoh mitkhabei shesh shanim va'atalyah molekhet 'al ha'arez. ubashanah hashebi'it shalakh yehoyada' vayiqakh 'et sarei hameiyot hamei'ot lakari velarazim vayabei 'otam 'eilav bet ihoh vayikhrot lahem berit vayashba' 'otam bebet ihoh vayar 'otam 'et ben hamelekh. vayzavem leimor zeh hadabar 'asher ta'asun hashelishit mikem ba'ei hashabat veshomerei mishmeret bet hamelekh. vehashelishit besha'ar sur vehashelishit basha'ar 'akhar harazim ushemartem 'et mishmeret habayit masakh. ushetei hayadot bakhem kol yoze'ei hashabat veshameru 'et mishmeret bet ihoh 'el hamelekh. vehiqaftem 'al hamelekh sabib 'ish vekheilav beyado vehaba 'el hasedeirot yumat vihyu 'et hamelekh bezeito ubebo'o. vaya'asu sarei hameiyot hamei'ot kekhol 'asher zivah yehoyada' hakohen vayiqkhu 'ish 'et 'anashav ba'ei hashabat 'im yoze'ei hashabat vayabo'u 'el yehoyada' hakohen. vayiten hakohen lesarei hameiyot hamei'ot 'et hakhanit ve'et hashelatim 'asher lamelekh david 'asher bebet ihoh. vaya'amdu harazim 'ish vekheilav beyado miketef habayit haymanit 'ad ketef habayit hasemalit lamizbeiakh velabayit 'al hamelekh sabib. vayozi 'et ben hamelekh vayiten 'alav 'et haneizer ve'et ha'eidut vayamlikhu 'oto vayimshakhuhu vayaku khaf vayomeru yekhi hamelekh. vatishma' 'atalyah 'et qol harazin ha'am vatabo 'el ha'am bet ihoh. vateire vehineh hamelekh 'omed 'al ha'amud kamishpat vehasarim vehakhazozerot 'el hamelekh vekhal 'am ha'arez sameiakh vetoqeia' bakhazozerot vatiqra' 'atalyah 'et begadeha vatiqra qesher qasher. vayzav yehoyada' hakohen 'et sarei hamei'ot hamei'ot pequdei hakhayil vayomer 'aleihem hozi'u 'otah 'el mibet lasedeirot vehaba 'akhareha hamet bekhareb ki 'amar hakohen 'al tumat bet ihoh. vayasimu lah yadayim vatabo derekh mebo hasusim bet hamelekh vatumat sham. vayikhrot yehoyada' 'et haberit ben ihoh uben hamelekh uben ha'am lihyot le'am ihoh uben hamelekh uben ha'am. vayabo'u khal 'am ha'arez bet haba'al vayitezuhu 'et mizbekhoto mizbekhotav ve'et zelamav shiberu heiteb ve'et matan kohen haba'al haregu lifnei hamizbekhot vayasem hakohen pequdot 'al bet ihoh. vayiqakh 'et sarei hamei'ot ve'et hakari ve'et harazim ve'et kal 'am ha'arez vayoridu 'et hamelekh mibet ihoh vayabo'u derekh sha'ar harazim bet hamelekh vayeisheb 'al kisei hamelakhim. vayismakh kal 'am ha'arez veha'ir shaqatah ve'et 'atalyahu heimitu bakhereb bet melekh hamelekh. ben sheba' shanim yeho'ash bemalekho. bishnat sheba' leyeihu malakh yeho'ash ve'arba'im shanah malakh birushalim veshem 'imo zibyah mibe'er shaba'. vaya'as yeho'ash hayashar be'einei ihoh kal yamav 'asher horahu yehoyada' hakohen. raq habamot lo saru 'od ha'am mezabekhim umeqaterim babamot. vayomer yeho'ash 'el hakohanim kol kesef haqodashim 'asher yuba bet ihoh
