kesef 'ober 'ish kesef nafshot 'erko kal kesef 'asher ya'aleh 'al leb 'ish lehabi bet ihoh. yiqkhu lahem hakohanim 'ish mei'et makaro vehem yekhazequ 'et bedeq habayit lekhol 'asher yimazei sham badeq. vayhi bishnat 'esrim veshalosh shanah lamelekh yeho'ash lo khizequ hakohanim 'et bedeq habayit. vayiqra hamelekh yeho'ash lihoyada' hakohen velakohanim vayomer 'aleihem madua' 'einekhem mekhazeqim 'et bedeq habayit ve'atah 'al tiqkhu khesef mei'et makareikhem ki lebedeq habayit titenuhu. vayei'otu hakohanim lebilti qekhat kesef mei'et ha'am ulebilti khazeq 'et bedeq habayit. vayiqakh yehoyada' hakohen 'aron 'ekhad vayiqob khor bedalto vayiten 'oto 'eizel hamizbeiakh bayamin miyamin bebo 'ish bet ihoh venatenu shamah hakohanim shomerei hasaf 'et kal hakesef hamuba bet ihoh. vayhi kir'otam ki rab hakesef ba'aron vaya'al sofer hamelekh vehakohen hagadol vayazuru vayimnu 'et hakesef hanimza bet ihoh. venatenu 'et hakesef hamtukan 'al yad yedei 'osei hamelakhah hapequdim hamufqadim bet ihoh vayozi'uhu lekharashei ha'ez velabonim ha'osim bet ihoh. velagoderim ulekhozebei ha'eben veliqnot 'eizim ve'abnei makhzeb lekhazeq 'et bedeq bet ihoh ulekhol 'asher yeizei 'al habayit lekhazeqah. 'akh lo yei'aseh bet ihoh sipot kesef mezamerot mizraqot khazozerot kal keli zahab ukheli khasef min hakesef hamuba bet ihoh. ki le'osei hamelakhah yitenuhu vekhizequ bo 'et bet ihoh. velo yekhashebu 'et ha'anashim 'asher yitenu 'et hakesef 'al yadam latet le'osei hamelakhah ki be'emunah hem 'osim. kesef 'asham vekhesef khata'ot lo yuba bet ihoh lakohanim yihyu. 'az ya'aleh khaza'el melekh 'aram vayilakhem 'al gat vayilkedah vayasem khaza'el panav la'alot 'al yerushalim. vayiqakh yeho'ash melekh yehudah 'et kal haqodashim 'asher hiqdishu yehoshafat vihoram va'akhazyahu 'abotav malkhei yehudah ve'et qodashav ve'et kal hazahab hanimza be'ozerot bet ihoh ubet hamelekh vayishlakh lakhaza'el melekh 'aram vaya'al mei'al yerushalim. veyeter dibrei yo'ash vekhal 'asher 'asah halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. vayaqumu 'abadav vayiqsheru qasher vayaku 'et yo'ash bet milo hayored sila. veyozabad benoshi me'at vihozabad ben shomer 'abadav hikuhu vayamot vayiqberu 'oto 'im 'abotav be'ir david vayimlokh 'amazyah beno takhtav. bishnat 'esrim veshalosh shanah leyo'ash ben 'akhazyahu melekh yehudah malakh yeho'akhaz ben yeihu 'al yisra'el beshomeron sheba' 'esreh shanah. vaya'as hara' be'einei ihoh vayeilekh 'akhar khatot yarabe'am ben nebat 'asher hekheti 'et yisra'el lo sar mimenah. vayikhar 'af ihoh beyisra'el vayitenem beyad khaza'el melekh 'aram ubeyad ben hadad ben khaza'el kal hayamim. vaykhal yeho'akhaz 'et penei ihoh vayishma' 'eilav ihoh ki ra'ah 'et lakhaz yisra'el ki lakhaz 'otam melekh 'aram. vayiten ihoh leyisra'el moshia' vayeize'u mitakhat yad 'aram vayeishebu benei yisra'el be'aholeihem kitmol shilshom. 'akh lo saru meikhatot bet yarabe'am 'asher hekheti hekheti 'et yisra'el bah halakh vegam ha'asheirah 'amedah beshomeron. ki lo hish'ir liho'akhaz 'am ki 'im khamishim parashim va'asarah rekheb va'aseret 'alafim ragli ki 'ibedam melekh 'aram vaysimem ke'afar ladush. veyeter dibrei yeho'akhaz vekhal 'asher 'asah ugeburato halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra'el. vayishkab yeho'akhaz 'im 'abotav vayiqberuhu beshomeron vayimlokh yo'ash beno takhtav. bishnat sheloshim vasheba' shanah leyo'ash melekh yehudah malakh yeho'ash ben yeho'akhaz 'al yisra'el beshomeron shesh 'esreh shanah. vaya'aseh hara' be'einei ihoh lo sar mikal khatot yarabe'am ben nebat 'asher hekheti 'et yisra'el bah halakh. veyeter dibrei yo'ash vekhal 'asher 'asah ugeburato 'asher nilkham 'im 'amazyah melekh yehudah halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra'el. vayishkab yo'ash 'im 'abotav veyarabe'am yashab 'al kis'o vayiqaber yo'ash beshomeron 'im malkhei yisra'el. ve'elisha' khalah 'et khaleyo 'asher yamut bo vayeired 'eilav yo'ash melekh yisra'el vayeibek 'al panav vayomar 'abi 'abi rekheb yisra'el ufarashav. vayomer lo 'elisha' qakh qeshet vekhizim vayiqakh 'eilav qeshet vekhizim. vayomer lemelekh yisra'el harkeb yadekha 'al haqeshet vayarkeb yado vayasem 'elisha' yadav 'al yedei hamelekh. vayomer petakh hakhalon qeidemah vayiftakh vayomer 'elisha' yereh vayor vayomer khez teshu'ah ihoh vekhez teshu'ah ba'aram vehikita 'et 'aram ba'afeq 'ad kaleh. vayomer qakh hakhizim vayiqakh vayomer lemelekh yisra'el hakh 'arzah vayakh shalosh pe'amim vaya'amod. vayiqzof 'alav 'ish ha'elohim vayomer lehakot khamesh 'o shesh pe'amim 'az hikita 'et 'aram 'ad kaleh ve'atah shalosh pe'amim takeh 'et 'aram. vayamat 'elisha' vayiqberuhu ugedudei mo'ab yabo'u ba'arez ba shanah. vayhi hem qoberim 'ish vehineh ra'u 'et hagedud vayashlikhu 'et ha'ish beqeber 'elisha' vayeilekh vayiga' ha'ish be'azmot 'elisha' vaykhi vayaqam 'al raglav. vakhaza'el melekh 'aram lakhaz 'et yisra'el kol yemei yeho'akhaz. vayakhan ihoh 'otam vayrakhamem vayifen 'aleihem lema'an berito 'et 'abraham yizkhaq veya'aqob velo 'abah hashkhitam velo hishlikham mei'al panav 'ad 'atah. vayamat khaza'el melekh 'aram vayimlokh ben hadad beno takhtav. vayashab yeho'ash ben yeho'akhaz vayiqakh 'et he'arim miyad ben hadad ben khaza'el 'asher laqakh miyad yeho'akhaz 'abiv bamilkhamah shalosh pe'amim hikahu yo'ash vayasheb 'et 'arei yisra'el. bishnat shetayim leyo'ash ben yo'akhaz melekh yisra'el malakh 'amazyahu ben yo'ash melekh yehudah. ben 'esrim vekhamesh shanah hayah bemalekho ve'esrim vateisha' shanah malakh birushalim veshem 'imo yeho'adin yeho'adan min yerushalim. vaya'as hayashar be'einei ihoh raq lo kedavid 'abiv kekhol 'asher 'asah yo'ash 'abiv 'asah. raq habamot lo saru 'od ha'am mezabekhim umeqaterim babamot. vayhi ka'asher khazeqah hamamlakhah beyado vayakh 'et 'abadav hamakim 'et hamelekh 'abiv. ve'et benei hamakim lo heimit kakatub beseifer torat mosheh 'asher zivah ihoh leimor lo yumetu 'abot 'al banim ubanim lo yumetu 'al 'abot ki 'im 'ish bekhet'o yamut yumat. hu hikah 'et 'edom begei hamelakh melakh 'aseret 'alafim vetafas 'et hasela' bamilkhamah vayiqra 'et shemah yaqete'el 'ad hayom hazeh. 'az shalakh 'amazyah mal'akhim 'el yeho'ash ben yeho'akhaz ben yeihu melekh yisra'el leimor lekhah nitra'eh fanim. vayishlakh yeho'ash melekh yisra'el 'el 'amazyahu melekh yehudah leimor hakhoakh 'asher balebanon lakh 'el ha'erez 'asher balebanon leimor tenah 'et bitekha libni le'ishah vata'abor khayat hasadeh 'asher balebanon vatirmos 'et hakhoakh. hakeh hikita 'et 'edom unesa'akha libekha hikabed vesheb bebeitekha velamah titgareh bera'ah venafaltah 'atah vihudah 'imakh. velo shama' 'amazyahu vaya'al yeho'ash melekh yisra'el vayitra'u fanim hu va'amazyahu melekh yehudah bebet shemesh 'asher lihudah. vayinagef yehudah lifnei yisra'el vayanusu 'ish le'aholo le'ohalav. ve'et 'amazyahu melekh yehudah ben yeho'ash ben 'akhazyahu tafas yeho'ash melekh yisra'el bebet shamesh vayabo'u vayabo yerushalim vayifroz bekhomat yerushalim besha'ar 'efrayim 'ad sha'ar hapinah 'arba' mei'ot 'amah. velaqakh 'et kal hazahab vehakesef ve'et kal hakeilim hanimze'im bet ihoh ube'ozerot bet hamelekh ve'et benei hata'arubot vayashab shomeronah. veyeter dibrei yeho'ash 'asher 'asah ugeburato va'asher nilkham 'im 'amazyahu melekh yehudah halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra'el. vayishkab yeho'ash 'im 'abotav vayiqaber beshomeron 'im malkhei yisra'el vayimlokh yarabe'am beno takhtav. vaykhi 'amazyahu ben yo'ash melekh yehudah 'akharei mot yeho'ash ben yeho'akhaz melekh yisra'el khamesh 'esreh shanah. veyeter dibrei 'amazyahu halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. vayiqsheru 'alav qesher birushalim vayanas lakhishah vayishlekhu 'akharav lakhishah vaymituhu sham. vayis'u 'oto 'al hasusim vayiqaber birushalim 'im 'abotav be'ir david. vayiqkhu kal 'am yehudah 'et 'azaryah vehu ben shesh 'esreh shanah vayamlikhu 'oto takhat 'abiv 'amazyahu. hu banah 'et 'eilat vayshibeha lihudah 'akharei shekhab hamelekh 'im 'abotav. bishnat khamesh 'esreh shanah la'amazyahu ben yo'ash melekh yehudah malakh yarabe'am ben yo'ash melekh yisra'el beshomeron 'arba'im ve'akhat shanah. vaya'as hara' be'einei ihoh lo sar mikal khatot yarabe'am ben nebat 'asher hekheti 'et yisra'el. hu heishib 'et gebul yisra'el milebo khamat 'ad yam ha'arabah kidbar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el 'asher diber beyad 'abdo yonah ben 'amitai hanabi 'asher migat hakheifer. ki ra'ah ihoh 'et 'oni yisra'el moreh me'od ve'efes 'azur ve'efes 'azub ve'en 'ozer leyisra'el. velo diber ihoh limkhot 'et shem yisra'el mitakhat hashamayim vayoshi'em beyad yarabe'am ben yo'ash. veyeter dibrei yarabe'am vekhal 'asher 'asah ugeburato 'asher nilkham va'asher heishib 'et dameseq ve'et khamat lihudah beyisra'el halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra'el. vayishkab yarabe'am 'im 'abotav 'im malkhei yisra'el vayimlokh zekharyah beno takhtav. bishnat 'esrim vasheba' shanah leyarabe'am melekh yisra'el malakh 'azaryah ben 'amazyah melekh yehudah. ben shesh 'esreh shanah hayah bemalekho vakhamishim ushetayim shanah malakh birushalim veshem 'imo yekhaleyahu mirushalim. vaya'as hayashar be'einei ihoh kekhol 'asher 'asah 'amazyahu 'abiv. raq habamot lo saru 'od ha'am mezabekhim umeqaterim babamot. vaynaga' ihoh 'et hamelekh vayhi mezora' 'ad yom moto vayeisheb bebet hakhafeshit veyotam ben hamelekh 'al habayit shofet 'et 'am ha'arez. veyeter dibrei 'azaryahu vekhal 'asher 'asah halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. vayishkab 'azaryah 'im 'abotav vayiqberu 'oto 'im 'abotav be'ir david vayimlokh yotam beno takhtav. bishnat sheloshim ushemoneh shanah la'azaryahu melekh yehudah malakh zekharyahu ben yarabe'am 'al yisra'el beshomeron shishah khodashim. vaya'as hara' be'einei ihoh ka'asher 'asu 'abotav lo sar meikhatot yarabe'am ben nebat 'asher hekheti 'et yisra'el. vayiqshor 'alav shalum ben yabesh vayakeihu qabale'am 'am vaymiteihu vayimlokh takhtav. veyeter dibrei zekharyah hinam ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra'el. hu debar ihoh 'asher diber 'el yeihu leimor benei rebi'im yeishebu lekha 'al kisei yisra'el vayhi khen. shalum ben yabesh malakh bishnat sheloshim vateisha' shanah le'uziyah melekh yehudah vayimlokh yerakh yamim beshomeron. vaya'al menakhem ben gadi mitirzah vayabo shomeron vayakh 'et shalum ben yabesh beshomeron vaymiteihu vayimlokh takhtav. veyeter dibrei shalum veqishro 'asher qashar hinam ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra'el. 'az yakeh menakhem 'et tifsakh ve'et kal 'asher bah ve'et gebuleha mitirzah ki lo fatakh vayakh 'et kal heharoteha biqeia'. bishnat sheloshim vateisha' shanah la'azaryah melekh yehudah malakh menakhem ben gadi 'al yisra'el 'eser shanim beshomeron. vaya'as hara' be'einei ihoh lo sar mei'al khatot yarabe'am ben nebat 'asher hekheti 'et yisra'el kal yamav. ba ful melekh 'ashur 'al ha'arez vayiten menakhem leful 'elef kikar kasef lihyot yadav 'ito lehakhaziq hamamlakhah beyado. vayozei menakhem 'et hakesef 'al yisra'el 'al kal giborei hakhayil latet lemelekh 'ashur khamishim sheqalim kesef le'ish 'ekhad vayashab melekh 'ashur velo 'amad sham ba'arez. veyeter dibrei menakhem vekhal 'asher 'asah halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra'el. vayishkab menakhem 'im 'abotav vayimlokh peqakhyah beno takhtav. bishnat khamishim shanah la'azaryah melekh yehudah malakh peqakhyah ben menakhem 'al yisra'el beshomeron shenatayim. vaya'as hara' be'einei ihoh lo sar meikhatot yarabe'am ben nebat 'asher hekheti 'et yisra'el. vayiqshor 'alav peqakh ben remalyahu shalisho vayakeihu beshomeron be'armon bet melekh hamelekh 'et 'argob ve'et ha'aryeh ve'imo khamishim 'ish mibenei gil'adim vaymiteihu vayimlokh takhtav. veyeter dibrei feqakhyah vekhal 'asher 'asah hinam ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra'el. bishnat khamishim ushetayim shanah la'azaryah melekh yehudah malakh peqakh ben remalyahu 'al yisra'el beshomeron 'esrim shanah. vaya'as hara' be'einei ihoh lo sar min khatot yarabe'am ben nebat 'asher hekheti 'et yisra'el. bimei peqakh melekh yisra'el ba tiglat pil'eser melekh 'ashur vayiqakh 'et 'iyon ve'et 'abel bet ma'akhah ve'et yanoakh ve'et qedesh ve'et khazor ve'et hagil'ad ve'et hagalilah kol 'erez naftali vayaglem 'ashurah. vayiqshar qesher hosheia' ben 'eilah 'al peqakh ben remalyahu vayakeihu vaymiteihu vayimlokh takhtav bishnat 'esrim leyotam ben 'uziyah. veyeter dibrei feqakh vekhal 'asher 'asah hinam ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra'el. bishnat shetayim lefeqakh ben remalyahu melekh yisra'el malakh yotam ben 'uziyahu melekh yehudah. ben 'esrim vekhamesh shanah hayah bemalekho veshesh 'esreh shanah malakh birushalim veshem 'imo yerusha bat zadoq. vaya'as hayashar be'einei ihoh kekhol 'asher 'asah 'uziyahu 'abiv 'asah. raq habamot lo saru 'od ha'am mezabekhim umeqaterim babamot hu banah 'et sha'ar bet ihoh ha'elyon. veyeter dibrei yotam 'asher 'asah halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. bayamim hahem heikhel ihoh lehashliakh bihudah rezin melekh 'aram ve'et peqakh ben remalyahu. vayishkab yotam 'im 'abotav vayiqaber 'im 'abotav be'ir david 'abiv vayimlokh 'akhaz beno takhtav. bishnat sheba' 'esreh shanah lefeqakh ben remalyahu malakh 'akhaz ben yotam melekh yehudah. ben 'esrim shanah 'akhaz bemalekho veshesh 'esreh shanah malakh birushalim velo 'asah hayashar be'einei ihoh 'elohav kedavid 'abiv. vayeilekh bederekh malkhei yisra'el vegam 'et beno he'ebir ba'esh keto'abot hagoyim 'asher horish ihoh 'otam mipenei benei yisra'el. vayzabeiakh vayqater babamot ve'al hageba'ot vetakhat kal 'ez ra'anan. 'az ya'aleh rezin melekh 'aram ufeqakh ben remalyahu melekh yisra'el yerushalim lamilkhamah vayazuru 'al 'akhaz velo yakhelu lehilakhem. ba'et hahi heishib rezin melekh 'aram 'et 'eilat la'aram vaynashel 'et hayhudim mei'eilot va'aramim va'adomim ba'u 'eilat vayeishebu sham 'ad hayom hazeh. vayishlakh 'akhaz mal'akhim 'el tiglat peleser melekh 'ashur leimor 'abdekha ubinkha 'ani 'aleh vehoshi'eini mikaf melekh 'aram umikaf melekh yisra'el haqomim 'alai. vayiqakh 'akhaz 'et hakesef ve'et hazahab hanimza bet ihoh ube'ozerot bet hamelekh vayishlakh lemelekh 'ashur shokhad. vayishma' 'eilav melekh 'ashur vaya'al melekh 'ashur 'el dameseq vayitpeseha vayagleha qirah ve'et rezin heimit. vayeilekh hamelekh 'akhaz liqrat tiglat pil'eser melekh 'ashur dumeseq vayar 'et hamizbeiakh 'asher bedamaseq vayishlakh hamelekh 'akhaz 'el 'uriyah hakohen 'et demut hamizbeiakh ve'et tabnito lekhal ma'aseihu. vayiben 'uriyah hakohen 'et hamizbeiakh kekhol 'asher shalakh hamelekh 'akhaz midameseq ken 'asah 'uriyah hakohen 'ad bo hamelekh 'akhaz midamaseq. vayabo hamelekh midameseq vayar hamelekh 'et hamizbeiakh vayiqrab hamelekh 'al hamizbeiakh vaya'al 'alav. vayaqter 'et 'olato ve'et minkhato vayasekh 'et nisko vayizroq 'et dam hashelamim 'asher lo 'al hamizbeiakh. ve'et hamizbakh hanekhoshet 'asher lifnei ihoh vayaqreb mei'et penei habayit miben hamizbeiakh umiben bet ihoh vayiten 'oto 'al yerekh hamizbeiakh zafonah. vayzaveihu vayzaveh hamelekh 'akhaz 'et 'uriyah hakohen leimor 'al hamizbeiakh hagadol haqter 'et 'olat haboqer ve'et minkhat ha'ereb ve'et 'olat hamelekh ve'et minkhato ve'et 'olat kal 'am ha'arez uminkhatam veniskeihem vekhal dam 'olah vekhal dam zebakh 'alav tizroq umizbakh hanekhoshet yihyeh li lebaqer. vaya'as 'uriyah hakohen kekhol 'asher zivah hamelekh 'akhaz. vayqazez hamelekh 'akhaz 'et hamisgerot hamekhonot vayasar mei'aleihem ve'et 'et hakiyor ve'et hayam horid mei'al habaqar hanekhoshet 'asher takhteha vayiten 'oto 'al marzefet 'abanim. ve'et misakh musakh hashabat 'asher banu babayit ve'et mebo hamelekh hakhizonah heiseb bet ihoh mipenei melekh 'ashur. veyeter dibrei 'akhaz 'asher 'asah halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. vayishkab 'akhaz 'im 'abotav vayiqaber 'im 'abotav be'ir david vayimlokh khizqiyahu beno takhtav. bishnat shetem 'esreh le'akhaz melekh yehudah malakh hosheia' ben 'eilah beshomeron 'al yisra'el teisha' shanim. vaya'as hara' be'einei ihoh raq lo kemalkhei yisra'el 'asher hayu lefanav. 'alav 'alah shalman'eser melekh 'ashur vayhi lo hosheia' 'ebed vayasheb lo minkhah. vayimza melekh 'ashur behosheia' qesher 'asher shalakh mal'akhim 'el so melekh mizrayim velo he'elah minkhah lemelekh 'ashur keshanah beshanah vaya'azreihu melekh 'ashur vaya'asreihu bet kele. vaya'al melekh 'ashur bekhal ha'arez vaya'al shomeron vayazar 'aleha shalosh shanim. bishnat hateshi'it lehosheia' lakhad melekh 'ashur 'et shomeron vayegel 'et yisra'el 'ashurah vayosheb 'otam bakhlakh ubekhabor nehar gozan ve'arei madai. vayhi ki khate'u benei yisra'el ihoh 'eloheihem hama'aleh 'otam mei'erez mizrayim mitakhat yad par'oh melekh mizrayim vayire'u 'elohim 'akheirim. vayeilekhu bekhuqot hagoyim 'asher horish ihoh mipenei benei yisra'el umalkhei yisra'el 'asher 'asu. vaykhape'u benei yisra'el debarim 'asher lo khen 'al ihoh 'eloheihem vayibnu lahem bamot bekhal 'areihem mimigdal nozrim 'ad 'ir mibzar. vayazibu lahem mazeibot va'asheirim 'al kal gib'ah gebohah vetakhat kal 'ez ra'anan. vayqateru sham bekhal bamot kagoyim 'asher heglah ihoh mipeneihem vaya'asu debarim ra'im lehakh'is 'et ihoh. vaya'abdu hagilulim 'asher 'amar ihoh lahem lo ta'asu 'et hadabar hazeh. vaya'ad ihoh beyisra'el ubihudah beyad kal nebi'o nebi'ei khal khozeh leimor bu midarkheikhem hara'im veshimru mizvotai khuqotai kekhal hatorah 'asher ziviti 'et 'aboteikhem va'asher shalakhti 'aleikhem beyad 'abadai hanebi'im. velo shamei'u vayaqshu 'et 'arepam ke'oref 'abotam 'asher lo he'eminu ihoh 'eloheihem. vayim'asu 'et khuqav ve'et berito 'asher karat 'et 'abotam ve'et 'eidevotav 'asher hei'id bam vayeilekhu 'akharei hahebel vayehbalu ve'akharei hagoyim 'asher sebibotam 'asher zivah ihoh 'otam lebilti 'asot kahem. vaya'azbu 'et kal mizvot ihoh 'eloheihem vaya'asu lahem maseikhah shenem shenei 'agalim vaya'asu 'asheirah vayishtakhavu lekhal zeba hashamayim vaya'abdu 'et haba'al. vaya'abiru 'et beneihem ve'et benoteihem ba'esh vayiqsemu qesamim vaynakheishu vayitmakeru la'asot hara' be'einei ihoh lehakh'iso. vayit'anaf ihoh me'od beyisra'el vaysirem mei'al panav lo nish'ar raq sheibet yehudah lebado. gam yehudah lo shamar 'et mizvot ihoh 'eloheihem vayeilekhu bekhuqot yisra'el 'asher 'asu. vayim'as ihoh bekhal zera' yisra'el vai'anem vayitenem beyad shosim 'ad 'asher hishlikham mipanav. ki qara' yisra'el mei'al bet david vayamlikhu 'et yarabe'am ben nebat vayadei vayadakh yarabe'am 'et yisra'el mei'akharei ihoh vehekhetei'am khata'ah gedolah. vayeilekhu benei yisra'el bekhal khatot yarabe'am 'asher 'asah lo saru mimenah. 'ad 'asher heisir ihoh 'et yisra'el mei'al panav ka'asher diber beyad kal 'abadav hanebi'im vayigel yisra'el mei'al 'admato 'ashurah 'ad hayom hazeh. vayabei melekh 'ashur mibabel umikutah umei'ava umeikhamat usefarvayim vayosheb be'arei shomeron takhat benei yisra'el vayirshu 'et shomeron vayeishebu be'areha. vayhi bitkhilat shibtam sham lo yare'u 'et ihoh vayshalakh ihoh bahem 'et ha'arayot vayihyu horegim bahem. vayomeru lemelekh 'ashur leimor hagoyim 'asher higlita vatosheb be'arei shomeron lo yade'u 'et mishpat 'elohei ha'arez vayshalakh bam 'et ha'arayot vehinam memitim 'otam ka'asher 'einam yode'im 'et mishpat 'elohei ha'arez. vayzav melekh 'ashur leimor holikhu shamah 'ekhad meihakohanim 'asher higlitem misham veyeilekhu veyeishebu sham veyorem 'et mishpat 'elohei ha'arez. vayabo 'ekhad meihakohanim 'asher higlu mishomeron vayeisheb bebet 'el vayhi moreh 'otam 'ekh yire'u 'et ihoh. vayihyu 'osim go go 'elohav vayanikhu bebet habamot 'asher 'asu hashomeronim go go be'areihem 'asher hem yoshebim sham. ve'anshei babel 'asu 'et sukot benot ve'anshei khut 'asu 'et neiregal ve'anshei khamat 'asu 'et 'ashima. veha'avim 'asu nibkhaz ve'et tartaq vehasfarvim sorefim 'et beneihem ba'esh le'adramelekh va'anamelekh 'eloah 'elohei sefarim sefarvayim. vayihyu yerei'im 'et ihoh vaya'asu lahem miqzotam kohanei bamot vayihyu 'osim lahem bebet habamot. 'et ihoh hayu yerei'im ve'et 'eloheihem hayu 'obedim kemishpat hagoyim 'asher higlu 'otam misham. 'ad hayom hazeh hem 'osim kamishpatim harishonim 'einam yerei'im 'et ihoh ve'einam 'osim kekhuqotam ukhemishpatam vekhatorah vekhamizvah 'asher zivah ihoh 'et benei ya'aqob 'asher sam shemo yisra'el. vayikhrot ihoh 'itam berit vayzavem leimor lo tire'u 'elohim 'akheirim velo tishtakhavu lahem velo ta'abdum velo tizbekhu lahem. ki 'im 'et ihoh 'asher he'elah 'etkhem mei'erez mizrayim bekhoakh gadol ubizroa' netuyah 'oto tira'u velo tishtakhavu velo tizbakhu. ve'et hakhuqim ve'et hamishpatim vehatorah vehamizvah 'asher katab lakhem tishmerun la'asot kal hayamim velo tire'u 'elohim 'akheirim. vehaberit 'asher karati 'itekhem lo tishkakhu velo tire'u 'elohim 'akheirim. ki 'im 'et ihoh 'eloheikhem tira'u vehu yazil 'etkhem miyad kal 'oyebeikhem. velo shamei'u ki 'im kemishpatam harishon hem 'osim. vayihyu hagoyim ha'eleh yerei'im 'et ihoh ve'et pesileihem hayu 'obedim gam beneihem ubenei beneihem ka'asher 'asu 'abotam hem 'osim 'ad hayom hazeh. vayhi bishnat shalosh lehosheia' ben 'eilah melekh yisra'el malakh khizqiyah ben 'akhaz melekh yehudah. ben 'esrim vekhamesh shanah hayah bemalekho ve'esrim vateisha' shanah malakh birushalim veshem 'imo 'abi bat zekharyah. vaya'as hayashar be'einei ihoh kekhol 'asher 'asah david 'abiv. hu heisir 'et habamot veshibar 'et hamazeibot vekharat 'et ha'asheirah vekhitat nekhash hanekhoshet 'asher 'asah mosheh ki 'ad hayamim hahemah hayu benei yisra'el meqaterim lo vayiqra lo nekhushtan. ihoh 'elohei yisra'el batakh ve'akharav lo hayah khamohu bekhol malkhei yehudah va'asher hayu lefanav. vayidbaq ihoh lo sar mei'akharav vayishmor mizvotav 'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh. vehayah ihoh 'imo bekhol 'asher yeizei yaskil vayimrod bemelekh 'ashur velo 'abado. hu hikah 'et pelishtim 'ad 'azah ve'et gebuleha mimigdal nozrim 'ad 'ir mibzar. vayhi bashanah harebi'it lamelekh khizqiyahu hi hashanah hashebi'it lehosheia' ben 'eilah melekh yisra'el 'alah shalman'eser melekh 'ashur 'al shomeron vayazar 'aleha. vayilkeduha miqzeh shalosh shanim bishnat shesh lekhizqiyah hi shenat teisha' lehosheia' melekh yisra'el nilkedah shomeron. vayegel melekh 'ashur 'et yisra'el 'ashurah vayankhem bakhlakh ubekhabor nehar gozan ve'arei madai. 'al 'asher lo shame'u beqol ihoh 'eloheihem vaya'abru 'et berito 'et kal 'asher zivah mosheh 'ebed ihoh velo shame'u velo 'asu. ube'arba' 'esreh shanah lamelekh khizqiyah 'alah sankheirib melekh 'ashur 'al kal 'arei yehudah habezurot vayitpesem. vayishlakh khizqiyah melekh yehudah 'el melekh 'ashur lakhishah leimor khatati shub mei'alai 'et 'asher titen 'alai 'esa vayasem melekh 'ashur 'al khizqiyah melekh yehudah shelosh mei'ot kikar kesef usheloshim kikar zahab. vayiten khizqiyah 'et kal hakesef hanimza bet ihoh ube'ozerot bet hamelekh. ba'et hahi qizaz khizqiyah 'et daltot heikhal ihoh ve'et ha'omenot 'asher zipah khizqiyah melekh yehudah vayitenem lemelekh 'ashur. vayishlakh melekh 'ashur 'et tartan ve'et rab saris ve'et rab shaqeh min lakhish 'el hamelekh khizqiyahu bekhel kabed yerushalim vaya'alu vayabo'u yerushalim vaya'alu vayabo'u vaya'amdu bit'alat habereikhah ha'elyonah 'asher bimsilat sedeh khobes. vayiqre'u 'el hamelekh vayeizei 'aleihem 'elyaqim ben khilqiyahu 'asher 'al habayit veshebnah hasofer veyo'akh ben 'asaf hamazkir. vayomer 'aleihem rab shaqeh 'imru na 'el khizqiyahu koh 'amar hamelekh hagadol melekh 'ashur mah habitakhon hazeh 'asher batakheta. 'amarta 'akh debar sefatayim 'eizah ugeburah lamilkhamah 'atah 'al mi batakhta ki maradta bi. 'atah hineh batakhta lekha 'al mish'enet haqaneh harazuz hazeh 'al mizrayim 'asher yisamekh 'ish 'alav uba bekhapo uneqabah ken par'oh melekh mizrayim lekhal habotekhim 'alav. vekhi tomerun 'eilai 'el ihoh 'eloheinu batakhenu halo hu 'asher heisir khizqiyahu 'et bamotav ve'et mizbekhotav vayomer lihudah velirushalim lifnei hamizbeiakh hazeh tishtakhavu birushalim. ve'atah hit'areb na 'et 'adoni 'et melekh 'ashur ve'etenah lekha 'alpayim susim 'im tukhal latet lekha rokhebim 'aleihem. ve'ekh tashib 'et penei fakhat 'akhad 'abdei 'adoni haqetanim vatibtakh lekha 'al mizrayim lerekheb ulefarashim. 'atah hamibal'adei ihoh 'aliti 'al hamaqom hazeh lehashkhito ihoh 'amar 'eilai 'aleh 'al ha'arez hazot vehashkhitah. vayomer 'elyaqim ben khilqiyahu veshebnah veyo'akh 'el rab shaqeh daber na 'el 'abadekha 'aramit ki shome'im 'anakhenu ve'al tedaber 'imanu yehudit be'azenei ha'am 'asher 'al hakhomah. vayomer 'aleihem rab shaqeh ha'al 'adonekha ve'eilekha shelakhani 'adoni ledaber 'et hadebarim ha'eleh halo 'al ha'anashim hayoshebim 'al hakhomah le'ekhol 'et khareihem zo'atam velishtot 'et sheineihem meimei ragleihem 'imakhem. vaya'amod rab shaqeh vayiqra beqol gadol yehudit vaydaber vayomer shim'u debar hamelekh hagadol melekh 'ashur. koh 'amar hamelekh 'al yashi lakhem khizqiyahu ki lo yukhal lehazil 'etkhem miyado. ve'al yabtakh 'etkhem khizqiyahu 'el ihoh leimor hazel yazileinu ihoh velo tinaten 'et ha'ir hazot beyad melekh 'ashur. 'al tishme'u 'el khizqiyahu ki khoh 'amar melekh 'ashur 'asu 'iti berakhah uze'u 'eilai ve'ikhlu 'ish gafno ve'ish te'einato ushetu 'ish mei boro. 'ad bo'i velaqakhti 'etkhem 'el 'erez ke'arzekhem 'erez dagan vetirosh 'erez lekhem ukheramim 'erez zet yizhar udebash vikhyu velo tamutu ve'al tishme'u 'el khizqiyahu ki yasit 'etkhem leimor ihoh yazileinu. hahazel hizilu 'elohei hagoyim 'ish 'et 'arzo miyad melekh 'ashur. 'ayeh 'elohei khamat ve'arpad 'ayeh 'elohei sefarvayim heina' ve'ivah ki hizilu 'et shomeron miyadi. mi bekhal 'elohei ha'arazot 'asher hizilu 'et 'arzam miyadi ki yazil ihoh 'et yerushalim miyadi. vehekherishu ha'am velo 'anu 'oto dabar ki mizvat hamelekh hi leimor lo ta'anuhu. vayabo 'elyaqim ben khilqiyah 'asher 'al habayit veshebna hasofer veyo'akh ben 'asaf hamazkir 'el khizqiyahu qeru'ei begadim vayagidu lo dibrei rab shaqeh. vayhi kishmoa' hamelekh khizqiyahu vayiqra' 'et begadav vayitkas basaq vayabo bet ihoh. vayishlakh 'et 'elyaqim 'asher 'al habayit veshebna hasofer ve'et ziqnei hakohanim mitkasim basaqim 'el yesha'yahu hanabi ben 'amoz. vayomeru 'eilav koh 'amar khizqiyahu yom zarah vetokheikhah une'azah hayom hazeh ki ba'u banim 'ad mashber vekhoakh 'ayin leleidah. 'ulai yishma' ihoh 'elohekha 'et kal dibrei rab shaqeh 'asher shelakho melekh 'ashur 'adonav lekharef 'elohim khai vehokhiakh badebarim 'asher shama' ihoh 'elohekha venasata tefilah be'ad hashe'eirit hanimza'ah. vayabo'u 'abdei hamelekh khizqiyahu 'el yesha'ayahu. vayomer lahem yesha'yahu koh tomerun 'el 'adoneikhem koh 'amar ihoh 'al tira mipenei hadebarim 'asher shama'ta 'asher gidefu na'arei melekh 'ashur 'oti. hini noten bo ruakh veshama' shemu'ah veshab le'arzo vehipaltiv bakhereb be'arzo. vayashab rab shaqeh vayimza 'et melekh 'ashur nilkham 'al libnah ki shama' ki nasa' milakhish. vayishma' 'el tirhaqah melekh kush leimor hineh yaza lehilakhem 'itakh vayashab vayishlakh mal'akhim 'el khizqiyahu leimor. koh tomerun 'el khizqiyahu melekh yehudah leimor 'al yashi'akha 'elohekha 'asher 'atah boteiakh bo leimor lo tinaten yerushalim beyad melekh 'ashur. hineh 'atah shama'ta 'et 'asher 'asu malkhei 'ashur lekhal ha'arazot lehakharimam ve'atah tinazel. hahizilu 'otam 'elohei hagoyim 'asher shikhatu 'abotai 'et gozan ve'et kharan verezef ubenei 'eden 'asher bitlasar. 'ayo melekh khamat umelekh 'arpad umelekh la'ir sefarvayim heina' ve'ivah. vayiqakh khizqiyahu 'et hasefarim miyad hamal'akhim vayiqra'em vaya'al bet ihoh vayifreseihu khizqiyahu lifnei ihoh. vayitpalel khizqiyahu lifnei ihoh vayomar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el yosheb hakerubim 'atah hu ha'elohim lebadekha lekhol mamlekhot ha'arez 'atah 'asita 'et hashamayim ve'et ha'arez. hateh ihoh 'azenekha ushama' peqakh ihoh 'einekha ure'eh ushema' 'et dibrei sankheirib 'asher shelakho lekharef 'elohim khai. 'amenam ihoh hekheribu malkhei 'ashur 'et hagoyim ve'et 'arzam. venatenu 'et 'eloheihem ba'esh ki lo 'elohim hemah ki 'im ma'aseh yedei 'adam 'ez va'eben vai'abedum. ve'atah ihoh 'eloheinu hoshi'einu na miyado veyeide'u kal mamlekhot ha'arez ki 'atah ihoh 'elohim lebadekha. vayishlakh yesha'yahu ben 'amoz 'el khizqiyahu leimor koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el 'asher hitpalalta 'eilai 'el sankheirib melekh 'ashur shama'eti. zeh hadabar 'asher diber ihoh 'alav bazah lekha la'agah lekha betulat bat ziyon 'akharekha rosh heini'ah bat yerushalim. 'et mi kheirafta vegidafta ve'al mi harimota qol vatisa marom 'einekha 'al qedosh yisra'el. beyad mal'akhekha kheirafta 'adonai vatomer berekheb berob rikhbi 'ani 'aliti merom harim yarketei lebanon ve'ekhrot qomat 'arazav mibkhor beroshav ve'abo'ah melon qizoh ya'ar karmilo. 'ani qarti veshatiti mayim zarim ve'akhrib bekhaf pe'amai kol ye'orei mazor. halo shama'ta lemeirakhoq 'otah 'asiti lemimei qedem vizartiha 'atah habeitiha utehi lahshot galim nizim 'arim bezurot. veyoshebeihen qizrei yad khatu vayeiboshu hayu 'eiseb sadeh viraq deshe khazir gagot ushedeifah lifnei qamah. veshibtekha vezeitekha ubo'akha yada'eti ve'et hitragezkha 'eilai. ya'an hitragezkha 'eilai vesha'anankha 'alah be'azenai vesamti khakhi be'apekha umitgi bisfatekha vahashibotikha baderekh 'asher bata bah. vezeh lekha ha'ot 'akhol hashanah safiakh ubashanah hasheinit sakhish ubashanah hashelishit zir'u veqizru venit'u kheramim ve'ikhlu firyam. veyasefah peleitat bet yehudah hanish'arah shoresh lematah ve'asah feri lema'elah. ki mirushalim teizei she'eirit ufeleitah meihar ziyon qin'at ihoh zeba'ot ta'aseh zot. lakhen koh 'amar ihoh 'el melekh 'ashur lo yabo 'el ha'ir hazot velo yoreh sham khez velo yeqademenah magen velo yishpokh 'aleha solelah. baderekh 'asher yabo bah yashub ve'el ha'ir hazot lo yabo ne'um ihoh. veganoti 'el ha'ir hazot lehoshi'ah lema'ani ulema'an david 'abdi. vayhi balaylah hahu vayeizei mal'akh ihoh vayakh bemakhaneh 'ashur mei'ah shemonim vakhamishah 'alef vayashkimu baboqer vehineh khulam pegarim meitim. vayisa' vayeilekh vayashab sankheirib melekh 'ashur vayeisheb benineveh. vayhi hu mishtakhaveh bet nisrokh 'elohav ve'adramelekh vesar'ezer banav hikuhu bakhereb vehemah nimletu 'erez 'ararat vayimlokh 'eisar khadon beno takhtav. bayamim hahem khalah khizqiyahu lamut vayabo 'eilav yesha'yahu ben 'amoz hanabi vayomer 'eilav koh 'amar ihoh zav lebeitekha ki met 'atah velo tikhyeh. vayaseb 'et panav 'el haqir vayitpalel 'el ihoh leimor. 'anah ihoh zekhar na 'et 'asher hithalakhti lefanekha be'emet ubeleibab shalem vehatob be'einekha 'asiti vayeibek khizqiyahu bekhi gadol. vayhi yesha'yahu lo yaza ha'ir khazer hatikhonah udebar ihoh hayah 'eilav leimor. shub ve'amarta 'el khizqiyahu negid 'ami koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei david 'abikha shama'ti 'et tefilatekha ra'iti 'et dim'atekha hini rofe lakh bayom hashelishi ta'aleh bet ihoh. vehosafti 'al yamekha khamesh 'esreh shanah umikaf melekh 'ashur 'azilekha ve'et ha'ir hazot veganoti 'al ha'ir hazot lema'ani ulema'an david 'abdi. vayomer yesha'yahu qekhu debelet te'einim vayiqkhu vayasimu 'al hashekhin vayekhi. vayomer khizqiyahu 'el yesha'yahu mah 'ot ki yirpa ihoh li ve'aliti bayom hashelishi bet ihoh. vayomer yesha'yahu zeh lekha ha'ot mei'et ihoh ki ya'aseh ihoh 'et hadabar 'asher diber halakh hazel 'eser ma'alot 'im yashub 'eser ma'alot. vayomer yekhizqiyahu naqel lazel lintot 'eser ma'alot lo khi yashub hazel 'akhoranit 'eser ma'alot. vayiqra yesha'yahu hanabi 'el ihoh vayasheb 'et hazel bama'alot 'asher yaredah bema'alot 'akhaz 'akhoranit 'eser ma'alot. ba'et hahi shalakh berodakh bal'adan ben bal'adan melekh babel sefarim uminkhah 'el khizqiyahu ki shama' ki khalah khizqiyahu. vayishma' 'aleihem khizqiyahu vayar'em 'et kal bet nekhotoh 'et hakesef ve'et hazahab ve'et habesamim ve'et shemen hatob ve'et bet keilav ve'et kal 'asher nimza be'ozrotav lo hayah dabar 'asher lo her'am khizqiyahu bebeito ubekhal memshalto. vayabo yesha'yahu hanabi 'el hamelekh khizqiyahu vayomer 'eilav mah 'ameru ha'anashim ha'eleh umei'ayin yabo'u 'eilekha vayomer khizqiyahu mei'erez rekhoqah ba'u mibabel. vayomer mah ra'u bebeitekha vayomer khizqiyahu 'et kal 'asher bebeiti ra'u lo hayah dabar 'asher lo hir'itim be'ozerotai. vayomer yesha'yahu 'el khizqiyahu shema' debar ihoh. hineh yamim ba'im venisa kal 'asher bebeitekha va'asher 'azeru 'abotekha 'ad hayom hazeh babelah lo yivater dabar 'amar ihoh. umibanekha 'asher yeize'u mimekha 'asher tolid yiqakh yiqakhu vehayu sarisim beheikhal melekh babel. vayomer khizqiyahu 'el yesha'yahu tob debar ihoh 'asher dibarta vayomer halo 'im shalom ve'emet yihyeh beyamai. veyeter dibrei khizqiyahu vekhal geburato va'asher 'asah 'et habereikhah ve'et hate'alah vayabei 'et hamayim ha'irah halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. vayishkab khizqiyahu 'im 'abotav vayimlokh menasheh beno takhtav. ben shetem 'esreh shanah menasheh bemalekho vakhamishim vekhamesh shanah malakh birushalim veshem 'imo khefzi bah. vaya'as hara' be'einei ihoh keto'abot hagoyim 'asher horish ihoh mipenei benei yisra'el. vayashab vayiben 'et habamot 'asher 'ibad khizqiyahu 'abiv vayaqem mizbekhot laba'al vaya'as 'asheirah ka'asher 'asah 'akh'ab melekh yisra'el vayishtakhu lekhal zeba hashamayim vaya'abod 'otam. ubanah mizbekhot bebet ihoh 'asher 'amar ihoh birushalim 'asim 'et shemi. vayiben mizbekhot lekhal zeba hashamayim bishtei khazrot bet ihoh. vehe'ebir 'et beno ba'esh ve'onen venikhesh ve'asah 'ob veyide'onim hirbah la'asot hara' be'einei ihoh lehakh'is. vayasem 'et pesel ha'asheirah 'asher 'asah babayit 'asher 'amar ihoh 'el david ve'el shelomoh beno babayit hazeh ubirushalim 'asher bakharti mikol shibtei yisra'el 'asim 'et shemi le'olam. velo 'osif lehanid regel yisra'el min ha'adamah 'asher natati la'abotam raq 'im yishmeru la'asot kekhol 'asher zivitim ulekhal hatorah 'asher zivah 'otam 'abdi mosheh. velo shamei'u vayat'em menasheh la'asot 'et hara' min hagoyim 'asher hishmid ihoh mipenei benei yisra'el. vaydaber ihoh beyad 'abadav hanebi'im leimor. ya'an 'asher 'asah menasheh melekh yehudah hato'eibot ha'eleh heira' mikol 'asher 'asu ha'emori 'asher lefanav vayakhati gam 'et yehudah begilulav. lakhen koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el hini meibi ra'ah 'al yerushalim vihudah 'asher kal shome'av shome'ah tizalnah shetei 'azenav. venatiti 'al yerushalim 'et qav shomeron ve'et mishqolet bet 'akh'ab umakhiti 'et yerushalim ka'asher yimkheh 'et hazalakhat makhah vehafakh 'al paneha. venatashti 'et she'eirit nakhalati unetatim beyad 'oyebeihem vehayu lebaz velimshisah lekhal 'oyebeihem. ya'an 'asher 'asu 'et hara' be'einai vayihyu makh'isim 'oti min hayom 'asher yaze'u 'abotam mimizrayim ve'ad hayom hazeh. vegam dam naqi shafakh menasheh harbeh me'od 'ad 'asher milei 'et yerushalim peh lafeh lebad meikhatato 'asher hekheti 'et yehudah la'asot hara' be'einei ihoh. veyeter dibrei menasheh vekhal 'asher 'asah vekhatato 'asher khata halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. vayishkab menasheh 'im 'abotav vayiqaber began beito began 'uza vayimlokh 'amon beno takhtav. ben 'esrim ushetayim shanah 'amon bemalekho ushetayim shanim malakh birushalim veshem 'imo meshulemet bat kharuz min yatebah. vaya'as hara' be'einei ihoh ka'asher 'asah menasheh 'abiv. vayeilekh bekhal haderekh 'asher halakh 'abiv vaya'abod 'et hagilulim 'asher 'abad 'abiv vayishtakhu lahem. vaya'azob 'et ihoh 'elohei 'abotav velo halakh bederekh ihoh. vayiqsheru 'abdei 'amon 'alav vayamitu 'et hamelekh bebeito. vayakh 'am ha'arez 'et kal haqosherim 'al hamelekh 'amon vayamlikhu 'am ha'arez 'et yoshiyahu beno takhtav. veyeter dibrei 'amon 'asher 'asah halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. vayiqber 'oto biqburato began 'uza vayimlokh yoshiyahu beno takhtav. ben shemoneh shanah yoshiyahu bemalekho usheloshim ve'akhat shanah malakh birushalim veshem 'imo yedidah bat 'adayah mibazeqat. vaya'as hayashar be'einei ihoh vayeilekh bekhal derekh david 'abiv velo sar yamin usemol. vayhi bishmoneh 'esreh shanah lamelekh yoshiyahu shalakh hamelekh 'et shafan ben 'azalyahu ben meshulam hasofer bet ihoh leimor. 'aleh 'el khilqiyahu hakohen hagadol veyatem 'et hakesef hamuba bet ihoh 'asher 'asefu shomerei hasaf mei'et ha'am. veyitenoh veyitenuhu 'al yad 'osei hamelakhah hamufqadim bebet bet ihoh veyitenu 'oto le'osei hamelakhah 'asher bebet ihoh lekhazeq bedeq habayit. lekharashim velabonim velagoderim veliqnot 'eizim ve'abnei makhzeb lekhazeq 'et habayit. 'akh lo yeikhasheb 'itam hakesef hanitan 'al yadam ki be'emunah hem 'osim. vayomer khilqiyahu hakohen hagadol 'al shafan hasofer seifer hatorah mazati bebet ihoh vayiten khilqiyah 'et haseifer 'el shafan vayiqra'eihu. vayabo shafan hasofer 'el hamelekh vayasheb 'et hamelekh dabar vayomer hitikhu 'abadekha 'et hakesef hanimza babayit vayitenuhu 'al yad 'osei hamelakhah hamufqadim bet ihoh. vayaged shafan hasofer lamelekh leimor seifer natan li khilqiyah hakohen vayiqra'eihu shafan lifnei hamelekh. vayhi kishmoa' hamelekh 'et dibrei seifer hatorah vayiqra' 'et begadav. vayzav hamelekh 'et khilqiyah hakohen ve'et 'akhiqam benosha fan ve'et 'akhbor ben mikhayah ve'et shafan hasofer ve'et 'asayah 'ebed hamelekh leimor. lekhu dirshu 'et ihoh ba'adi ube'ad ha'am ube'ad kal yehudah 'al dibrei haseifer hanimza hazeh ki gedolah khamat ihoh 'asher hi nizetah banu 'al 'asher lo shame'u 'aboteinu 'al dibrei haseifer hazeh la'asot kekhal hakatub 'aleinu. vayeilekh khilqiyahu hakohen va'akhiqam ve'akhbor veshafan va'asayah 'el khuldah hanebi'ah 'eishet shalum ben tiqvah ben kharkhas shomer habegadim vehi yoshebet birushalim bamishneh vaydaberu 'eileha. vatomer 'aleihem koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el 'imru la'ish 'asher shalakh 'etkhem 'eilai. koh 'amar ihoh hini meibi ra'ah 'el hamaqom hazeh ve'al yoshebav 'et kal dibrei haseifer 'asher qara melekh yehudah. takhat 'asher 'azabuni vayqateru leilohim 'akheirim lema'an hakh'iseini bekhol ma'aseh yedeihem venizetah khamati bamaqom hazeh velo tikhbeh. ve'el melekh yehudah hasholeiakh 'etkhem lidrosh 'et ihoh koh tomeru 'eilav koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el hadebarim 'asher shama'eta. ya'an rakh lebabekha vatikana' mipenei ihoh beshame'akha 'asher dibarti 'al hamaqom hazeh ve'al yoshebav lihyot leshamah veliqlalah vatiqra' 'et begadekha vatibkeh lefanai vegam 'anokhi shama'ti ne'um ihoh. lakhen hini 'osifkha 'al 'abotekha vene'esafta 'el qibrotekha beshalom velo tir'enah 'einekha bekhol hara'ah 'asher 'ani meibi 'al hamaqom hazeh vayashibu 'et hamelekh dabar. vayishlakh hamelekh vaya'asfu 'eilav kal ziqnei yehudah virushalim. vaya'al hamelekh bet ihoh vekhal 'ish yehudah vekhal yoshebei yerushalim 'ito vehakohanim vehanebi'im vekhal ha'am lemiqaton ve'ad gadol vayiqra be'azeneihem 'et kal dibrei seifer haberit hanimza bebet ihoh. vaya'amod hamelekh 'al ha'amud vayikhrot 'et haberit lifnei ihoh lalekhet 'akhar ihoh velishmor mizvotav ve'et 'eidevotav ve'et khuqotav bekhal leb ubekhal nefesh lehaqim 'et dibrei haberit hazot haketubim 'al haseifer hazeh vaya'amod kal ha'am baberit. vayzav hamelekh 'et khilqiyahu hakohen hagadol ve'et kohanei hamishneh ve'et shomerei hasaf lehozi meiheikhal ihoh 'et kal hakeilim ha'asuyim laba'al vela'asheirah ulekhol zeba hashamayim vayisrefem mikhuz lirushalim beshadmot qidron venasa 'et 'afaram bet 'el. vehishbit 'et hakemarim 'asher natenu malkhei yehudah vayqater babamot be'arei yehudah umesibei yerushalim ve'et hamqaterim laba'al lashemesh velayareiakh velamazalot ulekhol zeba hashamayim. vayozei 'et ha'asheirah mibet ihoh mikhuz lirushalim 'el nakhal qidron vayisrof 'otah benakhal qidron vayadeq le'afar vayashlekh 'et 'afarah 'al qeber benei ha'am. vayitoz 'et batei haqedeishim 'asher bebet ihoh 'asher hanashim 'oregot sham batim la'asheirah. vayabei 'et kal hakohanim mei'arei yehudah vaytamei 'et habamot 'asher qiteru shamah hakohanim migeba' 'ad be'er shaba' venataz 'et bamot hashe'arim 'asher petakh sha'ar yehoshua' sar ha'ir 'asher 'al semol 'ish besha'ar ha'ir. 'akh lo ya'alu kohanei habamot 'el mizbakh ihoh birushalim ki 'im 'akhelu mazot betokh 'akheihem. vetimei 'et hatofet 'asher begei benei ben hinom lebilti leha'abir 'ish 'et beno ve'et bito ba'esh lamolekh. vayashbet 'et hasusim 'asher natenu malkhei yehudah lashemesh mibo bet ihoh 'el lishkat netan melekh hasaris 'asher baparvarim ve'et markebot hashemesh saraf ba'esh. ve'et hamizbekhot 'asher 'al hagag 'aliyat 'akhaz 'asher 'asu malkhei yehudah ve'et hamizbekhot 'asher 'asah menasheh bishtei khazrot bet ihoh nataz hamelekh vayaraz misham vehishlikh 'et 'afaram 'el nakhal qidron. ve'et habamot 'asher 'al penei yerushalim 'asher mimin lehar hamashkhit 'asher banah shelomoh melekh yisra'el le'ashtoret shiquz zidonim velikhmosh shiquz mo'ab ulemilkom to'abat benei 'amon timei hamelekh. veshibar 'et hamazeibot vayikhrot 'et ha'asheirim vaymalei 'et meqomam 'azmot 'adam. vegam 'et hamizbeiakh 'asher bebet 'el habamah 'asher 'asah yarabe'am ben nebat 'asher hekheti 'et yisra'el gam 'et hamizbeiakh hahu ve'et habamah nataz vayisrof 'et habamah heidaq le'afar vesaraf 'asheirah. vayifen yoshiyahu vayar 'et haqebarim 'asher sham bahar vayishlakh vayiqakh 'et ha'azamot min haqebarim vayisrof 'al hamizbeiakh vaytame'eihu kidbar ihoh 'asher qara 'ish ha'elohim 'asher qara 'et hadebarim ha'eleh. vayomer mah haziyun halaz 'asher 'ani ro'eh vayomeru 'eilav 'anshei ha'ir haqeber 'ish ha'elohim 'asher ba mihudah vayiqra 'et hadebarim ha'eleh 'asher 'asita 'al hamizbakh bet 'el. vayomer hanikhu lo 'ish 'al yana' 'azmotav vaymaletu 'azmotav 'et 'azmot hanabi 'asher ba mishomeron. vegam 'et kal batei habamot 'asher be'arei shomeron 'asher 'asu malkhei yisra'el lehakh'is heisir yoshiyahu vaya'as lahem kekhal hama'asim 'asher 'asah bebet 'el. vayizbakh 'et kal kohanei habamot 'asher sham 'al hamizbekhot vayisrof 'et 'azmot 'adam 'aleihem vayashab yerushalim. vayzav hamelekh 'et kal ha'am leimor 'asu fesakh ihoh 'eloheikhem kakatub 'al seifer haberit hazeh. ki lo na'asah kapesakh hazeh mimei hashofetim 'asher shafetu 'et yisra'el vekhol yemei malkhei yisra'el umalkhei yehudah. ki 'im bishmoneh 'esreh shanah lamelekh yoshiyahu na'asah hapesakh hazeh ihoh birushalim. vegam 'et ha'obot ve'et hayide'onim ve'et haterafim ve'et hagilulim ve'et kal hashiquzim 'asher nir'u be'erez yehudah ubirushalim bi'er yoshiyahu lema'an haqim 'et dibrei hatorah haketubim 'al haseifer 'asher maza khilqiyahu hakohen bet ihoh. vekhamohu lo hayah lefanav melekh 'asher shab 'el ihoh bekhal lebabo ubekhal nafsho ubekhal me'odo kekhol torat mosheh ve'akharav lo qam kamohu. 'akh lo shab ihoh meikharon 'apo hagadol 'asher kharah 'apo bihudah 'al kal hake'asim 'asher hikh'iso menasheh. vayomer ihoh gam 'et yehudah 'asir mei'al panai ka'asher hasiroti 'et yisra'el uma'asti 'et ha'ir hazot 'asher bakharti 'et yerushalim ve'et habayit 'asher 'amarti yihyeh shemi sham. veyeter dibrei yoshiyahu vekhal 'asher 'asah halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. beyamav 'alah far'oh nekhoh melekh mizrayim 'al melekh 'ashur 'al nehar perat vayeilekh hamelekh yoshiyahu liqrato vaymiteihu bimgido kir'oto 'oto. vayarkibuhu 'abadav met mimegido vaybi'uhu yerushalim vayiqberuhu biqburato vayiqakh 'am ha'arez 'et yeho'akhaz ben yoshiyahu vayimshekhu 'oto vayamlikhu 'oto takhat 'abiv. ben 'esrim veshalosh shanah yeho'akhaz bemalekho usheloshah khodashim malakh birushalim veshem 'imo khamutal bat yirmeyahu milibnah. vaya'as hara' be'einei ihoh kekhol 'asher 'asu 'abotav. vaya'asreihu far'oh nekhoh beriblah be'erez khamat bimlokh mimelokh birushalim vayiten 'onesh 'al ha'arez mei'ah khikar kesef vekhikar zahab. vayamlekh par'oh nekhoh 'et 'elyaqim ben yoshiyahu takhat yoshiyahu 'abiv vayaseb 'et shemo yehoyaqim ve'et yeho'akhaz laqakh vayabo mizrayim vayamat sham. vehakesef vehazahab natan yehoyaqim lefar'oh 'akh he'erikh 'et ha'arez latet 'et hakesef 'al pi far'oh 'ish ke'erko nagas 'et hakesef ve'et hazahab 'et 'am ha'arez latet lefar'oh nekhoh. ben 'esrim vekhamesh shanah yehoyaqim bemalekho ve'akhat 'esreh shanah malakh birushalim veshem 'imo zebidah zebudah bat pedayah min rumah. vaya'as hara' be'einei ihoh kekhol 'asher 'asu 'abotav. beyamav 'alah nebukhadnezar melekh babel vayhi lo yehoyaqim 'ebed shalosh shanim vayashab vayimrad bo. vayshalakh ihoh bo 'et gedudei khasdim ve'et gedudei 'aram ve'et gedudei mo'ab ve'et gedudei benei 'amon vayshalekhem bihudah leha'abido kidbar ihoh 'asher diber beyad 'abadav hanebi'im. 'akh 'al pi ihoh hayetah bihudah lehasir mei'al panav bekhatot menasheh kekhol 'asher 'asah. vegam dam hanaqi 'asher shafakh vaymalei 'et yerushalim dam naqi velo 'abah ihoh lisloakh. veyeter dibrei yehoyaqim vekhal 'asher 'asah halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. vayishkab yehoyaqim 'im 'abotav vayimlokh yehoyakhin beno takhtav. velo hosif 'od melekh mizrayim lazet mei'arzo ki laqakh melekh babel minakhal mizrayim 'ad nehar perat kol 'asher hayetah lemelekh mizrayim. ben shemoneh 'esreh shanah yehoyakhin bemalekho usheloshah khodashim malakh birushalim veshem 'imo nekhushta bat 'elnatan mirushalim. vaya'as hara' be'einei ihoh kekhol 'asher 'asah 'abiv. ba'et hahi 'alah 'alu 'abdei nebukhadnezar melekh babel yerushalim vatabo ha'ir bamazor. vayabo nebukhadnezar melekh babel 'al ha'ir va'abadav zarim 'aleha. vayeizei yehoyakhin melekh yehudah 'al melekh babel hu ve'imo va'abadav vesarav vesarisav vayiqakh 'oto melekh babel bishnat shemoneh lemalekho. vayozei misham 'et kal 'ozrot bet ihoh ve'ozrot bet hamelekh vayqazez 'et kal kelei hazahab 'asher 'asah shelomoh melekh yisra'el beheikhal ihoh ka'asher diber ihoh. vehiglah 'et kal yerushalim ve'et kal hasarim ve'et kal giborei hakhayil 'asarah 'aseret 'alafim goleh vekhal hekharash vehamasger lo nish'ar zulat dalat 'am ha'arez. vayegel 'et yehoyakhin babelah ve'et 'em hamelekh ve'et neshei hamelekh ve'et sarisav ve'et 'evilei 'eilei ha'arez holikh golah mirushalim babelah. ve'et kal 'anshei hakhayil shib'at 'alafim vehekharash vehamasger 'elef hakol giborim 'osei milkhamah vaybi'em melekh babel golah babelah. vayamlekh melekh babel 'et matanyah dodo takhtav vayaseb 'et shemo zidqiyahu. ben 'esrim ve'akhat shanah zidqiyahu bemalekho ve'akhat 'esreh shanah malakh birushalim veshem 'imo khamital khamutal bat yirmeyahu milibnah. vaya'as hara' be'einei ihoh kekhol 'asher 'asah yehoyaqim. ki 'al 'af ihoh hayetah birushalim ubihudah 'ad hishlikho 'otam mei'al panav vayimrod zidqiyahu bemelekh babel. vayhi bishnat hateshi'it lemalekho bakhodesh ha'asiri be'asor lakhodesh ba nebukhadnezar melekh babel hu vekhal kheilo 'al yerushalim vayikhan 'aleha vayibnu 'aleha dayeq sabib. vatabo ha'ir bamazor 'ad 'ashtei 'esreh shanah lamelekh zidqiyahu. betish'ah lakhodesh vayekhezaq hara'ab ba'ir velo hayah lekhem le'am ha'arez. vatibaqa' ha'ir vekhal 'anshei hamilkhamah halaylah derekh sha'ar ben hakhomotayim 'asher 'al gan hamelekh vekhasdim 'al ha'ir sabib vayeilekh derekh ha'arabah. vayirdefu khel kasdim 'akhar hamelekh vayasigu 'oto be'arbot yereikho vekhal kheilo nafozu mei'alav. vayitpesu 'et hamelekh vaya'alu 'oto 'el melekh babel riblatah vaydaberu 'ito mishpat. ve'et benei zidqiyahu shakhatu le'einav ve'et 'einei zidqiyahu 'iver vaya'asreihu bankhushtayim vaybi'eihu babel. ubakhodesh hakhamishi beshib'ah lakhodesh hi shenat tesha' 'esreh shanah lamelekh nebukhadnezar melekh babel ba nebuzar'adan rab tabakhim 'ebed melekh babel yerushalim. vayisrof 'et bet ihoh ve'et bet hamelekh ve'et kal batei yerushalim ve'et kal bet gadol saraf ba'esh. ve'et khomot yerushalim sabib natezu kal khel kasdim 'asher rab tabakhim. ve'et yeter ha'am hanish'arim ba'ir ve'et hanofelim 'asher nafelu 'al hamelekh babel ve'et yeter hehamon heglah nebuzar'adan rab tabakhim. umidalat ha'arez hish'ir rab tabakhim lekhoremim uleyogebim. ve'et 'amudei hanekhoshet 'asher bet ihoh ve'et hamekhonot ve'et yam hanekhoshet 'asher bebet ihoh shiberu khasdim vayis'u 'et nekhushtam babelah. ve'et hasirot ve'et haya'im ve'et hamzamerot ve'et hakapot ve'et kal kelei hanekhoshet 'asher yesharetu bam laqakhu. ve'et hamakhtot ve'et hamizraqot 'asher zahab zahab va'asher kesef kasef laqakh rab tabakhim. ha'amudim shenayim hayam ha'ekhad vehamekhonot 'asher 'asah shelomoh lebet ihoh lo hayah mishqal linkhoshet kal hakeilim ha'eleh. shemoneh 'esreh 'amah qomat ha'amud ha'ekhad vekhoteret 'alav nekhoshet veqomat hakoteret shalosh 'amah 'amot usebakhah verimonim 'al hakoteret sabib hakol nekhoshet vekha'eleh la'amud hasheini 'al hasebakhah. vayiqakh rab tabakhim 'et serayah kohen harosh ve'et zefanyahu kohen mishneh ve'et sheloshet shomerei hasaf. umin ha'ir laqakh saris 'ekhad 'asher hu faqid 'al 'anshei hamilkhamah vakhamishah 'anashim meiro'ei fenei hamelekh 'asher nimze'u ba'ir ve'et hasofer sar hazaba hamazbi 'et 'am ha'arez veshishim 'ish mei'am ha'arez hanimze'im ba'ir. vayiqakh 'otam nebuzar'adan rab tabakhim vayolekh 'otam 'al melekh babel riblatah. vayakh 'otam melekh babel vaymitem beriblah be'erez khamat vayigel yehudah mei'al 'admato. veha'am hanish'ar be'erez yehudah 'asher hish'ir nebukhadnezar melekh babel vayafqed 'aleihem 'et gedalyahu ben 'akhiqam ben shafan. vayishme'u khal sarei hakhayalim hemah veha'anashim ki hifqid melekh babel 'et gedalyahu vayabo'u 'el gedalyahu hamizpah veyishma'el ben netanyah veyokhanan ben qareiakh userayah ben tankhumet hanetofati veya'azanyahu ben hama'akhati hemah ve'ansheihem. vayishaba' lahem gedalyahu ule'ansheihem vayomer lahem 'al tire'u mei'abdei hakasdim shebu ba'arez ve'ibdu 'et melekh babel veyitab lakhem. vayhi bakhodesh hashebi'i ba yishma'el ben netanyah ben 'elishama' mizera' hamelukhah va'asarah 'anashim 'ito vayaku 'et gedalyahu vayamot ve'et hayehudim ve'et hakasdim 'asher hayu 'ito bamizpah. vayaqumu khal ha'am miqaton ve'ad gadol vesarei hakhayalim vayabo'u mizrayim ki yare'u mipenei khasdim. vayhi bishloshim vasheba' shanah legalut yehoyakhin melekh yehudah bishnem 'asar khodesh be'esrim veshib'ah lakhodesh nasa 'evil merodakh melekh babel bishnat malekho 'et rosh yehoyakhin melekh yehudah mibet kele. vaydaber 'ito tobot vayiten 'et kis'o mei'al kisei hamelakhim 'asher 'ito bebabel. veshina 'et bigdei khil'o ve'akhal lekhem tamid lefanav kal yemei khayav. va'arukhato 'arukhat tamid nitenah lo mei'et hamelekh debar yom beyomo kol yemei khayav.

khazon yesha'yahu ben 'amoz 'asher khazah 'al yehudah virushalim bimei 'uziyahu yotam 'akhaz yekhizqiyahu malkhei yehudah. shim'u shamayim veha'azini 'erez ki ihoh diber banim gidalti veromamti vehem pashe'u bi. yada' shor qoneihu vakhamor 'eibus be'alav yisra'el lo yada' 'ami lo hitbonan. ho go khotei 'am kebed 'avon zera' merei'im banim mashkhitim 'azebu 'et ihoh ni'azu 'et qedosh yisra'el nazoru 'akhor. 'al meh tuku 'od tosifu sarah kal rosh lakholi vekhal leibab davai. mikaf regel ve'ad rosh 'en bo metom peza' vekhaburah umakah teriyah lo zoru velo khubashu velo rukekhah bashamen. 'arzekhem shemamah 'areikhem serufot 'esh 'admatkhem lenegdekhem zarim 'okhelim 'otah ushemamah kemahpeikhat zarim. venotrah bat ziyon kesukah bekharem kimlunah bemiqshah ke'ir nezurah. lulei ihoh zeba'ot hotir lanu sarid kim'at kisdom hayinu la'amorah daminu. shim'u debar ihoh qezinei sedom ha'azinu torat 'eloheinu 'am 'amorah. lamah li rob zibkheikhem yomar ihoh saba'ti 'olot 'eilim vekheileb meri'im vedam parim ukhebasim ve'atudim lo khafazeti. ki tabo'u leira'ot panai mi biqesh zot miyedkhem remos khazeirai. lo tosifu habi minkhat shav qetoret to'eibah hi li khodesh veshabat qero miqra lo 'ukhal 'aven va'azarah. khadesheikhem umo'adeikhem sane'ah nafshi hayu 'alai latorakh nil'eiti neso. ubefariskhem kapeikhem 'a'lim 'einai mikem gam ki tarbu tefilah 'eineni shomeia' yedeikhem damim malei'u. rakhazu hizaku hasiru roa' ma'aleikhem mineged 'einai khidlu hareia'. limdu heiteb dirshu mishpat 'asheru khamoz shiftu yatom ribu 'almanah. lekhu na venivakhekhah yomar ihoh 'im yihyu khata'eikhem kashanim kasheleg yalbinu 'im ya'dimu khatola' kazemer yihyu. 'im tobu ushema'tem tub ha'arez tokheilu. ve'im tema'anu umeritem khereb te'ukelu ki pi ihoh diber. 'eikhah hayetah lezonah qiryah ne'emanah melei'ati mishpat zedeq yalin bah ve'atah merazekhim. kaspekh hayah lesigim sabe'ekh mahul bamayim. sarayikh sorrim vekhabrei ganabim kulo 'oheb shokhad verodef shalmonim yatom lo yishpotu verib 'almanah lo yabo 'aleihem. lakhen ne'um ha'adon ihoh zeba'ot 'abir yisra'el ho 'enakhem mizarai ve'inaqemah mei'oybai. ve'ashibah yadi 'alayikh ve'ezrof kabor sigayikh ve'asirah kal bedilayikh. ve'ashibah shofetayikh kebarishonah veyo'azayikh kebatekhilah 'akharei khen yiqarei lakh 'ir hazedeq qiryah ne'emanah. ziyon bemishpat tipadeh veshabeha bizdaqah. vesheber poshe'im vekhata'im yakhdav ve'ozebei ihoh yikhlu. ki yeiboshu mei'eilim 'asher khamadtem vetakhperu meihaganot 'asher bekhartem. ki tihyu ke'eilah nobelet 'aleha ukheganah 'asher mayim 'en lah. vehayah hekhason lin'oret ufo'alo lenizoz uba'aru sheneihem yakhdav ve'en mekhabeh. hadabar 'asher khazah yesha'yahu ben 'amoz 'al yehudah virushalim. vehayah be'akharit hayamim nakhon yihyeh har bet ihoh berosh heharim venisa migeba'ot venaharu 'eilav kal hagoyim. vehalekhu 'amim rabim ve'ameru lekhu vena'aleh 'el har ihoh 'el bet 'elohei ya'aqob veyoreinu miderakhav veneilekhah be'orekhotav ki miziyon teizei torah udebar ihoh mirushalim. veshafat ben hagoyim vehokhiakh le'amim rabim vekhitetu kharbotam le'itim vakhanitoteihem lemazmeirot lo yisa go 'el go khereb velo yilmedu 'od milkhamah. bet ya'aqob lekhu veneilekhah be'or ihoh. ki natashtah 'amekha bet ya'aqob ki male'u miqedem ve'onenim kapelishtim ubeyaldei nakherim yaspiqu. vatimalei 'arzo kesef vezahab ve'en qeizeh le'ozerotav vatimalei 'arzo susim ve'en qeizeh lemarkebotav. vatimalei 'arzo 'elilim lema'aseh yadav yishtakhavu la'asher 'asu 'ezbe'otav. vayishakh 'adam vayishpal 'ish ve'al tisa lahem. bo bazur vehitamen be'afar mipenei pakhad ihoh umeihadar ge'ono. 'einei gabhut 'adam shafel veshakh rum 'anashim venisgab ihoh lebado bayom hahu. ki yom ihoh zeba'ot 'al kal gei'eh varam ve'al kal nisa veshafel. ve'al kal 'arzei halebanon haramim vehanisa'im ve'al kal 'alonei habashan. ve'al kal heharim haramim ve'al kal hageba'ot hanisa'ot. ve'al kal migdal gaboha ve'al kal khomah bezurah. ve'al kal 'oniyot tarshish ve'al kal sekhiyot hakhemdah. veshakh gabhut ha'adam veshafel rum 'anashim venisgab ihoh lebado bayom hahu. veha'elilim kalil yakhalof. uba'u bim'arot zurim ubimkhilot 'afar mipenei pakhad ihoh umeihadar ge'ono bequmo la'aroz ha'arez. bayom hahu yashlikh ha'adam 'et 'elilei khaspo ve'et 'elilei zehabo 'asher 'asu lo lehishtakhavot lakhpor peirot vela'ataleifim. labo beniqrot hazurim ubis'ifei hasela'im mipenei pakhad ihoh umeihadar ge'ono bequmo la'aroz ha'arez. khidlu lakhem min ha'adam 'asher neshamah be'apo ki bameh nekhshab hu. ki hineh ha'adon ihoh zeba'ot meisir mirushalim umihudah mash'en umash'einah kol mish'an lekhem vekhol mish'an mayim. gibor ve'ish milkhamah shofet venabi veqosem vezaqen. sar khamishim unesu fanim veyo'ez vakhakham kharashim unebon lakhash. venatati ne'arim sareihem veta'alulim yimshelu bam. venigas ha'am 'ish be'ish ve'ish berei'eihu yirhabu hana'ar bazaqen vehaniqleh banikhbad. ki yitpos 'ish be'akhiv bet 'abiv simlah lekhah qazin tihyeh lanu vehamakhsheilah hazot takhat yadekha. yisa bayom hahu leimor lo 'ehyeh khobesh ubebeiti 'en lekhem ve'en simlah lo tesimuni qezin 'am. ki khashelah yerushalim vihudah nafal ki leshonam uma'aleihem 'el ihoh lamrot 'einei khebodo. hakarat peneihem 'anetah bam vekhatatam kisdom higidu lo khikheidu 'o lenafsham ki gamelu lahem ra'ah. 'imru zadiq ki tob ki feri ma'aleihem yokheilu. 'o lerasha' ra' ki gemul yadav yei'aseh lo. 'ami nogesav me'olel venashim mashelu bo 'ami me'asherekha mat'im vederekh 'orekhotekha bilei'u. nizab larib ihoh ve'omed ladin 'amim. ihoh bemishpat yabo 'im ziqnei 'amo vesarav ve'atem bi'artem hakerem gezeilat he'ani bebateikhem. malakhem mah lakhem tedake'u 'ami ufenei 'aniyim titkhanu ne'um 'adonai ihoh zeba'ot. vayomer ihoh ya'an ki gabehu benot ziyon vateilakhnah netvot netuyot garon umesaqerot 'einayim halokh vetafof teilakhnah uberagleihem te'akasnah. vesipakh 'adonai qadeqod benot ziyon ihoh patehen ye'areh. bayom hahu yasir 'adonai 'et tif'eret ha'akhasim vehashebisim vehasaharonim. hanetifot vehasheirot vehare'alot. hape'eirim vehaze'adot vehaqishurim ubatei hanefesh vehalekhashim. hataba'ot venizmei ha'af. hamakhalazot vehama'atafot vehamitpakhot vehakharitim. vehagilyonim vehasedinim vehazenifot veharedidim. vehayah takhat bosem maq yihyeh vetakhat khagorah niqpah vetakhat ma'aseh miqsheh qarekhah vetakhat petigil makhagoret saq ki takhat yofi. metayikh bakhereb yipolu ugeburatekh bamilkhamah. ve'anu ve'abelu petakheha veniqatah la'arez teisheb. vehekheziqu sheba' nashim be'ish 'ekhad bayom hahu leimor lakhmeinu nokhel vesimlateinu nilbash raq yiqarei shimkha 'aleinu 'esof kherpateinu. bayom hahu yihyeh zemakh ihoh lizbi ulekhabod uferi ha'arez lega'on uletif'eret lifleitat yisra'el. vehayah hanish'ar beziyon vehanotar birushalim qadosh yei'amer lo kal hakatub lakhayim birushalim. 'im rakhaz 'adonai 'et zo'at benot ziyon ve'et demei yerushalim yadiakh miqirbah beruakh mishpat uberuakh ba'er. ubara ihoh 'al kal mekhon har ziyon ve'al miqra'eha 'anan yomam ve'ashan venogah 'esh lehabah layelah ki 'al kal kabod khupah. vesukah tihyeh lezel yomam meikhoreb ulemakhseh ulemistor mizerem umimatar. 'ashirah na lididi shirat dodi lekharmo kerem hayah lididi beqeren ben shamen. vai'azeqeihu vaysaqeleihu vayita'eihu soreq vayiben migdal betokho vegam yeqeb khazeb bo vayqav la'asot 'anabim vaya'as be'ushim. ve'atah yosheb yerushalim ve'ish yehudah shiftu na beini uben karmi. mah la'asot 'od lekharmi velo 'asiti bo madua' qiveiti la'asot 'anabim vaya'as be'ushim. ve'atah 'odi'ah na 'etkhem 'et 'asher 'ani 'oseh lekharmi haser mesukato vehayah leba'er paroz gedeiro vehayah lemirmas. va'ashiteihu batah lo yizamer velo yei'ader ve'alah shamir vashayit ve'al he'abim 'azaveh meihamtir 'alav matar. ki kherem ihoh zeba'ot bet yisra'el ve'ish yehudah neta' sha'ashu'av vayqav lemishpat vehineh mispakh lizdaqah vehineh ze'aqah. ho magi'ei bayit bebayit sadeh besadeh yaqribu 'ad 'efes maqom vehushabtem lebadekhem beqereb ha'arez. be'azenai ihoh zeba'ot 'im lo batim rabim leshamah yihyu gedolim vetobim mei'en yosheb. ki 'aseret zimdei kherem ya'asu bat 'ekhat vezera' khomer ya'aseh 'eifah. ho mashkimei baboqer sheikhar yirdofu me'akharei baneshef yayin yadliqem. vehayah khinor vanebel tof vekhalil vayayin mishteihem ve'et po'al ihoh lo yabitu uma'aseh yadav lo ra'u. lakhen galah 'ami mibeli da'at ukhebodo metei ra'ab vahamono zikheh zama. lakhen hirkhibah she'ol nafshah ufa'arah fiha libli khoq veyarad hadarah vahamonah ushe'onah ve'alez bah. vayishakh 'adam vayishpal 'ish ve'einei gebohim tishpalnah. vayigbah ihoh zeba'ot bamishpat veha'el haqadosh niqdash bizdaqah. vera'u khebasim kedaberam vekharebot meikhim garim yokheilu. ho moshekhei he'avon bekhablei hashav vekha'abot ha'agalah khata'ah. ha'omerim yemaher yakhishah ma'aseihu lema'an nir'eh vetiqrab vetabo'ah 'azat qedosh yisra'el veneida'ah. ho ha'omerim lara' tob velatob ra' samim khoshekh le'or ve'or lekhoshekh samim mar lematoq umatoq lemar. ho khakhamim be'eineihem veneged peneihem nebonim. ho giborim lishtot yayin ve'anshei khayil limsokh sheikhar. mazdiqei rasha' 'eiqeb shokhad vezidqat zadiqim yasiru mimenu. lakhen ke'ekhol qash leshon 'esh vakhashash lehabah yirpeh sharesham kamaq yihyeh ufirkham ka'abaq ya'aleh ki ma'asu 'et torat ihoh zeba'ot ve'et 'imrat qedosh yisra'el ni'eizu. 'al ken kharah 'af ihoh be'amo vayet yado 'alav vayakeihu vayirgezu heharim vatehi niblatam kasukhah beqereb khuzot bekhal zot lo shab 'apo ve'od yado netuyah. venasa nes lagoyim meirakhoq vesharaq lo miqzeh ha'arez vehineh meheirah qal yabo. 'en 'ayef ve'en koshel bo lo yanum velo yishan velo niftakh 'eizor khalazav velo nitaq serokh ne'alav. 'asher khizav shenunim vekhal qashetotav derukhot parsot susav kazar nekhshabu vegalgilav kasufah. she'agah lo kalabi vesha'ag yish'ag kakefirim veyinhom veyokhez teref veyaflit ve'en mazil. veyinhom 'alav bayom hahu kenahamat yam venibat la'arez vehineh khoshekh zar va'or khashakh ba'arifeha. bishnat mot hamelekh 'uziyahu va'er'eh 'et 'adonai yosheb 'al kisei ram venisa veshulav melei'im 'et haheikhal. serafim 'omedim mima'al lo shesh kenafayim shesh kenafayim le'ekhad bishtayim yekhaseh fanav ubishtayim yekhaseh raglav ubishtayim ye'ofef. veqara zeh 'el zeh ve'amar qadosh qadosh qadosh ihoh zeba'ot melo khal ha'arez kebodo. vayanu'u 'amot hasipim miqol haqorei vehabayit yimalei 'ashan. va'omar 'o li khi nidmeiti ki 'ish temei sefatayim 'anokhi ubetokh 'am temei sefatayim 'anokhi yosheb ki 'et hamelekh ihoh zeba'ot ra'u 'einai. vaya'af 'eilai 'ekhad min haserafim ubeyado rizpah bemelqakhayim laqakh mei'al hamizbeiakh. vayaga' 'al pi vayomer hineh naga' zeh 'al sefatekha vesar 'avonekha vekhatatekha tekhupar. va'eshma' 'et qol 'adonai 'omer 'et mi 'eshlakh umi yeilekh lanu va'omar hini shelakheini. vayomer lekh ve'amarta la'am hazeh shim'u shamoa' ve'al tabinu ure'u ra'o ve'al teida'u. hashmen leb ha'am hazeh ve'azenav hakhbed ve'einav hasha' pen yir'eh be'einav ube'azenav yishma' ulebabo yabin vashab verafa lo. va'omar 'ad matai 'adonai vayomer 'ad 'asher 'im sha'u 'arim mei'en yosheb ubatim mei'en 'adam veha'adamah tisha'eh shemamah. verikhaq ihoh 'et ha'adam verabah ha'azubah beqereb ha'arez. ve'od bah 'asiriyah veshabah vehayetah leba'er ka'eilah vekha'alon 'asher beshalekhet mazebet bam zera' qodesh mazabtah. vayhi bimei 'akhaz ben yotam ben 'uziyahu melekh yehudah 'alah rezin melekh 'aram ufeqakh ben remalyahu melekh yisra'el yerushalim lamilkhamah 'aleha velo yakhol lehilakhem 'aleha. vayugad lebet david leimor nakhah 'aram 'al 'efrayim vayana' lebabo ulebab 'amo kenoa' 'azei ya'ar mipenei ruakh. vayomer ihoh 'el yesha'yahu zei na liqrat 'akhaz 'atah ushe'ar yashub benekha 'el qezeh te'alat habereikhah ha'elyonah 'el mesilat sedeh khobes. ve'amarta 'eilav hishamer vehashqet 'al tira ulebabekha 'al yeirakh mishenei zanbot ha'udim ha'asheinim ha'eleh bakhori 'af rezin va'aram uben remalyahu. ya'an ki ya'az 'alekha 'aram ra'ah 'efrayim uben remalyahu leimor. na'aleh bihudah uneqizenah venabqi'enah 'eileinu venamlikh melekh betokhah 'et ben tabe'al. koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh lo taqum velo tihyeh. ki rosh 'aram dameseq verosh dameseq rezin ube'od shishim vekhamesh shanah yeikhat 'efrayim mei'am. verosh 'efrayim shomeron verosh shomeron ben remalyahu 'im lo ta'aminu ki lo tei'ameinu. vayosef ihoh daber 'el 'akhaz leimor. she'al lekha 'ot mei'im ihoh 'elohekha ha'meq she'alah 'o hagbeiah lema'elah. vayomer 'akhaz lo 'esh'al velo 'anaseh 'et ihoh. vayomer shim'u na bet david ham'at mikem hal'ot 'anashim ki tal'u gam 'et 'elohai. lakhen yiten 'adonai hu lakhem 'ot hineh ha'almah harah veyoledet ben veqarat shemo 'imanu 'el. khem'ah udebash yokhel leda'to ma'os bara' ubakhor batob. ki beterem yeida' hana'ar ma'os bara' ubakhor batob tei'azeb ha'adamah 'asher 'atah qaz mipenei shenei melakheha. yabi ihoh 'alekha ve'al 'amekha ve'al bet 'abikha yamim 'asher lo ba'u lemiyom sur 'efrayim mei'al yehudah 'et melekh 'ashur. vehayah bayom hahu yishroq ihoh lazebub 'asher biqzeh ye'orei mizrayim veladeborah 'asher be'erez 'ashur. uba'u venakhu khulam benakhalei habatot ubinqiqei hasela'im ubekhol hana'azuzim ubekhol hanahalolim. bayom hahu yegalakh 'adonai beta'ar hasekhirah be'ebrei nahar bemelekh 'ashur 'et harosh vesa'ar haraglayim vegam 'et hazaqan tispeh. vehayah bayom hahu yekhayeh 'ish 'eglat baqar ushetei zon. vehayah meirob 'asot khalab yokhal khem'ah ki khem'ah udebash yokhel kal hanotar beqereb ha'arez. vehayah bayom hahu yihyeh khal maqom 'asher yihyeh sham 'elef gefen be'elef kasef lashamir velashayit yihyeh. bakhizim ubaqeshet yabo shamah ki shamir vashayit tihyeh khal ha'arez. vekhol heharim 'asher bama'der yei'adeirun lo tabo shamah yir'at shamir vashayit vehayah lemishlakh shor ulemirmas seh. vayomer ihoh 'eilai qakh lekha gilayon gadol ukhetob 'alav bekheret 'enosh lemaher shalal khash baz. ve'a'idah li 'eidim ne'emanim 'et 'uriyah hakohen ve'et zekharyahu ben yeberekhyahu. va'eqrab 'el hanebi'ah vatahar vateiled ben vayomer ihoh 'eilai qera shemo maher shalal khash baz. ki beterem yeida' hana'ar qero 'abi ve'imi yisa 'et khel dameseq ve'et shelal shomeron lifnei melekh 'ashur. vayosef ihoh daber 'eilai 'od leimor. ya'an ki ma'as ha'am hazeh 'et mei hashiloakh haholekhim le'at umesos 'et rezin uben remalyahu. velakhen hineh 'adonai ma'aleh 'aleihem 'et mei hanahar ha'azumim veharabim 'et melekh 'ashur ve'et kal kebodo ve'alah 'al kal 'afiqav vehalakh 'al kal gedotav. vekhalaf bihudah shataf ve'abar 'ad zavar yagia' vehayah mutot kenafav melo rokhab 'arzekha 'imanu 'el. ro'u 'amim vakhotu veha'azinu kol merkhaqei 'arez hit'azeru vakhotu hit'azeru vakhotu. 'uzu 'eizah vetufar daberu dabar velo yaqum ki 'imanu 'el. ki khoh 'amar ihoh 'eilai kekhezqat hayad veyisereini milekhet bederekh ha'am hazeh leimor. lo tomerun qesher lekhol 'asher yomar ha'am hazeh qasher ve'et mora'o lo tire'u velo ta'arizu. 'et ihoh zeba'ot 'oto taqdishu vehu mora'akhem vehu ma'arizkhem. vehayah lemiqdash ule'eben negef ulezur mikhshol lishnei batei yisra'el lefakh ulemoqesh leyosheb yerushalim. vekhashelu bam rabim venafelu venishbaru venoqshu venilkadu. zor te'udah khatom torah belimudai. vekhikiti ihoh hamastir panav mibet ya'aqob veqiveiti lo. hineh 'anokhi vehayladim 'asher natan li ihoh le'otot ulemoftim beyisra'el mei'im ihoh zeba'ot hashokhen behar ziyon. vekhi yomeru 'aleikhem dirshu 'el ha'obot ve'el hayide'onim hamzafzefim vehamahgim halo 'am 'el 'elohav yidrosh be'ad hakhayim 'el hameitim. letorah velit'udah 'im lo yomeru kadabar hazeh 'asher 'en lo shakhar. ve'abar bah niqsheh vera'eb vehayah khi yir'ab vehitqazaf veqilel bemalko ubeilohav ufanah lema'elah. ve'el 'erez yabit vehineh zarah vakhasheikhah me'uf zuqah va'afeilah menudakh. ki lo mu'af la'asher muzaq lah ka'et harishon heiqal 'arzah zebulun ve'arzah naftali veha'akharon hikhbid derekh hayam 'eiber hayarden gelil hagoyim. ha'am haholekhim bakhoshekh ra'u 'or gadol yoshebei be'erez zalmavet 'or nagah 'aleihem. hirbita hago lo lo higdalta hasimkhah samekhu lefanekha kesimkhat baqazir ka'asher yagilu bekhaleqam shalal. ki 'et 'ol subolo ve'et mateh shikhmo sheibet hanoges bo hakhitota keyom midyan. ki khal se'on so'en bera'ash vesimlah megolalah bedamim vehayetah lisreifah ma'akholet 'esh. ki yeled yulad lanu ben nitan lanu vatehi hamisrah 'al shikhmo vayiqra shemo pele yo'ez 'el gibor 'abi'ad sar shalom. lemarbeh lemarbeh hamisrah uleshalom 'en qez 'al kisei david ve'al mamlakhto lehakhin 'otah ulesa'adah bemishpat ubizdaqah mei'atah ve'ad 'olam qin'at ihoh zeba'ot ta'aseh zot. dabar shalakh 'adonai beya'aqob venafal beyisra'el. veyade'u ha'am kulo 'efrayim veyosheb shomeron bega'avah ubegodel leibab leimor. lebeinim nafalu vegazit nibneh shiqmim guda'u va'arazim nakhalif. vaysageb ihoh 'et zarei rezin 'alav ve'et 'oyebav yesakhsekh. 'aram miqedem ufelishtim mei'akhor vayokhelu 'et yisra'el bekhal peh bekhal zot lo shab 'apo ve'od yado netuyah. veha'am lo shab 'ad hamakeihu ve'et ihoh zeba'ot lo darashu. vayakhret ihoh miyisra'el rosh vezanab kipah ve'agmon yom 'ekhad. zaqen unesu fanim hu harosh venabi moreh sheqer hu hazanab. vayihyu me'asherei ha'am hazeh mat'im ume'usharav mebula'im. 'al ken 'al bakhurav lo yismakh 'adonai ve'et yetomav ve'et 'almenotav lo yerakhem ki khulo khanef umeira' vekhal peh dober nebalah bekhal zot lo shab 'apo ve'od yado netuyah. ki ba'arah kha'esh rish'ah shamir vashayit tokhel vatizat besibkhei haya'ar vayit'abekhu gei'ut 'ashan. be'ebrat ihoh zeba'ot ne'tam 'arez vayhi ha'am kema'akholet 'esh 'ish 'el 'akhiv lo yakhmolu. vayigzor 'al yamin vera'eb vayokhal 'al semol velo sabei'u 'ish besar zero'o yokheilu. menasheh 'et 'efrayim ve'efrayim 'et menasheh yakhdav hemah 'al yehudah bekhal zot lo shab 'apo ve'od yado netuyah. ho hakhoqeqim khiqei 'aven umekhatebim 'amal kiteibu. lehatot midin dalim veligzol mishpat 'aniyei 'ami lihyot 'almanot shelalam ve'et yetomim yabozu. umah ta'asu leyom pequdah ulesho'ah mimerkhaq tabo 'al mi tanusu le'ezrah ve'anah ta'azbu kebodkhem. bilti khara' takhat 'asir vetakhat harugim yipolu bekhal zot lo shab 'apo ve'od yado netuyah. ho 'ashur sheibet 'api umateh hu beyadam za'mi. bego khanef 'ashalekhenu ve'al 'am 'ebrati 'azavenu lishlol shalal velaboz baz ulesimo ulesumo mirmas kekhomer khuzot. vehu lo khen yedameh ulebabo lo khen yakhshob ki lehashmid bilbabo ulehakhrit goyim lo me'at. ki yomar halo sarai yakhdav melakhim. halo kekharkemish kalno 'im lo khe'arpad khamat 'im lo khedameseq shomeron. ka'asher maze'ah yadi lemamlekhot ha'elil ufesileihem mirushalim umishomeron. halo ka'asher 'asiti leshomeron vele'elileha ken 'e'eseh lirushalim vela'azabeha. vehayah ki yebaza' 'adonai 'et kal ma'aseihu behar ziyon ubirushalim 'efqod 'al peri godel lebab melekh 'ashur ve'al tif'eret rum 'einav. ki 'amar bekhoakh yadi 'asiti ubekhakhemati ki nebunoti ve'asir gebulot 'amim va'atidoteihem va'atudoteihem shoseiti ve'orid kabir yoshebim. vatimza khaqen yadi lekhel ha'amim vekhe'esof beizim 'azubot kal ha'arez 'ani 'asafeti velo hayah noded kanaf ufozeh feh umezafzef. hayitpa'er hagarzen 'al hakhozeb bo 'im yitgadel hamasor 'al menifo kehanif sheibet ve'et merimav keharim mateh lo 'ez. lakhen yeshalakh ha'adon ihoh zeba'ot bemishmanav razon vetakhat kebodo yeiqad yeqod kiqod 'esh. vehayah 'or yisra'el le'esh uqedosho lelehabah uba'arah ve'akhelah shito ushemiro beyom 'ekhad. ukhebod ya'ro vekharmilo minefesh ve'ad basar yekhaleh vehayah kimsos noses. ushe'ar 'ez ya'ro mispar yihyu vena'ar yikhtebem. vehayah bayom hahu lo yosif 'od she'ar yisra'el ufeleitat bet ya'aqob lehisha'en 'al makeihu venish'an 'al ihoh qedosh yisra'el be'emet. she'ar yashub she'ar ya'aqob 'el 'el gibor. ki 'im yihyeh 'amekha yisra'el kekhol hayam she'ar yashub bo kilayon kharuz shotef zedaqah. ki khalah venekherazah 'adonai ihoh zeba'ot 'oseh beqereb kal ha'arez. lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh zeba'ot 'al tira 'ami yosheb ziyon mei'ashur basheibet yakekah umateihu yisa 'alekha bederekh mizrayim. ki 'od me'at miz'ar vekhalah za'am ve'api 'al tablitam. ve'orer 'alav ihoh zeba'ot shot kemakat midyan bezur 'oreb umateihu 'al hayam unesa'o bederekh mizrayim. vehayah bayom hahu yasur subolo mei'al shikhmekha ve'ulo mei'al zavarekha vekhubal 'ol mipenei shamen. ba 'al 'ayat 'abar bemigron lemikhmas yafqid keilav. 'aberu ma'barah geba' malon lanu kharedah haramah gib'at sha'ul nasah. zahali qolekh bat galim haqshibi layshah 'aniyah 'anatot. nadedah madmeinah yoshebei hageibim hei'izu. 'od hayom benob la'amod yenofef yado har bet bat ziyon gib'at yerushalim. hineh ha'adon ihoh zeba'ot mesa'ef purah bema'arazah veramei haqomah gedu'im vehagebohim yishpalu. veniqaf sibkhei haya'ar babarzel vehalebanon be'adir yipol. veyaza khoter migeiza' yishai veneizer misharashav yifreh. venakhah 'alav ruakh ihoh ruakh khakhmah ubinah ruakh 'eizah ugeburah ruakh da'at veyir'at ihoh. vaharikho beyir'at ihoh velo lemar'eh 'einav yishpot velo lemishma' 'azenav yokhiakh. veshafat bezedeq dalim vehokhiakh bemishor le'anvei 'arez vehikah 'erez besheibet piv uberuakh sefatav yamit rasha'. vehayah zedeq 'eizor matenav veha'emunah 'eizor khalazav. vegar ze'eb 'im kebes venamer 'im gedi yirbaz ve'eigel ukhefir umeri yakhdav vena'ar qaton noheg bam. ufarah vadob tir'enah yakhdav yirbezu yaldeihen ve'aryeh kabaqar yokhal teben. veshi'asha' yoneq 'al khur paten ve'al me'urat zif'oni gamul yado hadah. lo yarei'u velo yashkhitu bekhal har qadshi ki male'ah ha'arez dei'ah 'et ihoh kamayim layam mekhasim. vehayah bayom hahu shoresh yishai 'asher 'omed lenes 'amim 'eilav goyim yidroshu vehayetah menukhato kabod. vehayah bayom hahu yosif 'adonai sheinit yado liqnot 'et she'ar 'amo 'asher yisha'er mei'ashur umimizrayim umipatros umikush umei'eilam umishin'ar umeikhamat umei'iyei hayam. venasa nes lagoyim ve'asaf nidkhei yisra'el unefuzot yehudah yeqabez mei'arba' kanfot ha'arez. vesarah qin'at 'efrayim vezorerei yehudah yikareitu 'efrayim lo yeqanei 'et yehudah vihudah lo yazor 'et 'efrayim. ve'afu bekhatef pelishtim yamah yakhdav yabozu 'et benei qedem 'edom umo'ab mishlokh yadam ubenei 'amon mishma'tam. vehekherim ihoh 'et leshon yam mizrayim veheinif yado 'al hanahar ba'yam rukho vehikahu leshib'ah nekhalim vehidrikh bane'alim. vehayetah mesilah lish'ar 'amo 'asher yisha'er mei'ashur ka'asher hayetah leyisra'el beyom 'aloto mei'erez mizrayim. ve'amarta bayom hahu 'odkha ihoh ki 'anafta bi yashob 'apekha utenakhameini. hineh 'el yeshu'ati 'ebtakh velo 'efkhad ki 'azi vezimrat yah ihoh vayhi li lishu'ah. ushe'abtem mayim besason mima'aynei hayshu'ah. va'amartem bayom hahu hodu ihoh qir'u bishmo hodi'u ba'amim 'alilotav hazkiru ki nisgab shemo. zameru ihoh ki gei'ut 'asah meyuda'at muda'at zot bekhal ha'arez. zahali varoni yoshebet ziyon ki gadol beqirbekh qedosh yisra'el. masa babel 'asher khazah yesha'yahu ben 'amoz. 'al har nishpeh se'u nes harimu qol lahem hanifu yad veyabo'u pitkhei nedibim. 'ani ziveiti limqudashai gam qarati giborai le'api 'alizei ga'avati. qol hamon beharim demut 'am rab qol she'on mamlekhot goyim ne'esafim ihoh zeba'ot mefaqed zeba milkhamah. ba'im mei'erez merkhaq miqzeh hashamayim ihoh ukhelei za'mo lekhabel kal ha'arez. heililu ki qarob yom ihoh keshod mishadai yabo. 'al ken kal yadayim tirpenah vekhal lebab 'enosh yimas venibhalu zirim vakhabalim yokheizun kayoleidah yekhilun 'ish 'el rei'eihu yitmahu penei lehabim peneihem. hineh yom ihoh ba 'akhzari ve'ebrah vakharon 'af lasum ha'arez leshamah vekhata'eha yashmid mimenah. ki khokhbei hashamayim ukhesileihem lo yahelu 'oram khashakh hashemesh bezeito veyareiakh lo yagiha 'oro. ufaqadti 'al teibel ra'ah ve'al resha'im 'avonam vehishbati ge'on zeidim vega'avat 'arizim 'ashpil. 'oqir 'enosh mipaz ve'adam miketem 'ofir. 'al ken shamayim 'argiz vetir'ash ha'arez mimeqomah be'ebrat ihoh zeba'ot ubeyom kharon 'apo. vehayah kizbi mudakh ukhezon ve'en meqabez 'ish 'el 'amo yifnu ve'ish 'el 'arzo yanusu. kal hanimza yidaqer vekhal hanispeh yipol bekhareb. ve'oleleihem yeruteshu le'eineihem yishasu bateihem unesheihem tishagalnah tishakhabnah. hini mei'ir 'aleihem 'et madai 'asher kesef lo yakhshobu vezahab lo yakhpezu bo. uqeshatot ne'arim teratashnah uferi beten lo yerakheimu 'al banim lo takhus 'einam. vehayetah babel zebi mamlakhot tif'eret ge'on kasdim kemahpeikhat 'elohim 'et sedom ve'et 'amorah. lo teisheb lanezakh velo tishkon 'ad dor vador velo yahel sham 'arabi vero'im lo yarbizu sham. verabezu sham ziyim umale'u bateihem 'okhim veshakhenu sham benot ya'anah use'irim yeraqedu sham. ve'anah 'iyim be'almnotav vetanim beheikhelei 'oneg veqarob labo 'itah veyameha lo yimasheikhu. ki yerakhem ihoh 'et ya'aqob ubakhar 'od beyisra'el vehinikham 'al 'admatam venilvah hager 'aleihem venispekhu 'al bet ya'aqob. uleqakhum 'amim vehebi'um 'el meqomam vehitnakhalum bet yisra'el 'al 'admat ihoh la'abadim velishfakhot vehayu shobim leshobeihem veradu benogeseihem. vehayah beyom haniakh ihoh lekha mei'azebekha umeiragezekha umin ha'abodah haqashah 'asher 'ubad bakh. venasata hamashal hazeh 'al melekh babel ve'amareta 'ekh shabat noges shabetah madheibah. shabar ihoh mateh resha'im sheibet moshelim. makeh 'amim be'ebrah makat bilti sarah rodeh ba'af goyim murdaf beli khasakh. nakhah shaqetah kal ha'arez pazekhu rinah. gam beroshim samekhu lekha 'arzei lebanon mei'az shakhabta lo ya'aleh hakoret 'aleinu. she'ol mitakhat ragezah lekha liqrat bo'ekha 'orer lekha refa'im kal 'atudei 'arez heiqim mikis'otam kol malkhei goyim. kulam ya'anu veyomeru 'eilekha gam 'atah khuleita khamonu 'eileinu nimshaleta. hurad she'ol ge'onekha hemyat nebalekha takhtekha yuza' rimah umekhasekha tolei'ah. 'ekh nafalta mishamayim heilel ben shakhar nigda'ta la'arez kholesh 'al goyim. ve'atah 'amarta bilbabekha hashamayim 'e'eleh mima'al lekhokhbei 'el 'arim kis'i ve'eisheb behar mo'ed beyarketei zafon. 'e'eleh 'al bamotei 'ab 'edameh le'elyon. 'akh 'el she'ol turad 'el yarketei bor. ro'ekha 'eilekha yashgikhu 'eilekha yitbonanu hazeh ha'ish margiz ha'arez mar'ish mamlakhot. sam teibel kamidbar ve'arav haras 'asirav lo fatakh bayetah. kal malkhei goyim kulam shakhebu bekhabod 'ish bebeito. ve'atah hashelakhta miqibrekha keneizer nit'ab lebush harugim meto'anei khareb yordei 'el 'abnei bor kefeger mubas. lo teikhad 'itam biqburah ki 'arzekha shikhata 'amekha harageta lo yiqarei le'olam zera' merei'im. hakhinu lebanav matbeiakh ba'avon 'abotam bal yaqumu veyareshu 'arez umale'u fenei teibel 'arim. veqamti 'aleihem ne'um ihoh zeba'ot vehikhrati lebabel shem ushe'ar venin vanekhed ne'um ihoh. vesamtiha lemorash qipod ve'agmei mayim veteiteitiha bemat'atei hashmed ne'um ihoh zeba'ot. nishba' ihoh zeba'ot leimor 'im lo ka'asher dimiti ken hayatah vekha'asher ya'azti hi taqum. lishbor 'ashur be'arzi ve'al harai 'abusenu vesar mei'aleihem 'ulo vesubolo mei'al shikhmo yasur. zot ha'eizah haye'uzah 'al kal ha'arez vezot hayad hanetuyah 'al kal hagoyim. ki ihoh zeba'ot ya'az umi yafer veyado hanetuyah umi yeshibenah. bishnat mot hamelekh 'akhaz hayah hamasa hazeh. 'al tismekhi feleshet kulekh ki nishbar sheibet makekh ki mishoresh nakhash yeizei zefa' ufiryo saraf me'ofef. vera'u bekhorei dalim ve'ebyonim labetakh yirbazu veheimati bara'ab shareshekh ushe'eiritekh yaharog. heilili sha'ar za'aqi 'ir namog peleshet kulekh ki mizafon 'ashan ba ve'en boded bemo'adav. umah ya'aneh mal'akhei go ki ihoh yisad ziyon ubah yekhesu 'aniyei 'amo. masa mo'ab ki belel shudad 'ar mo'ab nidmah ki belel shudad qir mo'ab nidmah. 'alah habayit vedibon habamot lebekhi 'al nebo ve'al meideba mo'ab yeyeilil bekhal roshav qarekhah kal zaqan geru'ah. bekhuzotav khageru saq 'al gagoteha ubirkhoboteha kuloh yeyeilil yored babekhi. vatiz'aq kheshbon ve'el'aleh 'ad yahaz nishma' qolam 'al ken khaluzei mo'ab yari'u nafsho yare'ah lo. libi lemo'ab yiz'aq berikheha 'ad zo'ar 'eglat shelishiyah ki ma'aleh halukhit bibkhi ya'aleh bo ki derekh khoronayim za'aqat sheber ye'o'eiru. ki mei nimrim meshamot yihyu ki yabesh khazir kalah deshe yereq lo hayah. 'al ken yitrah 'asah ufequdatam 'al nakhal ha'arabim yisa'um. ki hiqifah haze'aqah 'et gebul mo'ab 'ad 'eglayim yilatah ube'er 'eilim yilatah. ki mei dimon male'u dam ki 'ashit 'al dimon nosafot lifleitat mo'ab 'aryeh velish'eirit 'adamah. shilkhu khar moshel 'erez misela' midbarah 'el har bat ziyon. vehayah khe'of noded qen meshulakh tihyenah benot mo'ab ma'barot le'arnon. habi'u habi'i 'eizah 'asu felilah shiti khalayil zilekh betokh zahorayim sateri nidakhim noded 'al tegali. yaguru bakh nidakhai mo'ab hevi seiter lamo mipenei shoded ki 'afes hamez kalah shod tamu romes min ha'arez. vehukhan bakhesed kisei veyashab 'alav be'emet be'ohel david shofet vedoresh mishpat umehir zedeq. shama'nu ge'on mo'ab gei me'od ga'avato uge'ono ve'ebrato lo khen badav. lakhen yeyeilil mo'ab lemo'ab kuloh yeyeilil la'ashishei qir khareset tehgu 'akh nekha'im. ki shadmot kheshbon 'umlal gefen sibmah ba'alei goyim halemu seruqeha 'ad ya'zer naga'u ta'u midbar shelukhoteha niteshu 'aberu yam. 'al ken 'ebkeh bibkhi ya'zer gefen sibmah 'arayavekh dim'ati kheshbon ve'el'aleh ki 'al qeizekh ve'al qezirekh heidad nafal. vene'esaf simkhah vagil min hakarmel ubakeramim lo yerunan lo yero'a' yayin bayqabim lo yidrokh hadorekh heidad hishbati. 'al ken mei'ai lemo'ab kakinor yehemu veqirbi leqir khares. vehayah khi nir'ah ki nil'ah mo'ab 'al habamah uba 'el miqdasho lehitpalel velo yukhal. zeh hadabar 'asher diber ihoh 'el mo'ab mei'az. ve'atah diber ihoh leimor beshalosh shanim kishnei sakhir veniqlah kebod mo'ab bekhol hehamon harab ushe'ar me'at miz'ar lo khabir. masa damaseq hineh dameseq musar mei'ir vehayetah me'i mapalah. 'azubot 'arei 'aro'er la'adarim tihyenah verabezu ve'en makharid. venishbat mibzar mei'efrayim umamlakhah midameseq ushe'ar 'aram kikhbod benei yisra'el yihyu ne'um ihoh zeba'ot. vehayah bayom hahu yidal kebod ya'aqob umishman besaro yeirazeh. vehayah ke'esof qazir qamah uzero'o shibolim yiqzor vehayah kimlaqet shibolim be'eimeq refa'im. venish'ar bo 'oleilot kenoqef zayit shenayim sheloshah
