gargerim berosh 'amir 'arba'ah khamishah bis'ifeha poriyah ne'um ihoh 'elohei yisra'el. bayom hahu yish'eh ha'adam 'al 'oseihu ve'einav 'el qedosh yisra'el tir'enah. velo yish'eh 'el hamizbekhot ma'aseh yadav va'asher 'asu 'ezbe'otav lo yir'eh veha'asheirim vehakhamanim. bayom hahu yihyu 'arei ma'uzo ka'azubat hakhoresh veha'amir 'asher 'azebu mipenei benei yisra'el vehayetah shemamah. ki shakhakhat 'elohei yish'ekh vezur ma'uzekh lo zakharet 'al ken tite'i nit'ei na'amanim uzemorat zar tizra'enu. beyom nit'ekh tesagseigi ubaboqer zar'ekh tafrikhi ned qazir beyom nakhalah ukhe'eb 'anush. ho hamon 'amim rabim kahamot yamim yehemayun ushe'on le'umim kish'on mayim kabirim yisha'un. le'umim kish'on mayim rabim yisha'un vega'ar bo venas mimerkhaq verudaf kemoz harim lifnei ruakh ukhegalgal lifnei sufah. le'et 'ereb vehineh balahah beterem boqer 'einenu zeh kheileq shoseinu vegoral lebozezeinu. ho 'erez zilzal kenafayim 'asher mei'eiber lenaharei khush. hasholeiakh bayam zirim ubikhlei gome 'al penei mayim lekhu mal'akhim qalim 'el go memushakh umorat 'el 'am nora min hu vahale'ah go qav qav umebusah 'asher baze'u neharim 'arzo. kal yoshebei teibel veshokhenei 'arez kinso nes harim tir'u vekhitqoa' shofar tishma'u. ki khoh 'amar ihoh 'eilai 'eshqotah 'eshqotah ve'abitah bimkhoni kekhom zakh 'alei 'or ke'ab tal bekhom qazir. ki lifnei qazir ketam perakh uboser gomel yihyeh nizah vekharat hazalzalim bamazmeirot ve'et hanetishot heisir heitaz. yei'azebu yakhdav le'et harim ulebehemat ha'arez veqaz 'alav ha'ayit vekhal behemat ha'arez 'alav tekheraf. ba'et hahi yubal shai ihoh zeba'ot 'am memushakh umorat umei'am nora min hu vahale'ah go qav qav umebusah 'asher baze'u neharim 'arzo 'el meqom shem ihoh zeba'ot har ziyon. masa mizrayim hineh ihoh rokheb 'al 'ab qal uba mizrayim vena'u 'elilei mizrayim mipanav ulebab mizrayim yimas beqirbo. vesikhsakhti mizrayim bemizrayim venilkhamu 'ish be'akhiv ve'ish berei'eihu 'ir be'ir mamlakhah bemamlakhah. venabeqah ruakh mizrayim beqirbo va'azato 'abaleia' vedareshu 'el ha'elilim ve'el ha'itim ve'el ha'obot ve'el hayide'onim. vesikarti 'et mizrayim beyad 'adonim qasheh umelekh 'az yimshal bam ne'um ha'adon ihoh zeba'ot. venishetu mayim meihayam venahar yekherab veyabesh. vehe'eznikhu neharot dalalu vekharebu ye'orei mazor qaneh vasuf qameilu. 'arot 'al ye'or 'al pi ye'or vekhol mizra' ye'or yibash nidaf ve'einenu. ve'anu hadayagim ve'abelu kal mashlikhei bai'or khakah uforesei mikhmoret 'al penei mayim 'umlalu. uboshu 'obedei fishtim seriqot ve'oregim khorai. vehayu shatoteha meduka'im kal 'osei sekher 'agmei nafesh. 'akh 'evilim sarei zo'an khakhmei yo'azei far'oh 'eizah nib'arah 'ekh tomeru 'el par'oh ben khakhamim 'ani ben malkhei qedem. 'ayam 'eifo khakhamekha veyagidu na lakh veyeide'u mah ya'az ihoh zeba'ot 'al mizrayim. no'alu sarei zo'an nishe'u sarei nof hit'u 'et mizrayim pinat shebateha. ihoh masakh beqirbah ruakh 'iv'im vehit'u 'et mizrayim bekhal ma'aseihu kehita'ot shikor beqi'o. velo yihyeh lemizrayim ma'aseh 'asher ya'aseh rosh vezanab kipah ve'agmon. bayom hahu yihyeh mizrayim kanashim vekharad ufakhad mipenei tenufat yad ihoh zeba'ot 'asher hu meinif 'alav. vehayetah 'admat yehudah lemizrayim lekhaga kol 'asher yazkir 'otah 'eilav yifkhad mipenei 'azat ihoh zeba'ot 'asher hu yo'ez 'alav. bayom hahu yihyu khamesh 'arim be'erez mizrayim medaberot sefat kena'an venishba'ot ihoh zeba'ot 'ir haheres yei'amer le'ekhat. bayom hahu yihyeh mizbeiakh ihoh betokh 'erez mizrayim umazeibah 'eizel gebulah ihoh. vehayah le'ot ule'ed ihoh zeba'ot be'erez mizrayim ki yiz'aqu 'el ihoh mipenei lokhazim veyishlakh lahem moshia' varab vehizilam. venoda' ihoh lemizrayim veyade'u mizrayim 'et ihoh bayom hahu ve'abedu zebakh uminkhah venaderu neider ihoh veshileimu. venagaf ihoh 'et mizrayim nagof verafo veshabu 'ad ihoh vene'tar lahem urefa'am. bayom hahu tihyeh mesilah mimizrayim 'ashurah uba 'ashur bemizrayim umizrayim be'ashur ve'abedu mizrayim 'et 'ashur. bayom hahu yihyeh yisra'el shelishiyah lemizrayim ule'ashur berakhah beqereb ha'arez. 'asher beirakho ihoh zeba'ot leimor barukh 'ami mizrayim uma'aseh yadai 'ashur venakhalati yisra'el. bishnat bo tartan 'ashdodah bishlokh 'oto sargon melekh 'ashur vayilakhem be'ashdod vayilkedah. ba'et hahi diber ihoh beyad yesha'yahu ben 'amoz leimor lekh ufitakhta hasaq mei'al matenekha vena'alkha takhaloz mei'al raglekha vaya'as ken halokh 'arom veyakhef. vayomer ihoh ka'asher halakh 'abdi yesha'yahu 'arom veyakhef shalosh shanim 'ot umofet 'al mizrayim ve'al kush. ken yinhag melekh 'ashur 'et shebi mizrayim ve'et galut kush ne'arim uzeqeinim 'arom veyakhef vakhasufai shet 'ervat mizrayim. vekhatu vaboshu mikush mabatam umin mizrayim tif'artam. ve'amar yosheb ha'i hazeh bayom hahu hineh khoh mabateinu 'asher nasnu sham le'ezrah lehinazel mipenei melekh 'ashur ve'ekh nimalet 'anakhenu. masa midbar yam kesufot banegeb lakhalof mimidbar ba mei'erez nora'ah. khazut qashah hugad li haboged boged vehashoded shoded 'ali 'eilam zuri madai kal 'ankhatah hishbati. 'al ken male'u matenai khalkhalah zirim 'akhazuni kezirei yoleidah na'aveiti mishemoa' nibhalti meire'ot. ta'ah lebabi palazut bi'atateni 'et neshef khishqi sam li lakharadah. 'arokh hashulkhan zafoh hazafit 'akhol shatoh qumu hasarim mishkhu magen. ki khoh 'amar 'eilai 'adonai lekh ha'amed hamzapeh 'asher yir'eh yagid. vera'ah rekheb zemed parashim rekheb khamor rekheb gamal vehiqshib qesheb rab qasheb. vayiqra 'aryeh 'al mizpeh 'adonai 'anokhi 'omed tamid yomam ve'al mishmarti 'anokhi nizab kal haleilot. vehineh zeh ba rekheb 'ish zemed parashim vaya'an vayomer nafelah nafelah babel vekhal pesilei 'eloheha shibar la'arez. medushati uben gareni 'asher shama'ti mei'et ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el higadti lakhem. masa dumah 'eilai qorei misei'ir shomer mah milaylah shomer mah milel. 'amar shomer 'atah boqer vegam layelah 'im tib'ayun be'ayu shubu 'eitayu. masa ba'rab baya'ar ba'rab talinu 'orekhot dedanim. liqrat zamei heitayu mayim yoshebei 'erez teima belakhmo qidemu noded. ki mipenei kharabot nadadu mipenei khereb netushah umipenei qeshet derukhah umipenei kobed milkhamah. ki khoh 'amar 'adonai 'eilai be'od shanah kishnei sakhir vekhalah kal kebod qeidar. ushe'ar mispar qeshet giborei benei qeidar yim'atu ki ihoh 'elohei yisra'el diber. masa gei khizayon mah lakh 'eifo ki 'alit kulakh lagagot. teshu'ot melei'ah 'ir homiyah qiryah 'alizah khalalayikh lo khalei khereb velo meitei milkhamah. kal qezinayikh nadedu yakhad miqeshet 'usaru kal nimza'ayikh 'useru yakhdav meirakhoq barakhu. 'al ken 'amarti she'u mini 'amarer babekhi 'al ta'izu lenakhameini 'al shod bat 'ami. ki yom mehumah umebusah umebukhah ladonai ihoh zeba'ot begei khizayon meqarqar qir veshoa' 'el hahar. ve'eilam nasa 'ashpah berekheb 'adam parashim veqir 'eirah magen. vayhi mibkhar 'amaqayikh male'u rakheb vehaparashim shot shatu hasha'erah. vaygal 'et masakh yehudah vatabet bayom hahu 'el nesheq bet haya'ar. ve'et beqi'ei 'ir david re'item ki rabu vateqabezu 'et mei habereikhah hatakhtonah. ve'et batei yerushalim sefartem vatitzev habatim lebazer hakhomah. umiqvah 'asitem ben hakhomotayim lemei habereikhah hayshanah velo hibatem 'el 'oseha veyozerah meirakhoq lo re'item. vayiqra 'adonai ihoh zeba'ot bayom hahu libkhi ulemisped uleqarekhah velakhagor saq. vehineh sason vesimkhah harog baqar veshakhot zon 'akhol basar veshatot yayin 'akhol veshato ki makhar namut. veniglah be'azenai ihoh zeba'ot 'im yekhupar he'avon hazeh lakhem 'ad temutun 'amar 'adonai ihoh zeba'ot. koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh zeba'ot lekh bo 'el hasokhen hazeh 'al shebna 'asher 'al habayit. mah lekha foh umi lekha foh ki khazabta lekha poh qaber khozebi marom qibro khoqeqi basela' mishkan lo. hineh ihoh metaltelkha talteilah gaber ve'otekha 'atoh. zanof yiznafekha zeneifah kadur 'el 'erez rakhabat yadayim shamah tamut veshamah markebot kebodekha qelon bet 'adonekha. vahadaftikha mimazabekha umima'amadekha yehersekha. vehayah bayom hahu veqarati le'abdi le'elyaqim ben khilqiyahu. vehilbashtiv kutanetekha ve'abneitekha 'akhazeqenu umemsheltekha 'eten beyado vehayah le'ab leyosheb yerushalim ulebet yehudah. venatati mafteiakh bet david 'al shikhmo ufatakh ve'en soger vesagar ve'en poteiakh. uteqa'tiv yated bemaqom ne'eman vehayah lekhisei khabod lebet 'abiv. vetalu 'alav kol kebod bet 'abiv haze'eza'im vehazefi'ot kol kelei haqatan mikelei ha'aganot ve'ad kal kelei hanebalim. bayom hahu ne'um ihoh zeba'ot tamush hayated hatequ'ah bemaqom ne'eman venigde'ah venafelah venikhrat hamasa 'asher 'aleha ki ihoh diber. masa zor heililu 'oniyot tarshish ki shudad mibayit mibo mei'erez kitim niglah lamo. domu yoshebei 'i sokher zidon 'ober yam mil'ukh. ubemayim rabim zera' shikhor qezir ye'or tebu'atah vatehi sekhar goyim. boshi zidon ki 'amar yam ma'oz hayam leimor lo khalti velo yaladti velo gidalti bakhurim romamti betulot. ka'asher sheima' lemizrayim yakhilu kesheima' zor. 'ibru tarshishah heililu yoshebei 'i. hazot lakhem 'alizah mimei qedem qadmatah yobiluha ragleha meirakhoq lagur. mi ya'az zot 'al zor hama'atirah 'asher sokhareh sarim kin'aneha nikhbadei 'arez. ihoh zeba'ot ye'azah lekhalel ge'on kal zebi lehaqel kal nikhbadei 'arez. 'ibri 'arzekh kai'or bat tarshish 'en meizakh 'od. yado natah 'al hayam hirgiz mamlakhot ihoh zivah 'el kena'an lashmid ma'uzneha. vayomer lo tosifi 'od la'loz ham'ushaqah betulat bat zidon kitiyim kitim qumi 'abori gam sham lo yanuakh lakh. hen 'erez kasdim zeh ha'am lo hayah 'ashur yesadah leziyim heiqimu bekhinav bakhunav 'oreru 'armenoteha samah lemapeilah. heililu 'oniyot tarshish ki shudad ma'uzekhen. vehayah bayom hahu venishkakhat zor shib'im shanah kimei melekh 'ekhad miqez shib'im shanah yihyeh lezor keshirat hazonah. qekhi khinor sobi 'ir zonah nishkakhah heitibi nagen harbi shir lema'an tizakheiri. vehayah miqez shib'im shanah yifqod ihoh 'et zor veshabah le'etnanah vezanetah 'et kal mamlekhot ha'arez 'al penei ha'adamah. vehayah sakhrah ve'etnanah qodesh ihoh lo yei'azer velo yeikhasen ki layoshebim lifnei ihoh yihyeh sakhrah le'ekhol lesabe'ah velimkhaseh 'atiq. hineh ihoh boqeq ha'arez ubolqah ve'ivah faneha veheifiz yoshebeha. vehayah kha'am kakohen ka'ebed kadonav kashifkhah kagebirtah kaqoneh kamokher kamalveh kaloeh kanosheh ka'asher noshe bo. hiboq tiboq ha'arez vehiboz tiboz ki ihoh diber 'et hadabar hazeh. 'abelah nabelah ha'arez 'umlelah nabelah teibel 'umlalu merom 'am ha'arez. veha'arez khanefah takhat yoshebeha ki 'aberu torot khalefu khoq heifeiru berit 'olam. 'al ken 'alah 'akhelah 'erez vaye'shemu yoshebei bah 'al ken kharu yoshebei 'erez venish'ar 'enosh miz'ar. 'abal tirosh 'umlelah gafen ne'enkhu kal simkhei leb. shabat mesos tupim khadal she'on 'alizim shabat mesos kinor. bashir lo yishtu yayin yeimar sheikhar leshotav. nishberah qiryat tohu sugar kal bayit mibo. zevakhah 'al hayayin bakhuzot 'arebah kal simkhah galah mesos ha'arez. nish'ar ba'ir shamah ushe'iyah yukat sha'ar. ki khoh yihyeh beqereb ha'arez betokh ha'amim kenoqef zayit ke'oleilot 'im kalah bazir. hemah yis'u qolam yaronu big'on ihoh zahalu miyam. 'al ken ba'urim kabedu ihoh be'iyei hayam shem ihoh 'elohei yisra'el. mikenaf ha'arez zemirot shama'nu zebi lazadiq va'omar razi li razi li 'o li bogedim bagadu ubeged bogdim bagadu. pakhad vafakhat vafakh 'alekha yosheb ha'arez. vehayah hanas miqol hapakhad yipol 'el hapakhat veha'oleh mitokh hapakhat yilakhed bapakh ki 'arubot mimarom niftakhu vayir'ashu mosdei 'arez. ro'ah hitro'a'ah ha'arez por hitporrah 'erez mot hitmotah 'arez. noa' tanua' 'erez kashikor vehitnoddah kamelunah vekhabad 'aleha pish'ah venafelah velo tosif qum. vehayah bayom hahu yifqod ihoh 'al zeba hamarom bamarom ve'al malkhei ha'adamah 'al ha'adamah. ve'usefu 'aseifah 'asir 'al bor vesugeru 'al masger umeirob yamim yipaqeidu. vekhaferah halebanah uboshah hakhamah ki malakh ihoh zeba'ot behar ziyon ubirushalim veneged zeqeinav kabod. ihoh 'elohai 'atah 'aromimkha 'odeh shimkha ki 'asita pele 'eizot meirakhoq 'emunah 'omen. ki samta mei'ir lagal qiryah bezurah lemapeilah 'armon zarim mei'ir le'olam lo yibaneh. 'al ken yekhabedukha 'am 'az qiryat goyim 'arizim yira'ukha. ki hayita ma'oz ladal ma'oz la'ebyon bazar lo makhseh mizerem zel meikhoreb ki ruakh 'arizim kezerem qir. kekhoreb bezayon she'on zarim takhnia' khoreb bezel 'ab zemir 'arizim ya'aneh. ve'asah ihoh zeba'ot lekhal ha'amim bahar hazeh mishteh shemanim mishteh shemarim shemanim memukhayim shemarim mezuqaqim. ubila' bahar hazeh penei halot halot 'al kal ha'amim vehamaseikhah hanesukhah 'al kal hagoyim. bila' hamavet lanezakh umakhah 'adonai ihoh dim'ah mei'al kal panim vekherpat 'amo yasir mei'al kal ha'arez ki ihoh diber. ve'amar bayom hahu hineh 'eloheinu zeh qivinu lo veyoshi'einu zeh ihoh qivinu lo nagilah venismekhah bishu'ato. ki tanuakh yad ihoh bahar hazeh venadosh mo'ab takhtav kehidush matben bemei bemo madmeinah. ufeiras yadav beqirbo ka'asher yefares hasokheh liskhot vehishpil ga'avato 'im 'arebot yadav. umibzar misgab khomotekha heishakh hishpil higia' la'arez 'ad 'afar. bayom hahu yushar hashir hazeh be'erez yehudah 'ir 'az lanu yeshu'ah yashit khomot vakhel. pitkhu she'arim veyabo go zadiq shomer 'emunim. yeizer samukh tizor shalom shalom ki bekha batuakh. bitkhu ihoh 'adei 'ad ki beyah ihoh zur 'olamim. ki heishakh yoshebei marom qiryah nisgabah yashpilenah yashpilah 'ad 'erez yagi'enah 'ad 'afar. tirmesenah ragel raglei 'ani pa'amei dalim. 'orakh lazadiq meisharim yashar ma'gal zadiq tefales. 'af 'orakh mishpatekha ihoh qivinukha leshimkha ulezikhrekha ta'avat nafesh. nafshi 'ivitikha balaylah 'af rukhi beqirbi 'ashakhareka ki ka'asher mishpatekha la'arez zedeq lamedu yoshebei teibel. yukhan rasha' bal lamad zedeq be'erez nekhokhot ye'avel ubal yir'eh gei'ut ihoh. ihoh ramah yadekha bal yekhezayun yekhezu veyeiboshu qin'at 'am 'af 'esh zarekha tokhelem. ihoh tishpot shalom lanu ki gam kal ma'aseinu pa'alta lanu. ihoh 'eloheinu be'alunu 'adonim zulatekha lebad bekha nazkir shemekha. meitim bal yikhyu refa'im bal yaqumu lakhen paqadta vatashmidem vate'abed kal zeikher lamo. yasafta lago ihoh yasafta lago nikhbadeta rikhaqta kal qazvei 'arez. ihoh bazar peqadukha zaqun lakhash musarekha lamo. kemo harah taqrib laledet takhil tiz'aq bakhabaleha ken hayinu mipanekha ihoh. harinu khalnu kemo yaladnu ruakh yeshu'ot bal na'aseh 'erez ubal yipelu yoshebei teibel. yikhyu meitekha nebeilati yequmun haqizu veranenu shokhenei 'afar ki tal 'orot talekha va'arez refa'im tapil. lekh 'ami bo bakhadarekha usegor delatekha delatekha ba'adekha khabi khim'at rega' 'ad ya'abor ya'abar za'am. ki hineh ihoh yozei mimeqomo lifqod 'avon yosheb ha'arez 'alav vegiletah ha'arez 'et dameha velo tekhaseh 'od 'al harugeha. bayom hahu yifqod ihoh bekharbo haqashah vehagedolah vehakhazaqah 'al livyatan nakhash bariakh ve'al livyatan nakhash 'aqalaton veharag 'et hatanin 'asher bayam. bayom hahu kerem khemed 'anu lah. 'ani ihoh nozerah lirga'im 'ashqenah pen yifqod 'aleha laylah vayom 'ezorenah. kheimah 'en li mi yiteneini shamir shayit bamilkhamah 'efse'ah bah 'azitenah yakhad. 'o yakhazeq bema'uzi ya'aseh shalom li shalom ya'aseh li. haba'im yashresh ya'aqob yaziz ufarakh yisra'el umale'u fenei teibel tenubah. hakemakat makeihu hikahu 'im kehereg harugav horag. besase'ah beshalkhah teribenah hagah berukho haqashah beyom qadim. lakhen bezot yekhupar 'avon ya'aqob vezeh kal peri hasir khatato besumo kal 'abnei mizbeiakh ke'abnei gir menupazot lo yaqumu 'asheirim vekhamanim. ki 'ir bezurah badad naveh meshulakh vene'ezab kamidbar sham yir'eh 'eigel vesham yirbaz vekhilah se'ifeha. bibosh qezirah tishabarnah nashim ba'ot me'irot 'otah ki lo 'am binot hu 'al ken lo yerakhamenu 'oseihu veyozero lo yekhunenu. vehayah bayom hahu yakhbot ihoh mishibolet hanahar 'ad nakhal mizrayim ve'atem teluqetu le'akhad 'ekhad benei yisra'el. vehayah bayom hahu yitaqa' beshofar gadol uba'u ha'obedim be'erez 'ashur vehanidakhim be'erez mizrayim vehishtakhavu ihoh behar haqodesh birushalim. ho 'ateret gei'ut shikorei 'efrayim veziz nobel zebi tif'arto 'asher 'al rosh gei shemanim halumei yayin. hineh khazaq ve'amiz ladonai kezerem barad sa'ar qateb kezerem mayim kabirim shotefim hiniakh la'arez beyad. beraglayim teiramasnah 'ateret gei'ut shikorei 'efrayim. vehayetah zizat nobel zebi tif'arto 'asher 'al rosh gei shemanim kebikurah beterem qayiz 'asher yir'eh haro'eh 'otah be'odah bekhapo yibla'enah. bayom hahu yihyeh ihoh zeba'ot la'ateret zebi velizfirat tif'arah lish'ar 'amo. uleruakh mishpat layosheb 'al hamishpat veligburah meshibei milkhamah sha'erah. vegam 'eleh bayayin shagu ubasheikhar ta'u kohen venabi shagu basheikhar nible'u min hayayin ta'u min hasheikhar shagu baro'eh paqu peliliyah. ki kal shulkhanot male'u qi zo'ah beli maqom. 'et mi yoreh dei'ah ve'et mi yabin shemu'ah gemulei meikhalab 'atiqei mishadayim. ki zav lazav zav lazav qav laqav qav laqav ze'er sham ze'er sham. ki bela'agei safah ubelashon 'akheret yedaber 'el ha'am hazeh. 'asher 'amar 'aleihem zot hamenukhah hanikhu le'ayef vezot hamargei'ah velo 'abu shemoa'. vehayah lahem debar ihoh zav lazav zav lazav qav laqav qav laqav ze'er sham ze'er sham lema'an yeilekhu vekhashelu 'akhor venishbaru venoqshu venilkadu. lakhen shim'u debar ihoh 'anshei lazon moshelei ha'am hazeh 'asher birushalim. ki 'amartem karatnu berit 'et mavet ve'im she'ol 'asinu khozeh shit shot shotef ki 'abar ya'abor lo yebo'einu ki samnu khazab makhseinu ubasheqer nistarenu. lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh hini yisad beziyon 'aben 'eben bokhan pinat yiqrat musad musad hama'amin lo yakhish. vesamti mishpat leqav uzedaqah lemishqalet veya'ah barad makhseh khazab veseiter mayim yishtofu. vekhupar beritekhem 'et mavet vekhazutekhem 'et she'ol lo taqum shot shotef ki ya'abor vihyitem lo lemirmas. midei 'abero yiqakh 'etkhem ki baboqer baboqer ya'abor bayom ubalayelah vehayah raq zeva'ah habin shemu'ah. ki qazar hamaza' meihistareia' vehamaseikhah zarah kehitkanes. ki khehar perazim yaqum ihoh ke'eimeq begib'on yirgaz la'asot ma'aseihu zar ma'aseihu vela'abod 'abodato nakheriyah 'abodato. ve'atah 'al titlozazu pen yekhzequ mosreikhem ki khalah venekherazah shama'ti mei'et 'adonai ihoh zeba'ot 'al kal ha'arez. ha'azinu veshim'u qoli haqshibu veshim'u 'imrati. hakhol hayom yakharosh hakhoresh lizroa' yefatakh visaded 'admato. halo 'im shivah faneha veheifiz qezakh vekhamon yizroq vesam khitah sorah use'orah nisman vekhusemet gebulato. veyisero lamishpat 'elohav yorenu. ki lo bekharuz yudash qezakh ve'ofan 'agalah 'al kamon yusab ki bamateh yeikhabet qezakh vekhamon bashabet. lekhem yudaq ki lo lanezakh 'adosh yedushenu vehamam gilgal 'eglato ufarashav lo yeduqenu. gam zot mei'im ihoh zeba'ot yaza'ah hifli 'eizah higdil tushiyah. ho 'ari'el 'ari'el qiryat khanah david sefu shanah 'al shanah khagim yinqofu. vahaziqoti la'ari'el vehayetah ta'aniyah va'aniyah vehayetah li ka'ari'el. vekhaniti khadur 'alayikh vezarti 'alayikh muzab vahaqimoti 'alayikh mezurot. veshafalt mei'erez tedabeiri umei'afar tishakh 'imratekh vehayah ke'ob mei'erez qolekh umei'afar 'imratekh tezafzef. vehayah ke'abaq daq hamon zarayikh ukhemoz 'ober hamon 'arizim vehayah lefeta' pit'om. mei'im ihoh zeba'ot tipaqed bera'am ubera'ash veqol gadol sufah use'arah velahab 'esh 'okheilah. vehayah kakhalom khazon laylah hamon kal hagoyim hazobe'im 'al 'ari'el vekhal zobeha umezodatah vehameziqim lah. vehayah ka'asher yakhalom hara'eb vehineh 'okhel veheiqiz vereiqah nafsho vekha'asher yakhalom hazamei vehineh shoteh veheiqiz vehineh 'ayef venafsho shoqeiqah ken yihyeh hamon kal hagoyim hazobe'im 'al har ziyon. hitmahmehu utemahu hishta'ash'u vasho'u shakheru velo yayin na'u velo sheikhar. ki nasakh 'aleikhem ihoh ruakh tardeimah vai'azem 'et 'eineikhem 'et hanebi'im ve'et rasheikhem hakhozim kisah. vatehi lakhem khazut hakol kedibrei haseifer hekhatum 'asher yitenu 'oto 'el yodeia' haseifer seifer leimor qera na zeh ve'amar lo 'ukhal ki khatum hu. venitan haseifer 'al 'asher lo yada' seifer leimor qera na zeh ve'amar lo yada'ti seifer. vayomer 'adonai ya'an ki nigash ha'am hazeh befiv ubisfatav kibeduni velibo rikhaq mimeni vatehi yir'atam 'oti mizvat 'anashim melumadah. lakhen hini yosif lehafli 'et ha'am hazeh haflei vafele ve'abedah khakhemat khakhamav ubinat nebonav tistatar. ho hama'amiqim ihoh lastir 'eizah vehayah bemakhshakh ma'aseihem vayomeru mi ro'einu umi yod'einu. hafkekhem 'im kekhomer hayozer yeikhasheb ki yomar ma'aseh le'oseihu lo 'asani veyeizer 'amar leyozro lo heibin. halo 'od me'at miz'ar veshab lebanon lakarmel vehakarmel laya'ar yeikhasheb. veshame'u bayom hahu hakheireshim dibrei seifer umei'ofel umeikhoshekh 'einei 'ivrim tir'enah. veyasefu 'anavim ihoh simkhah ve'ebyonei 'adam biqdosh yisra'el yagilu. ki 'afes 'ariz vekhalah lez venikhretu kal shoqedei 'aven. makhati'ei 'adam bedabar velamokhiakh basha'ar yeqoshun vayatu batohu zadiq. lakhen koh 'amar ihoh 'el bet ya'aqob 'asher padah 'et 'abraham lo 'atah yeibosh ya'aqob velo 'atah panav yekhevaru. ki bir'oto yeladav ma'aseh yadai beqirbo yaqdishu shemi vehiqdishu 'et qedosh ya'aqob ve'et 'elohei yisra'el ya'arizu. veyade'u to'ei ruakh binah verognim yilmedu leqakh. ho banim sorrim ne'um ihoh la'asot 'eizah velo mini velinsokh maseikhah velo rukhi lema'an sefot khatat 'al khatat. haholekhim laredet mizrayim ufi lo sha'alu la'oz bema'oz par'oh velakhsot bezel mizrayim. vehayah lakhem ma'oz par'oh leboshet vehekhasut bezel mizrayim likhlimah. ki hayu bezo'an sarav umal'akhav khanes yagi'u. kol hib'ish hobish 'al 'am lo yo'ilu lamo lo le'eizer velo leho'il ki leboshet vegam lekherpah. masa bahamot negeb be'erez zarah vezuqah labi valayish meihem 'ef'eh vesaraf me'ofef yis'u 'al ketef 'ayarim kheileihem ve'al dabeshet gemalim 'ozrotam 'al 'am lo yo'ilu. umizrayim hebel variq ya'zoru lakhen qarati lazot rahab hem shabet. 'atah bo khatebah 'al luakh 'itam ve'al seifer khuqah utehi leyom 'akharon la'ad 'ad 'olam. ki 'am meri hu banim kekhashim banim lo 'abu shemoa' torat ihoh. 'asher 'ameru laro'im lo tir'u velakhozim lo tekhezu lanu nekhokhot daberu lanu khalaqot khazu mahatalot. suru minei derekh hatu minei 'orakh hashbitu mipaneinu 'et qedosh yisra'el. lakhen koh 'amar qedosh yisra'el ya'an ma'asekhem badabar hazeh vatibtekhu be'osheq venaloz vatisha'anu 'alav. lakhen yihyeh lakhem he'avon hazeh keferez nofel nib'eh bekhomah nisgabah 'asher pit'om lefeta' yabo shibrah. ushebarah kesheiber neibel yozrim katut lo yakhmol velo yimazei bimkhitato kheres lakhtot 'esh miyaqud velakhsof mayim migebe. ki khoh 'amar 'adonai ihoh qedosh yisra'el beshubah vanakhat tivashei'un behashqet ubebitkhah tihyeh geburatkhem velo 'abitem. vatomeru lo khi 'al sus nanus 'al ken tenusun ve'al qal nirkab 'al ken yiqalu rodefeikhem. 'elef 'ekhad mipenei ga'arat 'ekhad mipenei ga'arat khamishah tanusu 'ad 'im notartem katoren 'al rosh hahar vekhanes 'al hagib'ah. velakhen yekhakeh ihoh lakhanankhem velakhen yarum lerakhemkhem ki 'elohei mishpat ihoh 'ashrei kal khokhei lo. ki 'am beziyon yeisheb birushalim bakho lo tibkeh khanon yakhenekha leqol za'aqekha keshame'ato 'anakh. venatan lakhem 'adonai lekhem zar umayim lakhaz velo yikanef 'od morekha vehayu 'einekha ro'ot 'et morekha. ve'azenekha tishma'nah dabar mei'akharekha leimor zeh haderekh lekhu bo ki ta'aminu vekhi tasme'ilu. vetimeitem 'et zipui pesilei khaspekha ve'et 'afudat maseikhat zehabekha tizrem kemo davah zei tomar lo. venatan metar zar'akha 'asher tizra' 'et ha'adamah velekhem tebu'at ha'adamah vehayah dashen veshamen yir'eh miqnekha bayom hahu kar nirkhab. veha'alafim veha'ayarim 'obedei ha'adamah belil khamiz yokheilu 'asher zoreh barakhat ubamizreh. vehayah 'al kal har gaboha ve'al kal gib'ah nisa'ah pelagim yiblei mayim beyom hereg rab binfol migdalim. vehayah 'or halebanah ke'or hakhamah ve'or hakhamah yihyeh shib'atayim ke'or shib'at hayamim beyom khabosh ihoh 'et sheber 'amo umakhaz makato yirpa. hineh shem ihoh ba mimerkhaq bo'er 'apo vekhobed masa'ah sefatav male'u za'am uleshono ke'esh 'okhalet. verukho kenakhal shotef 'ad zavar yekhezeh lahanafah goyim benafat shav veresen mat'eh 'al lekhayei 'amim. hashir yihyeh lakhem kelel hitqadesh khag vesimkhat leibab kaholekh bekhalil labo behar ihoh 'el zur yisra'el. vehishmia' ihoh 'et hod qolo venakhat zero'o yar'eh beza'af 'af velahab 'esh 'okheilah nefez vazerem ve'eben barad. ki miqol ihoh yeikhat 'ashur basheibet yakeh. vehayah kol ma'abar mateh musadah 'asher yaniakh ihoh 'alav betupim ubekhinorot ubemilkhamot tenufah nilkham bah bam. ki 'arukh mei'etmul tafeteh gam hu hi lamelekh hukhan he'miq hirkhib meduratah 'esh ve'eizim harbeh nishmat ihoh kenakhal gaferit bo'arah bah. ho hayoredim mizrayim le'ezrah 'al susim yisha'einu vayibtekhu 'al rekheb ki rab ve'al parashim ki 'azemu me'od velo sha'u 'al qedosh yisra'el ve'et ihoh lo darashu. vegam hu khakham vayabei ra' ve'et debarav lo heisir veqam 'al bet merei'im ve'al 'ezrat po'alei 'aven. umizrayim 'adam velo 'el vesuseihem basar velo ruakh ihoh yateh yado vekhashal 'ozer venafal 'azur veyakhdav kulam yikhlayun. ki khoh 'amar ihoh 'eilai ka'asher yehgeh ha'aryeh vehakefir 'al tarpo 'asher yiqarei 'alav melo ro'im miqolam lo yeikhat umeihamonam lo ya'aneh ken yeired ihoh zeba'ot lizbo 'al har ziyon ve'al gib'atah. keziporim 'afot ken yagen ihoh zeba'ot 'al yerushalim ganon vehizil pasoakh vehimlit. shubu la'asher he'miqu sarah benei yisra'el. ki bayom hahu yim'asun 'ish 'elilei khaspo ve'elilei zehabo 'asher 'asu lakhem yedeikhem khet. venafal 'ashur bekhereb lo 'ish vekhereb lo 'adam tokhalenu venas lo mipenei khereb ubakhurav lamas yihyu. vesal'o mimagor ya'abor vekhatu mines sarav ne'um ihoh 'asher 'ur lo beziyon vetanur lo birushalim. hen lezedeq yimlakh melekh ulesarim lemishpat yasoru. vehayah 'ish kemakhabei ruakh veseiter zarem kefalgei mayim bezayon kezel sela' kabed be'erez 'ayeifah. velo tish'enah 'einei ro'im ve'azenei shome'im tiqshabnah. ulebab nimharim yabin lada'at uleshon 'ilegim temaher ledaber zakhot. lo yiqarei 'od lenabal nadib ulekhilai lo yei'amer shoa'. ki nabal nebalah yedaber velibo ya'aseh 'aven la'asot khonef uledaber 'el ihoh to'ah lehariq nefesh ra'eb umashqeh zamei yakhsir. vekheilai keilav ra'im hu zimot ya'az lekhabel 'anavim 'aniyim be'imrei sheqer ubedaber 'ebyon mishpat. venadib nedibot ya'az vehu 'al nedibot yaqum. nashim sha'ananot qomenah shema'nah qoli banot botkhot ha'zenah 'imrati. yamim 'al shanah tirgaznah botekhot ki kalah bazir 'osef beli yabo. khirdu sha'ananot regazah botekhot peshotah ve'orah vakhagorah 'al khalazayim. 'al shadayim sofedim 'al sedei khemed 'al gefen poriyah. 'al 'admat 'ami qoz shamir ta'aleh ki 'al kal batei masos qiryah 'alizah. ki 'armon nutash hamon 'ir 'uzab 'ofel vabakhan hayah be'ad me'arot 'ad 'olam mesos pera'im mir'eh 'adarim. 'ad yei'areh 'aleinu ruakh mimarom vehayah midbar lakarmel vekharmel vehakarmel laya'ar yeikhasheb. veshakhan bamidbar mishpat uzedaqah bakarmel teisheb. vehayah ma'aseh hazedaqah shalom va'abodat hazedaqah hashqet vabetakh 'ad 'olam. veyashab 'ami binveh shalom ubemishkenot mibtakhim ubimnukhot sha'ananot. ubarad beredet haya'ar ubashiflah tishpal ha'ir. 'ashreikhem zore'ei 'al kal mayim meshalekhei regel hashor vehakhamor. ho shoded ve'atah lo shadud uboged velo bagedu bo kahatimkha shoded tushad kanelotekha libgod yibgedu bakh. ihoh khaneinu lekha qivinu heyeh zero'am labeqarim 'af yeshu'ateinu be'et zarah. miqol hamon nadedu 'amim meiromutekha nafezu goyim. ve'usaf shelalkhem 'osef hekhasil kemashaq geibim shoqeq bo. nisgab ihoh ki shokhen marom milei ziyon mishpat uzedaqah. vehayah 'emunat 'itekha khosen yeshu'ot khakhemat vada'at yir'at ihoh hi 'ozaro. hen 'er'elam za'aqu khuzah mal'akhei shalom mar yibkayun. nashamu mesilot shabat 'ober 'orakh heifer berit ma'as 'arim lo khashab 'enosh. 'abal 'umlelah 'arez hekhpir lebanon qamal hayah hasharon ka'arabah veno'er bashan vekharmel. 'atah 'aqum yomar ihoh 'atah 'eiromam 'atah 'enasei. taharu khashash teiledu qash rukhakhem 'esh tokhalkhem. vehayu 'amim misrefot sid qozim kesukhim ba'esh yizatu. shim'u rekhoqim 'asher 'asiti ude'u qerobim geburati. pakhadu beziyon khata'im 'akhazah re'adah khaneifim mi yagur lanu 'esh 'okheilah mi yagur lanu moqdei 'olam. holekh zedaqot vedober meisharim mo'es bebeza' ma'ashaqot no'er kapav mitemokh bashokhad 'otem 'azeno mishemoa' damim ve'ozem 'einav meire'ot bera'. hu meromim yishkon mezadot sela'im misgabo lakhmo nitan meimav ne'emanim. melekh beyafeyo tekhezenah 'einekha tir'enah 'erez markhaqim. libekha yehgeh 'eimah 'ayeh sofer 'ayeh shoqel 'ayeh sofer 'et hamigdalim. 'et 'am no'az lo tir'eh 'am 'imqei safah mishemoa' nil'ag lashon 'en binah. khazeh ziyon qiryat mo'adeinu 'einekha tir'enah yerushalim naveh sha'anan 'ohel bal yiz'an bal yisa' yeteidotav lanezakh vekhal khabalav bal yinateiqu. ki 'im sham 'adir ihoh lanu meqom neharim ye'orim rakhabei yadayim bal teilekh bo 'oni shayit vezi 'adir lo ya'abrenu. ki ihoh shofeteinu ihoh mekhoqeqeinu ihoh malkeinu hu yoshi'einu. niteshu khabalayikh bal yekhazequ khen tarenam bal paresu nes 'az khulaq 'ad shalal marbeh piskhim bazezu baz. ubal yomar shakhen khaliti ha'am hayosheb bah nesu 'avon. qirbu goyim lishmoa' ule'umim haqshibu tishma' ha'arez umelo'ah teibel vekhal ze'eza'eha. ki qezef ihoh 'al kal hagoyim vekheimah 'al kal zeba'am hekherimam netanam latabakh. vekhaleihem yushlakhu ufigreihem ya'aleh ba'esham venamasu harim midamam. venamaqu kal zeba hashamayim venagolu khaseifer hashamayim vekhal zeba'am yibol kinbol 'aleh migefen ukhenobelet mite'einah. ki rivetah bashamayim kharbi hineh 'al 'edom teired ve'al 'am khermi lemishpat. khereb ihoh male'ah dam hudashnah meikheileb midam karim ve'atudim meikheileb kilyot 'eilim ki zebakh ihoh bebazerah vetebakh gadol be'erez 'edom. veyaredu re'eimim 'imam ufarim 'im 'abirim verivetah 'arzam midam va'afaram meikheileb yedushan. ki yom naqam ihoh shenat shilumim lerib ziyon. venehefkhu nekhaleha lezefet va'afarah legaferit vehayetah 'arzah lezefet bo'eirah. laylah veyomam lo tikhbeh le'olam ya'aleh 'ashanah midor lador tekherab leneizakh nezakhim 'en 'ober bah. vireishuha qa'at veqipod veyanshof ve'oreb yishkenu bah venatah 'aleha qav tohu ve'abnei bohu. khoreha ve'en sham melukhah yiqra'u vekhal sareha yihyu 'afes. ve'aletah 'armenoteha sirim qimos vakhoakh bemibzareha vehayetah neveh tanim khazir libnot ya'anah. ufageshu ziyim 'et 'iyim vesa'ir 'al rei'eihu yiqra 'akh sham hirgi'ah lilit umaze'ah lah manoakh. shamah qinenah qipoz vatemalet ubaqe'ah vedagerah bezilah 'akh sham niqbezu dayot 'ishah re'utah. dirshu mei'al seifer ihoh uqera'u 'akhat meihenah lo ne'darah 'ishah re'utah lo faqadu ki fi hu zivah verukho hu qibezan. vehu hipil lahen goral veyado khileqatah lahem baqav 'ad 'olam yirashuha ledor vador yishkenu bah. yesusum midbar veziyah vetagel 'arabah vetifrakh kakhabazalet. paroakh tifrakh vetagel 'af gilat veranen kebod halebanon nitan lah hadar hakarmel vehasharon hemah yir'u khebod ihoh hadar 'eloheinu. khazequ yadayim rafot ubirkayim koshelot 'ameizu. 'imru lenimharei leb khizqu 'al tira'u hineh 'eloheikhem naqam yabo gemul 'elohim hu yabo veyosha'akhem. 'az tipaqakhnah 'einei 'ivrim ve'azenei kheireshim tipatakhnah. 'az yedaleg ka'ayal piseiakh vetaron leshon 'ilem ki nibqe'u bamidbar mayim unekhalim ba'arabah. vehayah hasharab la'agam vezima'on lemabu'ei mayim binveh tanim ribzah khazir leqaneh vagome. vehayah sham maslul vaderekh vederekh haqodesh yiqarei lah lo ya'abrenu tamei vehu lamo holekh derekh ve'evilim lo yit'u. lo yihyeh sham 'aryeh uferiz khayot bal ya'alenah lo timazei sham vehalekhu ge'ulim. ufeduyei ihoh yeshubun uba'u ziyon berinah vesimkhat 'olam 'al rosham sason vesimkhah yasigu venasu yagon va'anakhah. vayhi be'arba' 'esreh shanah lamelekh khizqiyahu 'alah sankheirib melekh 'ashur 'al kal 'arei yehudah habezurot vayitpesem. vayishlakh melekh 'ashur 'et rab shaqeh milakhish yerushalemah 'el hamelekh khizqiyahu bekhel kabed vaya'amod bit'alat habereikhah ha'elyonah bimsilat sedeh khobes. vayeizei 'eilav 'elyaqim ben khilqiyahu 'asher 'al habayit veshebna hasofer veyo'akh ben 'asaf hamazkir. vayomer 'aleihem rab shaqeh 'imru na 'el khizqiyahu koh 'amar hamelekh hagadol melekh 'ashur mah habitakhon hazeh 'asher batakheta. 'amarti 'akh debar sefatayim 'eizah ugeburah lamilkhamah 'atah 'al mi batakhta ki maradta bi. hineh batakhta 'al mish'enet haqaneh harazuz hazeh 'al mizrayim 'asher yisamekh 'ish 'alav uba bekhapo uneqabah ken par'oh melekh mizrayim lekhal habotekhim 'alav. vekhi tomar 'eilai 'el ihoh 'eloheinu batakhenu halo hu 'asher heisir khizqiyahu 'et bamotav ve'et mizbekhotav vayomer lihudah velirushalim lifnei hamizbeiakh hazeh tishtakhavu. ve'atah hit'areb na 'et 'adoni hamelekh 'ashur ve'etenah lekha 'alpayim susim 'im tukhal latet lekha rokhebim 'aleihem. ve'ekh tashib 'et penei fakhat 'akhad 'abdei 'adoni haqtanim vatibtakh lekha 'al mizrayim lerekheb ulefarashim. ve'atah hamibal'adei ihoh 'aliti 'al ha'arez hazot lehashkhitah ihoh 'amar 'eilai 'aleh 'el ha'arez hazot vehashkhitah. vayomer 'elyaqim veshebna veyo'akh 'el rab shaqeh daber na 'el 'abadekha 'aramit ki shome'im 'anakhenu ve'al tedaber 'eileinu yehudit be'azenei ha'am 'asher 'al hakhomah. vayomer rab shaqeh ha'el 'adonekha ve'eilekha shelakhani 'adoni ledaber 'et hadebarim ha'eleh halo 'al ha'anashim hayoshebim 'al hakhomah le'ekhol 'et khar'eihem zo'atam velishtot 'et sheineihem meimei ragleihem 'imakhem. vaya'amod rab shaqeh vayiqra beqol gadol yehudit vayomer shim'u 'et dibrei hamelekh hagadol melekh 'ashur. koh 'amar hamelekh 'al yashi lakhem khizqiyahu ki lo yukhal lehazil 'etkhem. ve'al yabtakh 'etkhem khizqiyahu 'el ihoh leimor hazel yazileinu ihoh lo tinaten ha'ir hazot beyad melekh 'ashur. 'al tishme'u 'el khizqiyahu ki khoh 'amar hamelekh 'ashur 'asu 'iti berakhah uze'u 'eilai ve'ikhlu 'ish gafno ve'ish te'einato ushetu 'ish mei boro. 'ad bo'i velaqakhti 'etkhem 'el 'erez ke'arzekhem 'erez dagan vetirosh 'erez lekhem ukheramim. pen yasit 'etkhem khizqiyahu leimor ihoh yazileinu hahizilu 'elohei hagoyim 'ish 'et 'arzo miyad melekh 'ashur. 'ayeh 'elohei khamat ve'arpad 'ayeh 'elohei sefarvayim vekhi hizilu 'et shomeron miyadi. mi bekhal 'elohei ha'arazot ha'eleh 'asher hizilu 'et 'arzam miyadi ki yazil ihoh 'et yerushalim miyadi. vayakharishu velo 'anu 'oto dabar ki mizvat hamelekh hi leimor lo ta'anuhu. vayabo 'elyaqim ben khilqiyahu 'asher 'al habayit veshebna hasofer veyo'akh ben 'asaf hamazkir 'el khizqiyahu qeru'ei begadim vayagidu lo 'et dibrei rab shaqeh. vayhi kishmoa' hamelekh khizqiyahu vayiqra' 'et begadav vayitkas basaq vayabo bet ihoh. vayishlakh 'et 'elyaqim 'asher 'al habayit ve'et shebna hasofer ve'et ziqnei hakohanim mitkasim basaqim 'el yesha'yahu ben 'amoz hanabi. vayomeru 'eilav koh 'amar khizqiyahu yom zarah vetokheikhah une'azah hayom hazeh ki ba'u banim 'ad mashber vekhoakh 'ayin leleidah. 'ulai yishma' ihoh 'elohekha 'et dibrei rab shaqeh 'asher shelakho melekh 'ashur 'adonav lekharef 'elohim khai vehokhiakh badebarim 'asher shama' ihoh 'elohekha venasata tefilah be'ad hashe'eirit hanimza'ah. vayabo'u 'abdei hamelekh khizqiyahu 'el yesha'yahu. vayomer 'aleihem yesha'yahu koh tomerun 'el 'adoneikhem koh 'amar ihoh 'al tira mipenei hadebarim 'asher shama'ta 'asher gidefu na'arei melekh 'ashur 'oti. hini noten bo ruakh veshama' shemu'ah veshab 'el 'arzo vehipaltiv bakhereb be'arzo. vayashab rab shaqeh vayimza 'et melekh 'ashur nilkham 'al libnah ki shama' ki nasa' milakhish. vayishma' 'al tirhaqah melekh kush leimor yaza lehilakhem 'itakh vayishma' vayishlakh mal'akhim 'el khizqiyahu leimor. koh tomerun 'el khizqiyahu melekh yehudah leimor 'al yashi'akha 'elohekha 'asher 'atah boteiakh bo leimor lo tinaten yerushalim beyad melekh 'ashur. hineh 'atah shama'ta 'asher 'asu malkhei 'ashur lekhal ha'arazot lehakharimam ve'atah tinazel. hahizilu 'otam 'elohei hagoyim 'asher hishkhitu 'abotai 'et gozan ve'et kharan verezef ubenei 'eden 'asher bitlasar. 'ayeh melekh khamat umelekh 'arpad umelekh la'ir sefarvayim heina' ve'ivah. vayiqakh khizqiyahu 'et hasefarim miyad hamal'akhim vayiqra'eihu vaya'al bet ihoh vayifreseihu khizqiyahu lifnei ihoh. vayitpalel khizqiyahu 'el ihoh leimor. ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el yosheb hakerubim 'atah hu ha'elohim lebadekha lekhol mamlekhot ha'arez 'atah 'asita 'et hashamayim ve'et ha'arez. hateh ihoh 'azenekha ushema' peqakh ihoh 'einekha ure'eh ushema' 'et kal dibrei sankheirib 'asher shalakh lekharef 'elohim khai. 'amenam ihoh hekheribu malkhei 'ashur 'et kal ha'arazot ve'et 'arzam. venaton 'et 'eloheihem ba'esh ki lo 'elohim hemah ki 'im ma'aseh yedei 'adam 'ez va'eben vai'abedum. ve'atah ihoh 'eloheinu hoshi'einu miyado veyeide'u kal mamlekhot ha'arez ki 'atah ihoh lebadekha. vayishlakh yesha'yahu ben 'amoz 'el khizqiyahu leimor koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el 'asher hitpalalta 'eilai 'el sankheirib melekh 'ashur. zeh hadabar 'asher diber ihoh 'alav bazah lekha la'agah lekha betulat bat ziyon 'akharekha rosh heini'ah bat yerushalim. 'et mi kheirafta vegidafta ve'al mi harimotah qol vatisa marom 'einekha 'el qedosh yisra'el. beyad 'abadekha kheirafta 'adonai vatomer berob rikhbi 'ani 'aliti merom harim yarketei lebanon ve'ekhrot qomat 'arazav mibkhar beroshav ve'abo merom qizo ya'ar karmilo. 'ani qarti veshatiti mayim ve'akhrib bekhaf pe'amai kol ye'orei mazor. halo shama'ta lemeirakhoq 'otah 'asiti mimei qedem vizartiha 'atah habeitiha utehi lehash'ot galim nizim 'arim bezurot. veyoshebeihen qizrei yad khatu vaboshu hayu 'eiseb sadeh viraq deshe khazir gagot ushedeimah lifnei qamah. veshibtekha vezeitekha ubo'akha yada'eti ve'et hitragezkha 'eilai. ya'an hitragezkha 'eilai vesha'anankha 'alah be'azenai vesamti khakhi be'apekha umitgi bisfatekha vahashibotikha baderekh 'asher bata bah. vezeh lekha ha'ot 'akhol hashanah safiakh ubashanah hasheinit shakhis ubashanah hashelishit zir'u veqizru venit'u kheramim ve'akhol ve'ikhlu firyam. veyasefah peleitat bet yehudah hanish'arah shoresh lematah ve'asah feri lema'elah. ki mirushalim teizei she'eirit ufeleitah meihar ziyon qin'at ihoh zeba'ot ta'aseh zot. lakhen koh 'amar ihoh 'el melekh 'ashur lo yabo 'el ha'ir hazot velo yoreh sham khez velo yeqademenah magen velo yishpokh 'oleha solelah. baderekh 'asher ba bah yashub ve'el ha'ir hazot lo yabo ne'um ihoh. veganoti 'al ha'ir hazot lehoshi'ah lema'ani ulema'an david 'abdi. vayeizei mal'akh ihoh vayakeh bemakhaneh 'ashur mei'ah ushemonim vakhamishah 'alef vayashkimu baboqer vehineh khulam pegarim meitim. vayisa' vayeilekh vayashab sankheirib melekh 'ashur vayeisheb benineveh. vayhi hu mishtakhaveh bet nisrokh 'elohav ve'adramelekh vesar'ezer banav hikuhu bakhereb vehemah nimletu 'erez 'ararat vayimlokh 'eisar khadon beno takhtav. bayamim hahem khalah khizqiyahu lamut vayabo 'eilav yesha'yahu ben 'amoz hanabi vayomer 'eilav koh 'amar ihoh zav lebeitekha ki met 'atah velo tikhyeh. vayaseb khizqiyahu panav 'el haqir vayitpalel 'el ihoh. vayomar 'anah ihoh zekhar na 'et 'asher hithalakhti lefanekha be'emet ubeleb shalem vehatob be'einekha 'asiti vayeibek khizqiyahu bekhi gadol. vayhi debar ihoh 'el yesha'yahu leimor. halokh ve'amarta 'el khizqiyahu koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei david 'abikha shama'ti 'et tefilatekha ra'iti 'et dim'atekha hini yosif 'al yamekha khamesh 'esreh shanah. umikaf melekh 'ashur 'azilekha ve'et ha'ir hazot veganoti 'al ha'ir hazot. vezeh lekha ha'ot mei'et ihoh 'asher ya'aseh ihoh 'et hadabar hazeh 'asher diber. hini meishib 'et zel hama'alot 'asher yaredah bema'alot 'akhaz bashemesh 'akhoranit 'eser ma'alot vatashab hashemesh 'eser ma'alot bama'alot 'asher yaradah. mikhtab lekhizqiyahu melekh yehudah bakhaloto vaykhi meikhaleyo. 'ani 'amarti bidmi yamai 'eileikhah besha'arei she'ol puqadti yeter shenotai. 'amarti lo 'er'eh yah yah be'erez hakhayim lo 'abit 'adam 'od 'im yoshebei khadel. dori nisa' veniglah mini ke'ohel ro'i qipadti kha'oreg khayai midalah yebaze'eini miyom 'ad laylah tashlimeini. shiviti 'ad boqer ka'ari ken yeshaber kal 'azmotai miyom 'ad laylah tashlimeini. kesus 'agur ken 'azafzef 'ehgeh kayonah dalu 'einai lamarom 'adonai 'asheqah li 'arebeini. mah 'adaber ve'amar li vehu 'asah 'edadeh khal shenotai 'al mar nafshi. 'adonai 'aleihem yikhyu ulekhal bahen khayei rukhi vetakhalimeini vehakhayeini. hineh leshalom mar li mar ve'atah khashaqta nafshi mishakhat beli ki hishlakhta 'akharei geivekha kal khata'ai. ki lo she'ol todeka mavet yehaleka lo yesaberu yordei bor 'el 'amitekha. khai khai hu yodekha kamoni hayom 'ab lebanim yodia' 'el 'amitekha. ihoh lehoshi'eini uneginotai nenagen kal yemei khayeinu 'al bet ihoh. vayomer yesha'yahu yis'u debelet te'einim veyimrekhu 'al hashekhin veyekhi. vayomer khizqiyahu mah 'ot ki 'e'eleh bet ihoh. ba'et hahiv shalakh merodakh bal'adan ben bal'adan melekh babel sefarim uminkhah 'el khizqiyahu vayishma' ki khalah vayekhezaq. vayismakh 'aleihem khizqiyahu vayar'em 'et bet nekhotah nekhoto 'et hakesef ve'et hazahab ve'et habesamim ve'et hashemen hatob ve'et kal bet keilav ve'et kal 'asher nimza be'ozerotav lo hayah dabar 'asher lo her'am khizqiyahu bebeito ubekhal memshalto. vayabo yesha'yahu hanabi 'el hamelekh khizqiyahu vayomer 'eilav mah 'ameru ha'anashim ha'eleh umei'ayin yabo'u 'eilekha vayomer khizqiyahu mei'erez rekhoqah ba'u 'eilai mibabel. vayomer mah ra'u bebeitekha vayomer khizqiyahu 'et kal 'asher bebeiti ra'u lo hayah dabar 'asher lo hir'itim be'ozrotai. vayomer yesha'yahu 'el khizqiyahu shema' debar ihoh zeba'ot. hineh yamim ba'im venisa kal 'asher bebeitekha va'asher 'azeru 'abotekha 'ad hayom hazeh babel lo yivater dabar 'amar ihoh. umibanekha 'asher yeize'u mimekha 'asher tolid yiqakhu vehayu sarisim beheikhal melekh babel. vayomer khizqiyahu 'el yesha'yahu tob debar ihoh 'asher dibarta vayomer ki yihyeh shalom ve'emet beyamai. nakhamu nakhamu 'ami yomar 'eloheikhem. daberu 'al leb yerushalim veqir'u 'eileha ki male'ah zeba'ah ki nirzah 'avonah ki laqekhah miyad ihoh kiflayim bekhal khatoteha. qol qorei bamidbar panu derekh ihoh yasheru ba'arabah mesilah leiloheinu. kal ge yinasei vekhal har vegib'ah yishpalu vehayah he'aqob lemishor veharekhasim lebiq'ah. veniglah kebod ihoh vera'u khal basar yakhdav ki pi ihoh diber. qol 'omer qera ve'amar mah 'eqra kal habasar khazir vekhal khasdo keziz hasadeh. yabesh khazir nabel ziz ki ruakh ihoh nashebah bo 'akhen khazir ha'am. yabesh khazir nabel ziz udebar 'eloheinu yaqum le'olam. 'al har gaboha 'ali lakh mebaseret ziyon harimi bakoakh qolekh mebaseret yerushalim harimi 'al tira'i 'imri le'arei yehudah hineh 'eloheikhem. hineh 'adonai ihoh bekhazaq yabo uzero'o moshelah lo hineh sekharo 'ito ufe'ulato lefanav. kero'eh 'edro yir'eh bizro'o yeqabez tela'im ubekheiqo yisa 'alot yenahel. mi madad besha'olo mayim veshamayim bazeret tiken vekhal bashalish 'afar ha'arez veshaqal bapeles harim ugeba'ot bemozenayim. mi tiken 'et ruakh ihoh ve'ish 'azato yodi'enu. 'et mi no'az vaybineihu vaylamedeihu be'orakh mishpat vaylamedeihu da'at vederekh tebunot yodi'enu. hen goyim kemar mideli ukheshakhaq mozenayim nekhshabu hen 'iyim kadaq yitol. ulebanon 'en dei ba'er vekhayato 'en dei 'olah. kal hagoyim ke'ayin negdo mei'efes vatohu nekhshebu lo. ve'el mi tedameyun 'el umah demut ta'arkhu lo. hapesel nasakh kharash vezoref bazahab yeraqe'enu uretuqot kesef zoref. hamsukan terumah 'ez lo yirqab yibkhar kharash khakham yebaqesh lo lehakhin pesel lo yimot. halo teide'u halo tishma'u halo hugad meirosh lakhem halo habinotem mosdot ha'arez. hayosheb 'al khug ha'arez veyoshebeha kakhagabim hanoteh khadoq shamayim vayimtakhem ka'ohel lashabet. hanoten roznim le'ayin shofetei 'erez katohu 'asah. 'af bal nita'u 'af bal zora'u 'af bal shoresh ba'arez giz'am vegam nashaf bahem vayibashu use'arah kaqash tisa'em. ve'el mi tedameyuni ve'eshveh yomar qadosh. se'u marom 'eineikhem ure'u mi bara 'eleh hamozi bemispar zeba'am lekhulam beshem yiqra meirob 'onim ve'amiz koakh 'ish lo ne'dar. lamah tomar ya'aqob utedaber yisra'el nisterah darki ihoh umei'elohai mishpati ya'abor. halo yada'ta 'im lo shama'ta 'elohei 'olam ihoh borei qezot ha'arez lo yi'af velo yiga' 'en kheiqer litbunato. noten laya'ef koakh ule'en 'onim 'azemah yarbeh. veyi'afu ne'arim veyiga'u ubakhurim kashol yikasheilu. veqoyei ihoh yakhalifu khoakh ya'alu 'eiber kanesharim yaruzu velo yiga'u yeilekhu velo yi'afu. hakharishu 'eilai 'iyim ule'umim yakhalifu khoakh yigeshu 'az yedabeiru yakhdav lamishpat niqrabah. mi hei'ir mimizrakh zedeq yiqra'eihu leraglo yiten lefanav goyim umelakhim yard yiten ke'afar kharbo keqash nidaf qashto. yirdefem ya'abor shalom 'orakh beraglav lo yabo. mi fa'al ve'asah qorei hadorot meirosh 'ani ihoh rishon ve'et 'akharonim 'ani hu. ra'u 'iyim veyira'u qezot ha'arez yekheradu qarebu vaye'etayun. 'ish 'et rei'eihu ya'zoru ule'akhiv yomar khazaq. vaykhazeq kharash 'et zoref makhaliq patish 'et holem pa'am 'omer ladebeq tob hu vaykhazeqeihu bemasmerim lo yimot. ve'atah yisra'el 'abdi ya'aqob 'asher bekhartikha zera' 'abraham 'ohabi. 'asher hekhezaqtikha miqzot ha'arez umei'azileha qeratikha va'omar lekha 'abdi 'atah bekhartikha velo me'astikha. 'al tira ki 'imekha 'ani 'al tishta' ki 'ani 'elohekha 'imaztikha 'af 'azartikha 'af temakhtikha bimin zidqi. hen yeiboshu veyikalemu kol hanekherim bakh yihyu khe'ayin veyobedu 'anshei ribekha. tebaqshem velo timza'em 'anshei mazutekha yihyu khe'ayin ukhe'efes 'anshei milkhamtekha. ki 'ani ihoh 'elohekha makhaziq yeminekha ha'omer lekha 'al tira 'ani 'azartikha. 'al tire'i tola'at ya'aqob metei yisra'el 'ani 'azartikh ne'um ihoh vego'alekh qedosh yisra'el. hineh samtikh lemorag kharuz khadash ba'al pifiyot tadush harim vetadoq ugeba'ot kamoz tasim. tizrem veruakh tisa'em use'arah tafiz 'otam ve'atah tagil ihoh biqdosh yisra'el tithalal. ha'aniyim veha'ebyonim mebaqshim mayim va'ayin leshonam bazama nashatah 'ani ihoh 'e'enem 'elohei yisra'el lo 'e'ezbem. 'eftakh 'al shefayim neharot ubetokh beqa'ot ma'yanot 'asim midbar la'agam mayim ve'erez ziyah lemoza'ei mayim. 'eten bamidbar 'erez shitah vahadas ve'ez shamen 'asim ba'arabah berosh tidhar ute'ashur yakhdav. lema'an yir'u veyeide'u veyasimu veyaskilu yakhdav ki yad ihoh 'asetah zot uqedosh yisra'el bera'ah. qarebu ribekhem yomar ihoh hagishu 'azumoteikhem yomar melekh ya'aqob. yagishu veyagidu lanu 'et 'asher tiqrenah harishonot mah henah hagidu venasimah libeinu veneide'ah 'akharitan 'o haba'ot hashmi'unu. hagidu ha'otiyot le'akhor veneide'ah ki 'elohim 'atem 'af teitibu vetarei'u venishta'ah veneire venir'eh yakhdav. hen 'atem mei'ayin ufa'alekhem mei'afa' to'eibah yibkhar bakhem. ha'iroti mizafon vayat mimizrakh shemesh yiqra bishmi veyabo seganim kemo khomer ukhemo yozer yirmas tit. mi higid meirosh veneida'ah umilefanim venomar zadiq 'af 'en magid 'af 'en mashmia' 'af 'en shomeia' 'imreikhem. rishon leziyon hineh hinam velirushalim mebaser 'eten. ve'eire ve'en 'ish umei'eleh ve'en yo'ez ve'esh'alem veyashibu dabar. hen kulam 'aven 'efes ma'aseihem ruakh vatohu niskeihem. hen 'abdi 'etmakh bo bekhiri razetah nafshi natati rukhi 'alav mishpat lagoyim yozi. lo yiz'aq velo yisa velo yashmia' bakhuz qolo. qaneh razuz lo yishbor ufishtah kheihah lo yekhabenah le'emet yozi mishpat. lo yikhheh velo yaruz 'ad yasim ba'arez mishpat uletorato 'iyim yeyakheilu. koh 'amar ha'el ihoh borei hashamayim venoteihem roqa' ha'arez veze'eza'eha noten neshamah la'am 'aleha veruakh laholekhim bah. 'ani ihoh qeratikha bezedeq ve'akhzeq beyadekha ve'ezarekha ve'etenkha librit 'am le'or goyim. lifqoakh 'einayim 'ivrot lehozi mimasger 'asir mibet kele yoshebei khoshekh. 'ani ihoh hu shemi ukhebodi le'akher lo 'eten utehilati lapesilim. harishonot hineh ba'u vakhadashot 'ani magid beterem tizmakhnah 'ashmi' 'etkhem. shiru ihoh shir khadash tehilato miqzeh ha'arez yordei hayam umelo'o 'iyim veyoshebeihem. yis'u midbar ve'arav khazeirim teisheb qeidar yaronu yoshebei sela' meirosh harim yizvakhu. yasimu ihoh kabod utehilato ba'iyim yagidu. ihoh kagibor yeizei ke'ish milkhamot ya'ir qin'ah yaria' 'af yazriakh 'al 'oyebav yitgabar. hekhesheiti mei'olam 'akharish 'et'apaq kayoleidah 'ef'eh 'eshom ve'esh'af yakhad. 'akharib harim ugeba'ot vekhal 'esbam 'obish vesamti neharot la'iyim va'agamim 'obish. veholakhti 'ivrim bederekh lo yada'u bintibot lo yade'u 'adrikhem 'asim makhshakh lifneihem la'or uma'aqashim lemishor 'eleh hadebarim 'asitim velo 'azabtim. nasogu 'akhor yeiboshu boshet habotekhim bapasel ha'omerim lemaseikhah 'atem 'eloheinu. hakheireshim shema'u veha'ivrim habitu lir'ot. mi 'iver ki 'im 'abdi vekheiresh kemal'akhi 'eshlakh mi 'iver kimshulam ve'iver ke'ebed ihoh. ra'ita ra'ot rabot velo tishmor paqoakh 'azenayim velo yishma'. ihoh khafez lema'an zidqo yagdil torah veya'dir. vehu 'am bazuz veshasui hafeiakh bakhurim kulam ubebatei khela'im hakheba'u hayu labaz ve'en mazil meshisah ve'en 'omer hashab. mi bakhem ya'azin zot yaqshib veyishma' le'akhor. mi natan limshoseh limshisah ya'aqob veyisra'el lebozezim halo ihoh zu khatanu lo velo 'abu bidrakhav halokh velo shame'u betorato. vayishpokh 'alav kheimah 'apo ve'ezuz milkhamah vatelahateihu misabib velo yada' vatib'ar bo velo yasim 'al leb. ve'atah koh 'amar ihoh bora'akha ya'aqob veyozerkha yisra'el 'al tira ki ge'altikha qarati beshimkha li 'atah. ki ta'abor bamayim 'itekha 'ani ubaneharot lo yishtefukha ki teilekh bemo 'esh lo tikaveh velehabah lo tib'ar bakh. ki 'ani ihoh 'elohekha qedosh yisra'el moshi'ekha natati khaferekha mizrayim kush useba takhtekha. mei'asher yaqarta be'einai nikhbadta va'ani 'ahabtikha ve'eten 'adam takhtekha ule'umim takhat nafshekha. 'al tira ki 'itekha 'ani mimizrakh 'abi zar'ekha umima'arab 'aqabezeka. 'omar lazafon teini uleteiman 'al tikhla'i habi'i banai meirakhoq ubenotai miqzeh ha'arez. kol haniqra bishmi velikhbodi berativ yezartiv 'af 'asitiv. hozi 'am 'iver ve'einayim yesh vekheireshim ve'azenayim lamo. kal hagoyim niqbezu yakhdav veyei'asefu le'umim mi bahem yagid zot verishonot yashmi'unu yitenu 'eideihem veyizdaqu veyishme'u veyomeru 'emet. 'atem 'eidai ne'um ihoh ve'abdi 'asher bakhareti lema'an teide'u veta'aminu li vetabinu ki 'ani hu lefanai lo nozar 'el ve'akharai lo yihyeh. 'anokhi 'anokhi ihoh ve'en mibal'adai moshia'. 'anokhi higadti vehosha'ti vehishma'ti ve'en bakhem zar ve'atem 'eidai ne'um ihoh va'ani 'el. gam miyom 'ani hu ve'en miyadi mazil 'ef'al umi yeshibenah. koh 'amar ihoh go'alkhem qedosh yisra'el lema'ankhem shilakhti babelah vehoradti barikhim kulam vekhasdim ba'oniyot rinatam. 'ani ihoh qedoshekhem borei yisra'el malkekhem. koh 'amar ihoh hanoten bayam darekh ubemayim 'azim netibah. hamozi rekheb vasus khayil ve'izuz yakhdav yishkebu bal yaqumu da'akhu kapishtah khabu. 'al tizkeru rishonot veqadmoniyot 'al titbonanu. hini 'oseh khadashah 'atah tizmakh halo teida'uha 'af 'asim bamidbar derekh bishimon neharot. tekhabedeini khayat hasadeh tanim ubenot ya'anah ki natati bamidbar mayim neharot bishimon lehashqot 'ami bekhiri. 'am zu yazarti li tehilati yesapeiru. velo 'oti qarata ya'aqob ki yaga'ta bi yisra'el. lo heibeita li seh 'olotekha uzebakhekha lo khibadtani lo he'ebadtikha beminkhah velo hoga'tikha bilbonah. lo qanita li bakesef qaneh vekheileb zebakhekha lo hirvitani 'akh he'ebadtani bekhatotekha hoga'tani ba'avonotekha. 'anokhi 'anokhi hu mokheh fesha'ekha lema'ani vekhatotekha lo 'ezkor. hazkireini nishafetah yakhad saper 'atah lema'an tizdaq. 'abikha harishon khata umelizekha pashe'u bi. va'akhalel sarei qodesh ve'etenah lakheirem ya'aqob veyisra'el legidufim. ve'atah shema' ya'aqob 'abdi veyisra'el bakharti bo. koh 'amar ihoh 'osekha veyozerkha mibeten ya'zereka 'al tira 'abdi ya'aqob vishurun bakharti bo. ki 'ezaq mayim 'al zamei venozelim 'al yabashah 'ezoq rukhi 'al zar'ekha ubirkhati 'al ze'eza'ekha. vezamekhu beben khazir ka'arabim 'al yiblei mayim. zeh yomar ihoh 'ani vezeh yiqra beshem ya'aqob vezeh yikhtob yado ihoh ubeshem yisra'el yekhaneh. koh 'amar ihoh melekh yisra'el vego'alo ihoh zeba'ot 'ani rishon va'ani 'akharon umibal'adai 'en 'elohim. umi khamoni yiqra veyagideha veya'rekheha li misumi 'am 'olam ve'otiyot va'asher tabonah yagidu lamo. 'al tifkhadu ve'al tirhu halo mei'az hishma'tikha vehigadti ve'atem 'eidai hayesh 'eloah mibal'adai ve'en zur bal yada'eti. yozerei fesel kulam tohu vakhamudeihem bal yo'ilu ve'eideihem hemah bal yir'u ubal yeide'u lema'an yeiboshu. mi yazar 'el ufesel nasakh lebilti ho'il. hen kal khabeirav yeiboshu vekharashim hemah mei'adam yitqabezu khulam ya'amodu yifkhadu yeiboshu yakhad. kharash barzel ma'azad ufa'al bapekham ubamaqabot yizereihu vayif'aleihu bizroa' kokho gam ra'eb ve'en koakh lo shatah mayim vayi'af. kharash 'eizim natah qav yeta'areihu basered ya'aseihu bamaqzu'ot ubamekhugah yeta'oreihu vaya'aseihu ketabnit 'ish ketif'eret 'adam lashebet bayit. likhrat lo 'arazim vayiqakh tirzah ve'alon vai'amez lo ba'azei ya'ar nata' 'oren vegeshem yegadel. vehayah le'adam leba'er vayiqakh meihem vayakham 'af yasiq ve'afah lakhem 'af yif'al 'el vayishtakhu 'asahu fesel vayisgad lamo. khezyo saraf bemo 'esh 'al khezyo basar yokhel yizleh zali veyisba' 'af yakhom veyomar he'akh khamoti ra'iti 'ur. ushe'eirito le'el 'asah lefislo yisgod yisgad lo veyishtakhu veyitpalel 'eilav veyomar hazileini ki 'eili 'atah. lo yade'u velo yabinu ki takh meire'ot 'eineihem meihaskil libotam. velo yashib 'el libo velo da'at velo tebunah leimor khezyo sarafti bemo 'esh ve'af 'afiti 'al gekhalav lekhem 'ezleh basar ve'okhel veyitro leto'eibah 'e'eseh lebul 'ez 'esgod. ro'eh 'eifer leb hutal hitahu velo yazil 'et nafsho velo yomar halo sheqer bimini. zekhar 'eleh ya'aqob veyisra'el ki 'abdi 'atah yezartikha 'ebed li 'atah yisra'el lo tinasheini. makhiti kha'ab pesha'ekha vekhe'anan khatotekha shubah 'eilai ki ge'altikha. ranu shamayim ki 'asah ihoh hari'u takhtiyot 'arez pizkhu harim rinah ya'ar vekhal 'ez bo ki ga'al ihoh ya'aqob ubeyisra'el yitpa'ar. koh 'amar ihoh go'alekha veyozerkha mibaten 'anokhi ihoh 'oseh kol noteh shamayim lebadi roqa' ha'arez mi 'iti mei'iti. meifer 'otot badim veqosemim yeholel meishib khakhamim 'akhor veda'tam yesakel. meiqim debar 'abdo va'azat mal'akhav yashlim ha'omer lirushalim tushab ule'arei yehudah tibanenah vekhareboteha 'aqomem. ha'omer lazulah khorabi venaharotayikh 'obish. ha'omer lekhoresh ro'i vekhal khefzi yashlim veleimor lirushalim tibaneh veheikhal tivased. koh 'amar ihoh limshikho lekhoresh 'asher hekhezaqti bimino lerad lefanav goyim umatenei melakhim 'afateiakh liftoakh lefanav delatayim ushe'arim lo yisageiru. 'ani lefanekha 'eilekh vahadurim 'oshir 'ayasher daltot nekhushah 'ashaber uberikhei barzel 'agadeia'. venatati lekha 'ozrot khoshekh umatmunei mistarim lema'an teida' ki 'ani ihoh haqorei beshimkha 'elohei yisra'el. lema'an 'abdi ya'aqob veyisra'el bekhiri va'eqra lekha bishmekha 'akhanekha velo yeda'tani. 'ani ihoh ve'en 'od zulati 'en 'elohim 'a'azerkha velo yeda'tani. lema'an yeide'u mimizrakh shemesh umima'arabah ki 'efes bil'adai 'ani ihoh ve'en 'od. yozer 'or uborei khoshekh 'oseh shalom uborei ra' 'ani ihoh 'oseh khal 'eleh. har'ifu shamayim mima'al ushekhaqim yizelu zedeq tiftakh 'erez veyifru yesha' uzedaqah tazmiakh yakhad 'ani ihoh berativ. ho rab 'et yozero kheres 'et kharsei 'adamah hayomar khomer leyozero mah ta'aseh ufa'alekha 'en yadayim lo. ho 'omer le'ab mah tolid ule'ishah mah tekhilin. koh 'amar ihoh qedosh yisra'el veyozero ha'otiyot she'aluni 'al banai ve'al po'al yadai tezavuni. 'anokhi 'asiti 'erez ve'adam 'aleha barati 'ani yadai natu shamayim vekhal zeba'am ziveiti. 'anokhi ha'irotihu bezedeq vekhal derakhav 'ayasher hu yibneh 'iri vegaluti yeshaleiakh lo bimkhir velo beshokhad 'amar ihoh zeba'ot. koh 'amar ihoh yegia' mizrayim usekhar kush useba'im 'anshei midah 'alayikh ya'aboru velakh yihyu 'akharayikh yeileikhu baziqim ya'aboru ve'eilayikh yishtakhavu 'eilayikh yitpalalu 'akh bakh 'el ve'en 'od 'efes 'elohim. 'akhen 'atah 'el mistater 'elohei yisra'el moshia'. boshu vegam nikhlemu kulam yakhdav halekhu bakelimah kharashei zirim. yisra'el nosha' ihoh teshu'at 'olamim lo teiboshu velo tikalemu 'ad 'olmei 'ad. ki khoh 'amar ihoh borei hashamayim hu ha'elohim yozer ha'arez ve'osah hu khonah lo tohu bera'ah lashebet yezarah 'ani ihoh ve'en 'od. lo baseiter dibarti bimqom 'erez khoshekh lo 'amarti lezera' ya'aqob tohu baqeshuni 'ani ihoh dober zedeq magid meisharim. hiqabezu vabo'u hitnageshu yakhdav pelitei hagoyim lo yade'u hanose'im 'et 'ez pislam umitpalim 'el 'el lo yoshia'. hagidu vehagishu 'af yiva'azu yakhdav mi hishmia' zot miqedem mei'az higidah halo 'ani ihoh ve'en 'od 'elohim mibal'adai 'el zadiq umoshia' 'ayin zulati. penu 'eilai vehivashe'u kal 'afsei 'arez ki 'ani 'el ve'en 'od. bi nishba'ti yaza mipi zedaqah dabar velo yashub ki li tikhra' kal berekh tishaba' kal lashon. 'akh ihoh li 'amar zedaqot va'oz 'adav yabo veyeiboshu kol hanekherim bo. ihoh yizdequ veyithalu kal zera' yisra'el. kara' bel qores nebo hayu 'azabeihem lakhayah velabeheimah nesu'oteikhem 'amusot masa la'ayeifah. qaresu khare'u yakhdav lo yakhelu malet masa venafsham bashebi halakhah. shim'u 'eilai bet ya'aqob vekhal she'eirit bet yisra'el ha'amusim mini beten hanesu'im mini rakham. ve'ad ziqnah 'ani hu ve'ad sheibah 'ani 'esbol 'ani 'asiti va'ani 'esa va'ani 'esbol va'amalet. lemi tedamyuni vetashvu vetamshiluni venidmeh. hazalim zahab mikis vekhesef baqaneh yishqolu yiskeru zoref veya'aseihu 'el yisgedu 'af yishtakhavu yisa'uhu 'al katef yisbeluhu veyanikhuhu takhtav veya'amod mimeqomo lo yamish 'af yiz'aq 'eilav velo ya'aneh mizarato lo yoshi'enu. zikhru zot vehit'oshashu hashibu foshe'im 'al leb. zikhru rishonot mei'olam ki 'anokhi 'el ve'en 'od 'elohim ve'efes kamoni. magid meireishit 'akharit umiqedem 'asher lo na'asu 'omer 'azati taqum vekhal khefzi 'e'eseh. qorei mimizrakh 'ayit mei'erez merkhaq 'ish 'azato 'azati 'af dibarti 'af 'abi'enah yazarti 'af 'e'esenah. shim'u 'eilai 'abirei leb harekhoqim mizedaqah. qeirabti zidqati lo tirkhaq uteshu'ati lo te'akher venatati beziyon teshu'ah leyisra'el tif'arti. redi ushebi 'al 'afar betulat bat babel shebi la'arez 'en kisei bat kasdim ki lo tosifi yiqre'u lakh rakah va'anugah. qekhi reikhayim vetakhani qamakh gali zamatekh khespi shobel gali shoq 'ibri neharot. tigal 'ervatekh gam teira'eh kherpatekh naqam 'eqakh velo 'efga' 'adam. go'aleinu ihoh zeba'ot shemo qedosh yisra'el. shebi dumam ubo'i bakhoshekh bat kasdim ki lo tosifi yiqre'u lakh geberet mamlakhot. qazafti 'al 'ami khilalti nakhalati va'etenem beyadekh lo samt lahem rakhamim 'al zaqen hikhbadt 'ulekh me'od. vatomeri le'olam 'ehyeh gebaret 'ad lo samt 'eleh 'al libekh lo zakhart 'akharitah. ve'atah shim'i zot 'adinah hayoshebet labetakh ha'omerah bilbabah 'ani ve'afsi 'od lo 'eisheb 'almanah velo 'eida' shekhol. vetabonah lakh shetei 'eleh rega' beyom 'ekhad shekhol ve'almon ketumam ba'u 'alayikh berob keshafayikh be'azemat khabarayikh me'od. vatibtekhi bera'atekh 'amart 'en ro'ani khakhematekh veda'tekh hi shobbatekh vatomeri belibekh 'ani ve'afsi 'od. uba 'alayikh ra'ah lo teide'i shakhrah vetipol 'alayikh hoah lo tukheli kaperah vetabo 'alayikh pit'om sho'ah lo teida'i. 'imdi na bakhabarayikh uberob keshafayikh ba'asher yaga'at mine'urayikh 'ulai tukheli ho'il 'ulai ta'arozi. nil'et berob 'azatayikh ya'amdu na veyoshi'ukh haberu hoberei shamayim hakhozim bakokhabim modi'im lekhodashim mei'asher yabo'u 'alayikh. hineh hayu kheqash 'esh serafatam lo yazilu 'et nafsham miyad lehabah 'en gakhelet lakhmam 'ur lashebet negdo. ken hayu lakh 'asher yaga'at sokharayikh mine'urayikh 'ish le'ebro ta'u 'en moshi'ekh. shim'u zot bet ya'aqob haniqra'im beshem yisra'el umimei yehudah yaza'u hanishba'im beshem ihoh ubeilohei yisra'el yazkiru lo be'emet velo bizdaqah. ki mei'ir haqodesh niqra'u ve'al 'elohei yisra'el nismakhu ihoh zeba'ot shemo. harishonot mei'az higadti umipi yaze'u ve'ashmi'em pit'om 'asiti vatabonah. mida'ti ki qasheh 'atah vegid barzel 'arepekha umizkhakha nekhushah. va'agid lekha mei'az beterem tabo hishma'tikha pen tomar 'azebi 'asam ufisli veniski zivam. shama'ta khazeh kulah ve'atem halo tagidu hishma'tikha khadashot mei'atah unezurot velo yeda'tam. 'atah nibre'u velo mei'az velifnei yom velo shema'tam pen tomar hineh yeda'tin. gam lo shama'ta gam lo yada'ta gam mei'az lo fitekhah 'azenekha ki yada'ti bagod tibgod ufosheia' mibeten qora lakh. lema'an shemi 'a'arikh 'api utehilati 'ekhetam lakh lebilti hakhritekha. hineh zeraftikha velo bekhasef bekhartikha bekhur 'oni. lema'ani lema'ani 'e'eseh ki 'ekh yeikhal ukhebodi le'akher lo 'eten. shema' 'eilai ya'aqob veyisra'el meqora'i 'ani hu 'ani rishon 'af 'ani 'akharon. 'af yadi yasedah 'erez vimini tipekhah shamayim qorei 'ani 'aleihem ya'amdu yakhdav. hiqabezu khulekhem ushama'u mi bahem higid 'et 'eleh ihoh 'aheibo ya'aseh khefzo bebabel uzero'o kasdim. 'ani 'ani dibarti 'af qerativ habi'otiv vehizliakh darko. qirbu 'eilai shim'u zot lo meirosh baseiter dibarti mei'et heyotah sham 'ani ve'atah 'adonai ihoh shelakhani verukho. koh 'amar ihoh go'alkha qedosh yisra'el 'ani ihoh 'elohekha melamedkha leho'il madrikhakha bederekh teilekh. lu hiqshabta lemizvotai vayhi khanahar shelomekha vezidqatekha kegalei hayam. vayhi khakhol zar'ekha veze'eza'ei mei'ekha kim'otav lo yikaret velo yishamed shemo milefanai. ze'u mibabel birkhu mikasdim beqol rinah hagidu hashmi'u zot hozi'uha 'ad qezeh ha'arez 'imru ga'al ihoh 'abdo ya'aqob. velo zame'u bakhorabot holikham mayim mizur hizil lamo vayibqa' zur vayazubu mayim. 'en shalom 'amar ihoh laresha'im. shim'u 'iyim 'eilai vehaqshibu le'umim meirakhoq ihoh mibeten qera'ani mime'ei 'imi hizkir shemi. vayasem pi kekhereb khadah bezel yado hekhbi'ani vaysimeini lekhez barur be'ashpato histirani. vayomer li 'abdi 'atah yisra'el 'asher bekha 'etpa'ar. va'ani 'amarti leriq yaga'ti letohu vehebel kokhi khileiti 'akhen mishpati 'et ihoh ufe'ulati 'et 'elohai. ve'atah 'amar ihoh yozeri mibeten le'ebed lo leshobeb ya'aqob 'eilav veyisra'el lo lo yei'asef ve'ekabed be'einei ihoh veilohai hayah 'uzi. vayomer naqel mihyotkha li 'ebed lehaqim 'et shibtei ya'aqob unezirei unezurei yisra'el lehashib unetatikha le'or goyim lihyot yeshu'ati 'ad qezeh ha'arez. koh 'amar ihoh go'el yisra'el qedosho libzoh nefesh limta'eb go le'ebed moshelim melakhim yir'u vaqamu sarim veyishtakhavu lema'an ihoh 'asher ne'eman qedosh yisra'el vayibkhareka. koh 'amar ihoh be'et razon 'anitikha ubeyom yeshu'ah 'azartikha ve'ezarekha ve'etenkha librit 'am lehaqim 'erez lehankhil nekhalot shomeimot. leimor la'asurim zei'u la'asher bakhoshekh higalu 'al derakhim yir'u ubekhal shefayim mar'itam. lo yir'abu velo yizma'u velo yakem sharab vashamesh ki merakhamam yenahagem ve'al mabu'ei mayim yenahalem. vesamti khal harai ladarekh umesilotai yerumun. hineh 'eleh meirakhoq yabo'u vehineh 'eleh mizafon umiyam ve'eleh mei'erez sinim. ranu shamayim vegili 'arez yifzekhu ufizkhu harim rinah ki nikham ihoh 'amo va'aniyav yerakhem. vatomer ziyon 'azabani ihoh vadonai shekheikhani. hatishkakh 'ishah 'ulah meirakhem ben bitnah gam 'eleh tishkakhnah ve'anokhi lo 'eshkakhekh. hen 'al kapayim khaqotikh khomotayikh negdi tamid. miharu banayikh meharesayikh umakharibayikh mimekh yeizei'u. se'i sabib 'einayikh ure'i kulam niqbezu ba'u lakh khai 'ani ne'um ihoh ki khulam ka'adi tilbashi uteqasherim kakalah. ki kharebotayikh veshomemotayikh ve'erez harisutekh ki 'atah teizeri miyosheb verakhaqu mebale'ayikh. 'od yomeru be'azenayikh benei shikulayikh zar li hamaqom geshah li ve'eisheibah. ve'amart bilbabekh mi yalad li 'et 'eleh va'ani shekhulah vegalmudah golah vesurah ve'eleh mi gidel hen 'ani nish'arti lebadi 'eleh 'eifoh hem. koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh hineh 'esa 'el goyim yadi ve'el 'amim 'arim nisi veheibi'u banayikh bekhozen ubenotayikh 'al katef tinasenah. vehayu melakhim 'omenayikh vesaroteihem meiniqotayikh 'apayim 'erez yishtakhavu lakh va'afar raglayikh yelakheikhu veyada'at ki 'ani ihoh 'asher lo yeiboshu qoai. hayuqakh migibor malqoakh ve'im shebi zadiq yimalet. ki khoh 'amar ihoh gam shebi gibor yuqakh umalqoakh 'ariz yimalet ve'et yeribekh 'anokhi 'arib ve'et banayikh 'anokhi 'oshia'. veha'akhalti 'et monayikh 'et besaram vekhe'asis damam yishkarun veyade'u khal basar ki 'ani ihoh moshi'ekh vego'alekh 'abir ya'aqob. koh 'amar ihoh 'ei zeh seifer keritut 'imekhem 'asher shilakhtiha 'o mi minoshai 'asher makharti 'etkhem lo hen ba'avonoteikhem nimkartem ubefish'eikhem shulekhah 'imekhem. madua' bati ve'en 'ish qarati ve'en 'oneh haqazor qazerah yadi mipedut ve'im 'en bi khoakh lehazil hen bega'arati 'akharib yam 'asim neharot midbar tib'ash degatam mei'en mayim vetamot bazama. 'albish shamayim qadrut vesaq 'asim kesutam. 'adonai ihoh natan li leshon limudim lada'at la'ut 'et ya'ef dabar ya'ir baboqer baboqer ya'ir li 'ozen lishmoa' kalimudim. 'adonai ihoh patakh li 'ozen ve'anokhi lo mariti 'akhor lo nesugoti. geivi natati lemakim ulekhayai lemoretim panai lo histarti mikelimot varoq. vadonai ihoh ya'azar li 'al ken lo nikhlameti 'al ken samti fanai kakhalamish va'eida' ki lo 'eibosh. qarob mazdiqi mi yarib 'iti na'amdah yakhad mi ba'al mishpati yigash 'eilai. hen 'adonai ihoh ya'azar li mi hu yarshi'eini hen kulam kabeged yiblu 'ash yokhelem. mi bakhem yerei ihoh shomeia' beqol 'abdo 'asher halakh khasheikhim ve'en nogah lo yibtakh beshem ihoh veyisha'en beilohav. hen kulekhem qodekhei 'esh me'azerei ziqot lekhu be'ur 'eshkhem ubeziqot bi'artem miyadi hayetah zot lakhem lema'azeibah tishkabun. shim'u 'eilai rodefei zedeq mebaqshei ihoh habitu 'el zur khuzabtem ve'el maqebet bor nuqartem. habitu 'el 'abraham 'abikhem ve'el sarah tekholelkhem ki 'ekhad qerativ va'abarekheihu ve'arbeihu. ki nikham ihoh ziyon nikham kal khareboteha vayasem midbarah ke'eiden ve'arbatah kegan ihoh sason vesimkhah yimazei bah todah veqol zimrah. haqshibu 'eilai 'ami ule'umi 'eilai ha'azinu ki torah mei'iti teizei umishpati le'or 'amim 'argia'. qarob zidqi yaza yish'i uzero'ai 'amim yishpotu 'eilai 'iyim yeqavu ve'el zero'i yeyakheilun. se'u lashamayim 'eineikhem vehabitu 'el ha'arez mitakhat ki shamayim ke'ashan nimlakhu veha'arez kabeged tibleh veyoshebeha kemo khen yemutun vishu'ati le'olam tihyeh vezidqati lo teikhat. shim'u 'eilai yode'ei zedeq 'am torati belibam 'al tire'u kherpat 'enosh umigidufotam 'al teikhatu. ki khabeged yokhelem 'ash vekhazemer yokhelem sas vezidqati le'olam tihyeh vishu'ati ledor dorim. 'uri 'uri libshi 'oz zeroa' ihoh 'uri kimei qedem dorot 'olamim halo 'at hi hamakhzebet rahab mekholelet tanin. halo 'at hi hamakharebet yam mei tehom rabah hasamah ma'amaqei yam derekh la'abor ge'ulim. ufeduyei ihoh yeshubun uba'u ziyon berinah vesimkhat 'olam 'al rosham sason vesimkhah yasigun nasu yagon va'anakhah. 'anokhi 'anokhi hu menakhemkhem mi 'at vatire'i mei'enosh yamut umiben 'adam khazir yinaten. vatishkakh ihoh 'osekha noteh shamayim veyosed 'arez vatefakhed tamid kal hayom mipenei khamat hameiziq ka'asher konen lehashkhit ve'ayeh khamat hameiziq. mihar zo'eh lehipateiakh velo yamut lashakhat velo yekhsar lakhmo. ve'anokhi ihoh 'elohekha roga' hayam vayehemu galav ihoh zeba'ot shemo. va'asim debarai befikha ubezel yadi kisitikha lintoa' shamayim velisod 'arez veleimor leziyon 'ami 'atah. hit'orri hit'orri qumi yerushalim 'asher shatit miyad ihoh 'et kos khamato 'et quba'at kos hatar'eilah shatit mazit. 'en menahel lah mikal banim yaladah ve'en makhaziq beyadah mikal banim gideilah. shetayim henah qore'otayikh mi yanud lakh hashod vehasheber vehara'ab vehakhereb mi 'anakhamekh. banayikh 'ulefu shakhebu berosh kal khuzot keto mikhmar hamlei'im khamat ihoh ga'arat 'elohayikh. lakhen shim'i na zot 'aniyah ushekhurat velo miyayin. koh 'amar 'adonayikh ihoh veilohayikh yarib 'amo hineh laqakhti miyadekh 'et kos hatar'eilah 'et quba'at kos khamati lo tosifi lishtotah 'od. vesamtiha beyad mogayikh 'asher 'ameru lenafshekh shekhi vena'aborah vatasimi kha'arez geivekh vekhakhuz la'oberim. 'uri 'uri libshi 'uzekh ziyon libshi bigdei tif'artekh yerushalim 'ir haqodesh ki lo yosif yabo bakh 'od 'arel vetamei. hitna'ari mei'afar qumi shebi yerushalim hitpatekhu hitpatekhi mosrei zavarekh shebiyah bat ziyon. ki khoh 'amar ihoh khinam nimkartem velo bekhesef tiga'eilu. ki khoh 'amar 'adonai ihoh mizrayim yarad 'ami barishonah lagur sham ve'ashur be'efes 'ashaqo. ve'atah mi li mah li foh ne'um ihoh ki luqakh 'ami khinam moshelo moshelav yeheililu ne'um ihoh vetamid kal hayom shemi mino'az. lakhen yeida' 'ami shemi lakhen bayom hahu ki 'ani hu hamdaber hineini. mah navu 'al heharim raglei mebaser mashmia' shalom mebaser tob mashmia' yeshu'ah 'omer leziyon malakh 'elohayikh. qol zofayikh nase'u qol yakhdav yeraneinu ki 'ayin be'ayin yir'u beshub ihoh ziyon. pizkhu ranenu yakhdav kharebot yerushalim ki nikham ihoh 'amo ga'al yerushalim. khasaf ihoh 'et zeroa' qadesho le'einei kal hagoyim vera'u kal 'afsei 'arez 'et yeshu'at 'eloheinu. suru suru ze'u misham tamei 'al tiga'u ze'u mitokhah hibaru nose'ei kelei ihoh. ki lo bekhipazon teizei'u ubimnusah lo teileikhun ki holekh lifneikhem ihoh ume'asifkhem 'elohei yisra'el. hineh yaskil 'abdi yarum venisa vegabah me'od. ka'asher shamemu 'alekha rabim ken mishkhat mei'ish mar'eihu veto'aro mibenei 'adam. ken yazeh goyim rabim 'alav yiqpezu melakhim pihem ki 'asher lo supar lahem ra'u va'asher lo shame'u hitbonanu. mi he'emin lishmu'ateinu uzeroa' ihoh 'al mi niglatah. vaya'al kayoneq lefanav vekhashoresh mei'erez ziyah lo to'ar lo velo hadar venir'eihu velo mar'eh venekhmedeihu. nibzeh vakhadal 'ishim 'ish makh'obot vidua' kholi ukhemaster panim mimenu nibzeh velo khashabnuhu. 'akhen kholayeinu hu nasa umakh'obeinu sebalam va'anakhnu khashabnuhu nagua' mukeh 'elohim ume'uneh. vehu mekholal mipesha'einu meduka mei'avonoteinu musar shelomeinu 'alav ubakhaburato nirpa lanu. kulanu kazon ta'inu 'ish ledarko paninu ihoh hifgia' bo 'et 'avon kulanu. nigas vehu na'aneh velo yiftakh piv kaseh latebakh yubal ukherakhel lifnei gozezeha ne'elamah velo yiftakh piv. mei'ozer umimishpat luqakh ve'et doro mi yesokheiakh ki nigzar mei'erez khayim mipesha' 'ami nega' lamo. vayiten 'et resha'im qibro ve'et 'ashir bemotav 'al lo khamas 'asah velo mirmah befiv. ihoh khafez dake'o hekheli 'im tasim 'asham nafsho yir'eh zera' ya'arikh yamim vekheifez ihoh beyado yizlakh. mei'amal nafsho yir'eh yisba' beda'to yazdiq zadiq 'abdi larabim va'avonotam hu yisbol. lakhen 'akhaleq lo barabim ve'et 'azumim yekhaleq shalal takhat 'asher he'erah lamavet nafsho ve'et poshe'im nimnah vehu khet rabim nasa velaposhe'im yafgia'. rani 'aqarah lo yaladah pizkhi rinah vezahali lo khalah ki rabim benei shomeimah mibenei be'ulah 'amar ihoh. harkhibi meqom 'aholekh viri'ot mishkenotayikh yatu 'al takhsokhi ha'arikhi meitarayikh viteidotayikh khazeiqi. ki yamin usemol tifrozi vezar'ekh goyim yirash ve'arim neshamot yoshibu. 'al tire'i ki lo teiboshi ve'al tikalemi ki lo takhpiri ki boshet 'alumayikh tishkakhi vekherpat 'almenutayikh lo tizkeri 'od. ki bo'alayikh 'osayikh ihoh zeba'ot shemo vego'alekh qedosh yisra'el 'elohei khal ha'arez yiqarei. ki khe'ishah 'azubah va'azubat ruakh qera'akh ihoh ve'eishet ne'urim ki tima'es 'amar 'elohayikh. berega' qaton 'azabtikh uberakhamim gedolim 'aqabezekh. beshezef qezef histarti fanai rega' mimekh ubekhesed 'olam rikhamtikh 'amar go'alekh ihoh. ki mei noakh zot li 'asher nishba'ti mei'abor mei noakh 'od 'al ha'arez ken nishba'ti miqezof 'alayikh umige'ar bakh. ki heharim yamushu vehageba'ot temutenah vekhasdi mei'itekh lo yamush uberit shelomi lo tamut 'amar merakhamekh ihoh. 'aniyah so'arah lo nukhamah hineh 'anokhi marbiz bapukh 'abanayikh visadtikh basapirim. vesamti kadkhod shimshotayikh ushe'arayikh le'abnei 'eqdakh vekhal gebulekh le'abnei kheifez. vekhal banayikh limudei ihoh verab shelom banayikh. bizdaqah tikonani rakhaqi mei'osheq ki lo tira'i umimekhitah ki lo tiqrab 'eilayikh. hen gor yagur 'efes mei'oti mi gar 'itakh 'alayikh yipol. hen hineh 'anokhi barati kharash nofeiakh be'esh pekham umozi kheli lema'aseihu ve'anokhi barati mashkhit lekhabel. kal keli yuzar 'alayikh lo yizlakh vekhal lashon taqum 'itakh lamishpat tarshi'i zot nakhalat 'abdei ihoh vezidqatam mei'iti ne'um ihoh. ho kal zamei lekhu lamayim va'asher 'en lo kasef lekhu shibru ve'ekholu ulekhu shibru belo khesef ubelo mekhir yayin vekhalab. lamah tishqelu khesef belo lekhem vigi'akhem belo lesabe'ah shim'u shamoa' 'eilai ve'ikhlu tob vetit'anag badeshen nafshekhem. hatu 'azenekhem ulekhu 'eilai shim'u utekhi nafshekhem ve'ekhretah lakhem berit 'olam khasdei david hane'emanim. hen 'ed le'umim netativ nagid umezaveh le'umim. hen go lo teida' tiqra vego lo yeda'ukha 'eilekha yaruzu lema'an ihoh 'elohekha veliqdosh yisra'el ki fei'arakh. dirshu ihoh behimaze'o qera'uhu bihyoto qarob. ya'azob rasha' darko ve'ish 'aven makhshebotav veyashob 'el ihoh virakhameihu ve'el 'eloheinu ki yarbeh lisloakh. ki lo makhshebotai makhsheboteikhem velo darkheikhem derakhai ne'um ihoh. ki gabehu shamayim mei'arez ken gabehu derakhai midarkheikhem umakhshebotai mimakhsheboteikhem. ki ka'asher yeired hageshem vehasheleg min hashamayim veshamah lo yashub ki 'im hirvah 'et ha'arez veholidah vehizmikhah venatan zera' lazoreia' velekhem la'okhel. ken yihyeh debari 'asher yeizei mipi lo yashub 'eilai reiqam ki 'im 'asah 'et 'asher khafazti vehizliakh 'asher shelakhtiv. ki besimkhah teizei'u ubeshalom tubalun heharim vehageba'ot yifzekhu lifneikhem rinah vekhal 'azei hasadeh yimkha'u khaf. takhat hana'azuz ya'aleh berosh takhat vetakhat hasirpad ya'aleh hadas vehayah ihoh leshem le'ot 'olam lo yikaret. koh 'amar ihoh shimru mishpat va'asu zedaqah ki qerobah yeshu'ati labo vezidqati lehigalot. 'ashrei 'enosh ya'aseh zot uben 'adam yakhaziq bah shomer shabat meikhalelo veshomer yado mei'asot kal ra'. ve'al yomar ben haneikhar hanilvah 'el ihoh leimor habdel yabdilani ihoh mei'al 'amo ve'al yomar hasaris hen 'ani 'ez yabesh. ki khoh 'amar ihoh lasarisim 'asher yishmeru 'et shabetotai ubakharu ba'asher khafazeti umakhaziqim bibriti. venatati lahem bebeiti ubekhomotai yad vashem tob mibanim umibanot shem 'olam 'eten lo 'asher lo yikaret. ubenei haneikhar hanilvim 'al ihoh leshareto ule'ahabah 'et shem ihoh lihyot lo la'abadim kal shomer shabat meikhalelo umakhaziqim bibriti. vahabi'otim 'el har qadshi vesimakhtim bebet tefilati 'oloteihem vezibkheihem lerazon 'al mizbekhi ki beiti bet tefilah yiqarei lekhal ha'amim. ne'um 'adonai ihoh meqabez nidkhei yisra'el 'od 'aqabez 'alav leniqbazav. kol khayto sadai 'eitayu le'ekhol kal khayto baya'ar. zafu zofav 'ivrim kulam lo yada'u kulam kelabim 'ilemim lo yukhelu linboakh hozim shokhebim 'ohabei lanum. vehakelabim 'azei nefesh lo yade'u sabe'ah vehemah ro'im lo yade'u habin kulam ledarkam panu 'ish lebiz'o miqazeihu. 'eitayu 'eqkhah yayin venisbe'ah sheikhar vehayah khazeh yom makhar gadol yeter me'od. hazadiq 'abad ve'en 'ish sam 'al leb ve'anshei khesed ne'esafim be'en meibin ki mipenei hara'ah ne'esaf hazadiq. yabo shalom yanukhu 'al mishkebotam holekh nekhokho. ve'atem qirbu henah benei 'onenah zera' mena'ef vatizneh. 'al mi tit'anagu 'al mi tarkhibu feh ta'arikhu lashon halo 'atem yildei fesha' zera' shaqer. haneikhamim ba'eilim takhat kal 'ez ra'anan shokhatei hayladim banekhalim takhat se'ifei hasela'im. bekhaleqei nakhal khelqekh hem hem goralekh gam lahem shafakht nesekh he'elit minkhah ha'al 'eleh 'enakhem. 'al har gaboah venisa samt mishkabekh gam sham 'alit lizboakh zabakh. ve'akhar hadelet vehamezuzah samt zikhronekh ki mei'iti gilit vata'ali hirkhabt mishkabekh vatikhrat lakh meihem 'ahabt mishkabam yad khazit. vatashuri lamelekh bashemen vatarbi riqukhayikh vateshalekhi ziraykh 'ad meirakhoq vatashpili 'ad she'ol. berob darkekh yaga'at lo 'amart no'ash khayat yadekh mazat 'al ken lo khalit. ve'et mi da'agt vatire'i ki tekhazeibi ve'oti lo zakhart lo samt 'al libekh halo 'ani makhsheh umei'olam ve'oti lo tira'i. 'ani 'agid zidqatekh ve'et ma'asayikh velo yo'ilukh. beza'aqekh yazilukh qibuzayikh ve'et kulam yisa ruakh yiqakh habel vehakhoseh bi yinkhal 'erez veyirash har qadshi ve'amar solu solu panu darekh harimu mikhshol miderekh 'ami. ki khoh 'amar ram venisa shokhen 'ad veqadosh shemo marom veqadosh 'eshkon ve'et daka ushefal ruakh lehakhayot ruakh shefalim ulehakhayot leb nidka'im. ki lo le'olam 'arib velo lanezakh 'eqezof ki ruakh milefanai ya'atof uneshamot 'ani 'asiti. ba'avon biz'o qazafti ve'akeihu haster ve'eqzof vayeilekh shobab bederekh libo. derakhav ra'iti ve'erpa'eihu ve'ankheihu va'ashalem nikhumim lo vela'abeilav. borei nub nib sefatayim shalom shalom larakhoq velaqarob 'amar ihoh urefativ. veharesha'im kayam nigrash ki hashqet lo yukhal vayigreshu meimav refesh vatit. 'en shalom 'amar 'elohai laresha'im. qera begaron 'al takhsokh kashofar harem qolekha vehaged le'ami pish'am ulebet ya'aqob khatotam. ve'oti yom yom yidroshun veda'at derakhai yekhpazun kego 'asher zedaqah 'asah umishpat 'elohav lo 'azab yish'aluni mishpetei zedeq qirbat 'elohim yekhpazun. lamah zamnu velo ra'ita 'ininu nafsheinu velo teida' hen beyom zomekhem timze'u kheifez vekhal 'azebeikhem tingosu. hen lerib umazah tazumu ulehakot be'egrof resha' lo tazumu khayom lehashmia' bamarom qolkhem. hakhazeh yihyeh zom 'ebkhareihu yom 'anot 'adam nafsho halakhof ke'agmon rosho vesaq va'eifer yazia' halazeh tiqra zom veyom razon ihoh. halo zeh zom 'ebkhareihu pateiakh kharzubot resha' hater 'agudot motah veshalakh rezuzim khafeshim vekhal motah tenateiqu. halo faros lara'eb lakhmekha va'aniyim merudim tabi bayit ki tir'eh 'arom vekhisito umibesarekha lo tit'alam. 'az yibaqa' kashakhar 'orekha va'arukhatekha meheirah tizmakh vehalakh lefanekha zidqekha kebod ihoh ya'asfekha. 'az tiqra ihoh ya'aneh teshava' veyomar hineini 'im tasir mitokhkha motah shelakh 'ezba' vedaber 'aven. vetafeq lara'eb nafshekha venefesh na'anah tasbia' vezarakh bakhoshekh 'orekha va'afeilatekha kazahorayim. venakhakha ihoh tamid vehisbia' bezakhzakhot nafshekha ve'azmotekha yakhaliz vehayita kegan raveh ukhemoza mayim 'asher lo yekhazebu meimav. ubanu mimekha kharebot 'olam mosdei dor vador teqomem veqora lekha goder perez meshobeb netibot lashabet. 'im tashib mishabat raglekha 'asot khafazekha beyom qadshi veqarata lashabat 'oneg liqdosh ihoh mekhubad vekhibadto mei'asot derakhekha mimezo khefzekha vedaber dabar. 'az tit'anag 'al ihoh vehirkabtikha 'al bamotei 'arez veha'akhaltikha nakhalat ya'aqob 'abikha ki pi ihoh diber. hen lo qazerah yad ihoh meihoshia' velo khabedah 'azeno mishemoa'. ki 'im 'avonoteikhem hayu mabdilim beineikhem leben 'eloheikhem vekhatoteikhem histiru fanim mikem mishemoa'. ki khapeikhem nego'alu badam ve'ezbe'oteikhem be'avon siftoteikhem diberu sheqer leshonkhem 'avlah tehgeh. 'en qorei bezedeq ve'en nishpat be'emunah batoakh 'al tohu vedaber shav haro 'amal veholed 'aven. beizei zif'oni biqei'u vequrei 'akabish ye'erogu ha'okhel mibeizeihem yamut vehazureh tibaqa' 'ef'eh. qureihem lo yihyu lebeged velo yitkasu bema'aseihem ma'aseihem ma'asei 'aven ufo'al khamas bekhapeihem. ragleihem lara' yaruzu vimaharu lishpokh dam naqi makhsheboteihem makhshebot 'aven shod vasheber bimsilotam. derekh shalom lo yada'u ve'en mishpat bema'gelotam netiboteihem 'iqeshu lahem kol dorekh bah lo yada' shalom.
