'al ken rakhaq mishpat mimenu velo tasigeinu zedaqah neqaveh la'or vehineh khoshekh lingohot ba'afeilot nehalekh. negashah kha'ivrim qir ukhe'en 'einayim negasheishah kashalnu bazahorayim kaneshef ba'ashmanim kameitim. nehemeh khadubim kulanu vekhayonim hagoh nehgeh neqaveh lamishpat va'ayin lishu'ah rakhaqah mimenu. ki rabu fesha'einu negdekha vekhatoteinu 'anetah banu ki fesha'einu 'itanu va'avonoteinu yeda'anum. pashoa' vekhakhesh ihoh venasog mei'akhar 'eloheinu daber 'osheq vesarah horo vehogo mileb dibrei shaqer. vehusag 'akhor mishpat uzedaqah meirakhoq ta'amod ki khashelah barekhob 'emet unekhokhah lo tukhal labo. vatehi ha'emet ne'deret vesar meira' mishtolel vayar ihoh vayeira' be'einav ki 'en mishpat. vayar ki 'en 'ish vayishtomem ki 'en mafgia' vatosha' lo zero'o vezidqato hi semakhatehu. vayilbash zedaqah kashiryan vekhoba' yeshu'ah berosho vayilbash bigdei naqam tilboshet vaya'at kam'il qin'ah. ke'al gemulot ke'al yeshalem kheimah lezarav gemul le'oyebav la'iyim gemul yeshalem. veyire'u mima'arab 'et shem ihoh umimizrakh shemesh 'et kebodo ki yabo khanahar zar ruakh ihoh nosesah bo. uba leziyon go'el uleshabei fesha' beya'aqob ne'um ihoh. va'ani zot beriti 'otam 'amar ihoh rukhi 'asher 'alekha udebarai 'asher samti befikha lo yamushu mipikha umipi zar'akha umipi zera' zar'akha 'amar ihoh mei'atah ve'ad 'olam. qumi 'ori ki ba 'orekh ukhebod ihoh 'alayikh zarakh. ki hineh hakhoshekh yekhaseh 'erez va'arafel le'umim ve'alayikh yizrakh ihoh ukhebodo 'alayikh yeira'eh. vehalekhu goyim le'orekh umelakhim lenogah zarkhekh. se'i sabib 'einayikh ure'i kulam niqbezu ba'u lakh banayikh meirakhoq yabo'u ubenotayikh 'al zad tei'amanah. 'az tir'i venahart ufakhad verakhab lebabekh ki yeihafekh 'alayikh hamon yam khel goyim yabo'u lakh. shif'at gemalim tekhasekh bikhrei midyan ve'eifah kulam misheba yabo'u zahab ulebonah yisa'u utehilot ihoh yebaseiru. kal zon qeidar yiqabezu lakh 'eilei nebayot yesharetunekh ya'alu 'al razon mizbekhi ubet tif'arti 'afa'er. mi 'eleh ka'ab te'ufenah vekhayonim 'el 'aruboteihem. ki li 'iyim yeqavu va'oniyot tarshish barishonah lehabi banayikh meirakhoq kaspam uzehabam 'itam leshem ihoh 'elohayikh veliqdosh yisra'el ki fei'arakh. ubanu benei neikhar khomotayikh umalkheihem yesharetunekh ki beqizpi hikitikh ubirzoni rikhamtikh. ufitekhu she'arayikh tamid yomam valaylah lo yisageiru lehabi 'eilayikh khel goyim umalkheihem nehugim. ki hago vehamamlakhah 'asher lo ya'abdukh yobeidu vehagoyim kharob yekherabu. kebod halebanon 'eilayikh yabo berosh tidhar ute'ashur yakhdav lefa'er meqom miqdashi umeqom raglai 'akhabed. vehalekhu 'eilayikh shekhoakh benei me'anayikh vehishtakhavu 'al kapot raglayikh kal mena'azayikh veqare'u lakh 'ir ihoh ziyon qedosh yisra'el. takhat heyotekh 'azubah usenu'ah ve'en 'ober vesamtikh lig'on 'olam mesos dor vador. veyanaqt khaleb goyim veshod melakhim tinaqi veyada'at ki 'ani ihoh moshi'ekh vego'alekh 'abir ya'aqob. takhat hanekhoshet 'abi zahab vetakhat habarzel 'abi khesef vetakhat ha'eizim nekhoshet vetakhat ha'abanim barzel vesamti fequdatekh shalom venogesayikh zedaqah. lo yishama' 'od khamas be'arzekh shod vasheber bigbulayikh veqarat yeshu'ah khomotayikh ushe'arayikh tehilah. lo yihyeh lakh 'od hashemesh le'or yomam ulenogah hayareiakh lo ya'ir lakh vehayah lakh ihoh le'or 'olam veilohayikh letif'artekh. lo yabo 'od shimshekh vireikhekh lo yei'asef ki ihoh yihyeh lakh le'or 'olam veshalemu yemei 'eblekh. ve'amekh kulam zadiqim le'olam yireshu 'arez neizer mata'o mata'ai ma'aseh yadai lehitpa'er. haqaton yihyeh la'elef vehaza'ir lego 'azum 'ani ihoh be'itah 'akhishenah. ruakh 'adonai ihoh 'alai ya'an mashakh ihoh 'oti lebaser 'anavim shelakhani lakhabosh lenishberei leb liqro lishbuyim deror vela'asurim peqakh qoakh. liqro shenat razon ihoh veyom naqam leiloheinu lenakhem kal 'abeilim. lasum la'abeilei ziyon latet lahem pe'er takhat 'eifer shemen sason takhat 'eibel ma'ateh tehilah takhat ruakh keihah veqora lahem 'eilei hazedeq mata' ihoh lehitpa'er. ubanu kharebot 'olam shomemot rishonim yeqomeimu vekhideshu 'arei khoreb shomemot dor vador. ve'amedu zarim vera'u zonekhem ubenei neikhar 'ikareikhem vekhoremeikhem. ve'atem kohanei ihoh tiqarei'u mesharetei 'eloheinu yei'amer lakhem khel goyim tokheilu ubikhbodam tityamaru. takhat bashetekhem mishneh ukhelimah yaronu khelqam lakhen be'arzam mishneh yirashu simkhat 'olam tihyeh lahem. ki 'ani ihoh 'oheb mishpat sonei gazel be'olah venatati fe'ulatam be'emet uberit 'olam 'ekhrot lahem. venoda' bagoyim zar'am veze'eza'eihem betokh ha'amim kal ro'eihem yakirum ki hem zera' beirakh ihoh. sos 'asis ihoh tagel nafshi beilohai ki hilbishani bigdei yesha' me'il zedaqah ye'atani kekhatan yekhahen pe'er vekhakalah ta'deh kheileha. ki kha'arez tozi zimkhah ukheganah zeiru'eha tazmiakh ken 'adonai ihoh yazmiakh zedaqah utehilah neged kal hagoyim. lema'an ziyon lo 'ekhesheh ulema'an yerushalim lo 'eshqot 'ad yeizei khanogah zidqah vishu'atah kelapid yib'ar. vera'u goyim zidqekh vekhal melakhim kebodekh veqora lakh shem khadash 'asher pi ihoh yiqobenu. vehayit 'ateret tif'eret beyad ihoh uzenof uzenif melukhah bekhaf 'elohayikh. lo yei'amer lakh 'od 'azubah ule'arzekh lo yei'amer 'od shemamah ki lakh yiqarei khefzi bah ule'arzekh be'ulah ki khafez ihoh bakh ve'arzekh tiba'el. ki yib'al bakhur betulah yib'alukh banayikh umesos khatan 'al kalah yasis 'alayikh 'elohayikh. 'al khomotayikh yerushalim hifqadti shomerim kal hayom vekhal halaylah tamid lo yekheshu hamazkirim 'et ihoh 'al domi lakhem. ve'al titenu domi lo 'ad yekhonen ve'ad yasim 'et yerushalim tehilah ba'arez. nishba' ihoh bimino ubizroa' 'uzo 'im 'eten 'et deganekh 'od ma'akhal le'oyebayikh ve'im yishtu benei neikhar tiroshekh 'asher yaga'at bo. ki me'asfav yokheluhu vehilu 'et ihoh umeqabezav yishtuhu bekhazrot qadshi 'ibru 'ibru bashe'arim panu derekh ha'am solu solu hamsilah saqelu mei'eben harimu nes 'al ha'amim. hineh ihoh hishmia' 'el qezeh ha'arez 'imru lebat ziyon hineh yish'ekh ba hineh sekharo 'ito ufe'ulato lefanav. veqare'u lahem 'am haqodesh ge'ulei ihoh velakh yiqarei derushah 'ir lo ne'ezabah. mi zeh ba mei'edom khamuz begadim mibazerah zeh hadur bilbusho zo'eh berob kokho 'ani medaber bizdaqah rab lehoshia'. madua' 'adom lilbushekha ubegadekha kedorekh begat. purah darakhti lebadi umei'amim 'en 'ish 'iti ve'edrekhem be'api ve'ermesem bakhamati veyez nizkham 'al begadai vekhal malbushai 'eg'aleti. ki yom naqam belibi ushenat ge'ulai ba'ah. ve'abit ve'en 'ozer ve'eshtomem ve'en somekh vatosha' li zero'i vakhamati hi semakhateni. ve'abus 'amim be'api va'ashakerem bakhamati ve'orid la'arez nizkham. khasdei ihoh 'azkir tehilot ihoh ke'al kol 'asher gemalanu ihoh verab tub lebet yisra'el 'asher gemalam kerakhamav ukherob khasadav. vayomer 'akh 'ami hemah banim lo yeshaqeiru vayhi lahem lemoshia'. bekhal zaratam lo lo zar umal'akh panav hoshi'am be'ahabato ubekhemlato hu ge'alam vaynatelem vaynase'em kal yemei 'olam. vehemah maru ve'izebu 'et ruakh qadesho vayeihafekh lahem le'oyeb hu nilkham bam. vayizkor yemei 'olam mosheh 'amo 'ayeh hama'alem miyam 'et ro'ei zono 'ayeh hasam beqirbo 'et ruakh qadesho. molikh limin mosheh zeroa' tif'arto boqeia' mayim mipeneihem la'asot lo shem 'olam. molikham batehomot kasus bamidbar lo yikasheilu. kabeheimah babiq'ah teired ruakh ihoh tenikhenu ken nihagta 'amekha la'asot lekha shem tif'aret. habet mishamayim ure'eh mizebul qadshekha vetif'artekha 'ayeh qin'atekha ugeburotekha hamon mei'ekha verakhamekha 'eilai hit'apaqu. ki 'atah 'abinu ki 'abraham lo yeda'anu veyisra'el lo yakiranu 'atah ihoh 'abinu go'aleinu mei'olam shemekha. lamah tat'einu ihoh miderakhekha taqshiakh libeinu miyir'atekha ub lema'an 'abadekha shibtei nakhalatekha. lamiz'ar yareshu 'am qadshekha zareinu bosu miqdashekha. hayinu mei'olam lo mashalta bam lo niqra shimkha 'aleihem lu qara'ta shamayim yaradta mipanekha harim nazolu. kiqdoakh 'esh hamasim mayim tib'eh 'esh lehodia' shimkha lezarekha mipanekha goyim yirgazu. ba'asotkha nora'ot lo neqaveh yaradta mipanekha harim nazolu. umei'olam lo shame'u lo he'ezinu 'ayin lo ra'atah 'elohim zulatekha ya'aseh limkhakeh lo. paga'ta 'et sas ve'oseh zedeq bidrakhekha yizkerukha hen 'atah qazafta vanekheta bahem 'olam venivasheia'. vanehi khatamei kulanu ukhebeged 'idim kal zidqoteinu vanabel ke'aleh kulanu va'avoneinu karuakh yisa'unu. ve'en qorei beshimkha mit'orer lehakhaziq bakh ki histarta fanekha mimenu vatemugeinu beyad 'avoneinu. ve'atah ihoh 'abinu 'atah 'anakhnu hakhomer ve'atah yozereinu uma'aseh yadekha kulanu. 'al tiqzof ihoh 'ad me'od ve'al la'ad tizkor 'avon hen habet na 'amekha khulanu. 'arei qadshekha hayu midbar ziyon midbar hayatah yerushalim shemamah. bet qadesheinu vetif'arteinu 'asher hilukha 'aboteinu hayah lisreifat 'esh vekhal makhamadeinu hayah lekharebah. ha'al 'eleh tit'apaq ihoh tekhesheh ute'aneinu 'ad me'od. nidrashti lelo sha'alu nimzeiti lelo biqshuni 'amarti hineini hineini 'el go lo qora bishmi. peirasti yadai kal hayom 'el 'am sorer haholekhim haderekh lo tob 'akhar makhsheboteihem. ha'am hamakh'isim 'oti 'al panai tamid zobekhim baganot umeqaterim 'al halebeinim. hayoshebim baqebarim ubanezurim yalinu ha'okhelim besar hakhazir uferaq umeraq pigulim keleihem. ha'omerim qerab 'eilekha 'al tigash bi ki qedashtikha 'eleh 'ashan be'api 'esh yoqedet kal hayom. hineh khetubah lefanai lo 'ekheseh ki 'im shilamti veshilamti 'al kheiqam. 'avonoteikhem va'avonot 'aboteikhem yakhdav 'amar ihoh 'asher qiteru 'al heharim ve'al hageba'ot kheirefuni umadoti fe'ulatam rishonah 'al 'el kheiqam. koh 'amar ihoh ka'asher yimazei hatirosh ba'eshkol ve'amar 'al tashkhiteihu ki berakhah bo ken 'e'eseh lema'an 'abadai lebilti hashkhit hakol. vehozeiti miya'aqob zera' umihudah yoresh harai vireishuha bekhirai va'abadai yishkenu shamah. vehayah hasharon linveh zon ve'eimeq 'akhor lereibez baqar le'ami 'asher derashuni. ve'atem 'ozebei ihoh hashekheikhim 'et har qadshi ha'orekhim lagad shulkhan vehamal'im lamni mimsakh. umaniti 'etkhem lakhereb vekhulekhem latebakh tikhra'u ya'an qarati velo 'anitem dibarti velo shema'tem vata'asu hara' be'einai uba'asher lo khafazti bekhartem. lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh hineh 'abadai yokheilu ve'atem tir'abu hineh 'abadai yishtu ve'atem tizma'u hineh 'abadai yismakhu ve'atem teiboshu. hineh 'abadai yaronu mitub leb ve'atem tiz'aqu mike'eb leb umisheiber ruakh teyeililu. vehinakhtem shimkhem lishbu'ah libkhirai vehemitekha 'adonai ihoh vela'abadav yiqra shem 'akher. 'asher hamitbarekh ba'arez yitbarekh beilohei 'amen vehanishba' ba'arez yishaba' beilohei 'amen ki nishkekhu hazarot harishonot vekhi nisteru mei'einai. ki hini borei shamayim khadashim va'arez khadashah velo tizakharnah harishonot velo ta'alenah 'al leb. ki 'im sisu vegilu 'adei 'ad 'asher 'ani borei ki hini borei 'et yerushalim gilah ve'amah masos. vegalti birushalim vesasti be'ami velo yishama' bah 'od qol bekhi veqol ze'aqah. lo yihyeh misham 'od 'ul yamim vezaqen 'asher lo yemalei 'et yamav ki hana'ar ben mei'ah shanah yamut vehakhote ben mei'ah shanah yequlal. ubanu batim veyashabu venate'u kheramim ve'akhelu piryam. lo yibnu ve'akher yeisheb lo yite'u ve'akher yokhel ki khimei ha'ez yemei 'ami uma'aseh yedeihem yebalu bekhirai. lo yige'u lariq velo yeiledu labehalah ki zera' berukhei ihoh hemah veze'eza'eihem 'itam. vehayah terem yiqra'u va'ani 'e'eneh 'od hem medaberim va'ani 'eshma'. ze'eb vetaleh yir'u khe'ekhad ve'aryeh kabaqar yokhal teben venakhash 'afar lakhmo lo yarei'u velo yashkhitu bekhal har qadshi 'amar ihoh. koh 'amar ihoh hashamayim kis'i veha'arez hadom raglai 'ei zeh bayit 'asher tibnu li ve'ei zeh maqom menukhati. ve'et kal 'eleh yadi 'asatah vayihyu khal 'eleh ne'um ihoh ve'el zeh 'abit 'el 'ani unekheh ruakh vekhared 'al debari. shokhet hashor makeh 'ish zobeiakh haseh 'oref keleb ma'aleh minkhah dam khazir mazkir lebonah mebarekh 'aven gam hemah bakharu bedarkheihem ubeshiquzeihem nafsham khafeizah. gam 'ani 'ebkhar beta'aluleihem umegurotam 'abi lahem ya'an qarati ve'en 'oneh dibarti velo shamei'u vaya'asu hara' be'einai uba'asher lo khafazti bakharu. shim'u debar ihoh hakhareidim 'el debaro 'ameru 'akheikhem sone'eikhem menadeikhem lema'an shemi yikhbad ihoh venir'eh besimkhatkhem vehem yeiboshu. qol sha'on mei'ir qol meiheikhal qol ihoh meshalem gemul le'oyebav. beterem takhil yaladah beterem yabo kheibel lah vehimlitah zakhar. mi shama' kazot mi ra'ah ka'eleh hayukhal 'erez beyom 'ekhad 'im yivaled go pa'am 'ekhat ki khalah gam yaledah ziyon 'et baneha. ha'ani 'ashbir velo 'olid yomar ihoh 'im 'ani hamolid ve'azarti 'amar 'elohayikh. simkhu 'et yerushalim vegilu bah kal 'ohabeha sisu 'itah masos kal hamit'abelim 'aleha. lema'an tinequ useba'tem mishod tankhumeha lema'an tamozu vehit'anagtem miziz kebodah. ki khoh 'amar ihoh hini noteh 'eileha kenahar shalom ukhenakhal shotef kebod goyim vinaqtem 'al zad tinasei'u ve'al birkayim tesha'osha'u. ke'ish 'asher 'imo tenakhamenu ken 'anokhi 'anakhemkhem ubirushalim tenukhamu. ure'item vesas libekhem ve'azmoteikhem kadeshe tifrakhnah venod'ah yad ihoh 'et 'abadav veza'am 'et 'oyebav. ki hineh ihoh ba'esh yabo vekhasufah markebotav lehashib bekheimah 'apo vega'arato belahabei 'esh. ki ba'esh ihoh nishpat ubekharbo 'et kal basar verabu khalei ihoh. hamitqadeshim vehamitaharim 'el haganot 'akhar 'ekhad 'akhat batavekh 'okhelei besar hakhazir vehasheqez veha'akhbar yakhdav yasufu ne'um ihoh. ve'anokhi ma'aseihem umakhsheboteihem ba'ah leqabez 'et kal hagoyim vehaleshonot uba'u vera'u 'et kebodi. vesamti bahem 'ot veshilakhti meihem peleitim 'el hagoyim tarshish pul velud moshekhei qeshet tubal veyavan ha'iyim harekhoqim 'asher lo shame'u 'et shim'i velo ra'u 'et kebodi vehigidu 'et kebodi bagoyim. veheibi'u 'et kal 'akheikhem mikal hagoyim minkhah ihoh basusim ubarekheb ubazabim ubaperadim ubakirkarot 'al har qadshi yerushalim 'amar ihoh ka'asher yabi'u benei yisra'el 'et haminkhah bikhli tahor bet ihoh. vegam meihem 'eqakh lakohanim lalviyim 'amar ihoh. ki kha'asher hashamayim hakhodashim veha'arez hakhadashah 'asher 'ani 'oseh 'omedim lefanai ne'um ihoh ken ya'amod zar'akhem veshimkhem. vehayah midei khodesh bekhadesho umidei shabat beshabato yabo khal basar lehishtakhavot lefanai 'amar ihoh. veyaze'u vera'u befigrei ha'anashim haposhe'im bi ki tola'tam lo tamut ve'isham lo tikhbeh vehayu deira'on lekhal basar.

dibrei yirmeyahu ben khilqiyahu min hakohanim 'asher ba'anatot be'erez binyamin. 'asher hayah debar ihoh 'eilav bimei yoshiyahu ben 'amon melekh yehudah bishlosh 'esreh shanah lemalekho. vayhi bimei yehoyaqim ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah 'ad tom 'ashtei 'esreh shanah lezidqiyahu ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah 'ad gelot yerushalim bakhodesh hakhamishi. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. beterem 'ezorkha 'ezarekha babeten yeda'tikha ubeterem teizei meirekhem hiqdashtikha nabi lagoyim netatikha. va'omar 'ahah 'adonai ihoh hineh lo yada'ti daber ki na'ar 'anokhi. vayomer ihoh 'eilai 'al tomar na'ar 'anokhi ki 'al kal 'asher 'eshlakhakha teilekh ve'et kal 'asher 'azavekha tedaber. 'al tira mipeneihem ki 'itekha 'ani lehazilekha ne'um ihoh. vayishlakh ihoh 'et yado vayaga' 'al pi vayomer ihoh 'eilai hineh natati debarai befikha. re'eh hifqadtikha hayom hazeh 'al hagoyim ve'al hamamlakhot lintosh velintoz uleha'abid velaharos libnot velintoa'. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor mah 'atah ro'eh yirmeyahu va'omar maqel shaqed 'ani ro'eh. vayomer ihoh 'eilai heitabta lir'ot ki shoqed 'ani 'al debari la'asoto. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai sheinit leimor mah 'atah ro'eh va'omar sir nafuakh 'ani ro'eh ufanav mipenei zafonah. vayomer ihoh 'eilai mizafon tipatakh hara'ah 'al kal yoshebei ha'arez. ki hini qorei lekhal mishpekhot mamlekhot zafonah ne'um ihoh uba'u venatenu 'ish kis'o petakh sha'arei yerushalim ve'al kal khomoteha sabib ve'al kal 'arei yehudah. vedibarti mishpatai 'otam 'al kal ra'atam 'asher 'azabuni vayqateru leilohim 'akheirim vayishtakhavu lema'asei yedeihem. ve'atah te'zor matenekha veqamta vedibarta 'aleihem 'et kal 'asher 'anokhi 'azaveka 'al teikhat mipeneihem pen 'akhitekha lifneihem. va'ani hineh netatikha hayom le'ir mibzar ule'amud barzel ulekhomot nekhoshet 'al kal ha'arez lemalkhei yehudah lesareha lekhohaneha ule'am ha'arez. venilkhamu 'eilekha velo yukhelu lakh ki 'itekha 'ani ne'um ihoh lehazilekha. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. halokh veqarata be'azenei yerushalim leimor koh 'amar ihoh zakharti lakh khesed ne'urayikh 'ahabat kelulotayikh lekhtekh 'akharai bamidbar be'erez lo zeru'ah. qodesh yisra'el ihoh reishit tebu'atoh kal 'okhelav ye'shamu ra'ah tabo 'aleihem ne'um ihoh. shim'u debar ihoh bet ya'aqob vekhal mishpekhot bet yisra'el. koh 'amar ihoh mah maze'u 'aboteikhem bi 'avel ki rakhaqu mei'alai vayeilekhu 'akharei hahebel vayehbalu. velo 'ameru 'ayeh ihoh hama'aleh 'otanu mei'erez mizrayim hamolikh 'otanu bamidbar be'erez 'arabah veshukhah be'erez ziyah vezalmavet be'erez lo 'abar bah 'ish velo yashab 'adam sham. va'abi 'etkhem 'el 'erez hakarmel le'ekhol piryah vetubah vatabo'u vatetame'u 'et 'arzi venakhalati samtem leto'eibah. hakohanim lo 'ameru 'ayeh ihoh vetofesei hatorah lo yeda'uni veharo'im pashe'u bi vehanebi'im nibe'u baba'al ve'akharei lo yo'ilu halakhu. lakhen 'od 'arib 'itekhem ne'um ihoh ve'et benei beneikhem 'arib. ki 'ibru 'iyei khitiyim ure'u veqeidar shilkhu vehitbonu me'od ure'u hen hayetah kazot. haheimir go 'elohim vehemah lo 'elohim ve'ami heimir kebodo belo yo'il. shomu shamayim 'al zot vesa'aru kharebu me'od ne'um ihoh. ki shetayim ra'ot 'asah 'ami 'oti 'azebu meqor mayim khayim lakhzob lahem borot borot nishbarim 'asher lo yakhilu hamayim. ha'ebed yisra'el 'im yelid bayit hu madua' hayah labaz. 'alav yish'agu khefirim natenu qolam vayashitu 'arzo leshamah 'arav nizetah nizetu mibeli yosheb. gam benei nof vetakhpenes vetakhpankhes yir'ukh qadeqod. halo zot ta'aseh lakh 'azebekh 'et ihoh 'elohayikh be'et molikhekh badarekh. ve'atah mah lakh lederekh mizrayim lishtot mei shikhor umah lakh lederekh 'ashur lishtot mei nahar. teyaserekh ra'atekh umeshubotayikh tokhikhukh ude'i ure'i ki ra' vamar 'azebekh 'et ihoh 'elohayikh velo fakhdati 'eilayikh ne'um 'adonai ihoh zeba'ot. ki mei'olam shabarti 'ulekh nitaqti mosrotayikh vatomeri lo 'e'ebod 'e'ebor ki 'al kal gib'ah gebohah vetakhat kal 'ez ra'anan 'at zo'ah zonah. ve'anokhi neta'tikh soreq kuloh zera' 'emet ve'ekh nehpakht li surei hagefen nakheriyah. ki 'im tekhabesi baneter vetarbi lakh borit nikhtam 'avonekh lefanai ne'um 'adonai ihoh. 'ekh tomeri lo nitmeiti 'akharei habe'alim lo halakhti re'i darkekh bagai de'i meh 'asit bikhrah qalah mesarekhet derakheha. pereh limud midbar be'avat nafosho nafshah sha'afah ruakh ta'anatah mi yeshibenah kal mebaqsheha lo yi'afu bekhadeshah yimza'uneha. min'i raglekh miyakhef ugoronekh ugeronekh mizim'ah vatomeri no'ash lo ki 'ahabti zarim ve'akhareihem 'eilekh. keboshet ganab ki yimazei ken hobishu bet yisra'el hemah malkheihem sareihem vekhohaneihem unebi'eihem. 'omerim la'ez 'abi 'atah vela'eben 'at yelidtin yelidtanu ki fanu 'eilai 'oref velo fanim ube'et ra'atam yomeru qumah vehoshi'einu. ve'ayeh 'elohekha 'asher 'asita lakh yaqumu 'im yoshi'ukha be'et ra'atekha ki mispar 'arekha hayu 'elohekha yehudah. lamah taribu 'eilai kulekhem pesha'tem bi ne'um ihoh. lashav hikeiti 'et beneikhem musar lo laqakhu 'akhelah kharbekhem nebi'eikhem ke'aryeh mashkhit. hador 'atem re'u debar ihoh hamidbar hayiti leyisra'el 'im 'erez ma'peileyah madua' 'ameru 'ami radnu lo nabo 'od 'eilekha. hatishkakh betulah 'edyah kalah qishureha ve'ami shekheikhuni yamim 'en mispar. mah teitibi darkekh lebaqesh 'ahabah lakhen gam 'et hara'ot limadti limadt 'et derakhayikh. gam bikhnafayikh nimze'u dam nafshot 'ebyonim neqiyim lo bamakhteret mezatim ki 'al kal 'eleh. vatomeri ki niqeiti 'akh shab 'apo mimeni hini nishpat 'otakh 'al 'amerekh lo khatati. mah teizeli me'od leshanot 'et darkekh gam mimizrayim teiboshi ka'asher boshet mei'ashur. gam mei'et zeh teize'i veyadayikh 'al roshekh ki ma'as ihoh bemibtakhayikh velo tazlikhi lahem. leimor hen yeshalakh 'ish 'et 'ishto vehalekhah mei'ito vehayetah le'ish 'akher hayashub 'eileha 'od halo khanof tekhenaf ha'arez hahi ve'at zanit rei'im rabim veshob 'eilai ne'um ihoh. se'i 'einayikh 'al shefayim ure'i 'eifoh lo shugalt shukabet 'al derakhim yashabt lahem ka'arabi bamidbar vatakhanifi 'erez biznutayikh ubera'atekh. vayimane'u rebibim umalqosh lo hayah umeizakh 'ishah zonah hayah lakh mei'ant hikalem. halo mei'atah qarati qarat li 'abi 'aluf ne'urai 'atah. hayintor le'olam 'im yishmor lanezakh hineh dibarti dibart vata'asi hara'ot vatukhal. vayomer ihoh 'eilai bimei yoshiyahu hamelekh hara'ita 'asher 'asetah meshubah yisra'el holekhah hi 'al kal har gaboah ve'el takhat kal 'ez ra'anan vatizni sham. va'omar 'akharei 'asotah 'et kal 'eleh 'eilai tashub velo shabah vateireh vateire bagodah 'akhotah yehudah. va'eire ki 'al kal 'odot 'asher ni'afah meshubah yisra'el shilakhtiha va'eten 'et seifer kerituteha 'eileha velo yare'ah bogeidah yehudah 'akhotah vateilekh vatizen gam hi. vehayah miqol zenutah vatekhenaf 'et ha'arez vatin'af 'et ha'eben ve'et ha'ez. vegam bekhal zot lo shabah 'eilai bagodah 'akhotah yehudah bekhal libah ki 'im besheqer ne'um ihoh. vayomer ihoh 'eilai zideqah nafshah meshubah yisra'el mibogeidah yehudah. halokh veqarata 'et hadebarim ha'eleh zafonah ve'amarta shubah meshubah yisra'el ne'um ihoh lo 'apil panai bakhem ki khasid 'ani ne'um ihoh lo 'etor le'olam. 'akh de'i 'avonekh ki ihoh 'elohayikh pasha'at vatefazeri 'et derakhayikh lazarim takhat kal 'ez ra'anan ubeqoli lo shema'tem ne'um ihoh. shubu banim shobabim ne'um ihoh ki 'anokhi ba'alti bakhem velaqakhti 'etkhem 'ekhad mei'ir ushenayim mimishpakhah veheibeiti 'etkhem ziyon. venatati lakhem ro'im kelibi vera'u 'etkhem dei'ah vehaskel. vehayah ki tirbu uferitem ba'arez bayamim hahemah ne'um ihoh lo yomeru 'od 'aron berit ihoh velo ya'aleh 'al leb velo yizkeru bo velo yifqodu velo yei'aseh 'od. ba'et hahi yiqre'u lirushalim kisei ihoh veniqvu 'eileha khal hagoyim leshem ihoh lirushalim velo yeilekhu 'od 'akharei sherirut libam hara'. bayamim hahemah yeilekhu bet yehudah 'al bet yisra'el veyabo'u yakhdav mei'erez zafon 'al ha'arez 'asher hinkhalti 'et 'aboteikhem. ve'anokhi 'amarti 'ekh 'ashitekh babanim ve'eten lakh 'erez khemdah nakhalat zebi zib'ot goyim va'omar 'abi tiqre'u tiqre'i li umei'akharai lo tashubu tashubi. 'akhen bagedah 'ishah meirei'ah ken begadtem bi bet yisra'el ne'um ihoh. qol 'al shefayim nishma' bekhi takhanunei benei yisra'el ki he'evu 'et darkam shakhekhu 'et ihoh 'eloheihem. ubu banim shobabim 'erpah meshuboteikhem hinu 'atanu lakh ki 'atah ihoh 'eloheinu. 'akhen lasheqer migeba'ot hamon harim 'akhen ihoh 'eloheinu teshu'at yisra'el. vehaboshet 'akhelah 'et yegia' 'aboteinu mine'ureinu 'et zonam ve'et beqaram 'et beneihem ve'et benoteihem. nishkebah bebasheteinu utekhaseinu kelimateinu ki ihoh 'eloheinu khatanu 'anakhnu va'aboteinu mine'ureinu ve'ad hayom hazeh velo shama'nu beqol ihoh 'eloheinu. 'im tashub yisra'el ne'um ihoh 'eilai tashub ve'im tasir shiquzekha mipanai velo tanud. venishba'ta khai ihoh be'emet bemishpat ubizdaqah vehitbarekhu bo goyim ubo yithalalu. ki khoh 'amar ihoh le'ish yehudah velirushalim niru lakhem nir ve'al tizre'u 'el qozim. himolu ihoh vehasiru 'arelot lebabkhem 'ish yehudah veyoshebei yerushalim pen teizei kha'esh khamati uba'arah ve'en mekhabeh mipenei roa' ma'aleikhem. hagidu bihudah ubirushalim hashmi'u ve'imru vtiq'u tiq'u shofar ba'arez qir'u mal'u ve'imru hei'asefu venabo'ah 'el 'arei hamibzar. se'u nes ziyonah ha'izu 'al ta'amodu ki ra'ah 'anokhi meibi mizafon vesheber gadol. 'alah 'aryeh misubekho umashkhit goyim nasa' yaza mimeqomo lasum 'arzekh leshamah 'arayikh tizenah mei'en yosheb. 'al zot khigru saqim sifdu veheililu ki lo shab kharon 'af ihoh mimenu. vehayah bayom hahu ne'um ihoh yobad leb hamelekh veleb hasarim venashamu hakohanim vehanebi'im yitmahu. va'omar 'ahah 'adonai ihoh 'akhen hashei hisheita la'am hazeh velirushalim leimor shalom yihyeh lakhem venage'ah khereb 'ad hanafesh. ba'et hahi yei'amer la'am hazeh velirushalim ruakh zakh shefayim bamidbar derekh bat 'ami lo lizrot velo lehabar. ruakh malei mei'eleh yabo li 'atah gam 'ani 'adaber mishpatim 'otam. hineh ka'ananim ya'aleh vekhasufah markebotav qalu minesharim susav 'o lanu ki shudadenu. kabesi meira'ah libekh yerushalim lema'an tivashei'i 'ad matai talin beqirbekh makhshebot 'onekh. ki qol magid midan umashmia' 'aven meihar 'efrayim. hazkiru lagoyim hineh hashmi'u 'al yerushalim nozerim ba'im mei'erez hamerkhaq vayitenu 'al 'arei yehudah qolam. keshomerei sadai hayu 'aleha misabib ki 'oti maratah ne'um ihoh. darkekh uma'alalayikh 'aso 'eleh lakh zot ra'atekh ki mar ki naga' 'ad libekh. mei'ai mei'ai 'akhulah 'okhilah qirot libi homeh li libi lo 'akharish ki qol shofar shama'ti shama'at nafshi teru'at milkhamah. sheber 'al sheber niqra ki shudedah kal ha'arez pit'om shudedu 'ohalai rega' yeri'otai. 'ad matai 'er'eh nes 'eshme'ah qol shofar. ki 'evil 'ami 'oti lo yada'u banim sekhalim hemah velo nebonim hemah khakhamim hemah lehara' uleheitib lo yada'u. ra'iti 'et ha'arez vehineh tohu vabohu ve'el hashamayim ve'en 'oram. ra'iti heharim vehineh ro'ashim vekhal hageba'ot hitqalqalu. ra'iti vehineh 'en ha'adam vekhal 'of hashamayim nadadu. ra'iti vehineh hakarmel hamidbar vekhal 'arav nitezu mipenei ihoh mipenei kharon 'apo. ki khoh 'amar ihoh shemamah tihyeh kal ha'arez vekhalah lo 'e'eseh. 'al zot te'ebal ha'arez veqaderu hashamayim mima'al 'al ki dibarti zamoti velo nikhamti velo 'ashub mimenah. miqol parash veromeh qeshet borakhat kal ha'ir ba'u be'abim ubakeifim 'alu kal ha'ir 'azubah ve'en yosheb bahen 'ish. ve'ati ve'at shadud mah ta'asi ki tilbeshi shani ki ta'di 'adi zahab ki tiqre'i bapukh 'einayikh lashav tityapi ma'asu bakh 'ogebim nafshekh yebaqeishu. ki qol kekholah shama'ti zarah kemabkirah qol bat ziyon tityapeiakh tefares kapeha 'o na li ki 'ayefah nafshi lehoregim. shotu bekhuzot yerushalim ure'u na ude'u ubaqshu birkhoboteha 'im timze'u 'ish 'im yesh 'oseh mishpat mebaqesh 'emunah ve'eslakh lah. ve'im khai ihoh yomeiru lakhen lasheqer yishabei'u. ihoh 'einekha halo le'emunah hikitah 'otam velo khalu kilitam mei'anu qakhat musar khizequ feneihem misela' mei'anu lashub. va'ani 'amarti 'akh dalim hem no'alu ki lo yade'u derekh ihoh mishpat 'eloheihem. 'eilakhah li 'el hagedolim va'adaberah 'otam ki hemah yade'u derekh ihoh mishpat 'eloheihem 'akh hemah yakhdav shaberu 'ol nitequ moseirot. 'al ken hikam 'aryeh miya'ar ze'eb 'arabot yeshadedem namer shoqed 'al 'areihem kal hayozei meihenah yitaref ki rabu pish'eihem 'azemu meshuboteihem meshuboteihem 'ei lazot 'esloakh 'eslakh lakh banayikh 'azabuni vayishabe'u belo 'elohim va'asbia' 'otam vayin'afu ubet zonah yitgodadu. susim meyuzanim mashkim hayu 'ish 'el 'eishet rei'eihu yizhalu. ha'al 'eleh lo 'efqod ne'um ihoh ve'im bego 'asher kazeh lo titnaqem nafshi. 'alu besharoteha veshakheitu vekhalah 'al ta'asu hasiru netishoteha ki lo ihoh hemah. ki bagod bagedu bi bet yisra'el ubet yehudah ne'um ihoh. kikhashu ihoh vayomeru lo hu velo tabo 'aleinu ra'ah vekhereb vera'ab lo nir'eh. vehanebi'im yihyu leruakh vehadiber 'en bahem koh yei'aseh lahem. lakhen koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei zeba'ot ya'an daberkhem 'et hadabar hazeh hini noten debarai befikha le'esh veha'am hazeh 'eizim va'akhalatam. hini meibi 'aleikhem go mimerkhaq bet yisra'el ne'um ihoh go 'eitan hu go mei'olam hu go lo teida' leshono velo tishma' mah yedaber. 'ashpato keqeber patuakh kulam giborim. ve'akhal qezirekha velakhmekha yokhelu banekha ubenotekha yokhal zonekha ubeqarekha yokhal gafnekha ute'einatekha yeroshesh 'arei mibzarekha 'asher 'atah boteiakh bahenah bekhareb. vegam bayamim hahemah ne'um ihoh lo 'e'eseh 'itekhem kalah. vehayah ki tomeru takhat meh 'asah ihoh 'eloheinu lanu 'et kal 'eleh ve'amarta 'aleihem ka'asher 'azabtem 'oti vata'abdu 'elohei neikhar be'arzekhem ken ta'abdu zarim be'erez lo lakhem. hagidu zot bebet ya'aqob vehashmi'uha bihudah leimor. shim'u na zot 'am sakhal ve'en leb 'einayim lahem velo yir'u 'azenayim lahem velo yishma'u. ha'oti lo tira'u ne'um ihoh 'im mipanai lo takhilu 'asher samti khol gebul layam khaq 'olam velo ya'abrenhu vayitga'ashu velo yukhalu vehamu galav velo ya'abrunhu. vela'am hazeh hayah leb sorer umoreh saru vayeileikhu. velo 'ameru bilbabam nira na 'et ihoh 'eloheinu hanoten geshem veyoreh yoreh umalqosh be'ito shebu'ot khuqot qazir yishmar lanu. 'avonoteikhem hitu 'eleh vekhatoteikhem mane'u hatob mikem. ki nimze'u be'ami resha'im yashur keshakh yequshim hizibu mashkhit 'anashim yilkodu. kikhlub malei 'of ken bateihem melei'im mirmah 'al ken gadelu vaya'ashiru. shamenu 'ashetu gam 'aberu dibrei ra' din lo danu din yatom veyazlikhu umishpat 'ebyonim lo shafatu. ha'al 'eleh lo 'efqod ne'um ihoh 'im bego 'asher kazeh lo titnaqem nafshi. shamah vesha'arurah nihyetah ba'arez. hanebi'im nibe'u basheqer vehakohanim yirdu 'al yedeihem ve'ami 'ahabu khen umah ta'asu le'akharitah. ha'izu benei binyamin miqereb yerushalim ubitqoa' tiq'u shofar ve'al bet hakerem se'u mas'et ki ra'ah nishqefah mizafon vesheber gadol. hanavah vehame'unagah damiti bat ziyon. 'eileha yabo'u ro'im ve'edreihem taqe'u 'aleha 'ohalim sabib ra'u 'ish 'et yado. qadeshu 'aleha milkhamah qumu vena'aleh bazahorayim 'o lanu ki fanah hayom ki yinatu zilei 'areb. qumu vena'aleh balayelah venashkhitah 'armenoteha. ki khoh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot kirtu 'eizah veshifkhu 'al yerushalim solelah hi ha'ir hafeqad kulah 'osheq beqirbah. kehaqir bever bayir meimeha ken heiqeirah ra'atah khamas vashod yishama' bah 'al panai tamid kholi umakah. hivaseri yerushalim pen teiqa' nafshi mimekh pen 'asimekh shemamah 'erez lo noshabah. koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'olel ye'olu khagefen she'eirit yisra'el hasheb yadekha kebozer 'al salsilot. 'al mi 'adaberah ve'a'idah veyishma'u hineh 'areilah 'azenam velo yukhelu lehaqshib hineh debar ihoh hayah lahem lekherpah lo yakhpezu bo. ve'et khamat ihoh maleiti nil'eiti hakhil shefokh 'al 'olal bakhuz ve'al sod bakhurim yakhdav ki gam 'ish 'im 'ishah yilakheidu zaqen 'im melei yamim. venasabu bateihem la'akheirim sadot venashim yakhdav ki 'ateh 'et yadi 'al yoshebei ha'arez ne'um ihoh. ki miqetanam ve'ad gedolam kulo bozeia' baza' uminabi ve'ad kohen kulo 'oseh shaqer. vayrape'u 'et sheber 'ami 'al neqalah leimor shalom shalom ve'en shalom. hobishu ki to'eibah 'asu gam bosh lo yeiboshu gam hakhlim lo yada'u lakhen yipelu banofelim be'et peqadtim yikashelu 'amar ihoh. koh 'amar ihoh 'imdu 'al derakhim ure'u vesha'alu lintibot 'olam 'ei zeh derekh hatob ulekhu bah umiz'u margoa' lenafshekhem vayomeru lo neilekh. vahaqimoti 'aleikhem zofim haqshibu leqol shofar vayomeru lo naqshib. lakhen shim'u hagoyim ude'i 'eidah 'et 'asher bam. shim'i ha'arez hineh 'anokhi meibi ra'ah 'el ha'am hazeh peri makhshebotam ki 'al debarai lo hiqshibu vetorati vayim'asu bah. lamah zeh li lebonah misheba tabo veqaneh hatob mei'erez merkhaq 'oloteikhem lo lerazon vezibkheikhem lo 'arebu li. lakhen koh 'amar ihoh hini noten 'el ha'am hazeh mikhsholim vekhashelu bam 'abot ubanim yakhdav shakhen verei'o yobeidu ve'abadu. koh 'amar ihoh hineh 'am ba mei'erez zafon vego gadol yei'or miyarketei 'arez. qeshet vekhidon yakhaziqu 'akhzari hu velo yerakheimu qolam kayam yehemeh ve'al susim yirkabu 'arukh ke'ish lamilkhamah 'alayikh bat ziyon. shama'nu 'et shame'o rafu yadeinu zarah hekheziqatnu khil kayoleidah. 'al teize'i teize'u hasadeh ubaderekh 'al teileikhi teileikhu ki khereb le'oyeb magor misabib. bat 'ami khigri saq vehitpaleshi ba'eifer 'eibel yakhid 'asi lakh mispad tamrurim ki fit'om yabo hashoded 'aleinu. bakhon netatikha be'ami mibzar veteida' ubakhanta 'et darkam. kulam sarei sorrim holekhei rakhil nekhoshet ubarzel kulam mashkhitim hemah. nakhar mapuakh mei'ishtam mei'esh tam 'ofaret lashav zaraf zarof vera'im lo nitaqu. kesef nim'as qare'u lahem ki ma'as ihoh bahem. hadabar 'asher hayah 'el yirmeyahu mei'et ihoh leimor. 'amod besha'ar bet ihoh veqarata sham 'et hadabar hazeh ve'amarta shim'u debar ihoh kal yehudah haba'im bashe'arim ha'eleh lehishtakhavot ihoh. koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el heitibu darkheikhem uma'aleikhem va'ashakenah 'etkhem bamaqom hazeh. 'al tibtekhu lakhem 'el dibrei hasheqer leimor heikhal ihoh heikhal ihoh heikhal ihoh hemah. ki 'im heiteb teitibu 'et darkheikhem ve'et ma'aleikhem 'im 'aso ta'asu mishpat ben 'ish uben rei'eihu. ger yatom ve'almanah lo ta'ashoqu vedam naqi 'al tishpekhu bamaqom hazeh ve'akharei 'elohim 'akheirim lo teilekhu lera' lakhem. veshikanti 'etkhem bamaqom hazeh ba'arez 'asher natati la'aboteikhem lemin 'olam ve'ad 'olam. hineh 'atem botekhim lakhem 'al dibrei hashaqer lebilti ho'il. haganob razoakh vena'of vehishabeia' lasheqer veqater laba'al vehalokh 'akharei 'elohim 'akheirim 'asher lo yeda'tem. ubatem va'amadtem lefanai babayit hazeh 'asher niqra shemi 'alav va'amartem nizalnu lema'an 'asot 'et kal hato'eibot ha'eleh. ham'arat parizim hayah habayit hazeh 'asher niqra shemi 'alav be'eineikhem gam 'anokhi hineh ra'iti ne'um ihoh. ki lekhu na 'el meqomi 'asher beshilo 'asher shikanti shemi sham barishonah ure'u 'et 'asher 'asiti lo mipenei ra'at 'ami yisra'el. ve'atah ya'an 'asotkhem 'et kal hama'asim ha'eleh ne'um ihoh va'adaber 'aleikhem hashkem vedaber velo shema'tem va'eqra 'etkhem velo 'anitem. ve'asiti labayit 'asher niqra shemi 'alav 'asher 'atem botekhim bo velamaqom 'asher natati lakhem vela'aboteikhem ka'asher 'asiti leshilo. vehishlakhti 'etkhem mei'al panai ka'asher hishlakhti 'et kal 'akheikhem 'et kal zera' 'efrayim. ve'atah 'al titpalel be'ad ha'am hazeh ve'al tisa ba'adam rinah utefilah ve'al tifga' bi ki 'eineni shomeia' 'otakh. ha'einekha ro'eh mah hemah 'osim be'arei yehudah ubekhuzot yerushalim. habanim melaqetim 'eizim veha'abot meba'arim 'et ha'esh vehanashim lashot bazeq la'asot kavanim limlekhet hashamayim vehasekh nesakhim leilohim 'akheirim lema'an hakh'iseini. ha'oti hem makh'isim ne'um ihoh halo 'otam lema'an boshet peneihem. lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh hineh 'api vakhamati nitekhet 'el hamaqom hazeh 'al ha'adam ve'al habeheimah ve'al 'ez hasadeh ve'al peri ha'adamah uba'arah velo tikhbeh. koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el 'oloteikhem sefu 'al zibkheikhem ve'ikhlu basar. ki lo dibarti 'et 'aboteikhem velo zivitim beyom hozi hozi'i 'otam mei'erez mizrayim 'al dibrei 'olah vazabakh. ki 'im 'et hadabar hazeh ziviti 'otam leimor shim'u beqoli vehayiti lakhem leilohim ve'atem tihyu li le'am vahalakhtem bekhal haderekh 'asher 'azaveh 'etkhem lema'an yitab lakhem. velo shame'u velo hitu 'et 'azenam vayeilekhu bemo'eizot bishrirut libam hara' vayihyu le'akhor velo lefanim. lemin hayom 'asher yaze'u 'aboteikhem mei'erez mizrayim 'ad hayom hazeh va'eshlakh 'aleikhem 'et kal 'abadai hanebi'im yom hashkem veshaloakh. velo shame'u 'eilai velo hitu 'et 'azenam vayaqshu 'et 'arepam heirei'u mei'abotam. vedibarta 'aleihem 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh velo yishme'u 'eilekha veqarata 'aleihem velo ya'anukhah. ve'amarta 'aleihem zeh hago 'asher lo shame'u beqol ihoh 'elohav velo laqekhu musar 'abedah ha'emunah venikhretah mipihem. gazi nizrekh vehashlikhi use'i 'al shefayim qinah ki ma'as ihoh vayitosh 'et dor 'ebrato. ki 'asu benei yehudah hara' be'einai ne'uvm ihoh samu shiquzeihem babayit 'asher niqra shemi 'alav letame'o. ubanu bamot hatofet 'asher begei ben hinom lisrof 'et beneihem ve'et benoteihem ba'esh 'asher lo ziviti velo 'aletah 'al libi. lakhen hineh yamim ba'im ne'um ihoh velo yei'amer 'od hatofet vegei ben hinom ki 'im gei hahareigah veqaberu betofet mei'en maqom. vehayetah niblat ha'am hazeh lema'akhal le'of hashamayim ulebehemat ha'arez ve'en makharid. vehishbati mei'arei yehudah umeikhuzot yerushalim qol sason veqol simkhah qol khatan veqol kalah ki lekharebah tihyeh ha'arez. ba'et hahi ne'um ihoh veyozi'u yozi'u 'et 'azmot malkhei yehudah ve'et 'azmot sarav ve'et 'azmot hakohanim ve'et 'azmot hanebi'im ve'et 'azmot yoshebei yerushalim miqibreihem. ushetakhum lashemesh velayareiakh ulekhol zeba hashamayim 'asher 'aheibum va'asher 'abadum va'asher halekhu 'akhareihem va'asher derashum va'asher hishtakhavu lahem lo yei'asefu velo yiqabeiru ledomen 'al penei ha'adamah yihyu. venibkhar mavet meikhayim lekhol hashe'eirit hanish'arim min hamishpakhah hara'ah hazot bekhal hameqomot hanish'arim 'asher hidakhtim sham ne'um ihoh zeba'ot. ve'amarta 'aleihem koh 'amar ihoh hayipelu velo yaqumu 'im yashub velo yashub. madua' shobbah ha'am hazeh yerushalim meshubah nizakhat hekheziqu batarmit mei'anu lashub. hiqshabti va'eshma' lo khen yedabeiru 'en 'ish nikham 'al ra'ato leimor meh 'asiti kuloh b bimruzotam bimruzatam kesus shotef bamilkhamah. gam khasidah bashamayim yade'ah mo'adeha vetor vesus vesis ve'agur shameru 'et 'et bo'anah ve'ami lo yade'u 'et mishpat ihoh. 'eikhah tomeru khakhamim 'anakhnu vetorat ihoh 'itanu 'akhen hineh lasheqer 'asah 'et sheqer soferim. hobishu khakhamim khatu vayilakheidu hineh bidbar ihoh ma'asu vekhakhemat meh lahem. lakhen 'eten 'et nesheihem la'akheirim sedoteihem leyorshim ki miqaton ve'ad gadol kuloh bozeia' baza' minabi ve'ad kohen kuloh 'oseh shaqer. vayrapu 'et sheber bat 'ami 'al neqalah leimor shalom shalom ve'en shalom. hobishu ki to'eibah 'asu gam bosh lo yeiboshu vehikalem lo yada'u lakhen yipelu banofelim be'et pequdatam yikashelu 'amar ihoh. 'asof 'asifem ne'um ihoh 'en 'anabim bagefen ve'en te'einim bate'einah vehe'aleh nabel va'eten lahem ya'abrum. 'al mah 'anakhnu yoshebim hei'asefu venabo 'el 'arei hamibzar venidemah sham ki ihoh 'eloheinu hadimanu vayashqeinu mei rosh ki khatanu ihoh. qaveh leshalom ve'en tob le'et marpeh vehineh be'atah. midan nishma' nakhrat susav miqol mizhalot 'abirav ra'ashah kal ha'arez vayabo'u vayokhelu 'erez umelo'ah 'ir veyoshebei bah. ki hini meshaleiakh bakhem nekhashim zif'onim 'asher 'en lahem lakhash venishekhu 'etkhem ne'um ihoh. mabligiti 'alei yagon 'alai libi davai. hineh qol shav'at bat 'ami mei'erez markhaqim ihoh 'en beziyon 'im malkah 'en bah madua' hikh'isuni bifsileihem behablei neikhar. 'abar qazir kalah qayiz va'anakhnu lo nosha'enu. 'al sheber bat 'ami hashebareti qadarti shamah hekheziqateni. hazori 'en begil'ad 'im rofei 'en sham ki madua' lo 'aletah 'arukhat bat 'ami. mi yiten roshi mayim ve'eini meqor dim'ah ve'ebkeh yomam valaylah 'et khalei bat 'ami. mi yiteneini bamidbar melon 'orekhim ve'e'ezbah 'et 'ami ve'eilekhah mei'itam ki khulam mena'afim 'azeret bogedim. vayadrekhu 'et leshonam qashtam sheqer velo le'emunah gaberu ba'arez ki meira'ah 'el ra'ah yaza'u ve'oti lo yada'u ne'um ihoh. 'ish meirei'eihu hishameiru ve'al kal 'akh 'al tibtakhu ki khal 'akh 'aqob ya'qob vekhal reia' rakhil yahalokh. ve'ish berei'eihu yehatelu ve'emet lo yedabeiru limedu leshonam daber sheqer ha'aveh nil'u. shibtekha betokh mirmah bemirmah mei'anu da'at 'oti ne'um ihoh. lakhen koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot hini zorfam ubekhantim ki 'ekh 'e'eseh mipenei bat 'ami. khez shokhet shakhut leshonam mirmah diber befiv shalom 'et rei'eihu yedaber ubeqirbo yasim 'arebo. ha'al 'eleh lo 'efqad bam ne'um ihoh 'im bego 'asher kazeh lo titnaqem nafshi. 'al heharim 'esa bekhi vanehi ve'al ne'ot midbar qinah ki nizetu mibeli 'ish 'ober velo shame'u qol miqneh mei'of hashamayim ve'ad beheimah nadedu halakhu. venatati 'et yerushalim legalim me'on tanim ve'et 'arei yehudah 'eten shemamah mibeli yosheb. mi ha'ish hekhakham veyaben 'et zot va'asher diber pi ihoh 'eilav veyagidah 'al mah 'abedah ha'arez nizetah khamidbar mibeli 'ober. vayomer ihoh 'al 'azebam 'et torati 'asher natati lifneihem velo shame'u beqoli velo halekhu bah. vayeilekhu 'akharei sherirut libam ve'akharei habe'alim 'asher limedum 'abotam. lakhen koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el hini ma'akhilam 'et ha'am hazeh la'anah vehishqitim mei rosh. vahafizotim bagoyim 'asher lo yade'u hemah va'abotam veshilakhti 'akhareihem 'et hakhereb 'ad kaloti 'otam. koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot hitbonu veqir'u lamqonot utebo'enah ve'el hakhakhamot shilkhu vetabonah. utemaheirenah vetisenah 'aleinu nehi veteiradnah 'eineinu dim'ah ve'af'apeinu yizelu mayim. ki qol nehi nishma' miziyon 'ekh shudadenu boshenu me'od ki 'azabnu 'arez ki hishlikhu mishkenoteinu. ki shema'nah nashim debar ihoh vetiqakh 'azenekhem debar piv velameidenah benoteikhem nehi ve'ishah re'utah qinah. ki 'alah mavet bekhaloneinu ba be'armenoteinu lehakhrit 'olal mikhuz bakhurim meirekhobot. daber koh ne'um ihoh venafelah niblat ha'adam kedomen 'al penei hasadeh ukhe'amir mei'akharei haqozer ve'en me'asef. koh 'amar ihoh 'al yithalel khakham bekhakhemato ve'al yithalel hagibor bigburato 'al yithalel 'ashir be'ashero. ki 'im bezot yithalel hamithalel haskel veyadoa' 'oti ki 'ani ihoh 'oseh khesed mishpat uzedaqah ba'arez ki be'eleh khafazti ne'um ihoh. hineh yamim ba'im ne'um ihoh ufaqadti 'al kal mul be'arelah. 'al mizrayim ve'al yehudah ve'al 'edom ve'al benei 'amon ve'al mo'ab ve'al kal qezuzei fei'ah hayoshebim bamidbar ki khal hagoyim 'areilim vekhal bet yisra'el 'arlei leb. shim'u 'et hadabar 'asher diber ihoh 'aleikhem bet yisra'el. koh 'amar ihoh 'el derekh hagoyim 'al tilmadu umei'otot hashamayim 'al teikhatu ki yeikhatu hagoyim meihemah. ki khuqot ha'amim hebel hu ki 'ez miya'ar kerato ma'aseh yedei kharash bama'azad. bekhesef ubezahab yeyapeihu bemasmerot ubemaqabot yekhazequm velo yafiq. ketomer miqshah hemah velo yedabeiru naso yinasu ki lo yiz'adu 'al tire'u meihem ki lo yarei'u vegam heiteb 'en 'otam. mei'en kamokha ihoh gadol 'atah vegadol shimkha bigburah. mi lo yira'akha melekh hagoyim ki lekha ya'atah ki bekhal khakhmei hagoyim ubekhal malkhutam mei'en kamokha. ube'akhat yib'aru veyikhsalu musar habalim 'ez hu. kesef meruqa' mitarshish yuba vezahab mei'ufaz ma'aseh kharash videi zoref tekheilet ve'argaman lebusham ma'aseh khakhamim kulam. ihoh 'elohim 'emet hu 'elohim khayim umelekh 'olam miqizpo tir'ash ha'arez velo yakhilu goyim za'mo. kidnah teimerun lehom 'elahaya di shemaya ve'arqa la 'abadu yeibadu mei'ar'a umin tekhot shemaya 'eleh. 'oseh 'erez bekhokho meikhin teibel bekhakhemato ubitbunato natah shamayim. leqol tito hamon mayim bashamayim vaya'aleh nesi'im miqzeh 'erez ha'arez beraqim lamatar 'asah vayozei ruakh mei'ozerotav. nib'ar kal 'adam mida'at hobish kal zoref mipasel ki sheqer nisko velo ruakh bam. hebel hemah ma'aseh ta'tu'im be'et pequdatam yobeidu. lo khe'eleh kheileq ya'aqob ki yozer hakol hu veyisra'el sheibet nakhalato ihoh zeba'ot shemo. 'ispi mei'erez kin'atekh yoshabti yoshebet bamazor. ki khoh 'amar ihoh hini qoleia' 'et yoshebei ha'arez bapa'am hazot vahazeiroti lahem lema'an yimza'u. 'o li 'al shibri nakhlah makati va'ani 'amarti 'akh zeh kholi ve'esa'enu. 'aholi shudad vekhal meitarai nitaqu banai yeza'uni ve'einam 'en noteh 'od 'aholi umeiqim yeri'otai. ki nib'aru haro'im ve'et ihoh lo darashu 'al ken lo hiskilu vekhal mar'itam nafozah. qol shemu'ah hineh ba'ah vera'ash gadol mei'erez zafon lasum 'et 'arei yehudah shemamah me'on tanim. yada'ti ihoh ki lo la'adam darko lo le'ish holekh vehakhin 'et za'ado. yasereini ihoh 'akh bemishpat 'al be'apekha pen tam'iteini. shefokh khamatekha 'al hagoyim 'asher lo yeda'ukha ve'al mishpakhot 'asher beshimkha lo qara'u ki 'akhelu 'et ya'aqob va'akhaluhu vaykhaluhu ve'et naveihu heishamu. hadabar 'asher hayah 'el yirmeyahu mei'et ihoh leimor. shim'u 'et dibrei haberit hazot vedibartam 'el 'ish yehudah ve'al yoshebei yerushalim. ve'amarta 'aleihem koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el 'arur ha'ish 'asher lo yishma' 'et dibrei haberit hazot. 'asher ziviti 'et 'aboteikhem beyom hozi'i 'otam mei'erez mizrayim mikur habarzel leimor shim'u beqoli va'asitem 'otam kekhol 'asher 'azaveh 'etkhem vihyitem li le'am ve'anokhi 'ehyeh lakhem leilohim. lema'an haqim 'et hashebu'ah 'asher nishba'ti la'aboteikhem latet lahem 'erez zabat khalab udebash kayom hazeh va'a'an va'omar 'amen ihoh. vayomer ihoh 'eilai qera 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh be'arei yehudah ubekhuzot yerushalim leimor shim'u 'et dibrei haberit hazot va'asitem 'otam. ki ha'ed ha'idoti ba'aboteikhem beyom ha'aloti 'otam mei'erez mizrayim ve'ad hayom hazeh hashkem veha'ed leimor shim'u beqoli. velo shame'u velo hitu 'et 'azenam vayeilekhu 'ish bishrirut libam hara' va'abi 'aleihem 'et kal dibrei haberit hazot 'asher ziviti la'asot velo 'asu. vayomer ihoh 'eilai nimza qesher be'ish yehudah ubeyoshebei yerushalim. shabu 'al 'avonot 'abotam harishonim 'asher mei'anu lishmoa' 'et debarai vehemah halekhu 'akharei 'elohim 'akheirim le'abedam heifeiru bet yisra'el ubet yehudah 'et beriti 'asher karati 'et 'abotam. lakhen koh 'amar ihoh hini meibi 'aleihem ra'ah 'asher lo yukhelu lazet mimenah veza'aqu 'eilai velo 'eshma' 'aleihem. vehalekhu 'arei yehudah veyoshebei yerushalim veza'aqu 'el ha'elohim 'asher hem meqaterim lahem vehosheia' lo yoshi'u lahem be'et ra'atam. ki mispar 'arekha hayu 'elohekha yehudah umispar khuzot yerushalim samtem mizbekhot laboshet mizbekhot leqater laba'al. ve'atah 'al titpalel be'ad ha'am hazeh ve'al tisa ba'adam rinah utefilah ki 'eineni shomeia' be'et qare'am 'eilai be'ad ra'atam. meh lididi bebeiti 'asotah hamzimatah harabim ubesar qodesh ya'abru mei'alayikh ki ra'ateikhi 'az ta'alozi. zayit ra'anan yefeh feri to'ar qara ihoh shemekh leqol hamulah gedolah hizit 'esh 'aleha vera'u daliyotav. ihoh zeba'ot hanoteia' 'otakh diber 'alayikh ra'ah biglal ra'at bet yisra'el ubet yehudah 'asher 'asu lahem lehakh'iseini leqater laba'al. ihoh hodi'ani va'eida'ah 'az hir'itani ma'aleihem. va'ani kekhebes 'aluf yubal litboakh velo yada'ti ki 'alai khashebu makhashabot nashkhitah 'ez belakhmo venikhretenu mei'erez khayim ushemo lo yizakher 'od. ihoh zeba'ot shofet zedeq bokhen kelayot valeb 'er'eh niqmatekha meihem ki 'eilekha giliti 'et ribi. lakhen koh 'amar ihoh 'al 'anshei 'anatot hambaqshim 'et nafshekha leimor lo tinabei beshem ihoh velo tamut beyadeinu. lakhen koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot hini foqed 'aleihem habakhurim yamutu bakhereb beneihem ubenoteihem yamutu bara'ab. ushe'eirit lo tihyeh lahem ki 'abi ra'ah 'el 'anshei 'anatot shenat pequdatam. zadiq 'atah ihoh ki 'arib 'eilekha 'akh mishpatim 'adaber 'otakh madua' derekh resha'im zaleikhah shalu kal bogedei baged. neta'tam gam shorashu yeilekhu gam 'asu feri qarob 'atah befihem verakhoq mikilyoteihem. ve'atah ihoh yeda'tani tir'eini ubakhanta libi 'itakh hatiqem kezon letibkhah vehaqdishem leyom hareigah. 'ad matai te'ebal ha'arez ve'eiseb kal hasadeh yibash meira'at yoshebei bah safetah beheimot va'of ki 'ameru lo yir'eh 'et 'akhariteinu. ki 'et raglim raztah vayal'ukha ve'ekh tetakhareh 'et hasusim ube'erez shalom 'atah boteiakh ve'ekh ta'aseh big'on hayarden. ki gam 'akhekha ubet 'abikha gam hemah bagedu bakh gam hemah qare'u 'akharekha malei 'al ta'amen bam ki yedaberu 'eilekha tobot. 'azabti 'et beiti natashti 'et nakhalati natati 'et yedidut nafshi bekhaf 'oyebeha. hayetah li nakhalati ke'aryeh baya'ar natenah 'alai beqolah 'al ken seneitiha. ha'ayit zabua' nakhalati li ha'ayit sabib 'aleha lekhu 'isfu kal khayat hasadeh heitayu le'akhlah ro'im rabim shikhatu kharmi bosesu 'et khelqati natenu 'et khelqat khemdati lemidbar shemamah. samah lishmamah 'abelah 'alai shemeimah nashamah kal ha'arez ki 'en 'ish sam 'al leb. 'al kal shefayim bamidbar ba'u shodedim ki khereb ihoh 'okhelah miqzeh 'erez ve'ad qezeh ha'arez 'en shalom lekhal basar. zare'u khitim veqozim qazaru nekhlu lo yo'ilu uboshu mitebu'oteikhem meikharon 'af ihoh. koh 'amar ihoh 'al kal shekheinai hara'im hanoge'im banakhalah 'asher hinkhalti 'et 'ami 'et yisra'el hini notesham mei'al 'admatam ve'et bet yehudah 'etosh mitokham. vehayah 'akharei nateshi 'otam 'ashub verikhamtim vahashibotim 'ish lenakhalato ve'ish le'arzo. vehayah 'im lamod yilmedu 'et darkhei 'ami lehishabeia' bishmi khai ihoh ka'asher limedu 'et 'ami lehishabeia' baba'al venibnu betokh 'ami. ve'im lo yishma'u venatashti 'et hago hahu natosh ve'abed ne'um ihoh. koh 'amar ihoh 'eilai halokh veqanita lekha 'eizor pishtim vesamto 'al matenekha ubamayim lo tebi'eihu. va'eqneh 'et ha'eizor kidbar ihoh va'asim 'al matenai. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai sheinit leimor. qakh 'et ha'eizor 'asher qanita 'asher 'al matenekha vequm lekh peratah vetameneihu sham binqiq hasala'. va'eilekh va'etmeneihu bifrat ka'asher zivah ihoh 'oti. vayhi miqez yamim rabim vayomer ihoh 'eilai qum lekh peratah veqakh misham 'et ha'eizor 'asher zivitikha letameno sham. va'eilekh peratah va'ekhpor va'eqakh 'et ha'eizor min hamaqom 'asher temantiv shamah vehineh nishkhat ha'eizor lo yizlakh lakol. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. koh 'amar ihoh kakhah 'ashkhit 'et ge'on yehudah ve'et ge'on yerushalim harab. ha'am hazeh hara' hamei'anim lishmoa' 'et debarai haholekhim bishrirut libam vayeilekhu 'akharei 'elohim 'akheirim le'abedam ulehishtakhavot lahem vihi ka'eizor hazeh 'asher lo yizlakh lakol. ki ka'asher yidbaq ha'eizor 'el matenei 'ish ken hidbaqti 'eilai 'et kal bet yisra'el ve'et kal bet yehudah ne'um ihoh lihyot li le'am uleshem velithilah uletif'aret velo shamei'u. ve'amarta 'aleihem 'et hadabar hazeh koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el kal neibel yimalei yayin ve'ameru 'eilekha hayadoa' lo neida' ki khal neibel yimalei yayin. ve'amarta 'aleihem koh 'amar ihoh hini memalei 'et kal yoshebei ha'arez hazot ve'et hamelakhim hayoshebim ledavid 'al kis'o ve'et hakohanim ve'et hanebi'im ve'et kal yoshebei yerushalim shikaron. venipaztim 'ish 'el 'akhiv veha'abot vehabanim yakhdav ne'um ihoh lo 'ekhmol velo 'akhus velo 'arakhem meihashkhitam. shim'u veha'azinu 'al tigbahu ki ihoh diber. tenu ihoh 'eloheikhem kabod beterem yakhshikh ubeterem yitnagefu ragleikhem 'al harei nashef veqivitem le'or vesamah lezalmavet yashit veshit la'arafel. ve'im lo tishma'uha bemistarim tibkeh nafshi mipenei geivah vedamoa' tidma' veteirad 'eini dim'ah ki nishbah 'eider ihoh. 'emor lamelekh velagebirah hashpilu sheibu ki yarad mar'ashoteikhem 'ateret tif'artekhem. 'arei hanegeb sugeru ve'en poteiakh hagelat yehudah kulah hagelat shelomim. se'i se'u 'eineikhem ure'i ure'u haba'im mizafon 'ayeh ha'eider nitan lakh zon tif'artekh. mah tomeri ki yifqod 'alayikh ve'at limadt 'otam 'alayikh 'alufim lerosh halo khabalim yokhezukh kemo 'eishet leidah. vekhi tomeri bilbabekh madua' qera'uni 'eleh berob 'avonekh niglu shulayikh nekhmesu 'aqeibayikh. hayahafokh kushi 'oro venamer khabarburotav gam 'atem tukhelu leheitib limudei hareia'. va'afizem keqash 'ober leruakh midbar. zeh goralekh menat midayikh mei'iti ne'um ihoh 'asher shakhakhat 'oti vatibtekhi bashaqer. vegam 'ani khasafti shulayikh 'al panayikh venir'ah qelonekh. ni'ufayikh umizhalotayikh zimat zenutekh 'al geba'ot basadeh ra'iti shiquzayikh 'o lakh yerushalim lo tithari 'akharei matai 'od. 'asher hayah debar ihoh 'el yirmeyahu 'al dibrei habazarot. 'abelah yehudah ushe'areha 'umlelu qaderu la'arez vezivkhat yerushalim 'alatah. ve'adireihem shalekhu ze'oreihem ze'ireihem lamayim ba'u 'al geibim lo maze'u mayim shabu kheleihem reiqam boshu vehakhelemu vekhafu rosham. ba'abur ha'adamah khatah ki lo hayah geshem ba'arez boshu 'ikarim khafu rosham. ki gam 'ayelet basadeh yaledah ve'azob ki lo hayah deshe. ufera'im 'amedu 'al shefayim sha'afu ruakh katanim kalu 'eineihem ki 'en 'eiseb. 'im 'avoneinu 'anu banu ihoh 'aseh lema'an shemekha ki rabu meshuboteinu lekha khatanu. miqveh yisra'el moshi'o be'et zarah lamah tihyeh keger ba'arez ukhe'oreiakh natah lalun. lamah tihyeh ke'ish nidham kegibor lo yukhal lehoshia' ve'atah beqirbeinu ihoh veshimkha 'aleinu niqra 'al tanikheinu. koh 'amar ihoh la'am hazeh ken 'ahabu lanua' ragleihem lo khasakhu ihoh lo razam 'atah yizkor 'avonam veyifqod khatotam. vayomer ihoh 'eilai 'al titpalel be'ad ha'am hazeh letobah. ki yazumu 'eineni shomeia' 'el rinatam vekhi ya'alu 'olah uminkhah 'eineni rozam ki bakhereb ubara'ab ubadeber 'anokhi mekhaleh 'otam. va'omar 'ahah 'adonai ihoh hineh hanebi'im 'omerim lahem lo tir'u khereb vera'ab lo yihyeh lakhem ki shelom 'emet 'eten lakhem bamaqom hazeh. vayomer ihoh 'eilai qer hanebi'im nibe'im bishmi lo shelakhtim velo zivitim velo dibarti 'aleihem khazon sheqer veqesem ve'elul ve'elil vetarmut vetarmit libam hemah mitnabe'im lakhem. lakhen koh 'amar ihoh 'al hanebi'im hanibe'im bishmi va'ani lo shelakhtim vehemah 'omerim khereb vera'ab lo yihyeh ba'arez hazot bakhereb ubara'ab yitamu hanebi'im hahemah. veha'am 'asher hemah nibe'im lahem yihyu mushlakhim bekhuzot yerushalim mipenei hara'ab vehakhereb ve'en meqaber lahemah hemah nesheihem ubeneihem ubenoteihem veshafakhti 'aleihem 'et ra'atam. ve'amarta 'aleihem 'et hadabar hazeh teiradnah 'einai dim'ah laylah veyomam ve'al tidmenah ki sheber gadol nishberah betulat bat 'ami makah nakhlah me'od. 'im yazati hasadeh vehineh khalei khereb ve'im bati ha'ir vehineh takhalu'ei ra'ab ki gam nabi gam kohen sakharu 'el 'erez velo yada'u. hama'os ma'asta 'et yehudah 'im beziyon ga'alah nafshekha madua' hikitanu ve'en lanu marpei qaveh leshalom ve'en tob ule'et marpei vehineh be'atah. yada'nu ihoh rish'einu 'avon 'aboteinu ki khatanu lakh. 'al tin'az lema'an shimkha 'al tenabel kisei khebodekha zekhor 'al tafer beritekha 'itanu. hayesh behablei hagoyim magshimim ve'im hashamayim yitenu rebibim halo 'atah hu ihoh 'eloheinu uneqaveh lakh ki 'atah 'asita 'et kal 'eleh. vayomer ihoh 'eilai 'im ya'amod mosheh ushemu'el lefanai 'en nafshi 'el ha'am hazeh shalakh mei'al panai veyeizei'u. vehayah ki yomeru 'eilekha 'anah neizei ve'amarta 'aleihem koh 'amar ihoh 'asher lamavet lamavet va'asher lakhereb lakhereb va'asher lara'ab lara'ab va'asher lashebi lashebi. ufaqadti 'aleihem 'arba' mishpakhot ne'um ihoh 'et hakhereb laharog ve'et hakelabim liskhob ve'et 'of hashamayim ve'et behemat ha'arez le'ekhol ulehashkhit. unetatim lizva'ah leza'avah lekhol mamlekhot ha'arez biglal menasheh ben yekhizqiyahu melekh yehudah 'al 'asher 'asah birushalim. ki mi yakhmol 'alayikh yerushalim umi yanud lakh umi yasur lish'ol leshalom lakh. 'at natasht 'oti ne'um ihoh 'akhor teileikhi va'at 'et yadi 'alayikh va'ashkhitekh nil'eiti hinakhem. va'ezrem bemizreh besha'arei ha'arez shikalti 'ibadti 'et 'ami midarkheihem lo shabu. 'azemu li 'almenotav meikhol yamim heibeiti lahem 'al 'em bakhur shoded bazahorayim hipalti 'aleha pit'om 'ir ubehalot. 'umlelah yoledet hashib'ah nafekhah nafshah ba'ah ba shimshah be'od yomam boshah vekhafeirah ushe'eiritam lakhereb 'eten lifnei 'oyebeihem ne'um ihoh. 'o li 'imi ki yelidtini 'ish rib ve'ish madon lekhal ha'arez lo nashiti velo nashu bi kuloh meqalavni. 'amar ihoh 'im lo sharotikha sheiritikha letob 'im lo hifga'ti bekha be'et ra'ah ube'et zarah 'et ha'oyeb. hayaroa' barzel barzel mizafon unekhoshet. kheilekha ve'ozrotekha labaz 'eten lo bimkhir ubekhal khatotekha ubekhal gebulekha. veha'abarti 'et 'oyebekha be'erez lo yada'eta ki 'esh qadekhah be'api 'aleikhem tuqad. 'atah yada'ta ihoh zakhereini ufaqedeini vehinaqem li meirodefai 'al le'erekh 'apekha tiqakheini da' se'eiti 'alekha kherpah. nimze'u debarekha va'okhelem vayhi debarekha debarekha li lesason ulesimkhat lebabi ki niqra shimkha 'alai ihoh 'elohei zeba'ot. lo yashabti besod mesakhaqim va'e'loz mipenei yadekha badad yashabti ki za'am mileitani. lamah hayah khe'eibi nezakh umakati 'anushah mei'anah heirafei hayo tihyeh li kemo 'akhzab mayim lo ne'emanu. lakhen koh 'amar ihoh 'im tashub va'ashibekha lefanai ta'amod ve'im tozi yaqar mizolel kefi tihyeh yashubu hemah 'eilekha ve'atah lo tashub 'aleihem. unetatikha la'am hazeh lekhomat nekhoshet bezurah venilkhamu 'eilekha velo yukhelu lakh ki 'itekha 'ani lehoshi'akha ulehazilekha ne'um ihoh. vehizaltikha miyad ra'im ufeditikha mikaf 'arizim. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. lo tiqakh lekha 'ishah velo yihyu lekha banim ubanot bamaqom hazeh. ki khoh 'amar ihoh 'al habanim ve'al habanot hayilodim bamaqom hazeh ve'al 'imotam hayoledot 'otam ve'al 'abotam hamolidim 'otam ba'arez hazot. memotei takhalu'im yamutu lo yisafedu velo yiqabeiru ledomen 'al penei ha'adamah yihyu ubakhereb ubara'ab yikhlu vehayetah niblatam lema'akhal le'of hashamayim ulebehemat ha'arez. ki khoh 'amar ihoh 'al tabo bet marzeiakh ve'al teilekh lispod ve'al tanod lahem ki 'asafti 'et shelomi mei'et ha'am hazeh ne'um ihoh 'et hakhesed ve'et harakhamim. umeitu gedolim uqetanim ba'arez hazot lo yiqabeiru velo yispedu lahem velo yitgodad velo yiqareiakh lahem. velo yifresu lahem 'al 'eibel lenakhamo 'al met velo yashqu 'otam kos tankhumim 'al 'abiv ve'al 'imo. ubet mishteh lo tabo lashebet 'otam le'ekhol velishtot. ki khoh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el hini mashbit min hamaqom hazeh le'eineikhem ubimeikhem qol sason veqol simkhah qol khatan veqol kalah. vehayah ki tagid la'am hazeh 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh ve'ameru 'eilekha 'al meh diber ihoh 'aleinu 'et kal hara'ah hagedolah hazot umeh 'avoneinu umeh khatateinu 'asher khatanu ihoh 'eloheinu. ve'amarta 'aleihem 'al 'asher 'azebu 'aboteikhem 'oti ne'um ihoh vayeilekhu 'akharei 'elohim 'akheirim vaya'abdum vayishtakhavu lahem ve'oti 'azabu ve'et torati lo shamaru. ve'atem harei'otem la'asot mei'aboteikhem vehinekhem holekhim 'ish 'akharei sherirut libo hara' lebilti shemoa' 'eilai. veheitalti 'etkhem mei'al ha'arez hazot 'al ha'arez 'asher lo yeda'tem 'atem va'aboteikhem va'abadtem sham 'et 'elohim 'akheirim yomam valaylah 'asher lo 'eten lakhem khaninah. lakhen hineh yamim ba'im ne'um ihoh velo yei'amer 'od khai ihoh 'asher he'elah 'et benei yisra'el mei'erez mizrayim. ki 'im khai ihoh 'asher he'elah 'et benei yisra'el mei'erez zafon umikol ha'arazot 'asher hidikham shamah vahashibotim 'al 'admatam 'asher natati la'abotam. hini sholeiakh ledavagim ledayagim rabim ne'um ihoh vedigum ve'akharei khen 'eshlakh lerabim zayadim vezadum mei'al kal har umei'al kal gib'ah umineqiqei hasela'im. ki 'einai 'al kal darkheihem lo nisteru milefanai velo nizpan 'avonam mineged 'einai. veshilamti rishonah mishneh 'avonam vekhatatam 'al khalelam 'et 'arzi beniblat shiquzeihem veto'aboteihem male'u 'et nakhalati. ihoh 'uzi uma'uzi umenusi beyom zarah 'eilekha goyim yabo'u mei'afsei 'arez veyomeru 'akh sheqer nakhalu 'aboteinu hebel ve'en bam mo'il. haya'aseh lo 'adam 'elohim vehemah lo 'elohim. lakhen hini modi'am bapa'am hazot 'odi'em 'et yadi ve'et geburati veyade'u ki shemi ihoh. khatat yehudah ketubah be'et barzel beziporen shamir kharushah 'al luakh libam uleqarnot mizbekhoteikhem. kizkor beneihem mizbekhotam va'asheireihem 'al 'ez ra'anan 'al geba'ot hagebohot. harari basadeh kheilekha khal 'ozrotekha labaz 'eten bamotekha bekhatat bekhal gebulekha. veshamatah ubekha minakhalatekha 'asher natati lakh veha'abadtikha 'et 'oyebekha ba'arez 'asher lo yada'eta ki 'esh qedakhtem be'api 'ad 'olam tuqad. koh 'amar ihoh 'arur hageber 'asher yibtakh ba'adam vesam basar zero'o umin ihoh yasur libo. vehayah ke'ar'ar ba'arabah velo yir'eh ki yabo tob veshakhan khareirim bamidbar 'erez meleikhah velo teisheb. barukh hageber 'asher yibtakh ihoh vehayah ihoh mibtakho. vehayah ke'ez shatul 'al mayim ve'al yubal yeshalakh sharashav velo yira yir'eh ki yabo khom vehayah 'aleihu ra'anan ubishnat bazoret lo yid'ag velo yamish mei'asot peri. 'aqob haleb mikol ve'anush hu mi yeida'enu. 'ani ihoh khoqer leb bokhen kelayot velatet le'ish kedarko kidrakhav kifri ma'alalav. qorei dagar velo yalad 'oseh 'osher velo bemishpat bakhazi yomo yamav ya'azbenu ube'akharito yihyeh nabal. kisei khabod marom meirishon meqom miqdasheinu. miqveh yisra'el ihoh kal 'ozebekha yeiboshu yisorai vesurai ba'arez yikateibu ki 'azebu meqor mayim khayim 'et ihoh. refa'eini ihoh ve'eirafei hoshi'eini ve'ivashei'ah ki tehilati 'atah. hineh hemah 'omerim 'eilai 'ayeh debar ihoh yabo na. va'ani lo 'azti meiro'eh 'akharekha veyom 'anush lo hit'aveiti 'atah yada'eta moza sefatai nokhakh panekha hayah. 'al tihyeh li limkhitah makhasi 'atah beyom ra'ah. yeiboshu rodefai ve'al 'eiboshah 'ani yeikhatu hemah ve'al 'eikhatah 'ani habi 'aleihem yom ra'ah umishneh shibaron shaberem. koh 'amar ihoh 'eilai halokh ve'amadta besha'ar benei 'am ha'am 'asher yabo'u bo malkhei yehudah va'asher yeize'u bo ubekhol sha'arei yerushalim. ve'amarta 'aleihem shim'u debar ihoh malkhei yehudah vekhal yehudah vekhol yoshebei yerushalim haba'im bashe'arim ha'eleh. koh 'amar ihoh hishameru benafshoteikhem ve'al tis'u masa beyom hashabat vahabeitem besha'arei yerushalim. velo tozi'u masa mibateikhem beyom hashabat vekhal melakhah lo ta'asu veqidashtem 'et yom hashabat ka'asher ziviti 'et 'aboteikhem. velo shame'u velo hitu 'et 'azenam vayaqshu 'et 'arepam lebilti shomeia' shemoa' ulebilti qakhat musar. vehayah 'im shamoa' tishme'un 'eilai ne'um ihoh lebilti habi masa besha'arei ha'ir hazot beyom hashabat uleqadesh 'et yom hashabat lebilti 'asot boh bo kal melakhah. uba'u besha'arei ha'ir hazot melakhim vesarim yoshebim 'al kisei david rokhebim barekheb ubasusim hemah vesareihem 'ish yehudah veyoshebei yerushalim veyashebah ha'ir hazot le'olam. uba'u mei'arei yehudah umisebibot yerushalim umei'erez binyamin umin hashefeilah umin hahar umin hanegeb mebi'im 'olah vezebakh uminkhah ulebonah umebi'ei todah bet ihoh. ve'im lo tishme'u 'eilai leqadesh 'et yom hashabat ulebilti se'et masa ubo besha'arei yerushalim beyom hashabat vehizati 'esh bish'areha ve'akhelah 'armenot yerushalim velo tikhbeh. hadabar 'asher hayah 'el yirmeyahu mei'et ihoh leimor. qum veyaradta bet hayozer veshamah 'ashmi'akha 'et debarai. va'eired bet hayozer vehineihu vehineh hu 'oseh melakhah 'al ha'abenayim. venishkhat hakeli 'asher hu 'oseh bakhomer beyad hayozer veshab vaya'aseihu keli 'akher ka'asher yashar be'einei hayozer la'asot. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. hakhayozer hazeh lo 'ukhal la'asot lakhem bet yisra'el ne'um ihoh hineh khakhomer beyad hayozer ken 'atem beyadi bet yisra'el. rega' 'adaber 'al go ve'al mamlakhah lintosh velintoz uleha'abid. veshab hago hahu meira'ato 'asher dibarti 'alav venikhamti 'al hara'ah 'asher khashabti la'asot lo. verega' 'adaber 'al go ve'al mamlakhah libnot velintoa'. ve'asah hara'ah hara' be'einai lebilti shemoa' beqoli venikhamti 'al hatobah 'asher 'amarti leheitib 'oto. ve'atah 'emar na 'el 'ish yehudah ve'al yoshebei yerushalim leimor koh 'amar ihoh hineh 'anokhi yozer 'aleikhem ra'ah vekhosheb 'aleikhem makhashabah shubu na 'ish midarko hara'ah veheitibu darkheikhem uma'aleikhem. ve'ameru no'ash ki 'akharei makhsheboteinu neilekh ve'ish sherirut libo hara' na'aseh. lakhen koh 'amar ihoh sha'alu na bagoyim mi shama' ka'eleh sha'arurit 'asetah me'od betulat yisra'el. haya'azob mizur sadai sheleg lebanon 'im yinateshu mayim zarim qarim nozlim. ki shekheikhuni 'ami lashav yeqateiru vayakhshilum bedarkheihem shebilei 'olam lalekhet netibot derekh lo selulah. lasum 'arzam leshamah sheruqat sheriqot 'olam kol 'ober 'aleha yishom veyanid berosho. keruakh qadim 'afizem lifnei 'oyeb 'oref velo fanim 'er'em beyom 'eidam. vayomeru lekhu venakhshebah 'al yirmeyahu makhashabot ki lo tobad torah mikohen ve'eizah meikhakham vedabar minabi lekhu venakeihu balashon ve'al naqshibah 'el kal debarav. haqshibah ihoh 'eilai ushema' leqol yeribai. hayshulam takhat tobah ra'ah ki kharu shukhah lenafshi zekhor 'amedi lefanekha ledaber 'aleihem tobah lehashib 'et khamatekha meihem. lakhen ten 'et beneihem lara'ab vehagirem 'al yedei khereb vetihyenah nesheihem shakulot ve'almanot ve'ansheihem yihyu harugei mavet bakhureihem mukei khereb bamilkhamah. tishama' ze'aqah mibateihem ki tabi 'aleihem gedud pit'om ki kharu shikhah shukhah lelakhedeini ufakhim tamenu leraglai. ve'atah ihoh yada'ta 'et kal 'azatam 'alai lamavet 'al tekhaper 'al 'avonam vekhatatam milefanekha 'al temkhi vehayu veyihyu mukhshalim lefanekha be'et 'apekha 'aseh bahem. koh 'amar ihoh halokh veqanita baqbuq yozer khares umiziqnei ha'am umiziqnei hakohanim. veyazata 'el gei ben hinom 'asher petakh sha'ar hakharasut hakharsit veqarata sham 'et hadebarim 'asher 'adaber 'eilekha. ve'amarta shim'u debar ihoh malkhei yehudah veyoshebei yerushalim koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el hini meibi ra'ah 'al hamaqom hazeh 'asher kal shome'ah tizalnah 'azenav. ya'an 'asher 'azabuni vaynakeru 'et hamaqom hazeh vayqateru bo leilohim 'akheirim 'asher lo yeda'um hemah va'aboteihem umalkhei yehudah umale'u 'et hamaqom hazeh dam neqiyim. ubanu 'et bamot haba'al lisrof 'et beneihem ba'esh 'olot laba'al 'asher lo ziviti velo dibarti velo 'aletah 'al libi. lakhen hineh yamim ba'im ne'um ihoh velo yiqarei lamaqom hazeh 'od hatofet vegei ben hinom ki 'im gei hahareigah. ubaqoti 'et 'azat yehudah virushalim bamaqom hazeh vehipaltim bakhereb lifnei 'oyebeihem ubeyad mebaqshei nafsham venatati 'et niblatam lema'akhal le'of hashamayim ulebehemat ha'arez. vesamti 'et ha'ir hazot leshamah velishreiqah kol 'ober 'aleha yishom veyishroq 'al kal makoteha. veha'akhaltim 'et besar beneihem ve'et besar benoteihem ve'ish besar rei'eihu yokheilu bemazor ubemazoq 'asher yaziqu lahem 'oyebeihem umebaqshei nafsham. veshabarta habaqbuq le'einei ha'anashim haholekhim 'otakh. ve'amarta 'aleihem koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot kakhah 'eshbor 'et ha'am hazeh ve'et ha'ir hazot ka'asher yishbor 'et keli hayozer 'asher lo yukhal leheirafeh 'od ubetofet yiqberu mei'en maqom liqbor. ken 'e'eseh lamaqom hazeh ne'um ihoh uleyoshebav velatet 'et ha'ir hazot ketofet. vehayu batei yerushalim ubatei malkhei yehudah kimqom hatofet hatemei'im lekhol habatim 'asher qiteru 'al gagoteihem lekhol zeba hashamayim vehasekh nesakhim leilohim 'akheirim. vayabo yirmeyahu meihatofet 'asher shelakho ihoh sham lehinabei vaya'amod bakhazar bet ihoh vayomer 'el kal ha'am. koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el hini meibi meibi 'el ha'ir hazot ve'al kal 'areha 'et kal hara'ah 'asher dibarti 'aleha ki hiqshu 'et 'arepam lebilti shemoa' 'et debarai. vayishma' pashkhur ben 'imer hakohen vehu faqid nagid bebet ihoh 'et yirmeyahu niba 'et hadebarim ha'eleh. vayakeh fashkhur 'et yirmeyahu hanabi vayiten 'oto 'al hamahpekhet 'asher besha'ar binyamin ha'elyon 'asher bebet ihoh. vayhi mimakhorat vayozei fashkhur 'et yirmeyahu min hamahpakhet vayomer 'eilav yirmeyahu lo fashkhur qara ihoh shemekha ki 'im magor misabib. ki khoh 'amar ihoh hini notenkha lemagor lekha ulekhal 'ohabekha venafelu bekhereb 'oyebeihem ve'einekha ro'ot ve'et kal yehudah 'eten beyad melekh babel vehiglam babelah vehikam bekhareb. venatati 'et kal khosen ha'ir hazot ve'et kal yegi'ah ve'et kal yeqarah ve'et kal 'ozrot malkhei yehudah 'eten beyad 'oyebeihem ubezazum uleqakhum vehebi'um babelah. ve'atah fashkhur vekhol yoshebei beitekha teilekhu bashebi ubabel tabo vesham tamut vesham tiqaber 'atah vekhal 'ohabekha 'asher nibeita lahem bashaqer. pititani ihoh va'epat khazaqtani vatukhal hayiti liskhoq kal hayom kuloh lo'eg li. ki midei 'adaber 'ez'aq khamas vashod 'eqra ki hayah debar ihoh li lekherpah uleqeles kal hayom. ve'amarti lo 'ezkerenu velo 'adaber 'od bishmo vehayah belibi ke'esh bo'eret 'azur be'azmotai venil'eiti kalkhel velo 'ukhal. ki shama'ti dibat rabim magor misabib hagidu venagidenu kol 'enosh shelomi shomerei zal'i 'ulai yefuteh venukhelah lo veniqkhah niqmateinu mimenu. ihoh 'oti kegibor 'ariz 'al ken rodefai yikashelu velo yukhalu boshu me'od ki lo hiskilu kelimat 'olam lo tishakheiakh. ihoh zeba'ot bokhen zadiq ro'eh khelayot valeb 'er'eh niqmatekha meihem ki 'eilekha giliti 'et ribi. ru ihoh halu 'et ihoh ki hizil 'et nefesh 'ebyon miyad merei'im. 'arur hayom 'asher yuladti bo yom 'asher yeladatni 'imi 'al yehi barukh. 'arur ha'ish 'asher bisar 'et 'abi leimor yulad lekha ben zakhar sameiakh simokhahu. vehayah ha'ish hahu ke'arim 'asher hafakh ihoh velo nikham veshama' ze'aqah baboqer uteru'ah be'et zahorayim. 'asher lo motani meirakhem vatehi li 'imi qibri verakhmah harat 'olam. lamah zeh meirekhem yazati lir'ot 'amal veyagon vayikhlu beboshet yamai. hadabar 'asher hayah 'el yirmeyahu mei'et ihoh bishloakh 'eilav hamelekh zidqiyahu 'et pashkhur ben malkiyah ve'et zefanyah ben ma'aseiyah hakohen leimor. derash na ba'adeinu 'et ihoh ki nebukhadrezar melekh babel nilkham 'aleinu 'ulai ya'aseh ihoh 'otanu kekhal nifle'otav veya'aleh mei'aleinu. vayomer yirmeyahu 'aleihem koh tomerun 'el zidqiyahu. koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el hini meiseb 'et kelei hamilkhamah 'asher beyedkhem 'asher 'atem nilkhamim bam 'et melekh babel ve'et hakasdim hazarim 'aleikhem mikhuz lakhomah ve'asafti 'otam 'el tokh ha'ir hazot. venilkhamti 'ani 'itekhem beyad netuyah ubizroa' khazaqah ube'af ubekheimah ubeqezef gadol. vehikeiti 'et yoshebei ha'ir hazot ve'et ha'adam ve'et habeheimah bedeber gadol yamutu. ve'akharei khen ne'um ihoh 'eten 'et zidqiyahu melekh yehudah ve'et 'abadav ve'et ha'am ve'et hanish'arim ba'ir hazot min hadeber min hakhereb umin hara'ab beyad nebukhadrezar melekh babel ubeyad 'oyebeihem ubeyad mebaqshei nafsham vehikam lefi khereb lo yakhus 'aleihem velo yakhmol velo yerakhem. ve'el ha'am hazeh tomar koh 'amar ihoh hini noten lifneikhem 'et derekh hakhayim ve'et derekh hamavet. hayosheb ba'ir hazot yamut bakhereb ubara'ab ubadaber vehayozei venafal 'al hakasdim hazarim 'aleikhem yikhyeh vekhayah vehayetah lo nafsho leshalal. ki samti fanai ba'ir hazot lera'ah velo letobah ne'um ihoh beyad melekh babel tinaten userafah ba'esh. ulebet melekh yehudah shim'u debar ihoh. bet david koh 'amar ihoh dinu laboqer mishpat vehazilu gazul miyad 'osheq pen teizei kha'esh khamati uba'arah ve'en mekhabeh mipenei roa' ma'aleihem ma'aleikhem. hini 'eilayikh yoshebet ha'eimeq zur hamishor ne'um ihoh ha'omerim mi yeikhat 'aleinu umi yabo bim'onoteinu. ufaqadti 'aleikhem kifri ma'aleikhem ne'um ihoh vehizati 'esh beya'rah ve'akhelah kal sebibeha. koh 'amar ihoh red bet melekh yehudah vedibarta sham 'et hadabar hazeh. ve'amarta shema' debar ihoh melekh yehudah hayosheb 'al kisei david 'atah va'abadekha ve'amekha haba'im bashe'arim ha'eleh. koh 'amar ihoh 'asu mishpat uzedaqah vehazilu gazul miyad 'ashoq veger yatom ve'almanah 'al tonu 'al takhmosu vedam naqi 'al tishpekhu bamaqom hazeh. ki 'im 'aso ta'asu 'et hadabar hazeh uba'u besha'arei habayit hazeh melakhim yoshebim ledavid 'al kis'o rokhebim barekheb ubasusim hu ve'abdav va'abadav ve'amo. ve'im lo tishme'u 'et hadebarim ha'eleh bi nishba'ti ne'um ihoh ki lekharebah yihyeh habayit hazeh. ki khoh 'amar ihoh 'al bet melekh yehudah gil'ad 'atah li rosh halebanon 'im lo 'ashitekha midbar 'arim lo noshabah noshabu. veqidashti 'alekha mashkhitim 'ish vekheilav vekharetu mibkhar 'arazekha vehipilu 'al ha'esh. ve'aberu goyim rabim 'al ha'ir hazot ve'ameru 'ish 'el rei'eihu 'al meh 'asah ihoh kakhah la'ir hagedolah hazot. ve'ameru 'al 'asher 'azebu 'et berit ihoh 'eloheihem vayishtakhavu leilohim 'akheirim vaya'abdum. 'al tibku lemet ve'al tanudu lo bekhu bakho laholekh ki lo yashub 'od vera'ah 'et 'erez moladto. ki khoh 'amar ihoh 'el shalum ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah hamolekh takhat yoshiyahu 'abiv 'asher yaza min hamaqom hazeh lo yashub sham 'od. ki bimqom 'asher higlu 'oto sham yamut ve'et ha'arez hazot lo yir'eh 'od. ho boneh beito belo zedeq va'aliyotav belo mishpat berei'eihu ya'abod khinam ufo'alo lo yiten lo. ha'omer 'ebneh li bet midot va'aliyot meruvakhim veqara' lo khalonai vesafun ba'arez umashoakh bashashar. hatimlokh ki 'atah metakhareh ba'arez 'abikha halo 'akhal veshatah ve'asah mishpat uzedaqah 'az tob lo. dan din 'ani ve'ebyon 'az tob halo hi hada'at 'oti ne'um ihoh. ki 'en 'einekha velibekha ki 'im 'al biz'ekha ve'al dam hanaqi lishpokh ve'al ha'osheq ve'al hameruzah la'asot. lakhen koh 'amar ihoh 'el yehoyaqim ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah lo yispedu lo ho 'akhi veho 'akhot lo yispedu lo ho 'adon veho hodoh qeburat khamor yiqaber sakhob vehashlekh meihale'ah lesha'arei yerushalim. 'ali halebanon uze'aqi ubabashan teni qolekh veza'aqi mei'abarim ki nishberu kal me'ahabayikh. dibarti 'eilayikh beshalvotayikh 'amart lo 'eshma' zeh darkekh mine'urayikh ki lo shama'at beqoli. kal ro'ayikh tir'eh ruakh ume'ahabayikh bashebi yeileikhu ki 'az teiboshi venikhlamt mikol ra'atekh. yoshabti yoshabt balebanon mequnanti mequnant ba'arazim mah neikhant bebo lakh khabalim khil kayoleidah khai 'ani ne'um ihoh ki 'im yihyeh kaneyahu ben yehoyaqim melekh yehudah khotam 'al yad yemini ki misham 'eteqenka. unetatikha beyad mebaqshei nafshekha ubeyad 'asher 'atah yagor mipeneihem ubeyad nebukhadrezar melekh babel ubeyad hakasdim. veheitalti 'otekha ve'et 'imekha 'asher yeladatkha 'al ha'arez 'akheret 'asher lo yuladtem sham vesham tamutu. ve'al ha'arez 'asher hem menase'im 'et nafsham lashub sham shamah lo yashubu. ha'ezeb nibzeh nafuz ha'ish hazeh kaneyahu 'im keli 'en kheifez bo madua' hutalu hu vezar'o vehushlekhu 'al ha'arez 'asher lo yada'u. 'erez 'erez 'arez shim'i debar ihoh. koh 'amar ihoh kitbu 'et ha'ish hazeh 'ariri geber lo yizlakh beyamav ki lo yizlakh mizar'o 'ish yosheb 'al kisei david umoshel 'od bihudah. ho ro'im me'abedim umefizim 'et zon mar'iti ne'um ihoh. lakhen koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el 'al haro'im haro'im 'et 'ami 'atem hafizotem 'et zoni vatadikhum velo feqadtem 'otam hini foqed 'aleikhem 'et roa' ma'aleikhem ne'um ihoh. va'ani 'aqabez 'et she'eirit zoni mikol ha'arazot 'asher hidakhti 'otam sham vahashiboti 'ethen 'al neveihen ufaru verabu. vahaqimoti 'aleihem ro'im vera'um velo yire'u 'od velo yeikhatu velo yipaqeidu ne'um ihoh. hineh yamim ba'im ne'um ihoh vahaqimoti ledavid zemakh zadiq umalakh melekh vehiskil ve'asah mishpat uzedaqah ba'arez. beyamav tivasha' yehudah veyisra'el yishkon labetakh vezeh shemo 'asher yiqre'o ihoh zidqeinu. lakhen hineh yamim ba'im ne'um ihoh velo yomeru 'od khai ihoh 'asher he'elah 'et benei yisra'el mei'erez mizrayim. ki 'im khai ihoh 'asher he'elah va'asher heibi 'et zera' bet yisra'el mei'erez zafonah umikol ha'arazot 'asher hidakhtim sham veyashebu 'al 'admatam. lanebi'im nishbar libi beqirbi rakhafu kal 'azmotai hayiti ke'ish shikor ukhegeber 'abaro yayin mipenei ihoh umipenei dibrei qadesho. ki mena'afim male'ah ha'arez ki mipenei 'alah 'abelah ha'arez yabeshu ne'ot midbar vatehi meruzatam ra'ah ugeburatam lo khen. ki gam nabi gam kohen khaneifu gam bebeiti mazati ra'atam ne'um ihoh. lakhen yihyeh darkam lahem kakhalaqlaqot ba'afeilah yidakhu venafelu bah ki 'abi 'aleihem ra'ah shenat pequdatam ne'um ihoh. ubinbi'ei shomeron ra'iti tiflah hinabe'u baba'al vayat'u 'et 'ami 'et yisra'el. ubinbi'ei yerushalim ra'iti sha'arurah na'of vehalokh basheqer vekhizequ yedei merei'im lebilti shabu 'ish meira'ato hayu li khulam kisdom veyoshebeha ka'amorah. lakhen koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'al hanebi'im hini ma'akhil 'otam la'anah vehishqitim mei rosh ki mei'et nebi'ei yerushalim yaze'ah khanupah lekhal ha'arez. koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'al tishme'u 'al dibrei hanebi'im hanibe'im lakhem mahbilim hemah 'etkhem khazon libam yedabeiru lo mipi ihoh. 'omerim 'amor limna'azai diber ihoh shalom yihyeh lakhem vekhol holekh bishrirut libo 'ameru lo tabo 'aleikhem ra'ah. ki mi 'amad besod ihoh veyeire veyishma' 'et debaro mi hiqshib debari debaro vayishma'. hineh sa'arat ihoh kheimah yaze'ah vesa'ar mitkholel 'al rosh resha'im yakhul. lo yashub 'af ihoh 'ad 'asoto ve'ad haqimo mezimot libo be'akharit hayamim titbonu bah binah. lo shalakhti 'et hanebi'im vehem razu lo dibarti 'aleihem vehem niba'u. ve'im 'amedu besodi veyashmi'u debarai 'et 'ami vishibum midarkam hara' umeiroa' ma'aleihem. ha'elohei miqarob 'ani ne'um ihoh velo 'elohei meirakhoq. 'im yisater 'ish bamistarim va'ani lo 'er'enu ne'um ihoh halo 'et hashamayim ve'et ha'arez 'ani malei ne'um ihoh. shama'ti 'et 'asher 'ameru hanebi'im hanibe'im bishmi sheqer leimor khalamti khalameti. 'ad matai hayesh beleb hanebi'im nibe'ei hashaqer unebi'ei tarmit libam. hakhoshebim lehashkiakh 'et 'ami shemi bakhalomotam 'asher yesaperu 'ish lerei'eihu ka'asher shakhekhu 'abotam 'et shemi baba'al. hanabi 'asher 'ito khalom yesaper khalom va'asher debari 'ito yedaber debari 'emet mah lateben 'et habar ne'um ihoh. halo khoh debari ka'esh ne'um ihoh ukhefatish yefozez sala'. lakhen hini 'al hanebi'im ne'um ihoh meganebei debarai 'ish mei'et rei'eihu. hini 'al hanebi'im ne'um ihoh haloqekhim leshonam vayin'amu ne'um. hini 'al nibe'ei khalomot sheqer ne'um ihoh vaysaperum vayat'u 'et 'ami beshiqreihem ubefakhazutam ve'anokhi lo shelakhtim velo zivitim veho'el lo yo'ilu la'am hazeh ne'um ihoh. vekhi yish'alekha ha'am hazeh 'o hanabi 'o khohen leimor mah masa ihoh ve'amarta 'aleihem 'et mah masa venatashti 'etkhem ne'um ihoh. vehanabi vehakohen veha'am 'asher yomar masa ihoh ufaqadti 'al ha'ish hahu ve'al beito. koh tomeru 'ish 'al rei'eihu ve'ish 'el 'akhiv meh 'anah ihoh umah diber ihoh. umasa ihoh lo tizkeru 'od ki hamasa yihyeh le'ish debaro vahafakhtem 'et dibrei 'elohim khayim ihoh zeba'ot 'eloheinu. koh tomar 'el hanabi meh 'anakh ihoh umah diber ihoh. ve'im masa ihoh tomeiru lakhen koh 'amar ihoh ya'an 'amarekhem 'et hadabar hazeh masa ihoh va'eshlakh 'aleikhem leimor lo tomeru masa ihoh. lakhen hini venashiti 'etkhem nasho venatashti 'etkhem ve'et ha'ir 'asher natati lakhem vela'aboteikhem mei'al panai. venatati 'aleikhem kherpat 'olam ukhelimut 'olam 'asher lo tishakheiakh. hir'ani ihoh vehineh shenei duda'ei te'einim mu'adim lifnei heikhal ihoh 'akharei haglot nebukhadrezar melekh babel 'et yekhaneyahu ben yehoyaqim melekh yehudah ve'et sarei yehudah ve'et hekharash ve'et hamasger mirushalim vaybi'em babel. hadud 'ekhad te'einim tobot me'od kit'einei habakurot vehadud 'ekhad te'einim ra'ot me'od 'asher lo tei'akhalnah meiroa'. vayomer ihoh 'eilai mah 'atah ro'eh yirmeyahu va'omar te'einim hate'einim hatobot tobot me'od vehara'ot ra'ot me'od 'asher lo tei'akhalnah meiroa'. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el kate'einim hatobot ha'eleh ken 'akir 'et galut yehudah 'asher shilakhti min hamaqom hazeh 'erez kasdim letobah. vesamti 'eini 'aleihem letobah vahashibotim 'al ha'arez hazot ubenitim velo 'eheros uneta'tim velo 'etosh. venatati lahem leb lada'at 'oti ki 'ani ihoh vehayu li le'am ve'anokhi 'ehyeh lahem leilohim ki yashubu 'eilai bekhal libam. vekhate'einim hara'ot 'asher lo tei'akhalnah meiroa' ki khoh 'amar ihoh ken 'eten 'et zidqiyahu melekh yehudah ve'et sarav ve'et she'eirit yerushalim hanish'arim ba'arez hazot vehayoshebim be'erez mizrayim. unetatim lizva'ah leza'avah lera'ah lekhol mamlekhot ha'arez lekherpah ulemashal lishninah veliqlalah bekhal hameqomot 'asher 'adikhem sham. veshilakhti bam 'et hakhereb 'et hara'ab ve'et hadaber 'ad tumam mei'al ha'adamah 'asher natati lahem vela'aboteihem. hadabar 'asher hayah 'al yirmeyahu 'al kal 'am yehudah bashanah harebi'it lihoyaqim ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah hi hashanah harishonit linbukhadrezar melekh babel. 'asher diber yirmeyahu hanabi 'al kal 'am yehudah ve'el kal yoshebei yerushalim leimor. min shelosh 'esreh shanah leyoshiyahu ben 'amon melekh yehudah ve'ad hayom hazeh zeh shalosh ve'esrim shanah hayah debar ihoh 'eilai va'adaber 'aleikhem 'ashkem vedaber velo shema'tem. veshalakh ihoh 'aleikhem 'et kal 'abadav hanebi'im hashkem veshaloakh velo shema'tem velo hititem 'et 'azenekhem lishmoa'. leimor shubu na 'ish midarko hara'ah umeiroa' ma'aleikhem ushebu 'al ha'adamah 'asher natan ihoh lakhem vela'aboteikhem lemin 'olam ve'ad 'olam. ve'al teilekhu 'akharei 'elohim 'akheirim le'abedam ulehishtakhavot lahem velo takh'isu 'oti bema'aseh yedeikhem velo 'ara' lakhem. velo shema'tem 'eilai ne'um ihoh lema'an hikh'isuni hakh'iseini bema'aseh yedeikhem lera' lakhem. lakhen koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot ya'an 'asher lo shema'tem 'et debarai. hini sholeiakh velaqakhti 'et kal mishpekhot zafon ne'um ihoh ve'el nebukhadrezar melekh babel 'abdi vahabi'otim 'al ha'arez hazot ve'al yoshebeha ve'al kal hagoyim ha'eleh sabib vehakharamtim vesamtim leshamah velishreiqah ulekharebot 'olam. veha'abadti meihem qol sason veqol simkhah qol khatan veqol kalah qol reikhayim ve'or ner. vehayetah kal ha'arez hazot lekharebah leshamah ve'abedu hagoyim ha'eleh 'et melekh babel shib'im shanah. vehayah khimlot shib'im shanah 'efqod 'al melekh babel ve'al hago hahu ne'um ihoh 'et 'avonam ve'al 'erez kasdim vesamti 'oto leshimot 'olam. veheibeiti veheibeiti 'al ha'arez hahi 'et kal debarai 'asher dibarti 'aleha 'et kal hakatub baseifer hazeh 'asher niba yirmeyahu 'al kal hagoyim. ki 'abedu bam gam hemah goyim rabim umelakhim gedolim veshilamti lahem kefa'olam ukhema'aseh yedeihem. ki khoh 'amar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el 'eilai qakh 'et kos hayayin hakheimah hazot miyadi vehishqitah 'oto 'et kal
