hagoyim 'asher 'anokhi sholeiakh 'otkha 'aleihem. veshatu vehitgo'ashu vehitholalu mipenei hakhereb 'asher 'anokhi sholeiakh beinotam. va'eqakh 'et hakos miyad ihoh va'ashqeh 'et kal hagoyim 'asher shelakhani ihoh 'aleihem. 'et yerushalim ve'et 'arei yehudah ve'et melakheha 'et sareha latet 'otam lekharebah leshamah lishreiqah veliqlalah kayom hazeh. 'et par'oh melekh mizrayim ve'et 'abadav ve'et sarav ve'et kal 'amo. ve'et kal ha'ereb ve'et kal malkhei 'erez ha'uz ve'et kal malkhei 'erez pelishtim ve'et 'ashqelon ve'et 'azah ve'et 'eqron ve'et she'eirit 'ashdod. 'et 'edom ve'et mo'ab ve'et benei 'amon. ve'et kal malkhei zor ve'et kal malkhei zidon ve'et malkhei ha'i 'asher be'eiber hayam. ve'et dedan ve'et teima ve'et buz ve'et kal qezuzei fei'ah. ve'et kal malkhei 'arab ve'et kal malkhei ha'ereb hashokhenim bamidbar. ve'et kal malkhei zimri ve'et kal malkhei 'eilam ve'et kal malkhei madai. ve'et kal malkhei hazafon haqerobim veharekhoqim 'ish 'el 'akhiv ve'et kal hamamlekhot ha'arez 'asher 'al penei ha'adamah umelekh sheishakh yishteh 'akhareihem. ve'amarta 'aleihem koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el shetu veshikhru uqeyu veniflu velo taqumu mipenei hakhereb 'asher 'anokhi sholeiakh beineikhem. vehayah ki yema'anu laqakhat hakos miyadekha lishtot ve'amarta 'aleihem koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot shato tishtu. ki hineh ba'ir 'asher niqra shemi 'aleha 'anokhi meikhel lehara' ve'atem hinaqeh tinaqu lo tinaqu ki khereb 'ani qorei 'al kal yoshebei ha'arez ne'um ihoh zeba'ot. ve'atah tinabei 'aleihem 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh ve'amarta 'aleihem ihoh mimarom yish'ag umime'on qadesho yiten qolo sha'og yish'ag 'al naveihu heidad kedorekhim ya'aneh 'el kal yoshebei ha'arez. ba sha'on 'ad qezeh ha'arez ki rib ihoh bagoyim nishpat hu lekhal basar haresha'im netanam lakhereb ne'um ihoh. koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot hineh ra'ah yozet migo 'el go vesa'ar gadol yei'or miyarketei 'arez. vehayu khalei ihoh bayom hahu miqzeh ha'arez ve'ad qezeh ha'arez lo yisafedu velo yei'asefu velo yiqabeiru ledomen 'al penei ha'adamah yihyu. heililu haro'im veza'aqu vehitpaleshu 'adirei hazon ki male'u yemeikhem litboakh utefozotikhem unefaltem kikhli khemdah. ve'abad manos min haro'im ufeleitah mei'adirei hazon. qol za'aqat haro'im vilelat 'adirei hazon ki shoded ihoh 'et mar'itam. venadamu ne'ot hashalom mipenei kharon 'af ihoh. 'azab kakefir suko ki hayetah 'arzam leshamah mipenei kharon hayonah umipenei kharon 'apo. bereishit mamlekhut yehoyaqim ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah hayah hadabar hazeh mei'et ihoh leimor. koh 'amar ihoh 'amod bakhazar bet ihoh vedibarta 'al kal 'arei yehudah haba'im lehishtakhavot bet ihoh 'et kal hadebarim 'asher zivitikha ledaber 'aleihem 'al tigra' dabar. 'ulai yishme'u veyashubu 'ish midarko hara'ah venikhamti 'el hara'ah 'asher 'anokhi khosheb la'asot lahem mipenei roa' ma'aleihem. ve'amarta 'aleihem koh 'amar ihoh 'im lo tishme'u 'eilai lalekhet betorati 'asher natati lifneikhem. lishmoa' 'al dibrei 'abadai hanebi'im 'asher 'anokhi sholeiakh 'aleikhem vehashkem veshaloakh velo shema'tem. venatati 'et habayit hazeh keshiloh ve'et ha'ir hazotah hazot 'eten liqlalah lekhol goyei ha'arez. vayishme'u hakohanim vehanebi'im vekhal ha'am 'et yirmeyahu medaber 'et hadebarim ha'eleh bebet ihoh. vayhi kekhalot yirmeyahu ledaber 'et kal 'asher zivah ihoh ledaber 'el kal ha'am vayitpesu 'oto hakohanim vehanebi'im vekhal ha'am leimor mot tamut. madua' nibeita beshem ihoh leimor keshilo yihyeh habayit hazeh veha'ir hazot tekherab mei'en yosheb vayiqahel kal ha'am 'el yirmeyahu bebet ihoh. vayishme'u sarei yehudah 'et hadebarim ha'eleh vaya'alu mibet hamelekh bet ihoh vayeishebu befetakh sha'ar ihoh hekhadash. vayomeru hakohanim vehanebi'im 'el hasarim ve'el kal ha'am leimor mishpat mavet la'ish hazeh ki niba 'el ha'ir hazot ka'asher shema'tem be'azeneikhem. vayomer yirmeyahu 'el kal hasarim ve'el kal ha'am leimor ihoh shelakhani lehinabei 'el habayit hazeh ve'el ha'ir hazot 'et kal hadebarim 'asher shema'tem. ve'atah heitibu darkheikhem uma'aleikhem veshim'u beqol ihoh 'eloheikhem veyinakhem ihoh 'el hara'ah 'asher diber 'aleikhem. va'ani hini beyedkhem 'asu li katob vekhayashar be'eineikhem. 'akh yadoa' teide'u ki 'im memitim 'atem 'oti ki dam naqi 'atem notenim 'aleikhem ve'el ha'ir hazot ve'el yoshebeha ki be'emet shelakhani ihoh 'aleikhem ledaber be'azeneikhem 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh. vayomeru hasarim vekhal ha'am 'el hakohanim ve'el hanebi'im 'en la'ish hazeh mishpat mavet ki beshem ihoh 'eloheinu diber 'eileinu. vayaqumu 'anashim miziqnei ha'arez vayomeru 'el kal qehal ha'am leimor. mikhayah mikhah hamorashti hayah niba bimei khizqiyahu melekh yehudah vayomer 'el kal 'am yehudah leimor koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot ziyon sadeh teikharesh virushalayim 'iyim tihyeh vehar habayit lebamot ya'ar. hehamet hemituhu khizqiyahu melekh yehudah vekhal yehudah halo yarei 'et ihoh vaykhal 'et penei ihoh vayinakhem ihoh 'el hara'ah 'asher diber 'aleihem va'anakhnu 'osim ra'ah gedolah 'al nafshoteinu. vegam 'ish hayah mitnabei beshem ihoh 'uriyahu ben shema'yahu miqiryat haye'arim vayinabei 'al ha'ir hazot ve'al ha'arez hazot kekhol dibrei yirmeyahu. vayishma' hamelekh yehoyaqim vekhal giborav vekhal hasarim 'et debarav vaybaqesh hamelekh hamito vayishma' 'uriyahu vayira vayibrakh vayabo mizrayim. vayishlakh hamelekh yehoyaqim 'anashim mizrayim 'et 'elnatan ben 'akhbor va'anashim 'ito 'el mizrayim. vayozi'u 'et 'uriyahu mimizrayim vaybi'uhu 'el hamelekh yehoyaqim vayakeihu bekhareb vayashlekh 'et niblato 'el qibrei benei ha'am. 'akh yad 'akhiqam ben shafan hayetah 'et yirmeyahu lebilti tet 'oto beyad ha'am lahamito. bereishit mamlekhet yehoyaqim ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah hayah hadabar hazeh 'el yirmeyah mei'et ihoh leimor. koh 'amar ihoh 'eilai 'aseh lekha moseirot umotot unetatam 'al zavarekha. veshilakhtam 'el melekh 'edom ve'el melekh mo'ab ve'el melekh benei 'amon ve'el melekh zor ve'el melekh zidon beyad mal'akhim haba'im yerushalim 'el zidqiyahu melekh yehudah. vezivita 'otam 'el 'adoneihem leimor koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el koh tomeru 'el 'adoneikhem. 'anokhi 'asiti 'et ha'arez 'et ha'adam ve'et habeheimah 'asher 'al penei ha'arez bekhokhi hagadol ubizro'i hanetuyah unetatiha la'asher yashar be'einai. ve'atah 'anokhi natati 'et kal ha'arazot ha'eleh beyad nebukhadnezar melekh babel 'abdi vegam 'et khayat hasadeh natati lo le'abedo. ve'abedu 'oto kal hagoyim ve'et beno ve'et ben beno 'ad bo 'et 'arzo gam hu ve'abedu bo goyim rabim umelakhim gedolim. vehayah hago vehamamlakhah 'asher lo ya'abdu 'oto 'et nebukhadnezar melekh babel ve'et 'asher lo yiten 'et zavaro be'ol melekh babel bakhereb ubara'ab ubadeber 'efqod 'al hago hahu ne'um ihoh 'ad tumi 'otam beyado. ve'atem 'al tishme'u 'el nebi'eikhem ve'el qosemeikhem ve'el khalomoteikhem ve'el 'oneneikhem ve'el kashafeikhem 'asher hem 'omerim 'aleikhem leimor lo ta'abdu 'et melekh babel. ki sheqer hem nibe'im lakhem lema'an harkhiq 'etkhem mei'al 'admatkhem vehidakhti 'etkhem va'abadtem. vehago 'asher yabi 'et zavaro be'ol melekh babel va'abado vehinakhtiv 'al 'admato ne'um ihoh va'abadah veyashab bah. ve'el zidqiyah melekh yehudah dibarti kekhal hadebarim ha'eleh leimor habi'u 'et zavereikhem be'ol melekh babel ve'ibdu 'oto ve'amo vikhyu. lamah tamutu 'atah ve'amekha bakhereb bara'ab ubadaber ka'asher diber ihoh 'el hago 'asher lo ya'abod 'et melekh babel. ve'al tishme'u 'el dibrei hanebi'im ha'omerim 'aleikhem leimor lo ta'abdu 'et melekh babel ki sheqer hem nibe'im lakhem. ki lo shelakhtim ne'um ihoh vehem nibe'im bishmi lashaqer lema'an hadikhi 'etkhem va'abadtem 'atem vehanebi'im hanibe'im lakhem. ve'el hakohanim ve'el kal ha'am hazeh dibarti leimor koh 'amar ihoh 'al tishme'u 'el dibrei nebi'eikhem hanibe'im lakhem leimor hineh khelei bet ihoh mushabim mibabelah 'atah meheirah ki sheqer hemah nibe'im lakhem. 'al tishme'u 'aleihem 'ibdu 'et melekh babel vikhyu lamah tihyeh ha'ir hazot kharebah. ve'im nebi'im hem ve'im yesh debar ihoh 'itam yifge'u na ihoh zeba'ot lebilti bo'u hakeilim hanotarim bebet ihoh ubet melekh yehudah ubirushalim babelah. ki khoh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'el ha'amudim ve'al hayam ve'al hamekhonot ve'al yeter hakeilim hanotarim ba'ir hazot. 'asher lo leqakham nebukhadnezar melekh babel bagloto 'et yekhonyah ben yehoyaqim melekh yehudah mirushalim babelah ve'et kal khorei yehudah virushalim. ki khoh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el 'al hakeilim hanotarim bet ihoh ubet melekh yehudah virushalim. babelah yuba'u veshamah yihyu 'ad yom paqedi 'otam ne'um ihoh veha'alitim vahashibotim 'el hamaqom hazeh. vayhi bashanah hahi bereishit mamlekhet zidqiyah melekh yehudah bishnat bashanah harebi'it bakhodesh hakhamishi 'amar 'eilai khananyah ben 'azur hanabi 'asher migib'on bebet ihoh le'einei hakohanim vekhal ha'am leimor. koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el leimor shabarti 'et 'ol melekh babel. be'od shenatayim yamim 'ani meishib 'el hamaqom hazeh 'et kal kelei bet ihoh 'asher laqakh nebukhadnezar melekh babel min hamaqom hazeh vaybi'em babel. ve'et yekhaneyah ben yehoyaqim melekh yehudah ve'et kal galut yehudah haba'im babelah 'ani meishib 'el hamaqom hazeh ne'um ihoh ki 'eshbor 'et 'ol melekh babel. vayomer yirmeyah hanabi 'el khananyah hanabi le'einei hakohanim ule'einei khal ha'am ha'omedim bebet ihoh. vayomer yirmeyah hanabi 'amen ken ya'aseh ihoh yaqem ihoh 'et debarekha 'asher nibeita lehashib kelei bet ihoh vekhal hagolah mibabel 'el hamaqom hazeh. 'akh shema' na hadabar hazeh 'asher 'anokhi dober be'azenekha ube'azenei kal ha'am. hanebi'im 'asher hayu lefanai ulefanekha min ha'olam vayinabe'u 'el 'arazot rabot ve'al mamlakhot gedolot lemilkhamah ulera'ah uledaber. hanabi 'asher yinabei leshalom bebo debar hanabi yivada' hanabi 'asher shelakho ihoh be'emet. vayiqakh khananyah hanabi 'et hamotah mei'al zavar yirmeyah hanabi vayishbereihu. vayomer khananyah le'einei khal ha'am leimor koh 'amar ihoh kakhah 'eshbor 'et 'ol nebukhadnezar melekh babel be'od shenatayim yamim mei'al zavar kal hagoyim vayeilekh yirmeyah hanabi ledarko. vayhi debar ihoh 'el yirmeyah 'akharei shebor khananyah hanabi 'et hamotah mei'al zavar yirmeyah hanabi leimor. halokh ve'amarta 'el khananyah leimor koh 'amar ihoh motot 'ez shabareta ve'asita takhteihen motot barzel. ki khoh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el 'ol barzel natati 'al zavar kal hagoyim ha'eleh la'abod 'et nebukhadnezar melekh babel va'abaduhu vegam 'et khayat hasadeh natati lo. vayomer yirmeyah hanabi 'el khananyah hanabi shema' na khananyah lo shelakhakha ihoh ve'atah hibtakhta 'et ha'am hazeh 'al shaqer. lakhen koh 'amar ihoh hini meshaleikhakha mei'al penei ha'adamah hashanah 'atah met ki sarah dibarta 'el ihoh. vayamat khananyah hanabi bashanah hahi bakhodesh hashebi'i. ve'eleh dibrei haseifer 'asher shalakh yirmeyah hanabi mirushalim 'el yeter ziqnei hagolah ve'el hakohanim ve'el hanebi'im ve'el kal ha'am 'asher heglah nebukhadnezar mirushalim babelah. 'akharei zet yekhaneyah hamelekh vehagebirah vehasarisim sarei yehudah virushalim vehekharash vehamasger mirushalim. beyad 'el'asah ben shafan ugemaryah ben khilqiyah 'asher shalakh zidqiyah melekh yehudah 'el nebukhadnezar melekh babel babelah leimor. koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el lekhal hagolah 'asher higleiti mirushalim babelah. benu batim vesheibu venit'u ganot ve'ikhlu 'et piryan. qekhu nashim veholidu banim ubanot uqekhu libneikhem nashim ve'et benoteikhem tenu la'anashim veteiladnah banim ubanot urebu sham ve'al tim'atu. vedirshu 'et shelom ha'ir 'asher higleiti 'etkhem shamah vehitpalu ba'adah 'el ihoh ki bishlomah yihyeh lakhem shalom. ki khoh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el 'al yashi'u lakhem nebi'eikhem 'asher beqirbekhem veqosemeikhem ve'al tishme'u 'el khalomoteikhem 'asher 'atem makhlemim. ki besheqer hem nibe'im lakhem bishmi lo shelakhtim ne'um ihoh. ki khoh 'amar ihoh ki lefi melot lebabel shib'im shanah 'efqod 'etkhem vahaqimoti 'aleikhem 'et debari hatob lehashib 'etkhem 'el hamaqom hazeh. ki 'anokhi yada'ti 'et hamakhashabot 'asher 'anokhi khosheb 'aleikhem ne'um ihoh makhshebot shalom velo lera'ah latet lakhem 'akharit vetiqvah. uqeratem 'oti vahalakhtem vehitpalaltem 'eilai veshama'ti 'aleikhem. ubiqashtem 'oti umezatem ki tidreshuni bekhal lebabkhem. venimzeiti lakhem ne'um ihoh veshabti 'et shebitekhem shebutekhem veqibazti 'etkhem mikal hagoyim umikal hameqomot 'asher hidakhti 'etkhem sham ne'um ihoh vahashiboti 'etkhem 'el hamaqom 'asher higleiti 'etkhem misham. ki 'amartem heiqim lanu ihoh nebi'im babelah. ki khoh 'amar ihoh 'el hamelekh hayosheb 'el kisei david ve'el kal ha'am hayosheb ba'ir hazot 'akheikhem 'asher lo yaze'u 'itekhem bagolah. koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot hini meshaleiakh bam 'et hakhereb 'et hara'ab ve'et hadaber venatati 'otam kate'einim hasho'arim 'asher lo tei'akhalnah meiroa'. veradafti 'akhareihem bakhereb bara'ab ubadaber unetatim lizva'ah leza'avah lekhol mamlekhot ha'arez le'alah uleshamah velishreiqah ulekherpah bekhal hagoyim 'asher hidakhtim sham. takhat 'asher lo shame'u 'el debarai ne'um ihoh 'asher shalakhti 'aleihem 'et 'abadai hanebi'im hashkem veshaloakh velo shema'tem ne'um ihoh. ve'atem shim'u debar ihoh kal hagolah 'asher shilakhti mirushalim babelah. koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el 'el 'akh'ab ben qolayah ve'el zidqiyahu ben ma'aseiyah hanibe'im lakhem bishmi shaqer hini noten 'otam beyad nebukhadrezar melekh babel vehikam le'eineikhem. veluqakh meihem qelalah lekhol galut yehudah 'asher bebabel leimor yesimkha ihoh kezidqiyahu ukhe'ekhab 'asher qalam melekh babel ba'esh. ya'an 'asher 'asu nebalah beyisra'el vayna'afu 'et neshei rei'eihem vaydaberu dabar bishmi sheqer 'asher lo zivitim ve'anokhi huyodeia' hayodeia' va'ed ne'um ihoh. ve'el shema'yahu hanekhelami tomar leimor. koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el leimor ya'an 'asher 'atah shalakhta beshimkhah sefarim 'el kal ha'am 'asher birushalim ve'el zefanyah ben ma'aseiyah hakohen ve'el kal hakohanim leimor. ihoh netanekha khohen takhat yehoyada' hakohen lihyot peqidim bet ihoh lekhal 'ish meshuga' umitnabei venatatah 'oto 'el hamahpekhet ve'el hazinoq. ve'atah lamah lo ga'arta beyirmeyahu ha'anetoti hamitnabei lakhem. ki 'al ken shalakh 'eileinu babel leimor 'arukah hi benu batim vesheibu venit'u ganot ve'ikhlu 'et perihen. vayiqra zefanyah hakohen 'et haseifer hazeh be'azenei yirmeyahu hanabi. vayhi debar ihoh 'el yirmeyahu leimor. shelakh 'al kal hagolah leimor koh 'amar ihoh 'el shema'yah hanekhelami ya'an 'asher niba lakhem shema'yah va'ani lo shelakhtiv vayabtakh 'etkhem 'al shaqer. lakhen koh 'amar ihoh hini foqed 'al shema'yah hanekhelami ve'al zar'o lo yihyeh lo 'ish yosheb betokh ha'am hazeh velo yir'eh batob 'asher 'ani 'oseh le'ami ne'um ihoh ki sarah diber 'al ihoh. hadabar 'asher hayah 'el yirmeyahu mei'et ihoh leimor. koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el leimor ketab lekha 'et kal hadebarim 'asher dibarti 'eilekha 'el seifer. ki hineh yamim ba'im ne'um ihoh veshabti 'et shebut 'ami yisra'el vihudah 'amar ihoh vahashibotim 'el ha'arez 'asher natati la'abotam vireishuha. ve'eleh hadebarim 'asher diber ihoh 'el yisra'el ve'el yehudah. ki khoh 'amar ihoh qol kharadah shama'enu pakhad ve'en shalom. sha'alu na ure'u 'im yoled zakhar madua' ra'iti khal geber yadav 'al khalazav kayoleidah venehefkhu khal panim leyeiraqon. ho ki gadol hayom hahu mei'ayin kamohu ve'et zarah hi leya'aqob umimenah yivasheia'. vehayah bayom hahu ne'um ihoh zeba'ot 'eshbor 'ulo mei'al zavarekha umosrotekha 'anateq velo ya'abdu bo 'od zarim. ve'abedu 'et ihoh 'eloheihem ve'et david malkam 'asher 'aqim lahem. ve'atah 'al tira 'abdi ya'aqob ne'um ihoh ve'al teikhat yisra'el ki hini moshi'akha meirakhoq ve'et zar'akha mei'erez shibyam veshab ya'aqob veshaqat vesha'anan ve'en makharid. ki 'itekha 'ani ne'um ihoh lehoshi'ekha ki 'e'eseh khalah bekhal hagoyim 'asher hafizotikha sham 'akh 'otekha lo 'e'eseh khalah veyisartikha lamishpat venaqeh lo 'anaqeka. ki khoh 'amar ihoh 'anush leshibrekh nakhlah makatekh. 'en dan dinekh lemazor refu'ot te'alah 'en lakh. kal me'ahabayikh shekheikhukh 'otakh lo yidroshu ki makat 'oyeb hikitikh musar 'akhzari 'al rob 'avonekh 'azemu khatotayikh. mah tiz'aq 'al shibrekh 'anush makh'obekh 'al rob 'avonekh 'azemu khatotayikh 'asiti 'eleh lakh. lakhen kal 'okhelayikh yei'akheilu vekhal zarayikh kulam bashebi yeileikhu vehayu shosayikh limshisah vekhal bozezayikh 'eten labaz. ki 'a'aleh 'arukhah lakh umimakotayikh 'erpa'ekh ne'um ihoh ki nidakhah qare'u lakh ziyon hi doresh 'en lah. koh 'amar ihoh hini shab shebut 'aholei ya'aqob umishkenotav 'arakhem venibnetah 'ir 'al tilah ve'armon 'al mishpato yeisheb. veyaza meihem todah veqol mesakhaqim vehirbitim velo yim'atu vehikhbadtim velo yiz'aru. vehayu banav keqedem va'adato lefanai tikon ufaqadti 'al kal lokhazav. vehayah 'adiro mimenu umoshelo miqirbo yeizei vehiqrabtiv venigash 'eilai ki mi hu zeh 'arab 'et libo lageshet 'eilai ne'um ihoh. vihyitem li le'am ve'anokhi 'ehyeh lakhem leilohim. hineh sa'arat ihoh kheimah yaze'ah sa'ar mitgorer 'al rosh resha'im yakhul. lo yashub kharon 'af ihoh 'ad 'asoto ve'ad haqimo mezimot libo be'akharit hayamim titbonu bah. ba'et hahi ne'um ihoh 'ehyeh leilohim lekhol mishpekhot yisra'el vehemah yihyu li le'am. koh 'amar ihoh maza khen bamidbar 'am seridei khareb halokh lehargi'o yisra'el. meirakhoq ihoh nir'ah li ve'ahabat 'olam 'ahabtikh 'al ken meshakhtikh khased. 'od 'ebnekh venibnet betulat yisra'el 'od ta'di tupayikh veyazat bimkhol mesakhaqim. 'od tite'i kheramim beharei shomeron nate'u note'im vekhileilu. ki yesh yom qare'u nozerim behar 'efrayim qumu vena'aleh ziyon 'el ihoh 'eloheinu. ki khoh 'amar ihoh ranu leya'aqob simkhah vezahalu berosh hagoyim hashmi'u halu ve'imru hosha' ihoh 'et 'amekha 'et she'eirit yisra'el. hini meibi 'otam mei'erez zafon veqibaztim miyarketei 'arez bam 'iver ufiseiakh harah veyoledet yakhdav qahal gadol yashubu henah. bibkhi yabo'u ubetakhanunim 'obilem 'olikhem 'el nakhalei mayim bederekh yashar lo yikashelu bah ki hayiti leyisra'el le'ab ve'efrayim bekhori hu. shim'u debar ihoh goyim vehagidu ba'iyim mimerkhaq ve'imru mezareh yisra'el yeqabezenu ushemaro kero'eh 'edro. ki fadah ihoh 'et ya'aqob uge'alo miyad khazaq mimenu. uba'u verinenu bimrom ziyon venaharu 'el tub ihoh 'al dagan ve'al tirosh ve'al yizhar ve'al benei zon ubaqar vehayetah nafsham kegan raveh velo yosifu leda'abah 'od. 'az tismakh betulah bemakhol ubakhurim uzeqeinim yakhdav vehafakhti 'eblam lesason venikhamtim vesimakhtim migonam. veriveiti nefesh hakohanim dashen ve'ami 'et tubi yisba'u ne'um ihoh. koh 'amar ihoh qol beramah nishma' nehi bekhi tamrurim rakhel mebakah 'al baneha mei'anah lehinakhem 'al baneha ki 'einenu. koh 'amar ihoh min'i qolekh mibekhi ve'einayikh midim'ah ki yesh sakhar lif'ulatekh ne'um ihoh veshabu mei'erez 'oyeb. veyesh tiqvah le'akharitekh ne'um ihoh veshabu banim ligbulam. shamoa' shama'ti 'efrayim mitnoded yisartani va'ivaser ke'eigel lo lumad hashibeini ve'ashubah ki 'atah ihoh 'elohai. ki 'akharei shubi nikhamti ve'akharei hivade'i safaqti 'al yarekh bosheti vegam nikhlamti ki nasati kherpat ne'urai. haben yaqir li 'efrayim 'im yeled sha'ashu'im ki midei daberi bo zakhor 'ezkerenu 'od 'al ken hamu mei'ai lo rakhem 'arakhamenu ne'um ihoh. hazibi lakh ziyunim simi lakh tamrurim shiti libekh lamsilah derekh halakheti halakhet ubi betulat yisra'el shubi 'el 'arayikh 'eleh. 'ad matai titkhamaqin habat hashobeibah ki bara ihoh khadashah ba'arez neqeibah tesobeb gaber. koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el 'od yomeru 'et hadabar hazeh be'erez yehudah ube'arav beshubi 'et shebutam yebarekhkha ihoh neveh zedeq har haqodesh. veyashebu bah yehudah vekhal 'arav yakhdav 'ikarim venase'u ba'eider. ki hirveiti nefesh 'ayeifah vekhal nefesh da'abah mileiti. 'al zot heqizoti va'er'eh ushenati 'arebah li. hineh yamim ba'im ne'um ihoh vezara'ti 'et bet yisra'el ve'et bet yehudah zera' 'adam vezera' beheimah. vehayah ka'asher shaqadti 'aleihem lintosh velintoz velaharos uleha'abid ulehareia' ken 'eshqod 'aleihem libnot velintoa' ne'um ihoh. bayamim hahem lo yomeru 'od 'abot 'akhelu boser veshinei banim tiqhenah. ki 'im 'ish ba'avono yamut kal ha'adam ha'okhel haboser tiqhenah shinav. hineh yamim ba'im ne'um ihoh vekharati 'et bet yisra'el ve'et bet yehudah berit khadashah. lo khaberit 'asher karati 'et 'abotam beyom hekheziqi beyadam lehozi'am mei'erez mizrayim 'asher hemah heifeiru 'et beriti ve'anokhi ba'alti bam ne'um ihoh. ki zot haberit 'asher 'ekhrot 'et bet yisra'el 'akharei hayamim hahem ne'um ihoh natati 'et torati beqirbam ve'al libam 'ekhtabenah vehayiti lahem leilohim vehemah yihyu li le'am. velo yelamedu 'od 'ish 'et rei'eihu ve'ish 'et 'akhiv leimor de'u 'et ihoh ki khulam yeide'u 'oti lemiqtanam ve'ad gedolam ne'um ihoh ki 'eslakh la'avonam ulekhatatam lo 'ezkar 'od. koh 'amar ihoh noten shemesh le'or yomam khuqot yareiakh vekhokhabim le'or layelah roga' hayam vayehemu galav ihoh zeba'ot shemo. 'im yamushu hakhuqim ha'eleh milefanai ne'um ihoh gam zera' yisra'el yishbetu mihyot go lefanai kal hayamim. koh 'amar ihoh 'im yimadu shamayim milma'lah veyeikhaqeru mosdei 'erez lematah gam 'ani 'em'as bekhal zera' yisra'el 'al kal 'asher 'asu ne'um ihoh. hineh yamim ba'im ne'um ihoh venibnetah ha'ir ihoh mimigdal khanan'el sha'ar hapinah. veyaza 'od qeveh qav hamidah negdo 'al gib'at gareb venasab go'atah. vekhal ha'eimeq hapegarim vehadeshen vekhal hashereimot hashedeimot 'ad nakhal qidron 'ad pinat sha'ar hasusim mizrakhah qodesh ihoh lo yinatesh velo yeihares 'od le'olam. hadabar 'asher hayah 'el yirmeyahu mei'et ihoh bishnat bashanah ha'asirit lezidqiyahu melekh yehudah hi hashanah shemoneh 'esreh shanah linbukhadrezar. ve'az khel melekh babel zarim 'al yerushalim veyirmeyahu hanabi hayah khalu bakhazar hamatarah 'asher bet melekh yehudah. 'asher kela'o zidqiyahu melekh yehudah leimor madua' 'atah niba leimor koh 'amar ihoh hini noten 'et ha'ir hazot beyad melekh babel ulekhadah. vezidqiyahu melekh yehudah lo yimalet miyad hakasdim ki hinaton yinaten beyad melekh babel vediber piv 'im piv ve'einav 'et 'eino 'einav tir'enah. ubabel yolikh 'et zidqiyahu vesham yihyeh 'ad paqedi 'oto ne'um ihoh ki tilakhamu 'et hakasdim lo tazlikhu. vayomer yirmeyahu hayah debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. hineh khanam'el ben shalum dodekha ba 'eilekha leimor qeneh lekha 'et sadi 'asher ba'anatot ki lekha mishpat hage'ulah liqnot. vayabo 'eilai khanam'el ben dodi kidbar ihoh 'el khazar hamatarah vayomer 'eilai qeneh na 'et sadi 'asher ba'anatot 'asher be'erez binyamin ki lekha mishpat hayrushah ulekha hage'ulah qeneh lakh va'eida' ki debar ihoh hu. va'eqneh 'et hasadeh mei'et khanam'el ben dodi 'asher ba'anatot va'eshqalah lo 'et hakesef shib'ah sheqalim va'asarah hakasef. va'ekhtob baseifer va'ekhtom va'a'ed 'eidim va'eshqol hakesef bemozenayim. va'eqakh 'et seifer hamiqnah 'et hekhatum hamizvah vehakhuqim ve'et hagalui. va'eten 'et haseifer hamiqnah 'el barukh ben neiriyah ben makhseiyah le'einei khanam'el dodi ule'einei ha'eidim hakotebim beseifer hamiqnah le'einei kal hayehudim hayoshebim bakhazar hamatarah. va'azaveh 'et barukh le'eineihem leimor. koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el laqoakh 'et hasefarim ha'eleh 'et seifer hamiqnah hazeh ve'et hekhatum ve'et seifer hagalui hazeh unetatam bikhli khares lema'an ya'amdu yamim rabim. ki khoh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el 'od yiqanu batim vesadot ukheramim ba'arez hazot. va'etpalel 'el ihoh 'akharei titi 'et seifer hamiqnah 'el barukh ben neiriyah leimor. 'ahah 'adonai ihoh hineh 'atah 'asita 'et hashamayim ve'et ha'arez bekhokhakha hagadol ubizro'akha hanetuyah lo yipalei mimekha kal dabar. 'oseh khesed la'alafim umeshalem 'avon 'abot 'el kheq beneihem 'akhareihem ha'el hagadol hagibor ihoh zeba'ot shemo. gedol ha'eizah verab ha'aliliyah 'asher 'einekha fequkhot 'al kal darkhei benei 'adam latet le'ish kidrakhav vekhifri ma'alalav. 'ashersa meta 'otot umofetim be'erez mizrayim 'ad hayom hazeh ubeyisra'el uba'adam vata'aseh lekha shem kayom hazeh. vatozei 'et 'amekha 'et yisra'el mei'erez mizrayim be'otot ubemoftim ubeyad khazaqah ube'ezroa' netuyah ubemora gadol. vatiten lahem 'et ha'arez hazot 'asher nishba'ta la'abotam latet lahem 'erez zabat khalab udebash. vayabo'u vayirshu 'otah velo shame'u beqolekha ubetorotekha ubetoratekha lo halakhu 'et kal 'asher zivitah lahem la'asot lo 'asu vataqrei 'otam 'et kal hara'ah hazot. hineh hasolelot ba'u ha'ir lelakhedah veha'ir nitenah beyad hakasdim hanilkhamim 'aleha mipenei hakhereb vehara'ab vehadaber va'asher dibarta hayah vehinekha ro'eh. ve'atah 'amarta 'eilai 'adonai ihoh qeneh lekha hasadeh bakesef veha'ed 'eidim veha'ir nitenah beyad hakasdim. vayhi debar ihoh 'el yirmeyahu leimor. hineh 'ani ihoh 'elohei kal basar hamimeni yipalei kal dabar. lakhen koh 'amar ihoh hini noten 'et ha'ir hazot beyad hakasdim ubeyad nebukhadrezar melekh babel ulekhadah. uba'u hakasdim hanilkhamim 'al ha'ir hazot vehizitu 'et ha'ir hazot ba'esh userafuha ve'et habatim 'asher qiteru 'al gagoteihem laba'al vehisikhu nesakhim leilohim 'akheirim lema'an hakh'iseini. ki hayu benei yisra'el ubenei yehudah 'akh 'osim hara' be'einai mine'uroteihem ki benei yisra'el 'akh makh'isim 'oti bema'aseh yedeihem ne'um ihoh. ki 'al 'api ve'al khamati hayetah li ha'ir hazot lemin hayom 'asher banu 'otah ve'ad hayom hazeh lahasirah mei'al panai. 'al kal ra'at benei yisra'el ubenei yehudah 'asher 'asu lehakh'iseini hemah malkheihem sareihem kohaneihem unebi'eihem ve'ish yehudah veyoshebei yerushalim. vayifnu 'eilai 'oref velo fanim velamed 'otam hashkem velamed ve'einam shome'im laqakhat musar. vayasimu shiquzeihem babayit 'asher niqra shemi 'alav letame'o. vayibnu 'et bamot haba'al 'asher begei ben hinom leha'abir 'et beneihem ve'et benoteihem lamolekh 'asher lo zivitim velo 'aletah 'al libi la'asot hato'eibah hazot lema'an hakhati hakhati 'et yehudah. ve'atah lakhen koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el 'el ha'ir hazot 'asher 'atem 'omerim nitenah beyad melekh babel bakhereb ubara'ab ubadaber. hini meqabezam mikal ha'arazot 'asher hidakhtim sham be'api ubakhamati ubeqezef gadol vahashibotim 'el hamaqom hazeh vehoshabtim labetakh. vehayu li le'am va'ani 'ehyeh lahem leilohim. venatati lahem leb 'ekhad vederekh 'ekhad leyir'ah 'oti kal hayamim letob lahem velibneihem 'akhareihem. vekharati lahem berit 'olam 'asher lo 'ashub mei'akhareihem leheitibi 'otam ve'et yir'ati 'eten bilbabam lebilti sur mei'alai. vesasti 'aleihem leheitib 'otam uneta'tim ba'arez hazot be'emet bekhal libi ubekhal nafshi. ki khoh 'amar ihoh ka'asher heibeiti 'el ha'am hazeh 'et kal hara'ah hagedolah hazot ken 'anokhi meibi 'aleihem 'et kal hatobah 'asher 'anokhi dober 'aleihem. veniqnah hasadeh ba'arez hazot 'asher 'atem 'omerim shemamah hi mei'en 'adam ubeheimah nitenah beyad hakasdim. sadot bakesef yiqnu vekhatob baseifer vekhatom veha'ed 'eidim be'erez binyamin ubisbibei yerushalim ube'arei yehudah ube'arei hahar ube'arei hashefeilah ube'arei hanegeb ki 'ashib 'et shebutam ne'um ihoh. vayhi debar ihoh 'el yirmeyahu sheinit vehu 'odenu 'azur bakhazar hamatarah leimor. koh 'amar ihoh 'osah ihoh yozer 'otah lahakhinah ihoh shemo. qera 'eilai ve'e'eneka ve'agidah lekha gedolot ubezurot lo yeda'tam. ki khoh 'amar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el 'al batei ha'ir hazot ve'al batei malkhei yehudah hanetuzim 'el hasolelot ve'el hekhareb. ba'im lehilakhem 'et hakasdim ulemal'am 'et pigrei ha'adam 'asher hikeiti be'api ubakhamati va'asher histarti fanai meiha'ir hazot 'al kal ra'atam. hini ma'aleh lah 'arukhah umarpei urefatim vegileiti lahem 'ateret shalom ve'emet. vahashiboti 'et shebut yehudah ve'et shebut yisra'el ubenitim kebarishonah. vetihartim mikal 'avonam 'asher khate'u li vesalakhti lekhol lekhal 'avonoteihem 'asher khate'u li va'asher pashe'u bi. vehayetah li leshem sason lithilah uletif'eret lekhol goyei ha'arez 'asher yishme'u 'et kal hatobah 'asher 'anokhi 'oseh 'otam ufakhadu veragezu 'al kal hatobah ve'al kal hashalom 'asher 'anokhi 'oseh lah. koh 'amar ihoh 'od yishama' bamaqom hazeh 'asher 'atem 'omerim khareb hu mei'en 'adam umei'en beheimah be'arei yehudah ubekhuzot yerushalim hanshamot mei'en 'adam umei'en yosheb umei'en beheimah. qol sason veqol simkhah qol khatan veqol kalah qol 'omerim hodu 'et ihoh zeba'ot ki tob ihoh ki le'olam khasdo mebi'im todah bet ihoh ki 'ashib 'et shebut ha'arez kebarishonah 'amar ihoh. koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'od yihyeh bamaqom hazeh hekhareb mei'en 'adam ve'ad beheimah ubekhal 'arav neveh ro'im marbizim zon. be'arei hahar be'arei hashefeilah ube'arei hanegeb ube'erez binyamin ubisbibei yerushalim ube'arei yehudah 'od ta'aborenah hazon 'al yedei moneh 'amar ihoh. hineh yamim ba'im ne'um ihoh vahaqimoti 'et hadabar hatob 'asher dibarti 'el bet yisra'el ve'al bet yehudah. bayamim hahem uba'et hahi 'azmiakh ledavid zemakh zedaqah ve'asah mishpat uzedaqah ba'arez. bayamim hahem tivasha' yehudah virushalim tishkon labetakh vezeh 'asher yiqra lah ihoh zidqeinu. ki khoh 'amar ihoh lo yikaret ledavid 'ish yosheb 'al kisei bet yisra'el. velakohanim halviyim lo yikaret 'ish milefanai ma'aleh 'olah umaqtir minkhah ve'oseh zebakh kal hayamim. vayhi debar ihoh 'el yirmeyahu leimor. koh 'amar ihoh 'im tafeiru 'et beriti hayom ve'et beriti halayelah ulebilti heyot yomam valaylah be'itam. gam beriti tufar 'et david 'abdi mihyot lo ben molekh 'al kis'o ve'et halviyim hakohanim mesharetai. 'asher lo yisafer zeba hashamayim velo yimad khol hayam ken 'arbeh 'et zera' david 'abdi ve'et halviyim mesharetei 'oti. vayhi debar ihoh 'el yirmeyahu leimor. halo ra'ita mah ha'am hazeh diberu leimor shetei hamishpakhot 'asher bakhar ihoh bahem vayim'asem ve'et 'ami yin'azun mihyot 'od go lifneihem. koh 'amar ihoh 'im lo beriti yomam valayelah khuqot shamayim va'arez lo sameti. gam zera' ya'aqob vedavid 'abdi 'em'as miqakhat mizar'o moshelim 'el zera' 'abraham yiskhaq veya'aqob ki 'ashub 'ashib 'et shebutam verikhamtim. hadabar 'asher hayah 'el yirmeyahu mei'et ihoh unebukhadrezar melekh babel vekhal kheilo vekhal mamlekhot 'erez memshelet yado vekhal ha'amim nilkhamim 'al yerushalim ve'al kal 'areha leimor. koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el halokh ve'amarta 'el zidqiyahu melekh yehudah ve'amarta 'eilav koh 'amar ihoh hini noten 'et ha'ir hazot beyad melekh babel userafah ba'esh. ve'atah lo timalet miyado ki tafos titafes ubeyado tinaten ve'einekha 'et 'einei melekh babel tir'enah ufihu 'et pikha yedaber ubabel tabo. 'akh shema' debar ihoh zidqiyahu melekh yehudah koh 'amar ihoh 'alekha lo tamut bekhareb. beshalom tamut ukhemisrefot 'abotekha hamelakhim harishonim 'asher hayu lefanekha ken yisrefu lakh veho 'adon yispedu lakh ki dabar 'ani dibarti ne'um ihoh. vaydaber yirmeyahu hanabi 'el zidqiyahu melekh yehudah 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh birushalim. vekhel melekh babel nilkhamim 'al yerushalim ve'al kal 'arei yehudah hanotarot 'el lakhish ve'el 'azeiqah ki henah nish'aru be'arei yehudah 'arei mibzar. hadabar 'asher hayah 'el yirmeyahu mei'et ihoh 'akharei kerot hamelekh zidqiyahu berit 'et kal ha'am 'asher birushalim liqro lahem deror. leshalakh 'ish 'et 'abdo ve'ish 'et shifkhato ha'ibri veha'ibriyah khafeshim lebilti 'abad bam bihudi 'akhihu 'ish. vayishme'u khal hasarim vekhal ha'am 'asher ba'u baberit leshalakh 'ish 'et 'abdo ve'ish 'et shifkhato khafeshim lebilti 'abad bam 'od vayishme'u vayshaleikhu. vayashubu 'akharei khen vayashibu 'et ha'abadim ve'et hashefakhot 'asher shilekhu khafeshim vayakhbishum vayikhbeshum la'abadim velishfakhot. vayhi debar ihoh 'el yirmeyahu mei'et ihoh leimor. koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el 'anokhi karati berit 'et 'aboteikhem beyom hozi'i 'otam mei'erez mizrayim mibet 'abadim leimor. miqez sheba' shanim teshalekhu 'ish 'et 'akhiv ha'ibri 'asher yimakher lekha va'abadekha shesh shanim veshilakhto khafeshi mei'imakh velo shame'u 'aboteikhem 'eilai velo hitu 'et 'azenam. vatashubu 'atem hayom vata'asu 'et hayashar be'einai liqro deror 'ish lerei'eihu vatikhretu berit lefanai babayit 'asher niqra shemi 'alav. vatashubu vatekhalelu 'et shemi vatashibu 'ish 'et 'abdo ve'ish 'et shifkhato 'asher shilakhtem khafeshim lenafsham vatikhbeshu 'otam lihyot lakhem la'abadim velishfakhot. lakhen koh 'amar ihoh 'atem lo shema'tem 'eilai liqro deror 'ish le'akhiv ve'ish lerei'eihu hini qorei lakhem deror ne'um ihoh 'el hakhereb 'el hadeber ve'el hara'ab venatati 'etkhem lizva'ah leza'avah lekhol mamlekhot ha'arez. venatati 'et ha'anashim ha'oberim 'et beriti 'asher lo heiqimu 'et dibrei haberit 'asher karetu lefanai ha'eigel 'asher karetu lishnayim vaya'abru ben betarav. sarei yehudah vesarei yerushalim hasarisim vehakohanim vekhol 'am ha'arez ha'oberim ben bitrei ha'eigel. venatati 'otam beyad 'oyebeihem ubeyad mebaqshei nafsham vehayetah niblatam lema'akhal le'of hashamayim ulebehemat ha'arez. ve'et zidqiyahu melekh yehudah ve'et sarav 'eten beyad 'oyebeihem ubeyad mebaqshei nafsham ubeyad khel melekh babel ha'olim mei'aleikhem. hini mezaveh ne'um ihoh vahashibotim 'el ha'ir hazot venilkhamu 'aleha ulekhaduha userafuha ba'esh ve'et 'arei yehudah 'eten shemamah mei'en yosheb. hadabar 'asher hayah 'el yirmeyahu mei'et ihoh bimei yehoyaqim ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah leimor. halokh 'el bet hareikhabim vedibarta 'otam vahabi'otam bet ihoh 'el 'akhat haleshakhot vehishqita 'otam yayin. va'eqakh 'et ya'azanyah ben yirmeyahu ben khabazinyah ve'et 'ekhav ve'et kal banav ve'et kal bet hareikhabim. va'abi 'otam bet ihoh 'el lishkat benei khanan ben yigdalyahu 'ish ha'elohim 'asher 'eizel lishkat hasarim 'asher mima'al lelishkat ma'aseiyahu ben shalum shomer hasaf. va'eten lifnei benei bet hareikhabim gebi'im melei'im yayin vekhosot va'omar 'aleihem shetu yayin. vayomeru lo nishteh yayin ki yonadab ben reikhab 'abinu zivah 'aleinu leimor lo tishtu yayin 'atem ubeneikhem 'ad 'olam. ubayit lo tibnu vezera' lo tizra'u vekherem lo tita'u velo yihyeh lakhem ki ba'ohalim teishebu kal yemeikhem lema'an tikhyu yamim rabim 'al penei ha'adamah 'asher 'atem garim sham. vanishma' beqol yehonadab ben reikhab 'abinu lekhol 'asher zivanu lebilti shetot yayin kal yameinu 'anakhnu nasheinu baneinu ubenoteinu. ulebilti benot batim leshibteinu vekherem vesadeh vazera' lo yihyeh lanu. vaneisheb ba'ohalim vanishma' vana'as kekhol 'asher zivanu yonadab 'abinu. vayhi ba'alot nebukhadrezar melekh babel 'el ha'arez vanomer bo'u venabo yerushalim mipenei khel hakasdim umipenei khel 'aram vaneisheb birushalim. vayhi debar ihoh 'el yirmeyahu leimor. koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el halokh ve'amarta le'ish yehudah uleyoshebei yerushalim halo tiqkhu musar lishmoa' 'el debarai ne'um ihoh. huqam 'et dibrei yehonadab ben reikhab 'asher zivah 'et banav lebilti shetot yayin velo shatu 'ad hayom hazeh ki shame'u 'et mizvat 'abihem ve'anokhi dibarti 'aleikhem hashkem vedaber velo shema'tem 'eilai. va'eshlakh 'aleikhem 'et kal 'abadai hanebi'im hashkem veshaloakh leimor shubu na 'ish midarko hara'ah veheitibu ma'aleikhem ve'al teilekhu 'akharei 'elohim 'akheirim le'abedam ushebu 'el ha'adamah 'asher natati lakhem vela'aboteikhem velo hititem 'et 'azenekhem velo shema'tem 'eilai. ki heiqimu benei yehonadab ben reikhab 'et mizvat 'abihem 'asher zivam veha'am hazeh lo shame'u 'eilai. lakhen koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el hini meibi 'el yehudah ve'el kal yoshebei yerushalim 'et kal hara'ah 'asher dibarti 'aleihem ya'an dibarti 'aleihem velo shamei'u va'eqra lahem velo 'anu. ulebet hareikhabim 'amar yirmeyahu koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el ya'an 'asher shema'tem 'al mizvat yehonadab 'abikhem vatishmeru 'et kal mizvotav vata'asu kekhol 'asher zivah 'etkhem. lakhen koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el lo yikaret 'ish leyonadab ben reikhab 'omed lefanai kal hayamim. vayhi bashanah harebi'it lihoyaqim ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah hayah hadabar hazeh 'el yirmeyahu mei'et ihoh leimor. qakh lekha megilat seifer vekhatabta 'eileha 'et kal hadebarim 'asher dibarti 'eilekha 'al yisra'el ve'al yehudah ve'al kal hagoyim miyom dibarti 'eilekha mimei yoshiyahu ve'ad hayom hazeh. 'ulai yishme'u bet yehudah 'et kal hara'ah 'asher 'anokhi khosheb la'asot lahem lema'an yashubu 'ish midarko hara'ah vesalakhti la'avonam ulekhatatam. vayiqra yirmeyahu 'et barukh ben neiriyah vayikhtob barukh mipi yirmeyahu 'et kal dibrei ihoh 'asher diber 'eilav 'al megilat seifer. vayzaveh yirmeyahu 'et barukh leimor 'ani 'azur lo 'ukhal labo bet ihoh. ubata 'atah veqarata bamegilah 'asher katabta mipi 'et dibrei ihoh be'azenei ha'am bet ihoh beyom zom vegam be'azenei khal yehudah haba'im mei'areihem tiqra'em. 'ulai tipol tekhinatam lifnei ihoh veyashubu 'ish midarko hara'ah ki gadol ha'af vehakheimah 'asher diber ihoh 'el ha'am hazeh. vaya'as barukh ben neiriyah kekhol 'asher zivahu yirmeyahu hanabi liqro baseifer dibrei ihoh bet ihoh. vayhi bashanah hakhamishit lihoyaqim ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah bakhodesh hateshi'i qare'u zom lifnei ihoh kal ha'am birushalim vekhal ha'am haba'im mei'arei yehudah birushalim. vayiqra barukh baseifer 'et dibrei yirmeyahu bet ihoh belishkat gemaryahu ben shafan hasofer bekhazer ha'elyon petakh sha'ar bet ihoh hekhadash be'azenei kal ha'am. vayishma' mikhayehu ben gemaryahu ben shafan 'et kal dibrei ihoh mei'al haseifer. vayeired bet hamelekh 'al lishkat hasofer vehineh sham kal hasarim yoshebim 'elishama' hasofer udelayahu benosh ma'yahu ve'elnatan ben 'akhbor ugemaryahu ben shafan vezidqiyahu ben khananyahu vekhal hasarim. vayaged lahem mikhayehu 'et kal hadebarim 'asher shameia' biqro barukh baseifer be'azenei ha'am. vayishlekhu khal hasarim 'el barukh 'et yehudi ben netanyahu ben shelemyahu ben kushi leimor hamegilah 'asher qarata bah be'azenei ha'am qakhenah beyadekha valekh vayiqakh barukh ben neiriyahu 'et hamegilah beyado vayabo 'aleihem. vayomeru 'eilav sheb na uqera'enah be'azeneinu vayiqra barukh be'azeneihem. vayhi keshame'am 'et kal hadebarim pakhadu 'ish 'el rei'eihu vayomeru 'el barukh haged nagid lamelekh 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh. ve'et barukh sha'alu leimor haged na lanu 'ekh katabta 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh mipiv. vayomer lahem barukh mipiv yiqra 'eilai 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh va'ani koteb 'al haseifer badeyo. vayomeru hasarim 'el barukh lekh hisater 'atah veyirmeyahu ve'ish 'al yeida' 'eifoh 'atem. vayabo'u 'el hamelekh khazeirah ve'et hamegilah hifqidu belishkat 'elishama' hasofer vayagidu be'azenei hamelekh 'et kal hadebarim. vayishlakh hamelekh 'et yehudi laqakhat 'et hamegilah vayiqakheha milishkat 'elishama' hasofer vayiqra'eha yehudi be'azenei hamelekh ube'azenei kal hasarim ha'omedim mei'al hamelekh. vehamelekh yosheb bet hakhoref bakhodesh hateshi'i ve'et ha'akh lefanav mebo'aret. vayhi kiqro yehudi shalosh delatot ve'arba'ah yiqra'eha beta'ar hasofer vehashlekh 'el ha'esh 'asher 'el ha'akh 'ad tom kal hamegilah 'al ha'esh 'asher 'al ha'akh. velo fakhadu velo qare'u 'et bigdeihem hamelekh vekhal 'abadav hashome'im 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh. vegam 'elnatan udelayahu ugemaryahu hifgi'u bamelekh lebilti serof 'et hamegilah velo shama' 'aleihem. vayzaveh hamelekh 'et yerakhme'el ben hamelekh ve'et serayahu ben 'azri'el ve'et shelemyahu ben 'abde'el laqakhat 'et barukh hasofer ve'et yirmeyahu hanabi vayastirem ihoh. vayhi debar ihoh 'el yirmeyahu 'akharei serof hamelekh 'et hamegilah ve'et hadebarim 'asher katab barukh mipi yirmeyahu leimor. shub qakh lekha megilah 'akheret ukhetob 'aleha 'et kal hadebarim harishonim 'asher hayu 'al hamegilah harishonah 'asher saraf yehoyaqim melekh yehudah. ve'al yehoyaqim melekh yehudah tomar koh 'amar ihoh 'atah sarafta 'et hamegilah hazot leimor madua' katabta 'aleha leimor bo yabo melekh babel vehishkhit 'et ha'arez hazot vehishbit mimenah 'adam ubeheimah. lakhen koh 'amar ihoh 'al yehoyaqim melekh yehudah lo yihyeh lo yosheb 'al kisei david veniblato tihyeh mushlekhet lakhoreb bayom velaqerakh balayelah. ufaqadti 'alav ve'al zar'o ve'al 'abadav 'et 'avonam veheibeiti 'aleihem ve'al yoshebei yerushalim ve'el 'ish yehudah 'et kal hara'ah 'asher dibarti 'aleihem velo shamei'u. veyirmeyahu laqakh megilah 'akheret vayitenah 'el barukh ben neiriyahu hasofer vayikhtob 'aleha mipi yirmeyahu 'et kal dibrei haseifer 'asher saraf yehoyaqim melekh yehudah ba'esh ve'od nosaf 'aleihem debarim rabim kahemah. vayimlakh melekh zidqiyahu ben yoshiyahu takhat kaneyahu ben yehoyaqim 'asher himlikh nebukhadrezar melekh babel be'erez yehudah. velo shama' hu va'abadav ve'am ha'arez 'el dibrei ihoh 'asher diber beyad yirmeyahu hanabi. vayishlakh hamelekh zidqiyahu 'et yehukhal ben shelemyah ve'et zefanyahu ben ma'aseiyah hakohen 'el yirmeyahu hanabi leimor hitpalel na ba'adeinu 'el ihoh 'eloheinu. veyirmeyahu ba veyozei betokh ha'am velo natenu 'oto bet hakeli hakelu. vekhel par'oh yaza mimizrayim vayishme'u hakasdim hazarim 'al yerushalim 'et shim'am vayei'alu mei'al yerushalim. vayhi debar ihoh 'el yirmeyahu hanabi leimor. koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el koh tomeru 'el melekh yehudah hasholeiakh 'etkhem 'eilai ledaresheini hineh khel par'oh hayozei lakhem le'ezrah shab le'arzo mizrayim. veshabu hakasdim venilkhamu 'al ha'ir hazot ulekhaduha userafuha ba'esh. koh 'amar ihoh 'al tashi'u nafshoteikhem leimor halokh yeilekhu mei'aleinu hakasdim ki lo yeileikhu. ki 'im hikitem kal khel kasdim hanilkhamim 'itekhem venish'aru bam 'anashim meduqarim 'ish be'aholo yaqumu vesarefu 'et ha'ir hazot ba'esh. vehayah behei'alot khel hakasdim mei'al yerushalim mipenei khel par'oh. vayeizei yirmeyahu mirushalim lalekhet 'erez binyamin lakhaliq misham betokh ha'am. vayhi hu besha'ar binyamin vesham ba'al peqidut ushemo yir'iyayh ben shelemyah ben khananyah vayitpos 'et yirmeyahu hanabi leimor 'el hakasdim 'atah nofel. vayomer yirmeyahu sheqer 'eineni nofel 'al hakasdim velo shama' 'eilav vayitpos yir'iyayh beyirmeyahu vaybi'eihu 'el hasarim. vayiqzefu hasarim 'al yirmeyahu vehiku 'oto venatenu 'oto bet ha'eisur bet yehonatan hasofer ki 'oto 'asu lebet hakele. ki ba yirmeyahu 'el bet habor ve'el hakhanuyot vayeisheb sham yirmeyahu yamim rabim. vayishlakh hamelekh zidqiyahu vayiqakheihu vayish'aleihu hamelekh bebeito baseiter vayomer hayesh dabar mei'et ihoh vayomer yirmeyahu yesh vayomer beyad melekh babel tinaten. vayomer yirmeyahu 'el hamelekh zidqiyahu meh khatati lekha vela'abadekha vela'am hazeh ki netatem 'oti 'el bet hakele. ve'ayo ve'ayeh nebi'eikhem 'asher nibe'u lakhem leimor lo yabo melekh babel 'aleikhem ve'al ha'arez hazot. ve'atah shema' na 'adoni hamelekh tipal na tekhinati lefanekha ve'al teshibeini bet yehonatan hasofer velo 'amut sham. vayzaveh hamelekh zidqiyahu vayafqidu 'et yirmeyahu bakhazar hamatarah venaton lo khikar lekhem layom mikhuz ha'ofim 'ad tom kal halekhem min ha'ir vayeisheb yirmeyahu bakhazar hamatarah. vayishma' shefatyah ben matan ugedalyahu ben pashkhur veyukhal ben shelemyahu ufashkhur ben malkiyah 'et hadebarim 'asher yirmeyahu medaber 'el kal ha'am leimor. koh 'amar ihoh hayosheb ba'ir hazot yamut bakhereb bara'ab ubadaber vehayozei 'el hakasdim yikhyeh vekhayah vehayetah lo nafsho leshalal vakhai. koh 'amar ihoh hinaton tinaten ha'ir hazot beyad khel melekh babel ulekhadah. vayomeru hasarim 'el hamelekh yumat na 'et ha'ish hazeh ki 'al ken hu merapei 'et yedei 'anshei hamilkhamah hanish'arim ba'ir hazot ve'et yedei khal ha'am ledaber 'aleihem kadebarim ha'eleh ki ha'ish hazeh 'einenu doresh leshalom la'am hazeh ki 'im lera'ah. vayomer hamelekh zidqiyahu hineh hu beyedkhem ki 'en hamelekh yukhal 'etkhem dabar. vayiqkhu 'et yirmeyahu vayashlikhu 'oto 'el habor malkiyahu ben hamelekh 'asher bakhazar hamatarah vayshalekhu 'et yirmeyahu bakhabalim ubabor 'en mayim ki 'im tit vayitba' yirmeyahu batit. vayishma' 'ebed melekh hakushi 'ish saris vehu bebet hamelekh ki natenu 'et yirmeyahu 'el habor vehamelekh yosheb besha'ar binyamin. vayeizei 'ebed melekh mibet hamelekh vaydaber 'el hamelekh leimor. 'adoni hamelekh heirei'u ha'anashim ha'eleh 'et kal 'asher 'asu leyirmeyahu hanabi 'et 'asher hishlikhu 'el habor vayamat takhtav mipenei hara'ab ki 'en halekhem 'od ba'ir. vayzaveh hamelekh 'et 'ebed melekh hakushi leimor qakh beyadekha mizeh sheloshim 'anashim veha'alita 'et yirmeyahu hanabi min habor beterem yamut. vayiqakh 'ebed melekh 'et ha'anashim beyado vayabo bet hamelekh 'el takhat ha'ozar vayiqakh misham beloyei hasekhabot sekhabot ubeloyei melakhim vayshalekhem 'el yirmeyahu 'el habor bakhabalim. vayomer 'ebed melekh hakushi 'el yirmeyahu sim na belo'ei hasekhabot vehamelakhim takhat 'azilot yadekha mitakhat lakhabalim vaya'as yirmeyahu ken. vayimshekhu 'et yirmeyahu bakhabalim vaya'alu 'oto min habor vayeisheb yirmeyahu bakhazar hamatarah. vayishlakh hamelekh zidqiyahu vayiqakh 'et yirmeyahu hanabi 'eilav 'el mabo hashelishi 'asher bebet ihoh vayomer hamelekh 'el yirmeyahu sho'el 'ani 'otekha dabar 'al tekhakhed mimeni dabar. vayomer yirmeyahu 'el zidqiyahu ki 'agid lekha halo hamet temiteini vekhi 'i'azekha lo tishma' 'eilai. vayishaba' hamelekh zidqiyahu 'el yirmeyahu baseiter leimor khai ihoh 'et 'asher 'asah lanu 'et hanefesh hazot 'im 'amitekha ve'im 'etenkha beyad ha'anashim ha'eleh 'asher mebaqshim 'et nafshekha. vayomer yirmeyahu 'el zidqiyahu koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el 'im yazo teizei 'el sarei melekh babel vekhayetah nafshekha veha'ir hazot lo tisaref ba'esh vekhayitah 'atah ubeitekha. ve'im lo teizei 'el sarei melekh babel venitenah ha'ir hazot beyad hakasdim userafuha ba'esh ve'atah lo timalet miyadam. vayomer hamelekh zidqiyahu 'el yirmeyahu 'ani do'eg 'et hayehudim 'asher nafelu 'el hakasdim pen yitenu 'oti beyadam vehit'alelu bi. vayomer yirmeyahu lo yiteinu shema' na beqol ihoh la'asher 'ani dober 'eilekha veyitab lekha utekhi nafshekha. ve'im ma'en 'atah lazet zeh hadabar 'asher hir'ani ihoh. vehineh khal hanashim 'asher nish'aru bebet melekh yehudah muza'ot 'el sarei melekh babel vehenah 'omerot hisitukha veyakhelu lekha 'anshei shelomekha hatebe'u baboz raglekha nasogu 'akhor. ve'et kal nashekha ve'et banekha mozi'im 'el hakasdim ve'atah lo timalet miyadam ki beyad melekh babel titafes ve'et ha'ir hazot tisrof ba'esh. vayomer zidqiyahu 'el yirmeyahu 'ish 'al yeida' badebarim ha'eleh velo tamut. vekhi yishme'u hasarim ki dibarti 'itakh uba'u 'eilekha ve'ameru 'eilekha hagidah na lanu mah dibarta 'el hamelekh 'al tekhakhed mimenu velo nemitekha umah diber 'eilekha hamelekh. ve'amarta 'aleihem mapil 'ani tekhinati lifnei hamelekh lebilti hashibeini bet yehonatan lamut sham. vayabo'u khal hasarim 'el yirmeyahu vayish'alu 'oto vayaged lahem kekhal hadebarim ha'eleh 'asher zivah hamelekh vayakharishu mimenu ki lo nishma' hadabar. vayeisheb yirmeyahu bakhazar hamatarah 'ad yom 'asher nilkedah yerushalim vehayah ka'asher nilkedah yerushalim. bashanah hateshi'it lezidqiyahu melekh yehudah bakhodesh ha'asiri ba nebukhadrezar melekh babel vekhal kheilo 'el yerushalim vayazuru 'aleha. be'ashtei 'esreh shanah lezidqiyahu bakhodesh harebi'i betish'ah lakhodesh habeqe'ah ha'ir. vayabo'u kol sarei melekh babel vayeishebu besha'ar hatavekh neiregal sar 'ezer samgar nebu sar sekhim rab saris neiregal sar 'ezer rab mag vekhal she'eirit sarei melekh babel. vayhi ka'asher ra'am zidqiyahu melekh yehudah vekhol 'anshei hamilkhamah vayibrekhu vayeize'u laylah min ha'ir derekh gan hamelekh besha'ar ben hakhomotayim vayeizei derekh ha'arabah. vayirdefu khel kasdim 'akhareihem vayasigu 'et zidqiyahu be'arbot yereikho vayiqkhu 'oto vaya'aluhu 'el nebukhadrezar melekh babel riblatah be'erez khamat vaydaber 'ito mishpatim. vayishkhat melekh babel 'et benei zidqiyahu beriblah le'einav ve'et kal khorei yehudah shakhat melekh babel. ve'et 'einei zidqiyahu 'iver vaya'asreihu bankhushtayim labi 'oto babelah. ve'et bet hamelekh ve'et bet ha'am sarefu hakasdim ba'esh ve'et khomot yerushalim natazu. ve'et yeter ha'am hanish'arim ba'ir ve'et hanofelim 'asher nafelu 'alav ve'et yeter ha'am hanish'arim heglah nebuzar 'adan rab tabakhim babel. umin ha'am hadalim 'asher 'en lahem me'umah hish'ir nebuzar'adan rab tabakhim be'erez yehudah vayiten lahem keramim vigeibim bayom hahu. vayzav nebukhadrezar melekh babel 'al yirmeyahu beyad nebuzar'adan rab tabakhim leimor. qakhenu ve'einekha sim 'alav ve'al ta'as lo me'umah ra' ki 'im ka'asher yedaber 'eilekha ken 'aseh 'imo. vayishlakh nebuzar'adan rab tabakhim unebushazban rab saris veneiregal sar 'ezer rab mag vekhol rabei melekh babel. vayishlekhu vayiqkhu 'et yirmeyahu meikhazar hamatarah vayitenu 'oto 'el gedalyahu ben 'akhiqam ben shafan lehozi'eihu 'el habayit vayeisheb betokh ha'am. ve'el yirmeyahu hayah debar ihoh bihyoto 'azur bakhazar hamatarah leimor. halokh ve'amarta le'ebed melekh hakushi leimor koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el hini meibi meibi 'et debarai 'el ha'ir hazot lera'ah velo letobah vehayu lefanekha bayom hahu. vehizaltikha bayom hahu ne'um ihoh velo tinaten beyad ha'anashim 'asher 'atah yagor mipeneihem. ki malet 'amaletkha ubakhereb lo tipol vehayetah lekha nafshekha leshalal ki batakhta bi ne'um ihoh. hadabar 'asher hayah 'el yirmeyahu mei'et ihoh 'akhar shalakh 'oto nebuzar'adan rab tabakhim min haramah beqakhto 'oto vehu 'asur baziqim betokh kal galut yerushalim vihudah hamuglim babelah. vayiqakh rab tabakhim leyirmeyahu vayomer 'eilav ihoh 'elohekha diber 'et hara'ah hazot 'el hamaqom hazeh. vayabei vaya'as ihoh ka'asher diber ki khatatem ihoh velo shema'tem beqolo vehayah lakhem dabar hadabar hazeh. ve'atah hineh fitakhtikha hayom min haziqim 'asher 'al yadekha 'im tob be'einekha labo 'iti babel bo ve'asim 'et 'eini 'alekha ve'im ra' be'einekha labo 'iti babel khadal re'eh kal ha'arez lefanekha 'el tob ve'el hayashar be'einekha lalekhet shamah lekh. ve'odenu lo yashub veshubah 'el gedalyah ben 'akhiqam ben shafan 'asher hifqid melekh babel be'arei yehudah vesheb 'ito betokh ha'am 'o 'el kal hayashar be'einekha lalekhet lekh vayiten lo rab tabakhim 'arukhah umas'et vayshalekheihu. vayabo yirmeyahu 'el gedalyah ben 'akhiqam hamizpatah vayeisheb 'ito betokh ha'am hanish'arim ba'arez. vayishme'u khal sarei hakhayalim 'asher basadeh hemah ve'ansheihem ki hifqid melekh babel 'et gedalyahu ben 'akhiqam ba'arez vekhi hifqid 'ito 'anashim venashim vataf umidalat ha'arez mei'asher lo hagelu babelah. vayabo'u 'el gedalyah hamizpatah veyishma'el ben netanyahu veyokhanan veyonatan benei qareiakh userayah ben tankhumet ubenei 'ofai 'eifai hanetofati vizanyahu ben hama'akhati hemah ve'ansheihem. vayishaba' lahem gedalyahu ben 'akhiqam ben shafan ule'ansheihem leimor 'al tire'u mei'abod hakasdim shebu ba'arez ve'ibdu 'et melekh babel veyitab lakhem. va'ani hini yosheb bamizpah la'amod lifnei hakasdim 'asher yabo'u 'eileinu ve'atem 'isfu yayin veqayiz veshemen vesimu bikhleikhem ushebu be'areikhem 'asher tefastem. vegam kal hayehudim 'asher bemo'ab ubibnei 'amon ube'edom va'asher bekhal ha'arazot shame'u ki natan melekh babel she'eirit lihudah vekhi hifqid 'aleihem 'et gedalyahu ben 'akhiqam ben shafan. vayashubu khal hayehudim mikal hameqomot 'asher nidekhu sham vayabo'u 'erez yehudah 'el gedalyahu hamizpatah vaya'asfu yayin vaqayiz harbeh me'od. veyokhanan ben qareiakh vekhal sarei hakhayalim 'asher basadeh ba'u 'el gedalyahu hamizpatah. vayomeru 'eilav hayadoa' teida' ki ba'alis melekh benei 'amon shalakh 'et yishma'el ben netanyah lehakotekha nafesh velo he'emin lahem gedalyahu ben 'akhiqam. veyokhanan ben qareiakh 'amar 'el gedalyahu baseiter bamizpah leimor 'eilekhah na ve'akeh 'et yishma'el ben netanyah ve'ish lo yeida' lamah yakekah nefesh venafozu kal yehudah haniqbazim 'eilekha ve'abedah she'eirit yehudah. vayomer gedalyahu ben 'akhiqam 'el yokhanan ben qareiakh 'al ta'as ta'aseh 'et hadabar hazeh ki sheqer 'atah dober 'el yishma'el. vayhi bakhodesh hashebi'i ba yishma'el ben netanyah ben 'elishama' mizera' hamelukhah verabei hamelekh va'asarah 'anashim 'ito 'el gedalyahu ben 'akhiqam hamizpatah vayokhelu sham lekhem yakhdav bamizpah. vayaqam yishma'el ben netanyah va'aseret ha'anashim 'asher hayu 'ito vayaku 'et gedalyahu ben 'akhiqam ben shafan bakhereb vayamet 'oto 'asher hifqid melekh babel ba'arez. ve'et kal hayehudim 'asher hayu 'ito 'et gedalyahu bamizpah ve'et hakasdim 'asher nimze'u sham 'et 'anshei hamilkhamah hikah yishma'el. vayhi bayom hasheini lehamit 'et gedalyahu ve'ish lo yada'. vayabo'u 'anashim mishekhem mishilo umishomeron shemonim 'ish megulekhei zaqan uqeru'ei begadim umitgodedim uminkhah ulebonah beyadam lehabi bet ihoh. vayeizei yishma'el ben netanyah liqratam min hamizpah holekh halokh ubokheh vayhi kifgosh 'otam vayomer 'aleihem bo'u 'el gedalyahu ben 'akhiqam. vayhi kebo'am 'el tokh ha'ir vayishkhatem yishma'el ben netanyah 'el tokh habor hu veha'anashim 'asher 'ito. va'asarah 'anashim nimze'u bam vayomeru 'el yishma'el 'al temiteinu ki yesh lanu matmonim basadeh khitim use'orim veshemen udebash vayekhdal velo hemitam betokh 'akheihem. vehabor 'asher hishlikh sham yishma'el 'et kal pigrei ha'anashim 'asher hikah beyad gedalyahu hu 'asher 'asah hamelekh 'asa mipenei ba'sha melekh yisra'el 'oto milei yishma'el ben netanyahu khalalim. vayishb yishma'el 'et kal she'eirit ha'am 'asher bamizpah 'et benot hamelekh ve'et kal ha'am hanish'arim bamizpah 'asher hifqid nebuzar'adan rab tabakhim 'et gedalyahu ben 'akhiqam vayishbem yishma'el ben netanyah vayeilekh la'abor 'el benei 'amon. vayishma' yokhanan ben qareiakh vekhal sarei hakhayalim 'asher 'ito 'et kal hara'ah 'asher 'asah yishma'el ben netanyah. vayiqkhu 'et kal ha'anashim vayeilekhu lehilakhem 'im yishma'el ben netanyah vayimze'u 'oto 'el mayim rabim 'asher begib'on. vayhi kir'ot kal ha'am 'asher 'et yishma'el 'et yokhanan ben qareiakh ve'et kal sarei hakhayalim 'asher 'ito vayismakhu. vayasobu kal ha'am 'asher shabah yishma'el min hamizpah vayashubu vayeilekhu 'el yokhanan ben qareiakh. veyishma'el ben netanyah nimlat bishmonah 'anashim mipenei yokhanan vayeilekh 'el benei 'amon. vayiqakh yokhanan ben qareiakh vekhal sarei hakhayalim 'asher 'ito 'et kal she'eirit ha'am 'asher heishib mei'et yishma'el ben netanyah min hamizpah 'akhar hikah 'et gedalyah ben 'akhiqam gebarim 'anshei hamilkhamah venashim vetaf vesarisim 'asher heishib migib'on. vayeilekhu vayeishebu begeirut khemohem kimham 'asher 'eizel bet lakhem lalekhet labo mizrayim. mipenei hakasdim ki yare'u mipeneihem ki hikah yishma'el ben netanyah 'et gedalyahu ben 'akhiqam 'asher hifqid melekh babel ba'arez. vayigeshu kal sarei hakhayalim veyokhanan ben qareiakh vizanyah ben hosha'yah vekhal ha'am miqaton ve'ad gadol. vayomeru 'el yirmeyahu hanabi tipal na tekhinateinu lefanekha vehitpalel ba'adeinu 'el ihoh 'elohekha be'ad kal hashe'eirit hazot ki nish'arnu me'at meiharbeh ka'asher 'einekha ro'ot 'otanu. veyaged lanu ihoh 'elohekha 'et haderekh 'asher neilekh bah ve'et hadabar 'asher na'aseh. vayomer 'aleihem yirmeyahu hanabi shama'ti hini mitpalel 'el ihoh 'eloheikhem kedibreikhem vehayah kal hadabar 'asher ya'aneh ihoh 'etkhem 'agid lakhem lo 'emna' mikem dabar. vehemah 'ameru 'el yirmeyahu yehi ihoh banu le'ed 'emet vene'eman 'im lo kekhal hadabar 'asher yishlakhakha ihoh 'elohekha 'eileinu ken na'aseh. 'im tob ve'im ra' beqol ihoh 'eloheinu 'asher 'anu 'anakhnu sholekhim 'otekha 'eilav nishma' lema'an 'asher yitab lanu ki nishma' beqol ihoh 'eloheinu. vayhi miqez 'aseret yamim vayhi debar ihoh 'el yirmeyahu. vayiqra 'el yokhanan ben qareiakh ve'el kal sarei hakhayalim 'asher 'ito ulekhal ha'am lemiqaton ve'ad gadol. vayomer 'aleihem koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el 'asher shelakhtem 'oti 'eilav lehapil tekhinatkhem lefanav. 'im shob teishebu ba'arez hazot ubaniti 'etkhem velo 'eheros venata'ti 'etkhem velo 'etosh ki nikhamti 'el hara'ah 'asher 'asiti lakhem. 'al tire'u mipenei melekh babel 'asher 'atem yerei'im mipanav 'al tire'u mimenu ne'um ihoh ki 'itekhem 'ani lehoshia' 'etkhem ulehazil 'etkhem miyado. ve'eten lakhem rakhamim verikham 'etkhem veheishib 'etkhem 'el 'admatkhem. ve'im 'omerim 'atem lo neisheb ba'arez hazot lebilti shemoa' beqol ihoh 'eloheikhem. leimor lo ki 'erez mizrayim nabo 'asher lo nir'eh milkhamah veqol shofar lo nishma' velalekhem lo nir'ab vesham neisheb. ve'atah lakhen shim'u debar ihoh she'eirit yehudah koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el 'im 'atem som tesimun peneikhem labo mizrayim ubatem lagur sham. vehayetah hakhereb 'asher 'atem yerei'im mimenah sham tasig 'etkhem be'erez mizrayim vehara'ab 'asher 'atem do'agim mimenu sham yidbaq 'akhareikhem mizrayim vesham tamutu. veyihyu khal ha'anashim 'asher samu 'et peneihem labo mizrayim lagur sham yamutu bakhereb bara'ab ubadaber velo yihyeh lahem sarid ufalit mipenei hara'ah 'asher 'ani meibi 'aleihem. ki khoh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el ka'asher nitakh 'api vakhamati 'al yoshebei yerushalim ken titakh khamati 'aleikhem bebo'akhem mizrayim vihyitem le'alah uleshamah veliqlalah ulekherpah velo tir'u 'od 'et hamaqom hazeh. diber ihoh 'aleikhem she'eirit yehudah 'al tabo'u mizrayim yadoa' teide'u ki ha'idoti bakhem hayom. ki hit'eitem hit'eitem benafshoteikhem ki 'atem shelakhtem 'oti 'el ihoh 'eloheikhem leimor hitpalel ba'adeinu 'el ihoh 'eloheinu ukhekhol 'asher yomar ihoh 'eloheinu ken haged lanu ve'asinu. va'agid lakhem hayom velo shema'tem beqol ihoh 'eloheikhem ulekhol 'asher shelakhani 'aleikhem. ve'atah yadoa' teide'u ki bakhereb bara'ab ubadeber tamutu bamaqom 'asher khafaztem labo lagur sham. vayhi kekhalot yirmeyahu ledaber 'el kal ha'am 'et kal dibrei ihoh 'eloheihem 'asher shelakho ihoh 'eloheihem 'aleihem 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh. vayomer 'azaryah ben hosha'yah veyokhanan ben qareiakh vekhal ha'anashim hazeidim 'omerim 'el yirmeyahu qer 'atah medaber lo shelakhakha ihoh 'eloheinu leimor lo tabo'u mizrayim lagur sham. ki barukh ben neiriyah masit 'otekha banu lema'an tet 'otanu beyad hakasdim lehamit 'otanu ulehaglot 'otanu babel. velo shama' yokhanan ben qareiakh vekhal sarei hakhayalim vekhal ha'am beqol ihoh lashebet be'erez yehudah. vayiqakh yokhanan ben qareiakh vekhal sarei hakhayalim 'et kal she'eirit yehudah 'asher shabu mikal hagoyim 'asher nidekhu sham lagur be'erez yehudah. 'et hagebarim ve'et hanashim ve'et hataf ve'et benot hamelekh ve'et kal hanefesh 'asher hiniakh nebuzar'adan rab tabakhim 'et gedalyahu ben 'akhiqam ben shafan ve'et yirmeyahu hanabi ve'et barukh ben neiriyahu. vayabo'u 'erez mizrayim ki lo shame'u beqol ihoh vayabo'u 'ad takhpankhes. vayhi debar ihoh 'el yirmeyahu betakhpankhes leimor. qakh beyadekha 'abanim gedolot utemantam bamelet bamalben 'asher befetakh bet par'oh betakhpankhes le'einei 'anashim yehudim. ve'amarta 'aleihem koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el hini sholeiakh velaqakhti 'et nebukhadrezar melekh babel 'abdi vesamti khis'o mima'al la'abanim ha'eleh 'asher tamaneti venatah 'et shafruro shafriro 'aleihem. uba'ah uba vehikah 'et 'erez mizrayim 'asher lamavet lamavet va'asher lashebi lashebi va'asher lakhereb lekhareb. vehizati 'esh bebatei 'elohei mizrayim userafam veshabam ve'atah 'et 'erez mizrayim ka'asher ya'teh haro'eh 'et bigdo veyaza misham beshalom. veshibar 'et mazebot bet shemesh 'asher be'erez mizrayim ve'et batei 'elohei mizrayim yisrof ba'esh. hadabar 'asher hayah 'el yirmeyahu 'el kal hayehudim hayoshebim be'erez mizrayim hayoshebim bemigdol ubetakhpankhes ubenof ube'erez patros leimor. koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el 'atem re'item 'et kal hara'ah 'asher heibeiti 'al yerushalim ve'al kal 'arei yehudah vehinam kharebah hayom hazeh ve'en bahem yosheb. mipenei ra'atam 'asher 'asu lehakh'iseini lalekhet leqater la'abod leilohim 'akheirim 'asher lo yeda'um hemah 'atem va'aboteikhem. va'eshlakh 'aleikhem 'et kal 'abadai hanebi'im hashkem veshaloakh leimor 'al na ta'asu 'et debar hato'eibah hazot 'asher saneiti. velo shame'u velo hitu 'et 'azenam lashub meira'atam lebilti qater leilohim 'akheirim. vatitakh khamati ve'api vatib'ar be'arei yehudah ubekhuzot yerushalim vatihyenah lekharebah lishmamah kayom hazeh. ve'atah koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el lamah 'atem 'osim ra'ah gedolah 'el nafshoteikhem lehakhrit lakhem 'ish ve'ishah 'olel veyoneq mitokh yehudah lebilti hotir lakhem she'eirit. lehakh'iseini bema'asei yedeikhem leqater leilohim 'akheirim be'erez mizrayim 'asher 'atem ba'im lagur sham lema'an hakhrit lakhem ulema'an heyotkhem liqlalah ulekherpah bekhol goyei ha'arez. hashkhakhtem 'et ra'ot 'aboteikhem ve'et ra'ot malkhei yehudah ve'et ra'ot nashav ve'et ra'oteikhem ve'et ra'ot nesheikhem 'asher 'asu be'erez yehudah ubekhuzot yerushalim. lo duke'u 'ad hayom hazeh velo yare'u velo halekhu betorati ubekhuqotai 'asher natati lifneikhem velifnei 'aboteikhem. lakhen koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el hini sam panai bakhem lera'ah ulehakhrit 'et kal yehudah. velaqakhti 'et she'eirit yehudah 'asher samu feneihem labo 'erez mizrayim lagur sham vetamu khol be'erez mizrayim yipolu bakhereb bara'ab yitamu miqaton ve'ad gadol bakhereb ubara'ab yamutu vehayu le'alah leshamah veliqlalah ulekherpah. ufaqadti 'al hayoshebim be'erez mizrayim ka'asher paqadti 'al yerushalim bakhereb bara'ab ubadaber. velo yihyeh palit vesarid lish'eirit yehudah haba'im lagur sham be'erez mizrayim velashub 'erez yehudah 'asher hemah menase'im 'et nafsham lashub lashebet sham ki lo yashubu ki 'im peleitim. vaya'anu 'et yirmeyahu kal ha'anashim hayode'im ki meqaterot nesheihem leilohim 'akheirim vekhal hanashim ha'omedot qahal gadol vekhal ha'am hayoshebim be'erez mizrayim befatros leimor. hadabar 'asher dibarta 'eileinu beshem ihoh 'einenu shome'im 'eilekha. ki 'asoh na'aseh 'et kal hadabar 'asher yaza mipinu leqater limlekhet hashamayim vehasekh lah nesakhim ka'asher 'asinu 'anakhnu va'aboteinu melakheinu vesareinu be'arei yehudah ubekhuzot yerushalim vanisba' lekhem vanihyeh tobim vera'ah lo ra'inu. umin 'az khadalnu leqater limlekhet hashamayim vehasekh lah nesakhim khasarnu khol ubakhereb ubara'ab tamenu. vekhi 'anakhnu meqaterim limlekhet hashamayim ulehasekh lah nesakhim hamibal'adei 'anasheinu 'asinu lah kavanim leha'azibah vehasekh lah nesakhim. vayomer yirmeyahu 'el kal ha'am 'al hagebarim ve'al hanashim ve'al kal ha'am ha'onim 'oto dabar leimor. halo 'et haqiter 'asher qitartem be'arei yehudah ubekhuzot yerushalim 'atem va'aboteikhem malkheikhem vesareikhem ve'am ha'arez 'otam zakhar ihoh vata'aleh 'al libo. velo yukhal ihoh 'od laset mipenei roa' ma'aleikhem mipenei hato'eibot 'asher 'asitem vatehi 'arzekhem lekharebah uleshamah veliqlalah mei'en yosheb kehayom hazeh. mipenei 'asher qitartem va'asher khatatem ihoh velo shema'tem beqol ihoh ubetorato ubekhuqotav ube'eidevotav lo halakhtem 'al ken qarat 'etkhem hara'ah hazot kayom hazeh. vayomer yirmeyahu 'el kal ha'am ve'el kal hanashim shim'u debar ihoh kal yehudah 'asher be'erez mizrayim. koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el leimor 'atem unesheikhem vatedabeirenah befikhem ubideikhem mileitem leimor 'asoh na'aseh 'et nedareinu 'asher nadarnu leqater limlekhet hashamayim ulehasekh lah nesakhim haqem taqimenah 'et nidreikhem ve'asoh ta'asenah 'et nidreikhem. lakhen shim'u debar ihoh kal yehudah hayoshebim be'erez mizrayim hini nishba'ti bishmi hagadol 'amar ihoh 'im yihyeh 'od shemi niqra befi kal 'ish yehudah 'omer khai 'adonai ihoh bekhal 'erez mizrayim. hini shoqed 'aleihem lera'ah velo letobah vetamu khal 'ish yehudah 'asher be'erez mizrayim bakhereb ubara'ab 'ad kelotam. ufelitei khereb yeshubun min 'erez mizrayim 'erez yehudah metei mispar veyade'u kal she'eirit yehudah haba'im le'erez mizrayim lagur sham debar mi yaqum mimeni umeihem. vezot lakhem ha'ot ne'um ihoh ki foqed 'ani 'aleikhem bamaqom hazeh lema'an teide'u ki qom yaqumu debarai 'aleikhem lera'ah. koh 'amar ihoh hini noten 'et par'oh khafera' melekh mizrayim beyad 'oyebav ubeyad mebaqshei nafsho ka'asher natati 'et zidqiyahu melekh yehudah beyad nebukhadrezar melekh babel 'oyebo umebaqesh nafsho. hadabar 'asher diber yirmeyahu hanabi 'el barukh ben neiriyah bekhatebo 'et hadebarim ha'eleh 'al seifer mipi yirmeyahu bashanah harebi'it lihoyaqim ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah leimor. koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el 'alekha barukh. 'amarta 'o na li ki yasaf ihoh yagon 'al makh'obi yaga'ti be'ankhati umenukhah lo mazati. koh tomar 'eilav koh 'amar ihoh hineh 'asher baniti 'ani hores ve'et 'asher nata'ti 'ani notesh ve'et kal ha'arez hi. ve'atah tebaqesh lekha gedolot 'al tebaqesh ki hini meibi ra'ah 'al kal basar ne'um ihoh venatati lekha 'et nafshekha leshalal 'al kal hameqomot 'asher teilekh sham. 'asher hayah debar ihoh 'el yirmeyahu hanabi 'al hagoyim. lemizrayim 'al khel par'oh nekho melekh mizrayim 'asher hayah 'al nehar perat bekharkemish 'asher hikah nebukhadrezar melekh babel bishnat harebi'it lihoyaqim ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah. 'irkhu magen vezinah ugeshu lamilkhamah. 'isru hasusim va'alu haparashim vehityazebu bekhoba'im mirqu haremakhim libshu hasiryonot. madua' ra'iti hemah khatim nesogim 'akhor vegiboreihem yukatu umanos nasu velo hifnu magor misabib ne'um ihoh. 'al yanus haqal ve'al yimalet hagibor zafonah 'al yad nehar perat kashelu venafalu. mi zeh kai'or ya'aleh kaneharot yitga'ashu meimav. mizrayim kai'or ya'aleh vekhaneharot yitgo'ashu mayim vayomer 'a'aleh 'akhaseh 'erez 'obidah 'ir veyoshebei bah. 'alu hasusim vehitholelu harekheb veyeize'u hagiborim kush ufut tofesei magen veludim tofesei dorekhei qashet. vehayom hahu ladonai ihoh zeba'ot yom neqamah lehinaqem mizarav ve'akhelah khereb vesabe'ah veravetah midamam ki zebakh ladonai ihoh zeba'ot be'erez zafon 'el nehar perat. 'ali gil'ad uqekhi zori betulat bat mizrayim lashav hirbeiti hirbet refu'ot te'alah 'en lakh. shame'u goyim qelonekh vezivkhatekh male'ah ha'arez ki gibor begibor kashalu yakhdav nafelu sheneihem. hadabar 'asher diber ihoh 'el yirmeyahu hanabi labo nebukhadrezar melekh babel lehakot 'et 'erez mizrayim. hagidu bemizrayim vehashmi'u bemigdol vehashmi'u benof ubetakhpankhes 'imru hityazeb vehakhen lakh ki 'akhelah khereb sebibekha. madua' niskhaf 'abirekha lo 'amad ki ihoh hadafo. hirbah koshel gam nafal 'ish 'el rei'eihu vayomeru qumah venashubah 'el 'ameinu ve'el 'erez moladteinu mipenei khereb hayonah. qare'u sham par'oh melekh mizrayim sha'on he'ebir hamo'ed. khai 'ani ne'um hamelekh ihoh zeba'ot shemo ki ketabor beharim ukhekharmel bayam yabo. kelei golah 'asi lakh yoshebet bat mizrayim ki nof leshamah tihyeh venizetah mei'en yosheb. 'eglah yefeh fiyah mizrayim qerez mizafon ba ba. gam sekhireha beqirbah ke'eglei marbeq ki gam hemah hifnu nasu yakhdav lo 'amadu ki yom 'eidam ba 'aleihem 'et pequdatam. qolah kanakhash yeilekh ki bekhayil yeileikhu ubeqardumot ba'u lah kekhotebei 'eizim. karetu ya'rah ne'um ihoh ki lo yeikhaqer ki rabu mei'arbeh ve'en lahem mispar. hobishah bat mizrayim nitenah beyad 'am zafon. 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el hini foqed 'el 'amon mino ve'al par'oh ve'al mizrayim ve'al 'eloheha ve'al melakheha ve'al par'oh ve'al habotekhim bo. unetatim beyad mebaqshei nafsham ubeyad nebukhadrezar melekh babel ubeyad 'abadav ve'akharei khen tishkon kimei qedem ne'um ihoh. ve'atah 'al tira 'abdi ya'aqob ve'al teikhat yisra'el ki hini moshi'akha meirakhoq ve'et zar'akha mei'erez shibyam veshab ya'aqob veshaqat vesha'anan ve'en makharid. 'atah 'al tira 'abdi ya'aqob ne'um ihoh ki 'itekha 'ani ki 'e'eseh khalah bekhal hagoyim 'asher hidakhtikha shamah ve'otekha lo 'e'eseh khalah veyisartikha lamishpat venaqeh lo 'anaqeka. 'asher hayah debar ihoh 'el yirmeyahu hanabi 'el pelishtim beterem yakeh far'oh 'et 'azah. koh 'amar ihoh hineh mayim 'olim mizafon vehayu lenakhal shotef veyishtefu 'erez umelo'ah 'ir veyoshebei bah veza'aqu ha'adam veheilil kol yosheb ha'arez. miqol sha'atat parsot 'abirav meira'ash lerikhbo hamon galgilav lo hifnu 'abot 'el banim meirifyon yadayim. 'al hayom haba lishdod 'et kal pelishtim lehakhrit lezor ulezidon kol sarid 'ozer ki shoded ihoh 'et pelishtim she'eirit 'i khaftor. ba'ah qarekhah 'el 'azah nidmetah 'ashqelon she'eirit 'imqam 'ad matai titgodadi. ho khereb ihoh 'ad 'anah lo tishqoti hei'asefi 'al ta'rekh heirage'i vadomi. 'ekh tishqoti ihoh zivah lah 'el 'ashqelon ve'el khof hayam sham ye'adah. lemo'ab koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el ho 'el nebo ki shudadah hobishah nilkedah qiryatayim hobishah hamisgab vakhatah. 'en 'od tehilat mo'ab bekheshbon khashebu 'aleha ra'ah lekhu venakhritenah migo gam madmen tidomi 'akharayikh teilekh khareb. qol ze'aqah meikhoronayim shod vasheber gadol. nishberah mo'ab hishmi'u ze'aqah ze'oreha ze'ireha. ki ma'aleh halukhot halukhit bibkhi ya'aleh bekhi ki bemorad khoronayim zarei za'aqat sheber shamei'u. nusu maletu nafshekhem vetihyenah ka'aro'er bamidbar. ki ya'an bitkhekh bema'asayikh ube'ozrotayikh gam 'at tilakheidi veyaza khemish khemosh bagolah kohanav vesarav yakhad yakhdav. veyabo shoded 'el kal 'ir ve'ir lo timalet ve'abad ha'eimeq venishmad hamishor 'asher 'amar ihoh. tenu ziz lemo'ab ki nazo teizei ve'areha leshamah tihyenah mei'en yosheb bahen. 'arur 'oseh melekhet ihoh remiyah ve'arur moneia' kharbo midam. sha'anan mo'ab mine'urav veshoqet hu 'el shemarav velo huraq mikeli 'el keli ubagolah lo halakh 'al ken 'amad ta'mo bo vereikho lo namar. lakhen hineh yamim ba'im ne'um ihoh veshilakhti lo zo'im vezei'uhu vekheilav yariqu venibleihem yenapeizu. ubosh mo'ab mikemosh ka'asher boshu bet yisra'el mibet 'el mibtekham. 'ekh tomeru giborim 'anakhenu ve'anshei khayil lamilkhamah. shudad mo'ab ve'areha 'alah umibkhar bakhurav yaredu latabakh ne'um hamelekh ihoh zeba'ot shemo. qarob 'ed mo'ab labo vera'ato miharah me'od. nudu lo kal sebibav vekhol yode'ei shemo 'imru 'eikhah nishbar mateh 'oz maqel tif'arah. redi mikabod yoshebe ushebi bazama yoshebet bat dibon ki shoded mo'ab 'alah bakh shikhet mibzarayikh. 'el derekh 'imdi vezapi yoshebet 'aro'er sha'ali nas venimlatah 'imri mah nihyatah. hobish mo'ab ki khatah heilili heililu uze'aqi uze'aqu hagidu be'arnon ki shudad mo'ab. umishpat ba 'el 'erez hamishor 'el kholon ve'el yahzah ve'al mofa'at meifa'at. ve'al dibon ve'al nebo ve'al bet diblatayim. ve'al qiryatayim ve'al bet gamul ve'al bet me'on. ve'al qeriyot ve'al bazrah ve'al kal 'arei 'erez mo'ab harekhoqot vehaqerobot. nigde'ah qeren mo'ab uzero'o nishbarah ne'um ihoh. hashkiruhu ki 'al ihoh higdil vesafaq mo'ab beqi'o vehayah liskhoq gam hu. ve'im lo hasekhoq hayah lekha yisra'el 'im beganabim nimza'ah nimza ki midei debarekha bo titnodad. 'izbu 'arim veshikhnu basela' yoshebei mo'ab vihyu kheyonah teqanen be'ebrei fi fakhat. shama'nu ge'on mo'ab gei'eh me'od gabeho uge'ono vega'avato verum libo. 'ani yada'ti ne'um ihoh 'ebrato velo khen badav lo khen 'asu. 'al ken 'al mo'ab 'ayeilil ulemo'ab kuloh 'ez'aq 'el 'anshei qir kheres yehgeh. mibekhi ya'zer 'ebkeh lakh hagefen sibmah netishotayikh 'aberu yam 'ad yam ya'zer naga'u 'al qeizekh ve'al bezirekh shoded nafal. vene'esfah simkhah vagil mikarmel umei'erez mo'ab veyayin miqabim hishbati lo yidrokh heidad heidad lo heidad. miza'aqat kheshbon 'ad 'el'aleh 'ad yahaz natenu qolam mizo'ar 'ad khoronayim 'eglat shelishiyah ki gam mei nimrim limshamot yihyu. vehishbati lemo'ab ne'um ihoh ma'aleh bamah umaqtir leilohav. 'al ken libi lemo'ab kakhalilim yehemeh velibi 'el 'anshei qir kheres kakhalilim yehemeh 'al ken yitrat 'asah 'abadu. ki khal rosh qarekhah vekhal zaqan geru'ah 'al kal yadayim gedudot ve'al matenayim saq. 'al kal gagot mo'ab ubirkhoboteha kuloh misped ki shabarti 'et mo'ab kikhli 'en kheifez bo ne'um ihoh. 'ekh khatah heililu 'ekh hifnah 'oref mo'ab bosh vehayah mo'ab liskhoq velimkhitah lekhal sebibav. ki khoh 'amar ihoh hineh khanesher yid'eh ufaras kenafav 'el mo'ab. nilkedah haqeriyot vehamezadot nitpasah vehayah leb giborei mo'ab bayom hahu keleb 'ishah mezeirah. venishmad mo'ab mei'am ki 'al ihoh higdil. pakhad vafakhat vafakh 'alekha yosheb mo'ab ne'um ihoh. hanis hanas mipenei hapakhad yipol 'el hapakhat veha'oleh min hapakhat yilakhed bapakh ki 'abi 'eileha 'el mo'ab shenat pequdatam ne'um ihoh. bezel kheshbon 'amedu mikoakh nasim ki 'esh yaza meikheshbon velehabah miben sikhon vatokhal pe'at mo'ab veqadeqod benei sha'on. 'o lekha mo'ab 'abad 'am kemosh ki luqekhu banekha bashebi ubenotekha bashibyah. veshabti shebut mo'ab be'akharit hayamim ne'um ihoh 'ad henah mishpat mo'ab. libnei 'amon koh 'amar ihoh habanim 'en leyisra'el 'im yoresh 'en lo madua' yarash malkam 'et gad ve'amo be'arav yashab. lakhen hineh yamim ba'im ne'um ihoh vehishma'ti 'el rabat benei 'amon teru'at milkhamah vehayetah letel shemamah ubenoteha ba'esh tizatnah veyarash yisra'el 'et yoreshav 'amar ihoh. heilili kheshbon ki shudedah 'ai ze'aqnah benot rabah khagorenah saqim sefodenah vehitshotatnah bagedeirot ki malkam bagolah yeilekh kohanav vesarav yakhdav. mah tithali ba'amaqim zab 'imqekh habat hashobeibah habotekhah be'ozeroteha mi yabo 'eilai. hini meibi 'alayikh pakhad ne'um 'adonai ihoh zeba'ot mikal sebibayikh venidakhtem 'ish lefanav ve'en meqabez lanoded. ve'akharei khen 'ashib 'et shebut benei 'amon ne'um ihoh. le'edom koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot ha'en 'od khakhmah beteiman 'abedah 'eizah mibanim nisrekhah khakhematam. nusu hafenu he'miqu lashebet yoshebei dedan ki 'ed 'eisav heibeiti 'alav 'et peqadtiv. 'im bozerim ba'u lakh lo yash'iru 'oleilot 'im ganabim balaylah hishkhitu dayam. ki 'ani khasafti 'et 'eisav gileiti 'et mistarav venekhbah lo yukhal shudad zar'o ve'ekhav ushekheinav ve'einenu. 'azebah yetomekha 'ani 'akhayeh ve'almenotekha 'alai tibtakhu. ki khoh 'amar ihoh hineh 'asher 'en mishpatam lishtot hakos shato yishtu ve'atah hu naqoh tinaqeh lo tinaqeh ki shatoh tishteh. ki bi nishba'ti ne'um ihoh ki leshamah lekherpah lekhoreb veliqlalah tihyeh bazerah vekhal 'areha tihyenah lekharebot 'olam. shemu'ah shama'ti mei'et ihoh vezir bagoyim shaluakh hitqabezu ubo'u 'aleha vequmu lamilkhamah. ki hineh qaton netatikha bagoyim bazui ba'adam. tiflaztekha hishi 'otakh zedon libekha shokheni bekhagvei hasela' tofesi merom gib'ah ki tagbiha kanesher qinekha misham 'oridekha ne'um ihoh. vehayetah 'edom leshamah kol 'ober 'aleha yishom veyishroq 'al kal makoteha. kemahpeikhat sedom va'amorah ushekheineha 'amar ihoh lo yeisheb sham 'ish velo yagur bah ben 'adam. hineh ke'aryeh ya'aleh mige'on hayarden 'el neveh 'eitan ki 'argi'ah 'arizenu mei'aleha umi bakhur 'eileha 'efqod ki mi khamoni umi yo'ideni umi zeh ro'eh 'asher ya'amod lefanai. lakhen shim'u 'azat ihoh 'asher ya'az 'el 'edom umakhshebotav 'asher khashab 'el yoshebei teiman 'im lo yiskhabum ze'irei hazon 'im lo yashim 'aleihem neveihem. miqol niflam ra'ashah ha'arez ze'aqah beyam suf nishma' qolah. hineh khanesher ya'aleh veyid'eh veyifros kenafav 'al bazrah vehayah leb giborei 'edom bayom hahu keleb 'ishah mezeirah. ledameseq boshah khamat ve'arpad ki shemu'ah ra'ah shame'u namogu bayam de'agah hashqet lo yukhal. rafetah dameseq hifnetah lanus veretet hekheziqah zarah vakhabalim 'akhazatah kayoleidah. 'ekh lo 'uzebah 'ir tehilah tehilat qiryat mesosi. lakhen yipelu bakhureha birkhoboteha vekhal 'anshei hamilkhamah yidamu bayom hahu ne'um ihoh zeba'ot. vehizati 'esh bekhomat damaseq ve'akhelah 'armenot ben hadad. leqeidar ulemamlekhot khazor 'asher hikah nebukhadrezor nebukhadrezar melekh babel koh 'amar ihoh qumu 'alu 'el qeidar veshadedu 'et benei qedem. 'aholeihem vezonam yiqakhu yeri'oteihem vekhal keleihem ugemaleihem yis'u lahem veqare'u 'aleihem magor misabib. nusu nudu me'od he'miqu lashebet yoshebei khazor ne'um ihoh ki ya'az 'aleikhem nebukhadrezar melekh babel 'eizah vekhashab 'aleihem 'aleikhem makhashabah. qumu 'alu 'el go shelev yosheb labetakh ne'um ihoh lo delatayim velo beriakh lo badad yishkonu. vehayu gemaleihem labaz vahamon miqneihem leshalal vezeiritim lekhal ruakh qezuzei fei'ah umikal 'abarav 'abi 'et 'eidam ne'um ihoh. vehayetah khazor lim'on tanim shemamah 'ad 'olam lo yeisheb sham 'ish velo yagur bah ben 'adam. 'asher hayah debar ihoh 'el yirmeyahu hanabi 'el 'eilam bereishit malkhut zidqiyah melekh yehudah leimor. koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot hini shober 'et qeshet 'eilam reishit geburatam. veheibeiti 'el 'eilam 'arba' rukhot mei'arba' qezot hashamayim vezeiritim lekhol harukhot ha'eleh velo yihyeh hago 'asher lo yabo sham nidekhei 'olam 'eilam. vehakhtati 'et 'eilam lifnei 'oyebeihem velifnei mebaqshei nafsham veheibeiti 'aleihem ra'ah 'et kharon 'api ne'um ihoh veshilakhti 'akhareihem 'et hakhereb 'ad kaloti 'otam. vesamti khis'i be'eilam veha'abadti misham melekh vesarim ne'um ihoh. vehayah be'akharit hayamim 'ashub 'ashib 'et shebit shebut 'eilam ne'um ihoh. hadabar 'asher diber ihoh 'el babel 'el 'erez kasdim beyad yirmeyahu hanabi. hagidu bagoyim vehashmi'u use'u nes hashmi'u 'al tekhakheidu 'imru nilkedah babel hobish bel khat merodakh hobishu 'azabeha khatu giluleha. ki 'alah 'aleha go mizafon hu yashit 'et 'arzah leshamah velo yihyeh yosheb bah mei'adam ve'ad beheimah nadu halakhu. bayamim hahemah uba'et hahi ne'um ihoh yabo'u benei yisra'el hemah ubenei yehudah yakhdav halokh ubakho yeileikhu ve'et ihoh 'eloheihem yebaqeishu. ziyon yish'alu derekh henah feneihem bo'u venilvu 'el ihoh berit 'olam lo tishakheiakh. zon 'obedot hayah hayu 'ami ro'eihem hit'um harim shobeibim shobbum meihar 'el gib'ah halakhu shakhekhu ribzam. kal moz'eihem 'akhalum vezareihem 'ameru lo ne'sham takhat 'asher khate'u ihoh neveh zedeq umiqveh 'aboteihem ihoh. nudu mitokh babel umei'erez kasdim yaze'u zei'u vihyu ke'atudim lifnei zon. ki hineh 'anokhi mei'ir uma'aleh 'al babel qehal goyim gedolim mei'erez zafon ve'arekhu lah misham tilakhed khizav kegibor mashkil lo yashub reiqam. vehayetah khasdim leshalal kal sholeleha yisba'u ne'um ihoh. ki tismekhi tismekhu ki ta'alzi ta'alzu shosei nakhalati ki tafushi tafushu ke'eglah dashah vetizhali vetizhalu ka'abirim. boshah 'imekhem me'od khaferah yoladtekhem hineh 'akharit goyim midbar ziyah va'arabah. miqezef ihoh lo teisheb vehayetah shemamah kulah kol 'ober 'al babel yishom veyishroq 'al kal makoteha. 'irkhu 'al babel sabib kal dorekhei qeshet yedu 'eileha 'al takhmelu 'el khez ki ihoh khata'ah. hari'u 'aleha sabib natenah yadah nafelu 'ashviyoteha 'asheyoteha nehersu khomoteha ki niqmat ihoh hi hinaqemu bah ka'asher 'asetah 'asu lah. kirtu zoreia' mibabel vetofes magal be'et qazir mipenei khereb hayonah 'ish 'el 'amo yifnu ve'ish le'arzo yanusu. seh fezurah yisra'el 'arayot hidikhu harishon 'akhalo melekh 'ashur vezeh ha'akharon 'izemo nebukhadrezar melekh babel. lakhen koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el hini foqed 'el melekh babel ve'el 'arzo ka'asher paqadti 'el melekh 'ashur. veshobabti 'et yisra'el 'el naveihu vera'ah hakarmel vehabashan ubehar 'efrayim vehagil'ad tisba' nafsho. bayamim hahem uba'et hahi ne'um ihoh yebuqash 'et 'avon yisra'el ve'einenu ve'et khatot yehudah velo timazenah ki 'eslakh la'asher 'ash'ir. 'al ha'arez meratayim 'aleh 'aleha ve'el yoshebei peqod kharob vehakharem 'akhareihem ne'um ihoh va'aseh kekhol 'asher zivitikha. qol milkhamah ba'arez vesheber gadol. 'ekh nigda' vayishaber patish kal ha'arez 'ekh hayetah leshamah babel bagoyim. yaqosheti lakh vegam nilkadt babel ve'at lo yada'at nimzet vegam nitpast ki ihoh hitgarit. patakh ihoh 'et 'ozaro vayozei 'et kelei za'mo ki melakhah hi ladonai ihoh zeba'ot be'erez kasdim. bo'u lah miqez pitkhu ma'abuseha saluha khemo 'areimim vehakharimuha 'al tehi lah she'eirit. khirbu kal pareha yeiredu latabakh ho 'aleihem ki ba yomam 'et pequdatam. qol nasim ufeleitim mei'erez babel lehagid beziyon 'et niqmat ihoh 'eloheinu niqmat heikhalo. hashmi'u 'el babel rabim kal dorekhei qeshet khanu 'aleha sabib 'al yehi lah peleitah shalemu lah kefa'olah kekhol 'asher 'asetah 'asu lah ki 'el ihoh zadah 'el qedosh yisra'el. lakhen yipelu bakhureha birkhoboteha vekhal 'anshei milkhamtah yidamu bayom hahu ne'um ihoh. hini 'eilekha zadon ne'um 'adonai ihoh zeba'ot ki ba yomkha 'et peqadtikha. vekhashal zadon venafal ve'en lo meiqim vehizati 'esh be'arav ve'akhelah kal sebibotav. koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'ashuqim benei yisra'el ubenei yehudah yakhdav vekhal shobeihem hekheziqu bam mei'anu shalekham. go'alam khazaq ihoh zeba'ot shemo rib yarib 'et ribam lema'an hirgia' 'et ha'arez vehirgiz leyoshebei babel. khereb 'al kasdim ne'um ihoh ve'el yoshebei babel ve'el sareha ve'el khakhameha. khereb 'el habadim veno'alu khereb 'el giboreha vakhatu. khereb 'el susav ve'el rikhbo ve'el kal ha'ereb 'asher betokhah vehayu lenashim khereb 'el 'ozroteha ubuzazu. khoreb 'el meimeha veyabeishu ki 'erez pesilim hi uba'eimim yitholalu. lakhen yeishebu ziyim 'et 'iyim veyashebu bah benot ya'anah velo teisheb
