'od lanezakh velo tishkon 'ad dor vador. kemahpeikhat 'elohim 'et sedom ve'et 'amorah ve'et shekheineha ne'um ihoh lo yeisheb sham 'ish velo yagur bah ben 'adam. hineh 'am ba mizafon vego gadol umelakhim rabim yei'oru miyarketei 'arez. qeshet vekhidon yakhaziqu 'akhzari hemah velo yerakheimu qolam kayam yehemeh ve'al susim yirkabu 'arukh ke'ish lamilkhamah 'alayikh bat babel. shama' melekh babel 'et shim'am verafu yadav zarah hekheziqathu khil kayoleidah. hineh ke'aryeh ya'aleh mige'on hayarden 'el neveh 'eitan ki 'argi'ah 'aruzem 'arizem mei'aleha umi bakhur 'eileha 'efqod ki mi khamoni umi yo'ideni umi zeh ro'eh 'asher ya'amod lefanai. lakhen shim'u 'azat ihoh 'asher ya'az 'el babel umakhshebotav 'asher khashab 'el 'erez kasdim 'im lo yiskhabum ze'irei hazon 'im lo yashim 'aleihem naveh. miqol nitpesah babel nir'ashah ha'arez uze'aqah bagoyim nishma'. koh 'amar ihoh hini mei'ir 'al babel ve'el yoshebei leb qamai ruakh mashkhit. veshilakhti lebabel zarim vezeiruha viboqequ 'et 'arzah ki hayu 'aleha misabib beyom ra'ah. 'el yidrokh yidrokh hadorekh qashto ve'el yit'al besiryono ve'al takhmelu 'el bakhureha hakharimu kal zeba'ah. venafelu khalalim be'erez kasdim umeduqarim bekhuzoteha. ki lo 'alman yisra'el vihudah mei'elohav ihoh zeba'ot ki 'arzam male'ah 'asham miqedosh yisra'el. nusu mitokh babel umaletu 'ish nafsho 'al tidamu ba'avonah ki 'et neqamah hi ihoh gemul hu meshalem lah. kos zahab babel beyad ihoh meshakeret kal ha'arez miyeinah shatu goyim 'al ken yitholelu goyim. pit'om nafelah babel vatishaber heililu 'aleha qekhu zori lemakh'obah 'ulai teirafei. ripinu ripinu 'et babel velo nirpatah 'izbuha veneilekh 'ish le'arzo ki naga' 'el hashamayim mishpatah venisa 'ad shekhaqim. hozi ihoh 'et zidqoteinu bo'u unesaperah beziyon 'et ma'aseh ihoh 'eloheinu. habeiru hakhizim mil'u hashelatim hei'ir ihoh 'et ruakh malkhei madai ki 'al babel mezimato lehashkhitah ki niqmat ihoh hi niqmat heikhalo. 'el khomot babel se'u nes hakhaziqu hamishmar haqimu shomerim hakhinu ha'orebim ki gam zamam ihoh gam 'asah 'et 'asher diber 'el yoshebei babel. shokhanti shokhant 'al mayim rabim rabat 'ozarot ba qizekh 'amat biz'ekh. nishba' ihoh zeba'ot benafsho ki 'im mileitikh 'adam kayeleq ve'anu 'alayikh heidad. 'oseh 'erez bekhokho meikhin teibel bekhakhemato ubitbunato natah shamayim. leqol tito hamon mayim bashamayim vaya'al nesi'im miqzeh 'arez beraqim lamatar 'asah vayozei ruakh mei'ozerotav. nib'ar kal 'adam mida'at hobish kal zoref mipasel ki sheqer nisko velo ruakh bam. hebel hemah ma'aseh ta'tu'im be'et pequdatam yobeidu. lo khe'eleh kheileq ya'aqob ki yozer hakol hu vesheibet nakhalato ihoh zeba'ot shemo. mapez 'atah li kelei milkhamah venipazti bekha goyim vehishkhati bekha mamlakhot. venipazti bekha sus verokhebo venipazti bekha rekheb verokhebo. venipazti bekha 'ish ve'ishah venipazti bekha zaqen vana'ar venipazti bekha bakhur ubetulah. venipazti bekha ro'eh ve'edro venipazti bekha 'ikar vezimdo venipazti bekha pakhot useganim. veshilamti lebabel ulekhol yoshebei khasdim 'et kal ra'atam 'asher 'asu beziyon le'eineikhem ne'um ihoh. hini 'eilekha har hamashkhit ne'um ihoh hamashkhit 'et kal ha'arez venatiti 'et yadi 'alekha vegilgaltikha min hasela'im unetatikha lehar sereifah. velo yiqkhu mimekha 'eben lefinah ve'eben lemosadot ki shimot 'olam tihyeh ne'um ihoh. se'u nes ba'arez tiq'u shofar bagoyim qadeshu 'aleha goyim hashmi'u 'aleha mamlekhot 'ararat mini ve'ashkenaz piqdu 'aleha tifsar ha'alu sus keyeleq samar. qadeshu 'aleha goyim 'et malkhei madai 'et pakhoteha ve'et kal seganeha ve'et kal 'erez memshalto. vatir'ash ha'arez vatakhol ki qamah 'al babel makhshebot ihoh lasum 'et 'erez babel leshamah mei'en yosheb. khadelu giborei babel lehilakhem yashebu bamezadot nashetah geburatam hayu lenashim hizitu mishkenoteha nishberu berikheha. raz liqrat raz yaruz umagid liqrat magid lehagid lemelekh babel ki nilkedah 'iro miqazeh. vehama'barot nitpasu ve'et ha'agamim sarefu ba'esh ve'anshei hamilkhamah nibhalu. ki khoh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el bat babel kegoren 'et hidrikhah 'od me'at uba'ah 'et haqazir lah. 'akhalanu 'akhalani hamamanu hamamani nebukhadrezar melekh babel hiziganu hizigani keli riq bela'anu bela'ani katanin mila khereiso mei'adanai hedikhanu hedikhani. khamasi ushe'eiri 'al babel tomar yoshebet ziyon vedami 'el yoshebei khasdim tomar yerushalim. lakhen koh 'amar ihoh hini rab 'et ribekh veniqamti 'et niqmatekh vehakharabti 'et yamah vehobashti 'et meqorah. vehayetah babel legalim me'on tanim shamah ushereiqah mei'en yosheb. yakhdav kakefirim yish'agu na'aru kegorei 'arayot. bekhumam 'ashit 'et mishteihem vehishkartim lema'an ya'alozu veyashenu shenat 'olam velo yaqizu ne'um ihoh. 'oridem kekharim litboakh ke'eilim 'im 'atudim. 'ekh nilkedah sheishakh vatitafes tehilat kal ha'arez 'ekh hayetah leshamah babel bagoyim. 'alah 'al babel hayam bahamon galav nikhsatah. hayu 'areha leshamah 'erez ziyah va'arabah 'erez lo yeisheb bahen kal 'ish velo ya'abor bahen ben 'adam. ufaqadti 'al bel bebabel vehozeiti 'et bil'o mipiv velo yinharu 'eilav 'od goyim gam khomat babel nafalah. ze'u mitokhah 'ami umaletu 'ish 'et nafsho meikharon 'af ihoh. ufen yeirakh lebabkhem vetire'u bashemu'ah hanishma'at ba'arez uba bashanah hashemu'ah ve'akharav bashanah hashemu'ah vekhamas ba'arez umoshel 'al moshel. lakhen hineh yamim ba'im ufaqadti 'al pesilei babel vekhal 'arzah teibosh vekhal khalaleha yipelu betokhah. verinenu 'al babel shamayim va'arez vekhol 'asher bahem ki mizafon yabo lah hashoddim ne'um ihoh. gam babel linpol khalei yisra'el gam lebabel nafelu khalei khal ha'arez. peleitim meikhereb hilkhu 'al ta'amodu zikhru meirakhoq 'et ihoh virushalim ta'aleh 'al lebabkhem. boshenu ki shama'nu kherpah kisetah khelimah paneinu ki ba'u zarim 'al miqdeshei bet ihoh. lakhen hineh yamim ba'im ne'um ihoh ufaqadti 'al pesileha ubekhal 'arzah ye'enoq khalal. ki ta'aleh babel hashamayim vekhi tebazer merom 'uzah mei'iti yabo'u shodedim lah ne'um ihoh. qol ze'aqah mibabel vesheber gadol mei'erez kasdim. ki shoded ihoh 'et babel ve'ibad mimenah qol gadol vehamu galeihem kemayim rabim nitan she'on qolam. ki ba 'aleha 'al babel shoded venilkedu giboreha khitetah qashetotam ki 'el gemulot ihoh shalem yeshalem. vehishkarti sareha vakhakhameha pakhoteha useganeha vegiboreha veyashenu shenat 'olam velo yaqizu ne'um hamelekh ihoh zeba'ot shemo. koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot khomot babel harekhabah 'ar'er tit'ar'ar ushe'areha hagebohim ba'esh yizatu veyig'u 'amim bedei riq ule'umim bedei 'esh veya'eifu. hadabar 'asher zivah yirmeyahu hanabi 'et serayah ben neiriyah ben makhseiyah belekhto 'et zidqiyahu melekh yehudah babel bishnat harebi'it lemalekho userayah sar menukhah. vayikhtob yirmeyahu 'et kal hara'ah 'asher tabo 'el babel 'el seifer 'ekhad 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh haketubim 'el babel. vayomer yirmeyahu 'el serayah kebo'akha babel vera'ita veqarata 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh. ve'amarta ihoh 'atah dibarta 'el hamaqom hazeh lehakhrito lebilti heyot bo yosheb lemei'adam ve'ad beheimah ki shimot 'olam tihyeh. vehayah kekhalotekha liqro 'et haseifer hazeh tiqshor 'alav 'eben vehishlakhto 'el tokh perat. ve'amarta kakhah tishqa' babel velo taqum mipenei hara'ah 'asher 'anokhi meibi 'aleha veya'eifu 'ad henah dibrei yirmeyahu. ben 'esrim ve'akhat shanah zidqiyahu bemalekho ve'akhat 'esreh shanah malakh birushalim veshem 'imo khamital khamutal bat yirmeyahu milibnah. vaya'as hara' be'einei ihoh kekhol 'asher 'asah yehoyaqim. ki 'al 'af ihoh hayetah birushalim vihudah 'ad hishlikho 'otam mei'al panav vayimrod zidqiyahu bemelekh babel. vayhi bashanah hateshi'it lemalekho bakhodesh ha'asiri be'asor lakhodesh ba nebukhadrezar melekh babel hu vekhal kheilo 'al yerushalim vayakhanu 'aleha vayibnu 'aleha dayeq sabib. vatabo ha'ir bamazor 'ad 'ashtei 'esreh shanah lamelekh zidqiyahu. bakhodesh harebi'i betish'ah lakhodesh vayekhezaq hara'ab ba'ir velo hayah lekhem le'am ha'arez. vatibaqa' ha'ir vekhal 'anshei hamilkhamah yibrekhu vayeize'u meiha'ir laylah derekh sha'ar ben hakhomotayim 'asher 'al gan hamelekh vekhasdim 'al ha'ir sabib vayeilekhu derekh ha'arabah. vayirdefu khel kasdim 'akharei hamelekh vayasigu 'et zidqiyahu be'arbot yereikho vekhal kheilo nafozu mei'alav. vayitpesu 'et hamelekh vaya'alu 'oto 'el melekh babel riblatah be'erez khamat vaydaber 'ito mishpatim. vayishkhat melekh babel 'et benei zidqiyahu le'einav vegam 'et kal sarei yehudah shakhat beriblatah. ve'et 'einei zidqiyahu 'iver vaya'asreihu bankhushtayim vaybi'eihu melekh babel babelah vayiteneihu bebet bet hapequdot 'ad yom moto. ubakhodesh hakhamishi be'asor lakhodesh hi shenat tesha' 'esreh shanah lamelekh nebukhadrezar melekh babel ba nebuzar'adan rab tabakhim 'amad lifnei melekh babel birushalim. vayisrof 'et bet ihoh ve'et bet hamelekh ve'et kal batei yerushalim ve'et kal bet hagadol saraf ba'esh. ve'et kal khomot yerushalim sabib natezu kal khel kasdim 'asher 'et rab tabakhim. umidalot ha'am ve'et yeter ha'am hanish'arim ba'ir ve'et hanofelim 'asher nafelu 'el melekh babel ve'et yeter ha'amon heglah nebuzar'adan rab tabakhim. umidalot ha'arez hish'ir nebuzar'adan rab tabakhim lekhoremim uleyogebim. ve'et 'amudei hanekhoshet 'asher lebet ihoh ve'et hamekhonot ve'et yam hanekhoshet 'asher bebet ihoh shiberu khasdim vayis'u 'et kal nekhushtam babelah. ve'et hasirot ve'et haya'im ve'et hamzamerot ve'et hamizraqot ve'et hakapot ve'et kal kelei hanekhoshet 'asher yesharetu bahem laqakhu. ve'et hasipim ve'et hamakhtot ve'et hamizraqot ve'et hasirot ve'et hamenorot ve'et hakapot ve'et hamenaqiyot 'asher zahab zahab va'asher kesef kasef laqakh rab tabakhim. ha'amudim shenayim hayam 'ekhad vehabaqar shenem 'asar nekhoshet 'asher takhat hamekhonot 'asher 'asah hamelekh shelomoh lebet ihoh lo hayah mishqal linkhushtam kal hakeilim ha'eleh. veha'amudim shemoneh 'esreh 'amah qomah qomat ha'amud ha'ekhad vekhut shetem 'esreh 'amah yesubenu ve'abeyo 'arba' 'azba'ot nabub. vekhoteret 'alav nekhoshet veqomat hakoteret ha'akhat khamesh 'amot usebakhah verimonim 'al hakoteret sabib hakol nekhoshet vekha'eleh la'amud hasheini verimonim. vayihyu harimonim tish'im veshishah rukhah kal harimonim mei'ah 'al hasebakhah sabib. vayiqakh rab tabakhim 'et serayah kohen harosh ve'et zefanyah kohen hamishneh ve'et sheloshet shomerei hasaf. umin ha'ir laqakh saris 'ekhad 'asher hayah faqid 'al 'anshei hamilkhamah veshib'ah 'anashim meiro'ei fenei hamelekh 'asher nimze'u ba'ir ve'et sofer sar hazaba hamazbi 'et 'am ha'arez veshishim 'ish mei'am ha'arez hanimze'im betokh ha'ir. vayiqakh 'otam nebuzar'adan rab tabakhim vayolekh 'otam 'el melekh babel riblatah. vayakeh 'otam melekh babel vaymitem beriblah be'erez khamat vayigel yehudah mei'al 'admato. zeh ha'am 'asher heglah nebukhadrezar bishnat sheba' yehudim sheloshet 'alafim ve'esrim usheloshah. bishnat shemoneh 'esreh linbukhadrezar mirushalim nefesh shemoneh mei'ot sheloshim ushenayim. bishnat shalosh ve'esrim linbukhadrezar heglah nebuzar'adan rab tabakhim yehudim nefesh sheba' mei'ot 'arba'im vakhamishah kal nefesh 'arba'at 'alafim veshesh mei'ot. vayhi bishloshim vasheba' shanah legalut yehoyakhin melekh yehudah bishnem 'asar khodesh be'esrim vakhamishah lakhodesh nasa 'evil merodakh melekh babel bishnat malkhuto 'et rosh yehoyakhin melekh yehudah vayozei 'oto mibet hakeli hakelu. vaydaber 'ito tobot vayiten 'et kis'o mima'al lekhisei melakhim hamelakhim 'asher 'ito bebabel. veshinah 'et bigdei khil'o ve'akhal lekhem lefanav tamid kal yemei khayav. va'arukhato 'arukhat tamid nitenah lo mei'et melekh babel debar yom beyomo 'ad yom moto kol yemei khayav.

vayhi bishloshim shanah barebi'i bakhamishah lakhodesh va'ani betokh hagolah 'al nehar kebar niftekhu hashamayim va'er'eh mar'ot 'elohim. bakhamishah lakhodesh hi hashanah hakhamishit legalut hamelekh yoyakhin. hayoh hayah debar ihoh 'el yekhezqel ben buzi hakohen be'erez kasdim 'al nehar kebar vatehi 'alav sham yad ihoh. va'eire vehineh ruakh se'arah ba'ah min hazafon 'anan gadol ve'esh mitlaqakhat venogah lo sabib umitokhah ke'en hakhashmal mitokh ha'esh. umitokhah demut 'arba' khayot vezeh mar'eihen demut 'adam lahenah. ve'arba'ah fanim le'ekhat ve'arba' kenafayim le'akhat lahem. veragleihem regel yesharah vekhaf ragleihem kekhaf regel 'eigel venozezim ke'en nekhoshet qalal. veyado videi 'adam mitakhat kanfeihem 'al 'arba'at rib'eihem ufeneihem vekhanfeihem le'arba'tam. khoberot 'ishah 'el 'akhotah kanfeihem lo yisabu belekhtan 'ish 'el 'eiber panav yeileikhu. udemut peneihem penei 'adam ufenei 'aryeh 'el hayamin le'arba'tam ufenei shor meihasemol le'arba'tan ufenei nesher le'arba'tan. ufeneihem vekhanfeihem perudot milma'elah le'ish tayim khoberot 'ish ushetayim mekhasot 'et geviyoteihenah ve'ish 'el 'eiber panav yeileikhu 'el 'asher yihyeh shamah haruakh lalekhet yeileikhu lo yisabu belekhtan. udemut hakhayot mar'eihem kegakhalei 'esh bo'arot kemar'eh halapidim hi mithalekhet ben hakhayot venogah la'esh umin ha'esh yozei baraq. vehakhayot razo vashob kemar'eh habazaq. va'eire hakhayot vehineh 'ofan 'ekhad ba'arez 'eizel hakhayot le'arba'at panav. mar'eh ha'ofanim uma'aseihem ke'en tarshish udemut 'ekhad le'arba'tan umar'eihem uma'aseihem ka'asher yihyeh ha'ofan betokh ha'ofan. 'al 'arba'at rib'eihen belekhtam yeileikhu lo yisabu belekhtan. vegabeihen vegobah lahem veyir'ah lahem vegabotam melei'ot 'einayim sabib le'arba'tan. ubelekhet hakhayot yeilekhu ha'ofanim 'ezlam ubehinasei hakhayot mei'al ha'arez yinase'u ha'ofanim. 'al 'asher yihyeh sham haruakh lalekhet yeileikhu shamah haruakh lalekhet veha'ofanim yinase'u le'umatam ki ruakh hakhayah ba'ofanim. belekhtam yeileikhu ube'amedam ya'amodu ubehinase'am mei'al ha'arez yinase'u ha'ofanim le'umatam ki ruakh hakhayah ba'ofanim. udemut 'al rashei hakhayah raqia' ke'en haqerakh hanora natui 'al rasheihem milma'elah. vetakhat haraqia' kanfeihem yesharot 'ishah 'el 'akhotah le'ish shetayim mekhasot lahenah ule'ish shetayim mekhasot lahenah 'et geviyoteihem. va'eshma' 'et qol kanfeihem keqol mayim rabim keqol shadai belekhtam qol hamulah keqol makhaneh be'amedam terapenah khanfeihen. vayhi qol mei'al laraqia' 'asher 'al rosham be'amedam terapenah khanfeihen. umima'al laraqia' 'asher 'al rosham kemar'eh 'eben sapir demut kisei ve'al demut hakisei demut kemar'eh 'adam 'alav milma'elah. va'eire ke'en khashmal kemar'eh 'esh bet lah sabib mimar'eh matenav ulema'elah umimar'eh matenav ulematah ra'iti kemar'eh 'esh venogah lo sabib. kemar'eh haqeshet 'asher yihyeh be'anan beyom hageshem ken mar'eh hanogah sabib hu mar'eh demut kebod ihoh va'er'eh va'epol 'al panai va'eshma' qol medaber. vayomer 'eilai ben 'adam 'amod 'al raglekha va'adaber 'otakh. vatabo bi ruakh ka'asher diber 'eilai vata'amideini 'al raglai va'eshma' 'et midaber 'eilai. vayomer 'eilai ben 'adam sholeiakh 'ani 'otkha 'el benei yisra'el 'el goyim hamordim 'asher maredu bi hemah va'abotam pashe'u bi 'ad 'ezem hayom hazeh. vehabanim qeshei fanim vekhizqei leb 'ani sholeiakh 'otkha 'aleihem ve'amarta 'aleihem koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh. vehemah 'im yishme'u ve'im yekhdalu ki bet meri hemah veyade'u ki nabi hayah betokham. ve'atah ben 'adam 'al tira meihem umidibreihem 'al tira ki sarabim vesalonim 'otakh ve'el 'aqrabim 'atah yosheb midibreihem 'al tira umipeneihem 'al teikhat ki bet meri hemah. vedibarta 'et debarai 'aleihem 'im yishme'u ve'im yekhdalu ki meri hemah. ve'atah ben 'adam shema' 'et 'asher 'ani medaber 'eilekha 'al tehi meri kebet hameri pezeh fikha ve'ekhol 'et 'asher 'ani noten 'eilekha. va'er'eh vehineh yad shelukhah 'eilai vehineh bo megilat seifer. vayifros 'otah lefanai vehi khetubah panim ve'akhor vekhatub 'eileha qinim vahegeh vahi. vayomer 'eilai ben 'adam 'et 'asher timza 'ekhol 'ekhol 'et hamegilah hazot velekh daber 'el bet yisra'el. va'eftakh 'et pi vaya'akhileini 'et hamegilah hazot. vayomer 'eilai ben 'adam bitnekha ta'akhel umei'ekha temalei 'et hamegilah hazot 'asher 'ani noten 'eilekha va'okhelah vatehi befi kidbash lematoq. vayomer 'eilai ben 'adam lekh bo 'el bet yisra'el vedibarta bidbarai 'aleihem. ki lo 'el 'am 'imqei safah vekhibdei lashon 'atah shaluakh 'el bet yisra'el. lo 'el 'amim rabim 'imqei safah vekhibdei lashon 'asher lo tishma' dibreihem 'im lo 'aleihem shelakhtikha hemah yishme'u 'eilekha. ubet yisra'el lo yobu lishmoa' 'eilekha ki 'einam 'obim lishmoa' 'eilai ki kal bet yisra'el khizqei meizakh uqeshei leb hemah. hineh natati 'et panekha khazaqim le'umat peneihem ve'et mizkhakha khazaq le'umat mizkham. keshamir khazaq mizor natati mizkhekha lo tira 'otam velo teikhat mipeneihem ki bet meri hemah. vayomer 'eilai ben 'adam 'et kal debarai 'asher 'adaber 'eilekha qakh bilbabekha ube'azenekha shema'. velekh bo 'el hagolah 'el benei 'amekha vedibarta 'aleihem ve'amarta 'aleihem koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh 'im yishme'u ve'im yekhdalu. vatisa'eini ruakh va'eshma' 'akharai qol ra'ash gadol barukh kebod ihoh mimeqomo. veqol kanfei hakhayot mashiqot 'ishah 'el 'akhotah veqol ha'ofanim le'umatam veqol ra'ash gadol. veruakh nesa'atni vatiqakheini va'eilekh mar bakhamat rukhi veyad ihoh 'alai khazaqah. va'abo 'el hagolah tel 'abib hayoshebim 'el nehar kebar va'asher va'eisheb hemah yoshebim sham va'eisheb sham shib'at yamim mashmim betokham. vayhi miqzeh shib'at yamim vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam zofeh netatikha lebet yisra'el veshama'ta mipi dabar vehizharta 'otam mimeni. be'ameri larasha' mot tamut velo hizharto velo dibarta lehazhir rasha' midarko haresha'ah lekhayoto hu rasha' ba'avono yamut vedamo miyadekha 'abaqesh. ve'atah ki hizharta rasha' velo shab meirish'o umidarko haresha'ah hu ba'avono yamut ve'atah 'et nafshekha hizalta. ubeshub zadiq mizidqo ve'asah 'avel venatati mikhshol lefanav hu yamut ki lo hizharto bekhatato yamut velo tizakharna zidqotav 'asher 'asah vedamo miyadekha 'abaqesh. ve'atah ki hizharto zadiq lebilti khato zadiq vehu lo khata khayo yikhyeh ki nizhar ve'atah 'et nafshekha hizalta. vatehi 'alai sham yad ihoh vayomer 'eilai qum zei 'el habiq'ah vesham 'adaber 'otakh. va'aqum va'eizei 'el habiq'ah vehineh sham kebod ihoh 'omed kakabod 'asher ra'iti 'al nehar kebar va'epol 'al panai. vatabo bi ruakh vata'amideini 'al raglai vaydaber 'oti vayomer 'eilai bo hisager betokh beitekha. ve'atah ben 'adam hineh natenu 'alekha 'abotim va'asarukha bahem velo teizei betokham. uleshonkha 'adbiq 'el khikekha vene'elamta velo tihyeh lahem le'ish mokhiakh ki bet meri hemah. ubedaberi 'otkha 'eftakh 'et pikha ve'amarta 'aleihem koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh hashomeia' yishma' vehekhadel yekhdal ki bet meri hemah. ve'atah ben 'adam qakh lekha lebeinah venatatah 'otah lefanekha vekhaqota 'aleha 'ir 'et yerushalim. venatatah 'aleha mazor ubanita 'aleha dayeq veshafakhta 'aleha solelah venatatah 'aleha makhanot vesim 'aleha karim sabib. ve'atah qakh lekha makhabat barzel venatatah 'otah qir barzel beinekha uben ha'ir vahakhinotah 'et panekha 'eileha vehayetah bamazor vezarta 'aleha 'ot hi lebet yisra'el. ve'atah shekhab 'al zidekha hasemali vesamta 'et 'avon bet yisra'el 'alav mispar hayamim 'asher tishkab 'alav tisa 'et 'avonam. va'ani natati lekha 'et shenei 'avonam lemispar yamim shelosh mei'ot vetish'im yom venasata 'avon bet yisra'el. vekhilita 'et 'eleh veshakhabta 'al zidekha haymoni haymani sheinit venasata 'et 'avon bet yehudah 'arba'im yom yom lashanah yom lashanah netativ lakh. ve'el mezor yerushalim takhin panekha uzero'akha khasufah venibeita 'aleha. vehineh natati 'alekha 'abotim velo teihafekh mizidekha 'el zidekha 'ad kalotkha yemei mezurekha. ve'atah qakh lekha khitin use'orim ufol va'adashim vedokhan vekhusemim venatatah 'otam bikhli 'ekhad ve'asita 'otam lekha lelakhem mispar hayamim 'asher 'atah shokheb 'al zidekha shelosh mei'ot vetish'im yom tokhalenu. uma'akhalekha 'asher tokhalenu bemishqol 'esrim sheqel layom mei'et 'ad 'et tokhalenu. umayim bimsurah tishteh shishit hahin mei'et 'ad 'et tishteh. ve'ugat se'orim tokhalenah vehi begelei zei'at ha'adam te'ugenah le'eineihem. vayomer ihoh kakhah yokhelu benei yisra'el 'et lakhmam tamei bagoyim 'asher 'adikhem sham. va'omar 'ahah 'adonai ihoh hineh nafshi lo metuma'ah unebeilah utereifah lo 'akhalti mine'urai ve'ad 'atah velo ba befi besar pigul. vayomer 'eilai re'eh natati lekha 'et zefu'ei zefi'ei habaqar takhat gelei ha'adam ve'asita 'et lakhmekha 'aleihem. vayomer 'eilai ben 'adam hini shober mateh lekhem birushalim ve'akhelu lekhem bemishqal ubid'agah umayim bimsurah ubeshimamon yishtu. lema'an yakhseru lekhem vamayim venashamu 'ish ve'akhiv venamaqu ba'avonam. ve'atah ben 'adam qakh lekha khereb khadah ta'ar hagalabim tiqakhenah lakh veha'abarta 'al roshekha ve'al zeqanekha velaqakhta lekha mozenei mishqal vekhilaqtam. shelishit ba'ur tab'ir betokh ha'ir kimlot yemei hamazor velaqakhta 'et hashelishit takeh bakhereb sebiboteha vehashelishit tizreh laruakh vekhereb 'ariq 'akhareihem. velaqakhta misham me'at bemispar vezarta 'otam bikhnafekha. umeihem 'od tiqakh vehishlakhta 'otam 'el tokh ha'esh vesarafta 'otam ba'esh mimenu teizei 'esh 'el kal bet yisra'el. koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh zot yerushalim betokh hagoyim samtiha usebiboteha 'arazot. vatemer 'et mishpatai lerish'ah min hagoyim ve'et khuqotai min ha'arazot 'asher sebiboteha ki bemishpatai ma'asu vekhuqotai lo halekhu bahem. lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh ya'an hamanekhem min hagoyim 'asher sebiboteikhem bekhuqotai lo halakhtem ve'et mishpatai lo 'asitem ukhemishpetei hagoyim 'asher sebiboteikhem lo 'asitem. lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh hini 'alayikh gam 'ani ve'asiti betokhekh mishpatim le'einei hagoyim. ve'asiti bakh 'et 'asher lo 'asiti ve'et 'asher lo 'e'eseh khamohu 'od ya'an kal to'abotayikh. lakhen 'abot yokhelu banim betokhekh ubanim yokhelu 'abotam ve'asiti bakh shefatim vezeiriti 'et kal she'eiritekh lekhal ruakh. lakhen khai 'ani ne'um 'adonai ihoh 'im lo ya'an 'et miqdashi timet bekhal shiquzayikh ubekhal to'abotayikh vegam 'ani 'egra' velo takhos 'eini vegam 'ani lo 'ekhmol. shelishitekh badeber yamutu ubara'ab yikhlu betokhekh vehashelishit bakhereb yipelu sebibotayikh vehashelishit lekhal ruakh 'ezareh vekhereb 'ariq 'akhareihem. vekhalah 'api vahanikhoti khamati bam vehinekhameti veyade'u ki 'ani ihoh dibarti beqin'ati bekhaloti khamati bam. ve'etenekh lekharebah ulekherpah bagoyim 'asher sebibotayikh le'einei kal 'ober. vehayetah kherpah ugedufah musar umeshamah lagoyim 'asher sebibotayikh ba'asoti bakh shefatim be'af ubekheimah ubetokhekhot kheimah 'ani ihoh dibarti. beshalekhi 'et khizei hara'ab hara'im bahem 'asher hayu lemashkhit 'asher 'ashalakh 'otam leshakhetkhem vera'ab 'osef 'aleikhem veshabarti lakhem mateh lakhem. veshilakhti 'aleikhem ra'ab vekhayah ra'ah veshikelukh vedeber vadam ya'abar bakh vekhereb 'abi 'alayikh 'ani ihoh dibarti. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam sim panekha 'el harei yisra'el vehinabei 'aleihem. ve'amarta harei yisra'el shim'u debar 'adonai ihoh koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh leharim velageba'ot la'afiqim velagei'ayot velagei'ayot hini 'ani meibi 'aleikhem khereb ve'ibadti bamoteikhem. venashamu mizbekhoteikhem venishberu khamaneikhem vehipalti khaleikhem lifnei giluleikhem. venatati 'et pigrei benei yisra'el lifnei giluleihem vezeiriti 'et 'azmoteikhem sebibot mizbekhoteikhem. bekhol mosheboteikhem he'arim tekherabnah vehabamot tishamenah lema'an yekherbu veye'shemu mizbekhoteikhem venishberu venishbetu giluleikhem venigde'u khamaneikhem venimkhu ma'aseikhem. venafal khalal betokhkhem vida'tem ki 'ani ihoh. vehotarti bihyot lakhem pelitei khereb bagoyim behizaroteikhem ba'arazot. vezakheru feliteikhem 'oti bagoyim 'asher nishbu sham 'asher nishbarti 'et libam hazoneh 'asher sar mei'alai ve'et 'eineihem hazonot 'akharei giluleihem venaqotu bifneihem 'el hara'ot 'asher 'asu lekhol to'aboteihem. veyade'u ki 'ani ihoh lo 'el khinam dibarti la'asot lahem hara'ah hazot. koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh hakeh bekhapekha ureqa' beraglekha ve'emar 'akh 'el kal to'abot ra'ot bet yisra'el 'asher bakhereb bara'ab ubadeber yipolu. harakhoq badeber yamut vehaqarob bakhereb yipol vehanish'ar vehanazur bara'ab yamut vekhileiti khamati bam. vida'tem ki 'ani ihoh bihyot khaleihem betokh giluleihem sebibot mizbekhoteihem 'el kal gib'ah ramah bekhol rashei heharim vetakhat kal 'ez ra'anan vetakhat kal 'eilah 'abutah meqom 'asher natenu sham reiakh nikhoakh lekhol giluleihem. venatiti 'et yadi 'aleihem venatati 'et ha'arez shemamah umeshamah mimidbar diblatah bekhol mosheboteihem veyade'u ki 'ani ihoh. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ve'atah ben 'adam koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh le'admat yisra'el qez ba haqez 'al 'arba'at 'arba' kanfot ha'arez. 'atah haqez 'alayikh veshilakhti 'api bakh ushefatikh kidrakhayikh venatati 'alayikh 'et kal to'abotayikh. velo takhos 'eini 'alayikh velo 'ekhmol ki derakhayikh 'alayikh 'eten veto'abotayikh betokhekh tihyena vida'tem ki 'ani ihoh. koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh ra'ah 'akhat ra'ah hineh ba'ah. qez ba ba haqez heiqiz 'eilayikh hineh ba'ah. ba'ah hazefirah 'eilekha yosheb ha'arez ba ha'et qarob hayom mehumah velo hed harim. 'atah miqarob 'eshpokh khamati 'alayikh vekhileiti 'api bakh ushefatikh kidrakhayikh venatati 'alayikh 'et kal to'abotayikh. velo takhos 'eini velo 'ekhmol kidrakhayikh 'alayikh 'eten veto'abotayikh betokhekh tihyena vida'tem ki 'ani ihoh makeh. hineh hayom hineh ba'ah yaze'ah hazefirah zaz hamateh parakh hazadon. hekhamas qam lemateh resha' lo meihem velo meihamonam velo mehemeihem velo noah bahem. ba ha'et higia' hayom haqoneh 'al yismakh vehamokher 'al yit'abal ki kharon 'el kal hamonah. ki hamokher 'el hamimkar lo yashub ve'od bakhayim khayatam ki khazon 'el kal hamonah lo yashub ve'ish ba'avono khayato lo yitkhazaqu. taqe'u bataqoa' vehakhin hakol ve'en holekh lamilkhamah ki kharoni 'el kal hamonah. hakhereb bakhuz vehadeber vehara'ab mibayit 'asher basadeh bakhereb yamut va'asher ba'ir ra'ab vadeber yokhalenu. ufaletu peliteihem vehayu 'el heharim keyonei hagei'ayot kulam homot 'ish ba'avono. kal hayadayim tirpenah vekhal birkayim teilakhnah mayim. vekhageru saqim vekhisetah 'otam palazut ve'el kal panim bushah ubekhal rasheihem qarekhah. kaspam bakhuzot yashlikhu uzehabam lenidah yihyeh kaspam uzehabam lo yukhal lehazilam beyom 'ebrat ihoh nafsham lo yesabei'u umei'eihem lo yemalei'u ki mikhshol 'avonam hayah. uzebi 'edyo lega'on samahu vezalmei to'abotam shiquzeihem 'asu bo 'al ken netativ lahem lenidah. unetativ beyad hazarim labaz ulerish'ei ha'arez leshalal vekhileluha vekhileluhu. vahasiboti fanai meihem vekhilelu 'et zefuni uba'u bah parizim vekhileluha. 'aseh haratoq ki ha'arez male'ah mishpat damim veha'ir male'ah khamas. veheibeiti ra'ei goyim veyareshu 'et bateihem vehishbati ge'on 'azim venikhalu meqadsheihem. qefadah ba ubiqshu shalom va'ayin. hoah 'al hoah tabo ushemu'ah 'el shemu'ah tihyeh ubiqshu khazon minabi vetorah tobad mikohen ve'eizah mizeqeinim. hamelekh yit'abal venasi yilbash shemamah videi 'am ha'arez tibahalnah midarkam 'e'eseh 'otam ubemishpeteihem 'eshpetem veyade'u ki 'ani ihoh. vayhi bashanah hashishit bashishi bakhamishah lakhodesh 'ani yosheb bebeiti veziqnei yehudah yoshebim lefanai vatipol 'alai sham yad 'adonai ihoh. va'er'eh vehineh demut kemar'eh 'esh mimar'eh matenav ulematah 'esh umimatenav ulema'lah kemar'eh zohar ke'en hakhashmalah. vayishlakh tabnit yad vayiqakheini bezizit roshi vatisa 'oti ruakh ben ha'arez uben hashamayim vatabei 'oti yerushalemah bemar'ot 'elohim 'el petakh sha'ar hapenimit haponeh zafonah 'asher sham moshab seimel haqin'ah hamaqneh. vehineh sham kebod 'elohei yisra'el kamar'eh 'asher ra'iti babiq'ah. vayomer 'eilai ben 'adam sa na 'einekha derekh zafonah va'esa 'einai derekh zafonah vehineh mizafon lesha'ar hamizbeiakh seimel haqin'ah hazeh babi'ah. vayomer 'eilai ben 'adam haro'eh 'atah meihem mah hem 'osim to'eibot gedolot 'asher bet yisra'el 'osim poh lerakhoqah mei'al miqdashi ve'od tashub tir'eh to'eibot gedolot. vayabei 'oti 'el petakh hekhazer va'er'eh vehineh khor 'ekhad baqir. vayomer 'eilai ben 'adam khatar na baqir va'ekhtor baqir vehineh petakh 'ekhad. vayomer 'eilai bo ure'eh 'et hato'eibot hara'ot 'asher hem 'osim poh. va'abo va'er'eh vehineh khal tabnit remes ubeheimah sheqez vekhal gilulei bet yisra'el mekhuqeh 'al haqir sabib sabib. veshib'im 'ish miziqnei bet yisra'el veya'azanyahu ben shafan 'omed betokham 'omedim lifneihem ve'ish miqtarto beyado va'atar 'anan haqetoret 'oleh. vayomer 'eilai hara'ita ben 'adam 'asher ziqnei bet yisra'el 'osim bakhoshekh 'ish bekhadrei maskito ki 'omerim 'en ihoh ro'eh 'otanu 'azab ihoh 'et ha'arez. vayomer 'eilai 'od tashub tir'eh to'eibot gedolot 'asher hemah 'osim. vayabei 'oti 'el petakh sha'ar bet ihoh 'asher 'el hazafonah vehineh sham hanashim yoshebot mebakot 'et hatamuz. vayomer 'eilai hara'ita ben 'adam 'od tashub tir'eh to'eibot gedolot mei'eleh. vayabei 'oti 'el khazar bet ihoh hapenimit vehineh fetakh heikhal ihoh ben ha'ulam uben hamizbeiakh ke'esrim vakhamishah 'ish 'akhoreihem 'el heikhal ihoh ufeneihem qeidemah vehemah mishtakhavitem qeidemah lashamesh. vayomer 'eilai hara'ita ben 'adam hanaqel lebet yehudah mei'asot 'et hato'eibot 'asher 'asu foh ki male'u 'et ha'arez khamas vayashubu lehakh'iseini vehinam sholekhim 'et hazemorah 'el 'apam. vegam 'ani 'e'eseh bekheimah lo takhos 'eini velo 'ekhmol veqare'u be'azenai qol gadol velo 'eshma' 'otam. vayiqra be'azenai qol gadol leimor qarebu pequdot ha'ir ve'ish keli mashkheito beyado. vehineh shishah 'anashim ba'im miderekh sha'ar ha'elyon 'asher mafeneh zafonah ve'ish keli mapazo beyado ve'ish 'ekhad betokham labush badim veqeset hasofer bematenav vayabo'u vaya'amdu 'eizel mizbakh hanekhoshet. ukhebod 'elohei yisra'el na'alah mei'al hakerub 'asher hayah 'alav 'el miftan habayit vayiqra 'el ha'ish halabush habadim 'asher qeset hasofer bematenav. vayomer ihoh 'eilo 'eilav 'abor betokh ha'ir betokh yerushalim vehitvita tav 'al mizkhot ha'anashim hane'enakhim vehane'enaqim 'al kal hato'eibot hana'asot betokhah. ule'eleh 'amar be'azenai 'ibru ba'ir 'akharav vehaku 'al 'al takhos 'eineikhem 'einekhem ve'al takhmolu. zaqen bakhur ubetulah vetaf venashim tahargu lemashkhit ve'al kal 'ish 'asher 'alav hatav 'al tigashu umimiqdashi takhelu vayakhelu ba'anashim hazeqeinim 'asher lifnei habayit. vayomer 'aleihem tame'u 'et habayit umal'u 'et hakhazeirot khalalim zei'u veyaze'u vehiku ba'ir. vayhi kehakotam veneisha'ar 'ani va'epelah 'al panai va'ez'aq va'omar 'ahah 'adonai ihoh hamashkhit 'atah 'et kal she'eirit yisra'el beshafekekha 'et khamatekha 'al yerushalim. vayomer 'eilai 'avon bet yisra'el vihudah gadol bim'od me'od vatimalei ha'arez damim veha'ir male'ah muteh ki 'ameru 'azab ihoh 'et ha'arez ve'en ihoh ro'eh. vegam 'ani lo takhos 'eini velo 'ekhmol darkam berosham natati. vehineh ha'ish lebush habadim 'asher haqeset bematenav meishib dabar leimor 'asiti kha'asher kekhol 'asher zivitani. va'er'eh vehineh 'el haraqia' 'asher 'al rosh hakerubim ke'eben sapir kemar'eh demut kisei nir'ah 'aleihem. vayomer 'el ha'ish lebush habadim vayomer bo 'el beinot lagalgal 'el takhat lakerub umalei khafenekha gakhalei 'esh mibeinot lakerubim uzeroq 'al ha'ir vayabo le'einai. vehakerubim 'omedim mimin labayit bebo'o ha'ish vehe'anan malei 'et hekhazer hapenimit. vayaram kebod ihoh mei'al hakerub 'al miftan habayit vayimalei habayit 'et he'anan vehekhazer male'ah 'et nogah kebod ihoh. veqol kanfei hakerubim nishma' 'ad hekhazer hakhizonah keqol 'el shadai bedabero. vayhi bezavoto 'et ha'ish lebush habadim leimor qakh 'esh mibeinot lagalgal mibeinot lakerubim vayabo vaya'amod 'eizel ha'ofan. vayishlakh hakerub 'et yado mibeinot lakerubim 'el ha'esh 'asher beinot hakerubim vayisa vayiten 'el khafenei lebush habadim vayiqakh vayeizei. vayeira lakerubim tabnit yad 'adam takhat kanfeihem. va'er'eh vehineh 'arba'ah 'ofanim 'eizel hakerubim 'ofan 'ekhad 'eizel hakerub 'ekhad ve'ofan 'ekhad 'eizel hakerub 'ekhad umar'eh ha'ofanim ke'en 'eben tarshish. umar'eihem demut 'ekhad le'arba'tam ka'asher yihyeh ha'ofan betokh ha'ofan. belekhtam 'el 'arba'at rib'eihem yeileikhu lo yisabu belekhtam ki hamaqom 'asher yifneh harosh 'akharav yeileikhu lo yisabu belekhtam. vekhal besaram vegabeihem videihem vekhanfeihem veha'ofanim melei'im 'einayim sabib le'arba'tam 'ofaneihem. la'ofanim lahem qora hagalgal be'azenai. ve'arba'ah fanim le'ekhad penei ha'ekhad penei hakerub ufenei hasheini penei 'adam vehashelishi penei 'aryeh veharebi'i penei nasher. vayeiromu hakerubim hi hakhayah 'asher ra'iti binhar kebar. ubelekhet hakerubim yeilekhu ha'ofanim 'ezlam ubis'et hakerubim 'et kanfeihem larum mei'al ha'arez lo yisabu ha'ofanim gam hem mei'ezlam. be'amedam ya'amodu uberomam yeiromu 'otam ki ruakh hakhayah bahem. vayeizei kebod ihoh mei'al miftan habayit vaya'amod 'al hakerubim. vayis'u hakerubim 'et kanfeihem vayeiromu min ha'arez le'einai bezeitam veha'ofanim le'umatam vaya'amod petakh sha'ar bet ihoh haqadmoni ukhebod 'elohei yisra'el 'aleihem milma'elah. hi hakhayah 'asher ra'iti takhat 'elohei yisra'el binhar kebar va'eida' ki kherubim hemah. 'arba'ah 'arba'ah fanim le'ekhad ve'arba' kenafayim le'ekhad udemut yedei 'adam takhat kanfeihem. udemut peneihem hemah hapanim 'asher ra'iti 'al nehar kebar mar'eihem ve'otam 'ish 'el 'eiber panav yeileikhu. vatisa 'oti ruakh vatabei 'oti 'el sha'ar bet ihoh haqadmoni haponeh qadimah vehineh befetakh hasha'ar 'esrim vakhamishah 'ish va'er'eh betokham 'et ya'azanyah ben 'azur ve'et pelatyahu ben benayahu sarei ha'am. vayomer 'eilai ben 'adam 'eleh ha'anashim hakhoshebim 'aven vehayo'azim 'azat ra' ba'ir hazot. ha'omerim lo beqarob benot batim hi hasir va'anakhnu habasar. lakhen hinabei 'aleihem hinabei ben 'adam. vatipol 'alai ruakh ihoh vayomer 'eilai 'emor koh 'amar ihoh ken 'amartem bet yisra'el uma'alot rukhakhem 'ani yeda'tiha. hirbeitem khaleikhem ba'ir hazot umileitem khuzoteha khalal. lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh khaleikhem 'asher samtem betokhah hemah habasar vehi hasir ve'etkhem hozi mitokhah. khereb yereitem vekhereb 'abi 'aleikhem ne'um 'adonai ihoh. vehozeiti 'etkhem mitokhah venatati 'etkhem beyad zarim ve'asiti bakhem shefatim. bakhereb tipolu 'al gebul yisra'el 'eshpot 'etkhem vida'tem ki 'ani ihoh. hi lo tihyeh lakhem lesir ve'atem tihyu betokhah lebasar 'el gebul yisra'el 'eshpot 'etkhem. vida'tem ki 'ani ihoh 'asher bekhuqai lo halakhtem umishpatai lo 'asitem ukhemishpetei hagoyim 'asher sebiboteikhem 'asitem. vayhi kehinabe'i ufelatyahu ben benayah met va'epol 'al panai va'ez'aq qol gadol va'omar 'ahah 'adonai ihoh kalah 'atah 'oseh 'et she'eirit yisra'el. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam 'akhekha 'akhekha 'anshei ge'ulatekha vekhal bet yisra'el kuloh 'asher 'ameru lahem yoshebei yerushalim rakhaqu mei'al ihoh lanu hi nitenah ha'arez lemorashah. lakhen 'emor koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh ki hirkhaqtim bagoyim vekhi hafizotim ba'arazot va'ehi lahem lemiqdash me'at ba'arazot 'asher ba'u sham. lakhen 'emor koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh veqibazti 'etkhem min ha'amim ve'asafti 'etkhem min ha'arazot 'asher nefozotem bahem venatati lakhem 'et 'admat yisra'el. uba'u shamah veheisiru 'et kal shiquzeha ve'et kal to'aboteha mimenah. venatati lahem leb 'ekhad veruakh khadashah 'eten beqirbekhem vahasiroti leb ha'eben mibesaram venatati lahem leb basar. lema'an bekhuqotai yeileikhu ve'et mishpatai yishmeru ve'asu 'otam vehayu li le'am va'ani 'ehyeh lahem leilohim. ve'el leb shiquzeihem veto'aboteihem libam holekh darkam berosham natati ne'um 'adonai ihoh. vayis'u hakerubim 'et kanfeihem veha'ofanim le'umatam ukhebod 'elohei yisra'el 'aleihem milma'elah. vaya'al kebod ihoh mei'al tokh ha'ir vaya'amod 'al hahar 'asher miqedem la'ir. veruakh nesa'atni vatebi'eini khasdimah 'el hagolah bamar'eh beruakh 'elohim vaya'al mei'alai hamar'eh 'asher ra'iti. va'adaber 'el hagolah 'et kal dibrei ihoh 'asher her'ani. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam betokh bet hameri 'atah yosheb 'asher 'einayim lahem lir'ot velo ra'u 'azenayim lahem lishmoa' velo shamei'u ki bet meri hem. ve'atah ben 'adam 'aseh lekha kelei golah ugeleh yomam le'eineihem vegalita mimeqomkha 'el maqom 'akher le'eineihem 'ulai yir'u ki bet meri hemah. vehozeita kheilekha kikhlei golah yomam le'eineihem ve'atah teizei ba'ereb le'eineihem kemoza'ei golah. le'eineihem khatar lekha baqir vehozeita bo. le'eineihem 'al katef tisa ba'alatah tozi panekha tekhaseh velo tir'eh 'et ha'arez ki mofet netatikha lebet yisra'el. va'a'as ken ka'asher zuveiti keilai hozeiti kikhlei golah yomam uba'ereb khatarti li baqir beyad ba'alatah hozeiti 'al katef nasati le'eineihem. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai baboqer leimor. ben 'adam halo 'ameru 'eilekha bet yisra'el bet hameri mah 'atah 'oseh. 'emor 'aleihem koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh hanasi hamasa hazeh birushalam vekhal bet yisra'el 'asher hemah betokham. 'emor 'ani mofetkhem ka'asher 'asiti ken yei'aseh lahem bagolah bashebi yeileikhu. vehanasi 'asher betokham 'el katef yisa ba'alatah veyeizei baqir yakhteru lehozi bo panav yekhaseh ya'an 'asher lo yir'eh la'ayin hu 'et ha'arez. ufarasti 'et rishti 'alav venitpas bimzudati veheibeiti 'oto babelah 'erez kasdim ve'otah lo yir'eh vesham yamut. vekhol 'asher sebibotav 'ezroh 'ezro vekhal 'agapav 'ezareh lekhal ruakh vekhereb 'ariq 'akhareihem. veyade'u ki 'ani ihoh bahafizi 'otam bagoyim vezeiriti 'otam ba'arazot. vehotarti meihem 'anshei mispar meikhereb meira'ab umidaber lema'an yesaperu 'et kal to'aboteihem bagoyim 'asher ba'u sham veyade'u ki 'ani ihoh. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam lakhmekha bera'ash tokhel umeimekha beragezah ubid'agah tishteh. ve'amarta 'el 'am ha'arez koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh leyoshebei yerushalim 'el 'admat yisra'el lakhmam bid'agah yokheilu umeimeihem beshimamon yishtu lema'an teisham 'arzah mimelo'ah meikhamas kal hayoshebim bah. vehe'arim hanoshabot tekherabnah veha'arez shemamah tihyeh vida'tem ki 'ani ihoh. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam mah hamashal hazeh lakhem 'al 'admat yisra'el leimor ya'arkhu hayamim ve'abad kal khazon. lakhen 'emor 'aleihem koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh hishbati 'et hamashal hazeh velo yimshelu 'oto 'od beyisra'el ki 'im daber 'aleihem qarebu hayamim udebar kal khazon. ki lo yihyeh 'od kal khazon shav umiqsam khalaq betokh bet yisra'el. ki 'ani ihoh 'adaber 'et 'asher 'adaber dabar veyei'aseh lo timashekh 'od ki bimeikhem bet hameri 'adaber dabar va'asitiv ne'um 'adonai ihoh. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam hineh bet yisra'el 'omerim hekhazon 'asher hu khozeh leyamim rabim ule'itim rekhoqot hu niba. lakhen 'emor 'aleihem koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh lo timashekh 'od kal debarai 'asher 'adaber dabar veyei'aseh ne'um 'adonai ihoh. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam hinabei 'el nebi'ei yisra'el haniba'im ve'amarta linbi'ei milibam shim'u debar ihoh. koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh ho 'al hanebi'im hanebalim 'asher holekhim 'akhar rukham ulebilti ra'u. keshu'alim bakhorabot nebi'ekha yisra'el hayu. lo 'alitem baperazot vatigderu gader 'al bet yisra'el la'amod bamilkhamah beyom ihoh. khazu shav veqesem kazab ha'omerim ne'um ihoh ihoh lo shelakham veyikhalu leqayem dabar. halo makhazeh shav khazitem umiqsam kazab 'amartem ve'omerim ne'um ihoh va'ani lo dibarti. lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh ya'an daberkhem shav vakhazitem kazab lakhen hini 'aleikhem ne'um 'adonai ihoh. vehayetah yadi 'el hanebi'im hakhozim shav vehaqosemim kazab besod 'ami lo yihyu ubikhtab bet yisra'el lo yikateibu ve'el 'admat yisra'el lo yabo'u vida'tem ki 'ani 'adonai ihoh. ya'an ubeya'an hit'u 'et 'ami leimor shalom ve'en shalom vehu boneh khayiz vehinam takhim 'oto tafel. 'emor 'el takhei tafel veyipol hayah geshem shotef ve'ateinah 'abnei 'elgabish tipolenah veruakh se'arot tebaqeia'. vehineh nafal haqir halo yei'amer 'aleikhem 'ayeh hatiakh 'asher takhtem. lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh ubiqa'ti ruakh se'arot bakhamati vegeshem shotef be'api yihyeh ve'abnei 'elgabish bekheimah lekhalah. veharasti 'et haqir 'asher takhtem tafel vehiga'tihu 'el ha'arez veniglah yesodo venafelah ukhelitem betokhah vida'tem ki 'ani ihoh. vekhileiti 'et khamati baqir ubatakhim 'oto tafel ve'omar lakhem 'en haqir ve'en hatakhim 'oto. nebi'ei yisra'el hanibe'im 'el yerushalim vehakhozim lah khazon shalom ve'en shalom ne'um 'adonai ihoh. ve'atah ben 'adam sim panekha 'el benot 'amekha hamitnabe'ot milibehen vehinabei 'aleihen. ve'amarta koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh ho limtaperot kesatot 'al kal 'azilei yadai ve'osot hamispakhot 'al rosh kal qomah lezoded nefashot hanefashot tezodeidenah le'ami unefashot lakhenah tekhayenah. vatekhalelnah 'oti 'el 'ami besha'alei se'orim ubiftotei lekhem lehamit nefashot 'asher lo temutenah ulekhayot nefashot 'asher lo tikhyenah bekhazebkhem le'ami shome'ei khazab. lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh hini 'el kisetoteikhenah 'asher 'ateinah mezodedot sham 'et hanefashot leforekhot veqara'ti 'otam mei'al zero'oteikhem veshilakhti 'et hanefashot 'asher 'atem mezodedot 'et nefashim leforekhot. veqara'ti 'et mispekhoteikhem vehizalti 'et 'ami miyedkhen velo yihyu 'od beyedkhen limzudah vida'ten ki 'ani ihoh. ya'an hakh'ot leb zadiq sheqer va'ani lo hikh'abtiv ulekhazeq yedei rasha' lebilti shub midarko hara' lehakhayoto. lakhen v lo tekhezenah veqesem lo tiqsamnah 'od vehizalti 'et 'ami miyedkhen vida'ten ki 'ani ihoh. vayabo 'eilai 'anashim miziqnei yisra'el vayeishebu lefanai. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam ha'anashim ha'eleh he'elu giluleihem 'al libam umikhshol 'avonam natenu nokhakh peneihem ha'idarosh 'idaresh lahem. lakhen daber 'otam ve'amarta 'aleihem koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh 'ish 'ish mibet yisra'el 'asher ya'aleh 'et gilulav 'el libo umikhshol 'avono yasim nokhakh panav uba 'el hanabi 'ani ihoh na'aneiti lo bah ba berob gilulav. lema'an tefos 'et bet yisra'el belibam 'asher nazoru mei'alai begiluleihem kulam. lakhen 'emor 'el bet yisra'el koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh shubu vehashibu mei'al giluleikhem umei'al kal to'aboteikhem hashibu feneikhem. ki 'ish 'ish mibet yisra'el umeihager 'asher yagur beyisra'el veyinazer mei'akharai veya'al gilulav 'el libo umikhshol 'avono yasim nokhakh panav uba 'el hanabi lidrash lo bi 'ani ihoh na'aneh lo bi. venatati fanai ba'ish hahu vahasimotihu le'ot velimshalim vehikhrativ mitokh 'ami vida'tem ki 'ani ihoh. vehanabi khi yefuteh vediber dabar 'ani ihoh piteiti 'et hanabi hahu venatiti 'et yadi 'alav vehishmadtiv mitokh 'ami yisra'el. venase'u 'avonam ka'avon hadoresh ka'avon hanabi yihyeh. lema'an lo yit'u 'od bet yisra'el mei'akharai velo yitame'u 'od bekhal pish'eihem vehayu li le'am va'ani 'ehyeh lahem leilohim ne'um 'adonai ihoh. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam 'erez ki tekheta li lim'al ma'al venatiti yadi 'aleha veshabarti lah mateh lakhem vehishlakhti bah ra'ab vehikhrati mimenah 'adam ubeheimah. vehayu sheloshet ha'anashim ha'eleh betokhah noakh dani'el dani'el ve'iyob hemah bezidqatam yenazelu nafsham ne'um 'adonai ihoh. lu khayah ra'ah 'a'abir ba'arez veshikelatah vehayetah shemamah mibeli 'ober mipenei hakhayah. sheloshet ha'anashim ha'eleh betokhah khai 'ani ne'um 'adonai ihoh 'im banim ve'im banot yazilu hemah lebadam yinazeilu veha'arez tihyeh shemamah. 'o khereb 'abi 'al ha'arez hahi ve'amarti khereb ta'abor ba'arez vehikhrati mimenah 'adam ubeheimah. usheloshet ha'anashim ha'eleh betokhah khai 'ani ne'um 'adonai ihoh lo yazilu banim ubanot ki hem lebadam yinazeilu. 'o deber 'ashalakh 'el ha'arez hahi veshafakhti khamati 'aleha bedam lehakhrit mimenah 'adam ubeheimah. venoakh dani'el dani'el ve'iyob betokhah khai 'ani ne'um 'adonai ihoh 'im ben 'im bat yazilu hemah bezidqatam yazilu nafsham. ki khoh 'amar 'adonai ihoh 'af ki 'arba'at shefatai hara'im khereb vera'ab vekhayah ra'ah vadeber shilakhti 'el yerushalim lehakhrit mimenah 'adam ubeheimah. vehineh notrah bah peleitah hamuza'im banim ubanot hinam yoz'im 'aleikhem ure'item 'et darkam ve'et 'alilotam venikhamtem 'al hara'ah 'asher heibeiti 'al yerushalim 'et kal 'asher heibeiti 'aleha. venikhamu 'etkhem ki tir'u 'et darkam ve'et 'alilotam vida'tem ki lo khinam 'asiti 'et kal 'asher 'asiti bah ne'um 'adonai ihoh. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam mah yihyeh 'ez hagefen mikal 'ez hazemorah 'asher hayah ba'azei haya'ar. hayuqakh mimenu 'ez la'asot limlakhah 'im yiqkhu mimenu yated litlot 'alav kal keli. hineh la'esh nitan le'akhlah 'et shenei qezotav 'akhelah ha'esh vetokho nakhar hayizlakh limlakhah. hineh bihyoto tamim lo yei'aseh limlakhah 'af ki 'esh 'akhalathu vayeikhar vena'asah 'od limlakhah. lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh ka'asher 'ez hagefen be'ez haya'ar 'asher netativ la'esh le'akhlah ken natati 'et yoshebei yerushalim. venatati 'et panai bahem meiha'esh yaza'u veha'esh tokhelem vida'tem ki 'ani ihoh besumi 'et panai bahem. venatati 'et ha'arez shemamah ya'an ma'alu ma'al ne'um 'adonai ihoh. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam hoda' 'et yerushalim 'et to'aboteha. ve'amarta koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh lirushalim mekhorotayikh umoledotayikh mei'erez hakena'ani 'abikh ha'emori ve'imekh khitit. umoldotayikh beyom huledet 'otakh lo kharrat sharrekh ubemayim lo rukhazt lemish'i vehameleiakh lo humlakhat vehakhetel lo khutalet. lo khasah 'alayikh 'ayin la'asot lakh 'akhat mei'eleh lekhumlah 'alayikh vatushlekhi 'el penei hasadeh bego'al nafshekh beyom huledet 'otakh. va'e'ebor 'alayikh va'er'ekh mitboseset bedamayikh va'omar lakh bedamayikh khayi va'omar lakh bedamayikh khayi. rebabah kezemakh hasadeh netatikh vatirbi vatigdeli vatabo'i ba'adi 'adayim shadayim nakhonu use'arekh zimeiakh ve'at 'eirom ve'eryah. va'e'ebor 'alayikh va'er'ekh vehineh 'itekh 'et dodim va'efros kenafi 'alayikh va'akhaseh 'ervatekh va'eshaba' lakh va'abo bibrit 'otakh ne'um 'adonai ihoh vatihyi li. va'erkhazekh bamayim va'eshtof damayikh mei'alayikh va'asukhekh bashamen. va'albishekh riqmah va'en'alekh takhash va'ekhbeshekh bashesh va'akhasekh meshi. va'e'dekh 'edi va'etenah zemidim 'al yadayikh verabid 'al geronekh. va'eten nezem 'al 'apekh va'agilim 'al 'azenayikh va'ateret tif'eret beroshekh. vata'di zahab vakhesef umalbushekh sheishi shesh vameshi veriqmah solet udebash vashemen 'akhaleti 'akhalet vatifi bim'od me'od vatizlekhi limlukhah. vayeizei lakh shem bagoyim beyafeyekh ki kalil hu bahadari 'asher samti 'alayikh ne'um 'adonai ihoh. vatibtekhi beyafeyekh vatizni 'al shemekh vatishpekhi 'et taznutayikh 'al kal 'ober lo yehi. vatiqkhi mibegadayikh vata'asi lakh bamot telu'ot vatizni 'aleihem lo ba'ot velo yihyeh. vatiqkhi kelei tif'artekh mizehabi umikaspi 'asher natati lakh vata'asi lakh zalmei zakhar vatizni bam. vatiqkhi 'et bigdei riqmatekh vatekhasim veshamni uqetareti natati natat lifneihem. velakhmi 'asher natati lakh solet vashemen udebash he'ekhaltikh unetatihu lifneihem lereiakh nikhoakh vayehi ne'um 'adonai ihoh. vatiqkhi 'et banayikh ve'et benotayikh 'asher yaladt li vatizbakhim lahem le'ekhol ham'at mitaznutekh mitaznutayikh. vatishkhati 'et banai vatitenim beha'abir 'otam lahem. ve'et kal to'abotayikh vetaznutayikh lo zakharti zakhart 'et yemei ne'urayikh bihyotekh 'eirom ve'eryah mitboseset bedamekh hayit. vayhi 'akharei kal ra'atekh 'o 'o lakh ne'um 'adonai ihoh. vatibni lakh geb vata'asi lakh ramah bekhal rekhob. 'el kal rosh derekh banit ramatekh vateta'abi 'et yafeyekh vatefaseqi 'et raglayikh lekhal 'ober vatarbi 'et taznutekh taznutayikh. vatizni 'el benei mizrayim shekheinayikh gidlei basar vatarbi 'et taznutekh lehakh'iseini. vehineh natiti yadi 'alayikh va'egra' khuqekh va'etenekh benefesh sone'otayikh benot pelishtim hanikhlamot midarkekh zimah. vatizni 'el benei 'ashur mibilti sabe'atekh vatiznim vegam lo saba'at. vatarbi 'et taznutekh 'el 'erez kena'an kasdimah vegam bezot lo saba'at. mah 'amulah libatekh ne'um 'adonai ihoh ba'asotekh 'et kal 'eleh ma'aseh 'ishah zonah shalatet. bibnotayikh gabekh berosh kal derekh veramatekh 'asiti 'asit bekhal rekhob velo hayit hayit kazonah leqales 'etnan. ha'ishah hamena'afet takhat 'ishah tiqakh 'et zarim. lekhal zonot yitenu neideh ve'at natat 'et nedanayikh lekhal me'ahabayikh vatishkhodi 'otam labo 'eilayikh misabib betaznutayikh. vayhi bakh heifekh min hanashim betaznutayikh ve'akharayikh lo zunah ubetitekh 'etnan ve'etnan lo nitan lakh vatehi lehefekh. lakhen zonah shim'i debar ihoh. koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh ya'an hishafekh nekhushtekh vatigaleh 'ervatekh betaznutayikh 'al me'ahabayikh ve'al kal gilulei to'abotayikh vekhidmei banayikh 'asher natat lahem. lakhen hini meqabez 'et kal me'ahabayikh 'asher 'arabt 'aleihem ve'et kal 'asher 'ahabt 'al kal 'asher sanet veqibazti 'otam 'alayikh misabib vegileiti 'ervatekh 'aleihem vera'u 'et kal 'ervatekh. ushefatikh mishpetei no'afot veshofekhot dam unetatikh dam kheimah veqin'ah. venatati 'otakh beyadam veharesu gabekh venitezu ramotayikh vehifshitu 'otakh begadayikh velaqekhu kelei tif'artekh vehinikhukh 'eirom ve'eryah. vehe'elu 'alayikh qahal veragemu 'otakh ba'aben ubitequkh bekharbotam. vesarefu batayikh ba'esh ve'asu bakh shefatim le'einei nashim rabot vehishbatikh mizonah vegam 'etnan lo titeni 'od. vahanikhoti khamati bakh vesarah qin'ati mimekh veshaqati velo 'ekh'as 'od. ya'an 'asher lo zakharti zakhart 'et yemei ne'urayikh vatirgezi li bekhal 'eleh vegam 'ani hei darkekh berosh natati ne'um 'adonai ihoh velo 'asiti 'asit 'et hazimah 'al kal to'abotayikh. hineh kal hamoshel 'alayikh yimshol leimor ke'imah bitah. bat 'imekh 'at go'elet 'ishah ubaneha va'akhot 'akhotekh 'at 'asher ga'alu 'ansheihen ubeneihen 'imekhen khitit va'abikhen 'emori. va'akhotekh hagedolah shomeron hi ubenoteha hayoshebet 'al semolekh va'akhotekh haqetanah mimekh hayoshebet miminekh sedom ubenoteha. velo bedarkheihen halakht ubeto'aboteihen 'asiti 'asit kim'at qat vatashkhiti meihen bekhal derakhayikh. khai 'ani ne'um 'adonai ihoh 'im 'asetah sedom 'akhotekh hi ubenoteha ka'asher 'asit 'at ubenotayikh. hineh zeh hayah 'avon sedom 'akhotekh ga'on sib'at lekhem veshalvat hashqet hayah lah velibnoteha veyad 'ani ve'ebyon lo hekheziqah. vatigbehenah vata'asenah to'eibah lefanai va'asir 'ethen ka'asher ra'iti. veshomeron kakhazi khatotayikh lo khata'ah vatarbi 'et to'abotayikh meihenah vatezadeqi 'et 'akhotekh 'akhotayikh bekhal to'abotayikh 'asher 'asit 'asit. gam 'at se'i khelimatekh 'asher pilalt la'akhotekh bekhatotayikh 'asher hit'abt meihen tizdaqnah mimekh vegam 'at boshi use'i khelimatekh bezadeqtekh 'akhyotekh. veshabti 'et shebitehen 'et shebit shebut sedom ubenoteha ve'et shebit shebut shomeron ubenoteha ushebit ushebut shebitayikh betokhahenah. lema'an tis'i khelimatekh venikhlamt mikol 'asher 'asit benakhamekh 'otan. va'akhotayikh sedom ubenoteha tashobena leqadmatan veshomeron ubenoteha tashobena leqadmatan ve'at ubenotayikh teshubenah leqadmatkhen. velo hayetah sedom 'akhotekh lishmu'ah befikh beyom ge'onayikh. beterem tigaleh ra'atekh kemo 'et kherpat benot 'aram vekhal sebiboteha benot pelishtim hashatot 'otakh misabib. 'et zimatekh ve'et to'abotayikh 'at nesatim ne'um ihoh. ki khoh 'amar 'adonai ihoh ve'asit ve'asiti 'otakh ka'asher 'asit 'asher bazit 'alah lehafer berit. vezakharti 'ani 'et beriti 'otakh bimei ne'urayikh vahaqimoti lakh berit 'olam. vezakhart 'et derakhayikh venikhlamt beqakhtekh 'et 'akhotayikh hagedolot mimekh 'el haqetanot mimekh venatati 'ethen lakh lebanot velo miberitekh. vahaqimoti 'ani 'et beriti 'itakh veyada'at ki 'ani ihoh. lema'an tizkeri vaboshet velo yihyeh lakh 'od pitkhon peh mipenei kelimatekh bekhaperi lakh lekhal 'asher 'asit ne'um 'adonai ihoh. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam khud khidah umeshol mashal 'el bet yisra'el. ve'amarta koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh hanesher hagadol gedol hakenafayim 'erekh ha'eiber malei hanozah 'asher lo hariqmah ba 'el halebanon vayiqakh 'et zameret ha'arez. 'et rosh yeniqotav qataf vaybi'eihu 'el 'erez kena'an be'ir rokhelim samo. vayiqakh mizera' ha'arez vayiteneihu bisdeh zara' qakh 'al mayim rabim zafzafah samo. vayizmakh vayhi legefen sorakhat shiflat qomah lifnot daliyotav 'eilav vesharashav takhtav yihyu vatehi legefen vata'as badim vateshalakh porot. vayhi nesher 'ekhad gadol gedol kenafayim verab nozah vehineh hagefen hazot kafenah sharosheha 'alav vedaliyotav shilkhah lo lehashqot 'otah mei'arugot mata'ah. 'el sadeh tob 'el mayim rabim hi shetulah la'asot 'anaf velaset peri lihyot legefen 'adaret. 'emor koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh tizlakh halo 'et sharasheha yenateq ve'et piryah yeqoses veyabesh kal tarpei zimkhah tibash velo bizroa' gedolah ube'am rab lemas'ot 'otah misharasheha. vehineh shetulah hatizlakh halo khega'at bah ruakh haqadim tibash yabosh 'al 'arugot zimkhah tibash. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. 'emar na lebet hameri halo yeda'tem mah 'eleh 'emor hineh ba melekh babel yerushalim vayiqakh 'et malkah ve'et sareha vayabei 'otam 'eilav babelah. vayiqakh mizera' hamelukhah vayikhrot 'ito berit vayabei 'oto be'alah ve'et 'eilei ha'arez laqakh. lihyot mamlakhah shefalah lebilti hitnasei lishmor 'et berito le'amedah. vayimrad bo lishloakh mal'akhav mizrayim latet lo susim ve'am rab hayizlakh hayimalet ha'oseh 'eleh veheifer berit venimlat. khai 'ani ne'um 'adonai ihoh 'im lo bimqom hamelekh hamamlikh 'oto 'asher bazah 'et 'alato va'asher heifer 'et berito 'ito betokh babel yamut. velo bekhayil gadol ubeqahal rab ya'aseh 'oto far'oh bamilkhamah bishpokh solelah ubibnot dayeq lehakhrit nefashot rabot. ubazah 'alah lehafer berit vehineh natan yado vekhal 'eleh 'asah lo yimalet. lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh khai 'ani 'im lo 'alati 'asher bazah uberiti 'asher heifir unetativ berosho. ufarasti 'alav rishti venitpas bimzudati vahabi'otihu babelah venishpati 'ito sham ma'alo 'asher ma'al bi. ve'et kal mibrakho mibrakhav bekhal 'agapav bakhereb yipolu vehanish'arim lekhal ruakh yipareisu vida'tem ki 'ani ihoh dibarti. koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh velaqakhti 'ani mizameret ha'erez haramah venatati meirosh yoneqotav rakh 'eqtof veshatalti 'ani 'al har gaboha vetalul. behar merom yisra'el 'eshtolenu venasa 'anaf ve'asah feri vehayah le'erez 'adir veshakhenu takhtav kol zipor kal kanaf bezel daliyotav tishkonah. veyade'u kal 'azei hasadeh ki 'ani ihoh hishpalti 'ez gaboha higbahti 'ez shafal hobashti 'ez lakh vehifrakhti 'ez yabesh 'ani ihoh dibarti ve'asiti. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. mah lakhem 'atem moshelim 'et hamashal hazeh 'al 'admat yisra'el leimor 'abot yokhelu boser veshinei habanim tiqhenah. khai 'ani ne'um 'adonai ihoh 'im yihyeh lakhem 'od meshol hamashal hazeh beyisra'el. hen kal hanefashot li henah kenefesh ha'ab ukhenefesh haben li henah hanefesh hakhotet hi tamut. ve'ish ki yihyeh zadiq ve'asah mishpat uzedaqah. 'el heharim lo 'akhal ve'einav lo nasa 'el gilulei bet yisra'el ve'et 'eishet rei'eihu lo timei ve'el 'ishah nidah lo yiqrab. ve'ish lo yoneh khabolato khob yashib gezeilah lo yigzol lakhmo lera'eb yiten ve'eirom yekhaseh baged. baneshekh lo yiten vetarbit lo yiqakh mei'avel yashib yado mishpat 'emet ya'aseh ben 'ish le'ish. bekhuqotai yehalekh umishpatai shamar la'asot 'emet zadiq hu khayoh yikhyeh ne'um 'adonai ihoh. veholid ben pariz shofekh dam ve'asah 'akh mei'akhad mei'eleh. vehu 'et kal 'eleh lo 'asah ki gam 'el heharim 'akhal ve'et 'eishet rei'eihu timei. 'ani ve'ebyon honah gezeilot gazal khabol lo yashib ve'el hagilulim nasa 'einav to'eibah 'asah. baneshekh natan vetarbit laqakh vakhai lo yikhyeh 'et kal hato'eibot ha'eleh 'asah mot yumat damav bo yihyeh. vehineh holid ben vayar 'et kal khatot 'abiv 'asher 'asah vayir'eh velo ya'aseh kahen. 'al heharim lo 'akhal ve'einav lo nasa 'el gilulei bet yisra'el 'et 'eishet rei'eihu lo timei. ve'ish lo honah khabol lo khabal ugezeilah lo gazal lakhmo lera'eb natan ve'eirom kisah baged. mei'ani heishib yado neshekh vetarbit lo laqakh mishpatai 'asah bekhuqotai halakh hu lo yamut ba'avon 'abiv khayoh yikhyeh. 'abiv ki 'ashaq 'osheq gazal geizel 'akh va'asher lo tob 'asah betokh 'amav vehineh met ba'avono. va'amartem madua' lo nasa haben ba'avon ha'ab vehaben mishpat uzedaqah 'asah 'et kal khuqotai shamar vaya'aseh 'otam khayoh yikhyeh. hanefesh hakhotet hi tamut ben lo yisa ba'avon ha'ab ve'ab lo yisa ba'avon haben zidqat hazadiq 'alav tihyeh verish'at rasha' harasha' 'alav tihyeh. veharasha' ki yashub mikal khatato khatotav 'asher 'asah veshamar 'et kal khuqotai ve'asah mishpat uzedaqah khayoh yikhyeh lo yamut. kal pesha'av 'asher 'asah lo yizakheru lo bezidqato 'asher 'asah yikhyeh. hekhafoz 'ekhpoz mot rasha' ne'um 'adonai ihoh halo beshubo miderakhav vekhayah. ubeshub zadiq mizidqato ve'asah 'avel kekhol hato'eibot 'asher 'asah harasha' ya'aseh vakhai kal zidqato zidqotav 'asher 'asah lo tizakharnah bema'alo 'asher ma'al ubekhatato 'asher khata bam yamut. va'amartem lo yitakhen derekh 'adonai shim'u na bet yisra'el hadarki lo yitakhen halo darkheikhem lo yitakheinu. beshub zadiq mizidqato ve'asah 'avel umet 'aleihem be'avlo 'asher 'asah yamut. ubeshub rasha' meirish'ato 'asher 'asah vaya'as mishpat uzedaqah hu 'et nafsho yekhayeh. vayir'eh vayashob vayashab mikal pesha'av 'asher 'asah khayo yikhyeh lo yamut. ve'ameru bet yisra'el lo yitakhen derekh 'adonai haderakhai lo yitakhenu bet yisra'el halo darkheikhem lo yitakhen. lakhen 'ish kidrakhav 'eshpot 'etkhem bet yisra'el ne'um 'adonai ihoh shubu vehashibu mikal pish'eikhem velo yihyeh lakhem lemikhshol 'avon. hashlikhu mei'aleikhem 'et kal pish'eikhem 'asher pesha'tem bam va'asu lakhem leb khadash veruakh khadashah velamah tamutu bet yisra'el. ki lo 'ekhpoz bemot hamet ne'um 'adonai ihoh vehashibu vikhyu. ve'atah sa qinah 'el nesi'ei yisra'el. ve'amarta mah 'imekha lebiya ben 'arayot rabazah betokh kefirim ribetah gureha. vata'al 'ekhad migureha kefir hayah vayilmad litraf teref 'adam 'akhal. vayishme'u 'eilav goyim beshakhtam nitpas vaybi'uhu bakhakhim 'el 'erez mizrayim. vateire ki nokhalah 'abedah tiqvatah vatiqakh 'ekhad migureha kefir samatehu. vayithalekh betokh 'arayot kefir hayah vayilmad litraf teref 'adam 'akhal. vayeida' 'almenotav ve'areihem hekherib vateisham 'erez umelo'ah miqol sha'agato. vayitenu 'alav goyim sabib mimedinot vayifresu 'alav rishtam beshakhtam nitpas. vayitenuhu basugar bakhakhim vaybi'uhu 'el melekh babel yebi'uhu bamezodot lema'an lo yishama' qolo 'od 'el harei yisra'el. 'imekha khagefen bedamekha 'al mayim shetulah poriyah va'aneifah hayetah mimayim rabim. vayihyu lah matot 'oz 'el shibtei moshelim vatigbah qomato 'al ben 'abotim vayeira begabeho berob daliyotav. vatutash bekheimah la'arez hushlakhah veruakh haqadim hobish piryah hitparequ veyabeishu mateh 'uzah 'esh 'akhalatehu. ve'atah shetulah bamidbar be'erez ziyah vezama. vateizei 'esh mimateh badeha piryah 'akhalah velo hayah bah mateh 'oz sheibet limshol qinah hi vatehi leqinah. vayhi bashanah hashebi'it bakhamishi be'asor lakhodesh ba'u 'anashim miziqnei yisra'el lidrosh 'et ihoh vayeishebu lefanai. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam daber 'et ziqnei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh halidrosh 'oti 'atem ba'im khai 'ani 'im 'idaresh lakhem ne'um 'adonai ihoh. hatishpot 'otam hatishpot ben 'adam 'et to'abot 'abotam hodi'em. ve'amarta 'aleihem koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh beyom bakhori beyisra'el va'esa yadi lezera' bet ya'aqob va'ivada' lahem be'erez mizrayim va'esa yadi lahem leimor 'ani ihoh 'eloheikhem. bayom hahu nasati yadi lahem lehozi'am mei'erez mizrayim 'el 'erez 'asher tarti lahem zabat khalab udebash zebi hi lekhal ha'arazot. va'omar 'aleihem 'ish shiquzei 'einav hashlikhu ubegilulei mizrayim 'al titama'u 'ani ihoh 'eloheikhem. vayamru bi velo 'abu lishmoa' 'eilai 'ish 'et shiquzei 'eineihem lo hishlikhu ve'et gilulei mizrayim lo 'azabu va'omar lishpokh khamati 'aleihem lekhalot 'api bahem betokh 'erez mizrayim. va'a'as lema'an shemi lebilti heikhel le'einei hagoyim 'asher hemah betokham 'asher noda'ti 'aleihem le'eineihem lehozi'am mei'erez mizrayim. va'ozi'em mei'erez mizrayim va'abi'em 'el hamidbar. va'eten lahem 'et khuqotai ve'et mishpatai hoda'ti 'otam 'asher ya'aseh 'otam ha'adam vakhai bahem. vegam 'et shabetotai natati lahem lihyot le'ot beini ubeineihem lada'at ki 'ani ihoh meqadesham. vayamru bi bet yisra'el bamidbar bekhuqotai lo halakhu ve'et mishpatai ma'asu 'asher ya'aseh 'otam ha'adam vakhai bahem ve'et shabetotai khilelu me'od va'omar lishpokh khamati 'aleihem bamidbar lekhalotam. va'e'eseh lema'an shemi lebilti heikhel le'einei hagoyim 'asher hozeitim le'eineihem. vegam 'ani nasati yadi lahem bamidbar lebilti habi 'otam 'el ha'arez 'asher natati zabat khalab udebash zebi hi lekhal ha'arazot. ya'an bemishpatai ma'asu ve'et khuqotai lo halekhu bahem ve'et shabetotai khileilu ki 'akharei giluleihem libam holekh. vatakhas 'eini 'aleihem mishakhatam velo 'asiti 'otam kalah bamidbar. va'omar 'el beneihem bamidbar bekhuqei 'aboteikhem 'al teileikhu ve'et mishpeteihem 'al tishmoru ubegiluleihem 'al titama'u. 'ani ihoh 'eloheikhem bekhuqotai leikhu ve'et mishpatai shimru va'asu 'otam. ve'et shabetotai qadeishu vehayu le'ot beini ubeineikhem lada'at ki 'ani ihoh 'eloheikhem. vayamru bi habanim bekhuqotai lo halakhu ve'et mishpatai lo shameru la'asot 'otam 'asher ya'aseh 'otam ha'adam vakhai bahem 'et shabetotai khileilu va'omar lishpokh khamati 'aleihem lekhalot 'api bam bamidbar. vahashiboti 'et yadi va'a'as lema'an shemi lebilti heikhel le'einei hagoyim 'asher hozeiti 'otam le'eineihem. gam 'ani nasati 'et yadi lahem bamidbar lehafiz 'otam bagoyim ulezarot 'otam ba'arazot. ya'an mishpatai lo 'asu vekhuqotai ma'asu ve'et shabetotai khileilu ve'akharei gilulei 'abotam hayu 'eineihem. vegam 'ani natati lahem khuqim lo tobim umishpatim lo yikhyu bahem. va'atamei 'otam bematenotam beha'abir kal peter rakham lema'an 'ashimem lema'an 'asher yeide'u 'asher 'ani ihoh. lakhen daber 'el bet yisra'el ben 'adam ve'amarta 'aleihem koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh 'od zot gidefu 'oti 'aboteikhem bema'alam bi ma'al. va'abi'em 'el ha'arez 'asher nasati 'et yadi latet 'otah lahem vayir'u khal gib'ah ramah vekhal 'ez 'abot vayizbekhu sham 'et zibkheihem vayitenu sham ka'as qarebanam vayasimu sham reiakh nikhokheihem vayasikhu sham 'et niskeihem. va'omar 'aleihem mah habamah 'asher 'atem haba'im sham vayiqarei shemah bamah 'ad hayom hazeh. lakhen 'emor 'el bet yisra'el koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh habederekh 'aboteikhem 'atem nitme'im ve'akharei shiquzeihem 'atem zonim. ubis'et matenoteikhem beha'abir beneikhem ba'esh 'atem nitme'im lekhal giluleikhem 'ad hayom va'ani 'idaresh lakhem bet yisra'el khai 'ani ne'um 'adonai ihoh 'im 'idaresh lakhem. veha'olah 'al rukhakhem hayo lo tihyeh 'asher 'atem 'omerim nihyeh khagoyim kemishpekhot ha'arazot lesharet 'ez va'aben. khai 'ani ne'um 'adonai ihoh 'im lo beyad khazaqah ubizroa' netuyah ubekheimah shefukhah 'emlokh 'aleikhem. vehozeiti 'etkhem min ha'amim veqibazti 'etkhem min ha'arazot 'asher nefozotem bam beyad khazaqah ubizroa' netuyah ubekheimah shefukhah. veheibeiti 'etkhem 'el midbar ha'amim venishpati 'itekhem sham panim 'el panim. ka'asher nishpati 'et 'aboteikhem bemidbar 'erez mizrayim ken 'ishafet 'itekhem ne'um 'adonai ihoh. veha'abarti 'etkhem takhat hashabet veheibeiti 'etkhem bemasoret haberit. ubaroti mikem hamoredim vehaposhe'im bi mei'erez megureihem 'ozi 'otam ve'el 'admat yisra'el lo yabo vida'tem ki 'ani ihoh. ve'atem bet yisra'el koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh 'ish gilulav lekhu 'abodu ve'akhar 'im 'einekhem shome'im 'eilai ve'et shem qadshi lo tekhalelu 'od bematenoteikhem ubegiluleikhem. ki behar qadshi behar merom yisra'el ne'um 'adonai ihoh sham ya'abduni kal bet yisra'el kuloh ba'arez sham 'erzem vesham 'edrosh 'et terumoteikhem ve'et reishit mas'oteikhem bekhal qadesheikhem. bereiakh nikhoakh 'erzeh 'etkhem behozi'i 'etkhem min ha'amim veqibazti 'etkhem min ha'arazot 'asher nefozotem bam veniqdashti bakhem le'einei hagoyim. vida'tem ki 'ani ihoh bahabi'i 'etkhem 'el 'admat yisra'el 'el ha'arez 'asher nasati 'et yadi latet 'otah la'aboteikhem. uzekhartem sham 'et darkheikhem ve'et kal 'aliloteikhem 'asher nitmeitem bam uneqototem bifneikhem bekhal ra'oteikhem 'asher 'asitem. vida'tem ki 'ani ihoh ba'asoti 'itekhem lema'an shemi lo khedarkheikhem hara'im vekha'aliloteikhem hanishkhatot bet yisra'el ne'um 'adonai ihoh. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam sim panekha derekh teimanah vehatef 'el darom vehinabei 'el ya'ar hasadeh negeb. ve'amarta leya'ar hanegeb shema' debar ihoh koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh hini mazit bekha 'esh ve'akhelah bekha khal 'ez lakh vekhal 'ez yabesh lo tikhbeh lahebet shalhebet venizrebu bah kal panim minegeb zafonah. vera'u kal basar ki 'ani ihoh bi'artiha lo tikhbeh. va'omar 'ahah 'adonai ihoh hemah 'omerim li halo memashel meshalim hu. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam sim panekha 'el yerushalim vehatef 'el miqdashim vehinabei 'el 'admat yisra'el. ve'amarta le'admat yisra'el koh 'amar ihoh hini 'eilayikh vehozeiti kharbi mita'rah vehikhrati mimekh zadiq verasha'. ya'an 'asher hikhrati mimekh zadiq verasha' lakhen teizei kharbi mita'rah 'el kal basar minegeb zafon. veyade'u kal basar ki 'ani ihoh hozeiti kharbi mita'rah lo tashub 'od. ve'atah ben 'adam hei'anakh beshibron matenayim ubimrirut tei'anakh le'eineihem. vehayah ki yomeru 'eilekha 'al mah 'atah ne'enakh ve'amarta 'el shemu'ah khi ba'ah venames kal leb verafu khal yadayim vekhihatah khal ruakh vekhal birkayim teilakhnah mayim hineh ba'ah venihyatah ne'um 'adonai ihoh. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam hinabei ve'amarta koh 'amar 'adonai 'emor khereb khereb hukhadah vegam merutah. lema'an teboakh tebakh hukhadah lema'an heyeh lah baraq moratah 'o nasis sheibet beni mo'eset kal 'ez. vayiten 'otah lemaretah litpos bakaf hi hukhadah khereb vehi moratah latet 'otah beyad horeg. ze'aq veheilel ben 'adam ki hi haytah be'ami hi bekhal nesi'ei yisra'el megurei 'el khereb hayu 'et 'ami lakhen sefoq 'el yarekh. ki bokhan umah 'im gam sheibet mo'eset lo yihyeh ne'um 'adonai ihoh. ve'atah ben 'adam hinabei vehakh kaf 'el kaf vetikafel khereb shelishitah khereb khalalim hi khereb khalal hagadol hakhoderet lahem. lema'an lamug leb veharbeh hamikhsholim 'al kal sha'areihem natati 'ibkhat khareb 'akh 'asuyah lebaraq me'utah letabakh. hit'akhadi heimini hasimi hasmili 'anah panayikh mu'adot. vegam 'ani 'akeh khapi 'el kapi vahanikhoti khamati 'ani ihoh dibarti. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ve'atah ben 'adam sim lekha shenayim derakhim labo khereb melekh babel mei'erez 'ekhad yeize'u sheneihem veyad barei berosh derekh 'ir barei. derekh tasim labo khereb 'et rabat benei 'amon ve'et yehudah birushalim bezurah. ki 'amad melekh babel 'el 'em haderekh berosh shenei haderakhim liqsam qasem qilqal bakhizim sha'al baterafim ra'ah bakabed. bimino hayah haqesem yerushalim lasum karim liftoakh peh berezakh leharim qol bitru'ah lasum karim 'al she'arim lishpokh solelah libnot dayeq. vehayah lahem kiqsom kiqsam shav be'eineihem shebu'ei shebu'ot lahem vehu mazkir 'avon lehitafes. lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh ya'an hazkarkhem 'avonekhem behigalot pish'eikhem leheira'ot khatoteikhem bekhol 'aliloteikhem ya'an hizakherkhem bakaf titafeisu. ve'atah khalal rasha' nesi yisra'el 'asher ba yomo be'et 'avon qez. koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh hasir hamiznefet veharim ha'atarah zot lo zot hashafalah hagbeiha vehagaboha hashpil. 'avah 'avah 'avah 'asimenah gam zot lo hayah 'ad bo 'asher lo hamishpat unetativ. ve'atah ben 'adam hinabei ve'amarta koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh 'el benei 'amon ve'el kherpatam ve'amarta khereb khereb petukhah letebakh merutah lehakhil lema'an baraq. bakhazot lakh shav biqsam lakh kazab latet 'otakh 'el zaverei khalei resha'im 'asher ba yomam be'et 'avon qez. hashab 'el ta'rah bimqom 'asher nibret be'erez mekhurotayikh 'eshpot 'otakh. veshafakhti 'alayikh za'mi be'esh 'ebrati 'afiakh 'alayikh unetatikh beyad 'anashim bo'arim kharashei mashkhit. la'esh tihyeh le'akhlah damekh yihyeh betokh ha'arez lo tizakheiri ki 'ani ihoh dibarti. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ve'atah ben 'adam hatishpot hatishpot 'et 'ir hadamim vehoda'tah 'et kal to'aboteha. ve'amarta koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh 'ir shofekhet dam betokhah labo 'itah ve'asetah gilulim 'aleha letame'ah. bedamekh 'asher shafakht 'ashamt ubegilulayikh 'asher 'asit tamet vataqribi yamayikh vatabo 'ad shenotayikh 'al ken netatikh kherpah lagoyim veqalasah lekhal ha'arazot. haqerobot veharekhoqot mimekh yitqalesu bakh temei'at hashem rabat hamehumah. hineh nesi'ei yisra'el 'ish lizro'o hayu bakh lema'an shefakh dam. 'ab va'em heiqalu bakh lager 'asu ba'osheq betokhekh yatom ve'almanah honu bakh. qadashai bazit ve'et shabetotai khilalet. 'anshei rakhil hayu bakh lema'an shefakh dam ve'el heharim 'akhelu bakh zimah 'asu betokhekh. 'ervat 'ab gilah bakh temei'at hanidah 'inu bakh. ve'ish 'et 'eishet rei'eihu 'asah to'eibah ve'ish 'et kalato timei bezimah ve'ish 'et 'akhoto bat 'abiv 'inah bakh. shokhad laqekhu bakh lema'an shefakh dam neshekh vetarbit laqakhat vatebaze'i rei'ayikh ba'osheq ve'oti shakhakhat ne'um 'adonai ihoh. vehineh hikeiti khapi 'el biz'ekh 'asher 'asit ve'al damekh 'asher hayu betokhekh. haya'amod libekh 'im tekhezaqnah yadayikh layamim 'asher 'ani 'oseh 'otakh 'ani ihoh dibarti ve'asiti. vahafizoti 'otakh bagoyim vezeiritikh ba'arazot vahatimoti tum'atekh mimekh. venikhalt bakh le'einei goyim veyada'at ki 'ani ihoh. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam hayu li bet yisra'el lesug lesig kulam nekhoshet ubedil ubarzel ve'oferet betokh kur sigim kesef hayu. lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh ya'an heyot kulekhem lesigim lakhen hini qobez 'etkhem 'el tokh yerushalim. qebuzat kesef unekhoshet ubarzel ve'oferet ubedil 'el tokh kur lafakhat 'alav 'esh lehantikh ken 'eqboz be'api ubakhamati vehinakhti vehitakhti 'etkhem. vekhinasti 'etkhem venafakhti 'aleikhem be'esh 'ebrati venitakhtem betokhah. kehitukh kesef betokh kur ken tutekhu betokhah vida'tem ki 'ani ihoh shafakhti khamati 'aleikhem. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam 'emar lah 'at 'erez lo metoharah hi lo gushmah beyom za'am. qesher nebi'eha betokhah ka'ari sho'eg toref taref nefesh 'akhalu khosen viqar yiqakhu 'almenoteha hirbu betokhah. kohaneha khamesu torati vaykhalelu qadashai ben qodesh lekhol lo hibdilu uben hatamei letahor lo hodi'u umishabetotai he'limu 'eineihem va'eikhal betokham. sareha beqirbah kiz'eibim torefei taref lishpakh dam le'abed nefashot lema'an bezoa' baza'. unebi'eha takhu lahem tafel khozim shav veqosemim lahem kazab 'omerim koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh ihoh lo diber. 'am ha'arez 'ashequ 'osheq vegazelu gazel ve'ani ve'ebyon honu ve'et hager 'ashequ belo mishpat. va'abaqesh meihem 'ish goder gader ve'omed baperez lefanai be'ad ha'arez lebilti shakhatah velo mazati. va'eshpokh 'aleihem za'mi be'esh 'ebrati kilitim darkam berosham natati ne'um 'adonai ihoh. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam shetayim nashim benot 'em 'akhat hayu. vatiznenah bemizrayim bin'ureihen zanu mah mo'akhu shedeihen vesham 'isu dadei betuleihen. ushemotan 'aholah hagedolah ve'aholibah 'akhotah vatihyenah li vateiladnah banim ubanot ushemotan shomeron 'aholah virushalim 'aholibah. vatizen 'aholah takhtai vata'gab 'al me'ahabeha 'el 'ashur qerobim. lebushei tekheilet pakhot useganim bakhurei khemed kulam parashim rokhebei susim. vatiten taznuteha 'aleihem mibkhar benei 'ashur kulam ubekhol 'asher 'agebah bekhal giluleihem nitma'ah. ve'et taznuteha mimizrayim lo 'azabah ki 'otah shakhebu bin'ureha vehemah 'isu dadei betuleha vayishpekhu taznutam 'aleha. lakhen netatiha beyad me'ahabeha beyad benei 'ashur 'asher 'agebah 'aleihem. hemah gilu 'ervatah baneha ubenoteha laqakhu ve'otah bakhereb haragu vatehi shem lanashim ushefutim 'asu bah. vateire 'akhotah 'aholibah vatashkhet 'agbatah mimenah ve'et taznuteha mizenunei 'akhotah. 'el benei 'ashur 'agabah pakhot useganim qerobim lebushei mikhlol parashim rokhebei susim bakhurei khemed kulam. va'eire ki nitma'ah derekh 'ekhad lishteihen. vatosef 'el taznuteha vateire 'anshei mekhuqeh 'al haqir zalmei khasdiyim khasdim khaquqim bashashar. khagorei 'eizor bemateneihem serukhei tebulim berasheihem mar'eh shalishim kulam demut benei babel kasdim 'erez moladtam. vata'gab vata'gebah 'aleihem lemar'eh 'eineha vatishlakh mal'akhim 'aleihem kasdimah. vayabo'u 'eileha benei babel lemishkab dodim vaytame'u 'otah betaznutam vatitma bam vateiqa' nafshah meihem. vategal taznuteha vategal 'et 'ervatah vateiqa' nafshi mei'aleha ka'asher naqe'ah nafshi mei'al 'akhotah. vatarbeh 'et taznuteha lizkor 'et yemei ne'ureha 'asher zanetah be'erez mizrayim. vata'gebah 'al pilagsheihem 'asher besar khamorim besaram vezirmat susim zirmatam. vatifqedi 'et zimat ne'urayikh ba'sot mimizrayim dadayikh lema'an shedei ne'urayikh. lakhen 'aholibah koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh hini mei'ir 'et me'ahabayikh 'alayikh 'et 'asher naqe'ah nafshekh meihem vahabeitim 'alayikh misabib. benei babel vekhal kasdim peqod veshoa' veqoa' kal benei 'ashur 'otam bakhurei khemed pakhot useganim kulam shalishim uqeru'im rokhebei susim kulam. uba'u 'alayikh hozen rekheb vegalgal ubiqhal 'amim zinah umagen veqoba' yasimu 'alayikh sabib venatati lifneihem mishpat ushefatukh bemishpeteihem. venatati qin'ati bakh ve'asu 'otakh bekheimah 'apekh ve'azenayikh yasiru ve'akharitekh bakhereb tipol hemah banayikh ubenotayikh yiqakhu ve'akharitekh tei'akhel ba'esh. vehifshitukh 'et begadayikh velaqekhu kelei tif'artekh. vehishbati zimatekh mimekh ve'et zenutekh mei'erez mizrayim velo tis'i 'einayikh 'aleihem umizrayim lo tizkeri 'od. ki khoh 'amar 'adonai ihoh hini notenakh beyad 'asher sanet beyad 'asher naqe'ah nafshekh meihem. ve'asu 'otakh besin'ah velaqekhu kal yegi'ekh va'azabukh 'eirom ve'eryah veniglah 'ervat zenunayikh vezimatekh vetaznutayikh. 'asoh 'eleh lakh biznotekh 'akharei goyim 'al 'asher nitmet begiluleihem. bederekh 'akhotekh halakhet venatati khosah beyadekh. koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh kos 'akhotekh tishti ha'amuqah veharekhabah tihyeh lizkhoq ulela'ag mirbah lehakhil. shikaron veyagon timalei'i kos shamah ushemamah kos 'akhotekh shomeron. veshatit 'otah umazit ve'et kharaseha tegareimi veshadayikh tenateiqi ki 'ani dibarti ne'um 'adonai ihoh. lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh ya'an shakhakhat 'oti vatashlikhi 'oti 'akharei gavekh vegam 'at se'i zimatekh ve'et taznutayikh. vayomer ihoh 'eilai ben 'adam hatishpot 'et 'aholah ve'et 'aholibah vehaged lahen 'et to'aboteihen. ki ni'eifu vedam bideihen ve'et giluleihen ni'eifu vegam 'et beneihen 'asher yaledu li he'ebiru lahem le'akhlah 'od zot 'asu li time'u 'et miqdashi bayom hahu ve'et shabetotai khileilu. ubeshakhatam 'et beneihem legiluleihem vayabo'u 'el miqdashi bayom hahu lekhalelo vehineh khoh 'asu betokh beiti. ve'af ki tishlakhnah la'anashim ba'im mimerkhaq 'asher mal'akh shaluakh 'aleihem vehineh ba'u la'asher rakhazt kakhalt 'einayikh ve'adit 'edi. veyashabt 'al mitah khebudah veshulkhan 'arukh lefaneha uqetareti veshamni samt 'aleha. veqol hamon shalev bah ve'el 'anashim meirob 'adam muba'im soba'im saba'im mimidbar vayitenu zemidim 'el yedeihen va'ateret tif'eret 'al rasheihen. va'omar labalah ni'ufim 'ata 'atah yiznuh yiznu taznuteha vahi. vayabo 'eileha kebo 'el 'ishah zonah ken ba'u 'el 'aholah ve'el 'aholibah 'ishot hazimah. va'anashim zadiqim hemah yishpetu 'othem mishpat no'afot umishpat shofekhot dam ki no'afot henah vedam bideihen. ki koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh ha'aleh 'aleihem qahal venaton 'ethen leza'avah velabaz. veragemu 'aleihen 'eben qahal ubarei 'othen bekharbotam beneihem ubenoteihem yaharogu ubateihen ba'esh yisrofu. vehishbati zimah min ha'arez venivaseru kal hanashim velo ta'asenah kezimatkhenah. venatenu zimatkhenah 'aleikhen vakhata'ei giluleikhen tisenah vida'tem ki 'ani 'adonai ihoh. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai bashanah hateshi'it bakhodesh ha'asiri be'asor lakhodesh leimor. ben 'adam ketob ketab lekha 'et shem hayom 'et 'ezem hayom hazeh samakh melekh babel 'el yerushalim be'ezem hayom hazeh. umeshol 'el bet hameri mashal ve'amarta 'aleihem koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh shefot hasir shefot vegam yezoq bo mayim. 'esof netakheha 'eileha kal neitakh tob yarekh vekhatef mibkhar 'azamim malei. mibkhar hazon laqoakh vegam dur ha'azamim takhteha ratakh retakheha gam bashelu 'azameha betokhah. lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh 'o 'ir hadamim sir 'asher khel'atah bah vekhel'atah lo yaze'ah mimenah lintakheha lintakheha hozi'ah lo nafal 'aleha goral. ki damah betokhah hayah 'al zekhiakh sela' samatehu lo shefakhathu 'al ha'arez lekhasot 'alav 'afar. leha'alot kheimah linqom naqam natati 'et damah 'al zekhiakh sala' lebilti hikasot. lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh 'o 'ir hadamim gam 'ani 'agdil hamedurah. harbeh ha'eizim hadleq ha'esh hatem habasar veharqakh hamerqakhah veha'azamot yeikharu. veha'amideha 'al gekhaleha reiqah lema'an teikham vekharah nekhushtah venitekhah betokhah tum'atah titum khel'atah. te'unim hel'at velo teizei mimenah rabat khel'atah be'esh khel'atah. betum'atekh zimah ya'an tihartikh velo tahart mitum'atekh lo tithari 'od 'ad hanikhi 'et khamati bakh. 'ani ihoh dibarti ba'ah ve'asiti lo 'efra' velo 'akhus velo 'enakhem kidrakhayikh vekha'alilotayikh shefatukh ne'um 'adonai ihoh. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam hini loqeiakh mimekha 'et makhmad 'einekha bemageifah velo tispod velo tibkeh velo tabo dim'atekha. hei'aneq dom meitim 'eibel lo ta'aseh fe'eirekha khabosh 'alekha une'alekha tasim beraglekha velo ta'teh 'al safam velekhem 'anashim lo tokhel. va'adaber 'el ha'am baboqer vatamat 'ishti ba'areb va'a'as baboqer ka'asher zuveiti. vayomeru 'eilai ha'am halo tagid lanu mah 'eleh lanu ki 'atah 'oseh. va'omar 'aleihem debar ihoh hayah 'eilai leimor. 'emor lebet yisra'el koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh hini mekhalel 'et miqdashi ge'on 'uzekhem makhmad 'eineikhem umakhmal nafshekhem ubeneikhem ubenoteikhem 'asher 'azabtem bakhereb yipolu. va'asitem ka'asher 'asiti 'al safam lo ta'tu velekhem 'anashim lo tokheilu. ufe'eireikhem 'al rasheikhem vena'aleikhem beragleikhem lo tispedu velo tibku unemaqotem ba'avonoteikhem unehamtem 'ish 'el 'akhiv. vehayah yekhezqel lakhem lemofet kekhol 'asher 'asah ta'asu bebo'ah vida'tem ki 'ani 'adonai ihoh. ve'atah ben 'adam halo beyom qakhti meihem 'et ma'uzam mesos tif'artam 'et makhmad 'eineihem ve'et masa nafsham beneihem ubenoteihem. bayom hahu yabo hapalit 'eilekha lehashma'ut 'azenayim. bayom hahu yipatakh pikha 'et hapalit utedaber velo tei'alem 'od vehayita lahem lemofet veyade'u ki 'ani ihoh. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam sim panekha 'el benei 'amon vehinabei 'aleihem. ve'amarta libnei 'amon shim'u debar 'adonai ihoh koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh ya'an 'amerekh he'akh 'el miqdashi khi nikhal ve'el 'admat yisra'el ki nashamah ve'el bet yehudah ki halekhu bagolah. lakhen hini notenakh libnei qedem lemorashah veyishebu tiroteihem bakh venatenu bakh mishkeneihem hemah yokhelu firyekh vehemah yishtu khalabekh. venatati 'et rabah linveh gemalim ve'et benei 'amon lemirbaz zon vida'tem ki 'ani ihoh. ki khoh 'amar 'adonai ihoh ya'an makh'akha yad veraq'akha beragel vatismakh bekhal shatekha benefesh 'el 'admat yisra'el. lakhen hini natiti 'et yadi 'alekha unetatikha lebag lebaz lagoyim vehikhratikha min ha'amim veha'abadtikha min ha'arazot 'ashmidekha veyada'ta ki 'ani ihoh. koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh ya'an 'amor mo'ab vesei'ir hineh kekhal hagoyim bet yehudah. lakhen hini foteiakh 'et ketef mo'ab meihe'arim mei'arav miqazeihu zebi 'erez bet hayshimot ba'al me'on veqiryatemah veqiryatayemah. libnei qedem 'al benei 'amon unetatiha lemorashah lema'an lo tizakher benei 'amon bagoyim. ubemo'ab 'e'eseh shefatim veyade'u ki 'ani ihoh. koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh ya'an 'asot 'edom binqom naqam lebet yehudah vaye'shemu 'ashom veniqemu bahem. lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh venatiti yadi 'al 'edom vehikhrati mimenah 'adam ubeheimah unetatiha kharebah miteiman udedaneh bakhereb yipolu. venatati 'et niqmati be'edom beyad 'ami yisra'el ve'asu be'edom ke'api vekhakhamati veyade'u 'et niqmati ne'um 'adonai ihoh. koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh ya'an 'asot pelishtim binqamah vayinaqemu naqam bish'at benefesh lemashkhit 'eibat 'olam. lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh hini noteh yadi 'al pelishtim vehikhrati 'et kereitim veha'abadti 'et she'eirit khof hayam. ve'asiti bam neqamot gedolot betokhkhot kheimah veyade'u ki 'ani ihoh betiti 'et niqmati bam. vayhi be'ashtei 'esreh shanah be'ekhad lakhodesh hayah debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam ya'an 'asher 'amerah zor 'al yerushalim he'akh nishberah daltot ha'amim nasebah 'eilai 'imale'ah hakhorabah. lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh hini 'alayikh zor veha'aleiti 'alayikh goyim rabim keha'alot hayam legalav. veshikhatu khomot zor veharesu migdaleha vesikheiti 'afarah mimenah venatati 'otah lizkhiakh sala'. mishtakh kharamim tihyeh betokh hayam ki 'ani dibarti ne'um 'adonai ihoh vehayetah lebaz lagoyim. ubenoteha 'asher basadeh
