bakhereb teiharagnah veyade'u ki 'ani ihoh. ki khoh 'amar 'adonai ihoh hini meibi 'el zor nebukhadrezar melekh babel mizafon melekh melakhim besus uberekheb ubefarashim veqahal ve'am rab. benotayikh basadeh bakhereb yaharog venatan 'alayikh dayeq veshafakh 'alayikh solelah veheiqim 'alayikh zinah. umekhi qabalo yiten bekhomotayikh umigdelotayikh yitoz bekharbotav. mishif'at susav yekhasekh 'abaqam miqol parash vegalgal varekheb tir'ashnah khomotayikh bebo'o bish'arayikh kimbo'ei 'ir mebuqa'ah. befarsot susav yirmos 'et kal khuzotayikh 'amekh bakhereb yaharog umazebot 'uzekh la'arez teired. veshalelu kheilekh ubazezu rekhulatekh veharesu khomotayikh ubatei khemdatekh yitozu va'abanayikh ve'eizayikh va'afarekh betokh mayim yasimu. vehishbati hamon shirayikh veqol kinorayikh lo yishama' 'od. unetatikh lizkhiakh sela' mishtakh kharamim tihyeh lo tibaneh 'od ki 'ani ihoh dibarti ne'um 'adonai ihoh. koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh lezor halo miqol mapaltekh be'enoq khalal beihareg hereg betokhekh yir'ashu ha'iyim. veyaredu mei'al kis'otam kol nesi'ei hayam veheisiru 'et me'ileihem ve'et bigdei riqmatam yifshotu kharadot yilbashu 'al ha'arez yeisheibu vekharedu lirga'im veshamemu 'alayikh. venase'u 'alayikh qinah ve'ameru lakh 'ekh 'abadt noshebet miyamim ha'ir hahulalah 'asher hayetah khazaqah bayam hi veyoshebeha 'asher natenu khititam lekhal yoshebeha. 'atah yekhredu ha'iyin yom mapaltekh venibhalu ha'iyim 'asher bayam mizeitekh. ki khoh 'amar 'adonai ihoh betiti 'otakh 'ir nekherebet ke'arim 'asher lo noshabu beha'alot 'alayikh 'et tehom vekhisukh hamayim harabim. vehoradtikh 'et yordei bor 'el 'am 'olam vehoshabtikh be'erez takhtiyot kakhorabot mei'olam 'et yordei bor lema'an lo teisheibi venatati zebi be'erez khayim. balahot 'etenekh ve'einekh utebuqshi velo timaze'i 'od le'olam ne'um 'adonai ihoh. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ve'atah ben 'adam sa 'al zor qinah. ve'amarta lezor hayoshebotei hayoshebet 'al mebo'ot yam rokhelet ha'amim 'el 'iyim rabim koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh zor 'at 'amart 'ani kelilat yofi. beleb yamim gebulayikh bonayikh kalelu yafeyekh. beroshim misenir banu lakh 'et kal lukhotayim 'erez milebanon laqakhu la'asot toren 'alayikh. 'alonim mibashan 'asu mishotayikh qarshekh 'asu shen bat 'ashurim mei'iyei kitiyim kitiyim. shesh beriqmah mimizrayim hayah mifrasekh lihyot lakh lenes tekheilet ve'argaman mei'iyei 'elishah hayah mekhasekh. yoshebei zidon ve'arvad hayu shatim lakh khakhamayikh zor hayu bakh hemah khobelayikh. ziqnei gebal vakhakhameha hayu bakh makhaziqei bidqekh kal 'oniyot hayam umalakheihem hayu bakh la'arob ma'arabekh. paras velud ufut hayu bekheilekh 'anshei milkhamtekh magen vekhoba' tilu bakh hemah natenu hadarekh. benei 'arvad vekheilekh 'al khomotayikh sabib vegamadim bemigdelotayikh hayu shilteihem tilu 'al khomotayikh sabib hemah kalelu yafeyekh. tarshish sokhartekh meirob kal hon bekhesef barzel bedil ve'oferet natenu 'izbonayikh. yavan tubal vameshekh hemah rokhelayikh benefesh 'adam ukhelei nekhoshet natenu ma'arabekh. mibet togarmah susim ufarashim uferadim natenu 'izbonayikh. benei dedan rokhelayikh 'iyim rabim sekhorat yadekh qarnot shen vehobnim vehabenim heishibu 'eshkarekh. 'aram sokhartekh meirob ma'asayikh benofekh 'argaman veriqmah ubuz veramot vekhadkod natenu be'izbonayikh. yehudah ve'erez yisra'el hemah rokhelayikh bekhitei minit ufanag udebash vashemen vazori natenu ma'arabekh. dameseq sokhartekh berob ma'asayikh meirob kal hon beyen khelbon vezemer zakhar. vedan veyavan me'uzal be'izbonayikh natanu barzel 'ashot qidah veqaneh bema'arabekh hayah. dedan rokhaltekh bebigdei khofesh lerikhbah. 'arab vekhal nesi'ei qeidar hemah sokharei yadekh bekharim ve'eilim ve'atudim bam sokharayikh. rokhelei sheba vera'mah hemah rokhelayikh berosh kal bosem ubekhal 'eben yeqarah vezahab natenu 'izbonayikh. kharan vekhaneh va'eden rokhelei sheba 'ashur kilmad rokhaltekh. hemah rokhelayikh bemakhlulim biglomei tekheilet veriqmah ubeginzei beromim bakhabalim khabushim va'aruzim bemarkhultekh. 'oniyot tarshish sharotayikh ma'arabekh vatimale'i vatikhbedi me'od beleb yamim. bemayim rabim hebi'ukh hashatim 'otakh ruakh haqadim shebarekh beleb yamim. honekh ve'izbonayikh ma'arabekh malakhayikh vekhobelayikh makhaziqei bidqekh ve'orebei ma'arabekh vekhal 'anshei milkhamtekh 'asher bakh ubekhal qehalekh 'asher betokhekh yipelu beleb yamim beyom mapaltekh. leqol za'aqat khobelayikh yir'ashu migroshot. veyaredu mei'aniyoteihem kol tofesei mashot malakhim kol khobelei hayam 'el ha'arez ya'amodu. vehishmi'u 'alayikh beqolam veyiz'aqu marah veya'alu 'afar 'al rasheihem ba'eifer yitpalashu. vehiqrikhu 'eilayikh qarekhah vekhageru saqim ubakhu 'eilayikh bemar nefesh misped mar. venase'u 'eilayikh benihem qinah veqonu 'alayikh mi khezor kedumah betokh hayam. bezet 'izbonayikh miyamim hisba'at 'amim rabim berob honayikh uma'arabayikh he'eshart malkhei 'arez. 'et nishberet miyamim bema'amaqei mayim ma'arabekh vekhal qehalekh betokhekh nafalu. kol yoshebei ha'iyim shamemu 'alayikh umalkheihem sa'aru sa'ar ra'amu panim. sokharim ba'amim sharequ 'alayikh balahot hayit ve'einekh 'ad 'olam. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam 'emor lingid zor koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh ya'an gabah libekha vatomer 'el 'ani moshab 'elohim yashabti beleb yamim ve'atah 'adam velo 'el vatiten libekha keleb 'elohim. hineh khakham 'atah midani'el midani'el kal satum lo 'amamukha. bekhakhematekha ubitbunatekha 'asita lekha khayil vata'as zahab vakhesef be'ozrotekha. berob khakhematekha birkhulatekha hirbita kheilekha vayigbah lebabekha bekheilekha. lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh ya'an titekha 'et lebabekha keleb 'elohim. lakhen hini meibi 'alekha zarim 'arizei goyim veheiriqu kharbotam 'al yefi khakhematekha vekhilelu yif'atekha. lashakhat yoridukha vamatah memotei khalal beleb yamim. he'amor tomar 'elohim 'ani lifnei horegekha ve'atah 'adam velo 'el beyad mekhalekha. motei 'areilim tamut beyad zarim ki 'ani dibarti ne'um 'adonai ihoh. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam sa qinah 'al melekh zor ve'amarta lo koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh 'atah khotem takhenit malei khakhmah ukhelil yofi. be'eiden gan 'elohim hayita kal 'eben yeqarah mesukhatekha 'odem pitdah veyahalom tarshish shoham veyashefeh sapir nofekh ubareqat vezahab melekhet tupekha uneqabekha bakh beyom hibara'akha konanu. 'at kerub mimshakh hasokhekh unetatikha behar qodesh 'elohim hayita betokh 'abnei 'esh hithalakheta. tamim 'atah bidrakhekha miyom hibare'akh 'ad nimza 'avlatah bakh. berob rekhulatekha malu tokhkha khamas vatekheta va'ekhalelkha meihar 'elohim va'abedkha kerub hasokhekh mitokh 'abnei 'esh. gabah libekha beyafeyekha shikhata khakhematekha 'al yif'atekha 'al 'erez hishlakhtikha lifnei melakhim netatikha lera'avah bakh. meirob 'avonekha be'evel rekhulatekha khilalta miqdashekha va'ozi 'esh mitokhkha hi 'akhalatkha va'etenkha le'eifer 'al ha'arez le'einei kal ro'ekha. kal yod'ekha ba'amim shamemu 'alekha balahot hayita ve'einekha 'ad 'olam. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam sim panekha 'el zidon vehinabei 'aleha. ve'amarta koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh hini 'alayikh zidon venikhbadti betokhekh veyade'u ki 'ani ihoh ba'asoti bah shefatim veniqdashti bah. veshilakhti bah deber vadam bekhuzoteha veniflal khalal betokhah bekhereb 'aleha misabib veyade'u ki 'ani ihoh. velo yihyeh 'od lebet yisra'el silon mam'ir veqoz makh'ib mikol sebibotam hashatim 'otam veyade'u ki 'ani 'adonai ihoh. koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh beqabezi 'et bet yisra'el min ha'amim 'asher nafozu bam veniqdashti bam le'einei hagoyim veyashebu 'al 'admatam 'asher natati le'abdi leya'aqob. veyashebu 'aleha labetakh ubanu batim venate'u kheramim veyashebu labetakh ba'asoti shefatim bekhol hashatim 'otam misebibotam veyade'u ki 'ani ihoh 'eloheihem. bashanah ha'asirit ba'asiri bishnem 'asar lakhodesh hayah debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam sim panekha 'al par'oh melekh mizrayim vehinabei 'alav ve'al mizrayim kulah. daber ve'amarta koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh hini 'alekha par'oh melekh mizrayim hatanim hagadol harobez betokh ye'orav 'asher 'amar li ye'ori va'ani 'asitini. venatati khakhiyim khakhim bilkhayekha vehidbaqti degat ye'orekha beqasqesotekha veha'alitikha mitokh ye'orekha ve'et kal degat ye'orekha beqasqesotekha tidbaq. unetashtikha hamidbarah 'otkha ve'et kal degat ye'orekha 'al penei hasadeh tipol lo tei'asef velo tiqabez lekhayat ha'arez ule'of hashamayim netatikha le'akhlah veyade'u kal yoshebei mizrayim ki 'ani ihoh ya'an heyotam mish'enet qaneh lebet yisra'el. betafesam bekha bakafkha bakaf teiroz ubaqa'ta lahem kal katef ubehisha'anam 'alekha tishaber veha'amadta lahem kal matenayim. lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh hini meibi 'alayikh khareb vehikhrati mimekh 'adam ubeheimah. vehayetah 'erez mizrayim lishmamah vekharebah veyade'u ki 'ani ihoh ya'an 'amar ye'or li va'ani 'asiti. lakhen hini 'eilekha ve'el ye'orekha venatati 'et 'erez mizrayim lekharebot khoreb shemamah mimigdol seveineh ve'ad gebul kush. lo ta'abar bah regel 'adam veregel beheimah lo ta'abar bah velo teisheb 'arba'im shanah. venatati 'et 'erez mizrayim shemamah betokh 'arazot neshamot ve'areha betokh 'arim makhorabot tihyena shemamah 'arba'im shanah vahafizoti 'et mizrayim bagoyim vezeiritim ba'arazot. ki koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh miqez 'arba'im shanah 'aqabez 'et mizrayim min ha'amim 'asher nafozu shamah. veshabti 'et shebut mizrayim vahashiboti 'otam 'erez patros 'al 'erez mekhuratam vehayu sham mamlakhah shefalah. min hamamlakhot tihyeh shefalah velo titnasei 'od 'al hagoyim vehim'atim lebilti redot bagoyim. velo yihyeh 'od lebet yisra'el lemibtakh mazkir 'avon bifnotam 'akhareihem veyade'u ki 'ani 'adonai ihoh. vayhi be'esrim vasheba' shanah barishon be'ekhad lakhodesh hayah debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam nebukhadrezar melekh babel he'ebid 'et kheilo 'abodah gedolah 'el zor kal rosh muqrakh vekhal katef merutah vesakhar lo hayah lo ulekheilo mizor 'al ha'abodah 'asher 'abad 'aleha. lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh hini noten linbukhadrezar melekh babel 'et 'erez mizrayim venasa hamonah veshalal shelalah ubazaz bizah vehayetah sakhar lekheilo. pe'ulato 'asher 'abad bah natati lo 'et 'erez mizrayim 'asher 'asu li ne'um 'adonai ihoh. bayom hahu 'azmiakh qeren lebet yisra'el ulekha 'eten pitkhon peh betokham veyade'u ki 'ani ihoh. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam hinabei ve'amarta koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh heililu hah layom. ki qarob yom veqarob yom ihoh yom 'anan 'et goyim yihyeh. uba'ah khereb bemizrayim vehayetah khalkhalah bekhush binfol khalal bemizrayim velaqekhu hamonah venehersu yesodoteha. kush ufut velud vekhal ha'ereb vekhub ubenei 'erez haberit 'itam bakhereb yipolu. koh 'amar ihoh venafelu somekhei mizrayim veyarad ge'on 'uzah mimigdol seveineh bakhereb yipelu bah ne'um 'adonai ihoh. venashamu betokh 'arazot neshamot ve'arav betokh 'arim nakharabot tihyenah. veyade'u ki 'ani ihoh betiti 'esh bemizrayim venishberu kal 'ozereha. bayom hahu yeize'u mal'akhim milefanai bazim lehakharid 'et kush betakh vehayetah khalkhalah bahem beyom mizrayim ki hineh ba'ah. koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh vehishbati 'et hamon mizrayim beyad nebukhadrezar melekh babel. hu ve'amo 'ito 'arizei goyim muba'im leshakhet ha'arez veheiriqu kharbotam 'al mizrayim umale'u 'et ha'arez khalal. venatati ye'orim kharabah umakharti 'et ha'arez beyad ra'im vahashimoti 'erez umelo'ah beyad zarim 'ani ihoh dibarti. koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh veha'abadti gilulim vehishbati 'elilim minof venasi mei'erez mizrayim lo yihyeh 'od venatati yir'ah be'erez mizrayim. vahashimoti 'et patros venatati 'esh bezo'an ve'asiti shefatim beno. veshafakhti khamati 'al sin ma'oz mizrayim vehikhrati 'et hamon no. venatati 'esh bemizrayim khul takhil takhul sin veno tihyeh lehibaqeia' venof zarei yomam. bakhurei 'aven ufi beset bakhereb yipolu vehenah bashebi teilakhnah. ubitkhafnekhes khasakh hayom beshibri sham 'et motot mizrayim venishbat bah ge'on 'uzah hi 'anan yekhasenah ubenoteha bashebi teilakhnah. ve'asiti shefatim bemizrayim veyade'u ki 'ani ihoh. vayhi be'akhat 'esreh shanah barishon beshib'ah lakhodesh hayah debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam 'et zeroa' par'oh melekh mizrayim shabareti vehineh lo khubeshah latet refu'ot lasum khitul lekhabeshah lekhazeqah litpos bekhareb. lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh hini 'el par'oh melekh mizrayim veshabarti 'et zero'otav 'et hakhazaqah ve'et hanishbaret vehipalti 'et hakhereb miyado. vahafizoti 'et mizrayim bagoyim vezeiritim ba'arazot. vekhizaqti 'et zero'ot melekh babel venatati 'et kharbi beyado veshabarti 'et zero'ot par'oh vena'aq na'aqot khalal lefanav. vehakhazaqti 'et zero'ot melekh babel uzero'ot par'oh tipolenah veyade'u ki 'ani ihoh betiti kharbi beyad melekh babel venatah 'otah 'el 'erez mizrayim. vahafizoti 'et mizrayim bagoyim vezeiriti 'otam ba'arazot veyade'u ki 'ani ihoh. vayhi be'akhat 'esreh shanah bashelishi be'ekhad lakhodesh hayah debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam 'emor 'el par'oh melekh mizrayim ve'el hamono 'el mi damita begadelekha. hineh 'ashur 'erez balebanon yefeh 'anaf vekhoresh meizal ugebah qomah uben 'abotim hayetah zamarto. mayim gideluhu tehom romematehu 'et naharoteha holekh sebibot mata'ah ve'et te'aloteha shilkhah 'el kal 'azei hasadeh. 'al ken gabeha qomato mikol 'azei hasadeh vatirbenah sar'apotav vate'erakhnah foroto forotav mimayim rabim beshalekho. bis'apotav qinu kal 'of hashamayim vetakhat porotav yaledu kol khayat hasadeh ubezilo yeishebu kol goyim rabim. vayeyif begadelo be'orekh daliyotav ki hayah sharesho 'el mayim rabim. 'arazim lo 'amamuhu began 'elohim beroshim lo damu 'el se'apotav ve'armonim lo hayu keforotav kal 'ez began 'elohim lo damah 'eilav beyafeyo. yafeh 'asitiv berob daliyotav vayqan'uhu kal 'azei 'eiden 'asher began ha'elohim. lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh ya'an 'asher gabahta beqomah vayiten zamarto 'el ben 'abotim veram lebabo begabeho. ve'eteneihu beyad 'el goyim 'aso ya'aseh lo kerish'o geirashtihu. vayikhretuhu zarim 'arizei goyim vayiteshuhu 'el heharim ubekhal gei'ayot nafelu daliyotav vatishabarnah forotav bekhol 'afiqei ha'arez vayeiredu mizilo kal 'amei ha'arez vayiteshuhu. 'al mapalto yishkenu kal 'of hashamayim ve'el porotav hayu kol khayat hasadeh. lema'an 'asher lo yigbehu beqomatam kal 'azei mayim velo yitenu 'et zamartam 'el ben 'abotim velo ya'amdu 'eileihem begabeham kal shotei mayim ki khulam nitenu lamavet 'el 'erez takhtit betokh benei 'adam 'el yordei bor. koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh beyom ridto she'olah he'ebalti kiseiti 'alav 'et tehom va'emna' naharoteha vayikale'u mayim rabim va'aqdir 'alav lebanon vekhal 'azei hasadeh 'alav 'ulpeh. miqol mapalto hir'ashti goyim behoridi 'oto she'olah 'et yordei bor vayinakhamu be'erez takhtit kal 'azei 'eiden mibkhar vetob lebanon kal shotei mayim. gam hem 'ito yaredu she'olah 'el khalei khareb uzero'o yashebu bezilo betokh goyim. 'el mi damita kakhah bekhabod ubegodel ba'azei 'eiden vehuradta 'et 'azei 'eiden 'el 'erez takhtit betokh 'areilim tishkab 'et khalei khereb hu far'oh vekhal hamonoh ne'um 'adonai ihoh. vayhi bishtei 'esreh shanah bishnei 'asar khodesh be'ekhad lakhodesh hayah debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam sa qinah 'al par'oh melekh mizrayim ve'amarta 'eilav kefir goyim nidmeita ve'atah katanim bayamim vatagakh benaharotekha vatidlakh mayim beraglekha vatirpos naharotam. koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh ufarasti 'alekha 'et rishti biqhal 'amim rabim vehe'elukha bekhermi. unetashtikha ba'arez 'al penei hasadeh 'atilekha vehishkanti 'alekha kal 'of hashamayim vehisba'ti mimekha khayat kal ha'arez. venatati 'et besarekha 'al heharim umileiti hagei'ayot ramutekha. vehishqeiti 'erez zafatekha midamekha 'el heharim va'afiqim yimale'un mimeka. vekhiseiti bekhabotkha shamayim vehiqdarti 'et kokhebeihem mesh be'anan 'akhasenu veyareiakh lo ya'ir 'oro. kal me'orei 'or bashamayim 'aqdirem 'alekha venatati khoshekh 'al 'arzekha ne'um 'adonai ihoh. vehikh'asti leb 'amim rabim bahabi'i shibrekha bagoyim 'al 'arazot 'asher lo yeda'tam. vahashimoti 'alekha 'amim rabim umalkheihem yis'aru 'alekha sa'ar be'offi kharbi 'al peneihem vekharedu lirga'im 'ish lenafsho beyom mapaltekha. ki koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh khereb melekh babel tebo'ekha. bekharbot giborim 'apil hamonekha 'arizei goyim kulam veshadedu 'et ge'on mizrayim venishmad kal hamonah. veha'abadti 'et kal behemtah mei'al mayim rabim velo tidlakhem regel 'adam 'od ufarsot beheimah lo tidlakhem. 'az 'ashqia' meimeihem venaharotam kashemen 'olikh ne'um 'adonai ihoh. betiti 'et 'erez mizrayim shemamah uneshamah 'erez mimelo'ah behakoti 'et kal yoshebei bah veyade'u ki 'ani ihoh. qinah hi veqonuha benot hagoyim teqonenah 'otah 'al mizrayim ve'al kal hamonah teqonenah 'otah ne'um 'adonai ihoh. vayhi bishtei 'esreh shanah bakhamishah 'asar lakhodesh hayah debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam neheh 'al hamon mizrayim vehorideihu 'otah ubenot goyim 'adirim 'el 'erez takhtiyot 'et yordei bor. mimi na'ameta redah vehashekebah 'et 'areilim. betokh khalei khereb yipolu khereb nitanah mashekhu 'otah vekhal hamoneha. yedaberu lo 'eilei giborim mitokh she'ol 'et 'ozerav yaredu shakhebu ha'areilim khalei khareb. sham 'ashur vekhal qehalah sebibotav qibrotav kulam khalalim hanofelim bekhareb. 'asher nitenu qibroteha beyarketei bor vayhi qehalah sebibot qeburatah kulam khalalim nofelim bakhereb 'asher natenu khitit be'erez khayim. sham 'eilam vekhal hamonah sebibot qeburatah kulam khalalim hanofelim bakhereb 'asher yaredu 'areilim 'el 'erez takhtiyot 'asher natenu khititam be'erez khayim vayis'u khelimatam 'et yordei bor. betokh khalalim natenu mishkab lah bekhal hamonah sebibotav qibroteha kulam 'areilim khalei khereb ki nitan khititam be'erez khayim vayis'u khelimatam 'et yordei bor betokh khalalim nitan. sham meshekh tubal vekhal hamonah sebibotav qibroteha kulam 'areilim mekhulei khereb ki natenu khititam be'erez khayim. velo yishkebu 'et giborim nofelim mei'areilim 'asher yaredu she'ol bikhlei milkhamtam vayitenu 'et kharbotam takhat rasheihem vatehi 'avonotam 'al 'azmotam ki khitit giborim be'erez khayim. ve'atah betokh 'areilim tishabar vetishkab 'et khalei khareb. shamah 'edom melakheha vekhal nesi'eha 'asher nitenu bigburatam 'et khalei khareb hemah 'et 'areilim yishkabu ve'et yoredei bor. shamah nesikhei zafon kulam vekhal zidoni 'asher yaredu 'et khalalim bekhititam migburatam boshim vayishkebu 'areilim 'et khalei khereb vayis'u khelimatam 'et yordei bor. 'otam yir'eh far'oh venikham 'al kal hamonoh hamono khalei khereb par'oh vekhal kheilo ne'um 'adonai ihoh. ki natati 'et khitito khititi be'erez khayim vehushkab betokh 'areilim 'et khalei khereb par'oh vekhal hamonoh ne'um 'adonai ihoh. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam daber 'el benei 'amekha ve'amarta 'aleihem 'erez ki 'abi 'aleha khareb velaqekhu 'am ha'arez 'ish 'ekhad miqzeihem venatenu 'oto lahem lezofeh. vera'ah 'et hakhereb ba'ah 'al ha'arez vetaqa' bashofar vehizhir 'et ha'am. veshama' hashomeia' 'et qol hashofar velo nizhar vatabo khereb vatiqakheihu damo berosho yihyeh. 'et qol hashofar shama' velo nizhar damo bo yihyeh vehu nizhar nafsho milet. vehazofeh ki yir'eh 'et hakhereb ba'ah velo taqa' bashofar veha'am lo nizhar vatabo khereb vatiqakh meihem nafesh hu ba'avono nilqakh vedamo miyad hazofeh 'edrosh. ve'atah ben 'adam zofeh netatikha lebet yisra'el veshama'ta mipi dabar vehizharta 'otam mimeni. be'ameri larasha' rasha' mot tamut velo dibarta lehazhir rasha' midarko hu rasha' ba'avono yamut vedamo miyadekha 'abaqesh. ve'atah ki hizharta rasha' midarko lashub mimenah velo shab midarko hu ba'avono yamut ve'atah nafshekha hizalta. ve'atah ben 'adam 'emor 'el bet yisra'el ken 'amartem leimor ki fesha'einu vekhatoteinu 'aleinu ubam 'anakhnu nemaqim ve'ekh nikhyeh. 'emor 'aleihem khai 'ani ne'um 'adonai ihoh 'im 'ekhpoz bemot harasha' ki 'im beshub rasha' midarko vekhayah shubu shubu midarkheikhem hara'im velamah tamutu bet yisra'el. ve'atah ben 'adam 'emor 'el benei 'amekha zidqat hazadiq lo tazilenu beyom pish'o verish'at harasha' lo yikashel bah beyom shubo meirish'o vezadiq lo yukhal likhyot bah beyom khatoto. be'ameri lazadiq khayoh yikhyeh vehu batakh 'al zidqato ve'asah 'avel kal zidqato zidqotav lo tizakharnah ube'avlo 'asher 'asah bo yamut. ube'ameri larasha' mot tamut veshab meikhatato ve'asah mishpat uzedaqah. khabol yashib rasha' gezeilah yeshalem bekhuqot hakhayim halakh lebilti 'asot 'avel khayo yikhyeh lo yamut. kal khatato khatotav 'asher khata lo tizakharnah lo mishpat uzedaqah 'asah khayo yikhyeh. ve'ameru benei 'amekha lo yitakhen derekh 'adonai vehemah darkam lo yitakhen. beshub zadiq mizidqato ve'asah 'avel umet bahem. ubeshub rasha' meirish'ato ve'asah mishpat uzedaqah 'aleihem hu yikhyeh. va'amartem lo yitakhen derekh 'adonai 'ish kidrakhav 'eshpot 'etkhem bet yisra'el. vayhi bishtei 'esreh shanah ba'asiri bakhamishah lakhodesh legaluteinu ba 'eilai hapalit mirushalim leimor huketah ha'ir. veyad ihoh hayetah 'eilai ba'ereb lifnei bo hapalit vayiftakh 'et pi 'ad bo 'eilai baboqer vayipatakh pi velo ne'elamti 'od. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam yoshebei hekhorabot ha'eleh 'al 'admat yisra'el 'omerim leimor 'ekhad hayah 'abraham vayirash 'et ha'arez va'anakhnu rabim lanu nitenah ha'arez lemorashah. lakhen 'emor 'aleihem koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh 'al hadam tokheilu ve'eineikhem tis'u 'el giluleikhem vedam tishpokhu veha'arez tirashu. 'amadtem 'al kharbekhem 'asiten to'eibah ve'ish 'et 'eishet rei'eihu timeitem veha'arez tirashu. koh tomar 'aleihem koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh khai 'ani 'im lo 'asher bekhorabot bakhereb yipolu va'asher 'al penei hasadeh lakhayah netativ le'akhelo va'asher bamezadot ubame'arot badeber yamutu. venatati 'et ha'arez shemamah umeshamah venishbat ge'on 'uzah veshamemu harei yisra'el mei'en 'ober. veyade'u ki 'ani ihoh betiti 'et ha'arez shemamah umeshamah 'al kal to'abotam 'asher 'asu. ve'atah ben 'adam benei 'amekha hanidbarim bekha 'eizel haqirot ubefitkhei habatim vediber khad 'et 'akhad 'ish 'et 'akhiv leimor bo'u na veshim'u mah hadabar hayozei mei'et ihoh. veyabo'u 'eilekha kimbo 'am veyeishebu lefanekha 'ami veshame'u 'et debarekha ve'otam lo ya'asu ki 'agabim befihem hemah 'osim 'akharei biz'am libam holekh. vehinekha lahem keshir 'agabim yefeh qol umeitib nagen veshame'u 'et debarekha ve'osim 'einam 'otam. ubebo'ah hineh ba'ah veyade'u ki nabi hayah betokham. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam hinabei 'al ro'ei yisra'el hinabei ve'amarta 'aleihem laro'im koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh ho ro'ei yisra'el 'asher hayu ro'im 'otam halo hazon yir'u haro'im. 'et hakheileb tokheilu ve'et hazemer tilbashu haberi'ah tizbakhu hazon lo tir'u. 'et hanakhlot lo khizaqtem ve'et hakholah lo ripeitem velanishberet lo khabashtem ve'et hanidakhat lo hasheibotem ve'et ha'obedet lo biqashtem ubekhazeqah reditem 'otam ubefarekh. vatefuzenah mibeli ro'eh vatihyenah le'akhlah lekhal khayat hasadeh vatefuzenah. yishgu zoni bekhal heharim ve'al kal gib'ah ramah ve'al kal penei ha'arez nafozu zoni ve'en doresh ve'en mebaqesh. lakhen ro'im shim'u 'et debar ihoh. khai 'ani ne'um 'adonai ihoh 'im lo ya'an heyot zoni labaz vatihyenah zoni le'akhlah lekhal khayat hasadeh mei'en ro'eh velo dareshu ro'ai 'et zoni vayir'u haro'im 'otam ve'et zoni lo ra'u. lakhen haro'im shim'u debar ihoh. koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh hini 'el haro'im vedarashti 'et zoni miyadam vehishbatim meire'ot zon velo yir'u 'od haro'im 'otam vehizalti zoni mipihem velo tihyena lahem le'akhlah ki koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh hini 'ani vedarashti 'et zoni ubiqartim. kebaqarat ro'eh 'edro beyom heyoto betokh zono nifrashot ken 'abaqer 'et zoni vehizalti 'ethem mikal hameqomot 'asher nafozu sham beyom 'anan va'arafel. vehozeitim min ha'amim veqibaztim min ha'arazot vahabi'otim 'el 'admatam ure'itim 'el harei yisra'el ba'afiqim ubekhol moshebei ha'arez. bemir'eh tob 'er'eh 'otam ubeharei merom yisra'el yihyeh neveihem sham tirbaznah benaveh tob umir'eh shamen tir'enah 'el harei yisra'el. 'ani 'er'eh zoni va'ani 'arbizem ne'um 'adonai ihoh. 'et ha'obedet 'abaqesh ve'et hanidakhat 'ashib velanishberet 'ekhebosh ve'et hakholah 'akhazeq ve'et hashemeinah ve'et hakhazaqah 'ashmid 'er'enah bemishpat. ve'ateinah zoni koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh hini shofet ben seh laseh la'eilim vela'atudim. ham'at mikem hamir'eh hatob tir'u veyeter mir'eikhem tirmesu beragleikhem umishqa' mayim tishtu ve'et hanotarim beragleikhem tirposun. vezoni mirmas ragleikhem tir'enah umirpas ragleikhem tishtenah. lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh 'aleihem hini 'ani veshafati ben seh biryah uben seh razah. ya'an bezad ubekhatef tehdofu ubeqarneikhem tenagekhu kal hanakhlot 'ad 'asher hafizotem 'otanah 'el hakhuzah. vehosha'ti lezoni velo tihyenah 'od labaz veshafati ben seh laseh. vahaqimoti 'aleihem ro'eh 'ekhad vera'ah 'ethen 'et 'abdi david hu yir'eh 'otam vehu yihyeh lahen lero'eh. va'ani ihoh 'ehyeh lahem leilohim ve'abdi david nasi betokham 'ani ihoh dibarti. vekharati lahem berit shalom vehishbati khayah ra'ah min ha'arez veyashebu bamidbar labetakh veyashenu baye'arim. venatati 'otam usebibot gib'ati berakhah vehoradti hageshem be'ito gishmei berakhah yihyu. venatan 'ez hasadeh 'et piryo veha'arez titen yebulah vehayu 'al 'admatam labetakh veyade'u ki 'ani ihoh beshibri 'et motot 'ulam vehizaltim miyad ha'obedim bahem. velo yihyu 'od baz lagoyim vekhayat ha'arez lo tokhelem veyashebu labetakh ve'en makharid. vahaqimoti lahem mata' leshem velo yihyu 'od 'asufei ra'ab ba'arez velo yis'u 'od kelimat hagoyim. veyade'u ki 'ani ihoh 'eloheihem 'itam vehemah 'ami bet yisra'el ne'um 'adonai ihoh. ve'aten zoni zon mar'iti 'adam 'atem 'ani 'eloheikhem ne'um 'adonai ihoh. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam sim panekha 'al har sei'ir vehinabei 'alav. ve'amarta lo koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh hini 'eilekha har sei'ir venatiti yadi 'alekha unetatikha shemamah umeshamah. 'arekha kharebah 'asim ve'atah shemamah tihyeh veyada'ta ki 'ani ihoh. ya'an heyot lekha 'eibat 'olam vatager 'et benei yisra'el 'al yedei khareb be'et 'eidam be'et 'avon qez. lakhen khai 'ani ne'um 'adonai ihoh ki ledam 'e'eskha vedam yirdafekha 'im lo dam saneita vedam yirdafekha. venatati 'et har sei'ir leshimah ushemamah vehikhrati mimenu 'ober vashab. umileiti 'et harav khalalav gib'otekha vegei'otekha vekhal 'afiqekha khalei khereb yipelu bahem. shimot 'olam 'etenkha ve'arekha lo teishabnah tashobenah vida'tem ki 'ani ihoh. ya'an 'amarekha 'et shenei hagoyim ve'et shetei ha'arazot li tihyenah virashnuha ihoh sham hayah. lakhen khai 'ani ne'um 'adonai ihoh ve'asiti ke'apekha ukheqin'atekha 'asher 'asitah misin'atekha bam venoda'ti bam ka'asher 'eshpetekha. veyada'ta ki 'ani ihoh shama'ti 'et kal na'azotekha 'asher 'amarta 'al harei yisra'el leimor shameimah shameimu lanu nitenu le'akhlah vatagdilu 'alai befikhem veha'tartem 'alai dibreikhem 'ani shama'eti. koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh kismoakh kal ha'arez shemamah 'e'eseh lakh. kesimkhatekha lenakhlat bet yisra'el 'al 'asher shameimah ken 'e'eseh lakh shemamah tihyeh har sei'ir vekhal 'edom kulah veyade'u ki 'ani ihoh. ve'atah ben 'adam hinabei 'el harei yisra'el ve'amarta harei yisra'el shim'u debar ihoh. koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh ya'an 'amar ha'oyeb 'aleikhem he'akh ubamot 'olam lemorashah hayetah lanu. lakhen hinabei ve'amarta koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh ya'an beya'an shamot vesha'of 'etkhem misabib lihyotkhem morashah lish'eirit hagoyim vatei'alu 'al sefat lashon vedibat 'am. lakhen harei yisra'el shim'u debar 'adonai ihoh koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh leharim velageba'ot la'afiqim velagei'ayot velekhorabot hashomemot vele'arim hane'ezabot 'asher hayu lebaz ulela'ag lish'eirit hagoyim 'asher misabib. lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh 'im lo be'esh qin'ati dibarti 'al she'eirit hagoyim ve'al 'edom kula 'asher natenu 'et 'arzi lahem lemorashah besimkhat kal leibab bish'at nefesh lema'an migrashah labaz. lakhen hinabei 'al 'admat yisra'el ve'amarta leharim velageba'ot la'afiqim velagei'ayot koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh hini beqin'ati ubakhamati dibarti ya'an kelimat goyim nesatem. lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh 'ani nasati 'et yadi 'im lo hagoyim 'asher lakhem misabib hemah kelimatam yisa'u. ve'atem harei yisra'el 'anpekhem titeinu uferyekhem tis'u le'ami yisra'el ki qeirebu labo. ki hini 'aleikhem ufaniti 'aleikhem vene'ebadtem venizra'tem. vehirbeiti 'aleikhem 'adam kal bet yisra'el kuloh venoshebu he'arim vehekhorabot tibanenah. vehirbeiti 'aleikhem 'adam ubeheimah verabu ufaru vehoshabti 'etkhem keqadmoteikhem veheitiboti meirishoteikhem vida'tem ki 'ani ihoh. veholakhti 'aleikhem 'adam 'et 'ami yisra'el vireishukha vehayita lahem lenakhalah velo tosif 'od leshakelam. koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh ya'an 'omerim lakhem 'okhelet 'adam 'ati 'at umeshakelet goyekh goyayikh hayit. lakhen 'adam lo tokheli 'od vegoyekh vegoyayikh lo tekhasheli teshakeli 'od ne'um 'adonai ihoh. velo 'ashmia' 'eilayikh 'od kelimat hagoyim vekherpat 'amim lo tis'i 'od vegoyekh vegoyayikh lo takhshili 'od ne'um 'adonai ihoh. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam bet yisra'el yoshebim 'al 'admatam vaytame'u 'otah bedarkam uba'alilotam ketum'at hanidah hayetah darkam lefanai. va'eshpokh khamati 'aleihem 'al hadam 'asher shafekhu 'al ha'arez ubegiluleihem time'uha. va'afiz 'otam bagoyim vayizaru ba'arazot kedarkam vekha'alilotam shefatim. vayabo 'el hagoyim 'asher ba'u sham vaykhalelu 'et shem qadshi be'emor lahem 'am ihoh 'eleh umei'arzo yaza'u. va'ekhmol 'al shem qadshi 'asher khileluhu bet yisra'el bagoyim 'asher ba'u shamah. lakhen 'emor lebet yisra'el koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh lo lema'ankhem 'ani 'oseh bet yisra'el ki 'im leshem qadshi 'asher khilaltem bagoyim 'asher batem sham. veqidashti 'et shemi hagadol hamkhulal bagoyim 'asher khilaltem betokham veyade'u hagoyim ki 'ani ihoh ne'um 'adonai ihoh behiqadeshi bakhem le'eineihem. velaqakhti 'etkhem min hagoyim veqibazti 'etkhem mikal ha'arazot veheibeiti 'etkhem 'el 'admatkhem. vezaraqti 'aleikhem mayim tehorim utehartem mikol tum'oteikhem umikal giluleikhem 'ataher 'etkhem. venatati lakhem leb khadash veruakh khadashah 'eten beqirbekhem vahasiroti 'et leb ha'eben mibesarkhem venatati lakhem leb basar. ve'et rukhi 'eten beqirbekhem ve'asiti 'et 'asher bekhuqai teileikhu umishpatai tishmeru va'asitem. vishabtem ba'arez 'asher natati la'aboteikhem vihyitem li le'am ve'anokhi 'ehyeh lakhem leilohim. vehosha'ti 'etkhem mikol tum'oteikhem veqarati 'el hadagan vehirbeiti 'oto velo 'eten 'aleikhem ra'ab. vehirbeiti 'et peri ha'ez utenubat hasadeh lema'an 'asher lo tiqkhu 'od kherpat ra'ab bagoyim. uzekhartem 'et darkheikhem hara'im uma'aleikhem 'asher lo tobim uneqototem bifneikhem 'al 'avonoteikhem ve'al to'aboteikhem. lo lema'ankhem 'ani 'oseh ne'um 'adonai ihoh yivada' lakhem boshu vehikalemu midarkheikhem bet yisra'el. koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh beyom tahari 'etkhem mikol 'avonoteikhem vehoshabti 'et he'arim venibnu hekhorabot. veha'arez haneshamah tei'abed takhat 'asher hayetah shemamah le'einei kal 'ober. ve'ameru ha'arez haleizu haneshamah hayetah kegan 'eiden vehe'arim hekhoreibot vehanshamot vehaneherasot bezurot yashabu. veyade'u hagoyim 'asher yisha'aru sebiboteikhem ki 'ani ihoh baniti haneherasot nata'ti haneshamah 'ani ihoh dibarti ve'asiti. koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh 'od zot 'idaresh lebet yisra'el la'asot lahem 'arbeh 'otam kazon 'adam. kezon qadashim kezon yerushalim bemo'adeha ken tihyenah he'arim hekhoreibot melei'ot zon 'adam veyade'u ki 'ani ihoh. hayetah 'alai yad ihoh vayozi'eini beruakh ihoh vaynikheini betokh habiq'ah vehi melei'ah 'azamot. vehe'ebirani 'aleihem sabib sabib vehineh rabot me'od 'al penei habiq'ah vehineh yebeishot me'od. vayomer 'eilai ben 'adam hatikhyenah ha'azamot ha'eleh va'omar 'adonai ihoh 'atah yada'eta. vayomer 'eilai hinabei 'al ha'azamot ha'eleh ve'amarta 'aleihem ha'azamot haybeishot shim'u debar ihoh. koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh la'azamot ha'eleh hineh 'ani meibi bakhem ruakh vikhyitem. venatati 'aleikhem gidim veha'aleiti 'aleikhem basar veqaramti 'aleikhem 'or venatati bakhem ruakh vikhyitem vida'tem ki 'ani ihoh. venibeiti ka'asher zuveiti vayhi qol kehinabe'i vehineh ra'ash vatiqrebu 'azamot 'ezem 'el 'azmo. vera'iti vehineh 'aleihem gidim ubasar 'alah vayiqram 'aleihem 'or milma'elah veruakh 'en bahem. vayomer 'eilai hinabei 'el haruakh hinabei ben 'adam ve'amarta 'el haruakh koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh mei'arba' rukhot bo'i haruakh ufekhi baharugim ha'eleh veyikhyu. vehinabeiti ka'asher zivani vatabo bahem haruakh vayikhyu vaya'amdu 'al ragleihem khayil gadol me'od me'od. vayomer 'eilai ben 'adam ha'azamot ha'eleh kal bet yisra'el hemah hineh 'omerim yabeshu 'azmoteinu ve'abedah tiqvateinu nigzarnu lanu. lakhen hinabei ve'amarta 'aleihem koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh hineh 'ani foteiakh 'et qibroteikhem veha'aleiti 'etkhem miqibroteikhem 'ami veheibeiti 'etkhem 'el 'admat yisra'el. vida'tem ki 'ani ihoh befitkhi 'et qibroteikhem ubeha'aloti 'etkhem miqibroteikhem 'ami. venatati rukhi bakhem vikhyitem vehinakhti 'etkhem 'al 'admatkhem vida'tem ki 'ani ihoh dibarti ve'asiti ne'um ihoh. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ve'atah ben 'adam qakh lekha 'ez 'ekhad ukhetob 'alav lihudah velibnei yisra'el khabeiro khabeirav uleqakh 'ez 'ekhad ukhetob 'alav leyosef 'ez 'efrayim vekhal bet yisra'el khabeiro khabeirav. veqarab 'otam 'ekhad 'el 'ekhad lekha le'ez 'ekhad vehayu la'akhadim beyadekha. vekha'asher yomeru 'eilekha benei 'amekha leimor halo tagid lanu mah 'eleh lakh daber 'aleihem koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh hineh 'ani loqeiakh 'et 'ez yosef 'asher beyad 'efrayim veshibtei yisra'el khebro khabeirav venatati 'otam 'alav 'et 'ez yehudah va'asitim le'ez 'ekhad vehayu 'ekhad beyadi. vehayu ha'eizim 'asher tikhtob 'aleihem beyadekha le'eineihem. vedaber 'aleihem koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh hineh 'ani loqeiakh 'et benei yisra'el miben hagoyim 'asher halekhu sham veqibazti 'otam misabib veheibeiti 'otam 'el 'admatam. ve'asiti 'otam lego 'ekhad ba'arez beharei yisra'el umelekh 'ekhad yihyeh lekhulam lemelekh velo yihyeh yihyu 'od lishnei goyim velo yeikhazu 'od lishtei mamlakhot 'od. velo yitame'u 'od begiluleihem ubeshiquzeihem ubekhol pish'eihem vehosha'ti 'otam mikol mosheboteihem 'asher khate'u bahem vetiharti 'otam vehayu li le'am va'ani 'ehyeh lahem leilohim. ve'abdi david melekh 'aleihem vero'eh 'ekhad yihyeh lekhulam ubemishpatai yeileikhu vekhuqotai yishmeru ve'asu 'otam. veyashebu 'al ha'arez 'asher natati le'abdi leya'aqob 'asher yashebu bah 'aboteikhem veyashebu 'aleha hemah ubeneihem ubenei beneihem 'ad 'olam vedavid 'abdi nasi lahem le'olam. vekharati lahem berit shalom berit 'olam yihyeh 'otam unetatim vehirbeiti 'otam venatati 'et miqdashi betokham le'olam. vehayah mishkani 'aleihem vehayiti lahem leilohim vehemah yihyu li le'am. veyade'u hagoyim ki 'ani ihoh meqadesh 'et yisra'el bihyot miqdashi betokham le'olam. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. ben 'adam sim panekha 'el gog 'erez hamagog nesi rosh meshekh vetubal vehinabei 'alav. ve'amarta koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh hini 'eilekha gog nesi rosh meshekh vetubal. veshobabtikha venatati khakhim bilkhayekha vehozeiti 'otkha ve'et kal kheilekha susim ufarashim lebushei mikhlol kulam qahal rab zinah umagen tofesei kharabot kulam. paras kush ufut 'itam kulam magen vekhoba'. gomer vekhal 'agapeha bet togarmah yarketei zafon ve'et kal 'agapav 'amim rabim 'itakh. hikon vehakhen lekha 'atah vekhal qehalekha haniqhalim 'alekha vehayita lahem lemishmar. miyamim rabim tipaqed be'akharit hashanim tabo 'el 'erez meshobebet meikhereb mequbezet mei'amim rabim 'al harei yisra'el 'asher hayu lekharebah tamid vehi mei'amim huza'ah veyashebu labetakh kulam. ve'alita kasho'ah tabo ke'anan lekhasot ha'arez tihyeh 'atah vekhal 'agapekha ve'amim rabim 'otakh. koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh vehayah bayom hahu ya'alu debarim 'al lebabekha vekhashabta makhashebet ra'ah. ve'amarta 'e'eleh 'al 'erez perazot 'abo hashoqetim yoshebei labetakh kulam yoshebim be'en khomah uberiakh udelatayim 'en lahem. lishlol shalal velaboz baz lehashib yadekha 'al khorabot noshabot ve'el 'am me'usaf migoyim 'oseh miqneh veqinyan yoshebei 'al tabur ha'arez. sheba udedan vesokharei tarshish vekhal kefireha yomeru lekha halishlol shalal 'atah ba halaboz baz hiqhalta qehalekha laset kesef vezahab laqakhat miqneh veqinyan lishlol shalal gadol. lakhen hinabei ben 'adam ve'amarta legog koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh halo bayom hahu beshebet 'ami yisra'el labetakh teida'. ubata mimeqomkha miyarketei zafon 'atah ve'amim rabim 'itakh rokhebei susim kulam qahal gadol vekhayil rab. ve'alita 'al 'ami yisra'el ke'anan lekhasot ha'arez be'akharit hayamim tihyeh vahabi'otikha 'al 'arzi lema'an da'at hagoyim 'oti behiqadeshi bekha le'eineihem gog. koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh ha'atah hu 'asher dibarti beyamim qadmonim beyad 'abadai nebi'ei yisra'el hanibe'im bayamim hahem shanim lehabi 'otekha 'aleihem. vehayah bayom hahu beyom bo gog 'al 'admat yisra'el ne'um 'adonai ihoh ta'aleh khamati be'api. ubeqin'ati be'esh 'ebrati dibarti 'im lo bayom hahu yihyeh ra'ash gadol 'al 'admat yisra'el. vera'ashu mipanai degei hayam ve'of hashamayim vekhayat hasadeh vekhal haremes haromes 'al ha'adamah vekhol ha'adam 'asher 'al penei ha'adamah venehersu heharim venafelu hamadreigot vekhal khomah la'arez tipol. veqarati 'alav lekhal harai khereb ne'um 'adonai ihoh khereb 'ish be'akhiv tihyeh. venishpati 'ito bedeber ubedam vegeshem shotef ve'abnei 'elgabish 'esh vegaferit 'amtir 'alav ve'al 'agapav ve'al 'amim rabim 'asher 'ito. vehitgadilti vehitqadishti venoda'ti le'einei goyim rabim veyade'u ki 'ani ihoh. ve'atah ben 'adam hinabei 'al gog ve'amarta koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh hini 'eilekha gog nesi rosh meshekh vetubal. veshobabtikha veshisheitikha veha'alitikha miyarketei zafon vahabi'otikha 'al harei yisra'el. vehikeiti qashtekha miyad semolekha vekhizekha miyad yeminekha 'apil. 'al harei yisra'el tipol 'atah vekhal 'agapekha ve'amim 'asher 'itakh le'et zipor kal kanaf vekhayat hasadeh netatikha le'akhlah 'al penei hasadeh tipol ki 'ani dibarti ne'um 'adonai ihoh. veshilakhti 'esh bemagog ubeyoshebei ha'iyim labetakh veyade'u ki 'ani ihoh. ve'et shem qadshi 'odia' betokh 'ami yisra'el velo 'akhel 'et shem qadshi 'od veyade'u hagoyim ki 'ani ihoh qadosh beyisra'el. hineh ba'ah venihyatah ne'um 'adonai ihoh hu hayom 'asher dibarti. veyaze'u yoshebei 'arei yisra'el ubi'aru vehisiqu benesheq umagen vezinah beqeshet ubekhizim ubemaqel yad uberomakh ubi'aru bahem 'esh sheba' shanim. velo yis'u 'eizim min hasadeh velo yakhtebu min haye'arim ki banesheq yeba'aru 'esh veshalelu 'et sholeleihem ubazezu 'et bozezeihem ne'um 'adonai ihoh. vehayah bayom hahu 'eten legog meqom sham qeber beyisra'el gei ha'oberim qidmat hayam vekhosemet hi 'et ha'oberim veqaberu sham 'et gog ve'et kal hamonoh veqare'u gei hamon gog. uqebarum bet yisra'el lema'an taher 'et ha'arez shib'ah khodashim. veqaberu kal 'am ha'arez vehayah lahem leshem yom hikabedi ne'um 'adonai ihoh. ve'anshei tamid yabdilu 'oberim ba'arez meqaberim 'et ha'oberim 'et hanotarim 'al penei ha'arez letaharah miqzeh shib'ah khodashim yakhqoru. ve'aberu ha'oberim ba'arez vera'ah 'ezem 'adam ubanah 'ezlo ziyun 'ad qaberu 'oto hamqaberim 'el gei hamon gog. vegam shem 'ir hamonah vetiharu ha'arez. ve'atah ben 'adam koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh 'emor lezipor kal kanaf ulekhol khayat hasadeh hiqabezu vabo'u hei'asefu misabib 'al zibkhi 'asher 'ani zobeiakh lakhem zebakh gadol 'al harei yisra'el va'akhaltem basar ushetitem dam. besar giborim tokheilu vedam nesi'ei ha'arez tishtu 'eilim karim ve'atudim parim meri'ei bashan kulam. va'akhaltem kheileb lesabe'ah ushetitem dam leshikaron mizibkhi 'asher zabakhti lakhem. useba'tem 'al shulkhani sus varekheb gibor vekhal 'ish milkhamah ne'um 'adonai ihoh. venatati 'et kebodi bagoyim vera'u khal hagoyim 'et mishpati 'asher 'asiti ve'et yadi 'asher samti bahem. veyade'u bet yisra'el ki 'ani ihoh 'eloheihem min hayom hahu vahale'ah. veyade'u hagoyim ki ba'avonam galu bet yisra'el 'al 'asher ma'alu bi va'astir panai meihem va'etenem beyad zareihem vayipelu bakhereb kulam. ketum'atam ukhefish'eihem 'asiti 'otam va'astir panai meihem. lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh 'atah 'ashib 'et shebit shebut ya'aqob verikhamti kal bet yisra'el veqineiti leshem qadshi venasu 'et kelimatam ve'et kal ma'alam 'asher ma'alu bi beshibtam 'al 'admatam labetakh ve'en makharid. beshobbi 'otam min ha'amim veqibazti 'otam mei'arzot 'oyebeihem veniqdashti bam le'einei hagoyim rabim. veyade'u ki 'ani ihoh 'eloheihem behagloti 'otam 'el hagoyim vekhinastim 'al 'admatam velo 'otir 'od meihem sham. velo 'astir 'od panai meihem 'asher shafakhti 'et rukhi 'al bet yisra'el ne'um 'adonai ihoh. be'esrim vekhamesh shanah legaluteinu berosh hashanah be'asor lakhodesh be'arba' 'esreh shanah 'akhar 'asher huketah ha'ir be'ezem hayom hazeh hayetah 'alai yad ihoh vayabei 'oti shamah. bemar'ot 'elohim hebi'ani 'el 'erez yisra'el vaynikheini 'el har gaboah me'od ve'alav kemibneh 'ir minegeb. vayabei 'oti shamah vehineh 'ish mar'eihu kemar'eh nekhoshet ufetil pishtim beyado uqeneh hamidah vehu 'omed basha'ar. vaydaber 'eilai ha'ish ben 'adam re'eh be'einekha ube'azenekha shema' vesim libekha lekhol 'asher 'ani mar'eh 'otakh ki lema'an har'otkhah hubatah henah haged 'et kal 'asher 'atah ro'eh lebet yisra'el. vehineh khomah mikhuz labayit sabib sabib ubeyad ha'ish qeneh hamidah shesh 'amot ba'amah vatofakh vayamad 'et rokhab habinyan qaneh 'ekhad veqomah qaneh 'ekhad. vayabo 'el sha'ar 'asher panav derekh haqadimah vaya'al bema'aloto bema'alotav vayamad 'et saf hasha'ar qaneh 'ekhad rokhab ve'et saf 'ekhad qaneh 'ekhad rokhab. vehata qaneh 'ekhad 'orekh veqaneh 'ekhad rokhab uben hata'im khamesh 'amot vesaf hasha'ar mei'eizel 'ulam hasha'ar meihabayit qaneh 'ekhad. vayamad 'et 'ulam hasha'ar meihabayit qaneh 'ekhad. vayamad 'et 'ulam hasha'ar shemoneh 'amot ve'eilo ve'eilav shetayim 'amot ve'ulam hasha'ar meihabayit. veta'ei hasha'ar derekh haqadim sheloshah mipoh usheloshah mipoh midah 'akhat lishlashetam umidah 'akhat la'eilim mipoh umipo. vayamad 'et rokhab petakh hasha'ar 'eser 'amot 'orekh hasha'ar shelosh 'esreh 'amot. ugebul lifnei hata'ot 'amah 'ekhat ve'amah 'akhat gebul mipoh vehata shesh 'amot mipo veshesh 'amot mipo. vayamad 'et hasha'ar migag hata legago rokhab 'esrim vekhamesh 'amot petakh neged patakh. vaya'as 'et 'eilim shishim 'amah ve'el 'el hekhazer hasha'ar sabib sabib. ve'al penei hasha'ar hayoton ha'iton 'al lifnei 'ulam hasha'ar hapenimi khamishim 'amah. vekhalonot 'atumot 'el hata'im ve'el 'eileiheimah lifnimah lasha'ar sabib sabib vekhen la'eilamot vekhalonot sabib sabib lifnimah ve'el 'ayil timorim. vaybi'eini 'el hekhazer hakhizonah vehineh leshakhot verizfah 'asui lekhazer sabib sabib sheloshim leshakhot 'el harizfah. veharizfah 'el ketef hashe'arim le'umat 'orekh hashe'arim harizfah hatakhtonah. vayamad rokhab milifnei hasha'ar hatakhtonah lifnei hekhazer hapenimi mikhuz mei'ah 'amah haqadim vehazafon. vehasha'ar 'asher panav derekh hazafon lekhazer hakhizonah madad 'areko verakhebo. veta'o veta'av sheloshah mipo usheloshah mipo ve'eilo ve'eilav ve'eilamo ve'eilamav hayah kemidat hasha'ar harishon khamishim 'amah 'areko verokhab khamesh ve'esrim ba'amah. vekhalono vekhalonav ve'eilamo ve'eilamav vetimoro vetimorav kemidat hasha'ar 'asher panav derekh haqadim ubema'alot sheba' ya'alu bo ve'eilamo ve'eilamav lifneihem. vesha'ar lekhazer hapenimi neged hasha'ar lazafon velaqadim vayamad misha'ar 'el sha'ar mei'ah 'amah. vayolikheini derekh hadarom vehineh sha'ar derekh hadarom umadad 'eilo 'eilav ve'eilamo ve'eilamav kamidot ha'eleh. vekhalonim lo ule'eilamo ule'eilamav sabib sabib kehakhalonot ha'eleh khamishim 'amah 'orekh verokhab khamesh ve'esrim 'amah. uma'alot shib'ah 'oloto 'olotav ve'eilamo ve'eilamav lifneihem vetimorim lo 'ekhad mipo ve'ekhad mipo 'el 'eilo 'eilav. vesha'ar lekhazer hapenimi derekh hadarom vayamad misha'ar 'el hasha'ar derekh hadarom mei'ah 'amot. vaybi'eini 'el khazer hapenimi besha'ar hadarom vayamad 'et hasha'ar hadarom kamidot ha'eleh. veta'o veta'av ve'eilo ve'eilav ve'eilamo ve'eilamav kamidot ha'eleh vekhalonot lo ule'eilamo ule'eilamav sabib sabib khamishim 'amah 'orekh verokhab 'esrim vekhamesh 'amot. ve'eilamot sabib sabib 'orekh khamesh ve'esrim 'amah verokhab khamesh 'amot. ve'eilamav 'el khazer hakhizonah vetimorim 'el 'eilo 'eilav uma'alot shemoneh ma'alo ma'alav. vaybi'eini 'el hekhazer hapenimi derekh haqadim vayamad 'et hasha'ar kamidot ha'eleh. veta'o veta'av ve'eilo ve'eilav ve'eilamo ve'eilamav kamidot ha'eleh vekhalonot lo ule'eilamo ule'eilamav sabib sabib 'orekh khamishim 'amah verokhab khamesh ve'esrim 'amah. ve'eilamo ve'eilamav lekhazer hakhizonah vetimorim 'el 'eilo 'eilav mipo umipo ushemoneh ma'alot ma'alo ma'alav. vaybi'eini 'el sha'ar hazafon umadad kamidot ha'eleh. ta'o ta'av 'eilo 'eilav ve'eilamo ve'eilamav vekhalonot lo sabib sabib 'orekh khamishim 'amah verokhab khamesh ve'esrim 'amah. ve'eilo ve'eilav lekhazer hakhizonah vetimorim 'el 'eilo 'eilav mipo umipo ushemoneh ma'alot ma'alo ma'alav. velishkah ufitkhah be'eilim hashe'arim sham yadikhu 'et ha'olah. ube'ulam hasha'ar shenayim shulkhanot mipo ushenayim shulkhanot mipoh lishkhot 'aleihem ha'olah vehakhatat veha'asham. ve'el hakatef mikhuzah la'oleh lefetakh hasha'ar hazafonah shenayim shulkhanot ve'el hakatef ha'akheret 'asher le'ulam hasha'ar shenayim shulkhanot. 'arba'ah shulkhanot mipoh ve'arba'ah shulkhanot mipoh lekhetef hasha'ar shemonah shulkhanot 'aleihem yishkhatu. ve'arba'ah shulkhanot la'olah 'abnei gazit 'orekh 'amah 'akhat vakheizi verokhab 'amah 'akhat vakheizi vegobah 'amah 'ekhat 'aleihem veyanikhu 'et hakeilim 'asher yishkhatu 'et ha'olah bam vehazabakh. vehashfatayim tofakh 'ekhad mukhanim babayit sabib sabib ve'el hashulkhanot besar haqareban. umikhuzah lasha'ar hapenimi lishkhot sharim bekhazer hapenimi 'asher 'el ketef sha'ar hazafon ufeneihem derekh hadarom 'ekhad 'el ketef sha'ar haqadim penei derekh hazafon. vaydaber 'eilai zoh halishkah 'asher paneha derekh hadarom lakohanim shomerei mishmeret habayit. vehalishkah 'asher paneha derekh hazafon lakohanim shomerei mishmeret hamizbeiakh hemah benei zadoq haqereibim mibenei leivi 'el ihoh leshareto. vayamad 'et hekhazer 'orekh mei'ah 'amah verokhab mei'ah 'amah meruba'at vehamizbeiakh lifnei habayit. vaybi'eini 'el 'ulam habayit vayamad 'el 'ulam khamesh 'amot mipoh vekhamesh 'amot mipoh verokhab hasha'ar shalosh 'amot mipo veshalosh 'amot mipo. 'orekh ha'ulam 'esrim 'amah verokhab 'ashtei 'esreh 'amah ubama'alot 'asher ya'alu 'eilav ve'amudim 'el ha'eilim 'ekhad mipoh ve'ekhad mipoh. vaybi'eini 'el haheikhal vayamad 'et ha'eilim shesh 'amot rokhab mipo veshesh 'amot rokhab mipo rokhab ha'ohel. verokhab hapetakh 'eser 'amot vekhitfot hapetakh khamesh 'amot mipo vekhamesh 'amot mipo vayamad 'areko 'arba'im 'amah verokhab 'esrim 'amah. uba lifnimah vayamad 'el hapetakh shetayim 'amot vehapetakh shesh 'amot verokhab hapetakh sheba' 'amot. vayamad 'et 'areko 'esrim 'amah verokhab 'esrim 'amah 'el penei haheikhal vayomer 'eilai zeh qodesh haqodashim. vayamad qir habayit shesh 'amot verokhab hazeila' 'arba' 'amot sabib sabib labayit sabib. vehazela'ot zeila' 'el zeila' shalosh usheloshim pe'amim uba'ot baqir 'asher labayit lazela'ot sabib sabib lihyot 'akhuzim velo yihyu 'akhuzim beqir habayit. verakhabah venasebah lema'lah lema'lah lazela'ot ki musab habayit lema'lah lema'lah sabib sabib labayit 'al ken rokhab labayit lema'elah vekhen hatakhtonah ya'aleh 'al ha'elyonah latikhonah. vera'iti labayit gobah sabib sabib meyusedot musedot hazela'ot melo haqaneh shesh 'amot 'azilah. rokhab haqir 'asher lazeila' 'el hakhuz khamesh 'amot va'asher munakh bet zela'ot 'asher labayit. uben haleshakhot rokhab 'esrim 'amah sabib labayit sabib sabib. ufetakh hazeila' lamunakh petakh 'ekhad derekh hazafon ufetakh 'ekhad ladarom verokhab meqom hamunakh khamesh 'amot sabib sabib. vehabinyan 'asher 'el penei hagizrah pe'at derekh hayam rokhab shib'im 'amah veqir habinyan khamesh 'amot rokhab sabib sabib ve'areko tish'im 'amah. umadad 'et habayit 'orekh mei'ah 'amah vehagizrah vehabinyah veqiroteha 'orekh mei'ah 'amah. verokhab penei habayit vehagizrah laqadim mei'ah 'amah. umadad 'orekh habinyan 'el penei hagizrah 'asher 'al 'akhareha ve'atuqeiha ve'atiqeha mipo umipo mei'ah 'amah vehaheikhal hapenimi ve'ulamei hekhazer. hasipim vehakhalonim ha'atumot veha'atiqim sabib lishlashetam neged hasaf sekhif 'ez sabib sabib veha'arez 'ad hakhalonot vehakhalonot mekhusot. 'al mei'al hapetakh ve'ad habayit hapenimi velakhuz ve'el kal haqir sabib sabib bapenimi ubakhizon midot. ve'asui kerubim vetimorim vetimorah ben kerub likhrub ushenayim panim lakerub. ufenei 'adam 'el hatimorah mipo ufenei khefir 'el hatimorah mipo 'asui 'el kal habayit sabib sabib. meiha'arez 'ad mei'al hapetakh hakerubim vehatimorim 'asuyim veqir haheikhal haheikhal mezuzat rebu'ah ufenei haqodesh hamar'eh kamar'eh. hamizbeiakh 'ez shalosh 'amot gaboah ve'areko shetayim 'amot umiqzo'otav lo ve'areko veqirotav 'ez vaydaber 'eilai zeh hashulkhan 'asher lifnei ihoh. ushetayim delatot laheikhal velaqodesh. ushetayim delatot ladelatot tayim musabot delatot tayim ledelet 'ekhat ushetei delatot la'akheret. va'asuyah 'aleihen 'el daltot haheikhal kerubim vetimorim ka'asher 'asuyim laqirot ve'ab 'ez 'el penei ha'ulam meihakhuz. vekhalonim 'atumot vetimorim mipo umipo 'el kitfot ha'ulam vezal'ot habayit veha'ubim. vayozi'eini 'el hekhazer hakhizonah haderekh derekh hazafon vaybi'eini 'el halishkah 'asher neged hagizrah va'asher neged habinyan 'el hazafon. 'el penei 'orekh 'amot hamei'ah petakh hazafon veharokhab khamishim 'amot. neged ha'esrim 'asher lekhazer hapenimi veneged rizfah 'asher lekhazer hakhizonah 'atiq 'el penei 'atiq bashelishim. velifnei haleshakhot mahalakh 'eser 'amot rokhab 'el hapenimit derekh 'amah 'ekhat ufitkheihem lazafon. vehaleshakhot ha'elyonot qezurot ki yokhlu 'atiqim meiheinah meihatakhtonot umeihatikhonot binyan. ki meshulashot henah ve'en lahen 'amudim ke'amudei hakhazeirot 'al ken ne'ezal meihatakhtonot umeihatikhonot meiha'arez. vegader 'asher lakhuz le'umat haleshakhot derekh hekhazer hakhizonah 'el penei haleshakhot 'areko khamishim 'amah. ki 'orekh haleshakhot 'asher lekhazer hakhizonah khamishim 'amah vehineh 'al penei haheikhal mei'ah 'amah. umitakhatah leshakhot umitakhat haleshakhot ha'eleh hamabo hameibi meihaqadim bebo'o lahenah meihekhazer hakhizonah. berokhab geder hekhazer derekh haqadim 'el penei hagizrah ve'el penei habinyan leshakhot. vederekh lifneihem kemar'eh haleshakhot 'asher derekh hazafon ke'arekan ken rakheban vekhol moza'eihen ukhemishpeteihen ukhefitkheihen. ukhefitkhei haleshakhot 'asher derekh hadarom petakh berosh darekh derekh bifnei hagederet haginah derekh haqadim bebo'an. vayomer 'eilai lishkhot hazafon lishkhot hadarom 'asher 'el penei hagizrah henah lishkhot haqodesh 'asher yokhelu sham hakohanim 'asher qerobim ihoh qadeshei haqodashim sham yanikhu qadeshei haqodashim vehaminkhah vehakhatat veha'asham ki hamaqom qadosh. bebo'am hakohanim velo yeize'u meihaqodesh 'el hekhazer hakhizonah vesham yanikhu bigdeihem 'asher yesharetu bahen ki qodesh henah yilbeshu velabeshu begadim 'akheirim veqarebu 'el 'asher la'am. vekhilah 'et midot habayit hapenimi vehozi'ani derekh hasha'ar 'asher panav derekh haqadim umedado sabib sabib. madad ruakh haqadim biqneh hamidah khamesh 'eimot mei'ot qanim biqneh hamidah sabib. madad ruakh hazafon khamesh mei'ot qanim biqneh hamidah sabib. 'et ruakh hadarom madad khamesh mei'ot qanim biqneh hamidah. sabab 'el ruakh hayam madad khamesh mei'ot qanim biqneh hamidah. le'arba' rukhot medado khomah lo sabib sabib 'orekh khamesh mei'ot verokhab khamesh mei'ot lehabdil ben haqodesh lekhol. vayolikheini 'el hasha'ar sha'ar 'asher poneh derekh haqadim. vehineh kebod 'elohei yisra'el ba miderekh haqadim veqolo keqol mayim rabim veha'arez hei'irah mikebodo. ukhemar'eh hamar'eh 'asher ra'iti kamar'eh 'asher ra'iti bebo'i leshakhet 'et ha'ir umar'ot kamar'eh 'asher ra'iti 'el nehar kebar va'epol 'el panai. ukhebod ihoh ba 'el habayit derekh sha'ar 'asher panav derekh haqadim. vatisa'eini ruakh vatebi'eini 'el hekhazer hapenimi vehineh malei khebod ihoh habayit. va'eshma' midaber 'eilai meihabayit ve'ish hayah 'omed 'ezli. vayomer 'eilai ben 'adam 'et meqom kis'i ve'et meqom kapot raglai 'asher 'eshkan sham betokh benei yisra'el le'olam velo yetame'u 'od bet yisra'el shem qadshi hemah umalkheihem biznutam ubefigrei malkheihem bamotam. betitam sipam 'et sipi umezuzatam 'eizel mezuzati vehaqir beini ubeineihem vetime'u 'et shem qadshi beto'abotam 'asher 'asu va'akhal 'otam be'api. 'atah yerakhaqu 'et zenutam ufigrei malkheihem mimeni veshakhanti betokham le'olam. 'atah ben 'adam haged 'et bet yisra'el 'et habayit veyikalemu mei'avonoteihem umadedu 'et takhenit. ve'im nikhlemu mikol 'asher 'asu zurat habayit utekhunato umoza'av umoba'av vekhal zurotav ve'et kal khuqotav vekhal zurotai zurotav vekhal toroto torotav hoda' 'otam ukhetob le'eineihem veyishmeru 'et kal zurato ve'et kal khuqotav ve'asu 'otam. zot torat habayit 'al rosh hahar kal gebulo sabib sabib qodesh qadashim hineh zot torat habayit. ve'eleh midot hamizbeiakh ba'amot 'amah 'amah vatofakh vekheq ha'amah ve'amah rokhab ugebulah 'el sefatah sabib zeret ha'ekhad vezeh gab hamizbeiakh. umeikheq ha'arez 'ad ha'azarah hatakhtonah shetayim 'amot verokhab 'amah 'ekhat umeiho'azarah haqetanah 'ad ha'azarah hagedolah 'arba' 'amot verokhab ha'amah. vehahar'el 'arba' 'amot umeiha'ari'el ulema'lah haqeranot 'arba'. veha'ari'el veha'ari'el shetem 'esreh 'orekh bishtem 'esreh rokhab rabua' 'el 'arba'at reba'av. veha'azarah 'arba' 'esreh 'orekh be'arba' 'esreh rokhab 'el 'arba'at reba'eha vehagebul sabib 'otah khazi ha'amah vehakheq lah 'amah sabib uma'aloteihu penot qadim. vayomer 'eilai ben 'adam koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh 'eleh khuqot hamizbeiakh beyom hei'asoto leha'alot 'alav 'olah velizroq 'alav dam. venatatah 'el hakohanim halviyim 'asher hem mizera' zadoq haqerobim 'eilai ne'um 'adonai ihoh leshareteini par ben baqar lekhatat. velaqakhta midamo venatatah 'al 'arba' qarnotav ve'el 'arba' pinot ha'azarah ve'el hagebul sabib vekhiteita 'oto vekhipartahu. velaqakhta 'et hapar hakhatat userafo bemifqad habayit mikhuz lamiqdash. ubayom hasheini taqrib se'ir 'izim tamim lekhatat vekhite'u 'et hamizbeiakh ka'asher khite'u bapar. bekhalotkha meikhatei taqrib par ben baqar tamim ve'ayil min hazon tamim. vehiqrabtam lifnei ihoh vehishlikhu hakohanim 'aleihem melakh vehe'elu 'otam 'olah ihoh. shib'at yamim ta'aseh se'ir khatat layom ufar ben baqar ve'ayil min hazon temimim ya'asu. shib'at yamim yekhaperu 'et hamizbeiakh vetiharu 'oto umil'u yado yadav. vikhalu 'et hayamim vehayah bayom hashemini vahale'ah ya'asu hakohanim 'al hamizbeiakh 'et 'oloteikhem ve'et shalmeikhem veraziti 'etkhem ne'um 'adonai ihoh. vayasheb 'oti derekh sha'ar hamiqdash hakhizon haponeh qadim vehu sagur. vayomer 'eilai ihoh hasha'ar hazeh sagur yihyeh lo yipateiakh ve'ish lo yabo bo ki ihoh 'elohei yisra'el ba bo vehayah sagur. 'et hanasi nasi hu yeisheb bo le'ekhol lekhem lifnei ihoh miderekh 'ulam hasha'ar yabo umidarko yeizei. vaybi'eini derekh sha'ar hazafon 'el penei habayit va'eire vehineh malei khebod ihoh 'et bet ihoh va'epol 'el panai. vayomer 'eilai ihoh ben 'adam sim libekha ure'eh be'einekha ube'azenekha shema' 'et kal 'asher 'ani medaber 'otakh lekhal khuqot bet ihoh ulekhal toroto torotav vesamta libekha limbo habayit bekhol moza'ei hamiqdash. ve'amarta 'el meri 'el bet yisra'el koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh rab lakhem mikal to'aboteikhem bet yisra'el. bahabi'akhem benei neikhar 'arlei leb ve'arlei basar lihyot bemiqdashi lekhalelo 'et beiti behaqribekhem 'et lakhmi kheileb vadam vayafeiru 'et beriti 'el kal to'aboteikhem. velo shemartem mishmeret qadashai vatesimun leshomerei mishmarti bemiqdashi lakhem. koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh kal ben neikhar 'erel leb ve'erel basar lo yabo 'el miqdashi lekhal ben neikhar 'asher betokh benei yisra'el. ki 'im halviyim 'asher rakhaqu mei'alai bit'ot yisra'el 'asher ta'u mei'alai 'akharei giluleihem venase'u 'avonam. vehayu bemiqdashi mesharetim pequdot 'el sha'arei habayit umesharetim 'et habayit hemah yishkhatu 'et ha'olah ve'et hazebakh la'am vehemah ya'amdu lifneihem lesharetam. ya'an 'asher yesharetu 'otam lifnei giluleihem vehayu lebet yisra'el lemikhshol 'avon 'al ken nasati yadi 'aleihem ne'um 'adonai ihoh venase'u 'avonam. velo yigeshu 'eilai lekhahen li velageshet 'al kal qadashai 'el qadeshei haqedashim venase'u kelimatam veto'abotam 'asher 'asu. venatati 'otam shomerei mishmeret habayit lekhol 'abodato ulekhol 'asher yei'aseh bo. vehakohanim halviyim benei zadoq 'asher shameru 'et mishmeret miqdashi bit'ot benei yisra'el mei'alai hemah yiqrebu 'eilai leshareteini ve'amedu lefanai lehaqrib li kheileb vadam ne'um 'adonai ihoh. hemah yabo'u 'el miqdashi vehemah yiqrebu 'el shulkhani leshareteini veshameru 'et mishmarti. vehayah bebo'am 'el sha'arei hekhazer hapenimit bigdei fishtim yilbashu velo ya'aleh 'aleihem zemer besharetam besha'arei hekhazer hapenimit vabayetah. pa'arei fishtim yihyu 'al rosham umikhnesei fishtim yihyu 'al mateneihem lo yakhgeru bayaza'. ubezeitam 'el hekhazer hakhizonah 'el hekhazer hakhizonah 'el ha'am yifshetu 'et bigdeihem 'asher hemah mesharetim bam vehinikhu 'otam belishkhot haqodesh velabeshu begadim 'akheirim velo yeqadeshu 'et ha'am bebigdeihem. verosham lo yegaleikhu ufera' lo yeshaleikhu kasom yikhsemu 'et rasheihem. veyayin lo yishtu kal kohen bebo'am 'el hekhazer hapenimit. ve'almanah ugerushah lo yiqkhu lahem lenashim ki 'im betulot mizera' bet yisra'el veha'almanah 'asher tihyeh 'almanah mikohen yiqakhu. ve'et 'ami yoru ben qodesh lekhol uben tamei letahor yodi'um. ve'al rib hemah ya'amdu lishpot lemishpat bemishpatai ushafetuhu yishpetuhu ve'et torotai ve'et khuqotai bekhal mo'adai yishmoru ve'et shabetotai yeqadeishu. ve'el met 'adam lo yabo letame'ah ki 'im le'ab ule'em uleben ulebat le'akh ule'akhot 'asher lo hayetah le'ish yitama'u. ve'akharei tahorato shib'at yamim yisperu lo. ubeyom bo'o 'el haqodesh 'el hekhazer hapenimit lesharet baqodesh yaqrib khatato ne'um 'adonai ihoh. vehayetah lahem lenakhalah 'ani nakhalatam va'akhuzah lo titenu lahem beyisra'el 'ani 'akhuzatam. haminkhah vehakhatat veha'asham hemah yokhelum vekhal kheirem beyisra'el lahem yihyeh. vereishit kal bikurei khol vekhal terumat kol mikol terumoteikhem lakohanim yihyeh vereishit 'arisoteikhem titenu lakohen lehaniakh berakhah 'el beitekha. kal nebeilah utereifah min ha'of umin habeheimah lo yokhelu hakohanim. ubehapilekhem 'et ha'arez benakhalah tarimu terumah ihoh qodesh min ha'arez 'orekh khamishah ve'esrim 'elef 'orekh verokhab 'asarah 'alef qodesh hu bekhal gebulah sabib. yihyeh mizeh 'el haqodesh khamesh mei'ot bakhamesh mei'ot meruba' sabib vakhamishim 'amah migrash lo sabib. umin hamidah hazot tamod 'orekh khamesh khamishah ve'esrim 'elef verokhab 'aseret 'alafim ubo yihyeh hamiqdash qodesh qadashim. qodesh min ha'arez hu lakohanim mesharetei hamiqdash yihyeh haqereibim lesharet 'et ihoh vehayah lahem maqom lebatim umiqdash lamiqdash. vakhamishah ve'esrim 'elef 'orekh va'aseret 'alafim rokhab yihyeh vehayah lalviyim mesharetei habayit lahem la'akhuzah 'esrim leshakhot. va'akhuzat ha'ir titenu khameishet 'alafim rokhab ve'orekh khamishah ve'esrim 'elef le'umat terumat haqodesh lekhal bet yisra'el yihyeh. velanasi mizeh umizeh litrumat haqodesh vela'akhuzat ha'ir 'el penei terumat haqodesh ve'el penei 'akhuzat ha'ir mipe'at yam yamah umipe'at qeidemah qadimah ve'orekh le'umot 'akhad hakhalaqim migebul yam 'el gebul qadimah. la'arez yihyeh lo la'akhuzah beyisra'el velo yonu 'od nesi'ai 'et 'ami veha'arez yitenu lebet yisra'el leshibteihem. koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh rab lakhem nesi'ei yisra'el khamas vashod hasiru umishpat uzedaqah 'asu harimu gerushoteikhem mei'al 'ami ne'um 'adonai ihoh. mozenei zedeq ve'eifat zedeq ubat zedeq yehi lakhem. ha'eifah vehabat tokhen 'ekhad yihyeh laset ma'sar hakhomer habat va'asirit hakhomer ha'eifah 'el hakhomer yihyeh matkunto. vehasheqel 'esrim geirah 'esrim sheqalim khamishah ve'esrim sheqalim 'asarah vakhamishah sheqel hamaneh yihyeh lakhem. zot haterumah 'asher tarimu shishit ha'eifah meikhomer hakhitim veshishitem ha'eifah meikhomer hase'orim. vekhoq hashemen habat hashemen ma'sar habat min hakor 'aseret habatim khomer ki 'aseret habatim khomer. veseh 'akhat min hazon min hamatayim mimashqeh yisra'el leminkhah ule'olah velishlamim lekhaper 'aleihem ne'um 'adonai ihoh. kol ha'am ha'arez yihyu 'el haterumah hazot lanasi beyisra'el. ve'al hanasi yihyeh ha'olot vehaminkhah vehaneisekh bakhagim ubekhodashim ubashabatot bekhal mo'adei bet yisra'el hu ya'aseh 'et hakhatat ve'et haminkhah ve'et ha'olah ve'et hashelamim lekhaper be'ad bet yisra'el. koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh barishon be'ekhad lakhodesh tiqakh par ben baqar tamim vekhiteita 'et hamiqdash. velaqakh hakohen midam hakhatat venatan 'el mezuzat habayit ve'el 'arba' pinot ha'azarah lamizbeiakh ve'al mezuzat sha'ar hekhazer hapenimit. vekhen ta'aseh beshib'ah bakhodesh mei'ish shogeh umipeti vekhipartem 'et habayit. barishon be'arba'ah 'asar yom lakhodesh yihyeh lakhem hapasakh khag shebu'ot yamim mazot yei'akhel. ve'asah hanasi bayom hahu ba'ado ube'ad kal 'am ha'arez par khatat. veshib'at yemei hekhag ya'aseh 'olah ihoh shib'at parim veshib'at 'eilim temimim layom shib'at hayamim vekhatat se'ir 'izim layom. uminkhah 'eifah lapar ve'eifah la'ayil ya'aseh veshemen hin la'eifah. bashebi'i bakhamishah 'asar yom lakhodesh bekhag ya'aseh kha'eleh shib'at hayamim kakhatat ka'olah vekhaminkhah vekhashamen. koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh sha'ar hekhazer hapenimit haponeh qadim yihyeh sagur sheishet yemei hama'aseh ubeyom hashabat yipateiakh ubeyom hakhodesh yipateiakh. uba hanasi derekh 'ulam hasha'ar mikhuz ve'amad 'al mezuzat hasha'ar ve'asu hakohanim 'et 'olato ve'et shelamav vehishtakhavah 'al miftan hasha'ar veyaza vehasha'ar lo yisager 'ad ha'areb. vehishtakhavu 'am ha'arez petakh hasha'ar hahu bashabatot ubekhodashim lifnei ihoh. veha'olah 'asher yaqrib hanasi ihoh beyom hashabat shishah khebasim temimim ve'ayil tamim. uminkhah 'eifah la'ayil velakebasim minkhah matat yado veshemen hin la'eifah. ubeyom hakhodesh par ben baqar temimim vesheishet kebasim va'ayil temimim yihyu. ve'eifah lapar ve'eifah la'ayil ya'aseh minkhah velakebasim ka'asher tasig yado veshemen hin la'eifah. ubebo hanasi derekh 'ulam hasha'ar yabo ubedarko yeizei. ubebo 'am ha'arez lifnei ihoh bamo'adim haba derekh sha'ar zafon lehishtakhavot yeizei derekh sha'ar negeb vehaba derekh sha'ar negeb yeizei derekh sha'ar zafonah lo yashub derekh hasha'ar 'asher ba bo ki nikhkho yeize'u yeizei. vehanasi betokham bebo'am yabo ubezeitam yeizei'u. ubakhagim ubamo'adim tihyeh haminkhah 'eifah lapar ve'eifah la'ayil velakebasim matat yado veshemen hin la'eifah. vekhi ya'aseh hanasi nedabah 'olah 'o shelamim nedabah ihoh ufatakh lo 'et hasha'ar haponeh qadim ve'asah 'et 'olato ve'et shelamav ka'asher ya'aseh beyom hashabat veyaza vesagar 'et hasha'ar 'akharei zeito. vekhebes ben shenato tamim ta'aseh 'olah layom ihoh baboqer baboqer ta'aseh 'oto. uminkhah ta'aseh 'alav baboqer baboqer shishit ha'eifah veshemen shelishit hahin laros 'et hasolet minkhah ihoh khuqot 'olam tamid. va'asu ya'asu 'et hakebes ve'et haminkhah ve'et hashemen baboqer baboqer 'olat tamid. koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh ki yiten hanasi matanah le'ish mibanav nakhalato hi lebanav tihyeh 'akhuzatam hi benakhalah. vekhi yiten matanah minakhalato le'akhad mei'abadav vehayetah lo 'ad shenat haderor veshabat lanasi 'akh nakhalato banav lahem tihyeh. velo yiqakh hanasi minakhalat ha'am lehonotam mei'akhuzatam mei'akhuzato yankhil 'et banav lema'an 'asher lo yafuzu 'ami 'ish mei'akhuzato. vaybi'eini bamabo 'asher 'al ketef hasha'ar 'el halishkhot haqodesh 'el hakohanim haponot zafonah vehineh sham maqom bayarkhotim bayarkhatayim yamah. vayomer 'eilai zeh hamaqom 'asher yebashelu sham hakohanim 'et ha'asham ve'et hakhatat 'asher yofu 'et haminkhah lebilti hozi 'el hekhazer hakhizonah leqadesh 'et ha'am. vayozi'eini 'el hekhazer hakhizonah vaya'abireini 'el 'arba'at miqzo'ei hekhazer vehineh khazer bemiqzoa' hekhazer khazer bemiqzoa' hekhazer. be'arba'at miqzo'ot hekhazer khazeirot qeturot 'arba'im 'orekh usheloshim rokhab midah 'akhat le'arba'tam mehuqza'ot vetur sabib bahem sabib le'arba'tam umebashelot 'asui mitakhat hatirot sabib. vayomer 'eilai 'eleh bet hambashelim 'asher yebashelu sham mesharetei habayit 'et zebakh ha'am. vayshibeini 'el petakh habayit vehineh mayim yoze'im mitakhat miftan habayit qadimah ki fenei habayit qadim vehamayim yoredim mitakhat miketef habayit haymanit minegeb lamizbeiakh. vayozi'eini derekh sha'ar zafonah vaysibeini derekh khuz 'el sha'ar hakhuz derekh haponeh qadim vehineh mayim mefakim min hakatef haymanit. bezet ha'ish qadim veqav beyado vayamad 'elef ba'amah vaya'abireini bamayim mei 'afesayim. vayamad 'elef vaya'abireini bamayim mayim birkayim vayamad 'elef vaya'abireini mei matenayim. vayamad 'elef nakhal 'asher lo 'ukhal la'abor ki ga'u hamayim mei sakhu nakhal 'asher lo yei'aber. vayomer 'eilai hara'ita ben 'adam vayolikheini vayshibeini sefat hanakhal. beshubeini vehineh 'el sefat hanakhal 'ez rab me'od mizeh umizeh. vayomer 'eilai hamayim ha'eleh yoz'im 'el hagelilah haqadmonah veyaredu 'al ha'arabah uba'u hayamah 'el hayamah hamuza'im venirpe'u venirpu hamayim. vehayah khal nefesh khayah 'asher yishroz 'el kal 'asher yabo sham nakhalayim yikhyeh vehayah hadagah rabah me'od ki ba'u shamah hamayim ha'eleh veyeirafe'u vakhai kol 'asher yabo shamah hanakhal. vehayah ya'amdu 'amedu 'alav davagim mei'en gedi ve'ad 'en 'eglayim mishtoakh lakharamim yihyu leminah tihyeh degatam kidgat hayam hagadol rabah me'od. bizoto bizotav ugeba'av velo yeirafe'u lemelakh nitanu. ve'al hanakhal ya'aleh 'al sefato mizeh umizeh kal 'ez ma'akhal lo yibol 'aleihu velo yitom piryo lakhodashav yebaker ki meimav min hamiqdash hemah yoz'im vehayu vehayah firyo lema'akhal ve'aleihu litrufah. koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh geh gebul 'asher titnakhalu 'et ha'arez lishnei 'asar shibtei yisra'el yosef khabalim. unekhaltem 'otah 'ish ke'akhiv 'asher nasati 'et yadi letitah la'aboteikhem venafelah ha'arez hazot lakhem benakhalah. vezeh gebul ha'arez lif'at zafonah min hayam hagadol haderekh khetlon lebo zedadah. khamat beirotah sibrayim 'asher ben gebul dameseq uben gebul khamat khazer hatikhon 'asher 'el gebul khavran. vehayah gebul min hayam khazar 'einon gebul dameseq vezafon zafonah ugebul khamat ve'et pe'at zafon. ufe'at qadim miben khavran umiben dameseq umiben hagil'ad umiben 'erez yisra'el hayarden migebul 'al hayam haqadmoni tamodu ve'et pe'at qadimah. ufe'at negeb teimanah mitamar 'ad mei meribot qadesh nakhalah 'el hayam hagadol ve'et pe'at teimanah negbah. ufe'at yam hayam hagadol migebul 'ad nokhakh lebo khamat zot pe'at yam. vekhilaqtem 'et ha'arez hazot lakhem leshibtei yisra'el. vehayah tapilu 'otah benakhalah lakhem ulehageirim hagarim betokhkhem 'asher holidu banim betokhkhem vehayu lakhem ke'ezrakh bibnei yisra'el 'itekhem yipelu benakhalah betokh shibtei yisra'el. vehayah basheibet 'asher gar hager 'ito m titenu nakhalato ne'um 'adonai ihoh. ve'eleh shemot hashebatim miqzeh zafonah 'el yad derekh khetlon lebo khamat khazar 'einan gebul dameseq zafonah 'el yad khamat vehayu lo fe'at qadim hayam dan 'ekhad. ve'al gebul dan mipe'at qadim 'ad pe'at yamah 'asher 'ekhad. ve'al gebul 'asher mipe'at qadimah ve'ad pe'at yamah naftali 'ekhad. ve'al gebul naftali mipe'at qadimah 'ad pe'at yamah menasheh 'ekhad. ve'al gebul menasheh mipe'at qadimah 'ad pe'at yamah 'efrayim 'ekhad. ve'al gebul 'efrayim mipe'at qadim ve'ad pe'at yamah re'uben 'ekhad. ve'al gebul re'uben mipe'at qadim 'ad pe'at yamah yehudah 'ekhad. ve'al gebul yehudah mipe'at qadim 'ad pe'at yamah tihyeh haterumah 'asher tarimu khamishah ve'esrim 'elef rokhab ve'orekh ke'akhad hakhalaqim mipe'at qadimah 'ad pe'at yamah vehayah hamiqdash betokho. haterumah 'asher tarimu ihoh 'orekh khamishah ve'esrim 'elef verokhab 'aseret 'alafim. ule'eleh tihyeh terumat haqodesh lakohanim zafonah khamishah ve'esrim 'elef veyamah rokhab 'aseret 'alafim veqadimah rokhab 'aseret 'alafim venegbah 'orekh khamishah ve'esrim 'alef vehayah miqdash ihoh betokho. lakohanim hamqudash mibenei zadoq 'asher shameru mishmarti 'asher lo ta'u bit'ot benei yisra'el ka'asher ta'u halviyim. vehayetah lahem terumiyah miterumat ha'arez qodesh qadashim 'el gebul halviyim. vehalviyim le'umat gebul hakohanim khamishah ve'esrim 'elef 'orekh verokhab 'aseret 'alafim kal 'orekh khamishah ve'esrim 'elef verokhab 'aseret 'alafim. velo yimkeru mimenu velo yamer velo ya'abur ya'abir reishit ha'arez ki qodesh ihoh. vakhameishet 'alafim hanotar barokhab 'al penei khamishah ve'esrim 'elef khol hu la'ir lemoshab ulemigrash vehayetah ha'ir betokhoh betokho. ve'eleh midoteha pe'at zafon khamesh mei'ot ve'arba'at 'alafim ufe'at negeb khamesh khamesh mei'ot ve'arba'at 'alafim umipe'at qadim khamesh mei'ot ve'arba'at 'alafim ufe'at yamah khamesh mei'ot ve'arba'at 'alafim. vehayah migrash la'ir zafonah khamishim umatayim venegbah khamishim umatayim veqadimah khamishim umatayim veyamah khamishim umatayim. vehanotar ba'orekh le'umat terumat haqodesh 'aseret 'alafim qadimah va'aseret 'alafim yamah vehayah le'umat terumat haqodesh vehayetah tebu'atoh tebu'ato lelekhem le'obedei ha'ir. veha'obed ha'ir ya'abduhu mikol shibtei yisra'el. kal haterumah khamishah ve'esrim 'elef bakhamishah ve'esrim 'alef rebi'it tarimu 'et terumat haqodesh 'el 'akhuzat ha'ir. vehanotar lanasi mizeh umizeh litrumat haqodesh vela'akhuzat ha'ir 'el penei khamishah ve'esrim 'elef terumah 'ad gebul qadimah veyamah 'al penei khamishah ve'esrim 'elef 'al gebul yamah le'umat khalaqim lanasi vehayetah terumat haqodesh umiqdash habayit betokhoh betokho. umei'akhuzat halviyim umei'akhuzat ha'ir betokh 'asher lanasi yihyeh ben gebul yehudah uben gebul binyamin lanasi yihyeh. veyeter hashebatim mipe'at qadimah 'ad pe'at yamah binyamin 'ekhad. ve'al gebul binyamin mipe'at qadimah 'ad pe'at yamah shim'on 'ekhad. ve'al gebul shim'on mipe'at qadimah 'ad pe'at yamah yisashkhar 'ekhad. ve'al gebul yisashkhar mipe'at qadimah 'ad pe'at yamah zebulun 'ekhad. ve'al gebul zebulun mipe'at qadimah 'ad pe'at yamah gad 'ekhad. ve'al gebul gad 'el pe'at negeb teimanah vehayah gebul mitamar mei meribat qadesh nakhalah 'al hayam hagadol. zot ha'arez 'asher tapilu minakhalah leshibtei yisra'el ve'eleh makhleqotam ne'um 'adonai ihoh. ve'eleh toz'ot ha'ir mipe'at zafon khamesh mei'ot ve'arba'at 'alafim midah. vesha'arei ha'ir 'al shemot shibtei yisra'el she'arim sheloshah zafonah sha'ar re'uben 'ekhad sha'ar yehudah 'ekhad sha'ar leivi 'ekhad. ve'el pe'at qadimah khamesh mei'ot ve'arba'at 'alafim ushe'arim sheloshah vesha'ar yosef 'ekhad sha'ar binyamin 'ekhad sha'ar dan 'ekhad. ufe'at negbah khamesh mei'ot ve'arba'at 'alafim midah ushe'arim sheloshah sha'ar shim'on 'ekhad sha'ar yisashkhar 'ekhad sha'ar zebulun 'ekhad. pe'at yamah khamesh mei'ot ve'arba'at 'alafim sha'areihem sheloshah sha'ar gad 'ekhad sha'ar 'asher 'ekhad sha'ar naftali 'ekhad. sabib shemonah 'asar 'alef veshem ha'ir miyom ihoh shamah.

debar ihoh 'asher hayah 'el hosheia' ben be'eiri bimei 'uziyah yotam 'akhaz yekhizqiyah malkhei yehudah ubimei yarabe'am ben yo'ash melekh yisra'el. tekhilat diber ihoh behosheia' vayomer ihoh 'el hosheia' lekh qakh lekha 'eishet zenunim veyaldei zenunim ki zanoh tizneh ha'arez mei'akharei ihoh. vayeilekh vayiqakh 'et gomer bat diblayim vatahar vateiled lo ben. vayomer ihoh 'eilav qera shemo yizre'el ki 'od me'at ufaqadti 'et demei yizre'el 'al bet yeihu vehishbati mamlekhut bet yisra'el. vehayah bayom hahu veshabarti 'et qeshet yisra'el be'eimeq yizre'el. vatahar 'od vateiled bat vayomer lo qera shemah lo rukhamah ki lo 'osif 'od 'arakhem 'et bet yisra'el ki naso 'esa lahem. ve'et bet yehudah 'arakhem vehosha'tim ihoh 'eloheihem velo 'oshi'em beqeshet ubekhereb ubemilkhamah besusim ubefarashim. vatigmol 'et lo rukhamah vatahar vateiled ben. vayomer qera shemo lo 'ami ki 'atem lo 'ami ve'anokhi lo 'ehyeh s vehayah mispar benei yisra'el kekhol hayam 'asher lo yimad velo yisafer vehayah bimqom 'asher yei'amer lahem lo 'ami 'atem yei'amer lahem benei 'el khai. veniqbezu benei yehudah ubenei yisra'el yakhdav vesamu lahem rosh 'ekhad ve'alu min ha'arez ki gadol yom yizre'el. 'imru la'akheikhem 'ami vela'akhoteikhem rukhamah. ribu be'imekhem ribu ki hi lo 'ishti ve'anokhi lo 'ishah vetaser zenuneha mipaneh vena'afufeha miben shadeha. pen 'afshitenah 'arumah vehizagtiha keyom hivaledah vesamtiha khamidbar veshatiha ke'erez ziyah vahamitiha bazama. ve'et baneha lo 'arakhem ki benei zenunim hemah. ki zanetah 'imam hobishah horatam ki 'amerah 'eilekhah 'akharei me'ahabai notenei lakhmi umeimai zamri ufishti shamni veshiquyai. lakhen hini sakh 'et darkekh basirim vegadarti 'et gedeirah unetiboteha lo timza. veridefah 'et me'ahabeha velo tasig 'otam ubiqshatam velo timza ve'amerah 'eilekhah ve'ashubah 'el 'ishi harishon ki tob li 'az mei'atah. vehi lo yade'ah ki 'anokhi natati lah hadagan vehatirosh vehayizhar vekhesef hirbeiti lah vezahab 'asu laba'al. lakhen 'ashub velaqakhti degani be'ito vetiroshi bemo'ado vehizalti zamri ufishti lekhasot 'et 'ervatah. ve'atah 'agaleh 'et nablutah le'einei me'ahabeha ve'ish lo yazilenah miyadi. vehishbati kal mesosah khagah khadeshah veshabatah vekhol mo'adah. vahashimoti gafnah ute'einatah 'asher 'amerah 'etnah hemah li 'asher natenu li me'ahabai vesamtim leya'ar va'akhalatam khayat hasadeh. ufaqadti 'aleha 'et yemei habe'alim 'asher taqtir lahem vata'ad nizmah vekhelyatah vateilekh 'akharei me'ahabeha ve'oti shakhekhah ne'um ihoh. lakhen hineh 'anokhi mefateha veholakhtiha hamidbar vedibarti 'al libah. venatati lah 'et kerameha misham ve'et 'eimeq 'akhor lefetakh tiqvah ve'anetah shamah kimei ne'ureha vikhyom 'alotah mei'erez mizrayim. vehayah bayom hahu ne'um ihoh tiqre'i 'ishi velo tiqre'i li 'od ba'li. vahasiroti 'et shemot habe'alim mipiha velo yizakheru 'od bishmam. vekharati lahem berit bayom hahu 'im khayat hasadeh ve'im 'of hashamayim veremes ha'adamah veqeshet vekhereb umilkhamah 'eshbor min ha'arez vehishkabtim labetakh. ve'eirastikh li le'olam ve'eirastikh li bezedeq ubemishpat ubekhesed uberakhamim. ve'eirastikh li be'emunah veyada'at 'et ihoh. vehayah bayom hahu 'e'eneh ne'um ihoh 'e'eneh 'et hashamayim vehem ya'anu 'et ha'arez. veha'arez ta'aneh 'et hadagan ve'et hatirosh ve'et hayizhar vehem ya'anu 'et yizre'el. uzera'tiha li ba'arez verikhamti 'et lo rukhamah ve'amarti lelo 'ami 'ami 'atah vehu yomar 'elohai. vayomer ihoh 'eilai 'od lekh 'ehab 'ishah 'ahubat reia' umena'afet ke'ahabat ihoh 'et benei yisra'el vehem ponim 'el 'elohim 'akheirim ve'ohabei 'ashishei 'anabim. va'ekereha li bakhamishah 'asar kasef vekhomer se'orim veleitekh se'orim. va'omar 'eileha yamim rabim teishebi li lo tizni velo tihyi le'ish vegam 'ani 'eilayikh. ki yamim rabim yeishebu benei yisra'el 'en melekh ve'en sar ve'en zebakh ve'en mazeibah ve'en 'eifod uterafim. 'akhar yashubu benei yisra'el ubiqshu 'et ihoh 'eloheihem ve'et david malkam ufakhadu 'el ihoh ve'el tubo be'akharit hayamim. shim'u debar ihoh benei yisra'el ki rib ihoh 'im yoshebei ha'arez ki 'en 'emet ve'en khesed ve'en da'at 'elohim ba'arez. 'aloh vekhakhesh verazoakh veganob vena'of parazu vedamim bedamim naga'u. 'al ken te'ebal ha'arez ve'umlal kal yosheb bah bekhayat hasadeh ube'of hashamayim vegam degei hayam yei'aseifu. 'akh 'ish 'al yareb ve'al yokhakh 'ish ve'amekha kimribei khohen. vekhashalta hayom vekhashal gam nabi 'imekha layelah vedamiti 'imekha. nidmu 'ami mibeli hada'at ki 'atah hada'at ma'asta ve'em'asekha mikahen li vatishkakh torat 'elohekha 'eshkakh banekha gam 'ani. kerubam ken khate'u li kebodam beqalon 'amir. khatat 'ami yokheilu ve'el 'avonam yis'u nafsho. vehayah kha'am kakohen ufaqadti 'alav derakhav uma'alalav 'ashib lo. ve'akhelu velo yisba'u hiznu velo yifrozu ki 'et ihoh 'azebu lishmor. zenut veyayin vetirosh yiqakh leb. 'ami be'eizo yish'al umaqlo yagid lo ki ruakh zenunim hit'ah vayiznu mitakhat 'eloheihem. 'al rashei heharim yezabeikhu ve'al hageba'ot yeqateiru takhat 'alon velibneh ve'eilah ki tob zilah 'al ken tiznenah benoteikhem vekhaloteikhem tena'afnah. lo 'efqod 'al benoteikhem ki tiznenah ve'al kaloteikhem ki tena'afnah ki hem 'im hazonot yefareidu ve'im haqedeishot yezabeikhu ve'am lo yabin yilabet. 'im zoneh 'atah yisra'el 'al ye'sham yehudah ve'al tabo'u hagilgal ve'al ta'alu bet 'aven ve'al tishabe'u khai ihoh. ki kefarah soreirah sarar yisra'el 'atah yir'em ihoh kekhebes bamerkhab. khabur 'azabim 'efrayim hanakh lo. sar sabe'am hazneh hiznu 'ahabu heibu qalon magineha. zarar ruakh 'otah bikhnafeha veyeiboshu mizibkhotam. shim'u zot hakohanim vehaqshibu bet yisra'el ubet hamelekh ha'azinu ki lakhem hamishpat ki fakh heyitem lemizpah vereshet perusah 'al tabor. veshakhatah seitim he'miqu va'ani musar lekhulam. 'ani yada'ti 'efrayim veyisra'el lo nikhkhad mimeni ki 'atah hizneita 'efrayim nitma yisra'el. lo yitenu ma'aleihem lashub 'el 'eloheihem ki ruakh zenunim beqirbam ve'et ihoh lo yada'u. ve'anah ge'on yisra'el befanav veyisra'el ve'efrayim yikashelu ba'avonam kashal gam yehudah 'imam. bezonam ubibqaram yeilekhu lebaqesh 'et ihoh velo yimza'u khalaz meihem. ihoh bagadu ki banim zarim yaladu 'atah yokhelem khodesh 'et khelqeihem. tiq'u shofar bagib'ah khazozerah baramah hari'u bet 'aven 'akharekha binyamin. 'efrayim leshamah tihyeh beyom tokheikhah beshibtei yisra'el hoda'ti ne'emanah. hayu sarei yehudah kemasigei gebul 'aleihem 'eshpokh kamayim 'ebrati. 'ashuq 'efrayim rezuz mishpat ki ho'il halakh 'akharei zav. va'ani kha'ash le'efrayim vekharaqab lebet yehudah. vayar 'efrayim 'et khaleyo vihudah 'et mezoro vayeilekh 'efrayim 'el 'ashur vayishlakh 'el melekh yareb vehu lo yukhal lirpo lakhem velo yigheh mikem mazor. ki 'anokhi khashakhal le'efrayim vekhakefir lebet yehudah 'ani 'ani 'etrof ve'eilekh 'esa ve'en mazil. 'eilekh 'ashubah 'el meqomi 'ad 'asher ye'shemu ubiqshu fanai bazar lahem yeshakharuni. lekhu venashubah 'el ihoh ki hu taraf veyirpa'einu yakh veyakhbesheinu. yekhayeinu miyomayim bayom hashelishi yeqimeinu venikhyeh lefanav. veneide'ah nirdefah lada'at 'et ihoh keshakhar nakhon moza'o veyabo khageshem lanu kemalqosh yoreh 'arez. mah 'e'eseh lekha 'efrayim mah 'e'eseh lekha yehudah vekhasdekhem ka'anan boqer vekhatal mashkim holekh. 'al ken khazabti banebi'im haragtim be'imrei fi umishpatekha 'or yeizei. ki khesed khafazti velo zabakh veda'at 'elohim mei'olot. vehemah ke'adam 'aberu berit sham bagedu bi. gil'ad qiryat po'alei 'aven 'aqubah midam. ukhekhakei 'ish gedudim kheber kohanim derekh yerazekhu shekhmah ki zimah 'asu. bebet yisra'el ra'iti sha'aririyah sha'aruriyah m zenut le'efrayim nitma yisra'el. gam yehudah shat qazir lakh beshubi shebut 'ami. kerafe'i leyisra'el veniglah 'avon 'efrayim vera'ot shomeron ki fa'alu shaqer veganab yabo pashat gedud bakhuz. ubal yomeru lilbabam kal ra'atam zakhareti 'atah sebabum ma'aleihem neged panai hayu. bera'atam yesamekhu melekh ubekhakhasheihem sarim. kulam mena'afim kemo tanur bo'eirah mei'ofeh yishbot mei'ir milush bazeq 'ad khumzato. yom malkeinu hekhelu sarim khamat miyayin mashakh yado 'et lozezim. ki qeirebu khatanur libam be'arebam kal halaylah yashen 'ofeihem boqer hu bo'er ke'esh lehabah. kulam yeikhamu katanur ve'akhelu 'et shofeteihem kal malkheihem nafalu 'en qorei bahem 'eilai. 'efrayim ba'amim hu yitbolal 'efrayim hayah 'ugah beli hafukhah. 'akhelu zarim kokho vehu lo yada' gam seibah zareqah bo vehu lo yada'. ve'anah ge'on yisra'el befanav velo shabu 'el ihoh 'eloheihem velo biqshuhu bekhal zot. vayhi 'efrayim keyonah fotah 'en leb mizrayim qara'u 'ashur halakhu. ka'asher yeileikhu 'efros 'aleihem rishti ke'of hashamayim 'oridem 'aysirem kesheima' la'adatam. 'o lahem ki nadedu mimeni shod lahem ki fashe'u bi ve'anokhi 'efdem vehemah diberu 'alai kezabim. velo za'aqu 'eilai belibam ki yeyeililu 'al mishkebotam 'al dagan vetirosh yitgoraru yasuru bi. va'ani yisarti khizaqti zero'otam ve'eilai yekhashebu ra'. yashubu lo 'al hayu keqeshet remiyah yipelu bakhereb sareihem miza'am leshonam zo la'gam be'erez mizrayim.
