'el khikekha shofar kanesher 'al bet ihoh ya'an 'aberu beriti ve'al torati pasha'u. li yiz'aqu 'elohai yeda'anukha yisra'el. zanakh yisra'el tob 'oyeb yirdefo hem himlikhu velo mimeni heisiru velo yada'eti kaspam uzehabam 'asu lahem 'azabim lema'an yikaret. zanakh 'eglekh shomeron kharah 'api bam 'ad matai lo yukhelu niqayon. ki miyisra'el vehu kharash 'asahu velo 'elohim hu ki shebabim yihyeh 'eigel shomeron. ki ruakh yizra'u vesufatah yiqzoru qamah 'en lo zemakh beli ya'aseh qemakh 'ulai ya'aseh zarim yibla'uhu. nibla' yisra'el 'atah hayu bagoyim kikhli 'en kheifez bo. ki hemah 'alu 'ashur pere boded lo 'efrayim hitnu 'ahabim. gam ki yitnu bagoyim 'atah 'aqabezem vayakhelu me'at mimasa melekh sarim. ki hirbah 'efrayim mizbekhot lakhato hayu lo mizbekhot lakhato. 'ekhtob 'ekhtab lo ribo rubei torati kemo zar nekhshabu. zibkhei habhabai yizbekhu basar vayokheilu ihoh lo razam 'atah yizkor 'avonam veyifqod khatotam hemah mizrayim yashubu. vayishkakh yisra'el 'et 'oseihu vayiben heikhalot vihudah hirbah 'arim bezurot veshilakhti 'esh be'arav ve'akhelah 'armenoteha. 'al tismakh yisra'el 'el gil ka'amim ki zanita mei'al 'elohekha 'ahabta 'etnan 'al kal garenot dagan. goren vayeqeb lo yir'em vetirosh yekhakhesh bah. lo yeishebu be'erez ihoh veshab 'efrayim mizrayim ube'ashur tamei yokheilu. lo yisekhu ihoh yayin velo ye'erbu lo zibkheihem kelekhem 'onim lahem kal 'okhelav yitama'u ki lakhmam lenafsham lo yabo bet ihoh. mah ta'asu leyom mo'ed uleyom khag ihoh. ki hineh halekhu mishod mizrayim teqabezem mof teqaberem makhmad lekhaspam qimos yirashem khoakh be'aholeihem. ba'u yemei hapequdah ba'u yemei hashilum yeide'u yisra'el 'evil hanabi meshuga' 'ish haruakh 'al rob 'avonekha verabah masteimah. zofeh 'efrayim 'im 'elohai nabi pakh yaqosh 'al kal derakhav masteimah bebet 'elohav. he'miqu shikheitu kimei hagib'ah yizkor 'avonam yifqod khatotam. ka'anabim bamidbar mazati yisra'el kebikurah bit'einah bereishitah ra'iti 'aboteikhem hemah ba'u ba'al pe'or vayinazeru laboshet vayihyu shiquzim ke'ahobam. 'efrayim ka'of yit'ofef kebodam mileidah umibeten umeiheirayon. ki 'im yegadelu 'et beneihem veshikaltim mei'adam ki gam 'o lahem besuri meihem. 'efrayim ka'asher ra'iti lezor shetulah benaveh ve'efrayim lehozi 'el horeg banav. ten lahem ihoh mah titen ten lahem rekhem mashkil veshadayim zomeqim. kal ra'atam bagilgal ki sham seneitim 'al roa' ma'aleihem mibeiti 'agareshem lo 'osef 'ahabatam kal sareihem sorerim. hukah 'efrayim sharesham yabesh peri beli bal ya'asun gam ki yeileidun veheimati makhamadei bitnam. yim'asem 'elohai ki lo shame'u lo veyihyu nodedim bagoyim. gefen boqeq yisra'el peri yeshaveh lo kerob lefiryo hirbah lamizbekhot ketob le'arzo heitibu mazeibot. khalaq libam 'atah ye'shamu hu ya'arof mizbekhotam yeshoded mazeibotam. ki 'atah yomeru 'en melekh lanu ki lo yareinu 'et ihoh vehamelekh mah ya'aseh lanu. diberu debarim 'alot shav karot berit ufarakh karosh mishpat 'al talmei sadai. le'eglot bet 'aven yaguru shekhan shomeron ki 'abal 'alav 'amo ukhemarav 'alav yagilu 'al kebodo ki galah mimenu. gam 'oto le'ashur yubal minkhah lemelekh yareb bashenah 'efrayim yiqakh veyeibosh yisra'el mei'azato. nidmeh shomeron malkah keqezef 'al penei mayim. venishmedu bamot 'aven khatat yisra'el qoz vedardar ya'aleh 'al mizbekhotam ve'ameru leharim kasunu velageba'ot niflu 'aleinu. mimei hagib'ah khatata yisra'el sham 'amadu lo tasigem bagib'ah milkhamah 'al benei 'alvah. be'avati ve'esorem ve'usefu 'aleihem 'amim be'aseram lishtei 'einotam 'onotam. ve'efrayim 'eglah melumadah 'ohabti ladush va'ani 'abarti 'al tub zavarah 'arkib 'efrayim yakharosh yehudah yesaded lo ya'aqob. zir'u lakhem lizdaqah qizru lefi khesed niru lakhem nir ve'et lidrosh 'et ihoh 'ad yabo veyoreh zedeq lakhem. kharashtem resha' 'avlatah qezartem 'akhaltem peri khakhash ki batakhta bedarkekha berob giborekha. veqam sha'on be'amekha vekhal mibzarekha yushad keshod shalman bet 'arbel beyom milkhamah 'em 'al banim rutashah. kakhah 'asah lakhem bet 'el mipenei ra'at ra'atkhem bashakhar nidmoh nidmah melekh yisra'el. ki na'ar yisra'el va'ohabeihu umimizrayim qarati libni. qare'u lahem ken halekhu mipeneihem labe'alim yezabeikhu velapesilim yeqateirun. ve'anokhi tirgalti le'efrayim qakham 'al zero'otav velo yade'u ki refatim. bekhablei 'adam 'emshekhem ba'abotot 'ahabah va'ehyeh lahem kimrimei 'ol 'al lekheihem ve'at 'eilav 'okhil. lo yashub 'el 'erez mizrayim ve'ashur hu malko ki mei'anu lashub. vekhalah khereb be'arav vekhiletah badav ve'akhalah mimo'azoteihem. ve'ami telu'im limshubati ve'el 'al yiqra'uhu yakhad lo yeromem 'ekh 'etenkha 'efrayim 'amagenkha yisra'el 'ekh 'etenkha khe'admah 'asimekha kizboyim nehpakh 'alai libi yakhad nikhmeru nikhumai. lo 'e'eseh kharon 'api lo 'ashub leshakhet 'efrayim ki 'el 'anokhi velo 'ish beqirbekha qadosh velo 'abo be'ir. 'akharei ihoh yeilekhu ke'aryeh yish'ag ki hu yish'ag veyekherdu banim miyam. yekherdu khezipor mimizrayim ukheyonah mei'erez 'ashur vehoshabtim 'al bateihem ne'um ihoh. sebabuni bekhakhash 'efrayim ubemirmah bet yisra'el vihudah 'od rad 'im 'el ve'im qedoshim ne'eman. 'efrayim ro'eh ruakh verodef qadim kal hayom kazab vashod yarbeh uberit 'im 'ashur yikhrotu veshemen lemizrayim yubal. verib ihoh 'im yehudah velifqod 'al ya'aqob kidrakhav kema'alalav yashib lo. babeten 'aqab 'et 'akhiv ube'ono sarah 'et 'elohim. vayasar 'el mal'akh vayukhal bakhah vayitkhanen lo bet 'el yimza'enu vesham yedaber 'imanu. ihoh 'elohei hazeba'ot ihoh zikhro. ve'atah beilohekha tashub khesed umishpat shemor veqaveh 'el 'elohekha tamid. kena'an beyado mozenei mirmah la'ashoq 'aheb. vayomer 'efrayim 'akh 'asharti mazati 'on li kal yegi'ai lo yimze'u li 'avon 'asher khet. ve'anokhi ihoh 'elohekha mei'erez mizrayim 'od 'oshibekha ba'ohalim kimei mo'ed. vedibarti 'al hanebi'im ve'anokhi khazon hirbeiti ubeyad hanebi'im 'adameh. 'im gil'ad 'aven 'akh shav hayu bagilgal shevarim zibeikhu gam mizbekhotam kegalim 'al talmei sadai. vayibrakh ya'aqob sedeh 'aram vaya'abod yisra'el be'ishah ube'ishah shamar. ubenabi he'elah ihoh 'et yisra'el mimizrayim ubenabi nishmar. hikh'is 'efrayim tamrurim vedamav 'alav yitosh vekherpato yashib lo 'adonav. kedaber 'efrayim retet nasa hu beyisra'el vaye'sham baba'al vayamot. ve'atah yosifu lakhato vaya'su lahem maseikhah mikaspam kitbunam 'azabim ma'aseh kharashim kuloh lahem hem 'omerim zobekhei 'adam 'agalim yishaqun. lakhen yihyu ka'anan boqer vekhatal mashkim holekh kemoz yeso'er migoren ukhe'ashan mei'arubah. ve'anokhi ihoh 'elohekha mei'erez mizrayim veilohim zulati lo teida' umoshia' 'ayin bilti. 'ani yeda'tikha bamidbar be'erez tal'ubot. kemar'itam vayisba'u sabe'u vayaram libam 'al ken shekheikhuni. va'ehi lahem kemo shakhal kenamer 'al derekh 'ashur. 'efgeshem kedob shakul ve'eqra' segor libam ve'okhelem sham kelabi khayat hasadeh tebaqe'em. shikhetkha yisra'el ki bi be'ezrekha. 'ehi malkekha 'eifo veyoshi'akha bekhal 'arekha veshofetekha 'asher 'amarta tenah li melekh vesarim. 'eten lekha melekh be'api ve'eqakh be'ebrati. zarur 'avon 'efrayim zefunah khatato. kheblei yoleidah yabo'u lo hu ben lo khakham ki 'et lo ya'amod bemishbar banim. miyad she'ol 'efdem mimavet 'eg'alem 'ehi debarekha mavet 'ehi qatabekha she'ol nokham yisater mei'einai. ki hu ben 'akhim yafri yabo qadim ruakh ihoh mimidbar 'oleh veyeibosh meqoro veyekherab ma'yano hu yishseh 'ozar kal keli khemdah. te'sham shomeron ki maretah beiloheha bakhereb yipolu 'oleleihem yerutashu vehariyotav yebuqa'u. ubah yisra'el 'ad ihoh 'elohekha ki khashalta ba'avonekha. qekhu 'imakhem debarim veshubu 'el ihoh 'imru 'eilav kal tisa 'avon veqakh tob uneshalemah farim sefateinu. 'ashur lo yoshi'einu 'al sus lo nirkab velo nomar 'od 'eloheinu lema'aseh yadeinu 'asher bekha yerukham yatom. 'erpa meshubatam 'ohabem nedabah ki shab 'api mimenu. 'ehyeh khatal leyisra'el yifrakh kashoshanah veyakh sharashav kalebanon. yeilekhu yoneqotav vihi khazayit hodo vereiakh lo kalebanon. yashubu yoshebei bezilo yekhayu dagan veyifrekhu khagafen zikhro keyen lebanon. 'efrayim mah li 'od la'azabim 'ani 'aniti va'ashurenu 'ani kibrosh ra'anan mimeni peryekha nimza. mi khakham veyaben 'eleh nabon veyeida'em ki yesharim darkhei ihoh vezadiqim yeilekhu bam ufoshe'im yikashelu bam.

debar ihoh 'asher hayah 'el yo'el ben petu'el. shim'u zot hazeqeinim veha'azinu kol yoshebei ha'arez hehayetah zot bimeikhem ve'im bimei 'aboteikhem. 'aleha libneikhem sapeiru ubeneikhem libneihem ubeneihem ledor 'akher. yeter hagazam 'akhal ha'arbeh veyeter ha'arbeh 'akhal hayaleq veyeter hayeleq 'akhal hekhasil. haqizu shikorim ubekhu veheililu kal shotei yayin 'al 'asis ki nikhrat mipikhem. ki go 'alah 'al 'arzi 'azum ve'en mispar shinav shinei 'aryeh umetale'ot labi lo. sam gafni leshamah ute'einati liqzafah khasof khasafah vehishlikh hilbinu sarigeha. 'eli kibtulah khagurat saq 'al ba'al ne'ureha. hakherat minkhah vanesekh mibet ihoh 'abelu hakohanim mesharetei ihoh. shudad sadeh 'abelah 'adamah ki shudad dagan hobish tirosh 'umlal yizhar. hobishu 'ikarim heililu koremim 'al khitah ve'al se'orah ki 'abad qezir sadeh. hagefen hobishah vehate'einah 'umlalah rimon gam tamar vetapuakh kal 'azei hasadeh yabeishu ki hobish sason min benei 'adam. khigru vesifdu hakohanim heililu mesharetei mizbeiakh bo'u linu basaqim mesharetei 'elohai ki nimna' mibet 'eloheikhem minkhah vanasekh. qadeshu zom qir'u 'azarah 'isfu zeqeinim kol yoshebei ha'arez bet ihoh 'eloheikhem veza'aqu 'el ihoh. 'ahah layom ki qarob yom ihoh ukheshod mishadai yabo. halo neged 'eineinu 'okhel nikhrat mibet 'eloheinu simkhah vagil. 'abeshu ferudot takhat megrefoteihem nashamu 'ozarot nehersu mamegurot ki hobish dagan. mah ne'enkhah beheimah nabokhu 'edrei baqar ki 'en mir'eh lahem gam 'edrei hazon ne'shamu. 'eilekha ihoh 'eqra ki 'esh 'akhelah ne'ot midbar velehabah lihatah kal 'azei hasadeh. gam bahamot sadeh ta'arog 'eilekha ki yabeshu 'afiqei mayim ve'esh 'akhelah ne'ot hamidbar. tiq'u shofar beziyon vehari'u behar qadshi yirgezu kol yoshebei ha'arez ki ba yom ihoh ki qarob. yom khoshekh va'afeilah yom 'anan va'arafel keshakhar parus 'al heharim 'am rab ve'azum kamohu lo nihyah min ha'olam ve'akharav lo yosef 'ad shenei dor vador. lefanav 'akhelah 'esh ve'akharav telahet lehabah kegan 'eiden ha'arez lefanav ve'akharav midbar shemamah vegam peleitah lo hayetah lo. kemar'eh susim mar'eihu ukhefarashim ken yeruzun. keqol markabot 'al rashei heharim yeraqeidun keqol lahab 'esh 'okhelah qash ke'am 'azum 'erukh milkhamah. mipanav yakhilu 'amim kal panim qibezu farur. kegiborim yeruzun ke'anshei milkhamah ya'alu khomah ve'ish bidrakhav yeileikhun velo ye'abetun 'orekhotam. ve'ish 'akhiv lo yidkhaqun geber bimsilato yeileikhun ube'ad hashelakh yipolu lo yibza'u. ba'ir yashoqu bakhomah yeruzun babatim ya'alu be'ad hakhalonim yabo'u kaganab. lefanav ragezah 'erez ra'ashu shamayim shemesh veyareiakh qadaru vekhokhabim 'asefu nageham. ihoh natan qolo lifnei kheilo ki rab me'od makhaneihu ki 'azum 'oseh debaro ki gadol yom ihoh venora me'od umi yekhilenu. vegam 'atah ne'um ihoh shubu 'adai bekhal lebabkhem ubezom ubebekhi ubemisped. veqir'u lebabkhem ve'al bigdeikhem veshubu 'el ihoh 'eloheikhem ki khanun verakhum hu 'erekh 'apayim verab khesed venikham 'al hara'ah. mi yodeia' yashub venikham vehish'ir 'akharav berakhah minkhah vanesekh ihoh 'eloheikhem. tiq'u shofar beziyon qadeshu zom qir'u 'azarah. 'isfu 'am qadeshu qahal qibzu zeqeinim 'isfu 'olalim veyoneqei shadayim yeizei khatan meikhedro vekhalah meikhupatah. ben ha'ulam velamizbeiakh yibku hakohanim mesharetei ihoh veyomeru khusah ihoh 'al 'amekha ve'al titen nakhalatekha lekherpah limshal bam goyim lamah yomeru ba'amim 'ayeh 'eloheihem. vayqanei ihoh le'arzo vayakhmol 'al 'amo. vaya'an ihoh vayomer le'amo hini sholeiakh lakhem 'et hadagan vehatirosh vehayizhar useba'tem 'oto velo 'eten 'etkhem 'od kherpah bagoyim. ve'et hazefoni 'arkhiq mei'aleikhem vehidakhtiv 'el 'erez ziyah ushemamah 'et panav 'el hayam haqadmoni vesofo 'el hayam ha'akharon ve'alah ba'esho veta'al zakhanato ki higdil la'asot. 'al tire'i 'adamah gili usemakhi ki higdil ihoh la'asot. 'al tire'u bahamot sadai ki dashe'u ne'ot midbar ki 'ez nasa firyo te'einah vagefen natenu kheilam. ubenei ziyon gilu vesimkhu ihoh 'eloheikhem ki natan lakhem 'et hamoreh lizdaqah vayored lakhem geshem moreh umalqosh barishon. umale'u hagoranot bar veheishiqu hayqabim tirosh veyizhar. veshilamti lakhem 'et hashanim 'asher 'akhal ha'arbeh hayeleq vehekhasil vehagazam kheili hagadol 'asher shilakhti bakhem. va'akhaltem 'akhol vesaboa' vehilaltem 'et shem ihoh 'eloheikhem 'asher 'asah 'imakhem lehafli velo yeiboshu 'ami le'olam. vida'tem ki beqereb yisra'el 'ani va'ani ihoh 'eloheikhem ve'en 'od velo yeiboshu 'ami le'olam. vehayah 'akharei khen 'eshpokh 'et rukhi 'al kal basar venibe'u beneikhem ubenoteikhem ziqneikhem khalomot yakhalomun bakhureikhem khezyonot yir'u. vegam 'al ha'abadim ve'al hashefakhot bayamim hahemah 'eshpokh 'et rukhi. venatati moftim bashamayim uba'arez dam va'esh vetimarot 'ashan. hashemesh yeihafekh lekhoshekh vehayareiakh ledam lifnei bo yom ihoh hagadol vehanora. vehayah kol 'asher yiqra beshem ihoh yimalet ki behar ziyon ubirushalim tihyeh feleitah ka'asher 'amar ihoh ubaseridim 'asher ihoh qorei. ki hineh bayamim hahemah uba'et hahi 'asher 'ashub 'ashib 'et shebut yehudah virushalim. veqibazti 'et kal hagoyim vehoradtim 'el 'eimeq yehoshafat venishpati 'imam sham 'al 'ami venakhalati yisra'el 'asher pizeru bagoyim ve'et 'arzi khileiqu. ve'el 'ami yadu goral vayitenu hayeled bazonah vehayaldah makheru bayayin vayishtu. vegam mah 'atem li zor vezidon vekhol gelilot pelashet hagemul 'atem meshalemim 'alai ve'im gomelim 'atem 'alai qal meheirah 'ashib gemulkhem beroshekhem. 'asher kaspi uzehabi leqakhtem umakhamadai hatobim habeitem leheikheleikhem. ubenei yehudah ubenei yerushalim mekhartem libnei hayevanim lema'an harkhiqam mei'al gebulam. hini me'iram min hamaqom 'asher mekhartem 'otam shamah vahashiboti gemulkhem beroshekhem. umakharti 'et beneikhem ve'et benoteikhem beyad benei yehudah umekharum lishbayim 'el go rakhoq ki ihoh diber. qir'u zot bagoyim qadeshu milkhamah ha'iru hagiborim yigeshu ya'alu kol 'anshei hamilkhamah. kotu 'iteikhem lakharabot umazmeroteikhem lirmakhim hakhalash yomar gibor 'ani. 'ushu vabo'u khal hagoyim misabib veniqbazu shamah hankhat ihoh giborekha. yei'oru veya'alu hagoyim 'el 'eimeq yehoshafat ki sham 'eisheb lishpot 'et kal hagoyim misabib. shilkhu magal ki bashal qazir bo'u redu ki male'ah gat heishiqu hayqabim ki rabah ra'atam. hamonim hamonim be'eimeq hekharuz ki qarob yom ihoh be'eimeq hekharuz. shemesh veyareiakh qadaru vekhokhabim 'asefu nageham. ihoh miziyon yish'ag umirushalim yiten qolo vera'ashu shamayim va'arez ihoh makhaseh le'amo uma'oz libnei yisra'el. vida'tem ki 'ani ihoh 'eloheikhem shokhen beziyon har qadshi vehayetah yerushalim qodesh vezarim lo ya'abru bah 'od. vehayah bayom hahu yitefu heharim 'asis vehageba'ot teilakhnah khalab vekhal 'afiqei yehudah yeilekhu mayim uma'yan mibet ihoh yeizei vehishqah 'et nakhal hashitim. mizrayim lishmamah tihyeh ve'edom lemidbar shemamah tihyeh meikhamas benei yehudah 'asher shafekhu dam naqi be'arzam. vihudah le'olam teisheb virushalim ledor vador. veniqeiti damam lo niqeiti ihoh shokhen beziyon.

dibrei 'amos 'asher hayah banoqedim miteqoa' 'asher khazah 'al yisra'el bimei 'uziyah melekh yehudah ubimei yarabe'am ben yo'ash melekh yisra'el shenatayim lifnei hara'ash. vayomar ihoh miziyon yish'ag umirushalim yiten qolo ve'abelu ne'ot haro'im veyabesh rosh hakarmel. koh 'amar ihoh 'al sheloshah pish'ei dameseq ve'al 'arba'ah lo 'ashibenu 'al dusham bakharuzot habarzel 'et hagil'ad. veshilakhti 'esh bebet khaza'el ve'akhelah 'armenot ben hadad. veshabarti beriakh dameseq vehikhrati yosheb mibiq'at 'aven vetomekh sheibet mibet 'eden vegalu 'am 'aram qirah 'amar ihoh. koh 'amar ihoh 'al sheloshah pish'ei 'azah ve'al 'arba'ah lo 'ashibenu 'al haglotam galut sheleimah lehasgir le'edom. veshilakhti 'esh bekhomat 'azah ve'akhelah 'armenoteha. vehikhrati yosheb mei'ashdod vetomekh sheibet mei'ashqelon vahashiboti yadi 'al 'eqron ve'abedu she'eirit pelishtim 'amar 'adonai ihoh. koh 'amar ihoh 'al sheloshah pish'ei zor ve'al 'arba'ah lo 'ashibenu 'al hasgiram galut sheleimah le'edom velo zakheru berit 'akhim. veshilakhti 'esh bekhomat zor ve'akhelah 'armenoteha. koh 'amar ihoh 'al sheloshah pish'ei 'edom ve'al 'arba'ah lo 'ashibenu 'al radefo bakhereb 'akhiv veshikhet rakhamav vayitrof la'ad 'apo ve'ebrato shemarah nezakh. veshilakhti 'esh beteiman ve'akhelah 'armenot bazrah koh 'amar ihoh 'al sheloshah pish'ei benei 'amon ve'al 'arba'ah lo 'ashibenu 'al biq'am harot hagil'ad lema'an harkhib 'et gebulam. vehizati 'esh bekhomat rabah ve'akhelah 'armenoteha bitru'ah beyom milkhamah besa'ar beyom sufah. vehalakh malkam bagolah hu vesarav yakhdav 'amar ihoh. koh 'amar ihoh 'al sheloshah pish'ei mo'ab ve'al 'arba'ah lo 'ashibenu 'al sarefo 'azmot melekh 'edom lasid. veshilakhti 'esh bemo'ab ve'akhelah 'armenot haqeriyot umet besha'on mo'ab bitru'ah beqol shofar. vehikhrati shofet miqirbah vekhal sareha 'eherog 'imo 'amar ihoh. koh 'amar ihoh 'al sheloshah pish'ei yehudah ve'al 'arba'ah lo 'ashibenu 'al ma'osam 'et torat ihoh vekhuqav lo shamaru vayat'um kizbeihem 'asher halekhu 'abotam 'akhareihem. veshilakhti 'esh bihudah ve'akhelah 'armenot yerushalim. koh 'amar ihoh 'al sheloshah pish'ei yisra'el ve'al 'arba'ah lo 'ashibenu 'al mikhram bakesef zadiq ve'ebyon ba'abur na'alayim. hasho'afim 'al 'afar 'erez berosh dalim vederekh 'anavim yatu ve'ish ve'abiv yeilekhu 'el hana'arah lema'an khalel 'et shem qadshi ve'al begadim khabulim yatu 'eizel kal mizbeiakh veyen 'anushim yishtu bet 'eloheihem. ve'anokhi hishmadti 'et ha'emori mipeneihem 'asher kegobah 'arazim gabeho vekhason hu ka'alonim va'ashmid piryo mima'al vesharashav mitakhat. ve'anokhi he'eleiti 'etkhem mei'erez mizrayim va'olekh 'etkhem bamidbar 'arba'im shanah lareshet 'et 'erez ha'emori. va'aqim mibeneikhem linbi'im umibakhureikhem linzirim ha'af 'en zot benei yisra'el ne'um ihoh. vatashqu 'et hanezirim yayin ve'al hanebi'im zivitem leimor lo tinabe'u. hineh 'anokhi mei'iq takhteikhem ka'asher ta'iq ha'agalah hamlei'ah lah 'amir. ve'abad manos miqal vekhazaq lo ye'amez kokho vegibor lo yemalet nafsho. vetofes haqeshet lo ya'amod veqal beraglav lo yemalet verokheb hasus lo yemalet nafsho. ve'amiz libo bagiborim 'arom yanus bayom hahu ne'um ihoh. shim'u 'et hadabar hazeh 'asher diber ihoh 'aleikhem benei yisra'el 'al kal hamishpakhah 'asher he'eleiti mei'erez mizrayim leimor. raq 'etkhem yada'ti mikol mishpekhot ha'adamah 'al ken 'efqod 'aleikhem 'et kal 'avonoteikhem. hayeilekhu shenayim yakhdav bilti 'im no'adu. hayish'ag 'aryeh baya'ar veteref 'en lo hayiten kefir qolo mime'onato bilti 'im lakhad. hatipol zipor 'al pakh ha'arez umoqesh 'en lah haya'aleh pakh min ha'adamah velakhod lo yilkod. 'im yitaqa' shofar be'ir ve'am lo yekheradu 'im tihyeh ra'ah be'ir ihoh lo 'asah. ki lo ya'aseh 'adonai ihoh dabar ki 'im galah sodo 'el 'abadav hanebi'im. 'aryeh sha'ag mi lo yira 'adonai ihoh diber mi lo yinabei. hashmi'u 'al 'armenot be'ashdod ve'al 'armenot be'erez mizrayim ve'imru hei'asefu 'al harei shomeron ure'u mehumot rabot betokhah va'ashuqim beqirbah. velo yade'u 'asot nekhokhah ne'um ihoh ha'ozrim khamas vashod be'armenoteihem. lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh zar usebib ha'arez vehorid mimekh 'uzekh venabozu 'armenotayikh. koh 'amar ihoh ka'asher yazil haro'eh mipi ha'ari shetei khera'ayim 'o bedal 'ozen ken yinazelu benei yisra'el hayoshebim beshomeron bif'at mitah ubidmesheq 'ares. shim'u veha'idu bebet ya'aqob ne'um 'adonai ihoh 'elohei hazeba'ot. ki beyom paqedi fish'ei yisra'el 'alav ufaqadti 'al mizbekhot bet 'el venigde'u qarnot hamizbeiakh venafelu la'arez. vehikeiti bet hakhoref 'al bet haqayiz ve'abedu batei hashen vesafu batim rabim ne'um ihoh. shim'u hadabar hazeh parot habashan 'asher behar shomeron ha'osheqot dalim harozezot 'ebyonim ha'omerot la'adoneihem habi'ah venishteh. nishba' 'adonai ihoh beqadesho ki hineh yamim ba'im 'aleikhem venisa 'etkhem bezinot ve'akharitekhen besirot dugah. uferazim teizenah 'ishah negdah vehishlakhtenah haharmonah ne'um ihoh. bo'u bet 'el ufish'u hagilgal harbu lifshoa' vehabi'u laboqer zibkheikhem lishloshet yamim ma'seroteikhem. veqater meikhamez todah veqir'u nedabot hashmi'u ki khen 'ahabtem benei yisra'el ne'um 'adonai ihoh. vegam 'ani natati lakhem niqyon shinayim bekhal 'areikhem vekhoser lekhem bekhol meqomoteikhem velo shabtem 'adai ne'um ihoh. vegam 'anokhi mana'ti mikem 'et hageshem be'od sheloshah khodashim laqazir vehimtarti 'al 'ir 'ekhat ve'al 'ir 'akhat lo 'amtir khelqah 'akhat timater vekhelqah 'asher lo tamtir 'aleha tibash. vena'u shetayim shalosh 'arim 'el 'ir 'akhat lishtot mayim velo yisba'u velo shabtem 'adai ne'um ihoh. hikeiti 'etkhem bashidafon ubayeiraqon harbot ganoteikhem vekharmeikhem ute'eineikhem vezeiteikhem yokhal hagazam velo shabtem 'adai ne'um ihoh. shilakhti bakhem deber bederekh mizrayim haragti bakhereb bakhureikhem 'im shebi suseikhem va'a'aleh be'osh makhaneikhem ube'apekhem velo shabtem 'adai ne'um ihoh. hafakhti bakhem kemahpeikhat 'elohim 'et sedom ve'et 'amorah vatihyu ke'ud muzal misereifah velo shabtem 'adai ne'um ihoh. lakhen koh 'e'eseh lekha yisra'el 'eiqeb ki zot 'e'eseh lakh hikon liqrat 'elohekha yisra'el. ki hineh yozer harim uborei ruakh umagid le'adam mah seikho 'oseh shakhar 'eifah vedorekh 'al bamotei 'arez ihoh 'elohei zeba'ot shemo. shim'u 'et hadabar hazeh 'asher 'anokhi nosei 'aleikhem qinah bet yisra'el. nafelah lo tosif qum betulat yisra'el niteshah 'al 'admatah 'en meqimah. ki khoh 'amar 'adonai ihoh ha'ir hayozet 'elef tash'ir mei'ah vehayozet mei'ah tash'ir 'asarah lebet yisra'el. ki khoh 'amar ihoh lebet yisra'el dirshuni vikhyu. ve'al tidreshu bet 'el vehagilgal lo tabo'u ube'er sheba' lo ta'aboru ki hagilgal galoh yigleh ubet 'el yihyeh le'aven. dirshu 'et ihoh vikhyu pen yizlakh ka'esh bet yosef ve'akhelah ve'en mekhabeh lebet 'el. hahofekhim lela'anah mishpat uzedaqah la'arez hinikhu. 'oseh khimah ukhesil vehofekh laboqer zalmavet veyom laylah hekhshikh haqorei lemei hayam vayishpekhem 'al penei ha'arez ihoh shemo. hamablig shod 'al 'az veshod 'al mibzar yabo. sane'u basha'ar mokhiakh vedober tamim yeta'eibu. lakhen ya'an boshaskhem 'al dal umas'at bar tiqkhu mimenu batei gazit benitem velo teishebu bam karmei khemed neta'tem velo tishtu 'et yeinam. ki yada'ti rabim pish'eikhem va'azumim khatoteikhem zorerei zadiq loqekhei khofer ve'ebyonim basha'ar hitu. lakhen hamaskil ba'et hahi yidom ki 'et ra'ah hi. dirshu tob ve'al ra' lema'an tikhyu vihi khen ihoh 'elohei zeba'ot 'itekhem ka'asher 'amartem. sin'u ra' ve'ehebu tob vehazigu basha'ar mishpat 'ulai yekhenan ihoh 'elohei zeba'ot she'eirit yosef. lakhen koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei zeba'ot 'adonai bekhal rekhobot misped ubekhal khuzot yomeru ho ho veqare'u 'ikar 'el 'eibel umisped 'el yod'ei nehi. ubekhal keramim misped ki 'e'ebor beqirbekha 'amar ihoh. ho hamit'avim 'et yom ihoh lamah zeh lakhem yom ihoh hu khoshekh velo 'or. ka'asher yanus 'ish mipenei ha'ari ufega'o hadob uba habayit vesamakh yado 'al haqir uneshakho hanakhash. halo khoshekh yom ihoh velo 'or ve'afel velo nogah lo. saneiti ma'asti khageikhem velo 'ariakh be'azeroteikhem. ki 'im ta'alu li 'olot uminkhoteikhem lo 'erzeh veshelem meri'eikhem lo 'abit. haser mei'alai hamon shirekha vezimrat nebalekha lo 'eshma'. veyigal kamayim mishpat uzedaqah kenakhal 'eitan. hazebakhim uminkhah higashtem li bamidbar 'arba'im shanah bet yisra'el. unesatem 'et sikut malkekhem ve'et kiyun zalmeikhem kokhab 'eloheikhem 'asher 'asitem lakhem. vehigleiti 'etkhem meihale'ah ledamaseq 'amar ihoh 'elohei zeba'ot shemo. ho hasha'ananim beziyon vehabotekhim behar shomeron nequbei reishit hagoyim uba'u lahem bet yisra'el. 'ibru khalneh ure'u ulekhu misham khamat rabah uredu gat pelishtm hatobim min hamamlakhot ha'eleh 'im rab gebulam migebulkhem. hamnadim leyom ra' vatagishun shebet khamas. hashokhebim 'al mitot shen userukhim 'al 'arsotam ve'okhelim karim mizon va'agalim mitokh marbeq. haporetim 'al pi hanabel kedavid khashebu lahem kelei shir. hashotim bemizreqei yayin vereishit shemanim yimshakhu velo nekhlu 'al sheiber yosef. lakhen 'atah yiglu berosh golim vesar mirzakh serukhim. nishba' 'adonai ihoh benafsho ne'um ihoh 'elohei zeba'ot meta'eb 'anokhi 'et ge'on ya'aqob ve'armenotav saneiti vehisgarti 'ir umelo'ah. vehayah 'im yivateru 'asarah 'anashim bebayit 'ekhad vameitu. unesa'o dodo umesarefo lehozi 'azamim min habayit ve'amar la'asher beyarketei habayit ha'od 'imakh ve'amar 'afes ve'amar has ki lo lehazkir beshem ihoh. ki hineh ihoh mezaveh vehikah habayit hagadol resisim vehabayit haqaton beqi'im. hayruzun basela' susim 'im yakharosh babeqarim ki hafakhtem lerosh mishpat uferi zedaqah lela'anah. hasemeikhim lelo dabar ha'omerim halo bekhazeqeinu laqakhnu lanu qarnayim. ki hini meiqim 'aleikhem bet yisra'el ne'um ihoh 'elohei hazeba'ot go velakhazu 'etkhem milebo khamat 'ad nakhal ha'arabah. koh hir'ani 'adonai ihoh vehineh yozer gobai bitkhilat 'alot halaqesh vehineh leqesh 'akhar gizei hamelekh. vehayah 'im kilah le'ekhol 'et 'eiseb ha'arez va'omar 'adonai ihoh selakh na mi yaqum ya'aqob ki qaton hu. nikham ihoh 'al zot lo tihyeh 'amar ihoh. koh hir'ani 'adonai ihoh vehineh qorei larib ba'esh 'adonai ihoh vatokhal 'et tehom rabah ve'akhelah 'et hakheileq. va'omar 'adonai ihoh khadal na mi yaqum ya'aqob ki qaton hu. nikham ihoh 'al zot gam hi lo tihyeh 'amar 'adonai ihoh. koh hir'ani vehineh 'adonai nizab 'al khomat 'anakh ubeyado 'anakh. vayomer ihoh 'eilai mah 'atah ro'eh 'amos va'omar 'anakh vayomer 'adonai hini sam 'anakh beqereb 'ami yisra'el lo 'osif 'od 'abor lo. venashamu bamot yiskhaq umiqdeshei yisra'el yekherabu veqamti 'al bet yarabe'am bekhareb. vayishlakh 'amazyah kohen bet 'el 'el yarabe'am melekh yisra'el leimor qashar 'alekha 'amos beqereb bet yisra'el lo tukhal ha'arez lehakhil 'et kal debarav. ki khoh 'amar 'amos bakhereb yamut yarabe'am veyisra'el galoh yigleh mei'al 'admato. vayomer 'amazyah 'el 'amos khozeh lekh berakh lekha 'el 'erez yehudah ve'ekhal sham lekhem vesham tinabei. ubet 'el lo tosif 'od lehinabei ki miqdash melekh hu ubet mamlakhah hu. vaya'an 'amos vayomer 'el 'amazyah lo nabi 'anokhi velo ben nabi 'anokhi ki boqer 'anokhi uboles shiqmim. vayiqakheini ihoh mei'akharei hazon vayomer 'eilai ihoh lekh hinabei 'el 'ami yisra'el. ve'atah shema' debar ihoh 'atah 'omer lo tinabei 'al yisra'el velo tatif 'al bet yiskhaq. lakhen koh 'amar ihoh 'ishtekha ba'ir tizneh ubanekha ubenotekha bakhereb yipolu ve'admatekha bakhebel tekhulaq ve'atah 'al 'adamah temei'ah tamut veyisra'el galoh yigleh mei'al 'admato. koh hir'ani 'adonai ihoh vehineh kelub qayiz. vayomer mah 'atah ro'eh 'amos va'omar kelub qayiz vayomer ihoh 'eilai ba haqez 'el 'ami yisra'el lo 'osif 'od 'abor lo. veheililu shirot heikhal bayom hahu ne'um 'adonai ihoh rab hapeger bekhal maqom hishlikh has. shim'u zot hasho'afim 'ebyon velashbit 'anvei 'aniyei 'arez. leimor matai ya'abor hakhodesh venashbirah sheber vehashabat veniftekhah bar lehaqtin 'eifah ulehagdil sheqel ule'avet mozenei mirmah. liqnot bakesef dalim ve'ebyon ba'abur na'alayim umapal bar nashbir. nishba' ihoh big'on ya'aqob 'im 'eshkakh lanezakh kal ma'aseihem. ha'al zot lo tirgaz ha'arez ve'abal kal yosheb bah ve'aletah kha'or kulah venigreshah venishqah venishqe'ah ki'or mizrayim. vehayah bayom hahu ne'um 'adonai ihoh veheibeiti hashemesh bazahorayim vehakhashakhti la'arez beyom 'or. vehafakhti khageikhem le'eibel vekhal shireikhem leqinah veha'aleiti 'al kal matenayim saq ve'al kal rosh qarekhah vesamtiha ke'eibel yakhid ve'akharitah keyom mar. hineh yamim ba'im ne'um 'adonai ihoh vehishlakhti ra'ab ba'arez lo ra'ab lalekhem velo zama lamayim ki 'im lishmoa' 'et dibrei ihoh. vena'u miyam 'ad yam umizafon ve'ad mizrakh yeshotu lebaqesh 'et debar ihoh velo yimza'u. bayom hahu tit'alafnah habetulot hayafot vehabakhurim bazama. hanishba'im be'ashmat shomeron ve'ameru khei 'elohekha dan vekhei derekh be'er shaba' venafelu velo yaqumu 'od. ra'iti 'et 'adonai nizab 'al hamizbeiakh vayomer hakh hakaftor veyir'ashu hasipim ubeza'am berosh kulam ve'akharitam bakhereb 'eherog lo yanus lahem nas velo yimalet lahem palit. 'im yakhteru bish'ol misham yadi tiqakhem ve'im ya'alu hashamayim misham 'oridem. ve'im yeikhabe'u berosh hakarmel misham 'akhapes uleqakhtim ve'im yisateru mineged 'einai beqarqa' hayam misham 'azaveh 'et hanakhash uneshakham. ve'im yeilekhu bashebi lifnei 'beihem misham 'azaveh 'et hakhereb vaharagatam vesamti 'eini 'aleihem lera'ah velo letobah. vadonai ihoh hazeba'ot hanogeia' ba'arez vatamog ve'abelu kal yoshebei bah ve'aletah khai'or kulah veshaqe'ah ki'or mizrayim. haboneh bashamayim ma'aloto ma'alotav va'agudato 'al 'erez yesadah haqorei lemei hayam vayishpekhem 'al penei ha'arez ihoh shemo. halo khibnei khushiyim 'atem li benei yisra'el ne'um ihoh halo 'et yisra'el he'eleiti mei'erez mizrayim ufelishtiyim mikaftor va'aram miqir. hineh 'einei 'adonai ihoh bamamlakhah hakhata'ah vehishmadti 'otah mei'al penei ha'adamah 'efes ki lo hashmed 'ashmid 'et bet ya'aqob ne'um ihoh. ki hineh 'anokhi mezaveh vahani'oti bekhal hagoyim 'et bet yisra'el ka'asher yinoa' bakebarah velo yipol zeror 'arez. bakhereb yamutu kol khata'ei 'ami ha'omerim lo tagish vetaqdim ba'adeinu hara'ah. bayom hahu 'aqim 'et sukat david hanofelet vegadarti 'et pirzeihen vaharisotav 'aqim ubenitiha kimei 'olam. lema'an yireshu 'et she'eirit 'edom vekhal hagoyim 'asher niqra shemi 'aleihem ne'um ihoh 'oseh zot. hineh yamim ba'im ne'um ihoh venigash khoresh baqozer vedorekh 'anabim bemoshekh hazara' vehitifu heharim 'asis vekhal hageba'ot titmogagnah. veshabti 'et shebut 'ami yisra'el ubanu 'arim neshamot veyashabu venate'u kheramim veshatu 'et yeinam ve'asu ganot ve'akhelu 'et perihem. uneta'tim 'al 'admatam velo yinateshu 'od mei'al 'admatam 'asher natati lahem 'amar ihoh 'elohekha.

khazon 'obadyah koh 'amar 'adonai ihoh le'edom shemu'ah shama'nu mei'et ihoh vezir bagoyim shulakh qumu venaqumah 'aleha lamilkhamah. hineh qaton netatikha bagoyim bazui 'atah me'od. zedon libekha hishi'ekha shokheni bekhagvei sela' merom shibto 'omer belibo mi yorideini 'arez. 'im tagbiah kanesher ve'im ben kokhabim sim qinekha misham 'oridekha ne'um ihoh. 'im ganabim ba'u lekha 'im shoddei laylah 'ekh nidmeitah halo yignebu dayam 'im bozerim ba'u lakh halo yash'iru 'oleilot. 'ekh nekhpesu 'eisav nib'u mazpunav. 'ad hagebul shilekhukha kol 'anshei beritekha hishi'ukha yakhelu lekha 'anshei shelomekha lakhmekha yasimu mazor takhtekha 'en tebunah bo. halo bayom hahu ne'um ihoh veha'abadti khakhamim mei'edom utebunah meihar 'eisav. vekhatu giborekha teiman lema'an yikaret 'ish meihar 'eisav miqatel. meikhamas 'akhikha ya'aqob tekhasekha bushah venikhrata le'olam. beyom 'amadekha mineged beyom shebot zarim kheilo venakherim ba'u sha'aro she'arav ve'al yerushalim yadu goral gam 'atah ke'akhad meihem. ve'al teire beyom 'akhikha beyom nakhero ve'al tismakh libnei yehudah beyom 'abedam ve'al tagdel pikha beyom zarah. 'al tabo besha'ar 'ami beyom 'eidam 'al teire gam 'atah bera'ato beyom 'eido ve'al tishlakhnah bekheilo beyom 'eido. ve'al ta'amod 'al hapereq lehakhrit 'et pelitav ve'al tasger seridav beyom zarah. ki qarob yom ihoh 'al kal hagoyim ka'asher 'asita yei'aseh lakh gemulkha yashub beroshekha. ki ka'asher shetitem 'al har qadshi yishtu khal hagoyim tamid veshatu vela'u vehayu kelo hayu. ubehar ziyon tihyeh feleitah vehayah qodesh veyareshu bet ya'aqob 'et morasheihem vehayah bet ya'aqob 'esh ubet yosef lehabah ubet 'eisav leqash vedalequ bahem va'akhalum velo yihyeh sarid lebet 'eisav ki ihoh diber. veyareshu hanegeb 'et har 'eisav vehashefeilah 'et pelishtim veyareshu 'et sedeh 'efrayim ve'et sedeh shomeron ubinyamin 'et hagil'ad. vegalut hakhel hazeh libnei yisra'el 'asher kena'anim 'ad zarefat vegalut yerushalim 'asher bisfarad yirshu 'et 'arei hanegeb. ve'alu moshi'im behar ziyon lishpot 'et har 'eisav vehayetah ihoh hamelukhah.

vayhi debar ihoh 'el yonah ben 'amitai leimor. qum lekh 'el nineveh ha'ir hagedolah uqera 'aleha ki 'aletah ra'atam lefanai. vayaqam yonah libroakh tarshishah milifnei ihoh vayeired yafo vayimza 'aniyah ba'ah tarshish vayiten sekharah vayeired bah labo 'imahem tarshishah milifnei ihoh. ihoh heitil ruakh gedolah 'el hayam vayhi sa'ar gadol bayam veha'oniyah khishebah lehishaber. vayire'u hamalakhim vayiz'aqu 'ish 'el 'elohav vayatilu 'et hakeilim 'asher ba'oniyah 'el hayam lehaqel mei'aleihem veyonah yarad 'el yarketei hasefinah vayishkab vayeiradam. vayiqrab 'eilav rab hakhobel vayomer lo mah lekha nirdam qum qera 'el 'elohekha 'ulai yit'ashet ha'elohim lanu velo nobed. vayomeru 'ish 'el rei'eihu lekhu venapilah goralot veneide'ah beshelemi hara'ah hazot lanu vayapilu goralot vayipol hagoral 'al yonah. vayomeru 'eilav hagidah na lanu ba'asher lemi hara'ah hazot lanu mah melakhtekha umei'ayin tabo mah 'arzekha ve'ei mizeh 'am 'atah. vayomer 'aleihem 'ibri 'anokhi ve'et ihoh 'elohei hashamayim 'ani yarei 'asher 'asah 'et hayam ve'et hayabashah. vayire'u ha'anashim yir'ah gedolah vayomeru 'eilav mah zot 'asita ki yade'u ha'anashim ki milifnei ihoh hu boreiakh ki higid lahem. vayomeru 'eilav mah na'aseh lakh veyishtoq hayam mei'aleinu ki hayam holekh veso'er. vayomer 'aleihem sa'uni vahatiluni 'el hayam veyishtoq hayam mei'aleikhem ki yodeia' 'ani ki besheli hasa'ar hagadol hazeh 'aleikhem. vayakhteru ha'anashim lehashib 'el hayabashah velo yakholu ki hayam holekh veso'er 'aleihem. vayiqre'u 'el ihoh vayomeru 'anah ihoh 'al na nobedah benefesh ha'ish hazeh ve'al titen 'aleinu dam naqi ki 'atah ihoh ka'asher khafazta 'asita. vayis'u 'et yonah vaytiluhu 'el hayam vaya'amod hayam miza'po. vayire'u ha'anashim yir'ah gedolah 'et ihoh vayizbekhu zebakh ihoh vayideru nedarim. vayman ihoh dag gadol libloa' 'et yonah vayhi yonah bim'ei hadag sheloshah yamim usheloshah leilot. vayitpalel yonah 'el ihoh 'elohav mime'ei hadagah. vayomer qarati mizarah li 'el ihoh vaya'aneini mibeten she'ol shiva'ti shama'ta qoli. vatashlikheini mezulah bilbab yamim venahar yesobebeini kal mishbarekha vegalekha 'alai 'abaru. va'ani 'amarti nigrashti mineged 'einekha 'akh 'osif lehabit 'el heikhal qadshekha 'afafuni mayim 'ad nefesh tehom yesobebeini suf khabush leroshi. leqizbei harim yaradti ha'arez berikheha ba'adi le'olam vata'al mishakhat khayai ihoh 'elohai. behit'atef 'alai nafshi 'et ihoh zakhareti vatabo 'eilekha tefilati 'el heikhal qadshekha meshamerim hablei shav khasdam ya'azobu. va'ani beqol todah 'ezbekhah lakh 'asher nadarti 'ashaleimah yeshu'atah ihoh. vayomer ihoh ladag vayaqei 'et yonah 'el hayabashah. vayhi debar ihoh 'el yonah sheinit leimor. qum lekh 'el nineveh ha'ir hagedolah viqra 'eileha 'et haqeri'ah 'asher 'anokhi dober 'eilekha. vayaqam yonah vayeilekh 'el nineveh kidbar ihoh venineveh hayetah 'ir gedolah leilohim mahalakh sheloshet yamim. vayakhel yonah labo ba'ir mahalakh yom 'ekhad vayiqra vayomar 'od 'arba'im yom venineveh nehpakhet. vaya'aminu 'anshei nineveh beilohim vayiqre'u zom vayilbeshu saqim migedolam ve'ad qetanam. vayiga' hadabar 'el melekh nineveh vayaqam mikis'o vaya'aber 'adarto mei'alav vaykhas saq vayeisheb 'al ha'eifer. vayaz'eq vayomer benineveh mita'am hamelekh ugedolav leimor ha'adam vehabeheimah habaqar vehazon 'al yit'amu me'umah 'al yir'u umayim 'al yishtu. veyitkasu saqim ha'adam vehabeheimah veyiqre'u 'el 'elohim bekhazeqah veyashubu 'ish midarko hara'ah umin hekhamas 'asher bekhapeihem. mi yodeia' yashub venikham ha'elohim veshab meikharon 'apo velo nobed. vayar ha'elohim 'et ma'aseihem ki shabu midarkam hara'ah vayinakhem ha'elohim 'al hara'ah 'asher diber la'asot lahem velo 'asah. vayeira' 'el yonah ra'ah gedolah vayikhar lo. vayitpalel 'el ihoh vayomar 'anah ihoh halo zeh debari 'ad heyoti 'al 'admati 'al ken qidamti libroakh tarshishah ki yada'ti ki 'atah 'el khanun verakhum 'erekh 'apayim verab khesed venikham 'al hara'ah. ve'atah ihoh qakh na 'et nafshi mimeni ki tob moti meikhayai. vayomer ihoh haheiteb kharah lakh. vayeizei yonah min ha'ir vayeisheb miqedem la'ir vaya'as lo sham sukah vayeisheb takhteha bazel 'ad 'asher yir'eh mah yihyeh ba'ir. vayman ihoh 'elohim qiqayon vaya'al mei'al leyonah lihyot zel 'al rosho lehazil lo meira'ato vayismakh yonah 'al haqiqayon simkhah gedolah. vayman ha'elohim tola'at ba'alot hashakhar lamakhorat vatakh 'et haqiqayon vayibash. vayhi kizroakh hashemesh vayman 'elohim ruakh qadim kharishit vatakh hashemesh 'al rosh yonah vayit'alaf vayish'al 'et nafsho lamut vayomer tob moti meikhayai. vayomer 'elohim 'el yonah haheiteb kharah lekha 'al haqiqayon vayomer heiteb kharah li 'ad mavet. vayomer ihoh 'atah khasta 'al haqiqayon 'asher lo 'amalta bo velo gidalto shebin laylah hayah ubin laylah 'abad. va'ani lo 'akhus 'al nineveh ha'ir hagedolah 'asher yesh bah harbeh mishtem 'esreh ribo 'adam 'asher lo yada' ben yemino lismolo ubeheimah rabah.

debar ihoh 'asher hayah 'el mikhah hamorashti bimei yotam 'akhaz yekhizqiyah malkhei yehudah 'asher khazah 'al shomeron virushalim. shim'u 'amim kulam haqshibi 'erez umelo'ah vihi 'adonai ihoh bakhem le'ed 'adonai meiheikhal qadesho. ki hineh ihoh yozei mimeqomo veyarad vedarakh 'al bamotei bamotei 'arez. venamasu heharim takhtav veha'amaqim yitbaqa'u kadonag mipenei ha'esh kemayim mugarim bemorad. befesha' ya'aqob kal zot ubekhatot bet yisra'el mi fesha' ya'aqob halo shomeron umi bamot yehudah halo yerushalim. vesamti shomeron le'i hasadeh lemata'ei kharem vehigarti lagai 'abaneha visodeha 'agaleh. vekhal pesileha yukatu vekhal 'etnaneha yisarefu ba'esh vekhal 'azabeha 'asim shemamah ki mei'etnan zonah qibazah ve'ad 'etnan zonah yashubu. 'al zot 'espedah ve'eililah 'eilekhah shilal sholal ve'arom 'e'eseh misped katanim ve'eibel kibnot ya'anah. ki 'anushah makoteha ki ba'ah 'ad yehudah naga' 'ad sha'ar 'ami 'ad yerushalim. begat 'al tagidu bakho 'al tibku bebet le'afrah 'afar hitpalasheti hitpalashi. 'ibri lakhem yoshebet shafir 'eryah boshet lo yaze'ah yoshebet za'anan mispad bet ha'eizel yiqakh mikem 'emdato. ki khalah letob yoshebet marot ki yarad ra' mei'et ihoh lesha'ar yerushalim. retom hamerkabah larekhesh yoshebet lakhish reishit khatat hi lebat ziyon ki bakh nimze'u pish'ei yisra'el. lakhen titeni shilukhim 'al moreshet gat batei 'akhzib le'akhzab lemalkhei yisra'el. 'od hayoresh 'abi lakh yoshebet mareishah 'ad 'adulam yabo kebod yisra'el. qarekhi vagozi 'al benei ta'anugayikh harkhibi qarekhatekh kanesher ki galu mimekh. ho khoshebei 'aven ufo'alei ra' 'al mishkebotam be'or haboqer ya'asuha ki yesh le'el yadam. vekhamedu sadot vegazalu ubatim venasa'u ve'ashequ geber ubeito ve'ish venakhalato. lakhen koh 'amar ihoh hini khosheb 'al hamishpakhah hazot ra'ah 'asher lo tamishu misham zaveroteikhem velo teilekhu romah ki 'et ra'ah hi. bayom hahu yisa 'aleikhem mashal venahah nehi nihyah 'amar shadod neshadunu kheileq 'ami yamir 'ekh yamish li leshobeb sadeinu yekhaleq. lakhen lo yihyeh lekha mashlikh khebel begoral biqhal ihoh. 'al tatifu yatifun lo yatifu la'eleh lo yisag kelimot. he'amur bet ya'aqob haqazar ruakh ihoh 'im 'eleh ma'alalav halo debarai yeitibu 'im hayashar holekh. ve'etmul 'ami le'oyeb yeqomem mimul salmah 'eder tafshitun mei'oberim betakh shubei milkhamah. neshei 'ami tegareshun mibet ta'anugeha mei'al 'olaleha tiqkhu hadari le'olam. qumu ulekhu ki lo zot hamenukhah ba'abur tame'ah tekhabel vekhebel nimraz. lu 'ish holekh ruakh vasheqer kizeb 'atif lekha layayin velasheikhar vehayah matif ha'am hazeh. 'asof 'e'esof ya'aqob kulakh qabez 'aqabez she'eirit yisra'el yakhad 'asimenu kezon bazrah ke'eider betokh hadabero tehimenah mei'adam. 'alah haporez lifneihem parezu vaya'aboru sha'ar vayeize'u bo vaya'abor malkam lifneihem ihoh berosham. va'omar shim'u na rashei ya'aqob uqezinei bet yisra'el halo lakhem lada'at 'et hamishpat. sone'ei tob ve'ohabei ra'ah ra' gozelei 'oram mei'aleihem ushe'eiram mei'al 'azmotam. va'asher 'akhelu she'er 'ami ve'oram mei'aleihem hifshitu ve'et 'azmoteihem pizeikhu ufaresu ka'asher basir ukhebasar betokh qalakhat. 'az yiz'aqu 'el ihoh velo ya'aneh 'otam veyaster panav meihem ba'et hahi ka'asher heirei'u ma'aleihem. koh 'amar ihoh 'al hanebi'im hamat'im 'et 'ami hanoshekhim beshineihem veqare'u shalom va'asher lo yiten 'al pihem veqideshu 'alav milkhamah. lakhen laylah lakhem meikhazon vekhashekhah lakhem miqesom uba'ah hashemesh 'al hanebi'im veqadar 'aleihem hayom. uboshu hakhozim vekhaferu haqosemim ve'atu 'al safam kulam ki 'en ma'aneh 'elohim. ve'ulam 'anokhi maleiti khoakh 'et ruakh ihoh umishpat ugeburah lehagid leya'aqob pish'o uleyisra'el khatato. shim'u na zot rashei bet ya'aqob uqezinei bet yisra'el hamata'abim mishpat ve'et kal haysharah ye'aqeishu. boneh ziyon bedamim virushalim be'avlah. rasheha beshokhad yishpotu vekhohaneha bimkhir yoru unebi'eha bekhesef yiqsomu ve'al ihoh yisha'einu leimor halo ihoh beqirbeinu lo tabo 'aleinu ra'ah. lakhen biglalkhem ziyon sadeh teikharesh virushalim 'iyin tihyeh vehar habayit lebamot ya'ar. vehayah be'akharit hayamim yihyeh har bet ihoh nakhon berosh heharim venisa hu migeba'ot venaharu 'alav 'amim vehalekhu goyim rabim ve'ameru lekhu vena'aleh 'el har ihoh ve'el bet 'elohei ya'aqob veyoreinu miderakhav veneilekhah be'orekhotav ki miziyon teizei torah udebar ihoh mirushalim. veshafat ben 'amim rabim vehokhiakh legoyim 'azumim 'ad rakhoq vekhitetu kharboteihem le'itim vakhanitoteihem lemazmeirot lo yis'u go 'el go khereb velo yilmedun 'od milkhamah. veyashebu 'ish takhat gafno vetakhat te'einato ve'en makharid ki fi ihoh zeba'ot diber. ki kal ha'amim yeilekhu 'ish beshem 'elohav va'anakhnu neilekh beshem ihoh 'eloheinu le'olam va'ed. bayom hahu ne'um ihoh 'osefah hazolei'ah vehanidakhah 'aqabeizah va'asher harei'oti. vesamti 'et hazolei'ah lish'eirit vehanahala'ah lego 'azum umalakh ihoh 'aleihem behar ziyon mei'atah ve'ad 'olam. ve'atah migdal 'eider 'ofel bat ziyon 'adekha teiteh uba'ah hamemshalah harishonah mamlekhet lebat yerushalim. 'atah lamah tari'i reia' hamelekh 'en bakh 'im yo'azekh 'abad ki hekheziqekh khil kayoleidah. khuli vagokhi bat ziyon kayoleidah ki 'atah teize'i miqiryah veshakhant basadeh ubat 'ad babel sham tinazeili m yig'alekh ihoh mikaf 'oyebayikh. ve'atah ne'esfu 'alayikh goyim rabim ha'omerim tekhenaf vetakhaz beziyon 'eineinu. vehemah lo yade'u makhshebot ihoh velo heibinu 'azato ki qibezam ke'amir gorenah. qumi vadoshi bat ziyon ki qarnekh 'asim barzel ufarsotayikh 'asim nekhushah vahadiqot 'amim rabim vehakharamti ihoh biz'am vekheilam la'adon kal ha'arez. 'atah titgodedi bat gedud mazor sam 'aleinu basheibet yaku 'al halekhi 'et shofet yisra'el. ve'atah bet lekhem 'efratah za'ir lihyot be'alfei yehudah mimekha li yeizei lihyot moshel beyisra'el umoza'otav miqedem mimei 'olam. lakhen yitenem 'ad 'et yoleidah yaladah veyeter 'ekhav yeshubun 'al benei yisra'el. ve'amad vera'ah be'oz ihoh big'on shem ihoh 'elohav veyashabu ki 'atah yigdal 'ad 'afsei 'arez. vehayah zeh shalom 'ashur ki yabo be'arzeinu vekhi yidrokh be'armenoteinu vahaqeimonu 'alav shib'ah ro'im ushemonah nesikhei 'adam. vera'u 'et 'erez 'ashur bakhereb ve'et 'erez nimrod biftakheha vehizil mei'ashur ki yabo be'arzeinu vekhi yidrokh bigbuleinu. vehayah she'eirit ya'aqob beqereb 'amim rabim ketal mei'et ihoh kirbibim 'alei 'eiseb 'asher lo yeqaveh le'ish velo yeyakhel libnei 'adam. vehayah she'eirit ya'aqob bagoyim beqereb 'amim rabim ke'aryeh bebahamot ya'ar kikhfir be'edrei zon 'asher 'im 'abar veramas vetaraf ve'en mazil. tarom yadekha 'al zarekha vekhal 'oyebekha yikareitu. vehayah bayom hahu ne'um ihoh vehikhrati susekha miqirbekha veha'abadti markebotekha. vehikhrati 'arei 'arzekha veharasti kal mibzarekha. vehikhrati kheshafim miyadekha ume'onim lo yihyu lakh. vehikhrati fesilekha umazeibotekha miqirbekha velo tishtakhaveh 'od lema'aseh yadekha. venatashti 'asheirekha miqirbekha vehishmadti 'arekha. ve'asiti be'af ubekheimah naqam 'et hagoyim 'asher lo shamei'u. shim'u na 'et 'asher ihoh 'omer qum rib 'et heharim vetishma'nah hageba'ot qolekha. shim'u harim 'et rib ihoh veha'eitanim mosedei 'arez ki rib ihoh 'im 'amo ve'im yisra'el yitvakakh. 'ami meh 'asiti lekha umah hel'eitikha 'aneh bi. ki he'elitikha mei'erez mizrayim umibet 'abadim peditikha va'eshlakh lefanekha 'et mosheh 'aharon umiryam. 'ami zekhar na mah ya'az balaq melekh mo'ab umeh 'anah 'oto bil'am ben be'or min hashitim 'ad hagilgal lema'an da'at zidqot ihoh. bamah 'aqadem ihoh 'ikaf leilohei marom ha'aqademenu be'olot ba'agalim benei shanah. hayirzeh ihoh be'alfei 'eilim beribbot nakhalei shamen ha'eten bekhori pish'i peri bitni khatat nafshi. higid lekha 'adam mah tob umah ihoh doresh mimekha ki 'im 'asot mishpat ve'ahabat khesed vehazneia' lekhet 'im 'elohekha. qol ihoh la'ir yiqra vetushiyah yir'eh shemekha shim'u mateh umi ye'adah. 'od ha'ish bet rasha' 'ozerot resha' ve'eifat razon ze'umah. ha'ezkeh bemozenei resha' ubekhis 'abnei mirmah. 'asher 'ashireha male'u khamas veyoshebeha diberu shaqer uleshonam remiyah befihem. vegam 'ani hekheleiti hakotekha hashmem 'al khatotekha. 'atah tokhal velo tisba' veyeshkhakha beqirbekha vetaseg velo taflit va'asher tefalet lakhereb 'eten. 'atah tizra' velo tiqzor 'atah tidrokh zayit velo tasukh shemen vetirosh velo tishteh yayin. veyishtamer khuqot 'ameri vekhol ma'aseh bet 'akh'ab vateilekhu bemo'azotam lema'an titi 'otekha leshamah veyoshebeha lishreiqah vekherpat 'ami tisa'u. 'alai li ki hayiti ke'asepei qayiz ke'olelot bazir 'en 'eshkol le'ekhol bikurah 'ivetah nafshi. 'abad khasid min ha'arez veyashar ba'adam 'ayin kulam ledamim ye'erobu 'ish 'et 'akhihu yazudu kheirem. 'al hara' kapayim leheitib hasar sho'el vehashofet bashilum vehagadol dober havat nafsho hu vai'abetuha. tobam kekheideq yashar mimesukhah yom mezapekha pequdatekha ba'ah 'atah tihyeh mebukhatam. 'al ta'aminu bereia' 'al tibtekhu be'aluf mishokhebet kheiqekha shemor pitkhei fikha. ki ben menabel 'ab bat qamah be'imah kalah bakhamotah 'oyebei 'ish 'anshei beito. va'ani ihoh 'azapeh 'okhilah leilohei yish'i yishma'eini 'elohai. 'al tismekhi 'oyabti li ki nafalti qameti ki 'eisheb bakhoshekh ihoh 'or li. za'af ihoh 'esa ki khatati lo 'ad 'asher yarib ribi ve'asah mishpati yozi'eini la'or 'er'eh bezidqato. veteire 'oyabti utekhaseha bushah ha'omerah 'eilai 'ayo ihoh 'elohayikh 'einai tir'enah bah 'atah tihyeh lemirmas ketit khuzot. yom libnot gedeirayikh yom hahu yirkhaq khoq. yom hu ve'adekha yabo lemini 'ashur ve'arei mazor ulemini mazor ve'ad nahar veyam miyam vehar hahar. vehayetah ha'arez lishmamah 'al yoshebeha miperi ma'aleihem. re'eh 'amekha beshibtekha zon nakhalatekha shokheni lebadad ya'ar betokh karmel yir'u bashan vegil'ad kimei 'olam. kimei zeitekha mei'erez mizrayim 'ar'enu nifla'ot. yir'u goyim veyeiboshu mikol geburatam yasimu yad 'al peh 'azeneihem tekherashnah. yelakhakhu 'afar kanakhash kezokhalei 'erez yirgezu mimisgeroteihem 'el ihoh 'eloheinu yifkhadu veyir'u mimeka. mi 'el kamokha nosei 'avon ve'ober 'al pesha' lish'eirit nakhalato lo hekheziq la'ad 'apo ki khafez khesed hu. yashub yerakhameinu yikhbosh 'avonoteinu vetashlikh bimzulot yam kal khatotam. titen 'emet leya'aqob khesed le'abraham 'asher nishba'ta la'aboteinu mimei qedem.

masa nineveh seifer khazon nakhum ha'elqoshi. 'el qano venoqem ihoh noqem ihoh uba'al kheimah noqem ihoh lezarav venoter hu le'oyebav. ihoh 'erekh 'apayim ugedol ugedal koakh venaqeh lo yenaqeh ihoh besufah ubis'arah darko ve'anan 'abaq raglav. go'er bayam vayabesheihu vekhal haneharot hekherib 'umlal bashan vekharmel uferakh lebanon 'umlal. harim ra'ashu mimenu vehageba'ot hitmogagu vatisa ha'arez mipanav veteibel vekhal yoshebei bah. lifnei za'mo mi ya'amod umi yaqum bakharon 'apo khamato nitekhah kha'esh vehazurim nitezu mimenu. tob ihoh lema'oz beyom zarah veyodeia' khosei bo. ubeshetef 'ober kalah ya'aseh meqomah ve'oyebav yeradef khoshekh mah tekhashebun 'el ihoh kalah hu 'oseh lo taqum pa'amayim zarah. ki 'ad sirim sebukhim ukhesabe'am sebu'im 'ukelu keqash yabesh malei. mimekh yaza khosheb 'al ihoh ra'ah yo'ez beliya'al. koh 'amar ihoh 'im sheleimim vekhen rabim vekhen nagozu ve'abar ve'initikh lo 'a'anekh 'od. ve'atah 'eshbor moteihu mei'alayikh umosrotayikh 'anateq. vezivah 'alekha ihoh lo yizara' mishimkha 'od mibet 'elohekha 'akhrit pesel umaseikhah 'asim qibrekha ki qalota. hineh 'al heharim raglei mebaser mashmia' shalom khagi yehudah khagayikh shalemi nedarayikh ki lo yosif 'od la'abor la'abar bakh beliya'al kuloh nikhrat. 'alah meifiz 'al panayikh nazor mezurah zapeh derekh khazeq matenayim 'amez koakh me'od. ki shab ihoh 'et ge'on ya'aqob kig'on yisra'el ki beqaqum boqeqim uzemoreihem shikheitu. magen giboreihu me'adam 'anshei khayil metula'im be'esh peladot harekheb beyom hakhino vehaberoshim hare'alu. bakhuzot yitholu harekheb yishtaqshequn barekhobot mar'eihen kalapidim kaberaqim yerozeizu. yizkor 'adirav yikashelu bahalikhotam bahalikhatam yemaharu khomatah vehukhan hasokhekh. sha'arei haneharot niftakhu vehaheikhal namog. vehuzab guletah ho'alatah ve'amhoteha menahagot keqol yonim metofefot 'al libbeihen. venineveh khibreikhat mayim mimei hi vehemah nasim 'imdu 'amodu ve'en mafneh. bozu khesef bozu zahab ve'en qeizeh latekhunah kabod mikol keli khemdah. buqah umebuqah umebulaqah veleb names ufiq birkayim vekhalkhalah bekhal matenayim ufenei khulam qibezu farur. 'ayeh me'on 'arayot umir'eh hu lakefirim 'asher halakh 'aryeh labi sham gur 'aryeh ve'en makharid. 'aryeh toref bedei gorotav umekhaneq lelib'otav vaymalei teref khorav ume'onotav tereifah. hini 'eilayikh ne'um ihoh zeba'ot vehib'arti be'ashan rikhbah ukhefirayikh tokhal khareb vehikhrati mei'erez tarpekh velo yishama' 'od qol mal'akheikheh. ho 'ir damim kulah kakhash pereq melei'ah lo yamish taref. qol shot veqol ra'ash 'ofan vesus doher umerkabah meraqeidah. parash ma'aleh velahab khereb uberaq khanit verob khalal vekhobed pager ve'en qeizeh lageviyah yikhshelu vekhashelu bigviyatam. meirob zenunei zonah tobat khen ba'alat keshafim hamokheret goyim biznuneha umishpakhot bikhshafeha. hini 'eilayikh ne'um ihoh zeba'ot vegileiti shulayikh 'al panayikh vehar'eiti goyim ma'rekh umamlakhot qelonekh. vehishlakhti 'alayikh shiquzim venibaltikh vesamtikh kero'i. vehayah khal ro'ayikh yidod mimekh ve'amar shadedah nineveh mi yanud lah mei'ayin 'abaqesh menakhamim lakh. hateitebi mino 'amon hayoshebah bai'orim mayim sabib lah 'asher khel yam miyam khomatah. kush 'azemah umizrayim ve'en qeizeh put velubim hayu be'ezratekh. gam hi lagolah halekhah bashebi gam 'olaleha yeruteshu berosh kal khuzot ve'al nikhbadeha yadu goral vekhal gedoleha rutequ baziqim. gam 'at tishkeri tehi na'alamah gam 'at tebaqshi ma'oz mei'oyeb. kal mibzarayikh te'einim 'im bikurim 'im yino'u venafelu 'al pi 'okhel. hineh 'amekh nashim beqirbekh le'oyebayikh patoakh niftekhu sha'arei 'arzekh 'akhelah 'esh berikhayikh. mei mazor sha'abi lakh khazeqi mibzarayikh bo'i batit verimsi bakhomer hakhaziqi malben. m tokhelekh 'esh takhritekh khereb tokhelekh kayaleq hitkabed kayeleq hitkabedi ka'arbeh. hirbet rokhelayikh mikokhbei hashamayim yeleq pashat vaya'of. minezarayikh ka'arbeh vetafserayikh kegob gobai hakhonim bagedeirot beyom qarah shemesh zarekhah venodad velo noda' meqomo 'ayam. namu ro'ekha melekh 'ashur yishkenu 'adirekha nafoshu 'amekha 'al heharim ve'en meqabez. 'en keihah leshibrekha nakhlah makatekha kol shome'ei shim'akha taqe'u khaf 'alekha ki 'al mi lo 'aberah ra'atekha tamid.

hamasa 'asher khazah khabaquq hanabi. 'ad 'anah ihoh shiva'ti velo tishma' 'ez'aq 'eilekha khamas velo toshia'. lamah tar'eini 'aven ve'amal tabit veshod vekhamas lenegdi vayhi rib umadon yisa. 'al ken tafug torah velo yeizei lanezakh mishpat ki rasha' makhtir 'et hazadiq 'al ken yeizei mishpat me'uqal. re'u bagoyim vehabitu vehitamehu temahu ki fo'al po'el bimeikhem lo ta'aminu ki yesupar. ki hini meiqim 'et hakasdim hago hamar vehanimhar haholekh lemerkhabei 'erez lareshet mishkanot lo lo. 'ayom venora hu mimenu mishpato use'eito yeizei. veqalu minemeirim susav vekhadu mize'eibei 'ereb ufashu parashav ufarashav meirakhoq yabo'u ya'ufu kenesher khash le'ekhol. kuloh lekhamas yabo megamat peneihem qadimah vaye'esof kakhol shebi. vehu bamelakhim yitqalas verozenim miskhaq lo hu lekhal mibzar yiskhaq vayizbor 'afar vayilkedah. 'az khalaf ruakh vaya'abor ve'ashem zu khokho leiloho. halo 'atah miqedem ihoh 'elohai qedoshi lo namut ihoh lemishpat samto vezur lehokhiakh yesadto. tehor 'einayim meire'ot ra' vehabit 'el 'amal lo tukhal lamah tabit bogdim takharish bebala' rasha' zadiq mimenu. vata'aseh 'adam kidgei hayam keremes lo moshel bo. kuloh bekhakah hei'alah yegoreihu bekhermo veya'asfeihu bemikhmarto 'al ken yismakh veyagil. 'al ken yezabeiakh lekhermo viqater lemikhmarto ki bahemah shamen khelqo uma'akhalo beri'ah. ha'al ken yariq khermo vetamid laharog goyim lo yakhmol. 'al mishmarti 'e'emodah ve'etyazebah 'al mazor va'azapeh lir'ot mah yedaber bi umah 'ashib 'al tokhakhti. vaya'aneini ihoh vayomer ketob khazon uba'er 'al halukhot lema'an yaruz qorei bo. ki 'od khazon lamo'ed veyafeiakh laqez velo yekhazeb 'im yitmahmah khakeh lo ki bo yabo lo ye'akher. hineh 'upelah lo yasherah nafsho bo vezadiq be'emunato yikhyeh. ve'af ki hayayin boged geber yahir velo yinveh 'asher hirkhib kish'ol nafsho vehu khamavet velo yisba' vaye'esof 'eilav kal hagoyim vayiqboz 'eilav kal ha'amim. halo 'eleh khulam 'alav mashal yisa'u umelizah khidot lo veyomar ho hamarbeh lo lo 'ad matai umakhbid 'alav 'abtit. halo feta' yaqumu noshekhekha veyiqzu meza'ze'ekha vehayita limshisot lamo. ki 'atah shalota goyim rabim yeshalukha kal yeter 'amim midemei 'adam vakhamas 'erez qiryah vekhal yoshebei bah. ho bozeia' beza' ra' lebeito lasum bamarom qino lehinazel mikaf ra'. ya'azta boshet lebeitekha qezot 'amim rabim vekhotei nafshekha. ki 'eben miqir tiz'aq vekhafis mei'ez ya'anenah. ho boneh 'ir bedamim vekhonen qiryah be'avlah. halo hineh mei'et ihoh zeba'ot veyige'u 'amim bedei 'esh ule'umim bedei riq yi'afu. ki timalei ha'arez lada'at 'et kebod ihoh kamayim yekhasu 'al yam. ho mashqeh rei'eihu mesapeiakh khamatekha ve'af shaker lema'an habit 'al me'oreihem. saba'ta qalon mikabod sheteh gam 'atah vehei'arel tisob 'alekha kos yemin ihoh veqiqalon 'al kebodekha. ki khamas lebanon yekhaseka veshod beheimot yekhitan midemei 'adam vakhamas 'erez qiryah vekhal yoshebei bah. mah ho'il pesel ki fesalo yozero maseikhah umoreh shaqer ki batakh yozer yizro 'alav la'asot 'elilim 'ilemim. ho 'omer la'ez haqizah 'uri le'eben dumam hu yoreh hineh hu tafus zahab vakhesef vekhal ruakh 'en beqirbo. ihoh beheikhal qadesho has mipanav kal ha'arez. tefilah lakhabaquq hanabi 'al shigyonot. ihoh shama'ti shim'akha yareiti ihoh pa'alekha beqereb shanim khayeihu beqereb shanim todia' berogez rakhem tizkor. 'eloha miteiman yabo veqadosh meihar paran selah kisah shamayim hodo utehilato male'ah ha'arez. venogah ka'or tihyeh qarnayim miyado lo vesham khebyon 'uzoh lefanav yeilekh daber veyeizei reshef leraglav. 'amad vaymoded 'erez ra'ah vayater goyim vayitpozezu harrei 'ad shakhu gib'ot 'olam halikhot 'olam lo takhat 'aven ra'iti 'aholei khushan yirgezun yeri'ot 'erez midyan. habinharim kharah ihoh 'im baneharim 'apekha 'im bayam 'ebratekha ki tirkab 'al susekha markebotekha yeshu'ah. 'eryah tei'or qashtekha shebu'ot matot 'omer selah neharot tebaqa' 'arez. ra'ukha yakhilu harim zerem mayim 'abar natan tehom qolo rom yadeihu nasa. shemesh yareiakh 'amad zebulah le'or khizekha yehaleikhu lenogah beraq khanitekha. beza'am tiz'ad 'arez be'af tadush goyim. yazata leyeisha' 'amekha leyeisha' 'et meshikhekha makhazta rosh mibet rasha' 'arot yesod 'ad zavar selah. naqabta bematav rosh perazo perazav yis'aru lahafizeini 'alizutam kemo le'ekhol 'ani bamistar. darakhta bayam susekha khomer mayim rabim. shama'ti vatirgaz bitni leqol zalalu sefatai yabo raqab ba'azamai vetakhtai 'ergaz 'asher 'anuakh leyom zarah la'alot le'am yegudenu. ki te'einah lo tifrakh ve'en yebul bagefanim kikhesh ma'aseh zayit ushedeimot lo 'asah 'okhel gazar mimikhlah zon ve'en baqar barefatim. va'ani ihoh 'e'lozah 'agilah beilohei yish'i. ihoh 'adonai kheili vayasem raglai ka'ayalot ve'al bamotai yadrikheini lamnazeiakh binginotai.

debar ihoh 'asher hayah 'el zefanyah ben kushi ben gedalyah ben 'amaryah ben khizqiyah bimei yoshiyahu ben 'amon melekh yehudah. 'asof 'asef kol mei'al penei ha'adamah ne'um ihoh. 'asef 'adam ubeheimah 'asef 'of hashamayim udegei hayam vehamakhsheilot 'et haresha'im vehikhrati 'et ha'adam mei'al penei ha'adamah ne'um ihoh. venatiti yadi 'al yehudah ve'al kal yoshebei yerushalim vehikhrati min hamaqom hazeh 'et she'ar haba'al 'et shem hakemarim 'im hakohanim. ve'et hamishtakhavim 'al hagagot lizba hashamayim ve'et hamishtakhavim hanishba'im ihoh vehanishba'im bemalkam. ve'et hanesogim mei'akharei ihoh va'asher lo biqshu 'et ihoh velo derashuhu. has mipenei 'adonai ihoh ki qarob yom ihoh ki heikhin ihoh zebakh hiqdish qeru'av. vehayah beyom zebakh ihoh ufaqadti 'al hasarim ve'al benei hamelekh ve'al kal halobeshim malbush nakheri. ufaqadti 'al kal hadoleg 'al hamiftan bayom hahu hamal'im bet 'adoneihem khamas umirmah. vehayah bayom hahu ne'um ihoh qol ze'aqah misha'ar hadagim vilalah min hamishneh vesheber gadol meihageba'ot. heililu yoshebei hamakhtesh ki nidmah kal 'am kena'an nikhretu kal netilei khasef. vehayah ba'et hahi 'akhapes 'et yerushalim baneirot ufaqadti 'al ha'anashim haqofe'im 'al shimreihem ha'omerim bilbabam lo yeitib ihoh velo yareia'. vehayah kheilam limshisah ubateihem lishmamah ubanu batim velo yeisheibu venate'u kheramim velo yishtu 'et yeinam. qarob yom ihoh hagadol qarob umaher me'od qol yom ihoh mar zoreiakh sham gibor. yom 'ebrah hayom hahu yom zarah umezuqah yom sho'ah umesho'ah yom khoshekh va'afeilah yom 'anan va'arafel. yom shofar uteru'ah 'al he'arim habezurot ve'al hapinot hagebohot. vahazeiroti la'adam vehalekhu ka'ivrim ki ihoh khata'u veshupakh damam ke'afar ulekhumam kagelalim. gam kaspam gam zehabam lo yukhal lehazilam beyom 'ebrat ihoh ube'esh qin'ato tei'akhel kal ha'arez ki khalah 'akh nibhalah ya'aseh 'et kal yoshebei ha'arez. hitqosheshu vaqoshu hago lo nikhsaf. beterem ledet khoq kemoz 'abar yom beterem lo yabo 'aleikhem kharon 'af ihoh beterem lo yabo 'aleikhem yom 'af ihoh. baqeshu 'et ihoh kal 'anvei ha'arez 'asher mishpato pa'alu baqeshu zedeq baqeshu 'anavah 'ulai tisateru beyom 'af ihoh. ki 'azah 'azubah tihyeh ve'ashqelon lishmamah 'ashdod bazahorayim yegareshuha ve'eqron tei'aqer. ho yoshebei khebel hayam go kereitim debar ihoh 'aleikhem kena'an 'erez pelishtim veha'abadtikh mei'en yosheb. vehayetah khebel hayam nevot kerot ro'im vegidrot zon. vehayah khebel lish'eirit bet yehudah 'aleihem yir'un bebatei 'ashqelon ba'ereb yirbazun ki yifqedem ihoh 'eloheihem veshab shebutam shebitam. shama'ti kherpat mo'ab vegidufei benei 'amon 'asher kheirefu 'et 'ami vayagdilu 'al gebulam. lakhen khai 'ani ne'um ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el ki mo'ab kisdom tihyeh ubenei 'amon ka'amorah mimshaq kharul umikhreh melakh ushemamah 'ad 'olam she'eirit 'ami yebazum veyeter go goyi yinkhalum. zot lahem takhat ge'onam ki kheirefu vayagdilu 'al 'am ihoh zeba'ot. nora ihoh 'aleihem ki razah 'et kal 'elohei ha'arez veyishtakhavu lo 'ish mimeqomo kol 'iyei hagoyim. gam 'atem kushim khalei kharbi hemah. veyet yado 'al zafon vi'abed 'et 'ashur veyasem 'et nineveh lishmamah ziyah kamidbar. verabezu betokhah 'adarim kal khayto go gam qa'at gam qipod bekhaftoreha yalinu qol yeshorer bakhalon khoreb basaf ki 'arzah 'eirah. zot ha'ir ha'alizah hayoshebet labetakh ha'omerah bilbabah 'ani ve'afsi 'od 'ekh hayetah leshamah marbez lakhayah kol 'ober 'aleha yishroq yania' yado. ho more'ah venig'alah ha'ir hayonah. lo shame'ah beqol lo laqekhah musar ihoh lo batakhah 'el 'eloheha lo qareibah. sareha beqirbah 'arayot sho'agim shofeteha ze'eibei 'ereb lo garemu laboqer. nebi'eha pokhazim 'anshei bogedot kohaneha khilelu qodesh khamesu torah. ihoh zadiq beqirbah lo ya'aseh 'avlah baboqer baboqer mishpato yiten la'or lo ne'dar velo yodeia' 'aval boshet. hikhrati goyim nashamu pinotam hekherabti khuzotam mibeli 'ober nizdu 'areihem mibeli 'ish mei'en yosheb. 'amarti 'akh tire'i 'oti tiqkhi musar velo yikaret me'onah kol 'asher paqadti 'aleha 'akhen hishkimu hishkhitu kol 'alilotam. lakhen khaku li ne'um ihoh leyom qumi le'ad ki mishpati le'esof goyim leqabezi mamlakhot lishpokh 'aleihem za'mi kol kharon 'api ki be'esh qin'ati tei'akhel kal ha'arez. ki 'az 'ehpokh 'el 'amim safah berurah liqro khulam beshem ihoh le'abedo shekhem 'ekhad. mei'eiber lenaharei khush 'atarai bat puzai yobilun minkhati. bayom hahu lo teiboshi mikol 'alilotayikh 'asher pasha'at bi ki 'az 'asir miqirbekh 'alizei ga'avatekh velo tosifi legabehah 'od behar qadshi vehish'arti beqirbekh 'am 'ani vadal vekhasu beshem ihoh. she'eirit yisra'el lo ya'asu 'avlah velo yedaberu khazab velo yimazei befihem leshon tarmit ki hemah yir'u verabezu ve'en makharid. rani bat ziyon hari'u yisra'el simkhi ve'alezi bekhal leb bat yerushalim. heisir ihoh mishpatayikh pinah 'oyebekh melekh yisra'el ihoh beqirbekh lo tire'i ra' 'od. bayom hahu yei'amer lirushalim 'al tira'i ziyon 'al yirpu yadayikh. ihoh 'elohayikh beqirbekh gibor yoshia' yasis 'alayikh besimkhah yakharish be'ahabato yagil 'alayikh berinah. nugei mimo'ed 'asafti mimekh hayu mas'et 'aleha kherpah. hini 'oseh 'et kal me'anayikh ba'et hahi vehosha'ti 'et hazolei'ah vehanidakhah 'aqabez vesamtim lithilah uleshem bekhal ha'arez bashetam. ba'et hahi 'abi 'etkhem uba'et qabezi 'etkhem ki 'eten 'etkhem leshem velithilah bekhol 'amei ha'arez beshubi 'et shebuteikhem le'eineikhem 'amar ihoh.

bishnat shetayim ledareyavesh hamelekh bakhodesh hashishi beyom 'ekhad lakhodesh hayah debar ihoh beyad khagai hanabi 'el zerubabel ben she'alti'el pakhat yehudah ve'el yehoshua' ben yehozadaq hakohen hagadol leimor. koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot leimor ha'am hazeh 'ameru lo 'et bo 'et bet ihoh lehibanot. vayhi debar ihoh beyad khagai hanabi leimor. ha'et lakhem 'atem lashebet bebateikhem sefunim vehabayit hazeh khareb. ve'atah koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot simu lebabkhem 'al darkheikhem. zera'tem harbeh vehabei me'at 'akhol ve'en lesabe'ah shato ve'en leshakherah labosh ve'en lekhom lo vehamistaker mistaker 'el zeror naqub. koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot simu lebabkhem 'al darkheikhem. 'alu hahar vahabeitem 'ez ubenu habayit ve'erzeh bo ve'ekabed ve'ekabedah 'amar ihoh. panoh 'el harbeh vehineh lim'at vahabeitem habayit venafakhti bo ya'an meh ne'um ihoh zeba'ot ya'an beiti 'asher hu khareb ve'atem razim 'ish lebeito. 'al ken 'aleikhem kale'u shamayim mital veha'arez kale'ah yebulah. va'eqra khoreb 'al ha'arez ve'al heharim ve'al hadagan ve'al hatirosh ve'al hayizhar ve'al 'asher tozi ha'adamah ve'al ha'adam ve'al habeheimah ve'al kal yegia' kapayim. vayishma' zerubabel ben shalti'el vihoshua' ben yehozadaq hakohen hagadol vekhol she'eirit ha'am beqol ihoh 'eloheihem ve'al dibrei khagai hanabi ka'asher shelakho ihoh 'eloheihem vayire'u ha'am mipenei ihoh. vayomer khagai mal'akh ihoh bemal'akhut ihoh la'am leimor 'ani 'itekhem ne'um ihoh. vaya'ar ihoh 'et ruakh zerubabel ben shalti'el pakhat yehudah ve'et ruakh yehoshua' ben yehozadaq hakohen hagadol ve'et ruakh kol she'eirit ha'am vayabo'u vaya'asu melakhah bebet ihoh zeba'ot 'eloheihem. beyom 'esrim ve'arba'ah lakhodesh bashishi bishnat shetayim ledareyavesh hamelekh. bashebi'i be'esrim ve'ekhad lakhodesh hayah debar ihoh beyad khagai hanabi leimor. 'emar na 'el zerubabel ben shalti'el pakhat yehudah ve'el yehoshua' ben yehozadaq hakohen hagadol ve'el she'eirit ha'am leimor. mi bakhem hanish'ar 'asher ra'ah 'et habayit hazeh bikhbodo harishon umah 'atem ro'im 'oto 'atah halo khamohu ke'ayin be'eineikhem. ve'atah khazaq zerubabel ne'um ihoh vakhazaq yehoshua' ben yehozadaq hakohen hagadol vakhazaq kal 'am ha'arez ne'um ihoh va'asu ki 'ani 'itekhem ne'um ihoh zeba'ot. 'et hadabar 'asher karati 'itekhem bezeitekhem mimizrayim verukhi 'omedet betokhkhem 'al tira'u. ki khoh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'od 'akhat me'at hi va'ani mar'ish 'et hashamayim ve'et ha'arez ve'et hayam ve'et hekharabah. vehir'ashti 'et kal hagoyim uba'u khemdat kal hagoyim umileiti 'et habayit hazeh kabod 'amar ihoh zeba'ot. li hakesef veli hazahab ne'um ihoh zeba'ot. gadol yihyeh kebod habayit hazeh ha'akharon min harishon 'amar ihoh zeba'ot ubamaqom hazeh 'eten shalom ne'um ihoh zeba'ot. be'esrim ve'arba'ah lateshi'i bishnat shetayim ledareyavesh hayah debar ihoh 'el khagai hanabi leimor. koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot she'al na 'et hakohanim torah leimor. hen yisa 'ish besar qodesh bikhnaf bigdo venaga' bikhnafo 'el halekhem ve'el hanazid ve'el hayayin ve'el shemen ve'el kal ma'akhal hayiqdash vaya'anu hakohanim vayomeru lo. vayomer khagai 'im yiga' temei nefesh bekhal 'eleh hayitma vaya'anu hakohanim vayomeru yitma. vaya'an khagai vayomer ken ha'am hazeh vekhen hago hazeh lefanai ne'um ihoh vekhen kal ma'aseh yedeihem va'asher yaqribu sham tamei hu. ve'atah simu na lebabkhem min hayom hazeh vama'elah miterem sum 'eben 'el 'eben beheikhal ihoh. mihyotam ba 'el 'areimat 'esrim vehayetah 'asarah ba 'el hayeqeb lakhsof khamishim purah vehayetah 'esrim. hikeiti 'etkhem bashidafon ubayeiraqon ubabarad 'et kal ma'aseh yedeikhem ve'en 'etkhem 'eilai ne'um ihoh. simu na lebabkhem min hayom hazeh vama'elah miyom 'esrim ve'arba'ah lateshi'i lemin hayom 'asher yusad heikhal ihoh simu lebabkhem. ha'od hazera' bamegurah ve'ad hagefen vehate'einah veharimon ve'ez hazayit lo nasa min hayom hazeh 'abarekh. vayhi debar ihoh sheinit 'el khagai be'esrim ve'arba'ah lakhodesh leimor. 'emor 'el zerubabel pakhat yehudah leimor 'ani mar'ish 'et hashamayim ve'et ha'arez. vehafakhti kisei mamlakhot vehishmadti khozeq mamlekhot hagoyim vehafakhti merkabah verokhebeha veyaredu susim verokhebeihem 'ish bekhereb 'akhiv. bayom hahu ne'um ihoh zeba'ot 'eqakhakha zerubabel ben she'alti'el 'abdi ne'um ihoh vesamtikha kakhotam ki bekha bakharti ne'um ihoh zeba'ot.

bakhodesh hashemini bishnat shetayim ledareyavesh hayah debar ihoh 'el zekharyah ben berekhyah ben 'ido hanabi leimor. qazaf ihoh 'al 'aboteikhem qazef. ve'amarta 'aleihem koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot shubu 'eilai ne'um ihoh zeba'ot ve'ashub 'aleikhem 'amar ihoh zeba'ot. 'al tihyu kha'aboteikhem 'asher qare'u 'aleihem hanebi'im harishonim leimor koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot shubu na midarkheikhem hara'im uma'alileikhem uma'aleikhem hara'im velo shame'u velo hiqshibu 'eilai ne'um ihoh. 'aboteikhem 'ayeh hem vehanebi'im hal'olam yikhyu. 'akh debarai vekhuqai 'asher ziviti 'et 'abadai hanebi'im halo hisigu 'aboteikhem vayashubu vayomeru ka'asher zamam ihoh zeba'ot la'asot lanu kidrakheinu ukhema'alaleinu ken 'asah 'itanu. beyom 'esrim ve'arba'ah le'ashtei 'asar khodesh hu khodesh shebat bishnat shetayim ledareyavesh hayah debar ihoh 'el zekharyah ben berekhyahu ben 'ido hanabi leimor. ra'iti halaylah vehineh 'ish rokheb 'al sus 'adom vehu 'omed ben hahadasim 'asher bamezulah ve'akharav susim 'adumim seruqim ulebanim. va'omar mah 'eleh 'adoni vayomer 'eilai hamal'akh hadober bi 'ani 'ar'eka mah hemah 'eleh. vaya'an ha'ish ha'omed ben hahadasim vayomar 'eleh 'asher shalakh ihoh lehithalekh ba'arez. vaya'anu 'et mal'akh ihoh ha'omed ben hahadasim vayomeru hithalakhnu ba'arez vehineh khal ha'arez yoshebet veshoqatet. vaya'an mal'akh ihoh vayomar ihoh zeba'ot 'ad matai 'atah lo terakhem 'et yerushalim ve'et 'arei yehudah 'asher za'amtah zeh shib'im shanah. vaya'an ihoh 'et hamal'akh hadober bi debarim tobim debarim nikhumim. vayomer 'eilai hamal'akh hadober bi qera leimor koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot qineiti lirushalim uleziyon qin'ah gedolah. veqezef gadol 'ani qozef 'al hagoyim hasha'ananim 'asher 'ani qazafti me'at vehemah 'azeru lera'ah. lakhen koh 'amar ihoh shabti lirushalim berakhamim beiti yibaneh bah ne'um ihoh zeba'ot veqavah veqav yinateh 'al yerushalim. 'od qera leimor koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'od tefuzenah 'arai mitob venikham ihoh 'od 'et ziyon ubakhar 'od birushalim. va'esa 'et 'einai va'eire vehineh 'arba' qeranot. va'omar 'el hamal'akh hadober bi mah 'eleh vayomer 'eilai 'eleh haqeranot 'asher zeiru 'et yehudah 'et yisra'el virushalam vayar'eini ihoh 'arba'ah kharashim. va'omar mah 'eleh ba'im la'asot vayomer leimor 'eleh haqeranot 'asher zeiru 'et yehudah kefi 'ish lo nasa rosho vayabo'u 'eleh lehakharid 'otam leyadot 'et qarnot hagoyim hanose'im qeren 'el 'erez yehudah lezarotah. va'esa 'einai va'eire vehineh 'ish ubeyado khebel midah. va'omar 'anah 'atah holekh vayomer 'eilai lamod 'et yerushalim lir'ot kamah rakhebah vekhamah 'arekah. vehineh hamal'akh hadober bi yozei umal'akh 'akher yozei liqrato. vayomer 'eilav ruz daber 'el hana'ar halaz leimor perazot teisheb yerushalim meirob 'adam ubeheimah betokhah. va'ani 'ehyeh lah ne'um ihoh khomat 'esh sabib ulekhabod 'ehyeh betokhah. ho ho venusu mei'erez zafon ne'um ihoh ki ke'arba' rukhot hashamayim peirasti 'etkhem ne'um ihoh. ho ziyon himaleti yoshebet bat babel. ki khoh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'akhar kabod shelakhani 'el hagoyim hasholelim 'etkhem ki hanogeia' bakhem nogeia' bebabat 'eino. ki hini meinif 'et yadi 'aleihem vehayu shalal le'abdeihem vida'tem ki ihoh zeba'ot shelakhani. rani vesimkhi bat ziyon ki hini ba veshakhanti betokhekh ne'um ihoh. venilvu goyim rabim 'el ihoh bayom hahu vehayu li le'am veshakhanti betokhekh veyada'at ki ihoh zeba'ot shelakhani 'eilayikh. venakhal ihoh 'et yehudah khelqo 'al 'admat haqodesh ubakhar 'od birushalim. has kal basar mipenei ihoh ki nei'or mime'on qadesho. vayar'eini 'et yehoshua' hakohen hagadol 'omed lifnei mal'akh ihoh vehasatan 'omed 'al yemino lesitno. vayomer ihoh 'el hasatan yig'ar ihoh bekha hasatan veyig'ar ihoh bekha habokher birushalim halo zeh 'ud muzal mei'esh. vihoshua' hayah labush begadim zo'im ve'omed lifnei hamal'akh. vaya'an vayomer 'el ha'omedim lefanav leimor hasiru habegadim hazo'im mei'alav vayomer 'eilav re'eh he'ebarti mei'alekha 'avonekha vehalbesh 'otekha makhalazot. va'omar yasimu zanif tahor 'al rosho vayasimu hazanif hatahor 'al rosho vayalbishuhu begadim umal'akh ihoh 'omed. vaya'ad mal'akh ihoh bihoshua' leimor. koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'im bidrakhai teilekh ve'im 'et mishmarti tishmor vegam 'atah tadin 'et beiti vegam tishmor 'et khazeirai venatati lekha mahlekhim ben ha'omedim ha'eleh. shema' na yehoshua' hakohen hagadol 'atah verei'ekha hayoshebim lefanekha ki 'anshei mofet hemah ki hini meibi 'et 'abdi zemakh. ki hineh ha'eben 'asher natati lifnei yehoshua' 'al 'eben 'akhat shib'ah 'einayim hini mefateiakh pitukhah ne'um ihoh zeba'ot umashti 'et 'avon ha'arez hahi beyom 'ekhad. bayom hahu ne'um ihoh zeba'ot tiqre'u 'ish lerei'eihu 'el takhat gefen ve'el takhat te'einah. vayashab hamal'akh hadober bi vai'ireini ke'ish 'asher yei'or mishenato. vayomer 'eilai mah 'atah ro'eh vayomer va'omar ra'iti vehineh menorat zahab kulah vegulah 'al roshah veshib'ah neiroteha 'aleha shib'ah veshib'ah muzaqot laneirot 'asher 'al roshah. ushenayim zeitim 'aleha 'ekhad mimin hagulah ve'ekhad 'al semolah. va'a'an va'omar 'el hamal'akh hadober bi leimor mah 'eleh 'adoni. vaya'an hamal'akh hadober bi vayomer 'eilai halo yada'ta mah hemah 'eleh va'omar lo 'adoni. vaya'an vayomer 'eilai leimor zeh debar ihoh 'el zerubabel leimor lo bekhayil velo bekhoakh ki 'im berukhi 'amar ihoh zeba'ot. mi 'atah har hagadol lifnei zerubabel lemishor vehozi 'et ha'eben haroshah teshu'ot khen khen lah. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. yedei zerubabel yisedu habayit hazeh veyadav tebaza'nah veyada'ta ki ihoh zeba'ot shelakhani 'aleikhem. ki mi baz leyom qetanot vesamekhu vera'u 'et ha'eben habedil beyad zerubabel shib'ah 'eleh 'einei ihoh hemah meshotim bekhal ha'arez. va'a'an va'omar 'eilav mah shenei hazeitim ha'eileh 'al yemin hamenorah ve'al semolah. va'a'an sheinit va'omar 'eilav mah shetei shibalei hazeitim 'asher beyad shenei zanterot hazahab hamriqim mei'aleihem hazahab. vayomer 'eilai leimor halo yada'ta mah 'eleh va'omar lo 'adoni. vayomer 'eleh shenei benei hayizhar ha'omedim 'al 'adon kal ha'arez. va'ashub va'esa 'einai va'er'eh vehineh megilah 'afah. vayomer 'eilai mah 'atah ro'eh va'omar 'ani ro'eh megilah 'afah 'arekah 'esrim ba'amah verakhebah 'eser ba'amah. vayomer 'eilai zot ha'alah hayozet 'al penei khal ha'arez ki khal hagoneb mizeh kamoha niqah vekhal hanishba' mizeh kamoha niqah. hozeitiha ne'um ihoh zeba'ot uba'ah 'el bet haganab ve'el bet hanishba' bishmi lashaqer velaneh betokh beito vekhilatu ve'et 'eizav ve'et 'abanav. vayeizei hamal'akh hadober bi vayomer 'eilai sa na 'einekha ure'eh mah hayozet hazot. va'omar mah hi vayomer zot ha'eifah hayozet vayomer zot 'einam bekhal ha'arez. vehineh kikar 'oferet niset vezot 'ishah 'akhat yoshebet betokh ha'eifah. vayomer zot harish'ah vayashlekh 'otah 'el tokh ha'eifah vayashlekh 'et 'eben ha'oferet 'el piha. va'esa 'einai va'eire vehineh shetayim nashim yoz'ot veruakh bekhanfeihem velahenah khenafayim kekhanfei hakhasidah vatisenah 'et ha'eifah ben ha'arez uben hashamayim. va'omar 'el hamal'akh hadober bi 'anah hemah molikhot 'et ha'eifah. vayomer 'eilai libnot lah bayit be'erez shin'ar vehukhan vehunikhah sham 'al mekhunatah. va'ashub va'esa 'einai va'er'eh vehineh 'arba' markabot yoze'ot miben shenei heharim veheharim harei nekhoshet. bamerkabah harishonah susim 'adumim ubamerkabah hasheinit susim shekhorim. ubamerkabah hashelishit susim lebanim ubamerkabah harebi'it susim berudim 'amuzim. va'a'an va'omar 'el hamal'akh hadober bi mah 'eleh 'adoni. vaya'an hamal'akh vayomer 'eilai 'eleh 'arba' rukhot hashamayim yoz'ot meihityazeb 'al 'adon kal ha'arez. 'asher bah hasusim hashekhorim yoze'im 'el 'erez zafon vehalebanim yaze'u 'el 'akhareihem vehaberudim yaze'u 'el 'erez hateiman. veha'amuzim yaze'u vaybaqshu lalekhet lehithalekh ba'arez vayomer lekhu hithalekhu ba'arez vatithalakhnah ba'arez. vayaz'eq 'oti vaydaber 'eilai leimor re'eh hayoz'im 'el 'erez zafon heinikhu 'et rukhi be'erez zafon. vayhi debar ihoh 'eilai leimor. laqoakh mei'et hagolah meikheldai umei'et tobiyah umei'et yeda'yah ubata 'atah bayom hahu ubata bet yoshiyah ben zefanyah 'asher ba'u mibabel. velaqakhta khesef vezahab ve'asita 'atarot vesamta berosh yehoshua' ben yehozadaq hakohen hagadol. ve'amarta 'eilav leimor koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot leimor hineh 'ish zemakh shemo umitakhtav yizmakh ubanah 'et heikhal ihoh. vehu yibneh 'et heikhal ihoh vehu yisa hod veyashab umashal 'al kis'o vehayah khohen 'al kis'o va'azat shalom tihyeh ben sheneihem. veha'atarot tihyeh lekheilem uletobiyah velida'yah ulekhen ben zefanyah lezikaron beheikhal ihoh. urekhoqim yabo'u ubanu beheikhal ihoh vida'tem ki ihoh zeba'ot shelakhani 'aleikhem vehayah 'im shamoa' tishme'un beqol ihoh 'eloheikhem. vayhi bishnat 'arba' ledareyavesh hamelekh hayah debar ihoh 'el zekharyah be'arba'ah lakhodesh hateshi'i bekhislev. vayishlakh bet 'el sar 'ezer veregem melekh va'anashav lekhalot 'et penei ihoh. leimor 'el hakohanim 'asher lebet ihoh zeba'ot ve'el hanebi'im leimor ha'ebkeh bakhodesh hakhamishi hinazer ka'asher 'asiti zeh kameh shanim. vayhi debar ihoh zeba'ot 'eilai leimor. 'emor 'el kal 'am ha'arez ve'el hakohanim leimor ki zamtem vesafod bakhamishi ubashebi'i vezeh shib'im shanah hazom zamtuni 'ani. vekhi tokhelu vekhi tishtu halo 'atem ha'okhelim ve'atem hashotim. halo 'et hadebarim 'asher qara ihoh beyad hanebi'im harishonim bihyot yerushalim yoshebet usheleivah ve'areha sebiboteha vehanegeb vehashefeilah yosheb. vayhi debar ihoh 'el zekharyah leimor. koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot leimor mishpat 'emet shefotu vekhesed verakhamim 'asu 'ish 'et 'akhiv. ve'almanah veyatom ger ve'ani 'al ta'ashoqu vera'at 'ish 'akhiv 'al takhshebu bilbabkhem. vayma'anu lehaqshib vayitenu khatef soraret ve'azeneihem hikhbidu mishemoa'. velibam samu shamir mishemoa' 'et hatorah ve'et hadebarim 'asher shalakh ihoh zeba'ot berukho beyad hanebi'im harishonim vayhi qezef gadol mei'et ihoh zeba'ot. vayhi kha'asher qara velo shamei'u ken yiqre'u velo 'eshma' 'amar ihoh zeba'ot. ve'eisa'arem 'al kal hagoyim 'asher lo yeda'um veha'arez nashamah 'akhareihem mei'ober umishab vayasimu 'erez khemdah leshamah. vayhi debar ihoh zeba'ot leimor. koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot qineiti leziyon qin'ah gedolah vekheimah gedolah qineiti lah. koh 'amar ihoh beti 'el ziyon veshakhanti betokh yerushalim veniqre'ah yerushalim 'ir ha'emet vehar ihoh zeba'ot har haqodesh. koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'od yeishebu zeqeinim uzeqeinot birkhobot yerushalim ve'ish mish'anto beyado meirob yamim. urekhobot ha'ir yimale'u yeladim viladot mesakhaqim birkhoboteha. koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot ki yipalei be'einei she'eirit ha'am hazeh bayamim hahem gam be'einai yipalei ne'um ihoh zeba'ot. koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot hini moshia' 'et 'ami mei'erez mizrakh umei'erez mebo hashamesh. veheibeiti 'otam veshakhenu betokh yerushalim vehayu li le'am va'ani 'ehyeh lahem leilohim be'emet ubizdaqah. koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot tekhezaqnah yedeikhem hashome'im bayamim ha'eleh 'et hadebarim ha'eleh mipi hanebi'im 'asher beyom yusad bet ihoh zeba'ot haheikhal lehibanot. ki lifnei hayamim hahem sekhar ha'adam lo nihyah usekhar habeheimah 'einenah velayozei velaba 'en shalom min hazar va'ashalakh 'et kal ha'adam 'ish berei'eihu. ve'atah lo khayamim harishonim 'ani lish'eirit ha'am hazeh ne'um ihoh zeba'ot. ki zera' hashalom hagefen titen piryah veha'arez titen 'et yebulah vehashamayim yitenu talam vehinkhalti 'et she'eirit ha'am hazeh 'et kal 'eleh. vehayah ka'asher heyitem qelalah bagoyim bet yehudah ubet yisra'el ken 'oshia' 'etkhem vihyitem berakhah 'al tira'u tekhezaqnah yedeikhem. ki khoh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot ka'asher zamamti lehara' lakhem behaqzif 'aboteikhem 'oti 'amar ihoh zeba'ot velo nikhameti. ken shabti zamamti bayamim ha'eleh leheitib 'et yerushalim ve'et bet yehudah 'al tira'u. 'eleh hadebarim 'asher ta'asu daberu 'emet 'ish 'et rei'eihu 'emet umishpat shalom shiftu besha'areikhem. ve'ish 'et ra'at rei'eihu 'al takhshebu bilbabkhem ushebu'at sheqer 'al te'ehabu ki 'et kal 'eleh 'asher saneiti ne'um ihoh. vayhi debar ihoh zeba'ot 'eilai leimor. koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot zom harebi'i vezom hakhamishi vezom hashebi'i vezom ha'asiri yihyeh lebet yehudah lesason ulesimkhah ulemo'adim tobim veha'emet vehashalom 'ehabu. koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'od 'asher yabo'u 'amim veyoshebei 'arim rabot. vehalekhu yoshebei 'akhat 'el 'akhat leimor neilekhah halokh lekhalot 'et penei ihoh ulebaqesh 'et ihoh zeba'ot 'eilekhah gam 'ani. uba'u 'amim rabim vegoyim 'azumim lebaqesh 'et ihoh zeba'ot birushalim ulekhalot 'et penei ihoh. koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot bayamim hahemah 'asher yakhaziqu 'asarah 'anashim mikol leshonot hagoyim vehekheziqu bikhnaf 'ish yehudi leimor neilekhah 'imakhem ki shama'nu 'elohim 'imakhem. masa debar ihoh be'erez khadrakh vedameseq menukhato ki ihoh 'en 'adam vekhol shibtei yisra'el. vegam khamat tigbal bah zor vezidon ki khakhmah me'od. vatiben zor mazor lah vatizbar kesef ke'afar vekharuz ketit khuzot. hineh 'adonai yorishenah vehikah bayam kheilah vehi ba'esh tei'akhel. teire 'ashqelon vetira ve'azah vetakhil me'od ve'eqron ki hobish mebatah ve'abad melekh mei'azah ve'ashqelon lo teisheb. veyashab mamzer be'ashdod vehikhrati ge'on pelishtim. vahasiroti damav mipiv veshiquzav miben shinav venish'ar gam hu leiloheinu vehayah ke'aluf bihudah ve'eqron kibusi. vekhaniti lebeiti mizabah mei'ober umishab velo ya'abor 'aleihem 'od noges ki 'atah ra'iti be'einai. gili me'od bat ziyon hari'i bat yerushalim hineh malkekh yabo lakh zadiq venosha' hu 'ani verokheb 'al khamor ve'al 'ayir ben 'atonot. vehikhrati rekheb mei'efrayim vesus mirushalim venikhretah qeshet milkhamah vediber shalom lagoyim umashelo miyam 'ad yam uminahar 'ad 'afsei 'arez. gam 'at bedam beritekh shilakhti 'asirayikh mibor 'en mayim bo. ubu lebizaron 'asirei hatiqvah gam hayom magid mishneh 'ashib lakh. ki darakhti li yehudah qeshet mileiti 'efrayim ve'orarti banayikh ziyon 'al banayikh yavan vesamtikh kekhereb gibor. ihoh 'aleihem yeira'eh veyaza khabaraq khizo vadonai ihoh bashofar yitqa' vehalakh besa'arot teiman. ihoh zeba'ot yagen 'aleihem ve'akhelu vekhabeshu 'abnei qela' veshatu hamu kemo yayin umale'u kamizraq kezaviyot mizbeiakh. vehoshi'am ihoh 'eloheihem bayom hahu kezon 'amo ki 'abnei neizer mitnosot 'al 'admato. ki mah tubo umah yafeyo dagan bakhurim vetirosh yenobeb betulot. sha'alu ihoh matar be'et malqosh ihoh 'oseh
