khazizim umetar geshem yiten lahem le'ish 'eiseb basadeh. ki haterafim diberu 'aven vehaqosmim khazu sheqer vakhalomot hashav yedabeiru hebel yenakheimun 'al ken nase'u khemo zon ya'anu ki 'en ro'eh. 'al haro'im kharah 'api ve'al ha'atudim 'efqod ki faqad ihoh zeba'ot 'et 'edro 'et bet yehudah vesam 'otam kesus hodo bamilkhamah. mimenu finah mimenu yated mimenu qeshet milkhamah mimenu yeizei khal noges yakhdav. vehayu khegiborim bosim betit khuzot bamilkhamah venilkhamu ki ihoh 'imam vehobishu rokhebei susim. vegibarti 'et bet yehudah ve'et bet yosef 'oshia' vehoshebotim ki rikhamtim vehayu ka'asher lo zenakhtim ki 'ani ihoh 'eloheihem ve'e'enem. vehayu khegibor 'efrayim vesamakh libam kemo yayin ubeneihem yir'u vesameikhu yagel libam ihoh. 'eshreqah lahem va'aqabezem ki feditim verabu kemo rabu. ve'ezra'em ba'amim ubamerkhaqim yizkeruni vekhayu 'et beneihem vashabu. vahashibotim mei'erez mizrayim umei'ashur 'aqabezem ve'el 'erez gil'ad ulebanon 'abi'em velo yimazei lahem. ve'abar bayam zarah vehikah bayam galim vehobishu kol mezulot ye'or vehurad ge'on 'ashur vesheibet mizrayim yasur. vegibartim ihoh ubishmo yithalakhu ne'um ihoh. petakh lebanon delatekha vetokhal 'esh ba'arazekha. heilel berosh ki nafal 'erez 'asher 'adirim shudadu heililu 'alonei bashan ki yarad ya'ar habazur habazir. qol yilat haro'im ki shudedah 'adartam qol sha'agat kefirim ki shudad ge'on hayarden. koh 'amar ihoh 'elohai re'eh 'et zon hahareigah. 'asher qoneihen yahargun velo ye'shamu umokhereihen yomar barukh ihoh va'shir vero'eihem lo yakhmol 'aleihen. ki lo 'ekhmol 'od 'al yoshebei ha'arez ne'um ihoh vehineh 'anokhi mamzi 'et ha'adam 'ish beyad rei'eihu ubeyad malko vekhitetu 'et ha'arez velo 'azil miyadam. va'er'eh 'et zon hahareigah lakhen 'aniyei hazon va'eqakh li shenei maqlot le'akhad qarati no'am ule'akhad qarati khobelim va'er'eh 'et hazon. va'akhkhid 'et sheloshet haro'im beyerakh 'ekhad vatiqzar nafshi bahem vegam nafsham bakhalah bi. va'omar lo 'er'eh 'etkhem hameitah tamut vehanikhkhedet tikakhed vehanish'arot tokhalnah 'ishah 'et besar re'utah. va'eqakh 'et maqli 'et no'am va'egda' 'oto lehafer 'et beriti 'asher karati 'et kal ha'amim. vatufar bayom hahu vayeide'u khen 'aniyei hazon hashomerim 'oti ki debar ihoh hu. va'omar 'aleihem 'im tob be'eineikhem habu sekhari ve'im lo khadalu vayishqelu 'et sekhari sheloshim kasef. vayomer ihoh 'eilai hashlikheihu 'el hayozer 'eder hayqar 'asher yaqarti mei'aleihem va'eqkhah sheloshim hakesef va'ashlikh 'oto bet ihoh 'el hayozer. va'egda' 'et maqli hasheini 'et hakhobelim lehafer 'et ha'akhavah ben yehudah uben yisra'el. vayomer ihoh 'eilai 'od qakh lekha keli ro'eh 'evili. ki hineh 'anokhi meiqim ro'eh ba'arez hanikhkhadot lo yifqod hana'ar lo yebaqesh vehanishberet lo yerapei hanizabah lo yekhalkel ubesar haberi'ah yokhal ufarseihen yefareq. ho ro'i ha'elil 'ozebi hazon khereb 'al zero'o ve'al 'en yemino zero'o yabosh tibash ve'en yemino kahoh tikhheh. masa debar ihoh 'al yisra'el ne'um ihoh noteh shamayim veyosed 'arez veyozer ruakh 'adam beqirbo. hineh 'anokhi sam 'et yerushalim saf ra'al lekhal ha'amim sabib vegam 'al yehudah yihyeh bamazor 'al yerushalim. vehayah bayom hahu 'asim 'et yerushalim 'eben ma'amasah lekhal ha'amim kal 'omeseha sarot yisareitu vene'esfu 'aleha kol goyei ha'arez. bayom hahu ne'um ihoh 'akeh khal sus batimahon verokhebo bashiga'on ve'al bet yehudah 'efqakh 'et 'einai vekhol sus ha'amim 'akeh ba'ivaron. ve'ameru 'alufei yehudah belibam 'amzah li yoshebei yerushalim ihoh zeba'ot 'eloheihem. bayom hahu 'asim 'et 'alufei yehudah kekhiyor 'esh be'eizim ukhelapid 'esh be'amir ve'akhelu 'al yamin ve'al semol 'et kal ha'amim sabib veyashebah yerushalim 'od takhteha birushalim. vehoshia' ihoh 'et 'aholei yehudah barishonah lema'an lo tigdal tif'eret bet david vetif'eret yosheb yerushalim 'al yehudah. bayom hahu yagen ihoh be'ad yosheb yerushalim vehayah hanikhshal bahem bayom hahu kedavid ubet david keilohim kemal'akh ihoh lifneihem. vehayah bayom hahu 'abaqesh lehashmid 'et kal hagoyim haba'im 'al yerushalim. veshafakhti 'al bet david ve'al yosheb yerushalim ruakh khen vetakhanunim vehibitu 'eilai 'et 'asher daqaru vesafedu 'alav kemisped 'al hayakhid vehamer 'alav kehamer 'al habekhor. bayom hahu yigdal hamisped birushalim kemispad hadad rimon bebiq'at megidon. vesafedah ha'arez mishpakhot mishpakhot lebad mishpakhat bet david lebad unesheihem lebad mishpakhat bet natan lebad unesheihem lebad. mishpakhat bet leivi lebad unesheihem lebad mishpakhat hashim'i lebad unesheihem lebad. kol hamishpakhot hanish'arot mishpakhot mishpakhot lebad unesheihem lebad. bayom hahu yihyeh maqor niftakh lebet david uleyoshebei yerushalim lekhatat ulenidah. vehayah bayom hahu ne'um ihoh zeba'ot 'akhrit 'et shemot ha'azabim min ha'arez velo yizakheru 'od vegam 'et hanebi'im ve'et ruakh hatum'ah 'a'abir min ha'arez. vehayah ki yinabei 'ish 'od ve'ameru 'eilav 'abiv ve'imo yoledav lo tikhyeh ki sheqer dibarta beshem ihoh udeqaruhu 'abihu ve'imo yoledav behinabe'o. vehayah bayom hahu yeiboshu hanebi'im 'ish meikhezyono behinabe'oto velo yilbeshu 'aderet sei'ar lema'an kakhesh. ve'amar lo nabi 'anokhi 'ish 'obed 'adamah 'anokhi ki 'adam hiqnani mine'urai. ve'amar 'eilav mah hamakot ha'eleh ben yadekha ve'amar 'asher hukeiti bet me'ahabai. khereb 'uri 'al ro'i ve'al geber 'amiti ne'um ihoh zeba'ot hakh 'et haro'eh utefuzena hazon vahashiboti yadi 'al hazo'arim. vehayah bekhal ha'arez ne'um ihoh pi shenayim bah yikaretu yigva'u vehashelishit yivater bah. veheibeiti 'et hashelishit ba'esh uzeraftim kizrof 'et hakesef ubekhantim kibkhon 'et hazahab hu yiqra bishmi va'ani 'e'eneh 'oto 'amarti 'ami hu vehu yomar ihoh 'elohai. hineh yom ba ihoh vekhulaq shelalekh beqirbekh. ve'asafti 'et kal hagoyim 'el yerushalim lamilkhamah venilkedah ha'ir venashasu habatim vehanashim tishagalnah tishakhabnah veyaza khazi ha'ir bagolah veyeter ha'am lo yikaret min ha'ir. veyaza ihoh venilkham bagoyim hahem keyom hilakhamo beyom qerab. ve'amedu raglav bayom hahu 'al har hazeitim 'asher 'al penei yerushalim miqedem venibqa' har hazeitim meikhezyo mizrakhah vayamah gei gedolah me'od umash khazi hahar zafonah vekhezyo negbah. venastem gei harai ki yagia' gei harim 'el 'azal venastem ka'asher nastem mipenei hara'ash bimei 'uziyah melekh yehudah uba ihoh 'elohai kal qedoshim 'imakh. vehayah bayom hahu lo yihyeh 'or yeqarot yiqpe'un veqipa'on. vehayah yom 'ekhad hu yivada' ihoh lo yom velo layelah vehayah le'et 'ereb yihyeh 'or. vehayah bayom hahu yeize'u mayim khayim mirushalim khezyam 'el hayam haqadmoni vekhezyam 'el hayam ha'akharon baqayiz ubakhoref yihyeh. vehayah ihoh lemelekh 'al kal ha'arez bayom hahu yihyeh ihoh 'ekhad ushemo 'ekhad. yisob kal ha'arez ka'arabah migeba' lerimon negeb yerushalim vera'amah veyashebah takhteha lemisha'ar binyamin 'ad meqom sha'ar harishon 'ad sha'ar hapinim umigdal khanan'el 'ad yiqbei hamelekh. veyashebu bah vekheirem lo yihyeh 'od veyashebah yerushalim labetakh. vezot tihyeh hamageifah 'asher yigof ihoh 'et kal ha'amim 'asher zabe'u 'al yerushalim hameq besaro vehu 'omed 'al raglav ve'einav timaqnah bekhoreihen uleshono timaq befihem. vehayah bayom hahu tihyeh mehumat ihoh rabah bahem vehekheziqu 'ish yad rei'eihu ve'aletah yado 'al yad rei'eihu. vegam yehudah tilakhem birushalim ve'usaf khel kal hagoyim sabib zahab vakhesef ubegadim larob me'od. vekhen tihyeh mageifat hasus hapered hagamal vehakhamor vekhal habeheimah 'asher yihyeh bamakhanot hahemah kamageifah hazot. vehayah kal hanotar mikal hagoyim haba'im 'al yerushalim ve'alu midei shanah beshanah lehishtakhavot lemelekh ihoh zeba'ot velakhog 'et khag hasukot. vehayah 'asher lo ya'aleh mei'et mishpekhot ha'arez 'el yerushalim lehishtakhavot lemelekh ihoh zeba'ot velo 'aleihem yihyeh hagashem. ve'im mishpakhat mizrayim lo ta'aleh velo ba'ah velo 'aleihem tihyeh hamageifah 'asher yigof ihoh 'et hagoyim 'asher lo ya'alu lakhog 'et khag hasukot. zot tihyeh khatat mizrayim vekhatat kal hagoyim 'asher lo ya'alu lakhog 'et khag hasukot. bayom hahu yihyeh 'al mezilot hasus qodesh ihoh vehayah hasirot bebet ihoh kamizraqim lifnei hamizbeiakh. vehayah kal sir birushalim ubihudah qodesh ihoh zeba'ot uba'u kal hazobekhim velaqekhu meihem ubishelu bahem velo yihyeh khena'ani 'od bebet ihoh zeba'ot bayom hahu.

masa debar ihoh 'el yisra'el beyad mal'akhi. 'ahabti 'etkhem 'amar ihoh va'amartem bamah 'ahabtanu halo 'akh 'eisav leya'aqob ne'um ihoh va'ohab 'et ya'aqob. ve'et 'eisav saneiti va'asim 'et harav shemamah ve'et nakhalato letanot midbar. ki tomar 'edom rushashnu venashub venibneh khorabot koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot hemah yibnu va'ani 'eheros veqare'u lahem gebul rish'ah veha'am 'asher za'am ihoh 'ad 'olam. ve'eineikhem tir'enah ve'atem tomeru yigdal ihoh mei'al ligbul yisra'el. ben yekhabed 'ab ve'ebed 'adonav ve'im 'ab 'ani 'ayeh khebodi ve'im 'adonim 'ani 'ayeh mora'i 'amar ihoh zeba'ot lakhem hakohanim bozei shemi va'amartem bameh bazinu 'et shemekha. magishim 'al mizbekhi lekhem mego'al va'amartem bameh gei'alnukha be'emarekhem shulkhan ihoh nibzeh hu. vekhi tagishun 'iver lizboakh 'en ra' vekhi tagishu piseiakh vekholeh 'en ra' haqribeihu na lefekhatekha hayirzekha 'o hayisa fanekha 'amar ihoh zeba'ot. ve'atah khalu na fenei 'el vikhaneinu miyedkhem hayetah zot hayisa mikem panim 'amar ihoh zeba'ot. mi gam bakhem veyisgor delatayim velo ta'iru mizbekhi khinam 'en li kheifez bakhem 'amar ihoh zeba'ot uminkhah lo 'erzeh miyedkhem. ki mimizrakh shemesh ve'ad mebo'o gadol shemi bagoyim ubekhal maqom muqtar mugash lishmi uminkhah tehorah ki gadol shemi bagoyim 'amar ihoh zeba'ot. ve'atem mekhalelim 'oto be'emarekhem shulkhan 'adonai mego'al hu venibo nibzeh 'akhelo. va'amartem hineh matela'ah vehipakhtem 'oto 'amar ihoh zeba'ot vahabeitem gazul ve'et hapiseiakh ve'et hakholeh vahabeitem 'et haminkhah ha'erzeh 'otah miyedkhem 'amar ihoh. ve'arur nokhel veyesh be'edro zakhar venoder vezobeiakh mashekhat ladonai ki melekh gadol 'ani 'amar ihoh zeba'ot ushemi nora bagoyim. ve'atah 'aleikhem hamizvah hazot hakohanim. 'im lo tishme'u ve'im lo tasimu 'al leb latet kabod lishmi 'amar ihoh zeba'ot veshilakhti bakhem 'et hame'eirah ve'aroti 'et birkhoteikhem vegam 'arotiha ki 'einekhem samim 'al leb. hini go'er lakhem 'et hazera' vezeiriti feresh 'al peneikhem peresh khageikhem venasa 'etkhem 'eilav. vida'tem ki shilakhti 'aleikhem 'et hamizvah hazot lihyot beriti 'et leivi 'amar ihoh zeba'ot. beriti hayetah 'ito hakhayim vehashalom va'etenem lo mora vayira'eini umipenei shemi nikhat hu. torat 'emet hayetah befihu ve'avlah lo nimza bisfatav beshalom ubemishor halakh 'iti verabim heishib mei'avon. ki siftei khohen yishmeru da'at vetorah yebaqshu mipihu ki mal'akh ihoh zeba'ot hu. ve'atem sartem min haderekh hikhshaltem rabim batorah shikhatem berit haleivi 'amar ihoh zeba'ot. vegam 'ani natati 'etkhem nibzim ushefalim lekhal ha'am kefi 'asher 'einekhem shomerim 'et derakhai venose'im panim batorah. halo 'ab 'ekhad lekhulanu halo 'el 'ekhad bera'anu madua' nibgad 'ish be'akhiv lekhalel berit 'aboteinu. bagedah yehudah veto'eibah ne'estah beyisra'el ubirushalim ki khilel yehudah qodesh ihoh 'asher 'aheb uba'al bat 'el neikhar. yakhret ihoh la'ish 'asher ya'asenah 'er ve'oneh mei'aholei ya'aqob umagish minkhah ihoh zeba'ot. vezot sheinit ta'asu kasot dim'ah 'et mizbakh ihoh bekhi va'anaqah mei'en 'od penot 'el haminkhah velaqakhat razon miyedkhem. va'amartem 'al mah 'al ki ihoh hei'id beinekha uben 'eishet ne'urekha 'asher 'atah bagadtah bah vehi khabertekha ve'eishet beritekha. velo 'ekhad 'asah ushe'ar ruakh lo umah ha'ekhad mebaqesh zera' 'elohim venishmartem berukhakhem ube'eishet ne'urekha 'al yibgod. ki sanei shalakh 'amar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el vekhisah khamas 'al lebusho 'amar ihoh zeba'ot venishmartem berukhakhem velo tibgodu. hoga'tem ihoh bedibreikhem va'amartem bamah hoga'enu be'emarekhem kal 'oseh ra' tob be'einei ihoh ubahem hu khafez 'o 'ayeh 'elohei hamishpat. hini sholeiakh mal'akhi ufinah derekh lefanai ufit'om yabo 'el heikhalo ha'adon 'asher 'atem mebaqshim umal'akh haberit 'asher 'atem khafeizim hineh ba 'amar ihoh zeba'ot. umi mekhalkel 'et yom bo'o umi ha'omed beheira'oto ki hu ke'esh mezaref ukheborit mekhabesim. veyashab mezaref umetaher kesef vetihar 'et benei leivi veziqaq 'otam kazahab vekhakasef vehayu ihoh magishei minkhah bizdaqah. ve'arebah ihoh minkhat yehudah virushalim kimei 'olam ukheshanim qadmoniyot. veqarabti 'aleikhem lamishpat vehayiti 'ed memaher bamkhashefim ubamna'afim ubanishba'im lashaqer ube'osheqei sekharsa khir 'almanah veyatom umatei ger velo yerei'uni 'amar ihoh zeba'ot. ki 'ani ihoh lo shaniti ve'atem benei ya'aqob lo khelitem. lemimei 'aboteikhem sartem meikhuqai velo shemartem shubu 'eilai ve'ashubah 'aleikhem 'amar ihoh zeba'ot va'amartem bameh nashub. hayiqba' 'adam 'elohim ki 'atem qobe'im 'oti va'amartem bameh qeba'anukha hama'aser vehaterumah. bame'eirah 'atem nei'arim ve'oti 'atem qobe'im hago kulo. habi'u 'et kal hama'aser 'el bet ha'ozar vihi teref bebeiti ubekhanuni na bazot 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'im lo 'eftakh lakhem 'et 'arubot hashamayim vahariqoti lakhem berakhah 'ad beli dai. vega'arti lakhem ba'okhel velo yashkhit lakhem 'et peri ha'adamah velo teshakel lakhem hagefen basadeh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot. ve'isheru 'etkhem kal hagoyim ki tihyu 'atem 'erez kheifez 'amar ihoh zeba'ot. khazequ 'alai dibreikhem 'amar ihoh va'amartem mah nidbarnu 'alekha. 'amartem shav 'abod 'elohim umah beza' ki shamarnu mishmarto vekhi halakhnu qedoranit mipenei ihoh zeba'ot. ve'atah 'anakhnu me'asherim zeidim gam nibnu 'osei rish'ah gam bakhanu 'elohim vayimaleitu. 'az nidberu yir'ei ihoh 'ish 'et rei'eihu vayaqsheb ihoh vayishma' vayikateb seifer zikaron lefanav leyir'ei ihoh ulekhoshebei shemo. vehayu li 'amar ihoh zeba'ot layom 'asher 'ani 'oseh segulah vekhamalti 'aleihem ka'asher yakhmol 'ish 'al beno ha'obed 'oto. veshabtem ure'item ben zadiq lerasha' ben 'obed 'elohim la'asher lo 'abado. ki hineh hayom ba bo'er katanur vehayu khal zeidim vekhal 'oseh rish'ah qash velihat 'otam hayom haba 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'asher lo ya'azob lahem shoresh ve'anaf. vezarekhah lakhem yir'ei shemi shemesh zedaqah umarpei bikhnafeha vizatem ufishtem ke'eglei marbeq. ve'asotem resha'im ki yihyu 'eifer takhat kapot ragleikhem bayom 'asher 'ani 'oseh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot. zikhru torat mosheh 'abdi 'asher ziviti 'oto bekhoreb 'al kal yisra'el khuqim umishpatim. hineh 'anokhi sholeiakh lakhem 'et 'eiliyah hanabi lifnei bo yom ihoh hagadol vehanora. veheishib leb 'abot 'al banim veleb banim 'al 'abotam pen 'abo vehikeiti 'et ha'arez kheirem.

'ashrei ha'ish 'asher lo halakh ba'azat resha'im ubederekh khata'im lo 'amad ubemoshab leizim lo yashab. ki 'im betorat ihoh khefzo ubetorato yehgeh yomam valayelah. vehayah ke'ez shatul 'al palgei mayim 'asher piryo yiten be'ito ve'aleihu lo yibol vekhol 'asher ya'aseh yazliakh. lo khen haresha'im ki 'im kamoz 'asher tidefenu ruakh. 'al ken lo yaqumu resha'im bamishpat vekhata'im ba'adat zadiqim. ki yodeia' ihoh derekh zadiqim vederekh resha'im tobed. lamah rageshu goyim ule'umim yehgu riq. yityazebu malkhei 'erez veroznim nosdu yakhad 'al ihoh ve'al meshikho. nenateqah 'et mosroteimo venashlikhah mimenu 'aboteimo. yosheb bashamayim yiskhaq 'adonai yil'ag lamo. 'az yedaber 'eileimo be'apo ubakharono yebahaleimo. va'ani nasakhti malki 'al ziyon har qadshi 'asaperah 'el khoq ihoh 'amar 'eilai beni 'atah 'ani hayom yelidtikha. she'al mimeni ve'etenah goyim nakhalatekha va'akhuzatekha 'afsei 'arez. tero'em besheibet barzel kikhli yozer tenapezem. ve'atah melakhim haskilu hivaseru shofetei 'arez. 'ibdu 'et ihoh beyir'ah vegilu bir'adah. nashequ bar pen ye'enaf vetobedu derekh ki yib'ar kim'at 'apo 'ashrei kal khosei bo. mizmor ledavid bebarekho mipenei 'abshalom beno. ihoh mah rabu zarai rabim qamim 'alai. rabim 'omerim lenafshi 'en yeshu'atah lo beilohim selah. ve'atah ihoh magen ba'adi kebodi umeirim roshi. qoli 'el ihoh 'eqra vaya'aneini meihar qadesho selah. 'ani shakhabti va'ishanah heqizoti ki ihoh yismekheini. lo 'ira meiribbot 'am 'asher sabib shatu 'alai. qumah ihoh hoshi'eini 'elohai ki hikita 'et kal 'oyebai lekhi shinei resha'im shibarta. ihoh hayshu'ah 'al 'amekha birkhatekha selah. lamnazeiakh binginot mizmor ledavid. beqare'i 'aneini 'elohei zidqi bazar hirkhabta li khaneini ushema' tefilati. benei 'ish 'ad meh khebodi likhlimah te'ehabun riq tebaqshu khazab selah. ude'u ki hiflah ihoh khasid lo ihoh yishma' beqare'i 'eilav. rigzu ve'al tekheta'u 'imru bilbabkhem 'al mishkabkhem vedomu selah. zibkhu zibkhei zedeq ubitkhu 'el ihoh. rabim 'omerim mi yar'einu tob nesah 'aleinu 'or panekha ihoh. natatah simkhah belibi mei'et deganam vetirosham rabu. beshalom yakhdav 'eshkebah ve'ishan ki 'atah ihoh lebadad labetakh toshibeini. lamnazeiakh 'el hanekhilot mizmor ledavid. 'amarai ha'azinah ihoh binah hagigi. haqshibah leqol shav'i malki veilohai ki 'eilekha 'etpalal. ihoh boqer tishma' qoli boqer 'e'erakh lekha va'azapeh. ki lo 'el khafez resha' 'atah lo yegurkha ra'. lo yityazebu holim leneged 'einekha neita kal po'alei 'aven. te'abed doberei khazab 'ish damim umirmah yeta'eb ihoh. va'ani berob khasdekha 'abo beitekha 'eshtakhaveh 'el heikhal qadshekha beyir'atekha. ihoh nekheini bezidqatekha lema'an shorrai hoshar hayshar lefanai darkekha. ki 'en befihu nekhonah qirbam havot qeber patuakh geronam leshonam yakhaliqun. ha'ashimem 'elohim yipelu mimo'azoteihem berob pish'eihem hadikheimo ki maru bakh. veyismekhu khal khosei bakh le'olam yeraneinu vetasekh 'aleimo veya'lezu bekha 'ohabei shemekha. ki 'atah tebarekh zadiq ihoh kazinah razon ta'terenu. lamnazeiakh binginot 'al hasheminit mizmor ledavid. ihoh 'al be'apekha tokhikheini ve'al bakhamatekha teyasereini. khaneini ihoh ki 'umlal 'ani refa'eini ihoh ki nibhalu 'azamai. venafshi nibhalah me'od ve'at ve'atah ihoh 'ad matai. shubah ihoh khalezah nafshi hoshi'eini lema'an khasdekha. ki 'en bamavet zikhrekha bish'ol mi yodeh lakh. yaga'ti be'ankhati 'askheh bekhal laylah mitati bedim'ati 'arsi 'amseh. 'asheshah mika'as 'eini 'ateqah bekhal zorrai. suru mimeni kal po'alei 'aven ki shama' ihoh qol bikhyi. shama' ihoh tekhinati ihoh tefilati yiqakh. yeiboshu veyibahalu me'od kal 'oyebai yashubu yeiboshu raga'. shigayon ledavid 'asher shar ihoh 'al dibrei khush ben yemini. ihoh 'elohai bekha khasiti hoshi'eini mikal rodefai vehazileini. pen yitrof ke'aryeh nafshi poreq ve'en mazil. ihoh 'elohai 'im 'asiti zot 'im yesh 'avel bekhapai. 'im gamalti sholmi ra' va'akhalezah zorri reiqam. yiradof 'oyeb nafshi veyaseg veyirmos la'arez khayai ukhebodi le'afar yashken selah. qumah ihoh be'apekha hinasei be'abrot zorrai ve'urah 'eilai mishpat zivita. va'adat le'umim tesobbeka ve'aleha lamarom shubah. ihoh yadin 'amim shafeteini ihoh kezidqi ukhetumi 'alai. yigmar na ra' resha'im utekhonen zadiq ubokhen libot ukhelayot 'elohim zadiq. magini 'al 'elohim moshia' yishrei leb. 'elohim shofet zadiq ve'el zo'em bekhal yom. 'im lo yashub kharbo yiltosh qashto darakh vaykhoneha. velo heikhin kelei mavet khizav ledoleqim yif'al. hineh yekhabel 'aven veharah 'amal veyalad shaqer. bor karah vayakhpereihu vayipol beshakhat yif'al. yashub 'amalo berosho ve'al qadeqodo khamaso yeired. 'odeh ihoh kezidqo va'azamerah shem ihoh 'elyon. lamnazeiakh 'al hagitit mizmor ledavid. ihoh 'adoneinu mah 'adir mekha bekhal ha'arez 'asher tenah hodkha 'al hashamayim. mipi 'olim veyoneqim yisadta 'oz lema'an zorrekha lehashbit 'oyeb umitnaqem. ki 'er'eh mekha ma'asei 'ezbe'otekha yareiakh vekhokhabim 'asher konanetah. mah 'enosh ki tizkerenu uben 'adam ki tifqedenu. vatekhasereihu me'at mei'elohim vekhabod vehadar te'atereihu. tamshileihu bema'asei yadekha kol shatah takhat raglav. zoneh va'alafim kulam vegam bahamot sadai. zipor mayim udegei hayam 'ober 'arekhot yamim. ihoh 'adoneinu mah 'adir mekha bekhal ha'arez. lamnazeiakh 'almut laben mizmor ledavid. 'odeh ihoh bekhal libi 'asaperah kal nifle'otekha. 'esmekhah ve'e'elzah bakh 'azamerah shimkha 'elyon. beshub 'oybai 'akhor yikashelu veyobedu mipanekha. ki 'asita mishpati vedini yashabta lekhisei shofet zedeq. ga'arta goyim 'ibadta rasha' shemam makhita le'olam va'ed. ha'oyeb tamu khorabot lanezakh ve'arim natashta 'abad zikhram hemah. ihoh le'olam yeisheb konen lamishpat kis'o. vehu yishpot teibel bezedeq yadin le'umim bemeisharim. vihi ihoh misgab ladakh misgab le'itot bazarah. veyibtekhu bekha yod'ei shemekha ki lo 'azabta doreshekha ihoh. zameru ihoh yosheb ziyon hagidu ba'amim 'alilotav. ki doresh damim 'otam zakhar losha khakh za'aqat 'aniyim 'anavim. khaneneini ihoh re'eh 'aneyi misone'ai meromi misha'arei mavet. lema'an 'asaperah kal tehilatekha besha'arei bat ziyon 'agilah bishu'atekha. tabe'u goyim beshakhat 'asu bereshet zu tamanu nilkedah raglam. noda' ihoh mishpat 'asah befo'al kapav noqesh rasha' higayon selah. yashubu resha'im lish'olah kal goyim shekheikhei 'elohim. ki lo lanezakh yishakhakh 'ebyon tiqvat 'anavim 'aniyim tobad la'ad. qumah ihoh 'al ya'oz 'enosh yishafetu goyim 'al panekha. shitah ihoh morah lahem yeide'u goyim 'enosh hemah selah. lamah ihoh ta'amod berakhoq ta'lim le'itot bazarah. bega'avat rasha' yidlaq 'ani yitafesu bimzimot zu khashabu. ki hilel rasha' 'al ta'avat nafsho ubozeia' beirekh ni'ez ihoh. rasha' kegobah 'apo bal yidrosh 'en 'elohim kal mezimotav. yakhilu darekv derakhav bekhal 'et marom mishpatekha minegdo kal zorrav yafiakh bahem. 'amar belibo bal 'emot ledor vador 'asher lo bera'. 'alah pihu malei umirmot vatokh takhat leshono 'amal va'aven. yeisheb bema'rab khazeirim bamistarim yaharog naqi 'einav lekheilekhah yizponu. ye'erob bamistar ke'aryeh besukoh ye'erob lakhatof 'ani yakhtof 'ani bemashekho berishto. vadakhah yidkeh yashoakh venafal ba'azumav khelka'im khel ka'im. 'amar belibo shakhakh 'el histir panav bal ra'ah lanezakh. qumah ihoh 'el nesa yadekha 'al tishkakh 'aniyim 'anavim. 'al meh ni'ez rasha' 'elohim 'amar belibo lo tidrosh. ra'itah ki 'atah 'amal vakha'as tabit latet beyadekha 'alekha ya'azob kheilekhah yatom 'atah hayita 'ozer. bor zeroa' rasha' vara' tidrosh rish'o bal timza. ihoh melekh 'olam va'ed 'abedu goyim mei'arzo. ta'avat 'anavim shama'ta ihoh takhin libam taqshib 'azenekha. lishpot yatom vadakh bal yosif 'od la'aroz 'enosh min ha'arez. lamnazeiakh ledavid ihoh khasiti 'ekh tomeru lenafshi nudu nudi harkhem zipor. ki hineh haresha'im yidrekhun qeshet konu khizam 'al yeter lirot bemo 'ofel leyishrei leb. ki hashatot yeihareisun zadiq mah pa'al. ihoh beheikhal qadesho ihoh bashamayim kis'o 'einav yekhezu 'af'apav yibkhanu benei 'adam. ihoh zadiq yibkhan verasha' ve'oheb khamas sane'ah nafsho. yamter 'al resha'im pakhim 'esh vegaferit veruakh zil'afot menat kosam. ki zadiq ihoh zedaqot 'aheb yashar yekhezu faneimo. lamnazeiakh 'al hasheminit mizmor ledavid. hoshi'ah ihoh ki gamar khasid ki fasu 'emunim mibenei 'adam. shav yedaberu 'ish 'et rei'eihu sefat khalaqot beleb valeb yedabeiru. yakhret ihoh kal siftei khalaqot lashon medaberet gedolot. 'asher 'ameru lilshoneinu nagbir sefateinu 'itanu mi 'adon lanu. mishod 'aniyim mei'anqat 'ebyonim 'atah 'aqum yomar ihoh 'ashit beyeisha' yafiakh lo. 'imarot ihoh 'amarot tehorot kesef zaruf ba'alil la'arez mezuqaq shib'atayim. 'atah ihoh tishmerem tizerenu min hador zu le'olam. sabib resha'im yithalakhun kerum zulut libnei 'adam. lamnazeiakh mizmor ledavid. 'ad 'anah ihoh tishkakheini nezakh 'ad 'anah tastir 'et panekha mimeni. 'ad 'anah 'ashit 'eizot benafshi yagon bilbabi yomam 'ad 'anah yarum 'oyebi 'alai. habitah 'aneini ihoh 'elohai ha'irah 'einai pen 'ishan hamavet. pen yomar 'oyebi yekhaletiv zarai yagilu ki 'emot. va'ani bekhasdekha batakhti yagel libi bishu'atekha 'ashirah ihoh ki gamal 'alai. lamnazeiakh ledavid 'amar nabal belibo 'en 'elohim hishkhitu hit'ibu 'alilah 'en 'oseh tob. ihoh mishamayim hishqif 'al benei 'adam lir'ot hayesh maskil doresh 'et 'elohim. hakol sar yakhdav ne'elakhu 'en 'oseh tob 'en gam 'ekhad. halo yade'u kal po'alei 'aven 'okhelei 'ami 'akhelu lekhem ihoh lo qara'u. sham pakhadu fakhad ki 'elohim bedor zadiq. 'azat 'ani tabishu ki ihoh makhseihu. mi yiten miziyon yeshu'at yisra'el beshub ihoh shebut 'amo yagel ya'aqob yismakh yisra'el mizmor ledavid ihoh mi yagur be'aholekha mi yishkon behar qadshekha holekh tamim ufo'el zedeq vedober 'emet bilbabo. lo ragal 'al leshono lo 'asah lerei'eihu ra'ah vekherpah lo nasa 'al qerobo. nibzeh be'einav nim'as ve'et yir'ei ihoh yekhabed nishba' lehara' velo yamir. kaspo lo natan beneshekh veshokhad 'al naqi lo laqakh 'oseh 'eleh lo yimot le'olam. mikhtam ledavid shamereini 'el ki khasiti bakh. 'amart ihoh 'adonai 'atah tobati bal 'alekha. liqdoshim 'asher ba'arez hemah ve'adirei kal khefzi bam. yirbu 'azebotam 'akher maharu bal 'asikh niskeihem midam ubal 'esa 'etosh motam 'al sefatai. ihoh menat khelqi vekhosi 'atah tomikh gorali. khabalim nafelu li bane'imim 'af nakhalat shaferah 'alai. 'abarekh 'et ihoh 'asher ye'azani 'af leilot yiseruni khilyotai. shiviti ihoh lenegdi tamid ki mimini bal 'emot. lakhen samakh libi vayagel kebodi 'af besari yishkon labetakh. ki lo ta'azob nafshi lish'ol lo titen khasidekha lir'ot shakhat todi'eini 'orakh khayim soba' makhot 'et panekha ne'imot biminekha nezakh. tefilah ledavid shim'ah ihoh zedeq haqshibah rinati ha'azinah tefilati belo siftei mirmah. milefanekha mishpati yeizei 'einekha tekhezenah meisharim. bakhanta libi paqadta laylah zeraftani bal timza zamoti bal ya'abar pi. lif'ulot 'adam bidbar sefatekha 'ani marti 'arekhot pariz. tamokh 'ashurai bema'gelotekha bal namotu fe'amai. 'ani qeratikha khi ta'aneini 'el hat 'azenekha li shema' 'imrati. hafleh khasadekha moshia' khosim mimitqomim biminekha. mereini ke'ishon bat 'ayin bezel kenafekha tastireini. mipenei resha'im zu shaduni 'oyebai benefesh yaqifu 'alai. khelbamo sageru pimo diberu begei'ut. 'ashureinu 'atah sebabuni sebabunu 'eineihem yashitu lintot ba'arez. dimyono ke'aryeh yikhsof litrof vekhikhfir yosheb bemistarim. qumah ihoh qademah fanav hakhri'eihu paletah nafshi meirasha' kharbekha. mimtim yadekha ihoh mimtim meikheled khelqam bakhayim uzefinekha uzefunekha temalei bitnam yisbe'u banim vehinikhu yitram le'oleihem. 'ani bezedeq 'ekhezeh fanekha 'esbe'ah behaqiz temunatekha. lamnazeiakh le'ebed ihoh ledavid 'asher diber ihoh 'et dibrei hashirah hazot beyom hizil ihoh 'oto mikaf kal 'oyebav umiyad sha'ul. vayomar 'erkhamekha ihoh khizqi. ihoh sal'i umezudati umefalti 'eili zuri 'ekheseh bo magini veqeren yish'i misgabi. mehulal 'eqra ihoh umin 'oyebai 'ivasheia'. 'afafuni kheblei mavet venakhalei beliya'al yeba'atuni. kheblei she'ol sebabuni qidemuni moqshei mavet. bazar li 'eqra ihoh ve'el 'elohai 'ashaveia' yishma' meiheikhalo qoli veshav'ati lefanav tabo be'azenav. vatig'ash vatir'ash ha'arez umosdei harim yirgazu vayitga'ashu ki kharah lo. 'alah 'ashan be'apo ve'esh mipiv tokhel gekhalim ba'aru mimenu. vayet mayim vayeirad va'arafel takhat raglav. vayirkab 'al kerub vaya'of vayeide 'al kanfei ruakh. yashet khoshekh sitro sebibotav sukato kheshkhat mayim 'abei shekhaqim. minogah negdo 'abav 'aberu barad vegakhalei 'esh. vayar'em bashamayim ihoh ve'elyon yiten qolo barad vegakhalei 'esh. vayishlakh khizav vayfizem uberaqim rab vayhumem. vayeira'u 'afiqei mayim vayigalu mosdot teibel miga'aratekha ihoh minishmat ruakh 'apekha. yishlakh mimarom yiqakheini yamsheini mimayim rabim. yazileini mei'oyebi 'az umisone'ai ki 'amezu mimeni. yeqademuni beyom 'eidi vayhi ihoh lemish'an li. vayozi'eini lamerkhab yekhalezeini ki khafez bi. yigmeleini ihoh kezidqi kebor yadai yashib li. kisha marti darkhei ihoh velo rasha'ti mei'elohai. ki khal mishpatav lenegdi vekhuqotav lo 'asir meni. va'ehi tamim 'imo va'eshtamer mei'avoni. vayasheb ihoh li khezidqi kebor yadai leneged 'einav. 'im khasid titkhasad 'im gebar tamim titamam. 'im nabar titbarar ve'im 'iqesh titpatal. ki 'atah 'am 'ani toshia' ve'einayim ramot tashpil. ki 'atah ta'ir neiri ihoh 'elohai yagiah khasheki. ki bekha 'aruz gedud ubeilohai 'adaleg shur. ha'el tamim darko 'imrat ihoh zerufah magen hu lekhol hakhosim bo. ki mi 'eloah mibal'adei ihoh umi zur zulati 'eloheinu. ha'el ham'azereini khayil vayiten tamim darki. meshaveh raglai ka'ayalot ve'al bamotai ya'amideini. melamed yadai lamilkhamah venikhatah qeshet nekhushah zero'otai. vatiten li magen yish'ekha viminekha tis'adeini ve'anvatkha tarbeini. tarkhib za'adi takhtai velo ma'adu qarsulai. 'erdof 'oybai ve'asigem velo 'ashub 'ad kalotam. 'emkhazem velo yukhlu qum yipelu takhat raglai. vate'azereini khayil lamilkhamah takhria' qamai takhtai. ve'oyebai natatah li 'oref umesan'ai 'azmitem. yeshave'u ve'en moshia' 'al ihoh velo 'anam. ve'eshkhaqem ke'afar 'al penei ruakh ketit khuzot 'ariqem. tefaleteini meiribei 'am tesimeini lerosh goyim 'am lo yada'ti ya'abduni. lesheima' 'ozen yishame'u li benei neikhar yekhakhashu li. benei neikhar yibolu veyakhregu mimisgeroteihem. khai ihoh ubarukh zuri veyarum 'elohei yish'i. ha'el hanoten neqamot li vayadber 'amim takhtai. mefaleti mei'oyebai 'af min qamai teromeini mei'ish khamas tazileini. 'al ken 'odkha bagoyim ihoh uleshimkha 'azameirah. migdol magdil yeshu'ot malko ve'oseh khesed limshikho ledavid ulezar'o 'ad 'olam. lamnazeiakh mizmor ledavid. hashamayim mesaperim kebod 'el uma'aseh yadav magid haraqia'. yom leyom yabia' 'omer velaylah lelaylah yekhaveh da'at. 'en 'omer ve'en debarim beli nishma' qolam. bekhal ha'arez yaza qavam ubiqzeh teibel mileihem lashemesh sam 'ohel bahem. vehu kekhatan yozei meikhupato yasis kegibor laruz 'orakh. miqzeh hashamayim moza'o utequfato 'al qezotam ve'en nistar meikhamato torat ihoh temimah meshibat nafesh 'eidut ihoh ne'emanah makhkimat peti. piqudei ihoh yesharim mesamekhei leb mizvat ihoh barah me'irat 'einayim. yir'at ihoh tehorah 'omedet la'ad mishpetei ihoh 'emet zadequ yakhdav. hanekhemadim mizahab umipaz rab umetuqim midebash venofet zufim. gam 'abdekha nizhar bahem beshameram 'eiqeb rab. shegi'ot mi yabin ministarot naqeini. gam mizeidim khasokh 'abdekha 'al yimshelu bi 'az 'eitam veniqeiti mipesha' rab. yihyu lerazon 'imrei fi vehegyon libi lefanekha ihoh zuri vego'ali. lamnazeiakh mizmor ledavid. ya'ankha ihoh beyom zarah yesagebkha shem 'elohei ya'aqob. yishlakh 'ezrekha miqodesh umiziyon yis'adeka. yizkor kal minkhotekha ve'olatekha yedasheneh selah. yiten lekha khilbabekha vekhal 'azatekha yemalei. neranenah bishu'atekha ubeshem 'eloheinu nidgol yemalei ihoh kal mish'alotekha. 'atah yada'ti ki hoshia' ihoh meshikho ya'aneihu mishemei qadesho bigburot yeisha' yemino. 'eleh barekheb ve'eleh basusim va'anakhnu beshem ihoh 'eloheinu nazkir. hemah kare'u venafalu va'anakhnu qamnu vanit'odad. ihoh hoshi'ah hamelekh ya'aneinu beyom qare'einu. lamnazeiakh mizmor ledavid. ihoh be'azekha yismakh melekh ubishu'atekha mah yagel me'od. ta'avat libo natatah lo va'areshet fatav bal mana'ta selah. ki teqademenu birkhot tob tashit lerosho 'ateret paz. khayim sha'al mimekha natatah lo 'orekh yamim 'olam va'ed. gadol kebodo bishu'atekha hod vehadar teshaveh 'alav. ki teshiteihu berakhot la'ad tekhadeihu besimkhah 'et panekha. ki hamelekh boteiakh ihoh ubekhesed 'elyon bal yimot. timza yadekha lekhal 'oyebekha yeminekha timza sone'ekha. teshiteimo ketanur 'esh le'et panekha ihoh be'apo yebale'em vetokhelem 'esh. piryamo mei'erez te'abed vezar'am mibenei 'adam. ki natu 'alekha ra'ah khashebu mezimah bal yukhalu. ki teshiteimo shekhem bemeitarekha tekhonen 'al peneihem. rumah ihoh be'uzekha nashirah unezamerah geburatekha. lamnazeiakh 'al 'ayelet hashakhar mizmor ledavid. 'eili 'eili lamah 'azabtani rakhoq mishu'ati dibrei sha'agati. 'elohai 'eqra yomam velo ta'aneh velaylah velo dumiyah li. ve'atah qadosh yosheb tehilot yisra'el. bekha batekhu 'aboteinu batekhu vatefaleteimo. 'eilekha za'aqu venimlatu bekha batekhu velo boshu. ve'anokhi tola'at velo 'ish kherpat 'adam ubezui 'am. kal ro'ai yal'igu li yaftiru besafah yani'u rosh. gol 'el ihoh yefaleteihu yazileihu ki khafez bo. ki 'atah gokhi mibaten mabtikhi 'al shedei 'imi. 'alekha hashelakhti meirakhem mibeten 'imi 'eili 'atah. 'al tirkhaq mimeni ki zarah qerobah ki 'en 'ozer. sebabuni parim rabim 'abirei bashan kiteruni. pazu 'alai pihem 'aryeh toref vesho'eg. kamayim nishpakhti vehitparedu kal 'azmotai hayah libi kadonag names betokh mei'ai. yabesh kakheres kokhi uleshoni mudbaq malqokhai vela'afar mavet tishpeteini. ki sebabuni kelabim 'adat merei'im hiqifuni ka'ari yadai veraglai. 'asaper kal 'azmotai hemah yabitu yir'u bi. yekhalequ begadai lahem ve'al lebushi yapilu goral. ve'atah ihoh 'al tirkhaq 'eyaluti le'ezrati khushah. hazilah meikhereb nafshi miyad keleb yekhidati. hoshi'eini mipi 'aryeh umiqarnei reimim 'anitani. 'asaperah shimkha le'ekhai betokh qahal 'ahaleka. yir'ei ihoh haluhu kal zera' ya'aqob kabeduhu veguru mimenu kal zera' yisra'el. ki lo bazah velo shiqaz 'enut 'ani velo histir panav mimenu ubeshave'o 'eilav shameia'. mei'itekha tehilati beqahal rab nedarai 'ashalem neged yerei'av. yokhelu 'anavim veyisba'u yehalu ihoh doreshav yekhi lebabkhem la'ad. yizkeru veyashubu 'el ihoh kal 'afsei 'arez veyishtakhavu lefanekha kal mishpekhot goyim. ki ihoh hamelukhah umoshel bagoyim. 'akhelu vayishtakhavu kal dishnei 'erez lefanav yikhre'u kal yordei 'afar venafsho lo khiyah. zera' ya'abdenu yesupar ladonai lador. yabo'u veyagidu zidqato le'am nolad ki 'asah. mizmor ledavid ihoh ro'i lo 'ekhsar. bin'ot deshe yarbizeini 'al mei menukhot yenahaleini. nafshi yeshobeb yankheini bema'gelei zedeq lema'an shemo. gam ki 'eilekh begei zalmavet lo 'ira ra' ki 'atah 'imadi shibtekha umish'antekha hemah yenakhamuni. ta'arokh lefanai shulkhan neged zorerai dishanta bashemen roshi kosi revayah. 'akh tob vakhesed yirdefuni kal yemei khayai veshabti bebet ihoh le'orekh yamim. ledavid mizmor ihoh ha'arez umelo'ah teibel veyoshebei bah. ki hu 'al yamim yesadah ve'al neharot yekhoneha. mi ya'aleh behar ihoh umi yaqum bimqom qadesho. neqi khapayim ubar leibab 'asher lo nasa lashav nafshi velo nishba' lemirmah. yisa berakhah mei'et ihoh uzedaqah mei'elohei yish'o. zeh dor doresho doreshav mebaqshei fanekha ya'aqob selah. se'u she'arim rasheikhem vehinase'u pitkhei 'olam veyabo melekh hakabod. mi zeh melekh hakabod ihoh 'izuz vegibor ihoh gibor milkhamah. se'u she'arim rasheikhem use'u pitkhei 'olam veyabo melekh hakabod. mi hu zeh melekh hakabod ihoh zeba'ot hu melekh hakabod selah. ledavid 'eilekha ihoh nafshi 'esa. 'elohai bekha batakhti 'al 'eiboshah 'al ya'alzu 'oyebai li. gam kal qoekha lo yeiboshu yeiboshu habogdim reiqam. derakhekha ihoh hodi'eini 'orekhotekha lamedeini. hadrikheini ba'amitekha velamedeini ki 'atah 'elohei yish'i 'otkha qiviti kal hayom. zekhor rakhamekha ihoh vakhasadekha ki mei'olam hemah. khatot ne'urai ufesha'ai 'al tizkor kekhasdekha zekhar li 'atah lema'an tubekha ihoh. tob veyashar ihoh 'al ken yoreh khata'im badarekh. yadrekh 'anavim bamishpat vilamed 'anavim darko. kal 'arekhot ihoh khesed ve'emet lenozerei berito ve'eidotav. lema'an shimkha ihoh vesalakhta la'avoni ki rab hu. mi zeh ha'ish yerei ihoh yorenu bederekh yibkhar. nafsho betob talin vezar'o yirash 'arez. sod ihoh lirei'av uberito lehodi'am. 'einai tamid 'el ihoh ki hu yozi meireshet raglai. peneh 'eilai vekhaneini ki yakhid ve'ani 'ani. zarot lebabi hirkhibu mimezuqotai hozi'eini. re'eh 'aneyi va'amali vesa lekhal khatotai. re'eh 'oybai ki rabu vesin'at khamas senei'uni. shamerah nafshi vehazileini 'al 'eibosh ki khasiti bakh. tom vayosher yizeruni ki qivitikha. pedeh 'elohim 'et yisra'el mikol zarotav ledavid shafeteini ihoh ki 'ani betumi halakhti ihoh batakhti lo 'em'ad. bekhaneini ihoh venaseini zerofah zarefah khilyotai velibi. ki khasdekha leneged 'einai vehithalakhti ba'amitekha. lo yashabti 'im metei shav ve'im na'alamim lo 'abo. neiti qehal merei'im ve'im resha'im lo 'eisheb. 'erkhaz beniqayon kapai va'asobebah 'et mizbakhakha ihoh. lashmia' beqol todah ulesaper kal nifle'otekha. ihoh 'ahabti me'on beitekha umeqom mishkan kebodekha. 'al te'esof 'im khata'im nafshi ve'im 'anshei damim khayai. 'asher bideihem zimah viminam male'ah shokhad. va'ani betumi 'eilekh pedeini vekhaneini ragli 'amedah bemishor bemaqheilim 'abarekh ihoh. ledavid ihoh 'ori veyish'i mimi 'ira ihoh ma'oz khayai mimi 'efkhad. biqrob 'alai merei'im le'ekhol 'et besari zarai ve'oyebai li hemah khashelu venafalu. 'im takhaneh 'alai makhaneh lo yira libi 'im taqum 'alai milkhamah bezot 'ani boteiakh. 'akhat sha'alti mei'et ihoh 'otah 'abaqesh shibti bebet ihoh kal yemei khayai lakhazot beno'am ihoh ulebaqer beheikhalo. ki yizpeneini besukoh beyom ra'ah yastireini beseiter 'aholo bezur yeromeini. ve'atah yarum roshi 'al 'oyebai sebibotai ve'ezbekhah be'aholo zibkhei teru'ah 'ashirah va'azamerah ihoh. shema' ihoh qoli 'eqra vekhaneini va'aneini. lekha 'amar libi baqeshu fanai 'et panekha ihoh 'abaqesh. 'al taster panekha mimeni 'al tat be'af 'abdekha 'ezrati hayita 'al titesheini ve'al ta'azbeini 'elohei yish'i. ki 'abi ve'imi 'azabuni ihoh ya'asfeini. horeini ihoh darkekha unekheini be'orakh mishor lema'an shorrai. 'al titeneini benefesh zarai ki qamu bi 'eideishe qer vifeiakh khamas. lulei he'emanti lir'ot betub ihoh be'erez khayim. qaveh 'el ihoh khazaq veya'amez libekha veqaveh 'el ihoh. ledavid 'eilekha ihoh 'eqra zuri 'al tekherash mimeni pen tekhesheh mimeni venimshalti 'im yordei bor. shema' qol takhanunai beshave'i 'eilekha benase'i yadai 'el debir qadshekha 'al timshekheini 'im resha'im ve'im po'alei 'aven doberei lom 'im rei'eihem vera'ah bilbabam. ten lahem kefa'olam ukheroa' ma'aleihem kema'aseh yedeihem ten lahem hasheb gemulam lahem. ki lo yabinu 'el pe'ulot ihoh ve'el ma'aseh yadav yehersem velo yibnem. barukh ihoh kisha ma' qol takhanunai. ihoh 'uzi umagini bo batakh libi vene'ezareti vaya'aloz libi umishiri 'ahodenu. ihoh 'oz lamo uma'oz yeshu'ot meshikho hu. hoshi'ah 'et 'amekha ubarekh 'et nakhalatekha ure'em venase'em 'ad ha'olam. mizmor ledavid habu ihoh benei 'eilim habu ihoh kabod va'oz. habu ihoh kebod shemo hishtakhavu ihoh behadrat qodesh. qol ihoh 'al hamayim 'el hakabod hir'im ihoh 'al mayim rabim. qol ihoh bakoakh qol ihoh behadar. qol ihoh shober 'arazim vayshaber ihoh 'et 'arzei halebanon. vayarqidem kemo 'eigel lebanon vesiryon kemo ben re'eimim. qol ihoh khozeb lahabot 'esh. qol ihoh yakhil midbar yakhil ihoh midbar qadesh. qol ihoh yekholel 'ayalot vayekhesof ye'arot ubeheikhalo kulo 'omer kabod. ihoh lamabul yashab vayeisheb ihoh melekh le'olam. ihoh 'oz le'amo yiten ihoh yebarekh 'et 'amo bashalom. mizmor shir khanukat habayit ledavid. 'aromimkha ihoh ki dilitani velo simakhta 'oyebai li. ihoh 'elohai shiva'ti 'eilekha vatirpa'eini. ihoh he'elita min she'ol nafshi khiyitani miyordei miyaredi bor. zameru ihoh khasidav vehodu lezeikher qadesho. ki rega' be'apo khayim birzono ba'ereb yalin bekhi velaboqer rinah. va'ani 'amarti beshalvi bal 'emot le'olam. ihoh birzonkha he'emadtah leharri 'oz histarta fanekha hayiti nibhal. 'eilekha ihoh 'eqra ve'el 'adonai 'etkhanan. mah beza' bedami beridti 'el shakhat hayodkha 'afar hayagid 'amitekha. shema' ihoh vekhaneini ihoh heyeh 'ozer li. hafakhta mispedi lemakhol li pitakhta saqi vate'azereini simkhah. lema'an yezamerkha khabod velo yidom ihoh 'elohai le'olam 'odeka. lamnazeiakh mizmor ledavid. bekha ihoh khasiti 'al 'eiboshah le'olam bezidqatekha faleteini. hateh 'eilai 'azenekha meheirah hazileini heyeh li lezur ma'oz lebet mezudot lehoshi'eini. ki sal'i umezudati 'atah ulema'an mekha tankheini utenahaleini. tozi'eini meireshet zu tamenu li ki 'atah ma'uzi. beyadekha 'afqid rukhi paditah 'oti ihoh 'el 'emet. saneiti hashomerim hablei shav va'ani 'el ihoh batakheti. 'agilah ve'esmekhah bekhasdekha 'asher ra'ita 'et 'aneyi yada'ta bezarot nafshi. velo hisgartani beyad 'oyeb he'emadta bamerkhab raglai. khaneini ihoh ki zar li 'asheshah bekha'as 'eini nafshi ubitni. ki khalu beyagon khayai ushenotai ba'anakhah kashal ba'avoni khokhi va'azamai 'asheishu. mikal zorerai hayiti kherpah velishakheinai me'od ufakhad limyuda'ai ro'ai bakhuz nadedu mimeni. nishkakhti kemet mileb hayiti kikhli 'obed. ki shama'ti dibat rabim magor misabib behivasedam yakhad 'alai laqakhat nafshi zamamu. va'ani 'alekha batakhti ihoh 'amarti 'elohai 'atah. beyadekha 'itotai hazileini miyad 'oybai umeirodefai. ha'irah fanekha 'al 'abdekha hoshi'eini bekhasdekha. ihoh 'al 'eiboshah ki qeratikha yeiboshu resha'im yidemu lish'ol. tei'alamnah siftei shaqer hadoberot 'al zadiq 'ataq bega'avah vabuz. mah rab tubekha 'asher zafanta lirei'ekha pa'alta lakhosim bakh neged benei 'adam tastirem beseiter panekha meirukhsei 'ish tizpenem besukah meirib leshonot. barukh ihoh ki hifli khasdo li be'ir mazor. va'ani 'amarti bekhafezi nigrazti mineged 'einekha 'akhen ma'ta qol takhanunai beshave'i 'eilekha. 'ehebu 'et ihoh kal khasidav 'emunim nozer ihoh umeshalem 'al yeter 'oseh ga'avah. khizqu veya'amez lebabkhem kal hamyakhalim ihoh. ledavid maskil 'ashrei nesui pesha' kesui khata'ah. 'ashrei 'adam lo yakhshob ihoh lo 'avon ve'en berukho remiyah ki hekherashti balu 'azamai besha'agati kal hayom. ki yomam valaylah tikhbad 'alai yadekha nehpakh leshadi bekharbonei qayiz selah. khatati 'odi'akha va'avoni lo khisiti 'amarti 'odeh 'alei fesha'ai ihoh ve'atah nasata 'avon khatati selah. 'al zot yitpalel kal khasid 'eilekha le'et mezo raq lesheitef mayim rabim 'eilav lo yagi'u. 'atah seiter li mizar tizereini ranei falet tesobbeini selah. 'askilekha ve'orkha bederekh zu teilekh 'i'azah 'alekha 'eini. 'al tihyu kesus kefered 'en habin bemeteg varesen 'edyo liblom bal qerob 'eilekha. rabim makh'obim larasha' vehaboteiakh ihoh khesed yesobbenu. simkhu ihoh vegilu zadiqim veharninu kal yishrei leb. ranenu zadiqim ihoh laysharim navah tehilah. hodu ihoh bekhinor beneibel 'asor zameru lo. shiru lo shir khadash heitibu nagen bitru'ah. ki yashar debar ihoh vekhal ma'aseihu be'emunah. 'oheb zedaqah umishpat khesed ihoh male'ah ha'arez. bidbar ihoh shamayim na'asu uberuakh piv kal zeba'am. kones kaned mei hayam noten be'ozarot tehomot. yire'u ihoh kal ha'arez mimenu yaguru kal yoshebei teibel. ki hu 'amar vayehi hu zivah vaya'amod. ihoh heifir 'azat goyim heini makhshebot 'amim. 'azat ihoh le'olam ta'amod makhshebot libo ledor vador. 'ashrei hago 'asher ihoh 'elohav ha'am bakhar lenakhalah lo. mishamayim hibit ihoh ra'ah 'et kal benei ha'adam. mimekhon shibto hishgiakh 'el kal yoshebei ha'arez. hayozer yakhad libam hameibin 'el kal ma'aseihem. 'en hamelekh nosha' berab khayil gibor lo yinazel berab koakh. sheqer hasus litshu'ah uberob kheilo lo yemalet. hineh 'en ihoh 'el yerei'av lamyakhalim lekhasdo. lehazil mimavet nafsham ulekhayotam bara'ab. nafsheinu khiketah ihoh 'ezreinu umagineinu hu. ki bo yismakh libeinu ki beshem qadesho batakhenu. yehi khasdekha ihoh 'aleinu ka'asher yikhalnu lakh. ledavid beshanoto 'et ta'mo lifnei 'abimelekh vaygarasheihu vayeilakh. 'abarakhah 'et ihoh bekhal 'et tamid tehilato befi. ihoh tithalel nafshi yishme'u 'anavim veyismakhu. gadelu ihoh 'iti uneromah shemo yakhdav. darashti 'et ihoh ve'anani umikal megurotai hizilani. hibitu 'eilav venaharu ufeneihem 'al yekhparu. zeh 'ani qara ihoh shameia' umikal zarotav hoshi'o. khoneh mal'akh ihoh sabib lirei'av vaykhalezem. ta'amu ure'u ki tob ihoh 'ashrei hageber yekheseh bo. yer'u 'et ihoh qedoshav ki 'en makhsor lirei'av. kefirim rashu vera'eibu vedoreshei ihoh lo yakhseru khal tob. lekhu banim shim'u li yir'at ihoh 'alamedkhem. mi ha'ish hekhafez khayim 'oheb yamim lir'ot tob. nezor leshonkha meira' usefatekha midaber mirmah. sur meira' va'aseh tob baqesh shalom veradefeihu. 'einei ihoh 'el zadiqim ve'azenav 'el shav'atam. penei ihoh be'osei ra' lehakhrit mei'erez zikhram. za'aqu ihoh shameia' umikal zarotam hizilam. qarob ihoh lenishberei leb ve'et dake'ei ruakh yoshia'. rabot ra'ot zadiq umikulam yazilenu ihoh. shomer kal 'azmotav 'akhat meihenah lo nishbarah. temotet rasha' ra'ah vesone'ei zadiq ye'shamu. podeh ihoh nefesh 'abadav velo ye'shemu kal hakhosim bo. ledavid ribah ihoh 'et yeribai lekham 'et lokhamai. hakhazeq magen vezinah vequmah be'ezrati. vehareq khanit usegor liqrat rodefai 'emor lenafshi yeshu'atekh 'ani. yeiboshu veyikalemu mebaqshei nafshi yisogu 'akhor veyakhperu khoshebei ra'ati. yihyu kemoz lifnei ruakh umal'akh ihoh dokheh. yehi darkam khoshekh vakhalaqlaqot umal'akh ihoh rodefam. ki khinam tamenu li shakhat rishtam khinam khaferu lenafshi. tebo'eihu sho'ah lo yeida' verishto 'asher taman tilkedo besho'ah yipal bah. venafshi tagil ihoh tasis bishu'ato. kal 'azmotai tomarnah ihoh mi khamokha mazil 'ani meikhazaq mimenu ve'ani ve'ebyon migozelo. yequmun 'eidei khamas 'asher lo yada'ti yish'aluni. yeshalemuni ra'ah takhat tobah shekhol lenafshi. va'ani bakhalotam lebushi saq 'ineiti bazom nafshi utefilati 'al kheiqi tashub. kereia' ke'akh li hithalakheti ka'abel 'em qoder shakhoti. ubezal'i samekhu vene'esafu ne'esfu 'alai neikhim velo yada'ti qare'u velo damu. bekhanfei la'agei ma'og kharoq 'alai shineimo. 'adonai kamah tir'eh hashibah nafshi misho'eihem mikefirim yekhidati. 'odkha beqahal rab be'am 'azum 'ahaleka. 'al yismekhu li 'oyebai sheqer sone'ai khinam yiqrezu 'ayin. ki lo shalom yedabeiru ve'al rig'ei 'erez dibrei mirmot yakhashobun. vayarkhibu 'alai pihem 'ameru he'akh he'akh ra'atah 'eineinu. ra'itah ihoh 'al tekherash 'adonai 'al tirkhaq mimeni. ha'irah vehaqizah lemishpati 'elohai vadonai leribi. shafeteini khezidqekha ihoh 'elohai ve'al yismekhu li. 'al yomeru belibam he'akh nafsheinu 'al yomeru bila'anuhu. yeiboshu veyakhperu yakhdav semeikhei ra'ati yilbeshu boshet ukhelimah hamagdilim 'alai. yaronu veyismekhu khafeizei zidqi veyomeru tamid yigdal ihoh hekhafez shelom 'abdo. uleshoni tehgeh zidqekha kal hayom tehilatekha. lamnazeiakh le'ebed ihoh ledavid. ne'um pesha' larasha' beqereb libi 'en pakhad 'elohim leneged 'einav. ki hekheliq 'eilav be'einav limzo 'avono lisno. dibrei fiv 'aven umirmah khadal lehaskil leheitib. 'aven yakhshob 'al mishkabo yityazeb 'al derekh lo tob ra' lo yim'as. ihoh behashamayim khasdekha 'emunatekha 'ad shekhaqim. zidqatekha keharrei 'el mishpatekha tehom rabah 'adam ubeheimah toshia' ihoh. mah yaqar khasdekha 'elohim ubenei 'adam bezel kenafekha yekhesayun. yirveyun mideshen beitekha venakhal 'adanekha tashqem. ki 'imekha meqor khayim be'orkha nir'eh 'or. meshokh khasdekha leyode'ekha vezidqatekha leyishrei leb. 'al tebo'eini regel ga'avah veyad resha'im 'al tenideini. sham nafelu po'alei 'aven dokhu velo yakhelu qum. ledavid 'al titkhar bamerei'im 'al teqanei be'osei 'avlah. ki khekhazir meheirah yimalu ukheyereq deshe yibolun. betakh ihoh va'aseh tob shekhan 'erez ure'eh 'emunah. vehit'anag 'al ihoh veyiten lekha mish'alot libekha. gol 'al ihoh darkekha ubetakh 'alav vehu ya'aseh. vehozi kha'or zidqekha umishpatekha kazahorayim. dom ihoh vehitkholel lo 'al titkhar bemazliakh darko be'ish 'oseh mezimot. heref mei'af va'azob kheimah 'al titkhar 'akh lehareia'. ki merei'im yikareitun veqoei ihoh hemah yireshu 'arez. ve'od me'at ve'en rasha' vehitbonanta 'al meqomo ve'einenu. va'anavim yireshu 'arez vehit'anegu 'al rob shalom. zomem rasha' lazadiq vekhoreq 'alav shinav. 'adonai yiskhaq lo ki ra'ah ki yabo yomo. khereb patekhu resha'im vedarekhu qashtam lehapil 'ani ve'ebyon litboakh yishrei darekh. kharbam tabo belibam veqashetotam tishabarnah. tob me'at lazadiq meihamon resha'im rabim. ki zero'ot resha'im tishabarnah vesomekh zadiqim ihoh. yodeia' ihoh yemei temimim venakhalatam le'olam tihyeh. lo yeiboshu be'et ra'ah ubimei re'abon yisba'u. ki resha'im yobeidu ve'oyebei ihoh kiqar karim kalu be'ashan kalu. loeh rasha' velo yeshalem vezadiq khonen venoten. ki meborakhav yireshu 'arez umequlalav yikareitu. ihoh miz'adei geber konanu vedarko yekhpaz. ki yipol lo yutal ki ihoh somekh yado. na'ar hayiti gam zaqanti velo ra'iti zadiq ne'ezab vezar'o mebaqesh lakhem. kal hayom khonen umalveh vezar'o librakhah. sur meira' va'aseh tob ushekhon le'olam. ki ihoh 'oheb mishpat velo ya'azob 'et khasidav le'olam nishmaru vezera' resha'im nikhrat. zadiqim yireshu 'arez veyishkenu la'ad 'aleha. pi zadiq yehgeh khakhmah uleshono tedaber mishpat. torat 'elohav belibo lo tim'ad 'ashurav. zofeh rasha' lazadiq umebaqesh lahamito ihoh lo ya'azbenu beyado velo yarshi'enu behishafeto. qaveh 'el ihoh ushemor darko viromimkha lareshet 'arez behikaret resha'im tir'eh. ra'iti rasha' 'ariz umit'areh ke'ezrakh ra'anan. vaya'abor vehineh 'einenu va'abaqsheihu velo nimza. shemar tam ure'eh yashar ki 'akharit le'ish shalom. ufoshe'im nishmedu yakhdav 'akharit resha'im nikhratah. uteshu'at zadiqim ihoh ma'uzam be'et zarah. vaya'zerem ihoh vayfaletem yefaletem meiresha'im veyoshi'em ki khasu bo. mizmor ledavid lehazkir. ihoh 'al beqezpekha tokhikheini ubakhamatekha teyasereini. ki khizekha nikhatu bi vatinkhat 'alai yadekha. 'en metom bibsari mipenei za'mekha 'en shalom ba'azamai mipenei khatati. ki 'avonotai 'aberu roshi kemasa khabed yikhbedu mimeni. hib'ishu namaqu khaburotai mipenei 'ivalti. na'aveiti shakhoti 'ad me'od kal hayom qoder hilakheti. ki khesalai male'u niqleh ve'en metom bibsari. nefugoti venidkeiti 'ad me'od 'agti minahamat libi. 'adonai negdekha khal ta'avati ve'ankhati mimekha lo nistarah. libi sekharkhar 'azabani khokhi ve'or 'einai gam hem 'en 'iti. 'ohabai verei'ai mineged nig'i ya'amodu uqerobai meirakhoq 'amadu. vaynaqshu mebaqshei nafshi vedoreshei ra'ati diberu havot umirmot kal hayom yehgu. va'ani khekheiresh lo 'eshma' ukhe'ilem lo yiftakh piv. va'ehi ke'ish 'asher lo shomeia' ve'en befiv tokhakhot. ki lekha ihoh hokhaleti 'atah ta'aneh 'adonai 'elohai. ki 'amarti pen yismekhu li bemot ragli 'alai higdilu. ki 'ani lezela' nakhon umakh'obi negdi tamid. ki 'avoni 'agid 'ed'ag meikhatati. ve'oyebai khayim 'azeimu verabu sone'ai shaqer. umeshalemei ra'ah takhat tobah yistenuni takhat redofi radefi tob. 'al ta'azbeini ihoh 'elohai 'al tirkhaq mimeni. khushah le'ezrati 'adonai teshu'ati. lamnazeiakh liditun lidutun mizmor ledavid. 'amarti 'eshmerah derakhai meikhato bilshoni 'eshmerah lefi makhsom be'od rasha' lenegdi. ne'elamti dumiyah hekhesheiti mitob ukhe'eibi ne'kar. kham libi beqirbi bahagigi tib'ar 'esh dibarti bilshoni. hodi'eini ihoh qizi umidat yamai mah hi 'eide'ah meh khadel 'ani. hineh tefakhot natatah yamai vekheldi khe'ayin negdekha 'akh kal hebel kal 'adam nizab selah. 'akh bezelem yithalekh 'ish 'akh hebel yehemayun yizbor velo yeida' mi 'osefam. ve'atah mah qiviti 'adonai tokhalti lekha hi. mikal pesha'ai hazileini kherpat nabal 'al tesimeini. ne'elamti lo 'eftakh pi ki 'atah 'asita. haser mei'alai nig'ekha mitigrat yadekha 'ani khaliti. betokhakhot 'al 'avon yisarta 'ish vatemes ka'ash khamudo 'akh hebel kal 'adam selah. shim'ah tefilati ihoh veshav'ati ha'azinah 'el dim'ati 'al tekherash ki ger 'anokhi 'imakh toshab kekhal 'abotai. hasha' mimeni ve'abligah beterem 'eilekh ve'eineni. lamnazeiakh ledavid mizmor. qavoh qiviti ihoh vayet 'eilai vayishma' shav'ati. vaya'aleini mibor sha'on mitit hayaven vayaqem 'al sela' raglai konen 'ashurai. vayiten befi shir khadash tehilah leiloheinu yir'u rabim veyira'u veyibtekhu ihoh. 'ashrei hageber 'asher sam ihoh mibtakho velo fanah 'el rehabim vesatei khazab. rabot 'asita 'atah ihoh 'elohai nifle'otekha umakhshebotekha 'eileinu 'en 'arokh 'eilekha 'agidah va'adabeirah 'azemu misaper. zebakh uminkhah lo khafazta 'azenayim karita li 'olah vakhata'ah lo sha'aleta. 'az 'amarti hineh bati bimgilat seifer katub 'alai. la'asot rezonkha 'elohai khafazeti vetoratekha betokh mei'ai. bisarti zedeq beqahal rab hineh fatai lo 'ekhla ihoh 'atah yada'eta. zidqatekha lo khisiti betokh libi 'emunatekha uteshu'atekha 'amareti lo khikhadti khasdekha va'amitekha leqahal rab. 'atah ihoh lo tikhla rakhamekha mimeni khasdekha va'amitekha tamid yizeruni. ki 'afefu 'alai ra'ot 'ad 'en mispar hisiguni 'avonotai velo yakholeti lir'ot 'azemu misa'arot roshi velibi 'azabani. rezeh ihoh lehazileini ihoh le'ezrati khushah. yeiboshu veyakhperu yakhad mebaqshei nafshi lispotah yisogu 'akhor veyikalemu khafeizei ra'ati. yashomu 'al 'eiqeb bashetam ha'omerim li he'akh he'akh. yasisu veyismekhu bekha kal mebaqshekha yomeru tamid yigdal ihoh 'ohabei teshu'atekha. va'ani 'ani ve'ebyon 'adonai yakhashab li 'ezrati umefalti 'atah 'elohai 'al te'akhar. lamnazeiakh mizmor ledavid. 'ashrei maskil 'el dal beyom ra'ah yemaleteihu ihoh. ihoh yishmereihu vikhayeihu ye'shor ve'ushar ba'arez ve'al titeneihu benefesh 'oyebav. ihoh yis'adenu 'al 'eres devai kal mishkabo hafakhta bekhaleyo. 'ani 'amarti ihoh khaneini refa'ah nafshi ki khatati lakh. 'oybai yomeru ra' li matai yamut ve'abad shemo. ve'im ba lir'ot shav yedaber libo yiqbaz 'aven lo yeizei lakhuz yedaber. yakhad 'alai yitlakhashu kal sone'ai 'alai yakhshebu ra'ah li. debar beliya'al yazuq bo va'asher khab lo yosif laqum. gam 'ish shelomi 'asher batakhti bo 'okhel lakhmi higdil 'alai 'aqeb. ve'atah ihoh khaneini vahaqimeini va'ashalemah lahem. bezot yada'ti ki khafazta bi ki lo yaria' 'oyebi 'alai. va'ani betumi tamakhta bi vatazibeini lefanekha le'olam. barukh ihoh 'elohei yisra'el meiha'olam ve'ad ha'olam 'amen ve'amen. lamnazeiakh maskil libnei qorakh. ke'ayal ta'arog 'al 'afiqei mayim ken nafshi ta'arog 'eilekha 'elohim. zame'ah nafshi leilohim le'el khai matai 'abo ve'eira'eh penei 'elohim. hayetah li dim'ati lekhem yomam valayelah be'emor 'eilai kal hayom 'ayeh 'elohekha. 'eleh 'ezkerah ve'eshpekhah 'alai nafshi ki 'e'ebor basakh 'edadem 'ad bet 'elohim beqol rinah vetodah hamon khogeg. mah tishtokhakhi nafshi vatehemi 'alai hokhili leilohim ki 'od 'odenu yeshu'ot panav. 'elohai 'alai nafshi tishtokhakh 'al ken 'ezkarekha mei'erez yarden vekhermonim meihar miz'ar. tehom 'el tehom qorei leqol zinorekha kal mishbarekha vegalekha 'alai 'abaru. yomam yezaveh ihoh khasdo ubalaylah shirah shiro 'imi tefilah le'el khayai. 'omrah le'el sal'i lamah shekhakhtani lamah qoder 'eilekh belakhaz 'oyeb. berezakh be'azmotai kheirefuni zorrai be'ameram 'eilai kal hayom 'ayeh 'elohekha. mah tishtokhakhi nafshi umah tehemi 'alai hokhili leilohim ki 'od 'odenu yeshu'ot panai veilohai. shafeteini 'elohim veribah ribi migo lo khasid mei'ish mirmah ve'avlah tefaleteini. ki 'atah 'elohei ma'uzi lamah zenakhtani lamah qoder 'ethalekh belakhaz 'oyeb. shelakh 'orkha va'amitekha hemah yankhuni yebi'uni 'el har qadshekha ve'el mishkenotekha. ve'abo'ah 'el mizbakh 'elohim 'el 'el simkhat gili ve'odkha bekhinor 'elohim 'elohai. mah tishtokhakhi nafshi umah tehemi 'alai hokhili leilohim ki 'od 'odenu yeshu'ot panai veilohai. lamnazeiakh libnei qorakh maskil. 'elohim be'azeneinu shama'nu 'aboteinu siperu lanu po'al pa'alta bimeihem bimei qedem. 'atah yadekha goyim horashta vatita'em tara' le'umim vateshalekhem. ki lo bekharbam yareshu 'arez uzero'am lo hoshi'ah lamo ki yeminekha uzero'akha ve'or panekha ki rezitam. 'atah hu malki 'elohim zaveh yeshu'ot ya'aqob. bekha zareinu nenageiakh beshimkha nabus qameinu. ki lo beqashti 'ebtakh vekharbi lo toshi'eini. ki hosha'tanu mizareinu umesan'einu hebishota. beilohim hilalnu khal hayom veshimkha le'olam nodeh selah. 'af zanakhta vatakhlimeinu velo teizei bezib'oteinu. teshibeinu 'akhor mini zar umesan'einu shasu lamo. titeneinu kezon ma'akhal ubagoyim zeiritanu. timkor 'amekha belo hon velo ribita bimkhireihem. tesimeinu kherpah lishkheineinu la'ag vaqeles lisbiboteinu. tesimeinu mashal bagoyim menod rosh bal 'umim. kal hayom kelimati negdi uboshet panai kisateni. miqol mekharef umegadef mipenei 'oyeb umitnaqem. kal zot ba'atnu velo shekhakhanukha veloshi qarnu bibritekha. lo nasog 'akhor libeinu vatet 'ashureinu mini 'arekhekha. ki dikitanu bimqom tanim vatekhas 'aleinu bezalmavet. 'imosha khakhnu shem 'eloheinu vanifros kapeinu le'el zar. halo 'elohim yakhaqar zot ki hu yodeia' ta'alumot leb. ki 'alekha horagnu khal hayom nekhshabnu kezon tibkhah. 'urah lamah tishan 'adonai haqizah 'al tiznakh lanezakh. lamah fanekha tastir tishkakh 'aneyeinu velakhazeinu. ki shakhah le'afar nafsheinu dabeqah la'arez bitneinu. qumah 'ezratah lanu ufedeinu lema'an khasdekha. lamnazeiakh 'alosho shanim libnei qorakh maskil shir yedidot. rakhash libi dabar tob 'omer 'ani ma'asai lemelekh leshoni 'et sofer mahir. yafeyafita mibenei 'adam huzaq khen besefetotekha 'al ken beirakhkha 'elohim le'olam. khagor kharbekha 'al yarekh gibor hodkha vahadarekha. vahadarekha zelakh rekhab 'al debar 'emet ve'anvah zedeq vetorkha nora'ot yeminekha. khizekha shenunim 'amim takhtekha yipelu beleb 'oybei hamelekh. kis'akha 'elohim 'olam va'ed sheibet mishor sheibet malkhutekha. 'ahabta zedeq vatisna resha' 'al ken meshakhakha 'elohim 'elohekha shemen sason meikhabeirekha. mor va'ahalot qezi'ot kal bigdotekha min heikhelei n mini simekhukha. benot melakhim beyiqerotekha nizebah sheigal liminekha bekhetem 'ofir. shim'i bat ure'i vehati 'azenekh veshikhkhi 'amekh ubet 'abikh. veyit'av hamelekh yafeyekh ki hu 'adonayikh vehishtakhavi lo. ubat zor beminkhah panayikh yekhalu 'ashirei 'am. kal kebudah bat melekh penimah mimishbezot zahab lebushah. lirqamot tubal lamelekh betulot 'akhareha rei'oteha muba'ot lakh. tubalnah bismakhot vagil tebo'enah beheikhal melekh. takhat 'abotekha yihyu banekha teshiteimo lesarim bekhal ha'arez. 'azkirah mekha bekhal dor vador 'al ken 'amim yehodukha le'olam va'ed. lamnazeiakh libnei qorakh 'al 'alamot shir. 'elohim lanu makhaseh va'oz 'ezrah bezarot nimza me'od. 'al ken lo nira behamir 'arez ubemot harim beleb yamim. yehemu yekhmeru meimav yir'ashu harim bega'avato selah. nahar pelagav yesamekhu 'ir 'elohim qedosh mishkenei 'elyon. 'elohim beqirbah bal timot ya'zereha 'elohim lifnot boqer. hamu goyim matu mamlakhot natan beqolo tamug 'arez. ihoh zeba'ot 'imanu misgab lanu 'elohei ya'aqob selah. lekhu khazu mif'alot ihoh 'asher sam shamot ba'arez. mashbit milkhamot 'ad qezeh ha'arez qeshet yeshaber veqizez khanit 'agalot yisrof ba'esh. harpu ude'u ki 'anokhi 'elohim 'arum bagoyim 'arum ba'arez. ihoh zeba'ot 'imanu misgab lanu 'elohei ya'aqob selah. lamnazeiakh libnei qorakh mizmor. kal ha'amim tiq'u khaf hari'u leilohim beqol rinah. ki ihoh 'elyon nora melekh gadol 'al kal ha'arez. yadber 'amim takhteinu ule'umim takhat ragleinu. yibkhar lanu 'et nakhalateinu 'et ge'on ya'aqob 'asher 'aheb selah. 'alah 'elohim bitru'ah ihoh beqol shofar. zameru 'elohim zameiru zameru lemalkeinu zameiru. ki melekh kal ha'arez 'elohim zameru maskil. malakh 'elohim 'al goyim 'elohim yashab 'al kisei qadesho. nedibei 'amim ne'esafu 'am 'elohei 'abraham ki leilohim maginei 'erez me'od na'alah. shir mizmor libnei qorakh. gadol ihoh umehulal me'od be'ir 'eloheinu har qadesho. yefeh nof mesos kal ha'arez har ziyon yarketei zafon qiryat melekh rab. 'elohim be'armenoteha noda' lemisgab. ki hineh hamelakhim no'adu 'aberu yakhdav. hemah ra'u ken tamahu nibhalu nekhpazu. re'adah 'akhazatam sham khil kayoleidah. beruakh qadim teshaber 'oniyot tarshish. ka'asher shama'nu ken ra'inu be'ir ihoh zeba'ot be'ir 'eloheinu 'elohim yekhoneha 'ad 'olam selah. diminu 'elohim khasdekha beqereb heikhalekha. keshimkha 'elohim ken tehilatekha 'al qazvei 'erez zedeq male'ah yeminekha. yismakh har ziyon tageilenah benot yehudah lema'an mishpatekha. sobu ziyon vehaqifuha sifru migdaleha. shitu libekhem lekheilah pasegu 'armenoteha lema'an tesaperu ledor 'akharon. ki zeh 'elohim 'eloheinu 'olam va'ed hu yenahageinu 'al mut. lamnazeiakh libnei qorakh mizmor. shim'u zot kal ha'amim ha'azinu kal yoshebei khaled. gam benei 'adam gam benei 'ish yakhad 'ashir ve'ebyon. pi yedaber khakhemot vehagut libi tebunot. 'ateh lemashal 'azeni 'eftakh bekhinor khidati. lamah 'ira bimei ra' 'avon 'aqeibai yesubeini. habotekhim 'al kheilam uberob 'asheram yithalalu. 'akh lo fadoh yifdeh 'ish lo yiten leilohim kafero. veyeiqar pidyon nafsham vekhadal le'olam. vikhi 'od lanezakh lo yir'eh hashakhat. ki yir'eh khakhamim yamutu yakhad kesil vaba'ar yobeidu ve'azebu la'akheirim kheilam. qirbam bateimo le'olam mishkenotam ledor vador qare'u bishmotam 'alei 'adamot. ve'adam biqar bal yalin nimshal kabeheimot nidmu. zeh darkam keisel lamo ve'akhareihem befihem yirzu selah. kazon lish'ol shatu mavet yir'em vayirdu bam yesharim laboqer veziram vezuram lebalot she'ol mizebul lo. 'akh 'elohim yifdeh nafshi miyad she'ol ki yiqakheini selah. 'al tira ki ya'ashir 'ish ki yirbeh kebod beito. ki lo bemoto yiqakh hakol lo yeired 'akharav kebodo. ki nafsho bekhayav yebarekh veyodukha ki teitib lakh. tabo 'ad dor 'abotav 'ad neizakh lo yir'u 'or. 'adam biqar velo yabin nimshal kabeheimot nidmu. mizmor le'asaf 'el 'elohim ihoh diber vayiqra 'arez mimizrakhoshe mesh 'ad mebo'o. miziyon mikhlal yofi 'elohim hofia'. yabo 'eloheinu ve'al yekherash 'esh lefanav tokhel usebibav nis'arah me'od. yiqra 'el hashamayim mei'al ve'el ha'arez ladin 'amo. 'isfu li khasidai koretei beriti 'alei zabakh. vayagidu shamayim zidqo ki 'elohim shofet hu selah. shim'ah 'ami va'adabeirah yisra'el ve'a'idah bakh 'elohim 'elohekha 'anokhi. lo 'al zebakhekha 'okhikhekha ve'olotekha lenegdi tamid. lo 'eqakh mibeitekha far mimikhle'otekha 'atudim. ki li khal khayto ya'ar beheimot beharrei 'alef. yada'ti kal 'of harim veziz dai 'imadi. 'im 'er'ab lo 'omar lakh ki li teibel umelo'ah. ha'okhal besar 'abirim vedam 'atudim 'eshteh. zebakh leilohim todah veshalem le'elyon nedarekha. uqera'eini beyom zarah 'akhalezkha utekhabedeini. velarasha' 'amar 'elohim mah lekha lesaper khuqai vatisa beriti 'alei fikha. ve'atah saneita musar vatashlekh debarai 'akharekha. 'im ra'ita ganab vatirez 'imo ve'im mena'afim khelqekha. pikha shalakhta bera'ah uleshonkha tazmid mirmah. teisheb be'akhikha tedaber beben 'imekha titen dofi. 'eleh 'asita vehekherashti dimita heyot 'ehyeh khamokha 'okhikhakha ve'e'erkhah le'einekha. binu na zot shokhekhei 'eloah pen 'etrof ve'en mazil. zobeiakh todah yekhabedaneni vesam derekh 'ar'enu beyeisha' 'elohim. lamnazeiakh mizmor ledavid. bebo 'eilav natan hanabi ka'asher ba 'el bat shaba'. khaneini 'elohim kekhasdekha kerob rakhamekha mekheh fesha'ai. harbeh hereb kabeseini mei'avoni umeikhatati tahareini. ki fesha'ai 'ani 'eida' vekhatati negdi tamid. lekha lebadekha khatati vehara' be'einekha 'asiti lema'an tizdaq bedaberekha tizkeh beshafetekha. hen be'avon kholaleti ubekhet yekhematni 'imi. hen 'emet khafazta batukhot ubesatum khakhmah todi'eini. tekhate'eini be'eizob ve'ethar tekhabeseini umisheleg 'albin. tashmi'eini sason vesimkhah tageilenah 'azamot dikita. haster panekha meikhata'ai vekhal 'avonotai mekheh. leb tahor bera li 'elohim veruakh nakhon khadesh beqirbi. 'al tashlikheini milefanekha veruakh qadshekha 'al tiqakh mimeni. hashibah li seson yish'ekha veruakh nedibah tismekheini. 'alamedah foshe'im derakhekha vekhata'im 'eilekha yashubu. hazileini midamim 'elohim 'elohei teshu'ati teranen leshoni zidqatekha. 'adonai sefatai tiftakh ufi yagid tehilatekha. ki lo takhpoz zebakh ve'eteinah 'olah lo tirzeh. zibkhei 'elohim ruakh nishbarah leb nishbar venidkeh 'elohim lo tibzeh. heitibah birzonkha 'et ziyon tibneh khomot yerushalim. 'az takhpoz zibkhei zedeq 'olah vekhalil 'az ya'alu 'al mizbakhakha farim. lamnazeiakh maskil ledavid. bebo do'eg ha'adomi vayaged lesha'ul vayomer lo ba david 'el bet 'akhimelekh. mah tithalel bera'ah hagibor khesed 'el kal hayom. havot takhshob leshonekha keta'ar melutash 'oseh remiyah. 'ahabta ra' mitob sheqer midaber zedeq selah. 'ahabta khal dibrei bala' leshon mirmah. gam 'el yitazekha lanezakh yakhtekha veyisakhakha mei'ohel vesheireshkha mei'erez khayim selah. veyir'u zadiqim veyira'u ve'alav yiskhaqu. hineh hageber lo yasim 'elohim ma'uzo vayibtakh berob 'ashero ya'oz behavato. va'ani kezayit ra'anan bebet 'elohim batakhti bekhesed 'elohim 'olam va'ed. 'odkha le'olam ki 'asita va'aqaveh shimkha khi tob neged khasidekha. lamnazeiakh 'al makhalat maskil ledavid. 'amar nabal belibo 'en 'elohim hishkhitu vehit'ibu 'avel 'en 'oseh tob. 'elohim mishamayim hishqif 'al benei 'adam lir'ot hayesh maskil doresh 'et 'elohim. kulo sag yakhdav ne'elakhu 'en 'oseh tob 'en gam 'ekhad. halo yade'u po'alei 'aven 'okhelei 'ami 'akhelu lekhem 'elohim lo qara'u. sham pakhadu fakhad lo hayah fakhad ki 'elohim pizar 'azmot khonakh hebishotah ki 'elohim me'asam. mi yiten miziyon yeshu'ot yisra'el beshub 'elohim shebut 'amo yagel ya'aqob yismakh yisra'el. lamnazeiakh binginot maskil ledavid. bebo hazifim vayomeru lesha'ul halo david mistater 'imanu. 'elohim beshimkha hoshi'eini ubigburatekha tedineini. 'elohim shema' tefilati ha'azinah le'imrei fi. ki zarim qamu 'alai ve'arizim biqshu nafshi lo samu 'elohim lenegdam selah. hineh 'elohim 'ozer li 'adonai besomekhei nafshi. yashob yashib hara' leshorerai ba'amitekha hazmitem. bindabah 'ezbekhah lakh 'odeh shimkha ihoh ki tob. ki mikal zarah hizilani ube'oyebai ra'atah 'eini. lamnazeiakh binginot maskil ledavid. ha'azinah 'elohim tefilati ve'al tit'alam mitekhinati. haqshibah li va'aneini 'arid besikhi ve'ahimah. miqol 'oyeb mipenei 'aqat rasha' ki yamitu 'alai 'aven ube'af yistemuni. libi yakhil beqirbi ve'eimot mavet nafelu 'alai. yir'ah vara'ad yabo bi vatekhaseini palazut. va'omar mi yiten li 'eiber kayonah 'a'ufah ve'eshkonah. hineh 'arkhiq nedod 'alin bamidbar selah. 'akhishah miflat li meiruakh so'ah misa'ar. bala' 'adonai palag leshonam ki ra'iti khamas verib ba'ir. yomam valaylah yesobbuha 'al khomoteha ve'aven ve'amal beqirbah. havot beqirbah velo yamish meirekhobah tokh umirmah. ki lo 'oyeb yekharefeini ve'esa lo mesan'i 'alai higdil ve'esater mimenu. ve'atah 'enosh ke'erki 'alufi umeyuda'i. 'asher yakhdav namtiq sod bebet 'elohim nehalekh beragesh. yashimavet yashi mavet 'aleimo yeiredu she'ol khayim ki ra'ot bimguram beqirbam. 'ani 'el 'elohim 'eqra ihoh yoshi'eini. 'ereb vaboqer vezahorayim 'asikhah ve'ehemeh vayishma' qoli. padah beshalom nafshi miqarab li ki berabim hayu 'imadi. yishma' 'el veya'anem veyosheb qedem selah 'asher 'en khalifot lamo velo yare'u 'elohim. shalakh yadav bishlomav khilel berito. khalequ makhma'ot piv uqarab libo raku debarav mishemen vehemah fetikhot. hashlekh 'al ihoh yehabekha vehu yekhalkelekha lo yiten le'olam mot lazadiq. ve'atah 'elohim toridem lib'er shakhat 'anshei damim umirmah lo yekhezu yemeihem va'ani 'ebtakh bakh. lamnazeiakh 'al yonat 'eilem rekhoqim ledavid mikhtam be'ekhoz 'oto felishtim begat. khaneini 'elohim ki she'afani 'enosh kal hayom lokhem yilkhazeini. sha'afu vrrai kal hayom ki rabim lokhamim li marom. yom 'ira 'ani 'eilekha 'ebtakh. beilohim 'ahalel debaro beilohim batakhti lo 'ira mah ya'aseh basar li. kal hayom debarai ye'azeibu 'alai kal makhshebotam lara'. yaguru yazpinu yizponu hemah 'aqeibai yishmoru ka'asher qivu nafshi. 'al 'aven palet lamo be'af 'amim hored 'elohim. nodi safartah 'atah simah dim'ati benodekha halo besifratekha. 'az yashubu 'oybai 'akhor beyom 'eqra zeh yada'ti ki 'elohim li. beilohim 'ahalel dabar ihoh 'ahalel dabar. beilohim batakhti lo 'ira mah ya'aseh 'adam li. 'alai 'elohim nedarekha 'ashalem todot lakh. ki hizalta nafshi mimavet halo raglai midekhi lehithalekh lifnei 'elohim be'or hakhayim. lamnazeiakh 'al tashkhet ledavid mikhtam bebarekho mipeneisha 'ul bame'arah. khaneini 'elohim khaneini ki bekha khasayah nafshi ubezel kenafekha 'ekhseh 'ad ya'abor havot. 'eqra leilohim 'elyon la'el gomer 'alai. yishlakh mishamayim veyoshi'eini kheiref sho'afi selah yishlakh 'elohim khasdo va'amito. nafshi betokh leba'im 'eshkebah lohatim benei 'adam neihem khanit vekhizim uleshonam khereb khadah. rumah 'al hashamayim 'elohim 'al kal ha'arez kebodekha. reshet heikhinu lif'amai kafaf nafshi karu lefanai shikhah nafelu betokhah selah. nakhon libi 'elohim nakhon libi 'ashirah va'azameirah. 'urah khebodi 'urah haneibel vekhinor 'a'irah shakhar. 'odkha ba'amim 'adonai 'azamerkha bal 'umim. ki gadol 'ad shamayim khasdekha ve'ad shekhaqim 'amitekha. rumah 'al shamayim 'elohim 'al kal ha'arez kebodekha. lamnazeiakh 'al tashkhet ledavid mikhtam. ha'umnam 'eilem zedeq tedabeirun meisharim tishpetu benei 'adam. 'af beleb 'olot tif'alun ba'arez khamas yedeikhem tefaleisun. zoru resha'im meirakhem ta'u mibeten doberei khazab. khamat lamo kidmut khamat nakhash kemo feten kheiresh ya'tem 'azeno. 'asher lo yishma' leqol melakhashim khober khabarim mekhukam. 'elohim haras shineimo befimo malte'ot kefirim netoz ihoh. yima'asu khemo mayim yithalekhu lamo yidrokh khizo khizav kemo yitmolalu. kemo belul temes yahalokh neifel 'eishet bal khazu shamesh. beterem yabinu siroteikhem 'atad kemo khai kemo kharon yis'arenu. yismakh zadiq ki khazah naqam pe'amav yirkhaz bedam harasha'. veyomar 'adam 'akh peri lazadiq 'akh yesh 'elohim shofetim ba'arez. lamnazeiakh 'al tashkhet ledavid mikhtam bishloakh sha'ul vayishmeru 'et habayit lahamito. hazileini mei'oyebai 'elohai mimitqomai tesagebeini. hazileini mipo'alei 'aven umei'anshei damim hoshi'eini. ki hineh 'arebu lenafshi yaguru 'alai 'azim lo fish'i velo khatati ihoh. beli 'avon yeruzun veyikonanu 'urah liqrati ure'eh. ve'atah ihoh 'elohim zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el haqizah lifqod kal hagoyim 'al takhon kal bogedei 'aven selah. yashubu la'ereb yehemu khakaleb visobbu 'ir. hineh yabi'un befihem kharabot besiftoteihem ki mi shomeia'. ve'atah ihoh tiskhaq lamo til'ag lekhal goyim. 'uzo 'eilekha 'eshmorah ki 'elohim misgabi. 'elohei khasdo khasdi yeqademeini 'elohim yar'eini beshorerai. 'al tahargem pen yishkekhu 'ami hani'eimo bekheilekha vehorideimo magineinu 'adonai. khatat pimo debar sefateimo veyilakhedu big'onam umei'alah umikakhash yesapeiru. kaleh bekheimah kaleh ve'eineimo veyeide'u ki 'elohim moshel beya'aqob le'afsei ha'arez selah. veyashubu la'ereb yehemu khakaleb visobbu 'ir. hemah yenu'un yeni'un le'ekhol 'im lo yisbe'u vayalinu. va'ani 'ashir 'uzekha va'aranen laboqer khasdekha ki hayita misgab li umanos beyom zar li. 'uzi 'eilekha 'azameirah ki 'elohim misgabi 'elohei khasdi. lamnazeiakh 'al shushan 'eidut mikhtam ledavid lelamed. behazoto 'et 'aram naharayim ve'et 'aram zobah vayashab yo'ab vayakh 'et 'edom begei melakh shenem 'asar 'alef. 'elohim zenakhtanu feraztanu 'anafta teshobeb lanu. hir'ashtah 'erez pezamtah refah shebareha khi matah. hir'itah 'amekha qashah hishqitanu yayin tar'eilah. natatah lirei'ekha nes lehitnoses mipenei qoshet selah. lema'an yeikhalezun yedidekha hoshi'ah yeminekha va'aneinu va'aneini. 'elohim diber beqadesho 'e'lozah 'akhaleqah shekhem ve'eimeq sukot 'amaded. li gil'ad veli menasheh ve'efrayim ma'oz roshi yehudah mekhoqeqi. mo'ab sir rakhzi 'al 'edom 'ashlikh na'ali 'alai peleshet hitro'a'i. mi yobileini 'ir mazor mi nakhani 'ad 'edom. halo 'atah 'elohim zenakhtanu velo teizei 'elohim bezib'oteinu. habah lanu 'ezrat mizar veshav teshu'at 'adam beilohim na'aseh khayil vehu yabus zareinu. lamnazeiakh 'al neginat ledavid. shim'ah 'elohim rinati haqshibah tefilati. miqzeh ha'arez 'eilekha 'eqra ba'atof libi bezur yarum mimeni tankheini. ki hayita makhseh li migdal 'oz mipenei 'oyeb. 'agurah be'ahalekha 'olamim 'ekheseh beseiter kenafekha selah. ki 'atah 'elohim shama'ta lindarai natata yerushat yir'ei shemekha. yamim 'al yemei melekh tosif notav kemo dor vador. yeisheb 'olam lifnei 'elohim khesed ve'emet man yinzeruhu. ken 'azamerah shimkha la'ad leshalemi nedarai yom yom. lamnazeiakh 'al yedutun mizmor ledavid. 'akh 'el 'elohim dumiyah nafshi mimenu yeshu'ati. 'akh hu zuri vishu'ati misgabi lo 'emot rabah. 'ad 'anah tehotu 'al 'ish terazekhu khulekhem keqir natui gader hadekhuyah. 'akh mise'eito ya'azu lehadiakh yirzu khazab befiv yebareikhu ubeqirbam yeqalu selah. 'akh leilohim domi nafshi ki mimenu tiqvati. 'akh hu zuri vishu'ati misgabi lo 'emot. 'al 'elohim yish'i ukhebodi zur 'uzi makhsi beilohim. bitkhu bo bekhal 'et 'am shifkhu lefanav lebabkhem 'elohim makhaseh lanu selah. 'akh hebel benei 'adam kazab benei 'ish bemozenayim la'alot hemah meihebel yakhad. 'al tibtekhu be'osheq ubegazel 'al tehbalu khayil ki yanub 'al tashitu leb. 'akhat diber 'elohim shetayim zu shama'eti ki 'oz leilohim. ulekha 'adonai khased ki 'atah teshalem le'ish kema'aseihu. mizmor ledavid bihyoto bemidbar yehudah. 'elohim 'eili 'atah 'ashakhareka zame'ah lekha nafshi kamah lekha besari be'erez ziyah ve'ayef beli mayim. ken baqodesh khazitikha lir'ot 'uzekha ukhebodekha. ki tob khasdekha meikhayim sefatai yeshabekhunekha. ken 'abarekhkha bekhayai beshimkha 'esa khapai. kemo kheileb vadeshen tisba' nafshi vesiftei renanot yehalel pi. 'im zekhartikha 'al yezu'ai be'ashmurot 'ehgeh bakh. ki hayita 'ezratah li ubezel kenafekha 'aranen. dabeqah nafshi 'akharekha bi tamekhah yeminekha. vehemah lesho'ah yebaqshu nafshi yabo'u betakhtiyot ha'arez. yagiruhu 'al yedei khareb menat shu'alim yihyu. vehamelekh yismakh beilohim yithalel kal hanishba' bo ki yisakher pi dobrei shaqer. lamnazeiakh mizmor ledavid. shema' 'elohim qoli besikhi mipakhad 'oyeb tizor khayai. tastireini misod merei'im meirigshat po'alei 'aven. 'asher shanenu khakhereb leshonam darekhu khizam dabar mar. lirot bamistarim tam pit'om yoruhu velo yira'u. yekhazequ lamo dabar ra' yesaperu litmon moqshim 'ameru mi yir'eh lamo. yakhpesu 'olot tamnu kheifes mekhupas veqereb 'ish veleb 'amoq. vayorem 'elohim khez pit'om hayu makotam. vayakhshiluhu 'aleimo leshonam yitnodadu kal ro'eh bam. vayire'u kal 'adam vayagidu po'al 'elohim uma'aseihu hiskilu. yismakh zadiq ihoh vekhasah bo veyithalu kal yishrei leb. lamnazeiakh mizmor ledavid shir. lekha dumiyah tehilah 'elohim beziyon ulekha yeshulam neder. shomeia' tefilah 'adekha kal basar yabo'u. dibrei 'avonot gaberu meni pesha'einu 'atah tekhaperem. 'ashrei tibkhar uteqareb yishkon khazeirekha nisbe'ah betub beitekha qedosh heikhalekha. nora'ot bezedeq ta'aneinu 'elohei yish'einu mibtakh kal qazvei 'erez veyam rekhoqim. meikhin harim bekhokho ne'zar bigburah. mashbiakh she'on yamim she'on galeihem vahamon le'umim. vayire'u yoshebei qezavot mei'ototekha moza'ei boqer va'ereb tarnin. paqadta ha'arez vateshoqeqeha rabat ta'sherenah peleg 'elohim malei mayim takhin deganam ki khen tekhineha. telameha raveh nakhet gedudeha birbibim temogegenah zimkhah tebarekh. 'itarta shenat tobatekha uma'galekha yir'afun dashen. yir'afu ne'ot midbar vegil geba'ot takhgorenah. labeshu kharim hazon va'amaqim ya'atfu bar yitro'a'u 'af yashiru. lamnazeiakh shir mizmor hari'u leilohim kal ha'arez. zameru khebod shemo simu khabod tehilato. 'imru leilohim mah nora ma'asekha berob 'uzekha yekhakhashu lekha 'oyebekha. kal ha'arez yishtakhavu lekha vizameru lakh yezameru shimkha selah. lekhu ure'u mif'alot 'elohim nora 'alilah 'al benei 'adam. hafakh yam leyabashah banahar ya'abru beragel m nismekhah bo. moshel bigburato 'olam 'einav bagoyim tizpenah hasorrim 'al yarimu yarumu lamo selah. barekhu 'amim 'eloheinu vehashmi'u qol tehilato. hasam nafsheinu bakhayim velo natan lamot ragleinu. ki bekhantanu 'elohim zeraftanu kizraf kasef. habeitanu bamezudah samta mu'aqah bemateneinu. hirkabta 'enosh lerosheinu banu ba'esh ubamayim vatozi'einu larevayah. 'abo beitekha be'olot 'ashalem lekha nedarai. 'asher pazu sefatai vediber pi bazar li. 'olot meikhim 'a'aleh lakh 'im qetoret 'eilim 'e'eseh baqar 'im 'atudim selah. lekhu shim'u va'asaperah kal yir'ei 'elohim 'asher 'asah lenafshi. 'eilav pi qarati veromam takhat leshoni. 'aven 'im ra'iti belibi lo yishma' 'adonai. 'akhen shama' 'elohim hiqshib beqol tefilati. barukh 'elohim 'asher lo heisir tefilati vekhasdo mei'iti. lamnazekh binginot mizmor shir. 'elohim yekhaneinu vibarekheinu ya'er panav 'itanu selah. lada'at ba'arez darkekha bekhal goyim yeshu'atekha. yodukha 'amim 'elohim yodukha 'amim kulam. yismekhu viranenu le'umim ki tishpot 'amim mishor ule'umim ba'arez tankhem selah. yodukha 'amim 'elohim yodukha 'amim kulam. 'erez natenah yebulah yebarekheinu 'elohim 'eloheinu. yebarekheinu 'elohim veyire'u 'oto kal 'afsei 'arez. lamnazeiakh ledavid mizmor shir. yaqum 'elohim yafuzu 'oybav veyanusu mesan'av mipanav. kehindof 'ashan tindof kehimes donag mipenei 'esh yobedu resha'im mipenei 'elohim. vezadiqim yismekhu ya'alzu lifnei 'elohim veyasisu besimkhah. shiru leilohim zameru shemo solu larokheb ba'arabot beyah shemo ve'ilzu lefanav. 'abi yetomim vedayan 'almanot 'elohim bim'on qadesho. 'elohim moshib yekhidim baytah mozi 'asirim bakosharot 'akh sorarim shakhenu zekhikhah. 'elohim bezeitekha lifnei 'amekha beza'dekha bishimon selah. 'erez ra'ashah 'af shamayim natefu mipenei 'elohim zeh sinai mipenei 'elohim 'elohei yisra'el. geshem nedabot tanif 'elohim nakhalatekha venil'ah 'atah khonantah. khayatekha yashebu bah takhin betobatekha le'ani 'elohim. 'adonai yiten 'omer hambaserot zaba rab. malkhei zeba'ot yidodun yidodun unevat bayit tekhaleq shalal. 'im tishkebun ben shefatayim kanfei yonah nekhpah bakesef ve'ebroteha biraqraq kharuz. befares shadai melakhim bah tashleg bezalmon. har 'elohim har bashan har gabnunim har bashan. lamah terazedun harim gabnunim hahar khamad 'elohim leshibto 'af ihoh yishkon lanezakh. rekheb 'elohim ribotayim 'alfei shin'an 'adonai bam sinai baqodesh. 'alita lamarom shabita shebi laqakhta matanot ba'adam ve'af sorrim lishkon yah 'elohim. barukh 'adonai yom yom ya'amas lanu ha'el yeshu'ateinu selah. ha'el lanu 'el lemosha'ot ihoh 'adonai lamavet toza'ot. 'akh 'elohim yimkhaz rosh 'oyebav qadeqod sei'ar mithalekh ba'ashamav. 'amar 'adonai mibashan 'ashib 'ashib mimezulot yam. lema'an timkhaz raglekha bedam leshon kelabekha mei'oyebim mineihu. ra'u halikhotekha 'elohim halikhot 'eili malki baqodesh. qidemu rim 'akhar nogenim betokh 'alamot tofeifot. bemaqheilot barekhu 'elohim ihoh mimeqor yisra'el. sham binyamin za'ir rodem sarei yehudah rigmatam sarei zebulun sarei naftali. zivah 'elohekha 'uzekha 'uzah 'elohim zu pa'alta lanu. meiheikhalekha 'al yerushalim lekha yobilu melakhim shai. ge'ar khayat qaneh 'adat 'abirim be'eglei 'amim mitrapes berazei khasef bizar 'amim qerabot yekhpazu. ye'etayu khashmanim mini mizrayim kush tariz yadav leilohim. mamlekhot ha'arez shiru leilohim zameru 'adonai selah. larokheb bishmei shemei qedem hen yiten beqolo qol 'oz. tenu 'oz leilohim 'al yisra'el ga'avato ve'uzo bashekhaqim. nora 'elohim mimiqdashekha 'el yisra'el hu noten 'oz veta'azumot la'am barukh 'elohim. lamnazeiakh 'al shoshanim ledavid. hoshi'eini 'elohim ki ba'u mayim 'ad nafesh. taba'ti biven mezulah ve'en ma'omad bati bema'amaqei mayim veshibolet shetafateni. yaga'ti beqare'i nikhar geroni kalu 'einai meyakhel leilohai. rabu misa'arot roshi sone'ai khinam 'azemu mazmitai 'oyebai sheqer 'asher lo gazalti 'az 'ashib. 'elohim 'atah yada'ta le'ivalti ve'ashmotai mimekha lo nikhkhadu. 'al yeiboshu bi qoekha 'adonai ihoh zeba'ot 'al yikalemu bi mebaqshekha 'elohei yisra'el. ki 'alekha nasati kherpah kisetah khelimah fanai. muzar hayiti le'ekhai venakheri libnei 'imi. ki qin'at beitekha 'akhalateni vekherpot khorfekha nafelu 'alai. va'ebkeh bazom nafshi vatehi lakharafot li. va'etenah lebushi saq va'ehi lahem lemashal. yasikhu bi yoshebei sha'ar uneginot shotei sheikhar. va'ani tefilati lekha ihoh 'et razon 'elohim berab khasdekha 'aneini be'emet yish'ekha. hazileini mitit ve'al 'etba'ah 'inazelah misone'ai umima'amaqei mayim. 'al tishtefeini shibolet mayim ve'al tibla'eini mezulah ve'al te'tar 'alai be'er piha. 'aneini ihoh ki tob khasdekha kerob rakhamekha peneh 'eilai. ve'al taster panekha mei'abdekha ki zar li maher 'aneini. qarebah 'el nafshi ge'alah lema'an 'oyebai pedeini. 'atah yada'ta kherpati ubasheti ukhelimati negdekha kal zorrai. kherpah shaberah libi va'anushah va'aqaveh lanud va'ayin velamnakhamim velo mazati. vayitenu bebaruti rosh velizma'i yashquni khomez. yehi shulkhanam lifneihem lefakh velishlomim lemoqesh. tekhshakhnah 'eineihem meire'ot umateneihem tamid ham'ad. shefakh 'aleihem za'mekha vakharon 'apekha yasigem. tehi tiratam neshamah be'aholeihem 'al yehi yosheb. ki 'atah 'asher hikita radafu ve'el makh'ob khalalekha yesapeiru. tenah 'avon 'al 'avonam ve'al yabo'u bezidqatekha. yimakhu miseifer khayim ve'im zadiqim 'al yikateibu. va'ani 'ani vekho'eb yeshu'atekha 'elohim tesagebeini. 'ahalah shem 'elohim beshir va'agadelenu betodah. vetitab ihoh mishor par maqrin mafris. ra'u 'anavim yismakhu doreshei 'elohim vikhi lebabkhem. ki shomeia' 'el 'ebyonim ihoh ve'et 'asirav lo bazah. yehaluhu shamayim va'arez yamim vekhal romes bam. ki 'elohim yoshia' ziyon veyibneh 'arei yehudah veyashebu m vireishuha. vezera' 'abadav yinkhaluha ve'ohabei mo yishkenu bah. lamnazeiakh ledavid lehazkir.
