'elohim lehazileini ihoh le'ezrati khushah. yeiboshu veyakhperu mebaqshei nafshi yisogu 'akhor veyikalemu khafeizei ra'ati. yashubu 'al 'eiqeb bashetam ha'omerim he'akh he'akh. yasisu veyismekhu bekha kal mebaqshekha veyomeru tamid yigdal 'elohim 'ohabei yeshu'atekha. va'ani 'ani ve'ebyon 'elohim khushah li 'ezri umefalti 'atah ihoh 'al te'akhar. bekha ihoh khasiti 'al 'eiboshah le'olam. bezidqatekha tazileini utefaleteini hateh 'eilai 'azenekha vehoshi'eini. heyeh li lezur ma'on labo tamid zivita lehoshi'eini ki sal'i umezudati 'atah. 'elohai paleteini miyad rasha' mikaf me'avel vekhomez ki 'atah tiqvati 'adonai ihoh mibtakhi mine'urai. 'alekha nismakhti mibeten mime'ei 'imi 'atah gozi bekha tehilati tamid. kemofet hayiti lerabim ve'atah makhasi 'oz. yimalei fi tehilatekha kal hayom tif'artekha. 'al tashlikheini le'et ziqnah kikhlot kokhi 'al ta'azbeini. ki 'ameru 'oybai li veshomerei nafshi no'azu yakhdav. leimor 'elohim 'azabo ridfu vetifsuhu ki 'en mazil. 'elohim 'al tirkhaq mimeni 'elohai le'ezrati khishah khushah. yeiboshu yikhlu sotenei nafshi ya'atu kherpah ukhelimah mebaqshei ra'ati. va'ani tamid 'ayakhel vehosafti 'al kal tehilatekha. pi yesaper zidqatekha kal hayom teshu'atekha ki lo yada'ti seforot. 'abo bigburot 'adonai ihoh 'azkir zidqatekha lebadekha. 'elohim limadtani mine'urai ve'ad henah 'agid nifle'otekha. vegam 'ad ziqnah veseibah 'elohim 'al ta'azbeini 'ad 'agid zero'akha ledor lekhal yabo geburatekha. vezidqatekha 'elohim 'ad marom 'asher 'asita gedolot 'elohim mi khamokha. 'asher hir'itanu hir'itani zarot rabot vera'ot tashub tekhayeinu tekhayeini umitehomot ha'arez tashub ta'aleini. tereb gedulati vetisob tenakhameini. gam 'ani 'odkha bikhli nebel 'amitekha 'elohai 'azamerah lekha bekhinor qedosh yisra'el. teranenah fatai ki 'azamerah lakh venafshi 'asher padita. gam leshoni kal hayom tehgeh zidqatekha ki boshu khi khaferu mebaqshei ra'ati. lishlomoh 'elohim mishpatekha lemelekh ten vezidqatekha leben melekh. yadin 'amekha bezedeq va'aniyekha bemishpat. yis'u harim shalom la'am ugeba'ot bizdaqah. yishpot 'aniyei 'am yoshia' libnei 'ebyon vidakei 'osheq. yira'ukha 'im shamesh velifnei yareiakh dor dorim. yeired kematar 'al gez kirbibim zarzif 'arez. yifrakh beyamav zadiq verob lom 'ad beli yareiakh. veyeired miyam 'ad yam uminahar 'ad 'afsei 'arez. lefanav yikhre'u ziyim ve'oyebav 'afar yelakheikhu. malkhei tarshish ve'iyim minkhah yashibu malkhei sheba useba 'eshkar yaqribu. veyishtakhavu lo khal melakhim kal goyim ya'abduhu. ki yazil 'ebyon meshaveia' ve'ani ve'en 'ozer lo. yakhos 'al dal ve'ebyon venafshot 'ebyonim yoshia'. mitokh umeikhamas yig'al nafsham veyeiqar damam be'einav. vikhi veyiten lo mizehab sheba veyitpalel ba'ado tamid kal hayom yebarakhenhu. yehi fisat bar ba'arez berosh harim yir'ash kalebanon piryo veyazizu mei'ir ke'eiseb ha'arez. yehi shemo le'olam lifnei shemesh yanin yinon shemo veyitbarekhu bo kal goyim ye'asheruhu. barukh ihoh 'elohim 'elohei yisra'el 'oseh nifla'ot lebado. ubarukh shem kebodo le'olam veyimalei khebodo 'et kol ha'arez 'amen ve'amen. kalu tefilot david ben yishai. mizmor le'asaf 'akh tob leyisra'el 'elohim lebarei leibab. va'ani kim'at natui natayu raglai ke'ayin shupekhah shupekhu 'ashurai. ki qineiti baholim shelom resha'im 'er'eh. ki 'en kharzubot lemotam ubari 'ulam. ba'amal 'enosh 'eineimo ve'im 'adam lo yenuga'u. lakhen 'anaqatmo ga'avah ya'atafoshi t khamas lamo. yaza meikheileb 'eineimo 'aberu maskiyot leibab. yamiqu vidaberu bera' 'osheq mimarom yedabeiru. shatu bashamayim pihem uleshonam tihalakh ba'arez. lakhen yashib yashub 'amo halom umei malei yimazu lamo. ve'ameru 'eikhah yada' 'el veyesh dei'ah be'elyon. hineh 'eleh resha'im veshalvei 'olam hisgu khayil. 'akh riq zikiti lebabi va'erkhaz beniqayon kapai. va'ehi nagua' kal hayom vetokhakhti labeqarim. 'im 'amarti 'asaperah khemo hineh dor banekha bagadeti. va'akhashebah lada'at zot 'amal hi hu be'einai. 'ad 'abo 'el miqdeshei 'el 'abinah le'akharitam. 'akh bakhalaqot tashit lamo hipaltam lemashu'ot. 'ekh hayu leshamah kheraga' safu tamu min balahot. kakhalom meihaqiz 'adonai ba'ir zalmam tibzeh. ki yitkhamez lebabi vekhilyotai 'eshtonan. va'ani ba'ar velo 'eida' beheimot hayiti 'imakh. va'ani tamid 'imakh 'akhazta beyad yemini. ba'azatekha tankheini ve'akhar kabod tiqakheini. mi li bashamayim ve'imekha lo khafazti ba'arez. kalah she'eiri ulebabi zur lebabi vekhelqi 'elohim le'olam. ki hineh rekheiqekha yobeidu hizmatah kal zoneh mimeka. va'ani qirabat 'elohim li tob shati badonai ihoh makhsi lesaper kal mal'akhotekha. maskil le'asaf lamah 'elohim zanakhta lanezakh ye'shan 'apekha bezon mar'itekha. zekhor 'adatekha qanita qedem ga'alta sheibet nakhalatekha har ziyon zeh shakhanta bo. harimah fe'amekha lemashu'ot nezakh kal heira' 'oyeb baqodesh. sha'agu zorerekha beqereb mo'adekha samu 'ototam 'otot. yivada' kemeibi lema'elah bisabakh 'ez qardumot. ve'et ve'atah pitukheha yakhad bekhashil vekheilapot yahalomun. shilkhu ba'esh miqdashekha la'arez khilelu mishkan shemekha. 'ameru belibam ninam yakhad sarefu khal mo'adei 'el ba'arez. 'ototeinu lo ra'inu 'en 'od nabi velo 'itanu yodeia' 'ad mah. 'ad matai 'elohim yekharef zar yena'ez 'oyeb shimkha lanezakh. lamah tashib yadekha viminekha miqereb khoqkha kheiqekha khaleh. veilohim malki miqedem po'el yeshu'ot beqereb ha'arez. 'atah forarta be'azekha yam shibarta rashei taninim 'al hamayim. 'atah rizazta rashei livyatan titenenu ma'akhal le'am leziyim. 'atah baqa'ta ma'yan vanakhal 'atah hobashta naharot 'eitan. lekha yom 'af lekha layelah 'atah hakhinota ma'or vashamesh. 'atah hizabta kal gebulot 'arez qayiz vakhoref 'atah yezartam zekhar zot 'oyeb kheiref ihoh ve'am nabal ni'azu shemekha. 'al titen lekhayat nefesh torekha khayat 'aniyekha 'al tishkakh lanezakh. habet laberit ki male'u makhashakei 'erez ne'ot khamas. 'al yashob dakh nikhlam 'ani ve'ebyon yehalu shemekha. qumah 'elohim ribah ribekha zekhor kherpatekha mini nabal kal hayom. 'al tishkakh qol zorerekha she'on qamekha 'oleh tamid. lamnazeiakh 'al tashkhet mizmor le'asaf shir. hodinu lekha 'elohim hodinu veqarob shemekha siperu nifle'otekha. ki 'eqakh mo'ed 'ani meisharim 'eshpot. nemogim 'erez vekhal yoshebeha 'anokhi tikanti 'amudeha selah. 'amarti laholim 'al taholu velaresha'im 'al tarimu qaren. 'al tarimu lamarom qarnekhem tedaberu bezavar 'ataq. ki lo mimoza umima'arab velo mimidbar harim. ki 'elohim shofet zeh yashpil vezeh yarim. ki khos beyad ihoh veyayin khamar malei mesekh vayager mizeh 'akhosh mareha yimzu yishtu kol rish'ei 'arez. va'ani 'agid le'olam 'azamerah leilohei ya'aqob. vekhal qarnei resha'im 'agadeia' teromamnah qarnot zadiq. lamnazeiakh binginot mizmor le'asaf shir. noda' bihudah 'elohim beyisra'el gadol shemo. vayhi beshalem suko ume'onato beziyon. mah shibar rishfei qashet magen vekhereb umilkhamah selah. na'or 'atah 'adir meiharrei taref. 'eshtolu 'abirei leb namu shenatam velo maze'u khal 'anshei khayil yedeihem. miga'aratekha 'elohei ya'aqob nirdam verekheb vasus. 'atah nora 'atah umi ya'amod lefanekha mei'az 'apekha. mishamayim hishma'ta din 'erez yare'ah veshaqatah. bequm lamishpat 'elohim lehoshia' kal 'anvei 'erez selah. ki khamat 'adam todeka she'eirit kheimot takhgor. nidaru veshalemu ihoh 'eloheikhem kal sebibav yobilu shai lamora. yibzor ruakh negidim nora lemalkhei 'arez. lamnazeiakh 'al yeditun yedutun le'asaf mizmor. qoli 'el 'elohim ve'ez'aqah qoli 'el 'elohim veha'azin 'eilai. beyom zarati 'adonai darasheti yadi laylah nigerah velo tafug mei'anah hinakhem nafshi. 'ezkerah 'elohim ve'ehemayah 'asikhah vetit'atef rukhi selah. 'akhazta shemurot 'einai nif'amti velo 'adaber. khishabti yamim miqedem not 'olamim. 'ezkerah neginati balayelah 'im lebabi 'asikhah vaykhapes rukhi. hal'olamim yiznakh 'adonai velo yosif lirzot 'od. he'afes lanezakh khasdo gamar 'omer ledor vador. hashakhakh khanot 'el 'im qafaz be'af rakhamav selah. va'omar khaloti hi not yemin 'elyon. 'azkir 'ezkor ma'alei yah ki 'ezkerah miqedem pil'ekha. vehagiti bekhal pa'olekha uba'alilotekha 'asikhah. 'elohim baqodesh darkekha mi 'el gadol keilohim. 'atah ha'el 'oseh fele hoda'ta ba'amim 'uzekha. ga'alta bizroa' 'amekha benei ya'aqob veyosef selah. ra'ukha mayim 'elohim ra'ukha mayim yakhilu 'af yirgezu tehomot. zoremu mayim 'abot qol natenu shekhaqim 'af khazazekha yithalakhu. qol ra'amkha bagalgal hei'iru beraqim teibel ragezah vatir'ash ha'arez. bayam darkekha ushebilekha ushebilekha bemayim rabim ve'iqebotekha lo noda'u. nakhita khazon 'amekha beyad mosheh ve'aharon. maskil le'asaf ha'azinah 'ami torati hatu 'azenekhem le'imrei fi. 'eftekhah bemashal pi 'abi'ah khidot mini qedem. 'asher ma'nu vaneida'em va'aboteinu siperu lanu. lo nekhakhed mibeneihem ledor 'akharon mesaperim tehilot ihoh ve'ezuzo venifle'otav 'asher 'asah. vayaqem 'eidut beya'aqob vetorah sam beyisra'el 'asher zivah 'et 'aboteinu lehodi'am libneihem. lema'an yeide'u dor 'akharon banim yivaleidu yaqumu visaperu libneihem. veyasimu beilohim kislam velo yishkekhu ma'alei 'el umizvotav yinzoru. velo yihyu ka'abotam dor sorer umoreh dor lo heikhin libo velo ne'emnah 'et 'el rukho. benei 'efrayim nosheqei romei qashet hafekhu beyom qerab. lo meru berit 'elohim ubetorato mei'anu lalekhet. vayishkekhu 'alilotav venifle'otav 'asher her'am. neged 'abotam 'asah fele be'erez mizrayim sedeh zo'an. baqa' yam vaya'abirem vayazeb mayim kemo ned. vayankhem be'anan yomam vekhal halaylah be'or 'esh. yebaqa' zurim bamidbar vayashq kithomot rabah. vayozi nozlim misala' vayored kaneharot mayim. vayosifu 'od lakhato lo lamrot 'elyon baziyah. vaynasu 'el bilbabam lish'al 'okhel lenafsham. vaydaberu beilohim 'ameru hayukhal 'el la'arokh lekhan bamidbar. hen hikah zur vayazubu mayim unekhalim yishtofu hagam lekhem yukhal tet 'im yakhin she'er le'amo. lakhen shama' ihoh vayit'abar ve'esh niseqah beya'aqob vegam 'af 'alah beyisra'el. ki lo he'eminu beilohim velo batekhu bishu'ato. vayzav shekhaqim mima'al vedaltei shamayim patakh. vayamter 'aleihem man le'ekhol udeganosha mayim natan lamo. lekhem 'abirim 'akhal 'ish zeidah shalakh lahem lasoba'. yasa' qadim bashamayim vaynaheg be'uzo teiman. vayamter 'aleihem ke'afar she'er ukhekhol yamim 'of kanaf. vayapel beqereb makhaneihu sabib lemishkenotav. vayokhelu vayisbe'u me'od veta'avatam yabi lahem. lo zaru mita'avatam 'od 'akhelam befihem. ve'af 'elohim 'alah bahem vayaharog bemishmaneihem ubakhurei yisra'el hikhria'. bekhal zot khate'u 'od velo he'eminu benifle'otav. vaykhal bahebel yemeihem ushenotam babehalah. 'im haragam uderashuhu veshabu veshikharu 'el. vayizkeru ki 'elohim zuram ve'el 'elyon go'alam. vayfatuhu befihem ubilshonam yekhazebu lo. velibam lo nakhon 'imo velo ne'emnu bibrito. vehu rakhum yekhaper 'avon velo yashkhit vehirbah lehashib 'apo velo ya'ir kal khamato. vayizkor ki basar hemah ruakh holekh velo yashub. kamah yamruhu bamidbar ya'azibuhu bishimon. vayashubu vaynasu 'el uqedosh yisra'el hitvu. lo zakheru 'et yado yom 'asher padam mini zar. 'asher sam bemizrayim 'ototav umoftav bisdeh zo'an. vayahafokh ledam ye'oreihem venozeleihem bal yishtayun. yeshalakh bahem 'arob vayokhelem uzefardeia' vatashkhitem. vayiten lekhasil yebulam vigi'am la'arbeh. yaharog babarad gafnam veshiqmotam bakhanamal. vayasger labarad be'iram umiqneihem lareshafim. yeshalakh bam kharon 'apo 'ebrah vaza'am vezarah mishlakhat mal'akhei ra'im. yefales natib le'apo lo khasakh mimavet nafsham vekhayatam ladeber hisgir. vayakh kal bekhor bemizrayim reishit 'onim be'aholei kham. vayasa' kazon 'amo vaynahagem ka'eider bamidbar. vayankhem labetakh velo fakhadu ve'et 'oybeihem kisah hayam. vaybi'em 'el gebul qadesho har zeh qanetah yemino. vaygaresh mipeneihem goyim vayapilem bekhebel nakhalah vayashken be'aholeihem shibtei yisra'el. vaynasu vayamru 'et 'elohim 'elyon ve'eidotav lo shamaru. vayisogu vayibgedu ka'abotam nehpekhu keqeshet remiyah. vayakh'isuhu bebamotam ubifsileihem yaqni'uhu. shama' 'elohim vayit'abar vayim'as me'od beyisra'el. vayitosh mishkan shilo 'ohel shiken ba'adam. vayiten lashebi 'uzo vetif'arto beyad zar. vayasger lakhereb 'amo ubenakhalato hit'abar. bakhurav 'akhelah 'esh ubetulotav lo hulalu. kohanav bakhereb nafalu ve'almenotav lo tibkenah. vayiqaz keyashen 'adonai kegibor mitronen miyayin. vayakh zarav 'akhor kherpat 'olam natan lamo. vayim'as be'ohel yosef ubesheibet 'efrayim lo bakhar. vayibkhar 'et sheibet yehudah 'et har ziyon 'asher 'aheb. vayiben kemo ramim miqdasho ke'erez yesadah le'olam. vayibkhar bedavid 'abdo vayiqakheihu mimikhle'ot zon. mei'akhar 'alot hebi'o lir'ot beya'aqob 'amo ubeyisra'el nakhalato. vayir'em ketom lebabo ubitbunot kapav yankhem. mizmor le'asaf 'elohim ba'u goyim benakhalatekha time'u 'et heikhal qadshekha samu 'et yerushalim le'iyim. natenu 'et niblat 'abadekha ma'akhal le'of hashamayim besar khasidekha lekhayto 'arez. shafekhu damam kamayim sebibot yerushalim ve'en qober. hayinu kherpah lishkheineinu la'ag vaqeles lisbiboteinu. 'ad mah ihoh te'enaf lanezakh tib'ar kemo 'esh qin'atekha. shefokh khamatekha 'el hagoyim 'asher lo yeda'ukha ve'al mamlakhot 'asher beshimkha lo qara'u. ki 'akhal 'et ya'aqob ve'et naveihu heishamu. 'al tizkar lanu 'avonot rishonim maher yeqademunu rakhamekha ki dalonu me'od. 'azereinu 'elohei yish'einu 'al debar kebod shemekha vehazileinu vekhaper 'al khatoteinu lema'an shemekha. lamah yomeru hagoyim 'ayeh 'eloheihem yivada' bagiyim bagoyim le'eineinu niqmat dam 'abadekha hashafukh. tabo lefanekha 'enqat 'asir kegodel zero'akha hoter benei temutah. vehasheb lishkheineinu be'atayim 'el kheiqam kherpatam 'asher kheirefukha 'adonai. va'anakhnu 'amekha vezon mar'itekha nodeh lekha le'olam ledor vador nesaper tehilatekha. lamnazeiakh 'el shoshanim 'eidut le'asaf mizmor. ro'eh yisra'el ha'azinah noheg kazon yosef yosheb hakerubim hofi'ah. lifnei 'efrayim ubinyamin umenasheh 'orrah 'et geburatekha ulekhah lishu'atah lanu. 'elohim hashibeinu veha'er panekha venivashei'ah. ihoh 'elohim zeba'ot 'ad matai 'ashanta bitfilat 'amekha. he'ekhaltam lekhem dim'ah vatashqeimo bidma'ot shalish. tesimeinu madon lishkheineinu ve'oyebeinu yil'agu lamo. 'elohim zeba'ot hashibeinu veha'er panekha venivashei'ah. gefen mimizrayim tasia' tegaresh goyim vatita'eha. pinita lefaneha vatashresh rasheha vatemalei 'arez. kasu harim zilah va'anafeha 'arzei 'el. teshalakh qezireha 'ad yam ve'el nahar yonqoteha. lamah parazta gedeireha ve'aruha kal 'oberei darekh. yekharsemenah khazir miya'ar veziz sadai yir'enah. 'elohim zeba'ot shub na habet mishamayim ure'eh ufeqod gefen zot. vekhanah 'asher nate'ah yeminekha ve'al ben 'imaztah lakh. serufah ba'esh kesukhah miga'arat panekha yobeidu. tehi yadekha 'al 'ish yeminekha 'al ben 'adam 'imazta lakh. velo nasog mimeka tekhayeinu ubeshimkha niqra. ihoh 'elohim zeba'ot hashibeinu ha'er panekha venivashei'ah. lamnazeiakh 'al hagitit le'asaf. harninu leilohim 'uzeinu hari'u leilohei ya'aqob. se'u zimrah utenu tof kinor na'im 'im nabel. tiq'u bakhodesh shofar bakeiseh leyom khageinu. ki khoq leyisra'el hu mishpat leilohei ya'aqob. 'eidut bihosef samo bezeito 'al 'erez mizrayim sefat lo yada'ti 'eshma'. hasiroti miseibel shikhmo kapav midud ta'aborenah. bazarah qarata va'akhalezeka 'e'enkha beseiter ra'am 'ebkhanekha 'al mei meribah selah. shema' 'ami ve'a'idah bakh yisra'el 'im tishma' li. lo yihyeh bekha 'el zar velo tishtakhaveh le'el neikhar. 'anokhi ihoh 'elohekha hama'alkha mei'erez mizrayim harkheb pikha va'amal'eihu. velo shama' 'ami leqoli veyisra'el lo 'abah li. va'ashalekheihu bishrirut libam yeilekhu bemo'azoteihem. lu 'ami shomeia' li yisra'el bidrakhai yehaleikhu. kim'at 'oybeihem 'akhnia' ve'al zareihem 'ashib yadi. mesan'ei ihoh yekhakhashu lo vihi 'itam le'olam. vaya'akhileihu meikheileb khitah umizur debash 'asbi'ekha. mizmor le'asaf 'elohim nizab ba'adat 'el beqereb 'elohim yishpot. 'ad matai tishpetu 'avel ufenei resha'im tis'u selah. shiftu dal veyatom 'ani varash hazdiqu. paletu dal ve'ebyon miyad resha'im hazilu. lo yade'u velo yabinu bakhasheikhah yithalakhu yimotu kal mosdei 'arez. 'ani 'amarti 'elohim 'atem ubenei 'elyon kulekhem. 'akhen ke'adam temutun ukhe'akhad hasarim tipolu. qumah 'elohim shafetah ha'arez ki 'atah tinkhal bekhal hagoyim. shir mizmor le'asaf. 'elohim 'al domi lakh 'al tekherash ve'al tishqot 'el. ki hineh 'oybekha yehemayun umesan'ekha nase'u rosh. 'al 'amekha ya'arimu sod veyitya'azu 'al zefunekha. 'ameru lekhu venakhkhidem migo velo yizakher shem yisra'el 'od. ki no'azu leb yakhdav 'alekha berit yikhrotu. 'aholei 'edom veyishme'eilim mo'ab vehagrim. gebal ve'amon va'amaleq peleshet 'im yoshebei zor. gam 'ashur nilvah 'imam hayu zeroa' libnei lot selah. 'aseh lahem kemidyan kesisera kheyabin benakhal qishon. nishmedu be'en dor hayu domen la'adamah. shiteimo nedibeimo ke'oreb vekhiz'eb ukhezebakh ukhezalmuna' kal nesikheimo. 'asher 'ameru nirashah lanu 'et ne'ot 'elohim. 'elohai shiteimo khagalgal keqash lifnei ruakh. ke'esh tib'ar ya'ar ukhelehabah telahet harim. ken tirdefem besa'arekha ubesufatekha tebahalem. malei feneihem qalon vibaqshu shimkha ihoh. yeiboshu veyibahalu 'adei 'ad veyakhperu veyobeidu. veyeide'u ki 'atah shimkha ihoh lebadekha 'elyon 'al kal ha'arez. lamnazeiakh 'al hagitit libnei qorakh mizmor. mah yedidot mishkenotekha ihoh zeba'ot. nikhsefah vegam kaletah nafshi lekhazrot ihoh libi ubesari yeranenu 'el 'el khai. gam zipor maze'ah bayit uderor qen lah 'asher shatah 'efrokheha 'et mizbekhotekha ihoh zeba'ot malki veilohai. 'ashrei yoshebei beitekha 'od yehalukha selah. 'ashrei 'adam 'oz lo bakh mesilot bilbabam. 'oberei be'eimeq habakha ma'yan yeshituhu gam berakhot ya'teh moreh. yeilekhu meikhayil 'el khayil yeira'eh 'el 'elohim beziyon. ihoh 'elohim zeba'ot shim'ah tefilati ha'azinah 'elohei ya'aqob selah. magineinu re'eh 'elohim vehabet penei meshikhekha. ki tob yom bakhazeirekha mei'alef bakharti histofef bebet 'elohai midur be'aholei resha'. ki shemesh umagen ihoh 'elohim khen vekhabod yiten ihoh lo yimna' tob laholekhim betamim. ihoh zeba'ot 'ashrei 'adam boteiakh bakh. lamnazeiakh libnei qorakh mizmor. razita ihoh 'arzekha beta shebut shebit ya'aqob. nasata 'avon 'amekha kisita khal khatatam selah. 'asafta khal 'ebratekha heshibota meikharon 'apekha. ubeinu 'elohei yish'einu vehafer ka'askha 'imanu. hal'olam te'enaf banu timshokh 'apekha ledor vador. halo 'atah tashub tekhayeinu ve'amekha yismekhu bakh. har'einu ihoh khasdekha veyesh'akha titen lanu. 'eshme'ah mah yedaber ha'el ihoh ki yedaber shalom 'el 'amo ve'el khasidav ve'al yashubu lekhislah. 'akh qarob lirei'av yish'o lishkon kabod be'arzeinu. khesed ve'emet nifgashu zedeq veshalom nashaqu. 'emet mei'erez tizmakh vezedeq mishamayim nishqaf. gam ihoh yiten hatob ve'arzeinu titen yebulah. zedeq lefanav yehalekh veyasem lederekh pe'amav. tefilah ledavid hateh ihoh 'azenekha 'aneini ki 'ani ve'ebyon 'ani. shamerah nafshi ki khasid 'ani hosha' 'abdekha 'atah 'elohai haboteiakh 'eilekha. khaneini 'adonai ki 'eilekha 'eqra kal hayom. meiakh nefesh 'abdekha ki 'eilekha 'adonai nafshi 'esa. ki 'atah 'adonai tob vesalakh verab khesed lekhal qore'ekha. ha'azinah ihoh tefilati vehaqshibah beqol takhanunotai. beyom zarati 'eqra'eka ki ta'aneini. 'en kamokha ba'elohim 'adonai ve'en kema'asekha. kal goyim 'asher 'asita yabo'u veyishtakhavu lefanekha 'adonai vikhabedu lishmekha. ki gadol 'atah ve'oseh nifla'ot 'atah 'elohim lebadekha. horeini ihoh darkekha 'ahalekh ba'amitekha yakhed lebabi leyir'ah shemekha. 'odkha 'adonai 'elohai bekhal lebabi va'akhabedah shimkha le'olam. ki khasdekha gadol 'alai vehizalta nafshi mishe'ol takhtiyah. 'elohim zeidim qamu 'alai va'adat 'arizim biqshu nafshi velo samukha lenegdam. ve'atah 'adonai 'el rakhum vekhanun 'erekh 'apayim verab khesed ve'emet. peneh 'eilai vekhaneini tenah 'uzekha le'abdekha vehoshi'ah leben 'amatekha. 'aseh 'imi 'ot letobah veyir'u sone'ai veyeiboshu ki 'atah ihoh 'azartani venikhamtani. libnei qorakh mizmor shir yesudato beharrei qodesh. 'oheb ihoh sha'arei ziyon mikol mishkenot ya'aqob. nikhbadot medubar bakh 'ir ha'elohim selah. 'azkir rahab ubabel leyode'ai hineh feleshet vezor 'im kush zeh yulad sham. ulaziyon yei'amar 'ish ve'ish yulad bah vehu yekhoneha 'elyon. ihoh yispor bikhtob 'amim zeh yulad sham selah. vesharim kekholelim kal ma'yanai bakh. shir mizmor libnei qorakh lamnazeiakh 'al makhalat le'anot maskil leheiman ha'ezrakhi. ihoh 'elohei yeshu'ati yom za'aqti balaylah negdekha. tabo lefanekha tefilati hateh 'azenekha lerinati. ki sabe'ah bera'ot nafshi vekhayai lish'ol higi'u. nekhshabti 'im yordei bor hayiti kegeber 'en 'eyal. bameitim khafeshi kemo khalalim shokhebei qeber 'asher lo zekhartam 'od vehemah miyadekha nigzaru. tani bebor takhtiyot bemakhashakim bimzolot. 'alai samekhah khamatekha vekhal mishbarekha 'inita selah. hirkhaqta meyuda'ai mimeni shatani to'eibot lamo kalu velo 'eizei. 'eini da'abah mini 'oni qeratikha ihoh bekhal yom shitakhti 'eilekha khapai. halameitim ta'aseh pele 'im refa'im yaqumu yodukha selah. haysupar baqeber khasdekha 'emunatekha ba'abadon. hayivada' bakhoshekh pil'ekha vezidqatekha be'erez neshiyah. va'ani 'eilekha ihoh shiva'ti ubaboqer tefilati teqademeka. lamah ihoh tiznakh nafshi tastir panekha mimeni. 'ani 'ani vegoeia' mino'ar nasati 'eimekha 'afunah. 'alai 'aberu kharonekha bi'utekha zimetutuni. sabuni khamayim kal hayom hiqifu 'alai yakhad. hirkhaqta mimeni 'oheb vareia' meyuda'ai makhshakh. maskil le'eitan ha'ezrakhi. khasdei ihoh 'olam 'ashirah ledor vador 'odia' 'emunatekha befi. ki 'amarti 'olam khesed yibaneh shamayim takhin 'emunatekha bahem. karati berit libkhiri nishba'ti ledavid 'abdi. 'ad 'olam 'akhin zar'ekha ubaniti ledor vador kis'akha selah. veyodu shamayim pil'akha ihoh 'af 'emunatekha biqhal qedoshim. ki mi bashakhaq ya'arokh ihoh yidmeh ihoh bibnei 'eilim 'el na'araz besod qedoshim rabah venora 'al kal sebibav. ihoh 'elohei zeba'ot mi khamokha khasin yah ve'emunatekha sebibotekha. 'atah moshel begei'ut hayam beso galav 'atah teshabekhem. 'atah dikita khekhalal rahab bizroa' 'uzekha pizarta 'oybekha. lekha mayim 'af lekha 'arez teibel umelo'ah 'atah yesadtam. zafon veyamin 'atah beratam tabor vekhermon beshimkha yeraneinu. lekha zeroa' 'im geburah ta'oz yadekha tarum yeminekha. zedeq umishpat mekhon kis'ekha khesed ve'emet yeqademu fanekha. 'ashrei ha'am yod'ei teru'ah ihoh be'or panekha yehaleikhun. beshimkha yegilun kal hayom ubezidqatekha yarumu. ki tif'eret 'uzamo 'atah ubirzonekha tarim tarum qarneinu. ki ihoh magineinu veliqdosh yisra'el malkeinu. 'az dibarta bekhazon lakhasidekha vatomer shiviti 'eizer 'al gibor harimoti bakhur mei'am. mazati david 'abdi beshemen qadshi meshakhtiv. 'asher yadi tikon 'imo 'af zero'i te'amezenu. lo yashi 'oyeb bo uben 'avlah lo ye'anenu. vekhatoti mipanav zarav umesan'av 'egof. ve'emunati vekhasdi 'imo ubishmi tarum qarno. vesamti bayam yado ubaneharot yemino. hu yiqra'eini 'abi 'atah 'eili vezur yeshu'ati. 'af 'ani bekhor 'eteneihu 'elyon lemalkhei 'arez. le'olam 'eshmor 'eshmar lo khasdi uberiti ne'emenet lo. vesamti la'ad zar'o vekhis'o kimei shamayim. 'im ya'azbu banav torati ubemishpatai lo yeileikhun. 'im khuqotai yekhaleilu umizvotai lo yishmoru. ufaqadti besheibet pish'am ubinga'im 'avonam. vekhasdi lo 'afir mei'imo velo 'ashaqer be'emunati. lo 'akhalel beriti umoza fatai lo 'ashaneh. 'akhat nishba'ti beqadeshi 'im ledavid 'akhazeb. zar'o le'olam yihyeh vekhis'o khashemesh negdi. keyareiakh yikon 'olam ve'ed bashakhaq ne'eman selah. ve'atah zanakhta vatim'as hit'abarta 'im meshikhekha. nei'artah berit 'abdekha khilalta la'arez nizro. parazta khal gedeirotav samta mibzarav mekhitah suhu kal 'oberei darekh hayah kherpah lishkheinav. harimota yemin zarav hismakhta kal 'oybav. 'af tashib zur kharbo velo haqeimoto bamilkhamah. hishbata miteharo vekhis'o la'arez migartah. hiqzarta yemei 'alumav he'etita 'alav bushah selah. 'ad mah ihoh tisater lanezakh tib'ar kemo 'esh khamatekha. zekhar 'ani meh khaled 'al mahosha v barata khal benei 'adam. mi geber yikhyeh velo yir'eh mavet yemalet nafsho miyad she'ol selah. 'ayeh khasadekha harishonim 'adonai nishba'ta ledavid be'emunatekha. zekhor 'adonai kherpat 'abadekha se'eiti bekheiqi kal rabim 'amim. 'asher kheirefu 'oybekha ihoh 'asher kheirefu 'iqebot meshikhekha. barukh ihoh le'olam 'amen ve'amen. tefilah lemosheh 'ish ha'elohim 'adonai ma'on 'atah hayita lanu bedor vador. beterem harim yuladu vatekholel 'erez veteibel umei'olam 'ad 'olam 'atah 'el. tasheb 'enosh 'ad daka vatomer shubu benei 'adam. ki 'elef shanim be'einekha keyom 'etmol ki ya'abor ve'ashmurah balayelah. zeramtam sheinah yihyu baboqer kekhazir yakhalof. baboqer yaziz vekhalaf la'ereb yemolel veyabesh. ki khalinu be'apekha ubakhamatekha nibhalenu. shata shatah 'avonoteinu lenegdekha 'alumeinu lim'or panekha. ki khal yameinu panu be'ebratekha kilinu shaneinu khemo hegeh. yemei shenoteinu bahem shib'im shanah ve'im bigburot shemonim shanah verahebam 'amal va'aven ki gaz khish vana'ufah. mi yodeia' 'oz 'apekha ukheyir'atekha 'ebratekha. limnot yameinu ken hoda' venabi lebab khakhmah shubah ihoh 'ad matai vehinakhem 'al 'abadekha. sabe'einu baboqer khasdekha uneranenah venismekhah bekhal yameinu. mekheinu kimot 'initanu not ra'inu ra'ah. yeira'eh 'el 'abadekha fa'olekha vahadarekha 'al beneihem. vihi no'am 'adonai 'eloheinu 'aleinu uma'aseh yadeinu konah 'aleinu uma'aseh yadeinu koneihu. yosheb beseiter 'elyon bezel dai yitlonan. 'omar ihoh makhsi umezudati 'elohai 'ebtakh bo. ki hu yazilekha mipakh yaqush mideber havot. be'ebrato yasekh lakh vetakhat kenafav tekhseh zinah vesokheirah 'amito. lo tira mipakhad layelah meikhez ya'uf yomam. mideber ba'ofel yahalokh miqeteb yashud zahorayim. yipol mizidekha 'elef urebabah miminekha 'eilekha lo yigash. raq be'einekha tabit veshilumat resha'im tir'eh. ki 'atah ihoh makhsi 'elyon samta me'onekha. lo te'uneh 'eilekha ra'ah venega' lo yiqrab be'aholekha. ki mal'akhav yezaveh lakh lishmarekha bekhal derakhekha. 'al kapayim yisa'unekha pen tigof ba'eben raglekha. 'al shakhal vafeten tidrokh tirmos kefir vetanin. ki bi khashaq va'afaleteihu 'asagebeihu ki yada' shemi. yiqra'eini ve'e'eneihu 'imo 'anokhi bezarah 'akhalezeihu va'akhabedeihu. 'orekh yamim 'asbi'eihu ve'ar'eihu bishu'ati. mizmor shir leyom hashabat. tob lehodot ihoh ulezamer leshimkha 'elyon. lehagid baboqer khasdekha ve'emunatekha baleilot. 'alei 'asor va'alei nabel 'alei higayon bekhinor. ki simakhtani ihoh befa'olekha bema'asei yadekha 'aranen. mah gadelu ma'asekha ihoh me'od 'amequ makhshebotekha. 'ish ba'ar lo yeida' ukhesil lo yabin 'et zot. bifroakh resha'im kemo 'eiseb vayazizu kal po'alei 'aven lehishamedam 'adei 'ad. ve'atah marom le'olam ihoh. ki hineh 'oyebekha ihoh ki hineh 'oyebekha yobeidu yitparedu kal po'alei 'aven. vatarem kir'em qarni baloti beshemen ra'anan. vatabet 'eini beshurai baqamim 'alai merei'im tishma'nah 'azenai. zadiq katamar yifrakh ke'erez balebanon yisgeh. tulim bebet ihoh bekhazrot 'eloheinu yafrikhu. 'od yenubun beseibah desheinim vera'ananim yihyu. lehagid ki yashar ihoh zuri velo 'olatah 'avlatah bo. ihoh malakh gei'ut labesh labesh ihoh 'oz hit'azar 'af tikon teibel bal timot. nakhon kis'akha mei'az mei'olam 'atah. nase'u neharot ihoh nase'u neharot qolam yis'u neharot dakheyam. miqolot mayim rabim 'adirim mishberei yam 'adir bamarom ihoh. 'eidotekha ne'emnu me'od lebeitekha na'avah qodesh ihoh le'orekh yamim. 'el neqamot ihoh 'el neqamot hofiya'. hinasei shofet ha'arez hasheb gemul 'al gei'im. 'ad matai resha'im ihoh 'ad matai resha'im ya'alozu. yabi'u yedaberu 'ataq yit'ameru kal po'alei 'aven. 'amekha ihoh yedake'u venakhalatekha ye'anu. 'almanah veger yaharogu vitomim yerazeikhu. vayomeru lo yir'eh yah velo yabin 'elohei ya'aqob. binu bo'arim ba'am ukhesilim matai taskilu. hanota' 'ozen halo yishma' 'im yozer 'ayin halo yabit. hayoser goyim halo yokhiakh hamlamed 'adam da'at. ihoh yodeia' makhshebot 'adam ki hemah habel. 'ashrei hageber 'asher teyaserenu yah umitoratekha telamedenu. lehashqit lo mimei ra' 'ad yikareh larasha' shakhat. ki lo yitosh ihoh 'amo venakhalato lo ya'azob. ki 'ad zedeq yashub mishpat ve'akharav kal yishrei leb. mi yaqum li 'im merei'im mi yityazeb li 'im po'alei 'aven. lulei ihoh 'ezratah li kim'at shakhenah dumah nafshi. 'im 'amarti matah ragli khasdekha ihoh yis'adeini. berob sar'apai beqirbi tankhumekha yesha'ash'u nafshi. haykhaberekha kisei havot yozer 'amal 'alei khoq. yagodu 'al nefesh zadiq vedam naqi yarshi'u. vayhi ihoh li lemisgab veilohai lezur makhsi. vayasheb 'aleihem 'et 'onam ubera'atam yazmitem yazmitem ihoh 'eloheinu. lekhu neranenah ihoh nari'ah lezur yish'einu. neqademah fanav betodah bizmirot naria' lo. ki 'el gadol ihoh umelekh gadol 'al kal 'elohim. 'asher beyado mekhqerei 'arez veto'afot harim lo. 'asher lo hayam vehu 'asahu veyabeshet yadav yazaru. bo'u nishtakhaveh venikhra'ah nibrekhah lifnei ihoh 'oseinu. ki hu 'eloheinu va'anakhnu 'am mar'ito vezon yado hayom 'im beqolo tishma'u. 'al taqshu lebabkhem kimribah keyom masah bamidbar. 'asher nisuni 'aboteikhem bekhanuni gam ra'u fa'oli. 'arba'im shanah 'aqut bedor va'omar 'am to'ei leibab hem vehem lo yade'u derakhai. 'asher nishba'ti be'api 'im yebo'un 'el menukhati. shiru ihoh shir khadash shiru ihoh kal ha'arez. shiru ihoh barakhu shemo baseru miyom leyom yeshu'ato. saperu bagoyim kebodo bekhal ha'amim nifle'otav. ki gadol ihoh umehulal me'od nora hu 'al kal 'elohim. ki kal 'elohei ha'amim 'elilim ihoh shamayim 'asah. hod vehadar lefanav 'oz vetif'eret bemiqdasho. habu ihoh mishpekhot 'amim habu ihoh kabod va'oz. habu ihoh kebod shemo se'u minkhah ubo'u lekhazrotav. hishtakhavu ihoh behadrat qodesh khilu mipanav kal ha'arez. 'imru bagoyim ihoh malakh 'af tikon teibel bal timot yadin 'amim bemeisharim. yismekhu hashamayim vetagel ha'arez yir'am hayam umelo'o. ya'aloz dai vekhal 'asher bo 'az yeranenu kal 'azei ya'ar. lifnei ihoh ki ba ki ba lishpot ha'arez yishpot teibel bezedeq ve'amim be'emunato. ihoh malakh tagel ha'arez yismekhu 'iyim rabim. 'anan va'arafel sebibav zedeq umishpat mekhon kis'o. 'esh lefanav teilekh utelahet sabib zarav. hei'iru beraqav teibel ra'atah vatakhel ha'arez. harim kadonag namasu milifnei ihoh milifnei 'adon kal ha'arez. higidu hashamayim zidqo vera'u khal ha'amim kebodo. yeiboshu kal 'obedei fesel hamithalim ba'elilim hishtakhavu lo kal 'elohim. shame'ah vatismakh ziyon vatageilenah benot yehudah lema'an mishpatekha ihoh. ki 'atah ihoh 'elyon 'al kal ha'arez me'od na'aleita 'al kal 'elohim. 'ohabei ihoh sin'u ra' mer nafshot khasidav miyad resha'im yazilem. 'or zarua' lazadiq uleyishrei leb simkhah. simkhu zadiqim ihoh vehodu lezeikher qadesho. mizmor shiru ihoh shir khadash ki nifla'ot 'asah hoshi'ah lo yemino uzeroa' qadesho. hodia' ihoh yeshu'ato le'einei hagoyim gilah zidqato. zakhar khasdo ve'emunato lebet yisra'el ra'u khal 'afsei 'arez 'et yeshu'at 'eloheinu. hari'u ihoh kal ha'arez pizkhu veranenu vezameiru. zameru ihoh bekhinor bekhinor veqol zimrah. bakhazozerot veqol shofar hari'u lifnei hamelekh ihoh. yir'am hayam umelo'o teibel veyoshebei bah. neharot yimkha'u khaf yakhad harim yeraneinu. lifnei ihoh ki ba lishpot ha'arez yishpot teibel bezedeq ve'amim bemeisharim. ihoh malakh yirgezu 'amim yosheb kerubim tanut ha'arez. ihoh beziyon gadol veram hu 'al kal ha'amim. yodu mekha gadol venora qadosh hu. ve'oz melekh mishpat 'aheb 'atah konanta meisharim mishpat uzedaqah beya'aqob 'atah 'asita. romu ihoh 'eloheinu vehishtakhavu lahadom raglav qadosh hu. mosheh ve'aharon bekhohanav ushemu'el beqore'ei shemo qorim 'el ihoh vehu ya'anem. be'amud 'anan yedaber 'aleihem shameru 'eidotav vekhoq natan lamo. ihoh 'eloheinu 'atah 'anitam 'el nosei hayita lahem venoqem 'al 'alilotam. romu ihoh 'eloheinu vehishtakhavu lehar qadesho ki qadosh ihoh 'eloheinu. mizmor letodah hari'u ihoh kal ha'arez. 'ibdu 'et ihoh besimkhah bo'u lefanav birnanah. de'u ki ihoh hu 'elohim hu 'asanu velo velo 'anakhnu 'amo vezon mar'ito. bo'u she'arav betodah khazeirotav bithilah hodu lo barakhu shemo. ki tob ihoh le'olam khasdo ve'ad dor vador 'emunato. ledavid mizmor khesed umishpat 'ashirah lekha ihoh 'azameirah. 'askilah bederekh tamim matai tabo 'eilai 'ethalekh betam lebabi beqereb beiti. lo 'ashit leneged 'einai debar beliya'al 'asoh seitim saneiti lo yidbaq bi. leibab 'iqesh yasur mimeni ra' lo 'eida'. melosheni melasheni baseiter rei'eihu 'oto 'azmit gebah 'einayim urekhab leibab 'oto lo 'ukhal. 'einai bene'emnei 'erez lashebet 'imadi holekh bederekh tamim hu yeshareteini. lo yeisheb beqereb beiti 'oseh remiyah dober sheqarim lo yikon leneged 'einai. labeqarim 'azmit kal rish'ei 'arez lehakhrit mei'ir ihoh kal po'alei 'aven. tefilah le'ani khi ya'atof velifnei ihoh yishpokh sikho. ihoh shim'ah tefilati veshav'ati 'eilekha tabo. 'al taster panekha mimeni beyom zar li hateh 'eilai 'azenekha beyom 'eqra maher 'aneini. ki khalu be'ashan yamai ve'azmotai kemo qed nikharu. hukah kha'eiseb vayibash libi kisha khakhti mei'akhol lakhmi. miqol 'ankhati dabeqah 'azmi libsari. damiti liq'at midbar hayiti kekhos khorabot. shaqadti va'ehyeh kezipor boded 'al gag. kal hayom kheirefuni 'oybai meholalai bi nishba'u. ki 'eifer kalekhem 'akhaleti veshiquvai bibkhi masakheti. mipenei za'amkha veqizpekha ki nesatani vatashlikheini. yamai kezel natui va'ani ka'eiseb 'ibash. ve'atah ihoh le'olam teisheb vezikhrekha ledor vador. 'atah taqum terakhem ziyon ki 'et lekhenah ki ba mo'ed. ki razu 'abadekha 'et 'abaneha ve'et 'afarah yekhoneinu. veyire'u goyim 'et shem ihoh vekhal malkhei ha'arez 'et kebodekha. ki banah ihoh ziyon nir'ah bikhbodo. panah 'el tefilat ha'ar'ar velo bazah 'et tefilatam. tikateb zot ledor 'akharon ve'am nibra yehalel yah. ki hishqif mimerom qadesho ihoh mishamayim 'el 'erez hibit. lishmoa' 'enqat 'asir lefateiakh benei temutah. lesaper beziyon shem ihoh utehilato birushalim. behiqabez 'amim yakhdav umamlakhot la'abod 'et ihoh. 'inah baderekh kokho kokhi qizar yamai. 'omar 'eili 'al ta'aleini bakhazi yamai bedor dorim shenotekha. lefanim ha'arez yasadta uma'aseh yadekha shamayim. hemah yobeidu ve'atah ta'amod vekhulam kabeged yiblu kalebush takhalifem veyakhalofu. ve'atah hu ushenotekha lo yitamu. benei 'abadekha yishkonu vezar'am lefanekha yikon. ledavid barakhi nafshi 'et ihoh vekhal qerabai 'et shem qadesho. barakhi nafshi 'et ihoh ve'al tishkekhi kal gemulav. hasoleiakh lekhal 'avoneikhi harofei lekhal takhalu'ayekhi. hago'el mishakhat khayayekhi ham'atereikhi khesed verakhamim. hamasbiya' batob 'edyekh titkhadesh kanesher ne'urayekhi. 'oseh zedaqot ihoh umishpatim lekhal 'ashuqim. yodia' derakhav lemosheh libnei yisra'el 'alilotav. rakhum vekhanun ihoh 'erekh 'apayim verab khased. lo lanezakh yarib velo le'olam yitor. lo khakhata'einu 'asah lanu velo kha'avonoteinu gamal 'aleinu. ki khigboah mayim 'al ha'arez gabar khasdo 'al yerei'av. kirkhoq mizrakh mima'arab hirkhiq mimenu 'et pesha'einu. kerakhem 'ab 'al banim rikham ihoh 'al yerei'av. ki hu yada' yizreinu zakhur ki 'afar 'anakhenu. 'enosh kekhazir yamav keziz hasadeh ken yaziz. ki ruakh 'aberah bo ve'einenu velo yakirenu 'od meqomo. vekhesed ihoh mei'olam ve'ad 'olam 'al yerei'av vezidqato libnei banim. leshomerei berito ulezokherei fiqudav la'asotam. ihoh bashamayim heikhin kis'o umalkhuto bakol mashalah. barakhu ihoh mal'akhav giborei khoakh 'osei debaro lishmoa' beqol debaro. barakhu ihoh kal zeba'av mesharetav 'osei rezono. barakhu ihoh kal ma'asav bekhal meqomot memshalto barakhi nafshi 'et ihoh. barakhi nafshi 'et ihoh ihoh 'elohai gadalta me'od hod vehadar labasheta. 'oteh 'or kasalmah noteh mayim kayri'ah. hamqareh bamayim 'aliyotav hasam 'abim rekhubo hamhalekh 'al kanfei ruakh. 'oseh mal'akhav rukhot mesharetav 'esh lohet. yasad 'erez 'al mekhoneha bal timot 'olam va'ed. tehom kalebush kisito 'al harim ya'amdu mayim. min ga'aratekha yenusun min qol ra'amkha yeikhafeizun. ya'alu harim yeiredu beqa'ot 'el meqom zeh yasadta lahem. gebulsa meta bal ya'aborun bal yeshubun lekhasot ha'arez. hamshaleiakh ma'yanim banekhalim ben harim yehaleikhun. yashqu kal khayto sadai yishberu fera'im zema'am. 'aleihem 'of hashamayim yishkon miben 'ofayim yitenu qol. mashqeh harim mei'aliyotav miperi ma'asekha tisba' ha'arez. mazmiakh khazir labeheimah ve'eiseb la'abodat ha'adam lehozi lekhem min ha'arez. veyayin yesamakh lebab 'enosh lehazhil panim mishamen velekhem lebab 'enosh yis'ad. yisbe'u 'azei ihoh 'arzei lebanon 'asher nata'. 'asherosha m ziporim yeqaneinu khasidah beroshim beitah. harim hagebohim laye'eilim sela'im makhseh lashfanim. 'asah yareiakh lemo'adim mesh yada' mebo'o. tashet khoshekh vihi layelah bo tirmos kal khayto ya'ar. hakefirim sho'agim lataref ulebaqesh mei'el 'akhelam. tizrakh hashemesh yei'aseifun ve'el me'onotam yirbazun. yeizei 'adam lefa'olo vela'abodato 'adei 'areb. mah rabu ma'asekha ihoh kulam bekhakhemah 'asita male'ah ha'arez qinyanekha. zeh hayam gadol urekhab yadayim sham remes ve'en mispar khayot qetanot 'im gedolot. m 'oniyot yehaleikhun livyatan zeh yazarta lesakheq bo. kulam 'eilekha yesabeirun latet 'akhelam be'ito. titen lahem yilqotun tiftakh yadekha yisbe'un tob. tastir panekha yibaheilun tosef rukham yigva'un ve'el 'afaram yeshubun. teshalakh rukhakha yibarei'un utekhadesh penei 'adamah. yehi khebod ihoh le'olam yismakh ihoh bema'asav. hamabit la'arez vatir'ad yiga' beharim veye'eshanu. 'ashirah ihoh bekhayai 'azamerah leilohai be'odi. ye'erab 'alav sikhi 'anokhi 'esmakh ihoh. yitamu khata'im min ha'arez uresha'im 'od 'einam barakhi nafshi 'et ihoh halu yah. hodu ihoh qir'u bishmo hodi'u ba'amim 'alilotav. shiru lo zameru lo khu bekhal nifle'otav. hithalu beshem qadesho yismakh leb mebaqshei ihoh. dirshu ihoh ve'uzo baqeshu fanav tamid. zikhru nifle'otav 'asher 'asah mofetav umishpetei fiv. zera' 'abraham 'abdo benei ya'aqob bekhirav. hu ihoh 'eloheinu bekhal ha'arez mishpatav. zakhar le'olam berito dabar zivah le'elef dor. 'asher karat 'et 'abraham ushebu'ato leyiskhaq. vaya'amideha leya'aqob lekhoq leyisra'el berit 'olam. leimor lekha 'eten 'et 'erez kena'an khebel nakhalatkhem. bihyotam metei mispar kim'at vegarim bah. vayithalekhu migo 'el go mimamlakhah 'el 'am 'akher. lo hiniakh 'adam le'asheqam vayokhakh 'aleihem melakhim. 'al tige'u bimshikhai velinbi'ai 'al tarei'u. vayiqra ra'ab 'al ha'arez kal mateh lekhem shabar. shalakh lifneihem 'ish le'ebed nimkar yosef. 'inu bakebel raglav raglo barzel ba'ah nafsho. 'ad 'et bo debaro 'imrat ihoh zerafatehu. shalakh melekh vayatireihu moshel 'amim vayfatekheihu. samo 'adon lebeito umoshel bekhal qinyano. le'sor sarav benafsho uzeqeinav yekhakem. vayabo yisra'el mizrayim veya'aqob gar be'erez kham. vayefer 'et 'amo me'od vaya'azimeihu mizarav. hafakh libam lisno 'amo lehitnakel ba'abadav. lakh mosheh 'abdo 'aharon 'asher bakhar bo. samu bam dibrei 'ototav umofetim be'erez kham. shalakh khoshekh vayakhshikh velo maru 'et debarav debaro. hafakh 'et meimeihem ledam vayamet 'et degatam. sharaz 'arzam zefarde'im bekhadrei malkheihem. 'amar vayabo 'arob kinim bekhal gebulam. natan gishmeihem barad 'esh lehabot be'arzam. vayakh gafnam ute'einatam vayshaber 'ez gebulam. 'amar vayabo 'arbeh veyeleq ve'en mispar. vayokhal kal 'eiseb be'arzam vayokhal peri 'admatam. vayakh kal bekhor be'arzam reishit lekhal 'onam. vayozi'em bekhesef vezahab ve'en bishbatav koshel. samakh mizrayim bezeitam ki nafal pakhdam 'aleihem. paras 'anan lemasakh ve'esh leha'ir layelah. sha'al vayabei selav velekhem mayim yasbi'em. patakh zur vayazubu mayim halekhu baziyot nahar. ki zakhar 'et debar qadesho 'et 'abraham 'abdo. vayozi 'amo besason berinah 'et bekhirav. vayiten lahem 'arzot goyim va'amal le'umim yirashu. ba'abur yishmeru khuqav vetorotav yinzoru halu yah. haluyah hodu ihoh ki tob ki le'olam khasdo. mi yemalel geburot ihoh yashmia' kal tehilato. 'ashrei shomerei mishpat 'oseh zedaqah bekhal 'et. zakhereini ihoh birzon 'amekha paqedeini bishu'atekha. lir'ot betobat bekhirekha lismoakh besimkhat goyekha lehithalel 'im nakhalatekha. khatanu 'im 'aboteinu he'evinu hirsha'enu. 'aboteinu bemizrayim lo hiskilu nifle'otekha lo zakheru 'et rob khasadekha vayamru 'al yam beyam suf. vayoshi'em lema'an shemo lehodia' 'et geburato. vayig'ar beyam suf vayekherab vayolikhem batehomot kamidbar. vayoshi'em miyad sonei vayig'alem miyad 'oyeb. vaykhasu mayim zareihem 'ekhad meihem lo notar. vaya'aminu bidbarav yashiru tehilato. miharu shakhekhu ma'asav lo khiku la'azato. vayit'avu ta'avah bamidbar vaynasu 'el bishimon. vayiten lahem she'elatam vayshalakh razon benafsham. vayqan'u lemosheh bamakhaneh le'aharon qedosh ihoh. tiftakh 'erez vatibla' datan vatekhas 'al 'adat 'abiram. vatib'ar 'esh ba'adatam lehabah telahet resha'im. ya'asu 'eigel bekhoreb vayishtakhavu lemaseikhah. vayamiru 'et kebodam betabnit vr 'okhel 'eiseb. khekhu 'el moshi'am 'oseh gedolot bemizrayim. nifla'ot be'erez kham nora'ot 'al yam suf. vayomer lehashmidam lulei mosheh bekhiro 'amad baperez lefanav lehashib khamato meihashkhit. vayim'asu be'erez khemdah lo he'eminu lidbaro. vayeiragenu be'aholeihem lo me'u beqol ihoh. vayisa yado lahem lehapil 'otam bamidbar. ulehapil zar'am bagoyim ulezarotam ba'arazot. vayizamedu leba'al pe'or vayokhelu zibkhei meitim. vayakh'isu bema'aleihem vatifraz bam mageifah. vaya'amod pinekhas vayfalel vatei'azar hamageifah. vateikhasheb lo lizdaqah ledor vador 'ad 'olam. vayaqzifu 'al mei meribah vayeira' lemosheh ba'aburam. ki himru 'et rukho vaybatei bisfatav. lo hishmidu 'et ha'amim 'asher 'amar ihoh lahem. vayit'arebu bagoyim vayilmedu ma'aseihem. vaya'abdu 'et 'azabeihem vayihyu lahem lemoqesh. vayizbekhu 'et beneihem ve'et benoteihem lasheidim. vayishpekhu dam naqi dam beneihem ubenoteihem 'asher zibekhu la'azabei khena'an vatekhenaf ha'arez badamim. vayitme'u bema'aseihem vayiznu bema'aleihem. vayikhar 'af ihoh be'amo vayta'eb 'et nakhalato. vayitenem beyad goyim vayimshelu bahem sone'eihem. vayilkhazum 'oybeihem vayikane'u takhat yadam. pe'amim rabot yazilem vehemah yamru ba'azatam vayamoku ba'avonam. vayar bazar lahem beshame'o 'et rinatam. vayizkor lahem berito vayinakhem kerob khasdo khasadav. vayiten 'otam lerakhamim lifnei kal shobeihem. hoshi'einu ihoh 'eloheinu veqabezeinu min hagoyim lehodot leshem qadshekha lehishtabeiakh bithilatekha. barukh ihoh 'elohei yisra'el min ha'olam ve'ad ha'olam ve'amar kal ha'am 'amen halu yah. hodu ihoh ki tob ki le'olam khasdo. yomeru ge'ulei ihoh 'asher ge'alam miyad zar. umei'arazot qibezam mimizrakh umima'arab mizafon umiyam. ta'u bamidbar bishimon darekh 'ir moshab lo maza'u. re'eibim gam zemei'im nafsham bahem tit'ataf. vayiz'aqu 'el ihoh bazar lahem mimezuqoteihem yazilem. vayadrikhem bederekh yesharah lalekhet 'el 'ir moshab. yodu ihoh khasdo venifle'otav libnei 'adam. ki hisbia' nefesh shoqeiqah venefesh re'eibah milei tob. yoshebei khoshekh vezalmavet 'asirei 'oni ubarzel. ki himru 'imrei 'el va'azat 'elyon na'azu. vayakhna' be'amal libam kashelu ve'en 'ozer. vayiz'aqu 'el ihoh bazar lahem mimezuqoteihem yoshi'em. yozi'em meikhoshekh vezalmavet umosroteihem yenateq. yodu ihoh khasdo venifle'otav libnei 'adam. kishi bar daltot nekhoshet uberikhei barzel gideia'. 'evilim miderekh pish'am umei'avonoteihem yit'anu. kal 'okhel teta'eb nafsham vayagi'u 'ad sha'arei mavet. vayiz'aqu 'el ihoh bazar lahem mimezuqoteihem yoshi'em. yishlakh debaro veyirpa'em vimalet mishekhitotam. yodu ihoh khasdo venifle'otav libnei 'adam. veyizbekhu zibkhei todah visaperu ma'asav berinah. yordei hayam ba'oniyot 'osei melakhah bemayim rabim. hemah ra'u ma'asei ihoh venifle'otav bimzulah. vayomer vaya'amed ruakh se'arah vateromem galav. ya'alu mayim yeiredu tehomot nafsham bera'ah titmogag. yakhogu veyanu'u kashikor vekhal khakhematam titbala'. vayiz'aqu 'el ihoh bazar lahem umimezuqoteihem yozi'em. yaqem se'arah lidmamah vayekheshu galeihem. vayismekhu khi yishtoqu vayankhem 'el mekhoz khefzam. yodu ihoh khasdo venifle'otav libnei 'adam. viromemuhu biqhal 'am ubemoshab zeqeinim yehaluhu. yasem neharot lemidbar umoza'ei mayim lezima'on. 'erez peri limleikhah meira'at yoshebei bah. yasem midbar la'agam mayim ve'erez ziyah lemoza'ei mayim. vayosheb sham re'eibim vaykhonu 'ir moshab. vayizre'u dot vayite'u kheramim vaya'asu peri tebu'ah. vaybarakhem vayirbu me'od ubehemtam lo yam'it. vayim'atu vayashokhu mei'ozer ra'ah veyagon. shofekh buz 'al nedibim vayat'em betohu lo darekh. vaysageb 'ebyon mei'oni vayasem kazon mishpakhot. yir'u yesharim veyismakhu vekhal 'avlah qafezah piha. mi khakham veyishmar 'eleh veyitbonu khasdei ihoh. shir mizmor ledavid. nakhon libi 'elohim 'ashirah va'azamerah 'af kebodi. 'urah haneibel vekhinor 'a'irah shakhar. 'odkha ba'amim ihoh va'azamerkha bal 'umim. ki gadol mei'al shamayim khasdekha ve'ad shekhaqim 'amitekha. rumah 'al shamayim 'elohim ve'al kal ha'arez kebodekha. lema'an yeikhalezun yedidekha hoshi'ah yeminekha va'aneini. 'elohim diber beqadesho 'e'lozah 'akhaleqah shekhem ve'eimeq sukot 'amaded. li gil'ad li menasheh ve'efrayim ma'oz roshi yehudah mekhoqeqi. mo'ab sir rakhzi 'al 'edom 'ashlikh na'ali 'alei feleshet 'etro'a'. mi yobileini 'ir mibzar mi nakhani 'ad 'edom. halo 'elohim zenakhtanu velo teizei 'elohim bezib'oteinu. habah lanu 'ezrat mizar veshav teshu'at 'adam. beilohim na'aseh khayil vehu yabus zareinu. lamnazeiakh ledavid mizmor 'elohei tehilati 'al tekherash. ki fi rasha' ufi mirmah 'alai patakhu diberu 'iti leshon shaqer. vedibrei sin'ah sebabuni vayilakhamuni khinam. takhat 'ahabati yistenuni va'ani tefilah. vayasimu 'alai ra'ah takhat tobah vesin'ah takhat 'ahabati. hafqed 'alav rasha' vesatan ya'amod 'al yemino. behishafeto yeizei rasha' utefilato tihyeh lakhata'ah. yihyu yamav me'atim pequdato yiqakh 'akher. yihyu banav yetomim ve'ishto 'almanah. venoa' yanu'u banav veshi'eilu vedareshu meikhareboteihem. yenaqesh nosheh lekhal 'asher lo veyabozu zarim yegi'o. 'al yehi lo moshekh khased ve'al yehi khonen litomav. yehi 'akharito lehakhrit bedor 'akher yimakh shemam. yizakher 'avon 'abotav 'el ihoh vekhatat 'imo 'al timakh. yihyu neged ihoh tamid veyakhret mei'erez zikhram. ya'an 'asher lo zakhar 'asot khased vayirdof 'ish 'ani ve'ebyon venikh'eh leibab lemotet. vaye'ehab qelalah vatebo'eihu velo khafez bibrakhah vatirkhaq mimenu. vayilbash qelalah kemado vatabo khamayim beqirbo vekhashemen be'azmotav. tehi lo kebeged ya'teh ulemeizakh tamid yakhgereha. zot pe'ulat tenai mei'et ihoh vehadoberim ra' 'al nafshi. ve'atah ihoh 'adonai 'aseh 'iti lema'an shemekha ki tob khasdekha hazileini. ki 'ani ve'ebyon 'anokhi velibi khalal beqirbi. kezel kintoto nehelakheti nin'arti ka'arbeh. birkai kashelu mizom ubesari kakhash mishamen. va'ani hayiti kherpah lahem yir'uni yeni'un rosham. 'azereini ihoh 'elohai hoshi'eini khekhasdekha. veyeide'u ki yadekha zot 'atah ihoh 'asitah. yeqalu hemah ve'atah tebarekh qamu vayeiboshu ve'abdekha yismakh. yilbeshu sotnai kelimah veya'atu kham'il bashetam. 'odeh ihoh me'od befi ubetokh rabim 'ahalenu. ki ya'amod limin 'ebyon lehoshia' mishofetei nafsho. ledavid mizmor ne'um ihoh ladoni sheb limini 'ad 'ashit 'oyebekha hadom leraglekha. mateh 'uzekha yishlakh ihoh miziyon redeh beqereb 'oyebekha. 'amekha nedabot beyom kheilekha behadrei qodesh meirekhem mishkhar lekha tal yaldutekha. nishba' ihoh velo yinakhem 'atah khohen le'olam 'al dibrati malki zedeq. 'adonai 'al yeminekha makhaz beyom 'apo melakhim. yadin bagoyim malei geviyot makhaz rosh 'al 'erez rabah. minakhal baderekh yishteh 'al ken yarim rosh. halu yah 'odeh ihoh bekhal leibab besod yesharim ve'eidah. gedolim ma'asei ihoh derushim lekhal khefzeihem. hod vehadar pa'olo vezidqato 'omedet la'ad. zeikher 'asah lenifle'otav khanun verakhum ihoh. teref natan lirei'av yizkor le'olam berito. koakh ma'asav higid le'amo latet lahem nakhalat goyim. ma'asei yadav 'emet umishpat ne'emanim kal piqudav. semukhim la'ad le'olam 'asuyim be'emet veyashar. pedut shalakh le'amo zivah le'olam berito qadosh venora shemo. reishit khakhmah yir'at ihoh seikhel tob lekhal 'oseihem tehilato 'omedet la'ad. halu yah 'ashrei 'ish yarei 'et ihoh bemizvotav khafez me'od. gibor ba'arez yihyeh zar'o dor yesharim yeborakh. hon va'osher bebeito vezidqato 'omedet la'ad. zarakh bakhoshekh 'or laysharim khanun verakhum vezadiq. tob 'ish khonen umalveh yekhalkel debarav bemishpat. ki le'olam lo yimot lezeikher 'olam yihyeh zadiq. mishemu'ah ra'ah lo yira nakhon libo batuakh ihoh. samukh libo lo yira 'ad 'asher yir'eh bezarav. pizar natan la'ebyonim zidqato 'omedet la'ad qarno tarum bekhabod. rasha' yir'eh vekha'as shinav yakharoq venamas ta'avat resha'im tobed. halu yah halu 'abdei ihoh halu 'et shem ihoh. yehi shem ihoh meborakh mei'atah ve'ad 'olam. mimizrakh shemesh 'ad mebo'o mehulal shem ihoh. ram 'al kal goyim ihoh 'al hashamayim kebodo. mi ihoh 'eloheinu hamagbihi lashabet. hamashpili lir'ot bashamayim uba'arez. meqimi mei'afar dal mei'ashpot yarim 'ebyon. lehoshibi 'im nedibim 'im nedibei 'amo. moshibi 'aqeret habayit 'em habanim semeikhah halu yah. bezet yisra'el mimizrayim bet ya'aqob mei'am lo'ez. hayetah yehudah leqadesho yisra'el mamshelotav. hayam ra'ah vayanos hayarden yisob le'akhor. heharim raqedu khe'eilim geba'ot kibnei zon. mah lekha hayam ki tanus hayarden tisob le'akhor. heharim tirqedu khe'eilim geba'ot kibnei zon. milifnei 'adon khuli 'arez milifnei 'eloah ya'aqob. hahofekhi hazur 'agam mayim khalamish lema'yeno mayim. lo lanu ihoh lo lanu ki leshimkha ten kabod 'al khasdekha 'al 'amitekha. lamah yomeru hagoyim 'ayeh na 'eloheihem. veiloheinu bashamayim kol 'asher khafez 'asah. 'azabeihem kesef vezahab ma'aseh yedei 'adam. peh lahem velo yedabeiru 'einayim lahem velo yir'u. 'azenayim lahem velo yishma'u 'af lahem velo yerikhun. yedeihem velo yemishun ragleihem velo yehaleikhu lo yehgu bigronam. kemohem yihyu 'oseihem kol 'asher boteiakh bahem. yisra'el betakh ihoh 'ezram umaginam hu. bet 'aharon bitkhu ihoh 'ezram umaginam hu. yir'ei ihoh bitkhu ihoh 'ezram umaginam hu. ihoh zekharanu yebarekh yebarekh 'et bet yisra'el yebarekh 'et bet 'aharon. yebarekh yir'ei ihoh haqetanim 'im hagedolim. yosef ihoh 'aleikhem 'aleikhem ve'al beneikhem. berukhim 'atem ihoh 'oseh shamayim va'arez. hashamayim mayim ihoh veha'arez natan libnei 'adam. lo hameitim yehalu yah velo kal yoredei dumah. va'anakhnu nebarekh yah mei'atah ve'ad 'olam halu yah. 'ahabti ki yishma' ihoh 'et qoli takhanunai. ki hitah 'azeno li ubeyamai 'eqra. 'afafuni kheblei mavet umezarei she'ol meza'uni zarah veyagon 'emza. ubeshem ihoh 'eqra 'anah ihoh maletah nafshi. khanun ihoh vezadiq veiloheinu merakhem. shomer petayim ihoh daloti veli yehoshia'. shubi nafshi limnukhayekhi ki ihoh gamal 'alayekhi. ki khilazta nafshi mimavet 'et 'eini min dim'ah 'et ragli midekhi. 'ethalekh lifnei ihoh be'arzot hakhayim. he'emanti ki 'adaber 'ani 'aniti me'od. 'ani 'amarti bekhafezi kal ha'adam kozeb. mah 'ashib ihoh kal tagmulohi 'alai. kos yeshu'ot 'esa ubeshem ihoh 'eqra. nedarai ihoh 'ashalem negdah na lekhal 'amo. yaqar be'einei ihoh hamavetah lakhasidav. 'anah ihoh ki 'ani 'abdekha 'ani 'abdekha ben 'amatekha pitakhta lemoseirai. lekha 'ezbakh zebakh todah ubeshem ihoh 'eqra. nedarai ihoh 'ashalem negdah na lekhal 'amo. bekhazrot bet ihoh betokheikhi yerushalim halu yah. halu 'et ihoh kal goyim bekhuhu kal ha'umim. ki gabar 'aleinu khasdo ve'emet ihoh le'olam halu yah. hodu ihoh ki tob ki le'olam khasdo. yomar na yisra'el ki le'olam khasdo. yomeru na bet 'aharon ki le'olam khasdo. yomeru na yir'ei ihoh ki le'olam khasdo. min hameizar qarati yah 'anani bamerkhab yah. ihoh li lo 'ira mah ya'aseh li 'adam. ihoh li be'ozerai va'ani 'er'eh besone'ai. tob lakhasot ihoh mibetoakh ba'adam. tob lakhasot ihoh mibetoakh bindibim. kal goyim sebabuni beshem ihoh ki 'amilam. sabuni gam sebabuni beshem ihoh ki 'amilam. sabuni khidborim do'akhu ke'esh qozim beshem ihoh ki 'amilam. dakhoh dekhitani linpol ihoh 'azarani. 'azi vezimrat yah vayhi li lishu'ah. qol rinah vishu'ah be'aholei zadiqim yemin ihoh 'osah khayil. yemin ihoh romeimah yemin ihoh 'osah khayil. lo 'amut ki 'ekhyeh va'asaper ma'asei yah. yasor yiserani yah velamavet lo netanani. pitkhu li sha'arei zedeq 'abo bam 'odeh yah. zeh hasha'ar ihoh zadiqim yabo'u bo. 'odkha ki 'anitani vatehi li lishu'ah. 'eben ma'asu habonim hayetah lerosh pinah. mei'et ihoh hayetah zot hi niflat be'eineinu. zeh hayom 'asah ihoh nagilah venismekhah bo. 'ana ihoh hoshi'ah na 'ana ihoh hazlikhah na. barukh haba beshem ihoh beirakhnukhem mibet ihoh. 'el ihoh vaya'er lanu 'isru khag ba'abotim 'ad qarnot hamizbeiakh. 'eili 'atah ve'odeka 'elohai 'aromeka. hodu ihoh ki tob ki le'olam khasdo. 'ashrei temimei darekh haholekhim betorat ihoh. 'ashrei nozerei 'eidotav bekhal leb yidreshuhu. 'af lo fa'alu 'avlah bidrakhav halakhu. 'atah zivitah fiqudekha lishmor me'od. 'akhalai yikonu derakhai lishmor khuqekha. 'az lo 'eibosh behabiti 'el kal mizvotekha. 'odkha beyosher leibab belamedi mishpetei zidqekha. 'et khuqekha 'eshmor 'al ta'azbeini 'ad me'od. bameh yezakeh na'ar 'et 'arekho lishmor kidbarekha. bekhal libi derashtikha 'al tashgeini mimizvotekha. belibi zafanti 'imratekha lema'an lo 'ekheta lakh. barukh 'atah ihoh lamedeini khuqekha. bisfatai siparti kol mishpetei fikha. bederekh 'eidevotekha sasti ke'al kal hon. befiqudekha 'asikhah ve'abitah 'orekhotekha. bekhuqotekha 'eshta'asha' lo 'eshkakh debarekha. gemol 'al 'abdekha 'ekhyeh ve'eshmerah debarekha. gal 'einai ve'abitah nifla'ot mitoratekha. ger 'anokhi ba'arez 'al taster mimeni mizvotekha. garesah nafshi leta'abah 'el mishpatekha bekhal 'et. ga'arta zeidim 'arurim hashogim mimizvotekha. gal mei'alai kherpah vabuz ki 'eidotekha nazareti. gam yashebu rim bi nidbaru 'abdekha yasiakh bekhuqekha. gam 'eidotekha sha'ashu'ai 'anshei 'azati. dabeqah le'afar nafshi khayeini kidbarekha. derakhai siparti vata'aneini lamedeini khuqekha. derekh piqudekha habineini ve'asikhah benifle'otekha. dalefah nafshi mitugah qayemeini kidbarekha. derekhoshe qer haser mimeni vetoratekha khaneini derekh 'emunah bakhareti mishpatekha shiviti. dabaqti be'eidevotekha ihoh 'al tebisheini. derekh mizvotekha 'aruz ki tarkhib libi. horeini ihoh derekh khuqekha ve'ezerenah 'eiqeb. habineini ve'ezerah toratekha ve'eshmerenah bekhal leb. hadrikheini bintib mizvotekha ki bo khafazeti. hat libi 'el 'eidevotekha ve'al 'el baza'. ha'aber 'einai meire'ot shav bidrakhekha khayeini. haqem le'abdekha 'imratekha 'asher leyir'atekha. ha'aber kherpati 'asher yagoreti ki mishpatekha tobim. hineh ta'abti lefiqudekha bezidqatekha khayeini. vibo'uni khasadekha ihoh teshu'atekha ke'imratekha. ve'e'eneh khorefi dabar ki batakhti bidbarekha. ve'al tazel mipi debar 'emet 'ad me'od ki lemishpatekha yikhaleti. ve'eshmerah toratekha tamid le'olam va'ed. ve'ethalekhah barekhabah ki fiqudekha darasheti. va'adaberah be'eidotekha neged melakhim velo 'eibosh. ve'eshta'asha' bemizvotekha 'asher 'ahabeti. ve'esa khapai 'el mizvotekha 'asher 'ahabeti ve'asikhah bekhuqekha. zekhor dabar le'abdekha 'al 'asher yikhaltani. zot nekhamati be'aneyi ki 'imratekha khiyateni. zeidim helizuni 'ad me'od mitoratekha lo natiti. zakharti mishpatekha mei'olam ihoh va'etnekham. zal'afah 'akhazatni meiresha'im 'ozebei toratekha. zemirot hayu li khuqekha bebet megurai. zakharti balaylah shimkha ihoh va'eshmerah toratekha. zot hayetah li ki fiqudekha nazareti. khelqi ihoh 'amarti lishmor debarekha. khiliti fanekha bekhal leb khaneini ke'imratekha. khishabti derakhai va'ashibah raglai 'el 'eidotekha. khashti velo hitmahmaheti lishmor mizvotekha. kheblei resha'im 'iveduni toratekha lo shakhakheti. khazot laylah 'aqum lehodot lakh 'al mishpetei zidqekha. khaber 'ani lekhal 'asher yerei'ukha uleshomerei piqudekha. khasdekha ihoh male'ah ha'arez khuqekha lamedeini. tob 'asita 'im 'abdekha ihoh kidbarekha. tub ta'am vada'at lamedeini ki bemizvotekha he'emaneti. terem 'e'eneh 'ani shogeg ve'atah 'imratekha shamareti. tob 'atah umeitib lamedeini khuqekha. tafelu 'alai sheqer zeidim 'ani bekhal leb 'ezor piqudekha. tafash kakheileb libam 'ani toratekha shi'asha'eti. tob li khi 'uneiti lema'an 'elmad khuqekha. tob li torat pikha mei'alfei zahab vakhasef. yadekha 'asuni vaykhonuni habineini ve'elmedah mizvotekha. yerei'ekha yir'uni veyismakhu ki lidbarekha yikhaleti. yada'ti ihoh ki zedeq mishpatekha ve'emunah 'initani. yehi na khasdekha lenakhameini ke'imratekha le'abdekha. yebo'uni rakhamekha ve'ekhyeh ki toratekha sha'ashu'ai. yeiboshu zeidim ki sheqer 'ivetuni 'ani 'asiakh befiqudekha. yashubu li yerei'ekha veyade'u veyode'ei 'eidotekha. yehi libi tamim bekhuqekha lema'an lo 'eibosh. kaletah litshu'atekha nafshi lidbarekha yikhaleti. kalu 'einai le'imratekha leimor matai tenakhameini. ki hayiti kenod beqitor khuqekha lo shakhakheti. kamah yemei 'abdekha matai ta'aseh berodefai mishpat. karu li zeidim shikhot 'asher lo khetoratekha. kal mizvotekha 'emunah sheqer redafuni 'azereini. kim'at kiluni ba'arez va'ani lo 'azabti fiquvdekha kekhasdekha khayeini ve'eshmerah 'eidut pikha. le'olam ihoh debarekha nizab bashamayim. ledor vador 'emunatekha konanta 'erez vata'amod. lemishpatekha 'amedu hayom ki hakol 'abadekha. lulei toratekha sha'ashu'ai 'az 'abadti be'aneyi. le'olam lo 'eshkakh piqudekha ki bam khiyitani. lekha 'ani hoshi'eini ki fiqudekha darasheti. li qivu resha'im le'abedeini 'eidotekha 'etbonan. lekhal tikhlah ra'iti qez rekhabah mizvatekha me'od. mah 'ahabti toratekha kal hayom hi sikhati. mei'oyebai tekhakemeini mizvotekha ki le'olam hi li. mikal melamedai hiskalti ki 'eidevotekha sikhah lyi. mizeqeinim 'etbonan ki fiqudekha nazareti. mikal 'orakh ra' kaliti raglai lema'an 'eshmor debarekha. mimishpatekha lo sareti ki 'atah horeitani. mah nimlezu lekhiki 'imratekha midebash lefi. mipiqudekha 'etbonan 'al ken saneiti kal 'orakh shaqer. ner leragli debarekha ve'or lintibati. nishba'ti va'aqayeimah lishmor mishpetei zidqekha. na'aneiti 'ad me'od ihoh khayeini khidbarekha. nidbot pi rezeh na ihoh umishpatekha lamedeini. nafshi bekhapi tamid vetoratekha lo shakhakheti. natenu resha'im pakh li umipiqudekha lo ta'iti. nakhalti 'eidevotekha le'olam ki seson libi hemah. natiti libi la'asot khuqekha le'olam 'eiqeb. sei'afim saneiti vetoratekha 'ahabeti. sitri umagini 'atah lidbarekha yikhaleti. suru mimeni merei'im ve'ezerah mizvot 'elohai. samekheini khe'imratekha ve'ekhyeh ve'al tebisheini misibri. se'adeini ve'ivashei'ah ve'esh'ah bekhuqekha tamid. salita kal shogim meikhuqekha kishe qer tarmitam. sigim hishbata khal rish'ei 'arez lakhen 'ahabti 'eidotekha. samar mipakhdekha besari umimishpatekha yareiti. 'asiti mishpat vazedeq bal tanikheini le'osheqai. 'arob 'abdekha letob 'al ya'ashquni zeidim. 'einai kalu lishu'atekha ule'imrat zidqekha. 'aseh 'im 'abdekha khekhasdekha vekhuqekha lamedeini. 'abdekha 'ani habineini ve'eide'ah 'eidotekha. 'et la'asot ihoh heifeiru toratekha. 'al ken 'ahabti mizvotekha mizahab umipaz. 'al ken kal piqudei khol yishareti kal 'orakh sheqer saneiti. pela'ot 'eidevotekha 'al ken nezaratam nafshi. peitakh debarekha ya'ir meibin petayim. pi fa'arti va'esh'afah ki lemizvotekha ya'abeti. peneh 'eilai vekhaneini kemishpat le'ohabei shemekha. pe'amai hakhen be'imratekha ve'al tashlet bi khal 'aven. pedeini mei'osheq 'adam ve'eshmerah piqudekha. panekha ha'er be'abdekha velamedeini 'et khuqekha. palgei mayim yaredu 'einai 'al lo shameru toratekha. zadiq 'atah ihoh veyashar mishpatekha. zivita zedeq 'eidotekha ve'emunah me'od. zimetatni qin'ati ki shakhekhu debarekha zarai. zerufah 'imratekha me'od ve'abdekha 'aheibah. za'ir 'anokhi venibzeh piqudekha lo shakhakheti. zidqatekha zedeq le'olam vetoratekha 'emet. zar umazoq meza'uni mizvotekha sha'ashu'ai. zedeq 'eidevotekha le'olam habineini ve'ekhyeh. qarati bekhal leb 'aneini ihoh khuqekha 'ezorah. qeratikha hoshi'eini ve'eshmerah 'eidotekha. qidamti baneshef va'ashavei'ah lidbarekha lidbarekha yikhaleti. qidemu 'einai 'ashmurot lasiakh be'imratekha. qoli shim'ah khekhasdekha ihoh kemishpatekha khayeini. qarebu rodefei zimah mitoratekha rakhaqu. qarob 'atah ihoh vekhal mizvotekha 'emet. qedem yada'ti mei'eidotekha ki le'olam yesadtam. re'eh 'aneyi vekhalezeini ki toratekha lo shakhakheti. ribah ribi uge'aleini le'imratekha khayeini. rakhoq meiresha'im yeshu'ah ki khuqekha lo darashu. rakhamekha rabim ihoh kemishpatekha khayeini. rabim rodefai vezarai mei'eidevotekha lo natiti. ra'iti bogedim va'etqotatah 'asher 'imratekha lo shamaru. re'eh ki fiqudekha 'ahabeti ihoh kekhasdekha khayeini. rosh debarekha 'emet ule'olam kal mishpat zidqekha. rim redafuni khinam umidebarekha umidebarekha pakhad libi. sas 'anokhi 'al 'imratekha kemozei shalal rab. sheqer neiti va'ata'eibah toratekha 'ahabeti. sheba' bayom hilaltikha 'al mishpetei zidqekha. shalom rab le'ohabei toratekha ve'en lamo mikhshol. sibarti lishu'atekha ihoh umizvotekha 'asiti. shamerah nafshi 'eidotekha va'ohabem me'od. shamarti fiqudekha ve'eidotekha ki khal derakhai negdekha. tiqrab rinati lefanekha ihoh kidbarekha habineini. tabo tekhinati lefanekha ke'imratekha hazileini. taba'nah sefatai tehilah ki telamedeini khuqekha. ta'an leshoni 'imratekha ki khal mizvotekha zedeq. tehi yadekha le'azereini ki fiqudekha bakhareti. ta'abti lishu'atekha ihoh vetoratekha sha'ashu'ai. tekhi nafshi utehaleka umishpatekha ya'azruni. ta'iti keseh 'obed baqesh 'abdekha ki mizvotekha lo shakhakheti. shir hama'alot 'el ihoh bazaratah li qarati vaya'aneini. ihoh hazilah nafshi misefat sheqer milashon remiyah. mah yiten lekha umah yosif lakh lashon remiyah. khizei gibor shenunim 'im gakhalei retamim. 'oyah li ki garti meshekh khanti 'im 'aholei qeidar. rabat shakhenah lah nafshi 'im sonei shalom. 'anisha lom vekhi 'adaber hemah lamilkhamah. shir lama'alot 'esa 'einai 'el heharim mei'ayin yabo 'ezri. 'ezri mei'im ihoh 'oseh shamayim va'arez. 'al yiten lamot raglekha 'al yanum shomerekha. hineh lo yanum velo yishan vmer yisra'el. ihoh shomerekha ihoh zilekha 'al yad yeminekha. yomam hashemesh lo yakekah veyareiakh balayelah. ihoh yishmarekha mikal ra' yishmor 'et nafshekha. ihoh yishmar zeitekha ubo'ekha mei'atah ve'ad 'olam. shir hama'alot ledavid makhti be'omerim li bet ihoh neilekh. 'omedot hayu ragleinu bish'arayikh yerushalim. yerushalim habenuyah ke'ir shekhuberah lah yakhdav. shesham 'alu shebatim shibtei yah 'eidut leyisra'el lehodot leshem ihoh. ki shamah yashebu khis'ot lemishpat kis'ot lebet david. 'alu shelom yerushalim yishlayu 'ohabayikh. yehi shalom bekheilekh levah be'armenotayikh. lema'an 'akhai verei'ai 'adaberah na shalom bakh. lema'an bet ihoh 'eloheinu 'abaqshah tob lakh. shir hama'alot 'eilekha nasati 'et 'einai hayoshebi bashamayim. hineh khe'einei 'abadim 'el yad 'adoneihem ke'einei shifkhah 'el yad gebirtah ken 'eineinu 'el ihoh 'eloheinu 'ad sheyekhaneinu. khaneinu ihoh khaneinu ki rab saba'nu buz. rabat sabe'ah lah nafsheinu hala'ag hasha'ananim habuz lig'eiyonim shir hama'alot ledavid lulei ihoh shehayah lanu yomar na yisra'el. lulei ihoh shehayah lanu bequm 'aleinu 'adam. 'azai khayim bela'unu bakharot 'apam banu. 'azai hamayim shetafunu nakhlah 'abar 'al nafsheinu. 'azai 'abar 'al nafsheinu hamayim hazeidonim. barukh ihoh shelo netananu teref leshineihem. nafsheinu kezipor nimletah mipakh yoqshim hapakh nishbar va'anakhnu nimlatenu. 'ezreinu beshem ihoh 'oseh shamayim va'arez. shir hama'alot habotekhim ihoh kehar ziyon lo yimot le'olam yeisheb. yerushalim harim sabib lah ihoh sabib le'amo mei'atah ve'ad 'olam. ki lo yanuakh sheibet haresha' 'al goral hazadiqim lema'an lo yishlekhu hazadiqim be'avlatah yedeihem. heitibah ihoh latobim velisharim belibotam. vehamatim 'aqalqalotam yolikhem ihoh 'et po'alei ha'aven lom 'al yisra'el. shir hama'alot beshub ihoh 'et shibat ziyon hayinu kekholemim. 'az yimalei sekhoq pinu uleshoneinu rinah 'az yomeru bagoyim higdil ihoh la'asot 'im 'eleh. higdil ihoh la'asot 'imanu hayinu semeikhim. shubah ihoh 'et shebuteinu shebiteinu ka'afiqim banegeb. hazore'im bedim'ah berinah yiqzoru. halokh yeilekh ubakhoh nosei meshekh hazara' bo yabo berinah nosei 'alumotav. shir hama'alot lishlomoh 'im ihoh lo yibneh bayit shav 'amelu bonav bo 'im ihoh lo yishmar 'ir shav shaqad shomer. shav lakhem mashkimei qum me'akharei shebet 'okhelei lekhem ha'azabim ken yiten lidido sheina. hineh nakhalat ihoh banim khar peri habaten. kekhizim beyad gibor ken benei hane'urim. 'ashrei hageber 'asher milei 'et 'ashpato meihem lo yeiboshu ki yedaberu 'et 'oybim basha'ar. shir hama'alot 'ashrei kal yerei ihoh haholekh bidrakhav. yegia' kapekha ki tokhel 'ashrekha vetob lakh. 'eshtekha kegefen poriyah beyarketei beitekha banekha kishtilei zeitim sabib leshulkhanekha. hineh khi khen yeborakh gaber yerei ihoh. yebarekhkha ihoh miziyon ure'eh betub yerushalim kol yemei khayekha. ure'eh banim lebanekha lom 'al yisra'el. shir hama'alot rabat zeraruni mine'urai yomar na yisra'el. rabat zeraruni mine'urai gam lo yakhelu li. 'al gabi khareshu khoreshim he'erikhu lema'anotam lema'anitam. ihoh zadiq qizez 'abot resha'im. yeiboshu veyisogu 'akhor kol sone'ei ziyon. yihyu kakhazir gagot sheqadmat shalaf yabesh. shelo milei khapo qozer vekhizno me'amer. velo 'ameru ha'oberim birkat ihoh 'aleikhem beirakhnu 'etkhem beshem ihoh. shir hama'alot mima'amaqim qeratikha ihoh. 'adonai shim'ah beqoli tihyenah 'azenekha qashubot leqol takhanunai. 'im 'avonot tishmar yah 'adonai mi ya'amod. ki 'imekha haselikhah lema'an tivarei. qiviti ihoh qivetah nafshi velidbaro hokhaleti. nafshi ladonai mishomerim laboqer shomerim laboqer. yakhel yisra'el 'el ihoh ki 'im ihoh hakhesed veharbeh 'imo fedut. vehu yifdeh 'et yisra'el mikol 'avonotav. shir hama'alot ledavid ihoh lo gabah libi velo ramu 'einai velo hilakhti bigdolot ubenifla'ot mimeni. 'im lo shiviti vedomamti nafshi kegamul 'alei 'imo kagamul 'alai nafshi. yakhel yisra'el 'el ihoh mei'atah ve'ad 'olam. shir hama'alot zekhor ihoh ledavid 'et kal 'unoto. 'asher nishba' ihoh nadar la'abir ya'aqob. 'im 'abo be'ohel beiti 'im 'e'eleh 'al 'eres yezu'ai. 'im 'eten shenat le'einai le'af'apai tenumah. 'ad 'emza maqom ihoh mishkanot la'abir ya'aqob. hineh shema'anuha be'efratah mezanuha bisdei ya'ar. nabo'ah lemishkenotav nishtakhaveh lahadom raglav. qumah ihoh limnukhatekha 'atah va'aron 'uzekha. kohanekha yilbeshu zedeq vakhasidekha yeraneinu. ba'abur david 'abdekha 'al tasheb penei meshikhekha. nishba' ihoh ledavid 'emet lo yashub mimenah miperi bitnekha 'ashit lekhisei lakh. 'im yishmeru banekha beriti ve'eidoti zo 'alamedem gam beneihem 'adei 'ad yeishebu lekhisei lakh. ki bakhar ihoh beziyon 'ivah lemoshab lo. zot menukhati 'adei 'ad poh 'eisheb ki 'ivitiha. zeidah barekh 'abarekh 'ebyoneha 'asbia' lakhem. vekhohaneha 'albish yesha' vakhasideha ranen yeraneinu. sham 'azmiakh qeren ledavid 'arakhti ner limshikhi. 'oybav 'albish boshet ve'alav yaziz nizro. shir hama'alot ledavid hineh mah tob umah na'im shebet 'akhim gam yakhad. kashemen hatob 'al harosh yored 'al hazaqan zeqan 'aharon yored 'al pi midotav. ketal khermon sheyored 'al harrei ziyon ki sham zivah ihoh 'et haberakhah khayim 'ad ha'olam. shir hama'alot hineh barakhu 'et ihoh kal 'abdei ihoh ha'omedim bebet ihoh baleilot. se'u yedeikhem qodesh ubarakhu 'et ihoh. yebarekhkha ihoh miziyon 'oseh shamayim va'arez. halu yah halu 'et shem ihoh halu 'abdei ihoh. 'omedim bebet ihoh bekhazrot bet 'eloheinu. halu yah ki tob ihoh zameru lishmo ki na'im. ki ya'aqob bakhar lo yah yisra'el lisgulato. ki 'ani yada'ti ki gadol ihoh va'adoneinu mikal 'elohim. kol 'asher khafez ihoh 'asah bashamayim uba'arez bayamim vekhal tehomot. ma'aleh nesi'im miqzeh ha'arez beraqim lamatar 'asah mozei ruakh mei'ozrotav. hikah bekhorei mizrayim mei'adam 'ad beheimah. shalakh 'otot umofetim betokheikhi mizrayim befar'oh ubekhal 'abadav. hikah goyim rabim veharag melakhim 'azumim. lesikhon melekh ha'emori ule'og melekh habashan ulekhol mamlekhot kena'an. venatan 'arzam nakhalah nakhalah leyisra'el 'amo. ihoh shimkha le'olam ihoh zikhrekha ledor vador. ki yadin ihoh 'amo ve'al 'abadav yitnekham. 'azabei hagoyim kesef vezahab ma'aseh yedei 'adam. peh lahem velo yedabeiru 'einayim lahem velo yir'u. 'azenayim lahem velo ya'azinu 'af 'en yesh ruakh befihem. kemohem yihyu 'oseihem kol 'asher boteiakh bahem. bet yisra'el barakhu 'et ihoh bet 'aharon barakhu 'et ihoh. bet haleivi barakhu 'et ihoh yir'ei ihoh barakhu 'et ihoh. barukh ihoh miziyon shokhen yerushalim halu yah. hodu ihoh ki tob ki le'olam khasdo. hodu leilohei ha'elohim ki le'olam khasdo. hodu la'adonei ha'adonim ki le'olam khasdo. le'oseh nifla'ot gedolot lebado ki le'olam khasdo. le'oseh hashamayim bitbunah ki le'olam khasdo. leroqa' ha'arez 'al hamayim ki le'olam khasdo. le'oseh 'orim gedolim ki le'olam khasdo. 'et hashemesh lememshelet bayom ki le'olam khasdo. 'et hayareiakh vekhokhabim lememshelot balayelah ki le'olam khasdo. lemakeh mizrayim bibkhoreihem ki le'olam khasdo. vayozei yisra'el mitokham ki le'olam khasdo. beyad khazaqah ubizroa' netuyah ki le'olam khasdo. legozer yam suf ligzarim ki le'olam khasdo. vehe'ebir yisra'el betokho ki le'olam khasdo. veni'er par'oh vekheilo beyam suf ki le'olam khasdo. lemolikh 'amo bamidbar ki le'olam khasdo. lemakeh melakhim gedolim ki le'olam khasdo. vayaharog melakhim 'adirim ki le'olam khasdo. lesikhon melekh ha'emori ki le'olam khasdo. ule'og melekh habashan ki le'olam khasdo. venatan 'arzam lenakhalah ki le'olam khasdo. nakhalah leyisra'el 'abdo ki le'olam khasdo. beshifleinu zakhar lanu ki le'olam khasdo. vayifreqeinu mizareinu ki le'olam khasdo. noten lekhem lekhal basar ki le'olam khasdo. hodu le'el hashamayim ki le'olam khasdo. 'al naharot babel sham yashabnu gam bakhinu bezakhereinu 'et ziyon. 'al 'arabim betokhah talinu kinoroteinu. ki sham she'eilunu shobeinu dibreishi r vetolaleinu simkhah shiru lanu mishir ziyon. 'ekh nashir 'et shir ihoh 'al 'admat neikhar. 'im 'eshkakhekh yerushalim tishkakh yemini. tidbaq leshoni lekhiki 'im lo 'ezkereikhi 'im lo 'a'aleh 'et yerushalim 'al rosh simkhati. zekhor ihoh libnei 'edom 'et yom yerushalim ha'omerim 'aru 'aru 'ad haysod bah. bat babel hashedudah 'ashrei sheyshalem lakh 'et gemulekh shegamalt lanu. 'ashrei sheyokhez venipez 'et 'olalayikh 'el hasala'. ledavid 'odkha bekhal libi neged 'elohim 'azamereka. 'eshtakhaveh 'el heikhal qadshekha ve'odeh 'et shemekha 'al khasdekha ve'al 'amitekha ki higdalta 'al kaloshi mekha 'imratekha. beyom qarati vata'aneini tarhibeini benafshi 'oz. yodukha ihoh kal malkhei 'arez ki me'u 'imrei fikha. veyashiru bedarkhei ihoh ki gadol kebod ihoh. ki ram ihoh veshafal yir'eh vegaboah mimerkhaq yeyeida'. 'im 'eilekh beqereb zarah tekhayeini 'al 'af 'oyebai tishlakh yadekha vetoshi'eini yeminekha. ihoh yigmor ba'adi ihoh khasdekha le'olam ma'asei yadekha 'al teref. lamnazeiakh ledavid mizmor ihoh khaqartani vateida'. 'atah yada'ta shibti vequmi bantah lerei'i meirakhoq. 'arekhi verib'i zeirita vekhal derakhai hiskantah. ki 'en milah bilshoni hen ihoh yada'ta khulah. 'akhor vaqedem zartani vatashet 'alai kapekhah. pil'iyah peli'ah da'at mimeni nisgebah lo 'ukhal lah. 'anah 'eilekh meirukhekha ve'anah mipanekha 'ebrakh. 'im 'esaq mayim sham 'atah ve'azi'ah she'ol hineka. 'esa khanfei shakhar 'eshkenah be'akharit yam. gamosha m yadekha tankheini vetokhazeini yeminekha. va'omar 'akh khoshekh yeshufeini velaylah 'or ba'adeini. gam khoshekh lo yakhshikh mimekha velaylah kayom ya'ir kakhasheikhah ka'orah. ki 'atah qanita khilyotai tesukeini bebeten 'imi. 'odkha 'al ki nora'ot nifleiti nifla'im ma'asekha venafshi yoda'at me'od. lo nikhkhad 'azemi mimeka 'asher 'useiti baseiter ruqamti betakhtiyot 'arez. galemi ra'u 'einekha ve'al sifrekha kulam yikateibu yamim yuzaru velo velo 'ekhad bahem. veli mah yaqeru rei'ekha 'el meh 'azemu rasheihem. 'esperem meikhol yirbun heqizoti ve'odi 'imakh. 'im tiqtol 'eloah rasha' ve'anshei damim suru meni. 'asher yomerukha limzimah nasu lashav 'arekha. halo mesan'ekha ihoh 'esna ubitqomekha 'etqotat. takhlit sin'ah seneitim le'oybim hayu li. khaqereini 'el veda' lebabi bekhaneini veda' sar'apai. ure'eh 'im derekh 'ozeb bi unekheini bederekh 'olam. lamnazeiakh mizmor ledavid. khalezeini ihoh mei'adam ra' mei'ish khamasim tinzereini. 'asher khashebu ra'ot beleb kal yom yaguru milkhamot. shananu leshonam kemo nakhash khamat 'akhshub takhat sefateimo selah. shamereini ihoh midei rasha' mei'ish khamasim tinzereini 'asher khashebu lidkhot pe'amai. tamenu gei'im pakh li vakhabalim paresu reshet leyad ma'gal moqeshim shatu li selah. 'amarti ihoh 'eili 'atah ha'azinah ihoh qol takhanunai. ihoh 'adonai 'oz yeshu'ati sakotah leroshi beyom nasheq. 'al titen ihoh ma'avayei rasha' zemamo 'al tafeq yarumu selah. rosh mesibai 'amal sefateimo yekhasumo yekhaseimo yamitu yimotu 'aleihem gekhalim ba'esh yapilem bemahamorot bal yaqumu. 'ish lashon bal yikon ba'arez 'ish khamas ra' yezudenu lemadkheifot. yada'ta yada'ti ki ya'aseh ihoh din 'ani mishpat 'ebyonim. 'akh zadiqim yodu lishmekha yeishebu yesharim 'et panekha. mizmor ledavid ihoh qeratikha khushah li ha'azinah qoli beqare'i lakh. tikon tefilati qetoret lefanekha mas'at kapai minkhat 'areb. shitah ihoh shamerah lefi nizerah 'al dal sefatai. 'al tat libi ledabar ra' lehit'olel 'alilot beresha' 'et 'ishim po'alei 'aven ubal 'elkham beman'ameihem. yehelmeini zadiq khesed veyokhikheini shemen rosh 'al yani roshi ki 'od utefilati bera'oteihem. nishmetu bidei sela' shofeteihem veshame'u 'amarai ki na'eimu. kemo foleiakh uboqeia' ba'arez nifzeru 'azameinu lefi she'ol. ki 'eilekha ihoh 'adonai 'einai bekhah khasiti 'al te'ar nafshi. shamereini midei fakh yaqeshu li umoqeshot po'alei 'aven. yipelu bemakhmorav resha'im yakhad 'anokhi 'ad 'e'ebor. maskil ledavid bihyoto bame'arah tefilah. qoli 'el ihoh 'ez'aq qoli 'el ihoh 'etkhanan. 'eshpokh lefanav sikhi zarati lefanav 'agid. behit'atef 'alai rukhi ve'atah yada'ta netibati be'orakh zu 'ahalekh tamenu fakh li. habet yamin ure'eh ve'en li makir 'abad manos mimeni 'en doresh lenafshi. za'aqti 'eilekha ihoh 'amarti 'atah makhsi khelqi be'erez hakhayim. haqshibah 'el rinati ki daloti me'od hazileini meirodefai ki 'amezu mimeni. hozi'ah mimasger nafshi lehodot 'et shemekha bi yakhtiru zadiqim ki tigmol 'alai. mizmor ledavid ihoh shema' tefilati ha'azinah 'el takhanunai be'emunatekha 'aneini bezidqatekha. ve'al tabo bemishpat 'et 'abdekha ki lo yizdaq lefanekha khal khai. ki radaf 'oyeb nafshi dika la'arez khayati hoshibani bemakhashakim kemeitei 'olam. vatit'atef 'alai rukhi betokhi yishtomem libi. zakharti yamim miqedem hagiti bekhal pa'olekha bema'aseh yadekha 'asokheiakh. peirasti yadai 'eilekha nafshi ke'erez 'ayeifah lekha selah. maher 'aneini ihoh kaletah rukhi 'al taster panekha mimeni venimshalti 'im yoredei bor. hashmi'eini baboqer khasdekha ki bekha batakheti hodi'eini derekh zu 'eilekh ki 'eilekha nasati nafshi. hazileini mei'oyebai ihoh 'eilekha khisiti. lamedeini la'asot rezonekha ki 'atah 'elohai rukhakha tobah tankheini be'erez mishor. lema'an shimkha ihoh tekhayeini bezidqatekha tozi mizarah nafshi. ubekhasdekha tazmit 'oyebai veha'abadta kal zorarei nafshi ki 'ani 'abdekha. ledavid barukh ihoh zuri hamlamed yadai laqrab 'ezbe'otai lamilkhamah. khasdi umezudati misgabi umefalti li magini ubo khasiti haroded 'ami takhtai. ihoh mah 'adam vateida'eihu ben 'enosh vatekhashebeihu. 'adam lahebel damah yamav kezel 'ober. ihoh hat shamekha veteired ga' beharim veye'eshanu. beroq baraq utefizem shelakh khizekha utehumem. shelakh yadekha mimarom pezeini vehazileini mimayim rabim miyad benei neikhar. 'asher pihem diber shav viminam yemin shaqer. 'elohim shir khadash 'ashirah lakh beneibel 'asor 'azamerah lakh. hanoten teshu'ah lamelakhim hapozeh 'et david 'abdo meikhereb ra'ah. pezeini vehazileini miyad benei neikhar 'asher pihem diber shav viminam yemin shaqer. 'asher baneinu kinti'im megudalim bin'ureihem benoteinu khezaviyot mekhutabot tabnit heikhal. mezaveinu melei'im mefiqim mizan 'el zan zoneinu ma'alifot merubabot bekhuzoteinu. 'alufeinu mesubalim 'en perez ve'en yozet ve'en zevakhah birkhoboteinu. 'ashrei ha'am shekakhah lo 'ashrei ha'am ihoh 'elohav. tehilah ledavid 'aromimkha 'elohai hamelekh va'abarakhah mekha le'olam va'ed. bekhal yom 'abarakheka va'ahalah mekha le'olam va'ed. gadol ihoh umehulal me'od veligdulato 'en kheiqer. dor ledor yeshabakh ma'asekha ugeburotekha yagidu. hadar kebod hodekha vedibrei nifle'otekha 'asikhah. ve'ezuz nor'otekha yomeiru ugedulotekha ugedulatekha 'asaperenah. zeikher rab tubekha yabi'u vezidqatekha yeraneinu. khanun verakhum ihoh 'erekh 'apayim ugedal khased. tob ihoh lakol verakhamav 'al kal ma'asav. yodukha ihoh kal ma'asekha vakhasidekha yebarakhukhah. kebod malkhutekha yomeiru ugeburatekha yedabeiru. lehodia' libnei ha'adam geburotav ukhebod hadar malkhuto. malkhutekha malkhut kal 'olamim umemsheltekha bekhal dor vador. somekh ihoh lekhal hanofelim vezoqef lekhal hakefufim. 'einei khol 'eilekha yesabeiru ve'atah noten lahem 'et 'akhelam be'ito. poteiakh 'et yadekha umasbia' lekhal khai razon. zadiq ihoh bekhal derakhav vekhasid bekhal ma'asav. qarob ihoh lekhal qore'av lekhol 'asher yiqra'uhu be'emet. rezon yerei'av ya'aseh ve'et shav'atam yishma' veyoshi'em. shomer ihoh 'et kal 'ohabav ve'et kal haresha'im yashmid. tehilat ihoh yedaber pi vibarekh kal basar shem qadesho le'olam va'ed. halu yah hali nafshi 'et ihoh. 'ahalah ihoh bekhayai 'azamerah leilohai be'odi. 'al tibtekhu bindibim beben 'adam she'en lo teshu'ah. teizei rukho yashub le'admato bayom hahu 'abedu 'eshtonotav. 'ashrei she'el ya'aqob be'ezro bero 'al ihoh 'elohav. 'oseh shamayim va'arez 'et hayam ve'et kal 'asher bam hashomer 'emet le'olam. 'oseh mishpat la'ashuqim noten lekhem lare'eibim ihoh matir 'asurim. ihoh poqeiakh 'ivrim ihoh zoqef kefufim ihoh 'oheb zadiqim. ihoh shomer 'et geirim yatom ve'almanah ye'oded vederekh resha'im ye'avet. yimlokh ihoh le'olam 'elohayikh ziyon ledor vador halu yah. halu yah ki tob zamerah 'eloheinu ki na'im navah tehilah. boneh yerushalim ihoh nidkhei yisra'el yekhanes. harofei lishburei leb umekhabesh le'azebotam. moneh mispar lakokhabim lekhulam sheimot yiqra. gadol 'adoneinu verab koakh litbunato 'en mispar. me'oded 'anavim ihoh mashpil resha'im 'adei 'arez. 'enu ihoh betodah zameru leiloheinu bekhinor. hamkhaseh shamayim be'abim hameikhin la'arez matar hamazmiakh harim khazir. noten libheimah lakhmah libnei 'oreb 'asher yiqra'u. lo bigburat hasus yekhpaz lo beshoqei ha'ish yirzeh. rozeh ihoh 'et yerei'av 'et hamyakhalim lekhasdo. shabekhi yerushalim 'et ihoh hali 'elohayikh ziyon. ki khizaq berikhei she'arayikh beirakh banayikh beqirbekh. hasam gebulekh shalom kheileb khitim yasbi'ekh. hasholeiakh 'imrato 'arez 'ad meheirah yaruz debaro. hanoten sheleg kazamer kefor ka'eifer yefazer. mashlikh qarkho khefitim lifnei qarato mi ya'amod. yishlakh debaro veyamsem yasheb rukho yizelu mayim. magid debaro debarav leya'aqob khuqav umishpatav leyisra'el. lo 'asah khen lekhal go umishpatim bal yeda'um halu yah. halu yah halu 'et ihoh min hashamayim haluhu bameromim. haluhu khal mal'akhav haluhu kal zeba'o zeba'av. haluhu shemesh veyareiakh haluhu kal kokhbei 'or. haluhu shemei hashamayim vehamayim 'asher mei'al hashamayim. yehalu 'et shem ihoh ki hu zivah venibra'u. vaya'amidem la'ad le'olam khaq natan velo ya'abor. halu 'et ihoh min ha'arez taninim vekhal tehomot. 'esh ubarad sheleg veqitor ruakh se'arah 'osah debaro. heharim vekhal geba'ot 'ez peri vekhal 'arazim. hakhayah vekhal beheimah remes vezipor kanaf. malkhei 'erez vekhal le'umim rim vekhal shofetei 'arez. bakhurim vegam betulot zeqeinim 'im ne'arim. yehalu 'et shem ihoh ki nisgab shemo lebado hodo 'al 'erez veshamayim. vayarem qeren le'amo tehilah lekhal khasidav libnei yisra'el 'am qerobo halu yah. halu yah shiru ihoh shir khadash tehilato biqhal khasidim. yismakh yisra'el be'osav benei ziyon yagilu bemalkam. yehalu shemo bemakhol betof vekhinor yezameru lo. ki rozeh ihoh be'amo yefa'er 'anavim bishu'ah. ya'lezu khasidim bekhabod yeranenu 'al mishkebotam. romot 'el bigronam vekhereb pifiyot beyadam. la'asot neqamah bagoyim tokheikhot bal 'umim. le'sor malkheihem beziqim venikhbedeihem bekhablei barzel. la'asot bahem mishpat katub hadar hu lekhal khasidav halu yah. halu yah halu 'el beqadesho haluhu birqia' 'uzo. haluhu bigburotav haluhu kerob gudlo. haluhu beteiqa' shofar haluhu beneibel vekhinor. haluhu betof umakhol haluhu beminim ve'ugab. haluhu bezilzelei shama' haluhu bezilzelei teru'ah. kol haneshamah tehalel yah halu yah.
