mishlei shelomoh ben david melekh yisra'el. lada'at khakhmah umusar lehabin 'imrei binah. laqakhat musar haskel zedeq umishpat umeisharim. latet liftayim 'aremah lena'ar da'at umezimah. yishma' khakham veyosef leqakh venabon takhbulot yiqneh. lehabin mashal umelizah dibrei khakhamim vekhidotam. yir'at ihoh reishit da'at khakhmah umusar 'evilim bazu. shema' beni musar 'abikha ve'al titosh torat 'imekha. ki livyat khen hem leroshekha va'anaqim legargerotekha. beni 'im yefatukha khata'im 'al tobei. 'im yomeru lekhah 'itanu ne'erbah ledam nizpenah lenaqi khinam. nibla'em kish'ol khayim utemimim keyordei bor. kal hon yaqar nimza nemalei bateinu shalal. goralekha tapil betokheinu kis 'ekhad yihyeh lekhulanu. beni 'al teilekh bederekh 'itam mena' raglekha minetibatam. ki ragleihem lara' yaruzu vimaharu lishpakh dam. ki khinam mezorah harashet be'einei khal ba'al kanaf. vehem ledamam ye'erobu yizpenu lenafshotam. ken 'arekhot kal bozeia' baza' 'et nefesh be'alav yiqakh. khakhemot bakhuz taronah barekhobot titen qolah. berosh homiyot tiqra befitkhei she'arim ba'ir 'amareha tomer. 'ad matai petayim te'eihabu feti veleizim lazon khamedu lahem ukhesilim yisne'u da'at. tashubu letokhakhti hineh 'abi'ah lakhem rukhi 'odi'ah debarai 'etkhem. ya'an qarati vatema'einu natiti yadi ve'en maqshib. vatifre'u khal 'azati vetokhakhti lo 'abitem. gam 'ani be'eidekhem 'eskhaq 'el'ag bebo fakhdekhem. bebo khesha'avah khesho'ah pakhdekhem ve'eidekhem kesufah ye'eteh bebo 'aleikhem zarah vezuqah. 'az yiqra'uni velo 'e'eneh yeshakharuni velo yimza'uni. takhat ki sane'u da'at veyir'at ihoh lo bakharu. lo 'abu la'azati na'azu kal tokhakhti. veyokhelu miperi darkam umimo'azoteihem yisba'u. ki meshubat petayim tahargem veshalvat kesilim te'abedem. veshomeia' li yishkan betakh vesha'anan mipakhad ra'ah. beni 'im tiqakh 'amarai umizvotai tizpon 'itakh. lehaqshib lakhakhemah 'azenekha tateh libekha latebunah. ki 'im labinah tiqra latebunah titen qolekha. 'im tebaqshenah khakasef vekhamatmonim takhpesenah. 'az tabin yir'at ihoh veda'at 'elohim timza. ki ihoh yiten khakhmah mipiv da'at utebunah. vezafan yizpon laysharim tushiyah magen leholekhei tom. linzor 'arekhot mishpat vederekh khasido khasidav yishmor. 'az tabin zedeq umishpat umeisharim kal ma'gal tob. ki tabo khakhmah belibekha veda'at lenafshekha yin'am. mezimah tishmor 'alekha tebunah tinzerekah. lehazilekha miderekh ra' mei'ish medaber tahpukhot. ha'ozebim 'arekhot yosher lalekhet bedarkhei khoshekh. hasemeikhim la'asot ra' yagilu betahpukhot ra'. 'asher 'arekhoteihem 'iqeshim unelozim bema'gelotam. lehazilekha mei'ishah zarah minakheriyah 'amareha hekheliqah. ha'ozebet 'aluf ne'ureha ve'et berit 'eloheha shakheikhah. ki shakhah 'el mavet beitah ve'el refa'im ma'geloteha. kal ba'eha lo yeshubun velo yasigu 'arekhot khayim. lema'an teilekh bederekh tobim ve'arekhot zadiqim tishmor. ki yesharim yishkenu 'arez utemimim yivateru bah. uresha'im mei'erez yikareitu ubogdim yisekhu mimenah. beni torati 'al tishkakh umizvotai yizor libekha. ki 'orekh yamim ushenot khayim veshalom yosifu lakh. khesed ve'emet 'al ya'azbukha qasherem 'al gargerotekha katebem 'al luakh libekha. umeza khen veseikhel tob be'einei 'elohim ve'adam. betakh 'el ihoh bekhal libekha ve'el binatekha 'al tisha'en. bekhal derakhekha da'eihu vehu yeyasher 'orekhotekha. 'al tehi khakham be'einekha yera 'et ihoh vesur meira'. rif'ut tehi lesharrekha veshiqui le'azmotekha. kabed 'et ihoh meihonekha umeireishit kal tebu'atekha. veyimale'u 'asamekha saba' vetirosh yeqabekha yifrozu. musar ihoh beni 'al tim'as ve'al taqoz betokhakhto. ki 'et 'asher ye'ehab ihoh yokhiakh ukhe'ab 'et ben yirzeh. 'ashrei 'adam maza khakhmah ve'adam yafiq tebunah. ki tob sakhrah misekhar kasef umeikharuz tebu'atah. yeqarah hi mipeniyim mipeninim vekhal khafazekha lo yishvu bah. 'orekh yamim biminah bismolah 'osher vekhabod. derakheha darkhei no'am vekhal netiboteha shalom. 'ez khayim hi lamakhaziqim bah vetomekheha me'ushar. ihoh bekhakhemah yasad 'arez konen mayim bitbunah. beda'to tehomot nibqa'u ushekhaqim yir'afu tal. beni 'al yaluzu mei'einekha nezor tushiyah umezimah. veyihyu khayim lenafshekha vekhen legargerotekha. 'az teilekh labetakh darkekha veraglekha lo tigof. 'im tishkab lo tifkhad veshakhabta ve'arebah shenatekha. 'al tira mipakhad pit'om umisho'at resha'im ki tabo. ki ihoh yihyeh bekhislekha veshamar raglekha milakhed. 'al timna' tob mibe'alav bihyot le'el yadekha yadekha la'asot. 'al tomar lerei'ekha lerei'akha lekh vashub umakhar 'eten veyesh 'itakh. 'al takharosh 'al rei'akha ra'ah vehu yosheb labetakh 'itakh. 'al tarob tarib 'im 'adam khinam 'im lo gemalekha ra'ah. 'al teqanei be'ish khamas ve'al tibkhar bekhal derakhav. ki to'abat ihoh naloz ve'et yesharim sodo. me'eirat ihoh bebet rasha' uneveh zadiqim yebarekh. 'im laleizim hu yaliz vela'aniyim vela'anavim yiten khen. kabod khakhamim yinkhalu ukhesilim meirim qalon. shim'u banim musar 'ab vehaqshibu lada'at binah. ki leqakh tob natati lakhem torati 'al ta'azobu. ki ben hayiti le'abi rakh veyakhid lifnei 'imi. vayoreini vayomer li yitmakh debarai libekha shemor mizvotai vekhyeh. qeneh khakhmah qeneh binah 'al tishkakh ve'al tet mei'imrei fi. 'al ta'azbeha vetishmereka 'ehabeha vetizereka. reishit khakhmah qeneh khakhmah ubekhal qinyanekha qeneh binah. salseleha uteromeka tekhabeidekha ki tekhabeqenah. titen leroshekha livyat khen 'ateret tif'eret temageneka. shema' beni veqakh 'amarai veyirbu lekha shenot khayim. bederekh khakhmah horeitikha hidrakhtikha bema'gelei yosher. belekhtekha lo yeizar za'adekha ve'im taruz lo tikashel. hakhazeq bamusar 'al teref nizereha ki hi khayekha. be'orakh resha'im 'al tabo ve'al te'asher bederekh ra'im. pera'eihu 'al ta'abar bo seteh mei'alav va'abor. ki lo yishnu 'im lo yarei'u venigzelah natam 'im lo yikhsholu yakhshilu. ki lakhamu lekhem resha' veyen khamasim yishtu. ve'orakh zadiqim ke'or nogah holekh va'or 'ad nekhon hayom. derekh resha'im ka'afeilah lo yade'u bameh yikasheilu. beni lidbarai haqshibah la'amarai hat 'azenekha. 'al yalizu mei'einekha merem betokh lebabekha. ki khayim hem lemoze'eihem ulekhal besaro marpei. mikal mishmar nezor libekha ki mimenu toz'ot khayim. haser mimekha 'iqeshut peh ulezut fatayim harkheq mimeka. 'einekha lenokhakh yabitu ve'af'apekha yayshiru negdekha. pales ma'gal raglekha vekhal derakhekha yikonu. 'al tet yamin usemol haser raglekha meira'. beni lekhakhemati haqshibah litbunati hat 'azenekha. lishmor mezimot veda'at sefatekha yinzoru. ki nofet titofenah siftei zarah vekhalaq mishemen khikah. ve'akharitah marah khala'anah khadah kekhereb piyot. ragleha yoredot mavet 'ol ze'adeha yitmokhu. 'orakh khayim pen tefales na'u ma'geloteha lo teida'. ve'atah banim shim'u li ve'al tasuru mei'imrei fi. harkheq mei'aleha darkekha ve'al tiqrab 'el petakh beitah. pen titen la'akheirim hodekha ushenotekha le'akhzari. pen yisbe'u zarim kokhekha va'azabekha bebet nakheri. venahamta be'akharitekha bikhlot besarekha ushe'eirekha. ve'amarta 'ekh saneiti musar vetokhakhat na'az libi. velosha ma'ti beqol morai velimlamedai lo hititi 'azeni. kim'at hayiti bekhal ra' betokh qahal ve'eidah. sheteh mayim miborekha venozelim mitokh be'eirekha. yafuzu ma'yenotekha khuzah barekhobot palgei mayim. yihyu lekha lebadekha ve'en lezarim 'itakh. yehi meqorkha barukh usemakh mei'eishet ne'urekha. 'ayelet 'ahabim veya'alat khen dadeha yeravukha bekhal 'et be'ahabatah tishgeh tamid. velamah tishgeh beni bezarah utekhabeq kheq nakheriyah. ki nokhakh 'einei ihoh darkhei 'ish vekhal ma'gelotav mefales. 'avonotav yilkeduno 'et harasha' ubekhablei khatato yitamekh. hu yamut be'en musar uberob 'ivalto yishgeh. beni 'im 'arabta lerei'ekha taqa'ta lazar kapekha. noqashta be'imrei fikha nilkadta be'imrei fikha. 'aseh zot 'eifo beni vehinazel ki bata bekhaf rei'ekha lekh hitrapes urehab rei'ekha. 'al titen sheinah le'einekha utenumah le'af'apekha. hinazel kizbi miyad ukhezipor miyad yaqush. lekh 'el nemalah 'azel re'eh derakheha vakhakham. 'asher 'en lah qazin shoter umoshel. takhin baqayiz lakhmah 'agerah baqazir ma'akhalah. 'ad matai 'azel tishkab matai taqum mishenatekha. me'at not me'at tenumot me'at khibuq yadayim lishkab. uba khimhalekh reishekha umakhsorekha ke'ish magen. 'adam beliya'al 'ish 'aven holekh 'iqeshut peh. qorez be'einav molel beraglav moreh be'ezbe'otav. tahpukhot belibo khoresh ra' bekhal 'et medanim midyanim yeshaleiakh. 'al ken pit'om yabo 'eido peta' yishaber ve'en marpei. shesh henah sanei ihoh vesheba' to'abot to'abat nafsho. 'einayim ramot leshon shaqer veyadayim shofekhot dam naqi. leb khoresh makhshebot 'aven raglayim memaharot laruz lara'ah. yafiakh kezabim 'ed shaqer umeshaleiakh medanim ben 'akhim. nezor beni mizvat 'abikha ve'al titosh torat 'imekha. qasherem 'al libekha tamid 'anedem 'al gargerotekha. behithalekhkha tankheh 'otakh beshakhebekha tishmor 'alekha vahaqizota hi tesikhekha. ki ner mizvah vetorah 'or vederekh khayim tokhkhot musar. lishmarekha mei'eishet ra' meikhelqat lashon nakheriyah. 'al takhmod yafeyah bilbabekha ve'al tiqakhakha be'af'apeha. ki be'ad 'ishah zonah 'ad kikar lakhem ve'eishet 'ish nefesh yeqarah tazud. hayakhteh 'ish 'esh bekheiqo ubegadav lo tisarafnah. 'im yehalekh 'ish 'al hagekhalim veraglav lo tikavenah. ken haba 'el 'eishet rei'eihu lo yinaqeh kal hanogeia' bah. lo yabuzu laganab ki yignob lemalei nafsho ki yir'ab. venimza yeshalem shib'atayim 'et kal hon beito yiten. no'ef 'ishah khasar leb mashkhit nafsho hu ya'asenah. nega' veqalon yimza vekherpato lo timakheh. ki qin'ah khamat gaber velo yakhmol beyom naqam. lo yisa penei khal kofer velo yobeh ki tarbeh shokhad. beni shemor 'amarai umizvotai tizpon 'itakh. shemor mizvotai vekhyeh vetorati ke'ishon 'einekha. qasherem 'al 'ezbe'otekha katebem 'al luakh libekha. 'emor lakhakhemah 'akhoti 'at umoda' labinah tiqra. lishmarekha mei'ishah zarah minakheriyah 'amareha hekheliqah. ki bekhalon beiti be'ad 'eshnabi nishqafeti. va'eire bapetayim 'abinah babanim na'ar khasar leb. 'ober bashuq 'eizel pinah vederekh beitah yiz'ad. beneshef be'ereb yom be'ishon laylah va'afeilah. vehineh 'ishah liqrato shit zonah unezurat leb. homiyah hi vesoraret bebeitah lo yishkenu ragleha. pa'am bakhuz pa'am barekhobot ve'eizel kal pinah te'erob. vehekheziqah bo venasheqah lo hei'eizah faneha vatomar lo. zibkhei shelamim 'alai hayom shilamti nedarai. 'al ken yazati liqratekha leshakher panekha va'emza'eka. marbadim rabadti 'arsi khatubot 'eitun mizrayim. nafti mishkabi mor 'ahalim veqinamon. lekhah nirveh dodim 'ad haboqer nit'alesah ba'ohabim. ki 'en ha'ish bebeito halakh bederekh meirakhoq. zeror hakesef laqakh beyado leyom hakeise yabo beito. hitatu berob liqkhah bekheileq fateha tadikhenu. holekh 'akhareha pit'om keshor 'el tabakh yabo ukhe'ekhes 'el musar 'evil. 'ad yefalakh khez kebeido kemaher zipor 'el pakh velo yada' ki benafsho hu. ve'atah banim shim'u li vehaqshibu le'imrei fi. 'al yeiset 'el derakheha libekha 'al teita' bintiboteha. ki rabim khalalim hipilah va'azumim kal harugeha. darkhei she'ol beitah yoredot 'el khadrei mavet. halo khakhmah tiqra utebunah titen qolah. berosh meromim 'alei darekh bet netibot nizabah. leyad she'arim lefi qaret mebo fetakhim taronah. 'aleikhem 'ishim 'eqra veqoli 'el benei 'adam. habinu fetayim 'aremah ukhesilim habinu leb. me'u ki negidim 'adaber umiftakh fatai meisharim. ki 'emet yehgeh khiki veto'abat sefatai resha'. bezedeq kal 'imrei fi 'en bahem niftal ve'iqesh. kulam nekhokhim lameibin visharim lemoze'ei da'at. qekhu musari ve'al kasef veda'at meikharuz nibkhar. ki tobah khakhmah mipeninim vekhal khafazim lo yishvu bah. 'ani khakhmah shakhanti 'aremah veda'at mezimot 'emza. yir'at ihoh senot ra' gei'ah vega'on vederekh ra' ufi tahpukhot saneiti. li 'eizah vetushiyah 'ani binah li geburah. bi melakhim yimlokhu veroznim yekhoqequ zedeq. bi sarim yasoru unedibim kal shofetei zedeq. 'ani 'ohabeha 'ohabai 'eihab umeshakharai yimza'uni. 'osher vekhabod 'iti hon 'ateq uzedaqah. tob piryi meikharuz umipaz utebu'ati mikesef nibkhar. be'orakh zedaqah 'ahalekh betokh netibot mishpat. lehankhil 'ohabai yesh ve'ozeroteihem 'amalei. ihoh qanani reishit darko qedem mif'alav mei'az. mei'olam nisakhti meirosh miqadmei 'arez. be'en tehomot kholaleti be'en ma'yanot nikhbadei mayim. beterem harim hateba'u lifnei geba'ot kholaleti. 'ad lo 'asah 'erez vekhuzot verosh 'aferot teibel. bahakhino mayim sham 'ani bekhuqo khug 'al penei tehom. be'amezo shekhaqim mima'al ba'azoz 'inot tehom besumo layam khuqo umayim lo ya'abru fiv bekhuqo mosdei 'arez. va'ehyeh 'ezlo 'amon va'ehyeh 'ashu'im yom yom mesakheqet lefanav bekhal 'et. mesakheqet beteibel 'arzo vesha'ashu'ai 'et benei 'adam. ve'atah banim shim'u li ve'ashrei derakhai yishmoru. shim'u musar vakhakhamu ve'al tifra'u. 'ashrei 'adam shomeia' li lishqod 'al daltotai yom yom lishmor mezuzot petakhai. ki moze'i moze'ei maza khayim vayafeq razon ihoh. vekhote'i khomes nafsho kal mesan'ai 'ahabu mavet. khakhemot banetah beitah khazebah 'amudeha shib'ah. tabekhah tibkhah masekhah yeinah 'af 'arekhah shulkhanah. shalekhah na'aroteha tiqra 'al gapei meromei qaret. mi feti yasur henah khasar leb 'amerah lo. lekhu lakhamu belakhami ushetu beyayin masakheti. 'izbu fetayim vikhyu ve'ishru bederekh binah. yoser lez loqeiakh lo qalon umokhiakh lerasha' mumo. 'al tokhakh lez pen yisna'eka hokhakh lekhakham veye'ehabeka. ten lekhakham veyekhkam 'od hoda' lezadiq veyosef leqakh. tekhilat khakhmah yir'at ihoh veda'at qedoshim binah. ki bi yirbu yamekha veyosifu lekha shenot khayim. 'im khakhamta khakhamta lakh velazta lebadekha tisa. 'eishet kesilut homiyah petayut ubal yade'ah mah. veyashebah lefetakh beitah 'al kisei meromei qaret. liqro le'oberei darekh hamyasherim 'orekhotam. mi feti yasur henah vakhasar leb ve'amerah lo. mayim genubim yimtaqu velekhem setarim yin'am. velo yada' ki refa'im sham be'imqei she'ol qeru'eha. mishlei shelomoh ben khakham yesamakh 'ab uben kesil tugat 'imo. lo yo'ilu 'ozrot resha' uzedaqah tazil mimavet. lo yar'ib ihoh nefesh zadiq vehavat resha'im yehdof. rash 'oseh khaf remiyah veyad kharuzim ta'ashir. 'oger baqayiz ben maskil nirdam baqazir ben meibish. berakhot lerosh zadiq ufi resha'im yekhaseh khamas. zeikher zadiq librakhah veshem resha'im yirqab. khakham leb yiqakh mizvot ve'evil fatayim yilabet. holekh batom yeilekh betakh ume'aqesh derakhav yivadeia'. qorez 'ayin yiten 'azabet ve'evil fatayim yilabet. meqor khayim pi zadiq ufi resha'im yekhaseh khamas. ne'ah te'orer medanim ve'al kal pesha'im tekhaseh 'ahabah. besiftei nabon timazei khakhmah vesheibet legev khasar leb. khakhamim yizpenu da'at ufi 'evil mekhitah qerobah. hon 'ashir qiryat 'uzo mekhitat dalim reisham. pe'ulat zadiq lekhayim tebu'at rasha' lekhatat. 'orakh lekhayim shomer musar ve'ozeb tokhakhat mat'eh. mekhaseh ne'ah siftei shaqer umozi dibah hu khesil. berob debarim lo yekhdal pasha' vekhosekh sefatav maskil. kesef nibkhar leshon zadiq leb resha'im kim'at. siftei zadiq yir'u rabim ve'evilim bakhasar leb yamutu. birkat ihoh hi ta'ashir velo yosif 'ezeb 'imah. kiskhoq likhsil 'asot zimah vekhakhemah le'ish tebunah. megorat rasha' hi tebo'enu veta'avat zadiqim yiten. ka'abor sufah ve'en rasha' vezadiq yesod 'olam. kakhomez lashinayim vekhe'ashan la'einayim ken he'azel lesholekhav. yir'at ihoh tosif yamim ushenot resha'im tiqzorenah. tokhelet zadiqim simkhah vetiqvat resha'im tobed. ma'oz latom derekh ihoh umekhitah lefo'alei 'aven. zadiq le'olam bal yimot uresha'im lo yishkenu 'arez. pi zadiq yanub khakhmah uleshon tahpukhot tikaret. siftei zadiq yeide'un razon ufi resha'im tahpukhot. mozenei mirmah to'abat ihoh ve'eben sheleimah rezono. ba zadon vayabo qalon ve'et zenu'im khakhmah tumat yesharim tankhem veselef bogdim veshadam yeshadem. lo yo'il hon beyom 'ebrah uzedaqah tazil mimavet. zidqat tamim teyasher darko uberish'ato yipol rasha'. zidqat yesharim tazilem ubehavat bogedim yilakheidu. bemot 'adam rasha' tobad tiqvah vetokhelet 'onim 'abadah. zadiq mizarah nekhelaz vayabo rasha' takhtav. befeh khanef yashkhit rei'eihu ubeda'at zadiqim yeikhaleizu. betub zadiqim ta'aloz qiryah uba'abod resha'im rinah. bebirkat yesharim tarum qaret ubefi resha'im teihares. baz lerei'eihu khasar leb ve'ish tebunot yakharish. holekh rakhil megaleh sod vene'eman ruakh mekhaseh dabar. be'en takhbulot yipal 'am uteshu'ah berob yo'ez. ra' yeiroa' ki 'arab zar vesonei toqe'im boteiakh. 'eishet khen titmokh kabod ve'arizim yitmekhu 'osher. gomel nafsho 'ish khased ve'okher 'eiro 'akhzari. rasha' 'oseh fe'ulat shaqer vezoreia' zedaqah sekher 'emet. ken zedaqah lekhayim umeradef ra'ah lemoto. to'abat ihoh 'iqeshei leb urezono temimei darekh. yad leyad lo yinaqeh ra' vezera' zadiqim nimlat. nezem zahab be'af khazir 'ishah yafah vesarat ta'am. ta'avat zadiqim 'akh tob tiqvat resha'im 'ebrah. yesh mefazer venosaf 'od vekhosekh miyosher 'akh lemakhsor. nefesh berakhah tedushan umarveh gam hu yore. moneia' bar yiqebuhu le'om uberakhah lerosh mashbir. shokher tob yebaqesh razon vedoresh ra'ah tebo'enu. boteiakh be'ashero hu yipol vekhe'aleh zadiqim yifrakhu. 'okher beito yinkhal ruakh ve'ebed 'evil lakhakham leb. peri zadiq 'ez khayim veloqeiakh nefasot khakham. hen zadiq ba'arez yeshulam 'af ki rasha' vekhotei. 'oheb musar 'oheb da'at vesonei tokhakhat ba'ar. tob yafiq razon ihoh ve'ish mezimot yarshia'. lo yikon 'adam beresha' veshoresh zadiqim bal yimot. 'eishet khayil 'ateret ba'lah ukheraqab be'azmotav mebishah. makhshebot zadiqim mishpat takhbulot resha'im mirmah. dibrei resha'im 'erab dam ufi yesharim yazilem. hafokh resha'im ve'einam ubet zadiqim ya'amod. lefisi khelo yehulal 'ish vena'aveh leb yihyeh labuz. tob niqleh ve'ebed lo mimetakabed vakhasar lakhem. yodeia' zadiq nefesh behemto verakhamei resha'im 'akhzari. 'obed 'admato yisba' lakhem umeradef reiqim khasar leb. khamad rasha' mezod ra'im veshoresh zadiqim yiten. befesha' fatayim moqesh ra' vayeizei mizarah zadiq. miperi fi 'ish yisba' tob ugemul yedei 'adam yashub yashib lo. derekh 'evil yashar be'einav veshomeia' le'eizah khakham. 'evil bayom yivada' ka'so vekhoseh qalon 'arum. yafiakh 'emunah yagid zedeq ve'ed sheqarim mirmah. yesh boteh kemadqerot khareb uleshon khakhamim marpei. sefat 'emet tikon la'ad ve'ad 'argi'ah leshon shaqer. mirmah beleb khoreshei ra' uleyo'azei shalom simkhah. lo ye'uneh lazadiq kal 'aven uresha'im male'u ra'. to'abat ihoh siftei shaqer ve'osei 'emunah rezono. 'adam 'arum koseh da'at veleb kesilim yiqra 'ivelet. yad kharuzim timshol uremiyah tihyeh lamas. de'agah beleb 'ish yashkhenah vedabar tob yesamekhenah. yater meirei'eihu zadiq vederekh resha'im tat'em. lo yakharokh remiyah zeido vehon 'adam yaqar kharuz. be'orakh zedaqah khayim vederekh netibah 'al mavet. ben khakham musar 'ab velez lo shama' ge'arah. miperi fi 'ish yokhal tob venefesh bogedim khamas. nozer piv shomer nafsho poseq fatav mekhitah lo. mit'avah va'ayin nafsho 'azel venefesh kharuzim tedushan. debaroshe qer yisna zadiq verasha' yab'ish veyakhpir. zedaqah tizor tam darekh verish'ah tesalef khatat. yesh mit'asher ve'en kol mitroshesh vehon rab. kofer nefesh 'ish 'ashero verash lo shama' ge'arah. 'or zadiqim yismakh vener resha'im yid'akh. raq bezadon yiten mazah ve'et no'azim khakhmah hon meihebel yim'at veqobez 'al yad yarbeh. tokhelet memushakhah makhalah leb ve'ez khayim ta'avah ba'ah. baz ledabar yeikhabel lo virei mizvah hu yeshulam. torat khakham meqor khayim lasur mimoqeshei mavet. seikhel tob yiten khen vederekh bogedim 'eitan. kal 'arum ya'aseh beda'at ukhesil yifros 'ivelet. mal'akh rasha' yipol bera' vezir 'emunim marpei. resh veqalon poreia' musar veshomer tokhakhat yekhubad. ta'avah nihyah te'erab lenafesh veto'abat kesilim sur meira'. halokh holekh 'et khakhamim vakhakham yekhkam vero'eh khesilim yeiroa'. khata'im teradef ra'ah ve'et zadiqim yeshalem tob. tob yankhil benei banim vezafun lazadiq khel khotei. rab 'okhel nir rashim veyesh nispeh belo mishpat. khosekh beto sonei beno ve'ohabo shikharo musar. zadiq 'okhel lesoba' nafsho ubeten resha'im tekhsar. khakhmot nashim banetah beitah ve'ivelet beyadeha tehersenu. holekh beyashero yerei ihoh uneloz derakhav bozeihu. befi 'evil khoter ga'avah vesiftei khakhamim tishmurem. be'en 'alafim 'eibus bar verab tebu'ot bekhoakh shor. 'ed 'emunim lo yekhazeb veyafiakh kezabim 'ed shaqer. biqesh lez khakhmah va'ayin veda'at lenabon naqal. lekh mineged le'ish kesil ubal yada'ta siftei da'at. khakhemat 'arum habin darko ve'ivelet kesilim mirmah. 'evilim yaliz 'asham uben yesharim razon. leb yodeia' marrat nafsho ubesimkhato lo yit'arab zar. bet resha'im yishamed ve'ohel yesharim yafriakh. yesh derekh yashar lifnei 'ish ve'akharitah darkhei mavet. gam biskhoq yikh'ab leb ve'akharitah simkhah tugah. miderakhav yisba' sug leb umei'alav 'ish tob. peti ya'amin lekhal dabar ve'arum yabin la'ashuro. khakham yarei vesar meira' ukhesil mit'aber uboteiakh. qezar 'apayim ya'aseh 'ivelet ve'ish mezimot yisanei. nakhalu fetayim 'ivelet va'arumim yakhtiru da'at. shakhu ra'im lifnei tobim uresha'im 'al sha'arei zadiq. gam lerei'eihu yisanei rash ve'ohabei 'ashir rabim. baz lerei'eihu khotei umekhonen 'anayim 'anavim 'ashrav. halo yit'u khoreshei ra' vekhesed ve'emet khoreshei tob. bekhal 'ezeb yihyeh motar udebars fatayim 'akh lemakhsor. 'ateret khakhamim 'asheram 'ivelet kesilim 'ivelet. mazil nefashot 'ed 'emet veyafiakh kezabim mirmah. beyir'at ihoh mibtakh 'oz ulebanav yihyeh makhseh. yir'at ihoh meqor khayim lasur mimoqeshei mavet. berab 'am hadrat melekh ube'efes le'om mekhitat razon. 'erekh 'apayim rab tebunah uqezar ruakh meirim 'ivelet. khayei besarim leb marpei ureqab 'azamot qin'ah. 'osheq dal kheiref 'oseihu umekhabedo khonen 'ebyon. bera'ato yidakheh rasha' vekhoseh bemoto zadiq. beleb nabon tanuakh khakhmah ubeqereb kesilim tivadeia'. zedaqah teromem go vekhesed le'umim khatat. rezon melekh le'ebed maskil ve'ebrato tihyeh meibish. ma'aneh rakh yashib kheimah udebar 'ezeb ya'aleh 'af. leshon khakhamim teitib da'at ufi khesilim yabia' 'ivelet. bekhal maqom 'einei ihoh zofot ra'im vtobim marpei lashon 'ez khayim veselef bah sheber beruakh. 'evil yin'az musar 'abiv veshomer tokhakhat ya'rim. bet zadiq khosen rab ubitbu'at rasha' ne'karet. siftei khakhamim yezaru da'at veleb kesilim lo khen. zebakh resha'im to'abat ihoh utefilat yesharim rezono. to'abat ihoh derekh rasha' umeradef zedaqah ye'ehab. musar ra' le'ozeb 'orakh sonei tokhakhat yamut. she'ol va'abadon neged ihoh 'af ki libot benei 'adam. lo ye'ehab lez hokheiakh lo 'el khakhamim lo yeilekh. leb meiakh yeitib panim ube'azebat leb ruakh nekhei'ah. leb nabon yebaqesh da'at ufenei ufi khesilim yir'eh 'ivelet. kal yemei 'ani ra'im vetob leb mishteh tamid. tob me'at beyir'at ihoh mei'ozar rab umehumah bo. tob 'arukhat yaraq ve'ahabah sham mishor 'abus vesin'ah bo. 'ish kheimah yegareh madon ve'erekh 'apayim yashqit rib. derekh 'azel kimsukhat khadeq ve'orakh yesharim selulah. ben khakham yesamakh 'ab ukhesil 'adam bozeh 'imo. 'ivelet simkhah lakhasar leb ve'ish tebunah yeyasher lakhet. hafer makhashabot be'en sod uberob yo'azim taqum. simkhah la'ish bema'aneh fiv vedabar be'ito mah tob. 'orakh khayim lema'lah lemaskil lema'an sur mishe'ol matah. bet gei'im yisakh ihoh veyazeb gebul 'almanah. to'abat ihoh makhshebot ra' utehorim 'imrei no'am. 'okher beito bozeia' baza' vesonei matanot yikhyeh. leb zadiq yehgeh la'anot ufi resha'im yabia' ra'ot. rakhoq ihoh meiresha'im utefilat zadiqim yishma'. me'or 'einayim yesamakh leb shemu'ah tobah tedashen 'azem. 'ozen shoma'at tokhakhat khayim beqereb khakhamim talin. poreia' musar mo'es nafsho veshomeia' tokhakhat qoneh leb. yir'at ihoh musar khakhmah velifnei khabod 'anavah. le'adam ma'arkhei leb ihoh ma'aneh lashon. kal darkhei 'ish zakh be'einav vetokhen rukhot ihoh. gol 'el ihoh ma'asekha veyikonu makhshebotekha. kol pa'al ihoh lama'aneihu vegam rasha' leyom ra'ah. to'abat ihoh kal gebah leb yad leyad lo yinaqeh. bekhesed ve'emet yekhupar 'avon ubeyir'at ihoh sur meira'. birzot ihoh darkhei 'ish gam 'oybav yashlim 'ito. tob me'at bizdaqah meirob tebu'ot belo mishpat. leb 'adam yekhasheb darko ihoh yakhin za'ado. qesem 'al siftei melekh bemishpat lo yim'al piv. peles umozenei mishpat ihoh ma'aseihu kal 'abnei khis. to'abat melakhim 'asot resha' ki bizdaqah yikon kisei. rezon melakhim siftei zedeq vedober yesharim ye'ehab. khamat melekh mal'akhei mavet ve'ish khakham yekhaperenah. be'or penei melekh khayim urezono ke'ab malqosh. qenoh khakhmah mah tob meikharuz uqenot binah nibkhar mikasef. mesilat yesharim sur meira' shomer nafsho nozer darko. lifnei sheber ga'on velifnei khishalon gobah ruakh. tob shefal ruakh 'et 'aniyim 'anavim meikhaleq lal 'et gei'im. maskil 'al dabar yimza tob uboteiakh ihoh 'ashrav. lakhakham leb yiqarei nabon umeteq fatayim yosif leqakh. meqor khayim seikhel be'alav umusar 'evilim 'ivelet. leb khakham yaskil pihu ve'als fatav yosif leqakh. zuf debash 'imrei no'am matoq lanefesh umarpei la'azem. yesh derekh yashar lifnei 'ish ve'akharitah darkhei mavet. nefesh 'amel 'amelah lo ki 'akhaf 'alav pihu. 'ish beliya'al koreh ra'ah ve'al sefatav fato ke'esh zarabet. 'ish tahpukhot yeshalakh madon venirgan mafrid 'aluf. 'ish khamas yefateh rei'eihu veholikho bederekh lo tob. 'ozeh 'einav lakhshob tahpukhot qorez fatav kilah ra'ah. 'ateret tif'eret seibah bederekh zedaqah timazei. tob 'erekh 'apayim migibor umoshel berukho milokhed 'ir. bakheq yutal 'et hagoral ihoh kal mishpato. tob pat khareibah veshalvah bah mibayit malei zibkhei rib. 'ebed maskil yimshol beben meibish ubetokh 'akhim yakhaloq nakhalah. mazref lakesef vekhur lazahab ubokhen libot ihoh. meira' maqshib 'al sefat 'aven sheqer meizin 'al leshon havot. lo'eg larash kheiref 'oseihu sameiakh le'ed lo yinaqeh. 'ateret zeqeinim benei banim vetif'eret banim 'abotam. lo navah lenabal sefat yeter 'af ki lenadib sefat shaqer. 'eben khen hashokhad be'einei be'alav 'el kal 'asher yifneh yaskil. mekhaseh pesha' mebaqesh 'ahabah veshoneh bedabar mafrid 'aluf. teikhat ge'arah bemeibin meihakot kesil mei'ah. 'akh meri yebaqesh ra' umal'akh 'akhzari yeshulakh bo. pagosh dob shakul be'ish ve'al kesil be'ivalto. meishib ra'ah takhat tobah lo tamish tamush ra'ah mibeito. poter mayim reishit madon velifnei hitgala' harib netosh. mazdiq rasha' umarshia' zadiq to'abat ihoh gam sheneihem. lamah zeh mekhir beyad kesil liqnot khakhmah veleb 'ayin. bekhal 'et 'oheb hareia' ve'akh lezarah yivaled. 'adam khasar leb toqeia' kaf 'oreb 'arubah lifnei rei'eihu. 'oheb pesha' 'oheb mazah magbiah pitkho mebaqesh shaber. 'iqesh leb lo yimza tob venehpakh bilshono yipol bera'ah. yoled kesil letugah lo velo yismakh 'abi nabal. leb meiakh yeitib geihah veruakh nekhei'ah teyabesh garem. shokhad meikheq rasha' yiqakh lehatot 'arekhot mishpat. 'et penei meibin khakhmah ve'einei khesil biqzeh 'arez. ka'as le'abiv ben kesil umemer leyoladto. gam 'anosh lazadiq lo tob lehakot nedibim 'al yosher. khosekh 'amarav yodeia' da'at veqar yeqar 'ish tebunah. gam 'evil makharish khakham yeikhasheb 'otem sefatav nabon. leta'avah yebaqesh nifrad bekhal tushiyah yitgala'. lo yakhpoz kesil bitbunah ki 'im behitgalot libo. bebo rasha' ba gam buz ve'im qalon kherpah. mayim 'amuqim dibrei fi 'ish nakhal nobeia' meqor khakhmah se'et penei rasha' lo tob lehatot zadiq bamishpat. siftei khesil yabo'u berib ufiv lemahalumot yiqra. pi khesil mekhitah lo usefatav moqesh nafsho. dibrei nirgan kemitlahamim vehem yaredu khadrei baten. gam mitrapeh bimlakhto 'akh hu leba'al mashkhit. migdal 'oz shem ihoh bo yaruz zadiq venisgab. hon 'ashir qiryat 'uzo ukhekhomah nisgabah bemaskito. lifneishe ber yigbah leb 'ish velifnei khabod 'anavah. meishib dabar beterem yishma' 'ivelet hi lo ukhelimah. ruakh 'ish yekhalkel makhaleihu veruakh nekhei'ah mi yisa'enah. leb nabon yiqneh da'at ve'ozen khakhamim tebaqesh da'at. matan 'adam yarkhib lo velifnei gedolim yankhenu. zadiq harishon beribo yabo uba vakhaqaro. midyanim yashbit hagoral uben 'azumim yafrid. 'akh nifsha' miqiryat 'oz umedonim umidyanim kibriakh 'armon. miperi fi 'ish tisba' bitno tebu'at sefatav yisba'. mavet vekhayim beyad lashon ve'ohabeha yokhal piryah. maza 'ishah maza tob vayafeq razon ihoh. takhanunim yedaber rash ve'ashir ya'aneh 'azot. 'ish rei'im lehitro'eia' veyesh 'oheb dabeq mei'akh. tob rash holekh betumo mei'iqesh fatav vehu khesil. gam belo da'at nefesh lo tob ve'az beraglayim khotei. 'ivelet 'adam tesalef darko ve'al ihoh yiz'af libo. hon yosif rei'im rabim vedal meirei'hu yipared. 'ed qarim lo yinaqeh veyafiakh kezabim lo yimalet. rabim yekhalu fenei nadib vekhal hareia' le'ish matan. kal 'akhei rash senei'uhu 'af ki merei'eihu rakhaqu mimenu meradef 'amarim lo lo hemah. qoneh leb 'oheb nafsho shomer tebunah limzo tob. 'ed qarim lo yinaqeh veyafiakh kezabim yobed. lo naveh likhsil ta'anug 'af ki le'ebed meshol besarim. seikhel 'adam he'erikh 'apo vetif'arto 'abor 'al pasha'. naham kakefir za'af melekh ukhetal 'al 'eiseb rezono. havot le'abiv ben kesil vedelef tored midyenei 'ishah. bayit vahon nakhalat 'abot ihoh 'ishah maskalet. 'azlah tapil tardeimah venefesh remiyah tir'ab. shomer mizvah shomer nafsho bozeh derakhav yumat yamut. malveh ihoh khonen dal ugemulo yeshalem lo. yaser binkha ki yesh tiqvah ve'el hamito 'al tisa nafshekha. goral gedal kheimah nosei 'onesh ki 'im tazil ve'od tosif. shema' 'eizah veqabel musar lema'an tekhkam be'akharitekha. rabot makhashabot beleb 'ish va'azat ihoh hi taqum. ta'avat 'adam khasdo vetob rash mei'ish kazab. yir'at ihoh lekhayim vesabeia' yalin bal yipaqed ra'. taman 'azel yado bazalakhat gam 'el pihu lo yeshibenah. lez takeh ufeti ya'rim vehokhiakh lenabon yabin da'at. meshaded 'ab yabriakh 'em ben meibish umakhpir. khadal beni lishmoa' musar lishgot mei'imrei da'at. 'ed beliya'al yaliz mishpat ufi resha'im yebala' 'aven. nakhonu laleizim shefatim umahalumot legev kesilim. lez hayayn homeh sheikhar vekhal shogeh bo lo yekhkam. naham kakefir 'eimat melekh mit'abero khotei nafsho. kabod la'ish shebet meirib vekhal 'evil yitgala'. meikhoref 'azel lo yakharosh yish'al vesha'al baqazir va'ayin. mayim 'amuqim 'eizah beleb 'ish ve'ish tebunah yidlenah. rab 'adam yiqra 'ish khasdo ve'ish 'emunim mi yimza. mithalekh betumo zadiq 'ashrei banav 'akharav. melekh yosheb 'al kisei din mezareh be'einav kal ra'. mi yomar zikiti libi taharti meikhatati. 'eben va'eben 'eifah ve'eifah to'abat ihoh gam sheneihem. gam bema'alalav yitnaker na'ar 'im zakh ve'im yashar pa'olo. 'ozen ma'at ve'ayin ro'ah ihoh 'asah gam sheneihem. 'al te'ehab nah pen tivaresh peqakh 'einekha seba' lakhem. ra' ra' yomar haqoneh ve'ozel lo 'az yithalal. yesh zahab verab peninim ukheli yeqar siftei da'at. leqakh bigdo ki 'arab zar ube'ad nakherim nakheriyah khableihu. 'areb la'ish lekhem shaqer ve'akhar yimalei fihu khazaz. makhashabot be'eizah tikon ubetakhbulot 'aseh milkhamah. goleh sod holekh rakhil ulefoteh fatav lo tit'arab. meqalel 'abiv ve'imo yid'akh neiro be'ishon be'eshun khoshekh. nakhalah mebukhelet mebohelet barishonah ve'akharitah lo teborakh. 'al tomar 'ashalemah ra' qaveh ihoh veyosha' lakh. to'abat ihoh 'eben va'aben umozenei mirmah lo tob. ihoh miz'adei gaber ve'adam mah yabin darko. moqesh 'adam yala' qodesh ve'akhar nedarim lebaqer. mezareh resha'im melekh khakham vayasheb 'aleihem 'ofan. ner ihoh nishmat 'adam khofes kal khadrei baten. khesed ve'emet yizeru melekh vesa'ad bakhesed kis'o. tif'eret bakhurim kokham vahadar zeqeinim seibah. khaburot peza' tamriq tamruq bera' umakot khadrei baten. palgei mayim leb melekh beyad ihoh 'al kal 'asher yakhpoz yatenu. kal derekh 'ish yashar be'einav vetokhen libot ihoh. 'asoh zedaqah umishpat nibkhar ihoh mizabakh. rum 'einayim urekhab leb nir resha'im khatat. makhshebot kharuz 'akh lemotar vekhal 'az 'akh lemakhsor. po'al 'ozarot bilshon shaqer hebel nidaf mebaqshei mavet. shod resha'im yegorem ki mei'anu la'asot mishpat. hafakhpakh derekh 'ish vazar vezakh yashar pa'olo. tob lashebet 'al pinat gag mei'eishet midyanim ubet khaber. nefesh rasha' 'ivetah ra' lo yukhan be'einav rei'eihu. ba'nash lez yekhkam peti ubehaskil lekhakham yiqakh da'at. maskil zadiq lebet rasha' mesalef resha'im lara'. 'otem 'azeno miza'aqat dal gam hu yiqra velo yei'aneh. matan baseiter yikhpeh 'af veshokhad bakheq kheimah 'azah. simkhah lazadiq 'asot mishpat umekhitah lefo'alei 'aven. 'adam to'eh miderekh haskel biqhal refa'im yanuakh. 'ish makhsor 'oheb simkhah 'oheb yayin vashemen lo ya'ashir. kofer lazadiq rasha' vetakhat yesharim boged. tob shebet be'erez midbar mei'eishet medonim midyanim vakha'as. 'ozar nekhmad vashemen binveh khakham ukhesil 'adam yebale'enu. rodef zedaqah vakhased yimza khayim zedaqah vekhabod. 'ir giborim 'alah khakham vayored 'oz mibtekhah. shomer piv uleshono shomer mizarot nafsho. zed yahir lez shemo 'oseh be'ebrat zadon. ta'avat 'azel temitenu ki mei'anu yadav la'asot. kal hayom hit'avah ta'avah vezadiq yiten velo yakhsokh. zebakh resha'im to'eibah 'af ki bezimah yebi'enu. 'ed kezabim yobed ve'ish vmeia' lanezakh yedaber. hei'ez 'ish rasha' befanav veyashar hu yakhin yabin derakhav darko. 'en khakhmah ve'en tebunah ve'en 'eizah leneged ihoh. sus mukhan leyom milkhamah ihoh hateshu'ah. nibkhar m mei'osher rab mikesef umizahab khen tob. 'ashir varash nifgashu 'oseh khulam ihoh. 'arum ra'ah ra'ah veyisater venistar ufetayim 'aberu vene'enashu. 'eiqeb 'anavah yir'at ihoh 'osher vekhabod vekhayim. zinim pakhim bederekh 'iqesh shomer nafsho yirkhaq meihem. khanokh lana'ar 'al pi darko gam ki yazqin lo yasur mimenah. 'ashir berashim yimshol ve'ebed loeh le'ish malveh. zoreia' 'avlah yiqzor yiqzar 'aven vesheibet 'ebrato yikhleh. tob 'ayin hu yeborakh ki natan milakhmo ladal. garesh lez veyeizei madon veyishbot din veqalon. 'oheb tehor tehar leb khen fatav rei'eihu melekh. 'einei ihoh nazeru da'at vaysalef dibrei boged. 'amar 'azel 'ari bakhuz betokh rekhobot 'eirazeiakh. shukhah 'amuqah pi zarot ze'um ihoh yipol yipal sham. 'ivelet qeshurah beleb na'ar sheibet musar yarkhiqenah mimenu. 'osheq dal leharbot lo noten le'ashir 'akh lemakhsor. hat 'azenekha ushema' dibrei khakhamim velibekha tashit leda'ti. ki na'im ki tishmerem bebitnekha yikonu yakhdav 'al sefatekha. lihyot ihoh mibtakhekha hoda'tikha hayom 'af 'atah. halo khatabti lekha shilshom shalishim bemo'eizot vada'at. lehodi'akha qoshet 'imrei 'emet lehashib 'amarim 'emet lesholekhekha. 'al tigzal dal ki dal hu ve'al tedakei 'ani basha'ar. ki ihoh yarib ribam veqaba' 'et qobe'eihem nafesh. 'al titra' 'et ba'al 'af ve'et 'ish kheimot lo tabo. pen te'elaf 'arekhato 'orekhotav velaqakhta moqesh lenafshekha. 'al tehi betoqe'ei khaf ba'orebim masha'ot. 'im 'en lekha leshalem lamah yiqakh mishkabekha mitakhtekha. 'al taseg gebul 'olam 'asher 'asu 'abotekha. khazita 'ish mahir bimlakhto lifnei melakhim yityazab bal yityazeb lifnei khashukim. ki teisheb lilkhom 'et moshel bin tabin 'et 'asher lefanekha. vesamta sakin belo'ekha 'im ba'al nefesh 'atah. 'al tit'av lemat'amotav vehu lekhem kezabim. 'al tiga' leha'ashir mibinatekha khadal. hata'uf hata'if 'einekha bo ve'einenu ki 'asoh ya'aseh lo khenafayim kenesher ve'ayef ya'uf hashamayim. 'al tilkham 'et lekhem ra' 'ayin ve'al tit'av tit'av lemat'amotav. ki kemo sha'ar benafsho ken hu 'ekhol usheteh yomar lakh velibo bal 'imakh. pitekha 'akhalta teqi'enah veshikhata debarekha hane'imim. be'azenei khesil 'al tedaber ki yabuz leseikhel milekha. 'al taseg gebul 'olam ubisdei yetomim 'al tabo. ki go'alam khazaq hu yarib 'et ribam 'itakh. habi'ah lamusar libekha ve'azenekha le'imrei da'at. 'al timna' mina'ar musar ki takenu basheibet lo yamut. 'atah basheibet takenu venafsho mishe'ol tazil. beni 'im khakham libekha yismakh libi gam 'ani. veta'lozenah khilyotai bedaber fatekha meisharim. 'al yeqanei libekha bakhata'im ki 'im beyir'at ihoh kal hayom. ki 'im yesh 'akharit vetiqvatekha lo tikaret. shema' 'atah beni vakhakham ve'asher baderekh libekha. 'al tehi besobe'ei yayin bezolalei basar lamo. ki sobei vezolel yivaresh uqera'im talbish numah. shema' le'abikha zeh yeladekha ve'al tabuz ki zaqenah 'imekha. 'emet qeneh ve'al timkor khakhmah umusar ubinah. gol gil yagol yagil 'abi zadiq yoled veyoled khakham veyismakh yismakh bo. yismakh 'abikha ve'imekha vetagel yoladtekha. tenah beni libekha li ve'einekha derakhai tirzenah tizorenah ki shukhah 'amuqah zonah ube'er zarah nakheriyah. 'af hi kekhetef te'erob ubogdim be'adam tosif. lemi 'o lemi 'abo lemi midonim midyanim lemi siakh lemi peza'im khinam lemi khakhlilut 'einayim. lam'akharim 'al hayayin laba'im lakhqor mimsakh. 'al teire yayin ki yit'adam ki yiten bakis bakos 'eino yithalekh bemeisharim. 'akharito kenakhash yishakh ukhezif'oni yafrish. 'einekha yir'u zarot velibekha yedaber tahpukhot. vehayita keshokheb beleb yam ukheshokheb berosh khibel. hikuni bal khaliti halamuni bal yada'eti matai 'aqiz 'osif 'abaqshenu 'od. 'al teqanei be'anshei ra'ah ve'al tit'av tit'av lihyot 'itam. ki shod yehgeh libam ve'amal sifteihem tedabeirenah. bekhakhemah yibaneh bayit ubitbunah yitkonan. ubeda'at khadarim yimale'u kal hon yaqar vena'im. geber khakham ba'oz ve'ish da'at me'amez koakh. ki betakhbulot ta'aseh lekha milkhamah uteshu'ah berob yo'ez. ramot le'evil khakhemot basha'ar lo yiftakh pihu. mekhasheb lehareia' lo ba'al mezimot yiqra'u. zimat 'ivelet khatat veto'abat le'adam lez. hitrapita beyom zarah zar kokhekhah. hazel lequkhim lamavet umatim lahereg 'im takhsokh. ki tomar hen lo yada'nu zeh halo tokhen libot hu yabin venozer nafshekha hu yeida' veheishib le'adam kefa'olo. 'ekhal beni debash ki tob venofet matoq 'al khikekha. ken de'eh khakhmah lenafshekha 'im mazata veyesh 'akharit vetiqvatekha lo tikaret. 'al te'erob rasha' linveh zadiq 'al teshaded ribzo. ki sheba' yipol zadiq vaqam uresha'im yikashelu bera'ah. binfol 'oybekha 'oyibkha 'al tismakh ubikashelo 'al yagel libekha. pen yir'eh ihoh vera' be'einav veheishib mei'alav 'apo. 'al titkhar bamerei'im 'al teqanei baresha'im. ki lo tihyeh 'akharit lara' ner resha'im yid'akh. yera 'et ihoh beni vamelekh 'imosho vnim 'al tit'arab. ki fit'om yaqum 'eidam ufid neihem mi yodeia'. gam 'eleh lakhakhamim haker panim bemishpat bal tob. 'omer lerasha' zadiq 'atah yiqebuhu 'amim yiz'amuhu le'umim. velamokhikhim yin'am va'aleihem tabo birkat tob. sefatayim yishaq meishib debarim nekhokhim. hakhen bakhuz melakhtekha ve'atedah basadeh lakh 'akhar ubanita beitekha. 'al tehi 'ed khinam berei'ekha vahafitita bisfatekha. 'al tomar ka'asher 'asah li ken 'e'eseh lo 'ashib la'ish kefa'olo. 'al sedeh 'ish 'azel 'abarti ve'al kerem 'adam khasar leb. vehineh 'alah khulo qimesonim kasu fanav kharulim vegeder 'abanav neherasah. va'ekhezeh 'anokhi 'ashit libi ra'iti laqakhti musar. me'at not me'at tenumot me'at khibuq yadayim lishkab. uba mithalekh reishekha umakhsorekha ke'ish magen. gam 'eleh mishlei shelomoh 'asher he'tiqu 'anshei khizqiyah melekh yehudah. kebod 'elohim haster dabar ukhebod melakhim khaqor dabar. shamayim larum va'arez la'omeq veleb melakhim 'en kheiqer. hago sigim mikasef vayeizei lazoref keli. hago rasha' lifnei melekh veyikon bazedeq kis'o. 'al tithadar lifnei melekh ubimqom gedolim 'al ta'amod. ki tob 'amar lekha 'aleh henah meihashpilekha lifnei nadib 'asher ra'u 'einekha. 'al teizei larib maher pen mah ta'aseh be'akharitah behakhlim 'otekha rei'ekha. ribekha rib 'et rei'ekha vesod 'akher 'al tegal. pen yekhasedkha shomeia' vedibatekha lo tashub. tapukhei zahab bemaskiyot kasef dabar dabur 'al 'afenav. nezem zahab vakhali khatem mokhiakh khakham 'al 'ozen shoma'at. kezinat sheleg beyom qazir zir ne'eman lesholekhav venefesh 'adonav yashib. nesi'im veruakh vegeshem 'ayin 'ish mithalel bematat shaqer. be'orekh 'apayim yefuteh qazin velashon rakah tishbar garem. debash mazata 'ekhol dayeka pen tisba'enu vahaqeito. hoqar raglekha mibet rei'ekha pen yisba'akha usenei'ekha. meifiz vekhereb vekhez shanun 'ish 'oneh berei'eihu 'ed shaqer. shen ro'ah veregel mu'adet mibtakh boged beyom zarah. ma'adeh beged beyom qarah khomez 'al nater veshar bashirim 'al leb ra'. 'im ra'eb na'akha ha'akhileihu lakhem ve'im zamei hashqeihu mayim. ki gekhalim 'atah khoteh 'al rosho ihoh yeshalem lakh. ruakh zafon tekholel gashem ufanim niz'amim leshon sater. tob shebet 'al pinat gag mei'eishet midonim midyanim ubet khaber. mayim qarim 'al nefesh 'ayeifah ushemu'ah tobah mei'erez merkhaq. ma'yan nirpas umaqor mashekhat zadiq mat lifnei rasha'. 'akhol debash harbot lo tob vekheiqer kebodam kabod. 'ir peruzah 'en khomah 'ish 'asher 'en ma'zar lerukho. kasheleg baqayiz vekhamatar baqazir ken lo naveh likhsil kabod. kazipor lanud kaderor la'uf ken qilat khinam lo lo tabo. shot lasus meteg lakhamor vesheibet legev kesilim. 'al ta'an kesil ke'ivalto pen tishveh lo gam 'atah. 'aneh khesil ke'ivalto pen yihyeh khakham be'einav. meqazeh raglayim khamas shoteh sholeiakh debarim beyad kesil. dalyu qayim mipiseiakh umashal befi khesilim. kizror 'eben bemargeimah ken noten likhsil kabod. khoakh 'alah beyad shikor umashal befi khesilim. rab mekholel kol vesokher kesil vesokher 'oberim. kekheleb shab 'al qei'o kesil shoneh be'ivalto. ra'ita 'ish khakham be'einav tiqvah likhsil mimenu. 'amar 'azel shakhal badarekh 'ari ben harekhobot. hadelet tisob 'al zirah ve'azel 'al mitato. taman 'azel yado bazalakhat nil'ah lahashibah 'el piv. khakham 'azel be'einav mishib'ah meshibei ta'am. makhaziq be'azenei khaleb 'ober mit'aber 'al rib lo lo. kemitlahleiah hayoreh ziqim khizim vamavet. ken 'ish rimah 'et rei'eihu ve'amar halo mesakheq 'ani. be'efes 'eizim tikhbeh 'esh ube'en nirgan yishtoq madon. pekham legekhalim ve'eizim le'esh ve'ish midonim midyanim lekharkhar rib. dibrei nirgan kemitlahamim vehem yaredu khadrei baten. kesef sigim mezupeh 'al khares sefatayim doleqim veleb ra'. bisfato bisfatav yinakher sonei ubeqirbo yashit mirmah. ki yekhanen qolo 'al ta'amen bo ki sheba' to'eibot belibo. tikaseh ne'ah bemasha'on tigaleh ra'ato beqahal. korehosha khat bah yipol vegolel 'eben 'eilav tashub. leshonoshe qer yisna dakav ufeh khalaq ya'aseh midkheh. 'al tithalel beyom makhar ki lo teida' mah yeiled yom. yehalelkha zar velo fikha nakheri ve'al sefatekha. kobed 'eben veneitel hakhol vekha'as 'evil kabed misheneihem. 'akhzeriyut kheimah veshetef 'af umi ya'amod lifnei qin'ah. tobah tokhakhat megulah mei'ahabah mesutaret. ne'emanim piz'ei 'oheb vena'tarot neshiqot sonei. nefesh bei'ah tabus nofet venefesh re'eibah kal mar matoq. kezipor nodedet min qinah ken 'ish noded mimeqomo. shemen uqetoret yesamakh leb umeteq rei'eihu mei'azat nafesh. rei'akha verei'eh vereia' 'abikha 'al ta'azob ubet 'akhikha 'al tabo beyom 'eidekha tob shakhen qarob mei'akh rakhoq. khakham beni vesamakh libi ve'ashibah khorefi dabar. 'arum ra'ah ra'ah nistar petayim 'aberu ne'enashu. qakh bigdo ki 'arab zar ube'ad nakheriyah khableihu. mebarekh rei'eihu beqol gadol baboqer hashkem qelalah teikhasheb lo. delef tored beyom sagrir ve'eishet midonim midyanim nishtavah. zofeneha zafan ruakh veshemen yemino yiqra. barzel bebarzel yakhad ve'ish yakhad penei rei'eihu. nozer te'einah yokhal piryah veshomer 'adonav yekhubad. kamayim hapanim lapanim ken leb ha'adam la'adam. she'ol va'abadoh va'abado lo tisba'nah ve'einei ha'adam lo tisba'nah. mazref lakesef vekhur lazahab ve'ish lefi mahalalo. 'im tikhtosh 'et ha'evil bamakhtesh betokh harifot ba'eli lo tasur mei'alav 'ivalto. yadoa' teida' penei zonekha shit libekha la'adarim. ki lo le'olam khosen ve'im neizer ledor dor vador. galah khazir venir'ah deshe vene'esfu 'isebot harim. kebasim lilbushekha umekhir deh 'atudim. vedei khaleb 'izim lelakhmekha lelekhem beitekha vekhayim lena'arotekha. nasu ve'en rodef rasha' vezadiqim kikhfir yibtakh. befesha' 'erez rabim sareha ube'adam meibin yodeia' ken ya'arikh. geber rash ve'osheq dalim matar sokhef ve'en lakhem. 'ozebei torah yehalu rasha' veshomerei torah yitgaru bam. 'anshei ra' lo yabinu mishpat umebaqshei ihoh yabinu khol. tob rash holekh betumo mei'iqesh derakhayim vehu 'ashir. nozer torah ben meibin vero'eh zolim yakhlim 'abiv. marbeh hono beneshekh ubetarbit vetarbit lekhonen dalim yiqbezenu. meisir 'azeno mishemoa' torah gam tefilato to'eibah. mashgeh yesharim bederekh ra' bishkhuto hu yipol utemimim yinkhalu tob. khakham be'einav 'ish 'ashir vedal meibin yakhqerenu. ba'aloz zadiqim rabah tif'aret ubequm resha'im yekhupas 'adam. mekhaseh fesha'av lo yazliakh umodeh ve'ozeb yerukham. 'ashrei 'adam mefakhed tamid umaqsheh libo yipol bera'ah. 'ari nohem vedob shoqeq moshel rasha' 'al 'am dal. nagid khasar tebunot verab ma'ashaqot sone'ei sonei beza' ya'arikh yamim. 'adam 'ashuq bedam nafesh 'ad bor yanus 'al yitmekhu bo. holekh tamim yivasheia' vene'qash derakhayim yipol be'ekhat. 'obed 'admato yisba' lakhem umeradef reiqim yisba' rish. 'ish 'emunot rab berakhot ve'az leha'ashir lo yinaqeh. haker panim lo tob ve'al pat lekhem yifsha' gaber. nibohal lahon 'ish ra' 'ayin velo yeida' ki kheser yebo'enu. mokhiakh 'adam 'akharai khen yimza mimakhaliq lashon. gozel 'abiv ve'imo ve'omer 'en pasha' khaber hu le'ish mashkhit. rekhab nefesh yegareh madon uboteiakh 'al ihoh yedushan. boteiakh belibo hu khesil veholekh bekhakhemah hu yimalet. noten larash 'en makhsor uma'lim 'einav rab me'eirot. bequm resha'im yisater 'adam ube'abedam yirbu zadiqim. 'ish tokhakhot maqsheh 'oref peta' yishaber ve'en marpei. birbot zadiqim yismakh ha'am ubimshol rasha' yei'anakh 'am. 'ish 'oheb khakhmah yesamakh 'abiv vero'eh zonot ye'abed hon. melekh bemishpat ya'amid 'arez ve'ish terumot yehersenah. geber makhaliq 'al rei'eihu reshet pores 'al pe'amav. befesha' 'ish ra' moqesh vezadiq yarun vesameiakh. yodeia' zadiq din dalim rasha' lo yabin da'at. 'anshei lazon yafikhu qiryah vakhakhamim yashibu 'af. 'ish khakham nishpat 'et 'ish 'evil veragaz vesakhaq ve'en nakhat. 'anshei damim yisne'u tam visharim yebaqshu nafsho. kal rukho yozi khesil vekhakham be'akhor yeshabekhenah. moshel maqshib 'al debar shaqer kal mesharetav resha'im. rash ve'ish tekhakhim nifgashu mei'ir 'einei sheneihem ihoh. melekh shofet be'emet dalim kis'o la'ad yikon. sheibet vetokhakhat yiten khakhmah vena'ar meshulakh meibish 'imo. birbot resha'im yirbeh pasha' vezadiqim bemapaltam yir'u. yaser binkha vinikhekha veyiten ma'adanim lenafshekha. be'en khazon yipara' 'am veshomer torah 'ashreihu. bidbarim lo yivaser 'abed ki yabin ve'en ma'aneh. khazita 'ish 'az bidbarav tiqvah likhsil mimenu. mefaneq mino'ar 'abdo ve'akharito yihyeh manon. 'ish 'af yegareh madon uba'al kheimah rab pasha'. ga'avat 'adam tashpilenu ushefal ruakh yitmokh kabod. kholeq 'im ganab sonei nafsho 'alah yishma' velo yagid. kherdat 'adam yiten moqesh uboteiakh ihoh yesugab. rabim mebaqshim penei moshel ihoh mishpat 'ish. to'abat zadiqim 'ish 'avel veto'abat rasha' yeshar darekh. dibrei 'agur bin yaqeh hamasa ne'um hageber le'iti'el le'iti'el ve'ukhal. ki ba'ar 'anokhi mei'ish velo binat 'adam li. velo lamadti khakhmah veda'at qedoshim 'eida'. mi 'alah shamayim vayeirad mi 'asaf ruakh bekhafenav mi zarar mayim basimlah mi heiqim kal 'afsei 'arez mah shemo umah shem beno ki teida'. kal 'imrat 'eloah zerufah magen hu lakhosim bo. 'al tosp 'al debarav pen yokhiakh bekha venikhzabeta. tayim sha'alti mei'itakh 'al timna' mimeni beterem 'amut. shav udebar kazab harkheq mimeni resh va'osher 'al titen li hatrifeini lekhem khuqi. pen 'esba' vekhikhashti ve'amarti mi ihoh ufen 'ivaresh veganabti vetafasti shem 'elohai. 'al talshen 'ebed 'el 'adono 'adonav pen yeqalelkha ve'ashameta. dor 'abiv yeqalel ve'et 'imo lo yebarekh. dor tahor be'einav umizo'ato lo rukhaz. dor mah ramu 'einav ve'af'apav yinasei'u. dor kharabot shinav uma'akhalot metale'otav le'ekhol 'aniyim mei'erez ve'ebyonim mei'adam. la'aluqah shetei banot hab hab shalosh henah lo tisba'nah 'arba' lo 'ameru hon. she'ol ve'ozer rakham 'erez lo sabe'ah mayim ve'esh lo 'amerah hon. 'ayin til'ag le'ab vetabuz liqahat 'em yiqeruha 'orebei nakhal veyokheluha benei nasher. sheloshah hemah nifle'u mimeni ve'arba' ve'arba'ah lo yeda'tim. derekh hanesher bashamayim derekh nakhash 'alei zur derekh 'oniyah beleb yam vederekh geber be'almah. ken derekh 'ishah mena'afet 'akhelah umakhatah fiha ve'amerah lo fa'alti 'aven. takhat losh ragezah 'erez vetakhat 'arba' lo tukhal se'et. takhat 'ebed ki yimlokh venabal ki yisba' lakhem. takhat nu'ah ki tiba'el veshifkhah ki tirash gebirtah. 'arba'ah hem qetanei 'arez vehemah khakhamim mekhukamim. hanemalim 'am lo 'az vayakhinu baqayiz lakhmam. fanim 'am lo 'azum vayasimu basela' beitam. melekh 'en la'arbeh vayeizei khozez kulo. mamit beyadayim tetapes vehi beheikhelei melekh. sheloshah hemah meitibei za'ad ve'arba'ah meitibei lakhet. layish gibor babeheimah velo yashub mipenei khol. zarzir matenayim 'o tayish umelekh 'alqum 'imo. 'im nabalta behitnasei ve'im zamota yad lefeh. ki miz khalab yozi khem'ah umiz 'af yozi dam umiz 'apayim yozi rib. dibrei lemu'el melekh masa 'asher yiseratu 'imo. mah beri umah bar bitni umeh bar nedarai. 'al titen lanashim kheilekha uderakhekha lamkhot melakhin. 'al lamlakhim lemo'el 'al lamlakhim sheto yayin uleroznim 'o 'ei sheikhar. pen yishteh veyishkakh mekhuqaq vishaneh din kal benei 'oni. tenu sheikhar le'obed veyayin lemarei nafesh. yishteh veyishkakh risho va'amalo lo yizkar 'od. petakh pikha le'ilem 'el din kal benei khalof. petakh pikha shefat zedeq vedin 'ani ve'ebyon. 'eishet khayil mi yimza verakhoq mipeninim mikhrah. batakh bah leb ba'lah veshalal lo yekhsar. gemalathu tob velo ra' kol yemei khayeh dareshah zemer ufishtim vata'as bekheifez kapeha. hayetah ka'oniyot sokher mimerkhaq tabi lakhmah. vataqam be'od laylah vatiten teref lebeitah vekhoq lena'aroteha. zamemah deh vatiqakheihu miperi khapeha neta' nate'ah karem. khagerah be'oz mateneha vate'amez zero'oteha. ta'amah ki tob sakhrah lo yikhbeh balayil balaylah neirah. yadeha shilekhah bakishor vekhapeha tamekhu falekh. kapah paresah le'ani veyadeha shilekhah la'ebyon. lo tira lebeitah mishaleg ki khal beitah labush shanim. marbadim 'asetah lah shesh ve'argaman lebushah. noda' bashe'arim ba'lah beshibto 'im ziqnei 'arez. sadin 'asetah vatimkor vakhagor natenah lakena'ani. 'oz vehadar lebushah vatiskhaq leyom 'akharon. piha patekhah bekhakhemah vetorat khesed 'al leshonah. zofiyah halikhot beitah velekhem 'azlut lo tokhel. qamu baneha vai'asheruha ba'lah vayhalah. rabot banot 'asu khayil ve'at 'alit 'al kulanah. sheqer hakhen vehebel hayofi 'ishah yir'at ihoh hi tithalal. tenu lah miperi yadeha vihaluha bashe'arim ma'aseha.

'ish hayah be'erez 'uz 'iyob shemo vehayah ha'ish hahu tam veyashar virei 'elohim vesar meira'. vayivaledu lo shib'ah banim veshalosh banot. vayhi miqneihu shib'at 'alfei zon usheloshet 'alfei gemalim vakhamesh mei'ot zemed baqar vakhamesh mei'ot 'atonot va'abudah rabah me'od vayhi ha'ish hahu gadol mikal benei qedem. vehalekhu banav ve'asu mishteh bet 'ish yomo veshalekhu veqare'u lishloshet 'akhyoteihem 'akhyoteihem le'ekhol velishtot 'imahem. vayhi ki hiqifu yemei hamishteh vayishlakh 'iyob vayqadeshem vehishkim baboqer vehe'elah 'olot mispar kulam ki 'amar 'iyob 'ulai khate'u banai ubeirakhu 'elohim bilbabam kakhah ya'aseh 'iyob kal hayamim. vayhi hayom vayabo'u benei ha'elohim lehityazeb 'al ihoh vayabo gam hasatan betokham. vayomer ihoh 'el hasatan mei'ayin tabo vaya'an hasatan 'et ihoh vayomar mishut ba'arez umeihithalekh bah. vayomer ihoh 'el hasatan hasamta libekha 'al 'abdi 'iyob ki 'en kamohu ba'arez 'ish tam veyashar yerei 'elohim vesar meira'. vaya'an hasatan 'et ihoh vayomar hakhinam yarei 'iyob 'elohim. halo 'at 'atah sakhta ba'ado ube'ad beito ube'ad kal 'asher lo misabib ma'aseh yadav beirakhta umiqneihu paraz ba'arez. ve'ulam shelakh na yadekha vega' bekhal 'asher lo 'im lo 'al panekha yebarakheka. vayomer ihoh 'el hasatan hineh khal 'asher lo beyadekha raq 'eilav 'al tishlakh yadekha vayeizei hasatan mei'im penei ihoh. vayhi hayom ubanav ubenotav 'okhelim veshotim yayin bebet 'akhihem habekhor. umal'akh ba 'el 'iyob vayomar habaqar hayu khoreshot veha'atonot ro'ot 'al yedeihem. vatipol sheba vatiqakhem ve'et hane'arim hiku lefi khareb va'imaletah raq 'ani lebadi lehagid lakh. 'od zeh medaber vezeh ba vayomar 'esh 'elohim nafelah min hashamayim vatib'ar bazon ubane'arim vatokhelem va'imaletah raq 'ani lebadi lehagid lakh. 'od zeh medaber vezeh ba vayomar kasdim samu sheloshah rashim vayifshetu 'al hagemalim vayiqakhum ve'et hane'arim hiku lefi khareb va'imaletah raq 'ani lebadi lehagid lakh. 'ad zeh medaber vezeh ba vayomar banekha ubenotekha 'okhelim veshotim yayin bebet 'akhihem habekhor. vehineh ruakh gedolah ba'ah mei'eiber hamidbar vayiga' be'arba' pinot habayit vayipol 'al hane'arim vayamutu va'imaletah raq 'ani lebadi lehagid lakh. vayaqam 'iyob vayiqra' 'et me'ilo vayagaz 'et rosho vayipol 'arzah vayishtakhu. vayomer 'arom yazati yazati mibeten 'imi ve'arom 'ashub shamah ihoh natan ihoh laqakh yehi shem ihoh meborakh. bekhal zot lo khata 'iyob velo natan tiflah leilohim. vayhi hayom vayabo'u benei ha'elohim lehityazeb 'al ihoh vayabo gam hasatan betokham lehityazeb 'al ihoh. vayomer ihoh 'el hasatan 'ei mizeh tabo vaya'an hasatan 'et ihoh vayomar mishut ba'arez umeihithalekh bah. vayomer ihoh 'el hasatan hasamta libekha 'el 'abdi 'iyob ki 'en kamohu ba'arez 'ish tam veyashar yerei 'elohim vesar meira' ve'odenu makhaziq betumato vatesiteini bo lebale'o khinam. vaya'an hasatan 'et ihoh vayomar 'or be'ad 'or vekhol 'asher la'ish yiten be'ad nafsho. 'ulam shelakh na yadekha vega' 'el 'azmo ve'el besaro 'im lo 'el panekha yebarakheka. vayomer ihoh 'el hasatan hino beyadekha 'akh 'et nafsho shemor. vayeizei hasatan mei'et penei ihoh vayakh 'et 'iyob bishkhin ra' mikaf raglo 'ad ve'ad qadeqodo. vayiqakh lo kheres lehitgared bo vehu yosheb betokh ha'eifer. vatomer lo 'ishto 'odekha makhaziq betumatekha barekh 'elohim vamut. vayomer 'eileha kedaber 'akhat hanebalot tedabeiri gam 'et hatob neqabel mei'et ha'elohim ve'et hara' lo neqabel bekhal zot lo khata 'iyob bisfatav. vayishme'u sheloshet rei'ei 'iyob 'et kal hara'ah hazot haba'ah 'alav vayabo'u 'ish mimeqomo 'elifaz hateimani ubildad hashukhi vezofar hana'amati vayiva'adu yakhdav labo lanud lo ulenakhamo. vayis'u 'et 'eineihem meirakhoq velo hikiruhu vayis'u qolam vayibku vayiqre'u 'ish me'ilo vayizrequ 'afar 'al rasheihem hashamayemah. vayeishebu 'ito la'arez shib'at yamim veshib'at leilot ve'en dober 'eilav dabar ki ra'u ki gadal hake'eb me'od. 'akharei khen patakh 'iyob 'et pihu vayqalel 'et yomo. vaya'an 'iyob vayomar. yobad yom 'ivaled bo vehalaylah 'amar horah gaber. hayom hahu yehi khoshekh 'al yidresheihu 'eloah mima'al ve'al tofa' 'alav neharah. yig'aluhu khoshekh vezalmavet tishkan 'alav 'ananah yeba'atuhu kimrirei yom. halaylah hahu yiqakheihu 'ofel 'al yikhad bimei shanah bemispar yerakhim 'al yabo. hineh halaylah hahu yehi galmud 'al tabo renanah bo. yiqebuhu 'orerei yom ha'atidim 'orer livyatan. yekhshekhu kokhbei nishpo yeqav le'or va'ayin ve'al yir'eh be'af'apei shakhar. ki lo sagar daltei bitni vayaster 'amal mei'einai. lamah lo meirekhem 'amut mibeten yazati ve'egva'. madua' qidemuni birkayim umahosha dayim ki 'inaq. ki 'atah shakhabti ve'eshqot yashanti 'az yanuakh li. 'im melakhim veyo'azei 'arez habonim khorabot lamo. 'o 'imsa rim zahab lahem hamal'im bateihem kasef. 'o kheneifel tamun lo 'ehyeh ke'olelim lo ra'u 'or. sham resha'im khadelu rogez vesham yanukhu yegi'ei khoakh. yakhad 'asirim sha'ananu lo me'u qol noges. qaton vegadol sham hu ve'ebed khafeshi mei'adonav. lamah yiten le'amel 'or vekhayim lemarei nafesh. hamkhakim lamavet ve'einenu vayakhperuhu mimatmonim. hasemeikhim 'elei gil yasisu ki yimze'u qaber. legeber 'asher darko nistarah vayasekh 'eloah ba'ado. ki lifnei lakhmi 'ankhati tabo vayitekhu khamayim sha'agotai. ki fakhad pakhadti vaye'etayeini va'asher yagoreti yabo li. lo shalavti velo shaqati velo nakheti vayabo rogez. vaya'an 'elifaz hateimani vayomar. hanisah dabar 'eilekha til'eh va'zor bemilin mi yukhal. hineh yisarta rabim veyadayim rafot tekhazeq. koshel yeqimun milekha ubirkayim kore'ot te'amez. ki 'atah tabo 'eilekha vateile tiga' 'adekha vatibahel. halo yir'atekha kislatekha tiqvatekha vetom derakhekha. zekhar na mi hu naqi 'abad ve'eifoh yesharim nikhkhadu. ka'asher ra'iti khoreshei 'aven vezore'ei 'amal yiqzeruhu. minishmat 'eloha yobeidu umeiruakh 'apo yikhlu. sha'agat 'aryeh veqol shakhal veshinei khefirim nita'u. layish 'obed mibeli taref ubenei labi yitparadu. ve'eilai dabar yegunab vatiqakh 'azeni sheimez menhu. bis'ipim meikhezyonot layelah binfol tardeimah 'al 'anashim. pakhad qera'ani ure'adah verob 'azmotai hifkhid. veruakh 'al panai yakhalof tesamer sa'arat besari. ya'amod velo 'akir mar'eihu temunah leneged 'einai demamah vaqol 'eshma'. ha'enosh mei'eloha yizdaq 'im mei'oseihu yithar gaber. hen ba'abadav lo ya'amin ubemal'akhav yasim taholah. 'af shokhenei batei khomer 'asher be'afar yesodam yedake'um lifnei 'ash. miboqer la'ereb yukatu mibeli meisim lanezakh yobeidu. halo nisa' yitram bam yamutu velo bekhakhemah. qera na hayesh 'oneka ve'el mi miqedoshim tifneh. ki le'evil yaharag ka'as ufoteh tamit qin'ah. 'ani ra'iti 'evil mashrish va'eqob naveihu fit'om. yirkhaqu banav miyesha' veyidake'u basha'ar ve'en mazil. 'asher qeziro ra'eb yokhel ve'el mizinim yiqakheihu vesha'af zamim kheilam. ki lo yeizei mei'afar 'aven umei'adamah lo yizmakh 'amal. ki 'adam le'amal yulad ubenei reshef yagbihu 'uf. 'ulam 'ani 'edrosh 'el 'el ve'el 'elohim 'asim dibrati. 'oseh gedolot ve'en kheiqer nifla'ot 'ad 'en mispar. hanoten matar 'al penei 'arez vesholeiakh mayim 'al penei khuzot. lasum shefalim lemarom veqoderim sagebu yesha'. meifer makhshebot 'arumim velo ta'asenah yedeihem tushiyah. lokhed khakhamim be'aremam va'azat niftalim nimharah. yomam yefageshu khoshekh vekhalaylah yemashu bazahorayim. vayosha' meikhereb mipihem umiyad khazaq 'ebyon. vatehi ladal tiqvah ve'olatah qafezah piha. hineh 'ashrei 'enosh yokhikhenu 'eloah umusar dai 'al tim'as. ki hu yakh'ib veyekhbash yimkhaz veyado veyadav tirpenah. beshesh zarot yazileka ubesheba' lo yiga' bekha ra'. bera'ab padekha mimavet ubemilkhamah midei khareb. beshot lashon teikhabei velo tira mishod ki yabo. leshod ulekhafan tiskhaq umeikhayat ha'arez 'al tira. ki 'im 'abnei hasadeh beritekha vekhayat hasadeh hashelemah lakh. veyada'ta ki shalom 'aholekha ufaqadta navekha velo tekheta. veyada'ta ki rab zar'ekha veze'eza'ekha ke'eiseb ha'arez. tabo bekhelakh 'elei qaber ka'alot gadish be'ito. hineh zot khaqarnuha ken hi ma'enah ve'atah da' lakh. vaya'an 'iyob vayomar. lu shaqol yishaqel ka'si vehayati vehavati bemozenayim yis'u yakhad. ki 'atah meikhol yamim yikhbad 'al ken debarai la'u. ki khizei shadai 'imadi 'asher khamatam shotah rukhi bi'utei 'eloah ya'arkhuni. hayinhaq pere 'alei deshe 'im yig'ehosho vr 'al belilo. hayei'akhel tafel mibeli melakh 'im yesh ta'am berir khalamut. mei'anah lingoa' nafshi hemah kidvei lakhmi. mi yiten tabo she'elati vetiqvati yiten 'eloah. veyo'el 'eloah vidake'eini yater yado vibaze'eini. utehi 'od nekhamati va'asaledah bekhilah lo yakhmol ki lo khikhadti 'imrei qadosh. mah kokhi khi 'ayakhel umah qizi ki 'a'arikh nafshi. 'im koakh 'abanim kokhi 'im besari nakhush. ha'im 'en 'ezrati bi vetushiyah nidekhah mimeni. lamas meirei'eihu khased veyir'at shadai ya'azob. 'akhai bagedu khemo nakhal ka'afiq nekhalim ya'aboru. haqoderim mini qarakh 'aleimo yit'alem shaleg. be'et yezorebu nizmatu bekhumo nid'akhu mimeqomam. yilafetu 'arekhot darkam ya'alu batohu veyobeidu. hibitu 'arekhot teima halikhot ba qivu lamo. boshu ki batakh ba'u 'adeha vayekhparu. ki 'atah heyitem lo lo tir'u khatat vatira'u. hakhi 'amarti habu li umikokhakhem shikhadu ba'adi. umaletuni miyad zar umiyad 'arizim tifduni. horuni va'ani 'akharish umahosha giti habinu li. mah nimrezu 'imrei yosher umah yokhiakh hokheiakh mikem. halhokhakh milim takhshobu uleruakh 'imrei no'ash. 'af 'al yatom tapilu vetikhru 'al rei'akhem. ve'atah ho'ilu fenu bi ve'al peneikhem 'im 'akhazeb. shubu na 'al tehi 'avlah veshubi veshubu 'od zidqi bah. hayesh bilshoni 'avlah 'im khiki lo yabin havot. halo zaba le'enosh 'al 'alei 'arez vekhimei sakhir yamav. ke'ebed yish'af zel ukhesakhir yeqaveh fa'olo. ken hanekhalti li yarkhei shav veleilot 'amal minu li. 'im shakhabti ve'amarti matai 'aqum umidad 'areb vesaba'ti nedudim 'adei nashef. labash besari rimah vegish vegush 'afar 'ori raga' vayima'es. yamai qalu mini 'areg vayikhlu be'efes tiqvah. zekhor ki ruakh khayai lo tashub 'eini lir'ot tob. lo teshureini 'en ro'i 'einekha bi ve'eineni. kalah 'anan vayeilakh ken yored 'ol lo ya'aleh. lo yashub 'od lebeito velo yakirenu 'od meqomo. gam 'ani lo 'ekhesakh pi 'adaberah bezar rukhi 'asikhah bemar nafshi. hayam 'ani 'im tanin ki tasim 'alai mishmar. ki 'amarti tenakhameini 'arsi yisa besikhi mishkabi. vekhitatani bakhalomot umeikhezyonot teba'atani. vatibkhar makhanaq nafshi mavet mei'azmotai. ma'asti lo le'olam 'ekhyeh khadal mimeni ki hebel yamai. mah 'enosh ki tegadelenu vekhi tashit 'eilav libekha. vatifqedenu libqarim lirga'im tibkhanenu. kamah lo tish'eh mimeni lo tarpeini 'ad bil'i ruqi. khatati mah 'ef'al lakh nozer ha'adam lamah samtani lemifga' lakh va'ehyeh 'alai lemasa. umeh lo tisa fish'i veta'abir 'et 'avoni ki 'atah le'afar 'eshkab veshikhartani ve'eineni. vaya'an bildad hashukhi vayomar 'ad 'an temalel 'eleh veruakh kabir 'imrei fikha. ha'el ye'avet mishpat ve'imosha dai ye'avet zedeq. 'im banekha khate'u lo vayshalekhem beyad pish'am. 'im 'atah teshakher 'el 'el ve'elosha dai titkhanan. 'im zakh veyashar 'atah ki 'atah ya'ir 'alekha veshilam nevat zidqekha. vehayah reishitekha miz'ar ve'akharitekha yisgeh me'od. ki she'al na ledor rishon vekhonen lekheiqer 'abotam. ki temol 'anakhnu velo neida' ki zel yameinu 'alei 'arez. halo hem yorukha yomeru lakh umilibam yozi'u milim. hayig'eh gome belo bizah yisgeh 'akhu beli mayim. 'odenu be'ibo lo yiqatef velifnei khal khazir yibash. ken 'arekhot kal shokhekhei 'el vetiqvat khanef tobed. 'asher yaqot kislo ubet 'akabish mibtakho. yisha'en 'al beito velo ya'amod yakhaziq bo velo yaqum. ratob hu lifnei shamesh ve'al ganato yonaqto teizei. 'al gal sharashav yesubakhu bet 'abanim yekhezeh. 'im yebale'enu mimeqomo vekhikhesh bo lo re'itikha. hen hu mesos darko umei'afar 'akher yizmakhu. hen 'el lo yim'as tam velo yakhaziq beyad merei'im. 'ad yemaleh sekhoq pikha usefatekha teru'ah. sone'ekha yilbeshu boshet ve'ohel resha'im 'einenu. vaya'an 'iyob vayomar. 'amenam yada'ti khi khen umah yizdaq 'enosh 'im 'el. 'im yakhpoz larib 'imo lo ya'anenu 'akhat mini 'alef. khakham leibab ve'amiz koakh mi hiqshah 'eilav vayishlam. hama'tiq harim velo yada'u 'asher hafakham be'apo. hamargiz 'erez mimeqomah ve'amudeha yitfalazun ha'omer lakheres velo yizrakh ube'ad kokhabim yakhtom. noteh shamayim lebado vedorekh 'al bamotei yam. 'oseh 'ash kesil vekhimah vekhadrei teiman. 'oseh gedolot 'ad 'en kheiqer venifla'ot 'ad 'en mispar. hen ya'abor 'alai velo 'er'eh veyakhalof velo 'abin lo. hen yakhtof mi yeshibenu mi yomar 'eilav mah ta'aseh. 'eloah lo yashib 'apo takhato takhtav khakhu 'ozerei rahab. 'af ki 'anokhi 'e'enenu 'ebkharah debarai 'imo. 'asher 'im zadaqti lo 'e'eneh limshofeti 'etkhanan. 'im qarati vaya'aneini lo 'a'amin ki ya'azin qoli. 'asher bis'arah yeshufeini vehirbah feza'ai khinam. lo yiteneini hasheb rukhi ki yasbi'ani mamerorim. 'im lekhoakh 'amiz hineh ve'im lemishpat mi yo'ideini. 'im 'ezdaq pi yarshi'eini tam 'ani vaya'qesheini. tam 'ani lo 'eida' nafshi 'em'as khayai. 'akhat hi 'al ken 'amarti tam verasha' hu mekhaleh. 'imosho vt yamit pit'om lemasat neqiyim yil'ag. 'erez nitenah beyad rasha' penei shofeteha yekhaseh 'im lo 'eifo mi hu. veyamai qalu mini raz barekhu lo ra'u tobah. khalefu 'im 'oniyot 'eibeh kenesher yatus 'alei 'okhel. 'im 'ameri 'eshkekhah sikhi 'e'ezbah fanai ve'abligah. yagoreti khal 'azebotai yada'ti ki lo tenaqeini. 'anokhi 'ersha' lamah zeh hebel 'iga'. 'im hitrakhazti bemo bemei shaleg vahazikoti bebor kapai. 'az bashakhat titbeleini veti'abuni salmotai. ki lo 'ish kamoni 'e'enenu nabo yakhdav bamishpat. lo yesh beineinu mokhiakh yashet yado 'al sheneinu. yaser mei'alai shibto ve'eimato 'al teba'atani. 'adaberah velo 'ira'enu ki lo khen 'anokhi 'imadi. naqetah nafshi bekhayai 'e'ezbah 'alai sikhi 'adaberah bemar nafshi. 'omar 'el 'eloah 'al tarshi'eini hodi'eini 'al mah teribeini. hatob lekha ki ta'ashoq ki tim'as yegia' kapekha ve'al 'azat resha'im hofa'eta. ha'einei basar lakh 'im kir'ot 'enosh tir'eh. hakhimei 'enosh yamekha 'imosh notekha kimei gaber. ki tebaqesh la'avoni ulekhatati tidrosh. 'al da'tekha ki lo 'ersha' ve'en miyadekha mazil. yadekha 'izebuni vaya'asuni yakhad sabib vatebale'eini. zekhar na ki khakhomer 'asitani ve'el 'afar teshibeini. halo khekhalab tatikheini vekhagebinah taqpi'eini. 'or ubasar talbisheini uba'azamot vegidim tesokhekheini. khayim vakhesed 'asita 'imadi ufequdatekha shamerah rukhi. ve'eleh zafanta bilbabekha yada'ti ki zot 'imakh. 'im khatati ushemartani umei'avoni lo tenaqeini. 'im rasha'ti 'alai li vezadaqti lo 'esa roshi seba' qalon ure'eh 'aneyi. veyig'eh kashakhal tezudeini vetashob titpala bi. tekhadesh 'eidekha negdi vetereb ka'askha 'imadi khalifot vezaba 'imi. velamah meirekhem hozeitani 'egva' ve'ayin lo tir'eini. ka'asher lo hayiti 'ehyeh mibeten laqeber 'ubal. halo me'at yamai yekhdal vakhadal yashit veshit mimeni ve'abligah me'at. beterem 'eilekh velo 'ashub 'el 'erez khoshekh vezalmavet. 'erez 'eifatah kemo 'ofel zalmavet velo sedarim vatofa' kemo 'ofel. vaya'an zofar hana'amati vayomar. harob debarim lo yei'aneh ve'im 'ish sefatayim yizdaq. badekha metim yakharishv vatil'ag ve'en makhlim. vatomer zakh liqkhi ubar hayiti be'einekha. ve'ulam mi yiten 'eloah daber veyiftakh sefatav 'imakh. veyaged lekha ta'alumot khakhmah ki khiflayim letushiyah veda' ki yasheh lekha 'eloha mei'avonekha. hakheiqer 'eloha timza 'im 'ad takhlit shadai timza. gabehei mayim mah tif'al 'amuqah mishe'ol mah teida'. 'arukah mei'erez midah urekhabah mini yam. 'im yakhalof veyasgir veyaqhil umi yeshibenu. ki hu yada' metei shav vayar 'aven velo yitbonan. ve'ish nabub yilabeb ve'ayir pere 'adam yivaled. 'im 'atah hakhinota libekha ufarasta 'eilav kapekha. 'im 'aven beyadekha harkhiqeihu ve'al tashken be'ohalekha 'avlah. ki 'az tisa fanekha mimum vehayita muzaq velo tira. ki 'atah 'amal tishkakh kemayim 'aberu tizkor. umizahorayim yaqum khaled ta'ufah kaboqer tihyeh. ubatakhta ki yesh tiqvah vekhafarta labetakh tishkab. verabazta ve'en makharid vekhilu fanekha rabim. ve'einei resha'im tikhlenah umanos 'abad minhem vetiqvatam mapakh nafesh. vaya'an 'iyob vayomar. 'amenam ki 'atem 'am ve'imakhem tamut khakhmah gam li leibab kemokhem lo nofel 'anokhi mikem ve'et mi 'en kemo 'eleh. sekhoq lerei'eihu 'ehyeh qorei le'eloah vaya'aneihu khoq zadiq tamim. lapid buz le'ashtut sha'anan nakhon lemo'adei ragel. yishlayu 'ohalim leshodedim ubatukhot lemargizei 'el la'asher heibi 'eloah beyado. ve'ulam she'al na beheimot vetoreka ve'of hashamayim veyaged lakh. 'o siakh la'arez vetoreka visaperu lekha degei hayam. mi lo yada' bekhal 'eleh ki yad ihoh 'asetah zot. 'asher beyado nefesh kal khai veruakh kal besar 'ish. halo 'ozen milin tibkhan vekhekh 'okhel yit'am lo. bishishim khakhmah ve'orekh yamim tebunah. 'imo khakhmah ugeburah lo 'eizah utebunah. hen yaharos velo yibaneh yisgor 'al 'ish velo yipateiakh. hen ya'zor bamayim veyibashu vishalekhem veyahafkhu 'arez. 'imo 'oz vetushiyah lo shogeg umashgeh. molikh yo'azim sholal veshofetim yeholel. musar melakhim piteiakh vaye'sor 'eizor bemateneihem. molikh kohanim sholal ve'eitanim yesalef. meisir fah lene'emanim veta'am zeqeinim yiqakh. shofekh buz 'al nedibim umeziakh 'afiqim ripah. megaleh 'amuqot mini khoshekh vayozei la'or zalmavet. masgi lagoyim vai'abedem shoteiakh lagoyim vayankhem. meisir leb rashei 'am ha'arez vayat'em betohu lo darekh. yemashu khoshekh velo 'or vayat'em kashikor. hen kol ra'atah 'eini shame'ah 'azeni vataben lah. keda'tekhem yada'ti gam 'ani lo nofel 'anokhi mikem. 'ulam 'ani 'el shadai 'adaber vehokheiakh 'el 'el 'ekhpaz. ve'ulam 'atem tofelei shaqer rofe'ei 'elil kulekhem. mi yiten hakharesh takharishun utehi lakhem lekhakhemah. shim'u na tokhakhti veribot sefatai haqshibu. hal'el tedaberu 'avlah velo tedaberu remiyah. hafanav tisa'un 'im la'el teribun. hatob ki yakhqor 'etkhem 'im kehatel be'enosh tehatelu bo. hokheiakh yokhiakh 'etkhem 'im baseiter panim tisa'un. halo 'eito teba'et 'etkhem ufakhdo yipol 'aleikhem. zikhroneikhem mishlei 'eifer legabei khomer gabeikhem. hakharishu mimeni va'adaberah 'ani veya'abor 'alai mah. 'al mah 'esa besari beshinai venafshi 'asim bekhapi. hen yiqteleini lo lo 'ayakhel 'akh derakhai 'el panav 'okhiakh. gam hu li lishu'ah ki lo lefanav khanef yabo. shim'u moa' milati ve'akhavati be'azeneikhem. hineh na 'arakhti mishpat yada'ti ki 'ani 'ezdaq. mi hu yarib 'imadi ki 'atah 'akharish ve'egva'. 'akhosh tayim 'al ta'as 'imadi 'az mipanekha lo 'esater. kapekha mei'alai harkhaq ve'eimatekha 'al teba'atani. uqera ve'anokhi 'e'eneh 'o 'adaber vahashibeini. kamah li 'avonot vekhata'ot pish'i vekhatati hodi'eini lamah fanekha tastir vetakhshebeini le'oyeb lakh. he'aleh nidaf ta'aroz ve'et qash yabesh tirdof. ki tikhtob 'alai merorot vetorisheini 'avonot ne'urai. vetasem basad raglai vetishmor kal 'arekhotai 'al shareshei raglai titkhaqeh. vehu keraqab yibleh kebeged 'akhalo 'ash. 'adam yelud 'ishah qezar yamim useba' rogez. keziz yaza vayimal vayibrakh kazel velo ya'amod. 'af 'al zeh paqakhta 'einekha ve'oti tabi bemishpat 'imakh. mi yiten tahor mitamei lo 'ekhad. 'im kharuzim yamav mispar khodashav 'itakh khuqo khuqav 'asita velo ya'abor. she'eh mei'alav veyekhdal 'ad yirzeh kesakhir yomo. ki yesh la'ez tiqvah 'im yikaret ve'od yakhalif veyonaqto lo tekhdal. 'im yazqin ba'arez sharesho ube'afar yamut giz'o. meireiakh mayim yafriakh ve'asah qazir kemo nata'. vegeber yamut vayekhelash vayigva' 'adam ve'ayo. 'azelu mayim mini yam venahar yekherab veyabesh. ve'ish shakhab velo yaqum 'ad bilti mayim lo yaqizu velo yei'oru mishenatam. mi yiten bish'ol tazpineini tastireini 'ad shub 'apekha tashit li khoq vetizkereini. 'im yamut geber hayikhyeh kal yemei zeba'i 'ayakhel 'ad bo khalifati. tiqra ve'anokhi 'e'eneka lema'aseh yadekha tikhsof. ki 'atah ze'adai tispor lo tishmor 'al khatati. khatum bizror pish'i vatitpol 'al 'avoni. ve'ulam har nofel yibol vezur ye'taq mimeqomo. 'abanim shakhaqu mayim tishtof sefikheha 'afar 'arez vetiqvat 'enosh he'ebadta. titqefeihu lanezakh vayahalokh meshaneh fanav vateshalekheihu. yikhbedu banav velo yeida' veyiz'aru velo yabin lamo. 'akh besaro 'alav yikh'ab venafsho 'alav te'ebal. vaya'an 'elifaz hateimani vayomar. hekhakham ya'aneh da'at ruakh vimalei qadim bitno. hokheiakh bedabar lo yiskon umilim lo yo'il bam. 'af 'atah tafer yir'ah vetigra' khah lifnei 'el. ki ye'alef 'avonekha fikha vetibkhar leshon 'arumim. yarshi'akha fikha velo 'ani usefatekha ya'anu bakh. hariyoshon 'adam tivaled velifnei geba'ot kholaleta. habsod 'eloha tishma' vetigra' 'eilekha khakhmah mah yada'ta velo neida' tabin velo 'imanu hu. gam sab gam yashish banu kabir mei'abikha yamim. ham'at mimekha tankhumot 'el vedabar la'at 'imakh. mah yiqakhakha libekha umah yirzemun 'einekha. ki tashib 'el 'el rukhekha vehozeita mipikha milin. mah 'enosh ki yizkeh vekhi yizdaq yelud 'ishah. hen biqdosho biqdoshav lo ya'amin veshamayim lo zaku be'einav. 'af ki nit'ab vene'elakh 'ish shoteh khamayim 'avlah. 'akhavkha shema' li vezeh khaziti va'asapeirah. 'asher khakhamim yagidu velo khikhadu mei'abotam. lahem lebadam nitenah ha'arez velo 'abar zar betokham. kal yemei rasha' hu mitkholel umispar nim nizpenu le'ariz. qol pekhadim be'azenav bashalom shoded yebo'enu. lo ya'amin ub mini khoshekh vezafu vezafui hu 'elei khareb. noded hu lalekhem 'ayeh yada' ki nakhon beyado yom khoshekh. yeba'atuhu zar umezuqah titqefeihu kemelekh 'atid lakidor. ki natah 'el 'el yado ve'elosha dai yitgabar. yaruz 'eilav bezavar ba'abi gabei maginav. ki khisah fanav bekhelbo vaya'as pimah 'alei khasel. vayishkon 'arim nikhkhadot batim lo yeishebu lamo 'asher hit'atedu legalim. lo ye'shar velo yaqum kheilo velo yiteh la'arez minlam. lo yasur mini khoshekh yonaqto teyabesh shalhabet veyasur beruakh piv. 'al ya'amen basho bashav nit'ah kisha v tihyeh temurato. belo yomo timalei vekhipato lo ra'ananah. yakhmos kagefen bisro veyashlekh kazayit nizato. ki 'adat khanef galmud ve'esh 'akhelah 'aholei shokhad. haroh 'amal veyalod 'aven ubitnam takhin mirmah. vaya'an 'iyob vayomar. shama'ti khe'eleh rabot menakhamei 'amal kulekhem. haqez ledibrei ruakh 'o mah yamrizekha ki ta'aneh. gam 'anokhi kakhem 'adabeirah lu yesh nafshekhem takhat nafshi 'akhbirah 'aleikhem bemilim ve'ani'ah 'aleikhem bemo roshi. 'a'amizkhem bemo fi venid sefatai yakhsokh. 'im 'adaberah lo yeikhasekh ke'eibi ve'akhdelah mah mini yahalokh. 'akh 'atah hel'ani hashimota kal 'adati. vatiqmeteini le'ed hayah vayaqam bi khakhashi befanai ya'aneh. 'apo taraf vayistemeini kharaq 'alai beshinav zari yiltosh 'einav li. pa'aru 'alai befihem bekherpah hiku lekhayai yakhad 'alai yitmala'un. yasgireini 'el 'el 'avil ve'al yedei resha'im yirteini. shalev hayiti vayfarpereini ve'akhaz be'arepi vayfazpezeini vayqimeini lo lematarah. yasobu 'alai rabav yefalakh kilyotai velo yakhmol yishpokh la'arez mereirati. yifrezeini ferez 'al penei farez yaruz 'alai kegibor. saq tafarti 'alei gildi ve'olalti be'afar qarni. panai khomarmerah khomarmeru mini bekhi ve'al 'af'apai zalmavet. 'al lo khamas bekhapai utefilati zakah. 'erez 'al tekhasi dami ve'al yehi maqom leza'aqati. gam 'atah hineh bashamayim 'eidi vesahadi bameromim. melizai rei'ai 'el 'eloha dalefah 'eini. veyokhakh legeber 'im 'eloah uben 'adam lerei'eihu. ki shenot mispar ye'etayu ve'orakh lo 'ashub 'ehelokh. rukhi khubalah yamai niz'akhu qebarim li. 'im lo hatulim 'imadi ubehamerotam talan 'eini. simah na 'arebeini 'imakh mi hu leyadi yitaqeia'. ki libam zafanta misakhel 'al ken lo teromem. lekheileq yagid rei'im ve'einei banav tikhlenah. vehizigani limshol 'amim vetofet lefanim 'ehyeh. vateikhah mika'as 'eini vizurai kazel kulam. yashomu yesharim 'al zot venaqi 'al khanef yit'orar. veyokhez zadiq darko utohar yadayim yosif 'omez. ve'ulam kulam tashubu ubo'u na velo 'emza bakhem khakham. yamai 'aberu zimotai nitequ morashei lebabi. laylah leyom yasimu 'or qarob mipenei khoshekh. 'im 'aqaveh she'ol beiti bakhoshekh ripadti yezu'ai. lashakhat qarati 'abi 'atah 'imi va'akhoti larimah. ve'ayeh 'eifo tiqvati vetiqvati mi yeshurenah. badei she'ol teiradnah 'im yakhad 'al 'afar nakhat. vaya'an bildad hashukhi vayomar. 'ad 'anah tesimun qinzei lemilin tabinu ve'akhar nedaber. madua' nekhshabnu khabeheimah nitminu be'eineikhem. toref nafsho be'apo halma'ankha tei'azab 'arez veye'taq zur mimeqomo. gam 'or resha'im yid'akh velo yigah shebib 'isho. 'or khashakh be'aholo veneiro 'alav yid'akh. yeizeru za'adei 'ono vetashlikheihu 'azato. ki shulakh bereshet beraglav ve'als bakhah yithalakh. yokhez be'aqeb pakh yakhazeq 'alav zamim. tamun ba'arez khablo umalkudto 'alei natib. sabib bi'atuhu balahot vehefizuhu leraglav. yehi ra'eb 'ono ve'ed nakhon lezal'o. yokhal badei 'oro yokhal badav bekhor mavet. yinateq mei'aholo mibtakho vetaz'ideihu lemelekh balahot. tishkon be'aholo mibeli lo yezoreh 'al naveihu gaferit. mitakhat sharashav yibashu umima'al yimal qeziro. zikhro 'abad mini 'arez velo shem lo 'al penei khuz. yehdefuhu mei'or 'el khoshekh umiteibel yeniduhu. lo nin lo velo nekhed be'amo ve'en rid bimgurav. 'al yomo nashamu 'akharonim veqadmonim 'akhazu sa'ar. 'akh 'eleh mishkenot 'aval vezeh meqom lo yada' 'el. vaya'an 'iyob vayomar. 'ad 'anah togyun nafshi utedake'unani bemilim. zeh 'eser pe'amim takhlimuni lo teiboshu tahkeru li. ve'af 'amenam shagiti 'iti talin meshugati. 'im 'amenam 'alai tagdilu vetokhikhu 'alai kherpati de'u 'eifo ki 'eloah 'ivetani umezudo 'alai hiqif. hen 'ez'aq khamas velo 'ei'aneh 'ashava' ve'en mishpat. 'arekhi gadar velo 'e'ebor ve'al netibotai khoshekh yasim. kebodi mei'alai hifshit vayasar 'ateret roshi. yitezeini sabib va'eilakh vayasa' ka'ez tiqvati. vayakhar 'alai 'apo vayakhshebeini lo khezarav. yakhad yabo'u gedudav vayasolu 'alai darkam vayakhanu sabib le'aholi. 'akhai mei'alai hirkhiq veyode'ai 'akh zaru mimeni. khadelu qerobai umeyuda'ai shekheikhuni. garei beiti ve'amhotai lezar takhshebuni nakheri hayiti be'eineihem. le'abdi qarati velo ya'aneh bemo fi 'etkhanen lo. rukhi zarah le'ishti vekhanoti libnei bitni. gam 'avilim ma'asu bi 'aqumah vaydaberu bi. ti'abuni kal metei sodi vezeh 'ahabti nehpekhu bi. be'ori ubibsari dabeqah 'azmi va'etmaletah be'or shinai. khanuni khanuni 'atem rei'ai ki yad 'eloah nage'ah bi. lamah tirdefuni khemo 'el umibesari lo tisba'u. mi yiten 'eifo veyikatebun milai mi yiten baseifer veyukhaqu. be'et barzel ve'ofaret la'ad bazur yeikhazebun. va'ani yada'ti go'ali khai ve'akharon 'al 'afar yaqum. ve'akhar 'ori niqefu zot umibesari 'ekhezeh 'eloah. 'asher 'ani 'ekhezeh li ve'einai ra'u velo zar kalu khilyotai bekheiqi. ki tomeru mah nirdaf lo veshoresh dabar nimza bi. guru lakhem mipenei khereb ki kheimah 'avonot khareb lema'an teide'un shadin shadun. vaya'an zofar hana'amati vayomar. lakhen se'ipai yeshibuni uba'abur khushi bi. musar kelimati 'eshma' veruakh mibinati ya'aneini. hazot yada'ta mini 'ad mini sim 'adam 'alei 'arez. ki rinat resha'im miqarob vesimkhat khanef 'adei raga'. 'im ya'aleh lashamayim si'o verosho la'ab yagia'. kegelalo lanezakh yobed ro'av yomeru 'ayo. kakhalom ya'uf velo yimza'uhu veyudad kekhezyon layelah. 'ayin zafatu velo tosif velo 'od teshurenu meqomo. banav yerazu dalim veyadav tasheibenah 'ono. 'azmotav male'u 'alumo 'alumav ve'imo 'al 'afar tishkab. 'im tamtiq befiv ra'ah yakhkhidenah takhat leshono. yakhmol 'aleha velo ya'azbenah veyimna'enah betokh khiko. lakhmo bemei'av nehpakh merorat petanim beqirbo. khayil bala' vayqi'enu mibitno yorishenu 'el. rosh petanim yinaq tahargeihu leshon 'ef'eh. 'al yeire biflagot naharei nakhalei debash vekhem'ah. meishib yaga' velo yibla' kekhel temurato velo ya'alos. ki rizaz 'azab dalim bayit gazal velo yibeneihu. ki lo yada' shalev bebitno bakhamudo lo yemalet. 'en sarid le'akhelo 'al ken lo yakhil tubo. bimlot feqo yeizer lo kal yad 'amel tebo'enu. yehi lemalei bitno yeshalakh bo kharon 'apo veyamter 'aleimo bilkhumo. yibrakh mineisheq barzel takhlefeihu qeshet nekhushah. shalaf vayeizei migeivah ubaraq mimerorato yahalokh 'alav 'eimim. kal khoshekh tamun lizpunav te'akheleihu 'esh lo nupakh yeira' sarid be'aholo. yegalu shamayim 'avono ve'erez mitqomamah lo. yigel yebul beito nigarot beyom 'apo. zeh kheileq 'adam rasha' mei'elohim venakhalat 'imro mei'el. vaya'an 'iyob vayomar. shim'u moa' milati utehi zot tankhumoteikhem. 'uni ve'anokhi 'adaber ve'akhar daberi tal'ig. he'anokhi le'adam sikhi ve'im madua' lo tiqzar rukhi. penu 'eilai vehashamu vesimu yad 'al peh. ve'im zakharti venibhaleti ve'akhaz besari palazut. madua' resha'im yikhyu 'atequ gam gaberu khayil. zar'am nakhon lifneihem 'imam veze'eza'eihem le'eineihem. bateihem shalom mipakhad velo sheibet 'eloah 'aleihem. shoro 'ibar velo yag'il tefalet parato velo teshakel. yeshalekhu khazon 'avileihem veyaldeihem yeraqeidun. yis'u ketof vekhinor veyismekhu leqol 'ugab. yebalu yekhalu batob yemeihem uberega' she'ol yeikhatu. vayomeru la'el sur mimenu veda'at derakhekha lo khafazenu. mah shadai ki na'abdenu umah no'il ki nifga' bo. hen lo beyadam tubam 'azat resha'im rakhaqah meni. kamah ner resha'im yid'akh veyabo 'aleimo 'eidam khabalim yekhaleq be'apo. yihyu keteben lifnei ruakh ukhemoz genabatu sufah. 'eloah yizpon lebanav 'ono yeshalem 'eilav veyeida'. yir'u 'eino 'einav kido umeikhamat shadai yishteh. ki mah khefzo bebeito 'akharav umispar khodashav khuzazu. hal'el yelamed da'at vehu ramim yishpot. zeh yamut be'ezem tumo kulo shal'anan veshalev.
