'atinav male'u khalab umoakh 'azmotav yeshuqeh. vezeh yamut benefesh marah velo 'akhal batobah. yakhad 'al 'afar yishkabu verimah tekhaseh 'aleihem. hen yada'ti makhsheboteikhem umezimot 'alai takhmosu. ki tomeru 'ayeh bet nadib ve'ayeh 'ohel mishkenot resha'im. halo 'eltem 'obrei darekh ve'ototam lo tenakeiru. ki leyom 'ed yeikhasekh ra' leyom 'abarot yubalu. mi yagid 'al panav darko vehu 'asah mi yeshalem lo. vehu liqbarot yubal ve'al gadish yishqod. matequ lo rigbei nakhal ve'akharav kal 'adam yimshokh ulefanav 'en mispar. ve'ekh tenakhamuni habel uteshuboteikhem nish'ar ma'al. vaya'an 'elifaz hateimani vayomar. hal'el yiskan gaber ki yiskon 'aleimo maskil. hakheifez leshadai ki tizdaq ve'im beza' ki tatem derakhekha. hamiyir'atekha yokhikhekha yabo 'imekha bamishpat. halo ra'atekha rabah ve'en qez la'avonotekha. ki takhbol 'akhekha khinam ubigdei 'arumim tafshit. lo mayim 'ayef tashqeh umeira'eb timna' lakhem. ve'ish zeroa' lo ha'arez unesu fanim yeisheb bah. 'almanot shilakhta reiqam uzero'ot yetomim yeduka. 'al ken sebibotekha fakhim vibahelkha pakhad pit'om. 'o khoshekh lo tir'eh veshif'at mayim tekhaseka. halo 'eloah gobah shamayim ure'eh rosh kokhabim ki ramu. ve'amarta mah yada' 'el hab'ad 'arafel yishpot. 'abim seiter lo velo yir'eh vekhug mayim yithalakh. ha'orakh 'olam tishmor 'asher darekhu metei 'aven. 'asher qumetu velo 'et nahar yuzaq yesodam. ha'omerim la'el sur mimenu umah yif'al shadai lamo. vehu milei bateihem tob va'azat resha'im rakhaqah meni. yir'u zadiqim veyismakhu venaqi yil'ag lamo. 'im lo nikhkhad qimanu veyitram 'akhelah 'esh. hasken na 'imo ushelm bahem tebo'atkha tobah. qakh na mipiv torah vesim 'amarav bilbabekha. 'im tashub 'adosha dai tibaneh tarkhiq 'avlah mei'aholekha. veshit 'al 'afar bazer ubezur nekhalim 'ofir. vehayah shadai bezarekha vekhesef to'afot lakh. ki 'az 'al shadai tit'anag vetisa 'el 'eloah panekha. ta'tir 'eilav veyishma'eka unedarekha teshalem. vetigzar 'omer veyaqam lakh ve'al derakhekha nagah 'or. ki hishpilu vatomer geivah veshakh 'einayim yoshia'. yemalet 'i naqi venimlat bebor kapekha. vaya'an 'iyob vayomar. gam hayom meri sikhi yadi kabedah 'al 'ankhati. mi yiten yada'ti ve'emza'eihu 'abo 'ad tekhunato. 'e'erkhah lefanav mishpat ufi 'amalei tokhakhot. 'eide'ah milim ya'aneini ve'abinah mah yomar li. haberab koakh yarib 'imadi lo 'akh hu yasim bi. sham yashar nokhakh 'imo va'afaletah lanezakh mishofeti. hen qedem 'ehelokh ve'einenu ve'akhor velo 'abin lo. semol ba'asoto velo 'akhaz ya'tof yamin velo 'er'eh. ki yada' derekh 'imadi bekhanani kazahab 'eizei. ba'ashuro 'akhazah ragli darko shamarti velo 'at. mizvat fatav velo 'amish meikhuqi zafanti 'imrei fiv. vehu be'ekhad umi yeshibenu venafsho 'ivetah vaya'as. ki yashlim khuqi vekhahenah rabot 'imo. 'al ken mipanav 'ebahel 'etbonen ve'efkhad mimenu. ve'el heirakh libi veshadai hibhilani. ki lo nizmati mipenei khoshekh umipanai kisah 'ofel. madua' mishadai lo nizpenu 'itim veyode'o veyode'av lo khazu yamav. gebulot yasigu 'eider gazelu vayir'u. khamor yetomim yinhagu yakhbelu shor 'almanah. yatu 'ebyonim midarekh yakhad khube'u 'aniyei 'arez. hen pera'im bamidbar yaze'u befa'olam meshakharei lataref 'arabah lo lekhem lane'arim. basadeh belilo yaqziru yiqzoru vekherem rasha' yelaqeishu. 'arom yalinu mibeli lebush ve'en kesut baqarah. mizerem harim yirtabu umibeli makhseh khibequ zur. yigzelu mishod yatom ve'al 'ani yakhbolu. 'arom hilekhu beli lebush ure'eibim nase'u 'omer. ben shurotam yazhiru yeqabim darekhu vayizma'u. mei'ir metim yin'aqu venefesh khalalim teshaveia' ve'eloah lo yasim tiflah. hemah hayu bemoredei 'or lo hikiru derakhav velo yashebu bintibotav. la'or yaqum rozeiakh yiqtal 'ani ve'ebyon ubalaylah yehi khaganab. ve'en no'ef shamerah neshef leimor lo teshureini 'ayin veseiter panim yasim. khatar bakhoshekh batim yomam khitemu lamo lo yade'u 'or. ki yakhdav boqer lamo zalmavet ki yakir balhot zalmavet. qal hu 'al penei mayim tequlal khelqatam ba'arez lo yifneh derekh keramim. ziyah gam khom yigzelu meimei sheleg she'ol khata'u. yishkakheihu rekhem metaqo rimah 'od lo yizakher vatishaber ka'ez 'avlah. ro'eh 'aqarah lo teiled ve'almanah lo yeyeitib. umashakh 'abirim bekhokho yaqum velo ya'amin bakhayin. yiten lo labetakh veyisha'en ve'eineihu 'al darkheihem. romu me'at ve'einenu vehumekhu kakol yiqafezun ukherosh shibolet yimalu. ve'im lo 'eifo mi yakhzibeini veyasem le'al milati. vaya'an bildad hashukhi vayomar. hamshel vafakhad 'imo 'oseh lom bimromav. hayesh mispar ligdudav ve'al mi lo yaqum 'oreihu. umah yizdaq 'enosh 'im 'el umah yizkeh yelud 'ishah. hen 'ad yareiakh velo ya'ahil vekhokhabim lo zaku be'einav. 'af ki 'enosh rimah uben 'adam tolei'ah. vaya'an 'iyob vayomar. meh 'azarta lelo khoakh hosha'ta zeroa' lo 'oz. mah ya'azta lelo khakhmah vetushiyah larob hoda'eta. 'et mi higadta milin venishmat mi yaze'ah mimeka. harefa'im yekholalu mitakhat mayim veshokheneihem. 'arom she'ol negdo ve'en kesut la'abadon. noteh zafon 'al tohu toleh 'erez 'al beli mah. zorer mayim be'abav velo nibqa' 'anan takhtam. me'akhez penei khiseh parshez 'alav 'anano. khoq khag 'al penei mayim 'ad takhlit 'or 'im khoshekh. 'amudei shamayim yerofafu veyitmehu miga'arato. bekhokho raga' hayam ubitubenato ubitbunato makhaz rahab. berukho shamayim shifrah kholalah yado nakhash bariakh. hen 'eleh qezot darko derakhav umah sheimez dabar nishma' bo vera'am geburato geburotav mi yitbonan. vayosef 'iyob se'et meshalo vayomar. khai 'el heisir mishpati veshadai heimar nafshi. ki khal 'od nishmati bi veruakh 'eloah be'api. 'im tedabeirenah sefatai 'avlah uleshoni 'im yehgeh remiyah. khalilah li 'im 'azdiq 'etkhem 'ad 'egva' lo 'asir tumati mimeni. bezidqati hekhezaqti velo 'arpeha lo yekheraf lebabi miyamai. yehi kherasha' 'oyebi umitqomi khe'aval. ki mah tiqvat khanef ki yibza' ki yeishel 'eloah nafsho. haza'aqato yishma' 'el ki tabo 'alav zarah. 'im 'al shadai yit'anag yiqra 'eloah bekhal 'et. 'oreh 'etkhem beyad 'el 'asher 'imosha dai lo 'akhakhed. hen 'atem kulekhem khazitem velamah zeh hebel tehbalu. zeh kheileq 'adam rasha' 'im 'el venakhalat 'arizim mishadai yiqakhu. 'im yirbu banav lemo khareb veze'eza'av lo yisbe'u lakhem. serido ridav bamavet yiqabeiru ve'almenotav lo tibkenah. 'im yizbor ke'afar kasef vekhakhomer yakhin malbush. yakhin vezadiq yilbash vekhesef naqi yakhaloq. banah kha'ash beito ukhesukah 'asah nozer. 'ashir yishkab velo yei'asef 'einav paqakh ve'einenu. tasigeihu khamayim balahot laylah genabatu sufah. yisa'eihu qadim veyeilakh visa'areihu mimeqomo. veyashlekh 'alav velo yakhmol miyado baroakh yibrakh. yispoq 'aleimo khapeimo veyishroq 'alav mimeqomo. ki yesh lakesef moza umaqom lazahab yazoqu. barzel mei'afar yuqakh ve'eben yazuq nekhushah. qez sam lakhoshekh ulekhal takhlit hu khoqer 'eben 'ofel vezalmavet. paraz nakhal mei'im gar hanishkakhim mini ragel dalu mei'enosh na'u. 'erez mimenah yeizei lakhem vetakhteha nehpakh kemo 'esh. meqom sapir 'abaneha ve'afrot zahab lo. natib lo yeda'o 'ayit velo zafatu 'en 'ayah. lo hidrikhuhu benei shakhaz lo 'adah 'alav shakhal. bakhalamish shalakh yado hafakh mishoresh harim. bazurot ye'orim biqeia' vekhal yeqar ra'atah 'eino. mibekhi neharot khibesh veta'alumah yozi 'or. vehakhakhemah mei'ayin timazei ve'ei zeh meqom binah. lo yada' 'enosh 'erkah velo timazei be'erez hakhayim. tehom 'amar lo bi hi veyam 'amar 'en 'imadi. lo yutan segor takhteha velo yishaqel kesef mekhirah. lo tesuleh bekhetem 'ofir beshoham yaqar vesapir. lo ya'arkhenah zahab uzekhokhit utemuratah keli faz. ramot vegabish lo yizakher umeshekh khakhmah mipeninim. lo ya'arkhenah pitdat kush bekhetem tahor lo tesuleh. vehakhakhemah mei'ayin tabo ve'ei zeh meqom binah. vene'elmah mei'einei khal khai umei'of hashamayim nistarah. 'abadon vamavet 'ameru be'azeneinu shama'nu shim'ah. 'elohim heibin darkah vehu yada' 'et meqomah. ki hu liqzot ha'arez yabit takhat kal hashamayim yir'eh. la'asot laruakh mishqal umayim tiken bemidah. ba'asto lamatar khoq vederekh lakhaziz qolot. 'az ra'ah vaysaperah hekhinah vegam khaqarah. vayomer la'adam hen yir'at 'adonai hi khakhmah vesur meira' binah. vayosef 'iyob se'et meshalo vayomar. mi yiteneini kheyarkhei qedem kimei 'eloah yishmereini. behilo neiro 'alei roshi le'oro 'eilekh khoshekh. ka'asher hayiti bimei kharepi besod 'eloah 'alei 'aholi. be'od dai 'imadi sebibotai ne'arai. birkhoz halikhai bekheimah vezur yazuq 'imadi palgei shamen. bezeiti sha'ar 'alei qaret barekhob 'akhin moshabi. ra'uni ne'arim venekhba'u vishishim qamu 'amadu. rim 'azeru bemilim vekhaf yasimu lefihem. qol negidim nekhba'u uleshonam lekhikam dabeiqah. ki 'ozen me'ah vate'ashereini ve'ayin ra'atah vate'ideini. ki 'amalet 'ani meshaveia' veyatom velo 'ozer lo. birkat 'obed 'alai tabo veleb 'almanah 'arnin. zedeq labashti vayilbasheini kim'il vezanif mishpati. 'einayim hayiti la'iver veraglayim lapiseiakh 'ani. 'ab 'anokhi la'ebyonim verib lo yada'ti 'ekhqereihu. va'ashaberah metale'ot 'aval umishinav 'ashlikh taref. va'omar 'im qini 'egva' vekhakhol 'arbeh yamim. shareshi fatuakh 'elei mayim vetal yalin biqziri. kebodi khadash 'imadi veqashti beyadi takhalif. li shame'u veyikhelu veyidemu lemo 'azati. 'akharei debari lo yishnu ve'aleimo titof milati. veyikhalu khamatar li ufihem pa'aru lemalqosh. 'eskhaq 'aleihem lo ya'aminu ve'or panai lo yapilun. 'ebakhar darkam ve'eisheb rosh ve'eshkon kemelekh bagedud ka'asher 'abeilim yenakhem. ve'atah sakhaqu 'alai ze'irim mimeni leyamim 'asher ma'asti 'abotam lashit 'im kalbei zoni. gam koakh yedeihem lamah li 'aleimo 'abad kalakh. bekheser ubekhafan galmud ha'oreqim ziyah 'emesh sho'ah umesho'ah. haqotefim maluakh 'alei siakh veshoresh retamim lakhmam. min gev yegorashu yari'u 'aleimo kaganab. ba'aruz nekhalim lishkon khorei 'afar vekheifim. ben sikhim yinhaqu takhat kharul yesupakhu. benei nabal gam benei beli shem nike'u min ha'arez. ve'atah neginatam hayiti va'ehi lahem lemilah. ti'abuni rakhaqu meni umipanai lo khasekhu roq. ki yitro yitri fitakh vai'aneini veresen mipanai shileikhu. 'al yamin pirkhakh yaqumu raglai shileikhu vayasolu 'alai 'arekhot 'eidam. natesu netibati lehavati yo'ilu lo 'ozer lamo. keferez rakhab ye'etayu takhat 'ah hitgalgalu. hahepakh 'alai balahot tirdof karuakh nedibati ukhe'ab 'aberah yeshu'ati. ve'atah 'alai tishtapekh nafshi yokhazuni yemei 'oni. laylah 'azamai niqar mei'alai ve'oreqai lo yishkabun. berab koakh yitkhapes lebushi kefi khutaneti ya'azreini. horani lakhomer va'etmashel ke'afar va'eifer. 'ashava' 'eilekha velo ta'aneini 'amadti vatitbonen bi. teihafekh le'akhzar li be'ozem yadekha tistemeini. tisa'eini 'el ruakh tarkibeini utemogegeini teshuveh tushiyah. ki yada'ti mavet teshibeini ubet mo'ed lekhal khai. 'akh lo be'i yishlakh yad 'im befido lahen shua'. 'im lo bakhiti liqsheh yom 'agemah nafshi la'ebyon. ki tob qiviti vayabo ra' va'ayakhalah le'or vayabo 'ofel. mei'ai rutekhu velo damu qidemuni yemei 'oni. qoder hilakhti belo khamah qamti baqahal 'ashaveia'. 'akh hayiti letanim vereia' libnot ya'anah. 'ori shakhar mei'alai ve'azmi kharah mini khoreb. vayhi le'eibel kinori ve'ugabi leqol bokhim. berit karati le'einai umah 'etbonen 'al betulah. umeh kheileq 'eloah mima'al venakhalat dai mimeromim. halo 'ed le'aval veneikher lefo'alei 'aven. halo hu yir'eh derakhai vekhal ze'adai yispor. 'im halakhti 'im shav vatakhash 'al mirmah ragli. yishqeleini bemozenei zedeq veyeida' 'eloah tumati. 'im titeh 'ashuri mini hadarekh ve'akhar 'einai halakh libi ubekhapai dabaq mu'um 'ezre'ah ve'akher yokhel veze'eza'ai yeshorashu. 'im niftah libi 'al 'ishah ve'al petakh rei'i 'arabeti. titkhan le'akher 'ishti ve'aleha yikhre'un 'akheirin. ki hu hi zimah vehi vehu 'avon pelilim. ki 'esh hi 'ad 'abadon tokhel ubekhal tebu'ati tesharesh. 'im 'em'as mishpat 'abdi va'amati beribam 'imadi. umah 'e'eseh ki yaqum 'el vekhi yifqod mah 'ashibenu. halo babeten 'oseini 'asahu vaykhunenu barekhem 'ekhad. 'im 'emna' meikheifez dalim ve'einei 'almanah 'akhaleh. ve'okhal piti lebadi velo 'akhal yatom mimenah. ki mine'urai gedeilani khe'ab umibeten 'imi 'ankhenah. 'im 'er'eh 'obed mibeli lebush ve'en kesut la'ebyon. 'im lo beirakhuni khalazo khalazav umigez kebasai yitkhamam. 'im hanifoti 'al yatom yadi ki 'er'eh basha'ar 'ezrati. keteifi mishikhmah tipol ve'ezro'i miqanah tishaber. ki fakhad 'eilai 'ed 'el umise'eito lo 'ukhal. 'im samti zahab kisli velaketem 'amarti mibtakhi. 'im 'esmakh ki rab kheili vekhi khabir maze'ah yadi. 'im 'er'eh 'or ki yahel veyareiakh yaqar holekh. vayift baseiter libi vatishaq yadi lefi. gam hu 'avon pelili ki khikhashti la'el mima'al. 'im 'esmakh befid mesan'i vehit'orarti ki meza'o ra'. velo natati lakhato khiki lish'ol be'alah nafsho. 'im lo 'ameru metei 'aholi mi yiten mibesaro lo nisba'. bakhuz lo yalin ger delatai la'orakh 'eftakh. 'im kisiti khe'adam pesha'ai litmon bekhubi 'avoni. ki 'e'eroz hamon rabah ubuz mishpakhot yekhiteini va'edom lo 'eizei fatakh. mi yiten li shomeia' li hen tavi shadai ya'aneini veseifer katab 'ish ribi. 'im lo 'aloshi khemi 'esa'enu 'e'endenu 'atarot li. mispar ze'adai 'agidenu kemo nagid 'aqarabenu. 'im 'alai 'admati tiz'aq veyakhad telameha yibkayun. 'im kokhah 'akhalti beli khasef venefesh be'aleha hipakheti. takhat khitah yeizei khoakh vetakhat se'orah ba'eshah tamu dibrei 'iyob. vayishbetu sheloshet ha'anashim ha'eleh mei'anot 'et 'iyob ki hu zadiq be'einav. vayikhar 'af 'elihu ben barakh'el habuzi mimishpakhat ram be'iyob kharah 'apo 'al zadeqo nafsho mei'elohim. ubishloshet rei'av kharah 'apo 'al 'asher lo maze'u ma'aneh vayarshi'u 'et 'iyob. ve'elihu khikah 'et 'iyob bidbarim ki zeqeinim hemah mimenu leyamim. vayar 'elihu ki 'en ma'aneh befi sheloshet ha'anashim vayikhar 'apo. vaya'an 'elihu ben barakh'el habuzi vayomar za'ir 'ani leyamim ve'atem yeshishim 'al ken zakhalti va'ira meikhavot dei'i 'etkhem. 'amarti yamim yedabeiru verob nim yodi'u khakhmah 'akhen ruakh hi be'enosh venishmat shadai tebinem. lo rabim yekhkamu uzeqeinim yabinu mishpat. lakhen 'amarti shim'ah li 'akhaveh dei'i 'af 'ani. hen hokhalti ledibreikhem 'azin 'ad tebunoteikhem 'ad takhqerun milin. ve'adeikhem 'etbonan vehineh 'en le'iyob mokhiakh 'oneh 'amarav mikem. pen tomeru mazanu khakhmah 'el yidefenu lo 'ish. velo 'arakh 'eilai milin ube'imreikhem lo 'ashibenu. khatu lo 'anu 'od he'tiqu meihem milim. vehokhalti ki lo yedabeiru ki 'amedu lo 'anu 'od. 'a'aneh 'af 'ani khelqi 'akhaveh dei'i 'af 'ani. ki maleiti milim heziqatni ruakh bitni. hineh bitni keyayin lo yipateiakh ke'obot khadashim yibaqeia'. 'adaberah veyirvakh li 'eftakh sefatai ve'e'eneh. 'al na 'esa fenei 'ish ve'el 'adam lo 'akhaneh. ki lo yada'ti 'akhaneh kim'at yisa'eini 'oseini. ve'ulam shema' na 'iyob milai vekhal debarai ha'azinah. hineh na patakhti fi diberah leshoni bekhiki. yosher libi 'amarai veda'at fatai barur mileilu. ruakh 'el 'asateni venishmat shadai tekhayeini. 'im tukhal hashibeini 'erkhah lefanai hityazabah. hen 'ani khefikha la'el meikhomer qorazti gam 'ani. hineh 'eimati lo teba'ateka ve'akhpi 'alekha lo yikhbad. 'akh 'amarta be'azenai veqol milin 'eshma'. zakh 'ani beli fasha' khaf 'anokhi velo 'avon li. hen tenu'ot 'alai yimza yakhshebeini le'oyeb lo. yasem basad raglai yishmor kal 'arekhotai. hen zot lo zadaqta 'e'eneka ki yirbeh 'eloha mei'enosh. madua' 'eilav ribota ki khal debarav lo ya'aneh. ki be'akhat yedaber 'el ubishtayim lo yeshurenah. bakhalom khezyon laylah binfol tardeimah 'al 'anashim bitnumot 'alei mishkab. 'az yigleh 'ozen 'anashim ubemosaram yakhtom. lehasir 'adam ma'aseh vegeivah migeber yekhaseh. yakhsokh nafsho mini shakhat vekhayato mei'abor bashalakh. vehukhakh bemakh'ob 'al mishkabo verib verob 'azamav 'eitan. vezihamatu khayato lakhem venafsho ma'akhal ta'avah. yikhel besaro meiro'i ushefi veshupu 'azmotav lo ru''u. vatiqrab lashakhat nafsho vekhayato lamitim. 'im yesh 'alav mal'akh meiliz 'ekhad mini 'alef lehagid le'adam yashero. vaykhunenu vayomer peda'eihu meiredet shakhat mazati khofer. rutafash besaro mino'ar yashub limei 'alumav. ye'tar 'el 'eloah vayirzeihu vayar panav bitru'ah vayasheb le'enosh zidqato. yashor 'al 'anashim vayomer khatati veyashar he'eveiti velo shavah li. padah nafshi nafsho mei'abor bashakhat vekhayati vekhayato ba'or tir'eh. hen kal 'eleh yif'al 'el pa'amayim shalosh 'im gaber. lehashib nafsho mini shakhat lei'or be'or hakhayim. haqsheb 'iyob shema' li hakharesh ve'anokhi 'adaber. 'im yesh milin hashibeini daber ki khafazti zadeqeka. 'im 'ayin 'atah shema' li hakharesh va'a'alefkha khakhmah vaya'an 'elihu vayomar. shim'u khakhamim milai veyode'im ha'azinu li. ki 'ozen milin tibkhan vekhekh yit'am le'ekhol. mishpat nibkharah lanu neide'ah beineinu mah tob. ki 'amar 'iyob zadaqti ve'el heisir mishpati. 'al mishpati 'akhazeb 'anush khizi beli fasha'. mi geber ke'iyob yishteh la'ag kamayim. ve'arakh lekhebrah 'im po'alei 'aven velalekhet 'im 'anshei resha'. ki 'amar lo yiskan gaber birzoto 'im 'elohim. lakhen 'anashei leibab shim'u li khalilah la'el meiresha' veshadai mei'avel. ki fo'al 'adam yeshalem lo ukhe'orakh 'ish yamzi'enu. 'af 'amenam 'el lo yarshia' veshadai lo ye'avet mishpat. mi faqad 'alav 'arezah umi m teibel kulah. 'im yasim 'eilav libo rukho venishmato 'eilav ye'esof. yigva' kal basar yakhad ve'adam 'al 'afar yashub. ve'im binah shim'ah zot ha'azinah leqol milai. ha'af sonei mishpat yakhabosh ve'im zadiq kabir tarshia'. ha'amor lemelekh beliya'al rasha' 'el nedibim. 'asher lo nasa penei sarim velo nikar shoa' lifnei dal ki ma'aseh yadav kulam. rega' yamutu vakhazot layelah yego'ashu 'am veya'aboru veyasiru 'abir lo beyad. ki 'einav 'al darkhei 'ish vekhal ze'adav yir'eh. 'en khoshekh ve'en zalmavet lehisater m po'alei 'aven. ki lo 'al 'ish yasim 'od lahalokh 'el 'el bamishpat. yaroa' kabirim lo kheiqer vaya'amed 'akheirim takhtam. lakhen yakir ma'badeihem vehafakh laylah veyidaka'u. takhat resha'im sefaqam bimqom ro'im. 'asher 'al ken saru mei'akharav vekhal derakhav lo hiskilu. lehabi 'alav za'aqat dal veza'aqat 'aniyim yishma'. vehu yashqit umi yarshia' veyaster panim umi yeshurenu ve'al go ve'al 'adam yakhad. mimelokh 'adam khanef mimoqeshei 'am. ki 'el 'el he'amar nasati lo 'ekhbol. bil'adei 'ekhezeh 'atah horeini 'im 'avel pa'alti lo 'osif. hamei'imekha yeshalmenah ki ma'asta ki 'atah tibkhar velo 'ani umah yada'ta daber. 'anshei leibab yomeru li vegeber khakham shomeia' li. 'iyob lo beda'at yedaber udebarav lo behaskel. 'abi yibakhen 'iyob 'ad nezakh 'al teshubot be'anshei 'aven. ki yosif 'al khatato fesha' beineinu yispoq veyereb 'amarav la'el. vaya'an 'elihu vayomar. hazot khashabta lemishpat 'amarta zidqi mei'el. ki tomar mah yiskan lakh mah 'o'il meikhatati. 'ani 'ashibekha milin ve'et rei'ekha 'imakh. habet shamayim ure'eh veshur khaqim gabehu mimeka. 'im khatata mah tif'al bo verabu fesha'ekha mah ta'aseh lo. 'im zadaqta mah titen lo 'o mah miyadekha yiqakh. le'ish kamokha rish'ekha uleben 'adam zidqatekha. meirob 'ashuqim yaz'iqu yeshave'u mizeroa' rabim. velo 'amar 'ayeh 'eloah 'osai noten zemirot balayelah. malefeinu mibahamot 'arez umei'of hashamayim yekhakemeinu. sham yiz'aqu velo ya'aneh mipenei ge'on ra'im. 'akhosha v lo yishma' 'el veshadai lo yeshurenah. 'af ki tomar lo teshurenu din lefanav utekholel lo. ve'atah ki 'ayin paqad 'apo velo yada' bapash me'od. ve'iyob hebel yifzeh pihu bibli da'at milin yakhbir. vayosef 'elihu vayomar. katar li ze'er va'akhaveka ki 'od le'eloah milim. 'esa dei'i lemeirakhoq ulefo'ali 'eten zedeq. ki 'amenam lo sheqer milai temim dei'ot 'imakh. hen 'el kabir velo yim'as kabir koakh leb. lo yekhayeh rasha' umishpat 'aniyim yiten. lo yigra' mizadiq 'einav ve'et melakhim lakisei vayoshibem lanezakh vayigbahu. ve'im 'asurim baziqim yilakhedun bekhablei 'oni. vayaged lahem pa'olam ufish'eihem ki yitgabaru. vayigel 'azenam lamusar vayomer ki yeshubun mei'aven. 'im yishme'u veya'abodu yekhalu yemeihem batob usheneihem bane'imim. ve'im lo yishme'u beshelakh ya'aboru veyigve'u kibli da'at vekhanfei leb yasimu 'af lo yeshave'u ki 'asaram. tamot bano'ar nafsham vekhayatam baqedeishim. yekhalez 'ani be'aneyo veyigel balakhaz 'azenam. ve'af hasitekha mipi zar rakhab lo muzaq takhteha venakhat lekhanekha malei dashen. vedin rasha' maleita din umishpat yitmokhu. ki kheimah pen yesitekha besafeq verab kofer 'al yateka. haya'arokh shu'akha lo bezar vekhol ma'amazei khoakh. 'al tish'af halayelah la'alot 'amim takhtam. hishamer 'al teifen 'el 'aven ki 'al zeh bakharta mei'oni. hen 'el yasgib bekhokho mi khamohu moreh. mi faqad 'alav darko umi 'amar pa'alta 'avlah. zekhor ki tasgi fa'olo 'asher shoreru 'anashim. kal 'adam khazu bo 'enosh yabit meirakhoq. hen 'el gi velo neida' mispar shanav velo kheiqer. ki yegara' nitfei mayim yazoqu matar le'eido. 'asher yizelu shekhaqim yir'afu 'alei 'adam rab. 'af 'im yabin mifresei 'ab teshu'ot sukato. hen paras 'alav 'oro veshareshei hayam kisah. ki bam yadin 'amim yiten 'okhel lemakhbir. 'al kapayim kisah 'or vayzav 'aleha bemafgia'. yagid 'alav rei'o miqneh 'af 'al 'oleh. 'af lezot yekherad libi veyitar mimeqomo. shim'u shamoa' berogez qolo vehegeh mipiv yeizei. takhat kal hashamayim yishreihu ve'oro 'al kanfot ha'arez. 'akharav yish'ag qol yar'em beqol ge'ono velo ye'aqebem ki yishama' qolo. yar'em 'el beqolo nifla'ot 'oseh gedolot velo neida'. ki lashelag yomar hevei 'arez vegeshem matar vegeshem mitrot 'uzo. beyad kal 'adam yakhtom lada'at kal 'anshei ma'aseihu. vatabo khayah bemo 'areb ubim'onoteha tishkon. min hakheder tabo sufah umimezarim qarah. minishmat 'el yiten qarakh verokhab mayim bemuzaq. 'af beri yatriakh 'ab yafiz 'anan 'oro. vehu mesibot mithapekh betakhbulato betakhbulotav lefa'olam kol 'asher yezavem 'al penei teibel 'arezah. 'im lesheibet 'im le'arzo 'im lekhesed yamzi'eihu. ha'azinah zot 'iyob 'amod vehitbonen nifle'ot 'el. hateida' besum 'eloah 'aleihem vehofia' 'or 'anano. hateida' 'al miflesei 'ab mifle'ot temim dei'im. 'asher begadekha khamim behashqit 'erez midarom. tarqia' 'imo lishkhaqim khazaqim kir'i muzaq. hodi'einu mah nomar lo lo na'arokh mipenei khoshekh. haysupar lo ki 'adaber 'im 'amar 'ish ki yebula'. ve'atah lo ra'u 'or bahir hu bashekhaqim veruakh 'aberah vatetaharem. mizafon zahab ye'eteh 'al 'eloah nora hod. shadai lo mezanuhu sagi khoakh umishpat verob zedaqah lo ye'aneh. lakhen yerei'uhu 'anashim lo yir'eh kal khakhmei leb. vaya'an ihoh 'et 'iyob min hase'arah min hase'arah vayomar. mi zeh makhshikh 'eizah bemilin beli da'at. 'ezar na khegeber khalazekha ve'esh'alekha vehodi'eini. 'eifoh hayita beyasedi 'arez haged 'im yada'ta binah. mi sam memadeha ki teida' 'o mi natah 'aleha qav. 'al mah 'adaneha hateba'u 'o mi yarah 'eben pinatah. beran yakhad kokhbei boqer vayari'u kal benei 'elohim. vayasekh bidlatayim yam begikho meirekhem yeizei. besumi 'anan lebusho va'arafel khatulato. va'eshbor 'alav khuqi va'asim beriakh udelatayim. va'omar 'ad poh tabo velo tosif ufo yashit big'on galekha. hemiyamekha zivita boqer yida'tah shakhar yida'ta hashakhar meqomo. le'ekhoz bekhanfot ha'arez veyina'aru resha'im mimenah. tithapekh kekhomer khotam veyityazebu kemo lebush. veyimana' meiresha'im 'oram uzeroa' ramah tishaber. habata 'ad nibkhei yam ubekheiqer tehom hithalakheta. haniglu lekha sha'arei mavet vesha'arei zalmavet tir'eh. hitbonanta 'ad rakhabei 'arez haged 'im yada'ta khulah. 'ei zeh haderekh yishkan 'or vekhoshekh 'ei zeh meqomo. ki tiqakhenu 'el gebulo vekhi tabin netibot beito. yada'ta ki 'az tivaled umispar yamekha rabim. habata 'el 'ozerot shaleg ve'ozerot barad tir'eh. 'asher khasakhti le'et zar leyom qerab umilkhamah. 'ei zeh haderekh yeikhaleq 'or yafez qadim 'alei 'arez. mi filag lashetef te'alah vederekh lakhaziz qolot. lehamtir 'al 'erez lo 'ish midbar lo 'adam bo. lehasbia' sho'ah umesho'ah ulehazmiakh moza deshe. hayesh lamatar 'ab 'o mi holid 'eglei tal. mibeten mi yaza haqarakh ukhefor mayim mi yelado. ka'eben mayim yitkhaba'u ufenei tehom yitlakadu. hatqasher ma'adanot kimah 'o moshekhot kesil tefateiakh. hatozi mazarot be'ito ve'ayish 'al baneha tankhem. hayada'ta khuqot shamayim 'im tasim mishtaro ba'arez. hatarim la'ab qolekha veshif'at mayim tekhaseka. hatshalakh beraqim veyeileikhu veyomeru lekha hineinu. misha t batukhot khakhmah 'o mi natan lasekhvi binah. mi yesaper shekhaqim bekhakhemah veniblei mayim mi yashkib. bezeqet 'afar lamuzaq uregabim yedubaqu. hatazud lelabi taref vekhayat kefirim temalei. ki yashokhu bame'onot yeishebu basukah lemo 'areb. mi yakhin la'oreb zeido ki yelado yeladav 'el 'el yeshavei'u yit'u libli 'okhel. hayada'ta 'et ledet ya'alei sala' kholel 'ayalot tishmor. tispor yerakhim temalenah veyada'ta 'et lidtanah. tikhra'nah yaldeihen tefalakhnah khebleihem teshalakhnah. yakhlemu beneihem yirbu babar yaze'u velo shabu lamo. mi shilakh pere khafeshi umoserot 'arod mi fiteiakh. 'asher samti 'arabah beito umishkenotav meleikhah. yiskhaq lahamon qiryah teshu'ot noges lo yishma'. yetur harim mir'eihu ve'akhar kal yaroq yidrosh. hayobeh rem 'abedekha 'im yalin 'al 'abusekha. hatiqshar rem betelem 'aboto 'im yesaded 'amaqim 'akharekha. hatibtakh bo ki rab kokho veta'azob 'eilav yegi'ekha. hata'amin bo ki yashub yashib zar'ekha vegarenekha ye'esof. kenaf renanim ne'elasah 'im 'ebrah khasidah venozah. ki ta'azob la'arez beizeha ve'al 'afar tekhamem. vatishkakh ki regel tezureha vekhayat hasadeh tedusheha. hiqshiakh baneha lelo lah leriq yegi'ah beli fakhad. ki hishah 'eloah khakhmah velo khalaq lah babinah. ka'et bamarom tamri tiskhaq lasus ulerokhebo. hatiten lasus geburah hatalbish zavaro ra'mah. hetar'ishenu ka'arbeh hod nakhro 'eimah. yakhperu ba'eimeq veyasis bekhoakh yeizei liqrat nasheq. yiskhaq lefakhad velo yeikhat velo yashub mipenei khareb. 'alav tirneh 'ashpah lahab khanit vekhidon. bera'ash verogez yegame 'arez velo ya'amin ki qol shofar. bedei shofar yomar he'akh umeirakhoq yariakh milkhamah ra'am rim uteru'ah. hamibinatekha ya'aber nez yifros kenafo kenafav leteiman. 'im 'al pikha yagbiah nasher vekhi yarim qino. sela' yishkon veyitlonan 'al shen sela' umezudah. misham khafar 'okhel lemeirakhoq 'einav yabitu. ve'efrokho ve'efrokhav ye'al'u dam uba'asher khalalim sham hu. vaya'an ihoh 'et 'iyob vayomar. harob 'im shadai yisor mokhiakh 'eloah ya'anenah. vaya'an 'iyob 'et ihoh vayomar. hen qaloti mah 'ashibeka yadi samti lemo fi. 'akhat dibarti velo 'e'eneh ushetayim velo 'osif. vaya'an ihoh 'et 'iyob min se'arah min se'arah vayomar. 'ezar na khegeber khalazekha 'esh'alekha vehodi'eini. ha'af tafer mishpati tarshi'eini lema'an tizdaq. ve'im zeroa' ka'el lakh ubeqol kamohu tar'em. 'adeh na ga'on vagobah vehod vehadar tilbash. hafez 'ebrot 'apekha ure'eh khal gei'eh vehashpileihu. re'eh khal gei'eh hakhni'eihu vahadokh resha'im takhtam. tamenem be'afar yakhad peneihem khabosh batamun. vegam 'ani 'odeka ki toshia' lekha yeminekha. hineh na beheimot 'asher 'asiti 'imakh khazir kabaqar yokhel. hineh na khokho bematenav ve'ono bishrirei bitno. yakhpoz zenabo khemo 'arez gidei fakhado fakhadav yesoragu. 'azamav 'afiqei nekhushah geramav kimtil barzel. hu reishit darkhei 'el ha'oso yagesh kharbo. ki bul harim yis'u lo vekhal khayat hasadeh yesakhaqu sham. takhat ze'elim yishkab beseiter qaneh ubizah. yesukuhu ze'elim zilalo yesubuhu 'arbei nakhal. hen ya'ashoq nahar lo yakhpoz yibtakh ki yagiakh yarden 'el pihu. be'einav yiqakhenu bemoqshim yinqab 'af. timshokh livyatan bekhakah ubekhebel tashqia' leshono. hatasim 'agmon be'apo ubekhoakh tiqob lekheyo. hayarbeh 'eilekha takhanunim 'im yedaber 'eilekha rakot. hayikhrot berit 'imakh tiqakhenu le'ebed 'olam. hatsakheq bo kazipor vetiqsherenu lena'arotekha. yikhru 'alav khabarim yekhezuhu ben kena'anim. hatmalei besukot 'oro ubezilzal dagim rosho. sim 'alav kapekha zekhor milkhamah 'al tosaf. hen tokhalto nikhzabah hagam 'el mar'av yutal. lo 'akhzar ki ye'urenu umi hu lefanai yityazab. mi hiqdimani va'ashalem takhat kal hashamayim li hu. lo lo 'akharish badav udebar geburot vekhin 'erko. mi gilah penei lebusho bekhefel risno mi yabo. daltei fanav mi fiteiakh sebibot shinav 'eimah. ga'avah 'afiqei maginim sagur khotam zar. 'ekhad be'ekhad yigashu veruakh lo yabo beineihem. 'ish be'akhihu yedubaqu yitlakedu velo yitparadu. 'atishotav tahel 'or ve'einav ke'af'apei shakhar. mipiv lapidim yahalokhu kidodei 'esh yitmalatu. minekhirav yeizei 'ashan kedud nafuakh ve'agmon. nafsho gekhalim telahet velahab mipiv yeizei. bezavaro yalin 'oz ulefanav taduz de'abah. mapelei besaro dabeiqu yazuq 'alav bal yimot. libo yazuq kemo 'aben veyazuq kefelakh takhtit. miseito yaguru 'eilim mishebarim yitkhata'u. masigeihu khereb beli taqum khanit masa' veshiryah. yakhshob leteben barzel le'ez riqabon nekhushah. lo yabrikhenu ben qashet leqash nehpekhu lo 'abnei qala'. keqash nekhshebu totakh veyiskhaq lera'ash kidon. takhtav khadudei khares yirpad kharuz 'alei tit. yartiakh kasir mezulah yam yasim kamerqakhah. 'akharav ya'ir natib yakhshob tehom leseibah. 'en 'al 'afar mashelo he'asu libli khat. 'et kal gaboah yir'eh hu melekh 'al kal benei shakhaz. vaya'an 'iyob 'et ihoh vayomar. yada'ta yada'ti ki khol tukhal velo yibazer mimekha mezimah. mi zeh ma'lim 'eizah beli da'at lakhen higadti velo 'abin nifla'ot mimeni velo 'eida'. shema' na ve'anokhi 'adaber 'esh'alekha vehodi'eini. lesheima' 'ozen shema'tikha ve'atah 'eini ra'atekha. 'al ken 'em'as venikhamti 'al 'afar va'eifer. vayhi 'akhar diber ihoh 'et hadebarim ha'eleh 'el 'iyob vayomer ihoh 'el 'elifaz hateimani kharah 'api bekha ubishnei rei'ekha ki lo dibartem 'eilai nekhonah ke'abdi 'iyob. ve'atah qekhu lakhem shib'ah farim veshib'ah 'eilim ulekhu 'el 'abdi 'iyob veha'alitem 'olah ba'adkhem ve'iyob 'abdi yitpalel 'aleikhem ki 'im panav 'esa lebilti 'asot 'imakhem nebalah ki lo dibartem 'eilai nekhonah ke'abdi 'iyob. vayeilekhu 'elifaz hateimani ubildad hashukhi zofar hana'amati vaya'asu ka'asher diber 'aleihem ihoh vayisa ihoh 'et penei 'iyob. ihoh b 'et shebit shebut 'iyob behitpalo be'ad rei'eihu vayosef ihoh 'et kal 'asher le'iyob lemishneh. vayabo'u 'eilav kal 'ekhav vekhal 'akhyotav 'akhyotav vekhal yode'av lefanim vayokhelu 'imo lekhem bebeito vayanudu lo vaynakhamu 'oto 'al kal hara'ah 'asher heibi ihoh 'alav vayitenu lo 'ish qesitah 'ekhat ve'ish nezem zahab 'ekhad. ihoh beirakh 'et 'akharit 'iyob meireishito vayhi lo 'arba'ah 'asar 'elef zon vesheishet 'alafim gemalim ve'elef zemed baqar ve'elef 'atonot. vayhi lo shib'anah banim veshalosh banot. vayiqra shem ha'akhat yemimah veshem hasheinit qezi'ah veshem hashelishit qeren hapukh. velo nimza nashim yafot kibnot 'iyob bekhal ha'arez vayiten lahem 'abihem nakhalah betokh 'akheihem. vaykhi 'iyob 'akharei zot mei'ah ve'arba'im shanah vayar vayir'eh 'et banav ve'et benei banav 'arba'ah dorot. vayamat 'iyob zaqen useba' yamim.

shir hashirim 'asher lishlomoh. yishaqeini mineshiqot pihu ki tobim dodekha miyayin. lereiakh shemanekha tobim shemen turaq shemekha 'al ken 'alamot 'aheibukha. mashekheini 'akharekha naruzah hebi'ani hamelekh khadarav nagilah venismekhah bakh nazkirah dodekha miyayin meisharim 'aheibukha. shekhorah 'ani venavah benot yerushalim ke'aholei qeidar kiri'ot shelomoh. 'al tir'uni she'ani shekharkhoret sheshezafatni hashamesh benei 'imi nikharu bi samuni noteirah 'et hakeramim karmi sheli lo natareti. hagidah li she'ahabah nafshi 'eikhah tir'eh 'eikhah tarbiz bazahorayim shalamah 'ehyeh ke'oteyah 'al 'edrei khabeirekha. 'im lo teide'i lakh hayafah banashim ze'i lakh be'iqbei hazon ure'i 'et gediyotayikh 'al mishkenot haro'im. lesusati berikhbei far'oh dimitikh ra'yati. navu lekhayayikh batorim zavarekh bakharuzim. torei zahab na'aseh lakh 'im nequdot hakasef. 'ad shehamelekh bimsibo nirdi natan reikho. zeror hamor dodi li ben shadai yalin. 'eshkol hakofer dodi li bekharmei 'en gedi. hinakh yafah ra'yati hinakh yafah 'einayikh yonim. hinekha yafeh dodi 'af na'im 'af 'arseinu ra'ananah. qorot bateinu 'arazim rakhiteinu rahiteinu berotim. 'ani khabazelet hasharon shoshanat ha'amaqim. keshoshanah ben hakhokhim ken ra'yati ben habanot. ketapuakh ba'azei haya'ar ken dodi ben habanim bezilo khimadti veyashabti ufiryo matoq lekhiki. hebi'ani 'el bet hayayin vediglo 'alai 'ahabah. samekhuni ba'ashishot rapeduni batapukhim ki kholat 'ahabah 'ani. semolo takhat leroshi vimino tekhabeqeini. hishba'ti 'etkhem benot yerushalim bizba'ot 'o be'aylot hasadeh 'im ta'iru ve'im te'orru 'et ha'ahabah 'ad shetekhpaz. qol dodi hineh zeh ba medaleg 'al heharim meqapez 'al hageba'ot. domeh dodi lizbi 'o le'ofer ha'ayalim hineh zeh 'omed 'akhar kateleinu mashgiakh min hakhalonot meiziz min hakharakim. 'anah dodi ve'amar li qumi lakh ra'yati yafati ulekhi lakh. ki hineh hasetav hasetav 'abar hageshem khalaf halakh lo. hanizanim nir'u ba'arez 'et hazamir higia' veqol hator nishma' be'arzeinu. hate'einah khanetah fageha vehagefanim semadar natenu reiakh qumi lekhi lakh ra'yati yafati ulekhi lakh. yonati bekhagvei hasela' beseiter hamadreigah har'ini 'et mar'ayikh hashmi'ini 'et qolekh ki qolekh 'areb umar'ekh naveh. 'ekhezu lanu shu'alim shu'alim qetanim mekhabelim keramim ukherameinu semadar. dodi li va'ani lo haro'eh bashoshanim. 'ad sheyafuakh hayom venasu hazelalim sob demeh lekha dodi lizbi 'o le'ofer ha'ayalim 'al harei bater. 'al mishkabi baleilot biqashti 'et she'ahabah nafshi biqashtiv velo mezativ. 'aqumah na va'asobbah ba'ir bashevaqim ubarekhobot 'abaqshah 'et she'ahabah nafshi biqashtiv velo mezativ. meza'uni hashomerim hasobebim ba'ir 'et she'ahabah nafshi re'item. kim'at she'abarti meihem 'ad shemazati 'et she'ahabah nafshi 'akhaztiv velo 'arpenu 'ad shehabeitiv 'el bet 'imi ve'el kheder horati. hishba'ti 'etkhem benot yerushalim bizba'ot 'o be'aylot hasadeh 'im ta'iru ve'im te'orru 'et ha'ahabah 'ad shetekhpaz. mi zot 'olah min hamidbar ketimarot 'ashan mequteret mor ulebonah mikol 'abqat rokhel. hineh mitato shelishlomoh shishim giborim sabib lah migiborei yisra'el. kulam 'akhuzei khereb melumedei milkhamah 'ish kharbo 'al yereikho mipakhad baleilot. 'apiryon 'asah lo hamelekh shelomoh mei'azei halebanon. 'amudav 'asah khesef refidato zahab merkabo 'argaman tokho razuf 'ahabah mibenot yerushalim. ze'enah ure'enah benot ziyon bamelekh shelomoh ba'atarah she'iterah lo 'imo beyom khatunato ubeyom simkhat libo. hinakh yafah ra'yati hinakh yafah 'einayikh yonim miba'ad lezamatekh sa'rekh ke'eider ha'izim shegaleshu meihar gil'ad. shinayikh ke'eider haqezubot she'alu min harakhzah shekulam mat'imot veshakulah 'en bahem. kekhut hashani siftotayikh umidbarekh naveh kefelakh harimon raqatekh miba'ad lezamatekh. kemigdal david zavarekh banui letalpiyot 'elef hamagen talui 'alav kol shiltei hagiborim. shenei shadayikh kishnei 'ofarim te'omei zebiyah haro'im bashoshanim. 'ad sheyafuakh hayom venasu hazelalim 'eilekh li 'el har hamor ve'el gib'at halebonah. kulakh yafah ra'yati umum 'en bakh. 'iti milebanon kalah 'iti milebanon tabo'i tashuri meirosh 'amanah meirosh senir vekhermon mime'onot 'arayot meiharrei nemeirim. libabtini 'akhoti khalah libabtini be'akhad be'akhat mei'einayikh be'akhad 'anaq mizaveronayikh. mah yafu dodayikh 'akhoti khalah mah tobu dodayikh miyayin vereiakh shemanayikh mikal besamim. nofet titofenah siftotayikh kalah debash vekhalab takhat leshonekh vereiakh salmotayikh kereiakh lebanon. gan na'ul 'akhoti khalah gal na'ul ma'yan khatum. shelakhayikh pardes rimonim 'im peri megadim kefarim 'im neradim. neired vekharkom qaneh veqinamon 'im kal 'azei lebonah mor va'ahalot 'im kal rashei besamim. ma'yan ganim be'er mayim khayim venozelim min lebanon. 'uri zafon ubo'i teiman hafikhi gani yizelu besamav yabo dodi legano veyokhal peri megadav. bati legani 'akhoti khalah 'ariti mori 'im besami 'akhalti ya'ri 'im dibshi shatiti yeini 'im khalabi 'ikhlu rei'im shetu veshikhru dodim. 'ani yesheinah velibi 'er qol dodi dofeq pitkhi li 'akhoti ra'yati yonati tamati sherroshi nimla tal qevuzotai resisei layelah. pashati 'et kutaneti 'eikhakhah 'elbashenah rakhazti 'et raglai 'eikhakhah 'atanefem. dodi shalakh yado min hakhor umei'ai hamu 'alav. qamti 'ani liftoakh ledodi veyadai natefu mor ve'ezbe'otai mor 'ober 'al kapot haman'ul. patakhti 'ani ledodi vedodi khamaq 'abar nafshi yaze'ah bedabero biqashtihu velo mezatihu qerativ velo 'anani. meza'uni hashomerim hasobebim ba'ir hikuni feza'uni nase'u 'et redidi mei'alai shomerei hakhomot. hishba'ti 'etkhem benot yerushalim 'im timze'u 'et dodi mah tagidu lo shekholat 'ahabah 'ani. mah dodekh midod hayafah banashim mah dodekh midod shekakhah hishba'tanu. dodi zakh ve'adom dagul meirebabah. rosho ketem paz qevzotav taltalim shekhorot ka'oreb. 'einav keyonim 'al 'afiqei mayim rokhazot bekhalab yoshebot 'al milet. lekhayav ka'arugat habosem migdelot merqakhim siftotav shoshanim notefot mor 'ober. yadav gelilei zahab memula'im batarshish mei'av 'eshet shen me'ulefet sapirim. shoqav 'amudei shesh meyusadim 'al 'adnei faz mar'eihu kalebanon bakhur ka'arazim. khiko mamtaqim vekhulo makhamadim zeh dodi vezeh rei'i benot yerushalim. 'anah halakh dodekh hayafah banashim 'anah panah dodekh unebaqshenu 'imakh. dodi yarad legano la'arugot habosem lir'ot baganim velilqot shoshanim. 'ani ledodi vedodi li haro'eh bashoshanim. yafah 'at ra'yati ketirzah navah kirushalim 'ayumah kanidgalot. hasebi 'einayikh minegdi shehem hirhibuni sa'rekh ke'eider ha'izim shegaleshu min hagil'ad. shinayikh ke'eider harekheilim she'alu min harakhzah shekulam mat'imot veshakulah 'en bahem. kefelakh harimon raqatekh miba'ad lezamatekh. shishim hemah melakhot ushemonim pilagshim va'alamot 'en mispar. 'akhat hi yonati tamati 'akhat hi le'imah barah hi leyoladtah ra'uha banot vai'asheruha melakhot ufilagshim vayhaluha. mi zot hanishqafah kemo shakhar yafah khalebanah barah kakhamah 'ayumah kanidgalot. 'el ginat 'egoz yaradti lir'ot be'ibei hanakhal lir'ot hafarekhah hagefen heineizu harimonim. lo yada'ti nafshi samatni markebot 'ami nadib. shubi shubi hashulamit shubi shubi venekhezeh bakh mah tekhezu bashulamit kimkholat hamakhanayim. mah yafu fe'amayikh bane'alim bat nadib khamuqei yereikhayikh kemo khala'im ma'aseh yedei 'aman. sharerekh 'agan hasahar 'al yekhsar hamazeg bitnekh 'areimat khitim sugah bashoshanim. shenei shadayikh kishnei 'ofarim ta'omei zebiyah. zavarekh kemigdal hashen 'einayikh bereikhot bekheshbon 'al sha'ar bat rabim 'apekh kemigdal halebanon zofeh penei damaseq. roshekh 'alayikh kakarmel vedalat roshekh ka'argaman melekh 'asur barehatim. mah yafit umah na'amt 'ahabah bata'anugim. zot qomatekh dametah letamar veshadayikh le'ashkolot. 'amarti 'e'eleh betamar 'okhazah besansinav veyihyu na shadayikh ke'eshkelot hagefen vereiakh 'apekh katapukhim. vekhikekh keyen hatob holekh ledodi lemeisharim dobeb siftei yesheinim. 'ani ledodi ve'alai teshuqato. lekhah dodi neizei hasadeh nalinah bakefarim. nashkimah lakeramim nir'eh 'im parekhah hagefen pitakh hasemadar heineizu harimonim sham 'eten 'et dodai lakh. haduda'im natenu reiakh ve'al petakheinu kal megadim khadashim gam yeshanim dodi zafanti lakh. mi yitenkha ke'akh li yoneq shedei 'imi 'emza'akha bakhuz 'eshaqekha gam lo yabuzu li. 'enhagakha 'abi'akha 'el bet 'imi telamedeini 'ashqekha miyayin hareqakh mei'asis rimoni. semolo takhat roshi vimino tekhabeqeini. hishba'ti 'etkhem benot yerushalim mah ta'iru umah te'oreru 'et ha'ahabah 'ad shetekhpaz. mi zot 'olah min hamidbar mitrapeqet 'al dodah takhat hatapuakh 'orartikha mah khibelatkha 'imekha shamah khibelah yeladatkha. simeini khakhotam 'al libekha kakhotam 'al zero'ekha ki 'azah khamavet 'ahabah qashah khish'ol qin'ah reshafeha rishpei 'esh shalhebetyah. mayim rabim lo yukhelu lekhabot 'et ha'ahabah uneharot lo yishtefuha 'im yiten 'ish 'et kal hon beito ba'ahabah boz yabuzu lo. 'akhot lanu qetanah veshadayim 'en lah mah na'aseh la'akhoteinu bayom sheyedubar bah. 'im khomah hi nibneh 'aleha tirat kasef ve'im delet hi nazur 'aleha luakh 'arez. 'ani khomah veshadai kamigdalot 'az hayiti be'einav kemoz'et shalom. kerem hayah lishlomoh beba'al hamon natan 'et hakerem lanoterim 'ish yabi befiryo 'elef kasef. karmi sheli lefanai ha'elef lekha shelomoh umatayim lenoterim 'et piryo. hayoshebet baganim khabeirim maqshibim leqolekh hashmi'ini. berakh dodi udemeh lekha lizbi 'o le'ofer ha'ayalim 'al harei besamim.

vayhi bimei shefot hashofetim vayhi ra'ab ba'arez vayeilekh 'ish mibet lekhem yehudah lagur bisdei mo'ab hu ve'ishto ushenei banav. veshem ha'ish 'elimelekh veshem 'ishto na'omi veshem shenei banav makhlon vekhilyon 'efratim mibet lekhem yehudah vayabo'u sedei mo'ab vayihyu sham. vayamat 'elimelekh 'ish na'omi vatisha'er hi ushenei baneha. vayis'u lahem nashim mo'abiyot shem ha'akhat 'arepah veshem hasheinit rut vayeishebu sham ke'eser shanim. vayamutu gam sheneihem makhlon vekhilyon vatisha'er ha'ishah mishenei yeladeha umei'ishah. vataqam hi vekhaloteha vatashab misedei mo'ab ki shame'ah bisdeh mo'ab ki faqad ihoh 'et 'amo latet lahem lakhem. vateizei min hamaqom 'asher hayetah shamah ushetei khaloteha 'imah vateilakhnah baderekh lashub 'el 'erez yehudah. vatomer na'omi lishtei khaloteha leikhenah shobenah 'ishah lebet 'imah ya'aseh ya'as ihoh 'imakhem khesed ka'asher 'asitem 'im hameitim ve'imadi. yiten ihoh lakhem umezena menukhah 'ishah bet 'ishah vatishaq lahen vatisenah qolan vatibkenah. vatomarnah lah ki 'itakh nashub le'amekh. vatomer na'omi shobenah benotai lamah teilakhnah 'imi ha'od li banim bemei'ai vehayu lakhem la'anashim. shobenah benotai leikhena ki zaqanti mihyot le'ish ki 'amarti yesh li tiqvah gam hayiti halaylah le'ish vegam yaladti banim. halahen tesabeirenah 'ad 'asher yigdalu halahen tei'ageinah lebilti heyot le'ish 'al benotai ki mar li me'od mikem ki yaze'ah bi yad ihoh. vatisenah qolan vatibkenah 'od vatishaq 'arepah lakhamotah verut dabeqah bah. vatomer hineh shabah yebimtekh 'el 'amah ve'el 'eloheha shubi 'akharei yebimtekh. vatomer rut 'al tifge'i bi le'azebekh lashub mei'akharayikh ki 'el 'asher teilekhi 'eilekh uba'asher talini 'alin 'amekh 'ami veilohayikh 'elohai. ba'asher tamuti 'amut vesham 'eqaber koh ya'aseh ihoh li vekhoh yosif ki hamavet yafrid beini ubeinekh. vateire ki mit'amezet hi lalekhet 'itah vatekhdal ledaber 'eileha. vateilakhnah sheteihem 'ad bo'anah bet lakhem vayhi kebo'anah bet lekhem vateihom kal ha'ir 'aleihen vatomarnah hazot na'omi. vatomer 'aleihen 'al tiqrenah li na'omi qerena li mara ki heimar shadai li me'od. 'ani melei'ah halakhti vereiqam heshibani ihoh lamah tiqrenah li na'omi ihoh 'anah bi veshadai heira' li. vatashab na'omi verut hamo'abiyah khalatah 'imah hashabah misedei mo'ab vehemah ba'u bet lekhem bitkhilat qezir se'orim. ulena'omi meyuda' moda' le'ishah 'ish gibor khayil mimishpakhat 'elimelekh ushemo bo'az. vatomer rut hamo'abiyah 'el na'omi 'eilekhah na hasadeh va'alaqotah bashibolim 'akhar 'asher 'emza khen be'einav vatomer lah lekhi biti. vateilekh vatabo vatelaqet basadeh 'akharei haqozerim vayiqer miqreha khelqat hasadeh lebo'az 'asher mimishpakhat 'elimelekh. vehineh bo'az ba mibet lekhem vayomer laqozrim ihoh 'imakhem vayomeru lo yebarekhkha ihoh. vayomer bo'az lena'aro hanizab 'al haqozrim lemi hana'arah hazot. vaya'an hana'ar hanizab 'al haqozrim vayomar na'arah mo'abiyah hi hashabah 'im na'omi misedeh mo'ab. vatomer 'alaqotah na ve'asafti ba'omarim 'akharei haqozrim vatabo vata'amod mei'az haboqer ve'ad 'atah zeh shibtah habayit me'at. vayomer bo'az 'el rut halo shama'at biti 'al teilekhi lilqot besadeh 'akher vegam lo ta'aburi mizeh vekhoh tidbaqin 'im na'arotai. 'einayikh basadeh 'asher yiqzorun vehalakht 'akhareihen halo ziviti 'et hane'arim lebilti nage'ekh vezamit vehalakht 'el hakeilim veshatit mei'asher yish'abun hane'arim. vatipol 'al paneha vatishtakhu 'arezah vatomer 'eilav madua' mazati khen be'einekha lehakireini ve'anokhi nakheriyah. vaya'an bo'az vayomer lah huged hugad li kol 'asher 'asit 'et khamotekh 'akharei mot 'ishekh vata'azbi 'abikh ve'imekh ve'erez moladtekh vateilekhi 'el 'am 'asher lo yada'at temol shilshom. yeshalem ihoh pa'olekh utehi maskurtekh sheleimah mei'im ihoh 'elohei yisra'el 'asher bat lakhasot takhat kenafav. vatomer 'emza khen be'einekha 'adoni ki nikhamtani vekhi dibarta 'al leb shifkhatekha ve'anokhi lo 'ehyeh ke'akhat shifkhotekha. vayomer lah bo'az le'et ha'okhel goshi halom ve'akhalt min halekhem vetabalt pitekh bakhomez vateisheb mizad haqozrim vayizbat lah qali vatokhal vatisba' vatotar. vataqam lelaqet vayzav bo'az 'et ne'arav leimor gam ben ha'omarim telaqet velo takhlimuha. vegam shol tasholu lah min hazebatim va'azabtem veliqetah velo tig'aru bah. vatelaqet basadeh 'ad ha'areb vatakhbot 'et 'asher liqeitah vayhi ke'eifah se'orim. vatisa vatabo ha'ir vateire khamotah 'et 'asher liqeitah vatozei vatiten lah 'et 'asher hotirah misabe'ah. vatomer lah khamotah 'eifoh liqat hayom ve'anah 'asit yehi makirekh barukh vataged lakhamotah 'et 'asher 'asetah 'imo vatomer shem ha'ish 'asher 'asiti 'imo hayom bo'az. vatomer na'omi lekhalatah barukh hu ihoh 'asher lo 'azab khasdo 'et hakhayim ve'et hameitim vatomer lah na'omi qarob lanu ha'ish migo'aleinu hu. vatomer rut hamo'abiyah gam ki 'amar 'eilai 'im hane'arim 'asher li tidbaqin 'ad 'im kilu 'et kal haqazir 'asher li. vatomer na'omi 'el rut kalatah tob biti ki teize'i 'im na'arotav velo yifge'u bakh besadeh 'akher. vatidbaq bena'arot bo'az lelaqet 'ad kelot qezir hase'orim uqezir hakhitim vateisheb 'et khamotah. vatomer lah na'omi khamotah biti halo 'abaqesh lakh manoakh 'asher yitab lakh. ve'atah halo bo'az moda'tanu 'asher hayit 'et na'arotav hineh hu zoreh 'et goren hase'orim halayelah. verakhazt vasakht vesamt simlotekh simlotayikh 'alayikh veyaradti veyaradt hagoren 'al tivade'i la'ish 'ad kaloto le'ekhol velishtot. vihi beshakhebo veyada'at 'et hamaqom 'asher yishkab sham ubat vegilit margelotav veshakhabeti veshakhabet vehu yagid lakh 'et 'asher ta'asin. vatomer 'eileha kol 'asher tomeri 'eilai 'e'eseh. vateired hagoren vata'as kekhol 'asher zivatah khamotah. vayokhal bo'az vayeishet vayitab libo vayabo lishkab biqzeh ha'areimah vatabo balat vategal margelotav vatishkab. vayhi bakhazi halaylah vayekherad ha'ish vayilafet vehineh 'ishah shokhebet margelotav. vayomer mi 'at vatomer 'anokhi rut 'amatekha ufarasta khenafekha 'al 'amatekha ki go'el 'atah. vayomer berukhah 'at ihoh biti heitabt khasdekh ha'akharon min harishon lebilti lekhet 'akharei habakhurim 'im dal ve'im 'ashir. ve'atah biti 'al tire'i kol 'asher tomeri 'e'eseh lakh ki yodeia' kal sha'ar 'ami ki 'eishet khayil 'at. ve'atah ki 'amenam ki 'im go'el 'anokhi vegam yesh go'el qarob mimeni. lini halaylah vehayah baboqer 'im yig'alekh tob yig'al ve'im lo yakhpoz lega'olekh uge'altikh 'anokhi khai ihoh shikhbi 'ad haboqer. vatishkab margelatav margelotav 'ad haboqer vataqam bitrom beterem yakir 'ish 'et rei'eihu vayomer 'al yivada' ki ba'ah ha'ishah hagoren. vayomer habi hamitpakhat 'asher 'alayikh ve'ekhozi bah vatokhez bah vayamad shesh se'orim vayashet 'aleha vayabo ha'ir. vatabo 'el khamotah vatomer mi 'at biti vataged lah 'et kal 'asher 'asah lah ha'ish. vatomer shesh hase'orim ha'eleh natan li ki 'amar 'eilai 'al tabo'i reiqam 'el khamotekh. vatomer shebi biti 'ad 'asher teide'in 'ekh yipol dabar ki lo yishqot ha'ish ki 'im kilah hadabar hayom. ubo'az 'alah hasha'ar vayeisheb sham vehineh hago'el 'ober 'asher diber bo'az vayomer surah shebah poh peloni 'almoni vayasar vayeisheb. vayiqakh 'asarah 'anashim miziqnei ha'ir vayomer shebu foh vayeisheibu. vayomer lago'el khelqat hasadeh 'asher le'akhinu le'elimelekh makherah na'omi hashabah misedeh mo'ab. va'ani 'amarti 'egleh 'azenekha leimor qeneh neged hayoshebim veneged ziqnei 'ami 'im tig'al ge'al ve'im lo yig'al hagidah li ve'eida' ve'eide'ah ki 'en zulatekha lig'ol ve'anokhi 'akharekha vayomer 'anokhi 'eg'al. vayomer bo'az beyom qenotkha hasadeh miyad na'omi umei'et rut hamo'abiyah 'eishet hamet qaniti qanitah lehaqim shem hamet 'al nakhalato. vayomer hago'el lo 'ukhal lig'ol lig'al pen 'ashkhit 'et nakhalati ge'al lekha 'atah 'et ge'ulati ki lo 'ukhal lig'ol. vezot lefanim beyisra'el 'al hage'ulah ve'al hatemurah leqayem kal dabar shalaf 'ish na'alo venatan lerei'eihu vezot hate'udah beyisra'el. vayomer hago'el lebo'az qeneh lakh vayishlof na'alo. vayomer bo'az lazeqeinim vekhal ha'am 'eidim 'atem hayom ki qaniti 'et kal 'asher le'elimelekh ve'et kal 'asher lekhilyon umakhlon miyad na'omi. vegam 'et rut hamo'abiyah 'eishet makhlon qaniti li le'ishah lehaqim shem hamet 'al nakhalato velo yikaret shem hamet mei'im 'ekhav umisha'ar meqomo 'eidim 'atem hayom. vayomeru kal ha'am 'asher basha'ar vehazeqeinim 'eidim yiten ihoh 'et ha'ishah haba'ah 'el beitekha kerakhel ukhelei'ah 'asher banu sheteihem 'et bet yisra'el va'aseh khayil be'efratah uqera shem bebet lakhem. vihi beitekha kebet perez 'asher yaledah tamar lihudah min hazera' 'asher yiten ihoh lekha min hana'arah hazot. vayiqakh bo'az 'et rut vatehi lo le'ishah vayabo 'eileha vayiten ihoh lah heirayon vateiled ben. vatomarnah hanashim 'el na'omi barukh ihoh 'asher lo hishbit lakh go'el hayom veyiqarei shemo beyisra'el. vehayah lakh lemeishib nefesh ulekhalkel 'et seibatekh ki khalatekh 'asher 'aheibatekh yeladatu 'asher hi tobah lakh mishib'ah banim. vatiqakh na'omi 'et hayeled vateshiteihu bekheiqah vatehi lo le'omenet. vatiqrenah lo hashekheinot shem leimor yulad ben lena'omi vatiqrenah shemo 'obed hu 'abi yishai 'abi david. ve'eleh toldot parez perez holid 'et khezron. vekhezron holid 'et ram veram holid 'et 'aminadab. ve'aminadab holid 'et nakhshon venakhshon holid 'et salmah. vesalmon holid 'et bo'az ubo'az holid 'et 'obed. ve'obed holid 'et yishai veyishai holid 'et david.

'eikhah yashebah badad ha'ir rabati 'am hayetah ke'almanah rabati bagoyim sarati bamedinot hayetah lamas. bakho tibkeh balaylah vedim'atah 'al lekheyah 'en lah menakhem mikal 'ohabeha kal rei'eha bagedu bah hayu lah le'oyebim. galetah yehudah mei'oni umeirob 'abodah hi yashebah bagoyim lo maze'ah manoakh kal rodefeha hisiguha ben hamezarim. darkhei ziyon 'abeilot mibeli ba'ei mo'ed kal she'areha shomeimin kohaneha ne'enakhim betuloteha nugot vehi mar lah. hayu zareha lerosh 'oyebeha shalu ki ihoh hogah 'al rob pesha'eha 'olaleha halekhu shebi lifnei zar. vayeizei min bat mibat ziyon kal hadarah hayu sareha ke'ayalim lo maze'u mir'eh vayeilekhu belo khoakh lifnei rodef. zakherah yerushalim yemei 'aneyah umerudeha kol makhamudeha 'asher hayu mimei qedem binfol 'amah beyad zar ve'en 'ozer lah ra'uha zarim sakhaqu 'al mishbateha. khet khate'ah yerushalim 'al ken lenidah hayatah kal mekhabedeha hiziluha ki ra'u 'ervatah gam hi ne'enkhah vatashab 'akhor. tum'atah beshuleha lo zakherah 'akharitah vateired pela'im 'en menakhem lah re'eh ihoh 'et 'aneyi ki higdil 'oyeb. yado paras zar 'al kal makhamadeha ki ra'atah goyim ba'u miqdashah 'asher zivitah lo yabo'u baqahal lakh. kal 'amah ne'enakhim mebaqeshim lekhem natenu makhamodeihem makhamadeihem be'okhel lehashib nafesh re'eh ihoh vehabitah ki hayiti zoleilah. lo 'aleikhem kal 'oberei derekh habitu ure'u 'im yesh makh'ob kemakh'obi 'asher 'olal li 'asher hogah ihoh beyom kharon 'apo. mimarom shalakh 'esh be'azmotai vayirdenah paras reshet leraglai heshibani 'akhor netanani shomeimah kal hayom davah. nisqad 'ol pesha'ai beyado yistaregu 'alu 'al zavari hikhshil kokhi netanani 'adonai bidei lo 'ukhal qum. silah khal 'abirai 'adonai beqirbi qara 'alai mo'ed lishbor bakhurai gat darakh 'adonai libtulat bat yehudah. 'al 'eleh 'ani bokhiyah 'eini 'eini yoredah mayim ki rakhaq mimeni menakhem meishib nafshi hayu banai shomeimim ki gabar 'oyeb. peiresah ziyon beyadeha 'en menakhem lah zivah ihoh leya'aqob sebibav zarav hayetah yerushalim lenidah beineihem. zadiq hu ihoh ki fihu mariti shim'u na khal 'amim ha'amim ure'u makh'obi betulotai ubakhurai halekhu bashebi. qarati lam'ahabai hemah rimuni kohanai uzeqeinai ba'ir gava'u ki biqshu 'okhel lamo veyashibu 'et nafsham. re'eh ihoh ki zar li mei'ai khomarmaru nehpakh libi beqirbi ki maro mariti mikhuz shikelah khereb babayit kamavet. shame'u ki ne'enakhah 'ani 'en menakhem li kal 'oyebai shame'u ra'ati sasu ki 'atah 'asita heibeita yom qarata veyihyu khamoni. tabo khal ra'atam lefanekha ve'olel lamo ka'asher 'olalta li 'al kal pesha'ai ki rabot 'ankhotai velibi davai. 'eikhah ya'ib be'apo 'adonai 'et bat ziyon hishlikh mishamayim 'erez tif'eret yisra'el velo zakhar hadom raglav beyom 'apo. bila' 'adonai lo velo khamal 'et kal ne'ot ya'aqob haras be'ebrato mibzerei bat yehudah higia' la'arez khilel mamlakhah vesareha. gada' bakhori 'af kol qeren yisra'el heishib 'akhor yemino mipenei 'oyeb vayib'ar beya'aqob ke'esh lehabah 'akhelah sabib. darakh qashto ke'oyeb nizab yemino kezar vayaharog kol makhamadei 'ayin be'ohel bat ziyon shafakh ka'esh khamato. hayah 'adonai ke'oyeb bila' yisra'el bila' kal 'armenoteha shikhet mibzarav vayereb bebat yehudah ta'aniyah va'aniyah. vayakhmos kagan suko shikhet mo'ado shikakh ihoh beziyon mo'ed veshabat vayin'az beza'am 'apo melekh vekhohen. zanakh 'adonai mizbekho ni'er miqdasho hisgir beyad 'oyeb khomot 'armenoteha qol natenu bebet ihoh keyom mo'ed. khashab ihoh lehashkhit khomat bat ziyon natah qav lo heishib yado mibaleia' vaya'abel khel vekhomah yakhdav 'umlalu. tabe'u ba'arez she'areha 'ibad veshibar berikheha malkah vesareha bagoyim 'en torah gam nebi'eha lo maze'u khazon ihoh. yeishebu la'arez yidemu ziqnei bat ziyon he'elu 'afar 'al rosham khageru saqim horidu la'arez roshan betulot yerushalim. kalu badema'ot 'einai khomarmeru mei'ai nishpakh la'arez kebeidi 'al sheber bat 'ami bei'atef 'olel veyoneq birkhobot qiryah. le'imotam yomeru 'ayeh dagan vayayin behit'atefam kekhalal birkhobot 'ir behishtapekh nafsham 'el kheq 'imotam. mah 'a'idekh mah 'adameh lakh habat yerushalim mah 'ashveh lakh va'anakhamekh betulat bat ziyon ki gadol kayam shibrekh mi yirpa lakh. nebi'ayikh khazu lakh shav vetafel velo gilu 'al 'avonekh lehashib shebitekh shebutekh vayekhezu lakh mas'ot shav umadukhim. safequ 'alayikh kapayim kal 'oberei derekh sharequ vayani'u rosham 'al bat yerushalim hazot ha'ir sheyomeru kelilat yofi masos lekhal ha'arez. pazu 'alayikh pihem kal 'oybayikh sharequ vayakharqu shen 'ameru bila'enu 'akh zeh hayom sheqivinuhu mazanu ra'inu. 'asah ihoh 'asher zamam biza' 'emrato 'asher zivah mimei qedem haras velo khamal vaysamakh 'alayikh 'oyeb heirim qeren zarayikh. za'aq libam 'el 'adonai khomat bat ziyon horidi khanakhal dim'ah yomam valaylah 'al titeni fugat lakh 'al tidom bat 'einekh. qumi roni balayil balaylah lerosh 'ashmurot shifkhi khamayim libekh nokhakh penei 'adonai se'i 'eilav kapayikh 'al nefesh 'olalayikh ha'atufim bera'ab berosh kal khuzot. re'eh ihoh vehabitah lemi 'olalta koh 'im tokhalnah nashim piryam 'olalei tipukhim 'im yeihareg bemiqdash 'adonai kohen venabi. shakhebu la'arez khuzot na'ar vezaqen betulotai ubakhurai nafelu bekhareb haragta beyom 'apekha tabakhta lo khamaleta. tiqra kheyom mo'ed megurai misabib velo hayah beyom 'af ihoh palit vesarid 'asher tipakhti veribiti 'oyebi khilam. 'ani hageber ra'ah 'oni besheibet 'ebrato. 'oti nahag vayolakh khoshekh velo 'or. 'akh bi yashub yahafokh yado kal hayom. bilah besari ve'ori shibar 'azmotai. banah 'alai vayaqaf rosh utela'ah. bemakhashakim hoshibani kemeitei 'olam. gadar ba'adi velo 'eizei hikhbid nekhasheti. gam ki 'ez'aq va'ashaveia' satam tefilati. gadar derakhai begazit netibotai 'ivah. dob 'oreb hu li 'aryeh 'ari bemistarim. derakhai sorer vayfashekheini samani shomem. darakh qashto vayazibeini kamatara lakhez. heibi bekhilyotai benei 'ashpato. hayiti sekhoq lekhal 'ami neginatam kal hayom. hisbi'ani bamerorim hirvani la'anah. vayagres bekhazaz shinai hikhpishani ba'eifer. vatiznakh mishalom nafshi nashiti tobah. va'omar 'abad nizkhi vetokhalti ihoh. zekhar 'aneyi umerudi la'anah varosh. zakhor tizkor vetashiakh vetashoakh 'alai nafshi. zot 'ashib 'el libi 'al ken 'okhil. khasdei ihoh ki lo tamenu ki lo khalu rakhamav. khadashim labeqarim rabah 'emunatekha. khelqi ihoh 'amerah nafshi 'al ken 'okhil lo. tob ihoh leqoav lenefesh tidreshenu. tob veyakhil vedumam litshu'at ihoh. tob lageber ki yisa 'ol bin'urav. yeisheb badad veyidom ki natal 'alav. yiten be'afar pihu 'ulai yesh tiqvah. yiten lemakeihu lekhi yisba' bekherpah. ki lo yiznakh le'olam 'adonai. ki 'im hogah verikham kerob khasdo khasadav. ki lo 'inah milibo vayageh benei 'ish. ledakei takhat raglav kol 'asirei 'arez. lehatot mishpat gaber neged penei 'elyon. le'avet 'adam beribo 'adonai lo ra'ah. mi zeh 'amar vatehi 'adonai lo zivah. mipi 'elyon lo teizei hara'ot vehatob. mah yit'onen 'adam khai geber 'al khet'o khata'av. nakhpesah derakheinu venakhqorah venashubah 'ad ihoh. nisa lebabeinu 'el kapayim 'el 'el bashamayim. nakhnu fasha'nu umarinu 'atah lo salakheta. sakotah ba'af vatirdefeinu haragta lo khamaleta. sakotah be'anan lakh mei'abor tefilah. sekhi uma'os tesimeinu beqereb ha'amim. pazu 'aleinu pihem kal 'oyebeinu. pakhad vafakhat hayah lanu hashet vehashaber. palgei mayim teirad 'eini 'al sheber bat 'ami. 'eini nigerah velo tidmeh mei'en hafugot. 'ad yashqif veyeire ihoh mishamayim. 'eini 'olah lenafshi mikol benot 'iri. zod zaduni kazipor 'oyebai khinam. zametu babor khayai vayadu 'eben bi. zafu mayim 'al roshi 'amarti nigzareti. qarati shimkha ihoh mibor takhtiyot. qoli shama'eta 'al ta'lem 'azenekha leravkhati leshav'ati. qarabta beyom 'eqra'eka 'amarta 'al tira. rabta 'adonai ribei nafshi ga'alta khayai. ra'itah ihoh 'avatati shafetah mishpati. ra'itah kal niqmatam kal makhshebotam li. shama'ta kherpatam ihoh kal makhshebotam 'alai. siftei qamai vehegyonam 'alai kal hayom. shibtam veqimatam habitah 'ani manginatam. tashib lahem gemul ihoh kema'aseh yedeihem. titen lahem meginat leb ta'alatekha lahem. tirdof be'af vetashmidem mitakhat shemei ihoh. 'eikhah yu'am zahab yishne haketem hatob tishtapeikhenah 'abnei qodesh berosh kal khuzot. benei ziyon hayqarim hamsula'im bapaz 'eikhah nekhshebu leniblei kheres ma'aseh yedei yozer. gam tanin tanim khalezu shad heiniqu gureihen bat 'ami le'akhzar ki 'einim kai'einim bamidbar. dabaq leshon yoneq 'el khiko bazama 'olalim sha'alu lekhem pores 'en lahem. ha'okhelim lema'adanim nashamu bakhuzot ha'emunim 'alei tola' khibequ 'ashpatot. vayigdal 'avon bat 'ami meikhatat sedom hahafukhah khemo raga' velo khalu bah yadayim. zaku nezireha misheleg zakhu meikhalab 'ademu 'ezem mipeninim sapir gizratam. khashakh mishekhor ta'oram lo nikeru bakhuzot zafad 'oram 'al 'azmam yabesh hayah kha'ez. tobim hayu khalei khereb meikhalei ra'ab shehem yazubu meduqarim mitenubot sadai. yedei nashim rakhamaniyot bishelu yaldeihen hayu lebarot lamo besheber bat 'ami. kilah ihoh 'et khamato shafakh kharon 'apo vayazet 'esh beziyon vatokhal yesodoteha. lo he'eminu malkhei 'erez vekhol kol yoshebei teibel ki yabo zar ve'oyeb besha'arei yerushalim. meikhatot nebi'eha 'avonot kohaneha hashofekhim beqirbah dam zadiqim. na'u 'ivrim bakhuzot nego'alu badam belo yukhelu yige'u bilbusheihem. suru tamei qare'u lamo suru suru 'al tiga'u ki nazu gam na'u 'ameru bagoyim lo yosifu lagur. penei ihoh khileqam lo yosif lehabitam penei khohanim lo nasa'u zeqeinim uzeqeinim lo khananu. 'odeinah 'odeinu tikhlenah 'eineinu 'el 'ezrateinu habel bezipiyateinu zipinu 'el go lo yoshia'. zadu ze'adeinu milekhet birkhoboteinu qarab qizeinu male'u yameinu ki ba qizeinu. qalim hayu rodefeinu minishrei shamayim 'al heharim delaqunu bamidbar 'arebu lanu. ruakh 'apeinu meshiakh ihoh nilkad bishkhitotam 'asher 'amarnu bezilo nikhyeh bagoyim. sisi vesimkhi bat 'edom yoshabti yoshebet be'erez 'uz gam 'alayikh ta'abar kos tishkeri vetit'ari. tam 'avonekh bat ziyon lo yosif lehaglotekh paqad 'avonekh bat 'edom gilah 'al khatotayikh. zekhor ihoh meh hayah lanu habet habitah ure'eh 'et kherpateinu. nakhalateinu nehefkhah lezarim bateinu lenakherim. yetomim hayinu 'en ve'en 'ab 'imoteinu ke'almanot. meimeinu bekhesef shatinu 'eizeinu bimkhir yabo'u. 'al zavareinu nirdafenu yaga'nu lo velo hunakh lanu. mizrayim natanu yad 'ashur lisboa' lakhem. 'aboteinu khate'u 'einam ve'einam 'anakhnu va'anakhnu 'avonoteihem sabalenu. 'abadim mashelu banu poreq 'en miyadam. benafsheinu nabi lakhmeinu mipenei khereb hamidbar. 'oreinu ketanur nikhmaru mipenei zal'afot ra'ab. nashim beziyon 'inu betulot be'arei yehudah. sarim beyadam nitlu penei zeqeinim lo nehdaru. bakhurim tekhon nasa'u une'arim ba'ez kashalu. zeqeinim misha'ar shabatu bakhurim mineginatam. shabat mesos libeinu nehpakh le'eibel mekholeinu. nafelah 'ateret rosheinu 'o na lanu ki khatanu. 'al zeh hayah daveh libeinu 'al 'eleh khashekhu 'eineinu. 'al har ziyon sheshamem shu'alim hilekhu bo. 'atah ihoh le'olam teisheb kis'akha ledor vador. lamah lanezakh tishkakheinu ta'azbeinu le'orekh yamim. hashibeinu ihoh 'eilekha venashub venashubah khadesh yameinu keqedem. ki 'im ma'os me'astanu qazafta 'aleinu 'ad me'od.

dibrei qohelet ben david melekh birushalim. habel habalim 'amar qohelet habel habalim hakol habel. mah yitron la'adam bekhal 'amalo sheya'amol takhat hashamesh. dor holekh vedor ba veha'arez le'olam 'omadet. vezarakh hashemesh uba hashamesh ve'el meqomo sho'ef zoreiakh hu sham. holekh 'el darom vesobeb 'el zafon sobeb sobeb holekh haruakh ve'al sebibotav shab haruakh. kal hanekhalim holekhim 'el hayam vehayam 'einenu malei 'el meqom shehanekhalim holekhim sham hem shabim lalakhet. kal hadebarim yegei'im lo yukhal 'ish ledaber lo tisba' 'ayin lir'ot velo timalei 'ozen mishemoa'. mah shehayah hu sheyihyeh umah shena'asah hu sheyei'aseh ve'en kal khadash takhat hashamesh. yesh dabar sheyomar re'eh zeh khadash hu kebar hayah le'olamim 'asher hayah milefaneinu. 'en zikhron larishonim vegam la'akharonim sheyihyu lo yihyeh lahem zikaron 'im sheyihyu la'akharonah. 'ani qohelet hayiti melekh 'al yisra'el birushalim. venatati 'et libi lidrosh velatur bakhakhemah 'al kal 'asher na'asah takhat hashamayim hu 'inyan ra' natan 'elohim libnei ha'adam la'anot bo. ra'iti 'et kal hama'asim shena'asu takhat hashamesh vehineh hakol hebel ure'ut ruakh. me'uvat lo yukhal litqon vekhesron lo yukhal lehimanot. dibarti 'ani 'im libi leimor 'ani hineh higdalti vehosafti khakhmah 'al kal 'asher hayah lefanai 'al yerushalim velibi ra'ah harbeh khakhmah vada'at. va'etenah libi lada'at khakhmah veda'at holeilot vesikhlut yada'ti shegam zeh hu ra'yon ruakh. ki berob khakhmah rab ka'as veyosif da'at yosif makh'ob. 'amarti 'ani belibi lekhah na 'anasekhah besimkhah ure'eh betob vehineh gam hu habel. liskhoq 'amarti meholal ulesimkhah mah zoh 'osah. tarti belibi limshokh bayayin 'et besari velibi noheg bakhakhemah vele'ekhoz besikhlut 'ad 'asher 'er'eh 'ei zeh tob libnei ha'adam 'asher ya'asu takhat hashamayim mispar yemei khayeihem. higdalti ma'asai baniti li batim nata'ti li keramim. 'asiti li ganot ufardeisim venata'ti bahem 'ez kal peri. 'asiti li bereikhot mayim lehashqot meihem ya'ar zomeiakh 'eizim. qaniti 'abadim ushefakhot ubenei bayit hayah li gam miqneh baqar vazon harbeh hayah li mikol shehayu lefanai birushalim. kanasti li gam kesef vezahab usegulat melakhim vehamedinot 'asiti li sharim vesharot veta'anugot benei ha'adam shidah veshidot. vegadalti vehosafti mikol shehayah lefanai birushalim 'af khakhemati 'amedah li. vekhol 'asher sha'alu 'einai lo 'azalti meihem lo mana'ti 'et libi mikal simkhah ki libi sameiakh mikal 'amali vezeh hayah khelqi mikal 'amali. ufaniti 'ani bekhal ma'asai she'asu yadai ube'amal she'amalti la'asot vehineh hakol hebel ure'ut ruakh ve'en yitron takhat hashamesh. ufaniti 'ani lir'ot khakhmah veholeilot vesikhlut ki meh ha'adam sheyabo 'akharei hamelekh 'et 'asher kebar 'asuhu. vera'iti 'ani sheyesh yitron lakhakhemah min hasikhlut kiteron ha'or min hakhoshekh. hekhakham 'einav berosho vehakesil bakhoshekh holekh veyada'ti gam 'ani shemiqreh 'ekhad yiqreh 'et kulam. ve'amarti 'ani belibi kemiqreh hakesil gam 'ani yiqreini velamah khakhamti 'ani 'az yoter vedibarti belibi shegam zeh habel. ki 'en zikhron lekhakham 'im hakesil le'olam beshekebar hayamim haba'im hakol nishkakh ve'ekh yamut hekhakham 'im hakesil. vesaneiti 'et hakhayim ki ra' 'alai hama'aseh shena'asah takhat hashamesh ki hakol hebel ure'ut ruakh. vesaneiti 'ani 'et kal 'amali she'ani 'amel takhat hashamesh she'anikhenu la'adam sheyihyeh 'akharai. umi yodeia' hekhakham yihyeh 'o sakhal veyishlat bekhal 'amali she'amalti veshekhakhamti takhat hashamesh gam zeh habel. vesaboti 'ani leya'esh 'et libi 'al kal he'amal she'amalti takhat hashamesh. ki yesh 'adam she'amalo bekhakhemah ubeda'at ubekhishron ule'adam shelo 'amal bo yitenenu khelqo gam zeh hebel vera'ah rabah. ki meh hoeh la'adam bekhal 'amalo ubera'yon libo shehu 'amel takhat hashamesh. ki khal yamav makh'obim vakha'as 'inyano gam balaylah lo shakhab libo gam zeh hebel hu. 'en tob ba'adam sheyokhal veshatah veher'ah 'et nafsho tob ba'amalo gam zoh ra'iti 'ani ki miyad ha'elohim hi. ki mi yokhal umi yakhush khuz mimeni. ki le'adam shetob lefanav natan khakhmah veda'at vesimkhah velakhote natan 'inyan le'esof velikhnos latet letob lifnei ha'elohim gam zeh hebel ure'ut ruakh. lakol zeman ve'et lekhal kheifez takhat hashamayim. 'et laledet ve'et lamut 'et lata'at ve'et la'aqor natua'. 'et laharog ve'et lirpo 'et lifroz ve'et libnot. 'et libkot ve'et liskhoq 'et sefod ve'et reqod. 'et lehashlikh 'abanim ve'et kenos 'abanim 'et lakhaboq ve'et lirkhoq meikhabeq. 'et lebaqesh ve'et le'abed 'et lishmor ve'et lehashlikh. 'et liqroa' ve'et litpor 'et lakhashot ve'et ledaber. 'et le'ehob ve'et lisno 'et milkhamah ve'et shalom. mah yitron ha'oseh ba'asher hu 'amel. ra'iti 'et ha'inyan 'asher natan 'elohim libnei ha'adam la'anot bo. 'et hakol 'asah yafeh be'ito gam 'et ha'olam natan belibam mibeli 'asher lo yimza ha'adam 'et hama'aseh 'asher 'asah ha'elohim meirosh ve'ad sof. yada'ti ki 'en tob bam ki 'im lismoakh vela'asot tob bekhayav. vegam kal ha'adam sheyokhal veshatah vera'ah tob bekhal 'amalo matat 'elohim hi. yada'ti ki kal 'asher ya'aseh ha'elohim hu yihyeh le'olam 'alav 'en lehosif umimenu 'en ligroa' veha'elohim 'asah sheyir'u milefanav. mah shehayah kebar hu va'asher lihyot kebar hayah veha'elohim yebaqesh 'et nirdaf. ve'od ra'iti takhat hashamesh meqom hamishpat shamah haresha' umeqom hazedeq shamah harasha'. 'amarti 'ani belibi 'et hazadiq ve'et harasha' yishpot ha'elohim ki 'et lekhal kheifez ve'al kal hama'aseh sham. 'amarti 'ani belibi 'al dibrat benei ha'adam lebaram ha'elohim velir'ot shehem beheimah hemah lahem. ki miqreh benei ha'adam umiqreh habeheimah umiqreh 'ekhad lahem kemot zeh ken mot zeh veruakh 'ekhad lakol umotar ha'adam min habeheimah 'ayin ki hakol habel. hakol holekh 'el maqom 'ekhad hakol hayah min he'afar vehakol shab 'el he'afar. mi yodeia' ruakh benei ha'adam ha'olah hi lema'elah veruakh habeheimah hayoredet hi lematah la'arez. vera'iti ki 'en tob mei'asher yismakh ha'adam bema'asav ki hu khelqo ki mi yebi'enu lir'ot bemeh sheyihyeh 'akharav. veshabti 'ani va'er'eh 'et kal ha'ashuqim 'asher na'asim takhat hashamesh vehineh dim'at ha'ashuqim ve'en lahem menakhem umiyad 'osheqeihem koakh ve'en lahem menakhem. veshabeiakh 'ani 'et hameitim shekebar meitu min hakhayim 'asher hemah khayim 'adenah. vetob misheneihem 'et 'asher 'aden lo hayah 'asher lo ra'ah 'et hama'aseh hara' 'asher na'asah takhat hashamesh. vera'iti 'ani 'et kal 'amal ve'et kal kishron hama'aseh ki hi qin'at 'ish meirei'eihu gam zeh hebel ure'ut ruakh. hakesil khobeq 'et yadav ve'okhel 'et besaro. tob melo khaf nakhat mimelo khafenayim 'amal ure'ut ruakh. veshabti 'ani va'er'eh hebel takhat hashamesh. yesh 'ekhad ve'en sheini gam ben va'akh 'en lo ve'en qez lekhal 'amalo gam 'einav 'eino lo tisba' 'osher ulemi 'ani 'amel umekhaser 'et nafshi mitobah gam zeh hebel ve'inyan ra' hu. tobim hashenayim min ha'ekhad 'asher yesh lahem sakhar tob ba'amalam. ki 'im yipolu ha'ekhad yaqim 'et khabeiro ve'ilo ha'ekhad sheyipol ve'en sheini lahaqimo. gam 'im yishkebu shenayim vekham lahem ule'ekhad 'ekh yeikham. ve'im yitqefo ha'ekhad hashenayim ya'amdu negdo vehakhut hamshulash lo bimheirah yinateq. tob yeled misken vekhakham mimelekh zaqen ukhesil 'asher lo yada' lehizaher 'od. ki mibet hasurim yaza limlokh ki gam bemalkhuto nolad rash. ra'iti 'et kal hakhayim hamhalekhim takhat hashamesh 'im hayeled hasheini 'asher ya'amod takhtav. 'en qez lekhal ha'am lekhol 'asher hayah lifneihem gam ha'akharonim lo yismekhu bo ki gam zeh hebel vera'yon ruakh. shemor raglekha raglekha ka'asher teilekh 'el bet ha'elohim veqarob lishmoa' mitet hakesilim zabakh ki 'einam yod'im la'asot ra'. 'al tebahel 'al pikha velibekha 'al yemaher lehozi dabar lifnei ha'elohim ki ha'elohim bashamayim ve'atah 'al ha'arez 'al ken yihyu debarekha me'atim. ki ba hakhalom berob 'inyan veqol kesil berob debarim. ka'asher tidor neder leilohim 'al te'akher leshalemo ki 'en kheifez bakesilim 'et 'asher tidor shalem. tob 'asher lo tidor mishetidor velo teshalem. 'al titen 'et pikha lakhati 'et besarekha ve'al tomar lifnei hamal'akh ki shegagah hi lamah yiqzof ha'elohim 'al qolekha vekhibel 'et ma'aseh yadekha. ki berob khalomot vahabalim udebarim harbeh ki 'et ha'elohim yera. 'im 'osheq rash vegeizel mishpat vazedeq tir'eh bamedinah 'al titmah 'al hakheifez ki gaboah mei'al gaboah shomer ugebohim 'aleihem. veyitron 'erez bakol hi hu melekh lesadeh ne'ebad. 'oheb kesef lo yisba' kesef umi 'oheb behamon lo tebu'ah gam zeh habel. birbot hatobah rabu 'okhleha umah kishron lib'aleha ki 'im re'iyat re'ut 'einav. metuqah shenat ha'obed 'im me'at ve'im harbeh yokhel vehasaba' le'ashir 'einenu maniakh lo lishon. yesh ra'ah kholah ra'iti takhat hashamesh 'osher shamur lib'alav lera'ato. ve'abad ha'osher hahu be'inyan ra' veholid ben ve'en beyado me'umah. ka'asher yaza mibeten 'imo 'arom yashub lalekhet kesheba ume'umah lo yisa ba'amalo sheyolekh beyado. vegam zoh ra'ah kholah kal 'umat sheba ken yeilekh umah yitron lo sheya'amol laruakh. gam kal yamav bakhoshekh yokhel vekha'as harbeh vekhaleyo vaqazef. hineh 'asher ra'iti 'ani tob 'asher yafeh le'ekhol velishtot velir'ot tobah bekhal 'amalo sheya'amol takhat hashemesh mispar yemei khayav khayav 'asher natan lo ha'elohim ki hu khelqo. gam kal ha'adam 'asher natan lo ha'elohim 'osher unekhasim vehishlito le'ekhol mimenu velaset 'et khelqo velismoakh ba'amalo zoh matat 'elohim hi. ki lo harbeh yizkor 'et yemei khayav ki ha'elohim ma'aneh besimkhat libo. yesh ra'ah 'asher ra'iti takhat hashamesh verabah hi 'al ha'adam. 'ish 'asher yiten lo ha'elohim 'osher unekhasim vekhabod ve'einenu khaser lenafsho mikol 'asher yit'aveh velo yashlitenu ha'elohim le'ekhol mimenu ki 'ish nakheri yokhalenu zeh hebel vakholi ra' hu. 'im yolid 'ish mei'ah veshanim rabot yikhyeh verab sheyihyu yemei shanav venafsho lo tisba' min hatobah vegam qeburah lo hayetah lo 'amarti tob mimenu hanafel. ki bahebel ba ubakhoshekh yeilekh ubakhoshekh shemo yekhuseh. gam shemesh lo ra'ah velo yada' nakhat lazeh mizeh. ve'ilu khayah 'elef shanim pa'amayim vetobah lo ra'ah halo 'el maqom 'ekhad hakol holekh. kal 'amal ha'adam lefihu vegam hanefesh lo timalei. ki mah yoter lekhakham min hakesil mah le'ani yodeia' lahalokh neged hakhayim. tob mar'eh 'einayim meihalakh nafesh gam zeh hebel ure'ut ruakh. mah shehayah kebar niqra shemo venoda' 'asher hu 'adam velo yukhal ladin 'im shehatqif shetaqif mimenu. ki yesh debarim harbeh marbim habel mah yoter la'adam. ki mi yodeia' mah tob la'adam bakhayim mispar yemei khayei heblo veya'asem kazel 'asher mi yagid la'adam mah yihyeh 'akharav takhat hashamesh. tob shem mishemen tob veyom hamavet miyom hivaledo. tob lalekhet 'el bet 'eibel milekhet 'el bet mishteh ba'asher hu sof kal ha'adam vehakhai yiten 'el libo. tob ka'as misekhoq ki beroa' panim yitab leb. leb khakhamim bebet 'eibel veleb kesilim bebet simkhah. tob lishmoa' ga'arat khakham mei'ish shomeia' shir kesilim. ki kheqol hasirim takhat hasir ken sekhoq hakesil vegam zeh habel. ki ha'osheq yeholel khakham vi'abed 'et leb matanah. tob 'akharit dabar meireishito tob 'erekh ruakh migebah ruakh. 'al tebahel berukhakha likh'os ki kha'as bekheq kesilim yanuakh. 'al tomar meh hayah shehayamim harishonim hayu tobim mei'eleh ki lo meikhakhemah sha'alta 'al zeh. tobah khakhmah 'im nakhalah veyoter lero'ei hashamesh. ki bezel hakhakhemah bezel hakasef veyitron da'at hakhakhemah tekhayeh be'aleha. re'eh 'et ma'aseh ha'elohim ki mi yukhal letaqen 'et 'asher 'iveto. beyom tobah heyeh betob ubeyom ra'ah re'eh gam 'et zeh le'umat zeh 'asah ha'elohim 'al dibrat shelo yimza ha'adam 'akharav me'umah. 'et hakol ra'iti bimei hebli yesh zadiq 'obed bezidqo veyesh rasha' ma'arikh bera'ato. 'al tehi zadiq harbeh ve'al titkhakam yoter lamah tishomem. 'al tirsha' harbeh ve'al tehi sakhal lamah tamut belo 'itekha. tob 'asher te'ekhoz bazeh vegam mizeh 'al tanakh 'et yadekha ki yerei 'elohim yeizei 'et kulam. hakhakhemah ta'oz lekhakham mei'asarah shalitim 'asher hayu ba'ir. ki 'adam 'en zadiq ba'arez 'asher ya'aseh tob velo yekheta. gam lekhal hadebarim 'asher yedabeiru 'al titen libekha 'asher lo tishma' 'et 'abdekha meqalekha. ki gam pe'amim rabot yada' libekha 'asher gam 'at 'atah qilalta 'akheirim. kal zoh nisiti bakhakhemah 'amarti 'ekhkamah vehi rekhoqah mimeni. rakhoq mah shehayah ve'amoq 'amoq mi yimza'enu. saboti 'ani velibi lada'at velatur ubaqesh khakhmah vekheshbon velada'at resha' kesel vehasikhlut holeilot. umoze 'ani mar mimavet 'et ha'ishah 'asher hi mezodim vakharamim libah 'asurim yadeha tob lifnei ha'elohim yimalet mimenah vekhotei yilakhed bah. re'eh zeh mazati 'amerah qohelet 'akhat le'akhat limzo kheshbon. 'asher 'od biqshah nafshi velo mazati 'adam 'ekhad mei'elef mazati ve'ishah bekhal 'eleh lo mazati. lebad re'eh zeh mazati 'asher 'asah ha'elohim 'et ha'adam yashar vehemah biqshu khishebonot rabim. mi kehekhakham umi yodeia' peisher dabar khakhemat 'adam ta'ir panav ve'oz panav yeshune. 'ani pi melekh shemor ve'al dibrat shebu'at 'elohim. 'al tibahel mipanav teilekh 'al ta'amod bedabar ra' ki kal 'asher yakhpoz ya'aseh. ba'asher debar melekh shilton umi yomar lo mah ta'aseh. shomer mizvah lo yeida' dabar ra' ve'et umishpat yeida' leb khakham. ki lekhal kheifez yesh 'et umishpat ki ra'at ha'adam rabah 'alav. ki 'einenu yodeia' mah sheyihyeh ki ka'asher yihyeh mi yagid lo. 'en 'adam shalit baruakh likhlo 'et haruakh ve'en shilton beyom hamavet ve'en mishlakhat bamilkhamah velo yemalet resha' 'et be'alav. 'et kal zeh ra'iti venaton 'et libi lekhal ma'aseh 'asher na'asah takhat hashamesh 'et 'asher shalat ha'adam be'adam lera' lo. ubekhen ra'iti resha'im qeburim vaba'u umimeqom qadosh yehaleikhu veyishtakekhu ba'ir 'asher ken 'asu gam zeh habel. 'asher 'en na'asah fitgam ma'aseh hara'ah meheirah 'al ken malei leb benei ha'adam bahem la'asot ra'. 'asher khote 'oseh ra' me'at uma'arikh lo ki gam yodeia' 'ani 'asher yihyeh tob leyir'ei ha'elohim 'asher yire'u milefanav. vetob lo yihyeh larasha' velo ya'arikh yamim kazel 'asher 'einenu yarei milifnei 'elohim. yesh hebel 'asher na'asah 'al ha'arez 'asher yesh zadiqim 'asher magia' 'aleihem kema'aseh haresha'im veyesh resha'im shemagia' 'aleihem kema'aseh hazadiqim 'amarti shegam zeh habel. veshibakhti 'ani 'et hasimkhah 'asher 'en tob la'adam takhat hashemesh ki 'im le'ekhol velishtot velismoakh vehu yilvenu ba'amalo yemei khayav 'asher natan lo ha'elohim takhat hashamesh. ka'asher natati 'et libi lada'at khakhmah velir'ot 'et ha'inyan 'asher na'asah 'al ha'arez ki gam bayom ubalaylah sheinah be'einav 'einenu ro'eh. vera'iti 'et kal ma'aseh ha'elohim ki lo yukhal ha'adam limzo 'et hama'aseh 'asher na'asah takhat hashemesh beshel 'asher ya'amol ha'adam lebaqesh velo yimza vegam 'im yomar hekhakham lada'at lo yukhal limzo. ki 'et kal zeh natati 'el libi velabur 'et kal zeh 'asher hazadiqim vehakhakhamim va'abadeihem beyad ha'elohim gam 'ahabah gam sin'ah 'en yodeia' ha'adam hakol lifneihem. hakol ka'asher lakol miqreh 'ekhad lazadiq velarasha' latob velatahor velatamei velazobeiakh vela'asher 'einenu zobeiakh katob kakhote hanishba' ka'asher shebu'ah yarei. zeh ra' bekhol 'asher na'asah takhat hashemesh ki miqreh 'ekhad lakol vegam leb benei ha'adam malei ra' veholeilot bilbabam bekhayeihem ve'akharav 'el hameitim. ki mi 'asher yibakher yekhubar 'el kal hakhayim yesh bitakhon ki lekheleb khai hu tob min ha'aryeh hamet. ki hakhayim yod'im sheyamutu vehameitim 'einam yod'im me'umah ve'en 'od lahem sakhar ki nishkakh zikhram. gam 'ahabatam gam sin'atam gam qin'atam kebar 'abadah vekheileq 'en lahem 'od le'olam bekhol 'asher na'asah takhat hashamesh. lekh 'ekhol besimkhah lakhmekha ushateh beleb tob yeinekha ki khebar razah ha'elohim 'et ma'asekha. bekhal 'et yihyu begadekha lebanim veshemen 'al roshekha 'al yekhsar. re'eh khayim 'im 'ishah 'asher 'ahabta kal yemei khayei heblekha 'asher natan lekha takhat hashemesh kol yemei heblekha ki hu khelqekha bakhayim uba'amalekha 'asher 'atah 'amel takhat hashamesh. kol 'asher timza yadekha la'asot bekhokhakha 'aseh ki 'en ma'aseh vekheshbon veda'at vekhakhemah bish'ol 'asher 'atah holekh shamah. shabti vera'oh takhat hashemesh ki lo laqalim hameiroz velo lagiborim hamilkhamah vegam lo lakhakhamim lekhem vegam lo lanebonim 'osher vegam lo layode'im khen ki 'et vafega' yiqreh 'et kulam. ki gam lo yeida' ha'adam 'et 'ito kadagim shene'ekhazim bimzodah ra'ah vekhaziporim ha'akhuzot bapakh kahem yuqashim benei ha'adam le'et ra'ah keshetipol 'aleihem pit'om. gam zoh ra'iti khakhmah takhat hashamesh ugedolah hi 'eilai. 'ir qetanah va'anashim bah me'at uba 'eileha melekh gadol vesabab 'otah ubanah 'aleha mezodim gedolim. umaza bah 'ish misken khakham umilat hu 'et ha'ir bekhakhemato ve'adam lo zakhar 'et ha'ish hamisken hahu. ve'amarti 'ani tobah khakhmah migeburah vekhakhemat hamisken bezuyah udebarav 'einam nishma'im. dibrei khakhamim benakhat nishma'im miza'aqat moshel bakesilim. tobah khakhmah mikelei qerab vekhote 'ekhad ye'abed tobah harbeh. zebubei mavet yab'ish yabia' shemen roqeiakh yaqar meikhakhemah mikabod sikhlut me'at. leb khakham limino veleb kesil lismolo. vegam baderekh keshehasakhal keshesakhal holekh libo khaser ve'amar lakol sakhal hu. 'im ruakh hamoshel ta'aleh 'alekha meqomkha 'al tanakh ki marpei yaniakh khata'im gedolim. yesh ra'ah ra'iti takhat hashamesh kishgagah sheyoza milifnei hashalit. nitan hasekhel bameromim rabim va'ashirim basheifel yeisheibu. ra'iti 'abadim 'al susim vesarim holekhim ka'abadim 'al ha'arez. khofer gumaz bo yipol uforez gader yishekhenu nakhash. masia' 'abanim yei'azeb bahem boqeia' 'eizim yisakhen bam. 'im qeihah habarzel vehu lo fanim qilqal vakhayalim yegaber veyitron hakhsher khakhmah 'im yishokh hanakhash belo lakhash ve'en yitron leba'al halashon. dibrei fi khakham khen vesiftot kesil tebale'enu. tekhilat dibrei fihu sikhlut ve'akharit pihu holeilut ra'ah. vehasakhal yarbeh debarim lo yeida' ha'adam mah sheyihyeh va'asher yihyeh mei'akharav mi yagid lo. 'amal hakesilim teyage'enu 'asher lo yada' lalekhet 'el 'ir. 'i lakh 'erez shemalkekh na'ar vesarayikh baboqer yokheilu. 'ashrekh 'erez shemalkekh ben khorim vesarayikh ba'et yokheilu bigburah velo basheti. ba'azaltayim yimakh hameqareh ubeshiflut yadayim yidlof habayit. liskhoq 'osim lekhem veyayin yesamakh khayim vehakesef ya'aneh 'et hakol. gam bemada'akha melekh 'al teqalel ubekhadrei mishkabekha 'al teqalel 'ashir ki 'of hashamayim yolikh 'et haqol uba'al hakenafayim kenafayim yaged dabar. shalakh lakhmekha 'al penei hamayim ki berob hayamim timza'enu. ten kheileq leshib'ah vegam lishmonah ki lo teida' mah yihyeh ra'ah 'al ha'arez. 'im yimale'u he'abim geshem 'al ha'arez yariqu ve'im yipol 'ez badarom ve'im bazafon meqom sheyipol ha'ez sham yehu. shomer ruakh lo yizra' vero'eh be'abim lo yiqzor. ka'asher 'einekha yodeia' mah derekh haruakh ka'azamim bebeten hamelei'ah kakhah lo teida' 'et ma'aseh ha'elohim 'asher ya'aseh 'et hakol. baboqer zera' 'et zar'ekha vela'ereb 'al tanakh yadekha ki 'einekha yodei' 'ei zeh yikhshar hazeh 'o zeh ve'im sheneihem ke'ekhad tobim. umatoq ha'or vetob la'einayim lir'ot 'et hashamesh. ki 'im shanim harbeh yikhyeh ha'adam bekhulam yismakh veyizkor 'et yemei hakhoshekh ki harbeh yihyu kal sheba habel. semakh bakhur beyaldutekha vitibekha libekha bimei bekhurotekha vehalekh bedarkhei libekha ubemar'ei 'einekha veda' ki 'al kal 'eleh yebi'akha ha'elohim bamishpat. vehaser ka'as milibekha veha'aber ra'ah mibesarekha ki hayaldut vehashakharut habel. uzekhor 'et bor'ekha bimei bekhurotekha 'ad 'asher lo yabo'u yemei hara'ah vehigi'u shanim 'asher tomar 'en li bahem kheifez.
