'edayin min di parshegen nishtevana di 'artakhshasta 'artakhshast malka qeri qodam rekhum veshimshai safera ukhenavatehon 'azalu bibhilu lirushelem 'al yehudayei ubatilu himo be'edra' vekhayil. beidayin beteilat 'abidat bet 'elaha di birushelem vahavat batela 'ad shenat tarten lemalkhut dareyavesh melekh paras. vehitnabi khagai nebi'ah nebiya uzekharyah bar 'ido nebi'aya nebiyaya 'al yehudayei di bihud ubirushelem beshum 'elah yisra'el 'aleihon. beidayin qamu zerubabel bar she'alti'el veyeishua' bar yozadaq veshariv lemibnei bet 'elaha di birushelem ve'imehon nebi'aya nebiyaya di 'elaha mesa'adin lehon beh zimna 'ata 'aleihon tatenai pakhat 'abar naharah ushetar boznai ukhenavatehon vekhen 'amerin lehom man sam lekhom te'em bayta denah libenei ve'usharna denah leshakhlalah. 'edayin keneima 'amarna lehom man 'inun shemahat gubraya di denah binyana banayin. ve'en 'elahahom havat 'al sabei yehudayei vela batilu himo 'ad ta'ma ledareyavesh yehakh ve'edayin yetibun nishtevana 'al denah. parshegen 'igarta di shelakh tatenai pakhat 'abar naharah ushetar boznai ukhenavateh 'afarsekhayei di ba'abar naharah 'al dareyavesh malka. pitgama shelakhu 'alohi vekhidnah ketib begaveh ledareyavesh malka shelama khola. yedia' lehevei lemalka di 'azalna lihud medineta lebet 'elaha raba vehu mitbenei 'eben gelal ve'a' mitesam bekhutlaya va'abideta dakh 'aseparna mit'abda umazlakh beyedhom. 'edayin she'eilena lesabaya 'ilekh keneima 'amarna lehom man sam lekhom te'em bayta denah lemibneyah ve'usharna denah leshakhlalah. ve'af shemahatehom she'eilena lehom lehoda'utakh di nikhtub shum gubraya di berasheihom. ukheneima fitgama hatibuna lemeimar 'anakhna himo 'abdohi di 'elah shemaya ve'ar'a ubanayin bayta di hava beneh miqadmat denah shenin sagi'an umelekh leyisra'el rab benahi veshakhleleh. lahen min di hargizu 'abahotana le'elah shemaya yehab himo beyad nebukhadnezar melekh babel kasdaya kasda'ah ubaytah denah satreh ve'amah hagli lebabel. beram bishnat khadah lekhoresh malka di babel koresh malka sam te'em bet 'elaha denah libenei. ve'af manaya di bet 'elaha di dahabah vekhaspa di nebukhadnezar hanpeq min heikhela di birushelem veheibel himo leheikhela di babel hanpeq himo koresh malka min heikhela di babel vihibu lesheishebazar shemeh di fekhah sameh. va'amar leh 'eleh 'el manaya se 'eizel 'akhet himo beheikhela di birushelem ubet 'elaha yitbenei 'al 'atreh. 'edayin sheishebazar dekh 'ata yehab 'ushaya di bet 'elaha di birushelem umin 'edayin ve'ad ke'an mitbenei vela shelim. ukhe'an hen 'al malka tab yitbaqar bebet ginzaya di malka tamah di bebabel hen 'itai di min koresh malka sim te'em lemibnei bet 'elaha dekh birushelem ure'ut malka 'al denah yishlakh 'alena. beidayin dareyavesh malka sam te'em ubaqaru bebet sifraya di ginzaya mehakhatin tamah bebabel. vehishtekhakh be'akhmeta bebireta di bemadai medinetah megilah khadah vekhen ketib begavah dikhronah. bishnat khadah lekhoresh malka koresh malka sam te'em bet 'elaha birushelem bayta yitbenei 'atar di dabekhin dibkhin ve'ushohi mesoblin rumeh 'amin shitin petayeh 'amin shitin. nidbakhin di 'eben gelal telata venidbakh di 'a' khadat venifqeta min bet malka tityehib. ve'af manei bet 'elaha di dahabah vekhaspa di nebukhadnezar hanpeq min heikhela di birushelem veheibel lebabel yahatibun vihakh leheikhela di birushelem le'atreh vetakhet bebet 'elaha. ke'an tatenai pakhat 'abar naharah shetar boznai ukhenavatehon 'afarsekhayei di ba'abar naharah rakhiqin havo min tamah. shebuqu la'abidat bet 'elaha dekh pakhat yehudayei ulesabei yehudayei bet 'elaha dekh yibnon 'al 'atreh. umini sim te'em lema di ta'abdun 'im sabei yehudayei 'ilekh lemibnei bet 'elaha dekh uminikhsei malka di midat 'abar naharah 'aseparna nifqeta tehevei mityahaba legubraya 'ilekh di la lebatala. umah khashkhan ubenei torin vedikhrin ve'imerin la'alavan le'elah shemaya khintin melakh khamar umeshakh kemeimar kahanaya di birushelem lehevei mityeheb lehom yom beyom di la shalu. di lehevon mehaqrebin nikhokhin le'elah shemaya umezalayin lekhayei malka ubenohi. umini sim te'em di khal 'enash di yehashnei pitgama denah yitnesakh 'a' min bayteh uzeqif yitmekhei 'alohi ubayteh nevalu yit'abed 'al denah. veilaha di shakin shemeh tamah yemagar kal melekh ve'am di yishlakh yedeh lehashnayah lekhabalah bet 'elaha dekh di birushelem 'anah dareyavesh samet te'em 'aseparna yit'abid. 'edayin tatenai pakhat 'abar naharah shetar boznai ukhenavatehon laqobel di shelakh dareyavesh malka keneima 'aseparna 'abadu. vesabei yehudayei banayin umazlekhin binbu'at khagai nebi'ah nebiya uzekharyah bar 'ido ubeno veshakhlilu min ta'am 'elah yisra'el umite'em koresh vedareyavesh ve'artakhshast melekh paras. vesheizi baytah denah 'ad yom telatah lirakh 'adar di hi shenat shet lemalkhut dareyavesh malka. va'abadu benei yisra'el kahanaya veleivayei ushe'ar benei galuta khanukat bet 'elaha denah bekhedvah. vehaqribu lakhanukat bet 'elaha denah torin me'ah dikhrin matayin 'imerin 'arba' me'ah uzefirei 'izin lekhataya lekhata'ah 'al kal yisra'el terei 'asar leminyan shibtei yisra'el. vahaqimu khahanaya biflugatehon veleivayei bemakhleqatehon 'al 'abidat 'elaha di birushelem kikhtab sefar mosheh. vaya'asu benei hagolah 'et hapasakh be'arba'ah 'asar lakhodesh harishon. ki hitaharu hakohanim vehalviyim ke'ekhad kulam tehorim vayishkhatu hapesakh lekhal benei hagolah vela'akheihem hakohanim velahem. vayokhelu benei yisra'el hashabim meihagolah vekhol hanibdal mitum'at goyei ha'arez 'aleihem lidrosh ihoh 'elohei yisra'el. vaya'asu khag mazot shib'at yamim besimkhah ki simekham ihoh veheiseb leb melekh 'ashur 'aleihem lekhazeq yedeihem bimlekhet bet ha'elohim 'elohei yisra'el. ve'akhar hadebarim ha'eleh bemalkhut 'artakhshast melekh paras 'ezra ben serayah ben 'azaryah ben khilqiyah. ben shalum ben zadoq ben 'akhitub. ben 'amaryah ben 'azaryah ben merayot. ben zerakhyah ben 'uzi ben buqi. ben 'abishua' ben pinekhas ben 'el'azar ben 'aharon hakohen harosh. hu 'ezra 'alah mibabel vehu sofer mahir betorat mosheh 'asher natan ihoh 'elohei yisra'el vayiten lo hamelekh keyad ihoh 'elohav 'alav kol baqashato. vaya'alu mibenei yisra'el umin hakohanim vehalviyim vehamshorerim vehasho'arim vehanetinim 'el yerushalim bishnat sheba' le'artakhshast hamelekh. vayabo yerushalim bakhodesh hakhamishi hi shenat hashebi'it lamelekh. ki be'ekhad lakhodesh harishon hu yesud hama'alah mibabel ube'ekhad lakhodesh hakhamishi ba 'el yerushalim keyad 'elohav hatobah 'alav. ki 'ezra heikhin lebabo lidrosh 'et torat ihoh vela'asot ulelamed beyisra'el khoq umishpat. vezeh parshegen hanishtevan 'asher natan hamelekh 'artakhshast le'ezra hakohen hasofer sofer dibrei mizvot ihoh vekhuqav 'al yisra'el. 'artakhshast melekh malkhaya le'ezra khahana safar data di 'elah shemaya gemir ukhe'enet. mini sim te'em di khal mitnadab bemalkhuti min 'amah yisra'el vekhahanohi veleivayei limhakh lirushelem 'imakh yehakh. kal qobel di min qodam malka veshib'at ya'atohi sheliakh lebaqara 'al yehud velirushelem bedat 'elahakh di bidakh. uleheibalah kesaf udehab di malka veya'atohi hitnadabu le'elah yisra'el di birushelem mishkeneh. vekhol kesaf udehab di tehashkakh bekhol medinat babel 'im hitnadabut 'ama vekhahanaya mitnadebin lebet 'elahahom di birushelem. kal qobel denah 'aseparna tiqnei bekhaspa denah torin dikhrin 'imerin uminkhatehon veniskeihon uteqareb himo 'al madbekhah di bet 'elahakhom di birushelem. umah di 'alayikh 'alakh ve'al 'ekhayikh 'ekhakh yitab bish'ar kaspa vedahabah leme'bad kir'ut 'elahakhom ta'abdun. umanaya di mityahabin lakh lefalekhan bet 'elahakh hashlem qodam 'elah yerushelem. ushe'ar khashkhut bet 'elahakh di yipel lakh lemintan tinten min bet ginzei malka. umini 'anah 'artakhshast malka sim te'em lekhol gizabraya di ba'abar naharah di khal di yish'alenkhon 'ezra khahanah safar data di 'elah shemaya 'aseparna yit'abid. 'ad kesaf kakerin me'ah ve'ad khintin korin me'ah ve'ad khamar batin me'ah ve'ad batin meshakh me'ah umelakh di la khetab. kal di min ta'am 'elah shemaya yit'abed 'adrazda lebet 'elah shemaya di lemah lehevei qezaf 'al malkhut malka ubenohi. ulekhom mehod'in di khal kahanaya veleivayei zamaraya tara'aya netinaya ufalekhei bet 'elaha denah mindah belo vahalakh la shalit lemirmei 'aleihom. ve'ant 'ezra kekhakhemat 'elahakh di bidakh meni shafetin vedayanin di lehevon da'anin dayenin lekhal 'amah di ba'abar naharah lekhal yade'ei datei 'elahakh vedi la yada' tehod'un. vekhal di la lehevei 'abed data di 'elahakh vedata di malka 'aseparna dinah lehevei mit'abed mineh hen lemot hen lishroshu lishroshi hen la'anash nikhsin vele'esurin. barukh ihoh 'elohei 'aboteinu 'asher natan kazot beleb hamelekh lefa'er 'et bet ihoh 'asher birushalim. ve'alai hitah khesed lifnei hamelekh veyo'azav ulekhal sarei hamelekh hagiborim va'ani hitkhazaqti keyad ihoh 'elohai 'alai va'eqbezah miyisra'el rashim la'alot 'imi. ve'eleh rashei 'aboteihem vehityakhsam ha'olim 'imi bemalkhut 'artakhshast hamelekh mibabel. mibenei finekhas geireshom mibenei 'itamar daniyel mibenei david khatush. mibenei shekhanyah mibenei far'osh zekharyah ve'imo hityakhes lizkharim mei'ah vakhamishim. mibenei pakhat mo'ab 'elyeho'einai ben zerakhyah ve'imo matayim hazekharim. mibenei shekhanyah ben yakhazi'el ve'imo shelosh mei'ot hazekharim. umibenei 'adin 'ebed ben yonatan ve'imo khamishim hazekharim. umibenei 'eilam yesha'yah ben 'atalyah ve'imo shib'im hazekharim. umibenei shefatyah zebadyah ben mikha'el ve'imo shemonim hazekharim. mibenei yo'ab 'obadyah ben yekhi'el ve'imo matayim ushemonah 'asar hazekharim. umibenei shelomit ben yosifyah ve'imo mei'ah veshishim hazekharim. umibenei beibai zekharyah ben beibai ve'imo 'esrim ushemonah hazekharim. umibenei 'azgad yokhanan ben haqatan ve'imo mei'ah va'asarah hazekharim. umibenei 'adoniqam 'akharonim ve'eleh shemotam 'elifelet ye'i'el ushema'yah ve'imahem shishim hazekharim. umibenei bigvai 'utai vezabud vezakur ve'imo shib'im hazekharim. va'eqbezem 'el hanahar haba 'el 'ahava vanakhaneh sham yamim sheloshah va'abinah ba'am ubakohanim umibenei leivi lo mazati sham. va'eshlekhah le'eli'ezer la'ari'el lishma'yah ule'elnatan uleyarib ule'elnatan ulenatan velizkharyah velimshulam rashim uleyoyarib ule'elnatan mebinim va'ozi'ah va'azaveh 'otam 'al 'ido harosh bekhasifya hamaqom va'asimah befihem debarim ledaber 'el 'ido 'akhiv hanetunim hanetinim bekhasifya hamaqom lehabi lanu mesharetim lebet 'eloheinu. vayabi''u lanu keyad 'eloheinu hatobah 'aleinu 'ish sekhel mibenei makhli ben leivi ben yisra'el vesheireibeyah ubanav ve'ekhav shemonah 'asar. ve'et khashabyah ve'ito yesha'yah mibenei merari 'ekhav ubeneihem 'esrim. umin hanetinim shenatan david vehasarim la'abodat halviyim netinim matayim ve'esrim kulam niqebu besheimot. va'eqra sham zom 'al hanahar 'ahava lehit'anot lifnei 'eloheinu lebaqesh mimenu derekh yesharah lanu uletapeinu ulekhal rekhusheinu. ki bosheti lish'ol min hamelekh khayil ufarashim le'azereinu mei'oyeb badarekh ki 'amarnu lamelekh leimor yad 'eloheinu 'al kal mebaqshav letobah ve'uzo ve'apo 'al kal 'ozebav. vanazumah vanebaqshah mei'eloheinu 'al zot vayei'ater lanu. va'abdilah misarei hakohanim shenem 'asar lesheireibeyah khashabyah ve'imahem mei'akheihem 'asarah. va'eshqolah va'eshqolah lahem 'et hakesef ve'et hazahab ve'et hakeilim terumat bet 'eloheinu haheirimu hamelekh veyo'azav vesarav vekhal yisra'el hanimza'im. va'eshqalah 'al yadam kesef kikarim shesh mei'ot vakhamishim ukhelei khesef mei'ah lekhikarim zahab mei'ah khikar. ukheforei zahab 'esrim la'adarkhonim 'alef ukhelei nekhoshet muzhab tobah shenayim khamudot kazahab. va'omerah 'aleihem 'atem qodesh ihoh vehakeilim qodesh vehakesef vehazahab nedabah ihoh 'elohei 'aboteikhem. shiqdu veshimru 'ad tishqelu lifnei sarei hakohanim vehalviyim vesarei ha'abot leyisra'el birushalim halishkhot bet ihoh. veqibelu hakohanim vehalviyim mishqal hakesef vehazahab vehakeilim lehabi lirushalim lebet 'eloheinu. vanis'ah minehar 'ahava bishnem 'asar lakhodesh harishon lalekhet yerushalim veyad 'eloheinu hayetah 'aleinu vayazileinu mikaf 'oyeb ve'oreb 'al hadarekh. vanabo yerushalim vaneisheb sham yamim sheloshah. ubayom harebi'i nishqal hakesef vehazahab vehakeilim bebet 'eloheinu 'al yad mereimot ben 'uriyah hakohen ve'imo 'el'azar ben pinekhas ve'imahem yozabad ben yeishua' veno'adyah ben binui halviyim. bemispar bemishqal lakol vayikateb kal hamishqal ba'et hahi. haba'im meihashebi benei hagolah hiqribu 'olot leilohei yisra'el parim shenem 'asar 'al kal yisra'el 'eilim tish'im veshishah kebasim shib'im veshib'ah zefirei khatat shenem 'asar hakol 'olah ihoh. vayitenu 'et datei hamelekh la'akhashdarpenei hamelekh ufakhavot 'eiber hanahar venise'u 'et ha'am ve'et bet ha'elohim. ukhekhalot 'eleh nigeshu 'eilai hasarim leimor lo nibdelu ha'am yisra'el vehakohanim vehalviyim mei'amei ha'arazot keto'aboteihem lakena'ani hakhiti haperizi haybusi ha'amoni hamo'abi hamizri veha'emori. ki nase'u mibenoteihem lahem velibneihem vehit'arebu zera' haqodesh be'amei ha'arazot veyad hasarim vehaseganim hayetah bama'al hazeh rishonah. ukheshame'i 'et hadabar hazeh qara'ti 'et bigdi ume'ili va'emretah mise'ar roshi uzeqani va'eishebah meshomem. ve'eilai yei'asefu kol khared bedibrei 'elohei yisra'el 'al ma'al hagolah va'ani yosheb meshomem 'ad leminkhat ha'areb. ubeminkhat ha'ereb qamti mita'aniti ubeqare'i bigdi ume'ili va'ekhre'ah 'al birkai va'efresah khapai 'el ihoh 'elohai. va'omerah 'elohai bosheti venikhlamti leharim 'elohai panai 'eilekha ki 'avonoteinu rabu lema'lah rosh ve'ashmateinu gadelah 'ad lashamayim. mimei 'aboteinu 'anakhnu be'ashmah gedolah 'ad hayom hazeh uba'avonoteinu nitanu 'anakhnu melakheinu khohaneinu beyad malkhei ha'arazot bakhereb bashebi ubabizah ubeboshet panim kehayom hazeh. ve'atah kim'at rega' hayetah tekhinah mei'et ihoh 'eloheinu lehash'ir lanu peleitah velatet lanu yated bimqom qadesho leha'ir 'eineinu 'eloheinu uletiteinu mikhyah me'at be'abduteinu. ki 'abadim 'anakhnu ube'abduteinu lo 'azabanu 'eloheinu vayat 'aleinu khesed lifnei malkhei faras latet lanu mikhyah leromem 'et bet 'eloheinu uleha'amid 'et kharebotav velatet lanu gader bihudah ubirushalim. ve'atah mah nomar 'eloheinu 'akharei zot ki 'azabnu mizvotekha. 'asher zivita beyad 'abadekha hanebi'im leimor ha'arez 'asher 'atem ba'im lerishtah 'erez nidah hi benidat 'amei ha'arazot beto'aboteihem 'asher mil'uha mipeh 'el peh betum'atam. ve'atah benoteikhem 'al titenu libneihem ubenoteihem 'al tis'u libneikhem velo tidreshu shelomam vetobatam 'ad 'olam lema'an tekhezqu va'akhaltem 'et tub ha'arez vehorashtem libneikhem 'ad 'olam. ve'akharei kal haba 'aleinu bema'aseinu hara'im ube'ashmateinu hagedolah ki 'atah 'eloheinu khasakhta lematah mei'avoneinu venatatah lanu peleitah kazot. hanashub lehafer mizvotekha ulehitkhaten be'amei hato'eibot ha'eleh halo te'enaf banu 'ad kaleh le'en she'eirit ufeleitah. ihoh 'elohei yisra'el zadiq 'atah ki nish'arnu feleitah kehayom hazeh hinu lefanekha be'ashmateinu ki 'en la'amod lefanekha 'al zot. ukhehitpalel 'ezra ukhehitvadoto bokheh umitnapel lifnei bet ha'elohim niqbezu 'eilav miyisra'el qahal rab me'od 'anashim venashim viladim ki bakhu ha'am harbeh bekheh. vaya'an shekhanyah ben yekhi'el mibenei 'olam 'eilam vayomer le'ezra 'anakhnu ma'alnu beiloheinu vanosheb nashim nakheriyot mei'amei ha'arez ve'atah yesh miqveh leyisra'el 'al zot. ve'atah nikhrat berit leiloheinu lehozi khal nashim vehanolad meihem ba'azat 'adonai vehakhareidim bemizvat 'eloheinu vekhatorah yei'aseh. qum ki 'alekha hadabar va'anakhnu 'imakh khazaq va'aseh. vayaqam 'ezra vayashba' 'et sarei hakohanim halviyim vekhal yisra'el la'asot kadabar hazeh vayishabei'u. vayaqam 'ezra milifnei bet ha'elohim vayeilekh 'el lishkat yehokhanan ben 'elyashib vayeilekh sham lekhem lo 'akhal umayim lo shatah ki mit'abel 'al ma'al hagolah. vaya'abiru qol bihudah virushalim lekhol benei hagolah lehiqabez yerushalim. vekhol 'asher lo yabo lishloshet hayamim ka'azat hasarim vehazeqeinim yakhoram kal rekhusho vehu yibadel miqehal hagolah. vayiqabezu khal 'anshei yehudah ubinyamin yerushalim lishloshet hayamim hu khodesh hateshi'i be'esrim bakhodesh vayeishebu khal ha'am birkhob bet ha'elohim mar'idim 'al hadabar umeihageshamim. vayaqam 'ezra hakohen vayomer 'aleihem 'atem me'altem vatoshibu nashim nakheriyot lehosif 'al 'ashmat yisra'el. ve'atah tenu todah ihoh 'elohei 'aboteikhem va'asu rezono vehibadelu mei'amei ha'arez umin hanashim hanakheriyot. vaya'nu khal haqahal vayomeru qol gadol ken kedibrekha kidbarekha 'aleinu la'asot. 'abal ha'am rab veha'et geshamim ve'en koakh la'amod bakhuz vehamelakhah lo leyom 'ekhad velo lishnayim ki hirbinu lifshoa' badabar hazeh. ya'amdu na reinu lekhal haqahal vekhol 'asher be'areinu hahoshib nashim nakheriyot yabo le'itim mezumanim ve'imahem ziqnei 'ir va'ir veshofeteha 'ad lehashib kharon 'af 'eloheinu mimenu 'ad ladabar hazeh. 'akh yonatan ben 'asah'el veyakhzeyah ben tiqvah 'amedu 'al zot umeshulam veshabetai haleivi 'azarum. vaya'asu khen benei hagolah vayibadelu 'ezra hakohen 'anashim rashei ha'abot lebet 'abotam vekhulam besheimot vayeishebu beyom 'ekhad lakhodesh ha'asiri ledaryosh hadabar. vaykhalu bakol 'anashim hahoshibu nashim nakheriyot 'ad yom 'ekhad lakhodesh harishon. vayimazei mibenei hakohanim 'asher hoshibu nashim nakheriyot mibenei yeishua' ben yozadaq ve'ekhav ma'aseiyah ve'eli'ezer veyarib ugedalyah. vayitenu yadam lehozi nesheihem va'asheimim 'el zon 'al 'ashmatam. umibenei 'imer khanani uzebadyah. umibenei kharim ma'aseiyah ve'eiliyah ushema'yah vikhi'el ve'uziyah. umibenei pashkhur 'elyo'einai ma'aseiyah yishma'el netan'el yozabad ve'el'asah. umin halviyim yozabad veshim'i veqeilayah hu qelita petakhyah yehudah ve'eli'ezer. umin hamshorerim 'elyashib umin hasho'arim shalum vatelem ve'uri. umiyisra'el mibenei far'osh ramyah veyiziyah umalkiyah umiyamin ve'el'azar umalkiyah ubenayah. umibenei 'eilam matanyah zekharyah vikhi'el ve'abdi vireimot ve'eiliyah. umibenei zatu 'elyo'einai 'elyashib matanyah vireimot vezabad va'aziza. umibenei beibai yehokhanan khananyah zabai 'atlai. umibenei bani meshulam malukh va'adayah yashub ushe'al yereimot veramot. umibenei pakhat mo'ab 'adna ukhelal benayah ma'aseiyah matanyah bezal'el ubinui umenasheh. ubenei kharim 'eli'ezer yishiyah malkiyah shema'yah shim'on. beneyamin malukh shemaryah. mibenei khashum matenai matatah zabad 'elifelet yereimai menasheh shim'i. mibenei bani ma'adai 'amram ve'u'el. benayah beideyah kelahai keluhu. vanyah mereimot 'elyashib. matanyah matenai veya'aso veya'asai. ubani ubinui shim'i. veshelemyah venatan va'adayah. makhnadbai shashai sharai. 'azar'el veshelemyahu shemaryah. shalum 'amaryah yosef. mibenei nebo ye'i'el matityah zabad zebina yado yadai veyo'el benayah. kal 'eleh nase'u nase'u nashim nakheriyot veyesh meihem nashim vayasimu banim.

dibrei nekhemyah ben khakhalyah vayhi bekhodesh kislev kislev shenat 'esrim va'ani hayiti beshushan habirah. vayabo khanani 'ekhad mei'akhai hu va'anashim mihudah va'esh'alem 'al hayehudim hapeleitah 'asher nish'aru min hashebi ve'al yerushalim. vayomeru li hanish'arim 'asher nish'aru min hashebi sham bamedinah bera'ah gedolah ubekherpah vekhomat yerushalim meforazet ushe'areha nizetu ba'esh. vayhi keshame'i 'et hadebarim ha'eleh yashabti va'ebkeh va'et'abelah yamim va'ehi zam umitpalel lifnei 'elohei hashamayim. va'omar 'ana ihoh 'elohei hashamayim ha'el hagadol vehanora shomer haberit vakhesed le'ohabav uleshomerei mizvotav. tehi na 'azenekha qashebet ve'einekha fetuvkhot lishmoa' 'el tefilat 'abdekha 'asher 'anokhi mitpalel lefanekha hayom yomam valaylah 'al benei yisra'el 'abadekha umitvadeh 'al khatot benei yisra'el 'asher khatanu lakh va'ani ubet 'abi khatanu. khabol khabalnu lakh velo shamarnu 'et hamizvot ve'et hakhuqim ve'et hamishpatim 'asher zivita 'et mosheh 'abdekha. zekhar na 'et hadabar 'asher zivita 'et mosheh 'abdekha leimor 'atem tim'alu 'ani 'afiz 'etkhem ba'amim. veshabtem 'eilai ushemartem mizvotai va'asitem 'otam 'im yihyeh nidakhakhem biqzeh hashamayim misham 'aqabezem vahabo'otim vahabi'otim 'el hamaqom 'asher bakharti leshaken 'et shemi sham. vehem 'abadekha ve'amekha 'asher padita bekhokhakha hagadol ubeyadekha hakhazaqah. 'ana 'adonai tehi na 'azenekha qashebet 'el tefilat 'abdekha ve'el tefilat 'abadekha hakhafeizim leyir'ah 'et shemekha vehazlikhah na le'abdekha hayom uteneihu lerakhamim lifnei ha'ish hazeh va'ani hayiti mashqeh lamelekh. vayhi bekhodesh nisan shenat 'esrim le'artakhshast hamelekh yayin lefanav va'esa 'et hayayin va'etenah lamelekh velo hayiti ra' lefanav. vayomer li hamelekh madua' panekha ra'im ve'atah 'einekha kholeh 'en zeh ki 'im roa' leb va'ira harbeh me'od. va'omar lamelekh hamelekh le'olam yikhyeh madua' lo yeire'u fanai 'asher ha'ir bet qibrot 'abotai khareibah ushe'areha 'ukelu ba'esh. vayomer li hamelekh 'al mah zeh 'atah mebaqesh va'etpalel 'el 'elohei hashamayim. va'omar lamelekh 'im 'al hamelekh tob ve'im yitab 'abdekha lefanekha 'asher tishlakheini 'el yehudah 'el 'ir qibrot 'abotai ve'ebnenah. vayomer li hamelekh vehasheigal yoshebet 'ezlo 'ad matai yihyeh mahalakhakha umatai tashub vayitab lifnei hamelekh vayishlakheini va'etenah lo zeman. va'omar lamelekh 'im 'al hamelekh tob 'igerot yitenu li 'al pakhavot 'eiber hanahar 'asher ya'abiruni 'ad 'asher 'abo 'el yehudah. ve'igeret 'el 'asaf shomer hapardes 'asher lamelekh 'asher yiten li 'eizim leqarot 'et sha'arei habirah 'asher labayit ulekhomat ha'ir velabayit 'asher 'abo 'eilav vayiten li hamelekh keyad 'elohai hatobah 'alai. va'abo 'el pakhavot 'eiber hanahar va'etenah lahem 'et 'igerot hamelekh vayishlakh 'imi hamelekh sarei khayil ufarashim. vayishma' sanbalat hakhoroni vetobiyah ha'ebed ha'amoni vayeira' lahem ra'ah gedolah 'asher ba 'adam lebaqesh tobah libnei yisra'el. va'abo 'el yerushalim va'ehi sham yamim sheloshah. va'aqum laylah 'ani va'anashim me'at 'imi velo higadti le'adam mah 'elohai noten 'el libi la'asot lirushalim ubeheimah 'en 'imi ki 'im habeheimah 'asher 'ani rokheb bah. va'eize'ah besha'ar hagai laylah ve'el penei 'en hatanin ve'el sha'ar ha'ashpot va'ehi sober bekhomot yerushalim 'asher hamforvazim hem peruzim ushe'areha 'ukelu ba'esh. va'e'ebor 'el sha'ar ha'ayin ve'el bereikhat hamelekh ve'en maqom labeheimah la'abor takhtai. va'ehi 'oleh banakhal laylah va'ehi sober bakhomah va'ashub va'abo besha'ar hagai va'ashub. vehaseganim lo yade'u 'anah halakhti umah 'ani 'oseh velayehudim velakohanim velakhorim velaseganim uleyeter 'oseh hamelakhah 'ad ken lo higadti. va'omar 'aleihem 'atem ro'im hara'ah 'asher 'anakhnu bah 'asher yerushalim khareibah ushe'areha nizetu ba'esh lekhu venibneh 'et khomat yerushalim velo nihyeh 'od kherpah. va'agid lahem 'et yad 'elohai 'asher hi tobah 'alai ve'af dibrei hamelekh 'asher 'amar li vayomeru naqum ubaninu vaykhazequ yedeihem latobah. vayishma' sanbalat hakhoroni vetobiyah ha'ebed ha'amoni vegeshem ha'arbi vayal'igu lanu vayibzu 'aleinu vayomeru mah hadabar hazeh 'asher 'atem 'osim ha'al hamelekh 'atem moredim. va'ashib 'otam dabar va'omar lahem 'elohei hashamayim hu yazliakh lanu va'anakhnu 'abadav naqum ubaninu velakhem 'en kheileq uzedaqah vezikaron birushalim. vayaqam 'elyashib hakohen hagadol ve'ekhav hakohanim vayibnu 'et sha'ar hazon hemah qideshuhu vaya'amidu daltotav ve'ad migdal hamei'ah qideshuhu 'ad migdal khanan'el. ve'al yado banu 'anshei yereikho ve'al yado banah zakur ben 'imri. ve'et sha'ar hadagim banu benei hasena'ah hemah qeiruhu vaya'amidu daltotav man'ulav uberikhav. ve'al yadam hekheziq mereimot ben 'uriyah ben haqoz ve'al yadam hekheziq meshulam ben berekhyah ben mesheizab'el ve'al yadam hekheziq zadoq ben ba'ana. ve'al yadam hekheziqu hateqo'im ve'adireihem lo heibi'u zavaram ba'abodat 'adoneihem. ve'et sha'ar hayshanah hekheziqu yoyada' ben paseiakh umeshulam ben besodyah hemah qeiruhu vaya'amidu daltotav uman'ulav uberikhav. ve'al yadam hekheziq melatyah hagib'oni veyadon hameironoti 'anshei gib'on vehamizpah lekhisei pakhat 'eiber hanahar. 'al yado hekheziq 'uzi'el ben kharhayah zorfim ve'al yado hekheziq khananyah ben haraqakhim vaya'azbu yerushalim 'ad hakhomah harekhabah. ve'al yadam hekheziq refayah ben khur sar khazi pelekh yerushalim. ve'al yadam hekheziq yedayah ben kharumaf veneged beito ve'al yado hekheziq khatush ben khashabneyah. midah sheinit hekheziq malkiyah ben kharim vekhashub ben pakhat mo'ab ve'et migdal hatanurim. ve'al yado hekheziq shalum ben halokhesh sar khazi pelekh yerushalim hu ubenotav. 'et sha'ar hagai hekheziq khanun veyoshebei zanoakh hemah banuhu vaya'amidu daltotav man'ulav uberikhav ve'elef 'amah bakhomah 'ad sha'ar hashafot. ve'et sha'ar ha'ashpot hekheziq malkiyah ben reikhab sar pelekh bet hakarem hu yibnenu veya'amid daltotav man'ulav uberikhav. ve'et sha'ar ha'ayin hekheziq shalun ben kal khozeh sar pelekh hamizpah hu yibnenu vitalenu veya'amidu veya'amid daltotav man'ulav uberikhav ve'et khomat bereikhat hashelakh legan hamelekh ve'ad hama'alot hayordot mei'ir david. 'akharav hekheziq nekhemyah ben 'azbuq sar khazi pelekh bet zur 'ad neged qibrei david ve'ad habereikhah ha'asuyah ve'ad bet hagiborim. 'akharav hekheziqu halviyim rekhum ben bani 'al yado hekheziq khashabyah sar khazi felekh qe'ilah lefilko. 'akharav hekheziqu 'akheihem bavai ben kheinadad sar khazi pelekh qe'ilah. vaykhazeq 'al yado 'eizer ben yeishua' sar hamizpah midah sheinit mineged 'alot hanesheq hamiqzoa'. 'akharav hekherah hekheziq barukh ben zabai zakai midah sheinit min hamiqzoa' 'ad petakh bet 'elyashib hakohen hagadol. 'akharav hekheziq mereimot ben 'uriyah ben haqoz midah sheinit mipetakh bet 'elyashib ve'ad takhlit bet 'elyashib. ve'akharav hekheziqu hakohanim 'anshei hakikar. 'akharav hekheziq binyamin vekhashub neged beitam 'akharav hekheziq 'azaryah ben ma'aseiyah ben 'ananeyah 'eizel beito. 'akharav hekheziq binui ben kheinadad midah sheinit mibet 'azaryah 'ad hamiqzoa' ve'ad hapinah. palal ben 'uzai mineged hamiqzoa' vehamigdal hayozei mibet hamelekh ha'elyon 'asher lakhazar hamatarah 'akharav pedayah ben par'osh. vehanetinim hayu yoshebim ba'ofel 'ad neged sha'ar hamayim lamizrakh vehamigdal hayozei. 'akharav hekheziqu hateqo'im midah sheinit mineged hamigdal hagadol hayozei ve'ad khomat ha'ofel. mei'al sha'ar hasusim hekheziqu hakohanim 'ish leneged beito. 'akharav hekheziq zadoq ben 'imer neged beito ve'akharav hekheziq shema'yah ben shekhanyah shomer sha'ar hamizrakh. 'akharei 'akharav hekheziq khananyah ben shelemyah vekhanun ben zalaf hashishi midah sheini 'akharav hekheziq meshulam ben berekhyah neged nishkato. 'akharei 'akharav hekheziq malkiyah ben hazorefi 'ad bet hanetinim veharokhelim neged sha'ar hamifqad ve'ad 'aliyat hapinah. uben 'aliyat hapinah lesha'ar hazon hekheziqu hazorefim veharokhelim. yehi ka'asher shama' sanbalat ki 'anakhnu bonim 'et hakhomah vayikhar lo vayikh'as harbeh vayal'eg 'al hayehudim. vayomer lifnei 'ekhav vekhel shomeron vayomer mah hayehudim ha'ameilalim 'osim haya'azbu lahem hayizbakhu haykhalu bayom haykhayu 'et ha'abanim mei'areimot he'afar vehemah serufot. vetobiyah ha'amoni 'ezlo vayomer gam 'asher hem bonim 'im ya'aleh shu'al ufaraz khomat 'abneihem. shema' 'eloheinu ki hayinu buzah vehasheb kherpatam 'el rosham utenem lebizah be'erez shibyah. ve'al tekhas 'al 'avonam vekhatatam milefanekha 'al timakheh ki hikh'isu leneged habonim. vanibneh 'et hakhomah vatiqasher kal hakhomah 'ad khezyah vayhi leb la'am la'asot. vayhi kha'asher shama' sanbalat vetobiyah veha'arbim veha'amonim veha'ashdodim ki 'aletah 'arukhah lekhomot yerushalim ki heikhelu haperuzim lehisatem vayikhar lahem me'od. vayiqsheru khulam yakhdav labo lehilakhem birushalim vela'asot lo to'ah. vanitpalel 'el 'eloheinu vana'amid mishmar 'aleihem yomam valaylah mipeneihem. vayomer yehudah kashal koakh hasabal vehe'afar harbeh va'anakhnu lo nukhal libnot bakhomah. vayomeru zareinu lo yeide'u velo yir'u 'ad 'asher nabo 'el tokham vaharagnum vehishbatnu 'et hamelakhah. vayhi ka'asher ba'u hayehudim hayoshebim 'ezlam vayomeru lanu 'eser pe'amim mikal hameqomot 'asher tashubu 'aleinu. va'a'amid mitakhtiyot lamaqom mei'akharei lakhomah bazekhikhiyim bazekhikhim va'a'amid 'et ha'am lemishpakhot 'im kharboteihem ramekheihem veqashetoteihem. va'eire va'aqum va'omar 'el hakhorim ve'el haseganim ve'el yeter ha'am 'al tire'u mipeneihem 'et 'adonai hagadol vehanora zekhoru vehilakhamu 'al 'akheikhem beneikhem ubenoteikhem nesheikhem ubateikhem. vayhi ka'asher shame'u 'oybeinu ki noda' lanu vayafer ha'elohim 'et 'azatam vanashub vanashab kulanu 'el hakhomah 'ish 'el melakhto. vayhi min hayom hahu khazi ne'arai 'osim bamelakhah vekhezyam makhaziqim veharemakhim hamaginim vehaqeshatot vehashiryonim vehasarim 'akharei kal bet yehudah. habonim bakhomah vehanose'im basebel 'omesim be'akhat yado 'oseh bamelakhah ve'akhat makhazeqet hashalakh. vehabonim 'ish kharbo 'asurim 'al matenav ubonim vehatoqeia' bashofar 'ezli. va'omar 'el hakhorim ve'el haseganim ve'el yeter ha'am hamelakhah harbeh urekhabah va'anakhnu nifradim 'al hakhomah rekhoqim 'ish mei'akhiv. bimqom 'asher tishme'u 'et qol hashofar shamah tiqabezu 'eileinu 'eloheinu yilakhem lanu. va'anakhnu 'osim bamelakhah vekhezyam makhaziqim baremakhim mei'alot hashakhar 'ad zet hakokhabim. gam ba'et hahi 'amarti la'am 'ish vena'aro yalinu betokh yerushalim vehayu lanu halaylah mishmar vehayom melakhah. ve'en 'ani ve'akhai une'arai ve'anshei hamishmar 'asher 'akharai 'en 'anakhnu foshetim begadeinu 'ish shilkho hamayim. vatehi za'aqat ha'am unesheihem gedolah 'el 'akheihem hayehudim. veyesh 'asher 'omerim baneinu ubenoteinu 'anakhnu rabim veniqkhah dagan venokhelah venikhyeh. veyesh 'asher 'omerim sedoteinu ukherameinu ubateinu 'anakhnu 'orebim veniqkhah dagan bara'ab. veyesh 'asher 'omerim lavinu khesef lemidat hamelekh sedoteinu ukherameinu. ve'atah kibsar 'akheinu besareinu kibneihem baneinu vehineh 'anakhnu khobeshim 'et baneinu ve'et benoteinu la'abadim veyesh mibenoteinu nikhbashot ve'en le'el yadeinu usedoteinu ukherameinu la'akheirim. vayikhar li me'od ka'asher shama'ti 'et za'aqatam ve'et hadebarim ha'eleh. vayimalekh libi 'alai va'aribah 'et hakhorim ve'et haseganim va'omerah lahem masha 'ish be'akhiv 'atem noshim va'eten 'aleihem qehilah gedolah. va'omerah lahem 'anakhnu qaninu 'et 'akheinu hayehudim hanimkarim lagoyim kedei banu vegam 'atem timkeru 'et 'akheikhem venimkeru lanu vayakharishu velo maze'u dabar. vayomer va'omar lo tob hadabar 'asher 'atem 'osim halo beyir'at 'eloheinu teileikhu meikherpat hagoyim 'oybeinu. vegam 'ani 'akhai une'arai noshim bahem kesef vedagan na'azbah na 'et hamasha hazeh. hashibu na lahem kehayom sedoteihem karmeihem zeiteihem ubateihem ume'at hakesef vehadagan hatirosh vehayizhar 'asher 'atem noshim bahem. vayomeru nashib umeihem lo nebaqesh ken na'aseh ka'asher 'atah 'omer va'eqra 'et hakohanim va'ashbi'em la'asot kadabar hazeh. gam khazeni na'arti va'omerah kakhah yena'er ha'elohim 'et kal ha'ish 'asher lo yaqim 'et hadabar hazeh mibeito umigi'o vekhakhah yihyeh na'ur vareq vayomeru khal haqahal 'amen vayhalu 'et ihoh vaya'as ha'am kadabar hazeh. gam miyom 'asher zivah 'oti lihyot pekham be'erez yehudah mishenat 'esrim ve'ad shenat sheloshim ushetayim le'artakhshast hamelekh shanim shetem 'esreh 'ani ve'akhai lekhem hapekhah lo 'akhalti. vehapakhot harishonim 'asher lefanai hikhbidu 'al ha'am vayiqkhu meihem belekhem vayayin 'akhar kesef sheqalim 'arba'im gam na'areihem shaletu 'al ha'am va'ani lo 'asiti khen mipenei yir'at 'elohim. vegam bimlekhet hakhomah hazot hekhezaqti vesadeh lo qaninu vekhal ne'arai qebuzim sham 'al hamelakhah. vehayehudim vehaseganim mei'ah vakhamishim 'ish vehaba'im 'eileinu min hagoyim 'asher sebiboteinu 'al shulkhani. va'asher hayah na'aseh leyom 'ekhad shor 'ekhad zon shesh berurot veziporim na'asu li uben 'aseret yamim bekhal yayin leharbeh ve'im zeh lekhem hapekhah lo biqashti ki khabedah ha'abodah 'al ha'am hazeh. zakherah li 'elohai letobah kol 'asher 'asiti 'al ha'am hazeh. vayhi kha'asher nishma' lesanbalat vetobiyah ulegeshem ha'arbi uleyeter 'oyebeinu ki baniti 'et hakhomah velo notar bah parez gam 'ad ha'et hahi delatot lo he'emadti bashe'arim. vayishlakh sanbalat vegeshem 'eilai leimor lekhah veniva'adah yakhdav bakefirim bebiq'at 'ono vehemah khoshebim la'asot li ra'ah. va'eshlekhah 'aleihem mal'akhim leimor melakhah gedolah 'ani 'oseh velo 'ukhal laredet lamah tishbat hamelakhah ka'asher 'arpeha veyaradti 'aleikhem. vayishlekhu 'eilai kadabar hazeh 'arba' pe'amim va'ashib 'otam kadabar hazeh. vayishlakh 'eilai sanbalat kadabar hazeh pa'am khamishit 'et na'aro ve'igeret petukhah beyado. katub bah bagoyim nishma' vegashmu 'omer 'atah vehayehudim khoshebim limrod 'al ken 'atah boneh hakhomah ve'atah hoeh lahem lemelekh kadebarim ha'eleh. vegam nebi'im he'emadta liqro 'alekha birushalim leimor melekh bihudah ve'atah yishama' lamelekh kadebarim ha'eleh ve'atah lekhah veniva'azah yakhdav. va'eshlekhah 'eilav leimor lo nihyah kadebarim ha'eleh 'asher 'atah 'omer ki milibekha 'atah bodam ki khulam meyare'im 'otanu leimor yirpu yedeihem min hamelakhah velo tei'aseh ve'atah khazeq 'et yadai. va'ani bati bet shema'yah ben delayah ben meheitab'el vehu 'azur vayomer niva'ed 'el bet ha'elohim 'el tokh haheikhal venisgerah daltot haheikhal ki ba'im leharegekha velaylah ba'im leharegekha. va'omerah ha'ish kamoni yibrakh umi khamoni 'asher yabo 'el haheikhal vakhai lo 'abo. va'akirah vehineh lo 'elohim shelakho ki hanebu'ah diber 'alai vetobiyah vesanbalat sekharo. lema'an sakhur hu lema'an 'ira ve'e'eseh ken vekhatati vehayah lahem leshem ra' lema'an yekharefuni. zakherah 'elohai letobiyah ulesanbalat kema'asav 'eleh vegam leno'adyah hanebi'ah uleyeter hanebi'im 'asher hayu meyare'im 'oti. vatishlam hakhomah be'esrim vakhamishah le'elul lakhamishim ushenayim yom. vayhi ka'asher shame'u kal 'oybeinu vayir'u kal hagoyim 'asher sebiboteinu vayipelu me'od be'eineihem vayeide'u ki mei'et 'eloheinu ne'estah hamelakhah hazot. gam bayamim hahem marbim khorei yehudah 'igeroteihem holkhot 'al tobiyah va'asher letobiyah ba'ot 'aleihem. ki rabim bihudah ba'alei shebu'ah lo ki khatan hu lishkhanyah ben 'arakh vihokhanan beno laqakh 'et bat meshulam ben berekhyah. gam tobotav hayu 'omerim lefanai udebarai hayu mozi'im lo 'igerot shalakh tobiyah leyare'eini. vayhi ka'asher nibnetah hakhomah va'a'amid hadelatot vayipaqedu hasho'arim vehamshorerim vehalviyim. va'azaveh 'et khanani 'akhi ve'et khananyah sar habirah 'al yerushalim ki hu ke'ish 'emet veyarei 'et ha'elohim meirabim. vayomer va'omar lahem lo yipatekhu sha'arei yerushalim 'ad khom hashemesh ve'ad hem 'omedim yagifu hadelatot ve'ekhozu veha'amed mishmerot yoshebei yerushalim 'ish bemishmaro ve'ish neged beito. veha'ir rakhabat yadayim ugedolah veha'am me'at betokhah ve'en batim benuyim. vayiten 'elohai 'el libi va'eqbezah 'et hakhorim ve'et haseganim ve'et ha'am lehityakhes va'emza seifer hayakhas ha'olim barishonah va'emza katub bo. 'eleh benei hamedinah ha'olim mishebi hagolah 'asher heglah nebukhadnezar melekh babel vayashubu lirushalim velihudah 'ish le'iro. haba'im 'im zerubabel yeishua' nekhemyah 'azaryah ra'amyah nakhamani maredokhai bilshan misperet bigvai nekhum ba'anah mispar 'anshei 'am yisra'el. benei far'osh 'alpayim mei'ah veshib'im ushenayim. benei shefatyah shelosh mei'ot shib'im ushenayim. benei 'arakh shesh mei'ot khamishim ushenayim. benei fakhat mo'ab libnei yeishua' veyo'ab 'alpayim ushemoneh mei'ot shemonah 'asar. benei 'eilam 'elef matayim khamishim ve'arba'ah. benei zatu shemoneh mei'ot 'arba'im vakhamishah. benei zakai sheba' mei'ot veshishim. benei binui shesh mei'ot 'arba'im ushemonah. benei beibai shesh mei'ot 'esrim ushemonah. benei 'azgad 'alpayim shelosh mei'ot 'esrim ushenayim. benei 'adoniqam shesh mei'ot shishim veshib'ah. benei bigvai 'alpayim shishim veshib'ah. benei 'adin shesh mei'ot khamishim vakhamishah. benei 'ater lekhizqiyah tish'im ushemonah. benei khashum shelosh mei'ot 'esrim ushemonah. benei beizai shelosh mei'ot 'esrim ve'arba'ah. benei kharif mei'ah shenem 'asar. benei gib'on tish'im vakhamishah. 'anshei bet lekhem unetofah mei'ah shemonim ushemonah. 'anshei 'anatot mei'ah 'esrim ushemonah. 'anshei bet 'azmavet 'arba'im ushenayim. 'anshei qiryat ye'arim kefirah ube'eirot sheba' mei'ot 'arba'im usheloshah. 'anshei haramah vagaba' shesh mei'ot 'esrim ve'ekhad. 'anshei mikhmas mei'ah ve'esrim ushenayim. 'anshei bet 'el veha'ai mei'ah 'esrim usheloshah. 'anshei nebo 'akher khamishim ushenayim. benei 'eilam 'akher 'elef matayim khamishim ve'arba'ah. benei kharim shelosh mei'ot ve'esrim. benei yereikho shelosh mei'ot 'arba'im vakhamishah. benei lod khadid ve'ono sheba' mei'ot ve'esrim ve'ekhad. benei sena'ah sheloshet 'alafim tesha' mei'ot usheloshim. hakohanim benei yeda'yah lebet yeishua' tesha' mei'ot shib'im usheloshah. benei 'imer 'elef khamishim ushenayim. benei fashkhur 'elef matayim 'arba'im veshib'ah. benei kharim 'elef shib'ah 'asar. halviyim benei yeishua' leqadmi'el libnei lehodvah shib'im ve'arba'ah. hamshorerim benei 'asaf mei'ah 'arba'im ushemonah. hasho'arim benei shalum benei 'ater benei talmon benei 'aqub benei khatita benei shobai mei'ah sheloshim ushemonah. hanetinim benei zikha benei khasufa benei taba'ot. benei qeiros benei si'a benei fadon. benei lebanah benei khagabah benei shalmai. benei khanan benei gidel benei gakhar. benei re'ayah benei rezin benei neqoda. benei gazam benei 'uza benei faseiakh. benei beisai benei me'unim benei nefushesim nefishesim. benei baqbuq benei khaqufa benei kharkhur. benei bazlit benei mekhida benei kharsha. benei barqos benei sisera benei tamakh. benei neziakh benei khatifa. benei 'abdei shelomoh benei sotai benei soferet benei ferida. benei ya'la benei darqon benei gidel. benei shefatyah benei khatil benei pokheret hazebayim benei 'amon. kal hanetinim ubenei 'abdei shelomoh shelosh mei'ot tish'im ushenayim. ve'eleh ha'olim mitel melakh tel kharsha kerub 'adon ve'imer velo yakhelu lehagid bet 'abotam vezar'am 'im miyisra'el hem. benei delayah benei tobiyah benei neqoda shesh mei'ot ve'arba'im ushenayim. umin hakohanim benei khobayah benei haqoz benei barzilai 'asher laqakh mibenot barzilai hagil'adi 'ishah vayiqarei 'al shemam. 'eleh biqshu khetabam hamityakhsim velo nimza vaygo'alu min hakehunah. vayomer hatirshata lahem 'asher lo yokhelu miqodesh haqodashim 'ad 'amod hakohen le'urim vetumim. kal haqahal ke'ekhad 'arba' ribo 'alpayim shelosh mei'ot veshishim. milebad 'abdeihem ve'amhoteihem 'eleh shib'at 'alafim shelosh mei'ot sheloshim veshib'ah velahem meshorarim umeshorarot matayim ve'arba'im vakhamishah. gemalim 'arba' mei'ot sheloshim vakhamishah khamorim sheishet 'alafim sheba' mei'ot ve'esrim. umiqzat rashei ha'abot natenu lamelakhah hatirshata natan la'ozar zahab darkemonim 'elef mizraqot khamishim katenot kohanim sheloshim vakhamesh mei'ot. umeirashei ha'abot natenu le'ozar hamelakhah zahab darkemonim shetei ribot vekhesef manim 'alpayim umatayim. va'asher natenu she'eirit ha'am zahab darkemonim shetei ribo vekhesef manim 'alpayim vekhatenot kohanim shishim veshib'ah. vayeishebu hakohanim vehalviyim vehasho'arim vehamshorerim umin ha'am vehanetinim vekhal yisra'el be'areihem vayiga' hakhodesh hashebi'i ubenei yisra'el be'areihem. vayei'asefu khal ha'am ke'ish 'ekhad 'el harekhob 'asher lifnei sha'ar hamayim vayomeru le'ezra hasofer lehabi 'et seifer torat mosheh 'asher zivah ihoh 'et yisra'el. vayabi 'ezra hakohen 'et hatorah lifnei haqahal mei'ish ve'ad 'ishah vekhol meibin lishmoa' beyom 'ekhad lakhodesh hashebi'i. vayiqra bo lifnei harekhob 'asher lifnei sha'ar hamayim min ha'or 'ad makhazit hayom neged ha'anashim vehanashim vehamebinim ve'azenei khal ha'am 'el seifer hatorah. vaya'amod 'ezra hasofer 'al migdal 'ez 'asher 'asu ladabar vaya'amod 'ezlo matityah veshema' va'anayah ve'uriyah vekhilqiyah uma'aseiyah 'al yemino umisemolo pedayah umisha'el umalkiyah vekhashum vekhashbadanah zekharyah meshulam. vayiftakh 'ezra haseifer le'einei khal ha'am ki mei'al kal ha'am hayah ukhefitkho 'amedu khal ha'am. vaybarekh 'ezra 'et ihoh ha'elohim hagadol vaya'anu khal ha'am 'amen 'amen bemo'al yedeihem vayiqedu vayishtakhavu ihoh 'apayim 'arezah. veyeishua' ubani vesheireibeyah yamin 'aqub shabetai hodiyah ma'aseiyah qelita 'azaryah yozabad khanan pelayah vehalviyim mebinim 'et ha'am latorah veha'am 'al 'amedam. vayiqre'u baseifer betorat ha'elohim meforash vesom sekhel vayabinu bamiqra. vayomer nekhemyah hu hatirshata ve'ezra hakohen hasofer vehalviyim hamebinim 'et ha'am lekhal ha'am hayom qadosh hu ihoh 'eloheikhem 'al tit'abelu ve'al tibku ki bokhim kal ha'am keshame'am 'et dibrei hatorah. vayomer lahem lekhu 'ikhlu mashmanim ushetu mamtaqim veshilkhu manot le'en nakhon lo ki qadosh hayom la'adoneinu ve'al tei'azeibu ki khedvat ihoh hi ma'uzekhem. vehalviyim makhshim lekhal ha'am leimor hasu ki hayom qadosh ve'al tei'azeibu. vayeilekhu khal ha'am le'ekhol velishtot uleshalakh manot vela'asot simkhah gedolah ki heibinu badebarim 'asher hodi'u lahem. ubayom hasheini ne'esfu rashei ha'abot lekhal ha'am hakohanim vehalviyim 'el 'ezra hasofer ulehaskil 'el dibrei hatorah. vayimze'u katub batorah 'asher zivah ihoh beyad mosheh 'asher yeishebu benei yisra'el basukot bekhag bakhodesh hashebi'i. va'asher yashmi'u veya'abiru qol bekhal 'areihem ubirushalim leimor ze'u hahar vehabi'u 'alei zayit va'alei 'ez shemen va'alei hadas va'alei temarim va'alei 'ez 'abot la'asot sukot kakatub. vayeize'u ha'am vayabi'u vaya'asu lahem sukot 'ish 'al gago ubekhazroteihem ubekhazrot bet ha'elohim ubirkhob sha'ar hamayim ubirkhob sha'ar 'efrayim. vaya'asu khal haqahal hashabim min hashebi sukot vayeishebu basukot ki lo 'asu mimei yeishua' bin nun ken benei yisra'el 'ad hayom hahu vatehi simkhah gedolah me'od. vayiqra beseifer torat ha'elohim yom beyom min hayom harishon 'ad hayom ha'akharon vaya'asu khag shib'at yamim ubayom hashemini 'azeret kamishpat. ubeyom 'esrim ve'arba'ah lakhodesh hazeh ne'esfu benei yisra'el bezom ubesaqim va'adamah 'aleihem. vayibadelu zera' yisra'el mikol benei neikhar vaya'amdu vayitvadu 'al khatoteihem va'avonot 'aboteihem. vayaqumu 'al 'amedam vayiqre'u beseifer torat ihoh 'eloheihem rebi'it hayom urebi'it mitvadim umishtakhavim ihoh 'eloheihem. vayaqam 'al ma'aleh halviyim yeishua' ubani qadmi'el shebanyah buni sheireibeyah bani khenani vayiz'aqu beqol gadol 'el ihoh 'eloheihem. vayomeru halviyim yeishua' veqadmi'el bani khashabneyah sheireibeyah hodiyah shebanyah fetakhyah qumu barakhu 'et ihoh 'eloheikhem min ha'olam 'ad ha'olam vibarekhu shem kebodekha umeromam 'al kal berakhah utehilah. 'atah hu ihoh lebadekha 'at 'atah 'asita 'et hashamayim shemei hashamayim vekhal zeba'am ha'arez vekhal 'asher 'aleha hayamim vekhal 'asher bahem ve'atah mekhayeh 'et kulam uzeba hashamayim lekha mishtakhavim. 'atah hu ihoh ha'elohim 'asher bakharta be'abram vehozeito mei'ur kasdim vesamta shemo 'abraham. umazata 'et lebabo ne'eman lefanekha vekharot 'imo haberit latet 'et 'erez hakena'ani hakhiti ha'emori vehaperizi vehaybusi vehagirgashi latet lezar'o vataqem 'et debarekha ki zadiq 'atah. vateire 'et 'oni 'aboteinu bemizrayim ve'et za'aqatam shama'ta 'al yam suf. vatiten 'otot umofetim befar'oh ubekhal 'abadav ubekhal 'am 'arzo ki yada'ta ki heizidu 'aleihem vata'as lekha shem kehayom hazeh. vehayam baqa'ta lifneihem vaya'abru betokh hayam bayabashah ve'et rodefeihem hishlakhta bimzolot kemo 'eben bemayim 'azim. ube'amud 'anan hinkhitam yomam ube'amud 'esh laylah leha'ir lahem 'et haderekh 'asher yeilekhu bah. ve'al har sinai yaradta vedaber 'imahem mishamayim vatiten lahem mishpatim yesharim vetorot 'emet khuqim umizvot tobim. ve'et shabat qadshekha hoda'ata lahem umizvot vekhuqim vetorah zivita lahem beyad mosheh 'abdekha. velekhem mishamayim natatah lahem lir'abam umayim misela' hozeita lahem lizma'am vatomer lahem labo lareshet 'et ha'arez 'asher nasata 'et yadekha latet lahem. vehem va'aboteinu heizidu vayaqshu 'et 'arepam velo shame'u 'el mizvotekha. vayma'anu lishmoa' velo zakheru nifle'otekha 'asher 'asita 'imahem vayaqshu 'et 'arepam vayitenu rosh lashub le'abdutam bemiryam ve'atah 'eloah selikhot khanun verakhum 'erekh 'apayim verab vekhesed khesed velo 'azabtam. 'af ki 'asu lahem 'eigel maseikhah vayomeru zeh 'elohekha 'asher he'elkha mimizrayim vaya'asu ne'azot gedolot. ve'atah berakhamekha harabim lo 'azabtam bamidbar 'et 'amud he'anan lo sar mei'aleihem beyomam lehankhotam behaderekh ve'et 'amud ha'esh belaylah leha'ir lahem ve'et haderekh 'asher yeilekhu bah. verukhakha hatobah natata lehaskilam umankha lo mana'ta mipihem umayim natatah lahem lizma'am. ve'arba'im shanah kilkaltam bamidbar lo khaseiru salmoteihem lo balu veragleihem lo bazeiqu. vatiten lahem mamlakhot va'amamim vatakhleqem lefei'ah vayireshu 'et 'erez sikhon ve'et 'erez melekh kheshbon ve'et 'erez 'og melekh habashan. ubeneihem hirbita kekhokhebei hashamayim vatebi'em 'el ha'arez 'asher 'amarta la'aboteihem labo larashet. vayabo'u habanim vayireshu 'et ha'arez vatakhna' lifneihem 'et yoshebei ha'arez hakena'anim vatitenem beyadam ve'et malkheihem ve'et 'amei ha'arez la'asot bahem kirzonam. vayilkedu 'arim bezurot va'adamah shemeinah vayireshu batim melei'im kal tub borot khazubim keramim vezeitim ve'ez ma'akhal larob vayokhelu vayisbe'u vayashminu vayit'adenu betubekha hagadol. vayamru vayimredu bakh vayashlikhu 'et toratekha 'akharei gavam ve'et nebi'ekha haragu 'asher hei'idu bam lahashibam 'eilekha vaya'asu ne'azot gedolot. vatitenem beyad zareihem vayazeiru lahem ube'et zaratam yiz'aqu 'eilekha ve'atah mishamayim tishma' ukherakhamekha harabim titen lahem moshi'im veyoshi'um miyad zareihem. ukhenoakh lahem yashubu la'asot ra' lefanekha vata'azbem beyad 'oyebeihem vayirdu bahem vayashubu vayiz'aqukha ve'atah mishamayim tishma' vetazilem kerakhamekha rabot 'itim. vata'ad bahem lahashibam 'el toratekha vehemah heizidu velo shame'u lemizvotekha ubemishpatekha khate'u bam 'asher ya'aseh 'adam vekhayah bahem vayitenu khatef soreret ve'arepam hiqshu velo shamei'u. vatimshokh 'aleihem shanim rabot vata'ad bam berukhakha beyad nebi'ekha velo he'ezinu vatitenem beyad 'amei ha'arazot. uberakhamekha harabim lo 'asitam kalah velo 'azabtam ki 'el khanun verakhum 'atah. ve'atah 'eloheinu ha'el hagadol hagibor vehanora shomer haberit vehakhesed 'al yim'at lefanekha 'et kal hatela'ah 'asher meza'atnu limlakheinu lesareinu ulekhohaneinu velinbi'einu vela'aboteinu ulekhal 'amekha mimei malkhei 'ashur 'ad hayom hazeh. ve'atah zadiq 'al kal haba 'aleinu ki 'emet 'asita va'anakhnu hirsha'enu. ve'et melakheinu sareinu kohaneinu va'aboteinu lo 'asu toratekha velo hiqshibu 'el mizvotekha ule'eidevotekha 'asher ha'idota bahem. vehem bemalkhutam ubetubekha harab 'asher natata lahem ube'erez harekhabah vehashemeinah 'asher natata lifneihem lo 'abadukha velo shabu mima'aleihem hara'im. hineh 'anakhnu hayom 'abadim veha'arez 'asher natatah la'aboteinu le'ekhol 'et piryah ve'et tubah hineh 'anakhnu 'abadim 'aleha. utebu'atah marbah lamelakhim 'asher natatah 'aleinu bekhatoteinu ve'al geviyoteinu moshelim ubibhemteinu kirzonam ubezarah gedolah 'anakhenu. ubekhal zot 'anakhnu koretim 'amanah vekhotebim ve'al hekhatum sareinu leviyeinu kohaneinu. ve'al hakhatumim nekhemyah hatirshata ben khakhalyah vezidqiyah. serayah 'azaryah yirmeyah. pashkhur 'amaryah malkiyah. khatush shebanyah malukh. kharim mereimot 'obadyah. daniyel gineton barukh. meshulam 'abiyah miyamin. ma'azyah bilgai shema'yah 'eleh hakohanim. vehalviyim veyeishua' ben 'azanyah binui mibenei kheinadad qadmi'el. va'akheihem shebanyah hodiyah qelita pelayah khanan. mikha rekhob khashabyah. zakur sheireibeyah shebanyah. hodiyah bani beninu. rashei ha'am par'osh pakhat mo'ab 'eilam zatu bani. buni 'azgad beibai. 'adoniyah bigvai 'adin. 'ater khizqiyah 'azur. hodiyah khashum beizai. kharif 'anatot nobai neibai. magpi'ash meshulam kheizir. mesheizab'el zadoq yadua'. pelatyah khanan 'anayah. hosheia' khananyah khashub. halokhesh pilkha shobeq. rekhum khashabnah ma'aseiyah. va'akhiyah khanan 'anan. malukh kharim ba'anah. ushe'ar ha'am hakohanim halviyim hasho'arim hamshorerim hanetinim vekhal hanibdal mei'amei ha'arazot 'el torat ha'elohim nesheihem beneihem ubenoteihem kol yodeia' meibin. makhaziqim 'al 'akheihem 'adireihem uba'im be'alah ubishbu'ah lalekhet betorat ha'elohim 'asher nitenah beyad mosheh 'ebed ha'elohim velishmor vela'asot 'et kal mizvot ihoh 'adoneinu umishpatav vekhuqav. va'asher lo niten benoteinu le'amei ha'arez ve'et benoteihem lo niqakh lebaneinu. ve'amei ha'arez hambi'im 'et hamaqakhot vekhal sheber beyom hashabat limkor lo niqakh meihem bashabat ubeyom qodesh venitosh 'et hashanah hashebi'it umasha khal yad. vehe'emadnu 'aleinu mizvot latet 'aleinu shelishit hasheqel bashanah la'abodat bet 'eloheinu. lelekhem hama'arekhet uminkhat hatamid ule'olat hatamid hashabatot hekhodashim lamo'adim velaqodashim velakhata'ot lekhaper 'al yisra'el vekhol melekhet bet 'eloheinu. vehagoralot hipalnu 'al qurban ha'eizim hakohanim halviyim veha'am lehabi lebet 'eloheinu lebet 'aboteinu le'itim mezumanim shanah beshanah leba'er 'al mizbakh ihoh 'eloheinu kakatub batorah. ulehabi 'et bikurei 'admateinu ubikurei kal peri khal 'ez shanah beshanah lebet ihoh. ve'et bekhorot baneinu ubehemteinu kakatub batorah ve'et bekhorei beqareinu vezoneinu lehabi lebet 'eloheinu lakohanim hamsharetim bebet 'eloheinu. ve'et reishit 'arisoteinu uterumoteinu uferi khal 'ez tirosh veyizhar nabi lakohanim 'el lishkhot bet 'eloheinu uma'sar 'admateinu lalviyim vehem halviyim ham'aserim bekhol 'arei 'abodateinu. vehayah hakohen ben 'aharon 'im halviyim ba'ser halviyim vehalviyim ya'alu 'et ma'asar hama'aser lebet 'eloheinu 'el haleshakhot lebet ha'ozar. ki 'el haleshakhot yabi'u benei yisra'el ubenei haleivi 'et terumat hadagan hatirosh vehayizhar vesham kelei hamiqdash vehakohanim hamsharetim vehasho'arim vehamshorerim velo na'azob 'et bet 'eloheinu. vayeishebu sarei ha'am birushalim ushe'ar ha'am hipilu goralot lehabi 'ekhad min ha'asarah lashebet birushalim 'ir haqodesh veteisha' hayadot be'arim. vaybarakhu ha'am lekhol ha'anashim hamitnadebim lashebet birushalim. ve'eleh rashei hamedinah 'asher yashebu birushalim ube'arei yehudah yashebu 'ish ba'akhuzato be'areihem yisra'el hakohanim vehalviyim vehanetinim ubenei 'abdei shelomoh. ubirushalim yashebu mibenei yehudah umibenei binyamin mibenei yehudah 'atayah ben 'uziyah ben zekharyah ben 'amaryah ben shefatyah ben mahalal'el mibenei farez. uma'aseiyah ben barukh ben kal khozeh ben khazayah ben 'adayah ben yoyarib ben zekharyah ben hashiloni kal benei ferez hayoshebim birushalim 'arba' mei'ot shishim ushemonah 'anshei khayil. ve'eleh benei binyamin salu ben meshulam ben yo'ed ben pedayah ben qolayah ben ma'aseiyah ben 'iti'el ben yesha'yah. ve'akharav gabai salai tesha' mei'ot 'esrim ushemonah. veyo'el ben zikhri paqid 'aleihem vihudah ben hasenu'ah 'al ha'ir mishneh. min hakohanim yeda'yah ben yoyarib yakhin. serayah ben khilqiyah ben meshulam ben zadoq ben merayot ben 'akhitub negid bet ha'elohim. va'akheihem 'osei hamelakhah labayit shemoneh mei'ot 'esrim ushenayim va'adayah ben yerokham ben pelalyah ben 'amzi ben zekharyah ben pashkhur ben malkiyah. ve'ekhav rashim le'abot matayim 'arba'im ushenayim va'amashsai ben 'azar'el ben 'akhzai ben meshileimot ben 'imer. va'akheihem giborei khayil mei'ah 'esrim ushemonah ufaqid 'aleihem zabdi'el ben hagedolim. umin halviyim shema'yah ben khashub ben 'azriqam ben khashabyah ben buni. veshabetai veyozabad 'al hamelakhah hakhizonah lebet ha'elohim meirashei halviyim. umatanyah ben mikhah ben zabdi ben 'asaf rosh hatekhilah yehodeh latefilah ubaqbuqyah mishneh mei'ekhav ve'abda ben shamua' ben galal ben yeditun yedutun. kal halviyim be'ir haqodesh matayim shemonim ve'arba'ah. vehasho'arim 'aqub talmon va'akheihem hashomerim bashe'arim mei'ah shib'im ushenayim. ushe'ar yisra'el hakohanim halviyim bekhal 'arei yehudah 'ish benakhalato. vehanetinim yoshebim ba'ofel vezikha vegishpa 'al hanetinim. ufeqid halviyim birushalim 'uzi ben bani ben khashabyah ben matanyah ben mikha mibenei 'asaf hamshorerim leneged melekhet bet ha'elohim. ki mizvat hamelekh 'aleihem va'amanah 'al hamshorerim debar yom beyomo. ufetakhyah ben mesheizab'el mibenei zerakh ben yehudah leyad hamelekh lekhal dabar la'am. ve'el hakhazeirim bisdotam mibenei yehudah yashebu beqiryat ha'arba' ubenoteha ubedibon ubenoteha ubiqabze'el vakhazeireha. ubeyeishua' ubemoladah ubebet palet. ubakhazar shu'al ubib'er sheba' ubenoteha. ubeziqlag ubimkhonah ubibnoteha. ube'en rimon ubezare'ah ubeyarmut. zanoakh 'adulam vekhazreihem lakhish usedoteha 'azeiqah ubenoteha vayakhanu mibe'er sheba' 'ad gei hinom. ubenei binyamin migaba' mikhmas ve'ayah ubet 'el ubenoteha. 'anatot nob 'ananeyah. khazor ramah gitayim. khadid zebo'im nebalat. lod ve'ono gei hakharashim. umin halviyim makhleqot yehudah lebinyamin. ve'eleh hakohanim vehalviyim 'asher 'alu 'im zerubabel ben she'alti'el veyeishua' serayah yirmeyah 'ezra. 'amaryah malukh khatush. shekhanyah rekhum mereimot. 'ido gineto 'abiyah. miyamin ma'adyah bilgah. shema'yah veyoyarib yeda'yah. salu 'amoq khilqiyah yeda'yah 'eleh rashei hakohanim va'akheihem bimei yeishua'. vehalviyim yeishua' binui qadmi'el sheireibeyah yehudah matanyah 'al hyedot hu ve'ekhav ubaqbuqyah ve'uno ve'uni 'akheihem lenegdam lemishmarot. veyeishua' holid 'et yoyaqim veyoyaqim holid 'et 'elyashib ve'elyashib 'et yoyada'. veyoyada' holid 'et yonatan veyonatan holid 'et yadua'. ubimei yoyaqim hayu khohanim rashei ha'abot lisrayah merayah leyirmeyah khananyah. le'ezra meshulam la'amaryah yehokhanan. limlukhi limlikhu yonatan lishbanyah yosef. lekharim 'adna limrayot khelqai. la'adaya le'ido zekharyah legineton meshulam. la'abiyah zikhri leminyamin lemo'adyah piltai. lebilgah shamua' lishma'yah yehonatan. uleyoyarib matenai lida'yah 'uzi. lesalai qalai le'amoq 'eiber. lekhilqiyah khashabyah lida'yah netan'el. halviyim bimei 'elyashib yoyada' veyokhanan veyadua' ketubim rashei 'abot vehakohanim 'al malkhut dareyavesh haparesi. benei leivi rashei ha'abot ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim ve'ad yemei yokhanan ben 'elyashib. verashei halviyim khashabyah sheireibeyah veyeishua' ben qadmi'el va'akheihem lenegdam lehalel lehodot bemizvat david 'ish ha'elohim mishmar le'umat mishmar. matanyah ubaqbuqyah 'obadyah meshulam talmon 'aqub shomerim sho'arim mishmar ba'asupei hashe'arim. 'eleh bimei yoyaqim ben yeishua' ben yozadaq ubimei nekhemyah hapekhah ve'ezra hakohen hasofer. ubakhanukat khomat yerushalim biqshu 'et halviyim mikal meqomotam lahabi'am lirushalim la'asot khanukah vesimkhah ubetodot ubeshir meziltayim nebalim ubekhinorot. vayei'asefu benei hamshorerim umin hakikar sebibot yerushalim umin khazrei netofati. umibet hagilgal umisedot geba' ve'azmavet ki khazeirim banu lahem hamshorarim sebibot yerushalim. vayitaharu hakohanim vehalviyim vaytaharu 'et ha'am ve'et hashe'arim ve'et hakhomah. va'a'aleh 'et sarei yehudah mei'al lakhomah va'a'amidah shetei todot gedolot vetahalukhot layamin mei'al lakhomah lesha'ar ha'ashpot. vayeilekh 'akhareihem hosha'yah vakhazi sarei yehudah. va'azaryah 'ezra umeshulam. yehudah ubinyamin ushema'yah veyirmeyah. umibenei hakohanim bakhazozerot zekharyah ben yonatan ben shema'yah ben matanyah ben mikhayah ben zakur ben 'asaf. ve'ekhav shema'yah va'azar'el milalai gilalai ma'ai netan'el vihudah khanani bikhlei shir david 'ish ha'elohim ve'ezra hasofer lifneihem. ve'al sha'ar ha'ayin venegdam 'alu 'al ma'alot 'ir david bama'aleh lakhomah mei'al lebet david ve'ad sha'ar hamayim mizrakh. vehatodah hasheinit haholekhet lemol va'ani 'akhareha vakhazi ha'am mei'al lehakhomah mei'al lemigdal hatanurim ve'ad hakhomah harekhabah. umei'al lesha'ar 'efrayim ve'al sha'ar hayshanah ve'al sha'ar hadagim umigdal khanan'el umigdal hamei'ah ve'ad sha'ar hazon ve'amedu besha'ar hamatarah. vata'amodenah shetei hatodot bebet ha'elohim va'ani vakhazi haseganim 'imi. vehakohanim 'elyaqim ma'aseiyah minyamin mikhayah 'elyo'einai zekharyah khananyah bakhazozerot. uma'aseiyah ushema'yah ve'el'azar ve'uzi vihokhanan umalkiyah ve'eilam va'azer vayashmi'u hamshorerim veyizrakhyah hapaqid. vayizbekhu bayom hahu zebakhim gedolim vayismakhu ki ha'elohim simekham simkhah gedolah vegam hanashim vehayladim sameikhu vatishama' simkhat yerushalim meirakhoq. vayipaqedu bayom hahu 'anashim 'al haneshakhot la'ozarot laterumot lareishit velama'asrot likhnos bahem lisdei he'arim mena'ot hatorah lakohanim velalviyim ki simkhat yehudah 'al hakohanim ve'al halviyim ha'omedim. vayishmeru mishmeret 'eloheihem umishmeret hatahorah vehamshorerim vehasho'arim kemizvat david shelomoh beno. ki bimei david ve'asaf miqedem rosh rashei hamshorerim veshir tehilah vehodot leilohim. vekhal yisra'el bimei zerubabel ubimei nekhemyah notenim menayot hamshorerim vehasho'arim debar yom beyomo umaqdishim lalviyim vehalviyim maqdishim libnei 'aharon. bayom hahu niqra beseifer mosheh be'azenei ha'am venimza katub bo 'asher lo yabo 'amoni umo'abi biqhal ha'elohim 'ad 'olam. ki lo qidemu 'et benei yisra'el balekhem ubamayim vayiskor 'alav 'et bil'am leqalo vayahafokh 'eloheinu haqelalah librakhah. vayhi keshame'am 'et hatorah vayabdilu khal 'eireb miyisra'el. velifnei mizeh 'elyashib hakohen natun belishkat bet 'eloheinu qarob letobiyah. vaya'as lo lishkah gedolah vesham hayu lefanim notenim 'et haminkhah halebonah vehakeilim uma'sar hadagan hatirosh vehayizhar mizvat halviyim vehamshorerim vehasho'arim uterumat hakohanim. ubekhal zeh lo hayiti birushalim ki bishnat sheloshim ushetayim le'artakhshast melekh babel bati 'el hamelekh uleqez yamim nish'alti min hamelekh. va'abo lirushalim va'abinah bara'ah 'asher 'asah 'elyashib letobiyah la'asot lo nishkah bekhazrei bet ha'elohim. vayeira' li me'od va'ashlikhah 'et kal kelei bet tobiyah hakhuz min halishkah. va'omerah vaytaharu haleshakhot va'ashibah sham kelei bet ha'elohim 'et haminkhah vehalebonah. va'eide'ah ki menayot halviyim lo nitanah vayibrekhu 'ish lesadeihu halviyim vehamshorerim 'osei hamelakhah. va'aribah 'et haseganim va'omerah madua' ne'ezab bet ha'elohim va'eqbezem va'a'amidem 'al 'amedam. vekhal yehudah heibi'u ma'sar hadagan vehatirosh vehayizhar la'ozarot. va'ozrah 'al 'ozarot shelemyah hakohen vezadoq hasofer ufedayah min halviyim ve'al yadam khanan ben zakur ben matanyah ki ne'emanim nekhshabu va'aleihem lakhaloq la'akheihem. zakherah li 'elohai 'al zot ve'al temakh khasadai 'asher 'asiti bebet 'elohai ubemishmarav. bayamim hahemah ra'iti bihudah dorekhim gitot bashabat umebi'im ha'areimot ve'omesim 'al hakhamorim ve'af yayin 'anabim ute'einim vekhal masa umebi'im yerushalim beyom hashabat va'a'id beyom mikhram zayid. vehazorim yashebu bah mebi'im dag vekhal mekher umokherim bashabat libnei yehudah ubirushalim. va'aribah 'et khorei yehudah va'omerah lahem mah hadabar hara' hazeh 'asher 'atem 'osim umekhalelim 'et yom hashabat. halo khoh 'asu 'aboteikhem vayabei 'eloheinu 'aleinu 'et kal hara'ah hazot ve'al ha'ir hazot ve'atem mosifim kharon 'al yisra'el lekhalel 'et hashabat. vayhi ka'asher zalalu sha'arei yerushalim lifnei hashabat va'omerah vayisageru hadelatot va'omerah 'asher lo yiftakhum 'ad 'akhar hashabat umine'arai he'emadti 'al hashe'arim lo yabo masa beyom hashabat. vayalinu harokhelim umokherei khal mimkar mikhuz lirushalim pa'am ushetayim. va'a'idah bahem va'omerah 'aleihem madua' 'atem leinim neged hakhomah 'im tishnu yad 'eshlakh bakhem min ha'et hahi lo ba'u bashabat. va'omerah lalviyim 'asher yihyu mitaharim uba'im shomerim hashe'arim leqadesh 'et yom hashabat gam zot zakherah li 'elohai vekhusah 'alai kerob khasdekha. gam bayamim hahem ra'iti 'et hayehudim hoshibu nashim 'ashdodiyot 'ashdodiyot 'amoniyot 'amoniyot mo'abiyot. ubeneihem khazi medaber 'ashdodit ve'einam makirim ledaber yehudit vekhilshon 'am va'am. va'arib 'imam va'aqalem va'akeh meihem 'anashim va'emretem va'ashbi'em beilohim 'im titenu benoteikhem libneihem ve'im tis'u mibenoteihem libneikhem velakhem. halo 'al 'eleh khata shelomoh melekh yisra'el ubagoyim harabim lo hayah melekh kamohu ve'ahub leilohav hayah vayiteneihu 'elohim melekh 'al kal yisra'el gam 'oto hekheti'u hanashim hanakheriyot. velakhem hanishma' la'asot 'et kal hara'ah hagedolah hazot lim'ol beiloheinu lehoshib nashim nakheriyot. umibenei yoyada' ben 'elyashib hakohen hagadol khatan lesanbalat hakhoroni va'abrikheihu mei'alai. zakherah lahem 'elohai 'al ga'olei hakehunah uberit hakehunah vehalviyim. vetihartim mikal neikhar va'a'amidah mishmarot lakohanim velalviyim 'ish bimlakhto. ulequrban ha'eizim be'itim mezumanot velabikurim zakherah li 'elohai letobah.

'adam shet 'enosh. qeinan mahalal'el yared. khanokh metushelakh lamekh. noakh shem kham vayafet. benei yefet gomer umagog umadai veyavan vetubal umeshekh vetiras. ubenei gomer 'ashkanaz vedifat vetogarmah. ubenei yavan 'elishah vetarshishah kitim verodanim. benei kham kush umizrayim put ukhena'an. ubenei khush seba vakhavilah vesabta vera'ma vesabtekha ubenei ra'ma sheba udedan. vekhush yalad 'et nimrod hu heikhel lihyot gibor ba'arez. umizrayim yalad 'et ludiyim ludim ve'et 'anamim ve'et lehabim ve'et naftukhim. ve'et patrusim ve'et kaslukhim 'asher yaze'u misham pelishtim ve'et kaftorim. ukhena'an yalad 'et zidon bekhoro ve'et khet. ve'et haybusi ve'et ha'emori ve'et hagirgashi. ve'et hakhivi ve'et ha'arqi ve'et hasini. ve'et ha'arvadi ve'et hazemari ve'et hakhamati. benei shem 'eilam ve'ashur ve'arpakhshad velud va'aram ve'uz vekhul vegeter vameshekh. ve'arpakhshad yalad 'et shalakh veshelakh yalad 'et 'eiber. ule'eiber yulad shenei banim shem ha'ekhad peleg ki beyamav niflegah ha'arez veshem 'akhiv yaqetan. veyaqetan yalad 'et 'almodad ve'et shalef ve'et khazarmavet ve'et yarakh. ve'et hadoram ve'et 'uzal ve'et diqlah. ve'et 'eibal ve'et 'abima'el ve'et sheba. ve'et 'ofir ve'et khavilah ve'et yobab kal 'eleh benei yaqetan. shem 'arpakhshad shalakh. 'eiber peleg re'u. serug nakhor tarakh. 'abram hu 'abraham. benei 'abraham yizkhaq veyishma'el. 'eleh toledotam bekhor yishma'el nebayot veqeidar ve'adbe'el umibsam. mishma' vedumah masa khadad veteima. yetur nafish vaqeidemah 'eleh hem benei yishma'el. ubenei qeturah pilegesh 'abraham yaledah 'et zimran veyaqeshan umedan umidyan veyishbaq veshuakh ubenei yaqeshan sheba udedan. ubenei midyan 'eifah va'eifer vakhanokh va'abida' ve'elda'ah kal 'eleh benei qeturah. vayoled 'abraham 'et yizkhaq benei yizkhaq 'eisav veyisra'el. benei 'eisav 'elifaz re'u'el vi'ush veya'lam veqorakh. benei 'elifaz teiman ve'omar zefi vega'tam qenaz vetimna' va'amaleq. benei re'u'el nakhat zerakh shamah umizah. ubenei sei'ir lotan veshobal vezib'on va'anah vedishon ve'eizer vedishan. ubenei lotan khori vehomam va'akhot lotan timna'. benei shobal 'alyan umanakhat ve'eibal shefi ve'onam ubenei zib'on 'ayah va'anah. benei 'anah dishon ubenei dishon khamran ve'eshban veyitran ukheran. benei 'eizer bilhan veza'avan ya'aqan benei dishon 'uz va'aran. ve'eleh hamelakhim 'asher malekhu be'erez 'edom lifnei melakh melekh libnei yisra'el bela' ben be'or veshem 'iro dinhabah. vayamat bala' vayimlokh takhtav yobab ben zerakh mibazerah. vayamat yobab vayimlokh takhtav khusham mei'erez hateimani. vayamat khusham vayimlokh takhtav hadad ben bedad hamakeh 'et midyan bisdeh mo'ab veshem 'iro 'ayot 'avit. vayamat hadad vayimlokh takhtav samlah mimasreiqah. vayamat samlah vayimlokh takhtav sha'ul meirekhobot hanahar. vayamat sha'ul vayimlokh takhtav ba'al khanan ben 'akhbor. vayamat ba'al khanan vayimlokh takhtav hadad veshem 'iro pa'i veshem 'ishto meheitab'el bat matred bat mei zahab. vayamat hadad vayihyu 'alufei 'edom 'aluf timna' 'aluf 'alyah 'alvah 'aluf yetet. 'aluf 'aholibamah 'aluf 'eilah 'aluf pinon. 'aluf qenaz 'aluf teiman 'aluf mibzar. 'aluf magdi'el 'aluf 'iram 'eleh 'alufei 'edom. 'eleh benei yisra'el re'uben shim'on leivi vihudah yisashkhar uzebulun. dan yosef ubinyamin naftali gad ve'asher. benei yehudah 'er ve'onan vesheilah sheloshah nolad lo mibat shua' hakena'anit vayhi 'er bekhor yehudah ra' be'einei ihoh vaymiteihu. vetamar kalato yaledah lo 'et perez ve'et zarakh kal benei yehudah khamishah. benei ferez khezron vekhamul. ubenei zerakh zimri ve'eitan veheiman vekhalkol vadara' kulam khamishah. ubenei karmi 'akhar 'okher yisra'el 'asher ma'al bakheirem. ubenei 'eitan 'azaryah. ubenei khezron 'asher nolad lo 'et yerakhme'el ve'et ram ve'et kelubai. veram holid 'et 'aminadab ve'aminadab holid 'et nakhshon nesi benei yehudah. venakhshon holid 'et salma vesalma holid 'et bo'az. ubo'az holid 'et 'obed ve'obed holid 'et yishai. ve'ishai holid 'et bekhoro 'et 'eli'ab va'abinadab hasheini veshim'a hashelishi. netan'el harebi'i radai hakhamishi. 'ozem hashishi david hashebi'i. ve'akhyoteihem ve'akhyoteihem zeruyah va'abigayil ubenei zeruyah 'abshai veyo'ab va'asah 'el sheloshah. va'abigayil yaledah 'et 'amasa va'abi 'amasa yeter hayishme'eili. vekhaleb ben khezron holid 'et 'azubah 'ishah ve'et yeri'ot ve'eleh baneha yeisher veshobab ve'ardon. vatamat 'azubah vayiqakh lo khaleb 'et 'efrat vateiled lo 'et khur. vekhur holid 'et 'uri ve'uri holid 'et bezal'el. ve'akhar ba khezron 'el bat makhir 'abi gil'ad vehu leqakhah vehu ben shishim shanah vateiled lo 'et segub. usegub holid 'et ya'ir vayhi lo 'esrim veshalosh 'arim be'erez hagil'ad. vayiqakh geshur va'aram 'et khavot ya'ir mei'itam 'et qenat ve'et benoteha shishim 'ir kal 'eleh benei makhir 'abi gil'ad. ve'akhar mot khezron bekhaleb 'efratah ve'eishet khezron 'abiyah vateiled lo 'et 'ashkhur 'abi teqoa'. vayihyu benei yerakhme'el bekhor khezron habekhor ram ubunah va'oren va'ozem 'akhiyah. vatehi 'ishah 'akheret lirakhme'el ushemah 'atarah hi 'em 'onam. vayihyu benei ram bekhor yerakhme'el ma'az veyamin va'eiqer. vayihyu benei 'onam shamai veyada' ubenei shamai nadab va'abishur. veshem 'eishet 'abishur 'abihayil vateiled lo 'et 'akhban ve'et molid. ubenei nadab seled ve'apayim vayamat seled lo banim. ubenei 'apayim yish'i ubenei yish'i sheishan ubenei sheishan 'akhlai. ubenei yada' 'akhi shamai yeter veyonatan vayamat yeter lo banim. ubenei yonatan pelet vezaza 'eleh hayu benei yerakhme'el. velo hayah lesheishan banim ki 'im banot ulesheishan 'ebed mizri ushemo yarkha'. vayiten sheishan 'et bito leyarkha' 'abdo le'ishah vateiled lo 'et 'atai. ve'atai holid 'et natan venatan holid 'et zabad. vezabad holid 'et 'eflal ve'eflal holid 'et 'obed. ve'obed holid 'et yeihu veyeihu holid 'et 'azaryah. va'azaryah holid 'et khalez vekhelez holid 'et 'el'asah. ve'el'asah holid 'et sismai vesismai holid 'et shalum. veshalum holid 'et yeqamyah viqamyah holid 'et 'elishama'. ubenei khaleb 'akhi yerakhme'el meisha' bekhoro hu 'abi zif ubenei mareishah 'abi khebron. ubenei khebron qorakh vetapuakh vereqem vashama'. veshema' holid 'et rakham 'abi yareqo'am vereqem holid 'et shamai. uben shamai ma'on uma'on 'abi bet zur. ve'eifah pilegesh kaleb yaledah 'et kharan ve'et moza ve'et gazez vekharan holid 'et gazez. ubenei yahedai regem veyotam vegeishan vafelet ve'eifah vasha'af. pilegesh kaleb ma'akhah yalad sheber ve'et tirkhanah. vateiled 'af 'abi madmanah 'et sheva 'abi makhbeinah va'abi gib'a ubat kaleb 'akhsah. 'eleh hayu benei khaleb ben khur bekhor 'efratah shobal 'abi qiryat ye'arim. salma 'abi bet lakhem kharef 'abi bet gader. vayihyu banim leshobal 'abi qiryat ye'arim haro'eh khazi hamenukhot. umishpekhot qiryat ye'arim hayitri vehaputi vehashumati vehamishra'i mei'eleh yaze'u hazare'ati veha'eshta'uli. benei salma bet lekhem unetofati 'atrot bet yo'ab vakhazi hamanakhti hazare'i. umishpekhot soferim yoshebu yoshebei ya'bez tir'atim shim'atim sukhatim hemah haqinim haba'im meikhamat 'abi bet reikhab. ve'eleh hayu benei davyid 'asher nolad lo bekhebron habekhor 'amnon la'akhino'am hayizre'eilit sheini daniyel la'abigayil hakarmelit. hashelishi le'abshalom ben ma'akhah bat talmai melekh geshur harebi'i 'adoniyah ben khagit. hakhamishi shefatyah la'abital hashishi yitre'am le'eglah 'ishto. shishah nolad lo bekhebron vayimlakh sham sheba' shanim veshishah khodashim usheloshim veshalosh shanah malakh birushalim. ve'eleh nuledu lo birushalayim me'a veshobab venatan ushelomoh 'arba'ah lebat shua' bat 'ami'el. veyibkhar ve'elishama' ve'elifalet. venogah venefeg veyafia'. ve'elishama' ve'elyada' ve'elifelet tish'ah. kol benei david milebad benei filagshim vetamar 'akhotam. uben shelomoh rekhab'am 'abiyah beno 'asa beno yehoshafat beno. yoram beno 'akhazyahu beno yo'ash beno. 'amazyahu beno 'azaryah beno yotam beno. 'akhaz beno khizqiyahu beno menasheh beno. 'amon beno yoshiyahu beno. ubenei yoshiyahu habekhor yokhanan hasheini yehoyaqim hashelishi zidqiyahu harebi'i shalum. ubenei yehoyaqim yekhaneyah beno zidqiyah beno. ubenei yekhaneyah 'asir she'alti'el beno. umalkiram ufedayah veshen'azar yeqamyah hoshama' unedabyah. ubenei fedayah zerubabel veshim'i uben zerubabel meshulam vakhananyah ushelomit 'akhotam. vakhashubah va'ohel uberekhyah vakhasadyah yushab khesed khamesh. uben khananyah pelatyah visha'yah benei refayah benei 'arnan benei 'obadyah benei shekhanyah. ubenei shekhanyah shema'yah ubenei shema'yah khatush veyig'al ubariakh une'aryah veshafat shishah. uben ne'aryah 'elyo'einai vekhizqiyah ve'azriqam sheloshah. ubenei 'elyo'einai hodayvahu hodavyahu ve'elyashib ufelayah ve'aqub veyokhanan udelayah va'anani shib'ah. benei yehudah perez khezron vekharmi vekhur veshobal. ure'ayah ben shobal holid 'et yakhat veyakhat holid 'et 'akhumai ve'et lahad 'eleh mishpekhot hazare'ati. ve'eleh 'abi 'eitam yizre'el veyishma veyidbash veshem 'akhotam hazlelponi. ufenu'el 'abi gedor ve'eizer 'abi khushah 'eleh benei khur bekhor 'efratah 'abi bet lakhem. ule'ashkhur 'abi teqoa' hayu shetei nashim khel'ah vena'arah. vateiled lo na'arah 'et 'akhuzam ve'et kheifer ve'et teimeni ve'et ha'akhashtari 'eleh benei na'arah. ubenei khel'ah zeret yizkhar vezokhar ve'etnan. veqoz holid 'et 'anub ve'et hazobeibah umishpekhot 'akharkhel ben harum. vayhi ya'bez nikhbad mei'ekhav ve'imo qare'ah shemo ya'bez leimor ki yaladti be'ozeb. vayiqra ya'bez leilohei yisra'el leimor 'im barekh tebarakheini vehirbita 'et gebuli vehayetah yadekha 'imi ve'asita meira'ah lebilti 'azebi vayabei 'elohim 'et 'asher sha'al. ukhelub 'akhi shukhah holid 'et mekhir hu 'abi 'eshton. ve'eshton holid 'et bet rafa ve'et paseiakh ve'et tekhinah 'abi 'ir nakhash 'eleh 'anshei reikhah. ubenei qenaz 'ateni'el userayah ubenei 'ateni'el khatat. ume'onotai holid 'et 'aferah userayah holid 'et yo'ab 'abi gei kharashim ki kharashim hayu. ubenei kaleb ben yefuneh 'iru 'eilah vana'am ubenei 'eilah uqenaz. ubenei yehalel'el zif vezifah tireya va'asar'el. uben 'ezrah yeter umered ve'eifer veyalon vatahar 'et miryam ve'et shamai ve'et yishbakh 'abi 'eshtemoa'. ve'ishto hayhudiyah yaledah 'et yered 'abi gedor ve'et kheber 'abi sokho ve'et yequti'el 'abi zanoakh ve'eleh benei bityah bat par'oh 'asher laqakh mared. ubenei 'eishet hodiyah 'akhot nakham 'abi qe'ilah hagarmi ve'eshtemoa' hama'akhati. ubenei shimon 'amnon verinah ben khanan vetolon vetilon ubenei yish'i zokhet uben zokhet. benei sheilah ben yehudah 'er 'abi leikhah vela'dah 'abi mareishah umishpekhot bet 'abodat habuz lebet 'ashbeia'. veyoqim ve'anshei khozeiba veyo'ash vesaraf 'asher ba'alu lemo'ab veyashubi lakhem vehadebarim 'atiqim. hemah hayozrim veyoshebei neta'im ugedeirah 'im hamelekh bimlakhto yashebu sham. benei shim'on nemu'el veyamin yarib zerakh sha'ul. shalum beno mibsam beno mishma' beno. ubenei mishma' khamu'el beno zakur beno shim'i beno. uleshim'i banim shishah 'asar ubanot shesh ule'ekhav 'en banim rabim vekhol mishpakhtam lo hirbu 'ad benei yehudah. vayeishebu bib'er sheba' umoladah vakhazar shu'al. ubebilhah ube'ezem ubetolad. ubibtu'el ubekharemah ubeziqelag. ubebet markabot ubakhazar susim ubebet bir'i ubesha'arayim 'eleh 'areihem 'ad melokh david. vekhazreihem 'eitam va'ayin rimon vetokhen ve'ashan 'arim khamesh. vekhal khazreihem 'asher sebibot he'arim ha'eleh 'ad ba'al zot moshebotam vehityakhsam lahem. umeshobab veyamlekh veyoshah ben 'amazyah. veyo'el veyeihu ben yoshibyah ben serayah ben 'asi'el. ve'elyo'einai veya'aqobah vishokhayah va'asayah va'adi'el visimi'el ubenayah. veziza ben shif'i ben 'alon ben yedayah ben shimri ben shema'yah. 'eleh haba'im besheimot nesi'im bemishpekhotam ubet 'aboteihem parezu larob. vayeilekhu limbo gedor 'ad lemizrakh hagai lebaqesh mir'eh lezonam. vayimze'u mir'eh shamen vatob veha'arez rakhabat yadayim veshoqetet usheleivah ki min kham hayoshebim sham lefanim. vayabo'u 'eleh haketubim besheimot bimei yekhizqiyahu melekh yehudah vayaku 'et 'aholeihem ve'et hame'inim hame'unim 'asher nimze'u shamah vayakharimum 'ad hayom hazeh vayeishebu takhteihem ki mir'eh lezonam sham. umeihem min benei shim'on halekhu lehar sei'ir 'anashim khamesh mei'ot ufelatyah une'aryah urefayah ve'uzi'el benei yish'i berosham. vayaku 'et she'eirit hapeleitah la'amaleq vayeishebu sham 'ad hayom hazeh. ubenei re'uben bekhor yisra'el ki hu habekhor ubekhalelo yezu'ei 'abiv nitenah bekhorato libnei yosef ben yisra'el velo lehityakhes labekhorah. ki yehudah gabar be'ekhav ulenagid mimenu vehabekhorah leyosef. benei re'uben bekhor yisra'el khanokh ufalu khezron vekharmi. benei yo'el shema'yah beno gog beno shim'i beno. mikhah beno re'ayah beno ba'al beno. be'eirah beno 'asher heglah tilegat pilne'eser melekh 'ashur hu nasi lar'ubeini. ve'ekhav lemishpekhotav behityakhes letoledotam harosh ye'i'el uzekharyahu. ubela' ben 'azaz ben shema' ben yo'el hu yosheb ba'aro'er ve'ad nebo uba'al me'on. velamizrakh yashab 'ad lebo midbarah lemin hanahar perat ki miqneihem rabu be'erez gil'ad. ubimei sha'ul 'asu milkhamah 'im hahagri'im vayipelu beyadam vayeishebu be'aholeihem 'al kal penei mizrakh lagil'ad. ubenei gad lenegdam yashebu be'erez habashan 'ad salkhah. yo'el harosh veshafam hamishneh veya'nai veshafat babashan. va'akheihem lebet 'aboteihem mikha'el umeshulam vesheba' veyorai veya'kan vezia' va'eiber shib'ah. 'eleh benei 'abikhayil ben khuri ben yaroakh ben gil'ad ben mikha'el ben yeshishai ben yakhdo ben buz. 'akhi ben 'abdi'el ben guni rosh lebet 'abotam. vayeishebu bagil'ad babashan ubibnoteha ubekhal migreshei sharon 'al toz'otam. kulam hityakhsu bimei yotam melekh yehudah ubimei yarabe'am melekh yisra'el. benei re'uben vegadi vakhazi sheibet menasheh min benei khayil 'anashim nose'ei magen vekhereb vedorekhei qeshet ulemudei milkhamah 'arba'im ve'arba'ah 'elef usheba' mei'ot veshishim yoze'ei zaba. vaya'asu milkhamah 'im hahagri'im vitur venafish venodab. vayei'azeru 'aleihem vayinatenu beyadam hahagri'im vekhol she'imahem ki leilohim za'aqu bamilkhamah vena'tor lahem ki batekhu bo. vayishbu miqneihem gemaleihem khamishim 'elef vezon matayim vakhamishim 'elef vakhamorim 'alpayim venefesh 'adam mei'ah 'alef. ki khalalim rabim nafalu ki meiha'elohim hamilkhamah vayeishebu takhteihem 'ad hagolah. ubenei khazi sheibet menasheh yashebu ba'arez mibashan 'ad ba'al khermon usenir vehar khermon hemah rabu. ve'eleh rashei bet 'abotam ve'eifer veyish'i ve'eli'el ve'azri'el veyirmeyah vehodavyah veyakhdi'el 'anashim giborei khayil 'anshei sheimot rashim lebet 'abotam. vayim'alu beilohei 'aboteihem vayiznu 'akharei 'elohei 'amei ha'arez 'asher hishmid 'elohim mipeneihem. vaya'ar 'elohei yisra'el 'et ruakh pul melekh 'ashur ve'et ruakh tilegat pilneser melekh 'ashur vayaglem lar'ubeini velagadi velakhazi sheibet menasheh vaybi'em lakhlakh vekhabor vehara unehar gozan 'ad hayom hazeh. benei leivi geireshon qehat umerari. ubenei qehat 'amram yizhar vekhebron ve'uzi'el. ubenei 'amram 'aharon umosheh umiryam ubenei 'aharon nadab va'abihu 'el'azar ve'itamar. 'el'azar holid 'et pinekhas pinekhas holid 'et 'abishua'. va'abishua' holid 'et buqi ubuqi holid 'et 'uzi. ve'uzi holid 'et zerakhyah uzerakhyah holid 'et merayot. merayot holid 'et 'amaryah va'amaryah holid 'et 'akhitub. va'akhitub holid 'et zadoq vezadoq holid 'et 'akhima'az. va'akhima'az holid 'et 'azaryah va'azaryah holid 'et yokhanan. veyokhanan holid 'et 'azaryah hu 'asher kihen babayit 'asher banah shelomoh birushalim. vayoled 'azaryah 'et 'amaryah va'amaryah holid 'et 'akhitub. va'akhitub holid 'et zadoq vezadoq holid 'et shalum. veshalum holid 'et khilqiyah vekhilqiyah holid 'et 'azaryah. va'azaryah holid 'et serayah userayah holid 'et yehozadaq. vihozadaq halakh behaglot ihoh 'et yehudah virushalim beyad nebukhadnezar. benei leivi geireshom qehat umerari. ve'eleh shemot benei geireshom libni veshim'i. ubenei qehat 'amram veyizhar vekhebron ve'uzi'el. benei merari makhli umushi ve'eleh mishpekhot haleivi la'aboteihem. legeireshom libni beno yakhat beno zimah beno. yo'akh beno 'ido beno zerakh beno ye'aterai beno. benei qehat 'aminadab beno qorakh beno 'asir beno. 'elqanah beno ve'ebyasaf beno ve'asir beno. takhat beno 'uri'el beno 'uziyah beno vesha'ul beno. ubenei 'elqanah 'amasai va'akhimot. 'elqanah beno benei 'elqanah zofai beno venakhat beno. 'eli'ab beno yerokham beno 'elqanah beno. ubenei shemu'el habekhor vashni va'abiyah. benei merari makhli libni beno shim'i beno 'uzah beno. shim'a beno khagiyah beno 'asayah beno. ve'eleh 'asher he'emid david 'al yedei shir bet ihoh mimenoakh ha'aron. vayihyu mesharetim lifnei mishkan 'ohel mo'ed bashir 'ad benot shelomoh 'et bet ihoh birushalim vaya'amdu khemishpatam 'al 'abodatam. ve'eleh ha'omedim ubeneihem mibenei haqehati heiman hamshorer ben yo'el ben shemu'el. ben 'elqanah ben yerokham ben 'eli'el ben toakh. ben zif zuf ben 'elqanah ben makhat ben 'amasai. ben 'elqanah ben yo'el ben 'azaryah ben zefanyah. ben takhat ben 'asir ben 'ebyasaf ben qorakh. ben yizhar ben qehat ben leivi ben yisra'el. ve'akhiv 'asaf ha'omed 'al yemino 'asaf ben berekhyahu ben shim'a. ben mikha'el ben ba'aseiyah ben malkiyah. ben 'etni ben zerakh ben 'adayah. ben 'eitan ben zimah ben shim'i. ben yakhat ben geireshom ben leivi. ubenei merari 'akheihem 'al hasemol 'eitan ben qishi ben 'abdi ben malukh. ben khashabyah ben 'amazyah ben khilqiyah. ben 'amzi ben bani ben shamer. ben makhli ben mushi ben merari ben leivi. va'akheihem halviyim netunim lekhal 'abodat mishkan bet ha'elohim. ve'aharon ubanav maqtirim 'al mizbakh ha'olah ve'al mizbakh haqetoret lekhol melekhet qodesh haqodashim ulekhaper 'al yisra'el kekhol 'asher zivah mosheh 'ebed ha'elohim. ve'eleh benei 'aharon 'el'azar beno pinekhas beno 'abishua' beno. buqi beno 'uzi beno zerakhyah beno. merayot beno 'amaryah beno 'akhitub beno. zadoq beno 'akhima'az beno. ve'eleh moshebotam letirotam bigbulam libnei 'aharon lemishpakhat haqehati ki lahem hayah hagoral. vayitenu lahem 'et khebron be'erez yehudah ve'et migrasheha sebiboteha. ve'et sedeh ha'ir ve'et khazeireha natenu lekhaleb ben yefuneh. velibnei 'aharon natenu 'et 'arei hamiqlat 'et khebron ve'et libnah ve'et migrasheha ve'et yatir ve'et 'eshtemoa' ve'et migrasheha. ve'et khilez ve'et migrasheha 'et debir ve'et migrasheha. ve'et 'ashan ve'et migrasheha ve'et bet shemesh ve'et migrasheha. umimateh binyamin 'et geba' ve'et migrasheha ve'et 'alemet ve'et migrasheha ve'et 'anatot ve'et migrasheha kal 'areihem shelosh 'esreh 'ir bemishpekhoteihem. velibnei qehat hanotarim mimishpakhat hamateh mimakhazit mateh khazi menasheh bagoral 'arim 'aser. velibnei geireshom lemishpekhotam mimateh yisashkhar umimateh 'asher umimateh naftali umimateh menasheh babashan 'arim shelosh 'esreh. libnei merari lemishpekhotam mimateh re'uben umimateh gad umimateh zebulun bagoral 'arim shetem 'esreh. vayitenu benei yisra'el lalviyim 'et he'arim ve'et migresheihem. vayitenu bagoral mimateh benei yehudah umimateh benei shim'on umimateh benei binyamin 'et he'arim ha'eleh 'asher yiqre'u 'ethem besheimot. umimishpekhot benei qehat vayhi 'arei gebulam mimateh 'efrayim. vayitenu lahem 'et 'arei hamiqlat 'et shekhem ve'et migrasheha behar 'efrayim ve'et gezer ve'et migrasheha. ve'et yaqeme'am ve'et migrasheha ve'et bet khoron ve'et migrasheha. ve'et 'ayalon ve'et migrasheha ve'et gat rimon ve'et migrasheha. umimakhazit mateh menasheh 'et 'aner ve'et migrasheha ve'et bil'am ve'et migrasheha lemishpakhat libnei qehat hanotarim. libnei geireshom mimishpakhat khazi mateh menasheh 'et golan babashan ve'et migrasheha ve'et 'ashtarot ve'et migrasheha. umimateh yisashkhar 'et qedesh ve'et migrasheha 'et daberat ve'et migrasheha. ve'et ramot ve'et migrasheha ve'et 'anem ve'et migrasheha. umimateh 'asher 'et mashal ve'et migrasheha ve'et 'abdon ve'et migrasheha. ve'et khuqoq ve'et migrasheha ve'et rekhob ve'et migrasheha.
