umimateh naftali 'et qedesh bagalil ve'et migrasheha ve'et khamon ve'et migrasheha ve'et qiryatayim ve'et migrasheha. libnei merari hanotarim mimateh zebulun 'et rimono ve'et migrasheha 'et tabor ve'et migrasheha. umei'eiber leyarden yereikho lemizrakh hayarden mimateh re'uben 'et bezer bamidbar ve'et migrasheha ve'et yahzah ve'et migrasheha. ve'et qedeimot ve'et migrasheha ve'et meifa'at ve'et migrasheha. umimateh gad 'et ramot bagil'ad ve'et migrasheha ve'et makhanayim ve'et migrasheha. ve'et kheshbon ve'et migrasheha ve'et ya'zer ve'et migrasheha. velibnei yisashkhar tola' ufu'ah yashib yashub veshimron 'arba'ah. ubenei tola' 'uzi urefayah viri'el veyakhmai veyibsam ushemu'el rashim lebet 'abotam letola' giborei khayil letoledotam misparam bimei david 'esrim ushenayim 'elef veshesh mei'ot. ubenei 'uzi yizrakhyah ubenei yizrakhyah mikha'el ve'obadyah veyo'el yishiyah khamishah rashim kulam. va'aleihem letoledotam lebet 'abotam gedudei zeba milkhamah sheloshim veshishah 'alef ki hirbu nashim ubanim. va'akheihem lekhol mishpekhot yisashkhar giborei khayalim shemonim veshib'ah 'elef hityakhsam lakol. binyamin bela' vabekher vidi'a'el sheloshah. ubenei bela' 'ezbon ve'uzi ve'uzi'el virimot ve'iri khamishah rashei bet 'abot giborei khayalim vehityakhsam 'esrim ushenayim 'elef usheloshim ve'arba'ah. ubenei bekher zemirah veyo'ash ve'eli'ezer ve'elyo'einai ve'ameri vireimot va'abiyah va'anatot ve'alamet kal 'eleh benei bakher. vehityakhsam letoledotam rashei bet 'abotam giborei khayil 'esrim 'elef umatayim. ubenei yedi'a'el bilhan ubenei bilhan ye'ish ye'ush ubinyamin ve'eihud ukhena'anah vezeitan vetarshish va'akhishakhar. kal 'eleh benei yedi'a'el lerashei ha'abot giborei khayalim shib'ah 'asar 'elef umatayim yoze'ei zaba lamilkhamah. veshupim vekhupim benei 'ir khushim benei 'akher. benei naftali yakhazi'el veguni veyeizer veshalum benei bilhah. benei menasheh 'asri'el 'asher yaladah pilagsho ha'aramiyah yaledah 'et makhir 'abi gil'ad. umakhir laqakh 'ishah lekhupim uleshupim veshem 'akhoto ma'akhah veshem hasheini zelafekhad vatihyenah lizlafekhad banot. vateiled ma'akhah 'eishet makhir ben vatiqra shemo peresh veshem 'akhiv sharesh ubanav 'ulam varaqem. ubenei 'ulam bedan 'eleh benei gil'ad ben makhir ben menasheh. va'akhoto hamolekhet yaledah 'et 'ishehod ve'et 'abi'ezer ve'et makhlah. vayihyu benei shemida' 'akhyan vashekhem veliqkhi va'ani'am. ubenei 'efrayim shutalakh ubered beno vetakhat beno ve'el'adah beno vetakhat beno. vezabad beno veshutelakh beno ve'eizer ve'el'ad vaharagum 'anshei gat hanoladim ba'arez ki yaredu laqakhat 'et miqneihem. vayit'abel 'efrayim 'abihem yamim rabim vayabo'u 'ekhav lenakhamo. vayabo 'el 'ishto vatahar vateiled ben vayiqra 'et shemo beri'ah ki bera'ah hayetah bebeito. ubito she'erah vatiben 'et bet khoron hatakhton ve'et ha'elyon ve'et 'uzen she'erah. verefakh beno vereshef vetelakh beno vetakhan beno. la'dan beno 'amihud beno 'elishama' beno. non beno yehoshua' beno. va'akhuzatam umoshebotam bet 'el ubenoteha velamizrakh na'aran velama'arab gezer ubenoteha ushekhem ubenoteha 'ad 'ayah ubenoteha. ve'al yedei benei menasheh bet she'an ubenoteha ta'nakh ubenoteha megido ubenoteha dor ubenoteha be'eleh yashebu benei yosef ben yisra'el. benei 'asher yimnah veyishvah veyishvi uberi'ah veserakh 'akhotam. ubenei beri'ah kheber umalki'el hu 'abi birzot birzayit. vekheber holid 'et yaflet ve'et shomer ve'et khotam ve'et shu'a 'akhotam. ubenei yaflet pasakh ubimhal ve'ashvat 'eleh benei yaflet. ubenei shamer 'akhi verohagah verahegah yakhbah vekhubah va'aram. uben heilem 'akhiv zofakh veyimna' vesheilesh ve'amal. benei zofakh suakh vekharnefer veshu'al ubeiri veyimrah. bezer vahod veshama veshilshah veyitran ube'eira. ubenei yeter yefuneh ufispah va'ra. ubenei 'ula 'arakh vekhani'el verizya. kal 'eleh benei 'asher rashei bet ha'abot berurim giborei khayalim rashei hanesi'im vehityakhsam bazaba bamilkhamah misparam 'anashim 'esrim veshishah 'alef. ubinyamin holid 'et bela' bekhoro 'ashbel hasheini ve'akhrakh hashelishi. nokhah harebi'i verafa hakhamishi. vayihyu banim lebala' 'adar vegeira va'abihud. va'abishua' vena'aman va'akhoakh. vegeira ushefufan vekhuram. ve'eleh benei 'eikhud 'eleh hem rashei 'abot leyoshebei geba' vayaglum 'el manakhat. vena'aman va'akhiyah vegeira hu heglam veholid 'et 'uza ve'et 'akhikhud. veshakharayim holid bisdeh mo'ab min shilkho 'otam khushim ve'et ba'ara nashav. vayoled min khodesh 'ishto 'et yobab ve'et zibya ve'et meisha ve'et malkam. ve'et ye'uz ve'et sakheyah ve'et mirmah 'eleh banav rashei 'abot. umeikhushim holid 'et 'abitub ve'et 'elpa'al. ubenei 'elpa'al 'eiber umish'am vashamed hu banah 'et 'ono ve'et lod ubenoteha. uberi'ah vashema' hemah rashei ha'abot leyoshebei 'ayalon hemah hibrikhu 'et yoshebei gat. ve'akhyo shashaq vireimot. uzebadyah va'arad va'ader. umikha'el veyishpah veyokha benei beri'ah. uzebadyah umeshulam vekhizqi vakhaber. veyishmerai veyizli'ah veyobab benei 'elpa'al. veyaqim vezikhri vezabdi. ve'eli'einai veziletai ve'eli'el. va'adayah uberayah veshimrat benei shim'i. veyishpan va'eiber ve'eli'el. ve'abdon vezikhri vekhanan. vakhananyah ve'eilam ve'antotiyah. veyifdeyah ufeni'el ufenu'el benei shashaq. veshamsherai ushekharyah va'atalyah. veya'areshyah ve'eiliyah vezikhri benei yerokham. 'eleh rashei 'abot letoledotam rashim 'eleh yashebu birushalim. ubegib'on yashebu 'abi gib'on veshem 'ishto ma'akhah. ubeno habekhor 'abdon vezur veqish uba'al venadab. ugedor ve'akhyo vazakher. umiqlot holid 'et shim'ah ve'af hemah neged 'akheihem yashebu birushalim 'im 'akheihem. vener holid 'et qish veqish holid 'et sha'ul vesha'ul holid 'et yehonatan ve'et malki shua' ve'et 'abinadab ve'et 'eshba'al. uben yehonatan merib ba'al umerib ba'al holid 'et mikhah. ubenei mikhah piton vamelekh veta'reia' ve'akhaz. ve'akhaz holid 'et yeho'adah viho'adah holid 'et 'alemet ve'et 'azmavet ve'et zimri vezimri holid 'et moza. umoza holid 'et bin'a rafah beno 'el'asah beno 'azel beno. ule'azel shishah banim ve'eleh shemotam 'azriqam bokheru veyishma'el ushe'aryah ve'obadyah vekhanan kal 'eleh benei 'azal. ubenei 'eisheq 'akhiv 'ulam bekhoro ye'ush hasheini ve'elifelet hashelishi. vayihyu benei 'ulam 'anashim giborei khayil dorekhei qeshet umarbim banim ubenei banim mei'ah vakhamishim kal 'eleh mibenei binyamin. vekhal yisra'el hityakhsu vehinam ketubim 'al seifer malkhei yisra'el vihudah hagelu lebabel bema'alam. vehayoshebim harishonim 'asher ba'akhuzatam be'areihem yisra'el hakohanim halviyim vehanetinim. ubirushalim yashebu min benei yehudah umin benei binyamin umin benei 'efrayim umenasheh. 'utai ben 'amihud ben 'ameri ben 'imri ben banimin bani min benei ferez ben yehudah. umin hashiloni 'asayah habekhor ubanav. umin benei zerakh ye'u'el va'akheihem shesh mei'ot vetish'im. umin benei binyamin salu ben meshulam ben hodavyah ben hasenu'ah. veyibneyah ben yerokham ve'eilah ben 'uzi ben mikhri umeshulam ben shefatyah ben re'u'el ben yibniyah. va'akheihem letoledotam tesha' mei'ot vakhamishim veshishah kal 'eleh 'anashim rashei 'abot lebet 'aboteihem. umin hakohanim yeda'yah vihoyarib veyakhin. va'azaryah ben khilqiyah ben meshulam ben zadoq ben merayot ben 'akhitub negid bet ha'elohim. va'adayah ben yerokham ben pashkhur ben malkiyah uma'sai ben 'adi'el ben yakhzeirah ben meshulam ben meshileimit ben 'imer. va'akheihem rashim lebet 'abotam 'elef usheba' mei'ot veshishim giborei khel melekhet 'abodat bet ha'elohim. umin halviyim shema'yah ben khashub ben 'azriqam ben khashabyah min benei merari. ubaqbaqar kheresh vegalal umatanyah ben mikha ben zikhri ben 'asaf. ve'obadyah ben shema'yah ben galal ben yedutun uberekhyah ben 'asa ben 'elqanah hayosheb bekhazrei netofati. vehasho'arim shalum ve'aqub vetalmon va'akhiman va'akhihem shalum harosh. ve'ad henah besha'ar hamelekh mizrakhah hemah hasho'arim lemakhanot benei leivi. veshalum ben qorei ben 'ebyasaf ben qorakh ve'ekhav lebet 'abiv haqarekhim 'al melekhet ha'abodah shomerei hasipim la'ohel va'aboteihem 'al makhaneh ihoh shomerei hamabo. ufinekhas ben 'el'azar nagid hayah 'aleihem lefanim ihoh 'imo. zekharyah ben meshelemyah sho'er petakh le'ohel mo'ed. kulam haberurim lesho'arim basipim matayim ushenem 'asar hemah bekhazreihem hityakhsam hemah yisad david ushemu'el haro'eh be'emunatam. vehem ubeneihem 'al hashe'arim lebet ihoh lebet ha'ohel lemishmarot. le'arba' rukhot yihyu hasho'arim mizrakh yamah zafonah vanegbah. va'akheihem bekhazreihem labo leshib'at hayamim mei'et 'el 'et 'im 'eleh. ki be'emunah hemah 'arba'at giborei hasho'arim hem halviyim vehayu 'al haleshakhot ve'al ha'ozerot bet ha'elohim. usebibot bet ha'elohim yalinu ki 'aleihem mishmeret vehem 'al hamafteiakh velaboqer laboqer. umeihem 'al kelei ha'abodah ki bemispar yebi'um ubemispar yozi'um. umeihem memunim 'al hakeilim ve'al kal kelei haqodesh ve'al hasolet vehayayin vehashemen vehalebonah vehabesamim. umin benei hakohanim roqekhei hamirqakhat labesamim. umatityah min halviyim hu habekhor leshalum haqarekhi be'emunah 'al ma'aseh hakhabitim. umin benei haqehati min 'akheihem 'al lekhem hama'arakhet lehakhin shabat shabat. ve'eleh hamshorerim rashei 'abot lalviyim baleshakhot petirim peturim ki yomam valaylah 'aleihem bamelakhah. 'eleh rashei ha'abot lalviyim letoledotam rashim 'eleh yashebu birushalim. ubegib'on yashebu 'abi gib'on ye'u'el ye'i'el veshem 'ishto ma'akhah. ubeno habekhor 'abdon vezur veqish uba'al vener venadab. ugedor ve'akhyo uzekharyah umiqlot. umiqlot holid 'et shim'am ve'af hem neged 'akheihem yashebu birushalim 'im 'akheihem. vener holid 'et qish veqish holid 'et sha'ul vesha'ul holid 'et yehonatan ve'et malki shua' ve'et 'abinadab ve'et 'eshba'al. uben yehonatan merib ba'al umeri ba'al holid 'et mikhah. ubenei mikhah piton vamelekh vetakhreia'. ve'akhaz holid 'et ya'rah veya'rah holid 'et 'alemet ve'et 'azmavet ve'et zimri vezimri holid 'et moza. umoza holid 'et bin'a urefayah beno 'el'asah beno 'azel beno. ule'azel shishah banim ve'eleh shemotam 'azriqam bokheru veyishma'el ushe'aryah ve'obadyah vekhanan 'eleh benei 'azal. ufelishtim nilkhamu beyisra'el vayanas 'ish yisra'el mipenei felishtim vayipelu khalalim behar gilboa'. vayadbequ felishtim 'akharei sha'ul ve'akharei banav vayaku felishtim 'et yonatan ve'et 'abinadab ve'et malki shua' benei sha'ul. vatikhbad hamilkhamah 'al sha'ul vayimza'uhu hamorim baqashet vayakhel min hayorim. vayomer sha'ul 'el nosei kheilav shelof kharbekha vedaqereini bah pen yabo'u ha'areilim ha'eleh vehit'alelu bi velo 'abah nosei kheilav ki yarei me'od vayiqakh sha'ul 'et hakhereb vayipol 'aleha. vayar nosei kheilav ki met sha'ul vayipol gam hu 'al hakhereb vayamot. vayamat sha'ul usheloshet banav vekhal beito yakhdav meitu. vayir'u kal 'ish yisra'el 'asher ba'eimeq ki nasu vekhi meitu sha'ul ubanav vaya'azbu 'areihem vayanusu vayabo'u felishtim vayeishebu bahem. vayhi mimakhorat vayabo'u felishtim lefashet 'et hakhalalim vayimze'u 'et sha'ul ve'et banav nofelim behar gilboa'. vayafshituhu vayis'u 'et rosho ve'et keilav vayshalekhu be'erez felishtim sabib lebaser 'et 'azabeihem ve'et ha'am. vayasimu 'et keilav bet 'eloheihem ve'et gulgaleto taqe'u bet dagon. vayishme'u kol yabesh gil'ad 'et kal 'asher 'asu felishtim lesha'ul. vayaqumu kal 'ish khayil vayis'u 'et gufat sha'ul ve'et gufot banav vaybi'um yabeishah vayiqberu 'et 'azmoteihem takhat ha'eilah beyabesh vayazumu shib'at yamim. vayamat sha'ul bema'alo 'asher ma'al ihoh 'al debar ihoh 'asher lo shamar vegam lish'ol ba'ob lidrosh. velo darash ihoh vaymiteihu vayaseb 'et hamelukhah ledavid ben yishai. vayiqabezu khal yisra'el 'el david khebronah leimor hineh 'azmekha ubesarekha 'anakhenu. gam temol gam shilshom gam bihyot sha'ul melekh 'atah hamozi vehameibi 'et yisra'el vayomer ihoh 'elohekha lekha 'atah tir'eh 'et 'ami 'et yisra'el ve'atah tihyeh nagid 'al 'ami yisra'el. vayabo'u kal ziqnei yisra'el 'el hamelekh khebronah vayikhrot lahem david berit bekhebron lifnei ihoh vayimshekhu 'et david lemelekh 'al yisra'el kidbar ihoh beyad shemu'el. vayeilekh david vekhal yisra'el yerushalim hi yebus vesham haybusi yoshebei ha'arez. vayomeru yoshebei yebus ledavid lo tabo henah vayilkod david 'et mezudat ziyon hi 'ir david. vayomer david kal makeh yebusi barishonah yihyeh lerosh ulesar vaya'al barishonah yo'ab ben zeruyah vayhi lerosh. vayeisheb david bamzad 'al ken qare'u lo 'ir david. vayiben ha'ir misabib min hamilo ve'ad hasabib veyo'ab yekhayeh 'et she'ar ha'ir. vayeilekh david halokh vegadol ihoh zeba'ot 'imo. ve'eleh rashei hagiborim 'asher ledavid hamitkhazeqim 'imo bemalkhuto 'im kal yisra'el lehamlikho kidbar ihoh 'al yisra'el. ve'eleh mispar hagiborim 'asher ledavid yashabe'am ben khakhmoni rosh hasheloshim hashalishim hu 'orer 'et khanito 'al shelosh mei'ot khalal befa'am 'ekhat. ve'akharav 'el'azar ben dodo ha'akhokhi hu bishloshah hagiborim. hu hayah 'im david bapas damim vehapelishtim ne'esfu sham lamilkhamah vatehi khelqat hasadeh melei'ah se'orim veha'am nasu mipenei felishtim. vayityazebu betokh hakhelqah vayaziluha vayaku 'et pelishtim vayosha' ihoh teshu'ah gedolah. vayeiredu sheloshah min hasheloshim rosh 'al hazur 'el david 'el me'arat 'adulam umakhaneh felishtim khonah be'eimeq refa'im. vedavid 'az bamezudah unezib pelishtim 'az bebet lakhem. vayit'av vayit'av david vayomar mi yashqeini mayim mibor bet lekhem 'asher basha'ar. vayibqe'u hasheloshah bemakhaneh felishtim vayish'abu mayim mibor bet lekhem 'asher basha'ar vayis'u vayabi'u 'el david velo 'abah david lishtotam vaynasekh 'otam ihoh. vayomer khalilah li mei'elohai mei'asot zot hadam ha'anashim ha'eleh 'eshteh benafshotam ki benafshotam hebi'um velo 'abah lishtotam 'eleh 'asu sheloshet hagiborim. ve'abshai 'akhi yo'ab hu hayah rosh hasheloshah vehu 'orer 'et khanito 'al shelosh mei'ot khalal velo velo shem basheloshah. min hasheloshah bashenayim nikhbad vayhi lahem lesar ve'ad hasheloshah lo ba. benayah ben yehoyada' ben 'ish khayil rab pe'alim min qabze'el hu hikah 'et shenei 'ari'el mo'ab vehu yarad vehikah 'et ha'ari betokh habor beyom hashaleg. vehu hikah 'et ha'ish hamizri 'ish midah khamesh ba'amah ubeyad hamizri khanit kimnor 'oregim vayeired 'eilav bashabet vayigzol 'et hakhanit miyad hamizri vayahargeihu bakhanito. 'eleh 'asah benayahu ben yehoyada' velo shem bishloshah hagiborim. min hasheloshim hino nikhbad hu ve'el hasheloshah lo ba vaysimeihu david 'al mishma'to. vegiborei hakhayalim 'asah 'el 'akhi yo'ab 'elkhanan ben dodo mibet lakhem. shamot haharori khelez hapeloni. 'ira ben 'iqesh hateqo'i 'abi'ezer ha'anetoti. sibekhai hakhushati 'ilai ha'akhokhi. mahrai hanetofati kheiled ben ba'anah hanetofati. 'itai ben ribai migib'at benei binyamin benayah hapir'atoni. khurai minakhalei ga'ash 'abi'el ha'arbati. 'azmavet habakharumi 'elyakhba hasha'alboni. benei hashem hagizoni yonatan ben shageh haharari. 'akhi'am ben sakhar haharari 'elifal ben 'ur. kheifer hamekheirati 'akhiyah hapeloni. khezro hakarmeli na'arai ben 'ezbai. yo'el 'akhi natan mibkhar ben hagri. zeleq ha'amoni nakhrai habeiroti nosei kelei yo'ab ben zeruyah. 'ira hayitri gareb hayitri. 'uriyah hakhiti zabad ben 'akhlai. 'adina ben shiza har'ubeini rosh lar'ubeini ve'alav sheloshim. khanan ben ma'akhah veyoshafat hamitni. 'uziya ha'ashterati shama' vi'u'el vi'i'el benei khotam ha'aro'eiri. yedi'a'el ben shimri veyokha 'akhiv hatizi. 'eli'el hamakhavim viribai veyoshavyah benei 'elna'am veyitmah hamo'abi. 'eli'el ve'obed veya'asi'el hamezobayah. ve'eleh haba'im 'el david leziqelag 'od 'azur mipenei sha'ul ben qish vehemah bagiborim 'ozerei hamilkhamah. nosheqei qeshet mayminim umasmilim ba'abanim ubakhizim baqashet mei'akhei sha'ul mibinyamin. harosh 'akhi'ezer veyo'ash benei hashema'ah hagib'ati vizu'el vizi'el vafelet benei 'azmavet uberakhah veyeihu ha'anetoti. veyishma'yah hagib'oni gibor basheloshim ve'al hasheloshim. veyirmeyah veyakhazi'el veyokhanan veyozabad hagedeirati. 'el'uzai virimot ube'alyah ushemaryahu ushefatyahu hakharifi hakharufi. 'elqanah veyishiyahu va'azar'el veyo'ezer veyashabe'am haqarekhim. veyo'eilah uzebadyah benei yerokham min hagedor. umin hagadi nibdelu 'el david lamzad midbarah giborei hakhayil 'anshei zaba lamilkhamah 'orekhei zinah varomakh ufenei 'aryeh peneihem vekhizbayim 'al heharim lemaher. 'eizer harosh 'obadyah hasheini 'eli'ab hashelishi. mishmanah harebi'i yirmeyah hakhamishi. 'atai hashishi 'eli'el hashebi'i. yokhanan hashemini 'elzabad hateshi'i. yirmeyahu ha'asiri makhbanai 'ashtei 'asar. 'eleh mibenei gad rashei hazaba 'ekhad lemei'ah haqatan vehagadol le'alef. 'eleh hem 'asher 'aberu 'et hayarden bakhodesh harishon vehu memalei 'al kal gidyotav gedotav vayabrikhu 'et kal ha'amaqim lamizrakh velama'arab. vayabo'u min benei binyamin vihudah 'ad lamzad ledavid. vayeizei david lifneihem vaya'an vayomer lahem 'im leshalom batem 'eilai le'azereini yihyeh li 'aleikhem leibab leyakhad ve'im leramotani lezarai belo khamas bekhapai yeire 'elohei 'aboteinu veyokhakh. veruakh labeshah 'et 'amasai rosh hasheloshim hashalishim lekha david ve'imekha ben yishai shalom shalom lekha veshalom le'ozerekha ki 'azarekha 'elohekha vayqabelem david vayitenem berashei hagedud. umimenasheh nafelu 'al david bebo'o 'im pelishtim 'al sha'ul lamilkhamah velo 'azarum ki be'eizah shilekhuhu sarnei felishtim leimor berasheinu yipol 'el 'adonav sha'ul. belekhto 'el ziqelag nafelu 'alav mimenasheh 'adnakh veyozabad vidi'a'el umikha'el veyozabad ve'elihu veziletai rashei ha'alafim 'asher limnasheh. vehemah 'azeru 'im david 'al hagedud ki giborei khayil kulam vayihyu sarim bazaba. ki le'et yom beyom yabo'u 'al david le'azero 'ad lemakhaneh gadol kemakhaneh 'elohim. ve'eleh misperei rashei hekhaluz lazaba ba'u 'al david khebronah lehaseb malkhut sha'ul 'eilav kefi ihoh. benei yehudah nose'ei zinah varomakh sheishet 'alafim ushemoneh mei'ot khaluzei zaba. min benei shim'on giborei khayil lazaba shib'at 'alafim umei'ah. min benei haleivi 'arba'at 'alafim veshesh mei'ot. vihoyada' hanagid le'aharon ve'imo sheloshet 'alafim usheba' mei'ot. vezadoq na'ar gibor khayil ubet 'abiv sarim 'esrim ushenayim. umin benei binyamin 'akhei sha'ul sheloshet 'alafim ve'ad henah marbitam shomerim mishmeret bet sha'ul. umin benei 'efrayim 'esrim 'elef ushemoneh mei'ot giborei khayil 'anshei sheimot lebet 'abotam. umeikhazi mateh menasheh shemonah 'asar 'alef 'asher niqebu besheimot labo lehamlikh 'et david. umibenei yisashkhar yod'ei binah la'itim lada'at mah ya'aseh yisra'el rasheihem matayim vekhal 'akheihem 'al pihem. mizebulun yoz'ei zaba 'orekhei milkhamah bekhal kelei milkhamah khamishim 'alef vela'ador belo leb valeb. uminaftali sarim 'alef ve'imahem bezinah vakhanit sheloshim veshib'ah 'alef. umin hadani 'orekhei milkhamah 'esrim ushemonah 'elef veshesh mei'ot. umei'asher yoz'ei zaba la'arokh milkhamah 'arba'im 'alef. umei'eiber layarden min har'ubeini vehagadi vakhazi sheibet menasheh bekhol kelei zeba milkhamah mei'ah ve'esrim 'alef. kal 'eleh 'anshei milkhamah 'oderei ma'arakhah beleibab shalem ba'u khebronah lehamlikh 'et david 'al kal yisra'el vegam kal sheirit yisra'el leb 'ekhad lehamlikh 'et david. vayihyu sham 'im david yamim sheloshah 'okhelim veshotim ki heikhinu lahem 'akheihem. vegam haqerobim 'aleihem 'ad yisashkhar uzebulun venaftali mebi'im lekhem bakhamorim ubagemalim ubaperadim ubabaqar ma'akhal qemakh debeilim vezimuqim veyayin veshemen ubaqar vezon larob ki simkhah beyisra'el. vayiva'az david 'im sarei ha'alafim vehamei'ot lekhal nagid. vayomer david lekhol qehal yisra'el 'im 'aleikhem tob umin ihoh 'eloheinu nifrezah nishlekhah 'al 'akheinu hanish'arim bekhol 'arzot yisra'el ve'imahem hakohanim vehalviyim be'arei migresheihem veyiqabezu 'eileinu. venasebah 'et 'aron 'eloheinu 'eileinu ki lo derashnuhu bimei sha'ul. vayomeru khal haqahal la'asot ken ki yashar hadabar be'einei khal ha'am. vayaqhel david 'et kal yisra'el min shikhor mizrayim ve'ad lebo khamat lehabi 'et 'aron ha'elohim miqiryat ye'arim. vaya'al david vekhal yisra'el ba'alatah 'el qiryat ye'arim 'asher lihudah leha'alot misham 'et 'aron ha'elohim ihoh yosheb hakerubim 'asher niqra shem. vayarkibu 'et 'aron ha'elohim 'al 'agalah khadashah mibet 'abinadab ve'uza ve'akhyo nohagim ba'agalah. vedavid vekhal yisra'el mesakhaqim lifnei ha'elohim bekhal 'oz ubeshirim ubekhinorot ubinbalim ubetupim ubimziltayim ubakhazozerot. vayabo'u 'ad goren kidon vayishlakh 'uza 'et yado le'ekhoz 'et ha'aron ki shametu habaqar. vayikhar 'af ihoh be'uza vayakeihu 'al 'asher shalakh yado 'al ha'aron vayamat sham lifnei 'elohim. vayikhar ledavid ki faraz ihoh perez be'uza vayiqra lamaqom hahu perez 'uza 'ad hayom hazeh. vayira david 'et ha'elohim bayom hahu leimor hekh 'abi 'eilai 'et 'aron ha'elohim. velo heisir david 'et ha'aron 'eilav 'el 'ir david vayateihu 'el bet 'obed 'edom hagiti. vayeisheb 'aron ha'elohim 'im bet 'obed 'edom bebeito sheloshah khodashim vaybarekh ihoh 'et bet 'obed 'edom ve'et kal 'asher lo. vayishlakh khiram khuram melekh zor mal'akhim 'el david va'azei 'arazim vekharashei qir vekharashei 'eizim libnot lo bayit. vayeida' david ki hekhino ihoh lemelekh 'al yisra'el ki niset lema'lah malkhuto ba'abur 'amo yisra'el. vayiqakh david 'od nashim birushalim vayoled david 'od banim ubanot. ve'eleh shemot hayludim 'asher hayu lo birushalim shamua' veshobab natan ushelomoh. veyibkhar ve'elishua' ve'elpalet. venogah venefeg veyafia'. ve'elishama' ube'elyada' ve'elifalet. vayishme'u felishtim ki nimshakh david lemelekh 'al kal yisra'el vaya'alu khal pelishtim lebaqesh 'et david vayishma' david vayeizei lifneihem. ufelishtim ba'u vayifshetu be'eimeq refa'im. vayish'al david beilohim leimor ha'e'eleh 'al pelishtiyim pelishtim unetatam beyadi vayomer lo ihoh 'aleh unetatim beyadekha. vaya'alu beba'al perazim vayakem sham david vayomer david paraz ha'elohim 'et 'oybai beyadi keferez mayim 'al ken qare'u shem hamaqom hahu ba'al perazim. vaya'azbu sham 'et 'eloheihem vayomer david vayisarefu ba'esh. vayosifu 'od pelishtim vayifshetu ba'eimeq. vayish'al 'od david beilohim vayomer lo ha'elohim lo ta'aleh 'akhareihem haseb mei'aleihem ubata lahem mimul habekha'im. vihi keshame'akha 'et qol haze'adah berashei habekha'im 'az teizei bamilkhamah ki yaza ha'elohim lefanekha lehakot 'et makhaneh felishtim. vaya'as david ka'asher zivahu ha'elohim vayaku 'et makhaneh felishtim migib'on ve'ad gazerah. vayeizei shem david bekhal ha'arazot ihoh natan 'et pakhdo 'al kal hagoyim. vaya'as lo batim be'ir david vayakhen maqom la'aron ha'elohim vayet lo 'ohel. 'az 'amar david lo laset 'et 'aron ha'elohim ki 'im halviyim ki bam bakhar ihoh laset 'et 'aron ihoh uleshareto 'ad 'olam. vayaqhel david 'et kal yisra'el 'el yerushalim leha'alot 'et 'aron ihoh 'el meqomo 'asher heikhin lo. vaye'esof david 'et benei 'aharon ve'et halviyim. libnei qehat 'uri'el hasar ve'ekhav mei'ah ve'esrim. libnei merari 'asayah hasar ve'ekhav matayim ve'esrim. libnei geireshom yo'el hasar ve'ekhav mei'ah usheloshim. libnei 'elizafan shema'yah hasar ve'ekhav matayim. libnei khebron 'eli'el hasar ve'ekhav shemonim. libnei 'uzi'el 'aminadab hasar ve'ekhav mei'ah ushenem 'asar. vayiqra david lezadoq ule'ebyatar hakohanim velalviyim le'uri'el 'asayah veyo'el shema'yah ve'eli'el ve'aminadab. vayomer lahem 'atem rashei ha'abot lalviyim hitqadeshu 'atem va'akheikhem veha'alitem 'et 'aron ihoh 'elohei yisra'el 'el hakhinoti lo. ki lemabarishonah lo 'atem paraz ihoh 'eloheinu banu ki lo derashnuhu kamishpat. vayitqadeshu hakohanim vehalviyim leha'alot 'et 'aron ihoh 'elohei yisra'el. vayis'u benei halviyim 'et 'aron ha'elohim ka'asher zivah mosheh kidbar ihoh bikhteifam bamotot 'aleihem. vayomer david lesarei halviyim leha'amid 'et 'akheihem hamshorerim bikhlei shir nebalim vekhinorot umeziltayim mashmi'im leharim beqol lesimkhah. vaya'amidu halviyim 'et heiman ben yo'el umin 'ekhav 'asaf ben berekhyahu umin benei merari 'akheihem 'eitan ben qushayahu. ve'imahem 'akheihem hamishnim zekharyahu ben veya'azi'el ushemiramot vikhi'el ve'uni 'eli'ab ubenayahu uma'aseiyahu umatityahu ve'elifeleihu umiqneiyahu ve'obed 'edom vi'i'el hasho'arim. vehamshorerim heiman 'asaf ve'eitan bimziltayim nekhoshet lehashmia'. uzekharyah va'azi'el ushemiramot vikhi'el ve'uni ve'eli'ab uma'aseiyahu ubenayahu binbalim 'al 'alamot. umatityahu ve'elifeleihu umiqneiyahu ve'obed 'edom vi'i'el va'azazyahu bekhinorot 'al hasheminit lenazeiakh. ukhenanyahu sar halviyim bemasa yasor bamasa ki meibin hu. uberekhyah ve'elqanah sho'arim la'aron. ushebanyahu veyoshafat unetan'el va'amasai uzekharyahu ubenayahu ve'eli'ezer hakohanim makhazozerim makhzerim bakhazozerot lifnei 'aron ha'elohim ve'obed 'edom vikhiyah sho'arim la'aron. vayhi david veziqnei yisra'el vesarei ha'alafim haholekhim leha'alot 'et 'aron berit ihoh min bet 'obed 'edom besimkhah. vayhi be'zor ha'elohim 'et halviyim nose'ei 'aron berit ihoh vayizbekhu shib'ah farim veshib'ah 'eilim. vedavid mekhurbal bim'il buz vekhal halviyim hanose'im 'et ha'aron vehamshorerim ukhenanyah hasar hamasa hamshorerim ve'al david 'eifod bad. vekhal yisra'el ma'alim 'et 'aron berit ihoh bitru'ah ubeqol shofar ubakhazozerot ubimziltayim mashmi'im binbalim vekhinorot. vayhi 'aron berit ihoh ba 'ad 'ir david umikhal bat sha'ul nishqefah be'ad hakhalon vateire 'et hamelekh david meraqed umesakheq vatibez lo belibah. vayabi'u 'et 'aron ha'elohim vayazigu 'oto betokh ha'ohel 'asher natah lo david vayaqribu 'olot ushelamim lifnei ha'elohim. vaykhal david meiha'alot ha'olah vehashelamim vaybarekh 'et ha'am beshem ihoh. vaykhaleq lekhal 'ish yisra'el mei'ish ve'ad 'ishah le'ish kikar lekhem ve'eshpar va'ashishah. vayiten lifnei 'aron ihoh min halviyim mesharetim ulehazkir ulehodot ulehalel ihoh 'elohei yisra'el. 'asaf harosh umishneihu zekharyah ye'i'el ushemiramot vikhi'el umatityah ve'eli'ab ubenayahu ve'obed 'edom vi'i'el bikhlei nebalim ubekhinorot ve'asaf bamziltayim mashmia'. ubenayahu veyakhazi'el hakohanim bakhazozerot tamid lifnei 'aron berit ha'elohim. bayom hahu 'az natan david barosh lehodot ihoh beyad 'asaf ve'ekhav. hodu ihoh qir'u bishmo hodi'u ba'amim 'alilotav. shiru lo zameru lo sikhu bekhal nifle'otav. hithalu beshem qadesho yismakh leb mebaqshei ihoh. dirshu ihoh ve'uzo baqeshu fanav tamid. zikhru nifle'otav 'asher 'asah mofetav umishpetei fihu. zera' yisra'el 'abdo benei ya'aqob bekhirav. hu ihoh 'eloheinu bekhal ha'arez mishpatav. zikhru le'olam berito dabar zivah le'elef dor. 'asher karat 'et 'abraham ushebu'ato leyizkhaq. vaya'amideha leya'aqob lekhoq leyisra'el berit 'olam. leimor lekha 'eten 'erez kena'an khebel nakhalatkhem. bihyotkhem metei mispar kim'at vegarim bah. vayithalekhu migo 'el go umimamlakhah 'el 'am 'akher. lo hiniakh le'ish le'asheqam vayokhakh 'aleihem melakhim. 'al tige'u bimshikhai ubinbi'ai 'al tarei'u. shiru ihoh kal ha'arez baseru miyom 'el yom yeshu'ato. saperu bagoyim 'et kebodo bekhal ha'amim nifle'otav. ki gadol ihoh umehulal me'od venora hu 'al kal 'elohim. ki kal 'elohei ha'amim 'elilim ihoh shamayim 'asah. hod vehadar lefanav 'oz vekhedvah bimqomo. habu ihoh mishpekhot 'amim habu ihoh kabod va'oz. habu ihoh kebod shemo se'u minkhah ubo'u lefanav hishtakhavu ihoh behadrat qodesh. khilu milefanav kal ha'arez 'af tikon teibel bal timot. yismekhu hashamayim vetagel ha'arez veyomeru bagoyim ihoh malakh. yir'am hayam umelo'o ya'aloz hasadeh vekhal 'asher bo. 'az yeranenu 'azei haya'ar milifnei ihoh ki ba lishpot 'et ha'arez. hodu ihoh ki tob ki le'olam khasdo. ve'imru hoshi'einu 'elohei yish'einu veqabezeinu vehazileinu min hagoyim lehodot leshem qadshekha lehishtabeiakh bithilatekha. barukh ihoh 'elohei yisra'el min ha'olam ve'ad ha'olam vayomeru khal ha'am 'amen vehalel ihoh. vaya'azab sham lifnei 'aron berit ihoh le'asaf ule'ekhav lesharet lifnei ha'aron tamid lidbar yom beyomo. ve'obed 'edom va'akheihem shishim ushemonah ve'obed 'edom ben yeditun vekhosah lesho'arim. ve'et zadoq hakohen ve'ekhav hakohanim lifnei mishkan ihoh babamah 'asher begib'on. leha'alot 'olot ihoh 'al mizbakh ha'olah tamid laboqer vela'areb ulekhal hakatub betorat ihoh 'asher zivah 'al yisra'el. ve'imahem heiman vidutun ushe'ar haberurim 'asher niqebu besheimot lehodot ihoh ki le'olam khasdo. ve'imahem heiman vidutun khazozerot umeziltayim lemashmi'im ukhelei shir ha'elohim ubenei yedutun lasha'ar. vayeilekhu khal ha'am 'ish lebeito vayisob david lebarekh 'et beito. vayhi ka'asher yashab david bebeito vayomer david 'el natan hanabi hineh 'anokhi yosheb bebet ha'arazim va'aron berit ihoh takhat yeri'ot. vayomer natan 'el david kol 'asher bilbabekha 'aseh ki ha'elohim 'imakh. vayhi balaylah hahu vayhi debar 'elohim 'el natan leimor. lekh ve'amarta 'el david 'abdi koh 'amar ihoh lo 'atah tibneh li habayit lashabet. ki lo yashabti bebayit min hayom 'asher he'eleiti 'et yisra'el 'ad hayom hazeh va'ehyeh mei'ohel 'el 'ohel umimishkan. bekhol 'asher hithalakhti bekhal yisra'el hadabar dibarti 'et 'akhad shofetei yisra'el 'asher ziviti lir'ot 'et 'ami leimor lamah lo benitem li bet 'arazim. ve'atah koh tomar le'abdi ledavid koh 'amar ihoh zeba'ot 'ani leqakhtikha min hanaveh min 'akharei hazon lihyot nagid 'al 'ami yisra'el. va'ehyeh 'imekha bekhol 'asher halakhta va'akhrit 'et kal 'oybekha mipanekha ve'asiti lekha shem keshem hagedolim 'asher ba'arez. vesamti maqom le'ami yisra'el uneta'tihu veshakhan takhtav velo yirgaz 'od velo yosifu benei 'avlah lebaloto ka'asher barishonah. ulemiyamim 'asher ziviti shofetim 'al 'ami yisra'el vehikhna'ti 'et kal 'oybekha va'agid lakh ubayit yibneh lekha ihoh. vehayah ki male'u yamekha lalekhet 'im 'abotekha vahaqimoti 'et zar'akha 'akharekha 'asher yihyeh mibanekha vahakhinoti 'et malkhuto. hu yibneh li bayit vekhonanti 'et kis'o 'ad 'olam. 'ani 'ehyeh lo le'ab vehu yihyeh li leben vekhasdi lo 'asir mei'imo ka'asher hasiroti mei'asher hayah lefanekha. veha'amadtihu bebeiti ubemalkhuti 'ad ha'olam vekhis'o yihyeh nakhon 'ad 'olam. kekhol hadebarim ha'eleh ukhekhol hekhazon hazeh ken diber natan 'el david. vayabo hamelekh david vayeisheb lifnei ihoh vayomer mi 'ani ihoh 'elohim umi beiti ki habi'otani 'ad halom. vatiqtan zot be'einekha 'elohim vatedaber 'al bet 'abdekha lemeirakhoq ure'itani ketor ha'adam hama'alah ihoh 'elohim. mah yosif 'od david 'eilekha lekhabod 'et 'abdekha ve'atah 'et 'abdekha yada'eta. ihoh ba'abur 'abdekha ukhelibekha 'asita 'et kal hagedulah hazot lehodia' 'et kal hagedulot. ihoh 'en kamokha ve'en 'elohim zulatekha bekhol 'asher shama'nu be'azeneinu. umi ke'amekha yisra'el go 'ekhad ba'arez 'asher halakh ha'elohim lifdot lo 'am lasum lekha m gedulot venora'ot legaresh mipenei 'amekha 'asher padita mimizrayim goyim. vatiten 'et 'amekha yisra'el lekha le'am 'ad 'olam ve'atah ihoh hayita lahem leilohim. ve'atah ihoh hadabar 'asher dibarta 'al 'abdekha ve'al beito yei'amen 'ad 'olam va'aseh ka'asher dibarta. veyei'amen veyigdal shimkha 'ad 'olam leimor ihoh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el 'elohim leyisra'el ubet david 'abdekha nakhon lefanekha. ki 'atah 'elohai galita 'et 'ozen 'abdekha libnot lo bayit 'al ken maza 'abdekha lehitpalel lefanekha. ve'atah ihoh 'atah hu ha'elohim vatedaber 'al 'abdekha hatobah hazot. ve'atah ho'alta lebarekh 'et bet 'abdekha lihyot le'olam lefanekha ki 'atah ihoh beirakhta umeborakh le'olam. vayhi 'akharei khen vayakh david 'et pelishtim vayakhni'em vayiqakh 'et gat ubenoteha miyad pelishtim. vayakh 'et mo'ab vayihyu mo'ab 'abadim ledavid nose'ei minkhah. vayakh david 'et hadad'ezer melekh zobah khamatah belekhto lehazib yado binhar perat. vayilkod david mimenu 'elef rekheb veshib'at 'alafim parashim ve'esrim 'elef 'ish ragli vai'aqer david 'et kal harekheb vayoter mimenu mei'ah rakheb. vayabo 'aram darmeseq la'zor lahadad'ezer melekh zobah vayakh david ba'aram 'esrim ushenayim 'elef 'ish. vayasem david ba'aram darmeseq vayhi 'aram ledavid 'abadim nose'ei minkhah vayosha' ihoh ledavid bekhol 'asher halakh. vayiqakh david 'et shiltei hazahab 'asher hayu 'al 'abdei hadad'azer vaybi'em yerushalim. umitibkhat umikun 'arei hadad'ezer laqakh david nekhoshet rabah me'od bah 'asah shelomoh 'et yam hanekhoshet ve'et ha'amudim ve'et kelei hanekhoshet. vayishma' to'u melekh khamat ki hikah david 'et kal khel hadad'ezer melekh zobah. vayishlakh 'et hadoram beno 'el hamelekh david lish'ol lish'al lo leshalom ulebarakho 'al 'asher nilkham bahadad'ezer vayakeihu ki 'ish milkhamot to'u hayah hadad'azer vekhol kelei zahab vakhesef unekhoshet. gam 'otam hiqdish hamelekh david ihoh 'im hakesef vehazahab 'asher nasa mikal hagoyim mei'edom umimo'ab umibenei 'amon umipelishtim umei'amaleq. ve'abshai ben zeruyah hikah 'et 'edom begei hamelakh shemonah 'asar 'alef. vayasem be'edom nezibim vayihyu khal 'edom 'abadim ledavid vayosha' ihoh 'et david bekhol 'asher halakh. vayimlokh david 'al kal yisra'el vayhi 'oseh mishpat uzedaqah lekhal 'amo. veyo'ab ben zeruyah 'al hazaba vihoshafat ben 'akhilud mazkir. vezadoq ben 'akhitub va'abimelekh ben 'ebyatar kohanim veshavsha sofer. ubenayahu ben yehoyada' 'al hakereiti vehapeleiti ubenei david harishonim leyad hamelekh. vayhi 'akharei khen vayamat nakhash melekh benei 'amon vayimlokh beno takhtav. vayomer david 'e'eseh khesed 'im khanun ben nakhash ki 'asah 'abiv 'imi khesed vayishlakh david mal'akhim lenakhamo 'al 'abiv vayabo'u 'abdei david 'el 'erez benei 'amon 'el khanun lenakhamo. vayomeru sarei benei 'amon lekhanun hamkhabed david 'et 'abikha be'einekha ki shalakh lekha menakhamim halo ba'abur lakhqor velahafokh uleragel ha'arez ba'u 'abadav 'eilekha. vayiqakh khanun 'et 'abdei david vaygalekhem vayikhrot 'et madveihem bakheizi 'ad hamifsa'ah vayshalekhem. vayeilekhu vayagidu ledavid 'al ha'anashim vayishlakh liqratam ki hayu ha'anashim nikhlamim me'od vayomer hamelekh shebu bireikho 'ad 'asher yezamakh zeqankhem veshabtem. vayir'u benei 'amon ki hitba'ashu 'im david vayishlakh khanun ubenei 'amon 'elef kikar kesef liskor lahem min 'aram naharayim umin 'aram ma'akhah umizobah rekheb ufarashim. vayiskeru lahem shenayim usheloshim 'elef rekheb ve'et melekh ma'akhah ve'et 'amo vayabo'u vayakhanu lifnei meideba ubenei 'amon ne'esfu mei'areihem vayabo'u lamilkhamah vayishma' david vayishlakh 'et yo'ab ve'et kal zaba hagiborim. vayeize'u benei 'amon vaya'arkhu milkhamah petakh ha'ir vehamelakhim 'asher ba'u lebadam basadeh. vayar yo'ab ki hayetah fenei hamilkhamah 'eilav panim ve'akhor vayibkhar mikal bakhur beyisra'el vaya'arokh liqrat 'aram. ve'et yeter ha'am natan beyad 'abshai 'akhiv vaya'arkhu liqrat benei 'amon. vayomer 'im tekhezaq mimeni 'aram vehayita li litshu'ah ve'im benei 'amon yekhezqu mimekha vehosha'tikha. khazaq venitkhazeqah be'ad 'ameinu ube'ad 'arei 'eloheinu ihoh hatob be'einav ya'aseh. vayigash yo'ab veha'am 'asher 'imo lifnei 'aram lamilkhamah vayanusu mipanav. ubenei 'amon ra'u ki nas 'aram vayanusu gam hem mipenei 'abshai 'akhiv vayabo'u ha'irah vayabo yo'ab yerushalim. vayar 'aram ki nigefu lifnei yisra'el vayishlekhu mal'akhim vayozi'u 'et 'aram 'asher mei'eiber hanahar veshofakh sar zeba hadad'ezer lifneihem. vayugad ledavid vaye'esof 'et kal yisra'el vaya'abor hayarden vayabo 'aleihem vaya'arokh 'aleihem vaya'arokh david liqrat 'aram milkhamah vayilakhamu 'imo. vayanas 'aram milifnei yisra'el vayaharog david mei'aram shib'at 'alafim rekheb ve'arba'im 'elef 'ish ragli ve'et shofakh sar hazaba heimit. vayir'u 'abdei hadad'ezer ki nigefu lifnei yisra'el vayashlimu 'im david vaya'abduhu velo 'abah 'aram lehoshia' 'et benei 'amon 'od. vayhi le'et teshubat hashanah le'et zet hamelakhim vayinhag yo'ab 'et khel hazaba vayashkhet 'et 'erez benei 'amon vayabo vayazar 'et rabah vedavid yosheb birushalim vayakh yo'ab 'et rabah vayeherseha. vayiqakh david 'et 'ateret malkam mei'al rosho vayimza'ah mishqal kikar zahab ubah 'eben yeqarah vatehi 'al rosh david ushelal ha'ir hozi harbeh me'od. ve'et ha'am 'asher bah hozi vayasar bamegeirah ubakharizei habarzel ubamegeirot vekhen ya'aseh david lekhol 'arei benei 'amon vayashab david vekhal ha'am yerushalim. vayhi 'akhareikhen vata'amod milkhamah begezer 'im pelishtim 'az hikah sibekhai hakhushati 'et sipai milidei harefa'im vayikanei'u. vatehi 'od milkhamah 'et pelishtim vayakh 'elkhanan ben ya'ur ya'ir 'et lakhmi 'akhi galeyat hagiti ve'ez khanito kimnor 'oregim. vatehi 'od milkhamah begat vayhi 'ish midah ve'ezbe'otav shesh vashesh 'esrim ve'arba' vegam hu nolad leharafa. vaykharef 'et yisra'el vayakeihu yehonatan ben shim'a 'akhi david. 'el nuledu leharafa begat vayipelu beyad david ubeyad 'abadav. vaya'amod satan 'al yisra'el vayaset 'et david limnot 'et yisra'el. vayomer david 'el yo'ab ve'el sarei ha'am lekhu sifru 'et yisra'el mibe'er sheba' ve'ad dan vehabi'u 'eilai ve'eide'ah 'et misparam. vayomer yo'ab yosef ihoh 'al 'amo kahem mei'ah fe'amim halo 'adoni hamelekh kulam ladoni la'abadim lamah yebaqesh zot 'adoni lamah yihyeh le'ashmah leyisra'el. udebar hamelekh khazaq 'al yo'ab vayeizei yo'ab vayithalekh bekhal yisra'el vayabo yerushalim. vayiten yo'ab 'et mispar mifqad ha'am 'el david vayhi khal yisra'el 'elef 'alafim umei'ah 'elef 'ish sholef khereb vihudah 'arba' mei'ot veshib'im 'elef 'ish sholef khareb. veleivi ubinyamin lo faqad betokham ki nit'ab debar hamelekh 'et yo'ab. vayeira' be'einei ha'elohim 'al hadabar hazeh vayakh 'et yisra'el. vayomer david 'el ha'elohim khatati me'od 'asher 'asiti 'et hadabar hazeh ve'atah ha'aber na 'et 'avon 'abdekha ki niskalti me'od. vaydaber ihoh 'el gad khozeh david leimor. lekh vedibarta 'el david leimor koh 'amar ihoh shalosh 'ani noteh 'alekha bekhar lekha 'akhat meihenah ve'e'eseh lakh. vayabo gad 'el david vayomer lo koh 'amar ihoh qabel lakh. 'im shalosh shanim ra'ab ve'im sheloshah khodashim nispeh mipenei zarekha vekhereb 'oybekha lemaseget ve'im sheloshet yamim khereb ihoh vedeber ba'arez umal'akh ihoh mashkhit bekhal gebul yisra'el ve'atah re'eh mah 'ashib 'et sholekhi dabar. vayomer david 'el gad zar li me'od 'epelah na beyad ihoh ki rabim rakhamav me'od ubeyad 'adam 'al 'epol. vayiten ihoh deber beyisra'el vayipol miyisra'el shib'im 'elef 'ish. vayishlakh ha'elohim mal'akh lirushalim lehashkhitah ukhehashkhit ra'ah ihoh vayinakhem 'al hara'ah vayomer lamal'akh hamashkhit rab 'atah heref yadekha umal'akh ihoh 'omed 'im goren 'arenan haybusi. vayisa david 'et 'einav vayar 'et mal'akh ihoh 'omed ben ha'arez uben hashamayim vekharbo shelufah beyado netuyah 'al yerushalim vayipol david vehazeqeinim mekhusim basaqim 'al peneihem. vayomer david 'el ha'elohim halo 'ani 'amarti limnot ba'am va'ani hu 'asher khatati vehareia' harei'oti ve'eleh hazon meh 'asu ihoh 'elohai tehi na yadekha bi ubebet 'abi ube'amekha lo lemageifah. umal'akh ihoh 'amar 'el gad leimor ledavid ki ya'aleh david lehaqim mizbeiakh ihoh begoren 'arenan haybusi. vaya'al david bidbar gad 'asher diber beshem ihoh. vayashab 'arenan vayar 'et hamal'akh ve'arba'at banav 'imo mitkhabe'im ve'arenan dash khitim. vayabo david 'ad 'arenan vayabet 'arenan vayar 'et david vayeizei min hagoren vayishtakhu ledavid 'apayim 'arezah. vayomer david 'el 'arenan tenah li meqom hagoren ve'ebneh bo mizbeiakh ihoh bekhesef malei teneihu li vetei'azar hamageifah mei'al ha'am. vayomer 'arenan 'el david qakh lakh veya'as 'adoni hamelekh hatob be'einav re'eh natati habaqar la'olot vehamorigim la'eizim vehakhitim laminkhah hakol natati. vayomer hamelekh david le'arenan lo ki qanoh 'eqneh bekhesef malei ki lo 'esa 'asher lekha ihoh veha'alot 'olah khinam. vayiten david le'arenan bamaqom shiqlei zahab mishqal shesh mei'ot. vayiben sham david mizbeiakh ihoh vaya'al 'olot ushelamim vayiqra 'el ihoh vaya'aneihu ba'esh min hashamayim 'al mizbakh ha'olah. vayomer ihoh lamal'akh vayasheb kharbo 'el nedanah. ba'et hahi bir'ot david ki 'anahu ihoh begoren 'arenan haybusi vayizbakh sham. umishkan ihoh 'asher 'asah mosheh bamidbar umizbakh ha'olah ba'et hahi babamah begib'on. velo yakhol david lalekhet lefanav lidrosh 'elohim ki nib'at mipenei khereb mal'akh ihoh. vayomer david zeh hu bet ihoh ha'elohim vezeh mizbeiakh le'olah leyisra'el. vayomer david likhnos 'et hageirim 'asher be'erez yisra'el vaya'amed khozebim lakhzob 'abnei gazit libnot bet ha'elohim. ubarzel larob lamismerim ledaltot hashe'arim velamkhaberot heikhin david unekhoshet larob 'en mishqal. va'azei 'arazim le'en mispar ki heibi'u hazidonim vehazorim 'azei 'arazim larob ledavid. vayomer david shelomoh beni na'ar varakh vehabayit libnot ihoh lehagdil lema'lah leshem uletif'eret lekhal ha'arazot 'akhinah na lo vayakhen david larob lifnei moto. vayiqra lishlomoh beno vayzaveihu libnot bayit ihoh 'elohei yisra'el. vayomer david lishlomoh beno beni 'ani hayah 'im lebabi libnot bayit leshem ihoh 'elohai. vayhi 'alai debar ihoh leimor dam larob shafakhta umilkhamot gedolot 'asita lo tibneh bayit lishmi ki damim rabim shafakhta 'arzah lefanai. hineh ben nolad lakh hu yihyeh 'ish menukhah vahanikhoti lo mikal 'oybav misabib ki shelomoh yihyeh shemo veshalom vasheqet 'eten 'al yisra'el beyamav. hu yibneh bayit lishmi vehu yihyeh li leben va'ani lo le'ab vahakhinoti kisei malkhuto 'al yisra'el 'ad 'olam. 'atah beni yehi ihoh 'imakh vehizlakhta ubanita bet ihoh 'elohekha ka'asher diber 'alekha. 'akh yiten lekha ihoh seikhel ubinah vizavekha 'al yisra'el velishmor 'et torat ihoh 'elohekha. 'az tazliakh 'im tishmor la'asot 'et hakhuqim ve'et hamishpatim 'asher zivah ihoh 'et mosheh 'al yisra'el khazaq ve'emaz 'al tira ve'al teikhat. vehineh be'aneyi hakhinoti lebet ihoh zahab kikarim mei'ah 'elef vekhesef 'elef 'alafim kikarim velanekhoshet velabarzel 'en mishqal ki larob hayah ve'eizim va'abanim hakhinoti va'aleihem tosif. ve'imekha larob 'osei melakhah khozebim vekharashei 'eben va'ez vekhal khakham bekhal melakhah. lazahab lakesef velanekhoshet velabarzel 'en mispar qum va'aseh vihi ihoh 'imakh. vayzav david lekhal sarei yisra'el la'zor lishlomoh beno. halo ihoh 'eloheikhem 'imakhem veheiniakh lakhem misabib ki natan beyadi 'et yoshebei ha'arez venikhbeshah ha'arez lifnei ihoh velifnei 'amo. 'atah tenu lebabkhem venafshekhem lidrosh ihoh 'eloheikhem vequmu ubenu 'et miqdash ihoh ha'elohim lehabi 'et 'aron berit ihoh ukhelei qodesh ha'elohim labayit hanibneh leshem ihoh. vedavid zaqen vesaba' yamim vayamlekh 'et shelomoh beno 'al yisra'el. vaye'esof 'et kal sarei yisra'el vehakohanim vehalviyim. vayisaferu halviyim miben sheloshim shanah vama'elah vayhi misparam legulgelotam ligbarim sheloshim ushemonah 'alef. mei'eleh lenazeiakh 'al melekhet bet ihoh 'esrim ve'arba'ah 'alef veshoterim veshofetim sheishet 'alafim. ve'arba'at 'alafim sho'arim ve'arba'at 'alafim mehalim ihoh bakeilim 'asher 'asiti lehalel. vayekhaleqem david makhleqot libnei leivi legeireshon qehat umerari. lageireshuni la'dan veshim'i. benei la'dan harosh yekhi'el vezeitam veyo'el sheloshah. benei shim'i shelomot shelomit vakhazi'el veharan sheloshah 'eleh rashei ha'abot lela'dan. ubenei shim'i yakhat zina vi'ush uberi'ah 'eleh benei shim'i 'arba'ah. vayhi yakhat harosh vezizah hasheini vi'ush uberi'ah lo hirbu banim vayihyu lebet 'ab lifqudah 'ekhat. benei qehat 'amram yizhar khebron ve'uzi'el 'arba'ah. benei 'amram 'aharon umosheh vayibadel 'aharon lehaqdisho qodesh qadashim hu ubanav 'ad 'olam lehaqtir lifnei ihoh leshareto ulebarekh bishmo 'ad 'olam. umosheh 'ish ha'elohim banav yiqare'u 'al sheibet haleivi. benei mosheh geireshom ve'eli'ezer. benei geireshom shebu'el harosh. vayihyu benei 'eli'ezer rekhabyah harosh velo hayah le'eli'ezer banim 'akheirim ubenei rekhabyah rabu lema'elah. benei yizhar shelomit harosh. benei khebron yeriyahu harosh 'amaryah hasheini yakhazi'el hashelishi viqam'am harebi'i. benei 'uzi'el mikhah harosh veyishiyah hasheini. benei merari makhli umushi benei makhli 'el'azar veqish. vayamat 'el'azar velo hayu lo banim ki 'im banot vayisa'um benei qish 'akheihem. benei mushi makhli ve'eider vireimot sheloshah. 'eleh benei leivi lebet 'aboteihem rashei ha'abot lifqudeihem bemispar sheimot legulgelotam 'oseh hamelakhah la'abodat bet ihoh miben 'esrim shanah vama'elah. ki 'amar david heiniakh ihoh 'elohei yisra'el le'amo vayishkon birushalim 'ad le'olam. vegam lalviyim 'en laset 'et hamishkan ve'et kal keilav la'abodato. ki bedibrei david ha'akharonim hemah mispar benei leivi miben 'esrim shanah ulema'elah. ki ma'amadam leyad benei 'aharon la'abodat bet ihoh 'al hakhazeirot ve'al haleshakhot ve'al tahorat lekhal qodesh uma'aseh 'abodat bet ha'elohim. ulelekhem hama'arekhet ulesolet leminkhah velirqiqei hamazot velamakhabat velamurbakhet ulekhal mesurah umidah. vela'amod baboqer baboqer lehodot ulehalel ihoh vekhen la'areb. ulekhol ha'alot 'olot ihoh lashabatot lekhodashim velamo'adim bemispar kemishpat 'aleihem tamid lifnei ihoh. veshameru 'et mishmeret 'ohel mo'ed ve'et mishmeret haqodesh umishmeret benei 'aharon 'akheihem la'abodat bet ihoh. velibnei 'aharon makhleqotam benei 'aharon nadab va'abihu 'el'azar ve'itamar. vayamat nadab va'abihu lifnei 'abihem ubanim lo hayu lahem vaykhahanu 'el'azar ve'itamar. vayekhaleqem david vezadoq min benei 'el'azar va'akhimelekh min benei 'itamar lifqudatam ba'abodatam. vayimaze'u benei 'el'azar rabim lerashei hagebarim min benei 'itamar vayakhlequm libnei 'el'azar rashim lebet 'abot shishah 'asar velibnei 'itamar lebet 'abotam shemonah. vayakhlequm begoralot 'eleh 'im 'eleh ki hayu sarei qodesh vesarei ha'elohim mibenei 'el'azar ubibnei 'itamar. vayikhtebem shema'yah ben netan'el hasofer min haleivi lifnei hamelekh vehasarim vezadoq hakohen va'akhimelekh ben 'ebyatar verashei ha'abot lakohanim velalviyim bet 'ab 'ekhad 'akhuz le'el'azar ve'akhuz 'akhuz le'itamar. vayeizei hagoral harishon lihoyarib lida'yah hasheini. lekharim hashelishi lis'orim harebi'i. lemalkiyah hakhamishi lemiyamin hashishi. lehaqoz hashebi'i la'abiyah hashemini. leyeishua' hateshi'i lishkhanyahu ha'asiri. le'elyashib 'ashtei 'asar leyaqim shenem 'asar. lekhupah sheloshah 'asar leyesheb'ab 'arba'ah 'asar. lebilgah khamishah 'asar le'imer shishah 'asar. lekheizir shib'ah 'asar lehapizez shemonah 'asar. liftakhyah tish'ah 'asar likhezqel ha'esrim. leyakhin 'ekhad ve'esrim legamul shenayim ve'esrim. lidlayahu sheloshah ve'esrim lema'azyahu 'arba'ah ve'esrim. 'eleh fequdatam la'abodatam labo lebet ihoh kemishpatam beyad 'aharon 'abihem ka'asher zivahu ihoh 'elohei yisra'el. velibnei leivi hanotarim libnei 'amram shuba'el libnei shuba'el yekhdeyahu. lirkhabyahu libnei rekhabyahu harosh yishiyah. layizhari shelomot libnei shelomot yakhat. ubenai yeriyahu 'amaryahu hasheini yakhazi'el hashelishi yeqam'am harebi'i. benei 'uzi'el mikhah libnei mikhah shamur shamir. 'akhi mikhah yishiyah libnei yishiyah zekharyahu. benei merari makhli umushi benei ya'aziyahu beno. benei merari leya'aziyahu beno veshoham vezakur ve'ibri. lemakhli 'el'azar velo hayah lo banim. leqish benei qish yerakhme'el. ubenei mushi makhli ve'eider virimot 'eleh benei halviyim lebet 'aboteihem. vayapilu gam hem goralot le'umat 'akheihem benei 'aharon lifnei david hamelekh vezadoq va'akhimelekh verashei ha'abot lakohanim velalviyim 'abot harosh le'umat 'akhiv haqatan. vayabdel david vesarei hazaba la'abodah libnei 'asaf veheiman vidutun hanebi'im hanibe'im bekhinorot binbalim ubimziltayim vayhi misparam 'anshei melakhah la'abodatam. libnei 'asaf zakur veyosef unetanyah va'asar'eilah benei 'asaf 'al yad 'asaf haniba 'al yedei hamelekh. lidutun benei yedutun gedalyahu uzeri visha'yahu khashabyahu umatityahu shishah 'al yedei 'abihem yedutun bakinor haniba 'al hodot vehalel ihoh. leheiman benei heiman buqiyahu matanyahu 'uzi'el shebu'el virimot khananyah khanani 'eli'atah gidalti veromamti 'ezer yashebeqashah maloti hotir makhazi'ot. kal 'eleh banim leheiman khozeh hamelekh bedibrei ha'elohim leharim qaren vayiten ha'elohim leheiman banim 'arba'ah 'asar ubanot shalosh. kal 'eleh 'al yedei 'abihem bashir bet ihoh bimziltayim nebalim vekhinorot la'abodat bet ha'elohim 'al yedei hamelekh 'asaf vidutun veheiman. vayhi misparam 'im 'akheihem melumedei shir ihoh kal hameibin matayim shemonim ushemonah. vayapilu goralot mishmeret le'umat kaqaton kagadol meibin 'im talmid. vayeizei hagoral harishon le'asaf leyosef gedalyahu hasheini hu ve'ekhav ubanav shenem 'asar. hashelishi zakur banav ve'ekhav shenem 'asar. harebi'i layizri banav ve'ekhav shenem 'asar. hakhamishi netanyahu banav ve'ekhav shenem 'asar. hashishi buqiyahu banav ve'ekhav shenem 'asar. hashebi'i yesar'eilah banav ve'ekhav shenem 'asar. hashemini yesha'yahu banav ve'ekhav shenem 'asar. hateshi'i matanyahu banav ve'ekhav shenem 'asar. ha'asiri shim'i banav ve'ekhav shenem 'asar. 'ashtei 'asar 'azar'el banav ve'ekhav shenem 'asar. hashenem 'asar lakhashabyah banav ve'ekhav shenem 'asar. lishloshah 'asar shuba'el banav ve'ekhav shenem 'asar. le'arba'ah 'asar matityahu banav ve'ekhav shenem 'asar. lakhamishah 'asar lireimot banav ve'ekhav shenem 'asar. leshishah 'asar lakhananyahu banav ve'ekhav shenem 'asar. leshib'ah 'asar leyashebeqashah banav ve'ekhav shenem 'asar. lishmonah 'asar lakhanani banav ve'ekhav shenem 'asar. letish'ah 'asar lemaloti banav ve'ekhav shenem 'asar. le'esrim le'eliyatah banav ve'ekhav shenem 'asar. le'ekhad ve'esrim lehotir banav ve'ekhav shenem 'asar. lishnayim ve'esrim legidalti banav ve'ekhav shenem 'asar. lishloshah ve'esrim lemakhazi'ot banav ve'ekhav shenem 'asar. le'arba'ah ve'esrim leromamti 'azer banav ve'ekhav shenem 'asar. lemakhleqot lesho'arim laqarekhim meshelemyahu ben qorei min benei 'asaf. velimshelemyahu banim zekharyahu habekhor yedi'a'el hasheini zebadyahu hashelishi yatni'el harebi'i. 'eilam hakhamishi yehokhanan hashishi 'elyeho'einai hashebi'i. ule'obed 'edom banim shema'yah habekhor yehozabad hasheini yo'akh hashelishi vesakhar harebi'i unetan'el hakhamishi. 'ami'el hashishi yisashkhar hashebi'i pe'uletai hashemini ki beirakho 'elohim. velishma'yah beno nolad banim hamimshalim lebet 'abihem ki giborei khayil hemah. benei shema'yah 'ateni urefa'el ve'obed 'elzabad 'ekhav benei khayil 'elihu usemakhyahu. kal 'eleh mibenei 'obed 'edom hemah ubeneihem va'akheihem 'ish khayil bakoakh la'abodah shishim ushenayim le'obed 'edom. velimshelemyahu banim ve'akhim benei khayil shemonah 'asar. ulekhosah min benei merari banim shimri harosh ki lo hayah bekhor vaysimeihu 'abihu lerosh. khilqiyahu hasheini tebalyahu hashelishi zekharyahu harebi'i kal banim ve'akhim lekhosah sheloshah 'asar. le'eleh makhleqot hasho'arim lerashei hagebarim mishmarot le'umat 'akheihem lesharet bebet ihoh. vayapilu goralot kaqaton kagadol lebet 'abotam lesha'ar vasha'ar. vayipol hagoral mizrakhah leshelemyahu uzekharyahu beno yo'ez besekhel hipilu goralot vayeizei goralo zafonah. le'obed 'edom negbah ulebanav bet ha'asupim. leshupim ulekhosah lama'arab 'im sha'ar shalekhet bamsilah ha'olah mishmar le'umat mishmar. lamizrakh halviyim shishah lazafonah layom 'arba'ah lanegbah layom 'arba'ah vela'asupim shenayim shenayim. laparbar lama'arab 'arba'ah lamsilah shenayim laparbar. 'eleh makhleqot hasho'arim libnei haqarekhi velibnei merari. vehalviyim 'akhiyah 'al 'ozrot bet ha'elohim ule'ozerot haqodashim. benei la'dan benei hageireshuni lela'dan rashei ha'abot lela'dan hageireshuni yekhi'eili. benei yekhi'eili zeitam veyo'el 'akhiv 'al 'ozerot bet ihoh. la'amrami layizhari lakhebroni la'azi'eili. ushebu'el ben geireshom ben mosheh nagid 'al ha'ozarot. ve'ekhav le'eli'ezer rekhabyahu beno visha'yahu beno veyoram beno vezikhri beno ushelomot ushelomit beno. hu shelomot ve'ekhav 'al kal 'ozerot haqodashim 'asher hiqdish david hamelekh verashei ha'abot lesarei ha'alafim vehamei'ot vesarei hazaba. min hamilkhamot umin hashalal hiqdishu lekhazeq lebet ihoh. vekhol hahiqdish shemu'el haro'eh vesha'ul ben qish ve'abner ben ner veyo'ab ben zeruyah kol hamaqdish 'al yad shelomit ve'ekhav. layizhari kenanyahu ubanav lamelakhah hakhizonah 'al yisra'el leshoterim uleshofetim. lakhebroni khashabyahu ve'ekhav benei khayil 'elef usheba' mei'ot 'al pequdat yisra'el mei'eiber layarden ma'rabah lekhol melekhet ihoh vela'abodat hamelekh. lakhebroni yeriyah harosh lakhebroni letoledotav le'abot bishnat ha'arba'im lemalkhut david nidrashu vayimazei bahem giborei khayil beya'zer gil'ad. ve'ekhav benei khayil 'alpayim usheba' mei'ot rashei ha'abot vayafqidem david hamelekh 'al har'ubeini vehagadi vakhazi sheibet hamnashi lekhal debar ha'elohim udebar hamelekh. ubenei yisra'el lemisparam rashei ha'abot vesarei ha'alafim vehamei'ot veshotereihem hamsharetim 'et hamelekh lekhol debar hamakhleqot haba'ah vehayozet khodesh bekhodesh lekhol khadeshei hashanah hamakhaloqet ha'akhat 'esrim ve'arba'ah 'alef. 'al hamakhaloqet harishonah lakhodesh harishon yashabe'am ben zabdi'el ve'al makhaluqto 'esrim ve'arba'ah 'alef. min benei ferez harosh lekhal sarei hazeba'ot lakhodesh harishon. ve'al makhaloqet hakhodesh hasheini dodai ha'akhokhi umakhaluqto umiqlot hanagid ve'al makhaluqto 'esrim ve'arba'ah 'alef. sar hazaba hashelishi lakhodesh hashelishi benayahu ben yehoyada' hakohen rosh ve'al makhaluqto 'esrim ve'arba'ah 'alef. hu benayahu gibor hasheloshim ve'al hasheloshim umakhaluqto 'amizabad beno. harebi'i lakhodesh harebi'i 'asah 'el 'akhi yo'ab uzebadyah beno 'akharav ve'al makhaluqto 'esrim ve'arba'ah 'alef. hakhamishi lakhodesh hakhamishi hasar shamhut hayizrakh ve'al makhaluqto 'esrim ve'arba'ah 'alef. hashishi lakhodesh hashishi 'ira ben 'iqesh hateqo'i ve'al makhaluqto 'esrim ve'arba'ah 'alef. hashebi'i lakhodesh hashebi'i khelez hapeloni min benei 'efrayim ve'al makhaluqto 'esrim ve'arba'ah 'alef. hashemini lakhodesh hashemini sibekhai hakhushati lazarkhi ve'al makhaluqto 'esrim ve'arba'ah 'alef. hateshi'i lakhodesh hateshi'i 'abi'ezer ha'anetoti labenyemini laben yemini ve'al makhaluqto 'esrim ve'arba'ah 'alef. ha'asiri lakhodesh ha'asiri mahrai hanetofati lazarkhi ve'al makhaluqto 'esrim ve'arba'ah 'alef. 'ashtei 'asar le'ashtei 'asar hakhodesh benayah hapir'atoni min benei 'efrayim ve'al makhaluqto 'esrim ve'arba'ah 'alef. hashenem 'asar lishnem 'asar hakhodesh kheldai hanetofati le'ateni'el ve'al makhaluqto 'esrim ve'arba'ah 'alef. ve'al shibtei yisra'el lar'ubeini nagid 'eli'ezer ben zikhri lashim'oni shefatyahu ben ma'akhah. leleivi khashabyah ben qemu'el le'aharon zadoq. lihudah 'elihu mei'akhei david leyisashkhar 'ameri ben mikha'el. lizbulun yishma'yahu ben 'obadyahu lenaftali yerimot ben 'azri'el. libnei 'efrayim hosheia' ben 'azazyahu lakhazi sheibet menasheh yo'el ben pedayahu. lakhazi hamnasheh gil'adah yido ben zekharyahu lebinyamin ya'asi'el ben 'abner. ledan 'azar'el ben yerokham 'eleh sarei shibtei yisra'el. velo nasa david misparam lemiben 'esrim shanah ulematah ki 'amar ihoh leharbot 'et yisra'el kekhokhbei hashamayim. yo'ab ben zeruyah heikhel limnot velo khilah vayhi bazot qezef 'al yisra'el velo 'alah hamispar bemispar dibrei hayamim lamelekh david. ve'al 'ozerot hamelekh 'azmavet ben 'adi'el ve'al ha'ozarot basadeh be'arim ubakefarim ubamigdalot yehonatan ben 'uziyahu. ve'al 'osei melekhet hasadeh la'abodat ha'adamah 'ezri ben kelub. ve'al hakeramim shim'i haramati ve'al shebakeramim le'ozerot hayayin zabdi hashifmi. ve'al hazeitim vehashiqmim 'asher bashefeilah ba'al khanan hagedeiri ve'al 'ozerot hashemen yo'ash. ve'al habaqar haro'im basharon shitrai shirtai hasharoni ve'al habaqar ba'amaqim shafat ben 'adlai. ve'al hagemalim 'obil hayishme'eili ve'al ha'atonot yekhdeyahu hameironoti. ve'al hazon yaziz hahagri kal 'eleh sarei harekhush 'asher lamelekh david. vihonatan dod david yo'ez 'ish meibin vesofer hu vikhi'el ben khakhmoni 'im benei hamelekh. va'akhitofel yo'ez lamelekh vekhushai ha'arki reia' hamelekh. ve'akharei 'akhitofel yehoyada' ben benayahu ve'ebyatar vesar zaba lamelekh yo'ab. vayaqhel david 'et kal sarei yisra'el sarei hashebatim vesarei hamakhleqot hamsharetim 'et hamelekh vesarei ha'alafim vesarei hamei'ot vesarei khal rekhush umiqneh lamelekh ulebanav 'im hasarisim vehagiborim ulekhal gibor khayil 'el yerushalim. vayaqam david hamelekh 'al raglav vayomer shema'uni 'akhai ve'ami 'ani 'im lebabi libnot bet menukhah la'aron berit ihoh velahadom raglei 'eloheinu vahakhinoti libnot. veha'elohim 'amar li lo tibneh bayit lishmi ki 'ish milkhamot 'atah vedamim shafakheta. vayibkhar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el bi mikol bet 'abi lihyot lemelekh 'al yisra'el le'olam ki bihudah bakhar lenagid ubebet yehudah bet 'abi ubibnei 'abi bi razah lehamlikh 'al kal yisra'el. umikal banai ki rabim banim natan li ihoh vayibkhar bishlomoh beni lashebet 'al kisei malkhut ihoh 'al yisra'el. vayomer li shelomoh binkha hu yibneh beiti vakhazeirotai ki bakharti bo li leben va'ani 'ehyeh lo le'ab. vahakhinoti 'et malkhuto 'ad le'olam 'im yekhezaq la'asot mizvotai umishpatai kayom hazeh. ve'atah le'einei khal yisra'el qehal ihoh ube'azenei 'eloheinu shimru vedirshu kal mizvot ihoh 'eloheikhem lema'an tireshu 'et ha'arez hatobah vehinkhaltem libneikhem 'akhareikhem 'ad 'olam. ve'atah shelomoh beni da' 'et 'elohei 'abikha ve'abedeihu beleb shalem ubenefesh khafeizah ki khal lebabot doresh ihoh vekhal yeizer makhashabot meibin 'im tidreshenu yimazei lakh ve'im ta'azbenu yaznikhakha la'ad. re'eh 'atah ki ihoh bakhar bekha libnot bayit lamiqdash khazaq va'aseh. vayiten david lishlomoh beno 'et tabnit ha'ulam ve'et batav veganzakav va'aliyotav vakhadarav hapenimim ubet hakaporet. vetabnit kol 'asher hayah baruakh 'imo lekhazrot bet ihoh ulekhal haleshakhot sabib le'ozerot bet ha'elohim ule'ozerot haqodashim. ulemakhleqot hakohanim vehalviyim ulekhal melekhet 'abodat bet ihoh ulekhal kelei 'abodat bet ihoh. lazahab bamishqal lazahab lekhal kelei 'abodah va'abodah lekhol kelei hakesef bemishqal lekhal kelei 'abodah va'abodah. umishqal limnorot hazahab veneiroteihem zahab bemishqal menorah umenorah veneiroteha velimnorot hakesef bemishqal limnorah veneiroteha ka'abodat menorah umenorah. ve'et hazahab mishqal leshulkhanot hama'arekhet leshulkhan veshulkhan vekhesef leshulkhanot hakasef. vehamizlagot vehamizraqot vehaqesavot zahab tahor velikhforei hazahab bemishqal likhfor ukhefor velikhforei hakesef bemishqal likhfor ukhefor. ulemizbakh haqetoret zahab mezuqaq bamishqal uletabnit hamerkabah hakerubim zahab leforesim vesokhekhim 'al 'aron berit ihoh. hakol bikhtab miyad ihoh 'alai hiskil kol mal'akhot hatabnit. vayomer david lishlomoh beno khazaq ve'emaz va'aseh 'al tira ve'al teikhat ki ihoh 'elohim 'elohai 'imakh lo yarpekha velo ya'azbeka 'ad likhlot kal melekhet 'abodat bet ihoh. vehineh makhleqot hakohanim vehalviyim lekhal 'abodat bet ha'elohim ve'imekha bekhal melakhah lekhal nadib bakhakhemah lekhal 'abodah vehasarim vekhal ha'am lekhal debarekha. vayomer david hamelekh lekhal haqahal shelomoh beni 'ekhad bakhar bo 'elohim na'ar varakh vehamelakhah gedolah ki lo le'adam habirah ki ihoh 'elohim. ukhekhal kokhi hakhinoti lebet 'elohai hazahab lazahab vehakesef lakesef vehanekhoshet lanekhoshet habarzel labarzel veha'eizim la'eizim 'abnei shoham umilu'im 'abnei fukh veriqmah vekhol 'eben yeqarah ve'abnei shayish larob. ve'od birzoti bebet 'elohai yesh li segulah zahab vakhasef natati lebet 'elohai lema'lah mikal hakhinoti lebet haqodesh. sheloshet 'alafim kikerei zahab mizehab 'ofir veshib'at 'alafim kikar kesef mezuqaq latuakh qirot habatim. lazahab lazahab velakesef lakesef ulekhal melakhah beyad kharashim umi mitnadeb lemalot yado hayom ihoh. vayitnadebu sarei ha'abot vesarei shibtei yisra'el vesarei ha'alafim vehamei'ot ulesarei melekhet hamelekh. vayitenu la'abodat bet ha'elohim zahab kikarim khameishet 'alafim va'adarkhonim ribo vekhesef kikarim 'aseret 'alafim unekhoshet ribo ushemonat 'alafim kikarim ubarzel mei'ah 'elef kikarim. vehanimza 'ito 'abanim natenu le'ozar bet ihoh 'al yad yekhi'el hageireshuni. vayismekhu ha'am 'al hitnadebam ki beleb shalem hitnadebu ihoh vegam david hamelekh samakh simkhah gedolah. vaybarekh david 'et ihoh le'einei kal haqahal vayomer david barukh 'atah ihoh 'elohei yisra'el 'abinu mei'olam ve'ad 'olam. lekha ihoh hagedulah vehageburah vehatif'eret vehaneizakh vehahod ki khol bashamayim uba'arez lekha ihoh hamamlakhah vehamitnasei lekhol lerosh. veha'osher vehakabod milefanekha ve'atah moshel bakol ubeyadekha koakh ugeburah ubeyadekha legadel ulekhazeq lakol. ve'atah 'eloheinu modim 'anakhnu lakh umehalim leshem tif'artekha. vekhi mi 'ani umi 'ami ki na'zor koakh lehitnadeb kazot ki mimekha hakol umiyadekha natanu lakh. ki geirim 'anakhnu lefanekha vetoshabim kekhal 'aboteinu kazel yameinu 'al ha'arez ve'en miqveh. ihoh 'eloheinu khol hehamon hazeh 'asher hakhinonu libnot lekha bayit leshem qadshekha miyadekha hi hu ulekha hakol. veyada'ti 'elohai ki 'atah bokhen leibab umeisharim tirzeh 'ani beyosher lebabi hitnadabti khal 'eleh ve'atah 'amekha hanimze'u foh ra'iti besimkhah lehitnadeb lakh. ihoh 'elohei 'abraham yizkhaq veyisra'el 'aboteinu shomrah zot le'olam leyeizer makhshebot lebab 'amekha vehakhen lebabam 'eilekha. velishlomoh beni ten leibab shalem lishmor mizvotekha 'eidevotekha vekhuqekha vela'asot hakol velibnot habirah 'asher hakhinoti. vayomer david lekhal haqahal barekhu na 'et ihoh 'eloheikhem vaybarakhu khal haqahal ihoh 'elohei 'aboteihem vayiqedu vayishtakhavu ihoh velamelekh. vayizbekhu ihoh zebakhim vaya'alu 'olot ihoh lemakhorat hayom hahu parim 'elef 'eilim 'elef kebasim 'elef veniskeihem uzebakhim larob lekhal yisra'el. vayokhelu vayishtu lifnei ihoh bayom hahu besimkhah gedolah vayamlikhu sheinit lishlomoh ben david vayimshekhu ihoh lenagid ulezadoq lekhohen. vayeisheb lomoh 'al kisei ihoh lemelekh takhat david 'abiv vayazlakh vayishme'u 'eilav kal yisra'el. vekhal hasarim vehagiborim vegam kal benei hamelekh david natenu yad takhat shelomoh hamelekh. vaygadel ihoh 'et shelomoh lema'lah le'einei kal yisra'el vayiten 'alav hod malkhut 'asher lo hayah 'al kal melekh lefanav 'al yisra'el. vedavid ben yishai malakh 'al kal yisra'el. vehayamim 'asher malakh 'al yisra'el 'arba'im shanah bekhebron malakh sheba' shanim ubirushalim malakh sheloshim veshalosh. vayamat beseibah tobah seba' yamim 'osher vekhabod vayimlokh shelomoh beno takhtav. vedibrei david hamelekh harishonim veha'akhronim hinam ketubim 'al dibrei shemu'el haro'eh ve'al dibrei natan hanabi ve'al dibrei gad hakhozeh. 'im kal malkhuto ugeburato veha'itim 'asher 'aberu 'alav ve'al yisra'el ve'al kal mamlekhot ha'arazot.

vayitkhazeq shelomoh ben david 'al malkhuto ihoh 'elohav 'imo vaygadeleihu lema'elah. vayomer shelomoh lekhal yisra'el lesarei ha'alafim vehamei'ot velashofetim ulekhol nasi lekhal yisra'el rashei ha'abot. vayeilekhu shelomoh vekhal haqahal 'imo labamah 'asher begib'on ki sham hayah 'ohel mo'ed ha'elohim 'asher 'asah mosheh 'ebed ihoh bamidbar. 'abal 'aron ha'elohim he'elah david miqiryat ye'arim baheikhin lo david ki natah lo 'ohel birushalim. umizbakh hanekhoshet 'asher 'asah bezal'el ben 'uri ben khur sam lifnei mishkan ihoh vayidresheihu shelomoh vehaqahal. vaya'al shelomoh sham 'al mizbakh hanekhoshet lifnei ihoh 'asher le'ohel mo'ed vaya'al 'alav 'olot 'alef. balaylah hahu nir'ah 'elohim lishlomoh vayomer lo she'al mah 'eten lakh. vayomer shelomoh leilohim 'atah 'asita 'im david 'abi khesed gadol vehimlakhtani takhtav. 'atah ihoh 'elohim yei'amen debarekha 'im david 'abi ki 'atah himlakhtani 'al 'am rab ka'afar ha'arez. 'atah khakhmah umada' ten li ve'eize'ah lifnei ha'am hazeh ve'abo'ah ki mi yishpot 'et 'amekha hazeh hagadol. vayomer 'elohim lishlomoh ya'an 'asher hayetah zot 'im lebabekha velosha 'alta 'osher nekhasim vekhabod ve'et nefesh sone'ekha vegam yamim rabim lo sha'aleta vatish'al lekha khakhmah umada' 'asher tishpot 'et 'ami 'asher himlakhtikha 'alav. hakhakhemah vehamada' natun lakh ve'osher unekhasim vekhabod 'eten lakh 'asher lo hayah khen lamelakhim 'asher lefanekha ve'akharekha lo yihyeh ken. vayabo shelomoh labamah 'asher begib'on yerushalim milifnei 'ohel mo'ed vayimlokh 'al yisra'el. vaye'esof shelomoh rekheb ufarashim vayhi lo 'elef ve'arba' mei'ot rekheb ushenem 'asar 'elef parashim vayanikhem be'arei harekheb ve'im hamelekh birushalim. vayiten hamelekh 'et hakesef ve'et hazahab birushalim ka'abanim ve'et ha'arazim natan kashiqmim 'asher bashefeilah larob. umoza hasusim 'asher lishlomoh mimizrayim umiqvei sokharei hamelekh miqvei yiqkhu bimkhir. vaya'alu vayozi'u mimizrayim merkabah beshesh mei'ot kesef vesus bakhamishim umei'ah vekhen lekhal malkhei hakhitim umalkhei 'aram beyadam yozi'u. vayomer shelomoh libnot bayit leshem ihoh ubayit lemalkhuto. vayispor shelomoh shib'im 'elef 'ish sabal ushemonim 'elef 'ish khozeb bahar umenazekhim 'aleihem sheloshet 'alafim veshesh mei'ot. vayishlakh shelomoh 'el khuram melekh zor leimor ka'asher 'asita 'im david 'abi vatishlakh lo 'arazim libnot lo bayit lashebet bo. hineh 'ani boneh bayit leshem ihoh 'elohai lehaqdish lo lehaqtir lefanav qetoret samim uma'arekhet tamid ve'olot laboqer vela'ereb lashabatot velekhodashim ulemo'adei ihoh 'eloheinu le'olam zot 'al yisra'el. vehabayit 'asher 'ani boneh gadol ki gadol 'eloheinu mikal ha'elohim. umi ya'azar koakh libnot lo bayit ki hashamayim ushemei hashamayim lo yekhalkeluhu umi 'ani 'asher 'ebneh lo bayit ki 'im lehaqtir lefanav. ve'atah shelakh li 'ish khakham la'asot bazahab ubakesef ubanekhoshet ubabarzel uba'argevan vekharmil utekheilet veyodeia' lefateiakh pitukhim 'im hakhakhamim 'asher 'imi bihudah ubirushalim 'asher heikhin david 'abi. ushelakh li 'azei 'arazim beroshim ve'algumim meihalebanon ki 'ani yada'ti 'asher 'abadekha yod'im likhrot 'azei lebanon vehineh 'abadai 'im 'abadekha. ulehakhin li 'eizim larob ki habayit 'asher 'ani boneh gadol vehaflei. vehineh lakhotebim lekhoretei ha'eizim natati khitim makot la'abadekha korim 'esrim 'elef use'orim korim 'esrim 'alef veyayin batim 'esrim 'elef veshemen batim 'esrim 'alef. vayomer khuram melekh zor bikhtab vayishlakh 'el shelomoh be'ahabat ihoh 'et 'amo netanekha 'aleihem melekh. vayomer khuram barukh ihoh 'elohei yisra'el 'asher 'asah 'et hashamayim ve'et ha'arez 'asher natan ledavid hamelekh ben khakham yodeia' seikhel ubinah 'asher yibneh bayit ihoh ubayit lemalkhuto. ve'atah shalakhti 'ish khakham yodeia' binah lekhuram 'abi. ben 'ishah min benot dan ve'abiv 'ish zori yodeia' la'asot bazahab ubakesef banekhoshet babarzel ba'abanim uba'eizim ba'argaman batekheilet ubabuz ubakarmil ulefateiakh kal pituakh velakhshob kal makhashabet 'asher yinaten lo 'im khakhamekha vekhakhmei 'adoni david 'abikha. ve'atah hakhitim vehase'orim hashemen vehayayin 'asher 'amar 'adoni yishlakh la'abadav. va'anakhnu nikhrot 'eizim min halebanon kekhal zarekekha unebi'em lekha rafsodot 'al yam yafo ve'atah ta'aleh 'otam yerushalim. vayispor shelomoh kal ha'anashim hageirim 'asher be'erez yisra'el 'akharei hasefar 'asher sefaram david 'abiv vayimaze'u mei'ah vakhamishim 'elef usheloshet 'alafim veshesh mei'ot. vaya'as meihem shib'im 'elef sabal ushemonim 'elef khozeb bahar usheloshet 'alafim veshesh mei'ot menazekhim leha'abid 'et ha'am. vayakhel shelomoh libnot 'et bet ihoh birushalim behar hamoriyah 'asher nir'ah ledavid 'abihu 'asher heikhin bimqom david begoren 'arenan haybusi. vayakhel libnot bakhodesh hasheini basheini bishnat 'arba' lemalkhuto. ve'eleh husad shelomoh libnot 'et bet ha'elohim ha'orekh 'amot bamidah harishonah 'amot shishim verokhab 'amot 'esrim. veha'ulam 'asher 'al penei ha'orekh 'al penei rokhab habayit 'amot 'esrim vehagobah mei'ah ve'esrim vayzapeihu mipenimah zahab tahor. ve'et habayit hagadol khipah 'ez beroshim vaykhapeihu zahab tob vaya'al 'alav timorim vesharsherot. vayzaf 'et habayit 'eben yeqarah letif'aret vehazahab zehab parvayim. vaykhaf 'et habayit haqorot hasipim veqirotav vedaltotav zahab ufitakh kerubim 'al haqirot. vaya'as 'et bet qodesh haqodashim 'areko 'al penei rokhab habayit 'amot 'esrim verakhebo 'amot 'esrim vaykhapeihu zahab tob lekhikarim shesh mei'ot. umishqal lemismerot lishqalim khamishim zahab veha'aliyot khipah zahab. vaya'as bebet qodesh haqodashim kerubim shenayim ma'aseh za'azu'im vayzapu 'otam zahab. vekhanfei hakerubim 'arekam 'amot 'esrim kenaf ha'ekhad le'amot khamesh maga'at leqir habayit vehakanaf ha'akheret 'amot khamesh magia' likhnaf hakerub ha'akher. ukhenaf hakerub ha'ekhad 'amot khamesh magia' leqir habayit vehakanaf ha'akheret 'amot khamesh debeiqah likhnaf hakerub ha'akher. kanfei hakerubim ha'eleh poresim 'amot 'esrim vehem 'omedim 'al ragleihem ufeneihem labayit. vaya'as 'et haparokhet tekheilet ve'argaman vekharmil ubuz vaya'al 'alav kerubim. vaya'as lifnei habayit 'amudim shenayim 'amot sheloshim vekhamesh 'orekh vehazefet 'asher 'al rosho 'amot khamesh. vaya'as sharsherot badebir vayiten 'al rosh ha'amudim vaya'as rimonim mei'ah vayiten basharsherot. vayaqem 'et ha'amudim 'al penei haheikhal 'ekhad miyamin ve'ekhad meihasemol vayiqra shem haymini haymani yakhin veshem hasemali bo'az. vaya'as mizbakh nekhoshet 'esrim 'amah 'areko ve'esrim 'amah rakhebo ve'eser 'amot qomato. vaya'as 'et hayam muzaq 'eser ba'amah misefato 'el sefato 'agol sabib vekhamesh ba'amah qomato veqav sheloshim ba'amah yasob 'oto sabib. udemut beqarim takhat lo sabib sabib sobbim 'oto 'eser ba'amah maqifim 'et hayam sabib shenayim turim habaqar yezuqim bemuzaqto. 'omed 'al shenem 'asar baqar sheloshah fonim zafonah usheloshah fonim yamah usheloshah ponim negbah usheloshah ponim mizrakhah vehayam 'aleihem milma'elah vekhal 'akhoreihem bayetah. ve'abeyo tefakh usefato kema'aseh sefat kos perakh shoshanah makhaziq batim sheloshet 'alafim yakhil. vaya'as kiyorim 'asarah vayiten khamishah miyamin vakhamishah misemol lerakhezah bahem 'et ma'aseh ha'olah yadikhu bam vehayam lerakhezah lakohanim bo. vaya'as 'et menorot hazahab 'eser kemishpatam vayiten baheikhal khamesh miyamin vekhamesh misemol. vaya'as shulkhanot 'asarah vayanakh baheikhal khamishah miyamin vakhamishah misemol vaya'as mizreqei zahab mei'ah. vaya'as khazar hakohanim veha'azarah hagedolah udelatot la'azarah vedaltoteihem zipah nekhoshet. ve'et hayam natan miketef haymanit qeidemah mimul negbah. vaya'as khuram 'et hasirot ve'et haya'im ve'et hamizraqot vaykhal khyram khuram la'asot 'et hamelakhah 'asher 'asah lamelekh shelomoh bebet ha'elohim. 'amudim shenayim vehagulot vehakotarot 'al rosh ha'amudim shetayim vehasebakhot shetayim lekhasot 'et shetei gulot hakotarot 'asher 'al rosh ha'amudim. ve'et harimonim 'arba' mei'ot lishtei hasebakhot shenayim turim rimonim lasebakhah ha'ekhat lekhasot 'et shetei gulot hakotarot 'asher 'al penei ha'amudim. ve'et hamekhonot 'asah ve'et hakiyorot 'asah 'al hamekhonot. 'et hayam 'ekhad ve'et habaqar shenem 'asar takhtav. ve'et hasirot ve'et haya'im ve'et hamizlagot ve'et kal keleihem 'asah khuram 'abiv lamelekh shelomoh lebet ihoh nekhoshet maruq. bekhikar hayarden yezaqam hamelekh ba'abi ha'adamah ben sukot uben zereidatah. vaya'as shelomoh kal hakeilim ha'eleh larob me'od ki lo nekhqar mishqal hanekhoshet. vaya'as shelomoh 'et kal hakeilim 'asher bet ha'elohim ve'et mizbakh hazahab ve'et hashulkhanot va'aleihem lekhem hapanim. ve'et hamenorot veneiroteihem leba'aram kamishpat lifnei hadebir zahab sagur. vehaperakh vehaneirot vehamelqakhayim zahab hu mikhlot zahab. vehamzamerot vehamizraqot vehakapot vehamakhtot zahab sagur ufetakh habayit daltotav hapenimiyot leqodesh haqodashim vedaltei habayit laheikhal zahab. vatishlam kal hamelakhah 'asher 'asah shelomoh lebet ihoh vayabei shelomoh 'et qadeshei david 'abiv ve'et hakesef ve'et hazahab ve'et kal hakeilim natan be'ozerot bet ha'elohim. 'az yaqhel shelomoh 'et ziqnei yisra'el ve'et kal rashei hamatot nesi'ei ha'abot libnei yisra'el 'el yerushalim leha'alot 'et 'aron berit ihoh mei'ir david hi ziyon. vayiqahalu 'el hamelekh kal 'ish yisra'el bekhag hu hakhodesh hashebi'i. vayabo'u kol ziqnei yisra'el vayis'u halviyim 'et ha'aron. vaya'alu 'et ha'aron ve'et 'ohel mo'ed ve'et kal kelei haqodesh 'asher ba'ohel he'elu 'otam hakohanim halviyim. vehamelekh shelomoh vekhal 'adat yisra'el hano'adim 'alav lifnei ha'aron mezabekhim zon ubaqar 'asher lo yisaferu velo yimanu meirob. vayabi'u hakohanim 'et 'aron berit ihoh 'el meqomo 'el debir habayit 'el qodesh haqedashim 'el takhat kanfei hakerubim. vayihyu hakerubim poresim kenafayim 'al meqom ha'aron vaykhasu hakerubim 'al ha'aron ve'al badav milma'elah. vaya'arikhu habadim vayeira'u rashei habadim min ha'aron 'al penei hadebir velo yeira'u hakhuzah vayhi sham 'ad hayom hazeh. 'en ba'aron raq shenei halukhot 'asher natan mosheh bekhoreb 'asher karat ihoh 'im benei yisra'el bezeitam mimizrayim. vayhi bezet hakohanim min haqodesh ki kal hakohanim hanimze'im hitqadashu 'en lishmor lemakhleqot. vehalviyim hamshorarim lekhulam le'asaf leheiman lidutun velibneihem vela'akheihem melubashim buz bimziltayim ubinbalim vekhinorot 'omedim mizrakh lamizbeiakh ve'imahem kohanim lemei'ah ve'esrim makhzeririm makhzerim bakhazozerot. vayhi khe'ekhad lamakhazozerim lamkhazerim velamshorarim lehashmia' qol 'ekhad lehalel ulehodot ihoh ukheharim qol bakhazozerot ubimziltayim ubikhlei hashir ubehalel ihoh ki tob ki le'olam khasdo vehabayit malei 'anan bet ihoh. velo yakhelu hakohanim la'amod lesharet mipenei he'anan ki malei khebod ihoh 'et bet ha'elohim. 'az 'amar shelomoh ihoh 'amar lishkon ba'arafel. va'ani baniti bet zebul lakh umakhon leshibtekha 'olamim. vayaseb hamelekh 'et panav vaybarekh 'et kal qehal yisra'el vekhal qehal yisra'el 'omed. vayomer barukh ihoh 'elohei yisra'el 'asher diber befiv 'et david 'abi ubeyadav milei leimor. min hayom 'asher hozeiti 'et 'ami mei'erez mizrayim lo bakharti be'ir mikol shibtei yisra'el libnot bayit lihyot shemi sham velo bakharti be'ish lihyot nagid 'al 'ami yisra'el. va'ebkhar birushalim lihyot shemi sham va'ebkhar bedavid lihyot 'al 'ami yisra'el. vayhi 'im lebab david 'abi libnot bayit leshem ihoh 'elohei yisra'el. vayomer ihoh 'el david 'abi ya'an 'asher hayah 'im lebabekha libnot bayit lishmi hetibota ki hayah 'im lebabekha. raq 'atah lo tibneh habayit ki binkha hayozei meikhalazekha hu yibneh habayit lishmi. vayaqem ihoh 'et debaro 'asher diber va'aqum takhat david 'abi va'eisheb 'al kisei yisra'el ka'asher diber ihoh va'ebneh habayit leshem ihoh 'elohei yisra'el. va'asim sham 'et ha'aron 'asher sham berit ihoh 'asher karat 'im benei yisra'el. vaya'amod lifnei mizbakh ihoh neged kal qehal yisra'el vayifros kapav. ki 'asah shelomoh kiyor nekhoshet vayiteneihu betokh ha'azarah khamesh 'amot 'areko vekhamesh 'amot rakhebo ve'amot shalosh qomato vaya'amod 'alav vayibrakh 'al birkav neged kal qehal yisra'el vayifros kapav hashamayemah. vayomar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el 'en kamokha 'elohim bashamayim uba'arez shomer haberit vehakhesed la'abadekha haholekhim lefanekha bekhal libam. 'asher shamarta le'abdekha david 'abi 'et 'asher dibarta lo vatedaber befikha ubeyadekha mileita kayom hazeh. ve'atah ihoh 'elohei yisra'el mor le'abdekha david 'abi 'et 'asher dibarta lo leimor lo yikaret lekha 'ish milefanai yosheb 'al kisei yisra'el raq 'im yishmeru banekha 'et darkam lalekhet betorati ka'asher halakhta lefanai. ve'atah ihoh 'elohei yisra'el yei'amen debarekha 'asher dibarta le'abdekha ledavid. ki ha'umnam yeisheb 'elohim 'et ha'adam 'al ha'arez hineh shamayim ushemei hashamayim lo yekhalkelukha 'af ki habayit hazeh 'asher baniti. ufanita 'el tefilat 'abdekha ve'el tekhinato ihoh 'elohai lishmoa' 'el harinah ve'el hatefilah 'asher 'abdekha mitpalel lefanekha. lihyot 'einekha fetukhot 'el habayit hazeh yomam valaylah 'el hamaqom 'asher 'amarta lasum shimkha sham lishmoa' 'el hatefilah 'asher yitpalel 'abdekha 'el hamaqom hazeh. veshama'ta 'el takhanunei 'abdekha ve'amekha yisra'el 'asher yitpalu 'el hamaqom hazeh ve'atah tishma' mimeqom shibtekha min hashamayim veshama'ta vesalakheta. 'im yekheta 'ish lerei'eihu venasha bo 'alah leha'aloto uba 'alah lifnei mizbakhakha babayit hazeh. ve'atah tishma' min hashamayim ve'asita veshafata 'et 'abadekha lehashib lerasha' latet darko berosho ulehazdiq zadiq latet lo kezidqato. ve'im yinagef 'amekha yisra'el lifnei 'oyeb ki yekhet'u lakh veshabu vehodu 'et shemekha vehitpalu vehitkhanenu lefanekha babayit hazeh. ve'atah tishma' min hashamayim vesalakhta lekhatat 'amekha yisra'el vahasheibotam 'el ha'adamah 'asher natatah lahem vela'aboteihem. behei'azer hashamayim velo yihyeh matar ki yekhet'u lakh vehitpalu 'el hamaqom hazeh vehodu 'et shemekha meikhatatam yeshubun ki ta'anem. ve'atah tishma' hashamayim vesalakhta lekhatat 'abadekha ve'amekha yisra'el ki torem 'el haderekh hatobah 'asher yeilekhu bah venatatah matar 'al 'arzekha 'asher natatah le'amekha lenakhalah. ra'ab ki yihyeh ba'arez deber ki yihyeh shidafon veyeiraqon 'arbeh vekhasil ki yihyeh ki yazar lo 'oybav be'erez she'arav kal nega' vekhal makhalah. kal tefilah khal tekhinah 'asher yihyeh lekhal ha'adam ulekhol 'amekha yisra'el 'asher yeide'u 'ish nig'o umakh'obo ufaras kapav 'el habayit hazeh. ve'atah tishma' min hashamayim mekhon shibtekha vesalakhta venatatah la'ish kekhal derakhav 'asher teida' 'et lebabo ki 'atah lebadekha yada'ta 'et lebab benei ha'adam. lema'an yira'ukha lalekhet bidrakhekha kal hayamim 'asher hem khayim 'al penei ha'adamah 'asher natatah la'aboteinu. vegam 'el hanakheri 'asher lo mei'amekha yisra'el hu uba mei'erez rekhoqah lema'an shimkha hagadol veyadekha hakhazaqah uzero'akha hanetuyah uba'u vehitpalu 'el habayit hazeh. ve'atah tishma' min hashamayim mimekhon shibtekha ve'asita kekhol 'asher yiqra 'eilekha hanakheri lema'an yeide'u khal 'amei ha'arez 'et shemekha uleyir'ah 'otekha ke'amekha yisra'el velada'at ki shimkha niqra 'al habayit hazeh 'asher baniti. ki yeizei 'amekha lamilkhamah 'al 'oybav baderekh 'asher tishlakhem vehitpalu 'eilekha derekh ha'ir hazot 'asher bakharta bah vehabayit 'asher baniti lishmekha. veshama'ta min hashamayim 'et tefilatam ve'et tekhinatam ve'asita mishpatam. ki yekhet'u lakh ki 'en 'adam 'asher lo yekheta ve'anafta bam unetatam lifnei 'oyeb veshabum shobeihem 'el 'erez rekhoqah 'o qerobah. veheishibu 'el lebabam ba'arez 'asher nishbu sham veshabu vehitkhanenu 'eilekha be'erez shibyam leimor khatanu he'evinu verasha'enu. veshabu 'eilekha bekhal libam ubekhal nafsham be'erez shibyam 'asher shabu 'otam vehitpalu derekh 'arzam 'asher natatah la'abotam veha'ir 'asher bakharta velabayit 'asher baniti lishmekha. veshama'ta min hashamayim mimekhon shibtekha 'et tefilatam ve'et tekhinoteihem ve'asita mishpatam vesalakhta le'amekha 'asher khate'u lakh. 'atah 'elohai yihyu na 'einekha petukhot ve'azenekha qashubot litfilat hamaqom hazeh. ve'atah qumah ihoh 'elohim lenukhekha 'atah va'aron 'uzekha kohanekha ihoh 'elohim yilbeshu teshu'ah vakhasidekha yismekhu batob. ihoh 'elohim 'al tasheb penei meshikhekha zakherah lekhasdei david 'abdekha. ukhekhalot shelomoh lehitpalel veha'esh yaredah meihashamayim vatokhal ha'olah vehazebakhim ukhebod ihoh malei 'et habayit. velo yakhelu hakohanim labo 'el bet ihoh ki malei khebod ihoh 'et bet ihoh. vekhol benei yisra'el ro'im beredet ha'esh ukhebod ihoh 'al habayit vayikhre'u 'apayim 'arzah 'al harizfah vayishtakhavu vehodot ihoh ki tob ki le'olam khasdo. vehamelekh vekhal ha'am zobekhim zebakh lifnei ihoh. vayizbakh hamelekh shelomoh 'et zebakh habaqar 'esrim ushenayim 'elef vezon mei'ah ve'esrim 'alef vayakhnekhu 'et bet ha'elohim hamelekh vekhal ha'am. vehakohanim 'al mishmerotam 'omedim vehalviyim bikhlei shir ihoh 'asher 'asah david hamelekh lehodot ihoh ki le'olam khasdo behalel david beyadam vehakohanim makhazozerim makhzerim negdam vekhal yisra'el 'omedim. vayqadesh shelomoh 'et tokh hekhazer 'asher lifnei bet ihoh ki 'asah sham ha'olot ve'et khelbei hashelamim ki mizbakh hanekhoshet 'asher 'asah shelomoh lo yakhol lehakhil 'et ha'olah ve'et haminkhah ve'et hakhalabim. vaya'as shelomoh 'et hekhag ba'et hahi shib'at yamim vekhal yisra'el 'imo qahal gadol me'od milebo khamat 'ad nakhal mizrayim. vaya'asu bayom hashemini 'azaret ki khanukat hamizbeiakh 'asu shib'at yamim vehekhag shib'at yamim. ubeyom 'esrim usheloshah lakhodesh hashebi'i shilakh 'et ha'am le'aholeihem semeikhim vetobei leb 'al hatobah 'asher 'asah ihoh ledavid velishlomoh uleyisra'el 'amo. vaykhal shelomoh 'et bet ihoh ve'et bet hamelekh ve'et kal haba 'al leb shelomoh la'asot bebet ihoh ubebeito hizliakh. vayeira ihoh 'el shelomoh balayelah vayomer lo shama'ti 'et tefilatekha ubakharti bamaqom hazeh li lebet zabakh. hen 'e'ezor hashamayim velo yihyeh matar vehen 'azaveh 'al khagab le'ekhol ha'arez ve'im 'ashalakh deber be'ami. veyikane'u 'ami 'asher niqra shemi 'aleihem veyitpalu vibaqshu fanai veyashubu midarkheihem hara'im va'ani 'eshma' min hashamayim ve'eslakh lekhatatam ve'erpa 'et 'arzam.
