'atah 'einai yihyu fetukhot ve'azenai qashubot litfilat hamaqom hazeh. ve'atah bakharti vehiqdashti 'et habayit hazeh lihyot shemi sham 'ad 'olam vehayu 'einai velibi sham kal hayamim. ve'atah 'im teilekh lefanai ka'asher halakh david 'abikha vela'asot kekhol 'asher zivitikha vekhuqai umishpatai tishmor. vahaqimoti 'et kisei malkhutekha ka'asher karati ledavid 'abikha leimor lo yikaret lekha 'ish moshel beyisra'el. ve'im teshubun 'atem va'azabtem khuqotai umizvotai 'asher natati lifneikhem vahalakhtem va'abadtem 'elohim 'akheirim vehishtakhavitem lahem. unetashtim mei'al 'admati 'asher natati lahem ve'et habayit hazeh 'asher hiqdashti lishmi 'ashlikh mei'al panai ve'etenenu lemashal velishninah bekhal ha'amim. vehabayit hazeh 'asher hayah 'elyon lekhal 'ober 'alav yishom ve'amar bameh 'asah ihoh kakhah la'arez hazot velabayit hazeh. ve'ameru 'al 'asher 'azebu 'et ihoh 'elohei 'aboteihem 'asher hozi'am mei'erez mizrayim vayakhaziqu beilohim 'akheirim vayishtakhavu lahem vaya'abdum 'al ken heibi 'aleihem 'et kal hara'ah hazot. vayhi miqez 'esrim shanah 'asher banah shelomoh 'et bet ihoh ve'et beito. vehe'arim 'asher natan khuram lishlomoh banah shelomoh 'otam vayosheb sham 'et benei yisra'el. vayeilekh shelomoh khamat zobah vayekhezaq 'aleha. vayiben 'et tadmor bamidbar ve'et kal 'arei hamiskenot 'asher banah bakhamat. vayiben 'et bet khoron ha'elyon ve'et bet khoron hatakhton 'arei mazor khomot delatayim uberiakh. ve'et ba'alat ve'et kal 'arei hamiskenot 'asher hayu lishlomoh ve'et kal 'arei harekheb ve'et 'arei haparashim ve'et kal kheisheq shelomoh 'asher khashaq libnot birushalim ubalebanon ubekhol 'erez memshalto. kal ha'am hanotar min hakhiti veha'emori vehaperizi vehakhivi vehaybusi 'asher lo miyisra'el hemah. min beneihem 'asher notru 'akhareihem ba'arez 'asher lo khilum benei yisra'el vaya'alem shelomoh lemas 'ad hayom hazeh. umin benei yisra'el 'asher lo natan shelomoh la'abadim limlakhto ki hemah 'anshei milkhamah vesarei shalishav vesarei rikhbo ufarashav. ve'eleh sarei hanezibim hanizabim 'asher lamelekh shelomoh khamishim umatayim harodim ba'am. ve'et bat par'oh he'elah shelomoh mei'ir david labayit 'asher banah lah ki 'amar lo teisheb 'ishah li bebet david melekh yisra'el ki qodesh hemah 'asher ba'ah 'aleihem 'aron ihoh. 'az he'elah shelomoh 'olot ihoh 'al mizbakh ihoh 'asher banah lifnei ha'ulam. ubidbar yom beyom leha'alot kemizvat mosheh lashabatot velekhodashim velamo'adot shalosh pe'amim bashanah bekhag hamazot ubekhag hashabu'ot ubekhag hasukot. vaya'amed kemishpat david 'abiv 'et makhleqot hakohanim 'al 'abodatam vehalviyim 'al mishmerotam lehalel ulesharet neged hakohanim lidbar yom beyomo vehasho'arim bemakhleqotam lesha'ar vasha'ar ki khen mizvat david 'ish ha'elohim. velo saru mizvat hamelekh 'al hakohanim vehalviyim lekhal dabar vela'ozarot. vatikon kal melekhet shelomoh 'ad hayom musad bet ihoh ve'ad keloto shalem bet ihoh. 'az halakh shelomoh le'ezyon geber ve'el 'eilot 'al sefat hayam be'erez 'edom. vayishlakh lo khuram beyad 'abadav 'oniyot 'oniyot va'abadim yod'ei yam vayabo'u 'im 'abdei shelomoh 'ofirah vayiqkhu misham 'arba' mei'ot vakhamishim kikar zahab vayabi'u 'el hamelekh shelomoh. umalkat sheba shame'ah 'et sheima' shelomoh vatabo lenasot 'et shelomoh bekhidot birushalim bekhayil kabed me'od ugemalim nose'im besamim vezahab larob ve'eben yeqarah vatabo 'el shelomoh vatedaber 'imo 'et kal 'asher hayah 'im lebabah. vayaged lah shelomoh 'et kal debareha velo ne'lam dabar mishelomoh 'asher lo higid lah. vateire malkat sheba 'et khakhemat shelomoh vehabayit 'asher banah. uma'akhal shulkhano umoshab 'abadav uma'amad mesharetav umalbusheihem umashqav umalbusheihem va'aliyato 'asher ya'aleh bet ihoh velo hayah 'od bah ruakh. vatomer 'el hamelekh 'emet hadabar 'asher shama'ti be'arzi 'al debarekha ve'al khakhematekha. velo he'emanti ledibreihem 'ad 'asher bati vatir'enah 'einai vehineh lo hugad li khazi marbit khakhematekha yasafta 'al hashemu'ah 'asher shama'eti. 'ashrei 'anashekha ve'ashrei 'abadekha 'eleh ha'omedim lefanekha tamid veshome'im 'et khakhematekha. yehi ihoh 'elohekha barukh 'asher khafez bekha letitekha 'al kis'o lemelekh ihoh 'elohekha be'ahabat 'elohekha 'et yisra'el leha'amido le'olam vayitenkha 'aleihem lemelekh la'asot mishpat uzedaqah. vatiten lamelekh mei'ah ve'esrim kikar zahab ubesamim larob me'od ve'eben yeqarah velo hayah kabosem hahu 'asher natenah malkat sheba lamelekh shelomoh. vegam 'abdei khiram khuram ve'abdei shelomoh 'asher heibi'u zahab mei'ofir heibi'u 'azei 'algumim ve'eben yeqarah. vaya'as hamelekh 'et 'azei ha'algumim mesilot lebet ihoh ulebet hamelekh vekhinorot unebalim lasharim velo nir'u khahem lefanim be'erez yehudah. vehamelekh shelomoh natan lemalkat sheba 'et kal khefzah 'asher sha'alah milebad 'asher heibi'ah 'el hamelekh vatahafokh vateilekh le'arzah hi va'abadeha. vayhi mishqal hazahab 'asher ba lishlomoh beshanah 'ekhat shesh mei'ot veshishim vashesh kikerei zahab. lebad mei'anshei hatarim vehasokharim mebi'im vekhal malkhei 'arab ufakhot ha'arez mebi'im zahab vakhesef lishlomoh. vaya'as hamelekh shelomoh matayim zinah zahab shakhut shesh mei'ot zahab shakhut ya'aleh 'al hazinah ha'ekhat. ushelosh mei'ot maginim zahab shakhut shelosh mei'ot zahab ya'aleh 'al hamagen ha'ekhat vayitenem hamelekh bebet ya'ar halebanon. vaya'as hamelekh kisei shen gadol vayzapeihu zahab tahor. veshesh ma'alot lakisei vekhebesh bazahab lakisei ma'okhazim veyadot mizeh umizeh 'al meqom hashabet ushenayim 'arayot 'omedim 'eizel hayadot. ushenem 'asar 'arayot 'omedim sham 'al shesh hama'alot mizeh umizeh lo na'asah khen lekhal mamlakhah. vekhol kelei mashqeh hamelekh shelomoh zahab vekhol kelei bet ya'ar halebanon zahab sagur 'en kesef nekhshab bimei shelomoh lim'umah. ki 'oniyot lamelekh holekhot tarshish 'im 'abdei khuram 'akhat leshalosh shanim tabonah 'oniyot tarshish nose'ot zahab vakhesef shenhabim veqofim vetukiyim. vayigdal hamelekh shelomoh mikol malkhei ha'arez le'osher vekhakhemah. vekhol malkhei ha'arez mebaqshim 'et penei shelomoh lishmoa' 'et khakhemato 'asher natan ha'elohim belibo. vehem mebi'im 'ish minkhato kelei khesef ukhelei zahab uselamot neisheq ubesamim susim uferadim debar shanah beshanah. vayhi lishlomoh 'arba'at 'alafim 'uryot susim umarkabot ushenem 'asar 'elef parashim vayanikhem be'arei harekheb ve'im hamelekh birushalim. vayhi moshel bekhal hamelakhim min hanahar ve'ad 'erez pelishtim ve'ad gebul mizrayim. vayiten hamelekh 'et hakesef birushalim ka'abanim ve'et ha'arazim natan kashiqmim 'asher bashefeilah larob. umozi'im susim mimizrayim lishlomoh umikal ha'arazot. ushe'ar dibrei shelomoh harishonim veha'akharonim halo hem ketubim 'al dibrei natan hanabi ve'al nebu'at 'akhiyah hashiloni ubakhazot ye'di ye'do hakhozeh 'al yarabe'am ben nebat. vayimlokh shelomoh birushalim 'al kal yisra'el 'arba'im shanah. vayishkab shelomoh 'im 'abotav vayiqberuhu be'ir david 'abiv vayimlokh rekhab'am beno takhtav. vayeilekh rekhab'am shekhemah ki shekhem ba'u khal yisra'el lehamlikh 'oto. vayhi kishmoa' yarabe'am ben nebat vehu bemizrayim 'asher barakh mipenei shelomoh hamelekh vayashab yarabe'am mimizrayim. vayishlekhu vayiqre'u lo vayabo yarabe'am vekhal yisra'el vaydaberu 'el rekhab'am leimor. 'abikha hiqshah 'et 'uleinu ve'atah haqel mei'abodat 'abikha haqashah umei'ulo hakabed 'asher natan 'aleinu vena'abdeka. vayomer 'aleihem 'od sheloshet yamim veshubu 'eilai vayeilekh ha'am. vayiva'az hamelekh rekhab'am 'et hazeqeinim 'asher hayu 'omedim lifnei shelomoh 'abiv bihyoto khai leimor 'ekh 'atem no'azim lehashib la'am hazeh dabar. vaydaberu 'eilav leimor 'im tihyeh letob leha'am hazeh urezitam vedibarta 'aleihem debarim tobim vehayu lekha 'abadim kal hayamim. vaya'azob 'et 'azat hazeqeinim 'asher ye'azuhu vayiva'az 'et hayladim 'asher gadelu 'ito ha'omedim lefanav. vayomer 'aleihem mah 'atem no'azim venashib dabar 'et ha'am hazeh 'asher diberu 'eilai leimor haqel min ha'ol 'asher natan 'abikha 'aleinu. vaydaberu 'ito hayladim 'asher gadelu 'ito leimor koh tomar la'am 'asher diberu 'eilekha leimor 'abikha hikhbid 'et 'uleinu ve'atah haqel mei'aleinu koh tomar 'aleihem qatani 'abah mimatenei 'abi. ve'atah 'abi he'mis 'aleikhem 'ol kabed va'ani 'osif 'al 'ulekhem 'abi yisar 'etkhem bashotim va'ani ba'aqrabim. vayabo yarabe'am vekhal ha'am 'el rekhab'am bayom hashelishi ka'asher diber hamelekh leimor shubu 'eilai bayom hashelishi. vaya'anem hamelekh qashah vaya'azob hamelekh rekhab'am 'et 'azat hazeqeinim. vaydaber 'aleihem ka'azat hayladim leimor 'akhbid 'et 'ulekhem va'ani 'osif 'alav 'abi yisar 'etkhem bashotim va'ani ba'aqrabim. velo shama' hamelekh 'el ha'am ki hayetah nesibah mei'im ha'elohim lema'an haqim ihoh 'et debaro 'asher diber beyad 'akhiyahu hashiloni 'el yarabe'am ben nebat. vekhal yisra'el ki lo shama' hamelekh lahem vayashibu ha'am 'et hamelekh leimor mah lanu kheileq bedavid velo nakhalah beben yishai 'ish le'ohalekha yisra'el 'atah re'eh beitekha david vayeilekh kal yisra'el le'ohalav. ubenei yisra'el hayoshebim be'arei yehudah vayimlokh 'aleihem rekhab'am. vayishlakh hamelekh rekhab'am 'et hadoram 'asher 'al hamas vayirgemu bo benei yisra'el 'eben vayamot vehamelekh rekhab'am hit'amez la'alot bamerkabah lanus yerushalim. vayifshe'u yisra'el bebet david 'ad hayom hazeh. vayabo rekhab'am yerushalim vayaqhel 'et bet yehudah ubinyamin mei'ah ushemonim 'elef bakhur 'oseh milkhamah lehilakhem 'im yisra'el lehashib 'et hamamlakhah lirkhab'am. vayhi debar ihoh 'el shema'yahu 'ish ha'elohim leimor. 'emor 'el rekhab'am ben shelomoh melekh yehudah ve'el kal yisra'el bihudah ubinyamin leimor. koh 'amar ihoh lo ta'alu velo tilakhamu 'im 'akheikhem ubu 'ish lebeito ki mei'iti nihyah hadabar hazeh vayishme'u 'et dibrei ihoh vayashubu milekhet 'el yarabe'am. vayeisheb rekhab'am birushalim vayiben 'arim lemazor bihudah. vayiben 'et bet lekhem ve'et 'eitam ve'et teqoa'. ve'et bet zur ve'et sokho ve'et 'adulam. ve'et gat ve'et mareishah ve'et zif. ve'et 'adorayim ve'et lakhish ve'et 'azeiqah. ve'et zare'ah ve'et 'ayalon ve'et khebron 'asher bihudah ubebinyamin 'arei mezurot. vaykhazeq 'et hamezurot vayiten bahem negidim ve'ozerot ma'akhal veshemen vayayin. ubekhal 'ir va'ir zinot uremakhim vaykhazeqem leharbeh me'od vayhi lo yehudah ubinyamin. vehakohanim vehalviyim 'asher bekhal yisra'el hityazebu 'alav mikal gebulam. ki 'azebu halviyim 'et migresheihem va'akhuzatam vayeilekhu lihudah velirushalim ki hiznikham yarabe'am ubanav mikahen ihoh. vaya'amed lo kohanim labamot velase'irim vela'agalim 'asher 'asah. ve'akhareihem mikol shibtei yisra'el hanotenim 'et lebabam lebaqesh 'et ihoh 'elohei yisra'el ba'u yerushalim lizboakh ihoh 'elohei 'aboteihem. vaykhazequ 'et malkhut yehudah vai'amezu 'et rekhab'am ben shelomoh leshanim shalosh ki halekhu bederekh david ushelomoh leshanim shalosh. vayiqakh lo rekhab'am 'ishah 'et makhalat ben bat yerimot ben david 'abihayil bat 'eli'ab ben yishai. vateiled lo banim 'et ye'ush ve'et shemaryah ve'et zaham. ve'akhareha laqakh 'et ma'akhah bat 'abshalom vateiled lo 'et 'abiyah ve'et 'atai ve'et ziza ve'et shelomit. vaye'ehab rekhab'am 'et ma'akhah bat 'abshalom mikal nashav ufilagshav ki nashim shemoneh 'esreh nasa ufilagshim shishim vayoled 'esrim ushemonah banim veshishim banot. vaya'amed larosh rekhab'am 'et 'abiyah ben ma'akhah lenagid be'ekhav ki lehamlikho. vayaben vayifroz mikal banav lekhal 'arzot yehudah ubinyamin lekhol 'arei hamezurot vayiten lahem hamazon larob vayish'al hamon nashim. vayhi kehakhin malkhut rekhab'am ukhekhezqato 'azab 'et torat ihoh vekhal yisra'el 'imo. vayhi bashanah hakhamishit lamelekh rekhab'am 'alah shishaq melekh mizrayim 'al yerushalim ki ma'alu ihoh. be'elef umatayim rekheb ubeshishim 'elef parashim ve'en mispar la'am 'asher ba'u 'imo mimizrayim lubim sukiyim vekhushim. vayilkod 'et 'arei hamezurot 'asher lihudah vayabo 'ad yerushalim. ushema'yah hanabi ba 'el rekhab'am vesarei yehudah 'asher ne'esfu 'el yerushalim mipenei shishaq vayomer lahem koh 'amar ihoh 'atem 'azabtem 'oti ve'af 'ani 'azabti 'etkhem beyad shishaq. vayikane'u sarei yisra'el vehamelekh vayomeru zadiq ihoh. ubir'ot ihoh ki nikhna'u hayah debar ihoh 'el shema'yah leimor nikhne'u lo 'ashkhitem venatati lahem kim'at lifleitah velo titakh khamati birushalim beyad shishaq. ki yihyu lo la'abadim veyeide'u 'abodati va'abodat mamlekhot ha'arazot. vaya'al shishaq melekh mizrayim 'al yerushalim vayiqakh 'et 'ozerot bet ihoh ve'et 'ozerot bet hamelekh 'et hakol laqakh vayiqakh 'et maginei hazahab 'asher 'asah shelomoh. vaya'as hamelekh rekhab'am takhteihem maginei nekhoshet vehifqid 'al yad sarei harazim hashomerim petakh bet hamelekh. vayhi midei bo hamelekh bet ihoh ba'u harazim unesa'um veheshibum 'el ta harazim. ubehikane'o shab mimenu 'af ihoh velo lehashkhit lekhalah vegam bihudah hayah debarim tobim. vayitkhazeq hamelekh rekhab'am birushalim vayimlokh ki ben 'arba'im ve'akhat shanah rekhab'am bemalekho ushaba' 'esreh shanah malakh birushalim ha'ir 'asher bakhar ihoh lasum 'et shemo sham mikol shibtei yisra'el veshem 'imo na'amah ha'amonit. vaya'as hara' ki lo heikhin libo lidrosh 'et ihoh. vedibrei rekhab'am harishonim veha'akharonim halo hem ketubim bedibrei shema'yah hanabi ve'ido hakhozeh lehityakhes umilkhamot rekhab'am veyarabe'am kal hayamim. vayishkab rekhab'am 'im 'abotav vayiqaber be'ir david vayimlokh 'abiyah beno takhtav. bishnat shemoneh 'esreh lamelekh yarabe'am vayimlokh 'abiyah 'al yehudah. shalosh shanim malakh birushalim veshem 'imo mikhayahu bat 'uri'el min gib'ah umilkhamah hayetah ben 'abiyah uben yarabe'am. vaye'sor 'abiyah 'et hamilkhamah bekhayil giborei milkhamah 'arba' mei'ot 'elef 'ish bakhur veyarabe'am 'arakh 'imo milkhamah bishmoneh mei'ot 'elef 'ish bakhur gibor khayil. vayaqam 'abiyah mei'al lehar zemarayim 'asher behar 'efrayim vayomer shema'uni yarabe'am vekhal yisra'el. halo lakhem lada'at ki ihoh 'elohei yisra'el natan mamlakhah ledavid 'al yisra'el le'olam lo ulebanav berit melakh. vayaqam yarabe'am ben nebat 'ebed shelomoh ben david vayimrod 'al 'adonav. vayiqabezu 'alav 'anashim reiqim benei beliya'al vayit'amezu 'al rekhab'am ben shelomoh urekhab'am hayah na'ar verakh leibab velo hitkhazaq lifneihem. ve'atah 'atem 'omerim lehitkhazeq lifnei mamlekhet ihoh beyad benei david ve'atem hamon rab ve'imakhem 'eglei zahab 'asher 'asah lakhem yarabe'am leilohim. halo hidakhtem 'et kohanei ihoh 'et benei 'aharon vehalviyim vata'asu lakhem kohanim ke'amei ha'arazot kal haba lemalei yado befar ben baqar ve'eilim shib'ah vehayah khohen lelo 'elohim. va'anakhnu ihoh 'eloheinu velo 'azabnuhu vekhohanim mesharetim ihoh benei 'aharon vehalviyim bamlakhet. umaqtirim ihoh 'olot baboqer baboqer uba'ereb ba'ereb uqetoret samim uma'arekhet lekhem 'al hashulkhan hatahor umenorat hazahab veneiroteha leba'er ba'ereb ba'ereb ki shomerim 'anakhnu 'et mishmeret ihoh 'eloheinu ve'atem 'azabtem 'oto. vehineh 'imanu barosh ha'elohim vekhohanav vakhazozerot hateru'ah leharia' 'aleikhem benei yisra'el 'al tilakhamu 'im ihoh 'elohei 'aboteikhem ki lo tazlikhu. veyarabe'am heiseb 'et hama'rab labo mei'akhareihem vayihyu lifnei yehudah vehama'rab mei'akhareihem. vayifnu yehudah vehineh lahem hamilkhamah panim ve'akhor vayiz'aqu ihoh vehakohanim makhazozerim makhzerim bakhazozerot. vayari'u 'ish yehudah vayhi beharia' 'ish yehudah veha'elohim nagaf 'et yarabe'am vekhal yisra'el lifnei 'abiyah vihudah. vayanusu benei yisra'el mipenei yehudah vayitenem 'elohim beyadam. vayaku bahem 'abiyah ve'amo makah rabah vayipelu khalalim miyisra'el khamesh mei'ot 'elef 'ish bakhur. vayikane'u benei yisra'el ba'et hahi vaye'emzu benei yehudah ki nish'anu 'al ihoh 'elohei 'aboteihem. vayirdof 'abiyah 'akharei yarabe'am vayilkod mimenu 'arim 'et bet 'el ve'et benoteha ve'et yeshanah ve'et benoteha ve'et 'efron 'efrayin ubenoteha. velo 'azar koakh yarabe'am 'od bimei 'abiyahu vayigefeihu ihoh vayamot. vayitkhazeq 'abiyahu vayisa lo nashim 'arba' 'esreh vayoled 'esrim ushenayim banim veshesh 'esreh banot. veyeter dibrei 'abiyah uderakhav udebarav ketubim bemidrash hanabi 'ido. vayishkab 'abiyah 'im 'abotav vayiqberu 'oto be'ir david vayimlokh 'asa beno takhtav beyamav shaqetah ha'arez 'eser shanim. vaya'as 'asa hatob vehayashar be'einei ihoh 'elohav. vayasar 'et mizbekhot haneikhar vehabamot vayshaber 'et hamazeibot vaygada' 'et ha'asheirim. vayomer lihudah lidrosh 'et ihoh 'elohei 'aboteihem vela'asot hatorah vehamizvah. vayasar mikal 'arei yehudah 'et habamot ve'et hakhamanim vatishqot hamamlakhah lefanav. vayiben 'arei mezurah bihudah ki shaqetah ha'arez ve'en 'imo milkhamah bashanim ha'eleh ki heiniakh ihoh lo. vayomer lihudah nibneh 'et he'arim ha'eleh venaseb khomah umigdalim delatayim uberikhim 'odenu ha'arez lefaneinu ki darashnu 'et ihoh 'eloheinu darashnu vayanakh lanu misabib vayibnu vayazlikhu. vayhi le'asa khayil nosei zinah varomakh mihudah shelosh mei'ot 'elef umibinyamin nose'ei magen vedorekhei qeshet matayim ushemonim 'alef kal 'eleh giborei khayil. vayeizei 'aleihem zerakh hakushi bekhayil 'elef 'alafim umarkabot shelosh mei'ot vayabo 'ad mareishah. vayeizei 'asa lefanav vaya'arkhu milkhamah begei zefatah lemareishah. vayiqra 'asa 'el ihoh 'elohav vayomar ihoh 'en 'imekha la'zor ben rab le'en koakh 'azereinu ihoh 'eloheinu ki 'alekha nish'anu ubeshimkha banu 'al hehamon hazeh ihoh 'eloheinu 'atah 'al ya'zor 'imekha 'enosh. vayigof ihoh 'et hakushim lifnei 'asa velifnei yehudah vayanusu hakushim. vayirdefem 'asa veha'am 'asher 'imo 'ad ligrar vayipol mikushim le'en lahem mikhyah ki nishberu lifnei ihoh velifnei makhaneihu vayis'u shalal harbeh me'od. vayaku 'et kal he'arim sebibot gerar ki hayah fakhad ihoh 'aleihem vayabozu 'et kal he'arim ki bizah rabah hayetah bahem. vegam 'aholei miqneh hiku vayishbu zon larob ugemalim vayashubu yerushalim. va'azaryahu ben 'oded hayetah 'alav ruakh 'elohim. vayeizei lifnei 'asa vayomer lo shema'uni 'asa vekhal yehudah ubinyamin ihoh 'imakhem bihyotkhem 'imo ve'im tidreshuhu yimazei lakhem ve'im ta'azbuhu ya'azob 'etkhem. veyamim rabim leyisra'el lelo 'elohei 'emet ulelo kohen moreh ulelo torah. vayashab bazar lo 'al ihoh 'elohei yisra'el vaybaqshuhu vayimazei lahem. uba'itim hahem 'en shalom layozei velaba ki mehumot rabot 'al kal yoshebei ha'arazot. vekhutetu go bego ve'ir be'ir ki 'elohim hamamam bekhal zarah. ve'atem khizqu ve'al yirpu yedeikhem ki yesh sakhar lif'ulatkhem. vekhishmoa' 'asa hadebarim ha'eleh vehanebu'ah 'oded hanabi hitkhazaq vaya'aber hashiquzim mikal 'erez yehudah ubinyamin umin he'arim 'asher lakhad meihar 'efrayim vaykhadesh 'et mizbakh ihoh 'asher lifnei 'ulam ihoh. vayiqboz 'et kal yehudah ubinyamin vehagarim 'imahem mei'efrayim umenasheh umishim'on ki nafelu 'alav miyisra'el larob bir'otam ki ihoh 'elohav 'imo. vayiqabezu yerushalim bakhodesh hashelishi lishnat khamesh 'esreh lemalkhut 'asa. vayizbekhu ihoh bayom hahu min hashalal heibi'u baqar sheba' mei'ot vezon shib'at 'alafim. vayabo'u baberit lidrosh 'et ihoh 'elohei 'aboteihem bekhal lebabam ubekhal nafsham. vekhol 'asher lo yidrosh ihoh 'elohei yisra'el yumat lemin qaton ve'ad gadol lemei'ish ve'ad 'ishah. vayishabe'u ihoh beqol gadol ubitru'ah ubakhazozerot ubeshofarot. vayismekhu khal yehudah 'al hashebu'ah ki bekhal lebabam nishba'u ubekhal rezonam biqshuhu vayimazei lahem vayanakh ihoh lahem misabib. vegam ma'akhah 'em 'asa hamelekh hesirah migebirah 'asher 'asetah la'asheirah miflazet vayikhrot 'asa 'et miflaztah vayadeq vayisrof benakhal qidron. vehabamot lo saru miyisra'el raq lebab 'asa hayah shalem kal yamav. vayabei 'et qadeshei 'abiv veqadashav bet ha'elohim kesef vezahab vekheilim. umilkhamah lo hayatah 'ad shenat sheloshim vekhamesh lemalkhut 'asa. bishnat sheloshim vashesh lemalkhut 'asa 'alah ba'sha melekh yisra'el 'al yehudah vayiben 'et haramah lebilti tet yozei vaba le'asa melekh yehudah. vayozei 'asa kesef vezahab mei'ozerot bet ihoh ubet hamelekh vayishlakh 'el ben hadad melekh 'aram hayosheb bedarmeseq leimor. berit beini ubeinekha uben 'abi uben 'abikha hineh shalakhti lekha kesef vezahab lekh hafer beritekha 'et ba'sha melekh yisra'el veya'aleh mei'alai. vayishma' ben hadad 'el hamelekh 'asa vayishlakh 'et sarei hakhayalim 'asher lo 'el 'arei yisra'el vayaku 'et 'iyon ve'et dan ve'et 'abel mayim ve'et kal miskenot 'arei naftali. vayhi kishmoa' ba'sha vayekhdal mibenot 'et haramah vayashbet 'et melakhto. ve'asa hamelekh laqakh 'et kal yehudah vayis'u 'et 'abnei haramah ve'et 'eizeha 'asher banah ba'sha vayiben bahem 'et geba' ve'et hamizpah. uba'et hahi ba khanani haro'eh 'el 'asa melekh yehudah vayomer 'eilav behisha'enkha 'al melekh 'aram velo nish'anta 'al ihoh 'elohekha 'al ken nimlat khel melekh 'aram miyadekha. halo hakushim vehalubim hayu lekhayil larob lerekheb ulefarashim leharbeh me'od ubehisha'enkha 'al ihoh netanam beyadekha. ki ihoh 'einav meshotetot bekhal ha'arez lehitkhazeq 'im lebabam shalem 'eilav niskalta 'al zot ki mei'atah yesh 'imekha milkhamot. vayikh'as 'asa 'el haro'eh vayiteneihu bet hamahpekhet ki beza'af 'imo 'al zot vayrazez 'asa min ha'am ba'et hahi. vehineh dibrei 'asa harishonim veha'akharonim hinam ketubim 'al seifer hamelakhim lihudah veyisra'el. vayekhele 'asa bishnat sheloshim vateisha' lemalkhuto beraglav 'ad lema'lah khaleyo vegam bekhaleyo lo darash 'et ihoh ki barofe'im. vayishkab 'asa 'im 'abotav vayamat bishnat 'arba'im ve'akhat lemalekho. vayiqberuhu beqibrotav 'asher karah lo be'ir david vayashkibuhu bamishkab 'asher milei besamim uzenim meruqakhim bemirqakhat ma'aseh vayisrefu lo sereifah gedolah 'ad lim'od. vayimlokh yehoshafat beno takhtav vayitkhazeq 'al yisra'el. vayiten khayil bekhal 'arei yehudah habezurot vayiten nezibim be'erez yehudah ube'arei 'efrayim 'asher lakhad 'asa 'abiv. vayhi ihoh 'im yehoshafat ki halakh bedarkhei david 'abiv harishonim velo darash labe'alim. ki leilohei 'abiv darash ubemizvotav halakh velo kema'aseh yisra'el. vayakhen ihoh 'et hamamlakhah beyado vayitenu khal yehudah minkhah lihoshafat vayhi lo 'osher vekhabod larob. vayigbah libo bedarkhei ihoh ve'od heisir 'et habamot ve'et ha'asheirim mihudah. ubishnat shalosh lemalekho shalakh lesarav leben khayil ule'obadyah velizkharyah velintan'el ulemikhayahu lelamed be'arei yehudah. ve'imahem halviyim shema'yahu unetanyahu uzebadyahu va'asah'el ushemirimot ushemiramot vihonatan va'adoniyahu vetobiyahu vetob 'adoniyah halviyim ve'imahem 'elishama' vihoram hakohanim. vaylamedu bihudah ve'imahem seifer torat ihoh vayasobu bekhal 'arei yehudah vaylamedu ba'am. vayhi pakhad ihoh 'al kal mamlekhot ha'arazot 'asher sebibot yehudah velo nilkhamu 'im yehoshafat. umin pelishtim mebi'im lihoshafat minkhah vekhesef masa gam ha'arbi'im mebi'im lo zon 'eilim shib'at 'alafim usheba' mei'ot uteyashim shib'at 'alafim usheba' mei'ot. vayhi yehoshafat holekh vegadel 'ad lema'elah vayiben bihudah biraniyot ve'arei miskenot. umelakhah rabah hayah lo be'arei yehudah ve'anshei milkhamah giborei khayil birushalim. ve'eleh fequdatam lebet 'aboteihem lihudah sarei 'alafim 'adnah hasar ve'imo giborei khayil shelosh mei'ot 'alef. ve'al yado yehokhanan hasar ve'imo matayim ushemonim 'alef. ve'al yado 'amasyah ben zikhri hamitnadeb ihoh ve'imo matayim 'elef gibor khayil. umin binyamin gibor khayil 'elyada' ve'imo nosheqei qeshet umagen matayim 'alef. ve'al yado yehozabad ve'imo mei'ah ushemonim 'elef khaluzei zaba. 'eleh hamsharetim 'et hamelekh milebad 'asher natan hamelekh be'arei hamibzar bekhal yehudah. vayhi lihoshafat 'osher vekhabod larob vayitkhaten le'akh'ab. vayeired leqez shanim 'el 'akh'ab leshomeron vayizbakh lo 'akh'ab zon ubaqar larob vela'am 'asher 'imo vaysiteihu la'alot 'el ramot gil'ad. vayomer 'akh'ab melekh yisra'el 'el yehoshafat melekh yehudah hateilekh 'imi ramot gil'ad vayomer lo kamoni khamokha ukhe'amekha 'ami ve'imekha bamilkhamah. vayomer yehoshafat 'el melekh yisra'el derash na khayom 'et debar ihoh. vayiqboz melekh yisra'el 'et hanebi'im 'arba' mei'ot 'ish vayomer 'aleihem haneilekh 'el ramot gil'ad lamilkhamah 'im 'ekhdal vayomeru 'aleh veyiten ha'elohim beyad hamelekh. vayomer yehoshafat ha'en poh nabi ihoh 'od venidreshah mei'oto. vayomer melekh yisra'el 'el yehoshafat 'od 'ish 'ekhad lidrosh 'et ihoh mei'oto va'ani seneitihu ki 'einenu mitnabei 'alai letobah ki khal yamav lera'ah hu mikhayehu ben yimla vayomer yehoshafat 'al yomar hamelekh ken. vayiqra melekh yisra'el 'el saris 'ekhad vayomer maher mikhahu mikhayehu ben yimla. umelekh yisra'el vihoshafat melekh yehudah yoshebim 'ish 'al kis'o melubashim begadim veyoshebim begoren petakh sha'ar shomeron vekhal hanebi'im mitnabe'im lifneihem. vaya'as lo zidqiyahu ben kena'anah qarnei barzel vayomer koh 'amar ihoh be'eleh tenagakh 'et 'aram 'ad kalotam. vekhal hanebi'im nibe'im ken leimor 'aleh ramot gil'ad vehazlakh venatan ihoh beyad hamelekh. vehamal'akh 'asher halakh liqro lemikhayehu diber 'eilav leimor hineh dibrei hanebi'im peh 'ekhad tob 'el hamelekh vihi na debarekha ke'akhad meihem vedibarta tob. vayomer mikhayehu khai ihoh ki 'et 'asher yomar 'elohai 'oto 'adaber. vayabo 'el hamelekh vayomer hamelekh 'eilav mikhah haneilekh 'el ramot gil'ad lamilkhamah 'im 'ekhdal vayomer 'alu vehazlikhu veyinatenu beyedkhem. vayomer 'eilav hamelekh 'ad kameh fe'amim 'ani mashbi'ekha 'asher lo tedaber 'eilai raq 'emet beshem ihoh. vayomer ra'iti 'et kal yisra'el nefozim 'al heharim kazon 'asher 'en lahen ro'eh vayomer ihoh lo 'adonim la'eleh yashubu 'ish lebeito beshalom. vayomer melekh yisra'el 'el yehoshafat halo 'amarti 'eilekha lo yitnabei 'alai tob ki 'im lera'. vayomer lakhen shim'u debar ihoh ra'iti 'et ihoh yosheb 'al kis'o vekhal zeba hashamayim 'omedim 'al yemino usemolo. vayomer ihoh mi yefateh 'et 'akh'ab melekh yisra'el veya'al veyipol beramot gil'ad vayomer zeh 'omer kakhah vezeh 'omer kakhah. vayeizei haruakh vaya'amod lifnei ihoh vayomer 'ani 'afatenu vayomer ihoh 'eilav bamah. vayomer 'eizei vehayiti leruakh sheqer befi kal nebi'av vayomer tefateh vegam tukhal zei va'aseh khen. ve'atah hineh natan ihoh ruakh sheqer befi nebi'ekha 'eleh ihoh diber 'alekha ra'ah. vayigash zidqiyahu ben kena'anah vayakh 'et mikhayehu 'al halekhi vayomer 'ei zeh haderekh 'abar ruakh ihoh mei'iti ledaber 'otakh. vayomer mikhayehu hinekha ro'eh bayom hahu 'asher tabo kheder bekheder leheikhabei. vayomer melekh yisra'el qekhu 'et mikhayehu vahashibuhu 'el 'amon sar ha'ir ve'el yo'ash ben hamelekh. va'amartem koh 'amar hamelekh simu zeh bet hakele veha'akhiluhu lekhem lakhaz umayim lakhaz 'ad shubi beshalom. vayomer mikhayehu 'im shob tashub beshalom lo diber ihoh bi vayomer shim'u 'amim kulam. vaya'al melekh yisra'el vihoshafat melekh yehudah 'el ramot gil'ad. vayomer melekh yisra'el 'el yehoshafat hitkhapes vabo bamilkhamah ve'atah lebash begadekha vayitkhapes melekh yisra'el vayabo'u bamilkhamah. umelekh 'aram zivah 'et sarei harekheb 'asher lo leimor lo tilakhamu 'et haqaton 'et hagadol ki 'im 'et melekh yisra'el lebado. vayhi kir'ot sarei harekheb 'et yehoshafat vehemah 'ameru melekh yisra'el hu vayasobu 'alav lehilakhem vayiz'aq yehoshafat ihoh 'azaro vaysitem 'elohim mimenu. vayhi kir'ot sarei harekheb ki lo hayah melekh yisra'el vayashubu mei'akharav. ve'ish mashakh baqeshet letumo vayakh 'et melekh yisra'el ben hadebaqim uben hashiryan vayomer larakab hafokh yadekha yadekha vehozeitani min hamakhaneh ki hakholeiti. vata'al hamilkhamah bayom hahu umelekh yisra'el hayah ma'amid bamerkabah nokhakh 'aram 'ad ha'areb vayamat le'et bo hashamesh. vayashab yehoshafat melekh yehudah 'el beito beshalom lirushalim. vayeizei 'el panav yeihu ben khanani hakhozeh vayomer 'el hamelekh yehoshafat halarasha' la'zor ulesone'ei ihoh te'ehab ubazot 'alekha qezef milifnei ihoh. 'abal debarim tobim nimze'u 'imakh ki bi'arta ha'asheirot min ha'arez vahakhinota lebabekha lidrosh ha'elohim. vayeisheb yehoshafat birushalim vayashab vayeizei ba'am mibe'er sheba' 'ad har 'efrayim vayshibem 'el ihoh 'elohei 'aboteihem. vaya'amed shofetim ba'arez bekhal 'arei yehudah habezurot le'ir va'ir. vayomer 'el hashofetim re'u mah 'atem 'osim ki lo le'adam tishpetu ki ihoh ve'imakhem bidbar mishpat. ve'atah yehi fakhad ihoh 'aleikhem shimru va'asu ki 'en 'im ihoh 'eloheinu 'avlah umaso fanim umiqakh shokhad. vegam birushalim he'emid yehoshafat min halviyim vehakohanim umeirashei ha'abot leyisra'el lemishpat ihoh velarib vayashubu yerushalim. vayzav 'aleihem leimor koh ta'asun beyir'at ihoh be'emunah ubeleibab shalem. vekhal rib 'asher yabo 'aleikhem mei'akheikhem hayoshebim be'areihem ben dam ledam ben torah lemizvah lekhuqim ulemishpatim vehizhartem 'otam velo ye'shemu ihoh vehayah qezef 'aleikhem ve'al 'akheikhem koh ta'asun velo te'shamu. vehineh 'amaryahu khohen harosh 'aleikhem lekhol debar ihoh uzebadyahu ben yishma'el hanagid lebet yehudah lekhol debar hamelekh veshoterim halviyim lifneikhem khizqu va'asu vihi ihoh 'im hatob. vayhi 'akhareikhen ba'u benei mo'ab ubenei 'amon ve'imahem meiha'amonim 'al yehoshafat lamilkhamah. vayabo'u vayagidu lihoshafat leimor ba 'alekha hamon rab mei'eiber layam mei'aram vehinam bekhazon tamar hi 'en gedi. vayira vayiten yehoshafat 'et panav lidrosh ihoh vayiqra zom 'al kal yehudah. vayiqabezu yehudah lebaqesh ihoh gam mikal 'arei yehudah ba'u lebaqesh 'et ihoh. vaya'amod yehoshafat biqhal yehudah virushalim bebet ihoh lifnei hekhazer hakhadashah. vayomar ihoh 'elohei 'aboteinu halo 'atah hu 'elohim bashamayim ve'atah moshel bekhol mamlekhot hagoyim ubeyadekha koakh ugeburah ve'en 'imekha lehityazeb. halo 'atah 'eloheinu horashta 'et yoshebei ha'arez hazot milifnei 'amekha yisra'el vatitenah lezera' 'abraham 'ohabkha le'olam. vayeishebu bah vayibnu lekha bah miqdash leshimkha leimor. 'im tabo 'aleinu ra'ah khereb shefot vedeber vera'ab na'amdah lifnei habayit hazeh ulefanekha ki shimkha babayit hazeh veniz'aq 'eilekha mizarateinu vetishma' vetoshia'. ve'atah hineh benei 'amon umo'ab vehar sei'ir 'asher lo natatah leyisra'el labo bahem bebo'am mei'erez mizrayim ki saru mei'aleihem velo hishmidum. vehineh hem gomelim 'aleinu labo legaresheinu miyerushatekha 'asher horashtanu. 'eloheinu halo tishpat bam ki 'en banu koakh lifnei hehamon harab hazeh haba 'aleinu va'anakhnu lo neida' mah na'aseh ki 'alekha 'eineinu. vekhol yehudah 'omedim lifnei ihoh gam tapam nesheihem ubeneihem. veyakhazi'el ben zekharyahu ben benayah ben ye'i'el ben matanyah haleivi min benei 'asaf hayetah 'alav ruakh ihoh betokh haqahal. vayomer haqshibu khal yehudah veyoshebei yerushalim vehamelekh yehoshafat koh 'amar ihoh lakhem 'atem 'al tire'u ve'al teikhatu mipenei hehamon harab hazeh ki lo lakhem hamilkhamah ki leilohim. makhar redu 'aleihem hinam 'olim bema'aleh haziz umezatem 'otam besof hanakhal penei midbar yeru'el. lo lakhem lehilakhem bazot hityazebu 'imdu ure'u 'et yeshu'at ihoh 'imakhem yehudah virushalim 'al tire'u ve'al teikhatu makhar ze'u lifneihem ihoh 'imakhem. vayiqod yehoshafat 'apayim 'arezah vekhal yehudah veyoshebei yerushalim nafelu lifnei ihoh lehishtakhavot ihoh. vayaqumu halviyim min benei haqehatim umin benei haqarekhim lehalel ihoh 'elohei yisra'el beqol gadol lema'elah. vayashkimu baboqer vayeize'u lemidbar teqoa' ubezeitam 'amad yehoshafat vayomer shema'uni yehudah veyoshebei yerushalim ha'aminu ihoh 'eloheikhem vetei'ameinu ha'aminu binbi'av vehazlikhu. vayiva'az 'el ha'am vaya'amed meshorarim ihoh umehalim lehadrat qodesh bezet lifnei hekhaluz ve'omerim hodu ihoh ki le'olam khasdo. ube'et heikhelu berinah utehilah natan ihoh me'arebim 'al benei 'amon mo'ab vehar sei'ir haba'im lihudah vayinageifu. vaya'amdu benei 'amon umo'ab 'al yoshebei har sei'ir lehakharim ulehashmid ukhekhalotam beyoshebei sei'ir 'azeru 'ish berei'eihu lemashkhit. vihudah ba 'al hamizpeh lamidbar vayifnu 'el hehamon vehinam pegarim nofelim 'arzah ve'en peleitah. vayabo yehoshafat ve'amo laboz 'et shelalam vayimze'u bahem larob urekhush ufegarim ukhelei khamudot vaynazelu lahem le'en masa vayihyu yamim sheloshah bozezim 'et hashalal ki rab hu. ubayom harebi'i niqhalu le'eimeq berakhah ki sham beirakhu 'et ihoh 'al ken qare'u 'et shem hamaqom hahu 'eimeq berakhah 'ad hayom. vayashubu kal 'ish yehudah virushalim vihoshafat berosham lashub 'el yerushalim besimkhah ki simekham ihoh mei'oybeihem. vayabo'u yerushalim binbalim ubekhinorot ubakhazozerot 'el bet ihoh. vayhi pakhad 'elohim 'al kal mamlekhot ha'arazot beshame'am ki nilkham ihoh 'im 'oybei yisra'el. vatishqot malkhut yehoshafat vayanakh lo 'elohav misabib. vayimlokh yehoshafat 'al yehudah ben sheloshim vekhamesh shanah bemalekho ve'esrim vekhamesh shanah malakh birushalim veshem 'imo 'azubah bat shilkhi. vayeilekh bederekh 'abiv 'asa velo sar mimenah la'asot hayashar be'einei ihoh. 'akh habamot lo saru ve'od ha'am lo heikhinu lebabam leilohei 'aboteihem. veyeter dibrei yehoshafat harishonim veha'akharonim hinam ketubim bedibrei yeihu ben khanani 'asher ho'alah 'al seifer malkhei yisra'el. ve'akhareikhen 'etkhabar yehoshafat melekh yehudah 'im 'akhazyah melekh yisra'el hu hirshia' la'asot. vaykhabereihu 'imo la'asot 'oniyot lalekhet tarshish vaya'asu 'oniyot be'ezyon gaber. vayitnabei 'eli'ezer ben dodavahu mimareishah 'al yehoshafat leimor kehitkhaberkha 'im 'akhazyahu paraz ihoh 'et ma'asekha vayishaberu 'oniyot velo 'azeru lalekhet 'el tarshish. vayishkab yehoshafat 'im 'abotav vayiqaber 'im 'abotav be'ir david vayimlokh yehoram beno takhtav. velo 'akhim benei yehoshafat 'azaryah vikhi'el uzekharyahu va'azaryahu umikha'el ushefatyahu kal 'eleh benei yehoshafat melekh yisra'el. vayiten lahem 'abihem matanot rabot lekhesef ulezahab ulemigdanot 'im 'arei mezurot bihudah ve'et hamamlakhah natan lihoram ki hu habekhor. vayaqam yehoram 'al mamlekhat 'abiv vayitkhazaq vayaharog 'et kal 'ekhav bekhareb vegam misarei yisra'el. ben sheloshim ushetayim shanah yehoram bemalekho ushemoneh shanim malakh birushalim. vayeilekh bederekh malkhei yisra'el ka'asher 'asu bet 'akh'ab ki bat 'akh'ab hayetah lo 'ishah vaya'as hara' be'einei ihoh. velo 'abah ihoh lehashkhit 'et bet david lema'an haberit 'asher karat ledavid vekha'asher 'amar latet lo nir ulebanav kal hayamim. beyamav pasha' 'edom mitakhat yad yehudah vayamlikhu 'aleihem melekh. vaya'abor yehoram 'im sarav vekhal harekheb 'imo vayhi qam laylah vayakh 'et 'edom hasobeb 'eilav ve'et sarei harakheb. vayifsha' 'edom mitakhat yad yehudah 'ad hayom hazeh 'az tifsha' libnah ba'et hahi mitakhat yado ki 'azab 'et ihoh 'elohei 'abotav. gam hu 'asah bamot beharei yehudah vayezen 'et yoshebei yerushalim vayadakh 'et yehudah. vayabo 'eilav mikhtab mei'eiliyahu hanabi leimor koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei david 'abikha takhat 'asher lo halakhta bedarkhei yehoshafat 'abikha ubedarkhei 'asa melekh yehudah. vateilekh bederekh malkhei yisra'el vatazneh 'et yehudah ve'et yoshebei yerushalim kehaznot bet 'akh'ab vegam 'et 'akhekha bet 'abikha hatobim mimekha harageta. hineh ihoh nogef mageifah gedolah be'amekha ubebanekha ubenashekha ubekhal rekhushekha. ve'atah bakholayim rabim bemakhaleh mei'ekha 'ad yeize'u mei'ekha min hakholi yamim 'al yamim. vaya'ar ihoh 'al yehoram 'et ruakh hapelishtim veha'arbim 'asher 'al yad kushim. vaya'alu bihudah vayibqa'uha vayishbu 'et kal harekhush hanimza lebet hamelekh vegam banav venashav velo nish'ar lo ben ki 'im yeho'akhaz qeton banav. ve'akharei kal zot negafo ihoh bemei'av lakholi le'en marpei. vayhi leyamim miyamim ukhe'et zet haqez leyamim shenayim yaze'u mei'av 'im khaleyo vayamat betakhalu'im ra'im velo 'asu lo 'amo sereifah kisreifat 'abotav. ben sheloshim ushetayim hayah bemalekho ushemoneh shanim malakh birushalim vayeilekh belo khemdah vayiqberuhu be'ir david velo beqibrot hamelakhim. vayamlikhu yoshebei yerushalim 'et 'akhazyahu beno haqaton takhtav ki khal harishonim harag hagedud haba ba'arbim lamakhaneh vayimlokh 'akhazyahu ben yehoram melekh yehudah. ben 'arba'im ushetayim shanah 'akhazyahu bemalekho veshanah 'akhat malakh birushalim veshem 'imo 'atalyahu bat 'ameri. gam hu halakh bedarkhei bet 'akh'ab ki 'imo hayetah yo'azto leharshia'. vaya'as hara' be'einei ihoh kebet 'akh'ab ki hemah hayu lo yo'azim 'akharei mot 'abiv lemashkhit lo. gam ba'azatam halakh vayeilekh 'et yehoram ben 'akh'ab melekh yisra'el lamilkhamah 'al khaza'el melekh 'aram beramot gil'ad vayaku haramim 'et yoram. vayashab lehitrapei beyizre'el ki hamakim 'asher hikuhu baramah behilakhamo 'et khazah'el melekh 'aram va'azaryahu ben yehoram melekh yehudah yarad lir'ot 'et yehoram ben 'akh'ab beyizre'el ki kholeh hu. umei'elohim hayetah tebusat 'akhazyahu labo 'el yoram ubebo'o yaza 'im yehoram 'el yeihu ben nimshi 'asher meshakho ihoh lehakhrit 'et bet 'akh'ab. vayhi kehishafet yeihu 'im bet 'akh'ab vayimza 'et sarei yehudah ubenei 'akhei 'akhazyahu mesharetim la'akhazyahu vayahargem. vaybaqesh 'et 'akhazyahu vayilkeduhu vehu mitkhabei beshomeron vaybi'uhu 'el yeihu vaymituhu vayiqberuhu ki 'ameru ben yehoshafat hu 'asher darash 'et ihoh bekhal lebabo ve'en lebet 'akhazyahu la'zor koakh lemamlakhah. va'atalyahu 'em 'akhazyahu ra'atah ki met benah vataqam vatedaber 'et kal zera' hamamlakhah lebet yehudah. vatiqakh yehoshab'at bat hamelekh 'et yo'ash ben 'akhazyahu vatignob 'oto mitokh benei hamelekh hamumatim vatiten 'oto ve'et meiniqto bakhadar hamitot vatastireihu yehoshab'at bat hamelekh yehoram 'eishet yehoyada' hakohen ki hi hayetah 'akhot 'akhazyahu mipenei 'atalyahu velo hemitatehu. vayhi 'itam bebet ha'elohim mitkhabei shesh shanim va'atalyah molekhet 'al ha'arez. ubashanah hashebi'it hitkhazaq yehoyada' vayiqakh 'et sarei hamei'ot la'azaryahu ben yerokham uleyishma'el ben yehokhanan vela'azaryahu ben 'obed ve'et ma'aseiyahu ben 'adayahu ve'et 'elishafat ben zikhri 'imo baberit. vayasobu bihudah vayiqbezu 'et halviyim mikal 'arei yehudah verashei ha'abot leyisra'el vayabo'u 'el yerushalim. vayikhrot kal haqahal berit bebet ha'elohim 'im hamelekh vayomer lahem hineh ben hamelekh yimlokh ka'asher diber ihoh 'al benei david. zeh hadabar 'asher ta'asu hashelishit mikem ba'ei hashabat lakohanim velalviyim lesho'arei hasipim. vehashelishit bebet hamelekh vehashelishit besha'ar haysod vekhal ha'am bekhazrot bet ihoh. ve'al yabo bet ihoh ki 'im hakohanim vehamsharetim lalviyim hemah yabo'u ki qodesh hemah vekhal ha'am yishmeru mishmeret ihoh. vehiqifu halviyim 'et hamelekh sabib 'ish vekheilav beyado vehaba 'el habayit yumat vihyu 'et hamelekh bebo'o ubezeito. vaya'asu halviyim vekhal yehudah kekhol 'asher zivah yehoyada' hakohen vayiqkhu 'ish 'et 'anashav ba'ei hashabat 'im yoz'ei hashabat ki lo fatar yehoyada' hakohen 'et hamakhleqot. vayiten yehoyada' hakohen lesarei hamei'ot 'et hakhanitim ve'et hamaginot ve'et hashelatim 'asher lamelekh david 'asher bet ha'elohim. vaya'amed 'et kal ha'am ve'ish shilkho beyado miketef habayit haymanit 'ad ketef habayit hasemalit lamizbeiakh velabayit 'al hamelekh sabib. vayozi'u 'et ben hamelekh vayitenu 'alav 'et haneizer ve'et ha'eidut vayamlikhu 'oto vayimshakhuhu yehoyada' ubanav vayomeru yekhi hamelekh. vatishma' 'atalyahu 'et qol ha'am harazim vehamhalim 'et hamelekh vatabo 'el ha'am bet ihoh. vateire vehineh hamelekh 'omed 'al 'amudo bamabo vehasarim vehakhazozerot 'al hamelekh vekhal 'am ha'arez sameiakh vetoqeia' bakhazozerot vehamshorarim bikhlei hashir umodi'im lehalel vatiqra' 'atalyahu 'et begadeha vatomer qesher qasher. vayozei yehoyada' hakohen 'et sarei hamei'ot pequdei hakhayil vayomer 'aleihem hozi'uha 'el mibet hasedeirot vehaba 'akhareha yumat bekhareb ki 'amar hakohen lo temituha bet ihoh. vayasimu lah yadayim vatabo 'el mebo sha'ar hasusim bet hamelekh vaymituha sham. vayikhrot yehoyada' berit beino uben kal ha'am uben hamelekh lihyot le'am ihoh. vayabo'u khal ha'am bet haba'al vayitezuhu ve'et mizbekhotav ve'et zelamav shibeiru ve'et matan kohen haba'al haregu lifnei hamizbekhot. vayasem yehoyada' pequdot bet ihoh beyad hakohanim halviyim 'asher khalaq david 'al bet ihoh leha'alot 'olot ihoh kakatub betorat mosheh besimkhah ubeshir 'al yedei david. vaya'amed hasho'arim 'al sha'arei bet ihoh velo yabo tamei lekhal dabar. vayiqakh 'et sarei hamei'ot ve'et ha'adirim ve'et hamoshelim ba'am ve'et kal 'am ha'arez vayored 'et hamelekh mibet ihoh vayabo'u betokh sha'ar ha'elyon bet hamelekh vayoshibu 'et hamelekh 'al kisei hamamlakhah. vayismekhu khal 'am ha'arez veha'ir shaqatah ve'et 'atalyahu heimitu bekhareb. ben sheba' shanim yo'ash bemalekho ve'arba'im shanah malakh birushalim veshem 'imo zibyah mibe'er shaba'. vaya'as yo'ash hayashar be'einei ihoh kal yemei yehoyada' hakohen. vayisa lo yehoyada' nashim shetayim vayoled banim ubanot. vayhi 'akhareikhen hayah 'im leb yo'ash lekhadesh 'et bet ihoh. vayiqboz 'et hakohanim vehalviyim vayomer lahem ze'u le'arei yehudah veqibzu mikal yisra'el kesef lekhazeq 'et bet 'eloheikhem midei shanah beshanah ve'atem temaharu ladabar velo miharu halviyim. vayiqra hamelekh lihoyada' harosh vayomer lo madua' lo darashta 'al halviyim lehabi mihudah umirushalim 'et mas'at mosheh 'ebed ihoh vehaqahal leyisra'el le'ohel ha'eidut. ki 'atalyahu hamirsha'at baneha farezu 'et bet ha'elohim vegam kal qadeshei bet ihoh 'asu labe'alim. vayomer hamelekh vaya'asu 'aron 'ekhad vayitenuhu besha'ar bet ihoh khuzah. vayitenu qol bihudah ubirushalim lehabi ihoh mas'at mosheh 'ebed ha'elohim 'al yisra'el bamidbar. vayismekhu khal hasarim vekhal ha'am vayabi'u vayashlikhu la'aron 'ad lekhaleh. vayhi be'et yabi 'et ha'aron 'el pequdat hamelekh beyad halviyim vekhir'otam ki rab hakesef uba sofer hamelekh ufeqid kohen harosh vi'aru 'et ha'aron veyisa'uhu vishibuhu 'el meqomo koh 'asu leyom beyom vaya'asfu khesef larob. vayiteneihu hamelekh vihoyada' 'el 'oseh melekhet 'abodat bet ihoh vayihyu sokherim khozebim vekharashim lekhadesh bet ihoh vegam lekharashei barzel unekhoshet lekhazeq 'et bet ihoh. vaya'asu 'osei hamelakhah vata'al 'arukhah lamelakhah beyadam vaya'amidu 'et bet ha'elohim 'al matkunto vai'amezuhu. ukhekhalotam heibi'u lifnei hamelekh vihoyada' 'et she'ar hakesef vaya'aseihu kheilim lebet ihoh kelei sharet veha'alot vekhapot ukhelei zahab vakhasef vayihyu ma'alim 'olot bebet ihoh tamid kol yemei yehoyada'. vayizqan yehoyada' vayisba' yamim vayamot ben mei'ah usheloshim shanah bemoto. vayiqberuhu be'ir david 'im hamelakhim ki 'asah tobah beyisra'el ve'im ha'elohim ubeito. ve'akharei mot yehoyada' ba'u sarei yehudah vayishtakhavu lamelekh 'az shama' hamelekh 'aleihem. vaya'azbu 'et bet ihoh 'elohei 'aboteihem vaya'abdu 'et ha'asheirim ve'et ha'azabim vayhi qezef 'al yehudah virushalim be'ashmatam zot. vayishlakh bahem nebi'im lahashibam 'el ihoh vaya'idu bam velo he'ezinu. veruakh 'elohim labeshah 'et zekharyah ben yehoyada' hakohen vaya'amod mei'al la'am vayomer lahem koh 'amar ha'elohim lamah 'atem 'oberim 'et mizvot ihoh velo tazlikhu ki 'azabtem 'et ihoh vaya'azob 'etkhem. vayiqsheru 'alav vayirgemuhu 'eben bemizvat hamelekh bakhazar bet ihoh. velo zakhar yo'ash hamelekh hakhesed 'asher 'asah yehoyada' 'abiv 'imo vayaharog 'et beno ukhemoto 'amar yeire ihoh veyidrosh. vayhi litqufat hashanah 'alah 'alav khel 'aram vayabo'u 'el yehudah virushalim vayashkhitu 'et kal sarei ha'am mei'am vekhal shelalam shilekhu lemelekh darmaseq. ki bemiz'ar 'anashim ba'u khel 'aram ihoh natan beyadam khayil larob me'od ki 'azebu 'et ihoh 'elohei 'aboteihem ve'et yo'ash 'asu shefatim. ubelekhtam mimenu ki 'azebu 'oto bemakhaliyim bemakhaluyim rabim hitqasheru 'alav 'abadav bidmei benei yehoyada' hakohen vayaharguhu 'al mitato vayamot vayiqberuhu be'ir david velo qebaruhu beqibrot hamelakhim. ve'eleh hamitqasherim 'alav zabad ben shim'at ha'amonit vihozabad ben shimrit hamo'abit. ubanav verob yireb hamasa 'alav visod bet ha'elohim hinam ketubim 'al midrash seifer hamelakhim vayimlokh 'amazyahu beno takhtav. ben 'esrim vekhamesh shanah malakh 'amazyahu ve'esrim vateisha' shanah malakh birushalim veshem 'imo yeho'adan mirushalayim. vaya'as hayashar be'einei ihoh raq lo beleibab shalem. vayhi ka'asher khazeqah hamamlakhah 'alav vayaharog 'et 'abadav hamakim 'et hamelekh 'abiv. ve'et beneihem lo heimit ki khakatub batorah beseifer mosheh 'asher zivah ihoh leimor lo yamutu 'abot 'al banim ubanim lo yamutu 'al 'abot ki 'ish bekhet'o yamutu. vayiqboz 'amazyahu 'et yehudah vaya'amidem lebet 'abot lesarei ha'alafim ulesarei hamei'ot lekhal yehudah ubinyamin vayifqedem lemiben 'esrim shanah vama'lah vayimza'em shelosh mei'ot 'elef bakhur yozei zaba 'okhez romakh vezinah. vayiskor miyisra'el mei'ah 'elef gibor khayil bemei'ah khikar kasef. ve'ish ha'elohim ba 'eilav leimor hamelekh 'al yabo 'imekha zeba yisra'el ki 'en ihoh 'im yisra'el kol benei 'efrayim. ki 'im bo 'atah 'aseh khazaq lamilkhamah yakhshilekha ha'elohim lifnei 'oyeb ki yesh koakh beilohim la'zor ulehakhshil. vayomer 'amazyahu le'ish ha'elohim umah la'asot lim'at hakikar 'asher natati ligdud yisra'el vayomer 'ish ha'elohim yesh ihoh latet lekha harbeh mizeh. vayabdilem 'amazyahu lehagedud 'asher ba 'eilav mei'efrayim lalekhet limqomam vayikhar 'apam me'od bihudah vayashubu limqomam bakhori 'af. va'amazyahu hitkhazaq vayinhag 'et 'amo vayeilekh gei hamelakh vayakh 'et benei sei'ir 'aseret 'alafim. va'aseret 'alafim khayim shabu benei yehudah vaybi'um lerosh hasala' vayashlikhum meirosh hasela' vekhulam nibqa'u. ubenei hagedud 'asher heishib 'amazyahu milekhet 'imo lamilkhamah vayifshetu be'arei yehudah mishomeron ve'ad bet khoron vayaku meihem sheloshet 'alafim vayabozu bizah rabah. vayhi 'akharei bo 'amazyahu meihakot 'et 'adomim vayabei 'et 'elohei benei sei'ir vaya'amidem lo leilohim velifneihem yishtakhaveh velahem yeqater. vayikhar 'af ihoh ba'amazyahu vayishlakh 'eilav nabi vayomer lo lamah darashta 'et 'elohei ha'am 'asher lo hizilu 'et 'amam miyadekha. vayhi bedabero 'eilav vayomer lo halyo'ez lamelekh netanukha khadal lekha lamah yakukha vayekhdal hanabi vayomer yada'ti ki ya'az 'elohim lehashkhitekha ki 'asita zot velo shama'ta la'azati. vayiva'az 'amazyahu melekh yehudah vayishlakh 'el yo'ash ben yeho'akhaz ben yeihu melekh yisra'el leimor lekha lekhah nitra'eh fanim. vayishlakh yo'ash melekh yisra'el 'el 'amazyahu melekh yehudah leimor hakhoakh 'asher balebanon lakh 'el ha'erez 'asher balebanon leimor tenah 'et bitekha libni le'ishah vata'abor khayat hasadeh 'asher balebanon vatirmos 'et hakhoakh. 'amarta hineh hikita 'et 'edom unesa'akha libekha lehakhbid 'atah shebah bebeitekha lamah titgareh bera'ah venafalta 'atah vihudah 'imakh. velo shama' 'amazyahu ki meiha'elohim hi lema'an titam beyad ki dareshu 'et 'elohei 'edom. vaya'al yo'ash melekh yisra'el vayitra'u fanim hu va'amazyahu melekh yehudah bebet shemesh 'asher lihudah. vayinagef yehudah lifnei yisra'el vayanusu 'ish le'ohalav. ve'et 'amazyahu melekh yehudah ben yo'ash ben yeho'akhaz tafas yo'ash melekh yisra'el bebet shamesh vaybi'eihu yerushalim vayifroz bekhomat yerushalim misha'ar 'efrayim 'ad sha'ar haponeh 'arba' mei'ot 'amah. vekhal hazahab vehakesef ve'et kal hakeilim hanimze'im bebet ha'elohim 'im 'obed 'edom ve'et 'ozerot bet hamelekh ve'et benei hata'arubot vayashab shomeron. vaykhi 'amazyahu ben yo'ash melekh yehudah 'akharei mot yo'ash ben yeho'akhaz melekh yisra'el khamesh 'esreh shanah. veyeter dibrei 'amazyahu harishonim veha'akharonim halo hinam ketubim 'al seifer malkhei yehudah veyisra'el. umei'et 'asher sar 'amazyahu mei'akharei ihoh vayiqsheru 'alav qesher birushalim vayanas lakhishah vayishlekhu 'akharav lakhishah vaymituhu sham. vayisa'uhu 'al hasusim vayiqberu 'oto 'im 'abotav be'ir yehudah. vayiqkhu kal 'am yehudah 'et 'uziyahu vehu ben shesh 'esreh shanah vayamlikhu 'oto takhat 'abiv 'amazyahu. hu banah 'et 'eilot vayshibeha lihudah 'akharei shekhab hamelekh 'im 'abotav. ben shesh 'esreh shanah 'uziyahu bemalekho vakhamishim ushetayim shanah malakh birushalim veshem 'imo yekhileyah yekhaleyah min yerushalim. vaya'as hayashar be'einei ihoh kekhol 'asher 'asah 'amazyahu 'abiv. vayhi lidrosh 'elohim bimei zekharyahu hameibin bir'ot ha'elohim ubimei daresho 'et ihoh hizlikho ha'elohim. vayeizei vayilakhem bapelishtim vayifroz 'et khomat gat ve'et khomat yabneh ve'et khomat 'ashdod vayibneh 'arim be'ashdod ubapelishtim. vaya'zereihu ha'elohim 'al pelishtim ve'al ha'arbiyim ha'arbim hayoshebim begur ba'al vehame'unim. vayitenu ha'amonim minkhah le'uziyahu vayeilekh shemo 'ad lebo mizrayim ki hekheziq 'ad lema'elah. vayiben 'uziyahu migdalim birushalim 'al sha'ar hapinah ve'al sha'ar hagai ve'al hamiqzoa' vaykhazeqem. vayiben migdalim bamidbar vayakhzob borot rabim ki miqneh rab hayah lo ubashefeilah ubamishor 'ikarim vekhoremim beharim ubakarmel ki 'oheb 'adamah hayah. vayhi le'uziyahu khayil 'oseh milkhamah yoz'ei zaba ligdud bemispar pequdatam beyad ye'u'el ye'i'el hasofer uma'aseiyahu hashoter 'al yad khananyahu misarei hamelekh. kol mispar rashei ha'abot legiborei khayil 'alpayim veshesh mei'ot. ve'al yadam khel zaba shelosh mei'ot 'elef veshib'at 'alafim vakhamesh mei'ot 'osei milkhamah bekhoakh khayil la'zor lamelekh 'al ha'oyeb. vayakhen lahem 'uziyahu lekhal hazaba maginim uremakhim vekhoba'im veshiryonot uqeshatot ule'abnei qela'im. vaya'as birushalim khishebonot makhashebet khosheb lihyot 'al hamigdalim ve'al hapinot liro bakhizim uba'abanim gedolot vayeizei shemo 'ad lemeirakhoq ki hifli lehei'azer 'ad ki khazaq. ukhekhezqato gabah libo 'ad lehashkhit vayim'al ihoh 'elohav vayabo 'el heikhal ihoh lehaqtir 'al mizbakh haqetoret. vayabo 'akharav 'azaryahu hakohen ve'imo kohanim ihoh shemonim benei khayil. vaya'amdu 'al 'uziyahu hamelekh vayomeru lo lo lekha 'uziyahu lehaqtir ihoh ki lakohanim benei 'aharon hamqudashim lehaqtir zei min hamiqdash ki ma'alta velo lekha lekhabod ihoh 'elohim. vayiz'af 'uziyahu ubeyado miqteret lehaqtir ubeza'po 'im hakohanim vehazara'at zarekhah bemizkho lifnei hakohanim bebet ihoh mei'al lemizbakh haqetoret. vayifen 'eilav 'azaryahu khohen harosh vekhal hakohanim vehineh hu mezora' bemizkho vayabhiluhu misham vegam hu nidkhaf lazet ki nige'o ihoh. vayhi 'uziyahu hamelekh mezora' 'ad yom moto vayeisheb bet hakhafeshut hakhafeshit mezora' ki nigzar mibet ihoh veyotam beno 'al bet hamelekh shofet 'et 'am ha'arez. veyeter dibrei 'uziyahu harishonim veha'akharonim katab yesha'yahu ben 'amoz hanabi. vayishkab 'uziyahu 'im 'abotav vayiqberu 'oto 'im 'abotav bisdeh haqeburah 'asher lamelakhim ki 'ameru mezora' hu vayimlokh yotam beno takhtav. ben 'esrim vekhamesh shanah yotam bemalekho veshesh 'esreh shanah malakh birushalim veshem 'imo yerushah bat zadoq. vaya'as hayashar be'einei ihoh kekhol 'asher 'asah 'uziyahu 'abiv raq lo ba 'el heikhal ihoh ve'od ha'am mashkhitim. hu banah 'et sha'ar bet ihoh ha'elyon ubekhomat ha'ofel banah larob. ve'arim banah behar yehudah ubekhorashim banah biraniyot umigdalim. vehu nilkham 'im melekh benei 'amon vayekhezaq 'aleihem vayitenu lo benei 'amon bashanah hahi mei'ah kikar kesef va'aseret 'alafim korim khitim use'orim 'aseret 'alafim zot heishibu lo benei 'amon ubashanah hasheinit vehashelishit. vayitkhazeq yotam ki heikhin derakhav lifnei ihoh 'elohav. veyeter dibrei yotam vekhal milkhamotav uderakhav hinam ketubim 'al seifer malkhei yisra'el vihudah. ben 'esrim vekhamesh shanah hayah bemalekho veshesh 'esreh shanah malakh birushalim. vayishkab yotam 'im 'abotav vayiqberu 'oto be'ir david vayimlokh 'akhaz beno takhtav. ben 'esrim shanah 'akhaz bemalekho veshesh 'esreh shanah malakh birushalim velo 'asah hayashar be'einei ihoh kedavid 'abiv. vayeilekh bedarkhei malkhei yisra'el vegam maseikhot 'asah labe'alim. vehu hiqtir begei ben hinom vayab'er 'et banav ba'esh keto'abot hagoyim 'asher horish hashem mipenei benei yisra'el. vayzabeiakh vayqater babamot ve'al hageba'ot vetakhat kal 'ez ra'anan. vayiteneihu ihoh 'elohav beyad melekh 'aram vayaku bo vayishbu mimenu shibyah gedolah vayabi'u darmaseq vegam beyad melekh yisra'el nitan vayakh bo makah gedolah. vayaharog peqakh ben remalyahu bihudah mei'ah ve'esrim 'elef beyom 'ekhad hakol benei khayil be'azebam 'et ihoh 'elohei 'abotam. vayaharog zikhri gibor 'efrayim 'et ma'aseiyahu ben hamelekh ve'et 'azriqam negid habayit ve'et 'elqanah mishneh hamelekh. vayishbu benei yisra'el mei'akheihem matayim 'elef nashim banim ubanot vegam shalal rab bazezu meihem vayabi'u 'et hashalal leshomeron. vesham hayah nabi ihoh 'oded shemo vayeizei lifnei hazaba haba leshomeron vayomer lahem hineh bakhamat ihoh 'elohei 'aboteikhem 'al yehudah netanam beyedkhem vatahargu bam beza'af 'ad lashamayim higia'. ve'atah benei yehudah virushalim 'atem 'omerim likhbosh la'abadim velishfakhot lakhem halo raq 'atem 'imakhem 'ashamot ihoh 'eloheikhem. ve'atah shema'uni vehashibu hashibyah 'asher shebitem mei'akheikhem ki kharon 'af ihoh 'aleikhem. vayaqumu 'anashim meirashei benei 'efrayim 'azaryahu ben yehokhanan berekhyahu ben meshileimot vikhizqiyahu ben shalum va'amasa ben khadlai 'al haba'im min hazaba. vayomeru lahem lo tabi'u 'et hashibyah henah ki le'ashmat ihoh 'aleinu 'atem 'omerim lehosif 'al khatoteinu ve'al 'ashmateinu ki rabah 'ashmah lanu vakharon 'af 'al yisra'el. vaya'azob hekhaluz 'et hashibyah ve'et habizah lifnei hasarim vekhal haqahal. vayaqumu ha'anashim 'asher niqebu besheimot vayakhaziqu bashibyah vekhal ma'arumeihem hilbishu min hashalal vayalbishum vayan'ilum vaya'akhilum vayashqum vaysukhum vaynahalum bakhamorim lekhal koshel vaybi'um yereikho 'ir hatemarim 'eizel 'akheihem vayashubu shomeron. ba'et hahi shalakh hamelekh 'akhaz 'al malkhei 'ashur la'zor lo. ve'od 'adomim ba'u vayaku bihudah vayishbu shebi. ufelishtim pashetu be'arei hashefeilah vehanegeb lihudah vayilkedu 'et bet shemesh ve'et 'ayalon ve'et hagedeirot ve'et sokho ubenoteha ve'et timnah ubenoteha ve'et gimzo ve'et benoteha vayeishebu sham. ki hikhnia' ihoh 'et yehudah ba'abur 'akhaz melekh yisra'el ki hifria' bihudah uma'ol ma'al ihoh. vayabo 'alav tilegat pilne'eser melekh 'ashur vayazar lo velo khazaqo. ki khalaq 'akhaz 'et bet ihoh ve'et bet hamelekh vehasarim vayiten lemelekh 'ashur velo le'ezrah lo. ube'et hazer lo vayosef lim'ol ihoh hu hamelekh 'akhaz. vayizbakh leilohei darmeseq hamakim bo vayomer ki 'elohei malkhei 'aram hem ma'zerim 'otam lahem 'azabeiakh veya'zeruni vehem hayu lo lehakhshilo ulekhal yisra'el. vaye'esof 'akhaz 'et kelei bet ha'elohim vayqazez 'et kelei bet ha'elohim vayisgor 'et daltot bet ihoh vaya'as lo mizbekhot bekhal pinah birushalim. ubekhal 'ir va'ir lihudah 'asah bamot leqater leilohim 'akheirim vayakh'es 'et ihoh 'elohei 'abotav. veyeter debarav vekhal derakhav harishonim veha'akharonim hinam ketubim 'al seifer malkhei yehudah veyisra'el. vayishkab 'akhaz 'im 'abotav vayiqberuhu ba'ir birushalim ki lo hebi'uhu leqibrei malkhei yisra'el vayimlokh yekhizqiyahu beno takhtav. yekhizqiyahu malakh ben 'esrim vekhamesh shanah ve'esrim vateisha' shanah malakh birushalim veshem 'imo 'abiyah bat zekharyahu. vaya'as hayashar be'einei ihoh kekhol 'asher 'asah david 'abiv. hu bashanah harishonah lemalekho bakhodesh harishon patakh 'et daltot bet ihoh vaykhazeqem. vayabei 'et hakohanim ve'et halviyim vaya'asfem lirkhob hamizrakh. vayomer lahem shema'uni halviyim 'atah hitqadeshu veqadeshu 'et bet ihoh 'elohei 'aboteikhem vehozi'u 'et hanidah min haqodesh. ki ma'alu 'aboteinu ve'asu hara' be'einei ihoh 'eloheinu vaya'azbuhu vayasebu feneihem mimishkan ihoh vayitenu 'oref. gam sageru daltot ha'ulam vaykhabu 'et haneirot uqetoret lo hiqtiru ve'olah lo he'elu baqodesh leilohei yisra'el. vayhi qezef ihoh 'al yehudah virushalim vayitenem lizva'ah leza'avah leshamah velishreiqah ka'asher 'atem ro'im be'eineikhem. vehineh nafelu 'aboteinu bekhareb ubaneinu ubenoteinu venasheinu bashebi 'al zot. 'atah 'im lebabi likhrot berit ihoh 'elohei yisra'el veyashob mimenu kharon 'apo. banai 'atah 'al tishalu ki bakhem bakhar ihoh la'amod lefanav leshareto velihyot lo mesharetim umaqtirim. vayaqumu halviyim makhat ben 'amasai veyo'el ben 'azaryahu min benei haqehati umin benei merari qish ben 'abdi va'azaryahu ben yehalel'el umin hageireshuni yo'akh ben zimah ve'eiden ben yo'akh. umin benei 'elizafan shimri vi'u'el vi'i'el umin benei 'asaf zekharyahu umatanyahu. umin benei heiman yekhu'el yekhi'el veshim'i umin benei yedutun shema'yah ve'uzi'el. vaya'asfu 'et 'akheihem vayitqadeshu vayabo'u khemizvat hamelekh bedibrei ihoh letaher bet ihoh. vayabo'u hakohanim lifnimah bet ihoh letaher vayozi'u 'et kal hatum'ah 'asher maze'u beheikhal ihoh lakhazar bet ihoh vayqabelu halviyim lehozi lenakhal qidron khuzah. vayakhelu be'ekhad lakhodesh harishon leqadesh ubeyom shemonah lakhodesh ba'u le'ulam ihoh vayqadeshu 'et bet ihoh leyamim shemonah ubeyom shishah 'asar lakhodesh harishon kilu. vayabo'u fenimah 'el khizqiyahu hamelekh vayomeru tiharnu 'et kal bet ihoh 'et mizbakh ha'olah ve'et kal keilav ve'et shulkhan hama'arekhet ve'et kal keilav. ve'et kal hakeilim 'asher hizniakh hamelekh 'akhaz bemalkhuto bema'alo heikhanu vehiqdashenu vehinam lifnei mizbakh ihoh. vayashkem yekhizqiyahu hamelekh vaye'esof 'et sarei ha'ir vaya'al bet ihoh. vayabi'u farim shib'ah ve'eilim shib'ah ukhebasim shib'ah uzefirei 'izim shib'ah lekhatat 'al hamamlakhah ve'al hamiqdash ve'al yehudah vayomer libnei 'aharon hakohanim leha'alot 'al mizbakh ihoh. vayishkhatu habaqar vayqabelu hakohanim 'et hadam vayizrequ hamizbeikhah vayishkhatu ha'eilim vayizrequ hadam hamizbeikhah vayishkhatu hakebasim vayizrequ hadam hamizbeikhah. vayagishu 'et se'irei hakhatat lifnei hamelekh vehaqahal vayismekhu yedeihem 'aleihem. vayishkhatum hakohanim vaykhate'u 'et damam hamizbeikhah lekhaper 'al kal yisra'el ki lekhal yisra'el 'amar hamelekh ha'olah vehakhatat. vaya'amed 'et halviyim bet ihoh bimziltayim binbalim ubekhinorot bemizvat david vegad khozeh hamelekh venatan hanabi ki beyad ihoh hamizvah beyad nebi'av. vaya'amdu halviyim bikhlei david vehakohanim bakhazozerot. vayomer khizqiyahu leha'alot ha'olah lehamizbeiakh ube'et heikhel ha'olah heikhel shir ihoh vehakhazozerot ve'al yedei kelei david melekh yisra'el. vekhal haqahal mishtakhavim vehashir meshorer vehakhazozerot makhazozerim makhzerim hakol 'ad likhlot ha'olah. ukhekhalot leha'alot kare'u hamelekh vekhal hanimze'im 'ito vayishtakhavu. vayomer yekhizqiyahu hamelekh vehasarim lalviyim lehalel ihoh bedibrei david ve'asaf hakhozeh vayhalu 'ad lesimkhah vayiqedu vayishtakhavu. vaya'an yekhizqiyahu vayomer 'atah mileitem yedkhem ihoh goshu vehabi'u zebakhim vetodot lebet ihoh vayabi'u haqahal zebakhim vetodot vekhal nedib leb 'olot. vayhi mispar ha'olah 'asher heibi'u haqahal baqar shib'im 'eilim mei'ah kebasim matayim le'olah ihoh kal 'eleh. vehaqodashim baqar shesh mei'ot vezon sheloshet 'alafim. raq hakohanim hayu lim'at velo yakhelu lehafshit 'et kal ha'olot vayekhazequm 'akheihem halviyim 'ad kelot hamelakhah ve'ad yitqadeshu hakohanim ki halviyim yishrei leibab lehitqadesh meihakohanim. vegam 'olah larob bekhelbei hashelamim ubanesakhim la'olah vatikon 'abodat bet ihoh. vayismakh yekhizqiyahu vekhal ha'am 'al haheikhin ha'elohim la'am ki befit'om hayah hadabar. vayishlakh yekhizqiyahu 'al kal yisra'el vihudah vegam 'igerot katab 'al 'efrayim umenasheh labo lebet ihoh birushalim la'asot pesakh ihoh 'elohei yisra'el. vayiva'az hamelekh vesarav vekhal haqahal birushalim la'asot hapesakh bakhodesh hasheini. ki lo yakhelu la'asoto ba'et hahi ki hakohanim lo hitqadeshu lemadai veha'am lo ne'esfu lirushalim. vayishar hadabar be'einei hamelekh ube'einei kal haqahal. vaya'amidu dabar leha'abir qol bekhal yisra'el mibe'er sheba' ve'ad dan labo la'asot pesakh ihoh 'elohei yisra'el birushalim ki lo larob 'asu kakatub. vayeilekhu harazim ba'igerot miyad hamelekh vesarav bekhal yisra'el vihudah ukhemizvat hamelekh leimor benei yisra'el shubu 'el ihoh 'elohei 'abraham yizkhaq veyisra'el veyashob 'el hapeleitah hanish'eret lakhem mikaf malkhei 'ashur. ve'al tihyu ka'aboteikhem vekha'akheikhem 'asher ma'alu ihoh 'elohei 'aboteihem vayitenem leshamah ka'asher 'atem ro'im. 'atah 'al taqshu 'arepekhem ka'aboteikhem tenu yad ihoh ubo'u lemiqdasho 'asher hiqdish le'olam ve'ibdu 'et ihoh 'eloheikhem veyashob mikem kharon 'apo. ki beshubekhem 'al ihoh 'akheikhem ubeneikhem lerakhamim lifnei shobeihem velashub la'arez hazot ki khanun verakhum ihoh 'eloheikhem velo yasir panim mikem 'im tashubu 'eilav. vayihyu harazim 'oberim mei'ir la'ir be'erez 'efrayim umenasheh ve'ad zebulun vayihyu maskhiqim 'aleihem umal'igim bam. 'akh 'anashim mei'asher umenasheh umizebulun nikhne'u vayabo'u lirushalim. gam bihudah hayetah yad ha'elohim latet lahem leb 'ekhad la'asot mizvat hamelekh vehasarim bidbar ihoh. vayei'asefu yerushalim 'am rab la'asot 'et khag hamazot bakhodesh hasheini qahal larob me'od. vayaqumu vayasiru 'et hamizbekhot 'asher birushalim ve'et kal hamqaterot heisiru vayashlikhu lenakhal qidron. vayishkhatu hapesakh be'arba'ah 'asar lakhodesh hasheini vehakohanim vehalviyim nikhlemu vayitqadeshu vayabi'u 'olot bet ihoh. vaya'amdu 'al 'amedam kemishpatam ketorat mosheh 'ish ha'elohim hakohanim zoreqim 'et hadam miyad halviyim. ki rabat baqahal 'asher lo hitqadashu vehalviyim 'al shekhitat hapesakhim lekhol lo tahor lehaqdish ihoh. ki marbit ha'am rabat mei'efrayim umenasheh yisashkhar uzebulun lo hiteharu ki 'akhelu 'et hapesakh belo khakatub ki hitpalel yekhizqiyahu 'aleihem leimor ihoh hatob yekhaper be'ad. kal lebabo heikhin lidrosh ha'elohim ihoh 'elohei 'abotav velo ketahorat haqodesh. vayishma' ihoh 'el yekhizqiyahu vayirpa 'et ha'am. vaya'asu benei yisra'el hanimze'im birushalim 'et khag hamazot shib'at yamim besimkhah gedolah umehalim ihoh yom beyom halviyim vehakohanim bikhlei 'oz ihoh. vaydaber yekhizqiyahu 'al leb kal halviyim hamaskilim seikhel tob ihoh vayokhelu 'et hamo'ed shib'at hayamim mezabekhim zibkhei shelamim umitvadim ihoh 'elohei 'aboteihem. vayiva'azu kal haqahal la'asot shib'at yamim 'akheirim vaya'asu shib'at yamim simkhah. ki khizqiyahu melekh yehudah heirim laqahal 'elef parim veshib'at 'alafim zon vehasarim heirimu laqahal parim 'elef vezon 'aseret 'alafim vayitqadeshu khohanim larob. vayismekhu kal qehal yehudah vehakohanim vehalviyim vekhal haqahal haba'im miyisra'el vehageirim haba'im mei'erez yisra'el vehayoshebim bihudah. vatehi simkhah gedolah birushalim ki mimei shelomoh ben david melekh yisra'el lo khazot birushalim. vayaqumu hakohanim halviyim vaybarakhu 'et ha'am vayishama' beqolam vatabo tefilatam lim'on qadesho lashamayim. ukhekhalot kal zot yaze'u kal yisra'el hanimze'im le'arei yehudah vayshaberu hamazeibot vaygade'u ha'asheirim vaynatezu 'et habamot ve'et hamizbekhot mikal yehudah ubinyamin ube'efrayim umenasheh 'ad lekhaleh vayashubu kal benei yisra'el 'ish la'akhuzato le'areihem. vaya'amed yekhizqiyahu 'et makhleqot hakohanim vehalviyim 'al makhleqotam 'ish kefi 'abodato lakohanim velalviyim le'olah velishlamim lesharet ulehodot ulehalel besha'arei makhanot ihoh. umenat hamelekh min rekhusho la'olot le'olot haboqer veha'ereb veha'olot lashabatot velekhodashim velamo'adim kakatub betorat ihoh. vayomer la'am leyoshebei yerushalim latet menat hakohanim vehalviyim lema'an yekhezqu betorat ihoh. vekhifroz hadabar hirbu benei yisra'el reishit dagan tirosh veyizhar udebash vekhol tebu'at sadeh uma'sar hakol larob heibi'u. ubenei yisra'el vihudah hayoshebim be'arei yehudah gam hem ma'sar baqar vazon uma'sar qadashim hamqudashim ihoh 'eloheihem heibi'u vayitenu 'areimot 'areimot. bakhodesh hashelishi heikhelu ha'areimot leyisod ubakhodesh hashebi'i kilu. vayabo'u yekhizqiyahu vehasarim vayir'u 'et ha'areimot vaybarakhu 'et ihoh ve'et 'amo yisra'el. vayidrosh yekhizqiyahu 'al hakohanim vehalviyim 'al ha'areimot. vayomer 'eilav 'azaryahu hakohen harosh lebet zadoq vayomer meihakhel haterumah labi bet ihoh 'akhol vesaboa' vehoter 'ad larob ki ihoh beirakh 'et 'amo vehanotar 'et hehamon hazeh. vayomer yekhizqiyahu lehakhin leshakhot bebet ihoh vayakhinu. vayabi'u 'et haterumah vehama'aser vehaqodashim be'emunah va'aleihem nagid konanyahu kananyahu haleivi veshim'i 'akhihu mishneh. vikhi'el va'azazyahu venakhat va'asah'el virimot veyozabad ve'eli'el veyismakhyahu umakhat ubenayahu peqidim miyad kavnanyahu kananyahu veshim'i 'akhiv bemifqad yekhizqiyahu hamelekh va'azaryahu negid bet ha'elohim. veqorei ben yimnah haleivi hasho'er lamizrakhah 'al nidbot ha'elohim latet terumat ihoh veqadeshei haqodashim. ve'al yado 'eiden uminyamin veyeishua' ushema'yahu 'amaryahu ushekhanyahu be'arei hakohanim be'emunah latet la'akheihem bemakhleqot kagadol kaqatan. milebad hityakhsam lizkharim miben shalosh shanim ulema'lah lekhal haba lebet ihoh lidbar yom beyomo la'abodatam bemishmerotam kemakhleqoteihem. ve'et hityakhes hakohanim lebet 'aboteihem vehalviyim miben 'esrim shanah ulema'elah bemishmeroteihem bemakhleqoteihem. ulehityakhes bekhal tapam nesheihem ubeneihem ubenoteihem lekhal qahal ki be'emunatam yitqadeshu qodesh. velibnei 'aharon hakohanim bisdei migrash 'areihem bekhal 'ir va'ir 'anashim 'asher niqebu besheimot latet manot lekhal zakhar bakohanim ulekhal hityakhes balviyim. vaya'as kazot yekhizqiyahu bekhal yehudah vaya'as hatob vehayashar veha'emet lifnei ihoh 'elohav. ubekhal ma'aseh 'asher heikhel ba'abodat bet ha'elohim ubatorah ubamizvah lidrosh leilohav bekhal lebabo 'asah vehizliakh. 'akharei hadebarim veha'emet ha'eleh ba sankheirib melekh 'ashur vayabo bihudah vayikhan 'al he'arim habezurot vayomer lebiq'am 'eilav. vayar yekhizqiyahu ki ba sankheirib ufanav lamilkhamah 'al yerushalim. vayiva'az 'im sarav vegiborav listom 'et meimei ha'ayanot 'asher mikhuz la'ir vaya'zeruhu. vayiqabezu 'am rab vayistemu 'et kal hama'yanot ve'et hanakhal hashotef betokh ha'arez leimor lamah yabo'u malkhei 'ashur umaze'u mayim rabim. vayitkhazaq vayiben 'et kal hakhomah haperuzah vaya'al 'al hamigdalot velakhuzah hakhomah 'akheret vaykhazeq 'et hamilo 'ir david vaya'as shelakh larob umaginim. vayiten sarei milkhamot 'al ha'am vayiqbezem 'eilav 'el rekhob sha'ar ha'ir vaydaber 'al lebabam leimor. khizqu ve'imzu 'al tire'u ve'al teikhatu mipenei melekh 'ashur umilifnei kal hehamon 'asher 'imo ki 'imanu rab mei'imo. 'imo zeroa' basar ve'imanu ihoh 'eloheinu le'azereinu ulehilakhem milkhamoteinu vayisamekhu ha'am 'al dibrei yekhizqiyahu melekh yehudah. 'akhar zeh lakh sankheirib melekh 'ashur 'abadav yerushalaymah vehu 'al lakhish vekhal memshalto 'imo 'al yekhizqiyahu melekh yehudah ve'al kal yehudah 'asher birushalim leimor. koh 'amar sankheirib melekh 'ashur 'al mah 'atem botekhim veyoshebim bemazor birushalim. halo yekhizqiyahu masit 'etkhem latet 'etkhem lamut bera'ab ubezama leimor ihoh 'eloheinu yazileinu mikaf melekh 'ashur. halo hu yekhizqiyahu heisir 'et bamotav ve'et mizbekhotav vayomer lihudah velirushalim leimor lifnei mizbeiakh 'ekhad tishtakhavu ve'alav taqtiru. halo teide'u meh 'asiti 'ani va'abotai lekhol 'amei ha'arazot hayakhol yakhelu 'elohei goyei ha'arazot lehazil 'et 'arzam miyadi. mi bekhal 'elohei hagoyim ha'eleh 'asher hekherimu 'abotai 'asher yakhol lehazil 'et 'amo miyadi ki yukhal 'eloheikhem lehazil 'etkhem miyadi. ve'atah 'al yashi 'etkhem khizqiyahu ve'al yasit 'etkhem kazot ve'al ta'aminu lo ki lo yukhal kal 'eloha kal go umamlakhah lehazil 'amo miyadi umiyad 'abotai 'af ki 'eloheikhem lo yazilu 'etkhem miyadi. ve'od diberu 'abadav 'al ihoh ha'elohim ve'al yekhizqiyahu 'abdo. usefarim katab lekharef ihoh 'elohei yisra'el veleimor 'alav leimor keilohei goyei ha'arazot 'asher lo hizilu 'amam miyadi ken lo yazil 'elohei yekhizqiyahu 'amo miyadi. vayiqre'u beqol gadol yehudit 'al 'am yerushalim 'asher 'al hakhomah leyare'am ulebahalam lema'an yilkedu 'et ha'ir. vaydaberu 'el 'elohei yerushalim ke'al 'elohei 'amei ha'arez ma'aseh yedei ha'adam. vayitpalel yekhizqiyahu hamelekh visha'yahu ben 'amoz hanabi 'al zot vayiz'aqu hashamayim. vayishlakh ihoh mal'akh vayakhkhed kal gibor khayil venagid vesar bemakhaneh melekh 'ashur vayashab beboshet panim le'arzo vayabo bet 'elohav umizi'o umizi'ei mei'av sham hipiluhu bekhareb. vayosha' ihoh 'et yekhizqiyahu ve'et yoshebei yerushalim miyad sankheirib melekh 'ashur umiyad kol vaynahalem misabib. verabim mebi'im minkhah ihoh lirushalim umigdanot likhizqiyahu melekh yehudah vayinasei le'einei khal hagoyim mei'akharei khen. bayamim hahem khalah yekhizqiyahu 'ad lamut vayitpalel 'el ihoh vayomer lo umofet natan lo. velo khigmul 'alav heishib yekhizqiyahu ki gabah libo vayhi 'alav qezef ve'al yehudah virushalim. vayikana' yekhizqiyahu begobah libo hu veyoshebei yerushalim velo ba 'aleihem qezef ihoh bimei yekhizqiyahu. vayhi likhizqiyahu 'osher vekhabod harbeh me'od ve'ozarot 'asah lo lekhesef ulezahab ule'eben yeqarah velibsamim ulemaginim ulekhol kelei khemdah. umiskenot litbu'at dagan vetirosh veyizhar ve'uravot lekhal beheimah ubeheimah va'adarim la'aveirot. ve'arim 'asah lo umiqneh zon ubaqar larob ki natan lo 'elohim rekhush rab me'od. vehu yekhizqiyahu satam 'et moza meimei gikhon ha'elyon vayaysherem lematah ma'rabah le'ir david vayazlakh yekhizqiyahu bekhal ma'aseihu. vekhen bimlizei sarei babel hamshalekhim 'alav lidrosh hamofet 'asher hayah ba'arez 'azabo ha'elohim lenasoto lada'at kal bilbabo. veyeter dibrei yekhizqiyahu vakhasadav hinam ketubim bakhazon yesha'yahu ben 'amoz hanabi 'al seifer malkhei yehudah veyisra'el. vayishkab yekhizqiyahu 'im 'abotav vayiqberuhu bema'aleh qibrei benei david vekhabod 'asu lo bemoto kal yehudah veyoshebei yerushalim vayimlokh menasheh beno takhtav. ben shetem 'esreh shanah menasheh bemalekho vakhamishim vekhamesh shanah malakh birushalim. vaya'as hara' be'einei ihoh keto'abot hagoyim 'asher horish ihoh mipenei benei yisra'el. vayashab vayiben 'et habamot 'asher nitaz yekhizqiyahu 'abiv vayaqem mizbekhot labe'alim vaya'as 'asheirot vayishtakhu lekhal zeba hashamayim vaya'abod 'otam. ubanah mizbekhot bebet ihoh 'asher 'amar ihoh birushalim yihyeh shemi le'olam. vayiben mizbekhot lekhal zeba hashamayim bishtei khazrot bet ihoh. vehu he'ebir 'et banav ba'esh begei ben hinom ve'onen venikhesh vekhishef ve'asah 'ob veyide'oni hirbah la'asot hara' be'einei ihoh lehakh'iso. vayasem 'et pesel hasemel 'asher 'asah bebet ha'elohim 'asher 'amar 'elohim 'el david ve'el shelomoh beno babayit hazeh ubirushalim 'asher bakharti mikol shibtei yisra'el 'asim 'et shemi le'eilom. velo 'osif lehasir 'et regel yisra'el mei'al ha'adamah 'asher he'emadti la'aboteikhem raq 'im yishmeru la'asot 'et kal 'asher zivitim lekhal hatorah vehakhuqim vehamishpatim beyad mosheh. vayeta' menasheh 'et yehudah veyoshebei yerushalim la'asot ra' min hagoyim 'asher hishmid ihoh mipenei benei yisra'el. vaydaber ihoh 'el menasheh ve'el 'amo velo hiqshibu. vayabei ihoh 'aleihem 'et sarei hazaba 'asher lemelekh 'ashur vayilkedu 'et menasheh bakhokhim vaya'asruhu bankhushtayim vayolikhuhu babelah. ukhehazer lo khilah 'et penei ihoh 'elohav vayikana' me'od milifnei 'elohei 'abotav. vayitpalel 'eilav vayei'ater lo vayishma' tekhinato vayshibeihu yerushalim lemalkhuto vayeida' menasheh ki ihoh hu ha'elohim. ve'akharei khen banah khomah khizonah le'ir david ma'rabah legikhon banakhal velabo besha'ar hadagim vesabab la'ofel vayagbiheha me'od vayasem sarei khayil bekhal he'arim habezurot bihudah. vayasar 'et 'elohei haneikhar ve'et hasemel mibet ihoh vekhal hamizbekhot 'asher banah behar bet ihoh ubirushalim vayashlekh khuzah la'ir. vayakhen vayiben 'et mizbakh ihoh vayizbakh 'alav zibkhei shelamim vetodah vayomer lihudah la'abod 'et ihoh 'elohei yisra'el. 'abal 'od ha'am zobekhim babamot raq ihoh 'eloheihem. veyeter dibrei menasheh utefilato 'el 'elohav vedibrei hakhozim hamdaberim 'eilav beshem ihoh 'elohei yisra'el hinam 'al dibrei malkhei yisra'el. utefilato vehei'ater lo vekhal khatato uma'lo vehameqomot 'asher banah bahem bamot vehe'emid ha'asheirim vehapesilim lifnei hikane'o hinam ketubim 'al dibrei khozai. vayishkab menasheh 'im 'abotav vayiqberuhu beito vayimlokh 'amon beno takhtav. ben 'esrim ushetayim shanah 'amon bemalekho ushetayim shanim malakh birushalim. vaya'as hara' be'einei ihoh ka'asher 'asah menasheh 'abiv ulekhal hapesilim 'asher 'asah menasheh 'abiv zibakh 'amon vaya'abdem. velo nikhna' milifnei ihoh kehikana' menasheh 'abiv ki hu 'amon hirbah 'ashmah. vayiqsheru 'alav 'abadav vaymituhu bebeito. vayaku 'am ha'arez 'et kal haqosherim 'al hamelekh 'amon vayamlikhu 'am ha'arez 'et yoshiyahu beno takhtav. ben shemoneh shanim yoshiyahu bemalekho usheloshim ve'akhat shanah malakh birushalim. vaya'as hayashar be'einei ihoh vayeilekh bedarkhei david 'abiv velo sar yamin usemol. ubishmoneh shanim lemalekho vehu 'odenu na'ar heikhel lidrosh leilohei david 'abiv ubishtem 'esreh shanah heikhel letaher 'et yehudah virushalim min habamot veha'asheirim vehapesilim vehamaseikhot. vaynatezu lefanav 'et mizbekhot habe'alim vehakhamanim 'asher lema'lah mei'aleihem gideia' veha'asheirim vehapesilim vehamaseikhot shibar veheidaq vayizroq 'al penei haqebarim hazobekhim lahem. ve'azmot kohanim saraf 'al mizbekhotaym mizbekhotam vaytaher 'et yehudah ve'et yerushalim. ube'arei menasheh ve'efrayim veshim'on ve'ad naftali bahar bateihem bekharboteihem sabib. vaynatez 'et hamizbekhot ve'et ha'asheirim vehapesilim kitat leheidaq vekhal hakhamanim gida' bekhal 'erez yisra'el vayashab lirushalim. ubishnat shemoneh 'esreh lemalekho letaher ha'arez vehabayit lakh 'et shafan ben 'azalyahu ve'et ma'aseiyahu sar ha'ir ve'et yo'akh ben yo'akhaz hamazkir lekhazeq 'et bet ihoh 'elohav. vayabo'u 'el khilqiyahu hakohen hagadol vayitenu 'et hakesef hamuba bet 'elohim 'asher 'asefu halviyim shomerei hasaf miyad menasheh ve'efrayim umikol she'eirit yisra'el umikal yehudah ubinyamin veyoshebei vayashubu yerushalim. vayitenu 'al yad 'oseh hamelakhah hamufqadim bebet ihoh vayitenu 'oto 'osei hamelakhah 'asher 'osim bebet ihoh libdoq ulekhazeq habayit. vayitenu lekharashim velabonim liqnot 'abnei makhzeb ve'eizim lamkhaberot uleqarot 'et habatim 'asher hishkhitu malkhei yehudah. veha'anashim 'osim be'emunah bamelakhah va'aleihem mufqadim yakhat ve'obadyahu halviyim min benei merari uzekharyah umeshulam min benei haqehatim lenazeiakh vehalviyim kal meibin bikhlei shir. ve'al hasabalim umenazekhim lekhol 'oseh melakhah la'abodah va'abodah umeihalviyim sofrim veshoterim vesho'arim. ubehozi'am 'et hakesef hamuba bet ihoh maza khilqiyahu hakohen 'et seifer torat ihoh beyad mosheh. vaya'an khilqiyahu vayomer 'el shafan hasofer seifer hatorah mazati bebet ihoh vayiten khilqiyahu 'et haseifer 'el shafan. vayabei shafan 'et haseifer 'el hamelekh vayasheb 'od 'et hamelekh dabar leimor kol 'asher nitan beyad 'abadekha hem 'osim. vayatikhu 'et hakesef hanimza bebet ihoh vayitenuhu 'al yad hamufqadim ve'al yad 'osei hamelakhah. vayaged shafan hasofer lamelekh leimor seifer natan li khilqiyahu hakohen vayiqra bo shafan lifnei hamelekh. vayhi kishmoa' hamelekh 'et dibrei hatorah vayiqra' 'et begadav. vayzav hamelekh 'et khilqiyahu ve'et 'akhiqam benosha fan ve'et 'abdon ben mikhah ve'et shafan hasofer ve'et 'asayah 'ebed hamelekh leimor. lekhu dirshu 'et ihoh ba'adi ube'ad hanish'ar beyisra'el ubihudah 'al dibrei haseifer 'asher nimza ki gedolah khamat ihoh 'asher nitekhah banu 'al 'asher lo shameru 'aboteinu 'et debar ihoh la'asot kekhal hakatub 'al haseifer hazeh. vayeilekh khilqiyahu va'asher hamelekh 'el khuldah hanebi'ah 'eishet shalum ben toqhat taqehat ben khasrah shomer habegadim vehi yoshebet birushalim bamishneh vaydaberu 'eileha kazot. vatomer lahem koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el 'imru la'ish 'asher shalakh 'etkhem 'eilai. koh 'amar ihoh hini meibi ra'ah 'al hamaqom hazeh ve'al yoshebav 'et kal ha'alot haketubot 'al haseifer 'asher qare'u lifnei melekh yehudah. takhat 'asher 'azabuni vayaqtiru vayqateru leilohim 'akheirim lema'an hakh'iseini bekhol ma'asei yedeihem vetitakh khamati bamaqom hazeh velo tikhbeh. ve'el melekh yehudah hasholeiakh 'etkhem lidrosh ihoh koh tomeru 'eilav koh 'amar ihoh 'elohei yisra'el hadebarim 'asher shama'eta. ya'an rakh lebabekha vatikana' milifnei 'elohim beshame'akha 'et debarav 'al hamaqom hazeh ve'al yoshebav vatikana' lefanai vatiqra' 'et begadekha vateibek lefanai vegam 'ani shama'ti ne'um ihoh. hini 'osifkha 'el 'abotekha vene'esafta 'el qibrotekha beshalom velo tir'enah 'einekha bekhol hara'ah 'asher 'ani meibi 'al hamaqom hazeh ve'al yoshebav vayashibu 'et hamelekh dabar. vayishlakh hamelekh vaye'esof 'et kal ziqnei yehudah virushalim. vaya'al hamelekh bet ihoh vekhal 'ish yehudah veyoshebei yerushalim vehakohanim vehalviyim vekhal ha'am migadol ve'ad qatan vayiqra be'azeneihem 'et kal dibrei seifer haberit hanimza bet ihoh. vaya'amod hamelekh 'al 'amedo vayikhrot 'et haberit lifnei ihoh lalekhet 'akharei ihoh velishmor 'et mizvotav ve'eidevotav vekhuqav bekhal lebabo ubekhal nafsho la'asot 'et dibrei haberit haketubim 'al haseifer hazeh. vaya'amed 'et kal hanimza birushalim ubinyamin vaya'asu yoshebei yerushalim kibrit 'elohim 'elohei 'aboteihem. vayasar yoshiyahu 'et kal hato'eibot mikal ha'arazot 'asher libnei yisra'el vaya'abed 'et kal hanimza beyisra'el la'abod 'et ihoh 'eloheihem kal yamav lo saru mei'akharei ihoh 'elohei 'aboteihem. vaya'as yoshiyahu birushalim pesakh ihoh vayishkhatu hapesakh be'arba'ah 'asar lakhodesh harishon. vaya'amed hakohanim 'al mishmerotam vaykhazeqem la'abodat bet ihoh. vayomer lalviyim hamebunim hamebinim lekhal yisra'el haqedoshim ihoh tenu 'et 'aron haqodesh babayit 'asher banah shelomoh ben david melekh yisra'el 'en lakhem masa bakatef 'atah 'ibdu 'et ihoh 'eloheikhem ve'et 'amo yisra'el. vehikonu lebet 'aboteikhem kemakhleqoteikhem bikhtab david melekh yisra'el ubemikhtab shelomoh beno. ve'imdu baqodesh liflugot bet ha'abot la'akheikhem benei ha'am vakhaluqat bet 'ab lalviyim. veshakhatu hapasakh vehitqadeshu vehakhinu la'akheikhem la'asot kidbar ihoh beyad mosheh. vayarem yoshiyahu libnei ha'am zon kebasim ubenei 'izim hakol lapesakhim lekhal hanimza lemispar sheloshim 'elef ubaqar sheloshet 'alafim 'eleh meirekhush hamelekh. vesarav lindabah la'am lakohanim velalviyim heirimu khilqiyah uzekharyahu vikhi'el negidei bet ha'elohim lakohanim natenu lapesakhim 'alpayim veshesh mei'ot ubaqar shelosh mei'ot. vekhavnanyahu vekhananyahu ushema'yahu unetan'el 'ekhav vakhashabyahu vi'i'el veyozabad sarei halviyim heirimu lalviyim lapesakhim khameishet 'alafim ubaqar khamesh mei'ot. vatikon ha'abodah vaya'amdu hakohanim 'al 'amedam vehalviyim 'al makhleqotam kemizvat hamelekh. vayishkhatu hapasakh vayizrequ hakohanim miyadam vehalviyim mafshitim. vayasiru ha'olah letitam lemiflagot lebet 'abot libnei ha'am lehaqrib ihoh kakatub beseifer mosheh vekhen labaqar. vaybashelu hapesakh ba'esh kamishpat vehaqodashim bishelu basirot ubadevadim ubazeilakhot vayarizu lekhal benei ha'am. ve'akhar heikhinu lahem velakohanim ki hakohanim benei 'aharon beha'alot ha'olah vehakhalabim 'ad layelah vehalviyim heikhinu lahem velakohanim benei 'aharon. vehamshorarim benei 'asaf 'al ma'amadam kemizvat david ve'asaf veheiman vidutun khozeh hamelekh vehasho'arim lesha'ar vasha'ar 'en lahem lasur mei'al 'abodatam ki 'akheihem halviyim heikhinu lahem. vatikon kal 'abodat ihoh bayom hahu la'asot hapesakh veha'alot 'olot 'al mizbakh ihoh kemizvat hamelekh yoshiyahu. vaya'asu benei yisra'el hanimze'im 'et hapesakh ba'et hahi ve'et khag hamazot shib'at yamim. velo na'asah fesakh kamohu beyisra'el mimei shemu'el hanabi vekhal malkhei yisra'el lo 'asu kapesakh 'asher 'asah yoshiyahu vehakohanim vehalviyim vekhal yehudah veyisra'el hanimza veyoshebei yerushalim. bishmoneh 'esreh shanah lemalkhut yoshiyahu na'asah hapesakh hazeh. 'akharei khal zot 'asher heikhin yoshiyahu 'et habayit 'alah nekho melekh mizrayim lehilakhem bekharkemish 'al perat vayeizei liqrato yoshiyahu. vayishlakh 'eilav mal'akhim leimor mah li valakh melekh yehudah lo 'alekha 'atah hayom ki 'el bet milkhamti veilohim 'amar lebahaleini khadal lekha mei'elohim 'asher 'imi ve'al yashkhitekha. velo heiseb yoshiyahu fanav mimenu ki lehilakhem bo hitkhapes velo shama' 'el dibrei nekho mipi 'elohim vayabo lehilakhem bebiq'at megido. vayoru hayorim lamelekh yoshiyahu vayomer hamelekh la'abadav ha'abiruni ki hakholeiti me'od. vaya'abiruhu 'abadav min hamerkabah vayarkibuhu 'al rekheb hamishneh 'asher lo vayolikhuhu yerushalim vayamat vayiqaber beqibrot 'abotav vekhal yehudah virushalim mit'abelim 'al yoshiyahu. vayqonen yirmeyahu 'al yoshiyahu vayomeru khal hasharim vehasharot beqinoteihem 'al yoshiyahu 'ad hayom vayitenum lekhoq 'al yisra'el vehinam ketubim 'al haqinot. veyeter dibrei yoshiyahu vakhasadav kakatub betorat ihoh. udebarav harishonim veha'akharonim hinam ketubim 'al seifer malkhei yisra'el vihudah. vayiqkhu 'am ha'arez 'et yeho'akhaz ben yoshiyahu vayamlikhuhu takhat 'abiv birushalim. ben shalosh ve'esrim shanah yo'akhaz bemalekho usheloshah khodashim malakh birushalim. vaysireihu melekh mizrayim birushalim vaya'anosh 'et ha'arez mei'ah khikar kesef vekhikar zahab. vayamlekh melekh mizrayim 'et 'elyaqim 'akhiv 'al yehudah virushalim vayaseb 'et shemo yehoyaqim ve'et yo'akhaz 'akhiv laqakh nekho vaybi'eihu mizrayemah. ben 'esrim vekhamesh shanah yehoyaqim bemalekho ve'akhat 'esreh shanah malakh birushalim vaya'as hara' be'einei ihoh 'elohav. 'alav 'alah nebukhadnezar melekh babel vaya'asreihu bankhushtayim leholikho babelah. umikelei bet ihoh heibi nebukhadnezar lebabel vayitenem beheikhalo bebabel. veyeter dibrei yehoyaqim veto'abotav 'asher 'asah vehanimza 'alav hinam ketubim 'al seifer malkhei yisra'el vihudah vayimlokh yehoyakhin beno takhtav. ben shemoneh shanim yehoyakhin bemalekho usheloshah khodashim va'aseret yamim malakh birushalim vaya'as hara' be'einei ihoh. velitshubat hashanah shalakh hamelekh nebukhadnezar vaybi'eihu babelah 'im kelei khemdat bet ihoh vayamlekh 'et zidqiyahu 'akhiv 'al yehudah virushalim. ben 'esrim ve'akhat shanah zidqiyahu bemalekho ve'akhat 'esreh shanah malakh birushalim. vaya'as hara' be'einei ihoh 'elohav lo nikhna' milifnei yirmeyahu hanabi mipi ihoh. vegam bamelekh nebukhadnezar marad 'asher hishbi'o beilohim vayeqesh 'et 'arepo vai'amez 'et lebabo mishub 'el ihoh 'elohei yisra'el. gam kal sarei hakohanim veha'am hirbu lim'al ma'al kekhol to'abot hagoyim vaytame'u 'et bet ihoh 'asher hiqdish birushalim. vayishlakh ihoh 'elohei 'aboteihem 'aleihem beyad mal'akhav hashkem veshaloakh ki khamal 'al 'amo ve'al me'ono. vayihyu mal'ibim bemal'akhei ha'elohim ubozim debarav umita'te'im binbi'av 'ad 'alot khamat ihoh be'amo 'ad le'en marpei. vaya'al 'aleihem 'et melekh kasdiyim kasdim vayaharog bakhureihem bakhereb bebet miqdasham velo khamal 'al bakhur ubetulah zaqen veyashesh hakol natan beyado. vekhol kelei bet ha'elohim hagedolim vehaqetanim ve'ozerot bet ihoh ve'ozerot hamelekh vesarav hakol heibi babel. vayisrefu 'et bet ha'elohim vaynatezu 'et khomat yerushalim vekhal 'armenoteha sarefu ba'esh vekhal kelei makhamadeha lehashkhit. vayegel hashe'eirit min hakhereb 'el babel vayihyu lo ulebanav la'abadim 'ad melokh malkhut paras. lemalot debar ihoh befi yirmeyahu 'ad razetah ha'arez 'et shabetoteha kal yemei hashamah shabatah lemalot shib'im shanah. ubishnat 'akhat lekhoresh melekh paras likhlot debar ihoh befi yirmeyahu hei'ir ihoh 'et ruakh koresh melekh paras vaya'aber qol bekhal malkhuto vegam bemikhtab leimor. koh 'amar koresh melekh paras kal mamlekhot ha'arez natan li ihoh 'elohei hashamayim vehu faqad 'alai libnot lo bayit birushalim 'asher bihudah mi bakhem mikal 'amo ihoh 'elohav 'imo veya'al.
